igbo: Iyabo Obasanjo-Bello (onye amụrụ na 27 April 1967) bụ na Nigerian President Olusegun Obasanjo na Oluremi Obasanjo
Obasanjo-Bello gụrụ akwụkwọ na Corona School di na Victoria Island, Lagos, Capital School di na Kaduna, nakwa Queen's College di na Lagos

O nwetara asambodo na Veterinary Medicine na University of Ibadan n'afọ 1988, master's degree na Epidemiology na University of California, Davis di na Davis, California, United States, n'afọ 1990, nakwa PhD n'otu ngalaba a na Cornell University di na Ithaca, New York, n'afọ 1994
Tupu onu ogugu ndi omeiwu ya, Obasanjo-Bello bu onye onye ome iwu na-ahu maka ahu ike n' Ogun Steeti
A ghọpụtara ya dika onye Senator na-anọchi anya Ogun Central Senatorial District nke Ogun State na April 2007
Ọ dọrọ ndọrọ ọchichi ọzọ mana Olugbenga Onaolapo Obadara nke Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) meriri ya site na-inweta votu 102,389 votes ebe ya bụ Obasanjo Bello nwetara votu 56,312
maka 2012

A ghọpụtara Obasanjo-Bello na Senate na Abali iri abuo na asatọ n'afo 2007 na platform ndi People's Democratic Party (PDP); mana onye ya na ya so zọọ ọkwa na Action Congress (AC) bụ Remilekun Bakare fufere isi ma si mba n'a-ọbụghị eziokwu, mana Ogun State Election Petition Tribunal kwụrụ na O mereriri
Ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii na-ahu maka Ahụike nakwa onye na-ahụ maka Nchebe & Ọgụgụ Isi, Ụgbọ ala, Sayensị na Nkà na Ụzụ, Mmụta, National Planning, na Inter-Parliamentary Kọmitii
Ọ pụrụ n'ọkwa mgbe emeriri ya na nghọpụta ndi Ngalaba Nlekọta na 9 April 2011
N'April 2003 na ụbọchị ntuli aka n'ozuzu ya, a gbara ụgbọala ya egbe n' Ifo Road na Steti Ogun
Ọ nọghị n'ụgbọala mana ndị okenye atọ na ụmụ abụọ nọ n'ụgbọala ahụ nwụrụ
E jideghị ndi mere mpụ a

N'April 2008, Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Mmebi Iwu na Ụba na Nigeria 'Economic and Financial Crimes Commission' (EFCC) nyochachara Obasanjo-Bello n'ihi nnyocha ndị metụtara Minista Na-ahụ Maka Ahụ Ike na onye ọrụ ya Prof
Adenike Grange, maka ịzụta ego ọha na eze Na njedebe afọ, Ụlọ ngbasa ozi ahụ eweghachighị na-enweghị isi nye ndị gọọmentị
Ọnụ ego ahụ bụ nde naira, bụ nke e kwuru na a ga-ekesa n'etiti Minista, onye Minista ya na ndị isi obodo na Senate na Ụlọ Ahụ Ike
A manyere Minista na onye ozo ya ka ha kwusi mgbe ha laghachiri ego ha; e mesịrị jide ha ma nyefee mgbapụta Iyabo Obasanjo-Bello ekweghi inyeghachi ego ya, nde Naira iri
O kwuru na ndị isi itoolu nọ na kọmitii ya 'gbara mbọ maka ego site n'ozi ha na-ahụ
O kwadoro ego a na ogbako banyere ike izulite ndi otu komiti ahuike ahu ndi gara Ghana
O kweghị ịpụta n'ihu EFCC Ọ bụ ezie na a kpọrọ ya, tinyere ndi ozi na ndị ọrụ gọọmenti ọzọ, ọ jụrụ ịbịa n'ụlọikpe

Otu izu mgbe e mesịrị, nnukwu ihe nkiri mere mgbe ndị isi nke EFCC gbalịrị ijide ya n'ụlọ ya na district Maitama nke obodo Abuja, mgbe ndị uweojii na-ahụ maka iwu na-eme ka ọ na-awụda mgbidi ya iji gbochie njide ya
N'afọ 2009, a kpụpụrụ ikpe ahụ n'Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na Abuja dị ka enweghi uru ọ bụla
Obasanjo-Bello kwuru na ebubo a bu 'ihe ndi ozo' ma kwuo na emegidere ya n'ihi na ọ bubu nwa nke onye isi ala
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Clinical Research na US tupu ya alaghachi na Naijiria n'afọ 2003Ọ bụ otu onye tinyere n'afọ 2013 otu onye galitere agalite na Harvard's Advanced Leadership Initiative
Ọrụ ya ndi ama-ama gụnyere
Alice Iyabo Ojo (onye amuru na abali iri-abuo na otu n’onwa iri-abuo n’afọ 1977) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri naNigerian film actress, onye nchikọ, na onye meputa
O gosiputara n’ime ihe nkiri otu bari na iri ise, ma mepụta ihe karịrị iri na ano nke ya
A mụrụ Iyabo Ojo dị ka Alice Iyabo Ogunro na ụbochi iri abuo na otu na onwa iri na abuo afor 1977 na Lagos, Nigeria, ọ bụ ezie na nna ya si Abeokuta, Ogun State
Ọ bụ ọdụdụ nwa n’ime ụmụ atọ, nwere ụmụnne nwoke abụọ ndị tọrọ ya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Lagos na National College, Gbagbada, tupu ọ gawa ọmụmụ Estate Management na Lagos State Polytechnic
N'ịbụ onye sonyeere otu egwuregwu na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Iyabo Ojo bidoro ọrụ ya na 1998
O debanyere aha ya na Actors Guild of Nigeria omekome (AGN) site na enyemaka nke Bimbo Akintola, ọ nwekwara ike ịkparịta ụka na ndị ọzọ
Ojo edewo ma gosipụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na 1998 nke Satanic, ihe nkiri Bekee
N’afọ 2002, ya na Baba Darijinwon malitere Yoruba-language ya
Na Jenụwarị 2015, ihe nkiri ya bụ Silence, nke gosipụtara Joseph Benjamin Alex Usifo, Fathia Balogun, na Doris Simeon,, bụ nke pụtara na Silverbird Cinema Ikeja, na Lagos
N’afọ 2004, Ojo bidoro imepụta ihe nkiri nke ya
Nmeputa mbu ya bu Bolutife, nke mezuru Bofeboko, Ololufe, Esan na Okunkun Biribiri
Ọ lụkwara di ya alụkwaghịm tupu oke aha ya amalite
Lụrụ onye na-ere ihe nkiri na Lagos na 1999, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, ọ kwụsịtụrụ ịchụso ọrụ ya
Ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke wee mụta nwa nwanyị (nke amụrụ na 1999 na 2001 n'otu n'otu), ya bụ Felix Ojo na Priscilla Ajoke Ojo, mana ha agbaala nna ha alukwaghim
O kwuola na mbibi nke alụm di na nwunye ha bụ mgbe ha di obere
O kwuola banyere uche ya ịkwụsị isa aha di ya mbụ, Ojo
Na ụbochi iri ato na otu na onwa asato na afo 2020, ọ na-eme emume ncheta ọmụmụ nne ya site na ịse foto mara mma nke o gosipụtara a igwe internet
Iyabo Ojo weputara otu NGO ya akporo Pinkies Foundation, nke na ahu umuaka nwere mkpa puru iche na ndi enweghi ikike, na onwa Ise na afor 2011
Ọ emere emume ncheta afọ ise nke ntọala ahụ na Otu ụbochi na onwa ise na afor 2016 na R&A City Hotel, Ikeja, Lagos
Iyanya Onoyom Mbuk (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 31 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1986), nke aha ya bụ Iyanya, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu Afropop
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe o meriri oge mbụ nke Project Fame West Africa ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Kukere'
Ya na Ubi Franklin hiwere labelụ Made Men Music Group n'afọ 2011
O wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ My Story n'afọ 2011
Ndị egwu 'No Time' na 'Love Truly' kwadoro ya
Desire, abọm studio ya nke abụọ, nwere egwu ise 'Kukere', 'Ur Waist', 'Flavour', 'Sexy Mama', na 'Jombolo'
O ritere ihe nrite Artist of the Year na The Headies 2013
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2016, Iyanya kwupụtara na Instagram na ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Mavin Records
Ọnwa ole na ole tupu mgbe ahụ, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta njikwa na Temple Management Company
O bu ụzọ kwupụta ebumnuche ya ịhapụ Made Men Music Group na July 2016

Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe o meriri oge mbụ nke Project Fame West Africa ma bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Kukere'

Ọnwa ole na ole tupu mgbe ahụ, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta njikwa na Temple Management Company

A mụrụ Iyanya na Palm Street na Calabar, Cross River State Nne ya bụ onye isi nwanyị na nna ya bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọhịa
Iyanya akọwaala nne ya dị ka onye na-enye ọzụzụ n'ụlọ, ebe nna ya bụ onye dị nro n'ime ha abụọ
Nne na nna ya nwụrụ n'afọ 2008, nwanne ya nwoke tọrọ ya nwụrụ n'otu oge ahụ
Nna nna Iyanya bụ onye ụkọchukwu ebe Iyanya na-abụ abụ na ukwe nke ụka ya ma bụrụ onye isi ukwe maka ukwe ụmụaka mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Mbuk gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị, sekọndrị, na mahadum na Calabar
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na njikwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Calabar
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Calabar, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na họtel ma bụrụ abụ karaoke na ụlọ mmanya ọ na-elekọta
Iyanya malitere ịzụlite ikike olu ya na ụlọ mmanya obodo nke gụnyere Fiesta Fries Bar, Mirage Nite Club, na West-Life
Iyanya hotara onye na-agụ egwú Britain bụ Craig David na onye na-agụ egwú hip hop nke America bụ R
Kelly dị ka isi egwu ya
A kpaliri Iyanya ịchụso egwu ọkachamara mgbe ọ kirisịrị ndụ ama ama nke 2 Face Idibia na Olu Maintain
Iyanya malitere dị ka onye na-eti egwu, na-aga site na aha 'Lofty'
N'afọ 2008, KCee si KC Presh mere ka Iyanya kwenye na oge mbụ nke Project Fame West Africa
Iyanya gara n'ihu wee bụrụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi ahụ mgbe ọ lụsoro ọtụtụ ndị nwere otu ọchịchọ ya ọgụ
Asọmpi Project Fame nke MTN kwadoro n'afọ 2008 bụ mmalite nke ọrụ egwu Iyanya
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-ebelata mgbe nnukwu asọmpi gasịrị, ihe ịga nke ọma Iyanya ka malitere
Mgbe o meriri MTN's Project Fame West Africa, Iyanya malitere idekọ abọm izizi ya My Story
Ọ bụ CN Media Imprint wepụtara ya
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara njirimara Iyanya dị iche iche dị ka onye na-ese egwu R&B, ọkachasị na egwu akpọrọ 'Iyanya' na 'Love Truly'
Abọm izizi nke Iyanya bụ ọdịda azụmahịa n'ihi nsogbu na nkesa na nkwaliteÀtụ Listen
Na 16 Ọktoba 2013, 360Nobs kọrọ na Iyanya ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Solo Phones Nigeria, ụlọ ọrụ ekwentị mkpanaaka dị na Computer Village, Ikeja
A kọrọ na nkwekọrịta otu afọ ahụ ruru $ 220,000 (35 nde naira)
Na mgbakwunye, Iyanya nwetara Toyota Prado 2014 site na nkwekọrịta ahụ
N'afọ 2013, akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Independent kọrọ na Iyanya bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na Zinox Computers (kọmputa mbụ a kwadoro na Naijiria) nke ruru $ 300,000
Nkwekọrịta ahụ ga-egosipụta Iyanya na bọọdụ mgbasa ozi Zinox na mgbasa ozi TV
Iyanya malitere ime ballads, ọkachasị na abọm izizi ya bụ My Story
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Toolz na Ndani TV, o kwuru na ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye na-ese ihe ma chọọ ka a mara ya maka ikike R&B na Afrobeats
N'otu ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ, o kwukwara na ọ gbanwere site na R&B gaa na Afrobeat n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịme ego ma chọọ ka ndị na-akwado ya hụ ọrụ ya
Na 25 Nọvemba 2012, Iyanya mere ihe ngosi AY Makun nke emere na INDIGO2 arena
Iji kwalite abọm nke abụọ ya na UK, Iyanya bụ isi okwu Iyanya vs
Ọchịchọ egwu
Ọ malitere na London wee kwụsị na Manchester
Emere egwu London na INDIGO2 arena na 9 June 2013
O gosipụtara ihe nkiri nke Tonto Dikeh na Emma Nyra
Na 14 June 2013, egwu Manchester malitere ma gosipụta ihe nkiri site n'aka Emma Nyra na DRB Lasgidi
Iyanya na onye otu ya bụ Emma Nyra gara obere njem gafee US na Canada na mbido afọ 2013
Iyanya rụrụ na Shrine na Chicago na 11 Eprel 2013
O mekwara ihe nkiri na African Muzik Magazine launch na 12 Eprel 2013, nke emere na Dallas, Texas
Iyanya mere ihe nkiri Grammy Award nominee Melanie Fiona na ụlọ ahịa LTB Jean dị na Soho, New York, ma mee ihe nkiri na New York Fashion Week a ma ama n'ụwa
Discography nke Iyanya nwere abọm studio abụọ, egwu iri abụọ na abụọ (gụnyere iri dị ka onye na-ese ihe), egwu nkwado ise, na vidiyo egwu iri na anọ
Otu Iyi-uwa bu ihe sitere n'echiche ndi Igbo nke na-ejide nkpuru nke nwuru anwu (nke a maara dika ogbanje ) gaa n'uwa, mee ya ka o lata ma burukwa otu nne ga-amu ya
Ọtụtụ ihe enwere ike ijiri mee iyi-uwa, gụnyere nkume, nwa bebi, ntutu ma ọ bụ mpempe uwe nwa nwụrụ anwụ, ihe mgbaàmà, ma ọ bụ onyinye
A ghaghị ịchọta iyi ahụ ma bibie ya ka ogbanje wee zuo ike ma kwụsịrị igbochi nne ya
Iji chọta ihe a, ndị na-eme ihe dị ka 'dibia' na-ajụ mmụọ ahụ ma na-eme ememe iji mee ka ọ mata ebe iyi dị
Akwukwo ogugu, Things Fall Apart (Ihe Amaghizi kwuru) nke Chinua Achebe dere nwere ihe omumu nke gunyere nwa ogbanje na iyi-uwa
Iyinoluwa Samuel Aboyeji (amụrụ na Machị 28, 1991) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Andela, ọ bụkwabu onye isi nchịkwa nke Flutterwave
E hotara Aboyeji dị ka otu n'ime Top 100 kasị nwee mmetụta n'Afrịka site na magazin New African na 2019
Aboyeji gara Loyola Jesuit College, ebe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na 2007
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Columbia International College wee nweta nzere bachelọ na ọmụmụ iwu na Mahadum Waterloo
Aboyeji bụ onye mmekọ na onye guzobere Future Africa, ikpo okwu nke na-enye isi obodo, nkuzi na obodo maka ndị na-emepụta ihe ọhụrụ
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị Future Africa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche maka mgbasa ozi onye isi ala nke Oby Ezekwesili n'afọ 2019
O nyekwara aka n'ịrụ Andela na Flutterwave, ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ abụọ nke Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Talent City Inc, ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ
Izaak Walton (nke e mere mmiri chukwu na 21 Septemba 1593 – 15 Disemba 1683) bụ onye odee Bekee
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye edemede nke “The Compleat Angler” , o dekwara ọtụtụ akụkọ ndụ dị mkpirikpi gụnyere otu enyi ya John Donne
Achịkọtala ha n'okpuru aha nke Ndụ Walton
A mụrụ Walton na mba Stafford na c
Ndebanye aha nke mmiri chukwu ya na 21 Septemba 1593 na-enye aha nna ya Jervis, ma ọ bụ Gervase
Nna ya, onye bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ nakwa onye nwe ụlọ nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, nwụrụ tupu Izaak eruo afo atọ, eliri ya na February 1596/7 [lower-alpha 1] dị ka Jarvicus Walton
Nne ya lụrụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ ọzọ nke aha ya bụ Bourne, onye mechara gbaa oso Swan na Stafford
Izaak nwekwara nwanne nwoke aha ya bụ Ambrose, dị ka egosiri na ntinye na ndekọ parish na -edekọ olili ozu na March 1595/6 nke Ambrosius filius Jervis Walton
Enyere ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya dịka 9 Ọgọst 1593
Agbanyeghị, ụbọchị a dabere na nkọwahie nke uche ya, nke ọ malitere na 9 Ọgọst 1683
Ekwenyere na ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Stafford tupu ọ kwaga London mgbe ọ dị na okorobia
A na-akọwakarị ya dị ka onye na-agba ígwè, ma a zụrụ ya azụ dị ka onye na-akwa ákwà linin, ahia nke bịara n'okpuru Ụlọ ọrụ Ndi na-agba igwe
O nwere obere ụlọ ahịa dị n'elu ụlọ elu nke “Thomas GreshamRoyal Burse ma ọ bụ Exchange na Cornhill”
Na 1614 o nwere ụlọ ahịa na Fleet Street, ọnụ ụzọ abụọ ọdịda anyanwụ nke Chancery Lane na parish nke St Dunstan's
Ọ ghọrọ verger na onye nlekọta ụka nke ụka, na enyi nke vicar, John Donne
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Ironmongers na Nọvemba 1618
Nwunye mbụ Walton bụ Rachel Floud (lụrụ di na nwunye Disemba 1626), nnukwu nwa nwanne Archbishọp Cranmer
Ọ nwụrụ na 1640
N’oge na-adịghị anya ọ lụgharịrị nwunye, nye Anne Ken (m
1641?-1662), onye pụtara dị ka pastoral Kenna nke The Angler’s Wish ; ọ bụụrụ onye nnochite anya Thomas Ken, emesia bishọp nke Bath na Wells

Ihe ize ndụ gburugburu ebe obibi bụ ihe mmetụta, ọnọdụ mati ma ọ bụmmemméomume nke nwere ike iyi gburugburu ebe obibi egwu ma ọ bụ metụta ahụike ndị mmadụ, gụnyere mmetọ na ọdachi ndị na-emere onwe ha dịka oké ifufe na ala ọma jijiji

Ọ nwere ike ịgụnye ihe ọbụna dí otu ma ọ bụ ngwakọta nke kemịkal na-egbu egbu, ihe ndị dị ndụ, ma ọ bụ ndị na-ahụ maka anụ ahụ na gburugburu ebe obibi, nke sitere na ọrụ mmadụ ma ọ bụ usoro okike, nke nwere ike imetụta ahụike nke ndị a kpughere, gụnyere mmetọ dị ka ọla dị arọ, ọgwụ ahụhụ, ihe ndị na-emerụ ahụ, nsị na-egbu egbu, ụlọ ọrụ na kemịkal ụlọ

Ikike ịmara ihe ize ndụ gburugburu ebe obibi bụ nzọụkwụ nke mbụ na nyocha ihe ize ndụ gburugburu ebe obibi, nke bụ usoro nke ịtụle ohere, ma ọ bụ ihe ize ndụ, nke mmetụta ọjọọ sitere na nrụgide gburugburu ebe obibi
Njirimara ihe ize ndụ bụ mkpebi nke ma, na n'okpuru ọnọdụ ndị dị aṅaa, ihe nrụgide gburugburu ebe obibi nwere ike ịkpata mmerụ ahụ
Ihe nlereanya echiche nke ikpughe
Ihe ize ndụ nwere ikike iji mee ka ihe ọjọọ naanị ma ọ bụrụ na ha na ndị nwere ike imerụ ahụ
N'ihi nke a, njirimara ihe ize ndụ gụnyere mmepe nke ụdị echiche nke ikpughe
Ụdị echiche na-ekwurịta ụzọ na-ejikọta isi mmalite nke ihe ize ndụ nyere ndị nwere ike ikpughe)
Ụlọ ọrụ United States maka ihe ndị na-egbu egbu na ndekọ ọrịa guzobere ihe ise a ga-etinye na ụdị echiche nke ikpughe
Akowara ihe ize ndụ kemịkal n'ime Global Harmonized System na ụkpụrụ kemịkal nke European Union
Ihe na eweta nkeá bu kemịkal na-akpata ha na-akpata nnukwu mmebi gburugburu ebe obibi

Izi (Izii, Izzi) bụ asụsụ Igboid a na-asụ na steeti Ebonyi na obodo Naịjirịa
Ọ na-emepụta ụyọkọ asụsụ nke ndi Ikwo, Ezza, na kwa ndi Mgbo ndị yiri ya
Ndi na asu asusu Izi gbasara na ebe di iche iche
Belonging to a larger group of people called the Igbo, the Izi distinguish themselves from their neighbors and have divided themselves into many clans
Izi speakers are found east of Abakaliki, the capital of the Ebonyi State and extend as far as the Anambra and Imo State boundaries
Longitudinally, Izi speakers extend from the Plateau State to approximately 12 miles north of the Cross River, which runs through the appropriately named Cross River State
Map ndị dị na ibe a na-egosi ebe ndị na-asụ Izi bi, na-egosi ma mba Naịjirịa n'ime Kọntinent nke Afrịka na nkewa dị na mba Naịjirị
Ndị nne na nna nke Izá, ndị Igbo, bi na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa
A na-akpọ mpaghara ebe ndị Igbo bi bụ nke a na-akpọ ŌIgboland
Ọ bụ ezie na Osimiri Niger kewara mpaghara a, ndị Igbo na-ejigide ịdị n'otu ọdịbendị, ebe osimiri ahụ na-enye ụzọ dị mma maka nkwurịta okwu ha
Nnyocha banyere mmalite nke Igbo pere mpe, mana echiche na-eduga bụ na ọtụtụ obodo dị iche iche si n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ na North kwaga n'ókè nke etiti Igboland
O nwere ike ịbụ na ọganihu ndị a malitere na narị afọ nke itoolu
Site na mpaghara etiti ahụ, mbata n'oge na-adịbeghị anya emeela n'akụkụ niile, nke dugara n'ọdịbendị Igbo
Before the 16th century, the Igbo had a pictogram form of writing called “Nsibidi”
That form died out, most likely because many of its users were members of secret societies and did not want it to be public
In 1854, A German philologist named Karl Richard Lepsius made a “Standard Alphabet”, meant for all the languages of the world

In 1882, Britain enacted an educational ordinance to direct the teaching of reading and writing only in English which temporarily inhibited the development of Igbo along with other languages of West Africa
Arụmụka banyere orthography Igbo malitere na 1927, mgbe International Institute of African Languages and Cultures (IIALC) bipụtara akwụkwọ nta, 'Practical Orthography of African Language'
A gbakwunyere ụdaume /gw/, /kw/, na /nw/ iji nọchite anya ụda Igbo
Akwụkwọ nta ahụ jiri akara ụfọdụ sitere na International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA), nke malitere esemokwu na ndị ozi ala ọzọ jiri ihe odide Lepsius mee ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 70
N'afọ 1929, Kọmitii Mmụta nke Gọọmentị Colonial gbalịrị iji orthography IIALCī dochie Lepsius
Gọọmentị, tinyere ndị ozi ala ọzọ Roman Katọlik na Metọdist, nabatara ma nabata orthography ọhụrụ ahụ; Otú ọ dị, ndị ozi ala ala ọzọ Protestant ndị ọzọ megidere ya
Ida Ward chepụtara mkpụrụedemede ọkọlọtọ dabere na asụsụ dị n'etiti na 1944, mana esemokwu ahụ gara n'ihu, e mekwara mkpebi iji mkpụrụedemede ọhụrụ mee ihe naanị maka akwụkwọ gọọmentị
E kwekọrịtara ụdị ọkọlọtọ site na 1962 ma ka na-eji ya eme ihe taa

N'afọ 1972, otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka ịhazi asụsụ Igbo gbakọtara iji gbasaa asụsụ Igbo, na-agbaziri okwu sitere n'asụsụ dị iche iche na-abụghị nke etiti, echiche maka Standard Igbo bụ nke ndị niile na-asụ Igbo ga-asụ ma ghọta
N'agbata afọ 1973 na afọ 1976, a kwadoro aro kọmitii nhazi maka mkpụrụ okwu Igbo, a tụlere aro ọhụrụ maka ịhazigharị mkpụrụedemede Igbo

Iziegbe (Izzy) Odigie (amụrụ n'afọ 1996) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri afrobeats nke Naijiria a mụrụ na New York
N'afọ 2019 ọ bụ otu n'ime 'ụmụ nwanyị 100' nke OkayAfrica
A mụrụ Odigie na 1996, nne ya, Osarenoma Odigie, bụ nọọsụ na nna ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego
A mụrụ ya na Brooklyn mana a zụlitere ya na Naịjirịa na Edo State
Ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi
Ọ kwagara US na 2007 wee mụọ ịgba egwú ma gaa Mahadum St
John's na Queens, New York
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ndị na-agba egwu Trybe bụ ndị pụtara na-eso ndị na-ese afrobeats
A maara ya maka ịgba egwu Afro
Ọ bịara mara mgbe ya na Eddy Kenzo gbara egwu na 2015 wee ruo nde 20 site na vidiyo
A họpụtara ya ka ọ nọrọ na ndepụta ụmụ nwanyị 100 nke OkayAfrica na 2019
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke 2019 bụ ịchọta ụmụ nwanyị na-emebi ọdịbendị obodo ha ma n'otu oge ahụ na-achọ ọhere nhata maka ọkwa ụwa
Odigie na-akụzi ịgba egwu na njem
Ya na ndị na-agu egwu dịka Tiwa Savage, Maazị Eazi, Moonchild Sanelly na Yemi Alade arụkọwo ọrụ
N'afọ 2020, ọ mere ihe nkiri ma pụta n'otu ihe omume nke usoro nke ise nke ihe nkiri Fox US, Empire
Jémanị (asụsụ jéman Bundesrepublik Deutschland), nke ana-kpo kwa, Federal Republic of Germany bụ otu ala ndi ocha no n'obodo ukwu adi-kpo Obodo Békè

Jérôme Cohen-Olivar (amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Morocco-French, nke a maara nke ọma maka Kandisha (2008), ihe nkiri fantasy nke akụkọ ifo nke Aicha Kandicha kpaliri
Cohen-Olivar tolitere na Morocco, ebe o mere ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri super 8mm, tupu ọ kwaga Los Angeles
Susan Susan, ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya, bụ satire banyere mbata nzuzo na United States, nke Disney zụrụ maka ihe dị ka dọla pụkụ narị ato ($300,000)
The Midnight Orchestra, ihe ọchị nke dabeere na akụkọ banyere otu nwoke na-aga Morocco iji mee ka ndị egwú nna ya dịghachi ndụ, nyochara ahụmịhe ndị Juu na-ahapụ Morocco
Ọ meriri ihe nrite nke Ecumenical Jury na Montreal World Film Festival na 2015
Jị bụ ụdị akwụkwọ nri tuber sitere na Asia, Africa, na Caribbean
Jị ndị a na-edozi ahụ nke ukwuu, na-agbanwe agbanwe, ma nwee ike ịbara ahụike gị uru n'ọtụtụ ụzọ￼
Jị nwere ike melite ọkwa shuga ọbara gị￼
Júlia do Vale Horta (a mụrụ na ụbọchị nke iri atọ n'otu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Brazil na-eme ihe nlereanya na onye na-ahụ maka ịma mma nke e chiri Miss Brasil 2019
Ọ nọchitere anya Brazil na asọmpi Miss Universe 2019, ebe ọ nọrọ n'ime iri abụọ kachasị elu
Júlia nwere ogologo akụkọ ihe mere eme n'ihe gbasara asọmupi ịma mma

O bu ụzọ sọọ mpi maka 'Miss World Minas Gerais' ebe o mechara bụrụ onye mmeri ma nọchite anya steeti ya na asọmpi mba Miss Mundo Brasil 2015, nke na-ahọpụta onye nnọchi anya Brazil na Miss World, na-aghọ Top 10 semifinalist
Otú ọ dị, mgbe onye mmeri mbụ gbara arụkwaghịm, Júlia ketara ọkwa nke anọ
N'afọ 2016, ọ nọchitere anya Brazil na asọmpi 'Reinado Internacional del Café 2016' wee bụrụ onye nke mbụ
O sonyeziri na asọmpi 'Miss Mundo Brasil' ọzọ na 2017, na-anọchite anya mpaghara Zona da Mata wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ
Ọ nọchitere anya Brazil na Miss Tourism International 2017 ma nweta ọkwa nke anọ

N'afọ 2019, Júlia nọchitere anya steeti Minas Gerais na asọmupi ịma mma nke mba, Miss Brasil 2019 nke emere na Machị 9, n'afo 2019, na São Paulo Expo Exhibition & Convention Center na obodo São Paulo, Brazil
Ná ngwụsị nke ihe omume ahụ, onye na-apụ apụ bụ Mayra Dias kpuwere Julia okpueze dịka Miss Brasil 2019
Júlia nọchitere anya Brazil na asọmupi Miss Universe 2019 ebe ọ nọrọ n'ime iri abụọ kachasị elu
Jürgen Schadeberg (18 Machị 1931 - 29 Ọgọst 2020) bụ onye na-ese foto na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
O sere foto oge ndị dị mkpa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa, nke gụnyere foto ndị dị ka Nelson Mandela na ụlọ mkpọrọ Robben Island
Ọ bikwa, rụọ ọrụ ma kụzie na London na Spain, ma na-ese foto n'ọtụtụ mba Afrịka
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke UK Arts Council, National Portrait Gallery, Tate na Victoria na Albert Museum na London
A mụrụ Jürgen Schadeberg na Berlin, Germany, na 1931 ebe ọ tolitere n'oge ọchịchị nazi na agha ụwa nke abụọ
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, nne ya malitere mmekọrịta ya na onye ọrụ Britain na ndị agha nke ndị agha na-achị achị wee soro ya kwaga South Africa na 1947
Schadeberg mụtara ịbụ onye na-ese foto na Deutsche Presseagentur (Ụlọọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Germany)
Ọ kwagara South Africa iji sonyere ezinụlọ ya na 1950 ma, n'afọ sochirinụ, ọ chọtara ọrụ na magazin Drum dị ka onye na-ese foto na onye na-eme ihe osise

Schadeberg ghọrọ onye isi nke otu ahụ na onye nkuzi na onye nduzi nye ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-ese foto South Africa kachasị mma n'oge ya, nke gụnyere Bob Gosani, Ernest Cole, na mgbe e mesịrị Peter Magubane
Dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọcha ole na ole na-ese foto na-ese ndụ kwa ụbọchị n'etiti ndị isi ojii, ọ ghọrọ onye maara banyere ndụ na ọdịbendị ndị isi ojii
N'ihi ya, o sere mmalite nke nnwere onwe na fim, mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na ndụ obodo

Schadeberg sere foto ọtụtụ ihe mere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe ndị dị mkpa na 1950s n'etiti ha Defiance Campaign nke 1952, 1956 Treason Trial, Sophiatown removals nke 1955, Sophiatowns jazz na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ememe olili ozu Sharpeville nke 1960, na foto nke ndị mkpọrọ Robben Island
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị ama ama o sere foto gụnyere Nelson Mandela, Walter Sisulu, Oliver Tambo, Trevor Huddleston, na Govan Mbeki
O dekwara akụkọ ọdịbendị jazz nke 1950 dịka Thandi Klaasen, Hugh Masekela, Kippie Moeketsi na Miriam Makeba
O mere akwụkwọ banyere ndụ kwa ụbọchị
Mgbe Drum chọrọ ka onye na-agụ egwu Dolly Rathebe bụrụ nwa agbọghọ na-ekpuchi otu n'ime nsogbu ha, Schadeberg kpọgara ya n'ebe a na-ekpofu ihe na Johannesburg wee see ya foto na bikini
E jidere ha abụọ maka imebi Iwu Omume rụrụ arụ nke machibidoro mmekọrịta agbụrụ
N'afọ 1959, Schadeberg hapụrụ Drum ka ọ bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke njem nke Prọfesọ Phillip V
Tobias si Mahadum nke Witwatersrand duziri iji mụọ ndị Bushmen, na-ebipụta foto na The Kalahari Bushmen Dance n'afọ 1982

Schadeberg chere na ọ manyere ya ịhapụ South Africa site na ọgba aghara obodo, n'afọ 1964 ọ gara London, ebe ọ bụ onye nchịkọta foto nke magazin Camera Owner (onye bu ụzọ na Creative Camera), nke o tinyere mmetụta siri ike nke imewe ma mụbaa ọdịnaya ya, site na Eprel ruo Julaị 1965 ọ bụ onye editọ ya
Ọ kụzikwaara ma na-elekọta ihe ngosi foto na England, ọkachasị maka Whitechapel Art Gallery
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Spain ebe o lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ ya dịka onye na-ese ihe
N'afọ 1972, ọ laghachiri Africa ebe ọ nabatara ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto maka Christian Aid na Botswana na Tanzania
N'afọ 1973, ọ gara Senegal, Mali, Kenya na Zaire, na-ese foto
N'afọ 1985, Schadeberg laghachiri South Africa, ebe ya na nwunye ya Claudia biri
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto, ma meekwa ihe ngosi banyere ndị isi ojii ruo afọ 2007, mgbe ọ laghachiri Europe
Schadeberg nwụrụ site na ọrịa strok n'ụlọ ya na La Drova, Valencia, Spain, na 29 August 2020, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na itoolu
A na-edebe ọrụ Schadeberg na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide ndị a
Jị Asuru Asụ ma ọ bụ Iyán bụ nri Naịjiria nke agbụrụ Yoruba, Igbo, Ebira na Tiv
Ọ bụ nri ọdịnala
A na-akwadebe ya site na iji ụrọ na ihe na-egbuke egbuke na-egwe ya
Jị Asuru Asụ yiri poteto mashed mana ọ dị arọ
Ọ bụ ihe dị nro ma dị ụtọ nke a na-eri n'aka
A na-eri Iyán na Edo, Benue, Ijesha, Ondo State na Ekiti na Naịjirịa ria
Enwere ike inye ya na egusi, ofe, ofe akwụkwọ jute (ewedu), spinach a na-esi esi (efo__) ma ọ bụ ofe okra
Ihe ndị dị mkpa iji mee yam a kụrụ akụ bụ puna yam, mmiri, ụrọ na pestle
Pịa Jị ma belata ya n'ime obere cubes, sachaa ya, wee sie ya ruo ihe dị ka minit 30 ruo mgbe ọ dị nro
Sachaa ụrọ na ihe mkpuchi site na iji mmiri saa ya, kụọ yam ruo mgbe ọ dị nro, dị nro ma dị ka ntụ ọka
Jị kpọrọ nkụ a na-ewepụta n'oge na-adịghị anya ga-achọ mmiri ka ukwuu ebe yam ọhụrụ a na-enweta n'oge gara aga ga-achọ obere mmiri n'oge a na-akụ ya
Na-eri íyán mgbe ọ na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-eri ya ọhụrụ
Ụdị Jị eji eme ihe maka ịpị yam bụ yam nke Afrịka nke a na-ahụkarị n'Africa na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Eshia
A makwaara ya dị ka puna ji, ezigbo yam ma ọ bụ white yamỌdịdị ya siri ike na akpụkpọ anụ na-acha nchara nchara na anụ na-adịghị ọcha; ogologo ya sitere na nke poteto nkịtị ruo mita ise n'ogologo
Puna yam bụ ihe ọkụkụ ego dị n'afọ niile n'adịghị ka ihe ọkụkụ ndị ọzọ na-adị n'oge
Ụdị yam ndị ọzọ gụnyere purple yam, wild yam, white guinea yam, Chinese na mmiri yam
Yam Africa bara ọgaranya na carbohydrates na calories
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ nweghị protein, enwere ike iji àkwá na ofe mee ka ọ dị mma
Pounded yam na-aga na okro soup, ẹ̀fọ́ rírò, banga soup (ofe akwu), ogbono na__wol____wol____wol__ gìrì soup
A na-eri nri ahụ na ofe egusi, nri dị ụtọ nke e ji mkpụrụ melon, tomato, yabasị na mmanụ nkwụ na-acha ọbara ọbara mee
Jean-Claude Peters (a mụrụ May 25, 1994 [afọ 26]), onye a kacha mara amara na JC, bụ onye Canada na-egwu egwu
A mụrụ JC na London, England, ma kwaga Canada mgbe ọ dị nanị afọ abuo
Zarpas bụ ụlọ ọrụ njem nke Gris nke na-arụ ọrụ na Lagos Steeti n'oge ọchịchị
Ọ bụ John Nicholas Zarpas guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 1929 ma na-achịkwa njem ọha na eze n'ime obodo ukwu ahụ site n'afọ 1933 ruo 1958
Ọrụ Zarpas malitere dị ka ọrụ bọs n'etiti Lagos Island na Yaba Estate ọhụrụ site na Ebute Metta
Onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ụzọ ahụ site na ịzụta bọs Dennis
Otú ọ dị, ọrụ ahụ na mbụ abaghị uru, Zarpas gbakwunyere ọdụ bọs ndị ọzọ iji mụbaa okporo ụzọ
Mmecha nke Carter Bridge n'afọ 1931 na mmụba nke njem gaa n'ala ahụ mere ka okporo ụzọ na akụnụba Zarpas dị mma
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-akwụ ụgwọ otu penny maka ọrụ mbụ ya ma ka ọ na-erule 1933 ọ na-enweta uru ma na-agbasawanye na ndị ọrụ mmadụ iri asaa na ise
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbakwunyere ụgbọala Albion na ụgbọ mmiri ya wee gbakwunye ụzọ Lagos na Apapa
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ọrụ bọs mbụ malitere na Naịjirịa, Charlotte Obasa, nwa nwanyị nke RB
Blaize na-arụ ọrụ na-enweghị uru na mbụ mgbe ụgbọ okporo ígwè Lagos mechiri
Ọrụ Zarpas mepụtara isi nke njem ọha na eze na Lagos
N'afọ 1933, ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ bidoro ịrụ ọrụ bọs site na Lagos Island ruo Ebute Metta
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1940, okporo ụzọ na-abawanye, enweghị ike nke Zarpas inweta ụgbọala ọhụrụ n'ihi agha ahụ mere ka bọs jupụta na-aba ụba karịsịa n'oge oge kachasị elu
Zarpas nwetara ikike nke Lagos Town Council iji mụbaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị njem guzo ọtọ

N'afọ 1958, mgbe ebubo nke ịkpa ókè na omume monopolistic gasịrị, ndị Lagos Town Council nwetara Zarpas Services ma hazie ya ọzọ dị ka Lagos Municipal Transport Service nke mesịrị ghọọ Lagos State Transport Corporation (LSTC)
Otú ọ dị, ọha na eze weere bọs LSTC dị ka ndị na-adịghị ngwa ngwa bụ ndị a na-eji ugbu a 'mgbagharị' na 'danfo' bọs ndị na-emebighị oge na nkwụsị bọs ọ bụla
Jonathan Adagogo Green (1873–1905) bụ 'onye so na ndi mbụ na-ese foto na Naijiria'
Ọ dị ịrịba ama n'ịbụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na-ese foto na Naijiria, amaara maka akwụkwọ ya banyere ike ọchịchị na omenala obodo, ọkachasị obodo Ibani Ijo ya
A mụrụ Green na Bonny, nke dị na Rivers Steeti ugbu a
“Ọ gụrụ gbasara foto na Sierra Leone wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na Bonny” Ọ nọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-ese foto naanị obere oge, ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na abụọ
'Ma n'oge ahụ, ọ na-arụpụta ihe n'ike ma nwee nkà n'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama n'ijere ndị ahịa obodo na ndị ọchịchị ozi
“Mgbe o guzobere ụlọ ahịa, obodo abụọ dị iche iche nwere ekele maka ọrụ ya ma kwụghachi ya ụgwọ” 'Ojiji ya nke mbido ya na kaadị azụmahịa ya na stampụ ya
kpuchiri mmalite Afrịka ya', akụkụ nke ọrụ ya na ndị isi oge ọchịchị
Johnson Donatus Aihumekeokhai Ojeikere (1930 - 2 Febụwarị 2014), nke a maara dị ka JD
'Okhai Ojeikere, bụ onye na-ese foto na Naijiria nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na ntutu isi pụrụ iche a na-ahụ na Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Ojeikere n'ụbọchị nke ịrị n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1930 na Ovbiomu-Emai, Owan East, Edo Steeti, ime obodo dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Na mgbakwunye na olumba Emai, Ojeikere na-asụ Yoruba na Bekee
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ma biri na Ketu, Nigeria
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, ọ malitere ịse foto, nke dị egwu na Naịjirịa, ọkachasị ndị nọ n'obodo ya
Igwefoto enweghị mkpa dị elu ma bụrụ nke ndị mmadụ na-achọghi n'ihi na a na-ewere ha dị ka okomoko
Otú ọ dị, na 1950 Enugu, Ojeikere zụtara igwefoto Brownie D na-enweghị ọkụ maka pound abụọ, ma mee ka enyi ya kụziere ya ihe ndị bụ isi gbasara ise foto
Ojeikere nwetara ozi gbasara Ministry for Information na Ibadan na 1951, nke ọ ga-edegara ha otu akwụkwọ ozi ahụ kwa ụbọchị iri na ise ruo afọ abụọ
Na ngwụcha afọ 1953, ha mechara zaghachi na ha natara arịrịọ Ojeikere, ọ dọtara uche ha
Ojeikere malitere dị ka onye enyemaka n'afọ 1954 na Ministry of Information na Ibadan
N'afọ 1959, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ọrụ ọkachamara ya na Ibadan ma kpebie na oge eruola ịlụ nwanyị
Tupu Ojeikere ahapụ obodo Ogute-Emai, ọ họọrọ nwunye ya, Ikegbua
Ozugbo ọ tozuru afọ 1959, ha kwụrụ ụgwọ ahụ ma mee emume alụmdi na nwunye ọdịnala n'obodo ha
N'afọ sochirinụ, ha nabatara nwa ha nwoke mbụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ha gara n'ihu mụọ ụmụ ise ma bụrụ Ndị Kraịst Katọlik
Mgbe Naịjirịa nwetachara nnwere onwe ya n'afọ 1960, Ojeikere chụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto
N'afọ 1961, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto na studio, n'okpuru Steve Rhodes, maka Television House Ibadan
Site na 1963 ruo 1975 Ojeikere rụrụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi na West Africa Publicity na Lagos
N'afọ 1967, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na Nigerian Arts Council
N'afọ 1968, ọ malitere otu n'ime ọrụ ya kachasị ukwuu ka ọ na-edekọ ụdị ntutu isi Naịjirịa
Nke a bụ akara ngosi nke ọrụ ya ma o bipụtara ihe dị ka otu puku foto nke ntutu isi ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka dị iche iche
N'afọ 1975, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ iri na abụọ, ebe Ojeikere bụ onye isi na-ese foto azụmahịa, a kagburu ọrụ ya

Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ọbá akwụkwọ foto magburu onwe ya nke ka a na-eji na-enye ya ohere ịhazi azụmahịa nke ya site n'enyemaka nke onye ọ bụla nọ na Lagos Island, na-emeghe ụlọ ọrụ akpọrọ “Foto Ojeikere”

Na mmemme mbụ nke Nigeria Photography Award (NIPHA), nke ụlọ ọrụ multimedia Fullhouse Entertainment chikọbara ma mee na Sọnde, 31 Julaị 2011, Ojeikere bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto ama ama na Naijiria, ya na Sunmi Smart-Cole, Don Barber, na Amos Olarenwaju Osidele, bụ ndị e nyere ihe nrite maka ndụ
E tinyere nnukwu nhọrọ nke ọrụ Ojeikere na ngalaba arsenale nke 55th Venice Biennale d'arte, 'Il Palazzo Enciclopedia' nke Massimiliano Gioni haziri na 2013
Ojeikere nwụrụ na 2 Febụwarị 2014, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na atọ
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke ihe nkiri Tam Fiofori nke akpọrọ J
‘Okhai Ojeikere Master Photographer
Mgbe Ojeikere nwụrụ, ọ hapụrụ ebe nchekwa nke ihe karịrị foto 10,000 nke obodo ya bụ Naịjirịa
Ihe mkpuchi foto ya na-egosi otú e si ahụ ụdị ntutu isi dị ka nka, ọdịbendị, ihe onwunwe, na usoro mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke oge ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Afrịka

N'ikwu otú, na okwu a na-eji maka ọtụtụ n'ime ụdị ntutu isi o dere bụ “Onile-Gogoro” okwu Yoruba nke pụtara “guzo ogologo” nke e ji na-ezo aka n’ụlọ ndị nwere ọtụtụ okpukpu na-epulite n’obodo ndị dị na Naijiria ma bụrụ ihe a ma ama site na egwu nke kọwara asụsụ na mmegharị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke afọ 1960
Ọzọkwa, utu aha nke foto Ojeikere na-abụkarị ihe nkịtị
A maara Ojeikere nke ọma maka foto ojii na-acha ọcha nke ụdị ntutu isi Naịjirịa nke ọ malitere ịse foto na 1950s, nke e gosipụtara na 2013 Venice Biennale

N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, dị ka otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-ese foto na Naịjirịa, ebe ọ dịrị ndụ site na 1930 site na nnwere onwe nke mba ahụ na 1960, ọchịchị aka ike nke ndị agha, na ndụ obodo na obodo, echiche ya sara mbara karịa ejiji
Ojeikere nwetakwara profaịlụ mba ụwa n'oge ndụ ya, na foto ya ugbu a na nchịkọta site na Metropolitan Museum of Art ruo Tate Modern

Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Giulia Paoletti na Ngalaba nka nke Africa, Oceania, na America na Metropolitan Museum of Art dere, sị 'A na-amata okwu ya ozugbo enweghị azụ ma ọ bụ ihe eji eme ihe, ụmụ nwanyị mara mma, coiffures mara mma, ọkụ dị nro, mbipụta ojii na-acha ọcha
N'aka Ojeikere, foto ghọrọ ụzọ isi dekọọ ihe okike na-agafe agafe nke gosipụtara ndụ mmekọrịta na ọdịbendị Naịjirịa

Medina Dugger, onye na-ese foto na Lagos na onye na-enwe mmasị na ọrụ Ojeikere kwuru okwu a 'Tupu ọchịchị Britain, ụdị ntutu isi ọdịnala bụ ụkpụrụ ma dị iche iche dịka agbụrụ, ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọnọdụ alụmdi na nwunye, na ihe omume pụrụ iche' Dugger bu ụzọ gaa obodo kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa n'afọ 2011 site n'iwu nke otu nwa klas ya bụ onye guzobere ememme LagosPhoto
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ zutere foto Ojeikere - 'Hairstyles' ya mere ka e mepụta Dugger's 'Chroma An Ode to JD
'Okhai Ojeikere', usoro foto ndị nwere obi ike, nke nwere agba na-egosi mmelite ọgbara ọhụrụ, nke nwere ọtụtụ agba nke ụdị ntutu isi gosipụtara na ọrụ Ojeikere
Martins Okechukwu Justice (amụrụ na Septemba 29, 1977), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ J
Martins, bụ onye egwu Naijiria, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'ede egwu na onye na-emepụta iheA maara ya nke ọma maka egwu ya 'Oyoyo' 'Jupa' na 'Good Or Bad' J
A makwaara na Martins gosipụtara na egwu P-Square, 'E No Easy'
O gosikwara Phyno, YCEE, Fally Ipupa, DJ Arafat, Koffi Olomide, Timaya
A mụrụ J
Martins na Onitsha, Anambra State, Nigeria, ma nwee agbụrụ ezinụlọ na Ohafia, Abia Siteet
Max Bond Jr
(Febụwarị 18, 2009) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ zụlitere mmasị n'ihe owuwu dabere na ahụmịhe sitere na ikiri steepụ na ụlọ ihi ụra na Tuskegee Institute na echiche nke ụdị owuwu North Afrịka na nleta na Tunisia
Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ndị na-ewu ụlọ na mba Afrịka na Amerịka
Ọ lụrụ onye edemede Jean Carey Bond na 1961 ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Bond gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Harvard, ebe e nyere ya nzere bachelọ na 1955 wee nweta nzere masta afọ atọ ka e mesịrị
N'oge ọ nọ na Harvard, ọ bụ otu n'ime otu ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii iri na otu nke ihe mberede ọkụ gbara n'ihu ụlọ ihi ụra ha, Stoughton Hall
O leghaara ndụmọdụ sitere n'aka onye otu ngalaba Harvard anya ka ọ kwụsị ịchụso ụlọ n'ihi agbụrụ ya, na-emeri ihe mgbochi n'ihe bụ ọrụ ndị ọcha n'oge ahụ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya na France na André Wogenscky
Ọ laghachiri na New York City, na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Gruzen & Partners na Pedersen & Tilney

Ọ kwagara Ghana ebe o mepụtara ọtụtụ ụlọ gọọmentị, gụnyere Ọbá Akwụkwọ Ógbè Bolgatanga n'ógbè dị nso n'ókè ya na Burkina Faso, nke nwere ụlọ anọ nke nwere onyinyo nke elu ụlọ nkịtị nke e mere iji nye ikuku okike ma mee ka ikuku oyi ghara ịdị mkpa
Ọ nọ na Ghana site na 1964 ruo 1967
Laa azụ na United States, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke Kọmitii Nweghachi Ndị Ọdịdị na Harlem (ARCH) na 1967 na 1968
N'afọ 1970, ya na Donald P
Ryder, hiwere ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu nke Bond Ryder & Associates nke na-ahụ anya maka imepụta Martin Luther King Jr
Center for Nonviolent Social Change na Atlanta, na Birmingham Civil Rights Institute na Birmingham, Alabama, yana Harlem's Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
Bond jere ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke ngalaba ihe owuwu na Columbia University Graduate School of Architecture and Planning site na 1980 ruo 1984
Ọ bụ dean site na 1985 ruo 1992 na City College of New York School of Architecture and Environmental Studies
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu New York City Planning Commission site na 1980 ruo 1986
Onye bi na Manhattan nke New York, Bond nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na atọ na Febụwarị 18, 2009
Nwunye ya, onye edemede Jean Carey Bond, ụmụ abụọ, ụmụ ụmụ atọ, nwanne nwanyị na nwanne nwoke hapụrụ ya
Nna ya bụ J
Max Bond Sr, Onye isi oche nke Mahadum Liberia
Nne ya bụ Ruth Clement Bond, nwanne ya nwanyị bụ ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Jane Clement Bond na nwanne ya nwoke bụ Prọfesọ
George C
Bond (Columbia University/Teachers College)
Nwanne nna ya bụ Horace Mann Bond, nwa nwanne ya bụ Julian Bond
John Pepper Clark-Bekederemo
( 6 Eprel 1935-13 Ọktoba 2020) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri na onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye bipụtakwara dị ka JP Clark na John Pepper Clark

A mụrụ ya na Kiagbodo, Naịjirịa, nna Ijaw na nne Urhobo, Clark nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Native Authority School, Okrika (Ofinibenya-Ama), na Burutu LGA (n'oge ahụ Western Ijaw) na prestigious Government College na Ughelli, na nzere BA ya na Bekee na Mahadum Ibadan, ebe o dezigharịrị magazin dị iche iche, gụnyere Beacon na The Horn

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ibadan na 1960, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ozi na Ministry of Information, na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ochie nke Naịjirịa, dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Daily Express, yana dị ka onye nyocha na Institute of African Studies, Mahadum Ibadan
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ dị ka prọfesọ nke Bekee na Mahadum Lagos, ọkwá ọ lara ezumike nká na 1980
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Lagos, ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Black Orpheus
N'afọ 1982, ya na nwunye ya Ebun Odutola (onye prọfesọ na onye bụbu onye nduzi nke Centre for Cultural Studies na Mahadum Lagos), o guzobere PEC Repertory Theatre na Lagos
Nwoke na-eme njem n'ọtụtụ ebe, Clark mere nleta na nhọpụta prọfesọ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu, gụnyere Yale na Mahadum Wesleyan na United States
A maara Clark nke ọma maka uri ya, gụnyere

Ndị nkatọ achọpụtala usoro atọ dị mkpa n'ọrụ uri Clark usoro mmụta nke nnwale na nnwale, nke ndị dị ka 'Darkness and Light' na 'Iddo Bridge' gosipụtara; usoro nṅomi, nke ọ na-eji usoro abụ ọdịda anyanwụ dị ka ọnụọgụ abụọ na usoro sonnet, nke gosipụtara na okwu ndị dị ka To a Fallen Soldier' na 'Of Faith'; na ọkwa nke ọ bụla, ebe ọ na-enweta ntozu na mmalite nke ụdị abụ ndị dị ka ụlọ elu mmiri ozuzo na 'Night Tower', 'Night'
N'ime ọrụ ya niile, isiokwu ụfọdụ na-apụta
Clark na-emekarị banyere isiokwu ndị a site na mgbagwoju anya nke ihe oyiyi ndị Afrịka na nke ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ

Ọrụ dị egwu nke Clark gụnyere Song of a Goat nke emere na Mbari Club na 1961 bụ ọdachi a na-eme n'ụdị ọdịnala ndị Gris nke enweghị ike nke Zifa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na-eme ka nwunye ya Ebiere na nwanne ya nwoke Tonye banye na mmekọrịta ịhụnanya iwu na-akwadoghị nke na-akpata igbu onwe
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Ọ bụ ezie na a katọrọ egwuregwu ya maka ịdabere na usoro oge ochie nke Greek (karịsịa ndị mbụ), n'ihi ịdị nro nke usoro ha na maka ngwaọrụ ogbo na-abụghị eziokwu (dị ka d iche echiche

Enyemaka Clark nyere n'ụdị ndị ọzọ gụnyere nsụgharị ya nke Ozidi Saga (1977), akwụkwọ edemede nke Ijaw nke na-ewe ụbọchị asaa n'ógbè ya, ọmụmụ ya dị oke egwu The Example of Shakespeare (Evanston Northwestern University Press, 1970), ebe ọ na-akọwa echiche ya mara mma banyere uri na ihe nkiri na edemede ya na Daily Express, Daily Times, na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụkwa onye dere America, Their America (Deutsch, 1964; Heinemann African Writers Series No
50, 1969), akwụkwọ njem nke ọ na-akatọ ndị America na ụkpụrụ ya

Ọ bụ ezie na iwe nke akwụkwọ a kpatara mere ka ọ banye n'ihe odide mba ụwa, mmebi ya na Casualties mere na aha ya yiri ka ọ na-adịgide adịgide; n'ọrụ abụọ ahụ, ọ kpasuru iwe ma chụpụ ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị na ụfọdụ ndị nkatọ nwere mmetụta
N'ịgbachitere ya, Clark kwusiri ike na ọ na-egosipụta naanị ihe ndị mere ka ọ na-ahụ ha
Dị ka otu n'ime ndị edemede a ma ama na ndị a ma ama n'Africa, ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ihe gbasara akwụkwọ, ọrụ nke ọ na-enwetawanye nkwado mba ụwa

N'afọ 1991, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ natara onyinye Nigerian National Order of Merit Award maka akwụkwọ edemede magburu onwe ya ma hụ mbipụta, site na Mahadum Howard, nke mpịakọta abụọ ya, The Ozidi Saga na Collected Plays and Poems 1958-1988
Na 6 Disemba 2011, iji kwanyere ndụ na ọrụ nke Prọfesọ John Pepper Clark-Bekederemo ùgwù, e mere emume na Lagos Motor Boat Club, Awolowo Road, Ikoyi, maka mbipụta nke J
'Ihe a pụrụ ịkọwa dị ka onye nọ n'etiti ndị edemede' bịara mbido ahụ, gụnyere onye nrite Nobel Wole Soyinka
N'afọ 2015, Society of Young Nigerian Writers n'okpuru nduzi nke Wole Adedoyin guzobere JP Clark Literary Society, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịkwalite na ịgụ ọrụ Clark
A mara ọkwa ọnwụ Clark na 13 Ọktoba 2020
Pauly & Sohn nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Pauly Beds bụ otu n'ime ụlọ nzukọ ndị juu ọchịchị nke nwere mmasị nwoke ikike ọrụ akwa akwa kachasị ochie n'ụwa
Ọ bụ naanị onye na-eweta àkwà na Alaeze Ukwu Austria ruo ọtụtụ ọgbọ
Josef Pauly guzobere otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Vienna, na 1838 mgbe ọ natara ikike ime àkwà na matarasị ndị mmadụ n'ihe site n'aka eze ukwu, Ferdinand I nke Austria (1793-1875)
Aha ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ahụ bụ 'J
Pauly & Sohn'

N'afọ 1878, Pauly natara ikike nke Imperial na Royal Warrant of Nhọpụta dị ka Azụmaahịa ka dị ka onye na-eweta ndị mmadụ n'ihe ihe na Imperial na Royal Court nke Emperor Franz Joseph I na nwunye na ímé ihe ọ ga esi na ahọrọ na ímé ihe nọr na mkpóró ya Empress Elisabeth nke Austria, (nke a maara dị ka 'Sissi')
Ná mmalite nke dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ka ndị ọzọ na ụdị àlà úkwú nke ụwa họrọ Austria, ọrụ aka nke àkwà na matarasị bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọdịnala
Na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ na Austria, e nwere ndị isi iri a ma ama nke ọrụ a
Ndị ọkachamara na-arụ ihe ndina na matarasị na-ejikwa akpa na oche aka rụọ
Nke a bụ n'ihi na ọtụtụ ihe ndị dị oke ọnụ dị ka ntutu ọdụ ịnyịnya, ajị anụ, ogho na akpụkpọ anụ eji emepụta bụ otu

Ndị omenkà ndị na eme ìhè ahụ n'ebe iso ụzọ isi mee, ọkachasị ndị na ụdị oge ụfọdụ ndị nke Vienna, bụ ndị a ma ama ma na-ebupụ ndị na eme ìhè ahụ ngwaahịa ha na Gris, Turkey na mba ndị ọzọ dị na Middle East
N'ime narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, e nwere mmụba n'ịchọrọ ngwaahịa ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa nke ụdị a
1873 Vienna World's Fair nyere ihe ngosi maka ndị omenkà ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na eme ìhè ahụ dị mpaghara
N'oge ngosi ahụ, Josef Pauly natara 'Golden Cross for Industrial Merit' mbụ Nile dị ndụ ebighị dị ka Azụmaahịa
Afọ 1873 bụ ncheta nke iri ise nke ntọala Pauly na Sohn
Josef Pauly pụtara na mbipụta Vienna na-asọpụrụ ndị na-emepụta ihe
Ka ọ na-erule 1891, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ enwetala onyinye iri, gụnyere Medal d'amission ('ihe nrite nke nnabata ziri ezi') na Brussels na 1876
Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ Vienna nke 1903, a na-ewere J

Pauly & Sohn dị ka 'otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ kachasị ochie nakwa n'oge kwesịrị dị n'ala ahụ n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị nke dị ka ndị mmadụ na nke a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ụlọ ọrụ ihe ndina' dịka afọ okuku, n'oge mbipụta ya, 'ọ bụ afọ 31 kemgbe Pauly nwetara aha nsọpụrụ nke K
& K
Purveyor of the Empire ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na-ebubata àkwà na oche na mba ụwa'
Onye na-eweta ndị na eme ìhè nke dị ka ihe n'ala na eze (kuk

Hoflieferant ndị na ụdị) bụ, na Austria-Hungary, onye na-ere ahịa ngwaahịa ma ọ bụ ọrụ ndị nwere ikike pụrụ iche, site na ihe ùgwù eze ukwu, iji nyefee gị azụmahịa ọ ngalaba ike ịbelata ngwongwo ma ọ bụ ozi ya n'ụlọ ikpe dị na Vienna
Ihe ùgwù a nyere ndị na-eweta ya ohere ịkpọsa dị ka onye isi oche nkeji nke dị ka Azụmaahịa n'ihu ọha ma wepụ ha ịkwụ ụtụ isi
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara aha ahụ naanị ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ onye ndu na ụlọ ọrụ ya na ogo
Ya mere, aha ahụ bụ akara nkwenye nke klas 'kasị elu', nsọpụrụ kachasị ebute site n'ime ụmụ ndị ogbi elu nke azụmahịa ka ndị mmadụ n'ihe nwere ike inweta n'oge ahụ
Pauly & Sohn bụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na Austria iji mepụta nkesa nke dị ka ndị na akwa akwa eji aka mee
Ha mere àkwà na oche ntụrụndụ, oche ime ụlọ, enyo, oche ime obodo, na oche maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na patios

Ha nyere arịa ụlọ zuru oke, àkwà maka ụmụaka, àkwù ndị na ụdị nke dị n'ala ahụ malite na ụdị nke dị ka ụmụaka, àkwá na ímé ihe nọr na mkpóró njem na ọtụtụ akwa akwa, bọọdụ ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ndụ ebighị dị ka ndị ọzọ na ụdị oge ụfọdụ isi na ngwaahịa maka ụra

N'ime matarasị na oche ha, ha jiri ihe ndị dị ka ntutu ịnyịnya (ihe na-eguzogide na ụdị àlà úkwú ụra akpa mmiri nke a na-eji n'oge ahụ na oche na oche ụgbọ ịnyịnya), ogho, ajị anụ na ímé ihe, isi iyi na silk
Nwa bu Josef Pauly nọchiri ya, nke a na-akpọkwa ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge gara 'Josef Pauly'
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1900, ezinụlọ Pauly anọwo ndị mmadụ n'ihe na-arụ ihe ndina dị ndụ ebighị ebi n'ụwa ọhụrụ nke dị ka ndị mmadụ aka ruo ọgbọ anọ
Ka o sina dị, Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọdịda nke eze na 1918, Great Depression na n'ikpeazụ Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ mepụtara ihe ịma aka mgbe niile maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Onye nwe ezinụlọ ikpeazụ bụ Dorothea Henning mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, otu ndị na-etinye ego nwetara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Yolande Daniels (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, onye mmebe na onye nkụzi
Ọ bụ onye ntọala ntọala nke studioSUMO, ụlọ ọrụ ihe owuwu nke na-ekwu ka obodo-ọdịnala obodo site na imewe
na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọonye mmebeye na onye nkuzi
Ọ bụ onye isi ntọala nke studioSUMO, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu nke na-ekwu maka ọdịdị ọdịbendị na ọdịbendị site na imewe
Daniels natara B
Arch ya na City College nke New York na M
Arch ya site na Graduate School of Architecture, Planning and Preservation na Mahadum Columbia
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ ya, Daniels natara fellowship abụọ site na Whitney Museum of American Art São na 1996
Daniels bịara chọta olu ya dị ka nwanyị ojii, onye ọ na-ahụkarị na ọ bụ na-agbagha n'ụzọ a na-eme ihe owuwu
ndị dị mkpa nke ọrụ ya na nyocha onwe onye na-elekwasị anya na nkatọ banyere usoro nke ike, mmekọahụ na agbụrụ na otu usoro mmekọrịta ndị a si emepụta gburugburu ebe obibi e wuru n'ụdị ihe owuwu
Mgbe ọ nọ na Whitney Independent Study Program, Daniels mepụtara ọrụ ya nke na-azaghachi nsogbu gbasara okike, agbụrụ na ụdị mmeri ndị ọzọ na gburugburu ebe obibi site na nyocha na imewe
Daniels na Sunil Bald guzobere studioSUMO n'afọ 1997
Na Bald dị ka studioSUMO, Daniels emeela ọrụ dịka Museum of Contemporary African Diasporan Art na Fort Greene, Brooklyn, New York na 2007 na Mizuta Museum na Mahadum Josai na Sakado, Japan na 2012
Ka ọ na-erule 2021, studioSUMO eguzobewo ọfịs na New York na Los Angeles
Ọ kụziri na Mahadum Michigan, Massachusetts Institute of Technology na Mahadụ Columbia, ebe ọ nọrọ ruo afọ iri
Ugbu a, ọ bụ osote prọfesọ na Mahadum nke Southern California ebe ọ na-akụzi nhazi ụlọ

N'afọ 1996, Daniels chepụtara ihe na-ehi ụra maka ụmụ nwanyị nke mbụ arụnyere n'ụlọ ndị ọbịa nke New York City Gramercy Park Hotel, iji maa ụlọ aka, na oke nke ohere na ihe, iji chee okike na mmekọahụ ihu dị ka teknụzụ na-adịghị mma na iwu ụlọ na uwe

Ntinye ụdị straddle, FEMMEpissoire, nwere ọkpọkọ maka ịsa ahụ, uwe rọba abụọ, onye na-eme ka ọ na-ekwu maka ịzụ ahịa nke ịdị ọcha ụmụ nwanyị, na enyo a kwụnyere maka ngosipụta onwe onye nke ahụ na njirimara
Ebubo nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-ekwu ma omume nke ịchịkwa nsị bụ nnwere onwe onwe dị mkpa maka ụmụ nwoke
A na-ele ọrụ ahụ anya dị ka ihe na-ekwughachi ndị na-eme enyi nwoke na-eme onwe ha n'ụlọ mposi na ụlọ mposi ọha na eze n'afọ ndị 1990 site na mpụ akụkọ ihe mere eme megide omume nwoke idina nwoke
Nhazi a bụ nke mbụ nke nwere ike 'ikwe ka onye na-eji ya hụ ahụ ya na-ewepụ onwe ya na mamịrị'
Site na Intimate Landscape nke Shotgun House na Dallas, Texas, Daniels gara n'ihu na mkparịta ụka banyere ike site na anya nke akụkọ ịgba ohu

N'ịchọ usoro obibi n'ụlọ Shotgun House, ụdị asụsụ dị na US South iji nye ndị ohu si West-Afrịka ụlọ, ọ kwughachiri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ala gbara ya gburugburu site na ihe ndị sitere na akụkọ ohu WPA
A na-edepụta ihe odide ahụ na mgbidi dị n'ime, na-eji ike nke ọkụ na onyinyo, ma nye ndị ọrụ ọchịchọ nke ala (ubi) iji mee ka ndị mmadụ nọrọ n'otu ma kewaa n'otu oge ahụ
Ụfọdụ ọrụ ndị mbụ Daniels rụrụ na studioSUMO wetara nsogbu agbụrụ n'ihu n'ụdị yiri nke ahụ
N'ime mgbalị ya, Daniel chere ihe owuwu ihu na ịdị arọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme ojii na ihe ndị sitere na eserese mpaghara na obere ntinye na mbipụta na ederede

De Facto/de Jure site na omenala / site na Iwu, dịka ọmụmaatụ, nyochara ma nyochaa eserese iwu nke mwepu na itinye n'oge narị afọ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ Great Migration na Southern Crescent Railway Line
Maka ebe a na-anabata ndị ọbịa na Museum of Contemporary African Diasporan Arts (MoCADA) na Brooklyn, Daniels chepụtara map atọ na-achọpụta mbata nke ndị Afrịka

Akwụkwọ edemede ya e bipụtara banyere ụlọ ọrụ, nke na-ekwu maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke okike, agbụrụ na klas, gụnyere Crime and Ornament (YYZ Press, 2002), White Papers, Black Marks (Athlone Press, 2000), Black bodies, black space A-waiting spectacle (2000) na Grey Areas (Chalkham Hill Press, 1999)

Tupu ọ banye na Mahadum nke Southern California dị ka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ na 2019, ọ kụziri ihe na MIT na Mahadim Yale dị ka Prọfesụ Nleta, na-elekwasị anya na ọmụmụ nke ọnụ ụzọ gafee ọdịiche ọdịbendị, ma kụzie ihe owuwu na Mahaduma Columbia, City College of New York, Mahadum Michigan
O jikwa Silcott Chair na Mahadum Howard ma bụrụkwa onye nduzi nke mmemme MArch na Parsons School of Constructed Environments

Daniels, dị ka onye otu Black Reconstruction Collective, nwere ọrụ ya ojii obodo The Los Angeles Edition, nyere iwu maka Reconstructions Architecture and Blackness in America site na Museum of Modern Art
O the apparatus in Crime and Ornament (YYZ Press, 2002)
Essay in White Papers, Black Marks (Athlone Press, 2000)
Essay in Grey Areas (Chalkham Hill Press, 1999)
J, ma ọ bụ j, bụ mkpụrụedemede nke iri na mkpụrụedemede Bekee ọgbara ọhụrụ yana mkpụrụedemede Latịn nke ISO
Aha ya na bekee bụ jay (akpọ /ˈdʒeɪ/), nwere ụdị jy / ˈdʒaɪ/ na-adịkarị ugbu a
Mgbe ejiri ya na mkpụrụedemede ụda olu mba ụwa maka ụda y, enwere ike ịkpọ ya yod ma ọ bụ jod (akpọ /ˈjɒd/ ma ọ bụ /ˈjoʊd/)
Jeremy Hawkins (amụrụ n'August 8, 1991) nke a maara dị ka JHawk ma ọ bụ JHawb Productions, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-ede egwu, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri si Los Angeles, California
A maara ya màkà ịbụ Onye ọsụ ụzọ nke Jerkin 'Movement, na-enweta ọtụtụ iri nde echiche na iyi, na-enye aka nke ukwuu na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na Los Angeles
Hawkins bụ ónyé a maara nke ọma maka ịmepụta egwu Rej3ctz 'Cat Daddy' na 2011 nke ruru Number 77 na Hot R&B / Hip-Hop Songs ma nweta asambodo Platinum n'onwe ya
JHawk tolitere n'ogige ntụrụndụ nke Los Angeles, Leimert Park
Ma nne na nna bụ ndị na-agụ egwú, nne bụ ónyé na-agụ egwu n'ógbè ahụ na nna bụ onye na'ọtụtụ ngwá egwú
Ọ bụkwa nwa nwanne nna nke The Chambers Brothers, (Time Has Come Today), na-ahụkarị ndị otu ahụ na-emegharị ma na-eme ihe ngosi màkà nne nne ha
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ natara ngwanrọ mbụ ya nke na-eme ka egwu Hip Hop EJay site n'aka nna ya, ọ malitere ịkụ egwu mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na otu ma chọọ ịghọ onye na-emepụta egwu
N'ikwu okwu na Killerhiphop's Quez, 'E wepụtara abụ mbụ m na ịntanetị mgbe m dị ihe dị ka 15-16, m na-esikwa m ike kemgbe ahụ'
JJ Bunny bụụrụ onye Ome ihe nkiri Nollywood US bi na United States
Ọ bụ omenka Ndekọ́, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ma gosipụta n'ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke a kpọrọ ' Caged ' na 2009
O ruola n'ógó dị elu na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood na Gollywood
Bọchị Dọkịta

Joseph Tom, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya JT the Bigga Figga (nke a makwaara dị ka Figg Panamera), bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na'emepụta ihe nkiri na onye isi ndekọ si n'ógbè Fillmore nke San Francisco, California
O mepụtara egwu na ihe karịrị otu narị abọm, màkà ndị na-ese ihe gụnyere Daz Dillinger, Master P, The Game, San Quinn, na Messy Marv
N'afọ 1991, JT guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ onwé ya Get Low Recordz Ihe malitere dị ka ụlọ ọrụ dị n'okpuru ala na ọrụ otu onye, ga-emesị bụrụ otu n'ime akara ndị nweere onwé ha na-aga nke ọma na mba ahụ
JT rap mbụ bịara na 1992 na abọm nke onwe ya Don't Stop til We Major mgbè ọ dị afọ 18
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ sochiri ya na Playaz N the Game
Otu egwu mbụ nke abọm ahụ, 'Game Recognize Game' nwetara ikuku dị ịrịba ama, na-eme ka JT banye n'ìhè
Ihe ịga nke ọma nkè abọm ya dugara n'agha n'etiti ndị na-edekọ egwu, o mechara bịanye aka na Priority Records na 1995
Abọm ndị sochirinụ wepụtara site na Priority Records enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, Otú ọ dị, na 1996 akara ahụ họpụtara ịtọhapụ JT site na nkwekọrịta ya
Mgbè nkwekọrịta ya na Priority Records gbasara, JT laghachiri na-ekesa abọm ya site na Get Low Recordz
Site na ego sitere na nkwekọrịta ya na Priority, JT tinyere ego na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nka ọhụrụ wee malite imepụta ma wepụta ọtụtụ abọm ngwá ngwá
N'afọ 2000, mgbe ha bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa dị ala na Bayside Records, Get Low malitere ịgbasawanye, na-ewepụta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ abọm 20 n'afọ
Ja'Tovia Gary bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri nke bi na Brooklyn, New York
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na Whitney Museum, Studio Museum of Harlem, na ndị ọzọ

A maara ya nke ọma màkà ihe nkiri ya The Giverny Document (2019), nke natara onyinye gụnyere Moving Ahead Award na Locarno Film Festival, Juror Award na Ann Arbor Film Festival, Best Experimental Film na Blackstar Film Festival, na Douglas Edwards Experimental film Award site na Los Angeles Film Critics Association
A mụrụ Gary na Dallas, Texas ma zụlite ya na Cedar Hill dị nso, n'ime ọbọdọ ụka Pentikọstal
Dị ka nwá akwụkwọ ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmemme ihe nkírí mpaghara ma gaa n'ihu nata diplọma ya na Booker T
Washington High School for the Performing and Visual Arts
Gary chụpụrụ ọrụ ọkachamara na ime ihe nkírí mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ dara mbà n'obi màkà ọrụ na ihe odide ndị a na-enye ya
Mgbè ahụ, ọ debanyere aha na Brooklyn College ma mechaa nzere bachelọ nke nka abụọ na Documentary Film Production na Africana Studies
O mechara nweta MFA ya na Social Documentary Filmmaking na School of Visual Arts
O nwekwara asambodo ihe nkírí Documentary Filmmaking site na LV Prasad Academy na Chennai, India
Ọrụ Gary lekwasịrị ányà na isiokwu ndị dị ka ndị isi ojii na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị ma chee akụkọ ihe méré eme nke isiokwu ndị a ihu site na igosi ihe nkiri echekwara n'ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2008, Gary pụtara na Grand Theft Auto IV dị ka Cherise Glover, ónyé na-ahụ na mberede
Na June 2013, Gary so na ndị guzobere New Negress Film Society, otu ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-eme ihe nkírí nke na-achọ ịmepụta ọbọdọ ma mee ka a mara olu na akụkọ ndị isi ojii na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri

Jabulile Cynthia Nightingale Mkhwanazi (amụrụ na 27 Febụwarị na afọ 1975) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South African National Congress na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly of South Africa site na KwaZulu-Natal kemgbe afọ 2019
Mkhwanazi jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya African National Congress (PR) na Newcastle Local Municipality
Maka ntuli aka n'ozuzu na Mee 8, na afọ 2019, Mkhwanazi bụ onye nke iri na abụọ na ndepụta nke ANC nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa National Assembly si KwaZulu-Natal
ANC meriri oche mpaghara 24 na KwaZulu-Natal ma họpụta Mkhwanazi na National Assembly
A ṅụrụ ya iyi n'ọkwa na Mee 22, n'oge nnọkọ mbụ nke National Assembly na-esote ntuli aka ahụ
Mkhwanazi ghọrọ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises na 27 Juun, na afọ 2019
N'afọ 2019, o nwere ọnụọgụ 88% nke ndị bịara kọmitii dị ka onye omeiwu (14 nzukọ n'ime 16) na afọ 2020, o nwere ọnọdụ 92% nke ndị bịara na kọmitii (24 nzukọ n'etiti 26)
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Jacchia Reference Atmosphere bụ ihe atụ ikuku nke na-akọwa ụkpụrụ maka okpomọkụ ikuku, njupụta, nrụgide na ihe ndị ọzọ dị n'ebe dị elu site na iri itoolu ruo puku abụọ na narị ise
N'adịghị ka US Standard Atmosphere na ụdị ndị yiri ya, ihe nlereanya Jacchia gụnyere latitudinal, ógè, geomagnetic, na mmetụta anyanwụ, mànà a ghaghị ịgbakwunye ya na ihe nlereanya ọzọ na ala

Ihe nlereanya ahụ, nke mbụ e bipụtara n'afọ 1970 ma melite n'afọ 1971 na 1977, dabere na data na-adọkpụ ụgbọ mbara igwe, a na-ejikwa ya mee ihe na ihe nlereanya ụgbọ mbara igwe na mpaghara ndị metụtara ya
Echiche a na-ahụkarị mgbè ị na-eji Jacchia Model bụ na ikuku na-agbagharị na ụwa dị ka ihe siri ike
Nkwekọ ọnụ ọgụgụ nke Jacchia Model bụ pasent iri na ise
Jacci Gresham (amụrụ n'afọ 1951) bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ a ma ama na-egbu egbugbu na United States
Ọ si Flint, Michigan, US
Ọ bi na New Orleans kemgbe afọ 1976
Ụlọ ahịa ya, Aart Accent Tattoos & Body Piercing, bụ azụmahịa egbugbu na-aga n'ihu na Louisiana
N'oge mmeghe ya, ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ụmụ nwanyị ise na-egbu egbugbu na United States, na naanị nwanyị na-egbu egbu na New Orleans
N'afọ 2011, a kwanyeere ya ùgwù dị ka ónyé ọsụ ụzọ nke ndị na-ese egbugbu
Gresham nwèrè mmasị ise ihe mgbè ọ bụ nwata
Na kọleji, ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu na injinia
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka General Motors na-emepụta atụmatụ ala màkà ndị na-ere ụgbọ ala
Mgbe ọ dị afọ irí abụọ na isé, mgbè ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ injinia, ọ zutere Ajit 'Ali' Singh
Ha abụọ mechara gaa New Orleans na-achọ ọrụ, mànà ha enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
N'oge ahụ, e nwèrè naanị ụlọ ahịa egbugbu abụọ na New Orleans
N'elu nchọpụta a, Gresham na Singh meghere ihe bụ ụlọ ahịa egbugbu nke atọ na New Orleans
Mgbè ha meghere ụlọ ahịa a, Gresham enweghị ahụmịhe, ọbụnakwa egbugbu nke ya
N'ikpeazụ, ụlọ ahịa abụọ dị ugbu a emechiela, na-eme ka Aart Accent bụrụ nke kacha ochie na New Orleans
N'etiti afọ 1950s na 1970, ụmụ nwanyị na ụlọ ọrụ egbugbu dị ụkọ
Ụmụ nwanyị na-enweta nnabata n'ime ụlọ ahịa egbugbu naanị ma ọ bụrụ na ha na-eme mkpapụ ma ọ bụ lụọ otu n'ime ndị na-egbu egbugbu
Na mbido afọ 1970, Jacci Gresham ghọrọ ónyé ọsụ ụzọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-egbu egbugbu nke nyéré áká kwadebe ụzọ màkà ịrị elu nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-ese egbugbu na-abanye na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Jacinta Athieno Ayo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya dị ka nwanyị onye omeiwu iji nọchite anya mpaghara Tororo n'oge ntuli aka nke afo 2021 Uganda mgbe o meriri Sarah Achieng Opendi

Jacinta Atuto bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo Uganda nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Kapelebyong District na ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda Ọ bụ osote onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement
O nyere ndị Kapelebyong ụgbọala eji ebu ozu

Ms Adupo Florence onye bụbu onye otu Kapelebyong nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu maka Kapelebyung District candidate na Forum for Democratic Change onye Atuto meriri, kwuru na e nyere ndị na-asọmpi ya na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021 gụnyere Atuto, okwu Adupo kpọgara n'ụlọ ikpe ndị isi majie Soroti na-achọ ka a gụgharịa vootu mana Chief Magistrate Monica Amono jụrụ akwụkwọ ndekọ vootu ya n'ihi na ha enweghị ihe akaebe dị ukwuu iji nye ikike ịtụ vootu ọzọ
Jacinta Asi Ocansey bụ onye Naijiria-Ghanaian nkwụ ọtọ na-abụ abụ nto ochi na-eme ihe nkiri
Akpọrọ ya 'naanị onye ọchị Ghana' na 'Lolo nke nto-ochi Ghana' na-enweghị asọmpi
Ụfọdụ ihe nrite o nwetara gụnyere; Ghana Tertiary Awards 2016Nwa akwụkwọ Kachasị akpa ọchị, nwa akwụkwọ ama ama na nwa akwụkwọ ntụrụndụ
A mụrụ Ocansey na Nigeria nye Alex Dzabaku Ocansey na Eucharia Ocansey dị ka otu nwa ha nwanyị
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Naịjirịa
Mgbe o dechara ule asambodo nke West Africa Senior School ma mee nkuzi na NIIT, ọ kwagara Ghana maka agụmakwụkwọ ya
Na Ghana, ọ gụrụ nzikọrịta ozi na Pentikọst University College
Ọ tughi anya ịghọ onye na-akpa ọchị mana ọ na-añara ntị na ndụmọdụ nne ya ka ọ were ihe ọchị kpọrọ ihe bụ ihe butere ya ịghọ onye na-akpa ọchị
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ya mere ka ọ pụta ìhè gụnyere, ihe ọ rụrụ na ụlọ egwuregwu na-atọ ọchị na Osu nke David Oscar gosipụtara ya na ihe ngosi ya na 2015 Akwaaba UK Comedy Night na Movenpick Hotel
Ọzọ na 2016, site n'enyemaka nke Buchi, otu n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu na Nigeria, ọ rụrụ na Lord of the Ribs comedy show na Ghana
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Master of Ceremony, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwú
O meela ihe nkiri yana Yvonne Nelson 's Heels na Sneakers na Selfie, ihe nkiri na-abịa abia
O nwere otu egwu, Gyrate na-egosi Ethel Eshun
Ọ bụ onye na-eso ụzọ Kraịst
A mụrụ Jack Cope na Natal, n'obodo South Africa ma bụrụ onye ndị nkuzi gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ

Site n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ọ banyere na Durban High School na Durban, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ na Natal Mercury wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na obodo nke London maka akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ malitere, n'ọnọdụ nkụda mmụọ, ọ laghachiri South Africa

Ọ kwagara na obodo Cape Town, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Marxist Guardian site na afọ 1941 wee ruo afọ 1955, na ikike dị iche na iche nke gụnyere onye nkatọ ọdịbendị na, n'otu oge, onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, Cope were ọmịiko na Kọmunist ya na Soviet Union
Otú ọ dị, ọmịiko ya na ndị Kọmunist kwụsịrị na nkụda mmụọ mgbe ekpughere mpụ Joseph Stalin na Nikita Khrushchev's Secret Speech
Ọ nụrụ nwa nwanne nne ya nke abụọ, onye na-ese ihe Lesley De Villiers na afọ 1942
Ha kewara na 1958 ma gbaa alụkwaghịm na mbido afọ 1960
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Raymond, (n'afọ 1948 rụọ afọ 1977) na Michael (amụrụ 1952)
A ma ra Jack Cope nke ọma maka mmekọrịta ịhụnanya ya (ihe dị ka 1960-1964) na onye na-ede uri asụsụ Afrikaans Ingrid Jonker, onye a maara dị ka azịza South Africa nye Sylvia Plath
Mgbe Jonker gburu onwe ya na afọ 1965, Cope dezigharịrị akwụkwọ edemede nke uri ikpeazụ ya ma sụgharịa ụfọdụ n'ime ha n'asụsụ Bekee
Cope bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ asatọ, ihe karịrị otu narị akụkọ mkpirikpi, na nchịkọta abụ atọ, nke ikpeazụ na njikọ ya na CJ
Driver
Ruo afọ iri abụọ, malite na 1960, ọ dezigharịrị Contrast, akwụkwọ akụkọ na-asụ asụsụ abụọ na Bekee na Afrikaans
Ya na Uys Krige dezigharịrị The Penguin Book of South African Verse (na afọ 1968) ma, dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'ọtụtụ afọ nke 1970, mepụtara mbipụta Mantis nke ndị na-ede uri Southern Africa
N'afọ 1980 ọ kwagara England, ebe o bipụtara The Adversary Within Dissident Writers in Afrikaans (na afọ 1982) na Selected Stories (n'afọ 1986)
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ Cope, The Fair House (n'afọ 1955), na-atụle Nnupụisi Bambata nke afọ 1906 na mgbalị ịkọwa ọnọdụ agbụrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na South Africa

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere The Golden Oriole (n'afọ 1958), Albino (n'afọ 1964), na The Rain-Maker (n'afọ 1971), na-akọ akụkọ mbibi nke onye ọcha ahụ bibiri omenala ndị isi ojii na ọgụ ndị isi ojii lụrụ iji nwetaghachi mpako na njirimara ha
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ dị ka onye edemede akụkọ dị mkpirikpi ka Cope gosipụtara nkà ya kachasị mma

Na A Crack in the Sky (The Tame Ox, na afọ 1960) na 'Power' (The Man Who Doubted and Other Stories, nke afọ 1967) ọhụụ omume ya doro anya; nchịkọta nke atọ ya, Alley Cat and Other Stories (n'afọ 1973), nwere isiokwu ndị gbara ọchịchịrị dịka nke ịpụ iche na owu ọmụma
Otu n'ime ihe ndị Cope rụzuru bụ mmetụta ya na akwụkwọ South Africa n'oge 1960s ya na 1970s, afọ dị mkpa na ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ihe nenyeriri anya nke Black Butterflies nke afọ 2011 na-akọ akụkọ mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Ingrid Jonker na Jack Cope, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Irish bụ Liam Cunningham gosipụtara na ihuenyo
Jack Penn (ụbọchị irí na ànó n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1909 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Novemba n'afọ 1996), MB, ChB, FRCS(E), Mil
Dec
MBE, SM, bụ onye na-awa ahụ, onye na-akpụ ihe na onye edemede, onye bụkwa onye otu Kansụl Onye isi ala na South Africa ruo oge ụfọdụ
A mụrụ Penn na Cape Town n'afọ 1909, ọ bụ nwa nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ asaa
Ógè Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Johannesburg, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Parktown Boys 'High School na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
Ọ lụrụ di n'afọ 1934 Diana Malkin, Penn na nwunye ya gara United Kingdom, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye otu Royal College of Surgeons of Edinburgh n'afọ 1935

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'usoro na Orthopaedic Centre na Liverpool, na British Postgraduate School ọhụrụ na London, dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ Senior Surgeon na ụlọ ọgwụ County Council na London, na dị ka Resident Surgical Officer na Royal Salop Infirmary na Shrewsbury
Ọ nọrọkwa akụkụ nke afọ1937 na Mayo Clinic na Rochester, na United States of America, wee laghachi, na ntakịrị oge na London, na Johannesburg, ebe Prof
Raymond Dart na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
E kwuola na a maara Penn nke ọma maka ihe banyere ọkpụkpụ ya na ihe odide ya dịka maka ịwa ahụ plastik ya
A ga-ahụ ihe ọkpụkpụ Penn n'ebe dị iche iche na South Africa na ebe ndị ọzọ
E nyere bust nke General Jan Christiaan Smuts n'ihe banyere ọdụ ụgbọ elu Jan Smuts (nke bụzi ọdụ ụgbọ elu O
Tambo), na ihe oyiyi nke Henrietta Stockdale, onye ọsụ ụzọ nọọsụ, dị n'ala Katidral St Cyprian na Kimberley
E nyere Strasbourg bust ya nke Albert Schweitzer, ebe nke David Ben-Gurion na General Moshe Dayan nọ na Israel
O mepụtara bust nke Joseph Lister, na England
O mekwara eserese na eserese

Jack Penn dere ụfọdụ akwụkwọ, ọkachasị nke nkà ihe ọmụma, nke gụnyere akwụkwọ ozi ya nye nwa m nwoke (1975) - akwụkwọ ozi ndị e degaara nwa ya nwoke John onye, dị ka ya onwe ya, ghọrọ onye na-awa ahụ ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke American Society for Aesthetic Plastic Surgery; The Right to Look Human an autobiography (afọ 1976); Reflections on Life (1980); na To think is to live (nd)
Penn nwụrụ n'ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1996, ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asaa
Jack Whitten (ubochí isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1939 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2018) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ
N'afọ 2016, e nyèrè ya National Medal of Arts
A mụrụ Whitten na 1939 na Bessemer, Alabama
N'ịhazi ọrụ dị ka dọkịta ndị agha, Whitten banyèrè ọmụmụ ọgwụ na Tuskegee Institute site na 1957 ruo 1959
Ọ gakwara Montgomery, Alabama dị nso iji nụ ka Martin Luther King Jr
na-ekwu okwu n'oge mkpagbu bọs Montgomery ma ọhụụ ya màkà America gbanwere metụrụ ya n'ahụ nke ukwuu
N'afọ 1960, Whitten gàrà Mahadum Southern dị na Baton Rouge, Louisiana iji malite ịmụ nka wee tinye ákà na ngagharị iwe nke ikike ọbọdọ n'ebe ahụ
Whitten sonyere na ngagharị si n'etiti ọbọdọ Baton Rouge gaa n'isi ọbọdọ steeti
Ikike onye na-ese ihe nke Whitten méré ka ọ bụrụ ónyé na-ahụ màkà ịmepụta ihe ịrịba ama na mkpọsa a ga-eji mee ihe na ngosipụta ahụ

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Cooper Union, Whitten nwere ohere izute ndị omenkà ojii ndị ọzọ gụnyere, Jacob Lawrence na Norman Lewis, mgbè ọ nọgidere na New York iji malite ọrụ nka ya
A maara ụdị nka Whitten dị ka ihe na-enweghị atụ mànà ọ na-amasị ya ịkọwa nka ya dị ka nka nwèrè eziokwu na mkpụrụ obi
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ọrụ Whitten sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ahụmịhe ya n'oge Civil Rights Movement
Whitten kwubiri na ịgba ohu na-egbochi ọdịbendị nkè ndị na-acha ọbara ọbara
Ya mere, Whitten kwenyere na ọ bụ akara aka ya iweghachi ọdịbendị site na iberibe ya
Mgbè mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu na World Trade Center mere, Whitten nọ na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Lispenard Street na Tribeca
N'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, o wuru nnukwu ihe osise, nkè e tinyere ntụ n'ime ya, dị ka ihe ncheta nke ụbọchị ahụ
Onye isi ala Barack Obama nyèrè Whitten 2015 National Medal Of Arts Award
N'afọ 2013, ónyé nlekọta Katy Siegel haziri ihe ngosi Light Years Jack Whitten, 1971-73 na Rose Art Museum na Mahadum Brandeis
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ọtụtụ ọrụ Whitten mepụtara n'etiti 1971-1973, nke a na-egosibeghị tupu
N'afọ 2014, The Museum of Contemporary Art na San Diego haziri ihe ngosi ncheta

Ihe ngosi ahụ gàrà Wexner Center for the Arts na 2015 na Walker Art Center na Minneapolis site na Septemba 13, 2015 ruo Jenụwarị 24, 2016 Dị ka akụkụ nke Walker ya, Whitten dere onye na-ese ihe Op-Ed na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na 'ọrụ nka n'oge ime ihe ike a na-apụghị ịkọwa akọwa
Na úbọchị atọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 2018 Crystal Bridges gosipụtara abụọ n'ime ihe Whitten si na 1970s; otu n'ime ha bụ Homage to Malcolm, 1970
N'afọ 2018, a haziri ihe ngosi 'Odyssey Jack Whitten Sculpture 1963' n'oge ọ nwụrụ ma meghee ya na Baltimore Museum of Art site na Eprel 22, 2018 ruo Julaị 29, 2018
Ihe ngosi ahụ gara na Metropolitan Museum of Art na New York site na Septemba 6 ruo Disemba 2, 2018 na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston site na Machị 3 ruo Mee 27, 2019
N'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara ihe ngosi nke mbụ n'otu ụlọ ọrụ Europe na Hamburger Bahnhof Museum für Gegenwart Berlin
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 78, Whitten nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 20, 2018
Whitten na nwunye ya Mary biri na Queens, New York
Jack in the Box bụ American nri ngwa ngwa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ chain
Ọ bụ Robert O
Peterson ka e hiwere na 1951
Jacki McInnes (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg

Ihe osise ya na-aga n'ihu n'ụdị ajụjụ abụọ migration na xenophobia, ihe onwunwe na ịda ogbenye, usoro ndụ nke ndị bi n'ọbọdọ mepere emepe ọhụrụ, na mgbagwoju anya metụtara ihe ndị dị ndụ nke ógè ochie

Ọrụ dị ugbu a, ọkachasị, na-enyocha esemokwu dị n'echiche na omume mmadụ nke oge a, ọkachachasị gbasara enweghị njikọ dị n'etiti ọchịchọ ihe onwunwe, ịzụ ahịa na-arịwanye elu, omume na-emebi ihe, na mmetụta ha na mbara ala anyị na ọdịnihu ikpeazụ
McInnes natara BA (FA) cum laude ya na 2001, na-emekwa UNISA Fine Art Faculty Medal n'afọ ahụ
Ọ gàrà n'ihu mezue MFA na Michaelis School of the Arts, Mahadum Cape Town na 2004
Kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, McInnes enwetala ọtụtụ ònyìnyé ma bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Switzerland, Brazil na Germany
Ihe ngosi onwé ónyé
Jackie Appiah (amụrụ 5 December 1983 ) bụ onye omee a mụrụ na Canada -wukwara onye Ghana

Jackie (Jackline) Nake Lumbasi bụ onye mgbasa ozi Kenya na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Kigali, Rwanda

O so mee The Big Breakfast Show na 913 Capital FM site n'afọ 2009 ruo 2018 ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe ngosi gụnyere Gaetano Kagwa, Ramesh Gabalsing, Alan Kasujja, Marcus Kwikiriza na Oulanya yana ịgụ akụkọ mgbede na UBC na Uganda ruo afọ 2014

Lumbasi hapụrụ ikuku Capital FM na Febụwarị 2018 wee sonye n'ọnọdụ ikuku n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mgbe mgbanwe zuru oke nke Big Breakfast show mana obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị ọ kwagara Royal FM nke dị na Rwanda iji mee ihe ngosi ụtụtụ n'asụsụ Bekee n'akụkụ Kwizera
A maara ya nke ọma maka olu ya siri ike ma sie ike ma kpọtụrụ ya aha n'etiti ndị na-eweta redio a na-akwụ ụgwọ kachasị elu na Uganda
Lumbasi malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya dị ka onye ngosi na Power FM na Kampala
Mgbe ahụ ọ kwagara Capital Fm Uganda ebe ọ malitere ịnabata ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ n'afọ 2009 mgbe ọpụpụ Lilian Mbabazi ruo 2018 mgbe a gbanwere ihe ngosi nri ehihie dum
O nwetara onyinye ozugbo na Kigali Rwanda na Machị 2018 ebe ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ na Kwizera
