Jackie Nyaminde (a mụrụ n'afọ 1983) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri nke aha ya bụ Wilbroda na Awilo
A mụrụ Nyaminde n'abalị 12 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1983, ma zụlite ya na Nairobi West, Langata na Rongai na Kajiado County
Ọ bụ onye mbụ a mụrụ n'ime ezinụlọ nke mmadụ isii ma ọ gara Kongoni Primary School na Uhuru Gardens Primary school na Nairobi, maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ọ gara Koru Girls High School na Kisumu County
Nyaminde gụrụ obere ihe ọmụmụ na mmepụta ihe nkiri mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gara n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ na-eleta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị iji soro ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri Kenya mee akwụkwọ
Ọ na-eme ihe ngosi a ma ama na mpaghara Papa Shirandula nke a na-egosi na Citizen TV
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio Kenya ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Milele Fm, ya na Alex Mwakideu na Morning Show
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na redio Citizen n'akụkụ Inspekta Mwala na Luchivya
Ọ bụkwa onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka nke ya na ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe ọchị ibe ya guzobere ọrụ ebere ya
Ọ na-akwado ọtụtụ ihe, n'etiti ha bụ ahụike ụmụaka na ịdị ọcha
Jackie Ormes (August 1, 1911 na December 26, 1985) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí
A maara ya dị ka nwanyị Africa-America mbụ na-ese ihe nkírí na ónyé mepụtara ihe nkírí Torchy Brown na Patty-Jo 'n' Ginger panel
A mụrụ Jackie Ormes Zelda Mavin Jackson na August 1, 1911, na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, nné na nnà William Winfield Jackson na Mary Brown Jackson
Nna ya William, onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ na onye nwe ụlọ ihe nkírí, nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọala na 1917
Nke a mèrè ka Jackie dị afọ isii n'oge ahụ na nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya Dolores nọrọ n'aka nwanne nne ha na nwanne nna ha maka oge dị mkpirikpi
N'ikpeazụ, nne Jackie lụrụ di ọzọ ma ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara n'ọbọdọ dị nso nke Monongahela
Ormes kọwara ógbè ahụ n'ajụjụ ọnụ 1985 maka Chicago Reader dị ka 'gbasa ma dị mfe
Ọ dịghị ihe dị mkpa na-eme ebe a
' Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Monongahela na 1930
E jikọghị ọrụ ya n'echiche a na-ahụkarị, mana, ebe ọ bụ na Courier nwèrè mbipụta obodo iri na anọ, a na-agụ ya n'ezie site n'ụsọ oké osimiri ruo n'ụsoro oké osimiri
Akara ahụ, nke Torchy Brown na-eme, bụ ihe na-atọ ọchị nke ónyé nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nke Mississippi nke nwetara aha na ọgaranya na-abụ abụ na ịgba egwú na Cotton Club
Njem Torchy si Mississippi gaa New York City gosipụtara njem nke ọtụtụ ndị Africa America na-aga n'ebe ugwu n'oge Nnukwu Migration
Ọ bụ site na Torchy Brown ka Ormes ghọrọ nwanyị Africa America mbụ mepụtara ihe na-atọ ọchị na-apụta na mba
Akara ahụ gara n'ihu ruo n'April 30, 1938
Ihe kpatara njedebe mberede nkè eriri ahụ ejighị n'aka, mana a na-eche na ọ bụ n'ihi njedebe nkwekọrịta ya
Jackie Sawiris bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Jọdan na Ijipt, odee na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka ime ihe nkiri dika nye Arab Majida na Knightmare site na 1993 ruo 1994
Omume ya na Knightmare bụ ọrụ Sawiris, ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi ahụ ruo afọ abụọ ruo mgbe usoro ahụ kwụsịrị na 1994, na-anọchi onye na-eme ihe nkiri David Learner onye na-arụ ọrụ osisi Pickle

Ọrụ ya na usoro ahụ bụ inye ụfọdụ enyemaka na-atọ ọchị, Majida na-akpọkarị ndị Dungeoneers n'ime onwe ya na na Episod nke mbu nke oge nke asaa ọ gbanwere okpu ikpe ziri ezi mbụ nwere mpi maka nke ọhụrụ (zuru ezu na visor), nke na-ewe iwe nke Treguard (Hugo Myatt)
Kemgbe 1988 Sawiris arụwo ọrụ n'azụ igwefoto dị ka onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe na fim Ọ bụ osote onye nduzi (1st AD/2nd Unit) na The Mummy Returns (2001)
Ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ mmepụta na ihe omume iri na abụọ nke The Wire na 2003
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na nhọrọ nke ọrụ na ihe nkiri, ụfọdụ edere, duzie ma mee onwe ya
Jackie Shako Diala Anahengo (23 August 1958 -15 June 2021) bụ onye Congolese na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na Radio-Télévision nationale congolaise, nakwa n'ọkwa ihe nkiri
Jacklet Atuhaire Rwabukurukuru Mukwana (Amụrụ na 20 June 1981) bụ onye ọkachamara mmanụ na gas nke Uganda, ọkachamara na mmepe mba ụwa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị omeiwu maka Sheema District ma ọ bụghị onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ bụla na Uganda
Ọ nọchiri Rosemary Nyakikongoro nke NRM bụ onye meriri ya na ntuli aka nke pati ahụ n'afọ 2015 n'ọnọdụ esemokwu
Atuhaire bụkwa onye bụbu onye isi oche guild maka Mahadum nke East London ma bụrụkwa onye otu Association of International Petroleum Negotiators (AIPN) na Society of Petroleum Engineers
Tupu ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị elu, Atuhaire bụ onye nduzi maka Extractive Energy Services na BFF Services Ltd

Ọ bụbu onye njikwa mmepe ngwaahịa nke WANA Energy Solutions, onye njikwa ọrụ maka Positive Care Link (PCL), otu ọrụ afọ ofufo na London, ọ bụkwa onye nhazi ọrụ maka International Refugee Trust (IRT) site na JustGiving na nyiwe ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Atuhaire n'obodo Runyinya, Kigarama Sub-county, Ankole sub-region n'ụbọchị 20 June 1981 n'ezinụlọ Anglican nke Banyankole
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na mpaghara Sheema, nweta asambodo PLE ya n'afọ 1992 site na Kamugungunu Primary School, ụlọ akwụkwọ praịm ọha na eze dị na Kyagaju Parish, Kagando Sub county

Atuhaire mechara gaa Rweibare Senior Secondary School maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level ya na Universal Girls High School maka agụmụwụkwọ A-Level, nweta asambodo UCE ya n'afọ 1997 na asambodo UACE ya n'afọ 2000
Ọ bụ onye isi nwanyị na Rweibare Senior Secondary School na onye isi oche Scripture Union na Universal Girls High School

Atuhaire gara n'ihu na Mahadum nke Woolwich ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na Public Administration n'afọ 2004 wee gaa Mahadum of East London, ebe ọ bụ onye isi oche guild ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2010 na Bachelor of Science na International Development and Information Technology

N'ikpeazụ, ọ nwetara Master of Science na International Oil and Gas Management n'afọ 2013 site na Centre for Energy, Petroleum and Mineral Law and Policy (CEPMLP), ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Dundee, Scotland, United Kingdom
Mgbe ọ nwetara asambodo UACE ya, Atuhaire kwagara United Kingdom ma rụọ ọrụ nwa oge site n'afọ 2001 ruo afọ 2004 dị ka onye nhazi ọrụ maka International Refugee Trust (IRT)
O wee nweta ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ maka Positive Care Link (PCL), otu ọrụ afọ ofufo na London, ruo afọ 2009 mgbe ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum nke East London
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa mmepe ngwaahịa maka WANA Energy Solutions site n'afọ 2012 ruo afọ 2015 mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm iji sonye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'otu oge ahụ, Atuhaire guzobere ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi maka Extractive Energy Services na BFF Services Ltd site n'afọ 2013 na 2016 ruo taa

Jackson Hlungwani (amụrụ n'afọ 1923 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe, onye ụkọchukwu, na onye guzobere Yesu Galeliya One Aposto na Sanyoni Alt na Omega na New Jerusalem, ebe dị na Mbhokota na Limpopo
Nwoke ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe nke ukwuu, a na-akọwa ọrụ Hlunwani site na ọnọdụ ime mmụọ ya na njikọ ya na obodo
A mụrụ Jackson Hlunwani n'afọ 1923, a maghị ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya, n'ezinụlọ Tsonga n'ime obodo Mashamba nke dị na Venda, South Africa
A kpọrọ Hlungwani aha nna nna ya, Bhandi Pavalala, nke a kwenyere na ọ bụ aha Tsonga / Shangaan dị nsọ nke chi
Nna nna Hlungwani nwụrụ otu izu tupu a mụọ ya, a kwenyekwara na a mụrụ nna nna ya ọzọ n'ime nwa nwa ya
E mechara manye ezinụlọ ya ịkwaga Gazankulu na-esote Iwu Apartheid nke afọ1948
[dubious Hlunwangi mụtara usoro Tsonga nke ịkpụ osisi na ịkwa nkà site n'aka nna ya, nkà nke ọ ga-aga n'ihu iji ọrụ nka ya niile
Hlungwani rụrụ ọrụ na Johannesburg site n'afọ 1941 rụọ afọ 1944, laghachi n'ala nna ya na-esote ihe mere n'ọrụ nke mere ka mkpịsị aka funahụ ya
Ógè ọ lọtara, Hlungwani bịdọrọ njem iji chọta ọgwụgwọ n'ime, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ma mesịa bụrụ onye ụkọchukwu nke Zion Christian Church site n'afọ 1944 ruo afọ 1978
Mkpa okpukpe enweghị ikewapụ na mkparịta ụka ógè ị na-enyocha ọrụ Hlungwani
N'ebe ngosi nke mgbe a, a na-elegharakarị nkwupụta okpukpe Hlungwani anya dị ka 'ọchịchọ ịmata ihe' ọ bụghị dị ka isi ihe na-emetụta ọrụ ahụ n'onwe ya
Otú ọ dị, Hlungwani chere na ọ bụ ọkpụkpọ Chineke ya iji ihe ọkpụkpụ na-agwa ndị obodo agha na agbụrụ kewara ekewa ozi Chineke

Na mkparịta ụka mbụ Hlungwani na Marcelle Manley, onye nta akụkọ, Manley na-echeta otú, “(Hlungwani) si nọdụ n'elu ikpo okwu dị ka veranda n'elu ọrụ aka ya gbakọtara, na-egbutu adze a rụrụ n'ụlọ na igodo ọzọ
Otu ọkụ eletrik gbara ọkụ n'akụkụ ya, na-eme ka ụkwụ ya dị ọnyá ebe, ọtụtụ afọ tupu ógè ahụ, akụ́ Setan batara ma nọrọ n'anụ ahụ ya, wee ghọọ agwọ
Ọkụ ahụ mere ka ọnyá ahụ ghara ikpo ọkụ ka Onye Ọjọọ ahụ wee nwee ike, n'oge a kara aka, ịpụ site n'otu ogbi ahụ
Ọ gwara m nke a n'ime nkeji ole na ole mgbe m zutere m, n'enweghị mgbochi ma ọ bụ obi abụọ ọ bụla n'ihi mkpa ahụmịhe ya
Nke a bụ ihe atụ nke otú Hlungwani si nweta ọtụtụ ọdịbendị maka isi mmalite nke mmụọ nsọ na otú o si zube ịkpọlite ụwa ime mmụọ site na ihe nnọchianya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
Jacob Samuel Brown (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka EFL Championship club Stoke City na otu bọọlụ mba Scotland
Brown malitere ọrụ ya na Barnsley, na-eme nke mbụ ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2016
Mgbe ọ nọrọ oge na mgbazinye na Chesterfield na 2017-2018, ọ banyere n'òtù mbụ na Oakwell, nyere ha aka inweta nkwalite na Championship na 2018-2019
Na Septemba 2020 ọ sonyeere Stoke City maka ego a na-akọwaghị
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya n'England, ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Scotland họpụtara Brown na Nọvemba 2021, na-eru eru site n'aka nne ya onye si Glasgow
Brown malitere ọrụ ya na Sheffield Wednesday Academy ebe a tọhapụrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ọ bịanyere aka na Guiseley mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii wee gbaa bọọlụ mbụ ya na Selby Town na West Riding County Cup n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014
Brown kwagara Barnsley na Jenụwarị 2015 mgbe ọ masịrị ha ka ha na-egwuri egwu n'egwuregwu na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ
Brown mere nke mbụ ya maka Barnsley megide Brentford na 22 Ọktoba 2016, na-abịa dị ka onye na-anọchi anya
Mgbe ọ nọrọ na ọkara mbụ nke oge 2017 na Barnsley n'okpuru afọ iri abụọ na atọ, Brown sonyeere otu egwuregwu League Two Chesterfield na mgbazinye ọnwa isii na 31 Jenụwarị n'afọ 2018
Brown gbara bọọlụ ugboro iri na atọ maka Spireites n'afọ 2017 ma ghara inyere ha aka izere ịlaghachi na National League
Brown banyere n'òtù mbụ na Oakwell na 2018 na 2019 n'okpuru Daniel Stendel ma nwee mmasị n'ịgba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ wee merie onyinye EFL Young Player of the Month maka Jenụwarị 2019
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Disemba 2018
A chụpụrụ ya na nke mbụ ya n'ọrụ ya megide Southend United na 2 Machị n'afọ 2019
Brown gbara bọọlụ ugboro iri atọ na asatọ n'afọ 2018 na afọ19, na-agba goolu asatọ ka Tykes nwetara nkwalite laghachi na Championship
Brown bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta ya na Barnsley na Mee 2019
N'afọ 201920, Brown nyere enyemaka itoolu ka Barnsley lụrụ ọgụ megide relegation ma nọrọ n'elu mgbe ha meriri egwuregwu abụọ ikpeazụ ha megide Nottingham Forest na Brentford
Brown sonyeere Stoke City na 9 Septemba n'afọ 2020 maka ego a na-akọwaghị
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Stoke na mmeri EFL Cup megide Wolverhampton Wanderers na 17 Septemba n'afọ 2020, na goolu mbụ nke league ya na mmeri 3 na Reading na Nọvemba
Brown gbara goolu isii n'egwuregwu iri anọ na isii n'afọ 2020 ka Stoke nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na anọ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'ụbọchị mmeghe nke oge 2021 na mmeri 3 na 2 megide Reading
Stoke malitere oge ahụ n'ụzọ dị mma ma nọ na esemokwu play-off na mmalite nke afọ mana ọkara nke abụọ dara ogbenye hụrụ ka ndị otu ahụ gbadata n'etiti tebụl
Brown bụ onye kacha gbaa goolu iri na anọ nke mere ka ọ nweta nkwekọrịta afọ atọ ọhụrụ ma hụ ya dịka onye egwuregwu nke afọ
Brown ruru eru igwu bọọlụ mba ụwa maka England na Scotland, na-eru eru maka nke ikpeazụ site na nne ya a mụrụ na Glasgow
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2021, Scotland họpụtara Brown maka asọmupi iko mba ụwa megide Moldova na Denmark
Brown mere nke mbụ ya na mba Scotland na 12 Nọvemba n'afo 2021, na-apụta dị ka onye na-anọchi anya na mmeri 2 na Moldova
Jacob Getlar Smith (1898 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1958) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe osise nke na-arụkarị ọrụ na New York City
Smith gụrụ akwụkwọ na National Academy of Design na New York site na 1919 ruo 1921
N'afọ 1929, e nyere Smith Guggenheim Fellowship n'ọhịa nka márá mmá, màkà ọrụ okike na eserese

E gosipụtara ihe osise Smith n'ọtụtụ gallery, gụnyere Midtown Galleries, New York; National Academy of Design; Art Institute of Chicago; Corcoran Gallery of Art; Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts; John Herron Art Institute; Fort Wayne Art Museum; Carnegie Institute; Brooklyn Museum; Minneapolis Institute of Arts; Ann Arbor Art Association; Rochester Memorial Art Gallery; Cincinnati Gallery of Toronto; National Gallery of Canada (Ottawa); Des Moines City Association of Fine Arts
N'afọ 1930, e nyèrè Smith Maazị na Oriakụ
Frank G
Logan Prize nke narị asaa na iri ise dollar màkà ihe osise ya, Friends, site na Kọmitii na-ese ihe na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke Art Institute of Chicago
Ọ nwụrụ na Montefiore Hospital na The Bronx, New York n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1958
Ihe osise nke Smith
Smith bụ ónyé édémédé ma ọ bụ ónyé nchịkọta akwụkwọ na isiokwu gbasara eserese, gụnyere
Jacob K
Olupona bụ onye Naijiria Amerikan prọfesọ na Harvard Divinity School na nhọpụta jikọrọ aka dị ka Prọfesọ nke Afrikan na Afrikan Amerikan Studies na ngalaba nke Arts and Sciences na Mahadum Harvard
Jacob K
Olupona bụ onye ọkà mmụta nke okpukpe ndị Afrịka nke bịara Harvard mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ na Mahadum California, Davis

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na nyocha nke omume okpukpe nke otu nde ndị Afrịka a na-eme atụmatụ na ha kwagara na United States n'ime afọ iri ano gara aga, na-enyocha karịsịa ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-anọgide na-adịghị ahụ anya na mpaghara okpukpe Amerika 'ndị ozi ala ọzọ' ndị bịara na US iji guzobe ọgbakọ, ndị Pentikọstal Africa na ọgbakọ Amerika, alaka Amerika nke ụka ndị nweere onwe ha, na obodo okpukpe ndị Afrịka na US Nnyocha mbụ ya gụnyere mmụọ na omume ememe, nnwere onwe, nnwere isi, ememe Pentikọstal, ihe nnọchianya anụmanụ, ihe nnọchiteanya, ihe nnọkọstal America, ihe oyiyi, ihe oyiyi okpukpe, ihe oyiyi nnwere onwe

N'akwụkwọ ya na-abịanụ Ile-Ife The City of 201 Gods, ọ na-enyocha ngwakọta obodo nke oge a nke ememe, ndị eze, okike, klas, na ike, yana otu nhazi, ọdịnaya, na ihe ọ pụtara nke nkwenkwe na omume okpukpe si abanye na ndụ kwa ụbọchị

O dere ma ọ bụ dezie akwụkwọ asaa ndị ọzọ, gụnyere ochichi Eze,okpukpe na emume n'ime obodo Naijiria A Phenomenological Study of Ondo Yoruba Festivals, nke ejirila maka nyocha ethnographic n'etiti obodo ndị na-asụ Yoruba

Olupona enwetala onyinye site na Guggenheim Foundation, American Philosophical Society, Ford Foundation, Davis Humanities Institute, Rockefeller Foundation, Wenner-Gren Foundation, na Getty Foundation

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na bọọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ na dịka onye isi oche nke Afrikan Association for the Study of Religion N'afọ 2000, Olupona natara nzere doctorate na chi site na Mahadum Edinburgh na Scotland
Jacob K
Olupona nwetara BA ya na Mahadum Naijiria na MA na PhD
ya na Machị Boston
A mụrụ Jacob K
Olupona n'ezinụlọ ebe agbụrụ nne na nna ya bụ ndị ụkọchukwu Anglican na ndị na-abụghị Anglican a ma ama
Ọtụtụ ọrụ okpukpe na ụka ọ hụrụ n'ime obodo nta, obodo nta na obodo ukwu ọ tolitere masịrị ya nke ukwuu
Ọ na-ele ka ndị mmadụ na-agwakọta ọdịnala
Ka ọ na-etolite, nghọta nke ọtụtụ okpukpe ọdịnala nke Islam, Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na okpukpe ụmụ amaala meghere ohere maka ịkwaga maka agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya na echiche na ememe nke eze dị nsọ nke Yoruba
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum na 1975 wee mee National Youth Service Corp (NYSC) na Ilorin
N'ime afọ ọ na-eje ozi na Ilorin, e gburu Gọvanọ nke Kwara steeti, Colonel Ibrahim Taiwo n'ọchịchị ndị agha yana General Murtala Muhammed nke jupụtara mba ahụ na obi erughị ala na 1976
Ozi ncheta ụka e mere maka ọchịagha na nkwusa nke onye ụkọchukwu Anglican na ihe omume ahụ mere ka echiche ya dị elu
Jacob K
Olupona malitere iche echiche miri emi banyere njikọ nke okpukpe dị iche iche na okpukpe obodo na Naịjirịa
Ihe omume ndị a mere ka ọ nwee ekele maka okpukpe ya na nnwere onwe ife ofufe na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Jacob Armstead Lawrence (amuru n'ọnwa Septemba 7, afọ 1917 – Juun 9, 2000) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ihe nke a maara maka ihe ngosi ya nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Afrịka na Amerịka na ndụ nke oge a
Lawrence zoro aka n'ụdị ya dị ka 'dynamic cubism', ọ bụ ezie na site na ndekọ nke ya, mmetụta bụ isi abụghị nka French dị ka ọdịdị na agba nke Harlem
O mere ka ahụmịhe ndị Afrịka na Amerịka dị ndụ site na iji ndị isi ojii na nchara nchara juxtaposed na agba doro anya
Ọ kụzikwaara ma nọrọ afọ iri na isii dị ka prọfesọ na Mahadum Washington

Lawrence so na ndị a maara nke ọma na narị afọ nke iri abụọ na-ese ihe n'Afrịka-Amerịka, nke a maara maka ihe osise ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị yana akụkọ banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Afrịka na Amerịka na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ, ọ nwetara nkwanye ùgwù mba ya na 60-panel The Migration Series, nke gosipụtara Nnukwu Mbugharị nke ndị Afrịka Amerịka si n'ime ime obodo ndịda gaa n'obodo ukwu North
Ndị Phillips Collection na Washington, DC, na Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) na New York zụtara usoro a

Ọrụ Lawrence dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, gụnyere Philadelphia Museum of Art, Whitney Museum, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Brooklyn Museum, Reynolda House Museum of American Art, na Museum of Northwest Art
Ihe osise ya nke afọ 1947 bụ The Builders kwụ n'ime White House
A mụrụ Jacob Lawrence n'ọnwa Septemba 7, afọ 1917, na Atlantic City, New Jersey, ebe nne na nna ya si n'ime ime obodo ndịda kwaga
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm na afọ 1924
Nne ya tinyere ya na ụmụnne ya abụọ tọrọ ya n'ime nlekọta na Philadelphia
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ya na ụmụnne ya kwagara New York City, ebe ya na nne ya zutere na Harlem

E webatara Lawrence na nka n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị mgbe nne ha debara aha ya na klas mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ nka na ọrụ aka na Harlem, nke a na-akpọ Utopia Children's Center, na mgbalị iji mee ka ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike
Lawrence na-eto eto na-esekarị ụkpụrụ na crayons
Na mbido, o depụtaghachiri ụkpụrụ nke kapet nne ya
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Lawrence rụrụ ọrụ na ebe a na-asa ákwà na ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na nka, na-aga klas na Harlem Art Workshop, nke onye ama ama na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na Amerịka bụ Charles Alston kụziri
Alston gbara ya ume ka ọ gaa Harlem Community Art Center, nke onye na-ese ihe bụ Augusta Savage duziri

Savage nwetara agụmakwụkwọ na American Artists School maka Lawrence na ọkwa a na-akwụ ụgwọ na Works Progress Administration, nke e guzobere n'oge nnukwu ịda mbà n'obi site n'aka ọchịchị nke Onye isi ala Franklin D
Roosevelt
Lawrence gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe ya, ya na Alston na Henry Bannarn, onye ọzọ na-ese ihe na Harlem Renaissance, na ụlọ ọrụ Alston-Bannarn
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ na Harlem Art Workshop na New York na 1937
Harlem nyere ọzụzụ dị mkpa maka ọtụtụ ndị oji na-ese ihe na United States
Lawrence bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-ese ihe zụrụ azụ na site na obodo ndị Africa na America na Harlem
N'ime ogologo ọrụ nka ya, Lawrence lekwasịrị anya n'inyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme na mgba nke ndị Africa America
Jacob Daniel Wiese (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 1981) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa, na nwa onye bụbu onye ijeri Christo Wiese
A mụrụ Jacob Wiese na Jenụwarị 1981, ọ bụ ọkpara n'ime ụmụ atọ nke Christo Wiese na nwunye ya Caro

O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Value & Policy Studies na Mahadum Stellenbosch, nzere masta na International Economics & Management na Mahadum Bocconi, Italy na 2004, na nzere bachelọ na Iwu na Mahadum Cape Town na 2008
Wiese bụ onye ọzọ na / ma ọ bụ onye na-abụghị onye isi nke New Look, Shoprite Holdings, Pepkor Holdings, Invicta Holdings, Tradehold, Premier Foods na Fairvest Property Holdings Ltd
A na-ahụta ya dị ka onye nwere ike ịbụ onye nketa nke azụmahịa nna ya
N'afọ 2011, ọ lụrụ Jackie Hawtrey, onye ọka iwu nke na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-azụ ụlọ ọrụ ejiji, na nwa ikpeazụ nke Melville na Dawn Hawtrey nke Cape Town
Ha bi na Bantry Bay, Cape Town

Jacobus Hendrik (Henk) Pierneef (nke a na-akpọkarị Pierneef) (ụbọchị irí àtó n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1886 Pretoria rụọ úbọchị ànó n'ọnwa Ọctoba 1957 Pretoria), bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'ala South Africa, nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ndị kacha mma n'ime nnà úkwú South Africa
A maara ụdị ya pụrụ iche n'ọtụtụ ebe ma ọrụ ya nwèrè mmetụta dị ukwuu site na ala South Africa
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya sitere na South African highveld, nké nyéré ya ihe na-akpali ya ruo ogologo ndụ
Ụdị Pierneef bụ iji belata ma mee ka ala dị mfe na geometric, na-eji mbara ala dị larịị, ahịrị na agba iji gosipụta nkwekọrịta na usoro na okike
Nke a mèrè ka e nwee ihe ngosi, nke a haziri ahazi na nke a na-ahụkarị na mpaghara South Africa, nke a na'ebighị na ya na ìhè na agba dị egwu

Enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ Pierneef n'ụwa niile n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ ọrụ nà nchịkọta ọha nà eze, gụnyere Africana Museum, Durban Art Gallery, Johannesburg Art Gallery, Nelson Mandela Metropolitan Art Museum, Pierneef Museum na Pretoria Art Gallery
A mụrụ Pierneef na Pretoria, site na nné na nnà Dutch na Boer
Ọ malitere ọrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Staatsmodelschool (nke pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị 'ụlọ akwụkwọ steeti nlereanya') n'ebe ahụ, ebe ọ gara klas nka mbụ ya, mànà Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer kwụsịrị ya
N'ihi agha ahụ, ezinụlọ Pierneef kpebiri ịlaghachi Netherlands na 1901
Mgbè ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Rotterdamse Kunstakademie
N'oge a, ọ bịakwara na ọrụ nke ndị nna ochie, nke hapụrụ mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide n'ahụ ya
Pierneef laghachiri Pretoria mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ebe ọ zutere ma gbaa ya ume site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa dị ka ńnà nnà yá Anton van Wouw, Hugo Naude na Frans Oerder
Ihe ngosi ihu ọha mbụ ya, ebe a nabatara ọrụ ya nke ọma, bụ ya na van Wouw na Naude na 1902
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na State Library n'abalị ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ma na-ese ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ya n'ehihie
N'afọ 1910, Pierneef lụrụ Agatha Delen, nwanyị ji afọ iri na abụọ tọọ ya
Pierneef nabatara ọrụ na 1929 iji see ihe osise 32 màkà ime ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè ọhụrụ nke Johannesburg, ọrụ ọ rụzuru na 1932

Kemgbe afọ 2002 usoro zuru ezu nke iri atọ na abụọ, iri abụọ na asatọ ala na anọ osisi, bụ ịgbazinye ego ogologo ógè site na Transnet Foundation na Rupert Art Foundation ma gosikwa ya na Jan Rupert Centre na Graaff-Reinet
A na-ewere akụkụ ndị ahụ dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya kachasị mma
N'afọ 1933, e nyèrè ya ọrụ ímè mgbidi asaa màkà South Africa House, ụlọ nnọchi ányá South Africa na Trafalgar Square, London
Pierneef rụchara ọrụ a na 1934
Die Kamp van Van Wouw (1918)
Die Groot Trek (1938)
Rooiplaatplaas, Noord-Transvaal – Sonsopkoms (1925)
Mont-aux-Sources (1925–1932)
Dar-es-Salaam (1926)
'n Somersmiddag, Bosveld (1928)
Die Kremetartboom (1934)
Watermeule naby Stellenbosch (1944)
Hardekoolbome – Bosveld (1945)
Pierneef nwetara ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ na onyinye n'oge ndụ ya, gụnyere
Jacqueline Nwere ike izo aka na
Jacqueline Amongin (amụrụ na 26 June 1982) bụ onye omeiwu Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement, onye e nyere ihe nrite Mandela Leadership Prize maka 'ịkwalite ezi ọchịchị na mmepe n'Africa'
A mụrụ Amongin n'afọ 1982
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere na 2005 dị ka Bachelor of Environmental Management
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Pan African Movement dị ka onye ọrụ ǹkwukọrịta n'afọ sochirinụ ruo otu afọ, tupụ ọ bụrụ onye ọrụ mmemme Pan African Movment nke Global ruọ n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu nke Uganda ma n'afọ 2013 ọ sonyeera ndị omeiwu Pan African
Ọ na-anọchite anya Ngora District
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na 2016 ebe ya na ndị omeiwu Ugandan anọ ndị ọzọ Anifa Kawoya, Prọfesọ Ogenga Latigo, Felix Okot Ogong na Veronica Babirye Kadogo nọ n'oche ya
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya n'ime ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mmadụ 5,000 ka e nye ya otu n'ime mmadụ iri na asaa Mandela Leadership Prize
E nyere onyinye ahụ maka ọrụ ya na ndị omeiwụ Pan African 'na-akwalite ezi ọchịchị na mmepe n'Africa'
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ Mandela Institute dị na Paris nyere onyinye ahụ
Ihe nrite ahụ kwuru na o guzobere 'Jacquline Amongin Development Foundation' (JADEF) ma too ihe ọ rụzuru na ndị omeiwu

Chen tolitere dị ka nwa nke ndị China kwagara Ohio, Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere masta na injinia igwe na 1982 na Mahadum California, Berkeley, n'okpuru nduzi nke Boris Rubinsky, ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadim Stanford maka ọmụmụ nke dokitaral n'otu isiokwu ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị PhD
ya na 1989; onye ndụmọdụ dokitaral ya na Stanford bụ Brian J
Cantwell
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Sandia kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma bụrụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke nnukwu ọnụọgụ ọnụọgụ nke ọkụ ọkụ na kemịkal dị mgbagwoju anya
Ọ duziri ìgwè ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị kọmputa, ndị na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ na ndị injinia na-ahụ maka mgbakọ na mwepụta na co-design nke ngwanrọ simulashon maka mgbakọ na ụzụ (10^18 flops)
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara Chen ka ọ bụrụ onye na ahụ maka ebe ana akwado maka enjiniaring'maka onyinye maka mmepụta nke usoro mgbagwoju anya na-emeghachi omume na kemịkal dị mgbagwoju

Jacqueline Fatima Bocoum bụ onye bụbu onye odeakụkọ tụgharịrị odee site na steeti West Africa nke Senegal
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Com 7
Dịka onye nta akụkọ, Jacqueline rụrụ ọrụ na RTS
na Sud FM tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi mmemme na onye isi ozi na Redio Nostalfie
Site na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nna ya bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ n'okpuru Onye isi ala Léopold Sédar Senghor
Jacqueline lekwasịrị anya n'ọnọdụ nchịkwa nna ya dị ka otu ngwaahịa nke usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị juru ebe niile n'oge ahụ, n'okwu mmalite nke akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ nwere mmasị na-enweghị mgbagha n'ebe ọ nọ
Ọ laghachiri na Chad na 1995, ka ọchịchị ụjọ nke mere n'oge Hissène Habré dị ka onye isi ala
O debara aha ya n'akwụkwọ dị ka onye ọrụ iwu, ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị inyom mbụ mere nke a
E buliri ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ iwu, mgbe ahụ na 2004, e mere ya onyeisi oche nke Chad Association for Promotion and Defense of Human Rights
N'ime afọ iri a, ọ malitere ịchịkọta ihe àmà nke arụrụala Habré na ndị òtù ya mere
N'afọ 1982 Hissène Habré weghaara ọchịchị site n'ọchịchị ọchịchị
Moudeina gbara akwụkwọ ikpe mbụ ya megide Habré na 2000, mgbe ọ na-ebi n'udo na Republic of Senegal, n'aha ụmụ nwanyị asaa
Ọkàikpe kpere ikpe ahụ boro ya ebubo na o so aka n’omume mmekpa ahụ na arụrụala
Agbanyeghị, otu afọ ka onye ọka ikpe chụpụrụ ikpe ahụ na-ekwu na ọ si na ikike Senegal
Moudeina na ndị ọ metụtara gbara akwụkwọ na Belgium, n'ihi na iwu dị ebe ahụ na a ga-ekpe onye ọ bụla mere mmekpa ahụ n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa ikpe ma kpee ya ikpe
Jacqueline Rachelle Theologo (née Watson) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu North West Provincial Legislature maka Democratic Alliance kemgbe Mee 2014
Theologo bụ nwa nwanyị nke Watty Watson
Theologo bụ onye otu Democratic Alliance
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl nke Ngaka Modiri Molema District Municipality ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na North West Provincial Legislature na ntuli aka n'ozuzu na 8 Mee 2014
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka MPL na 21 Mee 2014
A họpụtara Theologo ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ na Mee 2019
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 22 Mee 2019
N'ọnwa Machị 2021, a họpụtara Theologo ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Nlekọta nke North West Provincial Legislature
Theologo bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye nwụrụ anwụ Watty Watson, onye bụ onye isi otu Democratic Alliance ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Àtụ Members of the North West Provincial Legislature
Jacqueline Wolper Massawe a mụrụ na 18 Disemba 1987, bụ onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ejiji
Wolper malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 2007 ma gosipụta ihe karịrị ihe nkiri 30 kemgbe mmalite ya
A mụrụ Wolper ma zụlite ya na Moshi, Tanzania
Ọ gara Mawenzi Primary School tupu ọ kwaga Magrath, Ekenywa na Masai maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
O mechara gụọ asụsụ na ICC Arusha na ọmụmụ azụmahịa ndị ọzọ
Wolper banyere na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Tanzania n'afọ 2007 ebe onye na-eme ihe nkiri Lucy Komba chọpụtara ma mee ka o kwenye isonye na ụlọ ọrụ fim
Wolper na-arụ ọrụ na salon ya ebe Lucy bụ otu n'ime ndị ahịa ya
Ọ pụtara na mbụ na ihe nkiri nke Lucy Komba Ama Zako Ama Zangu ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ
O mechara pụta n'otu ebe Steven Kanumba na onye isi ya bụ Mtitu Game nwere mmasị n'ebe ọ nọ ma tinye ya na Family Tearsá na Red Valentineá
Wolper malitere ịkpa onye egwu a ma ama bụ Harmonize n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2016
Otú ọ dị, ha abụọ kewara n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2017
Ya na onye egwu ya, Diamond Platnumz nwekwara mmekọrịta
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nwere mmasị na omenala Kenya, Wolper kwuru na ọ chọghị ka ya na nwoke Kenya nwee mmekọrịta
N'afọ 2018, ọ mara ọkwa na ọ ghọwo Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ
A maara Wolper maka nkwupụta esemokwu ya na mgbasa ozi Tanzania, ọ kwupụtakwara egwu na a ga-eme ya n'ihi ha
Jacques Coetzer (a mụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye na-ese egwu pop, nke bi na South Africa
Usoro echiche ya na-ejikọta mgbasa ozi ọdịnala na nke ọhụrụ; mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke omume ya na ọrụ ya na-akpọkarị ọha na eze ka ha sonye
N'ime afọ iri abụọ, nka ya agbanweela site na ime ihe ọkpụkpụ gaa n'ụzọ dabeere na omume
Ụfọdụ n'ime nka Jacques Coetzer na-eji akara ngosi nka, arụmọrụ egwu na ntinye aka ọha na eze, nke ọ na-ede na foto na vidiyo
Ọrụ na-adịbeghị anya enyochaala nkà ihe ọmụma mgbanwe ihu igwe na mmekọrịta anyị na okike na gburugburu ebe obibi
Coetzer na-arụ ọrụ na East Africa na United Kingdom, na Cape Town, South Africa bụ mbido isi ntọala ya
Coetzer nwetara BA na Fine Art na Mahadum Pretoria n'afọ 1991 ma gụọ New Media na Groningen, Netherlands, n'afọ 1997
Ihe na-acha uhie uhie na mmiri nke Strijdom Square, Pretoria, ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1992
Jada Koren Pinkett Smith / / ˈdʒ eɪdə ˈpɪŋ kɪt / ; _ _ nne Pinkett nke amụrụ na Septemba 18, 1971) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọbụ abụ America

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ụwa dị iche (1991 – 1993), Prọfesọ Nutty (1996), dị ka Niobe na The Matrix Reloaded (2003), The Matrix Revolutions (2003) na The Matrix Resurrections (2021), Gotham ( 2014–2017) na njem ụmụ nwanyị (2017)
Na 2018, Pinkett Smith malitere ịkwado ihe ngosi okwu Facebook Watch na-egosi Red Table Talk, nke ọ na-enweta Daytime Emmy Award site na nhọpụta asaa
Pinkett Smith malitere ọrụ egwu ya na 2002, mgbe o nyere aka mepụta igwe egwu dị arọ Wicked Wisdom, nke ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú
Tinyere di ya Will Smith, o nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ma nwee ihe nturu ugo na fim, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na usoro telivishọn
O dekwara akwụkwọ ụmụaka, Girls Hold Up This World, nke e bipụtara na 2004, wee bụrụ akwụkwọ nke abụọ na ndeputa New York Times Best Seller
Kemgbe 1997, Pinkett Smith lụrụ Will Smith, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ nwa nwoke Jaden na nwa nwanyị Willow
Site n'alụmdi na nwunye ha, ọ bụkwa nne nnochi anya nwa Smith site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya, Trey Smith
Amụrụ ya na Baltimore, Maryland, Jada Pinkett Smith bụ aha onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha amasị nne ya, Jada Rowland
Pinkett Smith sitere na Jamaica na Bajan sitere n'akụkụ nne ya yana agbụrụ Africa-American n'akụkụ nna ya
Ndị mụrụ ya bụ Adrienne Banfield-Jones, onye isi nọọsụ nke ụlọ ọgwụ ime obodo Baltimore, yana Robsol Pinkett Jr, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ihe
Banfield-Jones, onye n'oge 2010 ghọrọ Adrienne Banfield-Norris, tụrụ ime na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị; di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ ma ha gbara alụkwaghịm ka ọtụtụ ọnwa gachara
Banfield-Jones zụlitere Pinkett site n'enyemaka nke nne ya, Marion Martin Banfield, onye ọrụ na- elekọta mmadụ nke Jamaica mụrụ
Banfield hụrụ mmasị nwa nwa ya nwere maka nka ihe omume wee debanye aha ya na piano, ịgba egwu, na nkuzi ballet

Pinkett Smith anọgidewo na-anọru nne ya nso wee sị, 'Mmekọrịta nne na nwa nwanyị na-abụkarị ndị kacha akwụwa aka ọtọ, anyị dịkwa nso' Ọ gbakwụnyere, sị '[Mama m] ghọtara ihe m chọrọ, ọ dịghịkwa mgbe ọ kwụchiri n'ụzọ m' Ọ sonyere dị ka nwa agbọghọ nsọpụrụ na agbamakwụkwọ Banfield-Norris nke 1998 nye Paul Jones, onye isi nkwukọrịta ozi
Pinkett Smith egosila nnukwu mmasị n'ebe nne nne ya nọ, na-ekwu, sị, 'Nne nne m bụ onye na-eme ihe, nke chọrọ ịmepụta obodo ka mma, ma tinye mma n'ụwa'
Pinkett Smith gara Baltimore School for the Arts, ebe ọ zutere wee bụrụ ezigbo enyi nke nwa klas ya, bu onye na-agụ egwú aha ya bu Tupac Shakur
Mgbe ọ zutere Shakur, ọ bụ onye na-ere ọgwụ ọjọọ
Nne ya bụbu onye heroin riri ahụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nkà ịgba egwu na ihe nkiri wee gụchaa na 1989
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nọrọ otu afọ na North Carolina School of Arts
Pinkett malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na 1990, mgbe o sonyere n'imeputa ihe nkiri True Colors

Ọ natara ọrụ ndị ọbịa na ihe nkiri telivishọn dị ka Doogie Howser, MD (1991) na 21 Jump Street (1991), wee rụpụta ọrụ n'ihe ememe telivishọn nke Bill Cosby na NBC nke a kpọrọ A Different World na 1991, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kọleji Lena James
Na 1994, Pinkett Smith soro Keenen Ivory Wayans mee ihe na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị a kpọrọ A Low Down Dirty Shame
Ọ kọwara agwa ya, Peaches, dị ka nke nwere 'isi agwa', na omume ya nwetara nlebanya dị mma
Akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Times dere, sị, 'Ms

Pinkett, onye ọrụ ya dị ka sassy na sizzling dị ka ihe ndekọ Salt-N-Pepa, na-aga na ihe nkiri ahụ' Na 1994, o mekwara ihe nkiri dị ka onye aha n'ihe nkiri ịhụnanya nke Doug McHenry a kpọrọ Jason's Lyric, megide Allen Payne, nakwa na 1995, o mere ihe nkiri dika onye e kpere ikpe na ntọhapụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri egwu Demon Knight

Na nyocha ya dị mma banyere ihe nkiri mbụ ahụ, Roger Ebert dere, sị, '[Payne] nwere kemistri siri ike na agwa njakịrị, àgwà dị nro nke Pinkett gosipụtara; ọ dị nnọọ ka ha na-enwe mmasị Onwe ha, nke na-abụghị mmetụta a na-ahuta n'ihe nkiri mgbe niile'

Pinkett Smith na onye na-agụ ọchị Eddie Murphy mere ihe nkiri n'afọ 1996 ebe emeghariri ihe nkiri The Nutty Prọfesọ, nke na-egosipụta mmasị ịhụnanya nke onye prọfesọ mahadum bụrụ ezigbo ibu nwere obi ịhụnanya
O nwekwara onye ndu nke ihe nkiri Set It Off (1996), ihe nkiri mpụ gbasara ụmụ nwanyị anọ na-apụnara ụlọ akụ iji gbanarị ịda ogbenye, megidere Queen Latifah, Vivica A
Fox, na Kimberly Elise
Edere ọrụ ya na fim ahụ na San Francisco Chronicle, nke e dere na ọ bụ ya bụ 'onye a ga-ekiri'
Emebere na na ihe nkiri ga-enweta nde dọla itoolu, mana Set it Off nwetara nde dọla iri anọ na otu n'ụwa niile
Na 1997, Pinkett Smith nwere ọrụ cameo na Scream 2 dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kọleji nke e gburu n'ụzọ obi ọjọọ n'ihu ọtụtụ narị ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri
Na 1998, ọ na-akpọ onye nta akụkọ n'ihr nkiri Laghachi na Paradaịs, na Joaquin Phoenix na Vince Vaughn, wee were ọrụ nke nwanyị ya na ndị mmadụ na-akparita ụka ya na Tommy Davidson, na ihe nkiri Woo
Mgbe ọ na-enyocha ọrụ ya nke ọma na Woo, Derek Armstrong nke AllMovie dere na edemede ahụ bụ 'formulaic'
O mechara mee ihe nkiri Spike Lee Bamboozled (2000) dị ka onye inyeaka nke onye isi agwa, nke Damon Wayans mere
N'agbanyeghị na ihe nkiri ahụ zutere na nyocha nke ndi nkatọ, ọ nwetara ihe nrite nke National Board of Review Freedom of Expression Award
Na 2001, e gosipụtara Pinkett Smith n'ihe nkiri dika nwunye na-ada ụda n'ime ihe nkiri mere nke ọma maa gaa nke ọma a kpọrọ Kingdom Come, ya na LL Cool J, Vivica A
Fox, Anthony Anderson, Toni Braxton, na Whoopi Goldberg
N'ime ihe nkiri egwuregwu nke ndụ Ali (nakwa 2001), ọ mere ihe nkiri dika Sonji Roi, nwunye mbụ nke ọkụ ọkpọ Muhammad Ali, na Will Smith na-aka nke ọzọ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ hụrụ mmepụtara ikpeazụ n'anya, o cheghị na ọ bụ onye kwesịrị ekwesị maka ọrụ ahụ 'Ọ dị m ka ọ dị m ka anyị bụ ndị na-anọghị na ihuenyo, ka ndị mmadụ hụ anyị ọnụ na ihuenyo na fim dị otú a, ga-ewere ya ndị si na fim ahụ, na ndị mmadụ ga-ahụ Will na Jada n'ebe ahụ-ha agaghị ahụ Ali na Sonji '

Ikekwe ọrụ ya a kacha mara amara ruo taa bụ ihe omere dika Niobe onye na-enupu isi na fim The Matrix Reloaded (2003) na The Matrix Revolutions (2003), ihe nkiri na-esote ndị emere na 1999 a kpọrọ The Matrix, na egwuregwu vidiyo metụtara ya Enter The Matrix (2003)
E bu nnọọ Pinkett Smith n'uche wee dee agwa ahụ kpọmkwem
Ozugbo o mesịrị ihe nkiri ya maka Ali, Pinkett Smith gbagara Australia iji rụọ ọrụ na usoro Matrix
Usoro ndị a nwetara ihe karịrị nde dọla iri itoolu na otu na nde dọla iri anọ na asatọ n'oge izu ụka mmeghe na North America ha, n'otu n'otu
Na neonoir thriller Collateral (2004), n'akụkụ Jamie Foxx na Tom Cruise, Pinkett Smith rụrụ onye ọka iwu na Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi na United States na ebumnuche nke onye na-egbu nkwekọrịta
O kwuputara ikwu dika Gloria, onye siri ike, nwee obi ike, ma hippopotamus na-atọ ụtọ, na ihe nkiri kọmputa nke Madagascar (2005)
Tom McGrath, otu n'ime ndị nduzi ihe nkiri ahụ, kwuru na ha hụrụ àgwà ndị a niile n'olu ya mgbe ha gere ya ntị

N'agbanyeghị nzaghachi dị iche iche sitere n'aka ndị nkatọ, ihe nkiri ahụ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke azụmahịa, na-enweta nde dọla narị ise na ịrị atọ na abụọ n'ụwa nile, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ihe kacha ewu ewu na 2005
Na 2007, o mere ihe nkiri dika nwunye nke dọkịta eze bara ọgaranya na ihe nkiri ahụ na- achị m, na Adam Sandler, Don Cheadle, Liv Tyler, na Donald Sutherland
Entertainment Weekly kpọrọ ihe nkiri a 'ihe nkiri ọgwụgwọ dị ịtụnanya, ojii na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke nwere ezi ebumnuche na mkpasu iwe', wee hụ Pinkett Smith 'nwere amara' na ya
Na 2008, Pinkett Smith weere ọrụ nke nwanyị onye na-ede akwụkwọ na-enwe mmasi nwanyị, n'he nkiri nile nke ụmụ nwanyị, na-emegide Meg Ryan, Annette Bening, Debra Messing, na Eva Mendes

Ọ bụ ezie na ha nwere ọganihu azụmahịa, ndị nkatọ nwere mmasị na ụmụ nwanyị ahụ, ebe Pinkett Smith nwetara nhọpụta maka ihe nrite Golden Raspberry Award maka Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị njọ maka arụmọrụ ya

Mpụta mbụ nke nduzi ya bụ ihe nkiri The Human Contract (nakwa 2008); o dekwara, ma bụrụ onye mere dị ka nwanne nwanyị nke onye ọchụnta ego ihe na-agara nke ọma mana ọ nweghị obi ụtọ, ya na Paz Vega na Idris Elba
Ọ malitere na Cannes Film Festival na Mee 2008
Ọganihu Madagascar mere Pinkett Smith ịlaghachi n'ọrụ Gloria na Madagascar Escape 2 Africa, nke nwetara nde dọla narị isii na atọ n'ụlọ ọrụ onyonyo mba ụwa
Pinkett Smith bụ onye nrụpụta onye isi ma bụrụ onye mere ihe nkiri dị ka onye isi nọọsụ na ihe nkiri ahụike TNT a kpọrọHawthorne, nke ewepụtara na June 16, 2009
USA Today kwuru si “Pinkett Smith na ihe nkiri Hawthorne ya bu ndị ike gwuru n'ụzọ niile, ọ bụghị kwa naanị ya'
Àgwà na omume ọ bụla dabara n'ụdị nke a pụrụ ịkọ nkọ n'egbu mgbu' Hawthorne kwụsịrị na August 16, 2011, mgbe oge atọ gasịrị

Mgbe ọ kwughachiri olu Gloria na Madagascar 3 Europe Most Wanted (2012), nke nwetara ihe karịrị nde dọla narị asaa na ịrị anọ na isii, o kwupụtakwara agwa ya n'ihe nkiri nke NBC mere n'ekeresimesi Merry Madagascar (2009) na ihe nkiri na-aga na-DVD kpọmkwem Madly Madagascar (2013)
Malite na 2014, Pinkett Smith sonyere na oge mbụ nke ihe nkiri mpụ FOX a kpọrọGotham, dị ka Gotham City gangster Fish Mooney
Ọ laghachiri, ugboro ugboro, na nke abụọ na nke atọ oge nke usoro
Na 2015, ọ gbara egwu na ihe nkiri Magic Mike XXL, dị ka onye njikwa nke ụlọ ịgba egwu kpakpando, na-emegide Channing Tatum na Joe Manganiello
Ọ gbara ya na Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell na Christina Applegate na ihe nkiri ọjọọ Bad Moms (2016), dị ka onye isi otu ndị nne na nna na ndị nkuzi
Ọ natara ntụle dị iche iche site n'aka ndị nkatọ, bụ ndị toro ihe nkedo na ọchị, n'agbanyeghị na echeghị na ọ nwere ike 'iji ihe onwunwe ya mee ihe n'ụzọ zuru ezu'
Pinkett Smith na-esote na-arụ ọrụ nke nọọsụ na nne kwụ ọtọ na nkiri na-atọ ọchị a kpọrọ Girls Trip (2017), n'akụkụ Regina Hall, Queen Latifah na Tiffany Haddish

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Time họpụtara ihe nkiri a ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ihe nkiri iri kacha elu nke 2017, wee kpata nde dọla otu narị na iri anọ n'ụwa niile, nke gụnyere ihe karịrị nde dọla otu narị na mba ahụ, ihe ọchị mbụ nke 2017 mere ya
Na Julaị 2017, Pinkett Smith pụtara na Essence Festival ebe, na ọkwa inye ike, ọ pụtara ka ya na Queen Latifah na-ekwurịta okwu

Pinkett Smith kwuru nke ọma maka ihe nkedo ahụ na-egosipụta àgwà ha na ndụ n'ezie, na-ekwupụta na ha niile bụ ụmụ nwanyị na-ahụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ n'anya ma na-arụ ọrụ inye ibe ha aka, njirimara nke ọ na-achọpụta dị ka ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe na Hollywood

Malite na May 2018, Pinkett Smith kwadoro okwu Facebook Watch okwu show Red Table Talk, nke na-egosipụta nne ya na nwa ya nwanyị ma na-elekwasị anya n'ọtụtụ isiokwu dị iche iche, ndị a na-ekiri site n'echiche atọ dị iche iche
Na ntụle dị mma, USA Today ' Maeve McDermott toro usoro a maka 'ndị ọbịa nwere nghọta, isiokwu enweghị ihe mgbochi na ọnụnọ nwere ùgwù nke Smith'
N'okpuru aha Jada Koren, Pinkett Smith hiwere otu Wicked Wisdom na 2002
Ndị otu ahụ nwere Pinkett Smith na-eme onye ọgụ egwu, Pocket Honore (guitar, vocals), Cameron 'Wirm' Graves (guitar, keyboard, vocals), na Rio (bass, vocals)
James Lassiter bu onye na-elekọta otu ahụ, ya na Miguel Melendez nke Overbrook Entertainment, ụlọ ọrụ nke dị Pinkett Smith bu Will Smith hibere
E wepụtara usoro egwu mbụ nke otú a na February 21, 2006, site na ụlọ ọrụ nrụpụta Pinkett Smith, 100% Womon na Suburban Noize Records
Will Smith jere ozi dị ka onye nrụpụta ọrụ ahụ
Usoro egwu ahụ mere ya na ndeputa nke b Top Heatseekers, wee nọrọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ nke iri anọ na anọ n'ime izu nke Maachị 11, 2006

Onye nyocha AllMusic Alex Henderson kwuru banyere usoro egwu ahụ, '[Pinkett Smith] na-egosi onwe ya dị ka onye na-ekwupụta okwu, onye na-abụ abụ na-enye nsọpụrụ' nakwa n '[Wicked Wisdom] na-egosi nnukwu nkwa'
Ndị otu ahụ kwalitere usoro egwu ahụ na 2006, na-eme njem dị iche iche na nnukwu ndị oti egwu a kpọrọ Sevendust
Wicked Wisdom nwetara oghere na Britney Spears ' Onyx Hotel Tour na 2004, otu n'ime njem nlegharị anya kachasị elu nke afọ
Ndị otu ahụ meghere maka Spears maka ụbọchị asatọ na Eprel na Mee 2004, n'oge European nke njegharị ahụ
Na 2005, Sharon Osbourne gara Wicked Wisdom dika ha na-eme ihe ngosi n'obere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Los Angeles
Ọ sịrị, “Ihe m hụrụ jụrụ m anya

Mgbe ị hụrụ ma nụ Jada na ndị otu ya, I ga-achọpụta na o nweghị ihe ọ bụla ma ọ bụghị ịhụnanya na nkwanye ùgwù maka ụdị egwu a' Na Mee 2005 ndị nhazi mara ọkwa na Wicked Wisdom ga-eme ihe ngosi na ọkwa nke abụọ nke 2005's Ozzfest
Ndị na-akwado ememme ahụ were iwe, na-ekwu na ndị otu ahụ enweghị ntụkwasị obi ha ga-eme na ememme egwu
N'ịmara ajụjụ gbasara mgbakwunye otu ahụ na Ozzfest, Pinkett Smith kwuru, 'Anọghị m ebe a na-arịọ maka ihu ọma ọ bụla
Ị ga-egosi ma gosi

Ọ bụghịkwa onye ọ bụla na-ege ntị ga-aga maka ya' Onye na-akpọ ụbọ nke Wicked Wisdom, Pocket Honore kwuru na n'oge mmalite nke njem a bụ nke siri ike ka nkume, 'Ozugbo okwu pụtara na anyị abụghị ihe a ga-eji egwuro egwu, ndị mmadụ malitere ịpụta na site na egwu nke isii ma ọ bụ nke asaa anyị chawaputara'
Pinkett Smith kwetara, na-ekwu, 'Mgbe ụbọchị asaa n'ime njem Ozzfest gasịrị, àgwà nke ndị mmadụ niile malitere ịtụgharị ozugbo okwu ọnụ malitere ịpụ'
Mgbe emepechara ụlọ ọrụ egwu ya 100% Women Productions, Pinkett Smith mepụtara akara ejiji nke ya, Maja, na 1994
Ahịrị uwe ahụ nwere T-shirts na uwe ụmụ nwanyị e ji okwu “Sister Power” chọọ ya mma, nke a na-ere ya site na obere katalọgụ
N'afọ 2003, Pinkett Smith na Smith nyere aka ịmepụta usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn anyị niile, nke na-agbasa na UPN / The CW
Pinkett Smith bipụtara akwụkwọ ụmụaka mbụ ya, Girls Hold Up This World, na 2004
'Edere m akwụkwọ maka Willow na ndị enyi ya na ụmụntakịrị nwanyị niile nọ n'ụwa bụ ndị chọrọ nkwenye maka ịbụ nwanyị n'ụwa a mara ama nke nwoke juputara
Agbalịrị m n'ezie igosiputa akụkụ dị iche iche nke nwanyị
Achọrọ m ka ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'ụwa nwee mmetụta dị ike, ịmara na ha nwere ikike ịgbanwe ụwa n'ụzọ ọ bụla masịrị ha'
N'afọ 2005, Pinkett Smith ghọrọ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị ama ama itinye ego ngụkọta nke nde dọla iri na Carol's Daughter, ahịrị ngwaahịa ịchọ mma nke Lisa Price mepụtara
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ekwuchitere ụlọọrụ ịma mma, wee sị, 'Ịbụ akụkụ nke nrọ nwanyị Afrịka America ọzọ bụụrụ m ihe dị oke ọnụ ahịa'
Na 2015, di na nwunye Smith so na ndị na-etinye ego nke ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ike
Na 1997, Pinkett Smith bụ emcee nke Million Women March na Philadelphia
Yana Will, Pinkett Smith ekepụtala Will na Jada Smith Family Foundation na Baltimore, Maryland, ọrụ ebere na-elekwasị anya na ntorobịa n'ime obodo, ime obodo yana nkwado ezinụlọ
Nwanne nne ya, Karen Banfield Evans, bụ onye isi oche nke ntọala ahụ
Enyere otu ha na-enyere ndi mmadụ aka onyinye nke David Angell Humanitarian Award nke American Screenwriters Association (ASA) na 2006
Will na Jada Smith Family Foundation enyela ndị otu a na-anaghị akwụ ụgwọ aka dị ka YouthBuild, na Pinkett Smith enyela onyinye onwe onye nye ndị otu dị ka Capital K-9s
Na 2006, Pinkett Smith nyere otu nde dọla maka ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, Baltimore School for Arts, ma nyefee ihe nkiri ọhụrụ ahụ nye nwa klas ya na ezigbo enyi ya Tupac Shakur

Mgbe a chọpụtara na nwanne nwanyi nne Pinkett Smith, Karen Banfield Evans, nwere ọrịa lupus, Will na Jada Smith Family Foundation, na njikọ Lupus Foundation of America na Maybelline, mere mmemme mbụ nke 'Butterflies Over Hollywood' na Septemba 29, 2007, na El Rey Theatre na Los Angeles
Ihe omume a welitere ego maka mmemme izi ọha na LFA
Enyere Will na Jada Smith Family Foundation onyinye nturu ugo na 2007 na 4th Annual Lupus Foundation of America Awards

Na 2012, n'aha PETA, Pinkett Smith degaara onye isi obodo Baltimore akwụkwọ ozi, na-arịọ ka onye nleta Ringling Brothers Circus 'na-agbaso ihe mgbochi zuru oke nke Baltimore nke iji ngwaọrụ ndị dị ka bullhooks' ma ghara imerụ enyí ahụ
N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na vidiyo maka mgbasa ozi 'Chime for Change' nke Gucci na-achọ ịkwalite ego na mmata banyere nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị zuru ụwa ọnụ
Pinkett Smith nwere ezigbo enyi ya na onye na-agụ egwu, Tupac Shakur nke malitere mgbe ha gara Baltimore School for Arts
O mechara pụta na vidiyo egwu ya ' Keep Ya Head Up ' (1993) na ' Ọnwụnwa ' (1995)
N'afọ 1995, o nyere otu narị puku dọla maka mgbapụta Shakur di ka ọ na-eche mkpesa na ikpe mmetọ mmekọahụ ya
Pinkett Smith kwuru na akwụkwọ akụkọ 2003 na ọ bụ 'otu n'ime ezigbo enyi m
Ọ dị ka nwanne m
Ọ karịrị ọbụbụenyi nye anyị

Ụdị mmekọrịta anyị nwere bu udi ị na-enweta naanị otu ugboro n'ime ndụ gị' Mgbe ha zutere Tom Cruise n'oge ihe nkiri nke Collateral na 2004, Pinkett Smith na Smith nyere US dọla puku iri abụọ na Hollywood Education and Literacy Programme (Enyemaka), Scientology ndabere maka homeschooling
Na 2018, Pinkett Smith kpughere na a chọpụtala na o nwere ọrịa alopecia areata
Ọ kesara vidiyo na akaụntụ Instagram ya n'afọ 2021 na-egosi onwe ya ka ọ kpụrụ isi ya, na-ekwu 'Ugbu a n'oge a, enwere m ike ịchị ọchị'
Pinkett Smith na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu basketball Grant Hill yiri ọyi mgbe ọ gara Mahadum Duke
Ọ zutere Will Smith na 1994 n'oge a na-emeputa ihe nkiri telivishọn Smith The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, mgbe a na-enyoch ya maka ọrụ nke enyi nwanyị ya, Lisa Wilkes
A na-ewere ya dịka onye di mkpụmkpụ maka ọrụ ahụ wee jekwuru onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nia Long
Will na Jada mechara malite iyi ọyị mgbe ya na Sheree Fletcher kewapuru
Tupu nke a, Will nwere ezigbo mmasị na Jada, mana o meghị ihe gbasara ya
Jada mechara si n’obodo ya bụ́ Baltimore kwaga California ka ya na ya nọrọ
Na Disemba 31, 1997, mgbe Jada dị ime ọnwa atọ, ihe dị ka ndị ọbịa otu narị gara agbamakwụkwọ ha na The Cloisters, na nso obodo ya nke Baltimore, Maryland
Banyere alụmdi na nwunye ya, Jada kwuru na ha bụ “ndị mmadụ” ma gwa otu onye gbara ajụjụ ọnụ, sị, “M ga-atụfu ọrụ m tupu mụ ekwe ka ọ tisaa alụmdi na nwunye anyị
M mere ka o doo Will anya
M ga-atụfu ya kpamkpam' Ụzọ abụọ ahụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri site na ụlọ ọrụ ha na-emepụta ihe, Overbrook Entertainment na Westbrook Inc

N'April 2013, Pinkett Smith mere ka ọtụtụ ndị kwenye na ya na Will nọ n'alụmdi na nwunye ghere oghe mgbe o kwuchara n'ajụjụ ọnụ 'Ana m agwa Will mgbe niile, 'Ị nwere ike ime ihe ọ bụla ịchọrọ ma ọ bụrụhaala na ị nwere ike ile onwe gị anya na enyo ma ọ dịrị gị mma'
N'ihi na n'ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị, Will bụ onye nke ya
Anọ m ebe a dị ka onye ibe ya, ma ọ bụ onye nke ya

' Otú ọ dị, ọ gọrọ agọ dị otú ahụ, na-akọwapụta okwu ya na Facebook, na-ede 'Alụmdi na nwunye ghere oghe? Okwu m kwuru gbasara 'Will nwere ike ime ihe ọ bụla ọ chọrọ' mere ka ọ pụta ìhè mkpa ọ dị ikwurịta mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ntụkwasị obi na ịhụnanya na otú ha si ebikọ'
Jada na Will nwere ụmụ abụọ, Jaden (amụrụ 1998), na Willow (amụrụ 2000)
Ọ bụkwa nne nnochi anya Trey Smith, nwa Will si n'alụmdi na nwunye gara aga
Will kwụrụ n'afọ 2008 banyere ụdị ịzụ ụmụ ha 'Anyị anaghị emesi ụmụ anyị ike mana anyị kwenyere n'ezie na ọ bụ akụkụ dị oke mkpa maka ịzụ ụmụ
Ọ na-emepụta ha ma bụrụ ihe nchekwa
Ha ghọtara na nduzi dị ha mkpa” Ezinụlọ ahụ bi n'oke ala ruru 27,000 square foot (2,500 m) na 100 acres (40 ha), na Malibu
Na May 2014, Moisés Arias, bụ onye dị afọ 20 n'oge ahụ, na-ese foto na-enweghị uwe na akwa ya na Willow Smith dị afọ 13 mgbe ahụ, Jada na nwa nwanyị Will
Foto a kpalitere nyocha n'ime ezinụlọ site na Ngalaba Ụmụaka na Ọrụ Ezinụlọ nke Los Angeles County
Na June 2020, onye na-agụ egwú August Alsina —enyi nwa Pinkett Smith Jaden—kwuru na ya na Pinkett Smith akwaala iko n'afọ 2016, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ na mgbe Pinkett dị afọ iri anọ na anọ
O kwukwara na ihe ahụ mere site na ikike Will Smith
Onye na-ekwuchitere Pinkett Smith gọnarịrị ebubo a, na-ekwu na ha 'bụchaghị eziokwu'
Na Julaị 10, n'oge ihe omume nke Red Table Talk na-egosi di ya, Pinkett Smith kwadoro 'nkwekọrịta' ya na Alsina n'oge nkewa ha, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụghị n'kike dị ya bu Will Smith
Pinkett Smith kwuru na Alsina tụgharịrị ya dị ka ikike n'ihi na ya na di ya kewara nke ọma
O mechara soro di ya lọta mgbe ya na Alsina kewapụrụ okwu wee kwuo na ya agwabeghị ya okwu kemgbe

Mgbe Pinkett Smith jiri okwu ahụ bụ 'Entanglement' bata na ịntanetị, Alsina weputara mmekorita egwu akpọrọ 'Entanglements' ya na onye ọgụ egwu Rick Ross na Julaị 19, 2020, ahịrị abụ dịka 'nkọwa nke mgbakwụnye bụ mgbe ị na-adaba na ya' na 'ị hapụrụ nwoke gị naanị ka mụ na gị kwaa iko ma gbawaa ya obi'
Na 2021, Will Smith kwuru na Pinkett Smith 'ekwetaghị n'alụmdi na nwunye nkịtị' yana na ha abụọ enweela mmekọahụ na- abụghị n'alụmdi na nwunye ha

Jade Pennock (amụrụ na abali asatọ nke onwa Jenụwarị afọ 1993) bụ onye ọkachamara na bọọlụ nke na agba bọọlụ nye FA Women's Super League club Birmingham City Ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ, na-agbaputa bọọlụ na aka onye na-eme egwuregwu na abụghị onye otu ya n'etiti , mgbe ụfọdụ, dị ka onye ọgba ọsọbinye goolu
Ọ bụ onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ na onye kacha nyere aka na Sheffield United's Championship history
Pennock nọchitekwara anya Leeds na Doncaster Belles
Pennock malitere ọrụ ntorobịa ya na Leeds na afọ 2001; ọ meriri County Cup na afọ 2009 ma họpụta ya di onye ọgba egwuregwu n'ejikwa bọọlụ nke afọ
A kpọrọ ya 'onye mbido nke afọ' mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Montevallo
Mgbe ọ gachara Mahadum Montevallo, ọ gafere Mahadum North Georgia maka afọ ikpeazụ ya na afọ 2015, na-aga n'ihu na-enwe otu n'ime oge kachasị mma [peacock prose] na ihe mere eme nke mahadum ahụ
A họpụtara Pennock maka ndị otu PBC All-Tournament All-Stars, ma nata nsọpụrụ All-American site na NSCAA
A kpọrọ Pennock onyeisi mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu maka UNG ma bụrụ naanị onye egwuregwu nke anọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mahadum a kpọrọ aha na ndị otu nsọpụrụ All-American 'afọ 2015
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2017, Pennock si na obodo Harrogate kwaga Doncaster Belles ebe ọ meriri asọmpi WSL2
Pennock gbara goolu nke buliri Doncaster Belles nwee mmeri n'asọmpi otu ọkpụ n'asataghi na Millwall na otu egwuregwu fọdụrụ na league
Pennock bịanyere aka na Sheffield United n'abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018
N'afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa Pennock dị ka onye egwuregwu Sheffield United nke Afo , onye egwuregwu ndị egwuregwu nke afo na onye njikwa egwuregwu nke de l'année

Mgbe o nye gara goolu megide Crystal Palace na goolu nke na-esote na cameo megide Charlton na afọ 2019, The Telegraph & Yahoo Sports kọrọ na Pennock nwere ikike ịnye otu goolu na nkeji 621 ọ bụla n'oge ahụ, ebe ọ gbara goolu irí na anọ na egwuregwu iri na atọ ikpeazụ ya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2019, ọ jikọtara ọrụ bọọlụ ya na ọrụ ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na YMCA, nke pụtara na ọ gara naanị nkuzi abụọ n'ime oge ọzụzụ abalị atọ nke klọb ahụ na-eme kwa izu
Mgbe Sheffield United sonyeere ọkwa nke abụọ nke bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị England, Pennock ghọrọ onye kacha gbaa goolu ma nyere aka Onye otu ya aka n'oge ahụ

N'afọ 2019, Pennock gbara goolu mmeri nke nkeji iri itoolu na anọ megide ndị otu Super League nke ụmụ nwanyị bụ Liverpool n'ihe a kpọrọ mmeri 'ịtụnanya' goolu atọ asatara abụọ nke Sheffield na iko Continental
Pennock bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ịgba bọọlụ otu afọ na Sheffield United, n'ihu oge asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2020 na 21

Pennock nyere goolu mbụ nke Neil Redfern dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa Sheffield United na afọ 2020 ka ọ gbara goolu ugboro abụọ megide ndị na-emegide asọmpi Championship London City Lionesses
N'abalị iri abụo na anọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2021, Pennock kwupụtara na ọ ga-ahapụ Sheffield United mgbe oge atọ gasịrị
Sheff Utd
N'abali iri na asaa nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 2021, Pennock bịanyere aka na Birmingham City, na Women's Super League, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ bịanyere aha n'okpuru onye njikwa ọhụrụ Scott Booth
Pennock nyere goolu mbụ ya nke Birmingham na nke atọ ya nke otu ahụ n'oge egwuregwu WSL megide Everton
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2022, Pennock gbara nkeji iri itoolu niile nke mmeri Birmingham meriri Arsenal n'oge ahụ
A na-akpọ mmeri ahụ dị ka nnukwu ihe ịtụnanya WSL n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ya ma họrọ Pennock maka otu Her Football Hub WSL nke izu ahụ
A họpụtara goolu Pennock maka Birmingham megide Reading na FA Women's Super League ọgụgụ ịnye goolu WSL nke ọnwa ahụ ma hụ arụmọrụ ya na ndị otu nke izu ahụ, nke Siobhan Chamberlain họọrọ

Pennock na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya n'akụkụ onye egwuregwu Manchester United na onye mba England Leah Galton nke SRUSA, mmemme agụmakwụkwọ nke na-enyere ndị na-eto eto na-agba bọọlụ aka ịchọta ebe na mahadum na United States

Na mbido afọ 2021, Pennock pụtara na telivishọn ụmụ nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu bọọlụ nke obere usoro ihe nkiri Throw in the Kitchen Sink na-ekwu maka ihe ịma aka nke ndị egwuregwu na-eme ka bọọlụ ọkara ọkachamara na ọrụ kwụsiri ike
Doncaster Belles
Onye ọ bụla
Jadesola Olayinka Akande (CON, OFR) (15 Nọvemba 1940 29 Eprel 2008) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria, onye edemede na ọkà mmụta nke a na-ewere dị ka nwanyị mbụ Naijiria prọfesọ nke Iwu
A mụrụ Akande Jadesola Olayinka na 15, Nòvemba 1940, na Ibadan, Oyo State, nke na-adịghịzi Western Region nke Naịjịrịa
Akande Jadesola Olayinka gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara, ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ibadan People's Girls School na St
Annes School

Ọ nwetara asambodo GCE Advanced Level ya mgbe ọ gachara Barnstaple Girls Grammar School, Devon, England tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na-amụ ihe ọmụmụ na Law na University College, London ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1963
Mgbe ọ kpọrọ oku n'ụlọ ikpe na Inner Temple, London na Nigerian Law School, Akande Jadesola laghachirị Naịjirịa ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nchịkwa na West Regional Civil Service
Akande Jadesola bụ ónye isi otu Kọmitii Nnyocha Iwu nke 1987, na Kọmitii Onye isi ala nke Nchebe Mba na 2000
N'ọnwa Eprelụ afọ 1989, a họpụtara Akande Jadesola Olayinka dị ka onye isi oche nke abụọ nke Mahadum Lagos State, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 1993, mgbe ọ kwụsịrị dị ka onye nkuzi na Mahadum nke Lagos

N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Pro-Chancellor nke Federal University of Technology, Akure ruo n'afọ 2004Ọ bụ onye isi otu Kọmitii Nnyocha Iwu nke 1987 na Kọmitii Onye isi ala nke Nchebe Mba na 2000
Ọgaranya nke ahụmịhe ya bụ nke abụọ na-enweghị onye ọ bụla
Dị ka nne na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ,

Jadesola Osiberu bụ onye Naijiria odee, onye nduzi na onye na- emepụta ihe
Amụrụ na ezinụlọ eze na 1985, nna Osiberu, Oba Adewale Osiberu bụ Elepe nke Epe Sagamu
Osiberu gụrụ akwụkwọ secondiri na Ịbadan, tupu inweta Computer Systems Engineering ogo si te na Mahadum nke Manchester
Ọ bụkwa onye gụrụ na Pan-Atlantic University, ebe ọ gụrụ mgbasa ozi na nzikọrịta ozi
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nrụpụta ngwanrọ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Osiberu kpebiri ịgbanwe ọrụ gaa na ịme ihe nkiri
N'ime ememe ọnwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị, Pulse tinyere ya na ndepụta nke ụmụ nwanyị iri na-emeputa otu ọdịmma site na ịmepụta ọdịnaya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa
Osiberu malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya, Tribe85 Productions na 2017 na ebumnuche nke 'ịkọrọ ndị na-ege ntị zuru ụwa ọnụ akụkọ Afrịka'
N'oge mkparịta ụka BellaNaija, ụkpụrụ omume ya, nlebara anya na nkọwa zuru ezu na ihe okike na-eto ya site na onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ
N'afọ 2018, ọ gbara isi okwu Nollywood Film Festival na Scotland

Na 2017, Osiberu dere ma duzie Isoken, ihe nkiri banyere ihe ịma aka ndị nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na-alụbeghị di na-eche ihu n'etiti nrụgide sitere n'aka ezinụlọ, yana mmekọrịta ịhụnanya na mmekọrịta nwoke na nwanyị na ọnọdụ Nigeria nke oge a
Maka ọrụ ntụzịaka ya, ọ meriri onye ntụzi aka kacha mma na 2018 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards wee nweta ihe nrite Africa Movie Academy Award maka nhọpụta onye isi kacha mma
Onye na-ahụ maka Omenala mere ka ọ pụta ìhè ka e si hazie isiokwu ihe nkiri a iji lụso ajọ omume ọgụ n'ime ọha ndị nna nna Naijiria

Jonathan Kweku Awote-Mensah (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 27 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1992), onye a maara dịka Jae5 bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye injinia na-agwakọta ihe na MBA Ghana si Plaistow, East London
Ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nrite Grammy Award ma bịanye aka na Black Butter Records
Jonathan Mensah tolitere na London mgbe ọ bụ nwata ma kwaga Ghana site na afọ 9 ruo afọ iri na abụọ ya na ụmụnne ya
Ọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke ndị otu NSG bụ Kruddz na OGD
Mgbe ọ laghachiri London, ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na mmemme APE Media, ebe ọ zụlitere mmepụta na nkà injinia
Nwanne ya nwoke tọrọ ya nwekwara mmemme DJ ebe ọ mụtara otu esi eji Fruity Loops na ngwaọrụ ngwanrọ ndị ọzọ
Jae5 bụ akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a na-akpọ JOAT Music Group, nke nwanne nna ya Blemish na onye na-ese ihe Randy Valentine malitere
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na J Hus na JOAT n'afọ 2015 wee mepụta mixtape The 15th Day iji nweta otuto zuru ebe niile
O mechara malite imepụta maka ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Britain dịka MoStack na Dave
N'afọ 2017, ọ bụ onye isi mepụtara abọm Common Sense nke J Hus, na-emepụta egwu na-aga nke ọma 'Did You See'
N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ, ya na Burna Boy rụkọrọ ọrụ na egwu 'Sekkle Down' na 'Calm Down'
Nakwa n'afọ 2018, ya na Geko, Shakka, Mr Eazi, Rudimental, na Young T & Bugsey rụkọrọ ọrụ, yana imepụta egwu NSG kacha nwee ihe ịga nke ọma 'Options'
N'afọ 2019, o mepụtara ọtụtụ platinum 'Location' na 'Disaster' nke Dave
Mmepụta ya mere ka ọ nweta nkwanye ugwu dịka GRM nyere onyinye na MOBO Awards maka onye nrụpụta kacha mma
N'afọ 2021, Jae5 wepụtara egwu izizi ya dị ka onye isi egwu a na-akpọ 'Dimension' nke gosipụtara Skepta na Rema
Ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nyere Jae5 otuto dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe maka ịsụ ụzọ ụdị njikọta nke afroswing
A kọwara ụda ya dị ka njikọta n'etiti grime, afrobeats, bashment, na dancehall

Ụlọ Jaekel bụ nnukwu ụlọ dị okpukpu abụọ na Ebute Metta, Lagos, Nigeria

E wuru ụlọ ahụ N'afọ 1898 n'elu nnukwu ala mara mma ma gụọ ya aha Francis Jaekel OBE, onye bụbu onye nlekọta nke Ụlọ ọrụ n'ahụ maka Njem ụgbọ oloko na Naijiria (Nigerian Railway Corporation), onye lara ezumike nká n'àgbàtà afọ 1970 na 1979 mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ nke ịrụsi ọrụ ike ya
Ụlọ Jaekel bụ ebe obibi nke Onye kachasị isi n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, emechaa gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ezumike ndị isi

Prọfesọ John Godwin na njikọ aka Railway Corporation rụzigharịrị ụlọ ahụ ma weghachite ya n'afọ 2010Ihe owuwu ahụ bụzi ebe ngosi ǹkà na-egosi ihe ndekọ foto dị iche iche site n'afọ 1940 hà ruo afọ 1970 hà nke ndị mmadụ, ebe, ihe ndị mere eme n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na Naịjirịa tupu, nakwa mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, ma nweekwa ihe ndị gụnyere ngwá ọrụ, uwe, foto wdg nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ oloko ochie
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ebe agbamakwụkwọ akụkọ ifo na Lagos
Ụlọ Jaekel na Ebe Ngosi Ihe Mgbe Ochie bụ nke Legacy n'afọ 1995 na-elekọta ugbu a iji chekwaa ihe nketa nke ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè mbụ, ebe nrụzi na ụlọ nkwakọba ihe na Naịjirịa
Jair Messias Bolsonaro (Glicério, March 21, 1955) Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye Brazil, onye so na Social Liberal Party (PSL)
Ọ bụ onye nchịkwa gọọmenti etiti ebe ọ bụ na 1991, nke dị ugbu a na nke asaa ya, nke onye Progressive Party (PP) họpụtara

Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Renato Bolsonaro na ụmụ ya atọ bụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Carlos Bolsonaro (onye ndụmọdụ Rio de Janeiro maka PSC), Flávio Bolsonaro (onye nnọchiteanya Rio de Janeiro maka PSL na onye isi nke akụkọ akụkọ ahụ na steeti) na Eduardo Bolsonaro (Federal São Paulo nakwa PSL)
Jaklin Dencheva Zlatanova (Bulgarian Жаклин Денчева Златанова, amụrụ na 25 Septemba 1988) bụ nwanyị Bulgaria na agba bọọlụ basketball na asọmpi ugbu a maka WBC Beroe na Njikọ Bulgaria
A na ewere Zlatanova dị ka otu n'ime ndị na eme egwuregwu kachasị nwee nkà na mba ahụ nke noge gara aga so na mba ndị kachasị nwee ọganihu na basketball ụmụ nwanyị Europe
A mụrụ Jaklin Zlatanova na 25 Septemba 1988 nisi obodo Sofia, ebe ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu noge ọ bụ nwata nezinụlọ nwere omenala basketball ogologo oge
Nne ya Krassimira Banova bụ onye na agba bọọlụ bọọlụ nke na aga nke ọma, ya na ndị otu Levski(Sofia) meriri asọmpi Euro league na 1984, iko Ronchetti na 1979 na onyinye ndị ọzọ tupu ọ laa ezumike nká
Zlatanova bụ akụkụ nke ndị otu mba Bulgaria kemgbe afọ 2003 mgbe ya na ndị otu Cadettes na asọ mpi na nke mbụ ya na Agba nke asọmpi asọmpi European
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gbara ihe karịrị 100 egwuregwu na ndị ntorobịa na ndị nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke mba ahụ
Otú ọ dị, Bulgaria agbaghị bọọlụ na Asọmpi Europe ruo ihe karịrị afọ 20 nagbanyeghị mbọ nke ọgbọ atọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na egwu basketball
Nihi nnukwu mmerụ ahụ atọ noge ahụ, 2012-2014 Zlatanova hapụrụ otu agba nke European Qualifications na 2014
Oge ikpeazụ ọ sonyere n'egwuregwu ndị ọrụ, n'oge mkpọsa EuroBasket na 2013, ọ bụ onye kacha gbaa goolu maka otu ya na nkezi nke 141 Points, 61 Rebounds na 15 Assist kwa egwuregwu
Ihe ka ukwuu n'ọrụ ya Zlatanova anọwo na mba ofesi, ọkachasị na ndị otu French na Spanish
N'afọ 2005, ọ bụ akụkụ nke Tarbes GB na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ France ebe o mere nke mbụ ya na Europe na asọmpi Euroleague
Ebe ọ nọrọ afọ anọ na klọb ahụ (2005-2008), Zlatanova kpebiri ịkwaga Spain na ndị otu Extrugasa na mbido oge 2009
Ọ gbara na asọmpi EuroCup na nkezi nke 143, 28 nlọghachi azụ na 08 na-enyere aka kwa egwuregwu
N'afọ 2010-2011, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Grand Canaria
N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ, ndị otu ahụ sonyere na asọmpi Eurocup na Zlatanova bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu kachasị mkpa na nkezi nke 112, 74 nlọghachi azụ na 14 na-enyere aka kwa egwuregwu
Ya na klọb na eto eto Mann Filter Zaragoza, ọ malitere oge nke asaa ya n'usoro na asọmpi Europe, n'ikpeazụ jiri nkezi nke 102, nlọghachi azụ isii na 14 nyere aka kwa egwuregwu
Ọzọkwa, nzọụkwụ kachasị mkpa n'ọrụ onye na eme egwuregwu bụ mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Rival Ecopolis na 2013
N'ụzọ dị mwute, n'oge ọzụzụ, tupu mmalite nke oge ahụ, onye na eme egwuregwu ahụ nwere nkụchi Achilles nke bụ nke mbụ n'ime nnukwu mmerụ ahụ atọ
Mgbe ọnwa anọ nke ịgbake gasịrị, ọ nwere ike igwu naanị egwuregwu ole na ole tupu ntinye aka nke abụọ n'otu ụkwụ ahụ
N'ịbụ onye na efu oge niile, Jaklin Zlatanova kpebiri ịlaghachi Bulgaria, ebe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta na Dunav 8806 Ruse na 2013
Ọnwa abụọ mbụ nke mgbake gara nke ọma, ọbụnakwa o nwere ike ịsọ mpi na Eurocup ọzọ, na-aghọ onye egwuregwu kachasị mkpa na otu ahụ na nkezi nke 124, 62 nlọghachi azụ na 14 na enyere aka kwa egwuregwu
Ọgwụgwụ nke oge fọdụrụnụ agwụla mgbe o merụrụ ahụ n'ikpere aka ekpe ya wee gaa ahụ na Jenụwarị 2014
Mgbe afọ iri gachara mba ọzọ, Zlatanova laghachiri n'ụlọ maka oge 2013-2014 na ndị otu Dunav 8806 Ruse
Klọb ahụ gosipụtara na ha sonyere na EuroCup, ọnụnọ Zlatanova nyere ha nnukwu olileanya maka ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma
N'ụzọ dị mwute, ịdị adị nke klọb siri ike sitere na Turkey na Russia hapụrụ ndị otu Dunav 8806 na enweghị ahụmahụ na ala nke tebụl isi, ha ga elekwasịkwa anya na mbọ ha naanị na league mpaghara

N'ịbụ onye gbakere site na ịwa ahụ nke abụọ nke Achilles, Zlatanova fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu kachasị mkpa na ndị otu ahụ mana ọ nweghị ihu ọma ọ merụrụ ikpere aka ekpe ya n'otu n'ime egwuregwu ikpeazụ tupu ezumike Krismas
Nnyocha ahụike gosipụtara nkwarụ nke nkwonkwo nke ikpere ya, ọ nwetakwara ihe ọhụrụ na mbido afọ 2014
Maka oge niile, 2013-2014 Jaklin Zlatanova sonyere na egwuregwu 11 na nkezi nke 124, 52 rebounds na 15 na-enyere aka kwa egwuregwu
Ka ọ dịgodị, Dunav 8806 Ruse gara n'ihu na-asọmpi na league, na anọ n'ọnọdụ maka nrite ọla edo
Na enweghị Zlatanova, ha jisiri ike merie ndị otu Levski Sofia siri ike ma bụrụ ndị mmeri nke ugboro anọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme ha
Mgbe ogologo oge gbakere, nke were ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọnwa itoolu, onye na eme egwuregwu ahụ dị njikere maka oge nke abụọ ya na Dunav 8806
Ọ gbara egwuregwu iri atọ na otu n'ime oge a na eme kwa afọ na egwuregwu iri abụọ na asaa n'ime ha ọ malitere
Noge niile, Zlatanova nwetara nkezi nke 113, 74 rebounds, na 25 na enyere aka
Ọzọkwa, usoro ahụ sonyere na asọmpi iko mba Bulgaria ebe e wepụrụ ya na ọkara ikpeazụ, mana Zlatanova wusiri ọnọdụ ya siri ike site n'ịghọ otu n'ime ndị atọ kachasị elu na asọmpi ahụ
Otú ọ dị, nke a ezughị maka ndị otu ya, ndị na-asọmpi si Ruse meriri naanị ọla nchara
Naanị otu ọnwa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ndị egwuregwu basketball nwere ohere ịbọ ọbọ maka ọdịda ahụ, na usoro egwuregwu ikpeazụ megide Neftohimik Bourgas, ha mechara merie aha ahụ mgbe 3-0 na usoro ahụ

Atọ ahụ na eme anwansi alaghachila ugbu a! Nịbụ onye furu oge 2016-2017 niile n'ihi ime ahụ, Zlatanova sonyeere Gaby Ocete na Pao Ferrari wee malite oge nke abụọ ya na jersey nke Mann Filer Stadium Casablanca
Na 2019 Jaklin bịanyere aka na WBC Beroe, nke na asọmpi na Otu egwuregwu bọọlụ basketball nke mba na Bulgaria
N'okpuru ebe a bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ ya maka oge a
WBC Beroe na esokwa na WABA Njikọ nke bụ asọmpi basketball mpaghara, na egosi ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị si Serbia, Montenegro, Bosnia na Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Slovenia, na Croatia
Maka oge 2019-2020, Zlatanova agbaala egwuregwu iri na abụọ na akara 88 kwa egwuregwu na nlọghachi azụ itoolu
Lee ọnụ ọgụgụ dị n'okpuru ebe a
Noge 2020-2021 ugbu a, Zlatanova megharịrị nkwekọrịta ya na ndị otu WBC Beroe
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19, a kwụsịtụrụ asọmpi otu egwuregwu basketballụmụ nwanyị na Bulgaria
Jakob Blasel (amụrụ n'afọ 2000) bụ onye Germany na-ahụ maka ihu igwe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Alliance 90/The Greens
Blasel tolitere na Kronshagen wee sonye na Green Party n'afọ 2017
Blasel haziri ngagharị iwe mbụ na Kiel n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2018; ọ bụ maka ichebe Ọhịa Hambach na North Rhine-Westphalia, nke a ga-ewepụ maka igwupụta lignite
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye malitere ọgbaghara ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ maka ihu igwe na Northern Germany
N'ọnwa Mee 2019, o kwuru okwu na ESA's Living Planet Symposium na Milan
N'afọ 2020, Blasel rusiri ọrụ obere oge n'ọfịs ndị omeiwu nke Lisa Badum
Tupu ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2021, Green Party họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa maka mpaghara Rendsburg-Eckernförde na Schleswig-Holstein
O meriri 148% nke vootu mbụ, na-abịa nke atọ n'azụ Sönke Rix, onye SDP, na Johann Wadephul, onye CDU
Jakow Trachtenberg (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 17 June 1888 ruo afọ 1953) bụ onye mgbakọ na mwepụ nke mepụtara usoro mgbakọ uche a na-akpọ usoro Trachtenberg
A mụrụ ya na Odessa, na Alaeze Ukwu Russia (Ukraine taa)
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ kachasị elu na Mining Engineering Institute na St
Petersburg ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ dị ka injinia na ụlọ ọrụ ngwá agha Obukhov
Mgbe ọ ka nọ na mbido afọ iri abụọ, ọ ghọrọ Chief Engineer na ndị ikom 11,000 n'okpuru nlekọta ya
Gọọmentị Tsarist nyere ya ọrụ nke ilekọta nhazi nke ndị agha mmiri mepere emepe

Jalaa (autonym basàrə̀n dà jàlààbè̩), eji kwa Cèntûm were mara, Centúúm ma ọ bụ Cen Tuum, bụ asụsụ na-adịghịzi adị nke ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria (Loojaa settlement dị na Balanga Local Government Area, Gombe State), nke a na-ejighị n'aka mmalite ya, o doro anya na ọ bụ asụsụ dịpụrụ adịpụ
Ndị Jalabe (dị ka a na-akpọ ụmụ nke ndị na-asụ asụsụ ahụ) na-asụrụ asụsụ Bwilim nke asụsụ Dikaka

O kwere omume (ma a na-ejighị n'aka) na e debere ụfọdụ okwu echeta maka ememe okpukpe, mana na 1992 ọ bụ naanị ndị okenye ole na ole na-echeta okwu ndị nne na nna ha ji mee ihe, na 2010 ọ nwere ike ọ gaghị adị ọbụna ihe ncheta dị otú ahụ
A na-ekwu na ndị Jalabe si n'ebe dị kilomita ole na ole na adịghị anya n'ebe ndịda n'ime Ugwu Muri bịa Loojaa, ebe ha na ndị agbụrụ Tso na Kwa kerịtara ebe obibi were bia
(A na-eji aha ebe obibi a, Cèntûm ma ọ bụ C Honeyum, mee ihe dị ka aha maka asụsụ ahụ n'ebe ụfọdụ

Ndị okenye Jalaa dị iche na ma ha kwenyere na Jalaa ma ọ bụ Centum / Cuntum bụ aha mbụ ha maka onwe ha) Ka e mesịrị, n'ime narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ndị Dikaka rutere n'ógbè ahụ, na-agba ọsọ mwakpo site na Waja ka ukwuu gaa n'ebe ugwu; ndị Cham lụrụ ndị Jalabe, ndị Jalape malitekwara ịnakwere asụsụ Dikaka
Agucha ọnụ ọgụgụ ise, ọnụọgụgụ ndị ọzọ fọrọ ntakiri ka ha yie nke Dikaka
Nọmba 2 ruo 5 fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu ihe na Tso, ebe 'otu' enweghị nkọwa doro anya
Dikaka nwere mmetụta di ukwu na Jalaa lexicon (nke metụtakwara ya); a na-ahụkwa ihe ụfọdụ yiri ya na Tso nke dị ya nso
Otú ọ dị, ọtụtụ n'ime okwu ya dị nnọọ iche
N'okwu Kleinewillinghöfer, 'Akụkụ ka ukwuu nke akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu ahụ yiri ka ọ dị iche kpamkpam na asụsụ niile gbara ya gburugburu, nke n'onwe ha na-anọchite anya ezinụlọ asụsụ dị iche iche'
Ndị Dikaka na ndị Tso na-ezere iji aha ndị nwụrụ anwụ
Mgbe aha ndị ahụ bụkwa okwu nke asụsụ ahụ, dị ka ọ na-emekarị, nke a meziri ha ịgbanwe okwu ahụ, mgbe ụfọdụ ha ewere okwu sitere na asụsụ agbata obi ha dochie ya
Kleinewillinghöfer na-ele nke a anya dị ka ihe na-akpali ụfọdụ ịgbazinye ego site na Jalaa gaa na Dikaka
Ọ nu ọgụgụ 1-6 na Jalaa bụ
Ọdidi nkè ndị Jalaa (ọ kachasị n'ụdị ya ugbu a) fọrọ ntakiri ka ọ bụrụ otu ihe na nke Cham
Isi ọdịiche dị na usoro klas aha bụ abụọ n'ime ọtụtụ nsonaazụ Jalaa -ta na Cham -te̩ na (maka ụmụ mmadụ) Jalaa -bo, -ba na Cham -b(e̩)
Ụdị aha yiri nke Cham, mana enwere ọdịiche
Ụfọdụ immatụ nke otu na ọtụtụ aha na Jalaa na Cham
Jalia Bintu makwaara dị ka Bintu Lukumu Ngonzi Abwooli Jalia (amụrụ 20 Mee 1967) bụ nwanyị Ugandan onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọrụ na-elekọta mmadụ / onye nkuzi jikọtara ya na

Jalia Bintu nke a makwaara dị ka Bintu Lukumu Ngonzi Abwooli Jalia (amụrụ na 20 Mee 1967) bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya / onye nkuzi nke jikọtara ya na National Resistance Movement
Ọ bụ nwanyị nnọchi anya mpaghara Masindi nke jere ozi na nke asatọ, nke itoolu, na nke iri nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Grade II Teaching Certificate na 1985 na National Institute of Education, Mahadum Makerere ma mesịa banye na Grade III Teaching Certification na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo ma mechaa na 1989
Ọ sonyeere Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo na 1993 iji nweta diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ 1999, ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ ya na nka na Mahadum Makerere wee laghachi maka Master of Arts ya na ọmụmụ udo na esemokwu na 2005 site n'otu mahadum ahụ
Site na 1986 ruo 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Army Barracks Public School ma mesịa sonye na Kamurasi Teachers College n'etiti 1993 na 1994 dị ka onye nduzi
Ọ bụ osote onyeisi oche nke Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (2004-2006)

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka osote onyeisi oche, Kọmitii na Kọmitii, Ndị Ọchịchị Iwu na Ụlọ Ọrụ Steeti (COSASE) na (2001-2004) na onyeisi oche, kọmitii na Ohere Ịha nhata (2006-2008)
N'afọ 2008, ọ bụ onye na-ekiri na mkparịta ụka udo na Juba

Jalia jere ozi n'ọtụtụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu na National Consultative Committee Fast-Tracking East African Federation (2007), kọmishọna na Parliamentary Commission (2011-2013), na dị ka onyeisi oche, ndị omeiwu SACCO na Parliament of Uganda (2015 ruo taa)
Site n'afọ 2001 ruo taa, ọ bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
A kpọrọ aha ya n'etiti ndị omeiwu n'okpuru NRM bụ ndị nọ na omeiwu ugboro abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa mana ha enwetaghị ọkọlọtọ pati ma merie na ntuli aka 2021-2026
O kpebeghị mkpebi n'oge ntuli aka nke Iwu Iwu, nke nwere otu ahịrịokwu maka iwepu oke afọ
Bintu kwuru na ọ ga-ebu ụzọ jụọ ndị ya tupu ya enwee ike iwere ọnọdụ n'okwu ahụ
Ọ lụrụ di
Ihe omume ntụrụndụ ya bụ ịgụ akwụkwọ, igwu netball, egwuregwu, ịbụ abụ na ịgba egwú
O nwere mmasị pụrụ iche n'inyere ndị nọ ná mkpa aka, ịkụ osisi na ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka nwanyị
Jalingo bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naijiria
Jalingo bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Taraba (Taraba State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 140,318 (Local Government Area; 2006; census) na 162,210 (Local Government Area; 2011; projection)
Jamaica bu òbòdò àgwè nọ na ime otú-Obodo Karibiyạn
O nor na ímé Osịmịrị Karibiyạn, nleda anyanwu ya bu ébé Cuba nor, na odida anyanwu ya wu ala-elu-mmiri há nạ kpo Hispanyola, ime ala nke bu obodo Hēyítị na Ochichiiwu Dọminícạ
Diạlạ Jamaikạ bu ndi Taíno ndi na su asụsụ Arawak, ha gùrù obodo ha Xaymaca, wuru 'Alạ nkú na mmirị', ma o bu 'Alạ mmirị jụrụ'
Búrú obodo ndi Spain wẹrẹ ha kpọrọ Santiago, mgbe ogẹ gáfèrè o dafụrụ áká ha, da na ime ochíchí ndi Britain aha ya wuzi 'Jamaica'
Wéré madu rúrú nde 28, o bu obodo ató nor na Olile anyanwu Amerika na su asụsụ Inglish wéré madu kacha, Nke ndi mbu bu Njikota Obodo Amerika na Kánada
O nor okpúrụ Eze nwanyi Elizabeth II bu ishi iwu alạ
Kingston bu ama ukwu bu nke kacha ívu na Jamaikạ
