Jamal Eddine Dkhissi (a mụrụ na Oujda, ọ nwụrụ na 24 Machị 2017) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
N'oge ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke karịrị afọ iri atọ, Dkhissi sonyere n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Dkhissi ma zụlite ya na Oujda
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Abdelmoumen High School, ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ ihe nkiri na Academy of Dramatic Arts na Moscow
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Morocco, ọ kụziri ntụgharị na Higher Institute of Drama and Cultural Animation (ISADAC) na Rabat, na-azụ ọgbọ nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Moroccan
Ọ bụ onye nduzi ISADAC, ma bụrụkwa onye nduzi nke ụlọ ihe nkiri Mohamed V nke mba ahụ
Oge ikpeazụ Dkhissi pụtara n'ihu ọha bụ na mmeghe nke mbipụta nke iri na asatọ nke National Film Festival nke Tangier izu atọ tupu ọnwụ ya, n'oge ọ natara ụtụ dị egwu
Dkhissi nwụrụ n'ọnwa Machị afy2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 63, mgbe ogologo oge ya na ọrịa lụchara ọgụ
E liri ya na ili ozu Chouhada na Rabat
Eze Mohammed nke isii zigara ozi nkasiobi na ọmịiko nye ndị ezinụlọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ nwụrụ anwụ
Jamar Nicholas (amụrụ na Machị 18, 1973) bụ onye African American na-ese katụụn, graphic novelist, na educator bi na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania

A maara ya maka akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ, Leon Protector of the Playground, na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke Fist, Stick, Knife, Gun, ihe ncheta nke onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke Africa America bụ Geoffrey Canada dere na 1995
Ọrụ Nicholas na-atụle isiokwu ndị dị ka mmegbu na ime ihe ike mgbe ọ na-enye ihe ngosi ọzọ, nke dị mma nke ndị isi ojii
Nicholas tolitere na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania ebe ọ na-elekarị Spider-Man n'ụtụtụ Satọdee ma na-amụsi ihe n'obi banyere ihe nkiri ọchị dị ka Peanuts, Andy Capp, na Blondie
Ọ gara Philadelphia High School for Creative and Performing Arts, wee gụsịa akwụkwọ na 1990
Nicholas gụrụ gbasara ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke Arts (Philadelphia) malite na 1991
N'afọ 1993, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Mahadum La Salle, o keputara The Adventures of Jamar & Patrick, ma ọ bụ Patrick & Jamar, Whatever
ya na enyi ya na odee ibe ya, Patrick White
Kwa izu, ọkara peeji nke na-atọ ọchị pụtara na The Collegian (La Salle University) site na 1993 ruo 1994
Nicholas malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na 1997 site na ịjị aka ya wee bipụta The Jamar Chronicles, nke nwere akwụkwọ abụọ na-atọ ọchị
N'afọ 2002, o mepụtara Detective Boogaloo Hip-Hop Cop, webcomic kwa izu nke e bipụtara na mbụ na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Kevin Smith bụ MoviePoopShootcom, nke gara ezumike ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2003, Nicholas jere ozi dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise nke Philadelphia Tribune, akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha ochie na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ African American na United States
Mgbe ọ nọ na Philadelphia Tribune, Nicholas mepụtara katọn nchịkọta akụkọ abụọ kwa izu ruo afọ atọ
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ eserese nke Geoffrey Canada's 1995 memoir Fist, Stick, Knife, Gun, nke Jamar Nicholas gosipụtara ma gbanwee, na 2010 site na Beacon Press
N'ịbụ onye Canada n'onwe ya họpụtara, a kọrọ na Nicholas 'kpọọrọ ahụmahụ ya na-etolite na Philadelphia mgbe o gosipụtara [akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ],' nke na-egosi afọ uto Canada na South Bronx

Nicholas gwara Ashley Huber nke The Philadelphia Inquirer na ya nwere olileanya na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ 'ga-emeghe uche ndị mmadụ maka nsogbu nke ụmụ okorobịa,' na-eto eto na agbata obi ndị na-enweghị ọrụ
Nicholas nwetakwara Rising Star Award site na Glyph Comics Awards n'otu afọ ahụ
The Young Adult Library Services Association mechara tinye mgbanwe eserese na ndepụta akwụkwọ ha maka 2011 Great Graphic Novels for Teens
N'afọ 2015, Detective Boogaloo laghachiri na akwụkwọ akụkọ Philadelphia, New York City, na Boston nke Metro International bipụtara dị ka ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị kwa ụbọchị
Nicholas na-akọwa ihe ọchị ahụ dị ka 'akwụkwọ ozi ịhụnanya ya na hip hop,' na-ezo aka na nwata ya, nke mere n'oge ọmụmụ nke ụdị ahụ
A họpụtara Detective Boogaloo maka Best Comic Strip / Webcomic na 2016 Glyph Awards

E gosipụtara ọrụ Nicholas na Black Comix African American Comics, Art and Culture, mbipụta 2010 nke ndị na-ese ihe osise Damian Duffy na John Jennings dere nke chịkọtara ọrụ nke ihe karịrị mmadụ iri ise African American comic book artists
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya ọzọ na mbipụta nke 2018, Black Comix Returns
Na Septemba 2017, Baltimore Comic-Con kwupụtara mmalite Nicholas nke akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, Leon Protector of the Playground, nke mere nke mbụ ya na 2017 Baltimore Comic Con na Ọktoba
Na ngwụcha afọ 2017, Nicholas natara Artblog's 2017 Liberta Award maka 'Author! Onye edemede! Akwụkwọ kachasị mma nke ndị Filadelfia dere
' Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya wee gaa n'ihu merie 2018 Dwayne McDuffie Award for Diversity in Comics, Nicholas natara 2018 Glyph Comics Award for Best Writer
Nicholas akụziela ihe ọmụmụ na Mahadum Arcadia, Mahadum Drexel, na Moore College of Art and Design dị ka prọfesọ
Isiokwu nke ọmụmụ ndị dị otú ahụ gụnyere ịkọ akụkọ, ihe nkiri, ihe atụ, edemede okike, na omenala pop
Nicholas emeela Glyph Comic Awards maka ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri n'usoro
Ọ bụkwa onye edemede maka Draw! Magazin, mbipụta 'how-to' nke onye na-ese akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị bụ Mike Manley dere nke na-atụle ihe nkiri, eserese, na ihe nkiri
N'ofè ịgba ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-emepụta akwụkwọ ọchị ajụjụ ọnụ, ọ bụ 'Crusty Critic' nke magazin ahụ, na-edebe kọlụm na nyocha ngwaahịa na ngwá ọrụ
N'akụkụ Rich Faber na John Gallagher, ndị okike nke Roboy Red na Buzzboy, Nicholas kwadoro Comic Book Diner, ụlọ ọrụ na podcast lekwasịrị anya na azụmahịa nke ihe nkiri
Jamel Debbouze (French pronunciation ; Arabic , ; a mụrụ na 18 June 1975) bụ onye France-Moroccan na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ọchị, onye edemede, onye na'emepụta ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe osise ya na-atọ ọchị, ya na onye nduzi Alain Chabat rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ndị ọzọ ama ama na France dịka Florence Foresti, Fred Testot na Gad Elmaleh
O meela ọtụtụ ihe ịga nke ọma, gụnyere Amélie, Asterix & Obelix Mission Cleopatra, Hollywoo na HOUBA! N'okporo ụzọ nke Marsupilami
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ihe ngosi telivishọn Canal + Jamel Comedy Club
A mụrụ Debbouze na Paris, France
Ezinụlọ ya, ndị si Taza, laghachiri Morocco n'afọ sochirinụ
Ha laghachiri n'afọ 1979 wee biri na Trappes n'afọ 1983, na mpaghara Paris, ebe Debbouze nọrọ oge nwata ya fọdụrụ
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụnne isii Jamel, Mohamed, Hayat, Karim, Rachid na Nawel Debbouze
Na 17 Jenụwarị afọ 1990, na ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè dị na Trappes, ụgbọ okporo ígwè na-agafe agafe na-agagharị na 150 km / h kụrụ ya
O nweghị ike iji aka nri ya mee ihe n'ihe mberede ahụ, nke gburu nwa okorobịa ọzọ, Jean-Paul Admette, nwa onye na-agụ egwu Michel Admette si Reunion
Ezinụlọ onye ahụ e gburu gbara Debbouze akwụkwọ maka igbu ọchụ mana e wepụrụ ikpe ahụ n'ihi enweghị ihe akaebe
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2004, ọ na-aga ime ihe nkiri n'àgwàetiti Réunion nke France, mana Debbouze kagburu, na-azọrọ na ọ na-arịa ọrịa, dịka nne na nna Michel Admette haziri ngagharị iwe megide ọbịbịa ya
N'afọ 1990, Debbouze zutere Alain Degois, onye nkuzi nke haziri ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri, wee sonye n'òtù ya
Ya na ndị otu a, o sonyere na French Championship of Improvisation n'afọ 1991 wee gaa Quebec na Morocco
N'afọ 1992, o nwetara òkè mbụ ya na ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Les Pierres Bleues du Désert
Mgbe ihe nkiri a gasịrị, Debbouze chọrọ ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma mepụta ihe ngosi nke ya
Nke a mere n'afọ 1995 na ihe ngosi C'est Tout Neuf nke nwere obi ụtọ nke ukwuu
Mgbe ahụ, o nwere ọrụ na-enweghị atụ na mmemme redio Radio Nova ma sonye na mmemme telivishọn Nova Premiere ebe Canal+ hụrụ ya
N'afọ 1996, o sonyere na nke mbụ ya na ihe ngosi TV a na-akpọ Nova première na Paris Première
Ụfọdụ ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri site na Canal+ hụrụ ya na ihe ngosi a bụ ndị were ya n'ọrụ iji gosipụta ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Le cinéma de Jamel
Maka Afọ Ọhụrụ n'afọ 2000, Debbouze mepụtara ihe ngosi TV maka oge a a na-akpọ Jamel show
Ọtụtụ ndị France na-eme ihe ọchị dịka Bruno Solo, Alain Chabat, Élie Semoun, na Dieudonné pụtara na ihe ngosi a
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003, o sonyere na mgbasa ozi 6 maka Orangina
N'abalị 29 ọnwa Machị afọ 2008, ya na onye nta akụkọ French bụ Mélissa Theuriau kwere nkwa ọlụlụ; ha abụọ lụrụ na 7 Mee 2008
Ha mụrụ nwa nwoke na 3 Disemba 2008 aha ya bụ Léon na nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Lila n'afọ 2011
Jamel Shabazz (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese ejiji, ezigbo nka, ihe ngosi na onye na-ese foto n'okporo ámá
E bipụtara ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ, gosipụta ya na ihe ngosi, ma jiri ya mee ihe na ọrụ nchịkọta akụkọ
A mụrụ ya na Brooklyn, New York
Jamel Shabazz lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ ya na ndị mmadụ ole na ole na mpaghara Amerịka n'oge ọgba aghara dị na mba ahụ
Ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ịmepụta mmata banyere ndụ nke ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na ndị mmadụ ole na ole nọ n'ógbè New York City
Jamel Shabazz bụ onye ọkachamara n'iji ihe ọ nwere maka uru ya iji mepụta ihe dị adị nke ịbụ akụkụ nke obodo ojii n'oge na ebe ahụ
E mepụtara ọrụ nka ya iji gosipụta ọṅụ na obi ụtọ na-abịa na itolite n'obodo ahụ
Jamel na-ese ndị ogbenye na-erughị eru bi n'ebe ahụ n'ụzọ a maara nke ọma na nke na-egwuri egwu nke na-emegide ọtụtụ echiche ọjọọ ndị mmadụ nwere n'oge ahụ

Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ foto ya A Time of Innocence, nke e sere n'afọ 1981 na Brooklyn, New YorkFoto a gosipụtara otu ìgwè ụmụaka Afrịka Amerịka na-egwuri egwu ma na-agba ịnyịnya n'ụgbọ ahịa n'etiti okporo ámá ọgba aghara
Foto a gosipụtara ndụ ndị ntorobịa ojii na-eto eto ma nyere ndị ọzọ aka ịhụ njikọ na obodo ha na-ekerịta
Akwụkwọ ya Back in the Days (2002) na-anakọta foto Shabazz nke e mere na New York City n'etiti afọ 1980 na afọ 1989, nke na-edekọ ọdịbendị hip-hop na-apụta
The Last Sunday in June (2003) na-anakọta foto afọ iri nke ihe omume mpako nwoke idina nwoke na New York City
Sights in the City New York Street Photographs (2017) nwere ọrụ sitere na iri afọ anọ nke ise ndị mmadụ foto n'obodo ahụ
City Metro (2020) nwere foto ndị e mere n'etiti afọ 1980 na afọ 2018 nke ndị mmadụ na New York City Subway

Foto Shabazz apụtala na ihe nkiri afọ 2007 Planet B-Boy, ihe ngosi 2008 Street Art Street Life From the 1950s to Now in the Bronx Museum of the Arts, na dị ka ihe osise mkpuchi album maka album hip hop nke afọ 2011 Undun by The Roots
Shabazz pụtara na Cheryl Dunn 2010 documentary Everybody Street, 'maka ndị na-ese foto ndị jiri ndụ okporo ámá New York City dị ka isi isiokwu n'ọrụ ha'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na magazin Nation19, Jamel kwuru na o jiri ihe nkiri analog na foto dijitalụ
N'afọ 2016, Cedric Benjamin gosipụtara Shabazz na nke abụọ nke Luke Cage
N'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, Pop debere otu foto ahụ
James Amos Porter (ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1905 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 1970) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ónyé na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi
A maara ya nke ọma màkà iguzobe ngalaba nke akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Africa na America ma nwee mmetụta na African American Art movement
A mụrụ Porter na Baltimore, Maryland na úbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1905
Nnà ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu African Methodist Episcopal na nné ya bụ ónyé nkuzi
Nwanne ya nwoke John kụziiri ya ise ihe
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Washington DC
n'etiti 1918 na 1923, ma mesịa gaa Mahadum Howard
N'okpuru nduzi nke James V
Herring, ónyé isi nke Ngalaba Art na Mahadum Howard, Porter mụrụ ihe osise, eserese, na akụkọ nka
Porter gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard na 1926
Ọ gụkwara maka nzere na Teachers College, Mahadum Columbia
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Porter nabatara ọkwa dị ka onye nkuzi nke eserese na eserese na Mahadum Howard
O mechara bụrụ onyeisi oche nke ngalaba nka, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ na 1970
Porter gara The Art Institute nke New York City
O mechara gụọ akwụkwọ na Art Students League nke New York
Porter natara agụmakwụkwọ na 1935 site na Institute of International Education ma bụrụ onye natara ònyìnyé Rockefeller Foundation nke nyere ya ohere ịmụ nka na Europe
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise Baroque na Institute of Art and Archeology na Sorbonne
Ọ laghachiri na United States ebe ọ gàrà Mahadum New York, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1937 na nzere masta na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Akwụkwọ edemede nke Porter, nke mechara bụrụ isiokwu maka akwụkwọ ya nwere mmetụta, Modern Negro Art, lekwasịrị anya na nka na ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka
Porter kụziri na Mahadum Howard ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ, ya na ndị na-ese ihe dịka James Lesesne Wells na Lois Mailou Jones
Ọ bụ ónyé isi nke Ngalaba Art, ma jee ozi dị ka ónyé nduzi nke Art Gallery site na 1953 rụo 1970

David Driskell, otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ Porter na Howard, chetara n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Xavier Nicholas na ọ bụ naanị nwa akwụkwọ na klas ya 'Negro Art' otu semester Mana 'Ọ kụziri usoro ahụ dị ka a ga-asị na o nwere otu narị ụmụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ, naanị m bụ'
O bipụtara Modern Negro Art na 1943, ọmụmụ zuru oke mbụ na United States nke nka Africa-America
Porter jiri nkwubi okwu tinye ndị na-ese ihe Africa-America n'ime usoro nka America
Ọ bụ ónyé mbụ ghọtara ma dekọọ ònyìnyé dị mkpa ndị omenkà a nyere na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nka America
Site na usoro nhazi nke Porter, Modern Negro Art ghọrọ ma ka bụ ntọala nke akụkọ ihe méré eme nke nka Africa-America na màkà ederede ndị ọzọ

Mmasị Porter nwèrè n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka e chefuo ma na-elegharakarị anya na ndị na-ese ihe nke ndị Afrịka sitere n'ịgụ edemede dị mkpirikpi banyere onye na-ese onyinyo ala Afrịka-Amerịka Robert Scott Duncanson
N'ihi mkpirikpi nke akụkọ ahụ, Porter sooro ọchịchọ ịmata ihe ya iji nyochaa Duncanson na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe nke ndị Afrịka
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, Porter zutere Dorothy Burnett, ónyé na-elekọta ọbá akwụkwọ na alaka Harlem nke New York Public Library, ebe o mèrè nyocha
Na Disemba 27, 1929, Porter na Burnett lụrụ
Ha nwere otu nwa nwanyị, Constance Porter
Ha ghọrọ ndị ọkachamara yana ndị mmekọ onwe ónyé
Dorothy sooro Porter rụkọọ ọrụ, na-enye ozi bibliographic dị oke mkpa maka nyocha ya
Ha abụọ rụrụ ọrụ na Mahadum Howard
Dorothy Porter bụ onye nduzi nke Moorland Foundation, nke e mechara màrà dị ka Moorland-Spingarn Research Center
Ọ mepụtara ma depụta ozi gbasara ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na America
James A
Porter Colloquium bụ mmemmé agụmakwụkwọ ụbọchị atọ na Mahadum Howard na-enyocha akụkọ nka na mmepe ọdịbendị nke Africa America
Malite na 1990 site n'aka ónyé na-akọ akụkọ ihe méré eme Dr

Floyd Coleman, Porter Colloquium bụ ọnọdụ agụmakwụkwọ kachasị màkà mkparịta ụka ọhụrụ na echiche sitere n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta na-eduga na ndị na-apụta, ndị na-ese , ndị na'anakọta, na ndị nkatọ ọdịbendị
Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, ndị na-eme ihe ngosi nkè Colloquium gụnyere ndị isi n'ọhịa, dị ka David Driskell, Ann Gibson, Leslie King Hammond, Samella Lewis, Lowery Stokes Sims, Deborah Willis na Judith Wilson
A na-akpọ Colloquium iji sọpụrụ ónyé ọsụ ụzọ Howard University art historian na ónyé na-ese ihe, James A
Porter
Segun James Adeniyi (amụrụ na 20 Disemba 1992) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere Tuzlaspor na TFF na League mbụ
A mụrụ Adeniyi na Lagos, Naijiria n'ime ezinụlọ ndị Alakụba, a zụlitere ya na mpaghara Mushin nke Lagos ya na ụmụnne ya nwoke abụọ na ụmụnne nwanyị anọ
N'afọ 2009, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa n'ogige ọzụzụ nke ndị otu mba Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa kwadoro, mana e mechara hapụ ya ma ọ banyeghị na ndị otu ikpeazụ nke gara njem Qatar

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2012, James sonyeere ndị otu Superliga nke Albania bụ Bylis Ballsh, ebe ndị egwuregwu Naijiria ndị ọzọ bụbu akụkụ nke ndị otu ahụ, ọ sonyeere otu ndị ntorobịa nke klọb ahụ tupu a kwalite ya na otu mbụ n'ihu mkpọsa 2012
O mere nke mbụ ya na 23 Septemba 2012 na Superliga nke Albania megide FK Kukësi, na-abịa dị ka onye na-anọchi Shkëlzen Kelmendi na nkeji iri asatọ na ọdịda 1
Naanị ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị na 26 Septemba, James mere mmalite ọkachamara mbụ ya na Albania Cup tie megide Tërbuni Puke, ebe ọ gbakwara goolu ọkachamara mbụ ya n'ọkwa 2a
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, e zigara James na onye otu ụgbọ elu Tomori Berat maka akụkụ nke abụọ nke oge 2012 - 13
Mgbe ejiri ya mee ihe na mbụ dị ka onye azụ aka nri, James nwere mmasị na egwuregwu mwakpo ya na mwakpo n'ihu ma nye ya ọrụ mwakpo
Ọ gbara egwuregwu mbụ ya maka otu ọhụrụ ya na 10 Febụwarị, malite ma na-egwu nkeji 90 zuru ezu na mmeri Tirana
Onyinye mbụ ya maka otu ahụ bịara mgbe e mesịrị na mpụta nke anọ ya, na-emeghe ihe n'ime nkeji anọ na mmeri Kastrioti Krujë n'ụlọ
James gbara egwuregwu iri na abụọ n'oge obere oge ọ nọrọ na klọb ahụ, ha niile dị ka onye mbido, na-anakọta nkeji 1062 ka ndị otu ahụ laghachiri na ngalaba mbụ nke Albania mgbe oge abụọ gasịrị
Mgbe ngwụcha oge ahụ gasịrị, ndị otu ahụ gbasara ma James nọgidere na-enweghị ego, mgbe klọb ahụ akwụghị ya ụgwọ ọtụtụ oge, ya na ndị egwuregwu mba ọzọ bi na obere họtel dị nso n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ
Na mbido mbụ ya na Europe na agba nke mbụ nke Europa League na 3 Julaị 2014, James gbara goolu mbụ ya na European megide Rudar Velenje nke Slovenia n'ụlọ
Goolu ya bịara na nkeji nke 89 nke egwuregwu ahụ nke mere ka akara ahụ hara nhata na 1 - 1

Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ n'oge ọ laghachiri, na-emeghe akara ahụ naanị ka onye na-eme ka egwuregwu ahụ nwee oge mgbakwunye wee nye ntaramahụhụ, ebe Laçi meriri 3 - 2 na ọgụ ahụ na ebe Adeniyi gbara penalty mmeri
Mgbe e wepụrụ Laçi na Europa League, James gbara egwuregwu mbụ ya na 24 Ọgọst 2014, na-enyere Elton Doku aka na 1 zọpụtara n'ụlọ megide Partizani Tirana
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, n'egwuregwu nke ise megide Tirana, James nyere aka nke abụọ ya n'oge ahụ n'ụlọ n'elu isi obodo ahụ
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya n'oge ahụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Septemba n'egwuregwu ya na Flamurtari Vlorë, na-agba goolu ahụ na nkeji iri atọ na otu site na nnukwu chip si n'èzí mpaghara ahụ
N'egwuregwu nke mbụ nke agba nke mbụ nke 2014 na Naftëtari Kuçovë, ọ gbara bọọlụ na nkeji nke isii, na-enyere ndị otu ahụ aka inweta mmeri dị mma nke 2 - 0

N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, n'egwuregwu Supercup nke Albania nke afọ 2015 nke e mere na Qemal Stafa Stadium, James gbara bọọlụ ugboro abụọ maka ndị otu ahụ n'egwú 2-2 draw; ọ gbakwara bọọlụ penaty ya na-anwa inyere Laçi aka imeri egwuregwu 8-7 site na oso penaty Nke ahụ bụ Supercup Albania mbụ nke klọb ahụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2016, n'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke oge oyi, James hapụrụ Laçi iji sonye na Skënderbeu Korçë, ebe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ

Ọ malitere na klọb ahụ ụbọchị isii ka e mesịrị na egwuregwu megide Kukësi, ebe James nyere aka na goolu mbụ nke Salihi ma mesịa gbaa onwe ya na mmeri n'ụlọ nke 3 - 1, na-etinye Skënderbeu akara abụọ n'elu

N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Mee, n'ụbọchị egwuregwu nke iri atọ na atọ nke league megide Laçi, James bụ onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri site n'inye aka atọ ma nye onwe ya ugboro abụọ ka Skënderbeu Korçë gbara goolu isii na ọkara mbụ na 6-1

N'egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke Superliga nke Albania megide Flamurtari Vlorë, James nyere aka nke goolu nke abụọ nke otu ahụ na ihe ịga nke ọma 2-0 na-aga n'ihu, na-enyere klọb ahụ aka imeri nke isii ya n'usoro na nke asaa n'ozuzu
Ọ gwụchara oge ahụ site n'ịgba goolu iri abụọ na atọ na asọmpi niile ya na Laçi na Skënderbeu, gụnyere iri na ise na league, na-etinye ihe kachasị mma
James malitere oge ọhụrụ ahụ na 24 Ọgọstụ site n'ịgba nkeji iri ikpeazụ nke 2016 Albanian Supercup, ebe Kukësi meriri Skënderbeu 3-1 na Selman Stërmasi Stadium
Ọ malitere oge league site n'ịpụta ọzọ dị ka onye na-anọchi anya ka otu ahụ meriri Flamurtari Vlorë n'ụlọ
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba, n'ụbọchị egwuregwu nke anọ, n'egwuregwu mbụ ya dị ka onye mbido, James gbara naanị goolu megide Luftëtari Gjirokastër ka Skënderbeu meriri nke anọ n'usoro
O mere 100th Albanian Superliga pụtara na 25 Eprel 2016 na egwuregwu 31 megide Tirana
N'afọ 2016 na afọ iri na asaa, James gbara bọọlụ iri atọ na abụọ ma gbaa goolu asatọ dịka Skënderbeu enwetaghị mmeri n'asọmpi ahụ na nke mbụ ya n'ime afọ isii
O nyekwara aka na egwuregwu 6 na goolu 3 na Iko Albania ka Skënderbeu meriri Tirana na ngwụcha

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2017-18 n'egwuregwu UEFA Europa League Group B nke 2017 megide Dynamo Kyiv, James gbara goolu nke abụọ nke otu ya na mmeri n'ụlọ, mmeri nke abụọ ha nwere n'otu

Na 27 Mee 2018, na asọmpi iko mba Albania nke afọ 2018, James meriri penalt nke Sabien Lilaj gbara maka naanị goolu nke egwuregwu ahụ megide Laçi, nke pụtara na Skënderbeu meriri iko mba Albania na nke mbụ ya
O nyekwara goolu iri na ugboro iri atọ na abụọ ọ pụtara na asọmpi nke mechara na mmeri, nke pụtara na klọb ahụ emechaala okpukpu abụọ nke ụlọ maka oge mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Na 26 June 2018, James kwagara na Gabala FK nke Azerbaijan Premier League site na ide nkwekọrịta afọ atọ, na-alọghachikwute onye otu ya Sabien Lilaj
E gosipụtara ya n'otu ụbọchị ahụ, na-ekwu, sị Ọ dị obi ụtọ isonyere Gabala
Ọ bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nwere nnukwu ebumnuche ma chọọ ịkụ ha na klọb a
Abịara m na Gabala iji nweta ihe ịga nke ọma ọhụrụ
Amaara m na Gabala nwere ọganihu ụfọdụ na UEFA Europa League n'oge gara aga
Mana n'oge a, achọrọ m ịbụ akụkụ nke ihe ịga nke ọma ndị ọzọ ma gaa n'ihu na asọmpi kọntinent
Na 9 Julaị 2019 ọ bịanyere aka na Ironi Kiryat Shmona
James bụ onye Alakụba na-eme ihe
O ruru eru igwu egwu maka Naijiria, Togo na Albania, ma gosipụta ọchịchọ ya igwu egwu na Albania ma ọ bụrụ na ohere ahụ apụta

James Luther Bevel (Ọktoba 19, 1936 ruo Disemba 19, 2008) bụ onye ozi na onye ndú nke 1960s Civil Rights Movement na United States

Dịka onye otu Southern Christian Leadership Conference (SCLC), na mgbe ahụ dịka onye nduzi ya nke Direct Action na Nonviolent Education, Bevel malitere, haziri, ma mepụta ihe ịga nke ọma atọ dị mkpa nke SCLC nke oge ahụ 1963 Birmingham Children's Crusade, 1965 Selma vootu rights movement, na 1966 Chicago open housing movement
Ọ tụrụ aro ka SCLC kpọọ ma sonye na March na Washington na 1963
Bevel mere atụmatụ maka ngagharị Selma na Montgomery nke afọ 1965, nke nyere aka na ntinye aka nke Iwu Ikike Ntụle nke afọ 1965
A mụrụ Bevel n'afọ 1936 na Itta Bena, Mississippi, nwa Illie na Dennis Bevel
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri na asaa ma too n'ime ime obodo LeFlore County nke Mississippi Delta na Cleveland, Ohio
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ugbo owuwe ihe ubi ruo oge ụfọdụ dịka onye ntorobịa ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ igwe
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche dị na Mississippi na Cleveland
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na US Navy ruo oge ụfọdụ ma chụsoo ọrụ dịka onye na-agụ egwu
N'inwe mmetụta nke ọkpụkpọ ime ka ọ bụrụ onye ụkọchukwu, ọ gara American Baptist Theological Seminary na Nashville, Tennessee site n'afọ 1957 ruo afọ 1961 wee ghọọ onye nkwusa Baptist
Ọ sonyeere Southern Christian Leadership Conference
Mgbe ọ nọ na seminarị, Bevel gụgharịrị akwụkwọ Leo Tolstoy dere n'afọ 1894 The Kingdom of God Is Within You, nke kpaliri mkpebi ya ịhapụ ndị agha

Bevel gụkwara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Mohandas Gandhi mgbe ọ na-eme ọmụmụ ihe na-abụghị ụlọ akwụkwọ na nkà ihe ọmụma Gandhi na usoro na-abụghị ime ihe ike nke James Lawson nke Southern Christian Leadership Conference kụziiri
Bevel gakwara ọmụmụ ihe na Highlander Folk School nke onye guzobere ya, Myles Horton, kụziiri, onye kwusiri ike ịhazi ndị mmadụ
N'afọ 1962, a kpọrọ Bevel ka ya na Martin Luther King Jr, onye ozi bụ onye isi SCLC, zute na Atlanta

Na nzukọ ahụ, nke James Lawson tụrụ aro ya, Bevel na King kwetara ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ n'otu ụzọ ahụ, na-enweghị ike veto n'elu nke ọzọ, na ọrụ n'okpuru nkwado nke Southern Christian Leadership Conference (SCLC)
Ha kwetara ịrụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ha kwụsịrị ịkpa ókè, nweta ikike ịtụ vootu, ma hụ na ụmụaka America niile nwere agụmakwụkwọ dị mma
Ha kwetara ịga n'ihu ruo mgbe ha mezuru ihe mgbaru ọsọ ndị a, na ịrịọ maka ego site na SCLC naanị ma ọ bụrụ na otu ahụ na-etinye aka n'ịhazi otu
N'oge na-adịghị anya, Bevel ghọrọ onye nduzi nke SCLC nke Direct Action na onye nduzi agụmakwụkwọ na-enweghị ime ike iji bulie ọnọdụ Eze dịka onye isi oche na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere SCLC
N'afọ 1968, Dr
King jụrụ mmegide Bevel na ndị ọzọ na-ahazi SCLC ka ha gaa n'ihu na mkpọsa ndị ogbenye nke Eze

Ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Taylor Branch họtara King na At Canaan's Edge America in the King Years, 1965-1968 (2006) ka ọ na-ekwu na 'Andrew Young abanyela n'obi, Bevel nyela ụbụrụ, na Jackson nyela oké ọchịchọ', ma kwuo na òtù ahụ emeela ha ma ugbu a ha na-eji òtù ahụ eme ihe iji kwalite onwe ha
'Ọ zutere Bevel, onye bụbu onye nduzi Jackson na Young, dịka 'onye nwere ọgụgụ isi nke kpaliri obi ya'
'Ọ dịghị amasị gị ịrụ ọrụ na ihe ọ bụla na-abụghị echiche gị,' ka Eze kwuru, 'Kwere m, echere m na ị ji m ụgwọ
Mana tupu mkpọsa ndị ogbenye emee, King na ndị na-ahazi SCLC gara Memphis, Tennessee, iji hazie ngagharị iji kwado ngagharị iwe dị ọcha mgbe ngagharị mbụ nke King na James Lawson ghọrọ ọgba aghara
Bevel nọ n'ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala nke Lorraine Motel na Memphis ma hụ ogbugbu Eze na Eprel 4, 1968
Ọ chetara ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ SCLC na ndị ọrụ ya n'uhuruchi ahụ na Eze hapụrụ 'iwu ịga ije' na, ọ bụrụ na ihe ọ bụla emee ya, o bu n'obi ka Abernathy were ọnọdụ ya dịka Onye isi oche SCLC
Bevel gara n'ihu na-emegide mkpọsa ndị ogbenye, mana ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke agụmakwụkwọ na-abụghị nke ime ihe ike
Mgbe e gbusịrị King, Bevel kwuru na James Earl Ray abụghị onye gburu ya nakwa na o nwere ihe akaebe na Ray enweghị ihe ọ bụla
Bevel agaghị ekpughe ihe akaebe ahụ, a mara Ray ikpe maka mpụ ahụ
Ndị isi SCLC fọdụrụnụ wepụrụ Bevel n'ọkwa nduzi ya n'afọ 1969
Bevel lụrụ onye na-eme ihe ike Diane Nash n'afọ 1961 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ seminarị ya
Ha rụkọrọ ọrụ ọnụ na ikike obodo, ma nwee nwa nwanyị na nwa nwoke
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe afọ asaa gasịrị
Ọ lụrụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ọzọ n'ime iri afọ ndị sochirinụ, ma gwa ụlọ ikpe n'oge ikpe ya na o nwere ụmụ iri na isii nke ụmụ nwanyị asaa mụrụ

James Bisset (ubochí irí na ànó n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1836 rụo ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Oktọba 1919) bụ ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ónyé injinia obodo nke Cape Colony, na-ahụ màkà ọtụtụ ụlọ mbụ na akụrụngwa nkwukọrịta nke Cape
Ọ bụkwa ónyé isi ọbọdọ Wynberg, South Africa
A mụrụ James Bisset na 1836 na Aberdeen, Scotland, nwa nke ónyé kansụl ọbọdọ na Master of Mortifications William Bisset da nwunye ya Margaret
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnne nwoke isii na ụmụnne nwanyị atọ
Ọ zụrụ dị ka injinia na Mahadum London ma rụọ ọrụ mbụ ya na Crystal Palace, ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Sydenham yana ọtụtụ ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ụlọ ọha na eze gbụrụ-gbúrụ Europe
N'afọ 1858, e zigara ya na Cape, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ, iji malite ọrụ na ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè mbụ ya, màkà ụlọ ọrụ Cape Railway and Dock Company (nke mechara bụrụ Cape Government Railways)
Ụgbọ okporo ígwè a sitere na Cape Town ruo Wellington, ndị otu ya malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ya n'ubochí irí àtó nà otu n'ọnwa Machị 1859
E wuru akụkụ ọzọ site na Cape Town ruo Wynberg
N'afọ 1861, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'iwu okporo ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke Cape Town, gụnyere akara na Sea point, (nke ịnyịnya na-adọta na mbụ) na 'Green Point Tramway Company'
O mechara rụchaa ọrụ yiri nke ahụ màkà Port Elizabeth

N'oge a, ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ụlọ na injinia na Cape niile, gụnyere ụlọ ochie Mutual Assurance na Cape Town, Dutch Reformed Churches na ọtụtụ ụlọ ndị ọzọ na Beaufort West na Graaff-reinet, ya na Ụlọ Nzukọ Ọbọdọ na isi ụka nke Port Elizabeth
Bisset na-agbaso ọtụtụ ọrụ n'otu oge n'oge ọrụ ya niile
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Anglo-Boer War ma bụrụ ónyé isi òche nke School, Municipal na Hospital Boards
Ọ bụ ónyé kansụl màkà Liesbeeck Municipality (1883-1886), Mayor of Wynberg (1886, 1893) na obéré ógè Mayor of Claremont
Mgbè ọ bụ ónyé isi ọbọdọ Wynberg, ọ nwetara onyinye ala màkà ihe ghọrọ Wynberg Park
O nwekwara ihe ịga nke ọma n'ime ka Wynberg bụrụ ọbọdọ mbụ dị na mpaghara Cape Peninsula iji nweta ọkụ eletrik n'okporo ámá

Na mbido ọrụ ya, n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1862, ọ lụrụ Elizabeth Magdalena Christina Jarvis, nwa nwanyị nke ónyé isi obodo Cape Town Hercules Jarvis, ha nwekwara ụmụ nwoke isii na otu nwa nwanyị
Otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwoke, Murray Bisset bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu crick nke bụ onyeisi South Africa tupu ọ kwaga Southern Rhodesia ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Gọvanọ nke Southern Rhodesia
Onye ọzọ bụ ónyé egwuregwu Rugby nke mbà ụwa bụ William Molteno 'Bill' Bisset
James Bisset nwụrụ n'ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1919 na Beauleigh, ụlọ ya na Kenilworth, Cape Town

James Obialor (amuru Febụwarị 22, 1999), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka James Brown, bụ onye na -ahụ maka ịntanetị, onye na -agba egwu, na onye na -akwa akwa nke ghọrọ onye ama ama na 2018 mgbe vidiyo vidiyo nke ha kwuru ahịrịokwu 'Ha enwetaghị m' mgbe ndị uwe ojii nwụchiri ya
Ejidere ha na mmadụ iri anọ na isii maka ebubo na ha bụ ndị mmekọ nwoke na nwoke ma nọrọ n'ụlọ Ikoyi Correctional Facility otu ọnwa
Otu ụlọikpe mechara kagbuo ikpe ahụ eboro ha
N'afọ 2021, James Brown wepụtara otu akpọrọ 'Hey Dulings' dabere na ahịrịokwu ọ na -eji agwa ndị na -akwado ya okwu na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Ha na-ekwu na ha bu nje HIV kemgbe amụrụ ha

Na Jenụwarị 2021, a kwụsịtụrụ akaụntụ Instagram James Brown mgbe o biputere vidiyo nke ọ na -ekwu na Bobrisky boro ya ebubo na o na -edegharị ọdịnaya Bobrisky dị ka onye na -agafe agafe ma na -eyi egwu igbu
N'aka nke ọzọ, Bobrisky gọrọ ebubo ndị a, James Brown rịọkwara mgbaghara na YouTube
James Conway Farley (Ọnwa Ọgọọst 10, afọ 1854 - rụọ mgbe afọ 1910 gasịrị) bụ onye na-ese foto na Richmond, Virginia
Ọ bụ onye nwe Jefferson Fine Arts Gallery site n'afọ 1895 ruo n'afọ ndị 1900s
A maara ya dị ka onye na-ese foto mbụ a ma ama na Afrịka-Amerịka
A mụrụ James Conway Farley dị ka ohu na Prince Edward County, Virginia, n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 10, afọ 1854
Nne na nna ya abụọ bụ ndị ohu
N'afọ 1861, ya na nne ya kwagara Richmond, Virginia n'afọ 1861
ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa na Columbia Hotel ma nyere aka n'ime kandụl ma mụta ịgụ ihe
O mechara mụọ ọrụ onye na-eme achịcha, mana ọ kwụsịrị ma were ọrụ na ngalaba kemịkal nke ụlọ ọrụ foto C
Rees
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 1875, Farley ghọrọ onye na-ese foto maka G
Davis megide mmegide nke ndị ọrụ anọ ndị ọzọ, ha niile bụ ndị ọcha
Davis kwadoro Farley ma chụpụ ndị ọzọ anọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nọgidere na-enwe nsogbu iwe ndị ọcha n'ọrụ, mana Farley toro na nkà ma n'afọ 1879 bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na galarị
E gosipụtara ọrụ Farley n'ọtụtụ ebe, gụnyere na Colored Industrial Fair na Richmond n'afọ 1884, ebe ọ nwetara ihe nrite mbụ, na World Cotton Centennial na New Orleans n'afọ 1885
Farley hapụrụ Davis Galarị n'afọ 1895 iji malite ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, Jefferson Fine Arts Gallery
Farley bụ onye otu Knights of Pythias, Richmond Lodge No
Farley bụ onye nnọchiteanya n'ọnwa Mee afọ 1902 Virginia Baptist State Convention ebe ọ kwuru maka azụmaahịa ndị isi ojii
Farley bụ onye otu Board of Directors nke Mechanics Savings Bank nke Richmond nke onye nchịkọta akụkọ Richmond Planet bụ John Mitchell, Jr
duziri na ndi afọ 1900s
Ọtụtụ foto Farley pụtara na Planet
Farley lụrụ Rebecca P
Robinson nke Amelia County, Virginia, n'ọnwa Disemba 10, afọ 1876
Ha nwere ụmụ ise
Farley bụkwa dikọn na First Baptist Church na Richmond
Farley biri ruo ma ọ dịkarịa afọ 1910, mgbe ọ bi na Jersey City, New Jersey
A maara Farley dị ka onye isi ojii Amerịka mbụ nwetara nkwado dị ka onye na-ese foto
Ọ bụ ọrụ Farley ole na ole ka dị, otu ihe fọdụrụ na Valentine Museum na Richmond
Nzukọ Virginia Baptist State na 1902
Foto nke Richmond Knights nke Pythias n'ihu Mechanics Savings Bank nke Farley wepụtara na Mee 20, 1902

James Chapman (ubochi iri abụo na asaa n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1831 Cape Town -ruo ụbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1872 Kimberley), bụ onye nchọpụta South Africa, onye na-achụ nta, onye ahịa na onye na-ese foto
Nwa James Chapman na Elizabeth Greeff nke Malmesbury na nwanne Henry Samuel Chapman, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cape Town wee gaa Durban mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi odeakwụkwọ na Ngalaba Na-ahụ N'ihe banyere Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ụlọ Ọrụ n'afọ 1848
Otu afọ ógè e mesịrị, ọ gara biri na Potchefstroom ebe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa izizi
Mgbe na-adịghị anya ógè nke ahụ gasịrị, na 1852, ọ gara gafee Osimiri Limpopo wee banye n'ime obodo Bamangwato
Ọ ghọrọ enyi na Khama, otu n'ime ụmụ Sekgoma, onye isi Bamangwato, na-arịọ enyemaka ya iji ruo Osimiri Chobe
Na mbido afọ sochirinụ, ọ chọtara ya na Osimiri Zambesi nke ọ nyochara n'ime kilomita iri asaa (Otu narị na iri) nke Victoria Falls, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ tie David Livingstone ihe nchọpụta ha
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1854 ya na Samuel H
Edwards, onye nchọpụta ọzọ, sonyeere ma malite njem gaa n'Ọdọ Mmiri Ngami ógè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gafere ókèala dị n'etiti Northern Bechuanaland na Zambesi
Nwoke dị mfe, o nwere ike iso ndị na-achụ nta Bushman nke ọkara ọzara dị n'ime ma nọrọ ogologo oge na ụlọ ọrụ ha, na-enweta enyemaka bara uru n'aka ha
Ógè ọ laghachiri Ngami, ọ gara n'ebe ugwu ruo Osimiri Okavango, gafee Damaraland wee ruo Walvis Bay
N'ebe a, ọ na-azụ ahịa ehi na Damaraland, tupu ya na nwanne ya nwoke Henry na Thomas Baines gawa njem site n'ọnwa Disemba 1860 ruo ọnwa Septemba 1864
Ebumnuche ha bụ inyocha Zambesi site na Victoria Falls ruo na delta ya, iji nwalee ikike ya
Otú ọ dị, ọrịa na ọdachi mebiri atụmatụ ndị a
Ha rutere Zambesi, mana ha enweghị ike inyocha ọnụ ya
Na 23 Julaị 1862 ha rutere Victoria Falls
Ọ bụ na njem a ka Baines sere ọtụtụ n'ime ihe nkiri ya a ma ama nke e mepụtara na album nke mbipụta
Mgbalị ya ịchọpụta Zambesi mebiri ahụike ya ma mebie ego ya
Ọ laghachiri Cape Town na 1864, na-enweghị nkụda mmụọ na ahụ ọkụ
Njem ahụ dị ịrịba ama ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ oge mbụ e ji igwefoto stereoscopic dekọọ ọganihu ya
Ogologo nke negatives bụ ihe dị ka 6 x 45 sentimita ma bụrụ nke na-adịghị mma
Ihe osise nke foto ndị a dị na Africana Museum na Johannesburg
Sir George Grey nyere ya iwu ijide anụmanụ dị ndụ na ịhazi okwu nke asụsụ Bantu
Chapman debere akwụkwọ akụkọ n'oge niile ọ na-eme njem, mana njem ya na ime obodo nke South Africa pụtara naanị n'afọ 1868, ntakịrị oge tupu ọnwụ ya
Chapman so Francis Galton na CJ
Andersson mee njem ógè ụfọdụ
Ọ nwara ịkọ ugbo na Anawood n'akụkụ osimiri Swakop n'afọ 1863 na afọ 1864, mana a manyere ya ịhapụ ikike ya n'ihi Agha Nama-Ovaherero, nke ọ jụrụ itinye aka na ya
Site n'afọ 1864 ruo afọ 1870 ọ biri n'ebe dị iche iche na South Africa, mana ọ laghachiri dị ka onye ahịa na onye na-achụ nta na Hereroland na Ovamboland n'etiti afọ 1870 na 1871
Ọ nwụrụ na Du Toit's Pan nso Kimberley, n'ubochí anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1872, mgbe ọ dị afọ 40
N'afọ 1857 ọ lụrụ Catherine Cecelia Roome, nwa nwanyị nke Capt

William Roome, (onye isi ụgbọ mmiri 'Olivia' nke Thomas Baines rutere na Cape Town n'ubochí irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 1842) na Catherine Cecelia Bushnell (onye amụrụ na Virginia USA - nna ya, bụkwa onye isi ụgbọ mmiri nke o doro anya na ọ biri na Nova Scotia)
James na Catherine nwere ụmụ anọ
Otu n'ime ụmụ ha nwoke, William James Bushnell Chapman (1858[[1932) ghọrọ onye ahịa, onye na-achụ nta na onye ọrụ ugbo
Ọ bịara Namibia dị ka nwatakịrị n'afọ 1864, nọrọ afọ iri na Cape Town wee laghachi n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa June n'afọ 1874 na Walvis Bay dị ka onye enyemaka na ụlọ ahịa Harrison
Ọ zụrụ ahịa ma na-achụ nta na Ovamboland n'afọ 1875, wee gaa Angola n'afọ 1881 wee rụọ ọrụ ugbo na Humpata pt Humpata
O mechara soro ndị Angola Boer ndị ọzọ biri na 1928 na mpaghara Gobabis nke Namibia, ebe ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1932
A mụrụ nwa nwoke ọzọ, Charles Henry Chapman, na Cape Town ma banye na Titanic na Southampton dị ka onye njem klas nke abụọ (nọmba tiketi 248731, £ 13 10s)
O buuru Bible ezinụlọ nke ezinụlọ nne na nna ya ochie na Virginia na / ma ọ bụ Nova Scotia; Chapman n'onwe ya biri na The Bronx, NY
Ọ nwụrụ ógè ọ dị afọ iri ise na abụọ site na hypothermia na mmiri riri ya mgbe ọ mikpuru n'isi ụtụtụ nke 15 Eprel 1912; Mackay-Bennett mechara chọta ozu ya

Henry Samuel Chapman (afọ 1834 rụọ afọ 1922), nwanne James Chapman, rutere Walvis Bay site n'oké osimiri n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1860 wee gaa ọtụtụ ebe dị ka onye na-achụ nta na onye ahịa n'etiti Walvis Bay, Ovamboland, Hereroland, Lake Ngami na Cape ruo afọ 1863
O mechara biri na Oudtshoorn, Kimberley na Johannesburg, ma nwụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1922 na Braamfontein na South Africa
James F
Colaianni (August 6, 1922- October 5, 2016) bụ onye American katholic lay ọkà mmụta okpukpe, onye edemede, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ, onye ọka iwu, na onye na-eme ihe ike
A mụrụ ya na Paterson, New Jersey na 1922
N'afọ 1939, Colaianni gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St
Josephīs High School na Paterson, NJ wee gaa Mahadum Seton Hall
Colaianni jere ozi na ndị agha US n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na North Africa, Ịtali, France na Germany, na-enweta ọkwa nke onye isi ọrụ
Mgbe a chụpụrụ ya n'ụzọ dị ùgwù, nkwenye ya na-emegide agha malitere ịpụta
A nabatara Colaianni na New Jersey Bar na 1948 mgbe ọ gachara John Marshall School of Law
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu, ọ zụrụ basketball n'ụlọ ọrụ sekọndrị wee merie asọmpi steeti
N'otu oge ahụ, o mepụtara usoro arụmụka a kpọsara n'ọtụtụ ebe n'etiti William F
Buckley Jr
nke National Review, na William Clancy nke magazin Katọlik Commonweal
O nwetara nzere masta ya na nkà mmụta okpukpe site na Institute of Lay Theology (ILT), nke dị na Mahadum San Francisco, na 1963
Dị ka onye otu ILT, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi agụmakwụkwọ okpukpe ndị okenye site na 1963 ruo 1965 na parish Lady of Mount Carmel Catholic na Redwood City, California
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na onye nchịkọta okpukpe nke Ramparts Magazine site na 1965 ruo 1967
Na mbipụta August 1966 nke Ramparts, edemede Colaianni, 'Napalm Small Town Diary,' dere nguzogide maka nguzobe nke ụlọ ọrụ napalm na Redwood City
Ọ bụ akụkọ mbụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ahụ katọrọ mmepụta na ojiji nke napalm na Agha Vietnam
Colaianni duziri ngagharị iwe nke ọtụtụ puku megide iji napalm dị ka ngwá agha na Vietnam
Colaianni kwadoro ka ewepụ alụmdi na nwunye iwu na ndị ụkọchukwu nke Chọọchị Katọlik n'akwụkwọ ya Married Priests & Married Nuns (McGraw Hill)
Akwụkwọ ọzọ, The Catholic Left The Crisis of Radicalism in the Church (Chilton Publishing), bụ ọmụmụ banyere ihe omume nke nnwere onwe na Chọọchị Katọlik na America
Colaianni jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke National Liturgical Conference, Washington DC
site na 1967 ruo 1970

N'ọrụ ahụ, o mepụtara otu n'ime 'ụda nkume' mbụ na mba ahụ, na-egosi Minnie Riperton na Rotary Connection, na Liturgical Conference National Convention, Milwaukee Arena, n'afọ 1969, na ọtụtụ puku ndị bịara
Malite na 1970, Colaianni bụ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na onye isi edemede nke Sunday Sermons, ọkachamara na ihe enyemaka maka ndị ụkọchukwu na-ekwusa ozi ọma, na nkesa zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2006, Colaianni edeela ihe karịrị 2,000 okwuchukwu n'ọtụtụ isiokwu, ọtụtụ n'ime ha edepụtara
Ọ bụ kwa onye na-ebipụta Manual of Clinical Nutrition,n'afọ 1985, na akwụkwọ akụkọ Clinical nutrition, nke Dr
David M
Paige nke Johns Hopkins University Medical School dezigharịrị
E kesara ha na mba ụwa nye ndị dọkịta na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ahụike
Ọ bụ Scott A
Johnson, nwa nwa Nwoke Colaianni dezigharịrị mbipụta ahụ
Ọ bụ James F
Colaianni, Jr
bipụtara Sunday Sermons ugbu a
N'afọ,1950, Colaianni lụrụ Patricia Kelly Colaianni, onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta ya, Sunday Sermons
Ha nwere ụmụ isii Karen, Janice, Pamela, James, Louis na John
Ya na Art D'Lugoff nke New York City-Village Gate, Colaianni bụ onye na-emepụta egwu One Moń Time na Village Gate North, na Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Ọ bụ naanị onye na-emepụta Jazz America na Warner Theatre, Washington, DC
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Galloway, New Jersey, mgbe ọ dị afọ 94
James Alfred Cope-Christie bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na mmalite Johannesburg na Rhodesia
A mụrụ ya na mba England
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na London wee bịa Cape n'afọ 1894
Cope-Christie gwara Charles Freeman na Cape mana o nyere onyinye dị mkpa na Rand na Rhodesia
N'afọ 1904, onye na-ahụ maka ego na Johannesburg bụ Sir Charles Llewellyn Andersson debanyere aha ọrụ nke Sir Herbert Baker iji chepụta ụlọ ya na Parktown
Llewellyn Andersson jụrụ atụmatụ Baker ma na 1906 e wuru ụlọ ya pụrụ iche dịka atụmatụ Cope-Christie si dị
Ụlọ ahụ, Dolobran dị n'ụdị eclectic ma ọ ka nọ n'ezinụlọ ahụ, ugbu a ebe nwa nwa Sir Charles
Onyinye ndị ọzọ Cope Christie nyere na Johannesburg gụnyere ụlọ dị na Yeoville na ụlọ dị na Waverley
James Cudjoe bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a na-aga nke ọma na Ghana
Ọ na-ewu ewu kemgbe mmalite ọrụ ya
A mụrụ Cudjoe na Septemba 7, 1971, na Takoradi, Ghana
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji nka nke Ghana bụ Ghanatta n'afọ 1996, ma kemgbe ahụ, o sonyere na otu mba asaa na-aga nke ọma na ihe ngosi nke onwe ya
Cudjoe na-arụ ọrụ nke ya na Accra na Takoradi, Ghana
Ọrụ James Cudjoe na-esite na ihe oyiyi sitere na ndụ kwa ụbọchị
A maara ya maka osise ọdịdị obodo ya, nke sitere na ịma mma, mara mma na ike (dịka Hot Day (na Osu), lee n'aka nri) iji mee ka obi dị jụụ, dị jụụ ma dị ala (dịka New Beginnings I

A makwaara ya ka ọ na-egosi nwanyị ahịa Afrịka, onye ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-anọchite anya nne ya, na ihe nkiri nke ọrụ ma ọ bụ izu ike, dị ka Dancer (lee aka nri), ma ọ bụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ nke Good Returns III
Ndị na-akwado ọrụ ya na-ahụ ihe osise ndị a na-akpali akpali, mmetụta uche na mmekọrịta
Ịma ama ya na ihe ịga nke ọma ya na Europe na United States, yana ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ n'ụwa niile, bụ ihe akaebe maka nkà ya na mkpa ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Na Mee 2007, e gosipụtara James Cudjoe na ihe ngosi na San Diego Museum of Man, Artists Speak ǹkà dịkọrọ ndụ sị mba Ghana and Zimbabwe
A na-ewere ọrụ ya dị ka ihe atụ nke ọgbọ nke atọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Ghana, bụ ndị na-egosipụta onwe ha n'efu dị ka ndị na-ese ihe n'ụwa nke oge a, na-enweghị ọdịda n'echiche mgbochi nke nka Afrịka
2003-Golden Tulip Hotel, Accra
2001-LA Palm Beach Hotel
2001-African Beach, Takoradi
2001-Shangrila Hotel
2000-Elmina Beach Resort, Elmina
2000-Art Centre National Exhibition
1998-Golden Tulip
1997-Arama Art Gallery, Accra
James Byron Dean (Önwa abụo 8, 1931 – Önwa itoolu 30, 1955) bu mgbe mbu ony oméka nke Amerikạ
Aha ya ka onye mkpa na orü oméka ziri na ishi edemede orü nke madu machara, Rebel Without a Cause; ime ya o mèrè ka okoro nke Los Angeles onye ishi ya e dofùrù; áhà ya bu Jim Stark
Oméka abụo ndi ozor nke tírí orü ya na ishi me ko bu kpakpando na Hollywood bu ka onye nor na onwe ya ha kporo Cal Trask no onyo-na-ga East of Eden, na ka diubi obi o'tó Jett Rink na onyo Giant
Nke madu ji machara ya di na onyonaga ató nkea, nke o mèchàrà ka íshí oméka ya
Onwú ya mere na ógè ngwá ngwá mèrè ka nkoriko ya dí ndu
Ó bu oméka búrú ishi I bu onye nwere ihe onyinye Academy Award na oge byara mgbe ö nwushichàrà maka o bu ómeka nke karírí
O bu kwa onye mkpuru otu bu onye nwere onyinye abuo mgbe onwu ya gáfèrè
Na 1999, Amrican Film Institute tiri Dean ébé o gbàrà 18 na oméka nke nwoko karírí na AFI 100 Years100 Stars lost nke ha
James Anthony Dean (Ọnwa Februari ụbọchị asaa, afọ 1943 rụọ ọnwa Eprel ụbọchị itoolu, afọ 2006) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede egwu

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Motown Records n'ime afọ 1960s, mgbe mgbe ya na William Weatherspoon na-arụkọ ọrụ, onye ya na ya so dee ọtụtụ egwu gụnyere Jimmy Ruffin's 'What Becomes of the Brokenhearted'
Dean dekwara, ya na John Glover, 'You Don't Have to Be a Star (To Be in My Show),' a US no1 hit for Marilyn McCoo and Billy Davis, Jr
A mụrụ Dean na Detroit bụ nwa mbụ nke Richard na Dorothy Dean, ma gaa Hamtramck High School na Hamtramck, Michigan
Ọ jere ozi na US Army, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede egwu maka Motown n'afọ 1964

Ya na William Weatherspoon jikọrọ aka dee egwu maka Jimmy Ruffin ('What Becomes of the Brokenhearted', 'I've Passed This Way Before', 'Farewell Is a Lonely Sound', 'I'll Say Forever My Love', na 'It's Wonderful (To Be Loved by You')); Marv Johnson ('I'll Pick a Rose for My Rose'); Edwin Starr ('I Am the Man for You Baby'); na ndị ọzọ
Dean so dee 'Everything Is Good About You Baby' nke The Supremes na Eddie Holland; Eddie na Brian Holland bụ ụmụ nwanne nna Dean
Ya na Weatherspoon mepụtakwara 'Mgbe ị bụ nwata na ịhụnanya', ihe egwu maka The Marvelettes

Ya na John Glover, Dean so dee maka The Four Tops, First Choice, na Marilyn McCoo na Billy Davis Jr, na-enwe ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ndekọ US nọmba nke mbụ nke afọ 1976 'You Don't Have to Be a Star (To Be in My Show)'
James Dean nwụrụ site na ọrịa kansa nke ọkpụkpụ azụ n'ụlọ ya na Detroit n'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na atọ
James Dupree (amụrụ n'afọ 1950) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé nkuzi, na ónyé na-eme ihe ike

Ọ natala ma fellowships na ebe obibi ónyé na-ese ihe na Pennsylvania, New York, Massachusetts, na Wales, yana ihe nríte dị íchè íchè, gụnyere Living Legend Award nke Black Alumni Society nke Mahadum Pennsylvania
Site na 2012 ruo 2014, Dupree Studios na obodo Mantua nke West Philadelphia bụ isiokwu nke mgbalị a ma ama nke Philadelphia Redevelopment Authority (PRA), nke mechiri na Dupree na-edebe ụlọ ọrụ ya
A mụrụ James Dupree na 1950 na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, ma nọrọ akụkụ ụfọdụ nke nwata ya na Philadelphia, Pittsburgh, na Bridgeville, Pennsylvania
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ gàrà klas n'efu na Fleisher Art Memorial na Philadelphia
Dupree nwetara agụmakwụkwọ zụrụ òkè na Columbus College of Art and Design, ébé ọ natara Bachelor of Fine Arts na 1972
Ọ gàrà Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts na Mahadum Pennsylvania, na-aghọ otu n'ime ndị Africa America mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadụ Pennsylvania's Master of Fine Arts program, na 1977

Dupree egosila ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi otu na nkè onwé ya, n'oge na-adịbeghị ányá Works From The Stolen Dreams And Forbidden Fruit Series na Art Sanctuary na Philadelphia (March 2015); na Stolen Dreums in the Promise Zone na Mahadum Stockton (ọnwa Julaị rụo ọnwa Ọgọst 2015)
A maara ya màkà nchọpụta ya nkè mgbasa ozi ngwakọta gụnyere iko, osisi, na ihe ndị ọzọ, yana ojiji ya na-eji agba eme ihe
E gosipụtara ọrụ Dupree ná ngosi 2015 We Speak Black Artists ná Philadelphia, 1920s-1970s na Woodmere Art Museum

Dupree enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nríte na mkpakọrịta, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ese ihe na Contemporary Arts Center, North Adams, MA; African American Museum, Philadelphia, PA; National Museum of Wales, Cardiff, Wales; Brandywine Graphics Studio, Philadelphia,PA; na Studio Museum na Harlem, New York, NY
N'afọ 2010, James Dupree natara Living Legend Award nke Black Alumni Society nke Mahadum Pennsylvania
Dupree Studios dị na obodo Mantua nke West Philadelphia

N'afọ 2005, Dupree zụrụ ụlọ nkwakọba ihe mebiri emebi na 361719 Haverford Avenue màkà dollar otu narị na iri asatọ na atọ, wee jiri ego dị ukwuu ọzọ na-emezigharị, na-edozi, na ịgbanwe ihe onwunwe ahụ
Kemgbe ahụ, Prudential atụlewo ya na ọnụ ahịa nke $ 22 nde
A na-eji oghere 8,646-square-foot eme ihe màkà ibi ndụ, nkuzi na oghere studio yana màkà ịchekwa na igosi ihe osise
A na-eme atụmatụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị puku ise nke ọrụ Dupree
Na Disemba úbọchị irí abụọ na asaá, 2012, ndị Philadelphia Redevelopment Authority (PRA) weghaara akwụkwọ ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ Dupree n'okpuru Pennsylvania's soon-exire Eminent Domain Code
Na atụmatụ mmepe ha, PRA tụrụ aro ịkwatu ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ ma jiri ụlọ ahịa nri na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala dochie ya
Ọbọdọ ahụ bu ụzọ kwuo na ọ ga-akwụ Dupree ego dollar narị puku isii maka ihe onwunwe ahụ
Ụlọikpe nke Philadelphia nke Common Pleas kwadoro mgbalị PRA ịkatọ ihe onwunwe ahụ na Nọvemba ụbọchị irí na àtó, 2013, ma kwughachi mkpebi ahụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Juun, 2014
A katọrọ omume nke PRA dị ka 'ezighị ezi', 'ezighị Ezi', na 'ezighịzi America'
James Edward Fauntleroy II (amụrụ na Mee 16, 1984) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Inglewood, California
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ide ihe nrite na egwu site n'aka ndị omenkà dị elu dịka Travis Scott, Frank Ocean, Kendrick Lamar, SZA, Drake, J
Cole, Vince Staples, Big Sean, Jay-Z, na John Mayer yana ide egwu màkà ndị omenkọ gụnyere Bruno Mars, Chris Brown, Beyonce, Rihanna, na Justin Timberlake
N'afọ 2014 na 2018, Fauntleroy meriri Grammy Award maka Best R&B Song
N'afọ 2007, Fauntleroy dere egwu ise site na abọm nke abụọ nké Chris Brown bụ Exclusive (2007)
N'afọ 2009, James Fauntleroy so dee egwu isii site na abọm nké anọ nke Rihanna bụ Rated R (2009)
N'afọ 2011, Fauntleroy nyere olu maka egwu ise na Common's The Dreamer / The Believer album
Ọ pụtara na 'Dreamer (feat
Maya Angelou)', 'Gold,' 'Cloth', 'Celebrate', na 'Windows'
N'afọ 2012, o nyèrè aka na egwu egwu egwu nke mbụ nke GOOD
nke Kanye West, Cruel Summer
Ọ pụtara na 'Clique', 'Higher', 'Sin City', na 'The One'
A na-enye Grammy Awards kwa afọ site na National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences nke United States maka ihe ịga nke ọma dị ịrịba ama na ụlọ ọrụ egwu
A na-ewere ya dị ka nsọpụrụ egwu kachasị elu, e guzobere onyinye ahụ na 1958
James Fauntleroy enwetala ihe nrite 4 n'ime nhọpụta 6
James Gareth Endicott (December 24, 1898 na November 27, 1993) bụ onye ozi ala ọzọ, onye ozi alaeze, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Canada
A mụrụ Endicott na Szechuan Province, China, nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ ise na ezinụlọ ndị ozi ala ọzọ Metọdist ma bụrụ onye na-asụ Chinese nke ọma
Ezinụlọ ya lara Canada na 1910
A họpụtara nna ya, James Endicott, dị ka onye nhazi nke abụọ nke United Church of Canada site na 1926 ruo 1928
Endicott détùrù aha ya na Agha Ụwa Mbụ dị ka onye nkịtị
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Toronto's Victoria College ebe ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kansụl ụmụ akwụkwọ na onye guzobere University's Student Christian Movement
Endicott nwetara nzere master's ma bụrụ onye ozi na United Church of Canada
N'afọ 1925, Endicott lara China dị ka onye ozi ala ọzọ nọrọ ebe ahụ maka ọtụtụ n'ime afọ iri abụọ sochirinụ
Mgbe Endicott bụ onye ozi ala ọzọ na China, ọ kụziri Bekee na China wee ghọọ prọfesọ nke Bekee na Omume na Mahadum West China Union

Ọ ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nye Chiang Kai-shek na onye ndụmọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na New Life Movement ya ma jee ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka ndị agha US site na 1944 ruo 1945 dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta n'etiti ndị agha America na ndị agha Kọmunist nke China na-alụso ndị Japan ọgụ na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Na mbụ, ọ bụ onye na-akwado Chiang Kai-shek na nwunye ya, o jiri Chiang tụnyere Abraham Lincoln ma kọwaa Madame Chiang dị ka ngwakọta nke Helen nke Troy, Florence Nightingale na Joan nke Arc
O nwere nkụda mmụọ mgbe ọ hụrụ ndị isi Chiang na-egbu ndị agha ha n'agụụ nakwa nrụrụ aka nke Kuomintang
Ndị Kọmunist nwere mmasị n'ebe Endicott nọ ma bụrụ enyi Zhou Enlai ka Agha Obodo China maliteghachiri, ọ ghọkwara onye na-akwado Chinese Communist Party
N'oge agha ahụ, o nyere netwọk nzuzo ebe ndị agha na-akwado ndị Kọmunist nwere ike i zute ma nye echiche
Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, o kwuru okwu na ngagharị iwe ụmụ akwụkwọ, na-agba ume i megide gọọmentị Nationalist ma na-akpali nkatọ site na chọọchị dị na Canada
Nke a mere ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm na ozi na Mee 5, 1946 mgbe United Church of Canada nyere ya iwu ka ọ gbanwee nkwupụta ihu ọha ya ma ọ bụ kwụsị
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1946, a kpọrọ Endicott ka o nyere aka dee iwu maka Njikọ ọhụrụ maka Nchebe nke Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na China
A gwara Paul Yen, Talitha Gerlach, Y
Wu na ndị ọzọ nwere nnwere onwe ka ha sonye
Na agbamume Zhou En-lai, ọ kwagara Shanghai iji bipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ nzuzo na-emegide Kuomintang Shanghai Newsletter
Ebumnuche akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ bụ maka ndị ọdịda anyanwụ nọ n'ebe ndị Kuomintang siri ike nakwa ịnwa ime ka gọọmentị ọdịda anyanwụ kwenye na ọchịchị Chiang bụ nrụrụ aka na ọchịchị aka ike
N'afọ 1947, ọ laghachiri Canada

N'oge mba ndị dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na-akwado Chiang ma nwee nchekwube banyere ọchịchị ya, Endicott dụrụ gọọmentị Canada ọdụ na ọdịda nke ọchịchị Kuomintang dị nso wee gaa n'ihu ọha na amụma ya na nkatọ ya banyere Kuomintang dị ka onye nrụrụ aka

Ndị mgbasa ozi katọrọ okwu ya dị ka onye aghụghọ ma kpọọ ya onye Canada a kacha kparị n'afọ maka nkwado ya maka mgbanwe China na Chinese Communist Party ma United Church katọrọ ya maka nkwado ya na mgbanwe ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na nkwado ya maka Chinese Communist Party site na inye nkuzi na i bipụta Canadian Far Eastern Weekly nke nwere ndị debanyere aha 5,000 n'oge ọ kachasị elu
N'afọ 1949, o guzobere ma bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Canadian Peace Congress ma nyere aka bipụta akwụkwọ ozi Peace Letter
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi na World Peace Council na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke International Institute for Peace site na 1957 ruo 1971
N'afọ 1950, dị ka onye nnọchi anya Canada na World Peace Council na Stockholm, Endicott nọdụrụ na kọmitii nke dere Stockholm Peace Appeal nke bụ mkpesa nke malitere mba ụwa 'Ban the Bomb'
Endicott laghachiri na nleta na China na 1952, n'oge Agha Korea ma, mgbe ọ laghachiri Canada, ọ boro United States ebubo iji ngwá agha kemịkal na nke nje n'oge agha ahụ
Ebubo ya mere ka a katọọ ya na ndị nta akụkọ Canada dị ka 'onye iro ọha na eze nke mbụ' ma United Church katọrọ ya maka nkwado ya na Mao Zedong na ndị Kọmunist China
Ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Canada katọrọ ya, gụnyere Lester Pearson onye bụbu enyi kọleji

Pearson kpọrọ ya 'onye aghụghọ na njedebe nke Red hook' na 'Red stooge' ebe John Diefenbaker kpọrọ nkwupụta ya 'ihe ọjọọ,' na onye ndú Conservative George Drew zoro aka na Endicott dị ka 'onye na-emebi ndị Kọmunist'
Gọọmentị yiri egwu na ha ga-ebo ya ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru na ịgba ọchịchị mgbaasị, mana ha emeghị, ebe ndị ọzọ kpọrọ ya ka ọ tụfuo paspọtụ ya na ikike izipu ozi
E nyere Endicott ihe nrite udo Stalin n'afọ 1952 maka mbọ ọ na-agba maka 'ịdị n'udo n'etiti Ndị Kraịst na ndị Kọmunist'

Ọ gara n'ihu na nkwado ya maka People's Republic of China site n'ibipụta Canadian Far East Newsletter ma ọ bụ ezie na ọ kwadoro Soviet Union n'ihu ọha n'afọ ndị mbụ nke nkewa Sino-Soviet, ọ nwere ọmịiko na arụmụka China ma kọọrọ ha na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ

E nyere Endicott ọkwa onye isi oche nke World Peace Council na mbido afọ 1960 mana ọ jụrụ n'ihi ahụike nwunye ya na ihe ọ tụrụ anya ya dị ka ọnọdụ na-enweghị isi nke iduzi kansụl ahụ n'oge esemokwu na-arịwanye elu n'etiti Soviet Union na People's Republic of China na akụkụ ha dị iche iche na kansụl
N'afọ 1982, United Church rịọrọ Endicott mgbaghara maka ịkatọ ya afọ iri atọ gara aga, na-ekweta na ọ kpatara ya 'ọtụtụ ihe mgbu na nchegbu onwe onye'
N'afọ 1983, Mahadum York nyere Endicott nzere doctorate nke iwu

N'ajụjụ ọnụ obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya, Endicott kwuru na ya chere na Manifesto nke ndị Kọmunist 'ka bụ eziokwu dịka ọ dịbu,' ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-eche na 'ndị agadi' bụ ndị isi ndị Kọmunst dị ka Deng Xiaoping anaghị enwe ọganihu

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-emegiderịta onwe ya banyere ụkpụrụ Deng ma na-akwado ngagharị iwe Tiananmen Square nke 1989, Endicott nwere ọmịiko maka nsogbu gọọmentị China na-emeso ihe ọ bịara hụ dị ka mmegide mgbanwe
Ọ gwara onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ,
Ihe doro m anya ugbu a bụ na e nwere isi ụmụ akwụkwọ na-echegbu onwe ha maka ime ihe gbasara nrụrụ aka na pati na ọha mmadụ
Agwara m n'oge ahụ ka a ga-akwado ha
Mana ọtụtụ n'ime ndị isi, ndị n'oge ahụ yiri ka ha bụ ndị nwere echiche, ghọrọ ndị nnọchi anya maka mweghachi nke isi obodo
O yiri ugbu a na gọọmentị Kọmunist ziri ezi n'ikwu na mmadụ ole na ole nwụrụ na Tiananmen ma eleghị anya narị abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ, ma ọ dịkarịa ala
Mana n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ ọzọ nke Beijing, e gburu ọtụtụ mmadụ
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na e nwere ọgụ n'etiti ndị na-eme njem n'okporo ụzọ na ndị Socialist ma ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ike ịkpọ ndị agha Socialist
N'ikwu na e nwere mgbalị ịkwatu gọọmentị China, Endicott kwuru,
Ihe mere bụ obere agha obodo
Omume ndị agha na-akwado iwu ahụ nwere ike igbochi ndị na-eme njem n'okporo ụzọ nke isi obodo ka ha ghara ịnwa iji ike ndị agha weghara ọchịchị
Gịnị ka gọọmentị ga-eme? Ọ̀ Bụla Onwe Mmeghachi omume?

N'afọ 1971, William Kashtan, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Communist Party of Canada gwara ya ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm na Canadian Peace Congress na dịka onye nnọchi anya Canada na World Council of Peace na-ebo Canadian Far East Newsletter ebubo na ọ na-emegide Soviet na pro-Mao
Endicott kwetara ịhapụ nzukọ ahụ kama ịkwụsị ibipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ma ọ bụ wepụ nkwado ya maka China na esemokwu ya na Soviet Union
O guzobere Canada-China Society n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Canadian Peace Congress ma kewapụ ya na Soviet Union n'ihu ọha

Ọ bụ ezie na ya na Tim Buck, Stanley Ryerson, Leslie Morris na ndị Kọmunist ndị ọzọ nke Canada nwere enyi, Endicott esonyeghị na Communist Party nke Canada ọ bụ ezie na atọ n'ime ụmụ ya sonyeere ya n'ihu iwu, Labor-Progressive Party

Ọ sonyeere Co-operative Commonwealth Federation mgbe ọ bi na Toronto na ezumike site na 1941 ruo 1944, ma mee mkpọsa maka pati ahụ na ntuli aka gọọmentị etiti nke 1942 nke Joseph Noseworthy meriri mmeri iwe, mana ndị otu ya kwụsịrị mgbe ọ laghachiri China
Mgbe o tinyere akwụkwọ ka ọ laghachi na CCF na 1948 a jụrụ arịrịọ ya maka ịbụ onye otu; ọ dịghị ihe kpatara ya ma ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na a jụrụ ya n'ihi njikọ Endicott na Kọmunist
James Godday (amuru 9 Jenuarị 1984) bu onye okacha amara na 400 mita na Naijiria
Amuru ya na Kaduna
Godday so na ndị otu Naijiria nwetara ihe nrite ọla kọpa n'asọmpi Olympic 2004 4 x 400
N'asọmpi mba ụwa nke 2005 na Helsinki, ọ gbara ọsọ na 400 mita ebe ejiri 4662 kụpụ ya na ọkara nke ikpeazụ
O nwetara ihe kacha mma nke nkeonwe na okpomọkụ na 4530
O mechara kwalite nke a ruo sekọnd 4499, na February 2006 na Abuja
Ọ mechara n'ọkwa ise na asọmpi Africa 2006 na nke anọ na 2007 All-Africa Games
James Homer Garrott (Jụn 19, 1897 na Montgomery, Alabama ruo Jụn 9, 1991) bụ onye America na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara Los Angeles n'etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ
O chepụtara ihe karịrị ụlọ narị abụọ, gụnyere ụlọ ụka iri abụọ na ise na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọha na eze
A kọwawo ya dị ka 'onye isi ojii avant garde modernist nke oge 1940s'
Garrott gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Los Angeles Polytechnic High School na 1917
O nwetara ikike iwu ụlọ ya n'afọ 1928
Nnukwu ihe mbụ Garrott rụzuru bụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ụlọ ọrụ Golden State Mutual Life Insurance Company nke 1928
Site na 1926 ruo 1928, Garrott rụrụ ọrụ na Cavagliere Construction Company nke Los Angeles
Ọ gụrụ Architecture na Mahadum nke Southern California site na 1930 ruo 1934
Garrott bụ ezigbo enyi nke onye ọka iwu a ma ama na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ bụ Loren Miller
Na mbido 1940, Garrott rụrụ ụlọ abụọ ha nke Silver Lake na 647 na 653 Micheltorena Street
N'afọ 1946, Garrott bụ onye Afrịka Amerịka nke abụọ nabatara na American Institute of Architects (AIA) na Los Angeles, mgbe Paul R
Williams gasịrị
Williams na Gregory Ain kwadoro ngwa ya
Garrott na Ain nwekọrọ ohere ọfịs na Granada Building malite na 1940
Mgbe ahụ, ha rụkọtara ọrụ na 'mmekọrịta na-enweghị isi' na 1940s na 50s, ma jikọọ aka mepụta obere ụlọ ọrụ nke ha na-arụkọ ọrụ na mpaghara Silver Lake nke Los Angeles
Ha na-agbanwere na-adabere na onye na-ahụ maka imepụta, ebe na ọrụ ndị ọzọ ha na-enyere ibe ha aka n'onwe ha n'enweghị otuto
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, Garrott na Ain jikọrọ aka chepụta ma wuo ụlọ ọrụ ha, na 2311 Hyperion Avenue, n'ebe dị anya site n'ụlọ Garrott
Garrott nwere njikọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ọma ma nata ọrụ itoolu site na Gọọmentị Los Angeles County na ngwụcha afọ 1950
Ma Los Angeles Tribune kwuru, sị 'James Garrott, Paul R
Williams, na Carey Jenkins, bụ naanị ndị Negro architects nwetara nkwekọrịta ọha na eze na slate a
ma e wezụga Williams ha na-enweta ha ugboro ugboro
James Houra (27 Machị 1952 - 27 Jenụwarị 2020) bụ onye Ivory Coast na-ese ihe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke École des beaux arts d'Abidjan ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ihe osise ya
Otu n'ime ihe osise ya, Offrande, bu nke e gosiri na Obí Onye isi ala na Abidjan

Onye isi ala Ouattara nyere Minista nke Interior nke France, Claude Guéant, otu n'ime ihe osise ya, ọ bụkwa ihe kpatara esemokwu n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na e weghachighị ihe osise ahụ na njedebe nke oge nke onye mbụ
Ọnụ ahịa ọrụ Houra no n'agbata euro pụkụ abụọ na euro pụkụ abụọ na narị ise
James Houra nwụrụ na 27 Jenụwarị 2020 mgbe ọ dị afọ 67
James Iroha Uchechukwu bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1972 na Enugu
A maara ya maka foto ya, nkwado ya nye ndị na-eto eto na-ese foto, na inyefe ihe ọmụma ya na ndị na-eto eto
A na-ele ya anya na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu dị ka onye mere ka oghere nke foto Naịjirịa gbasaa
Uchechukwu malitere ịmụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na 1990 na Art Academy nke Mahadum Port Harcourt
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya n'afọ 1996, ma mesịa gaa n'ihu na-amụ ihe n'ihe bụ ọrụ ya ugbu a, foto
N'ime ọrụ ya, Uchechukwu na-agbaze mmeputakwa nke eziokwu nkịtị na 'asụsụ' okike nke echiche, ebe ọ na-agbatị ohere nke foto ma na-enye ntụziaka ọhụrụ na nka obodo
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Depth of Field (DOF), nchịkọta nke ndị na-ese foto, ndị na-ese ihe, na ndị na-ese ihe
O butere ụzọ ịkpọkọta ndị na-eto eto isii nwere nkà na-ese foto iji mepụta DOF
Ọ haziri ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ha na Naịjirịa yana mba ofesi
Ọ na-akụzikwara foto site n'inye nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe na ọmụmụ
N'afọ 2004 Uchechukwu gosipụtara ọtụtụ foto mmeri na ụlọ ahịa ndị na-egbu anụ na mbara igwe na Lagos, na aha Fire, Flesh and Blood
Usoro foto ahụ na mbụ nwere ihe nkiri, mana ọ nwetara nlebara anya nke ọha na eze n'ihi ngwakọta nka ya nke agba na anwụrụ ọkụ
Ndị ọka ikpe nke 2008 nke Prince Claus Fund na-akọwa usoro foto ahụ dị ka nke siri ike, cru, dị ike na uri
N'afọ 2005, Uchechukwu natara Élan Price na African Photography Encounters na Mali maka ọrụ ya Fire, Flesh and Blood N'afọ 2008, e nyere ya onyinye Prince Claus Award site na Netherlands
Uche bụ Onye nke Kraịst, ọ zutere ma lụọ nwunye ya Chinwe na afọ 2007
Uchechukwu sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi
Nke a na-esote nhọrọ
James Latimer Allen (1907-1977), bụ onye na-ese foto na onye na-ede foto nke a maara maka ihe oyiyi ya nke Harlem Renaissance nke ndi afọ 1920s na afọ 1930s
A mụrụ Allen na New York City, na ngwụcha afọ 1920 ọ wuru ụlọ foto ebe a na-ese foto ọtụtụ ndị isi site n'oge ahụ
N'etiti ndị o sere foto gụnyere Langston Hughes, Paul Robeson, Alain Locke, na Carl Van Vechten
Dị ka onye na-enyocha nka nke New York Times William Zimmer si kwuo, ọrụ Allen nyeere aka 'ịkwado mmalite' nke 'The New Negro' nkà ihe ọmụma nke oge ahụ
Ọrụ ya gosipụtara 'otu ebumnuche' nke o kwenyere na ọ na-ejide echiche a nke onye isi ala, onye Afrịka-Amerịka gụrụ akwụkwọ nke ọma
Ihe niile ọ na-ese na-eyi uwe nke ọma, ma na-ese foto n'ụzọ dị nro, nke yiri nke foto nke ndị nwere ọgụgụ isi n'oge ahụ
A na-akpọ ihe oyiyi ndị a ihe osise dị iche iche, ma gosipụta ndị dị mkpa na Harlem Renaissance dịka Langston Hughes na Countee Cullen
Ọrụ Allen pụtara n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ a ma ama site n'aka ndị na-akwado na ndị na-agbachitere Harlem Renaissance movement, dị ka The Opportunity, The Messenger, na The Crisis

E gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri ndi afọ 1930 A Study of Negro Artists, ya na Richmond Barthé, Aaron Douglas, Palmer Hayden, William Ellisworth Artis, Malvin Gray Johnson, Augusta Savage, Lois Mailou Jones, na Georgette Seabrooke, na ndị ọzọ
Dị ka Camara Dia Holloway dere 'Allen, James Latimer' na-egosi na Allen debanyere aha na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Yale University Art Gallery n'afọ 1999
Harmon Foundation nyere ya ihe nrite $ 50 maka ọrụ ya na foto dị ka onye na-ese ihe Negro
Otú ọ dị, a na-ekwu na ihe ngosi ahụ n'afọ 1933, anaghị anọchite anya ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe Negro na-arụ na mba niile
James Lesesne Wells (Ubochí abụọ n'ọnwa Novemba, 1902 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1993) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe osise na onye na-ese onyinyo nké jikọtara ya na Harlem Renaissance
Ọ bụ prọfesọ nka nwéré mmetụta na Mahadum Howard site na 1929 ruo 1968 ma a na-ewere ya dị ka ónyé ọsụ ụzọ na agụmakwụkwọ nka nkè ógè a
A mụrụ Wells na Nọvemba 2, 1902, na Atlanta, Georgia
Nnà ya bụ ónyé ụkọchukwu Baptist na nne ya na-akụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbè ọ dị obéré, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Florida
Ahụmahụ mbụ Wells nwere na nka bụ inyere nné ya aka na klas nka ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara ya
Mgbe Wells dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ ritere ihe nrite abụọ na nka na Florida State Fair, ihe nrite mbụ na eserese na ihe nrite nke abụọ na ọrụ osisi
Wells gara n'ihu na-aga Mahadum Lincoln na Pennsylvania, ma mesịa gaa Mahadum Columbia na New York City, na-amụ ihe gbasara nka
Wells mechara mụọ nka na National Academy of Design
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Wells bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na blọk obibi akwụkwọ, lithography na etching

O mepụtara ihe osise màkà akwụkwọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere ihe osise iji nchịkọta uri nke Marianne Moore na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Association for the Study of Afro-American Life and History
N'afọ 1929, e wéré Wells n'ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkụzi ọrụ aka na Mahadum Howard dị na Washington DC
Ọ kụziri obibi akwụkwọ, ite, ịkpụzi ụrọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, Well mere ka Mahadum College of Fine Arts kwenye inye klas na linoleum printmaking
A maara Wells maka ihe ọ na-emepụta na nke oge a
Ọ bụ ónyé nkuzi nwere mmetụta na onye nduzi nye ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe n'oge ọrụ ya, gụnyere ónyé a ma ama na-ese foto Elizabeth Catlett na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ Stephanie Pogue
Wells bụ onye omenkà ama ama na Washington DC
ruo afọ iri isii
Ọ lara ezumike nká na nkuzi na 1968, mana ọ gàrà n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ
na 1973, Mahadum Fisk mere ihe ngosi otu ónyé nke ọrụ Well
N'afọ 1980, Onye isi ala Jimmy Carter nwèrè Wells ihe nrite Presidental Citation for Lifelong Contribution to American art
N'afọ 1986, e mere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Washington Project for the Arts
Ihe ngosi ahụ akpọrọ 'Afọ iri isii na nka'
Wells nwụrụ na Washington DC
n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1993
James Little (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nlekọta
A maara ya màkà ọrụ ya nke geometric abstraction nke na-enwekarị ụcha mara mma
Ọ bi na New York City
A mụrụ Little na 1962 na Memphis, Tennessee, ma too na South America
O sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị Africa America

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Memphis Academy of Art (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Memphis College of Art), mgbè ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ, a na-eto ọrụ ya ma họrọ ya na 1973 màkà ngosi na Arkansas Arts Center site na Gerald Nordland
O nwetara ákàrà ugo mmụta BFA ya na Memphis Academy of Art na 1974
N'afọ 1976, Little nwetara ákàrá ugo mmụta MFA na Mahadum Syracuse dị na Syracuse, New York
Little kwùrù na Mitchell tinyere Barnett Newman, Mark Rothko, Franz Kline, Alma Thomas, na George L
Morris so n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya na-enwe mmasị na ya
O kwùrù banyéré modus operani nke ọrụ nke ya (nke ahụ)'Abstraction nyere m mkpebi onwé onye na nnwere onwe ime nhọrọ
Ọ bụ nnwere onwe
Achọghị m nnwere onwe n'ụdị ọ bụla ọzọ
Ndị mmadụ na-achọ ịnwe azịza tupu ha enwee ahụmịhe
Abstraction anaghị enye gị nke ahụ
' Onye nkatọ Karen Wilkin akpọwo ọrụ Little (dị ka nke nwere) ahụike na-adọrọ mmasị' na
'orchestrations nke geometry na chroma iji mee ka anya anyị nwee obi ụtọ ma kpalie mmetụta na ọgụgụ isi anyịNke a bụ ihe a na-akpọ
N'afọ 2009, Little ritere ihe nríte Joan Mitchell Foundation
Ọ bụkwa ónyé natara onyinye Pollock-Krasner Foundation

N'afọ 2019, Little haziri ihe ngosi 'New York Centric' na gallery nke American Fine Arts Society nke gụnyere ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na-enweghị atụ metụtara nnukwu Metropolis gụnyere Alma Thomas, Alvin Loving, Larry Poons, Stanley Boxer, Peter Reginato, Dan Christensen, Ronnie Landfield, Gabriele Evertz, Charles Hinman, Thornton Willis, Doug Ohlson, Robert Swain, na Ed Clark
James Madhlope Phillips (11 Disemba 1919 22 Ọktoba 1987) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe
James Nachtwey (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Machị, n'afọ 1948) bụ ónyé America na-ese foto na onye na-ese ihe agha
E nyela ya ihe nrite Robert Capa Gold Medal nke Overseas Press Club ugboro ise na ihe nrite World Press Photo abụọ
N'afọ 2003, Nachtwey merụrụ ahụ na mwakpo grenade na ndị njem ya mgbé ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Baghdad, nké o si na ya gbakee kpamkpam
Nachtwey arụwo ọrụ na Time dị ka ónyé na-ese foto nkwekọrịta kemgbe afọ 1984
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Black Star (afọ 1980), bụ onye otu Magnum Photos (afọ 1986 rụọ afọ 2001) na VII Photo Agency (20012011) ebe ọ bụ onye guzobere
Nachtwey tolitere na Massachusetts ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Dartmouth College, ebe ọ gụrụ akụkọ nka na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị (afọ 1966)
Ọ bịdọrọ ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto akwụkwọ akụkọ n'afọ 1976 na Albuquerque Journal
N'afọ 1980, ọ kwagara New York City wee bido ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya
N'afọ 1981, ọ kọrọ ọrụ izizi ya na Northern Ireland na-egosi esemokwu obodo

O dere ọtụtụ esemokwu agha na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na-etinye oge na South Africa, Latin America, Middle East, Russia, Eastern Europe, Soviet Union nke mbụ na-ese foto agha, esemokwu na foto nke nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Europe na United States
Ọ lụbeghị di ma bi na New York City ugbu a
N'afọ 1994, Nachtwey na-ekpuchi ntuli aka na-abịanụ na South Africa, nke izizi na-abụghị agbụrụ n'ime ọtụtụ iri afọ
Dị ka onye mmekọ nke Bang-Bang Club, ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ ógè e gburu Ken Oosterbroek na Greg Marinovich merụrụ ahụ nkè ukwuu
Nachtwey merụrụ ahụ n'oge gara aga n'ọrụ ya, mana ọ bụ n'oge ọ na-akọ akụkọ zuru oke màkà mwakpo United States na Iraq ka o nwetara mmerụ ahụ agha mbụ ya
Dị ka Nachtwey, ya na ónyé nta akụkọ Time Michael Weisskopf nọ n'azụ Humvee na United States Army 'Tomb Raiders' Survey Platoon, otu onye nnupụisi tụbara grenade n'ime ụgbọala ahụ
Weisskopf jidere grenade iji tụba ya n'ime humvee ndị agha abụọ merụrụ ahụ na mgbawa ahụ, tinyere ndị nta akụkọ Time
Nachtwey jisiri ike were ọtụtụ foto nke dọkịta Billie Grimes na-agwọ Weisskopf tupu ọ tụbọọ
E bugara ndị nta akụkọ abụọ ahụ na Germany ma mesịa gaa ụlọ ọgwụ dị na United States
Nachtwey gbakere nke ọma iji laghachi mba ofesi iji kpuchie tsunami na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia nkè ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2004
Nachtwey arụwo ọrụ na Time dị ka ónyé na-ese foto nkwekọrịta kemgbe afọ 1984
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Black Star site n'afọ 1980 ruo afọ 1985 ma bụrụ onye otu Magnum Photos site n'afọ 1986 ruo afọ 2001
N'afọ 2001, ọ bụ ónyé guzobere VII Photo Agency (ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na VII n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011)
Nachtwey nọ n'oge mwakpo n'ọnwa Septemba n'ubochí irí na otu, n'afọ 2001 na World Trade Center, ma mepụta ọrụ a ma ama
Ọ chịkọtakwara edemede foto banyere mmetụta nke esemokwu Sudan na ndị nkịtị
N'afọ 2001, a tọhapụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ War Photographer, na-elekwasị anya na Nachtwey na ọrụ ya
N'ịbụ nke Christian Frei duziri, ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara nhọpụta Academy Award màkà ihe nkiri kachasị mma
N'abalị izizi n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2014, a gbagburu Nachtwey mgbe ọ na-ese foto màkà ngagharị iwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Thailand
Nachtwey bụ otu n'ime ndị mmeri atọ nke afọ 2007 TED Prize
E nyere onye ọ bụla natara otu narị puku dollar na otu 'ọchịchọ na-agbanwe ụwa' ka ekpughe na nzukọ TED nke afọ 2007, na Monterey, California
Ọtụtụ ndị otu TED Community, na otu ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị n'ụwa, ekwewo nkwa nkwado iji nyere aka mezuo ọchịchọ ahụ

Ọchịchọ Nachtwey, kpughere n'ubochí asatọ n'ọnwa Machị, n'afọ 2007, bụ nke a 'E nwere akụkọ dị mkpa a ga-agwa ya, achọrọ m ka TED nyere m aka inweta ya wee nyere m aka ịmepụta ụzọ ọhụrụ na nke na-akpali akpali iji foto akụkọ n'oge dijitalụ

' Ndị chọrọ inyere ya aka ga-abịanye aka na nkwekọrịta Non-disclosure (NDA) ma nyere ya aka 'inweta ohere n'ebe n'ụwa ebe ọnọdụ dị oke egwu na-eme ma jiri foto dekọọ ya n'ụzọ zuru ezu; setịpụ ụbọchị iji kpughee foto ma chọta usoro ụzọ ọhụrụ iji mepụta mmetụta dị ike na ha, na-eji teknụzụ ngosi ọhụrụ na ike nke Ịntanetị yana mgbasa ozi; ma jiri mkpọsa ahụ mepụta ihe onwunwe maka òtù ndị na-arụ ọrụ iji dozie ma gbanwee ọnọdụ ahụ'
A kpughere nsonaazụ izizi nke ọrụ a na XDRTBorg iji dekọọ ọrịa ụkwara nta na-eguzogide ọgwụ n'ụwa niile
James Oatway (amụrụ n'afọ 1978) bụ onye nta akụkọ foto South Africa
Ọ bụ onye isi na-ese foto nke Sunday Times (South Africa) ruo n'afọ 2016
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'Africa, mbata na ndị esemokwu metụtara
Oatway gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rhodes dị na Grahamstown, South Africa na nzere Bachelor of Journalism
A maara James Oatway nke ọma n'ihe banyere foto ọ sere n'afọ 2015 nke ogbugbu Emmanuel Sithole n'oge Xenophobia na South Africa
E bipụtara ọrụ Oatway na Sunday Times, The Guardian, The New York Times, Time, magazin sayensị Harper's Magazine na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa
Ọ kọọrọ esemokwu na Democratic Republic of Congo na Central African Republic; Agha na Afghanistan; Ala ọma jijiji na Haiti na 2010
Oatway bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ foto Panos

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015, Oatway nọ n'ọrụ maka Sunday Times na-ekpuchi ime ihe ike Xenophobic na Alexandra Township na Johannesburg ógè ọ na-ese foto otu ndị ikom South Africa na-eti ma na-egbu Emmanuel Sithole, onye ahịa Mozambican
Oatway na onye ọrụ ibe ya, onye nta akụkọ Beauregard Tromp, kpọgara Sithole n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị nso mana a gwara ha na ọ dịghị ndị dọkịta nọ n'ọrụ
Ha wee kpọga Sithole n'ụlọ ọgwụ Edenvale ebe ọ nwụrụ ntakịrị oge ka ọ bịarutere
Also katọrọ James Oatway nke ukwuu n'ihi na o tinyeghị aka iji zọpụta ndụ Emmanuel Sithole
Oatway gwara Time na ọ naghị akwa ụta maka iwere foto ndị ahụ, na-agbakwụnye, sị 'Echere m na ọnụnọ m n'ebe ahụ dọpụrụ uche ha ma mee ka ha daa mbà'

N'ịzaghachi nkatọ a na-akatọ na e bipụtara foto ndị ahụ, o kwuru, sị 'Ọ dịghị mfe ile anya ma aghọta m na nke ahụ nwere ike iwe ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ, mana n'ezie ndị mmadụ ga-ama ihe na-eme, ndị mmadụ ga na-ahụ obi ọjọọ na okwu mkparị nke ihe na-aga n'ihu, yabụ enweghị ịkwa ụta maka ya na ọ dị na peeji ihu,'
Oatway dere edemede màkà ahụmịhe ya banyere ihe ahụ merenụ nke e bipụtara na Sunday Times
Dị ka Oatway si kwuo, naanị ihe ọ na-akwa ụta bụ na ọ nweghị ike ịkpọrọ Sithole gaa ụlọ ọgwụ n'oge iji zọpụta ndụ ya
