James Oladipo Williams bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria na onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Lagos Steeti
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Lagos na 1 June 1975, n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha wee laa ezumike nká na 22 May 1987
Ọ bụ nna Ayotunde Phillips na Oluwafunmilayo Olajumoke Atilade, ndi rụrụ ọrụ dịka ndị isi ikpe nke iri na anọ na nke iri na ise nke Lagos State
James Oyedeji (June 1953 - 4 May 2016), nke a na-akpọ Uncle Bode ma ọ bụ Uncle Bodey, bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwuregwu na Ghana, onye bụkwa Chief Executive nke Tudu Mighty Jets
Oyedeji nwere nzere MSc nke akụ na ụba

A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke egwuregwu, a na-akpọ ya 'Uncle Bodey' ma ọ bụ 'Uncle bodey' n'ihi ihe ọmụma ya dị ukwuu banyere egwuregwu West Africa, ọkachasị bọọlụ na ịkụ ọkpọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Chief Executive nke Tudu mighty jets and okwawu united
Oyedeji nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 63 na 4 June 2016 na 37 Ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha na Accra mgbe ọ nwesịrị ọrịa strok; a nabatara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ na 2015 n'ihi nsogbu obi
E ji emume otu izu mara ọnwụ ya
James P
Newton bụ ónyé na-ese foto na Memphis, Tennessee
A maara ya dị ka ónyé na-ese foto nke mbụ n'ọbọdọ ahụ na dịka ónyé na-ede akụkọ ihe méré eme nke ọbọdọ ahụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime foto kaadị ya ka dị gụnyere na nchịkọta Mahadum Memphis
Newton nwere ala na Chicago ma soro nwanne ya nwoke Charles jikọọ aka mepụta Newton & Newton
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ màkà nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ n'oge ọrụ ya
O gosipụtara na Sprakling Gems of Race Knowledge Worth Knowing (1897), tinyere onyinyo ya
Hamilton dere banyéré ya na The Bright Side of Memphis (1908)
O nwèrè ụlọ ọrụ na 134 South Main na mgbè ahụ Beale Street
Memphis Heritage Trail gụnyere saịtị metụtara ya

James Pinson Labulo Davies (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1828 , nwụọ n'abalị iri abụo na itoolu nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 1906) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria, onye ahịa ụgbọ mmiri, onye ọrụ agha mmiri, Onye ọrụ ugbo, onye ọsụ ụzọ na-emepụta ihe, onye ọchịchị, na onye ọrụ ebere nke lụrụ Sara Forbes Bonetta na Lagos
A mụrụ James Pinson Labulo Davies na James na Charlotte Davies n'obodo Bathurst, Sierra Leone, bụ mpaghara Britain mgbe ahụ
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị asụsụ Creole nke ndị nna nna Yoruba nke British West Africa Squadron tọhapụrụ site na otu mgbere ohu Atlantic , na ndị malitere ndụ site na Abeokuta na Ogbomoso n'otu n'otu

Davies banyere Church Missionary Society (CMS) Grammar School, (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Sierra Leone Grammar School), na Freetown n'afọ 1848, ebe ọ gụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ, akụkọ ihe mere eme nke akwụkwọ nso ,Grik, na Bekee, ọdịdị ala, egwu na Latin
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na CMS na Freetown

Mgbe ọ gachara dị ka onye nkuzi, Davies debanyere aha dị ka onye agha na ndị otu agha British Royal Navy's nke West Africa , wee rụọ ọrụ na HMS Volcano n'okpuru Commander Robert Coote ebe enyere ya ọzụzụ gbasara njem ụgbọ mmiri na ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri
Davies gara n'ihu site na onye mmalite ruo midshipman na n'ikpeazụ lieutenant
Davies bụ onye lieutenant n'ụgbọ HMS Bloodhound n'oge bọmbụ nke Lagos n'okpuru iwu nke Commander Wilmot na Commodore Henry William Bruce na nke a chụpụrụ Oba Kosoko, nke mere ka Oba Akitoye rịgoro
N'oge bọmbụ ahụ, ndị agha mmiri Britain nwere iri uju ndị isi abụọ na ndị ikom iri merụrụ ahụ
Lieutenant Davies so na ndị merụrụ ahụ
Davies lara ezumike nká na ndị agha mmiri na 1852 ma nye ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi ụgbọ mmiri na-agafe n'ụsọ oké osimiri West Africa
O mechara biri na Lagos n'afo 1856, ebe a maara ya dị ka 'Captain JPL Davies'
Davies lụrụ Matilda Bonifacio Serrano, nwanyị Spanish si Havana, onye nwụrụ na 1860, ọnwa itoolu mgbe ha lụsịrị
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 1862, Davies lụrụ Sara Forbes Bonetta, onye Queen Victoria na-akwado
Aha mbụ ya bụ Aina (nke a na-akpọkwa Ina), e mere ya ohu mgbe mwakpo nke obodo ya dị na Okeadan na ọnwụ nne na nna ya n'aka ndị agha Dahomean, e mesịa debe ya n'ụlọ eze Ghezo nke Dahomey
Captain Forbes nke Bonetta tọhapụrụ ya mgbe ya na Ghezo zutere
Sara nwụrụ n'ọrịa ụkwara nta na 1880, Davies lụrụ Catherine Kofoworola Reffle na 1889
A na-eto Davies dị ka onye na-ebute ụzọ n'ọrụ ugbo koko n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka mgbe ọ nwetasịrị mkpụrụ koko n'ụgbọ mmiri Brazil nakwa n'ailand Fernando Po n'afọ 1879 na 1880
Davies mechara guzobe ugbo koko na-aga nke ọma na Ijon, Western Lagos
Davies nyekwara aka gbasaa ihe ọmụma banyere ọrụ ugbo koko nye Jacob Kehinde Coker, onye jiri ego sitere na ugbo koko ya kwado ọdịmma Ndị Kraịst
JK Coker bụkwa onye isi nke Agege Planters Union, nke gbasara koko n'ókèala Yoruba niile
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1916, The Journal of African Society nyere onye obodo Accra otuto maka iwebata koko na mpaghara West Africa, mana Justice WB

Griffiths, Chief Justice of Gold Coast (bụ Ghana ugbu a), nyere nzaghachi na mbipụta nke abalị iri abụọ nke ọnwa June afọ 1916 nke otuto nna ya, Sir Brandford Griffiths، gọvanọ Britain nke Gold Coast site na 1885 ruo 1895, na-mbute ụzọ n'ọrụ ugbo koko na Gold Coast, na-ekwu na Davies bu nna ya ụzọ dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ koko na West Africa
Justice Griffith dere, sị
Dị ka m maara, onye mbụ kụrụ koko n'ala ahụ bụ Capt nwụrụ anwụ
JPL
Davies, onye a ma ama nke Lagos, onye na 1882 na-agwa m banyere ugbo ọ ka mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya gafere mpaghara ọchịchị nke Lagos
Davies bụkwa ezigbo enyi na enyi nke Bishọp Samuel Ajayi Crowther

Ndị ikom abụọ ahụ rụkọtara ọrụ na atụmatụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Lagos dị ka mmeghe nke The Academy (ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta na ọdịbendị maka nghọta ọha na eze) n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1866 na Bishop Crowther dị ka onye nkwado mbụ na Davies dị ka onye isi oche mbụ ya

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1859, Davies nyere Reverend Thomas Babington Macaulay ego iji guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ CMS Grammar School, Lagos £ 50 (Mgbakọ pụtara nke nde 134 ka ọ na-erule afọ 2014) iji zụta akwụkwọ na ngwá ọrụ
Site na ego enyere, Macaulay meghere CMS Grammar School n'abalị isii nke ọnwa June afọ 1859
N'afọ 1867, Davies nyere £ otu narị ọzọ (Mgbakọ pụtara nke nde 268 ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2014) maka ego ụlọ akwụkwọ Grammar nke CMS
Ndị ọzọ nyere aka na ego owuwu CMS bụ ndị na-abụghị ndị Saros dịka Taiwo Olowo, onye nyere £ 50
Ndị nyere onyinye Saro gụnyekwara ndị ikom dị ka Moses Johnson, IH
Willoughby, TF
Cole, James George, na Charles Foresythe bụ ndị nyere £ 40
Captain Davies nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Lagos n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke onwa ọgọstụ afọ 1906 ma lie ya na Ajele Cemetery na Lagos n'abalị iri atọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke afọ 1906
James Presley Ball, Sr
(Amụrụ n'afọ 1825 - rụọ n'onwa Mee 4, afọ 1904) bụ onye ama ama na-ese foto n'Afrịka na Amerịka, onye na-ekpochapụ ihe, na onye ọchụnta ego
A mụrụ Ball na Frederick County, Virginia, nyere William na Susan Ball n'afọ 1825
Ọ mụtara foto daguerreotype site n'aka John B
Bailey nke Boston, onye dị ka Ball bụ 'onye nweere onwe ya nke agba' Ball mepere otu ụlọ ọrụ daguerreotype na Cincinnati, Ohio, n'afọ 1845

Azụmahịa ahụ enweghị ọganihu, ya mere Ball rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ejegharị ejegharị daguerreotypist, na-ebi obere oge na Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, mgbe ahụ na Richmond, Virginia n'afọ 1846 iji mepụta ụlọ ọrụ na-aga nke ọma na nso ụlọ Capitol State
N'afọ 1847, Ball gara Ohio ọzọ, ọzọ dị ka onye na-eme njem daguerreotypist
O biri na Cincinnati n'afọ 1849 wee mepee ụlọ ọrụ ebe nwanne ya nwoke bụ Thomas Ball ghọrọ onye ọrụ

Ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ, nke a maara dị ka 'Ball's Daguerrean Gallery of the West' ma ọ bụ 'Ball's Great Daguerrean Gallery of the West', rịgoro 'site na obere ụlọ ngosi gaa n'otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ngosi nke Midwest
' Malite n'afọ 1854 ma gaa n'ihu 'ruo ihe dị ka afọ anọ,' Robert Seldon Duncanson rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Ball na-emegharị ihe osise na agba foto

Gleason's Pictorial Drawing-Room Companion n'afọ 1854 kọwara ụlọ ihe ngosi ahụ dị ka nke na-egosipụta foto 187 nke Ball na ihe osise 6 nke Duncanson; Ọzọkwa, ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ 'jupụtara n'ịdị mma na ịma mma,' na mgbidi 'nke nwere akwụkwọ ọlaedo na okooko osisi,' 'master-piece furniture, piano, na enyo
Ka ọ dịgodị, Ball meghere galarị di iche nke akporo Ball na Thomas Galarị ya na nwanne di ya bụ Alexander Thomas

N'afọ 1855, Ball bipụtara akwụkwọ nta na-ekpochapụ ihe na-esonyere ihe osise panoramic dị mita 600 nke akpọrọ 'Mammoth Pictorial Tour of the United States Comprising Views of the African Slave Trade'; Duncanson nwere ike isonye na mmepụta nke eserese ahụ
N'oge 1855 Ball's daguerreotypes e gosiri na Ohio State Fair na na Ohio Mechanics Annual Exhibition
Na 1856 Ball gara Europe
Oké ifufe bibiri Ball na Thomas Gallery na Mee 1860, mana e mechara wughachi ya site n'enyemaka nke obodo
James Vernon Herring (ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1887 rụo ubochí irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Mée, 1969) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe na prọfesọ nke nka na Mahadum Howard
James V
Herring guzobere Ngalaba nka nkè Mahadum Howard na 1922
N'afọ 1943, ya na Alonzo J
Aden meghere ụlọ ngosi Barnett-Aden na Washington, DC
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ bụ ụlọ ngosi nka ojii mbụ nwéré onwé ya na United States ma dị na otu narị na iri abụọ na asaa Randolph Street, NW
Na mgbalị ịlụso ịkpa ókè ọgụ, a gosipụtara ndị na-ese ihe ojii na ndị ọcha na gallery ahụ
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ jere ozi dị ka ebe ndị nwéré mmasị na nka ga-ezukọ, gụnyere ndị nlekọta sitere na Phillips Collection, Corcoran Gallery of Art, na National Gallery of Art
Herring na Aden rụkọkwara ọrụ ọnụ na Gallery of Art na Howard
Herring guzobere ya na 1930 ma Aden jere ozi dị ka ónyé nlekọta mbụ
Herring làrà ezumike nká na Howard na 1953
James Augustus Van Der Zee (ọnwa Juun 29, afọ 1886 - rụọ ọnwa Mee 15, afọ 1983) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke a maara nke ọma maka foto ya nke ndị New York ojii
Ọ bụ onye isi na Harlem Renaissance
Ewezuga uru nka nke ọrụ ya, Van Der Zee mepụtara akwụkwọ zuru oke nke oge ahụ
Otu n'ime isiokwu ya ndị a ma ama n'oge a bụ Marcus Garvey, Bill 'Bojangles' Robinson na Countee Cullen
A mụrụ ya na Lenox, Massachusetts, Van Der Zee gosipụtara onyinye mbụ maka egwu, ma na mbụ ọ chọrọ ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpọ ngwa égwu violin
Mmasị nke abụọ Van Der Zee nwere bụ na foto
Ọ zụrụ igwefoto mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, wee mepụta ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị n'ụlọ ndị mụrụ ya
O sere ọtụtụ narị foto nke ezinụlọ ya yana obodo ya Lenox
Van Der Zee bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ nyere akwụkwọ mbụ nke ndụ obodo ya na obere obodo New England
N'afọ 1906, ya na nna ya na nwanne ya nwoke kwagara Harlem na New York City, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere nri na onye na-arụ ọrụ elevator
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Van Der Zee bụ onye na-akpọ piano nke ọma na onye na-achọ ịbụ onye na-akpọ violin
Ọ ga-aghọ onye isi okike na otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ise n'otu ìgwè a maara dị ka Harlem Orchestra
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 1907, Van Der Zee lụrụ Kate L
Brown ma ha laghachiri Lenox iji mụọ nwa ha nwanyị, Rachel, n'ọnwa Septemba
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ha kwagara Phoebus, Virginia
N'afọ 1908, a mụrụ nwa ha nwoke, Emile, mana ọ nwụrụ n'ime otu afọ site na oyi ịba n'ahụ
N'afọ 1915, ọ kwagara Newark, New Jersey, ebe ọ nwetara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-ese foto, nke mbụ dị ka onye na-enyere aka n'ime ụlọ gbara ọchịchịrị ma mesịa dị ka onye-ese foto
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye Katọlik ma malite iwere ọrụ na Chọọchị
Ọ laghachiri Harlem n'afọ sochirinụ, dịka ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị Black na ndị na-akwaga mba ọzọ na-abata n'akụkụ ahụ nke obodo ahụ
Ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, Jennie Louise Van de Zee, nke a makwaara dị ka Madame E Toussaint, guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na Toussaint Conservatory of Art and Music, onye guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na 1911
N'afọ 1916, Van Der Zee na Gaynella Greenlee malitere Guarantee Photo Studio na West 125th Street na Harlem
Ha lụrụ n'afọ 1918
Azụmaahịa ya bara ọgaranya n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, na foto ndị ọ sere site n'oge a ruo afọ 1945 chọrọ ọtụtụ nlebara anya
N'afọ 1919, o sere foto nke mmeri nke 369th Infantry Regiment, otu ndị Afrịka Amerịka na-akpọkarị 'Harlem Hellfighters' mgbe ụfọdụ
James W
Washington Jr
(Ubochí irí n'ọnwa Novemba, 1908 rụọ úbọchị asaá n'ọnwa Juun, 2000) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ọkpụkpụ nké ghọrọ ónyé ama ama na Seattle, Washington, ọbọdọ nka
A mụrụ Washington ma zụlite ya na Gloster, Mississippi, ọbọdọ ime ọbọdọ na Jim Crow South
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ isii nke ónyé ụkọchukwu Baptist James Washington na nwunye ya Lizzie
Mgbè ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị, nna ya gbapụrụ n'ihi egwu ime ihe ike, ha ahụghịkwa ọzọ

Ọ malitere ise ihe mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ma mụta ihe mgbè ọ gbara afọ iri na anọ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme akpụkpọ ụkwụ, ma rụọ ọrụ dị iche iche (gụnyere ịrụ ọrụ na onye ozi unere, nke nyéré ya ohere ịga obodo ndị buru ibu mgbè niile)
Ka ọ na-erule mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na gọọmentị etiti; ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka gọọmentị gọọmentị ruo mgbe ọ dịla afọ iri ise
N'afọ 1938, ọ sonyeere Federal Works Progress Administration dị ka onye enyemaka ónyé nkụzi nka na Baptist Academy na Vicksburg, Mississippi
A chụpụrụ ya na South site na ihe ngosi na-egosi ndị na-ese ihe ọcha, o mepụtara ihe ngosi nke ndị na-eme ihe nkírí ojii nke WPA kwadoro, nke mbụ dị otú ahụ na Mississippi

Washington gàrà Mexico na 1951, ebe ọ zutere ndị na-ese ihe na muralists Diego Rivera na David Alfaro Siqueiros na ebe ọ zutekwara nkume volcanic dị nro nke ga-eme ka ọrụ ya gaa n'ihe ọkpụkpụ; obéré ihe ọkpụkpụ o mere bụ osisi
Ihe osise nkume mbụ ya, Young Boy nke Athens bụ nke e ji nkume ọ buuru na Teotihuacán mee n'ụzọ dị n'etiti Pyramid nkè Anyanwụ na Pyramid nkè Ọnwa
Washington bụ ma Ónyé na-ese ihe ma ónyé na'ese ihe
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-agụnyekwa collage
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-egosi mpụga ma ọ bụ ime ụlọ ndị e gosipụtara na ndụ ya, ma ọ bụ echiche ndị ọ zutere na njem ya

Ndị ọzọ na-ekwu maka isiokwu nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, dị ka The Making of the UN Charter (1945), nke na-agụnye akwụkwọ akụkọ na ihe oyiyi nke akụkụ ahụ, na nke 'na-egosipụta echiche na ndị isi ojii nwụrụ maka echiche nke nnwere onwé na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, mana a jụrụ ha ebe na mba nke ha dịka ekwupụtara na nkwupụta ikike mmadụ na United Nations
' N'otu aka ahụ, ihe ọkpụkpụ ya nke 1946 The Chaotic Half na-egosi aka ojii na-eru maka igbe ntuli aka, jikọtara ya na Klansman, obe, na eriri
Kemgbe afọ 1992, ụlọ Washington na ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na 1816 26th Avenue enweela ọnọdụ gọọmentị dị ka ihe ịrịba ama obodo Seattle
James Webb (amụrụ na June 20, 1975 na Kimberley, Northern Cape) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma maka ntinye aka ya na ntinye aka na-etinye ụda
Webb na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ụda, onye nlekọta na onye nkuzi
Ihe owuwu ụda ya na-ekwusi ike na isi mmalite na ngosi nke ihe nkiri ụda, yana mkpa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọnọdụ nke ụda ndị a
A na-akpọkarị ya 'onye na-achịkọta ụda,' Webb nwere mmasị na ọrụ ihe omume na-anụ ihe na-arụ na ndụ anyị kwa ụbọchị
Ngosipụta anụ ahụ nke ọrụ ahụ, gụnyere oghere ntinye na nhazi nke ndị ọkà okwu, bụkwa nhọrọ a kpachaara anya mee maka Webb

Webb natara ihe nrite 2008 ABSA L'Atelier Award ma gosipụta ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta onwe na nke ọha na eze, nke gụnyere Iziko South African National Gallery, Johannesburg Art Gallery, na Nelson Mandela Metropolitan Art Museum
Webb nwetara nzere BA ya na Drama and Comparative Religion na Mahadum Cape Town na 1996
Mahadum Prince Abubakar Audu, bụbu Mahadum Kogi State) nke dị na Anyigba, bụ mahadum nke Kogi, Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ Prince Abubakar Audu, onye bụbu gọvanọ nke steeti ahụ, guzobere ya na 1999

N'oge e guzobere ya, a maara ya dị ka Mahadum Kogi State, E mechara kpọọ ya Mahadum Prince Abubakar Audu (PAAU) n'afọ 2002, mgbe gọvanọ nọ n'ọkwa nke Kogi Steeti n'oge ahụ, onye kwupụtara nguzobe ya, ma mesịa kpọgharịa ya Mahadụ Kogi State (KSU) n'afọ 2003 site n'aka onye bụbu gọvanọ Ibrahim Idris ma mesịa gụọ ya Mahadume Prince Abubakur Audu na 2020 site n'aha Mahadum Alhaji Yahaya Adoza Bello n'ihe gbasara Abubakar
Prọfesọ SK
Okwute (Profesọ nke Chemistry) bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ Vice Chancellor (2000-2005) ma ugbu a laghachi na Mahadum Abuja
Prọfesọ FS
Idachaba (OFR), Prọfesor nke Agric-Economics, weghaara n'etiti afọ 2005 na 2008 wee laa ezumike nká iji rụọ ọrụ na ntọala ya (FSIdachaba Ntọala maka nyocha na agụmakwụkwọ) tupu ọnwụ ya
Prọfesọ I
Isah (Profesọ nke Chemical Pathology), site na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, weghaara ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2008, Prọfesụ nọchiri ya
Mohammed Abdulkadir si Mahadum Ado Bayero
Onye osote onye isi ala bụ Prọfesọ Marietu Tenuche
N'afọ 2017, e mechiri ngalaba Ndị ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ Union of University(ASUU) KSU na nsogbu ụlọ ọrụ na gọọmentị steeti maka ịghara ịkwụ ụgwọ ọnwa ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa

Gọọmentị steeti boro ndị nkuzi ebubo na ha na-eme ka esemokwu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụrụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma nye iwu ka ha laghachi na klas ozugbo ma ọ bụ na a ga-ekwupụta ọnọdụ ha dị n'efu maka itinye akwụkwọ ọhụrụ
Mgbe ọtụtụ ụbọchị nke ịjụ ịlaghachi na klas ahụ gasịrị, Gọvanọ Bello onye bụ onye ọbịa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ kwupụtara mmachibido iwu nke ASUU na mwepụ ya na ASUU mba
Mahadum Prince Abubakar Audu nwere ngalaba asaa (7)

Mahadum Prince Abubakar Audu malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ n'ọnwa Eprel, afọ 2000 na ngalaba isii Faculties of Agriculture, Arts and Humanities, Law, Management Sciences, Natural Sciences and Social Sciences
Mahadum ahụ gbakwunyere nguzobe nke Faculty of Medicine nwere nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ nyocha
E guzobere Centre for Pre-Degree and Diploma Studies n'okpuru nchịkwa Mahadum dị ugbu a iji mee ka diplọma na mmemme pre-degree
Ụmụ akwụkwọ nke mmemme pre-degree nwere ike ịbanye na mmemme ogo ma ọ bụrụ na ha nwere ịga nke ọma na ule dị n'ime ma ọ dịghị mkpa ide ule Post-UTME
[citation needed]
Ngalaba na ụlọ ọrụ niile maka Remedial Studies na Diploma dị n'otu ebe n'ihi na a na-eme atụmatụ ka mahadum ahụ bụrụ obodo nke ya
Enweghị ụlọ akwụkwọ satellite
Otú ọ dị, e nwere mkpu na a ga-eme ka mahadum ahụ dị iche iche site na ịkwaga ụfọdụ n'ime ikike ya karịsịa College of Medicine gaa ma ọ bụ n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ma ọ bụ Central nke steeti ahụ

Mahadum ahụ na-enye ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe na isiokwu ndị dị ka ọgwụ, iwu, microbiology, biochemistry, geology (ngwakọta injinia na geosciences), physics, mgbakọ na mwepụ, sayensị kọmputa, nchịkwa ọha na eze, kinetics mmadụ, kemịkalụ ụlọ ọrụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ, nchịkwa azụmahịa, ndekọ ego, ndekọ ego na ego, nka ihe nkiri, nri, nri na sayensị sayensị na sayensụ na teknụzụ, ịkụ azụ na ọhịa, ọmụmụ Alakụzụ, okpukpe na nkà ihe ọmụma, agụmakwụkwọ, agụmakọta, agụmakọrịta, agụmakwu, agụmakịa, agụmakbe, agụmakzụ, agụmakpọ, agụmakmakwụkwọ, Bekee, akụkọ ihe nkwurịta okwu mba ụwa nyere ụlọ ọrụ, asụsụ Bekee, Nchịchịchị, akụkọ ihe mere eme na nkwurịta nkwurugwu, Njikọ, Njikọrịta mba ụwa
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ihe a ma ama, mahadum ahụ bụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị mma n'Africa, ebe ụfọdụ ngalaba ya bụ ndị ọkachamara na agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria na-ahọrọ dị ka ndị kachasị mma na Naijiria
Afọ ole na ole gara aga, a kpọsara ngalaba iwu dị ka nke kachasị mma na Naịjirịa, ma nọgide na-abụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị mma n'afọ ndị sochirinụ
Ọzọkwa, a họpụtara ngalaba nke Geology dị ka otu n'ime ndị kachasị mma n'Africa, n'akụkụ Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, na Mahadum Ibadan

Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ na-akwado ọbá akwụkwọ nke nwere nnukwu nchịkọta akwụkwọ pụrụ iche dị oke ọnụ, ihe, na ọdụ Geologic, nke Shell Petroleum Development Company nyere dị ka ekele maka àgwà mmepe ọgụgụ isi pụrụ iche nke ngalaba ahụ
Mahadum ahụ na-etu ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka isi mmalite a na-akọwaghị, ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike ịnweta maka nyocha agụmakwụkwọ, ihe ùgwù a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'etiti mahadum ndị ọzọ nke Naijiria
Ihe a ma ama bụ E-ọbá akwụkwọ nke Mahadum ahụ; nnukwu ihe owuwu nwere nnukwu ngwá ọrụ nke kwụ otu ebe ma kewapụ onwe ya na ọbá akwụkwọ isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Isi mmalite na-ekwu na e nwere mahadum ole na ole ndị ọzọ dị na Naijiria dị ka Mahadum Covenant (mahadum onwe onye) nke na-etu ọnụ na ọ bụ naanị ya

N'agbanyeghị ego ezughi oke nke bụ nnukwu ihe ịma aka nke mahadum ndị steeti ma e jiri ya tụnyere mahadum gọọmentị etiti, a na-akpọ KSU mahadum nwere mmejuputa ihe kachasị mma maka mmepe site na Knowledge for Impact Foundation
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere na ụmụ akwụkwọ dị ihe dị ka 751 n'afọ 2000, mana nke dị ka afọ 2009/2010 na-anabata akwụkwọ etoola ruo ihe dị ka 16,000, ma ugbu a ọ dị ihe dị na 50,000 na 2016
A makwaara ya dị ka otu n'ime mahadum kachasị mma n'ọrụ nnabata ya, na-anabata ụmụ akwụkwọ site na uru, yana mgbakwunye site na uru dị nso
A họpụtara ya dị ka mahadum na-emepe ngwa ngwa na Naịjirịa, na otu n'ime ndị dị otú ahụ, n'Africa
Mahadum ahụ dị ka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nwere Gọọmentị Njikọ Ụmụ akwụkwọ (SUG)
N'afọ 2014 agbanyeghị, a kwụsịtụrụ SUG n'ihi ime ihe ike n'oge ntuli aka ma mesịa weghachite ya na 2016 (ọ bụ gọọmentị na-achịkwa ya ruo mgbe ahụ)
Nhọrọ ọzọ gara nke ọma ma mepụta Phillip Omepa dị ka onye isi ala na Suleiman, Farouq Omale dị ka onye nduzi nke ọdịmma
N'afọ 2018, e boro Gọvanọ Yahaya Bello ebubo na ọ na-akpa nkata iji mee ka ndị a họọrọ dị ka ndị isi nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ihe a ma ama dị ka ndị ibe ya dị ka Mahadum Lagos, Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ mba dị iche iche akpọwo Mahadum Kogi Steeti aha dị ka otu n'ime mahadum BEST nke Africa dabere na agbụrụ ọgụgụ isi pụrụ iche nke ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya
Ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị 2017, mahadum ahụ kewara onwe ya n'ụzọ iwu site na Academic Staff Union of Universities òtù nche anwụ maka ndị ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ nke mahadum Naijiria
N'ihi nke a, mmemme agụmakwụkwọ abụrụla ihe kwụsiri ike na ngwa ngwa, na-enweghị omume ọgbaghara na-adịghị akwụsị akwụsị nke mahadum ndị otu ASUU
Emelite = 2019
Àtụ Association of African UniversitiesÀtụ Universities in Nigeria
Jamie Margolin (amụrụ na Disemba 10, 2001) bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi nke ịhụ igwe
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Zero Hour
Margolin gara Holy Names Academy
Ọ na-amụ ihe nkiri ugbu a na Mahadum New York Tisch School of the Arts
N'afọ 2017, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Margolin guzobere otu ndị ntorobịa na-ahụ maka ihu igwe nke a kpọrọ Zero Hour na Nadia Nazar, Zanagee Artis, na ndị ntorobịa ndị ọzọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke nzukọ ahụ ruo na Septemba 2020 mgbe ọ kwụsịrị
Onye guzobere ya na onye na-eme ihe ike maka ndị ntorobịa bụ Madelaine Tew nọchiri ya
Margolin jikọtara aka guzobe Zero Hour na mmeghachi omume na nzaghachi ọ hụrụ mgbe Hurricane Maria na Puerto Rico na ahụmịhe onwe ya n'oge ọkụ ọhịa nke Washington na 2017
Ọ nwetara ụfọdụ aha ọjọọ dị ka onye gbara akwụkwọ na Aji P
Ikpe Washington, na-ebo steeti Washington akwụkwọ maka emeghị ihe megide mgbanwe ihu igwe na ndabere nke ihu igwe kwụsiri ike ịbụ ikike mmadụ
Na Septemba 2018, Margolin so n'òtù ndị ntorobịa gbara Gọvanọ Jay Inslee na Steeti Washington akwụkwọ maka ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ na steeti ahụ
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe nke King County Superior Court jụrụ ikpe ahụ, onye kpebiri na ikpe ahụ bụ nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Gọvanọ na ndị omeiwu ga-edozi
Kemgbe ahụ, a rịọrọ ya ka ọ rịọ ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị ikpe nke Washington
Na Septemba 2019, a gwara ya ka ọ gbaa akaebe na kọmitii a na-akpọ 'Voices Leading the Next Generation on the Global Climate Crisis' n'akụkụ Greta Thunberg maka United States House of Representatives
N'afọ 2021, Margolin malitere agụmakwụkwọ ihu igwe
Ihe odide ya banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe apụtala n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ gụnyere HuffPost, Teen Ink na CNN
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Teen Voguez 21 Under 21 nke 2018
N'afọ 2018, a kpọkwara ya otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ịrị abụọ na ise nke People Magazine na-agbanwe ụwa
Margolin gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka onye Juu na Latinx
Ọ na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka nwanyị na-edina nwanyị ma na-ekwu n'ihu ọha banyere ahụmịhe ya dị ka onye LGBT
Margolin bụ onye otu Junior State of America
Margolin meriri MTV Europe Music Awards Generation Change award na 2019
Jimila Umar Nagudu (amuru 10 August,1985) bu onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Kannywood na Naijiria
Jimila Nagudu bụ onye amuru na 10 August,1985 na Magana Gumau, Toro local government Area of Bauchi State, Nigeria
Jamila gụru akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndịrị ya na Steeti Bauchi
Jamila Umar nke amara aha ya dịka Jamila Umar Nagudu mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ụlọ ọrụ kannywood n'afọ 2002
Kemgbe ọ gbarachara di ya alụkwaghịm, o kpebiri ibidokwa ihe nkiri
Ọ hapụrụ Bauchi laghachi Kano wee ghọta na o mezuola ebumnobi ya nke ịbụ onye amara amara na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ kannywood
Ọ nọburii na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dịka onye na-agba egwu kemgbe (2002)
E mechara o sonye n'ụlọ orụ nke ihe nkiri obere oge
Mgbalị ya na ime obi ụtọ nke itundụmmanụ na ejije dọtara uche ndị nduzi nke mere ha ji malite igosi ya n'ihe nkiri ha
Jamila nwere ike ịpụta n'ihe nkiri ọbụla
Ọ pụtala n'he nkiri ịhụnanya mana mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-apụtakwa n'ihe nkiri ndị na-atọ ọchị
Nagudu abụrụla onye na-ewu ewu na Kannywood nke na a na-akpọkarị ya eze nwanyị Kannywood
Onye nduziAminu Saira bụ onye mbụ gosipụtara ya n'ihe nkiri ya 'Jamila da Jamilu' dịka onye nwanyi na-eme ihe nkiri
Jalima gbara di ya alụkwaghịm, o nwere nwa nwoke
Jamila Debbech Ksiksi (amụrụ n'afọ 1968 - 19 Disemba 2022) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia si Ennahda
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ , a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke ndị nnọchi anya ndị mmadụ wee bụrụ nwanyị ojii mbụ na-emepe emepe na mba ahụ
Jamour Chames (amụrụ n'August 29, 1989) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe n'oge a
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa
A maara ya nke ọma màkà nchịkọta nka ya 'Girl All Over the World', nke bụ ọrụ ya ọ raara nye ime ememe ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City
A mụrụ Jamour Chames na Covington, Kentucky nà August 29, 1989
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nà Holmes High School
Ụdị mbinye aka Chames bụ nké dị mfe site na iji agba na ọdịdị
Ọrụ Jamour Chames na-enyocha ihe oyiyi dị mma ma ọ na-achọ ịmepụta ihe osise nke na-enwe mmetụta dị mma n'ụwa
N'ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ 'Girl All Over the World,' Chames na-eme emume ụmụ nwanyị n'ụwa niile
Na Girl All Over the World Chames ' gbalịrị idozi ihe oyiyi nwoke na nwanyị na nka ma mee ka ìhè dị mmà na ụmụ nwanyị n'ụzọ na-abụghị nke ányà
Chames egosila ọrụ a na mba ụwa
Jan Awei bụ asụsụ ndị moribund Jukunoid nke Naijiria
Ọ nwere ọkà okwu rụrụ 12 na 1997 ama na-asụ ya n'ógbè dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ugwu Muri na South nke Gombe Steeti, mana a maghị kpọmkwem ebe ahụ

Jan Ernst Abraham Volschenk (ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa August 1853 Riversdale rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1936 Riversdale), bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa, amaara màkà nnukwu ọdịdị ala ya nke Langeberg Range na Western Cape Province
A mụrụ ya na nne na nna Dutch na ugbo Melkhoutskraal, Volschenk malitere ise ihe mgbè ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị ma bụrụ ónyé na-akụziri onwé ya
James Reitz, onye na-enyocha ala gọọmentị, hụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya wee tụọ aro ka nwanne ya nwoke Gysbert, ónyé ọka iwu Riversdale, nwee mmasị
O mechara sonye na ụlọ ọrụ Reitz & Versfeld dị ka onye na-edebe akwụkwọ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri ise na otu, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ọfịs ya ma tinye oge ya niile na mmanụ na ákwà ya
Mpaghara obibi ya gburugburu Riversdale na Langeberg, bụ ihe mkpali na isiokwu ya, ọ ghọkwara onye nwe ụcha na ụda nke ugwu Karoo
Ike dị egwu nke Volschenk nke ịhụ ihe gbasara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme - ọ chịkọtara ihe karịrị puku anọ beetle specimens
Mgbè ọ dị afọ irí ànó nà isé, Volschenk lụrụ onye ọzọ bi na Riversdale, Helen Smalberger, ha wee mụọ ezinụlọ nke ụmụ nwanyị itoolu
N'ime ndị a, Vera, nke okenye, sooro nzọụkwụ nna ya ma see ihe n'otu ụdị ahụ

Jan Francois Elias Celliers, onye a mara ama n'ụwa niile dị ka Jan FE
Celliers
mana mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka Jan EF Cilliers (na ubochi 12 Jenụwarị n'afọ 1865 wee ruo 1 June afọ 1940) bụ onye na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nyocha
Celliers bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ede uri atọ a mara ama n'asụsụ Afrikaans nke dere ozugbo Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer; ya na Totius na C
Louis Leipoldt, Celliers dere uri ndị ntorobịa banyere mbibi nke agha ahụ n'asụsụ ndị ntorobịa nke Afrikaans
Abụ ya kachasị mma pụtara na nchịkọta n'afọ 1908 Die Vlakte en ander gedigte ('The Plains and Other Poems)
A mụrụ Celliers na na akụkụ W
Wellington, Western Cape Province na Cape Colony South Africa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nso Cape Town, Celliers na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Pretoria, na mba Transvaal n'oge ah afọ ụ na 1874
Mgbe Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer malitere, Celliers lụrụ ọgụ na Colesberg site na Kimberley ruo mgbe agha ahụ biri
N'ịgbapụ site na ndị Britain na-eyi uwe nwunye ya, Celliers gara Europe ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa na 1907
Sitafọ e na wee 1919afọ ruo 1940 Celliers bụ prọfesọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch Ọ nwụrụ na Johannesburg, Transvaalńo Gauteng Province
Jan Vermeiren (amụrụ na 1949 na Belgium) bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na South Africa dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe (mmanụ na ihe osise mural) na ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ (lithography na etching)
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nke ọrụ ya jikọtara ọdịbendị abụọ bara ọgaranya na nke dị iche iche
N'otu akụkụ, e nwere ihe nketa Europe ya, n'aka nke ọzọ, mmetụta dị ukwuu nke Africa, nke bụzi ebe obibi ya
Abụọ a na-eweta ihe na-akpali akpali na ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'ọrụ ya
Ihe oyiyi ya na-ekpughe usoro akara ochie sitere na ọdịbendị ógè ochie dị iche iche, na-egosipụta nkwenye ya na ọ bụ akara 'primitive' ndị a na-ejikọta mmadụ gafee oge na mmepeanya dị iche iche
Ebumnuche ya bụ ime ka ónyé na-ekiri ya banye n'ime mmụọ nke Africa, iji gbaa ume nghọta ka mma màkà njirimara Africa
Ọmụmụ nka 1968-71 Koninklijke Academie voor Schone Kunsten Antwerpen, Belgium na 1971-74 Koninklijke Ac Academia voor Schone kunsten Antwerpen
Nwa akwụkwọ nke Geert Reusens na ónyé na-ese ihe Lode Eyckermans

Ọ ghọrọ ónyé nkụzi na Technical College for Advanced Education na Cape Town (1981[[87) ebe ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-ese ihe na Alfred Krentz, Marthinus la Grange, Erik Laubscher, Claude Bouscharain na Stanley Pinker
Kemgbe afọ 1977 ọ bi na South Africa, ugbu a na Cape Town
A mụrụ Jan Vermeiren na Bornem, Belgium na 1949
Site n'oge ọ dị obere, ise ihe bụ ụzọ dị mkpà ọ ga-esi kwuo okwu ma ọ malitere ọzụzụ nka mgbè ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
O mechara gụọ akwụkwọ ógè niile na Academy St
Niklaas na Academy of Mechelen, wee gaa na National Hoger Institute na Antwerp
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, obibi akwụkwọ bụ mmasị pụrụ iche ya, ọ bụkwa naanị mgbè ọ kwagara South Africa na 1976 ka ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe
Mkpebi ya ịkwaga bịara mgbè ọ nọrọ otu afọ na mba ahụ n'afọ 1973/4 mgbè a kpọrọ ya ka ọ kụzie lithography
Ọ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ihi ọtụtụ ụcha ọ hụrụ ebe a, mgbè ọ na-acha ntụ ntụ nke Belgium
Agba 'Afrịka' ndị a pụtara ìhè n'ọrụ ya - ma na ụda mbụ, ma na ọchịchịrị, ọnọdụ ikuku, nke pụtara n'ọrụ ọhụrụ ya
A na-ewere ọrụ ya ugbu a dị ka ihe doro anya nkè ihe osise South Africa na-eme mgbe agha ụwa gasịrị na-emepụta echiche ndị Europe banyere ọdịbendị ọdịnala South Africa
Ónyé na-ese ihe osise nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka na akwụkwọ akụkọ

Ihe ịrịba ámá nke ọrụ ya bụ ihe e nyere màkà ihe osise 'onyinye n'Africa' dị ka onyinye sitere n'aka Gọọmentị Flemish nye Ónyé isi àlà South Africa Nelson Mandela (1997), ihe ngosi nke ihe osise màkà ngosi Millennium na Cape Town (1999) na ihe ngosi nke eserese mmanụ na South African pavilion na EXPO 2000 na Hannover, Germany (2000)
Jan Vermeiren bụ ónyé otu profaịlụ nke SAAA, Cape Town Branch na ónyé otu South African Artists Guild
Ihe ngosi Jan Vermeiren esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu site na 1969 nke emere na Belgium, Yugoslavia, South Africa, USA, Germany na Namibia
O nweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ya ámá àmà na Belgium na South Africa, gụnyere
Ọrụ ọha na eze
Ntuziaka AASA

Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ Vermeiren na Iziko South African National Gallery, Durban Art Gallery, National Museum, Bloemfontein, Pretoria Art Museum, Mahadum nke Orange Free State, Bibliothèque Nationale de France, Victoria na Albert Museum, Albertina, Sterckshof Museum, Antwerp, Belgium
Jan Voje (amụrụ na 5 Disemba na afọ 1942) bụ onye Norway na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na 3000 mita steeplechase, nke ọ gbakwara asọmupi na 1972 Olympic Games
Ọ nọchitere anya klọb Gjerpen IF, ya na ejima ya Andor Voje
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 8 020 na mita 3000 (1973), 8 298 na steeplechase (1973), 14 006 na mita 5000 (1973) na 29 102 na mita 10,000 (1973)
Na ọsọ dị n'etiti o nwere 1 540 na mita 800 (1965), 3 465 na mita 1500 (1971) na 4 131 na ọsọ kilomita (1959)
Nanị njem mba ụwa ya bịara na 1964 Summer Olympics, ebe ọ na-asọmupi na okpomọkụ nke steeplechase
A họpụtakwara ya maka 1974 European Championships, mana ọ malitereghị
N'okporo ụzọ ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri Norwegian steeplechase na afọ 1972
Nanị ihe nrite ọla edo ya na ihe omume pụrụ iche ya bụ n'ihi mmeri Sverre Sørnes na ihe omume ahụ; na mbụ kwa Arne Risa
Voje ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha nke mba na 1968, 1973 na 1974 na ọla nchara na 1966 na 1970
O nwetakwara mmeri n'asọmpi kilomita abụọ na 1966 na 1967, wee nweta ọla nchara na 1968 na 1969 tupu a kwụsị ihe omume ahụ
N'ihe omume kilomita nke asatọ, nke na-adịghịzi ugbu a, ọ meriri ọla nchara Norwegian na 1973 n'azụ Knut Børø na Per Halle
Jan Pieter Hendrik van Gilse (Rotterdam, 11 Mee 1881 - Oegstgeest, 8 Septemba 1944) bụ onye na-ede egwu na onye nduzi Dutch
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya bụ symphonies ise na opera asụsụ Dutch bụ Thijl
N'ịbụ onye sitere n'ezinụlọ ndị ọkà mmụta okpukpe, Jan van Gilse gosipụtara ikike mbụ maka ịkpọ piano na ide egwu
Site na 1897 gaa n'ihu, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cologne conservatory
Mgbe onye nkuzi ya, Franz Wüllner, nwụrụ na 1902, ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Engelbert Humperdinck na Berlin
Site na 1909 ruo 1911, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ịtali

N'afọ 1901, van Gilse natara ihe nrite Beethoven-Haus na Bonn maka Symphony ya (nke mbụ) na F major; N'afọ 2010, e nyere ya ihe nrite Michael Beer maka Symphonic ya nke atọ, 'Erhebung' ('Elevation'; maka soprano solo na orchestra)
Na mgbakwunye na ide egwu, van Gilse zụlitere mmasị n'ịduzi
Ọ malitere na Bremen Opera, ọrụ nke nhọpụta sochiri na Munich na Amsterdam
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ tiwapụrụ mere ka njem sie ike, ọ laghachiri Netherlands
Site na 1917 ruo 1922 ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Utrecht Municipal Orchestra (Utrechtsch Stedelijk Orkest)
N'afọ 1921, van Gilse gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ahụ mgbe esemokwu ya na ndị nduzi nke ndị egwú
Onye na-ede egwu na onye na-enyocha egwu Willem Pijper wakporo Van Gilse ruo oge ụfọdụ na Utrechts Dagblad kwa ụbọchị, mwakpo nke toro n'ụzọ dị egwu ka oge na-aga
Arịrịọ Van Gilse na a gaghị ekwe ka Pijper nwee ike ịga kọntaktị kwụsịrị ruo ogologo oge nke na ọ tụfuru okwukwe ya wee gbaa arụkwaghịm
Ndị otu ahụ mechara jụ ịgba egwu nke ọma
Afọ asatọ ka e mesịrị, van Gilse tinyere ahụmahụ sitere n'oge ọ nọ na Utrecht na akwụkwọ
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi na ọ hapụghị onye ọ bụla ma ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla (gụnyere onwe ya), van Gilse nwere obi abụọ ma ihe odide ahụ ga-ahụ ìhè nke ụbọchị
E mechara dezie ya ma bipụta ya na 2003
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, van Gilse sonyere n'ụzọ siri ike n'òtù mmegide megide ndị Germany bi na Netherlands
Ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ, ndị bụkwa ndị agha nnupụisi, bụ ndị ndị ndị bi na ya gburu tupu van Gilse n'onwe ya anwụọ (ma eleghị anya n'ihi oyi bara ya n'ahụ) n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1944
Iji chebe ebe mgbaba ya, e liri ya n'ili a na-amaghị aha ya na mpụga obodo Oegstgeest
Site na 1933 ruo 1937, van Gilse jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Utrecht conservatory
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ichebe ọdịmma nke ndị na-ede egwu na Netherlands
N'afọ 1911, van Gilse bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Society of Dutch Musicians (Genootschap van Nederlandse Componisten ma ọ bụ GENECO)
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, o nyere aka guzobe Dutch Bureau for Musical Copyrights (Buma)
Van Gilses early is indebted to German
Late romanticism
After about 1920 however it becomes more modernist his opera thiji(1940)often regarded as his masterpiece and arguably the most important opera in Dutch musical history
Is one of his last works and a totally individual conceptionan attempt by the German occupiers to destroy all of van gilses work was prevented by his collaborators
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, mmasị na van Gilse amụbaala, site na mbipụta nke akụkọ ndụ ya (nke Hans van Dijk dezigharịrị) na akụkọ ndụ
Ụlọ ọrụ Germany CPO edekọla symphonies anọ ọ rụzuru, na atụmatụ na-aga n'ihu idekọ opera Thijl n'ọdịnihu dị nso, niile n'okpuru nduzi nke onye nduzi David Porcelijn
Johanna Wilhelmina Cilliers (a mụrụ n'afọ 1950), nke a maara dịka Jana Cilliers, bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri n'asụsụ abụọ
Ọ bụ onye natara ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere South African Film and Television Awards abụọ na Fleur du Cap Theatre Award
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Pretoria, Cilliers bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye na-ese ihe osise Bettie Cilliers-Barnard na Carel Hancke Cilliers
Ọ gara Hoërskool Menlopark
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum nke Pretoria tupu ọ gaa ọzụzụ na Royal Academy of Dramatic Art (RADA) na London, na-emecha diplọma ya n'afọ̀ 1973
Cilliers lụrụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede Regardt van den Bergh n'afọ iri asatọ, ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Lika Berning na Leán
Mgbe Cilliers na van den Bergh gbara alụkwaghịm, Cilliers lụrụ Bill Flynn, onye nwụrụ n'afọ 2007
Janat Balunzi Mukwaya bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbu onyeisi ndị agha nke Uganda
Ugbu a ọ bụ Onye Nnọchiteanya Onye isi ala Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista maka Ọrụ Nchịkọta n'Ọfịs Praịm Minista site na 16 Febụwarị 2009 ruo 27 Mee 2011
Minista nke Mmekọahụ, Ọrụ na Mmekọrịta Ọha site na 6 June 2016 ruo Disemba 2019
Minista nke Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ site na June 2006 ruo February 2009
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, ọ lara ezumike nká na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwa oge ma Kiddu Makubuya nọchiri ya na kansụl
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka Mukono South Constituency na Mukono District, site na 2006 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 2011
A mụrụ Mukwaya na 12 Disemba 1951 na Mukono District
Ọ gụrụ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nchịkwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Makerere n'etiti afọ 1971 na 1975, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Arts na nsọpụrụ
N'agbata afọ 1975 na afọ 1981, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe nchịkwa (magistrate) nke abụọ n'ụlọ ikpe ime obodo
N'afọ 1981, ọ sonyeere National Resistance Army (NRA) dị ka onye agha
Ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa onye isi na NRA
O nwekwara nzere Master of Arts na iwu ọha na eze na njikwa site na Mahadum London
Mgbe NRA weghaara ọchịchị na 1986, a họpụtara Mukwaya dịka onye nduzi nke ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na Ministry of Gender, Labor and Social Affairs, ebe ọ jere ozi ruo n'afọ 1990
N'afọ 1994, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke onye osote onye isi ala nke Uganda, na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 1995
N'agbata afọ 1995 na 1996, Mukwaya jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka Luwero Triangle na Ọfịs Onye isi ala
N'agbata afọ 1996 na afọ pụkụ abụọ na otụ , ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Mmekọahụ, Ọrụ na Mmepe Ọha
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọka iwu ukwu nke Uganda na Minista nke Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Iwu Iwu na afọr puku abụọ na anọ ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo 2005
N'afọ 2005, a kpọfere ya na Ministri Ọrụ Ugbo ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Ọrụ Ugbo, Ụlọ Ọrụ Ụmụ Anụmanụ na Azụmaahịa ruo n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na tiketi National Resistance Movement iji nọchite anya Mukono South Constituency
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Njem, Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo mgbe a họpụtara ọfịs praịm minista dị ka Minista nke Ọrụ Nchịkọta

Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ugandan si kwuo, a na-edebanye aha Mukwaya na mmemme nzere masta site na mmụta dị anya, na-eduga na nzere masta nke sayensị na iwu ọha na eze na njikwa na Mahadum London
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Ugandan kọrọ na ọ gaghị agba oche ndị omeiwu ya na ntuli aka mba 2011
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, a kpọpụtara ya n'ịla ezumike nká, mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka okike, ọrụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ dị ka minista ọrụ nke oge nke abụọ, bụ ịmekọrịta nkwekọrịta ọrụ na alaeze Jọdan, ebe ndị Uganda na-akwaga mba ọzọ nwere ike ịchọ ọrụ na ala ọma jijiji ahụ
Jane Ruth Aceng (amụrụ na 11 Mee na afo 1968), bụ onye Uganda na-ahụ maka ụmụaka na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ Minista nke Ahụike na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June na afo 2016
Tupu nke ahụ, site na June 2011 ruo June na afo 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Director General of Medical Services na Ministry of Health nke Uganda
A mụrụ Aceng na 11 Mee na afo 1968
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Shimoni na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nabisunsa Girls Secondary School maka agụmakwụkwọ ya na nke Advanced Level
O nwere Bachelor of Medicine na Bachelor of Surgery, Master of Medicine na Pediatrics, na Master of Public Health, niile sitere na Makerere University College of Health Sciences
O nwekwara diplọma na Health Systems Management nke Galilee International Management Institute nyere, na Israel
Aceng malitere ije ozi dị ka onye ọrụ ahụike na ngalaba ahụike
N'oge a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi nchịkwa nke ọrụ ahụike, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịk nke Lira Regional Referral Hospital
Aceng bụ onye otu ndị nduzi nke Infectious Diseases Institute
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu bọọdụ nke Uganda National Medical Stores, ngalaba na-ahụ maka ịzụta ọgwụ na nkesa nke ngalaba ahụike, site na afo 2005 ruo na afo 2016
N'ọnwa Julaị na afo 2020, Dr Jane Ruth Aceng kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịzọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka mpaghara Lira, na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu (na afo 2021 ruo na afo 2026)
Ọ na-ezube ịgba ọsọ na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2014, mgbanwe atọ dị na usoro ahụike mba malitere ịbịakọta na ọkwa nke nsogbu
N'ihi ya, a na-emegide ụlọ ọrụ ahụike megide ndị SHO na-enweghị ụgwọ ọ bụla na ndị na-arụ ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ na-adịghị mma na nke a na-akwụghị ụgwọ

Na mgbalị iji chekwaa ego, Aceng dị ka onye ozi boro ụfọdụ mahadum ebubo na ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọtụtụ ndị dọkịta na-adịghị mma, ọ bụ ezie na ma ndị Uganda Medical and Dental Practitioners Council (UMDPC) na East African Community Medical and Dent Practitioner Boards and Councils ekwenyeghị na ya
Ndị a bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị iwu kwadoro na East African Community nke a na-enye iwu ka ha debe ụkpụrụ nke ọzụzụ ahụike na ezé na ikike dọkịta na ezé
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, ma eleghị anya, ihe kachasị arụmụka n'ime atụmatụ Aceng's bụ ihe ọhụrụ a chọrọ na ndị na-arụ ọrụ na-ewere ule mba ọhụrụ, tupu ngalaba ahụike enwee ike inye ha oghere ọzụzụ
Nke a agabeghị nke ọma na klas 2016/2017, na-akpali ikpe nke na-agafe usoro iwu
Aceng esonyewo ma bipụta ya n'ọtụtụ ebe n'ọhịa ọgwụ na ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya dị n'okpuru ebe a
Jane Alexander (amụrụ n'afọ 1959) bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà a ma àmá na South Africa
Ọ bụ nwanyị na-ese ihe nkè a maara nke ọma màkà ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, The Butcher Boys
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ, photomontages, foto na vidiyo
Alexander nwere mmasị n'omume mmadụ, esemokwu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, ncheta ọdịbendị nke mmegbu na enweghị ntinye aka zuru ụwa ọnụ n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọrụ Alexander dị mkpà ma na ọnọdụ ọha na eze nke ugbu a na South Africa na mbá ofesi
A mụrụ Alexander na Johannesburg, South Africa, n'afọ 1959
Ọ tolitere n'oge oke agbụrụ South Africa na mbido afọ 1980

N'ịbụ ónyé tolitere n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa, a chebere Alexander pụọ na ndị uwe ojii na ímè ihe ike n'okporo ámá n'oge ahụ rụọ mgbè ọ kwagara Braamfotein, South Africa iji nọrọ nso na mahadum ya
A na-akpọ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'asụsụ Afrikaans nke pụtara ịkpa ókè - bụ usoro nke ịkpa ókè ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị na South Africa nke dịruru site na 1948-1994
Iwu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ mepụtara ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị iche iche dabere na ụcha akpụkpọ ahụ mmadụ
A gụnyere ntụziaka nka na usoro mmụta màkà ndị ọcha, mana ọ bụghị màkà ndị isi ojii ma ọ bụ ndị India
N'afọ 1959, iwu nyere iwu na ọ bụ naanị ndị ọcha nwere ike ịnata ọzụzụ nka dị mma na mahadum ma ọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ teknụzụ
Na ngwụcha afọ 1970, nka ga-ahọrọ ilekwasị anya n'ụdị karịa ọdịnaya ma ọ bụ lụso ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọgụ site na nka
Site na 1985-1989 n'oge Ọchịchị Mberede, ndị na-ese ihe na-acha ọcha dị ka Alexander nwéré nnwere onwé ka ukwuu iji maa ịkpa ókè agbụrụ aka ma mee ka ụwa ndị ọzọ màrà site na nka ha
N'ịbụ ndị ime ihe ike nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ mebiri, ihe ndị Alexander na-enwekarị isiokwu ndị na-emegide onwé ha nke mmasị na iwe, mmadụ na anụmanụ na Grotesque ma ọ bụ ndị na-adịghị ike
Enwere ike ịhụ ụmụ mmadụ na ụmụ anụmanụ n'ọrụ ya dị ka ọdịdị obi ọjọọ nke ọha mmadụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọdịiche dị n'ọrụ Alexander n'etiti onye a na-emegbu na ndị na-emeso ya, ónyé mmegbu na ndị a na-emegide emegbu dọrọ anya

Ụdị ngwakọta ya na-atụ aro ka a na-eme ka ihe ike dị égwù dị ka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ikike nke ndị nkịtị ịghọ ndị na-eme ihe ike obi ọjọọ mgbè ha na-eme akụkụ nke otu nwere atụmatụ mmegbu na ime ihe ike
Ihe omuma ndi a abughi ihe na-emenye anyị egwu n'ihi na ha abughi mmadu, kama, n'ihi ne ha bu mmadu
Ọrụ Alexander na-egosikwa ikike màkà ịnagide mmadụ, ike na ùgwù n'ihu ime ihe ike, ihe isi ike, na mmegbu, yana enweghị nchebe, na egwu nke ndị nọ n'ọkwá ike
Ụmụ mmadụ-anụmanụ ya na-eziga ịdọ aka ná ntị banyere ihe akụkọ ihe mere eme ga-esi pụta ma gosipụta ọdịnihu nwere ike ime
Ọrụ ya na-egosi ndị na-akwado ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'emeghị ka ozi ya doo anya, ọ naghịkwa eji ihe ngosi dị ka ọkọlọtọ, mkpọsa ma ọ bụ ihe ngosi mgbasa ozi

N'oge ọ na-enweta nzere masta n'afọ 1985 na 1986, Alexander mepụtara otu n'ime ihe osise ya a ma ama; The Butcher Boys The Butcher Boys bụ ihe a kpụrụ akpụ nke ụmụ nwoke atọ nwere ọdịdị dị egwu nke e ji plaster mee, ha niile nọ ọdụ n'elu bench
Akụkụ ahụ na-ekwu maka mmekọahụ anụmanụ na mmetụta na-emebi mmadụ nke ime ihe ike n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Africa
N'otu edemede dị na New York Times, Holland Cotter kọwara na 'ahụ ha, nke na-acha ọcha ma nwee uru ahụ, màrà mmá, mana ha nwèrè eriri na-aga site na nkwonkwo rụọ n'olu, na-enye nsogbụ'
Ahịrị a nke Cotter na-akọwa bụ akara gbárá ọchịchịrị nke na-egosi na ewepụla akpịrị nke ga-eme ka ónyé ọ bụla ghara ikwu okwu
Akụkụ ahụ gụnyere ọkpụkpụ azụ a kpughere yana mpi dị iche iche na onyinyo ọ bụla, nke niile sitere na anụmanụ
Akụkụ ahụ nwèrè otu n'ime nkwanye ùgwù kachasị na South African National Gallery
N'ịbụ nkè e kere na 1998, Bom Boys nwèrè ọtụtụ obere, guzo ọtọ, ndị nwéré akpụkpọ anụ na-acha ntụ ntụ
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na-eyi uwe ụfọdụ na ndị ọzọ gba ọtọ, ónyé ọ bụla na-eyi ihe nkpuchi ma ọ bụ ihe mkpuchi anya
Ha niile na-ele anya n'akụkụ dị iche iche na-atụ aro ikewapụ onwé ha na ịgbahapụ
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị dị na mpempe akwụkwọ a na-ezo aka na adịghị ike nke ụmụaka ndị a chụpụrụ na Cape Town, nke ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya hụrụ mgbè ọ bi n'ebe ahụ
Ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma ọ bụrụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ahụ bụ ndị na-eri anụ, ma ọ bụ ndị a na-eri
Jane Ayiyem (amụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
O sonyere Ghana na afo 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations, na-egwu egwuregwu atọ

N'afọ 2012, 2013, 2014 Ghana Sports Writers Association of Ghana 'SWAG' Awards, Jane Ayieyam meriri onye egwuregwu bọọlụ kachasị mma n'afọ nakwa n'afọ 2012 nwanyị kacha gbaa bọọlụ na goolu iri na asatọ
Jane Bakaluba (amụrụ 1939 na Kampala, makwaara dị ka Jane Jägers ma ọ bụ Jaggers Bakaluba na Jane Kironde Bakaluba) bụ onye ode akwụkwọ akụkọ Uganda bi ugbu a na Canada
Ọrụ ya kacha mara amara bụ Honeymoon maka atọ nke East African Publishing House bipụtara na 1975 na usoro ha nke African Secondary Readers, nke ọ na-emegide ụmụ nwanyị ọdịnala na ndị ọdịda anyanwụ
Ọ bụ onye Baganda, ma na-asụ Luganda na Bekee
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na Kampala, ma mesịa kwaga Canada

Na Women's Literature in Kenya and Uganda The Trouble with Modernity na 2011, Kruger dere na 'Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1990, ọ bụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị Ugandan anọ na-ede akwụkwọ (Rose Mboya [ma eleghị anya ederede na-ezighi ezi nke Rose Mbowa], Elvania Zirimu, Jane Bakaluba na Barbara Kimenye) enwetala aha mba'
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri na anọ gụnyere na Oladele Taiwo's 1985 Female Novelists of Modern Africa, n'ime otu mmadụ isii 'a maara nke ọma maka otu akwụkwọ akụkọ ọ bụla'

Jane Burston bụ onye isi, onye nchịkọta na onye hibere Clean Air Fund, bụ otú na ahụ banyere enyemaka na ịkwụsị mmetọ ikuku nke ụwa nke ehibere na mgbe UN Secretari Jeneral mere mmemme nke ọgbakọ iru eluigwe na mba New York ya na ijeri dolas iri ise site na aka ndị enyemaka ego isi Na mgbe mbu, Jane bụ onye isi nke ike sitere n' ala na gburugburu ebe obibi nke obodo nke nlekọta ahụ ike ana ahụ anya
Onwuka Burston has strong ethical and environmental principles
She gave up meat when she was eleven, and as a student fought to eliminate plastic in her college canteen
Burston studied philosophy at the University of Cambridge, graduating with a first class degree in 2002
After graduating, Burston worked for a strategy consultancy for 4 years, before spending a year in Zambia running an NGO recycling computers and training teachers in IT
On returning to the UK she worked on climate policy for Transport for London and the Mayor of London's office
In 2008, Burston founded Carbon Retirement, a social enterprise that reformed emissions trading and carbon offsetting
Carbon Retirement put pressure on countries and companies to embrace clean technology, by allowing them to buy and use up credits
Carbon Retirement partnered with the New York Stock Exchange in September 2011
Burston joined the National Physical Laboratory in 2012, where she led a team of 150 scientists and engineers
At NPL, she founded the Centre for Carbon Measurement, looking at carbon markets, low carbon technologies and climate data
In 2015 she gave evidence at the House of Commons of the United Kingdom
In August 2017 Burston was seconded to the Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy as Deputy Director of Science for Climate and Energy
In June 2019, Burston founded and became Executive Director of the Clean Air Fund
Jane Burston became a Trustee of Parkinson's UK in 2019
In 2009 Burston was selected as a Climate Change Ambassador for the British Council
In 2011 Burston was named as one of Management Today's High Flying Women Under 35 and the Square Mile Social Entrepreneur of the Year
In 2012 Burston was selected as a World Economic Forum Young Global Leader
She won the 2012 Management Today Future Leaders Award
In 2015, she was named as one of the Top 20 Young People Globally by the International Chamber of Commerce and a Friends of Europe European Young Leader 40 under 40
In 2021, she was nominated by Christina Figueres as a WIRED changemaker of tomorrow

Burston was a member of the World Economic Forum Global Agenda Council for the Future of Real Estate and Urbanization, a member of the Global Future Council for Energy and she currently co-chairs the Global Future Council for Clean Air
She was instrumental in launching the first global corporate Alliance for Clean Air
Jane Burston has a strong track record of public engagement
She gave a TED talk in 2015 at the London School of Economics
That year she also spoke at X
She has spoken at the 2016, 2017 and 2018 and 2021 United Nations Climate Change conferences
Burston delivered a lecture at the Grantham Institute for Climate Change and the Environment in 2018
She has contributed to HuffPost, Carbon Brief and the World Economic Forum's Agenda
Jane Chemutai Goin bụ onye nta akụkọ akụkọ Kenya nke si Nandi County
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nta akụkọ telivishọn na Citizen TV Kenya Ebe ndị ọ na-amasị gụnyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a
Chemutai Goin anọwo na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi kemgbe afọ asatọ gara aga
Ọ na-egosipụta ihe ndị dị mkpa nke ịkọ akụkọ nke gụnyere ịkọ akụkọ, ịmepụta akụkọ na nkwukọrịta ederede maka nyocha
Chemutai sonyeere Capital FM dị ka onye nta akụkọ
Mgbe oge ụfọdụ gasịrị, ọ nwetara ọrụ na Media Max ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na K24 TV
Kemgbe Kenya dekọrọ ọrịa coronavirus mbụ ya, Chemutai anọwo na-ekwu okwu n'ịkọrọ akụkọ banyere COVID-19 na mmetụta ọ kpatara na mba ahụ

N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, Chemutai mere akụkọ akụkọ na Kiswahili na-agwa ọha na eze na ndị uwe ojii na-achọ ijide ndị gbapụrụ na nnọpụiche na Kenya Medical Training Institute na Nairobi
Ụfọdụ n'ime isiokwu ya gbasara ahụike gụnyere
Onyinye Onye isi ala Na 1 June afo 2020 (Madaraka Day), Chemutai so n'ime ndị nta akụkọ nyere otuto steeti n'inyere mba ahụ aka ma mee ka a mara banyere ọrịa coronavirus
Onye isi ala Uhuru Kenyatta nyere onyinye ahụ, nke a maara dị ka 'onyinye uzalendo' mgbe ọ na-agwa mba ahụ okwu
O kwetara na Chemutai so n'ime ndị nta akụkọ iri bụ ndị butere ụzọ ma gosipụta nnukwu mgbalị n'oge ọrịa COVID-19
Jane Egerton-Idehen bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Avanti Communications
na Nigeria ma burụkwa Direktọ na-ahụ maka azụmahia na West Afrika
Ọ sobụ n'otu ndi nnukwu ndi isi na Ericsson na Ghana na Liberia

O nwetara digiri nke injinia site na University of Nigeria, Nsukka,nakwa digiri nke MBA site na Warwick Business School ọzọ kwa o nwetara digiri nke akpọrọ executive education site na Harvard Business Schoo
E dere aha ya dika otu n' ime # 50LeadingLadiesinCorporateNigeria n'afọ 2019

Ọ so n'otu ndi bidoro otu IEEE Women in Engineering (WIE) na Nigeria, Nke a bụ otu na-ahụ ma na-achịkọta ụmụ nwaanyị bụ injinia na ndị gụrụ sayensị nakwa inyere ụmụ aka na-eto eto iji hụ na ha gbasoro agụ akwụkwọ iji bụ injinia
Dika anyi kwuru na mbụ Egerton-Idehen nwetara nzere digiri Bachelor of Engineering na Electronic engineering site University of Nigeria, Nsukka n'afọ 2001
Ọ gara Mahadu Havard di na Warwick ebe ọ gụrụ maka ka esi azụ ahia, akpata ego n'afọ 2007 wee nwet nzere nke MBA n'afọ 2010
O nwetakwara nzere digiri ọzọ nke Education site n'otu ụlọ akwukwọ Havard ahụ
Egerton-Idehen bidoro ọrụ ya dị ka Injinia nguzo ụwa akpọrọ 'Earth Station Engineer n'ụlọ ọrụ Spar Aerospace Limited di na Lagos, Nigeria ozugbo ọ gụchara Mahadum
Ọ gara ụlọ ọrụ Ericsson,dị na Nigeria be ọ rụrụ dika Manaja na-ahụ maka mmepụta ngwaahịa n'afọ 2003 wee gba maka nchekwa ego azumahia ụlọ ọru a bido n'afọ 2008 ruo 2010

Ọ were ọkwa dika onye isi na-ahụ maka mmekọrita ụlọ ọru MTN Nigeria nakwa ndị na-azụ ya ahia tumadị Nokia Siemensn'afọ 2010 wee ruo 2012 mgbe ọ laghachiriazụ na Ericsson dị ka nnukwu onye isi nke na-ahụ maka ego Ericsson nke Ghana na Liberia ji azụkọrita ahia site n'afọ 2013 ruo 2017 tuppu ọ laghachite azụ na Nigeria dika onye isi na anọchịte anya ndi Avanti Communications na Nigeria
Egerton-Idehen alụọla di ma mụta ụmụ abụọ, Otu nwoke na otu nwaanyị

Jane Frances Kuka bụ onye nkuzi Ugandan, onye na-emegide Female Genital Mutilation (FGM), onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbu onye omeiwu maka Kapchorwa na omeiwu nke isii nke Uganda (1996 - 2001) ma jiri Gertrude Kulany dochie ya

Ọ bụ Minista nke Steeti maka Mmekọahụ na Mmepe site na 1996 ruo 1998, Minista nke steeti maka Nkwadebe Ọdachi na 1999 ma mesịa họpụta Kọmishọna Mpaghara nke Kapchorwa District na 2007 na-anọchi Tezira Jamwa
A mụrụ Kuka Jane Frances Yasiwa na Sipi, Kapchorwa na Miriam Chelangat na 1950s
Ọ gara Gamutui Primary School ma mesịa na 1966 debanye aha na Nyondo Teachers College na Mbale
Ọ ruru eru dị ka onye nkuzi n'afọ 1969
Ọ gara n'ihu na Ggaba Teachers College wee ghọọ onye nkuzi nke atọ
Kuka bụ onye nkuzi egwu na Gamutui Primary School na 1969
N'afọ 1988, e buliri ya n'ọkwa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Kapchorwa Teachers Pob College
Kuka gbalịrị ịzọ ọkwa onye omeiwu na ntuli aka 1989 yana ntuli aka ndị omeiwu na 1994
E mechara họpụta ya dị ka nwanyị omebe iwu ma nọchite anya Kapchorwa na omebe iwu nke isii nke Uganda
Na mgbakwunye na ịbụ onye omeiwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Mmekọahụ na Mmepe Obodo (1996 -1998)
N'afọ 1999, a kpọfere ya ma họpụta ya dị ka Minista Steeti maka Nkwadebe Ọdachi na Ndị Gbara Ọsọ Ndụ
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo nke Kapchorwa district ma họpụta ya ọzọ n'otu ọkwa ahụ n'afọ 2014
N'etiti, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke onye isi ala
Dị ka onye isi nke Kapchorwa Teachers College na 1988, Kuka lanarịrị lynching ka ọ na-emegide mkpebi nke Kapchorona District Council nke mere ka Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) bụrụ iwu
Kuka n'onwe ya na-ezo aka na ya dị ka 'Female Genital Cutting' ka ọ na-ekwu na okwu ahụ bụ 'Female genital Mutilation na-ada ụda nke ukwuu ma na-akwalite nchebe dị ukwuu'
A na-akpọ ya 'Heroine of the Female Genital Mutilation fight' ma kwuo okwu banyere isiokwu ahụ n'ọtụtụ nyiwe mba ụwa
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ na abụọ , Kuka natara ihe nrite ndị nkịtị - The Distinguished Order of the Nile Class 4 iji kwado ọrụ ya megide Female Genital Mutilation
N'ịkwado ọgụ ya megide Female Genital Mutilation (FGM), e nyere Kuka ihe nrite Tumaini Lifetime Achievement na 2013
Jane Furst (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Julaị 1944) bụ ónyé England na-ese ihe n'oge a
Ọrụ ya na-adabere na mmasị na ndị na-ese ihe site n'oge gárá àga, dịka Northern Renaissance, ónyé ọ na-agbaziri ihe oyiyi, yana ọmụmụ nke ọdịdị okike
O meela ọtụtụ etchings na Mezzotints sitere na eserese na lithographs nkè Ernst Haeckel
O nwéré mmasị igosi ịdị ukwuu nke obere , dị ka microscopic Radiolarian nkè Haeckel chọpụtara
[citation needed]
Otu n'ime akwụkwọ nka nkè Furst na nwa ya nwanyị bipụtara n'okpuru ákàrà Furst & King bụ màkà di ya nwụrụ anwụ áhà ya bụ Michael Copus, Museum Artist
A na-edebe ọrụ Furst na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nkè Victoria na Albert Museum na Wellcome Collection
mkpịsị aka ukwu nke ndị agha nke abalị, 2012
Knut, Sky Goddess, 2016 monotype etching
Marine Machine
Jane Manganye bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu South African National Assembly kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019, na n'oge gara aga site na Mee 2009 ruo Mee, na afọ 2014
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke North West Provincial Legislature site na Mee, na afọ 2014 ruo Mee, na afọ 2019
Manganye bụ onye otu African National Congress
Onye otu African National Congress, a họpụtara Manganye ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba na ntuli aka nke afọ 2009
N'oge mbụ ya, ọ bụ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Water Affairs and Environmental Affairs; Ad Hoc Committee on Coordinated Oversight on Service Delivery; na Portfolio Committee for Tourism
Ọfịs ndị omeiwu ya dị na Rustenburg
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke African National Congress Women's League
A họpụtara Manganje ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu North West Provincial na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014
Mgbe ndị omeiwu zukọrọ ọzọ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote ọkà okwu
Ọzọkwa n'afọ 2014, ndị isi ANC nke mpaghara ahụ tụrụ anya na ọ ga-eme mkpọsa maka Bathabile Dlamini ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala nke ụmụ nwanyị
Kama nke ahụ, Manganye mere mkpọsa maka Angie Motshekga nọ n'ọkwa, nke mere ka ewepụ ya dị ka onyeisi oche nke asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke mpaghara ahụ
N'ọnwa Disemba, na afọ 2017, ndị isi mpaghara ANC yiri egwu ịkpọghachi ya n'ọkwa osote ọkà okwu, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ kwụsịrị
Manganye kwuru na a na-achụpụ ya n'ihi nkwado ya maka onye osote onye isi ala nke ANC Cyril Ramaphosa
Alaka ANC nke mpaghara ahụ 'n'ụzọ dị ukwuu' kwadoro mkpọsa Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma
Ndị isi mpaghara gọnahụrụ ebubo ya
Ọ nọgidere na-abụ osote ọkà okwu ruo na njedebe nke oge
Manganye laghachiri na National Assembly mgbe ntuli aka afọ 2019 gasịrị
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a na Kọmitii Portfolio na Social Development
Jane Munene-Murago bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Kenya,ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ gụrụ ihe gbasara ihe nkiri na Kenya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe nkiri ya abụrụ̀la akwụkwọ akụkọ edeturu edetu, nke ụlọ ọrụ ya CineArts mepụtara, n'okwu metụtara ụmụ nwanyị
Na 1976 Munene gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị bụ Kenya Institute of Mass Communication (KIMC), ma bụrụ naanị nwanyị n'ime afọ mbụ nke KIMC nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Tender One (1979), bụ Na nkwado nke United Nations dịka akụkụ nke ụmụ ntakịrị International Year of the Child

Unbroken Spirit (2011) bụ ihe osise nke Monica Wangu Wamwere, nne nke onye na-akwado ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ Koigi wa Wamwere, bụ onye so na Wangari Maathai na 1992 abụ̀ba ọrụ ndi Nne Nne ka ahapụ ndị mkpọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kpatara
E gosiri ihe nkiri a na New York African Film Festival Na 2012
Jane Murago-Munene bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke National Film Association Kenya
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke FEPACI
Jane Nabulindo Kwoba (amụrụ na ụbọchị nke atọ ọnwa June 1976) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye nkuzi site na ọrụ na onye omeiwu
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị bi na Busia District dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda

Ọ bụ onye omeiwu nwere onwe ya, ọ banyere na omeiwu mgbe o meriri onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara karamoja na onye otu National Resistance Movement Barbara Nekesa Oundo onye na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nnọchi anya na South Africa
Hellen Auma Wandera meriri ya na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke 2021-2026

Jane malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya site na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarịa Elgon View ebe ọ nọrọ n'ule ịhapụ praịmarik ya bụ(PLE) n'afọ 1988, O mechara banye na Masaba College maka agụmakwụkwọ O'level ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) n'ọnwa 1991

O mechara sonye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Makerere Greg center ebe ọ nọrọ na Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) n'afọ 1995, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ sonyeere National Teacher college Nagongera ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ 1997
O mechara sonye na Mahadum Kyambogo ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ nke Arts na Education
Jane jere ozi dị ka ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara ahụike ma bo ya ebubo na ọ na-akwado mmekọrịta ndị na-enye onyinye maka Compassion International site na 2002 ruo 2012
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ HIV / AIDS maka ndị na-ahụ maka njem na ndị ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ (ATGWU) Uganda site na 2013 ruo 2016
Ọ bụkwa onye ndú otu ụmụ nwanyị na Eastern African sub-regional support initiative maka ọganihu nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị (EASSI-WOGE) site na 2013 ruo 2016
Site na pụkụ abụọ na iri na isii ruo taa, Jane Nabulindo Kwoba bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Na nzuko omeiwu ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii na HIV / AIDS na ọrịa ndị metụtara ya
Jane bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)
Ọ na-akwado maka ịkwụ ụgwọ ziri ezi na nke ezi uche dị na ya maka ezinụlọ ndị nọ n'ógbè ya nke ọrụ nrụpụta ọla edo nke ndị China ga-emetụta
Jane Pilgrim bụ onye nhazi otu ndị ọrụ oge niile nke Bekee na-arụ ọrụ na National Health Service maka UNISON
Ọ batara n'ihu ọha na 2011 ka ọ katọchara amụma ahụike gọọmentị
Ndị ọrụ otu ndị ọrụ na-akwụ ụtụ isi oge niile bụ ndị amara aha ha dị ka 'Ndị pilgrim', na-ewebata Motion Early Day na House of Commons na-akatọ omume ndị dị otú ahụ
David Morris MP welitere okwu ahụ na odeakwụkwọ ahụike, ebe Alok Sharma MP jụrụ ajụjụ Prime Minista

David Cameron zara na 'Ọ dị mma ọrụ ma ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ike nweta ya!'Sharma ezipụla arịrịọ maka nnwere onwe ozi na ndị kansụl ime obodo niile ka ha kpughee ole 'ndị njem ala nsọ' na-arụ ọrụ na gọọmentị ime obodo, na nzaghachi na-egosi na ọ dịkarịa ala £ 35m na-emefu kwa afọ
Raesetja Jane Sithole bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Mpumalanga Provincial Legislature kemgbe Mee 2014
Sithole bụkwa onye isi mpaghara nke Mpumalanga Democratic Alliance
Sithole nwetara nzere BA na Communications na Mahadum nke South Africa
Sithole nwekwara National Diploma (T3) na Office Administration site na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Tshwane
O nwetakwara diplọma na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọchịchị site na Wits School of Governance
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta Post Graduate Diploma na Political Leadership and Governance site na Wits School of Governance
Sithole nwetakwara asambodo Management Development Programme (MDP) site na Graduate School of Management na Mahadum Pretoria
O nwetakwara asambodo Senior Management Programme (SMP) site na Graduate School of Management na Mahadum Pretoria
Sithole sonyeere Democratic Alliance, nke a maara dị ka Democratic Party, na 1999
Sithole jere ozi dị ka onye kansụl nke Emalahleni Local Municipality na Nkangala District Municipality site na 2000 ruo 2014
Sithole jere ozi dị ka Chief Whip nke Emalahleni Caucas site na 2007 ruo 2014
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Mpumalanga Provincial na 2014 ma họpụta ya ka ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa Chief Whip nke Democratic Alliance caucus
Na ndị omeiwu nke ise nke mpaghara (2014X2019) ọ nọdụrụ na kọmitii ọrụ ọha na eze na njem, nchekwa obodo, nchekwa na mmekọrịta, ahụike, na mmepe ọha na eze
Ọ na-anọdụ ugbu a na kọmitii ahụike na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na agụmakwụkwọ, ọdịbendị, egwuregwu na ntụrụndụ
Tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi mpaghara, Sithole jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche mpaghara maka Association of Democratic Alliance Councillors (ADAC) site na 2005 ruo 2011
A họpụtara Sithole ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi mpaghara n'afọ 2012 ruo n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara Sithole ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke pati ahụ
A họpụtara Sithole n'enweghị onye na-emegide ya dị ka onye isi mpaghara nke Democratic Alliance na Mpumalanga na 3 Machị 2018, na-anọchi James Masango
Na 20 Septemba 2018, a mara ọkwa Sithole dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Democratic Alliance maka ntuli aka 2019
Na ntuli aka nke Mee 2019, Provincial Democratic Alliance tụfuru ọnọdụ mmegide ya na Economic Freedom Fighters, ọ bụ ezie na pati ahụ jisiri ike jide oche atọ ya niile na ndị omeiwu mpaghara
A họpụtara Sithole ọzọ n'enweghị onye na-emegide ya dị ka onye isi mpaghara n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020
Ọ kwadoro mkpọsa onye isi DA John Steenhuisen iji bụrụ onye ndú nke pati ahụ maka oge zuru ezu na Federal Congress nke pati ahụ

Jane Taylor (amụrụ 19 Eprel 1956) bụ onye odee South Africa, onye na-ede egwuregwu na agụmakwụkwọ
Ugbu a ọ na-ejide Andrew W
Mellon oche nke aesthetic tiori na Material Performance na Center for Humanities Research na Mahadum Western Cape na South Africa
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Laboratory of Kinetic Objects (LoKO), Center for theoretical and material exploration of the Subject/Object continuum
Ebe a na-etinye aka na nka arụmọrụ yana nyocha na nyocha ọgụgụ isi n'ime mmadụ na teknụzụ, Artificial Intelligence (AI) Amplification Intelligent (IA)

Ihe omume / nkuzi ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya 'Ne'er So Much the Ape' [nke na-ewere aha ya site n'okwu ochie Bekee, 'Adịghị enwe Ape dị ka mgbe ọ na-eyi akwa dọkịta'] na-enyocha nkọwa nke nchọpụta primate, agbụrụ
tiori, AI, na tiori arụmọrụ

Na 1987, ya na David Bunn kwadoro site na South Africa ( Mahadum Chicago Press ), akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke na-edekọ afọ nke Mberede na afọ iri ikpeazụ nke Apartheid na mba ahụ, site na foto ọhụrụ, eserese, akwụkwọ
Na 1994, ya na David Bunn chepụtara ihe ngosi 'Ntugharị' na Block Gallery, Mahadum Northwwest, Illinois
N'afọ 1996, ọ chịkọtara 'Ụdị Ụgha,' ihe ngosi na Cape Town Castle maka eziokwu na imezigharị
'Ụdị mmejọ' bụkwa, n'ụzọ sara mbara, usoro nzaghachi omenala nke ọ malitere iji dọta ndị na-ese ihe site na mba ụwa n'ime nyocha okwu na omume nke Eziokwu na Mkpekọrịta
Odewo banyere Jarry's Pere Ubu ma dekwara egwu egwu nke ' Ubu and the Truth Commission ' ya na onye na-ese ihe / onye nduzi William Kentridge na Handspring Puppet Company
N'afọ 2001, o dere libretto maka nkwupụta nke Zeno maka Kentridge na Handspring
Ọ deziela Handspring Puppet Company n'oge na-adịbeghị anya (Ndị mbipụta David Krut, 2009), ọmụmụ gbara ọkpụrụkpụ nke otu egwuregwu South Africa ama ama n'ụwa

Taylor bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Refiguring the Archive, mpịakọta nke nyochara ngalaba nke ọkụ ọkụ n'ime afọ iri gara aga (Kluwer Academic Press); na curated ihe ngosi, 'Holdings', nke na-etinye aka na ajụjụ nke uru, Archive na ebe nchekwa
Ọ natara ihe nrite Olive Schreiner a ma ama maka akụkọ ifo ọhụrụ maka nkịta ọhịa ya n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 2009, o bipụtara The Transplant Men, akwụkwọ akụkọ na-enyocha ndụ onye dọkịta na-awa obi South Africa, Chris Barnard
Ọ bụbu onye nleta nleta na Mahadum Chicago na Oxford na Cambridge Universities yana Rockefeller Fellow na Mahadum Emory, Atlanta
Ọ natala mkpakọrịta sitere na Mellon na Rockefeller, ma bụrụkwa Prọfesọ nleta na Oxford na na Cambridge
Site na 2000 ruo 2009, ọ bụ Skye oche nke Dramatic Arts na Mahadum Witwatersrand
Na Fall nke afọ 2011, ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ na Mahadum Northwwest
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ ọ bụ Prọfesọ nleta oge ụfọdụ na Mahadum Chicago

Onye ọkà mmụta Renaissance Stephen Greenblatt nyere Taylor ọrụ dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ede egwuregwu iri na abụọ ka ha mee nsụgharị nke 'Cardenio', egwuregwu a na-ebo ebubo na Shakespeare dere na mbụ, na nke ahụ furu efu na-ahapụ ihe ọ bụla ma ọ bụghị aha ọrụ ahụ
Mmepụta ya, 'Mgbe Cardenio' meghere na Cape Town na August 2011
Ọ bụ ọrụ nke ụlọ ihe nkiri avant garde, nke na-arụ ọrụ na nwa nkịta vellum nke onye na-ese ihe South Africa bụ Gavin Younge mere
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ maka dOCUMENTA 2012
Ya na onye medievalist David Nirenberg gbanwere usoro akwụkwọ ozi dịka otu n'ime akwụkwọ ndetu ebipụtara (online na www3documentade/uploads/tx_publications/103_Taylor-Nirenbergpdf) maka dOcumenta
Site na afọ 2013-2016, o jidere Wole Soyinka Chair of Theatre na Mahadum Leeds
N'afọ 2016, ọ na-eleta Avenali oche nke Humanities na Mahadum California, Berkeley
N'afọ 2017, o bipụtara Being Led By the Nose (Mahadum Chicago), ọmụmụ nke mmepụta ihe nkiri / onye isi William Kentridge nke Shostakovitch 's opera maka New York Metropolitan Opera
O nwere mmasị na-adịgide adịgide na History na Theory nke arụmọrụ nke ezi obi ma nyochaa ajụjụ a gbasara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke arụmọrụ, iwu, na nkà mmụta okpukpe
Jane Wanjuki Njiru bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Embu County na onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị, otu Jubilee nke Kenya
Ọ gbara mpi ma merie ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị Embu na ntuli aka ọra nke afọ 2017
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mulango Girls maka asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Kenya na 1971 ruo 1974
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Kenya Management and Training Institute ebe ọ nwetara Advanced Diploma in management, Advance Diploma in Sale and Marketing and Diploma in Public Relations
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche ọhụrụ nke kọmitii nkwukọrịta, ozi na Innovation na ndị omeiwu
Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Ngalaba na-ahụ maka ala na mmejuputa iwu na 12th parliament
A họpụtara Njiru dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Embu County na 2017
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Chief Executive Officer na New day Motors Limited na 2006 ruo 2017 na 1979 ruo 2006 ọ bụ Sales and Marketing Associate na Telecom Kenya
Jane de Wet bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agba egwu na South Africa
De Wet si Somerset West, Western Cape
O bu ụzọ chọpụta ime nka dịka onye na-agba egwú na recital na De Hoop Primary School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Parel Vallei High School wee gaa n'ihu gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Communications na Management Sciences na Mahadum Stellenbosch n'afọ 2017
De Wet malitere ọrụ ya n'elu ikpo okwu ma a kpọọ ya onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 2012 ATKV Tienertoneelfees

N'afọ 2014, ọ meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ATKV Tienertoneelfees, onye na-ese ihe nkiri kacha mkpa na Durbanville Tienertoneelbees, nakwa onye na-ede ihe nkiri kacha kyau na Fraserburg Logan Toneelfees
De Wet gosipụtara dịka Alexis 'Lexi' Summerveld n'afọ 2019 Showmax mystery series The Girl from St
Agnes O mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ ahụ na obere ọrụ na Moffie na dịka Marthella Steencamp na Griekwastad

Maka nke ikpeazụ, ọ meriri Most Promising Young Talent kykNET Silver Screen Film Festival nke afọ 2020 ma nata nhọpụta maka Best Supporting Actress in a Feature Film na South African Film and Television Awards nke afọ 2021

N'afọ 2020, de Wet pụtara na usoro Vuzu Still Breathing yana ihe nkiri telivishọn Rage na Parable N'afọ 2021, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri kykNET & kie Spoorloos maka nke atọ ya, Steynhof dịka Adri von Tonder
Janet Amponsah (amụrụ na 12 ọnwa Eprel 1993) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na afo 2013 World Championships na-erughị eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ
O ritere ihe nrite na 4 × 100 mita relay na asọmpi Afrịka abụọ na 2010 Commonwealth Games
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-eburu ọkọlọtọ Ghana na emume mmeghe nke afo 2014 Commonwealth Games ma họpụta ya na afọ 2015 Ghanaian Female Athlete of the Year
Ọ hapụrụ afọ 2015 World Championships na China n'ihi nsogbu na visa ya
Na afọ 2016 Olympics, ọ sonyere na 200m na 4 × 100m relay events
Ọ bịara nke abụọ n'azụ Ivorian Marie Josee Ta Louat na afọ 2018 women's 100m final na African Senior Athletics Championships na Asaba, Nigeria
