Jara, nke eji kwa Jera were mara bu asụsụ Naịjịrị́a nke a kọrọ na mmadụ 46,000 na-asụ n'afọ 2000
A na-asụ ya na Borno na Gombe Steeti, na Biu, Kwaya-Kusar, Akko, na Yamaltu-Deba LGAs
Ọ bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic, na alaka Biu São Mandara nke ndị ezinụlọ Chadic
Asụsụ Jara na-ebelata; Fulfulde na Hausa bu nke a na asu ugbua
Jarawa (eji Jar, Jara, ma ọ bụ na Hausa Jaranci were mara) bụ asụsụ a kachasi mara nke ndị Bantu nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ụyọkọ asụsụ nwere ọtụtụ ụdị
Asụsụ Jarawa bụ ndị a
Kantana nwere ike bụrụ asụsụ dị iche
Blench (2019) depụtara ịhe ndị a dị ka olumba nke Jar (Jarawa)
Jarryd Coetsee (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Obere ihe nkiri ya, The Suit nwetara mmeri ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa
A mụrụ Coetsee na Pretoria ebe ọ gara Pretoria Boys High School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na ime ihe nkiri na South Africa na UK
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị na-elekọta Coetsenburg, otu n'ime ụlọ mmanya kachasị ochie na South Africa, nke e guzobere n'afọ 1682
Obere ihe nkiri ya, The Suit, meriri ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa gụnyere Best Short Film Award na 11th SAFTAs ma gosipụta ya na obodo 83 na obodo karịrị mba 20
Atọ n'ime emume ihe nkiri a họpụtara ya bụ Oscar qualifiers (Urbanworld Film Festival, Pan African Film Festival nakwa BronzeLens Film Festival)

Coetsee bụ naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Africa nke Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma họpụtara maka Les Nuits en maọbụ afọ 2017 (Golden Nights 2017) nke hụrụ ya ka ọ sonye na mmemme metụtara ihe nkiri na France, Italy na Gris, ma nata onyinye site n'aka UNESCO n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ya, World Heritage Centre, na Paris maka The Suit nke ahọpụtara dịka otu n'ime obere ihe nkiri iri atọ kachasị elu site na gburugburu ụwa
Jasmine Jamila Baroudi onye amụrụ n'abali iri na isii nke ọnwa Septemba ) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gụrụ Psychology na Mahadum nke Ghana ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ

E gosipụtara ya n'usoro ihe omume onyonyo Ghana ,bu Adam's Apples (2011 ruo 2012) ma soro ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Ghallywood na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka Majid Michel E mechara họpụta ya na ngalaba Nchọpụta Kachasị Mma na 2011 Ghana Movie Awards maka usoro TV a

N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri nke Mikki Osei-Berko duziri bu nke akpọrọ, Broken Mirror, nke gosipụtara Jackie Appiah, James Gardiner, Fred Amugi na Roselyn Ngissah, nke onye mmepụta ya bụDavid Owusu
N'agbata afọ 2014 na 2015, e gosipụtara ya dị ka Tilly Walsh na Shirley nduzi usoro ihe omume onyonyo nke Frimpong-Manso duziri, bụ V-Republic
ndị àmà ama ndị ọzọ gụnyere Nikki Samonas, Joselyn Dumas na Christabel Ekeh
A họpụtara ya na 2014 Ghana Movie Awards na Best TV Series Actress category, maka TV Series, Heart Break Hotel na TV3 Ghana
Ọ bụ onye mmeri na Best Supporting Actress - Drama category nke 2019 Golden Movie Awards (GMA)
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri, The Cell, n'otu afọ ahụ
E gosiputara ya na ihe nkiri 2019, A New Flame
Ndị Ghana egosipụtakwara gụnyere Richard Asante (Kalyboss) na Edinam Atatsi
Baroudi nyere ịdọ aka ná ntị siri ike nye ndị ikom ọ na-eyi egwu ikpọ'aha na imenye ihere' bụ ndị zitere ya foto nke ihe ha jiri bụrụ nwoke ha n'ịntanetị, na-ahụta nke dị ka omume nke mmegbu saiba

Graphic Showbizz mere mkpesa gbasara ya, na-ekwu na iji ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-enwebeghi ahụmahụ bụ ndị dị ọtụtụ na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ghara ito, na-atụ aro ka ndị na-emepụta ihe na-etinye naanị ndị ruru eru na ihuenyo
Ọ lụrụ Williams Ofori Atta
Jasmine Nwajei (ka a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1995) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Naijiria maka First Bank BC na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa
Ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na 2019 Women's Afrobasket
SourceÀtụ Switcher
Jason Cope (nke a maara dị ka Benoit Franc) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Ọ pụtara ma rụọ ọtụtụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri akụkọ sayensị nke a họpụtara na 2009 Academy Award District 9
N'afọ 2004, Cope rụrụ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche na oge nke abụọ nke ihe ngosi SABC1 The Pure Monate Show
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Howard Weaver na MNet miniseries Ella Blue
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Nathalie Blott gosipụtara aha nke miniseries ahụ, onye ga-aga n'ihu soro Cope na ihe nkiri District 9
Na ihe nkiri 2009 District 9, Cope gosipụtara ọtụtụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke gụnyere onye ala ọzọ Christopher Johnson, nke e kere kpamkpam site na CGI site na iji mmegharị Cope weghaara arụmọrụ
Usoro a na-emepụta onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri, na-enye ohere maka ihe ngosi na igwefoto gụnyere mmekọrịta ya na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri ahu
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ Grey Bradnam, otu n'ime ndị na-akọ akụkọ ihe nkiri ahụ, ma nye ọtụtụ ọrụ olu na ihe nkiri ahụ
N'otu ebe ehichapụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ, Cope mekwara ka dọkịta nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ gara, onye na-achọ ka e gbupụ aka ya n'ihi na ọ butere DNA
A na-egosi ihe nkiri ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke ihe nkiri DVD 'ihe ndị ọzọ'
N'afọ 2010 ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri South Africa Spud, ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri John Cleese
N'afọ 2012, Cope nwere obere ọrụ na DREDD 3D dị ka otu n'ime ndị omempụ e gburu n'oge usoro mmeghe nke ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Tetravaal Lead Mechanic na ihe nkiri sayensị na-atọ ọchị nke Neill Blomkamp bụ Chappie
Jason Moore (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1984 maọbụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Wikipedia nke America n'etiti ndị na-enye aka na Wikipedia nke Bekee site na ọnụ ọgụgụ nhazi

N'ịbụ onye na-edezi kemgbe afọ 2007 dị ka 'Onye kwere ekwe ọzọ', ọ bụ ọkachamara na ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a, na mkpuchi gụnyere ọrịa COVID-19, ngagharị iwe George Floyd, na ọdịbendị Portland, Oregon, ebe ọ nọ
Na Wikipedia, Moore mepụtara ma mepụta otu ndị nchịkọta akụkọ maka ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na isiokwu ndị a
Dị ka onye na-ahazi na mmegharị Wikimedia, Moore anabatala nzukọ na idezi-a-thons iji zụọ ndị nchịkọta ọhụrụ
Moore so n'ime ndị ndezi na-arụsi ọrụ ike site na nhazi ọnụ ọgụgụ na Wikipedia Bekee

N'ime ọkara nde edezi ya n'okpuru aha njirimara 'Another Believer' kemgbe afọ 2007, Moore emeela ọtụtụ puku peeji, gụnyere isiokwu gbasara ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a, ọdachi ndị na-emere onwe ha, na mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu
Ụfọdụ n'ime isiokwu ndị a gụnyere mwakpo United States Capitol nke afọ 2021, ịgba égbè Buffalo nke afọ 2022, na ịgba égbè Laguna Woods nke 2022
Na Wikipedia Bekee, Moore emeela ka ndị nchịkọta akụkọ ('WikiProjects') raara onwe ha nye imeziwanye mgbasa ozi Wikipedia banyere ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a dịka ọrịa COVID-19
N'oge COVID-19, o dere banyere ọganihu nke ọrịa a na-efe efe n'ọtụtụ steeti US, ngalaba azụmaahịa, na obodo
Ọ bụ onye isi na-enye aka na isiokwu gbasara ngagharị iwe na-esote ogbugbu George Floyd
Mgbe ọ malitere ịbanye na mwakpo nke United States Capitol nke afọ 2021, ya na ndị editọ ndị ọzọ duziri ntinye nke isiokwu ahụ nke ọdịnaya ọhụrụ ka ihe omume ahụ mepụtara n'oge
O dekwara banyere isiokwu dị na Portland, Oregon, dị ka mgbaaka ịnyịnya, roses, Yale Union Laundry Building, n'afọ 2011 Oregon Symphony recording Music for a Time of War
Isiokwu mbụ Moore gosipụtara bụ banyere 2007 album Rufus Does Judy na Carnegie Hall
Ọ kọwara na 'mmeri ozugbo nke ime ka Intanet dịkwuo mfe' na afọ ojuju nke 'ịkekọrịta ozi na ụwa
Azụmaahịa CNN kọwara Moore dị ka 'onye nwere mmetụta Wikipedia
Na mgbakwunye na idezi, Moore esonyewo n'iwulite usoro Wikimedia site na ịhazi nzukọ mpaghara na ịzụ ndị editọ ọhụrụ
Arụmarụ ndezi (edit-a-thon) nke afọ 2013 ya ọ haziri na Portland Art Museum kpọrọ ndị mmadụ ka ha jiri ihe onwunwe ụlọ ọrụ mee ihe iji melite mkpuchi nke ndị na-ese ihe, òtù nka, na nka ọha
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado ihe omume mpaghara Portland, ọkachasị iji melite mgbasa ozi Wikipedia banyere nka Portland na ndị inyom na-ese ihe
Moore enyekwara aka ịhazi otu LGBT-specific outreach affiliate nke Wikimedia Foundation na mkpọsa Wiki Loves Pride ya iji melite omenala LGBT na akụkọ ihe mere eme
A mụrụ Moore n'afọ 1984 maọbu 1985
A zụlitere ya na Houston, o nwere mmasị na akụkọ akwụkwọ na ọrụ sayensị dị ka nwa akwụkwọ
Ọ biri na Portland, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2022, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka atụmatụ dijitalụ ma rụọ ọrụ na ngalaba nchịkọta ego nke Oregon Symphony
Jason Chukwuma Njoku (amụrụ 11 Disemba 1980) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Britain na Naijiria Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke iROKOtv, ọrụ vidiyo na-achọ maka ihe nkiri Naijiria

Onye kwuputara onwe ya serial entrepreneur, iROKOtv bụ mbọ Njoku nke iri na otu n'ịmalite azụmaahịa O weputara echiche nke ibido usoro nkesa ọhụrụ maka Nollywood ka ya na nne ya, dị afọ 30 bi n'ụlọ, mgbe ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ dara ada

A mụrụ ma zụlite Jason na Deptford, South East London, nne ya zụlitere ya na ụmụnne ya nwanyị atọ na nwanne ya naanị ya, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ oge nile na National Health Service Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Lọndọn, wee kwaga n'otu obodo dị na Nigeria site na afọ 12 - 15

Mgbe ọ si Nigeria lọta, ọ gara kọleji iji mechaa A-Levels, tupu ọ nweta ohere na The University of Manchester ebe ọ gụrụ Chemistry Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005 na 2 1 wee malite Brash Magazine, akwụkwọ ụmụ akwụkwọ nke gbara afọ atọ tupu ya emechie na 2008

Mgbe ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ dara ada n'etiti 2005 na 2010, nke gụnyere netwọk blog, azụmahịa T-shirt na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta webụ, Njoku laghachiri n'ụlọ nne ya na Deptford Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka o wepụtara echiche nke ịmalite azụmahịa nkesa Nollywood n'ịntanetị, 'Ndị West nwere Hulu na Netflix - Africa enweghị ihe ọ bụla', Njoku kwuru N'ịbụ onye mụọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site n'ebe dị anya, ọ gbagara Lagos, n'ihi enyemaka ego nke ezigbo enyi ya Bastian Gotter, onye otu mahadum Manchester gụsịrị akwụkwọ, wee malite ịzụta akwụkwọ ikike ntanetị nke ihe nkiri Nollywood Ọ rụrụ ọrụ site na ọnụ ụlọ nwere ọnụ ụlọ abụọ na Festac, Lagos, wee soro YouTube na Germany nwee nkwekọrịta ka ọ bụrụ onye mmekọ ọwa maka ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood [Nnwale nke dara ada]

N'afọ 2010, Njoku na onye ya na ya na-emebu bụ Bastian Gotter malitere NollywoodLove, ọwa YouTube, bụ nke bara uru n'ime ọnwa abụọ nke mmalite N'otu afọ ahụ, ekele maka akụkọ Sarah Lacy bụ onye rụrụ ọrụ n'oge ahụ maka Tech Crunch, NollywoodLove dọtara uche nke isi ego ụlọ ọrụ na United States Tiger Global bụ ndị nwere mmasị n'ịgbasawanye ike ha na ahịa ndị na-apụta
E nwetara usoro ntinye ego nke nde $3 n'aka Tiger Global na 2010 ma ụlọ ọrụ ahụ weputara ikpo okwu ihe nkiri vidiyo na-achọ naanị, iROKOtv, na 1 Disemba 2011

Saịtị ahụ dọtara ndị na-ekiri si mba 178 gburugburu ụwa Njoku na Gotter aga n'ihu wepụta $22 nde ọzọ site na mba ụwa VC, gụnyere gụnyere Investment AB Kinnevik na RISE Capital ma jiri ego ahụ wuo nnukwu katalọgụ ihe nkiri nke ihe nkiri 5,000, malite ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, New York, na London ma tinye ego n'ịkwalite akụrụngwa teknụzụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Iroko agaala itinye ego ego ndi ozo ruru nde $40
N'afọ 2015, Njoku kpebiri ilekwasị anya ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ngwa mkpanaaka Android, karịa ikpo okwu mgbasa ozi iji luso nsogbu akụrụngwa brọdband ọgụ nke Africa na-ebute

Na Julaị 2012, Forbes Africa kpọtụrụ ya dị ka otu n'ime 'Ten Young African Millionaires to Watch' Na 29 Ọgọst 2013, akpọrọ Njoku ka CNBC All Africa Business Awards Young Leader of the Year for West Africa [Nkwado dara ada] Akpọrọla ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ngwa ngwa kacha elu 1000 Kasị keepụta ndị mmadụ na azụmaahịa

N'August 2013, ya na ndị mmekọ azụmahịa ya Bastian Gotter na Mary Remmy Njoku, Njoku weputara ụgbọ ntinye ego nde $2 maka mmalite ịntanetị dabere na Lagos akpọrọ Spark Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tinyere ego na ụlọ ọrụ 11 na mbụ, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ na-ekesa ihe ọṅụṅụ a na-akpọ Drinksng, ụlọ ọrụ na-enye ohere maka ụlọ na ihe onwunwe n'ịntanetị a na-akpọ ToLetcomng, na ebe ntinye akwụkwọ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, nke a na-akpọ Hotelsng, nke gara n'ihu iji nweta $12 nde na ntinye ego VC sitere na EchoVC Pan-Africa Fund na Omidyar Network Na 2015, Jason Njoku na post blọgụ kwupụtara ọkwa na ha na-ahapụ ụlọ ọrụ mmalite anọ a na-ewere na azụmaahịa dara ada Buscomng (ọrụ ntinye akwụkwọ ụgbọ ala n'ịntanetị), Insuredng (ihe atụnyere mkpuchi mkpuchi), Giddimintcom ng (ụlọ ahịa ejiji dị n'ịntanetị) na Christiansng, ikpo okwu mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwaanyị n'ịntanetị maka Ndị Kraịst
Jason Njoku lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na onye mmepụta Mary Remmy Njoku na Festac, Lagos, na 18 August 2012
Ha nabatara nwa mbụ ha, Jason Obinna Njoku, na 30 July 2013, nwa nke abụọ, Nwakaego Annabel Njoku, mụrụ na 24 August 2015 na nwa nke atọ, Nnenna Amber Njoku mụrụ na 4 August 2017

Javon Johnson bụ onye America na-ede abụ, onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na prọfesọ

Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Afrikan American and Afrikan agụmakwụkwọ nke ofesi na Ngalaba nke mmetụta dị iche iche, okike nwoke na nwanyị, na ọmụmụ nke omume na Mahadum Nevada, Las Vegas, na onye edemede nke Killing Poetry Blackness and the Making of Slam and Obodo ndị a na-ekwu okwu
A mụrụ Johnson ma zụlite ya na Los Angeles
A mụrụ ya na Septemba 15, 1968
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gụrụ ọrụ Amiri Baraka na Langston Hughes, nke kpaliri ya ide uri
Mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji na Mahadum California State, Los Angeles, Johnson meriri ebe mbụ na Nkọwa ihe nkiri n'afọ 2002 American Forensic Association National Individual Events Tournament O nwetara PhD
ya na Ọmụmụ arụmọrụ na Mahadum Northwestern site na edemede banyere 'agbụrụ, okike, na mmekọahụ na slam na obodo uri okwu'
Johnson apụtawo na HBO's Def Poetry Jam, BET's Lyric Café, TVOne's Verses & Flow, The Arsenio Hall Show, na The Steve Harvey Show
O dekwara ihe nkiri Showtime Crossover Ọ nọ na otu Da Poetry Lounge slam nke rụrụ na National Poetry Slam n'afọ 2003, 2004, 2005, 2007, 2008, 2011, 2012, na 2013, merie asọmpi NPS n'afọ 2003 na 2004
Na mmemme 2012 na Literary Death Match na Los Angeles, Henry Rollins katọrọ uri Johnson dị ka 'nke e wuru maka arụmọrụ'
N'otu afọ ahụ, Johnson rụrụ na Stockton Plea for Peace Center ya na ndị na-ede uri ibe ya anọ n'aha 'Blackson 5'
O nyekwara edemede banyere agbụrụ na mgbasa ozi a ma ama na ikpo okwu blọọgụ nke Huffington Post
N'afọ 2015, Johnson rụrụ na ememe nke anọ nke ọnwa Julaị na Grand Park na Los Angeles
Dị ka onye otu San Diego PoetrySLAM n'afọ 2017, Johnson weere ọnọdụ mbụ ọzọ na National Poetry Slam
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị PhD
Johnson rụrụ ọrụ dị ka USC Visions and Voices postdoctoral fellow na Ngalaba nke American Studies and Ethnicity na Mahadum nke Southern California

Johnson nọrọ afọ anọ dị ka osote prọfesọ nke ọmụmụ nkwukọrịta na Mahadum San Francisco Steeti tupu ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke African American na African Diaspora Studies na Ngalaba nke Interdisciplinary, Gender, na Ethnic Studies na Mahadum Nevada, Las Vegas
Nnyocha agụmakwụkwọ ya na-enyocha obodo uri na Los Angeles, na-egosi ọdịiche dị n'etiti ohere ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na ahụmịhe nke ọgụ na ihe ùgwù

N'afọ 2017 Rutgers University Press bipụtara akwụkwọ ya Killing Poetry Blackness and the Making of Slam and Spoken Word Communities, n'afọ 2018 ọ chịkọtara nchịkọta uri End of Chiraq A Literary Mixtape, nke Northwestern University Press bipụtara
Jawara bụ nsụgharị Bekee nke aha nna madu nke sitere na Manding (ntụgharị French bụ Diawara)
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere ndia
A mụrụ Tiss na Ghomrassen na Tataouine na 8 Julaị 1985
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ọmụmụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Tunis na 2007 na nzere masta na Bekee na Ecole Normale Supérieure na 2010

Tiss rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Higher Institute of Languages na Tunis ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu Mgbe ọ sonyechara na Ennahda Movement, a họpụtara ya na 23 Ọktoba 2011 dị ka onye otu Constituent Assembly
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị nta n'ime Nzukọ ahụ, na arụmụka banyere usoro iwu a tụrụ aro kwuru na ọ gaghị ekwe omume ịkọwa 'Islam' n'ụzọ zuru ezu
Mgbe a gafere iwu ahụ, o kwuru na ọ 'mepụtara mgbanwe na Tunisia' ma mgbe a jụrụ ya ma ọ ga-eme ka ndụ nwa ya nwanyị dị mma, o kwuru 'N'ezie, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị, ọ nwere ike ịgbanwe ya'
Tiss lụrụ di na 2012 ma mụọ nwa nwanyị na 2013, onye ọ na-eweta mgbe ụfọdụ na mgbakọ ahụ
Elpadaro F

Electronica Allah (amụrụ Timothy Elpadaro Thedford; ụbọchị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba, n'afọ 1976), nke a maara dịka Jay Electronica (nke a na-akpọ J A Y E L E C T R O N I C A), bụ onye America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
O bu ụzọ nweta nlebara anya na 2007, mgbe ewepụtara mixtape mbụ ya, Act I Eternal Sunshine (The Pledge)
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke mixtape a kpọtụrụ aha na otu egwu 'Exhibit C' mechara mee ka onye egwu America ibe ya bụ Jay-Z bịanye aka na Electronica na akara ndekọ ya, Roc Nation na 2010
E wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya, A Written Testimony na 2020 ma soro Act II The Patents of Nobility (The Turn) mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke ịkọ nkọ na igbu oge gasịrị
N'ike mmụọ nsọ LL Cool J, Jay Electronica malitere ịkụ egwu ógè ọ dị afọ iri
O tolitere na Magnolia Projects na New Orleans, Louisiana's 3rd Ward ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Katọlik nke ụmụ nwoke niile St
Augustine High School
Electronica hapụrụ New Orleans dị ka onye na-eto eto na ngwụsị afọ 1990 na ebumnuche ịkwaga New York City mana ọ kwụsịrị na Atlanta

Electronica nwere 'ihe ịrịba ama gburugburu na-akwụ ụgwọ ugbu a màkà Olimpik' Na Atlanta, ọ nabatara ozizi Elijah Muhammad site na Five-Percent Nation tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ịghọ onye debanyere aha na Nation of Islam n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Chicago
N'afọ 2007, Jay Electronica wepụtara mixtape izizi ya, Act I Eternal Sunshine (The Pledge), site na MySpace
Ebudatara ya ihe karịrị ugboro puku iri ise
Ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ na katalọgụ ya mere ka Electronica sonye na Rock the Bells Tour n'afọ 2008
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, onye na-emepụta Just Blaze na Jay Electronica họọrọ egwu n'ihe banyere ọrụ GAIN nke Guitar Center, Fresh Cuts Vol
3 ma tinye egwu (nke a na-akpọghị aha ya na mbụ) nke Just Blaze kpọrọ 'Exhibit A (Transformations)'

Just Blaze ga-emesị (ọnwa Ọctoba ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa, n'afọ 2009) malite 'Exhibit C' na Tony Touch's Sirius Radio program, ebe ọ jidere ngwa ngwa, na-aga n'ụlọ ọrụ redio dị n'elu ala dị ka New York's Hot 97 na-emepụta remixes site na MCs AZ, NORE, Saigon, Joell Ortiz na ndị ọzọ
Agha ịgba akwụkwọ sochiri Jay mechara bịanye aka (ọnwa Nọvemba n'ubochí irí na abụọ, n'afọ 2010) na Roc Nation
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị na-akwado ya na ndị nkatọ na-atụ anya mmalite zuru oke, mmepụta nke Electronica n'ime afọ iri sochirinụ nwere ụfọdụ mmekorita na abụ ndị na-abụghị album
N'ọnwa Febụwarị úbọchị asaá, n'afọ 2020, Jay Electronica kwupụtara site na Twitter mmecha nke abọm ya, A Written Testimony, nke e dekọrọ n'ime ụbọchị iri anọ
E wepụtara ya na March 13, 2020

N'ọnwa Ọktọba ụbọchị ịse, n'afọ 2020, Jay Electronica kwupụtara site na Twitter na abọm ya a na-ebutebeghị, Act II The Patents of Nobility (The Turn), dị maka mgbasa ozi na Tidal mgbe abọm ahụ pụtara n'ịntanetị ụbọchị abụọ tupu
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021, e gosipụtara Jay Electronica na egwu 'Jesus Lord' nke ewepụtara na abọm Kanye West bụ Donda
Jay Electronica na Erykah Badu nwere mmekọrịta ruo afọ ise ma nwee nwa nwanyị, a mụrụ n'afọ 2009
Jay Electronica na Kate Emma Rothschild, nwunye Benjamin Goldsmith, nwere mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị, nke butere ka alụmdi na nwunye Goldsmith daa

Jayaseelan 'Jay' Naidoo (amụrụ na 1954) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Congress of South African Trade Unions (COSATU) site na 1985 ruo 1993
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka
Mmemme nwughari na mmepeaanọR
na kọmitii mbụ nke President Nelson Mandela (1994X) na dị Ka Minisita nke Biputere, nkwukọrịta na mgbasa ozi 1996X1999)
Naidoo bụ onye otu NEC nke African National Congress
Ọ nọ n'ihu n'ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na-eduga otu ndị ọrụ aka kachasị ukwuu na South Africa

A mụrụ ya na 1954, Naidoo debanyere aha na Mahadum nke Durban-Westville iji mụọ maka nzere Bachelor of Science (BSc) na ịchụso ọrụ ahụike na 1975 ka ọ bụrụ dọkịta ma ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge ahụ kwụsịrị ọmụmụ ya n'ihi nnupụisi ụmụ akwụkwọ
Naidoo ghọrọ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nzukọ ụmụ akwụkwọ South Africa (SASO) nke amachibidoro na 1977 ka e gbuchara onye ndu Steve Biko na njide ndị uwe ojii
Ọ ghọrọ obodo dabere Onye nhazi na-arụ ọrụ na ntọala obodo
O sonyeere otu ndị otu ndị ọrụ na South Africa dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo na 1979
E mechara họpụta Naidoo ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke sweet, food Na allied staff Union (SFAWU)
N'ime ikike a, o duuru nnukwu iku mba ahụ nwere ihe ruru nde 35 ndị ​​sonyere na 1991, na-emebi ụlọ ọrụ na azụmaahịa n'ofe ndịda
Africa na ịhapụ ndị mmadụ na-enweghị ọrụ nke ndị ọrụ ojii na-enye
(SASO) nke a machibidoro iwu na 1977 ozugbo e gburu onye ndú ya Steve Biko n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ndị uwe ojii
Mgbe ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahazi obodo na ụlọ ọrụ obodo
Ọ sonyeere Federation of South African Trade Unions dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo na 1979
E mechara họpụta Naidoo ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Sweet, Food and Allied Workers' Union (SFAWU)

N'ọrụ a, ọ duziri ọgbaghara kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ na ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 35 sonyere na 1991, na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na azụmaahịa dị iche iche na South Africa ghara ịrụ ọrụ ma na'ahapụ ndị mmadụ na ndị ọrụ ojii na
N'afọ 1995, Naidoo jere ozi na kọmitii nhọpụta nke Onye isi ala Mandela họpụtara iji gbaa ajụjụ ọnụ ma depụta ndị ga-anọchite anya Kọmiti Eziokwu na Mmekọrịta nke South Africa

Site na 2002 ruo 2015, Naidoo bụ onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi na onye nduze nke Partnership Council nke Global Alliance for Improved Nutrition (GAIN) nke nwere isi na Geneva ma malite na Summit UN nke 2002 na Children dị ka mmekọrịta ọha na eze iji dozie nsogbu nri na-edozi ahụ na ijeri mmadụ 2 n'ụwa
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ngalaba mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke ụlọ ọrụ itinye ego na njikwa, J&J Group, nke o guzobere na 2000 na South Africa
Site na 2001 ruo 2010, Naidoo jere ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke Ụlọ Akụ̀ Mmepe nke Southern Africa (DBSA), ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ego kachasị na-akwọ akụrụngwa na mpaghara SADC
N'afọ 2010, a kọrọ na Naidoo rere otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ nke òkè ya na J&J Group ma nye onyinye ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ebere abụọ a na-akpọghị aha
O bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya, nke a na-akpọ 'Fighting for Justice' ma bipụta akwụkwọ ya
Gbanweenhazi echi, taa' C
N'afọ 2013, na arịrịọ nke Minista Mmepe nke France, Pascal Canfin, Naidoo so dee akụkọ (ya na Emmanuel Faber) banyere mgbanwe nke Official Development Assistance
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ duziri nyocha mba ụwa banyere mmebi ikike ọrụ na Swaziland, ya na Alec Muchadehama, Paul Verryn na Nomthetho Simelane

N'ihi ihe ndị ọ rụzuru, Naidoo enwetala ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ, gụnyere ịghọ Chevalier de la Légion d'Honneur (Legion of Honour), otu n'ime ihe ịchọ mma kachasị elu na France, ma nata onyinye nke osimiri maka mgbanwe site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Southern African Trust and Mail & Guardian n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2010

Ihe nrite ya kachasị ọhụrụ gụnyere Ellen Kuzwayo Award site na Mahadum Johannesburg, na Nọvemba 2012, yana nzere doctorate nke teknụzụ na injinia na gburugburu ebe obibi sitere na Durban University of Technology, nke enyere na Septemba 2013
Jay Naidoo lụrụ Lucie Pagé, onye edemede na onye nta akụkọ French-Canadian na-enweta ihe nrite, ma na'ele ụmụ ya atọ anya dị ka kachasị mma ọ rụzuru
William Jay Sydeman (May 8, 1928 - May 27, 2021) bụ onye America na-ede egwu
A mụrụ ya na New York
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Duke, ma nweta nzere BS
na 1955 site na Mannes School of Music, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ya na Felix Salzer, Roy Travis, na Roger Sessions
Ọ natara nzere masta ya na egwu site na Hartt School na 1958, na-amụ n'okpuru Arnold Franchetti na Goffredo Petrassi
Site na 1959 ruo 1970 ọ sonyeere ngalaba na-ede egwu na alma mater ya Mannes School of Music
N'afọ 1951, ọ lụrụ Hope Millholland, onye na-akpọ piano na nwa akwụkwọ ibe ya na Mannes
Wìnning early acclaim for his avant garde music (principally published by CF Peter's)he felt trapped by the prevailing orthodoxies and moved to California in 1970
Beginning a period of wandering during which he also studied Buddhism and Anthroposophy
Ọ sonyeere ASCAP na 1975
Site na 1980 ruo 1982 ọ kụziri na Rudolph Steiner College na Fair Oaks
N'afọ 1981, ọ gara biri na Sacramento wee maliteghachi ide egwu n'ụzọ ọ na-emebu, ebe ọ nabatara asụsụ egwu ọhụrụ
O mechara kwaga Mendocino
N'afọ 1966, Nancy B
Reich dezigharịrị akwụkwọ ya (ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ 75 site na ụbọchị a) ma bipụta ya dị ka mmega ahụ mbụ na akwụkwọ ndị a na-agụ na igwe
E wepụtara mbipụta nke abụọ, nke NYU Department of Music Education bipụtara, na 1968
Afọ 35 ka e mesịrị ọ ga-ede ederede ya maka Grove Dictionary of Music
Egwú ya sitere n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
O ritere ihe nrite site na Boston Symphony Orchestra, Pacifica Foundation, na National Institutes of Arts and Letters
Jayaben Desai (2 Eprel 1933 - 23 Disemba 2010) bụ onye ndú a ma ama nke ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na esemokwu Grunwick na London na 1976
A mụrụ ya na Dharmaj, Gujarat, India, Desai kwagara Tanzania, East Africa, na 1956
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ, ọ lụrụ Suryakant, onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Di na nwunye ahụ si n'ezinụlọ ahịa dị n'etiti
Ha mechara kwaga Britain tupu Commonwealth Immigrants Act 1968 mee ka o sie ike maka ndị nwere paspọtụ Britain site na ndị Britain na-achịbu ịbanye na mba ahụ
Na Britain, ọ ghaghị ịrụ ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala, nke mbụ dị ka onye na-akwa akwa, mgbe ahụ na-arụzi ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ Grunwick
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm mgbe e nyere ya iwu ka ọ rụọ ọrụ oge ọzọ, ma kpalie ọgbaghara n'etiti ndị ọrụ Eshia na ndị ọrụ nwanyị
Ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe mere ngagharị iwe maka ọnọdụ ọrụ, ịkwụ ụgwọ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọbụna a jụrụ ụmụ nwanyị ihe mere ha ji chọọ ịga ụlọ mposi, Desai dụrụ ndị ọrụ ibe ya ọdụ ka nke a ghara imenye ha egwu
Desai duziri ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe n'afọ abụọ ha mere site na 1976 ruo 1978
Òtù Apex kwadoro ọgbaghara ahụ na ndị otu post na mbụ jụrụ ịnye post nke ụlọ nyocha foto Grunwick, ruo mgbe a mara ya aka site na nkwado nke pati Tory, n'oge ahụ bụ ndị mmegide gọọmentị

Desai bụ ọkà okwu na-akpali akpali na ọkà okwu a ma ama, na-ekwu okwu megide okwu agbụrụ na nke nwoke na nwanyị na-ekwu maka ya na ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-eme ngagharị iwe, ma na-akatọ ihe ọ chere na ọ bụ enweghị nkwado sitere na Trades Union Congress maka ebumnuche ya
Praịm Minista Jim Callaghan họpụtara onye ọka ikpe, Lord Justice Scarman iji dozie esemokwu ahụ
Desai gbara akaebe ogologo oge
Ọkàikpe Scarman tụrụ aro na a ga-amata ndị otu ahụ ma weghachite ndị ọrụ a chụrụ n'ọrụ
Onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ leghaara akụkọ ahụ anya ma ndị otu ahụ laghachiri azụ, na-ahapụ kọmitii Grunwick ka ọ mara ọkwa na ọgbaghara ahụ agwụla na 14 Julaị 1978
Desai laghachiri na ụlọ ọrụ ịkwa akwa ma mesịa ghọọ onye nkuzi na Harrow College
Ọ gafere ule ịkwọ ụgbọala ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 60 ma gbaa ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ ume ime nke a iji mee ka nnwere onwe ha dịkwuo ukwuu
Oriakụ Desai (dị ka a na-akpọ ya mgbe niile) dekọrọ echiche ya maka Brent Museum na ihe ndekọ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke Hannah Phung nke Brent Museum kwuru, sị 'Ọ dị ịtụnanya, ka m gwa gị, ọ dị ịtụnanya

Ezinụlọ ya gbasasịrị ntụ ya n'akụkụ isi iyi nke osimiri Indus na Ganges na Rotherhithe na Thames

Jemima Annor Yeboah, nke e ji aha Jayana mara bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu ozioma nke oge a, onye na-ede egwu ma bụrụkwa onye ọchụnta ego
A họpụtara ya dịka nwanyị na-eti egwu nke afọ n'afọ 2020 na Ghana Urban Gospel Music Awards
A mụrụ Jemima Annor-Yeboah, Jayana n'ezinụlọ ndị na-agụ egwú
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyi nke abụọ nke Late Bishop Dr Augustine Annor-Yeboah, onye nchoputa nke Christian Praise International Center (CPIC) na onye bụbu onyeisi oche nke Christ Apostolic Church (CAC) mụrụ
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị anọ, Mavis, Deborah, Karen na Julie
N'ime afọ ntolite nke Jayana dị ka nwa nke onye ụkọchukwu Reverend, o tinyere akụkụ nke oge ya na-ege ntị na ịmụta ozi-ọma nke oge a, otuto na ofufe

Jayana sonyere na mbipụta mbụ nke ihe ngosi nka egwu ama ama nke Ghana, Charterhouse's Stars of The Future Television show, na-asọmpi na ndị dị ka Efya, Irene Logan, Ramzy Prince na ndị ọzọ ma so na ndị ikpeazụ nke oge mbụ nke kpakpando nke ọdịnihu

Ọ rụrụ na isi nyiwe, Na 2007 ọ rụrụ na Vodafone Ghana Music Awards ulo oru awards n'abalị na kemgbe ahụ hụrụ na-arụkọ ọrụ na-eme n'otu ogbo na ọtụtụ ndị Ghana music gụnyere, Joyce Blessing, Grace Ashy, Selina Boateng, Shatta Wale, Kuami Eugene, KiDi,

Jayda Cheyni Hylton-Pelaia (amụrụ na 30 Mee 1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye azụ maka otu egwuregwu League1 Ontario a kpọrọ Woodbridge Strikers na ndị otu egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị Jamaica
A mụrụ ya na Canada, ọ na-anọchite anya Jamaica na mba ụwa
A mụrụ Hylton-Pelaia na Brampton, Ontario, Canada
A mụrụ nna ya, Gary Hylton, na Jamaica ma o biri ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Nne ya, Tracy Pelaia, bụ onye Ịtali
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ na Brams United SC wee sonye n'òtù ndị ntorobịa nke Woodbridge Strikers mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Hylton-Pelaia gara St
Augustine Catholic Secondary School na Brampton, ebe ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu na onye egwuregwu kachasị baa uru ugboro abụọ n'ime afọ anọ ya na Falcons
Hylton-Pelaia gara Mahadum East Carolina na Greenville, North Carolina, United States
Ọ bụ ezie na a mụrụ ya na Canada, Hylton-Pelaia nwekwara ike ịnọchite anya Jamaica, site n'aka nna ya, na Ịtali, site n'aka nne ya
Ọ bụ Jamaica kpọrọ ya na mbụ na ọkwa dị n'okpuru afọ iri abụọ, aha ya na ndị otu maka 2018 CONCACAF Women's U-20 Championship
Hylton-Pelaia mere mpụta nke mbụ ya na nke na-eduga na asọmpi ahụ, na-amalite egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Costa Rica na Jenụwarị
N'asọmpi ahụ, ọ malitere asọmpi ikpeazụ nke otu B wee gbaa bọọlụ niile megide Nicaragua
Na ọkwa dị elu, a kpọrọ Hylton-Pelaia na nke mbụ ya na 2019 Pan American Games
O nwetara akara mbụ ya na Group A na-emeghe megide Mexico wee gaa n'ihu na-egwu na nkeji ọ bụla nke asọmpi ahụ ka Jamaica mechara na nke asaa
Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, onye isi nchịkwa Hue Menzies kwuru na Hylton-Pelaia 'mere nke ọma' nakwa na ọ ga-atụle maka ịkpọ oku n'ọdịnihu n'oge usoro iru eru nke 2020 Summer Olympics
Agbanyeghị nke a, n'ihi mmerụ ahụ na mmetụta nke ọrịa COVID-19, Hylton-Pelaia apụtaghị na Jamaica ruo afọ atọ
Ọkpụkpọ ọzọ a kpọrọ ya bụ maka 2022 CONCACAF W Championship

Jayne Cortez (Ọnwa Mee 10, afọ 1934 - ọnwa Desemba 28, afọ 2012) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ede uri, onye na-eme ihe, obere onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ na onye na-ese okwu nke a na-eme emume maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, surrealistic na ihe ọhụrụ dị egwu na lyricism na ụda olu
Ihe odide ya bụ akụkụ nke Canon nke Black Arts Movement
Ọ lụrụ onye na-egwu saxophon jazz bụ Ornette Coleman (1954), nwa ha nwoke bụ onye na-akụ egwu jazz bụ Denardo Coleman
N'afọ 1975, Cortez lụrụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe, na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ Melvin Edwards, ha biri na Dakar, Senegal, na New York City
A mụrụ Jayne Cortez dị ka Sallie Jayne Richardson na ọdụ ndị agha na Fort Huachuca, Arizona, n'ọnwa Mee 10, afọ 1934
Nna ya bụ onye agha na-arụ ọrụ nke ga-eje ozi n'agha ụwa abụọ; nne ya bụ odeakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ atọ nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya na nwanne nwoke nke obere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ kwagara Los Angeles, ebe ọ tolitere na mpaghara Watts
Jayne Richardson na-eto eto kpughere na jazz na Latin ndekọ nke nne na nna ya chịkọtara
Ọ gụrụ nka, egwu na ihe nkiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O mechara gaa Compton Community College, mana ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya n'ihi nsogbu ego
Ọ were aha nna Cortez, aha nne nne ya Filipino, na mbido ọrụ nka ya
N'afọ 1954, Cortez lụrụ onye na-egwu saxophon jazz bụ Ornette Coleman mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
Nwa ha nwoke Denardo, amụrụ n'afọ 1956, malitere iso nna ya na-akụ ịgba mgbe ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị ma tinye ndụ ya ka ya na ndị nne na nna abụọ na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ọrụ ha
N'afọ 1964, Cortez gbara Coleman alụkwaghịm wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Watts Repertory Theater Company, nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nka ruo n'afọ 1970

Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọgụ maka ikike obodo, ya na onye a ma ama na-ahụ maka ikike obodo Fannie Lou Hamer rụkọtara ọrụ ma na-akwado iji nka dị ka ụgbọ ala iji kwalite ihe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-eji ọrụ ya edebanye aha ndị isi ojii na Mississippi na mbido afọ 1960
Mgbe ọ na-atụgharị uche n'oge a n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na DH
Melham na 1990, Cortez kwuru banyere mmetụta ya n'ọrụ ya, na-ekwu, 'Ịbụ onye na-enweghị ọrụ na enweghị nri nwere ike ime ka ị nwee mwute
Mana ị bụghị nsogbu
Nsogbu ahụ dị tupu ị mara na enwere nsogbu
Nsogbu bụ usoro, ị nwere ike ịhazi, jikọta, ma mee ihe gbasara usoro ahụ
Nke ahụ bụ ihe m mụtara'
Ọ gara Europe na Africa, wee kwaga New York City na 1967
Paul 'Jayso' Nuamah Donkor (amụrụ na June 1, 1983) bụ onye na-eti egwu rap nke Ghana, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, onye na'agụ egwu, onye na -ede egwu na onye ọchụnta ego

Mgbe afọ iri gachara n'ụlọ ọrụ egwu dị ka onye rapper na onye na-emepụta ihe, Jayso nwetara nlebara anya karị na-eso ọrụ ya na Sarkodie nke abụọ, Borga, nke gosipụtara na album mbụ ya, Maakye Jayso mepụtara ihe karịrị pasenti iri asaa nke egwu ndị dị na ọba ahụ nke gbakwara ya n'ọkwa

N'oge Jayso dị afọ iri na ụma na Presbyterian Boys' Senior High School (PRESEC-Legon) o guzobere Skillions, otu egwu hip hop a ma ama nke ọrụ ya abụghị naanị ntọala na ihe ndabere maka ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe iji banye na hip hop, kamakwa webatara hip hop a na-eme n'ógbè ahụ na nnukwu obodo egwu Ghana
Tupu nke a, Jayso sonyeere onye nrụpụta rapper ọzọ JPE (ugbu a Kobi Onyame) ya na ndị enyi ya Canz na Mr
Scratch iji guzobe Haatsville Project Nke a butere ntọhapụ nke Haatsville Project mixtape, nke mere ka ọtụtụ mmadụ na-ekwu maka ya n'ime sekit hip hop n'okpuruala nke Ghana
Ọrụ mmepụta ya ugbu a gụnyere Sarkodie, Manifest, Sway, Scientific, Kwaw Kese, Jon Germain, Efya, Rumor na ndị MC Naijiria Naeto C na Ikechukwu na onye na-ese ihe Gabon Baponga
Na Disemba 10, 2015, ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya akpọrọ 'Making Tasha Proud' mgbe ihe karịrị ọkara afọ iri na-emepụta maka ndị ọzọ
Mmekọrịta Jayso na egwu malitere n'oge ọ bụ nwata
N'ime ụbọchị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Jayso na (Presec-Legon) ọ malitere ịkwalite nkà ya na mbụ dị ka onye na-agụ rapper na onye na-emepụta egwu
Tupu ịbanye na Haatsville, Jayso na enyi ya T-Kube na-egwu egwu, onye hapụrụ Ghana gaa UK na 2002 mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ya na JPE (ugbu a Kobi Onyame), Canz na Mr
Scratch (ndị ọrụ Haatsville) wepụrụ teepu Haatsville Project
Teepu ahụ nwetara otuto n'etiti ndị hụrụ hip hop bụ ndị kacha bụrụ ndị ntorobịa
N'ịbụ onye wuru ihe ọmụma mmepụta ya site na mmekọrịta ya na Haatsville, Jayso malitere iwebata ihe mechara bụrụ otu hip hop mbụ Skillions (Skills in a Million)
Ntinye Ball J, Jinx Therapy (nke bụzi Frank P) dị ka ndị otu mbụ nke Skillions, ndị dị ka EL, Midnight, J-Town, KP na Sandyswiz sonyeere ezinụlọ Skillions
N'okpuru nlekọta mmepụta nke Jayso (onye a pụrụ ịkọwa dị ka ụdị Ghana nke America's RZA of Skillions) otu ahụ wepụtara egwu mbụ ha 21 'Skillions Demotapes' na 2002
Nchịkọta nke mixtape ahụ mere kpamkpam n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra nke Jayso
Vidio ahụ nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma nke dugara na GH-Rap Movement dum

Ihe ịga nke ọma nke teepu ngwakọta ahụ bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi ọrụ mmepụta na ụdị egwu; ha na-abụkarị rap n'asụsụ Bekee na-agwakọta na pidgin (ụdị Ghana nke Bekee na asụsụ mpaghara mebiri emebi) - nke masịrị nnukwu akụkụ nke ndị ntorobịa

N'ikpeazụ ya kwadoro nzere Skillions dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu rap nwere nkà nke oge ha na Ghana Ọbụna mgbe nkesa nke otu ahụ gasịrị, Skillionaire ọ bụla na-emere onwe ya aha n'ime egwu na nka Nkewa nke Skillions mere ka ha nwee ike ịchụso ọrụ solo wee mee ka Jayso guzobe ọgbọ ọzọ nke nkà Ọgbọ Ọhụrụ gụnyere Lil Shaker, Rumour, Kevin Beats, Graffik, Killmatic, Paapa Versa, Padlock, Sandra, Gemini, Nobel na Joey B

Ọgbọ Ọhụrụ n'okpuru nlekọta nke Jayso wepụtara 'The Skillions New Generation Mixtape' nwere egwu egwu dị otú ahụ dị ka 'Hood', 'Alert', 'Facebook Girl and Boy', 'I No Dey Biz' n'okpuru akara ndekọ nka nka
Jayso esorowo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ onye ọ bụla a ma ama na-ese egwu na Ghana rụọ ọrụ kemgbe afọ 1999
N'èzí Ghana, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka otu n'ime akụkọ hip hop Wyclef Jean na UK's Sway
N'ógbè, o mepụtara ọrụ maka ndị dị ka Sarkodie, Manifest, R2Bees, Efya, Kwaw Kese, Afro Rock Band Dark Suburb, VIP, Reggie Rockstone, ASEM na ndị ọzọ

Ọ malitere akara ndekọ egwu ya aha ya bụ Next World Music na 2013 mgbe ọpụsịrị na Kennis Music

Ọ natakwara onyinye ọkacha mma na ndekọ egwu na Headies 2013 nakwa Tush Awọdụ maka egwu 'This Year'

Mgbe e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, Jaywon bịanyere aka na ndekọ egwu na 'Kennis Music Record Label'
N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, o wepụtara ‘Odun Yi (This Year)’ nke pụrụ iche na nke otuto na 2013
O mechara bịanye aka na PZ Cusson nke mere ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jiri egwu ya, 'This Year' maka ịkwado ahịa ha
Mgbe ọ gachara indie, ọ wepụtara abọm ya a na-atụ anya ya na nke atọ akpọrọ 'Oba Orin' mgbe anọ gachara nke gosipụtara Vector, Reminisce na Reekado Banks
Nke a bụ ihe na-esote abọm abụọ ahụ ọ wepụtara na Kennis Music
360nobs dere akwụkwọ egwu ahụ 'Oba Orin bụ ezigbo nchịkọta ụda nke gosipụtara talentị Jaywon kachasị mma na egwu pọpụ ya
Ọ dị ọgaranya, dị ndụ, na-enye ume ọhụrụ mgbe niile
Jaywon nwere ike ikwuwa ọnụ mana onweghị onye ga-asị na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ maka ya oge ọbụla
Naanị oge ga-egosi ma ọ nwetala aha ahụ
PulseNG na-atụle ya 3/5 wee dee 'Na njedebe nke abọm ahụ, ị ga-enwe mmetụta na Jaywon awụpụọla mkpụrụ obi ya, na-ejikọ mmetụta ya na inwe oke okike nka ya na gị
Ọ dị ka Jaywon a na-eme egwu maka gị, n'ebe ọgbakọ mmadụ juru

Jazmine Marie Sullivan (amuru Eprel 9, 1987) bu onye America na-ede ukwe
Amụrụ na zụlitere na Philadelphia, album mbụ ya, E wepụtara Fearless na 2008 iji nwee ọganihu azụmahịa na nke siri ike
Ndekọ ahụ tolitere Album Top R&B/Hip-Hop nke Billboard wee nweta nkwado ọla edo site n'aka ndị ụlọ ọrụ ndekọta nke America (RIAA)
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ nwoke anọ, gụnyere ' Mkpa U Bad ' na ' Bust Your Windows ', ha abụọ nọ n'elu 40 nke Hot R&B/Hip-Hop
Sullivan sochiri nke a na album studio ya nke abụọ, Love Me Back, na 2010, nke ndị nkatọ nabatara nke ọma

Mgbe ọ gbasịrị ezumike afọ atọ, Sullivan bịanyere aka na RCA Records wee wepụta album studio mbụ ya n'okpuru akara, Reality Show, na 2015, ọ ghọkwara album nke abụọ ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mbụ na Top R & B / Hip-Hop Albums chart
Na 2021, o wepụtara EP mbụ ya nke ọma, Heaux Tales nke nwere otu ' Bulie Mmetụta Gị '
Sullivan enwetala Grammy Awards abụọ, onyinye onyinye Women in Music Awards, onyinye egwu egwu mkpụrụ obi abụọ, atọ NAACP Image Awards, na onyinye BET abụọ n'oge ọrụ ya
Nne na nna Jazmine Sullivan bụ Don na Pam Sullivan
Nne ya bụ onye bụbu onye ọbụ abụ ndabere maka Philadelphia International Records
Mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, nna ya rutere n'ọkwa dị ka onye nlekọta maka nnukwu ụlọ Strawberry Historic nke obodo na ngalaba Strawberry Mansion na ezinụlọ ya kwagara n'ime ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme
Sullivan bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005 na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Philadelphia maka imepụta nka na ime nka ebe ọ bụ onye isi egwu olu
Sullivan malitere ịbụ abụ dị ka contralto n'ime ukwe ụmụaka, ma emesịa n'òtù ukwe okenye
Sullivan ekpughere egwu ụwa amachaghị na mbụ
Na iri na ise Sullivan bịanyere aka na Jive Records
O dekọrọ otu ọba egwu, nke a na-ewepụtaghị ma emechaa wepụ ya na label
Sullivan nyere ụda olu maka Kindred the Family Soul 's song, 'Am' yana ụda ndabere na egwu 'Party's Over', na aha egwu na 2003 mpụta mbụ ha nyefere n'ịhụnanya
O bu ụzọ zute onye rapper Missy Elliott n'oge nnọkọ ahụ; Elliott gara n'ihu wepụta ma ọtụtụ n'ime album mbụ ya, enweghị atụ egwu na egwu na Love Me Back
Sullivan dere ma dekọọ ya na ndị na-emepụta Cool & Dre egwu akpọrọ ' Kwuo m ' na ndị na-emepụta Cool & Dre ; Enyere ya enyi nwanyị Dre Christina Milian n'oge ahụ maka album nke atọ ya, So Amazin'
Egwu a ghọrọ onye ndu otu, na-arị elu na nọmba 13 na egwu R&B/Hip-Hop dị ọkụ yana iru nọmba 21 na eserese Hot 100
Sullivan's breakthrough song, ' Need U Bad ' wepụtara na Mee 2008
The song featured additional vocals by Missy Elliott and Sandy 'Pepa' Denton of Salt-n-Pepa, emesia debuted na nọmba 37 na Billboard Hot 100 na nọ n'elu Hot R & B / Hip Hop Songs maka 34 izu
N'otu aka ahụ, olu Sullivan na-agbanwe n'etiti 'mmepụta ọgbara ọhụrụ' na 'ụda mmetụta 1980' nke ndị nkatọ egwu na-ekwu na-enye ya 'ụda hip hop ụlọ akwụkwọ ochie '
Ụdị olu ya bụ contralto
Olu ya nwere ike siri ike na ndekọ niile ma jikọta nke ọma n'etiti A2 na G5 ya nwere 'olu dị nro '
Ọ kọwara ụdị edemede ya dị ka “mgbagha azụ”, n'ịtụ aka na egwu ya gbasara mmekọrịta dara ada bụ nke na-akparị anụ ahụ na nke mmụọ
Egwu ya na-egosipụta nzaghachi ya na mmekọrịta ndị a nke ọma na egwu ya ' Bust Your Windows '
Ọ na-amasị ya ide banyere mmetụta ọ na-enwe, nke n'aka nke ya, na-ewe otu ụbọchị ma ọ bụ ihe ruru otu ọnwa iji mezue
N'oge ndekọ nke album Reality Show, Sullivan jiri oge dị ukwuu na-emegharị ma na-edegharị ya, na ndị na-emepụta ihe ga-amanye ya ka ọ hapụ album ahụ iji gbochie nkwụsị oge
A maara Sullivan nke ọma maka ide egwu nke ya nke na-eme ka ama ama ya na ndị nkatọ na ndị na-akwado ya
Edepụtara egwu Sullivan ' Bust Your Windows ' na nọmba 137 na ndepụta National Public Radio nke abụ 200 Kachasị Kasị Mma Site na narị afọ nke 21st ụmụ nwanyị
Na Mee 11, 2020, Sullivan kwupụtara na nne ya Pam achọpụtala ọrịa kansa na-egbu egbu na Ọktoba 2019
N'akwụkwọ ozi Instagram ya, o dere, sị 'Ọ bụrụ na ịbụ nwa gị nwanyị kụziiri m otu ihe bụ ka esi arụ ọrụ na ihe jọrọ njọ, na-egbu mgbu ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ nkà'
Jean-Baptiste Ngnetchopa (a mụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ onye mba Cameroon na-akpụ osisi
O nwetara nlebara anya mba ụwa site na usoro akwụkwọ ego sitere na Afrịka nke o piputara n' osisi
Ọ pụtala na ihe ngosi mba ụwa na ihe ngosi dị ka Africa hoy na 1991
A mụrụ Ngnetchopa n'ezinụlọ ndị na-akpụ osisi ọdịnala sitere n'otu obodo nke ndị Bamileke na Cameroun
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ banyere n'ọrụ mmụta afọ asaa
Ọrụ Ngnetchopa agbanwenyela n'ime nyocha nke, 'mmekọrịta dị n'etiti nka, ike na ego' nke na-eme ka ụwa nke ọdịbendị pop na nka nke oge a
Akwụkwọ ego ya na-eji agba ojii n'elu osisi ahu iji gosipụta nkọwa a pịrị apị na nke ihe edere n' opipi ahu
Ngnetchopa ekwuola na, 'Ụfọdụ ndị ọgaranya na-etinye ego ha n'ime ụlọ
Ego a na-ehi ụra ma na-adalata n'uru
Ana m arịọ ndị ọgaranya a ka ha nyefee m akụkụ nke ego a, m ga-akpụ ha ego osisi nke ha nwere ike I Ji bie ma gosi ndị ọzọ
Ego osisi a ga-enwetakwa uru
Jean-Bosco Barayagwiza (1950 - 25 Eprel 2010) bụ onye Génocidiare a mara ikpe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke jikọtara ya na Hutu Power movement
Onye ọrụ gọọmentị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu, Barayagwiza jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi iwu n'ime Mịnịstrị nke Mba Ọzọ n'oge mgbukpọ agbụrụ Rwanda
A kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime 'ndị isi' nke mgbukpọ ahụ

Barayagwiza bụ onye guzobere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Coalition for the Defence of the Republic, nke a na-ewere dị ka ọ na-ewere ọnọdụ dị oke egwu megide ndị Tutsi karịa ndị ọchịchị National Republican Movement for Democracy and Development Dị ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii ndị isi nke ụlọ ọrụ redio a ma ama Radio Télévision Libre des Mille Collines (RTML), ọ ga-elekọta mgbasa ozi nke ọdịnaya na-agba ume ime ihe ike megide ndị Tutsis
Kamerun

Mgbe a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ na Yaoundé, Cameroon n'afọ 1996, Barayagwiza ga-ebo gọọmentị RPF ebubo na ha na-ele ndị Hutus anya n'ihu n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, na-ekwu na 'ọchịchị ahụ na-eme ka ihe bụrụ agbụrụ site n'ebo ndị Hutu ebubo dị ka ndị na-egbu agbụrụ'
Barayagwiza kwuru na ndị Hutus bụ ndị mwakpo ndị Tutsi gburu n'oge mgbukpọ ahụ ma na-eme ihe iji chebe onwe ha
Ikpe igbu ọchụ na ọnwụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2000, Ụlọikpe Na-ahụ Maka Mpụ Mba Nile maka Rwanda boro ya ebubo igbu ọchụ, Mpụ megide Mmadụ na imebi nkwekọrịta Geneva
E kpere ya ikpe ya na Ferdinand Nahimana, onye guzobere RTLM, na Hassan Ngeze, onye nduzi na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Kangura
Onye ọka iwu Canada bụ Oriakụ gbachitere Barayagwiza na mbụ
Marchessault na onye ọka iwu America bụ Maazị Danielson

ndị ọka iwu abụọ ahụ kwụsịrị, a gbachitere Barayagwiza n'oge ikpe ahụ niile, ruo ikpe nke mbụ, site n'aka onye ọka iwu Ịtali Giacomo Barletta Caldarera, ruo ugbu a [mgbe?] naanị onye ọka iwu Ịtali rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na-agbachitere ya na UN International Tribunal
Barayagwiza jụrụ isonye na ikpe ahụ, na-ekwu na ndị ọka ikpe adịghị ele mmadụ anya n'ihu
N'ụbọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2003, a mara Barayagwiza ikpe maka mgbukpọ agbụrụ, izu igbu ọchụ, ọha na eze na ịkpalite mgbukpọ agbụrụ na mkpochapụ na mkpagbu nke mejupụtara mpụ megide mmadụ
A chọpụtakwara na ọ bụghị onye ikpe mara maka ebubo ndị ọzọ nke itinye aka na mgbukpọ agbụrụ, igbu ọchụ na imebi nkwekọrịta Geneva
A mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri atọ na ise
O kwupụtara na ọ na-arịọ arịrịọ maka ikpe ahụ ma nye ya Donald Herbert na Tanoo Mylvaganam dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nchebe ọhụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 2004
A kpọrọ Alfred Pognon dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na-agbachitere Barletta Caldarera
A kwadoro arịrịọ ya na 22 June 2009 ma belata ikpe ya na mkpọrọ afọ iri atọ na abụọ
Ọ nwụrụ na 25 Eprel 2010 na Cotonou, Benin, n'ihi ọrịa ịba ọcha n'anya C
Ndị ezinụlọ ya ekwuola na a jụrụ ya ọgwụgwọ zuru oke
Jean-Claude Roger Mbede (nwụrụ na 10 Jenụwarị 2014) bụ nwoke Cameroon nke a mara ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ atọ maka ebubo nke ndina ụdị onwe na ịnwa ndina ụdị onwe
Ndị otu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ n'ụwa niile gụnyere Human Rights Watch na Amnesty International mere mkpesa banyere ikpe ya, nke ikpeazụ kpọrọ ya onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2011, ndị ọrụ nchekwa nke onye odeakwụkwọ nke steeti Cameroon (SED) jidere Mbede mgbe o zigara ozi SMS na-ahazi izute onye ọ maara nwoke

Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ UK The Guardian si kwuo, SED 'na-elekwasị anya ma na-ekpe ndị ikom na-edina nwoke ibe ha ikpe' n'okpuru iwu ntaramahụhụ Nkebi 347a 'Onye ọ bụla na onye nwere mmekọahụ na onye nwoke na nwanyị ga-ata ahụhụ site na ọnwa isii ruo afọ ise na ịkwụ ụgwọ site na 20,000 CFA Francs ruo 200,000 CFA'
E jidere Mbede otu izu na 'ihe a na-enyo enyo na ọ bụ nwoke idina nwoke' na Yaoundé tupu ebubo ebubo 'ị idina nwoke ma nwaa idina nwoke idina nwanyị' na 9 Machị
Onye nnọchi anya Mbede bụ Alice Nkom, onye ọka iwu a ma ama na-ahụ maka ikike LGBT na onye isi nke Cameroon's Association to Defend Homosexuals
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2011, a mara ya ikpe maka ebubo abụọ ahụ ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ atọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Kondengui Central
Human Rights Watch mere mkpesa banyere ikpe ya, bụ ndị kọwara ya dị ka 'nnukwu mmebi nke ikike Mbede nwere nnwere onwe ikwu okwu na ịha nhata' ma kpọọ gọọmentị Cameroon ka ha wepụ iwu ahụ dị mkpa

Amnesty International weputara ịdọ aka ná ntị n'aha Mbede, na onye na-ekwuchitere ya na-ekwu, sị 'Ichebe mmadụ maka ezi omume mmekọahụ ha ma ọ bụ nke a na-eche na ọ bụ omume mmekọahụ bụ mmebi iwu siri ike ma ekwesighi ikwe ka ọ bụrụ n'okpuru iwu ntaramahụhụ nke mba ọ bụla'
Onye nduzi Africa nke Amnesty International Erwin var der Borght kwuru, 'Jean-Claude Mbede bụ onye mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche e jidere naanị n'ihi na ọ na-eche na ọ bụ mmekọahụ
A ga-ewepụ ebubo niile e boro ya ma hapụ ya ozugbo
Ọtụtụ alaka Amnesty International na-anakọta mbinye aka na-achọ ka a tọhapụ ya
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011, Nkom kwuru na Mbede nwere nsogbu nri na-edozi ahụ na mwakpo mmekọahụ mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
E mere ndokwa ka a nụ arịrịọ ya n'ụbọchị 5 n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2012, mana e yigharịrị ya
A tọhapụrụ ya nwa oge n'ụbọchị 16 n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2012
Mbede dị afọ iri atọ na anọ nwụrụ na 10 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2014 n'obodo ya Ngoumou mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọgwụ n'ihi na ọ nweghị ego maka nlekọta ahụike
Jean-Marie Tjibaou (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 30, 1936 ruo n'ọnwa Mee 4, 1989) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị French na New Caledonia na onye ndú nke òtù nnwere onwe Kanak
Nwa nke onye isi agbụrụ, a họpụtara Tjibaou ka ọ bụrụ ụkọchukwu Katọlik mana ọ hapụrụ ọrụ okpukpe ya maka ndụ ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'ime afọ ndị 1970, o mere thesis na ethnology na Sorbonne
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gụchaghị akwụkwọ ya, ọ malitere itinye aka na ọdịbendị na agbụrụ na New Caledonia
N'afọ 1975, ọ haziri emume Melanesia 2000, nke mesiri njirimara Kanak ike
Jean-Paul Sartre (21 Juunu 1905 – 15 Epurel 1980) bụ a ọkà ihe ọmụma, bụ nwa afọ France
Jean-Pierre Dikongué Pipa (amụrụ n'afọ 1940) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na odee nke Cameroon
O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ zuru oke nke Cameroon, Muna Moto, na 1975
Jean-Bosco Mwenda, onye a makwaara dị ka Mwenda wa Bayeke (1930 September 1990), bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke egwu egwu egwu egwu nke Congolese

Ọ bụkwa onye a ma ama na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka, ọkachasị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka, na ngwụcha afọ 1950 na mmalite afọ 1960 ọ nọrọ obere oge na Nairobi, Kenya, ebe ọ na-eme ihe ngosi redio mgbe niile ma bụrụ mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ọgbọ ndị na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na Kenya

A mụrụ Jean-Bosco Mwenda na 1930 na Bunkeya (nke bụzi akụkụ nke Lualaba Province) n'ihe bụ Belgian Congo n'oge ahụ, mana o biri ọtụtụ ndụ ya na Lubumbashi, ebe na mgbakwunye na ịkpọ egwu ọ nwere ọrụ na ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe n'ógbè ahụ, na-elekọta ìgwè ndị ọzọ, ma nwee họtel n'ókè Zambia
Ọ nwụrụ na Septemba 1990 n'ihe mberede ụgbọala na Zambia
Mwenda jiri aha Mwenda wa Bayeke, na-azọrọ na ọ sitere n'ezinụlọ Sanga nke Bayeke
Egwú ya sitere na isi mmalite dị iche iche gụnyere egwu ọdị nala nke ndị Luba / Sanga ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Congo ole na ole nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ n'oge ọchịchị ndị ọchịchị n'ihi ọnọdụ nna ya na Chọọchị Katọlik
Mwenda rụrụ ọrụ na mbụ dị ka onye ode akwụkwọ maka nchịkwa Likasi mana n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ nwetara nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, na-ewepụta egwu mbụ ya na 1952
Ya na enyi ya na onye mmekọ ya Losta Abelo, na nwa nwanne ya nwoke Edouard Masengo, Bosco kọwapụtara ụdị guitar acoustic nke Congo
Egwú ya 'Masanga', nke Hugh Tracey dere, ghọrọ ihe na-emetụta ya karịsịa, n'ihi akụkụ ya dị mgbagwoju anya na nke dịgasị iche iche
Mmetụta nke ya gụnyere egwu ọdị nala nke Zambia na Eastern Congo, otu Cuban dị ka Trio Matamoros, na ihe nkiri cowboy
Ihe ndekọ vidio nke Gerhard Kubik na 1982 dị na nchịkọta nke ndị na-ese egwu egwu na-emetụta Afrịka nke akpọrọ Native African Guitar
CD nke 1982 nwere akwụkwọ nta (ihe odide nke Gerhard Kubik, kwa na Bekee, gụnyere ederede égwu Kiswahili), dị na Museum für Völkerkunde, Berlin
Ihe ndekọ ahụ gụnyere égwu zuru ezu Bosco nyere na June 30, 1982, na Museum für Völkerkunde, Berlin
N'afọ 1988, ụlọ ọrụ na-ede kọ ihe na Cape Town bụ Mountain Records de kọrọ abọm studio nke egwu Mwenda ma wepụta ya n'afọ 1994
A na-akpọ abọm ahụ Mwenda wa Bayeke - onye na-akụ egwú guitar n'Africa
Rosario Rodriguez Maitim (amuru Ọgọst 22, 1969), nke a kacha mara amara dị ka Jean Garcia, bụ ihe onyonyo Filipina na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye sitere na Angeles City
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Madam Claudia Buenavista na nsụgharị mbụ nke Pangako Sa 'Yo, Alvina Montenegro na Ina, Kasusuklaman Ba Kita? na Karina 'Rina' Mercado na ọkara ụmụnna nwanyị
Ọ gara Mahadum Trinity nke Asia (nke bụbu Trinity College of Quezon City) na Quezon City ruo mgbe achọpụtara ya na ihe ngosi ehihie Kalatog Pinggan
O nwere ụmụ abụọ, Jennica Garcia na Kotaro
Ọrụ ya kachasị ama bụ na opera ncha Pangako Sa 'Yo (2000) bụ ebe ọ na-egwuri egwu Madam Claudia Buenavista
Ọrụ ya dị ịrịba ama na-esote bụ na Kay Tagal Kang Hinintay (2002) a na-akwanyere ùgwù dị ka Lady Morganna
O nwekwara kpakpando na fantaserye Kampanerang Kuba egwu mbụ, na ihe ngosi nri Makuha Ka sa Tikim
Ọ kwagara ABS-CBN 's rival network GMA Network, na-egwu ọrụ nkwado na arụrụala n'ihe ngosi oge mbụ dị ka Impostora, La Vendetta, Majika na ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ na nso nso a kwuru na netwọk kacha ọhụrụ telefantasya, Dyesebel
Garcia gbara Abresia na Gagambino
Ọ bụ mkpuchi nke FHM Philippines mbipụta October 2008
Garcia gbara 'Sister Maria Belonia' na Shake, Rattle & Roll X, ntinye ihe nkiri Metro Manila (MMFF)
Mgbe Gagambino gachara, ọ pụtara na All About Eve, ebe ya na Sunshine Dizon, Iza Calzado, Richard Gomez na Eula Valdez rụkọrọ ọrụ

O mechara sonye na nkedo usoro amoosu Ilumina N'oge na-adịbeghị anya Garcia rụrụ ọrụ nkwụghachi ụgwọ TV remake nke Pinulot Ka Lang sa Lupa, nke dabere na ihe nkiri 1987 nke otu aha ahụ nke Regal Entertainment wepụtara (nke Eddie Garcia gosipụtara)
Melina Montero Azardon de Sebastian
Ihe nrite ihuenyo ọla edo
Gawad Tanglaw Awards
GMA Box Office Group
Jean Goss (Caluire na France November 20, 1912 - Paris April 3, 1991) bụ onye France na-eme ihe ike na-enweghị ihe ike
Nwa nke onye opera baritone nke tụfuru olu ya n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, a manyere Jean Goss ịrụ ọrụ malite mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ na Paris, tupu ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè France were ya n'ọrụ n'afọ 1937
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ sonyeere otu ndị ọrụ
N'ịbụ onye a kwadoro n'afọ 1939, ọ sonyere n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
N'ọnwa June 1940, n'abalị tupu ya enyefee onwe ya n'aka ndị agha Germany na Lille, ọ nwere ahụmahụ dị egwu nke ịhụnanya Chineke nwere n'ebe ọ nọ na maka mmadụ niile
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Ọ ga-abụ mmalite nke nkwekọrịta ndụ
Dị ka onye mkpọrọ agha n'ogige ndị Germany ruo n'afọ 1945, a mara ya ikpe ọnwụ mana onye ọrụ Germany zọpụtara ya nke akaebe ya kpaliri
Na ngwụcha agha ahụ, ọ na-achọ ndị ụkọchukwu na Chọọchị Roman Katọlik kwenyesiri ike na nkwanye ùgwù zuru oke maka ndụ mmadụ
N'afọ 1950, ọ manyere ịbanye n'Ọfịs Nsọ na Rom iji zute Kadinal Alfredo Ottaviani
N'afọ 1948, ọ zutere International Fellowship of Reconciliation na France wee zighachi Ministri France akwụkwọ agha ya na ihe nrite agha ya iji kwado ndị jụrụ n'ihi akọ na uche
Ebe ọ bi na Arcueil, obodo dịpụrụ adịpụ na Paris, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmegharị ọha na eze maka ụlọ nakwa na ndị ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ndú nke ọgbaghara 1953
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ nzukọ udo n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Europe (Budapest 1953, Warsaw 1956, Moscow 1957, Prague 1958)
N'afọ 1958, ọ lụrụ Hildegard Mayr
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, Etienne na Myriam
Ndụ ya na Hildegard raara onwe ya nye ịkwalite enweghị ime ihe ike nke Ndị Kraịst
Ha nọ na Rom n'oge Council Vatican nke Abụọ na-agba mbọ ka Chọọchị Roman Katọlik mara nkwenye nke akọ na uche
N'afọ ndị 1960 na 1970, ha biri oge ụfọdụ na Brazil (1964-1965) na Mexico (1970-1971)
Ha jikọtara nzukọ abụọ nke kọntinent na-abụghị ime ihe ike (Montevideo 1966, Medellín 1974), nke a mụrụ SERPAJ (Servizio Paz y Justizia)
Onye nhazi mbụ ya bụ Adolfo Pérez Esquivel, onye natara Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 1980
Ha rụrụ ọrụ n'oge ahụ na Don Hélder Câmara, Mgr Leonidas Proaño, Dom Antonio Fragoso, Fredy Kunz

Ha nyere ọzụzụ na seminarị na-enweghị ime ihe ike n'ọtụtụ mba ndị agha ma ọ bụ agha metụtara; Ireland (site n'afọ 1963), Balkans (site n'afọ 1972), Austral Africa (site n'afọ 1973), Lebanon (1974-1975 na 1980), San Salvador (1979)
N'afọ 1980, ha na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Eshia; Philippines (site na 1984), Thailand, Bangladesh, na Hong Kong
Karịsịa ọrụ ya nke mgbanwe Nonviolent na Philippines nafe1986, bụ otu n'ime ihe ịga nke ọma ka ukwuu o nwere, ka ọ na-eduzi ma na-akwadebe ndị mmadụ
N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, ọ gara Central Africa
N'afọ 1990, ọ nọ na Zaïre, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1991, ka ọ na-eme atụmatụ ịga Madagascar
Ọ nwụrụ na Paris n'ọnwa Eprel 3rd, 1993
Ya na Hildegard Goss-Mayr, ọ bụ onye otu International Board of the International Fellowship of Reconciliation ruo ọtụtụ afọ na osote onye isi oche ya ruo oge ụfọdụ
Jean Hébey (afọ 1916 - afọ 1992) bụ onye France na-eme ihe nkiri na Algeria
Jean Kapata (amụrụ na 25 Disemba na afo 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia na onye bụbu Minista nke Ala na Akụ na Akụnụba
Kapata rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nọọsụ na-eme ihe nkiri tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ nọchite anya mpaghara Mandevu na ntuli aka afo 2006 maka Patriotic Front
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na afo 2011 na afo 2016
Kapata jere ozi dị ka osote minista nke mmepe obodo, ahụike nne na nwa
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2009, e jidere ya na ndị omeiwu Patriotic Front itoolu ndị ọzọ mgbe ha mere mkpesa maka ịtọhapụ onye isi ala Frederick Chiluba site na ịpị ụbọ na ịfụ ụfụ
A tọhapụrụ ha na 7 Ọktoba
N'afọ 2014, Onye isi ala Michael Sata họpụtara Kapata dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka njem nleta na nka
N'okpuru ọchịchị ya, e wepụrụ mmachibido iwu maka nnukwu nwamba na-achụ nta na Zambia

N'ịzaghachi nlebara anya mgbasa ozi mba ụwa banyere ogbugbu Cecil ọdụm na Zimbabwe dị nso, Kapata kwuru, 'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ yiri ka ọ na-echegbu onwe ya maka ọdịmma ọdụm na Zimbabue karịa nke ndị Afrịka n'onwe ha'
Kapata bụ onye otu ndị nnọchi anya Zambia na nnọkọ nke iri isii nke United Nations nke Commission on the Status of Women na Machị na afo 2016
Na-eduga na ntuli aka nke Ọgọstụ na afo 2016 Kapata natara egwu ọnwụ na ndị ikom ji égbè wakporo onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ya na-achọ ịmata ebe ọ nọ
Onye na-azọ ọkwa MMD maka mpaghara ya, Mary Phiri, boro Kapata ebubo na ọ na-eziga ndị mmadụ ịwakpo ndị otu mkpọsa ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2016, ọ ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka ala, akụrụngwa na nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Patriotic Front maka ntuli aka
Kapata lụrụ di ma bụrụ nne na nne nne
N'afọ 2013, First Lady Christine Kaseba mere agbamakwụkwọ nwa nwanyị Kapata
Jean Lacy (amụrụ n'afọ 1932 na Washington, DC) bụ ónyé America na-ahụ màkà agụmakwụkwọ na ihe ngosi nka na ónyé na-ese ihe nkírí nke na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi na collage
Ọ bụ ónyé Africa America, ma kwenyere na ezinụlọ ya sitere na ndị Afrịka na Jamestown Colony
Ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke akụkọ ifo na akụkọ okpukpe, Civil Rights Movement, na omenala ndị Africa America
Site na 1975-77 ọ nọ n'ọkwa ónyé nlekọta nke agụmakwụkwọ na ngosi na Museum of African-American Life and Culture na Dallas, Texas
Site na 1977-88 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nduzi nke African American Cultural Heritage Center nke Dallas Independent School District
N'afọ 2009, Lacy nwèrè ihe ngosi onwe ya, Divine Kinship Ancient Forms and Social Commentary, the Art of Jean Lacy, na Tyler Museum of Art

A gụnyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi otu gụnyere Black Artists / South na Huntsville Museum of Art na Alabama; National Urban League Expo na Houston, TX, na ihe ngosi African American Artists of Dallas na Southern Methodist University Gallery
Ọrụ Lacy dị na nchịkọta nke Dallas Museum of Art, na Museum of Fine Arts, Houston
E nyèrè Lacy ọrụ ịmepụta windo enyo iji sọpụrụ Rosa Parks na Sanctuary of St
Luke's United Methodist Church na Dallas, TX
Ọ natawokwa ọrụ màkà windo enyo na Houston
N'afọ 1995, Lacy natara Women's Caucus for Art Lifetime Achievement Award
Jean Welz (1908-1975) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa
A mụrụ Welz na Salzburg, Austria, na 1900, n'ime ezinụlọ na-emepụta ihe osise na ahịa ọla edo
Ọ gụrụ nka na ihe owuwu, na 1925 ọ gara Paris, ebe ọ nọrọ ruo 1937
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ọ nabatara aha Jean
N'afọ 1937, Welz kwagara South Africa, wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, ebe o mere oghere mbata nke Great Hall na Institute for Geophysical Research
N'afọ 1939, ọ dara n'ọrịa ụkwara nta ma soro ezinụlọ ya kwaga Barrydale na Little Karoo, ebe ya na ezinụlọ ya na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ tii
N'afọ 1941, Welz ghọrọ onye isi nke Hugo Naudé Art Centre na Worcester, Western Cape, nọrọ na Worcesters ruo afọ iri abụọ na asatọ
O mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Stellenbosch na Cape Town n'afọ 1942, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye otu New Group of South African artists, otu ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe
Welz bụ onye na-ese ihe na-aga nke ọma ma nwee mmetụta ruo mgbe ọ dara n'ọrịa ọzọ na 1968
Ahụike ya kara njọ o wee nwụọ na 1975
Otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwoke, Martin Welz, bụ onye nta akụkọ nyocha a ma ama na South Africa
Onye ọzọ, Stephan Welz, bụ onye na-ere ihe osise
Welz gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ebe site na 1942 ruo mgbe ngosi ikpeazụ ya na 1970
N'afọ 1947, e nyere ya Silver Medal nke South African Academy for Arts and Science maka foto ya Earthenware na ọnụ ụzọ kọbọd
N'afọ 1969, ụlọ akwụkwọ South African Academy for Arts and Science nyere ya Medal of Honour maka eserese
Jeanette, Jeannette Ma ọ bụ Jeanetta nwere ike izo aka na

Jeanmarie Simpson (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 20, 1959) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme udo nke a maara nke ọma maka ide na ime ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, A Single Woman, dabere na ndụ nke US Congresswoman mbụ, Jeannette Rankin
A mụrụ Simpson na Ray, Arizona
Nne na nna ya bụ Maria Luisa Jugo (nwụrụ anwụ), onye Venezuelan kwagara mba ọzọ, na Donald Leroy Simpson, onye injinia America na-egwupụta ihe (nwụrụ nwụrụ anwụ)
Ọ bụ nwa nwa Carlos López Bustamante
A zụlitere ya n'ime ime obodo Arizona
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Toronto, Ontario, Canada n'afọ 1970 dugara na ọzụzụ ihe nkiri ya
Ọ bụ onye guzobere onye nduzi nka nke Nevada Shakespeare Company nke ọ duziri ọtụtụ mmepụta a ma ama ma kpọọ ihe odide ndị ama gụnyere Maude Gonne na Lady Macbeth
Ọ lara ezumike nká na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2008
Jeanne-Nicole Ngo Minyemeck (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye Cameroon na-eme egwuregwu
O sonyere na ịgba égbè ụmụ nwanyị na ịgba é égbè ụmụnwaanyị na 1988 Summer Olympics
Jeanne Moutoussamy-Ashe (amụrụ n'ọnwa Julaị 9, afọ 1951) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye na-eme ngagharị iwe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na magazin, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ foto, yana dịka onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa AIDS
A mụrụ Moutoussamy-Ashe na Chicago, Illinois, n'ọnwa Julaị 9, afọ 1951
Ezinụlọ nne ya si Arkansas, ezinụlọ nna ya si New Orleans na Guadeloupe
Nne na nna abụọ ahụ bụ ndị ọkachamara na ngalaba metụtara nka
Nne ya, Elizabeth Rose Hunt Moutoussamy, bụ onye na-ese ihe n'ime ụlọ, nna ya, John Warren Moutoussamic, bụ onye
Ha gbara ya ume ịchụso mmasị nka nke ya site na itinye ya na klas ngwụsị izu na Art Institute nke Chicago mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, enyi ezinụlọ, Frank Stewart, mere ka ọ mara foto
Mgbe a jụrụ akwụkwọ ya na Cooper Union School of Art, ọ mụụrụ Garry Winogrand maka oge okpomọkụ wee tinye akwụkwọ ọzọ
Moutoussamy-Ashe gara n'ihu nweta BFA ya site na Cooper Union n'afọ 1975
Tupu ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ nọrọ afọ nke mbụ ya na West Africa iji mezue ọmụmụ onwe ya na foto
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Moutoussamy-Ashe rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na foto telivishọn maka WNBC na WNEW na New York, yana maka PM Magazine
Enyi ya, Gordon Parks tụrụ aro ka ọ nweta asambodo iji see foto nke afọ 1968 United Negro College Fund Tennis Tournament nke onye mmeri tennis Arthur Ashe haziri
N'oge ọrụ ya, Moutoussamy-Ashe enyewo foto na ọtụtụ magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ, gụnyere Life, Smithsonian, Sports Illustrated, People Weekly, Ebony, Black Enterprise, World Tennis, Self, na Essence
Moutoussamy-Ashe lụrụ Arthur Ashe n'afọ 1977
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1986, Ashe na Moutoussamy-Ashe kuchiri nwa nwanyị, onye ha kpọrọ Camera n'aha ọrụ Moutoussamic-Ashe
Mgbe ọnwa iri na itoolu gachara, a chọpụtara na Arthur nwere nje HIV, mgbe ọ butere ọrịa ahụ site na mmịnye ọbara ọ natara n'oge ịwa ahụ obi

Moutoussamy-Ashe esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke otu na otu n'obodo ndị dị gburugburu United States na Europe, a na-etinyekwa ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, gụnyere Museum of Modern Art na New York, Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, Smithsonian National Museum of African American History and Culture, National Portrait Gallery, na Whitney Museum of American Art
Ọ dịkwa na nchịkọta onwe onye, gụnyere Oprah Winfrey
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere Essence Photography Literary Award (2008), na Mayoral Citation site na City of Chicago (1986)
O nwekwara nzere Doctor of Fine Arts abụọ, site na Queens College (2002, Charlotte, North Carolina) na Long Island University (CW
Post Campus, 1990)
[citation needed]

Jeannette Nyiramongi Kagame (Jeannette Nyiramongi, amuru Ọgọst 10, 1962) bụ nwunye Paul Kagame
Ọ ghọrọ First Lady nke Rwanda mgbe di ya were ọrụ dị ka President na 2000
Di na nwunye nwere ụmụ anọ - Ivan, Ange, Ian na Brian
Kagame bụ onye nchoputa na onyeisi oche nke Imbuto Foundation, otu òtù na-abaghị uru nke ebumnuche ya bụ ịkwado mmepe nke ọha mmadụ dị mma, gụrụ akwụkwọ na ọganihu
Onye guzobere imbuto foundation Activism

Jeannette Unite (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1964) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nké chịkọtara oxides, nnu ígwè na ihe fọdụrụ n'ebe a na-egwupụta ihe, ihe nketa na ebe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe iji mepụta ihe osise, pastel na iko màkà nnukwu ọrụ nka ya nke na-egosipụta na ebe a na-egwu ala na ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ihe ebe a na'ụwa nke mmadụ

E gosipụtara ihe osise Headgear na ihe osise 'TERRA' ya na Museum Ostwall, Dortmund, Germany n'ụlọ ahụ e wughachiri n'ebe isi ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe màkà Ndagwurugwu Ruhr na ncheta afọ ikpeazụ nkè igwupụta coal n'okpuru àlà na Germany

Site n'afọ 2014 na afọ 2015, nyocha ya na stratigraphy nke ụwa na Ngalaba Sayensị Ụwa, Mahadum Oxford na Mahadum Mahadum Oxford Museum, mepụtara n'ime ọrụ egosiri na Centre for Contemporary Art and the Natural World (CCANW), Mahadum Exeter, Devon, n'etiti ọnwa Ọktoba 2015 na ọnwa Febụwarị 2016
Ihe ngosi njem a bụkwa akụkụ nke United Nations' Year of Soil na British Geological Society's Year of Mud
Ọrụ Unite na-ezo aka na ihe nketa nke na-egwupụta ihe n'ebe ndebe ihe ochie na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie
Nke a gụnyere map akụkọ ihe méré eme nke ala na ederede ndị e mepụtara n'oge British Industrial Revolution iji duzie igwupụta coal nke na-eme ka engines ndị na-akpali ọgbara ọhụrụ
'N'etiti Strata nke Trauma na Violence', ihe osise nke Jeannette Unite
EARTHSCARS - Minerals and Metals, nke Jeannette Unite
EARTHSCARS - A Visual Mining Exploration, nke Jeannette Unite
Onye na-ese ihe Jeannette Unite na 'paintbox' ya n'azụ - tebụl oge nke mineral
Otu n'ime ihe osise 'Headgear' nke Jeannette Unite sere
Ntinye anya nke Jeannette Unite's Master of Fine Art postgraduate exhibition
Ntinye anya nke Jeannette Unite's Master of Fine Art postgraduate exhibition
Otu n'ime ọrụ ncheta nke Jeannette Unite na ogbugbu Marikana nke mere na South Africa na 16 August 2012
Unite gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Michaelis School of Fine Art n'afọ 1986, mgbè afọ anọ nke ọmụmụ gasịrị
Site n'afọ 1987 ruo afọ 1997, ọ kụziri ihe osise na nka n'ozuzu na Frank Joubert Art Centre, yana ịkụzi nkuzi ndị okenye na-ese ihe na ihe osise
N'oge a, ọ nọrọ afọ anọ na UNISA na-edegara akwụkwọ ozi ma nye ndị nkuzi ọzụzụ nka na Nyanga, mpaghara obodo
Site n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2016, ọ kụziri ọmụmụ ihe na Materiality na Michaelis School of Fine Art, usoro ọmụmụ ihe na-elekwasị anya n'ịgwa ụmụ akwụkwọ ụdị ya pụrụ iche nke nkwadebe na ojiji
N'afọ 2014, ọ gụsịrị MFA (Masters in Fine Arts) na Michaelis, na-enweta ihe dị iche

Jeannette Grace Ngock Yango (amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri na abuo nke ọnwa June n'afọ̀ 1993) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Division 1 Feminine club FC Fleury bọọlụ na Cameroon National Team

Jeannie Deakyne, bụ onye Arlington, nke Texas, onye mmeri n'ihe gbasara mmụta na ohere nweta mmụta, onye na-emelite obodo na onye agha ọgụ
Dị ka nke 2020 ọ na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ọrụ maka National Medal of Honor Museum Foundation na Arlington, Texas
Ọ bụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na National na Texas Societies of the Daughters of the American Revolution, Alumni nke Gamma Phi Beta Sorority, na Arlington Council nke PTA onye ndu
A zụlitere Deakyne na Arlington, Texas
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Arlington High School na 1993 wee gaa n'ihu na BA na political sayensị na Mahadum Texas na Arlington na 1998
N'oge agum kọleji ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi otu ụmụ akwụkwọ, bụrụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ndị agha ama ama, bụrụkwa onye otu Gamma Phi Beta
O nwetara nzere masta ya na Political sayensị na Mahadum Texas na Arlington na 2010
Deakyne jere ozi dị ka onye isi ndị agha na-arụsi ọrụ ike site na 1998 ruo 2011

Ọrụ ndị agha afọ iri na abụọ a ma ama gụnyere ntinye abụọ na ngalaba mbụ nke Cavalry na nkwado nke Operation Iraqi Freedom, ọrụ dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ maka ndị agha niile na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Baghdad International, Onye isi ndị ọrụ maka ngalaba ụgbọ elu Air Combat Brigade na onye ọrụ ntinye no ọrụ
maka ndị ọrụ, nzi ozi na ngalaba arụrụ arụ ọrụ maka Iraq na Kuwait

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ nke Sayensị ndị agha na UT Arlington na-eduga mmepe usoro ọmụmụ na ọzụzụ ngalaba mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nkuzi izizi maka ụmụ akwụkwọ kọleji na Army's Reserve Officer Training Corp (ROTC)
O nwetara Medal Bronze Star na Army's Bronze Star na Action Badge mgbe etinyere ya na nkwado nke Operation Iraqi Freedom

Deakyne mechara jee ozi dị ka onye isi njikwa nke ndị ọrụ na ngalaba mmụta na mmepe nke Mahadum ebe o guzobere usoro ndekọ nke imepụta ọzụzụ iduzi ọhụrụ maka ndị isi ngalaba, mechaa mezie ụzọ maka ịkwaga Texas Christian University's Neeley School of Business na ihe egwuregwu ọhụrụ dị ka
Onye isi oche nke TCU Neeley Executive Education
Deakyne malitere ije ozi, dị ka onye isi oche nke Ọrụ maka National Medal of Honor Museum Foundation n'afọ 2020

Jeannie na-egosipụta ǹdú site na nkata iwu ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ebe agụmakwụkwọ dị na Texas, na nkesa akụkọ banyere ndị nnata Medal of Honor anyị, na onye kpali muọ nyere ndị ọbịa no n'ofe ụwa inyocha echiche nke obi ike, ịchụ àjà, ịhụ mba n'anya, ịbụ nwa amaala, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe na ntinye aka, na mụta ka e nwere ike isi gosi ụkpụrụ ndị a na ndụ ha kwa ụbọchị
O mepụtakwala ihe nke ukwuu na obodo North Texas ya

Jeannie jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Arlington Independent School District 2019 Capital Needs Committee Steering Committee, onye so na kọmitii 2014 Capital Needs steering, onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka njide ụmụ amaala 2009, yana ọtụtụ ụkpụrụ na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ọdịmma ego nke mpaghara

Akpọrọ ya aha onye nnata mbụ nke Greater Arlington Chamber of Commerce Women's Alliance Rising Star Award, wee nata Texas PTA's Honorary Life Membership Award na Junior League of Arlington's President's Award

Ihe mgbakwunye ya ugbu a na nke gara aga na ọrụ obodo gụnyere Kọmitii Ọchịchị maka Association of Junior Leagues International, National Vice Chair of Junior Membership (onyinye klas) maka ụmụ nwanyị nke American Revolution, osote onye isi oche nke onye ndu nke Texas Parent Teacher Association, Onye isi oche Arlington Council of PTAs, Onye isi oche nke CC Duff Elementary PTA, Onye isi oche nke Junior League of Arlington, Regent nke Quanah Parker Chapter of DAR, Obodo Arlington Zoning Board of Adjustment, onye isi oche nke Arlington Convention na Visitors Bureau, onye otu bọọdụ nke Greater Arlington Chamber of Commerce, onye otu Board nke Veterans Business Council, na onye otu Women's Alliance Advisory Council
Deakyne bụkwa onye otu Junior League nke Arlington, Texas
Jebli (Jebelia) bụ olumba Arabi tupu Hilalia nke a na-asụ n'ugwu dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Morocco
Jecha bụ aha nna madu
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Jedidah C
Isler bụ onye American astrophysicist, onye nkụzi, na onye na-akwado ịdị iche iche na STEM
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Africa America mbụ mezue PhD ya na astrophysics na Yale na 2014
Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nke Astrophysics na Dartmouth College ugbu a
Nnyocha ya na-enyocha physics nké blazars (oghere ojii na-arụ ọrụ) ma na-enyochaa iyi jet na-esi na ha apụta
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, a kpọrọ Isler ónyé otu Joe Biden's presidential transition Agency Review Team iji kwado mbọ mgbanwe metụtara National Aeronautics and Space Administration
A zụlitere Isler na Niagara Falls, New York ma mesịa Virginia Beach, Virginia
Mmasị ya na nkà mmụta mbara igwe malitere mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na otu ma ọ bụ iri na abụọ
N'iji onyokomita nke nwanne ya nwanyị nyèrè ya màkà ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya, ọ malitere ile kpakpando anya ma na-amụsi ọrụ ike maka ọrụ ọkachamara na sayensị
Obéré ógè tupu ọ gaa kọleji, nna Isler hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ na-akpata nsogbụ ego nke yiri egwu belata agụmakwụkwọ ya
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị PhD ya, Isler gàrà n'ihu na-eme nchọpụta ya site na ọtụtụ nhọpụta nyocha postdoctoral
Site na 2013 ruo 2015, o nwèrè afọ abụọ nke Chancellor's Faculty Fellowship na Mahadum Syracuse
N'afọ 2014, e nyere Isler onyinye Future Faculty Leaders Postdoctoral Fellowship na Harvard São Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics
Mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ meriri na 2015 National Science Foundation Astronomy & Astrophysics Postdoctoral Fellowship na-akwado nyocha ya na Ngalaba Physics na Astronomy na Mahadum Vanderbilt
N'afọ 2015, e nyere Isler onyinye TED Fellowship
Ọ bụ ónyé 2016 National Geographic Emerging Explorer, na 2017 ọ ghọrọ ónyé TED Senior Fellow
N'afọ 2015, Isler guzobere Vanguard Conversations with Women of Color na STEM (VanguardSTEM) dị ka mbinye ákà nkè STEM en Route to Change Foundation (SeRCH Foundation, Inc)

VanguardSTEM bụ usoro weebụ nke gosipụtara ajụjụ ọnụ nke Isler kwadoro ma gosipụta ụmụ nwanyị na-acha uhie uhie na STEM, na-atụle ọrụ na omenala agụmakwụkwọ na nke ọkachamara yana ihe omume ndị dị ugbu a
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị gosipụtara gụnyere Brittany Kamai, DeAndrea Salvador, na Naia Butler-Craig
Ebumnuche webinar a kọwara bụ 'ịmepụta mkparịta ụka n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na-acha uhie uhie na STEM, ebe anyị nwèrè ike ime emume na-akwado njirimara anyị na mmasị STEM n'ebe dị nchebe'
Jeff Sharlet Nwere ike izo aka na
Jeff Sonhouse (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà ihe osise mgbasa ozi ya na-emetụta njirimara Black
A mụrụ Sonhouse na 1968, na New York City, New York
Ọ gàrà kọleji na School of Visual Arts, ebe ọ nwetara nzèrè BFA
na 1998; sochiri ọmụmụ na Hunter College, ebe ọ natara nzèrè MFА
Sonhouse na-ese foto, nke na-abụkarị nke ndị isi ojii nke na-ekwu màkà isiokwu nke njirimara
Sonhouse kwuru, na-ese onyinyo nwoke ojii n'ihi na ọ bụ ónyé m bụ
Ihe osise ya nwèrè ihe ịchọ mma na nkọwa dị ka uwe ọla, ọla na ihe nkpuchi; Sonhouse ga-ejikọta mgbè ụfọdụ n'ime ákwà site na iji mgbasa ozi ngwakọta dị ka glitter, ma ọ bụ beads
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya bụ nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ na-ezo aka na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke jazz
Ihe osise ya, The Son of the Hypocrite (2008), na-ezo aka n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị Afrịka
N'afọ 2002, Sonhouse nwèrè ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya, Tailored Larceny, na Kustera Tilton Gallery
E tinyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi atọ, Legacies Contemporary Artists Reflect on Slavery (2006), na New-York Historical Society
A gụnyere ọrụ Sonhouse na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka ọha na eze na Studio Museum na Harlem, Nasher Museum of Art, Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art
N'afọ 2010, Sonhouse nwèrè ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Los Angeles, California na Martha Otero ihe ngosi ya gbanwere, Better Off Dead, Said the Landlord

Jeffrey Lionel Dahmer (/ ˈdɑːmər/; Mee 21, 1960 - Nọvemba 28, 1994), makwaara dị ka Milwaukee Cannibal ma ọ bụ Milwaukee Monster, bụ onye ogbu mmadụ na onye mejọrọ mmekọahụ nke America bụ onye gburu ogbugbu na mkpọpu nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwoke iri na asaa n'etiti
Ọtụtụ n'ime igbu ọchụ ya mechara gụnyere necrophilia, iri anụ mmadụ, na ichekwa akụkụ ahụ ya kpamkpam - na-abụkarị akụkụ niile ma ọ bụ akụkụ nke ọkpụkpụ￼
Jeffrey Daniels bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka tolitere na Chicago na-ede uri, onye na-ese ihe, na prọfesọ na Harold Washington College
Ọ kụziri na Columbia College Chicago na School of the Art Institute of Chicago
Jeffreycia bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko n'Afrịka si ezinụlọ daisy
Ha nọ na Vernonieae subtribe
Ọ sị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka na Sri Lanka
A na-ahụ ya na mba Ethiopia, Kenya, Madagascar, Mozambique, Somalia na Tanzania
Jeffreycia na adị obere na nke tinyere mgbalitetu, na-enwe alaka, na-agbakarị obere osisi
Ha nwere osisi oghere, nke nwere oghere dị warara ma sie ike
A na-ahazi akwụkwọ ya na petiole ( akwụkwọ oghere) dị iche iche na mkpụmkpụ na ogologo
Akpụkpọ akwụkwọ ya na-adị gburugburu na elliptik ma ọ bụ panduriform (dị ka fiddle) na-enwekarị ọrikul nke basal (dị ka ntị)
Ha dị cm abụọ na ụma (dị otú n'ime) ruo ihe dị ka cm irí na otu (dị anọ n'ime) na ogologo ihe dị ka otu na Ụma ise ruo asaa na ụka ise (dị otu ruo atọ n'ime) n'obosara
Ha nwere crenated (ezé gbara gburugburu) ma ọ bụ akụkụ serrated na apices (isi akwụkwọ) dị nkọ na-esiri ike (na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ebelata ruo n'otu isi) ma na-adịkarịghị kpọọ mpio

Elu elu nke akwụkwọ ahụ bụ obere pilosulous (nke e ji ntutu dị nro, na-adịghị ike, dị gịrịgịrị ma kewaa nke ọma kpuchie) ma ọ bụ hispidulous (nke nwere ogologo, kwụ ọtọ, ntutu siri ike ma ọ bụ bristles)
Ala ala nke akwụkwọ ahụ, bụ obere pilosulous na tomentellous (ihe mkpuchi dị mkpirikpi, ajị dị mkpirisi), nwere ọtụtụ ntụpọ glandular
Akwụkwọ ya nwere akwara abụọ ruo anọ dị n'akụkụ nke ọ bụla, na-agbasa n'ụzọ dị iche iche, na-agbasa site na digrii angle iri anọ na ise ruo iri isii

Okooko osisi ndị ahụ bụ ndị na-agwụ agwụ (na nsọtụ alaka), na alaka na-agbanwekarị ma na-eru digrii angul iri atọ ° ma ọ bụ obere, na-enwekarị obere bracteoles (obere bracts), mgbe ụfọdụ bracteolas bụ ndị buru ibu na foliiform (ụdị akwụkwọ)
A na-ejupụta isi okooko osisi na nsọtụ alaka ndị toro ogologo, na peduncles dị mkpirikpi (ogwe okooko osisi)

Bracts involucral (akwụkwọ ndị gbara okooko osisi ahụ gburugburu) na-adịgide adịgide, subimbricate (na-ekpuchi ntakịrị) n'ihe dị ka usoro nke anọ ma ọ bụ ise na-enwe ọdịiche dị ogologo, linear-lanceolate basal bracts, ma e wezụga na ala
Ha dị nro n'èzí na-enweghị Keep etiti
Ihe nkwakọba ihe ahụ bụ ihe na-adịghị agbagọ agbagọ, epaleate (enweghị mkpuchi), epilose (na-enweghị ntutu), nwere akara na-apụta apụ (na-agba agba)
Isi okooko osisi ahụ nwere okooko osisi iri ise na anọ
Corollas na-acha odo odo, nwee mm ise ruo iri na otu n'ogologo, na ụfọdụ ntụpọ glandular n'èzí
Ha nwere ntutu ole na ole ma ọ bụ enweghị ntutu n'okpuru isi na obere tube nke dị ọkara ogologo dị ka corolla
Olu (nke okooko osisi) bụ ọkara ogologo dị ka aka na ihe dịka ogologo dị ka lobes
Lobes bụ lanceolate siri ike (dị ka ube), na akụkụ kwụ ọtọ site na ala ruo n'elu ma ghara ịlaghachi azụ
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ha na-enwe aji siri ike n'isi
Anther thecae enweghị gland na calcarate na ala (spurred), nwere ọdụ dị warara
Mkpụrụ ndụ endothecial (mkpịsị nke oghere nke anther) enweghị nodes doro anya
Apical appendixes bụ nke dị warara lanceolate
Ụdị ahụ nwere eriri na ntutu na-ekpo ọkụ na isi na-adịghị mma, na-ejedebe na alaka, na-enwekarị ihe dị anya n'elu ntọala nke alaka

Achenes (otu mkpụrụ indehiscent) dị mm abụọ ruo iri anọ na otu n'ogologo, nwere angul anọ ma ọ bụ ise nke oghere dị iche iche, nwere ma ọ bụ na-enweghị gland ma ọ bụ setulae, na idioblasts (mkpụrụ ndụ) gbasasịrị agbasa n'elu mgbe ụfọdụ n'usoro kwụ ọtọ
Mkpụrụ ndụ dị n'ime mgbidi achene bụ mgbidi mkpụrụ ndụ siri ike, nwere obere raphids sub-quadrate (akara ma ọbu ịdị elu nke mkpụrụ ya)
carpopodium stopper-shaped ma ọ bụ ntakịrị turbinate na asymmetrical, nwere ọtụtụ usoro nke sub-quad, nnukwu mgbidi mkpụrụedemede
Pappus (tuft nke ntutu) na-acha ọcha, na-enwe usoro capillary dị n'ime (dị nro), na-adịkarị n'ime akwụkwọ, 45 Xia 70 mm ogologo ma na-ebelata nwayọọ na isi
Ha dịtụ larịị n'elu ala ma usoro dị n'èzí nwere ibe dị mkpirikpi, nkeji ruo mm 05 na ogologo
Aha ụdị nke Jeffreycia bụ nke nsọpụrụ Charles Jeffrey (b
1934), onye Bekee na-ahụ maka ihe ọkụkụ na Kew Gardens na-nlekwasị anya na ihe ọkụkụ ndị China yana ọkachamara na Asteraceae na Cucurbitaceae
Ọ bụ onye dere ọmụmụ nke Vernonieae nke East Tropical Africa
A kọwara ya na mbụ ma bipụta ya na PhytoKeys Vol39 na peeji nke iri ise na itoolu na afọ 2014
