Jehovah bu Chi nke kachasi chi nile

Jeillo Edwards (23 Septemba 1942, Freetown, Sierra Leone 2 Julaị 2004, London, England) bụ onye Sierra Leone na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ama ama na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ojii na Britain
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ sitere n'Afrịka ịmụ ihe nkiri na Guildhall School of Music and Drama nke London
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii mbụ na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn UK bụ ː Dixon nke Dock Green, ma mee ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ na telivisọn Britain, redio, ikpo okwu na ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Jeillo Angela Doris Edwards na Freetown, Sierra Leone, otu n'ime ụmụ isii, ọ gara ụlọakwụkwọ Annie Walsh Memorial School
Ọ kwagara England na ngwụcha afọ 1950 wee gụọ akwụkwọ n'ụlọakwụkwọ Guildhall School of Music and Drama
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ, na-agụ akwụkwọ Bible na chọọchị ya
A maara ya nke ọma maka olu ya pụrụ iche na nkwupụta siri ike
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na United Kingdom, na-apụta na telivishọn, ebe ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ pụtara na telivisọn Britain yana ịbụ onye Afrịka mbụ pụtara na The Bill, redio na n'elu ikpo okwu

Ọ pụtara na ọrụ cameo n'ọtụtụ mmemme telivishọn na-atọ ọchị na Britain, nke gụnyere The Professionals, The League of Gentlemen, Absolutely Fabulous, Red Dwarf, Black Books, Spaced na Little Britain, nke a haziri ka ọ pụta na usoro nke abụọ tupu ọnwụ ya
Tinyere ime ihe nkiri ọ bụkwa onye gọvanọ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'otu oge ma nwee ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ a na-akpọ Auntie J's na Brixton
Na mbido afọ 1970, ọ lụrụ onye Ghana, Edmund Clottey, ha nwere nwa nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Jeillo Edwards nwụrụ na London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na otu, ebe ọ na-arịa ọrịa akụrụ dị egwu
Jelili Atiku bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-akpụ ihe, o si na Lagos, Nigeria
Omume ya gbasara eserese, foto, ntinye ihe ọkpụkpụ, vidiyo na arụmọrụ ndụ emeela ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nkiri a ma ama site na Naịjirịa gburugburu ụwa
E kwuru na ọrụ ya nwere ike nke 'dị na ojiji o ji akara Yoruba na ọdịnala obodo ya'
A mụrụ Atiku na 27 Septemba 1968 na Ejigbo, obodo dị na Lagos Steeti nke Naịjirịa
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka site na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria n'afọ 1998 na Master of Arts na nka ọhụụ na Mahadum Lagos, Nigeria, n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 1998, ọ kụziri nka na Federal Government College, Ikot Ekpene, Akwa Ibom, Nigeria
Site n'afọ 2004 ruo n'afọ 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka osote onye nkuzi mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke Visual Arts, Mahadum nke Lagos
Site na 2011 ruo 2013 ọ bụ onye nkuzi nke Arts and Industrial Designs Department, Lagos State Polytechnic, Ikorodu, Lagos
Ọrụ Atiku na-elekwasị anya na ikike mmadụ na ikpe ziri ezi nke ọha na eze, nke na-ewetakarị ya na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị okwu
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ n'obodo ya bụ Ejigbo na 18th nke Jenụwarị, e jidere ya ma bo ya ebubo n'ụlọ ikpe
E mechara wepu ya na ikpe ahụ mgbe ndị na-ese ihe na ndị otu obodo na ndị mba ọzọ rụgidere ha
N'afọ 2012, Atiku na Helene Aurell (onye na-ese ihe na Sweden), Nigel Wells (onye na-ese ihe na UK / Sweden) na PålGunnäs (onye na-ese ihe na Norway) rụkọrọ ọrụ na arụmọrụ ọ kpọrọ, “In(ut)Flöde'
Ya na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe dị ka Graham Martin na Scarborough, York (United Kingdom); na TOGYG, otu ndị na-ese ihe nke Bangor Greadigol, nke dị na North Wales
N'afọ 2015, o ritere ihe nrite Prince Claus Award
N'afọ 2017, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na-anọchite anya Naịjirịa na Venice Biennale, na Italy
Aráf'́rakù (2013)
Ihe ngosi a lekwasịrị anya na ntụgharị uche Atiku banyere ọnwụ nna ọ na-ahụtụbeghị

'Ọ bụ naanị ya nọ n'ime ọtụtụ awa iri anọ na anọ ebe otu awa na-anọchite anya otu afọ ọ bụla nke ndụ ya, naanị onye a na-ekwe - ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ obere oge - ikere òkè n'oge ahụ bụ nne ya, na-emepụta trilogy nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ transcendental

' Nke sochiri ya bụ arụmọrụ ihu ọha na eze nke na-eṅomi ememe olili ozu Yorùbá 'na-eme ka ókèala dị n'etiti eziokwu na akụkọ ifo dị ka a na-anwa inweta ọnọdụ mmechi site na ngosipụta ọha na eze nke mmetụta uche zuru ụwa ọnụ'

Isi ya bụ Berlin
Mgbe gara-aga ndi Jémanị biara n'ime Afrika nonye ebe Togo na Kameroon

Jemima Osunde ( onye a muru ka ọnwa Eprel dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ) bụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, nakwa onye na-akọwapụta ihe n'onyonyo maọbụ redio
E bidoro ịmata onye ọ bụ nke ọma mgbe ọ kpara agwa dịka Leila n'ihe nkiri onyonyo a kpọrọ Shuga
A họpụtara Osunde dịka Best Actress in a Leading Role mgbe emere 15th Africa Movie Academy Awards maka agwa ọ kpara n'egwuregwu The Delivery Boy n'afọ 2018
Jemima Osunde bụ otu nwa n’ime ezinụlọ mmadụ ise ma bụrụkwa onye Edo State
Ọ gụrụ maka physiotherapy na University of Lagos
Osunde sokwa mee fim akpọrọ Jungle Jewel ka nwanne nna/nne ya jara ya ike isonye n'ihe nkiri egwuregwu
Ọ kpara agwa dika Laila n'ihe nkiri MTV Shuga na sirisi ano egosiri ya, ma jee South Africa maka nke ugboro ise, ọ lọchitere Nigeria maka imeputa ihe nkiri a nke ụgboro isii
N'afọ 2018, ya na Linda Ejiofor so mepụta ihe nkiri Rumour Has It na Ndani TV

Osunde lachitere nke ugboro asaa na ihe nkiri MTV Shuga akpọrọ 'Alone Together' bụ nke a na-egosi kwa anyasị banyere (lockdown) mkpọchibido ụzọ ya mkparịta ụka di n'etiti ndị bụ (ọria nje corona) coronavirus Ndi gosipụtara ihe nkiri a bụ ndi niile kpara agwa na ya , ha gụnyere Lerato Walaza, Mamarumo Marokane na Mohau Cele
N' afọ 2019, Osunde gụrụ na University of Lagos ede ọ nwetara digiri na physiotherapy
Marathon mbụ Sumgong bịara na Las Vegas Marathon na 2006 ma merie na mgbalị mbụ ya, na-ewere aha ụmụ nwanyị n'oge 2 35 22
Ọ bịara nke atọ na Azalea Trail Run n'afọ sochirinụ
O mere nke mbụ ya na Europe na 2007 Frankfurt Marathon ma ọ bịara nke anọ na oge ka mma nke 2 29 41
Njem ọzọ ọ gara n'ihu n'ebe ahụ bịara na San Diego Marathon ma ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 2 30 18 n'azụ Yulia Gromova, onye mmeri nke White Nights Marathon
Ọ debanyere aha ịrụ ọrụ maka ndị agha Kenya na 2009
N'ịkwụsị ịgba ọsọ, ọ lụrụ Noah Talam (onye ọzọ na-agba ọsọ marathon na Kenya) ma di na nwunye ahụ mechara mụọ nwa nwanyị na 2011
N'ịbụ onye na-efu oge 2009, ọ laghachiri na 2010 wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ na San Blas Half Marathon, nke ise na Berlin Half Marathon na nke ise na San Diego Marathon
Mgbe amuchara nwa ya nwanyị, Sumgong laghachiri nke ọma na Disemba 2011 na Castellón Marathon, nke ọ meriri na nke kacha mma nke 2 28 32
Sumgong bụ onye nke asaa na asọmpi asọmpi Kenyan Cross Country Championship na mbido afọ 2012

Na 2012 Boston Marathon, mwepụ dị elu na ọnọdụ ịgba ọsọ na-ekpo ọkụ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụzọ dị mma ka asọmpi ahụ gbadatara na njedebe ọsọ megide Sharon Cherop, na Sumgong na-ewere ebe nke abụọ sekọnd abụọ n'azụ
Sumgong nwalere ihe a machibidoro iwu prednisolone na ule mgbochi ọgwụ ọjọọ ya mgbe ọ gbasịrị ma nye ya mmachibido iwu afọ abụọ site na asọmpi site na Athletics Kenya
Otú ọ dị, IAAF wepụrụ ya na arịrịọ na Septemba 2012, ebe a na-ekwe ka ọgwụ mgbochi mpaghara nke Sumgong natara n'okpuru iwu nke òtù na-achị achị
N'ịbụ onye e wepụrụ ka ọ gbaa ọsọ, Sumgong mechiri ọzọ n'azụ Cherop na Philadelphia Half Marathon nke afọ ahụ, na-ewere ọnọdụ nke atọ
Sumgong meziwanyere nke ukwuu na 2013 Rotterdam Marathon, ebe ọ meriri asọmpi ahụ n'oge nke 2 23 27 na-eme ka akara mbụ ya karịa nkeji isii
O belatara ihe kachasị mma ya maka oge nke abụọ na 2013 na 2 20 48 na njedebe nke abụọ na onye ọzụzụ ya Rita Jeptoo na Chicago Marathon
Sumgong mechiri n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na Boston Marathon na oge kachasị ọsọ nke 2 20 41 (ọdịda ugwu na ọdịdị isi na isi nke usoro Boston pụtara na anaghị ele oge ya anya dị ka nke kachasị mma)
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ mechara nke abụọ na New York City Marathon, na-efunahụ onye obodo ya Mary Keitany, onye mmeri nke sekọnd atọ ya bụ nke kacha dị warara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel, ọ meriri London Marathon na oge nke 2 22 58
Ihe omume ahụ dị ịrịba ama ka ọ dara n'oge ọsọ ahụ, mana ọ ka jisiri ike mechie n'ihu ndị ọzọ
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo n'egwuregwu Olimpik nke Rio na oge nke 2 24 04
Ihe nrite ọla edo nke Sumgong na 2016 Olympic bụ ihe nrite ọlaedo mbụ nke Kenya na marathon Olympic nke ụmụ nwanyị

Sumgong ga-agbachitere aha ya na 2017 London Marathon na Eprel 23, mana izu abụọ tupu asọmpi ahụ, a kwụsịtụrụ ya mgbe ọ nwalere erythropoietin (EPO) na ule na-abụghị asọmpi nke International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF) mere na Kenya, mara ọkwa na Epral 6, 2017
E mechara kwụsị ya ruo afọ anọ na a mara ọkwa ya na 7 Nọvemba 2017 ma mmachibido iwu ya ga-amalite site na 3 Eprel 2017 nke bụ mgbe a kwụsịtụrụ ya nwa oge
E mechara mee ka mmachibido iwu doping ya okpukpu abụọ ruo afọ 8 wee maliteghachi na Jenụwarị 2019 mgbe e weere na ọ ghaara ụgha ma mepụta ihe ndekọ ahụike ya, na-ewepụ ya na asọmpi mba ụwa ruo 2027
Nke a bụ mmachibido iwu doping ya nke abụọ n'ime afọ 5 mgbe ọ nwalere na 2012 kwa
Jemma Nunu Kumba (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan
SPLM họpụtara ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke Revitalised Transitional National Legislative Assembly (R-TNLA)
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-achịkwa ndị omeiwu nke South Sudan
A mụrụ Jemma Nunu Kumba na Tombura County nke Western Equatoria
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ si Tombura County kwaga n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Central Africa
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị site na 1983 ruo 1986 na Juba
N'afọ ndị 1990, Kumba rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ nwere njikọ na Sudan People's Liberation Army (SPLA) wee bụrụ onye nhazi maka New Sudan Council of Churches
Mgbe a họpụtara di ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Sudan People's Liberation Movement (SPLM) na Namibia, Kumba sooro ya kwaga
Mgbe ọ nọ na Nambia, ọ debara aha ya na Mahadum nke Namibia, na-amụ ọrụ nchịkwa ọha na eze site na 1999 ruo 2002
N'afọ 2002, o sonyere na mkparịta ụka udo maka SPLM na Kenya
Mgbe nkwekọrịta udo zuru oke (CPA) gasịrị na 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu na Khartoum
Kumba bụ onye otu SPLM
Kumba bụ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka gọvanọ mgbe CPA gasịrị
A họpụtara ya dịka Gọvanọ nke Western Equatoria State n'afọ 2008
Ọ meriri na ntuli aka Eprel 2010 maka gọvanọ na Bangassi Joseph Mario Bakosoro
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ụlọ na atụmatụ ahụike na Cabinet nke South Sudan

N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2013, onye isi ala South Sudan Salva Kiir Mayardit wepụrụ ọtụtụ ndị minista na ndị nnọchi anya, na-ebugharị Kumba ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik, mmiri, mmiri na mmiri
Ka ọ na-erule Julaị afọ 2016 ọ bụ Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa anụ ọhịa na njem nleta
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2015, Onye isi ala Kiir Mayardit, họpụtara Kumba ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke SPLM
N'otu oge ahụ, Salva Kiir gbasara ndị odeakwụkwọ mba ma nye Kumba ọrụ ịtụ aro ndị odeakwụkwọ ọhụrụ
Ọ nọchiri Anne Itto Leonardo n'ọkwa osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke SPLM
A ṅụrụ Kumba iyi na 13 Nọvemba 2015
Ọ lụrụ Festo Kumba, onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba anụmanụ na azụ
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ anọ
Jems Robert Koko Bi bụ onye Ivory Coast na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na 1966, na Sifra, Ivory Coast
Ọ gụrụ maka akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Spain n'etiti afọ 1986 na 1988 na Mahadum Abidjan
N'etiti afọ 1988 na 1995 ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Institut National Supérieur des Arts et de l'Action Culturelle (INSAAC) na Abidjan
N'afọ 1997, ọ meriri DAAD scholarship wee kwaga Germany ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kunstakademie Düsseldorf ya na Klaus Rinke
Jems Robert Koko Bi na-eji osisi dị ka ihe na-eme ihe n'ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
Mmepụta ya gụnyekwara arụmọrụ
Na Jenụwarị 19, 2019 ọnwa na na na Julian na Gregorian calender ma bu kwa nke mbu n’ onwa nke asaa nwere ogologo ubochi 31
A maara ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa ahụ dị ka Ụbọchị Afọ Ọhụrụ

Ọ bụ, ná nkezi, ọnwa kasị oyi n'afọ n'ime ọtụtụ n'ime Northern Hemisphere (ebe ọ bụ ọnwa nke abụọ nke oyi) na ọnwa kacha okpomọkụ nke afọ n'ime ọtụtụ n'ime Southern Hemisphere (ebe ọ bụ ọnwa nke abụọ nke okpomọkụ)
Na mpaghara ndịda, Jenụwarị bụ oge oge ya na Julaị na mpaghara ugwu yana ọzọ
Ememe ndị Rom oge ochie n'ime ọnwa a gụnyere Cervula na Juvenalia, nke a na-eme na Jenụwarị 1, yana otu n'ime Agonalia atọ, nke a na-eme na Jenụwarị 9, na Carmentalia, nke a na-eme na Jenụwarị 11
Ụbọchị ndị a adabaghị na kalenda Gregorian nke oge a
A na-akpọ Jenụwarị (na Latin, Ianuarius) Janus, chi nke mmalite na mgbanwe na akụkọ ifo ndị Rom
Wednesday nke izu nke atọ zuru ezu nke Jenụwarị

Jenụwarị 30 ma ọ bụ Sọnde kacha nso

Dza, ejikwa Jen were mara, bụ asụsụ ndị Adamawa nke Naijiria
Jenefer Shute bụ onye edemede nke akwụkwọ akụkọ anọ N'ịdị ndụ, Mpụ Mmekọahụ, Fall Fall na NJ onye ọrụ
Odekwala akwụkwọ maka Harper's, The Nation, saloncom, The Guardian, Tikkun, Boston Review, na Modern Fiction Studies
Amụrụ ya na Johannesburg, South Africa, ọ bi ugbu a na Hudson, New York

O nwere PhD na akwụkwọ sitere na Mahadum California ma bụrụ, ruo n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, prọfesọ na Hunter College of the City University of New York, bụ ebe ọ kụziiri ihe na mmemme MFA na edemede okike
Ọ kụzikwara ihe na Emerson College na Boston, Mahadum Paris , na Mahadum Cape Town, bụ ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na Bekee
Site n'afọ 2012 ruo afọ 2016, o biri na Cape Town wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ akụkọ ifo maka Penguin Random House, South Africa
Jenevieve Aken (a mụrụ n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ese foto n'obodo ukwu, na-elekwasị anya na omenala na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọrụ ya na-agbakarị gburugburu ahụmịhe onwe ya na nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya gbasara ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị
Aken na-emekwa ihe ngosi na ọrụ eserese onwe ya
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Lagos Photo Festival
Aken bi ugbu a na Lagos, Nigeria
Aken tolitere na obere obodo Ikom Aluk na Cross River State
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere ma ọ bụghị ya na nna ya bi
Nna ya bụ onye ọdịnala ma ọ chọghị ka ọ na-eti egwu
N'ihi ya, ha kewara
O dere egwu sitere na ahụmịhe ndụ ya, otu egwu akpọrọ 'Make It Through The Race'
Mgbe obere oge ya na egwu gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu ịnwa ime ihe nkiri mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, o wepụrụ nke ahụ n'akụkụ
O mechara nweta ezumike mbụ ya na Vilsco Fashion Show ma ghọtakwa eziokwu siri ike nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụlọ ọrụ ịme ihe ngosi
Ọ bụ ahụmịhe ya na ịme ihe ngosi nke mere ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na foto
O debara aha na Market Photo workshop, Johannesburg, South Africa mana o nweghị ike ịmecha ọmụmụ ihe ahụ ka ọ chọpụtara ohere na asọmpi British Council Model of the Year
Ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ iji sonye na MTN Lagos Fashion & Design Week
Ka ọ kwụsịrị imecha klas foto ya, ọ gwara Pulseng 'M ga-alaghachi iji gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ foto m
Amaara m na foto na ịme ihe ngosi bụ ọrụ dị arọ ịrụ mana enwere m mmasị maka ha abụọ ma m ga-eme ha abụọ n'otu oge ruo ogologo oge m nwere ike,' na ajụjụ ọnụ
Aken ahụla ihe ịga nke ọma na foto n'agbanyeghị ịmecha klas site na isonye na Lagos Photo Festival
Usoro foto a na-edekọ ụmụ nwanyị nọ na Berlin, Germany ka ha na-agbasi mbọ ike ịbanye na ọrụ 'a kapịrị ọnụ' nke ụmụ nwanyị na ọha mmadụ
Ihe oyiyi ndị a na-egosi usoro ụmụ nwanyị na-achụso ọrụ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwoke na-achịkwa
Ụmụ nwanyị nọ na foto ndị ahụ na-enwe mmetụta siri ike banyere ọrụ ha ma nwee obi ike na ọrụ ha na-arụ n'agbanyeghị ọdịiche dị n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị
Nke a bụ oji na ọcha, usoro eserese onwe onye nke pụtara iji gosipụta ụmụ nwanyị na ọrụ ha na omenala Naịjirịa
Ihe oyiyi ndị a na-egosi udo na mmezu onwe onye nke nwanyị na-enweghị echiche dị oke nke ụmụ nwanyị na omenala Naịjirịa
Ihe oyiyi ndị ahụ na-enyocha otú ụmụ nwanyị nwere ike isi nwee mmetụta nke ihe 'ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị ekwesị' kwesịrị ime dị ka ọha mmadụ
Foto ndị a bụ iji gosipụta ụmụ nwanyị ndị mebiri ihere ndị a mana ha na-eche na ụkpụrụ nke ọha mmadụ kewapụrụ ha
N'ime usoro a, Aken na-atụ anya ịkpali ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa ime nnwere onwe ha n'agbanyeghị echiche ndị dị n'èzí
Site na mkpali nke Charles Dickens, Great Expectations, Akens mepụtara usoro a iji gosipụta nrụgide ụmụ nwanyị, ọkachasị ndị Afrịka, ịlụ di
Akens na-anwa igosi otú ọbụna ụmụ nwanyị kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma nwere ike isi nwee ihe ịga nke ọma ruo mgbe ha lụrụ n'ihi nrụgide mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Usoro foto a nke Aken dabeere na omenala a na-akpọ Monankim nke sitere n'ebo ndị Bakor
Monankim bụ ọdịnala na omenala Bakor nke na-ebi ụmụ nwanyị úgwù wee mee ememe dịka ọ bụ ihe nnọchianya nke ịbanye n'ibu nwanyị zụrụ oke
A na-ahụta ọdịnala a dị ka ikike nke ngafe ma na-efe nwanyị ofufe mgbe emechara usoro ahụ
Omenala a na-arụrịta ụka dịka usoro ahụ dị ize ndụ ma na-eyi ndụ egwu
Aken na-edekọ echiche na-emegide Monankim site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị nọ na ọha mmadụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ na-ahụ usoro ahụ dị ka ihe na-akpali akpali, ndị ọzọ na-enwe obi abụọ maka echiche ahụ
E debere usoro foto a n'ụsọ osimiri a na-akpọ Takwa Bay nke bụ ebe a ma ama maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na-egwu mmiri na mmiri
A maara Takwa Bay maka ikwe ka ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-emekọrịta ihe

Jeni Couzyn (amụrụ ya na1942) bụ onye na- ede uri nwanyị na ọkà mmụta ihe omimi nke mmịpụta South Afrika nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Canada na United Kingdom
Nchịkọta a kacha mara amara bụ nke akpọrọ Ndụ site na mmiri mmiri Abụ ahọpụtara (1985), nke gụnyere usoro izizi Oge A ga-amụ (1981) nke na-akọwa afọ ime ya na ọmụmụ nwa ya nwanyị
A mụrụ Couzyn na South Afrika wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal
Ọ kwagara Britain n'afọ 1966 wee guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye edemede nweere onwe ya
Ọ ghọrọ nwa amaala Canada n'afọ 1975 na afọ na-esote a họpụtara onye ode akwụkwọ na Mahadum Victoria, British Columbia
Kemgbe ahụ o kewara oge ya n'etiti England, Canada, na South Afrika
Nchịkọta mbụ Couzyn bụ nke akpọrọ Flying (1970)
Nchịkọta ndị ọzọ gụnyere Christmas in Africa (1975), A Time to be Born (1981), Life by Drowning Selected poems (1985), na That's It (1993)
Oge a ga-amụ gbasara ọmụmụ nwa site na 'ịtụrụ ime ruo n'oge a mụrụ na nwata'
The Oxford Companion to Twentieth- Century Literature na bekee na- ekwu na abụ Couzyn na-etinye aka ugboro ugboro na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na echiche nke ịbụ nwanyị
A kọwawo uri ya dị ka nke pere mpe
The Oxford Companion na-achọpụta na echiche ya banyere uri dị ka ọnụ na-ebu ụzọ pụta ìhè na-enye ọtụtụ ọrụ ya idoanya na ngwa ngwa
Couzyn deziri ihe mmetụta The Bloodaxe Book of Contemporary Women Poets (1985), nke edobere ka ederede A-larịị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Britain n'oge ahụ
Edemede akwụkwọ akụkọ mechara, Singing Down the Bones (1989), bụ ndị na-ege ntị n'afọ iri na ụma
Couzyn edeela akwụkwọ abụọ maka ụmụaka
Na Julie Malgas, o mepụtara ọmụmụ nke Koos Malgas, onye na-ese ihe na-enyere aka ịmepụta Ụlọ Owl, ihe ngosi nka na Nieu-Bethesda, Eastern Cape, South Africa, kwuru maka echiche ọhụụ ya
Jenifer Abaho Muheesi bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị Ugandan nke Kazo District n'okpuru National Resistance Movement (NRM) na nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Jenifer nọdụrụ asambodo agụmakwụkwọ ya na Uganda site na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị nke Kibura
Onye bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka nlekota akụ na ụba, Molly Kamukama tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa na-egbochi nhọpụta Jennifer Muheesi dị ka onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ NRM maka Kazo District Woman Member of Parliament
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu dị na Mbarara jụrụ nke ahụ na-azọrọ na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement mebiri na mmebi iwu mgbe e meriri Molly

Jenipher Kacha Namuyangu, onye a na-akpọkwa Jennifer Namuyangu Byakatonda, mana a na-ekwukarị ya dị ka Jennifer Namuyang, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
Ọ bụ Minista nke Steeti maka Gọọmentị Obodo na Kọmitii Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Steeti maka Ihe onwunwe Mmiri, site na 1 June 2006 ruo 27 May 2011
Na ntuli aka nke Cabinet na 27 Mee 2011, e wepụrụ ya na kansụl ma jiri Betty Bigombe dochie ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Pallisa District, site na 2001 ruo 2011
N'afọ 2010, e kewara Mpaghara Pallisa abụọ, iji mepụta Mpaghara Kibuku
Namuyangu sonyere n'ọkwa onye omeiwu nke Kibuku County, Kibuku District
Saleh Kamba meriri ya site n'ụzọ dị ukwuu
Namuyangu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kibuku maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya, tupu ọ gaa Iganga Sekọndrị Skul , ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ A-Level
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum kachasị ochie na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Science na Forestry, na 1993
Ọ nwetakwara nzere masta nke sayensị na Agroforestry na Mahadum Makerere, n'afọ otu puku narị itoolu, nari itoolu na isii
Site na 1994 ruo 1996, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa maka Eastern Uganda na National Resistance Council, ụlọ ọrụ ndị omeiwu n'oge ahụ
Site na 1997 ruo 1998, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Nyabyeya Forestry College na Masindi District
Ọ sonyeere Ministry of Lands and the Environment, na Ngalaba Ọhịa, dị ka onye isi mmepe mkpụrụ, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ site na 1998 ruo 2001
N'afọ 2001, ọ laghachiri na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma họpụta ya ka ọ nọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Pallisa District na ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'otu ọkwa ahụ n'afọ 2006
N'agbata afọ 2003 na afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke State maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
A họpụtara ya dị ka Minista Steeti maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Osimiri na 1 June 2006, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo 27 May 2011
N'agbata afọ 2013 na 2016, ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii nke Ministry of Finance, Planning and Economic Development

Namuyangu bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị minista gọọmentị na ndị omeiwu National Resistance Movement bụ ndị meriri na ntuli aka nke pati ha ma mebie ntụziaka nke Onye isi ala Museveni, ka ha ghara iguzo dị ka ndị nweere onwe ha, kama inye onwe ha ka ha guzo dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa ndị omeiwu n'onwe ha n'afọ 2011
Ọ lụrụ ọgụ megide onye otu NRM ibe ya, Saleh Kamba (onye omeiwu na-arụ ọrụ n'oge ahụ na onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ NRM) maka oche 'Kibuku County', na-efunahụ ya site n'ụzọ sara mbara
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016, Namuyangu sonyere na Kabweri County Constituency, na tiketi NRM Party
Ọ meriri ma bụrụ onye nọ n'ọkwa
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista Steeti maka Gọọmentị Obodo

Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị
Jenna Cato Bass (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri South Africa, onye na-ese foto na onye edemede
O deela akụkọ stort n'okpuru aha Constance Myburgh, otu n'ime ha edepụtara n'ihi 2012 Caine Prize
A mụrụ Bass na London, England ọ ma tolite na South Africa
Ọ na-eme anwansi na College of Magic
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Cape Town campus nke AFDA, The School for the Creative Economy
N'afọ 2011 Bass hiwere Jungle Jim, magazin akụkọ ifo
Nkebi nke isii gosipụtara akụkọ nchọpụta ya 'Hunter Emmanuel', nke gosipụtara nyocha banyere nwanyị akwụna a gbupụrụ akpụ
E depụtara akụkọ a n'ihe banyere Caine Prize for African Writing na 2012
High Fantasy (afọ 2017) bụ ihe na-akpali akpali màkà otu ndị njem na-eto eto bụ ndị na-agbanwe ahụ ha n'ụzọ dị omimi na njem mara ụlọikwuu
A gbagburu ya ọzọ na iPhones site na iji improvisation, ihe nkiri ahụ nyochara 'mgbagwoju anya nke agbụrụ, klas na njirimara nwoke na nwanyị na South Africa nke oge a'
Flatland (afọ 2019), nwanyị niile 'South African kitsch-western genre mashup', a gbara ya na mmefu ego buru ibu
A họọrọ ya dị ka ihe nkiri mmeghe na 2019 Berlinale Panorama
Jenna Brooks (a mụrụ 16 Eprel, 1983) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee
Enye ama odụk okenye ịse ụlọ ọrụ na 2001 na afọ na 18 ma pụtara ihe karịrị 40 nkiri

Prandini bịara Mahadum Oregon na otu nzere egwu egwu atọ ahụ, na-emeri ihe omume atọ niile (100m, 200m na ​​ogologo jump) na 2011 CIF California State Meet for Clovis High School na Clovis, California
N'afọ nke nta ya, ọ meriri ma mwụ elu ogologo na nke atọ ma gụchaa nke abụọ na 100 mita
N'afọ 2011, o meriri US Junior Championship n'ọwụ elu ogologo
Jennie Kim ( Korean ; amuru na abalị iri na ise na onwa mbụ, na afọ1996), nke amara aha ya dika Jennie, bu onye South Korea na-abụ abụ na onye na-agụ egwu
Amụrụ ma zụlite na South Korea, Jennie gụrụ akwụkwọ na New Zealand afọ ise tupu ọ laghachi South Korea na 2010
Ọ rụrụ arụ dị ka onye so na otu nwa agbọghọ Blackpink, nke YG Entertainment hibere, na August 2016
Na Nọvemba 2018, Jennie mere mpụta mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe na otu ' Solo '
Egwu a bụ ihe ịga nke ọma azụmahịa n'ime ụlọ na nke mba ụwa, na-ebuli ma Gaon Digital Chart na Billboard ' World Digital Songs chart
A mụrụ Jennie Kim na Cheongdam-dong, Gangnam-gu, Seoul na Jenụwarị 16, 1996, dịka naanị nwa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Cheongdam na Seoul tupu ọ kwaga New Zealand
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya gara njem gaa Australia na New Zealand

Mgbe nne ya jụrụ ya ma New Zealand ọ masịrị ya ma chọọ ịnọrọ, Jennie zara “ee”; Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, e zigara ya ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Waikowhai Intermediate School dị na Auckland ma soro ezinụlọ na-anọ n'ụlọ biri
Jennie kwuru gbasara ahụmịhe ya ịmata asụsụ ọhụrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ MBC Bekee, Must Change to Survive (2006)
N'oge ọ na-eto eto, ọ tụrụ anya ịghọ onye na -agba egwú ballet
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị etiti, ọ debara aha na ACG Parnell College
Mgbe Jennie malitere ịrapara na mbụ, ọ mụtara ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe na-amasị ya ma kwanyere ya ùgwù, dị ka Lauryn Hill na TLC
Jennie zoro aka na Rihanna dị ka isi mmetụta egwu ya na ihe nlereanya
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Blackpink's The Album, Jennie gere ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Lana Del Rey, Billie Eilish, Harry Hudson, HER na Kacey Musgraves
Onye nkuzi olu Shin Yoo-mi, onye ya na Blackpink rụkọrọ ọrụ ruo afọ isii ruo mpụta mbụ ha, zụrụ Jennie maka mpụta mbụ ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, Shin kọwara Jennie dị ka onye na-egwu ọtụtụ egwuregwu nwere nkà maka ịbụ abụ, rapping na ide egwu
Jennie malitere ịgụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji na ile ányá ụdị uwe dị iche iche mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Mmasị ya na ejiji sitere na nne ya

Jennie gwara Elle Indonesia na Chanel bụ akụkụ nke ndụ ya site na nwata nakwa na ọ ka na-echeta ncheta mbụ ya gbasara ụlọ ejiji 'Echetara m mgbe m dị obere, m na-eleba anya na uwe mama m, na-achọkwa Chanel ọ bụla
Enwere m ike ịchọta'
Maka mpụta mbụ ya, o tinyere aka na nhazi na ịhazi uwe nke ya wee tinye ihe karịrị uwe 20 maka vidiyo egwu nke 'Solo'

Jennie chetara na ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Billboard gbara na n’oge a na-ese vidio egwú, ọ tụlere otú onye nke ọ bụla ga-esi kwekọọ n’abụ ahụ na ihe ọ pụrụ ịgbanwe, bụ́ nke nyeere ya aka ịmụta ọtụtụ ụzọ ọhụrụ e si abịaru ejiji
O kwuru na N'ajụjụ ọnụ Elle Korea gbara ya na ejiji ghọrọ akụkụ dị mkpa n'ọrụ ya ka ọ na-agbalị iziga ozi egwu ya ma n'ọnụ ma n'anya
Jennie na-asụ Korean na Bekee nke ọma yana Japanese bụ isi
Ọ mụtakwara ịsụ French
Jennie, bụ ngwá ọrụ na ihe oyiyi ejiji Blackpink, ka a na-akpọ 'Human Gucci' na 'Human Chanel'
Pọtụfoliyo ụdị ya sitere na Gucci na Saint Laurent ruo na aha niche dị ka Marine Serre na Richard Quinn

Ụdị ejiji nke Jennie nwetara akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù maka ihe omume ejiji dị ka Saint Laurent's Summer 17 Collection Launch Party nke Anthony Vaccarello, Chanel's Mademoiselle Privé ngosi, na Prada 's Comics Collection Launch Party
Chanel họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ mgbe o kwuchara mmetụta azụmahịa ya dị egwu
Ntutu isi Jennie yi na nkebi ise na ise n'oge ọ na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ 'Solo' na-ewu ewu ozugbo na South Korea ma kpọọ ya 'ntutu ntutu Jennie'
Jane 'Jennie' Collins (1828-1887) bụ onye America na-eme mgbanwe ọrụ, onye ọrụ ebere, na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị
N'ịbụ nwa mgbei dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ kwadoro onwe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ owuwe ihe ubi, ma mesịa bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ezinụlọ na onye na-akwa akwa
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na abolitionist na ọrụ ndị ọrụ, wepụtara onwe ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha n'oge Agha Obodo, ma guzobe ọrụ ebere maka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na Boston
N'afọ 1870, mgbe Susan B
Anthony kpọrọ ya, ọ gwara mgbakọ National Woman Suffrage Association na Washington okwu
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na United States iji bipụta mpịakọta nke ihe odide ya Nature's Aristocracy; Ma ọ bụ, Agha na Ọnyá n'oge udo
Arịrịọ Maka Ndị A Na-emegbu Mkpọrọ
A mụrụ Jennie Collins na ịda ogbenye na Amoskeag, New Hampshire (nke bụzi akụkụ nke Manchester), na 1828
N'ịbụ nwa mgbei mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, nne nne ya Quaker zụlitere ya, onye nwụrụ mgbe Jennie dị afọ iri na anọ
A hapụrụ ya ka ọ na-elekọta onwe ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge na ụlọ ọrụ owuwe ihe ubi nke Lawrence na Lowell, mgbe ahụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ Judge John Lowell na Boston
Site na 1861 ruo 1870 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme uwe maka Macullar, Williams & Parker, onye na-emepụta uwe nke ndị nwe ya mechara nyere aka kwado ọrụ ebere ya
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Boston, ọ gara klas mgbede na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma kụzie klas akụkọ ihe mere mere eme n'onwe ya na Church of the Unity
Collins bụ onye na-enwe mmasị na onye ụkọchukwu Unitarian Theodore Parker, onye na-ekwusa ozi ọma na Boston n'oge ahụ
O nwekwara mmasị miri emi na Spiritualism, òtù okpukpe nke jikọtara ya na ọrụ na ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Collins bụ onye na-emegide ịgba ohu, dịka Parker
N'oge Agha Obodo, ọ wepụtara onwe ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha, kụziere ụmụ ndị agha, ma hazie otu ụmụ nwanyị obodo na-arụ ọrụ ebere maka ndị agha Union n'oge ezumike ha
Mgbe ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme uwe elu, Collins malitere ikwu okwu banyere ọrụ na nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị na ime mkpọsa maka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'otu ihe omume, ebe ọ bụ naanị nwanyị na-ekwu okwu, ọ kwuru okwu iji kwado Ulysses S
Grant, Charles Sumner, na William Claflin
O mere okwu ihu ọha mbụ ya na 1868, na Washington Hall, iji kwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bịakwutere isiokwu ahụ site n'echiche ndị ọrụ, dịka Margaret Foley mere ọtụtụ iri afọ ka e mesịrị
N'otu afọ ahụ, o kwuru okwu na nzukọ nhazi nke Daughters of St
Crispin, otu ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na United States
Aha ya toro, ọ ghọkwara otu n'ime ndị isi okwu na Boston n'okwu ndị dị ka mgbanwe ọrụ ụmụaka, ụbọchị awa asatọ, na ụgwọ ọrụ ka mma na ọnọdụ ọrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1869 ọ sonyeere National Labor Reform League ma nyere aka hazie Boston Working Women's League
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke 1869 ọ kwuru okwu iji kwado ndị ọrụ na-eme ngagharị iwe na Cocheco Mill na Dover, New Hampshire
N'otu ihe omume, ọ gwara ìgwè mmadụ okwu na Huntington Hall na Lowell, ebe ọ kpọrọ oku ka a kwụsị ya 'Anyị ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ ga-eyi uwe osisi fig tupu anyị agaa ụlọ ọrụ Cocheco
' Okwu ya na-akpali akpali dọtara ọkwa nke onye suffragist Susan B
Anthony, onye kpọrọ Collins ka ọ kwuo okwu na mgbakọ 1870 nke National Woman Suffrage Association
Okwu ya na Union League Hall na Washington bụ 'ihe ịga nke ọma'
Otu onye na-ekiri ihe na-emenụ mechara dee na Collins 'na-akọ akụkọ ya n'ụzọ dị nro, nke na anya ole na ole na-akpọnwụ n'oge okwu ya'
N'oge ọkọchị nke 1870, site na nkwado nke ndị isi azụmaahịa mpaghara, Collins guzobere Boffin's Bower, ebe mmekọrịta maka ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ, na 813 Washington Street
Aha ya pụrụ iche sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Dickens, Our Mutual Friend
Dị ka Collins kọwara mgbe e mesịrị, 'Ọ bụrụ na m kpọrọ ebe m 'Headquarters for Working Women', ma ọ bụ aha ọ bụla yiri ya, ọ gaghị adọta uche ọ bụla
Mana mgbe m tinyere ihe ịrịba ama 'Boffin's Bower' onye ọ bụla gbagara n'ime ụlọ ahụ iji hụ ihe ebe ahụ bụ
M mere ọtụtụ ndị enyi na ndị enyi n'ụzọ ahụ, ma nweta enyemaka dị ukwuu
' Boffin's Bower malitere n'ụzọ dị ala dị ka ụlọ ịnọdụ ala nwere piano, ma gbasaa iji tinye ụlọ ọgụgụ nwere akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, na ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na igwe ịkwa akwa
Bower nyere nri na uwe maka ndị nọ ná mkpa, na ebe obibi nwa oge maka ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ụmụ nwanyị na-enweghị ebe obibi
Site na njikọ ya na azụmaahịa mpaghara, Collins nyeere ọtụtụ narị ụmụ nwanyị aka ịchọta ọrụ kwa afọ; n'etiti ha, ndị ọrụ nwanyị mbụ nke Boston Post Office
N'oge pụrụ iche ọ haziri maka ntụrụndụ; e nwere nri abalị Krismas, ọgụgụ na-atọ ọchị, egwu egwu, na nkuzi nke ndị ọkà okwu obodo dị ka Julia Ward Howe
Collins maara na ọrụ ebere enweghị ike idozi ihe kpatara ịda ogbenye, ọ nọgidekwara na-agbalị ime ihe ndị ọzọ
N'otu oge, o mere atụmatụ imeghe 'ụlọ akwụkwọ nri', na 1871 ọ rịọrọ ndị omeiwu steeti maka enyemaka n'ịmepụta Òtù Ụmụ Nwa agbọghọ na-eto eto iji nye ndị ọrụ na-enweghị nkà ọzụzụ ọrụ
Site na Working Women's League, ya na Aurora Phelps gbalịrị ịmepụta obodo na-achịkwa ụmụ nwanyị a na-akpọ 'Aurora' n'ime ime obodo Massachusetts, mana ha enweghị ike ịnakọta ego zuru ezu
Ka ọ dịgodị, Collins nwere mkpa ndị 'ụmụ agbọghọ' ya ozugbo iji lekọta
N'afọ 1872, nnukwu ọkụ ọkụ nke Boston bibiri 65 acres nke etiti obodo Boston
Ọtụtụ narị ụmụ nwanyị ndị a chụrụ n'ọrụ, na n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ ụlọ ha, gbakọtara na Bower maka enyemaka
Iji nweta ego maka Boffin's Bower, Collins nyere nkuzi a kwụrụ ụgwọ ma hazie ihe ngosi kwa afọ
O nyekwara aka n'ọtụtụ ego sitere n'akwụkwọ ya, Nature's Aristocracy, nke Russell Conwell dezigharịrị ma bipụta na 1871
Collins bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na United States bipụtara mpịakọta nke ihe odide ya

Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nchịkọta nke ihe osise akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, arụmụka, na ihe osise efu, nke na-adabere na arụmụka na ọha mmadụ America ahapụla echiche ndị dị na Iwu ahụ, na-emepụta aristocracy rụrụ arụ na ọkwa dị ize ndụ nke enweghị nhata akụ na ụba
N'agbanyeghị enweghị agụmakwụkwọ ya, ma eleghị anya ndị edemede na-arụ ọrụ dịka Lucy Larcom nakwa Dickens kpaliri ya, Collins rọrọ nrọ maka ọrụ edemede nke na-emetụbeghị
O dere n'ụzọ na-akpali akpali banyere nsogbu nke ndị nne na-arụ ọrụ na-enweghị ike ịnweta nlekọta ụmụaka dị ọnụ ala, ụmụ nwanyị a na-akwụ ụgwọ agụụ, na ụmụ agbọghọ a ghọgburu ụgwọ ha
N'afọ 1874, ụlọ ọrụ State Bureau of Labor Statistics chọrọ ntinye aka ya maka akụkọ gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na Boston
Ọ lụbeghị di
Ndị ya na ha dịkọrọ ndụ nwere ike ịkọwa ya n'okwu na-adịghị mma na nke na-adọrọ mmasị onye na-enweghị nsọpụrụ na onye na-alụ ọgụ; onye nwere ọgụgụ isi, onye nwere ọgụgụ uche, na onye nwere obiọma
Nkọwa onye nta akụkọ na Sacramento Daily Union bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị

Obere, dị gịrịgịrị, akụkụ, dị nro, ogologo oge gafere okooko osisi nke ndị ntorobịa, na-eme ihere na omenala niile nke ọha mmadụ ma ọ bụ rostrum, ọ bụ onye mmeri na onye na-ekwuchitere ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ nke New England
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-arịa ụkwara ume ọkụ, Collins nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike ruo ọgwụgwụ ndụ ya
O nyere aka nke ukwuu na akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ, yana ibipụta akụkọ kwa afọ maka Boffin's Bower
N'ime afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, ọ biri n'ụlọ enyi di ya nwụrụ aha ya bụ Eveline J
Pillsbury, na nwanne Pillsbury
N'afọ 1887, ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ enyi ya na Brookline
Ihe ịrịba ama ili ya na Walnut Hills Cemetery na-agụ, 'Jennie Collins, Enyi Nwa agbọghọ na-arụ ọrụ, na Onye guzobere 'Boffin's Bower'
Ọ nwụrụ na Julaị 20, 1887, mgbe ọ dị afọ 59
Boffin's Bower bu South End House, nke a na-ewere dị ka ụlọ obibi mbụ nke Boston, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ

Ọ bụ ezie na Boffin's Bower rụrụ ọtụtụ n'ime otu ọrụ ahụ dị ka ụlọ obibi, ọ bụghị ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu, ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ na kọleji na-eme mgbanwe na-ezube ịmụ nsogbu nke ndị ogbenye na-arụ ọrụ, kama ọ bụ nwanyị na-arụsi ọrụ ike maara ha

Mgbe Collins nwụsịrị, otu òtù ọrụ ebere ụmụ nwanyị a na-akpọ Helping Hand Society weghaara ọrụ nke Boffin's Bower, na-emeghe ụlọ obibi dị ala maka ụmụ agbọghọ na-arụ ọrụ na Carver Street (nke bụzi Charles Street South), na nso Women's Educational and Industrial Union
Rev
Edward Everett Hale kwuru n'oge ahụ na ụlọ iri atọ ma ọ bụ iri anọ dị otú ahụ dị mkpa na Boston
Mahadum Nebraska bipụtara mbipụta ọhụrụ nke Nature's Aristocracy na 2010
N'okwu mmeghe ya, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Judith Ranta na-akpọ ya 'mgbalị mbụ nke onye edemede US nke nzụlite ma ọ bụ okike ọ bụla iji mepụta nkọwa zuru oke nke ndụ ndị ọrụ'
A na-echeta Jennie Collins na Boffin's Bower na Boston Women's Heritage Trail
Jennifer Alanyo bụ dọkịta Uganda, onye agha na onye omeiwu
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị agha na-echebe ndị Uganda (UPDF) na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Alanyo bụ dọkịta site na ọrụ, ọ bụkwa onye agha UPDF na ọkwa nke Major
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ahụike dị elu na UPDF ma na-eduzi ndị otu ahụike UPDF, nke n'etiti ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka usoro nchịkọta UPDF inoder iji nweta ndị agha nwere ahụike
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu iji nọchite anya ndị agha Uganda People's Defense Forces (UPDF) na aro sitere na kansụl ndị agha na ntuli aka ndị ọrụ agha
Oso na umunwayi ato ahoputara na of UPDF in parliament, ndi ozo gunyere, Charity Bainababo and Victor Nekesa
Na nzuko omeiwu, ọ na-eje ozi na kọmitii sayensị, teknụzụ na ihe ọhụrụ

Jennifer Ayoo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye omeiwu na omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Kalaki District ona Teso Sub-Region nke Eastern Uganda Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement(NRM)
Ayoo meriri na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement mgbe o meriri Maria Gorretti Ajilo onye bụbu onye omeiwu maka Kaberamaido District
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka afo 2021
Ayoo nyere aka n'ọgụ megide mgbasawanye nke coronavirus na Uganda site n'inye igbe nke ọgwụ mkpá akwụkwọ Covidex na Ngwá Ọrụ Nchebe onwe onye ((PPEs) gụnyere Sanitizers na igbe ihe nkpuchi ihu
Ọ bụ Kọmitii Task Force nke COVID-19 nke Kalaki District (RDC), Paul Kalikwani duziri, natara onyinye Ayoo
Jennifer Cudjoe (amụrụ na 7 Machị 1994) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti NJ / NY Gotham FC na National Women's Soccer League (NWSL)
Cudjoe bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nwa oge na Sky Blue FC maka 2020 NWSL Challenge Cup
O mere nke mbụ ya na NWSL na 30 June 2020
Racing Louisville FC họọrọ Cudjoe na 2020 NWSL Expansion Draft, mana Sky Blue nwetara ya n'oge na-adịghị anya na azụmahịa
Onye ọ bụla

Jennifer Driwaru (amụrụ na 1982) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego Ugandan, onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Maracha District na 11th Ugandan Parliament nke jikọtara ya na National Resistance Movement (NRM)

A mụrụ Driwaru ma too na mpaghara Yivu, Loinya Parish na Aliro East Village na Orijaba John, onye isi ndị uwe ojii lara ezumike nká nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi ndị isi ndị uweojii distrikti (DPC) na Florence Drijaru, nwanyị ọchụnta ego

N'afọ 1995, Driwaru gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examinations (PLE) ya na Maracha Primary School, ọkwa O ya na afo 1999 na ọkwa A (ọ mere LEG / Fine art) na afo 2001 site na Maracha Secondary School

N'afọ 2004, o nwetara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ na nka ma mesịa sonye na Mahadum Kyambogo ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Guidance And Counselling n'afọ 2012, diplọma postgraduate na Social Work and Social Administration n'afọ 2014 ruo na afo 2015
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, na-akụzi asụsụ Bekee na Maracha Secondary School mgbe ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ na St
Joseph's Hospital Maracha / Ovujo Hospital dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'etiti afo 2022 na afo 2013
N'afọ 2007, Jennifer rụkwara ọrụ na Baylor Uganda na Entebbe dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na PHAs pụrụ iche

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na National Identification Registration Authority (NIRA) dị ka onye na-edebanye aha na afo 2014 mgbe ahụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na International Rescue Committee(IRC) n'etiti afọ 2017 ruo na afo 2019
Driwaru zụrụ ụgbọ ala abụọ maka mpaghara Maracha site na ego e kwuru na e nyere ya ịzụta ụgbọ ala
Ndepụta nke ndị otu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Jennifer Eliogu (amụrụ n'April 30, 1976) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu nke a ma ama maka ịbụ onye na-eme egwuregwu
N'afọ 2016, Eliogu natara Special Recognition Award na City People Entertainment Awards maka onyinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria
Eliogu, N'afọ 2014 maka ọrụ ya n'inye ụmụ nwanyị ike, e nyere ya onyinye maka ịdị mma na African Women Leadership Conference nke mere na United States of America
Eliogu si Idemili na Anambra Steetị, mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria mana a zụlitere ya na steeti Lagos, nke dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria
Eliogu nwetara diplọma na Mahadum Jos wee nweta nzere BSc
ya na Mahadim Lagos State
Eliogu na 1997 malitere n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijirịa na ihe nkiri akpọrọ House On Fire

Eliogu hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijirịa n'oge na-adịghị anya wee banye n'egwú n'ụzọ ọkachamara na 2012 wee wepụta ọrụ egwu mbụ ya akpọrọ Ifunanya nke a họpụtara maka onyinye n'otu afọ ahụ maka Best R&B Video na Nigeria Music Video Awards (NMVA)
N'etiti ndị ọzọ ama ama Nollywood ya na ha rụkọtara ọrụ gụnyere, Rich Tanksley, Kenneth Okolie, Susan Peters, Bolanle Ninalowo, Moyo Lawal, Desmond Elliot, Rukky Sanda na ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-agba ndị na-eme ihe nkiri gị ume na nkà ga-eduga ha n'ebe dị anya ọ bụghị ịgba ọtọ
E nyere Eliogu onyinye pụrụ iche na City People Entertainment Awards n'afọ 2016
O nwekwara onyinye maka ịdị mma na 2014 African Women Leadership Conference nke emere na United States Of America maka ọrụ ya n'inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
A họpụtara ọrụ egwu Eliógu nke akpọrọ Ifunanya maka Best R&B Video na Nigeria Music Video Awards (NMVA)
Eliogu lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Jennifer Fry (amụrụ na 24 Machị 1989) bụ onye egwuregwu badminton nke South Africa
Ọ bụ onye nrite ọla edo nke 2015 All-Africa Games na ngwakọta abụọ, nwetakwara nrite ọla ọcha na ngwakọta otu
N'afọ 2017, o nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo abụọ na 2017 African Championship, merie aha ahụ n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị na ngwakọta abụọ

Jennifer Anne Garner (amuru Eprel 17, 1972) bu onye omekorita America
Amụrụ na Houston, Texas, ma zụlite na Charleston, West Virginia, Garner gụrụ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Denison wee malite ime ihe dị ka nwa akwụkwọ maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Roundabout na New York City
O mere mpụta mpụta ihuenyo ya na mmegharị ihe onyonyo nke Danielle Steel akwụkwọ akụkọ ịhụnanya Zoya na 1995

O nwere ihe ngosi telivishọn ndị ọbịa na ọrụ ihe nkiri na-akwado, yana ọrụ egosipụtara na usoro ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ntorobịa nke oge ndụ gị (1999 – 2000) yana ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri agha Pearl Harbor (2001)
Garner na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado maka agụmakwụkwọ nwata ma bụrụ onye otu bọọdụ Save the Children USA
Ọ bụ onye ngalaba-nchoputa na onye isi ika nke ụlọ ọrụ nri nwa nwa organic Ozugbo N'ugbo
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado mgbasa ozi mgbochi paparazzi n'etiti ụmụaka ndị a ma ama
A mụrụ Garner na Eprel 17, 1972, na Houston, Texas, mana ọ kwagara Charleston, West Virginia, mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Nna ya, William John Garner, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye injinia kemịkalụ maka Union Carbide ; nne ya, Patricia Ann English, bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ ma mesịa bụrụ onye nkuzi Bekee na kọleji dị n'ógbè ahụ
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ
Garner akọwawo onwe ya dị ka nwa na-ahụkarị nke na-achọ ikewapụta onwe ya na nwanne ya nwanyị nke tọrọ ya
Ọ bụ ezie na Garner etobeghị n'ụlọ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nna ya bụ 'ezigbo nchekwa ' yana nne ya 'dị jụụ na- acha anụnụ anụnụ '
Ọ na-aga Chọọchị United Methodist dị n'ógbè ahụ kwa Sunday ma gaa Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Bible ezumike
Mgbe ha na-eto eto, e ekweghị ka ya na ụmụnne ya nọrọ ka ha na-ete mma, tee ntu ha, ; ọ kwara njakịrị na 'ihe ezinụlọ ya mere n'ụwa' bụ ' Amish n'ezie '
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị George Washington na Charleston
Na 1990, Garner debanyere aha na Mahadum Denison na Granville, Ohio, ebe ọ gbanwere isi ya site na kemistri gaa na ihe nkiri ma bụrụ onye otu Pi Beta Phi sorority
Ọ nọrọ na semester ọdịda nke 1993 na-agụ akwụkwọ na National Theater Institute na Eugene O'Neill Theatre Center na Waterford, Connecticut
N'oge okpomọkụ nke kọleji, ọ na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ihe nkiri okpomọkụ
Na 1994, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts na arụmọrụ ihe nkiri
Na 2009, Garner ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya nka maka Save the Children USA, na-akwalite agụmakwụkwọ mba, nri nri, na mbọ agụmakwụkwọ mbụ
Kemgbe 2014, Garner na-eje ozi na kọmitii ndị nlekọta maka nzukọ ahụ, na-akwado maka agụmakwụkwọ nwata
Dịka onye nnọchi anya, ọ na-eso ezinụlọ na-eso na mmemme ịga nke ọma ụlọ akwụkwọ na-eleta ugboro ugboro, nke na-azụ ezinụlọ iji nyere ụmụaka aka ịmụta n'oge mbụ
Na 2002, Garner na-esere mgbasa ozi telivishọn 30 nke abụọ maka enyi ya bụ Corey Palumbo, bụ onye na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic maka West Virginia House of Delegates
Na 2006, o kwuru okwu na nnọkọ nkwado nke onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Democratic Jerry McNerney na Pleasanton, California
Na 2008, ọ kwadoro ndị na-akwado ego abụọ maka Barack Obama n'oge 2008 Democratic Primary
N'afọ 2007, Garner kwuru na ya 'abụghị onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'èzí'
Na 2014, Garner nyere $25,000 maka mkpọsa nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic Wendy Davis
N'oge mgbasa ozi onye isi ala nke 2016, Garner kwadoro onye ntinye ego na nkwado nke Hillary Clinton na Bozeman, Montana
Garner garakwa ndebanye aha ndị ntuli aka na mmemme ụlọ akụ ekwentị iji kwado Clinton na Reno, Nevada
Garner na John Foraker kwadoro organic, ọhụrụ ụlọ ọrụ nri nwa ọhụrụ Ozugbo N'elu Ugbo na 2018; Garner bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2019, Ozugbo N'elu Ugbo ghọrọ nri nwa ọhụrụ etinyere na friji dị maka ezinaụlọ ndị tozuru oke WIC
Garner zutere onye otu kpakpando Scott Foley na set nke Felicity na 1998
Ha lụrụ n’ememe n’ụlọ ha n’October 19, 2000
Di na nwunye ahụ kewara na March 2003
Garner gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm na Mee 2003, na-ekwu maka esemokwu na-enweghị nkwekọrịta, na akwụkwọ ịgba alụkwaghịm bịanyere aka na March 2004
Ọ kpalitere onye na-arụkọ ọrụ Alias Michael Vartan site n'August 2003 ruo etiti 2004
Garner malitere ịlụ Ben Affleck n'etiti afọ 2004, guzobe ọbụbụenyi na ntọala Pearl Harbor (2001) na Daredevil (2003)
Ha lụrụ na June 29, 2005, na ememe ndị Turks na Caicos nkeonwe
Victor Garber, bụ onye na-elekọta ememe ahụ, na di ya mechara, Rainer Andreesen, bụ nanị ndị ọbịa
Garner na Affleck nwere ụmụ atọ ọnụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Violet Anne Affleck mụrụ na 2005 na Seraphina Rose Elizabeth Affleck a mụrụ na 2009, na otu nwa nwoke, Samuel Garner Affleck mụrụ na 2012
Di na nwunye ahụ kwuputara ebumnuche ha ịgba alụkwaghịm na June 2015, wee gbakọta akwụkwọ iwu n'April 2017, na-achọ nkwado anụ ahụ na nke iwu kwadoro nke ụmụ ha
Emechara ịgba alụkwaghịm na October 2018
Garner kwadoro mgba Affleck na-alụ n'oge na mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ha ma kwuo na 2020 na ịga nzukọ Al-Anon gbanwere 'egwu' nke mmekọrịta ha
Ọ bụ ezie na Garner kwụsịrị ịga chọọchị mgbe ọ kwagara Los Angeles, ụmụ ya atọ mere baptizim dị ka ndị otu United Methodist Church n'obodo ya bụ Charleston, West Virginia
Na 2015, ya na ezinụlọ ya malitere ịga ọrụ ụka Methodist kwa izu na Los Angeles

Jennifer madu (amụrụ 23 Septemba afọ 1994 na Garland, Texas ) bụ nwaafọ Naijiria amuru na United Steeti n'agba ọsọ
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na Rio 2016 Summer Olimpik
Ọ gbara onye ka ise na Heat 5 nke 100m na oge nke 1161
Ọ gbakwara ụkwụ nke atọ maka otu egwuregwu 4 ×100 relay nke Naijiria
Jennifer Maestre (a mụrụ n'afọ 1959 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Massachusetts
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe banyere ọkpụkpụ pensụl ya
Maestre sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'ụdị na ọrụ nke urchin oké osimiri
N'okwu onye na-ese ihe ya, ọ na-ede, sị 'Ọkpụkpụ nke urchin, nke dị ize ndụ ma mara mma, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ịdọ aka ná ntị doro anya megide ịkpọtụrụ
Ọdịdị na-adọrọ adọrọ nke spines na-adọta mmetụ n'agbanyeghị ihe ndị nwere ike ịpụta
Esemokwu ahụ kpughere, anyị na-enwe mmetụta nke ịmanye na ịdọrọ, ọchịchọ na mkpasu iwe

Akụkụ nke pensụl na-egosi akụkụ dị nkọ ma dị mma n'ihe banyere ahụmịhe abụọ dị iche iche na ọdịdị na nke mara mmaE nwere ezigbo adịghị ike na akụkụ obi ọjọọ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ ógè ụfọdụ, adịghị ike nke ọdịdị dị egwu na-agbagha
Maestre na-eji pensụl dị iche iche, ntu na akwa iji mee ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ
Ọ na-ewere ụfọdụ narị pensụl, na-ebipụ ha n'ime ntakịrị akụkụ 1-inch, na-egwu oghere na ngalaba nke ọ bụla, na-eme ka ha niile dị nkọ ma na-adụ ha ọnụ
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke New Britain Museum of American Art
Krannert Art Museum, na DeCordova Museum na Sculpture Park
Jennifer Okere (Ọgustu 30, 1968 - Jun 28, 1999) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigeria na otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria ( Nollywood ) na 1990s
Ọ bụ onye nnata nke 2016 Afro Heritage Broadcasting and Entertainment Awards (AHBEA) na Houston, Texas
A mụrụ Jennifer Okere nye Chief Raymond Okere na Lolo Janet Okere na Okolochi, Owerri West, Imo State, Nigeria, ebe o biri n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Ka Okere gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Legọs steeti, ebe ọ batara n'ọrụ ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Theater Art na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka, Okere sonyeere Nollywood na mmalite nineties
O mere mmetụta dị ịrịba ama na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ihe nkiri ya na-emebi emebi Living in Bondage na Glamour Girls
Okere rụrụ nnukwu ọrụ na ihe nkiri ya, ọkachasị ihe nkiri mbụ ya ibi n'ogbụ
E wepụtara akụkụ ya abụọ na 1992 na 1993, n'otu n'otu
Ndị mere ihe nkiri ahụ buru ụzọ resị Charles Okpaleke ikike ya n'afọ 2015 maka imegharị ya
N'afọ 2015, Ramsey Nouah nwetara ikike Living in Bondage site n'aka Kenneth Nnebue, wee mee ihe nkiri na Europe, America na Nigeria
Ma Charles Okpaleke na ikike Nouah rụpụtara ka ọ bụrụ usoro nke akpọrọ Living in Bondage Breaking Free
Na 12 Disemba 2019, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria Charles Okpaleke, nwetara ya maka nwebisiinka ndụ niile nke 1994 maka mmegharị ọgbara ọhụrụ
Okere pụtakwara na Ikuku na True Confession
Ọ mekwara ihe nkiri The Oath, The Ripples, Strange Woman, Calabash
The Oath bụ ihe nkiri ikpeazụ Okere
N'afọ 1996, Okere nwetara ihe nrite ihe nkiri dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Igbo kacha mma ka ọ rụchara ọrụ Ikuku (akụkụ 2)
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, e nyere ya The Afro Heritage Broadcasting and Entertainment Awards (AHBEA) na 2016, na Houston, Texas
Di ya bụ Emeka Ossai natara ihe nrite a na nturu ugo nke abuo
E mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama site na Living in Bondage, na Glamour Girls, mere ka amara ya amara na ememe nke talent ya na The Afro Heritage Broadcasting and Entertainment Awards (AHBEA)
Okere nwụrụ na 1999, ikekwe ọ site na ajoo mmeso di ya, Emeka Ossai, na ndị ọgọ ya n'ihi igbu oge ya n'ịmụ nwa
E liri ya n'obodo ya bụ Okolochi, ndị ọrụ ibe ya na ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood rukwara ya újú, ndị ọtụtụ n'ime ha nọ na olili ya
Ọnwụ ya bụ nke mbụ mere Nollywood maa jijiji
Ruth Jennifer Ondo Mouchita (amụrụ n'afọ 1992) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mara mma na Gabon bụ onye e chiri okpueze Nwada Gabon 2013 na onye nnọchi anya Gabon na Miss Universe 2013

Onye nnọchi anya mpaghara Haut-Ogooué, Jennifer Ondo Mouchita ka Miss Gabon 2013 kpuwere okpueze Miss Gabon 2012 Marie-Noëlle Ada n'oge emume na ngwụcha nke nwanyị kachasị mma nke Gabon emere na Fraịdee ikpeazụ, Disemba 22 na 'City of Democracy,' na Libreville

Jennifer Ondo si Libreville nọchitere anya mba ahụ na asọmpi Nwada Universe nke afọ 2013 na Crocus City Hall na Moscow, Russia na Nọvemba 9 mgbe akpọrọ ya Nwanyị ma karịsịa na Gabon mana ọ banyeghị n'elu 15

Jennifer Packer (amụrụ n'afọ 1984) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi nkè ógè a nke na-emepụta foto ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ihe nkírí dị n'ime, na ndụ ndị bi na New York City
Ọ na-achọ ijide ahụmịhe ndị Black American nke oge a site n'ọrụ ya, na-ese foto nke ndị ógè ya, nhazi okooko osisi olili ozu, na isiokwu ndị ọzọ site na nyocha nké ọma
N'ịbụ ónyé na-eji mmanụ arụ ọrụ, ụdị ya na-eji brush strokes na-enweghị isi na ụcha ụcha ụkọ
A mụrụ Jennifer Packer ma too na Philadelphia
Ọ gàrà Tyler School of Art and Architecture na Mahadum Temple ébé ọ nwetara nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na 2007
N'afọ 2012, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Yale na Master of Fine Arts na eserese na óbíbí akwụkwọ
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị MFA ya, Packer kwagara Bronx, ma mesịa bụrụ osote prọfesọ na ngalaba eserese na Rhode Island School of Design ebe ọ na-aga n'ihu na-akụzi
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na 2012-2013 na Studio Museum na Harlem, na Visual Arts Fellow na Fine Arts Work Center site na 2014-2016
Packer sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke òtù ikpe ziri ezi nke ọha na eze, nke a pụrụ ịhụ site na ọrụ okooko osisi ya na-anọchite anya ime ihe ike megide ndị isi ojii America na iru uju na-esi na ya apụta
Maka foto ya, ọ na-egosi ndị enyi na ezinụlọ n'ụdị dị nso nke a na-eme iji zere ọgụgụ nkịtị
N'afọ 2013, Jenifer mere ihe osise na akụkụ ahụ dị ka mkpịsị aka, ikpere, na eriri agbà na-apụta site na alụlụ; halo nke ochre fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ uwe a na-akpọ Lost In Translation

Na 2017 Transfiguration (He's No Saint) na-egosi nwa okorobịa African American nwèrè iko nwéré aka abụọ e welitere elu, a sụgharịrị ọtụtụ n'ime ahụ ya n'ụzọ dị egwu na odo, ọbara ọbara, na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
N'ime nka, echiche nke asụsụ ahụ na-akpọ uche, n'ụzọ ụfọdụ, a na-eche na foto ndị ahụ na-egosi mgbochi nke ndị uwe ojii na-akwụsị ma na-achọ ónyé ojii
Ọzọkwa akụkụ dị gburugburu n'anụ ahụ ya na-egosi akara nke stigmata
Anya ónyé ahụ mechiri n'etiti ụzọ, ọ dịtụ efu mgbè ọ hụrụ ihe ọ bụ ma ọ bụ ihe ọ na-atụ anya n'ụwa
Gụnyere ihe ndị ọzọ otú onye ahụ si eche echiche site na ịkpa ókè nwéré ike
The Mind is Its Own Place (2020), na-egosi ọkwa nke ịda mbà n'obi na mgbagwoju anya nke uche mmadụ n'ime ọrụ ya site na obéré palette na eserese icheku ọkụ
N'afọ 2013, e nyèrè Packer Rema Hort Mann Grant
N'afọ 2012-2013 Parker bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na The Studio Museum na Harlem, na site na 2014 ruo 2016, ónyé Visual Arts Fellow na Fine Arts Work Center na Provincetown, Massachusetts
N'afọ 2020, ọ meriri Hermitage Greenfield Prize nke gụnyere ọrụ iji mepụta ọrụ ọhụrụ nke ga-amalite na 2022 na John na Mable Ringling Museum of Art na Sarasota, Florida
Jennifer Vel bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na Seychelles
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly of Seychelles
Ọ bụ onye otu Seychelles People's Progressive Front, a họpụtakwara ya na Nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 2007
Jennifer White-Johnson bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ngagharị iwe bi na Baltimore

Dị ka onye na-ese ihe Afro-Latina nwéré nkwarụ na ADHD na Graves' Disease ọ na-eji ihe osise na foto dị ka ụzọ isi kwurịta njikọ nke ikike ndị nwere nkwarụrụ na mmegide agbụrụ, yana inye ọhụụ màkà olu ndị na-ezighị ezi

Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị MFA ya na Graphic Design site na Maryland Institute College of Art, o nweela ohere iso ọtụtụ ụdị, [promotion?] ma kụzie dị ka prọfesọ nke Visual Communication Design na Mahadum Bowie State
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama [dubious gụnyere akara Black Disabled Lives Matter, na zine Black Autistic Joy advocacy zine a na-akpọ Knox Roxs
White-Johnson nwetara BA yá nà Visual Arts na Mahadum Maryland Baltimore County
O nwèkwàrà MFA na Graphic Design site na Maryland Institute College of Art

White-Johnson bụ ugbu a [mgbe?] bụ prọfesọ nke Visual Communications na Mahadum Bowie State, ébé ọ bụ ónyé ndụmọdụ ngalaba ụmụ akwụkwọ màkà ngalaba Bowie State nke American Institute of Graphic Arts (AIGA)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ maka ụdị ndị gụnyere Nike, Converse, Twitter, Amazon, Today at Apple, na Google Stories, na-atụle ma na-emepụta ihe omume gbụrụ-gbúrụ njikọ nke nka na nkwarụ
N'afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye nnọchiteanya na mmemme 5 Points nke akpọrọ 'Olee otu esi abụ onye Black Designer na-enweghị mfu mkpụrụ obi gị'

N'afọ 2020, White-Johnson bụ onye a na-asọpụrụ na D-30 Disability Impact List maka nka mkpesa ya na atụmatụ mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na 2021 e gosipụtara ya na ndepụta nke ndị Latino Artists 20 iji lelee site na Today Show
