Jenny Genoveva Maakal (amụrụ na abalị abụọ na ọnwa Ọgọst, na afọ 1913 na abalị iri na ise na onwa Septemba, na afọ 2002) bụ onye South Africa na-egwu mmiri n'efu nke sonyere na 1932 Summer Olympics
A mụrụ ya na Rayton
N'egwuregwu Olimpik nke afọ 1932, o ritere ọla nchara na 400m freestyle ihe omume ma bụrụ nke isii na 100m freest style ihe omume
Maakal sonyekwara na 1930 British Empire Games ma gwuo mmiri na ngwụcha abụọ
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na asọmpi 440 yards freestyle na dịka onye otu South Africa na asọmpi 4×110 yards freestiyle relay
Jenny Nijenhuis (a mụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a maara n'ihe banyere ọkpụkpụ ya na ntinye ọha na eze
A mụrụ Jenny Nijenhuis na Johannesburg, South Africa ma n'afọ 1993 ọ natara nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand

N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ikpeazụ n'ihe banyere Lovell Tranyr Art Trophy A họpụtara ya dị ka onye ikpeazụ maka PPC Imaginarium art award n'afọ 2015, na onye ikpeazụ maka Sasol New Signatures art competition n'afọ 2017
N'agbata afọ 2005 - 2018 ọ rụrụ ọrụ Genealogy Brand DNA, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta nkwukọrịta
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nka nke onwe na nke ọha dịka August House na Johannesburg, na nchịkọta nke Paul Stuart
Ndị Cornell University International Students Union (ISU) kpọrọ Nijenhuis ka ọ nye isi okwu na mmemme mahadum niile a na-eme n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Machị 2019
A gwara ya ka ọ webata ọrụ ọ na-arụ dị ka onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2016 Nijenhuis chepụtara ntinye ọha na eze nke SA's Dirty Laundry ya na onye na-ese ihe nkiri Nondumiso Msimanga

Ntinye ahụ nwere mita otu puku na narị abụọ nke eriri ịsa ahụ na-egosipụta uwe ime puku atọ na narị isii, nke dị ka Medical Research Council si kwuo, kwekọrọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndina n'ike a na-eme atụmatụ na ọ na-eme kwa ụbọchị na South Africa
A kwụgidere uwe mwụda ahụ n'okporo ámá Johannesburg ruo izu abụọ iji katọọ mmetọ mmekọahụ na ndina n'ike
Site n'echiche ya, iji uwe a na-akpachi anya na-ebute ozi siri ike karị, na ozi onwe onye n'ụzọ ihe atụ
SA's Dirty Laundry enwetawo nnukwu mgbasa ozi mba ụwa
The Guardian, Marie Claire, Upworthy, yana mgbasa ozi Italian, Spanish, German, Turkish na Chinese, tinyere ndị ọzọ gosipụtara ntinye ahụ
Amnesty International South Africa nyere aka na mmezu nke ọrụ ahụ site n'inye ego dị mkpa n'ihe banyere iwu nrụnye ahụ
A katọrọ Nijenhuis na Msimanga maka iji ọnụ ọgụgụ Medical Research Council, dịka United Nations na-eme atụmatụ na a na-edina mmadụ otu narị na iri atọ na abụọ n'ike na South Africa kwa ụbọchị
Ndị na-ese ihe zaghachiri site n'ikwu na mgbalị niile iji chọpụta mwakpo mmekọahụ na South Africa nwere ntụpọ, nakwa na ihe ka ụfọdụ n'ime ihe omume ahụ abụghị ndị metụtara

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2019 Nijenhuis gosipụtara Nke a bụ South Africa, nnukwu ọkọlọtọ South Africa nke e ji akwa na uwe ime mee nke ndị lanarịrị ndina n'ike nyere onyinye na ntinye ụlọ ọrụ SA's Dirty Laundry na 2016
A na-etinye ọkọlọtọ ahụ n'elu dị ka ihe mgbaàmà nke nhụjuanya dịka usoro nkwukọrịta mba ụwa si dị
A kwụgidere ọkọlọtọ ahụ na SA High Commission na London iji kwekọọ na ngagharị iwe megide ime ihe ike nwoke na nwanyị
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Nijenhuis na-enyocha njirimara archetypes na ọnọdụ mmadụ n'ụwa site na iji ahụ mmadụ
Nnyocha a na-esite na mmepe njirimara na otú ndụ na ọha mmadụ si emetụta njirimara a
Echiche ọtụtụ n'azụ ọrụ ọkpụkpụ ya na-emetụta onye nyocha uche Carl Jung

Nijenhuis na-eme ihe ngosi kpọmkwem na ụrọ iji mepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ nha ndụ iji nweta ọnụnọ ụwa n'ezie site na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ ha na ntakịrị ọrụ ndị ọzọ site na iji ihe nchọta iji chọpụta ọnụnọ site na ntinye
Ọrụ Nijenhuis na-ekwu n'ihe banyere nsogbu nke ịnọpụ iche, nkwarụ, njikwa, nwoke na nwanyị na ahụmịhe nwanyị
Ooo
Jenny Rakotomamonjy (amụrụ n'afọ 1979), nke a maara site na aha edemede Jenny, bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Madagascar
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Chibimag comics studio
A mụrụ Jenny Rakotomamonjy na Antananarivo, Madagascar, n'afọ 1979
Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, ya na ndị mụrụ ya hapụrụ agwaetiti ahụ wee kwaga na mpaghara Paris
Ọ gụrụ nka na Mahadum Paris 1 Pantheon-Sorbonne's Saint-Charles Center, wee sonye n'asọmpi mmemme afọ abụọ na Gobelins, l'École de l'image
N'afọ 2002, Jenny, onye na-eji naanị aha mbụ ya bịanye aka n'ọrụ ya, mepụtara obere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Le Papillon, ya na Antoine Antin
A họọrọ mkpirikpi ahụ maka ihe nrite Canal J Prize na Annecy International Animation Film Festival nke afọ ahụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Marathon Animation were ya n'ọrụ ịrụ ọrụ na nhazi agwa maka usoro Martin Mystery na akụkọ maka Totally Spies!
Jenny wepụtara ihe ọchị mbụ ya, ụdị Pink Diary, na 2005
Usoro Pink Diary, nke Delcourt bipụtara na France, meriri ihe nrite 2006 maka Best Manga-Style Bande Dessinée site na magazin French Animeland
Ọ gara n'ihu ruo n'afọ 2008, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Jenny malitere usoro ọhụrụ, Mathilde, nke Sara et les Contes perdus sochiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na usoro Patricia Lyfoung's La Rose écarlate
N'afọ 2003, ọ ghọkwara onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Chibimag comics studio, nke o jikọtara aka na akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị dị iche iche
Jenny bi na Eure-et-Loir, France, ebe ya na di ya na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro, onye na-emepụta ihe ọchị Alexis Coridun
Jentrix Shikangwa Milimu (amụrụ na 27 Nọvemba 2001), nke a maara dị ka Jentrix Shiikangwa, bụ onye Kenya na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka Fatih Karagümrük SK
na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Kenya
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha Jenụwarị 2022, ọ kwagara Turkey, wee sonye na Fatih Karagümrük nke e guzobere ọhụrụ iji rụọ ọrụ na 2021-22 Women's Super League
Shikangwa gbara Kenya bọọlụ na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2019 CECAFA Women's Championship na 2020 Turkish Women's Cup
Ọ bụ eziokwụ na Jentrix Milimu Shikangwa ga-abịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ya na Fatih Karagumruk Sportif Fasiliyetler San
Tic Klọb AS, Na Turkey
Jere bụ mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo nke Steeti Borno Naịjirịa
O nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya n'obodo Khaddamari
O nwere mpaghara 868 km² narị asatọ na iri isii na asatọ
Jere nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ puku abụọ na iri na otu na narị abụọ na anọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ afọ 2006
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị bi na Jere sitere n'agbụrụ ndị Arab bụ Baggara
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ Narị isii
Ọ bụ otu n'ime gọọmenti ime obodo iri na isii mejupụtara Borno Emirate, steeti ọdịnala dị na Steeti Borno , Naijiria
Àtụ LGAs of Borno State
Jeremy Phillip Felton (amụrụ na Julaị 17, 1987), nke a maara dịka Jeremih (/ˈdʒɛrəmaɪ/ JERR-əm-eye), bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu R&B
N'afọ 2009, ọ bịanyere ákà na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Def Jam Recordings

Egwú azụmahịa mbụ nke Jeremih, 'Birthday Sex', rutere n'ọkwa nke anọ na US Billboard Hot 100 chart na-eduga na abọm izizi ya nke akpọrọ onwé ya wepụtara na June n'afọ ahụ, na-eru ọnụọgụ isii na US 200 chart
Ihe ịga nke ọma Jeremih gara n'ihu site na ntọhapụ nke abọm nke abụọ ya, All About You, nke otu 'Down on Me' (nke gosipụtara 50 Cent), nke ruru n'elu ise nke Billboard Hot 100
N'afọ 2014, egwu ya 'Don't Tell 'Em' (nke YG gosipụtara) ghọrọ nke atọ ya n'elu iri na Billboard Hot 100
Egwú ahụ ghọrọ egwu mbụ màkà abọm studio nke atọ ya, Late Nights wepụtara na Disemba 2015
E wepụtara abọm jikọrọ aka n'etiti Jeremih na ónyé na-agụ egwu California bụ Ty Dolla Sign, nke akpọrọ MihTy, n'afọ 2018
A mụrụ ya na Chicago, Illinois, Jeremih malitere ịkpọ ụbọ mgbè ọ dị afọ atọ ma nwee ike ịkpọ saxophone, ọtụtụ ngwá egwu na piano / keyboard
Ọ gara Morgan Park High School, ébé ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị na-aga ije yana ndị Latin jazz
Ọ mụtakwara ịkpọ ngwá egwu dị ka congas na timbales
Felton bụ ezigbo nwa akwụkwọ ma nweta nsọpụrụ agụmakwụkwọ na Morgan Park High School
Ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya siri ike mere ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị otu afọ tupu oge eruo
Ọ debara aha ya na Mahadum Illinois na Parkland College na Urbana-Champaign Mgbè ọ gachara otu semester na mahadum na-amụ injinia, ọ chọrọ ịgbanwe agụmakwụkwọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe metụtara egwu
Ọ gàrà Columbia College Chicago na 2007 iji nweta akara ugo mmụta na azụmaahịa egwu
Mgbe o kwusịrị otuto nye Ray Charles n'otu n'ime ihe ngosi nkà nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ natara nzaghachi dị mma ma ghọta ikike olu ya, na-ekwu na 'egwú ahụ na-eweghara'
On February 7, 2016, Jeremih revealed his fourth studio album will be called, Later That Night in an interview with Billboard
In the same interview, he mentioned he had been recently writing songs for Kanye West and Nicki Minaj
In the summer of 2016, Jeremih headlined his first European concert tour
In July 2016, Jeremih released his second mixtape called Late Nights Europe, which he recorded while on tour overseas
He stated that he was 90% done with his upcoming album Later That Night that would complete his 'Late Night' series

Jeremy Maggs (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1961) bụ onye nta akụkọ South Afrika, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na redio na onye na-egosi ihe nkiri telivishọn, nke a maara nke ọma maka ịnabata ụdị egwuregwu South Afrika nke ihe ngosi egwuregwu bụ Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? na maka ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ akụkọ South Africa nke awa iri na anọ bụ eNCA na DStv n'ime afọ iri gara aga
Ọ kwadokwara ihe ngosi ule Test The Nation ma na-akwado ihe ngosi nke ya 'Maggs on Media' - kwa na eNews Channel, ebe ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ele ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Na redio, Maggs gosipụtara mmemme SAfm nke ehihie n'ehihie, PM Live, yana ịbụ onye na-elekọta mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi ụtụtụ Sunday, Media @ SAFM nke lekwasịrị anya na mgbasa ozi na ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta
Ihe omume ahụ were afọ iri ma Maggs na-ezo aka na ya dị ka 'oké ọṅụ' ya
Ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na-ebipụta The Annual; mkpuchi siri ike nke azụmahịa kwa afọ na mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2014, Maggs sonyeere POWER 987 dị ka onye na-elekọta redio nke oghere ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Best of POWER - nke na-eme ka ihe ngosi na mgbasa ozi ọhụrụ, teknụzụ, ihe na-eme, ihe na njem
A mụrụ Maggs na 1 Febụwarị na afọ 1961 na Johannesburg
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na ihe bụ Natal Technikon n'oge ahụ, wee malite ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ na-ede maka akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Eastern Province Herald na Durban's Sunday Tribune
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Natal Technikon, Maggs malitere ọrụ odeakụkọ ya na-ede akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ ndị dị ka Eastern Province Herald na Durban's Sunday Tribune
Maggs na-aga n'ihu na-ede kọlụm kwa izu maka The Herald nke akpọrọ 'Daze of My Life'
A maara Maggs nke ọma maka igosi onye chọrọ ịbụ onye nde mmadụ?, nke o mere site na afọ 1999 ruo afọ 2005; mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ kwụsịrị n'afọ ahụ mgbe 100 episodes gasịrị
Maggs ghọkwara onye na-egosi Test the Nation ma na-akwado mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi kwa izu nke SABC3, Media Focus
Maggs bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Journal of Marketing nke bụ mbipụta gọọmentị nke Marketing Association of South Africa (MASA)
l nke Marketing
Ọ bụbu onye na-ede akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi na Financial Mail ma nwee ọrụ maka nyocha ụlọ ọrụ kwa afọ a na-akpọ Ad Focus

Ugbu a, ọ na-ebipụta nyocha nke ya banyere ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ The Annual ma na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ maka mbipụta a ma ama, nke a na-eme ka ọ dịghachi ndụ nke Journal of Marketing, The Redzone
Maggs ebiela na Johannesburg ndụ ya niile
Ya na nwunye ya Anne nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Ọ bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na onye na-anakọta akwụkwọ ma na-enwe mmasị ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè n'oge ezumike ya

A mụrụ Jeremy Wafer na Durban n'afọ 1953, Laura na Michael Wafer, tolitere na Nkwalini, Zululand, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal, Pietermaritzburg (BA Fine Art n'afọ 1979) na Mahadum Witwatersrand (BA
Hons
na Art History n'afọ 1980 na MA
Fine Art n'afọ 1987)

Ọ kụziri na Ngalaba Fine Art nke Technikon Natal na Technikon Witwatersrand tupu a họpụta ya n'afọ 2004 Prọfesọ na School of Arts nke Mahadum Witwatersrand, Johannesburg ebe ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Fine Art ugbu a

A na-anọchite anya ọrụ ya na National Museum of African Art, Smithsonian Institution, Washington DC, South African National Gallery, Johannesburg Art Gallery na ụfọdụ ihe ngosi nka ndị ọzọ, nchịkọta nke onwe na ụlọ ọrụ

Ihe ngosi gụnyere ihe ngosi ngosi na Stellenbosch University na Durban Art Gallery n'afọ 2002 na KZNSA Gallery, Durban n'afọ 2009, ụfọdụ ihe ngosi ndị otu gụnyere Panoramas of Passage nke gara US na 1995, Earth and Everything na Arnolfini, Bristol UK, afọ 1996, Johannesburg Biennale 1997, 20 Afọ iri abụọ nke South African Sculpture 2010 na Nirox Foundation, Johannesburg, Earth Matters na Smithsonian Museum of African Art, Washington DC 2013, na Basel Art Fair n'afọ 2009 na afọ 2014

Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ihe ngosi nke naanị ya gụnyere Tropic na Project Space Leeds, UK na October 2010, Paradise na Goodman Gallery 2009, Survey na WAM 2013, na nso nso a Strata na Goodman, Johannesburg n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2014

O sonyere n'ufodu ebe obibi mba ụwa gụnyere Thami Mnyeni Foundation na Amsterdam, Civitella Ranieri na Umbertide, Italy, South Project na Melbourne, Australia, Brande na Denmark, Ampersand na New York na n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, dịka akụkụ nke otu nyocha UK / AU / SA akpọrọ Onyeàmà nke ọ bụ onye guzobere ya, nkuzi nleta na Mahadum Monash na ihe ngosi na Linden Art Centre, Melbourne
O nwere ọkwa B site na South African National Research Foundation (NRF), n'etiti ndị izizi e nyere n'ọhịa ya
E nyela ya ọtụtụ ihe nrite nké gụnyere Standard Bank National Drawing Prize n'afọ 1987, Vita Award n'afọ 2002, Kebble na 2004, na Sasol Wax Prize na 2006
Ọrụ ya, kemgbe mbido afọ 1990, Goodman Gallery nọchitere anya ya na Johannesburg, Cape Town na mba ofesi
Jeremy lụrụ Colleen onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ n'ufodu ọrụ nka ma nwee ụmụ abụọ, ma Wits Alumni, Mary Wafer onye na-ese ihe na Johannesburg na Alexander Wafer onye nkuzi na Geography na Wits
O so hazie ihe ncheta ọrịa AIDS 'Wall of Hope' (ya na Georgia Sarkin), nke a raara nye ncheta Gugu Dlamini, na Durban, South Africa
Nwanne nna Wafer, Richard Wafer, nwụrụ na HMS Jaguar na-agbalị ịnapụta ndị ibe ya
Chief Jerome Oputa Udoji CMG, CFR (site n'afọ1912 ruo afọ 2010), Igwe Ozuluoha I nke Igboland, bụ onye nchịkwa azụmahịa Naijiria, onye ọrụ gọọmentị, onye ọchịchị ọdịnala, na onye ọrụ ebere
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọrụ gọọmentị a ma ama na Naịjirịa n'ihi 'Udoji Award' na ọrụ dị iche iche ọ na-arụ na gọọmentị na ngalaba nkeonwe
Udoji mere ka a na akwanyere ya ùgwù ma na mba ma na mba ụwa dị ka onye na-akwụwa aka ọtọ, onye nwere ezigbo agwa na onye nchịkwa ọha na eze na onye ọrụ nke onwe
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cambridge na England ma mesịa gaa na Economic Institute of the World Bank na Washington

O nwere utu aha ọdịnala nke Igwe, bụ onye natara Commander nke Order of Saint Michael na Saint George kachasị mma site na British Crown n'afọ 1959, Commander of Order of the Federal Republic of Nigeria (CFR) n'afọ 1963, wee ghọọ onye Papal knight nke Order of St Gregory the Great n'afọ 1975
N'ime oge ọrụ gọọmentị ya ọ jere ozi na ministri ego, ahụike na azụmahịa, bụrụkwa onye isi ọrụ na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ mbụ, Nigeria

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omebe iwu nke n'afọ 1977 ruo n'afọ 1978 nke rụrụ ọrụ na Iwu nke Naijiria nke afọ 1979 (Republic nke Abụọ) ma jee ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu, na ndị nnọchi anya Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naijiria na Nzukọ Iwu Naijiria dị na London

Udoji bụkwa onye Naijiria mbụ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke otu ụlọ ọrụ mba ọzọ na Naijiria n'ihi ọrụ ọma ya n'ọkwa ahụ ọ meghere ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ ụzọ Christopher Abebe na UAC, Michael Omolayole na Lever Brothers, Gamaliel Onosode na Cadbury na Jamodu na PZ

O nyere aka chọta Nigerian Stock Exchange (NSE) ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche mbụ ya site n'afọ 1981 ruo n'afọ 1986 yana ọrụ ya dị ka onye nduzi nke abụọ nke Manufacturers Association of Nigeria (MAN) site n'afọ 1982 ruo n'afọ 1987
N'agbata afọ 1974 n'afọ 1993, ọ bụ onye isi oche ma ọ bụ na bọọdụ nke ọ dịkarịa ala ụlọ ọrụ iri na atọ dị mkpa, gụnyere Citibank Nigeria, The Nigerian Tobacco Company, RT
Briscoe, Michellin, Motor Tyre Service Company, Wiggins Teape, Udoji United FC, na Solgas Petroleum
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịhazi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naịjirịa mgbe agha obodo gasịrị
Onye nchịkwa a ma ama, onye nkuzi, onye ọka iwu na onye ọchụnta ego, Udoji, metụtakwara obodo ndị ọzọ nke mpaghara Afrịka nke ọma, n'oge ndụ ya dị egwu dịka onye ndụmọdụ United Nations

Maka omume ya, ọ nwetara ọtụtụ nsọpụrụ na aha ọdịnala gụnyere inwe ụlọ akwụkwọ, okporo ụzọ na ụlọ gọọmentị akpọrọ aha yaN'afọ 1995, o bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, nke akpọrọ 'Under Three Masters' na ụfọdụ okwu ya na akwụkwọ ozi ya dị ka, Kedu Way Nigeria? Okwu ndị a họọrọ nke Chief JO
Udoji (n'afọ 2000, Ibadan, Spectrum)

Mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Gọvanọ Peter Obi nkellllll Anambra Steeti kwuru na 'Udoji bụ onye ama ama, onye Naijiria na-achọghị ọdịmma onwe ya nanị na Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi nke na-elekọta ndị a na-emegbu emegbu, ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ na ndị ogbenye
Ọnwụ ya ga-eme ka oghere nke ga-esi ezigbo ike imeju
A mụrụ Udoji n'afọ 1912 nye ezinụlọ Ezemba-Dogbu Udoji dị n'Ozubulu, Ekusigo LGA nke Steeti Anambra
Ọ were ọkwa Igwe n'Ozubulu
Otu nwoke nwere nnukwu mmụta na ahụmịhe sara mbara, Udoji malitere agụmakwụkwọ na St
Michael's Catholic School, Ozubulu (n'afọ 1920 ruo afọ 1926), gara St
Charles Training College, Onitsha (n'afọ 1929 ruo afọ 1931), tupu ọ gaa Kings College, Cambridge University, England (n'afọ 1945 ruo afọ 1948), ma kpọọ ya na Bar, Gray's Inn, London, n'afọ 1948
Ọ nọkwa na World Bank, Washington, n'etiti afọ1955 n'afọ1956
Udoji nwetara akara ugo mmụta na post-gụsị akwụkwọ naugo mmụta na post graduate na Mahadum Cambridge
Tupu ọ gaa King's College na Cambridge, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ ya na Ọdịda Anyanwụ, gụnyere Ibadan Grammar School na Abeokuta Grammar School
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na-ahụ maka mpaghara ndị dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Mgbe ọ lọtara England, Udoji sonyeere Ndị Ọrụ Nchịkwa Colonial ma mee ya onye na-enyere ndị ọrụ mpaghara aka na Ado Ekiti tupu eziga ya dị ka onye ọrụ mpaghara Egbado
Dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke ọchịchị, o nwere ọrụ pụrụ iche na mpaghara Ondo na Abeokuta nke mba ahụ
N'afọ 1954, a kpọfere ya na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ wee mee ya odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na ngalaba ahụike, azụmahịa, ego na ụlọ ọrụ

N'afọ 1959, nraranye Udoji n'ọrụ, ikike ọgụgụ isi ya dị ịrịba ama na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe ya mere ka ọ rịgoro n'ọkwa Onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị nke mpaghara ahụ, Onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke onye isi ala nke mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ, Dr Michael Okpara, yana odeakwụkwọ nke ndị isi
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe a kwaturu ọchịchị na Naijiria n'afọ 1966
Mgbe nnupụisi ahụ gasịrị, ọ banyere n'ọrụ iwu onwe ya (n'afọ 1966 rue afọ 68) ma jee ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ Ford Foundation na nchịkwa na nchịkwa (n'afọ 1968 ruo afọ72)

N'afọ 1972, n'oge ọchịchị Naijiria na-ebuwanye ibu mmanụ, ndị ọchịchị Yakubu Gowon nyere ya ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ na-enyocha ụkpụrụ na ụgwọ ọrụ obodo na mba ahụKọrụ ahụ tụrụ aro dịka mmụba nke ụgwọ ọrụ nke ndị ọrụ ọha na eze, ọzụzụ ndị ọrụ obodo, usoro nchịkwa dị n'otu ma jikọta ọnụ, mkpochapụ nke ihe mkpofu na mwepụ nke ngalaba ndị na-adịghị arụ ọrụ na ntinye nke ọrụ obodo na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma na ndabere nke njikwa site na ebumnuche
Kọmitii ahụ tụkwara aro ka e guzobe Ombudsman na mba ahụ

E gosipụtara akụkọ nke kọmitii ahụ n'afọ ndị sochirinụ dị ka kọmitii nyocha ụgwọ ọrụ ọ bụ ezie na ebumnuche mbụ bụ ịmụ ma mee aro zuru oke na ọrụ ọha na eze gụnyere aro maka ebumnuche ma ọ bụ ebumnuche njikwa
A maara mmụba ụgwọ a taa dị ka 'Udoji Award'
N'ịbụ onye gara ọtụtụ ebe, Udoji jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Africanisation Commission nke East African Community, na-ekpuchi Kenya, Uganda na Tanzania (n'afọ 1963)

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na Nzukọ Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu na Nchịkwa nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọha nke e mere na Yugoslavia (n'afọ 1969), ma rụọ ọrụ na Swaziland (n'afọ 1970) dị ka naanị Kọmishọna maka Kọmitii Localization nke mba ahụ, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke African Association for Public Administration and Management (n'afọ 1972 ruo afọ 1975) ma họpụta ya site na United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) iji nyochaa ma hazie Ọrụ Ọha Uganda n'afọ 1991

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omebe iwu nke afọ 1977 ruo afọ 78 nke rụrụ ọrụ na Iwu Iwu nke Naịjirịa nke afọ 1979 ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke Nigerian Stock Exchange (NSE) site na 1981 ruo 1986 na onye isi oche of the Manufacturers Association of Nigeria (MAN) site n'afọ 1982 ruo afọ 1987
Na mba mbụ nke Naijiria, Udoji nọchitere anya gọọmentị mpaghara na ụfọdụ nchegbu ego nke ikpeazụ dị ka Hotel Presidential, Enugu na Port Harcourt na Independence Breweries, Umuahia
Otú ọ dị, mgbe esemokwu dị n'etiti ya na ndị isi agha ọhụrụ n'afọ 1966,ọ hapụrụ ọrụ obodo na mpaghara ka ọ na-eme iwu obere oge tupu ya abanye na ntọala Ford
Udoji jere ozi n'ọtụtụ bọọdụ dị ka Onye isi oche gụnyere ndị nduzi nke RT
Briscoe, Motor Tyre Service Company, Wiggins Teape, na Nigerian Tobacco Company

Akwụkwọ akụkọ onwe ya 'Under Three Masters Memoirs of an African Administrator' kwuru na Chief Jerome Udoji lụrụ Marcelina Uzoamaka Udoji née Onuchukwu, ada Pa William Onuchukwu, onye ama ama n'agụmakwụkwọ na Onitsha
Ọ nwụrụ n'October n'afọ1992
Jerome Udoji nwere ụmụ atọ - otu nwa nwanyị, Scholastica - na ụmụ nwoke abụọ - Osita Paul (aka Oscar) na Peter Ebelechukwu (aka Sunday) Udoji
Oriakụ Scholastica Lola Onwubuya bụ onye nkuzi ezumike nka, onye ọrụ obodo na onye ndụmọdụ ndụmọdụ
Chief Osita Oscar Paul Udoji bụ onye guzobere na CEO nke Superior Motors Ltd
na Executive Car Rentals Ltd
Newswatch Magazine kwanyeere ya ugwu na 'Emergent Titans' Category ya na Tony Elumelu, Isyaku Rabiu, Folu Ayeni na Leo Stan Ekeh maka ihe ha rụzuru na azụmahịa
Jerome Udoji jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ abụọ nke Oscar Udoji bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche, ya bụ, Solgas Petroleum na Udoji United FC

Oscar Udojin jere ozi dị Ka onye isi oche mba maka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Congress for Progressive Change (CPC) nke mechara dị ka ndị na-esote na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2011 ya na General Muhammadu Buhari dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala
Maazị Peter Ebelechukwu Udoji bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke BELSUN Holdings Ltd
Chief Jerome Udoji tupu ya anwụọ nwere ụmụ ụmụ iri na otu
Jerome Udoji nwụrụ na ụbọchị nke abụọ nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2010, ụbọchị Good Friday, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na asatọ
Nwa ya nwoke bụ Chief Oscar Udoji kwadoro nke a na nkwupụta
Gọvanọ Peter Obi nke Anambra Steeti kọwara ọnwụ Udoji dị ka nnukwu mfu nye mba ahụ
O kwuru na 'Ọ bụ nwoke kwesịrị nṅomi
O mere ka mba ahụ nwee obi ụtọ n'akụkụ ọ bụla nke ndụ ya
Gọọmentị steeti ga-etinye aka n'ụzọ zuru oke n'ili ahụ,'
Enyi ezinụlọ Kadinal Francis Arinze kwuru Mas na olili ahụ
N'okwuchukwu ya, Kadịnal Arinze kwuru na ndụ na oge Udoji gosipụtara ka ndị nwoke nwetara onwe ha n'ọchịchị kwesịrị isi na-akpa àgwà n'ihu ọha

Kadinal Arinze kọwara Udoji dị ka nwoke jiri ahụmịhe ya, akụ na ụba na ọnọdụ ya mee ihe iji lekọta ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria site na ịtụ aro ngwugwu ụgwọ ọrụ maka ndị ọrụ, ebe ọ na-echebe ọdịmma nke ndị ogbenye
'Udoji bụ nwoke nwere ntụkwasị obi, onye na-adịghị achọ ọdịmma onwe ya nanị, onye nwere ezi mmadụ nke biri ndụ dị mma
Onye ọbụla bịara emume olili ya taa ga abụgọrọ onye ritagoro uru na Award Udoji ya, 'ka o kwuru, na-agba onye ọ bụla ume iṅomi ihe nketa ya
Nakwa n'ozi nkasi obi ya, Gọvanọ Peter Obi kọwara Udoji dịka otu n'ime ụmụ Naijiria ole na ole mere atụmatụ obodo ahụ na mba ụwa na n'ime obodo
onyinye ndị Udoji wepụtara mere ka ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria, ọkachasị ndị ọrụ obodo ka mma, na-ekwu na enwere ike ịhụ ekele ha n'ọkwa dị ukwuu n'ịkwado nkwanye ugwu ha

O kwuru na steeti Anambra emeela ka ọ ghara ịnwụ site n'ịkpọ aha odeakwụkwọ ọhụrụ ahụ Udoji ma gbaa Gọọmentị etiti ume ka ha sọpụrụ ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Naijiria ole na ole nyere aka nke ukwuu na mmepe mba ahụ
Na ncheta akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard kwuru na 'Chief Udoji bụ onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, onye ọchịagha na onye ndu obodo nke na-emebighị ụkpụrụ na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe
Ọ bụ ụdị a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke ịhụ mba n'anya na ntinye onwe ya n'ije ozi adịghị njọ'

Jerry Craft (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 22, 1963) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ese akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke a maara nke ọma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na-atọ ọchị Mama's Boyz na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya New Kid Craft bụ otu n'ime mmadụ ole na ole na-ese ihe nkiri Afrika Amerikan na US
Craft tolitere na Washington Heights ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Ethical Culture Fieldston Skul
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Skul nke Ahụ anya nka na 1984 na Bachelor nke Fine Arts na Media Arts
Craft rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri na abụọ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, n'oge ahụ, ọ nwetakwara ọrụ mbụ ya na-atọ ọchị na ọrụ maka Marvel Comics na Harvey Comics
N'ịga n'ihu na King Features Syndicate, Craft nọrọ afọ asatọ na-ede broshuọ ahịa
Njikọ a na King Features dugara na syndication nke Craft's Mama's Boyz malite na 1995

Craft mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Sports Illustrated for Kids ebe a họpụtara ya maka New Media Award site na National Cartoonists Society maka usoro ihe nkiri Flash ya a ma ama, tupu ọ hapụ ọrụ ahụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006 iji ghọọ onye na-ese ihe nkiri oge niile
Craft na-eme ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị mgbe niile n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ogige, na ọbá akwụkwọ
Na Jenụwarị ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa , 2020, e nyere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, New Kid, Newbery Medal, na-aghọ akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ na-ese onyinyo iji nweta nsọpụrụ a
New Kid nwetakwara onyinye Coretta Scott King Author Award, na onyinye Kirkus
Mama's Boyz na-agbaso ndụ nne naanị ya bụ Pauline Porter na ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ dị afọ iri na ụma Tyrell na Yusuf
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere nwanne Pauline bụ Greg na nne na nna ha
Mama's Boyz bụ mmepụta nke ihe nkiri a na-akpọ nkiri mpụga , nke Craft malitere na 1987
N'afọ 1990, ọ gbanwere ụfọdụ ihe nke The Outside View iji mepụta Mama's Boyz, nke ọ jikọtara onwe ya na The City Sun nke New York na n'ikpeazụ ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ kwa izu gafee mba ahụ
N'afọ 1995, King Features wepụtara Mama's Boyz maka ezigbo mfe kwa izu

A na-eto Mama's Boyz na Nnukwu Akwụkwọ n' ihi na African American Children, ma gosipụta ya na Chicken Soup maka African American Soul, Chicken Sup maka African American Woman's Soul, na The Complete Idiot's Guide to Comedy Writing
Ihe odide Mama's Boyz na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka 'spokescharacters' nke American Diabetes Association's African-American Program
E bipụtara ya na 2019, New Kid na-akọ akụkọ Jordan Banks, onye Africa-America nke nọ na klas nke asaa nke sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na-acha ọcha, nke bara ọgaranya
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ akụkụ nke akụkọ ndụ onwe onye na-abịa n'afọ ndụ
Dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ Africa-America ole na ole nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, Jordan ga-eche obere esemokwu ihu kwa ụbọchị, nke e gosipụtara n'akwụkwọ ahụ
Craft nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Jaylen na Aren, bụ ndị so nna ha dee akwụkwọ The Offenders Saving the World While Serving Detention! Craft bi na Norwalk, Connecticut
Jerry Phele (a mụrụ na 1 Julaị 1956) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Sotho nke South Africa nke a maara nke ọma maka ime ihe nkiri na Emzini Wezinsizwa dịka Mofokeng
O meela ihe nkiri na usoro ihe nkiri TV ndị ọzọ a ma ama dịka Skwizas na The Throne
Phele bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa maka African Content Movement na ntuli aka South Africa nke afọ 2019
N'afọ 2021, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na oge nke abụọ nke usoro ihe nkiri Abomama
Jerry Phele na IMDb
Jerusalem bu obodo okeye no n'ime ala ana-kpo Israel
Ndi Jew, Christian, na Muslim che obu ebe nso
Ndi Christian ma ndi Islam luru ogu ana-kpo the Crusades ebe na
Na oge nka, ndi Jew ma ndi Islam nwere nsobu site ebe na
Jesús España Cobo (amụrụ na 21 Ọgọstụ na afọ 1978 na Valdemoro, Obodo nke Madrid) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge na Spain, onye na-elekwasị anya na mita 3000 na 5000
España bu ụzọ nọchite anya Spain na asomupi nke afọ 2001 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ebe ọ bụ onye nke iri na otu na ọsọ dị mkpirikpi
O meriri nrite mbụ ya n'afọ sochirinụ na 2002 European Athletics Indoor Championships, na-ewere ọla nchara karịa 3000 m
N'èzí, ọ bịara nke iri na otu na 5000m na 2002 European Athletics Championships
Ọ bịarutere nso na nrite ọzọ n'ime ụlọ na 2003 IAAF World Indoor Championships, na-emecha akụkụ nke abụọ n'azụ onye nwetara ọla nchara Luke Kipkosgei
N'afọ 2005, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo nke 3000m na 2005 European Cup wee gaa n'ihu na asọmupi na 2005 World Championships in Athletics, ebe a napụrụ ya ikike na okpomọkụ
Na 2006 European Championships na Athletics Spain nwetara mmeri dị mkpirikpi na 5000 m, na-agafe Mo Farah naanị mita site na akara
Nke a bụ aha mba ụwa mbụ ya
O mere egwuregwu Olympic mbụ ya na 2008 Beijing Olympics, ebe o mechara nke iri na anọ na 5000m na ngwụcha

N'afọ 2009, o meriri ọla nchara 3000m na European Indoors, ihe nrite ọla edo n'elu anya na 2009 European Team Championships, wee bụrụ onye nke iri na 5000m ikpeazụ na 2009 World Championships in Athletics
Jesús España sonyere na 2010 IAAF World Indoor Championships wee bịa nke isii, ma nọgide na-enwe aha ya na 2010 European Team Championships
Ọ nwara ịgbachitere aha 5000m ya na 2010 European Athletics Championships, mana Farah kụrụ ya n'oge a, wee nweta ọlaọcha
Ọ gbara ọsọ na San Silvestre Vallecana na Madrid na New Year's Eve wee bụrụ onye nke atọ na podium n'azụ Zersenay Tadese na onye Spain ibe ya Ayad Lamdassem
Ọ bụ onye nke ise n'elu 3000 m na 2011 European Athletics Indoor Championships na Machị wee merie Great Ireland Run na na ọnwa Eprel
Jesca Ababiku (amụrụ na 17 Julaị na afo 1975) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu nke iri nke Uganda ugbu a, na-anọchite anya ndị obodo Adjumani n'otu n'ime oche ndị omeiwu echekwara maka ụmụ nwanyị

Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement (NRM), otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị Uganda n'okpuru onye isi oche nke Yoweri Kaguta Museveni Tibuhaburwa, onye isi ala nke Republic of Uganda ugbu a (dị ka nke afo 2021)
A mụrụ Ababiku n'ụbọchị iri na asaa nke ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1945
Ọ tolitere na mpaghara Adjumani
Ọ gara Adjumani Girls Primary School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1990 na Primary Leaving Examination

N'afọ 1994, ọ nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda na Metu Secondary School, n'afọ 1997, ọ nwetara asambodu agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda Advanced na Moyo Secondary School na Moyo Town, na afo 1999 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Muni National Teachers College na Diploma na agụmakwụkwọ
N'afọ 2006, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere, ma mesịa n'afọ 2013, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadume Gulu na nzere masta na agụmakmakwụkwọ
Ababiku ghọrọ onye nkuzi n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Muni National Teachers College

N'afọ 2000, ọ malitere ịkụzi na Alere Secondary School, ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị na-enyere aka na mpaghara Adropi nke Adjumani District nke e guzobere na afo 1991 dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi iji nyere ụmụaka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ aka, ọkachasị ndị si South Sudan

N'afọ 2002, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya ndị nkuzi na Board of Governors nke Alere Secondary School, ọkwá o nwere ruo n'afọ 2004, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi klas na onye isi nke ngalaba akụkọ ihe mere eme site n'afọ 2004 ruo na afo 2006
Ọ ghọkwara onye ndụmọdụ distrikti na gọọmentị ime obodo Adjumani District site na afo 2002 ruo na afo 2010 ma bụrụ onye otu kansụl nke Mahadum Kyambogo site na afo 2004 ruo na afo 2010

Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke mmepụta maka Adjumani District Local Government site na afo 2004 ruo na afo 2006, ma site na afo 2006 ruo na afo 2010 ọ bụ onye otu kansụl nke National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda
Na mbido afọ 2002, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Adjumani nwere nkwarụ, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 2010

N'afọ 2010, ọ lara ezumike nká site n'ịbụ onye nkuzi, site n'ịghọ onye ndụmọdụ distrikti maka Gọọmentị Obodo Adjumani, na ọrụ ya na National Union of Disabled Persons of Uganda na Adjumani Disabled Persones Association iji gbaa ọsọ maka Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya (ọ bụ ezie na o mechara bụrụ onye otu National Resistance Movement) maka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka distrikti Adjumani wee merie
O nwetara vootu 17,037 iji merie asọmpi ụzọ anọ maka oche ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA), ebe ọ bụ onye otu Employment Act / Economic empowerment round table committee nke Agnes Kunihira bụ onye isi oche ya
Jesca Ababiku bụ onye na-alụbeghị di
Ihe ntụrụndụ ya gụnyere ige egwu na ịgụ akwụkwọ
Jesesi Mungoshi (nke a na-akpọkwa Jesese Mungoshi) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Zimbabwe
Ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya n'afọ 1989, na ihe nkiri akpọrọ, African Journey

N'oge mbụ, e gosipụtara Mungoshi na mbipụta afọ 1989 na akụkụ abụọ nke ihe nkiri ezinụlọ telivishọn George Bloomfield n'afọ 1990, African Journey, nke gosipụtara Jason Blicker, Katja Blomquist, Allan Jordan, Ulla Mahaka na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1991, e gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Godwin Mawuru nke akpọrọ, Neria, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka 'Neria'
Ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Dominic Kanaveli na Violet Ndlovu n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ọzọkwa, e gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke afọ 1993 nke Farai Sevenzo kpọrọ, Rwendo, nke Yemi Goodman Ajibade, Ben Daniels, Eldinah Tshatedi na Frank Windsor
N'afọ 2017, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị, Cook Off, nke Tomas Brickhill duziri, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Gogo'
N'ịghọta onyinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Zimbabwe, e nyere ya onyinye Lifetime Achievement Award site na Mahadum Great Zimbabwe n'ọnwa Mee 2017 na Masvingo

Ọ lụrụ onye edemede Zimbabwe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede uri, Charles Mungoshi, onye, dịka ndị nta akụkọ Zimbabwe Mail na This is Africa si kwuo, nwụrụ na 16 Febụwarị 2019 na Harare, Zimbabwe mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa afọ 10 na 71
Alụmdi na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ ise Farai, Graham, Nyasha, Charles, na Tsitsi, n'oge ọnwụ ya ha nwere ụmụ asaa
Di na nwunye ahụ na nwa ha nwoke, Farai niile nọ na ime ihe nkiri
Jesse Garba Abaga (amụrụ ya n'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1984), onye a maara dịka Jesse Jagz, bụ onye na-eti egwu na Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Chocolate City na 2010 wee wepụta abọm studio mbụ ya Jag of All Tradez n'otu afọ ahụ
O ji aka ya pụọ na nkwekọrịta Chocolate City n'afọ 2013 wee kwupụta mmalite nke akara onwe ya, Jagz Nation
Jagz wepụtara abọm studio nke abụọ ya Jagz Nation, Vol1
Thy Nation Come n'afọ 2013; ọ gụnyere egwu dịka 'Redemption', 'Bad Girl', 'Sex & Scotch' na 'God on the Mic'
E wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ ya, Jagz Nation Vol
2 Royal Niger Company, n'afọ 2014
Ọ laghachiri na Chocolate City n'afọ 2015 mana ọ hapụrụ akara ahụ ọzọ tupu ọ wepụta abọm studio nke anọ ya Odysseus n'afọ 2017
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2020, o wepụtara egwu ise nke akpọrọ Garba
A mụrụ Jesse Garba Abaga na 10 Ọgọstụ 1984 na Chris na Lydia Abaga
Ọ tolitere na Jos ma bụrụ onye otu agbụrụ Jukun nke Taraba State
Nna ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu na nne ya bụ onye na-ese ozi ọma na onye ndụmọdụ
Ọ sonyeere ndị ukwe chọọchị ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ma mesịa mụta ịkpọ ụbọ akwara na ngwá ụbọ nke nne na nna ya
O dekọrọ otu abọm a na-ebipụtabeghị na otu egwu Gospel Insanity n'afọ 2003
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, Abaga guzobere otu Eleven Thirty; ha nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ógbè ahụ tupu ha agbasa n'afọ 2006
Abaga wepụtara egwu mbụ n'okpuru aha egwu Jesse Jagz n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na egwu mbụ ya 'Africa' n'afọ 2006, na-ebute chaatị nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio dị n'ebe ugwu Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2007, atọ n'ime egwu ya nwere ihe ịga nke ọma yiri nke ahụ, na-arị elu n'ime Top 10 na ọtụtụ chaatị redio na mpaghara ahụ
Jesse Jagz emepụtala egwu maka ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, ndị gụnyere Majek Fashek, MI Abaga, Banky W, Ice Prince, Mode 9, na Proverb na Dekunle Fuji
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2009, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na Sauti Za mmemme egwu nke Busara
Jesse Jagz wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya Jag of All Tradez na 21 Eprel 2010
Ọ gụnyere egwu 'Wetin Dey', 'Pump It Up', 'Jesse Swag', 'Sugar Cane Baby' na 'Bend Down Low'
Ọ bụ Jesse Jagz mepụtara abọm ahụ kpamkpam ma gaa ofụma nke ukwuu na Naịjirịa ọnwa abụọ mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya
A kọwara ya dị ka ọrụ pop na-azụ ahịa, abọm ahụ bụ nnwale na ọdịdị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Adeoye Arubayi gbara ya, Jagz kwuru na abọm ahụ bụ usoro mmụta na ụzọ ọ ga-esi nyochaa ahịa egwu dị iche iche na Naịjirịa
Jag nke All Tradez nwetara nyocha dị iche iche site n'aka ndị nkatọ egwu
Magazin Keeps jara mmepụta nke abọm ahụ mma na nnyefe Jesse Jagz, mana ọ kwụsịrị nyocha ahụ na-ekwu na e kwesịrị ime ka ndekọ ahụ dị mkpirikpi ruo abụ iri

Oye Akd nke 360nobs nyere abọm ahụ mkpebi ikpe zuru oke nke kpakpando 75 n'ime 10, na-aja ya mma maka ịbụ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche nke nwere 'mgwakọta nke beat na rhymes nke na-egosi ebe hip-hop Naijiria kwesịrị ịdị taa'
Adeyinka Yusuff nke BellaNaija nyere abọm ahụ ọkwa rụrụ ise n'ime iri, na-eto mmepụta ya n'ozuzu ya ma na-akatọ ọdịdị nnwale ya n'otu oge
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2013, Jesse Jagz kwupụtara ọpụpụ ya n'afọ ofufo na Chocolate City na mmalite nke ụlọ ọrụ ya Jagz Nation
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị ka Nigerian Entertainment Today na Pulse Nigeria kọrọ na Chocolate City boro Jesse Jagz ebubo na ọ na-akwụ ha ego ma bụrụ onye wii wii riri ahụ
Otú ọ dị, akara ahụ gbaghaara akụkọ ahụ site na ụlọ ọrụ PR ha, World PR Media
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Kolapo Olapoju, Jesse Jagz kwuru na ọ hapụrụ Chocolate City n'ihi na ike gwụrụ ya na-abụ abụ sitere na album ya Jag of All Tradez ruo afọ atọ n'usoro
Ọzọkwa, ọ gwara akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard na njikwa akara ahụ egosila obere mmasị n'ịkwalite ọtụ egwu ọ dekọrọ

Jesse Murry (1948-1993) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ede uri

A mụrụ ya na 1948 na Fayetteville, North Carolina, mgbè ọ bụ nwatakịrị, a manyere ya ka ya na nwanne nne ya biri na New York, ebe ọ ghọrọ enyi Isabel Clark, onye na-elekọta ọ́bá akwụkwọ na ọbá akwụkwọ White Plains, ónyé mechara kuchie Murry

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gàrà Sarah Lawrence College, ebe ọ gụrụ nka na nkà ihe ọmụma wee gaa n'ihu na-akụzi dị ka Hobart na William Smith Colleges ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nlekọta ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe dịka Howard Finster
N'afọ 1984, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri atọ na ise, ọ banyèrè na mmemme MFA na Yale School of Art
Ọ zutere onye na-ese ihe Lisa Yuskavage n'ụbọchị ajụjụ ọnụ ya
Ha abụọ ga-abụ ndị enyi maka ndụ ya fọdụrụnụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yale, ọ kwagara New York City, soro onye mmekọ ya George Centanni biri na West Village
Murry nwụrụ n'ọrịa ndị metụtara ọrịa AIDS na 1993
Onye nkatọ Hilton Als etoola Murray maka 'mmiri ọ maara banyéré otu ihe osise si arụ ọrụ na ákwà, na otu agba na ọdịdị nwere ike ma kwesịkwa iji nlezianya, na nkwanye ùgwù'
Ihe ndị Murray hụrụ n'anya bụ mmanụ na wax aṅụ
Ihe osise bụ akụkọ ifo kachasị elu Ihe odide nke Jesse Murry, 1980 na 1993
Nke Jarrett Earnest dezigharịrị
E bipụtara ya site na Soberscove Press, 2021
Jessica Romuald Emmanuella Aby (amụrụ na 16 na ọnwa nke isii, na afọ1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Ivorian nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ivory Coast
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Ivorian maka 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
Jessica Marie Alba / / ˈælbə / AL -bə ; amuru Eprel 28, 1981) bu nwanyị America na-eme ihe nkiri na nwanyị na-azu ahịa

Ọ malitere ihe ngosi telivishọn ya nakwa mputa ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ na Camp Nowhere na World Secret of Alex Mack (1994), wee bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Dark Angel (2000-2002), nke o mere nke wetara ya nhọpụta Golden Globe
Nnukwu ihe ngosi ihuenyo ya bịara n'ihe ngosi a kpọrọ Honey (2003)

N'oge na-adịghị anya, o guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Hollywood, ma sonyekwa n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi, nke gụnyere Fantastic Four (2005), Fantastic Four Rise of the Silver Surfer (2007), Good Luck Chuck (2007), Anya (2007)
2008), Ụbọchị Valentine (2010), Little Fockers (2010), na Mechanic Mbilite n'ọnwụ (2016)

Ọ bụ onye na-emekọ ihe ọnụ ugboro ugboro nke onye nduzi Robert Rodriguez, ma na-esonye na Sin City (2005), Machete (2010), Spy Kids All Time in the World (2011), Machete Kills (2013), na Sin City A Dame to Kill For (2014)
Site na 2019 ruo 2020, Alba sonyere n'usoro ihe nkiri mpụ nke Spectrum a kpọrọ LA's Finest
Na 2011, Alba soro wee give ụlọọrụ The Honest Company, ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-azụ ahịa na-ere ihe nwa, nke onwe na ngwaahịa ụlọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere Men's Health, Vanity Fair na FHM etinyela ya na ndepụta ha nke ụmụ nwanyị mara mma n'ụwa
A mụrụ Jessica Marie Alba na Pomona, California na Eprel 28, 1981, ọ bu ada Catherine Louisa ( née Jensen) na Mark David Alba
Nne ya nwere ndabere mkpọrọgwụ Danish, Welsh, German, English na French, ebe nne na nna nna ya, bụ ndị a mụrụ na California, bụ ụmụ abụọ nke ndị si Mexico kwabata
O nwere nwanne nwoke nke nta, Jọshụa
Nwa nwanne nna ya nke atọ, ewepụburu, bụ onye edemede Gustavo Arellano
Ọrụ nna ya na Air Force were ezinụlọ gaa Biloxi, Mississippi, na Del Rio, Texas, tupu ya ebighachi na Claremont, California, mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu

Alba akọwaala ezi na ụlọ ya dị ka 'ezinaụlọ na+akwado ihe ka ọ si wee dị - ezinụlọ omenala, ezinụlọ Katọlik, na ezinụlọ Latin America' na onwe ya dị ka onye na-emesapụ aka; o kwuru na ya akọwapụtala onwe ya dị ka ' nwaanyị ' mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Ọtụtụ ọrịa anụ ahụ́ ka e ji mara Alba mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ riara ọrịa oyi ugboro anọ ma ọ bụ ise n'afọ ma na -adaba nke akpa ume ugboro abụọ nakwa appendix na cyst tonsillar gbawara agbawa
Ọ na-enwekwa asthma kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
Alba nọpụrụ iche n'ebe ụmụaka ndị ọzọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nọ n'ihi na ọ na-anọkarị n'ụlọ ọgwụ n'ọrịa ya nke na ọ dịghị onye maara ya nke ọma nke mere ka ya na ya bụrụ enyi
O kwuwo na nkwapu na nkwa ga ezinụlọ ya na-agakarị sokwa mee ka e kewapunya n'ebe ndị ọgbọ ya nọ
Alba gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Claremont High School mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii wee gaa n'ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Atlantic
Alba gosipụtara mmasị ime ihe site na afọ ise
Na 1992, Alba onye dị afọ iri na otu rịọrọ nne ya ka ọ kpọga ya na asọmpi ime egwuregwu na Beverly Hills, ebe nnukwu ihe nrite bụ klas ime ihe n'efu
Alba nwetara nnukwu ihe nrite, ma were nkuzi izizi mbụ ya
Otu onye ọrụ were Alba n'ọrụ ka ọnwa itoolu gachara
Ngosipụta mbụ ya na ihe nkiri bụ obere ọrụ na njirimara 1994 Camp Nowhere dị ka Gail
Egoro ya na mbụ maka izu abụọ mana ọrụ ya ghọrọ ọrụ ọnwa abụọ mgbe otu onye n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ama ama kwụsịrị
Alba pụtara na mgbasa ozi telivishọn abụọ maka Nintendo na JC Penney mgbe ọ bụ nwata
E mechara gosi ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nọọrọ onwe ya
Ọ batara na telivishọn na 1994 na-arụ ọrụ ugboro ugboro dị ka Jessica efu na akụkụ atọ nke usoro ihe nkiri Nickelodeon The Secret World of Alex Mack
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke Maya na oge abụọ nke mmalite nke usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn emere n'afọ 1995 a kpọrọ Flipper

N'okpuru nduzi nke nne na-akuziri ya etu esị egwu mmiri, Alba mụtara igwu mmiri tupu ya enwee ike ịga ije, ọ bụkwa onye na-egwu mmiri, o nwekwara nzere nke PADI, nkà ndị a na-eji eme ihe na ihe ngosi, nke a na-ese na Australia

Na 1998, ọ pụtara dị ka Melissa Hauer na ihe omume nke mbụ nke ihe nkiri mpụ nke Steven Bochco a kpọrọ Brooklyn South, dị ka Leanne na akụkụ abụọ nke Beverly Hills, 90210, na dị ka Layla na ihe omume nke Love Boat The Next Wave
Na 1999, ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri mkpa ọchị nke Randy Quaid a kpọrọ PUNKS
Mgbe Alba gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ mụtara ime ihe ya na William H
Macy na nwunye ya, Felicity Huffman, n'ulọ ihe nkiri Atlantic, bụ nke Macy na onye nrite nke Pulitzer Prize mepụtara - onye na-eme egwuregwu na onye nduzi ihe nkiri, David Mamet

Alba ghọrọ onye a ma ama na Hollywood na 1999 mgbe ọ pụtara dị ka onye so n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-ata onye editọ na-enweghị nchebe ahụhụ n'ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Never Been Kissed, na-emegide Drew Barrymore, yana dịka onye isi nwanyị na ihe nkiri egwu egwu a na-ahughi anya nke oma Idle Hands, ya na Devon Sawa

Nnukwu ihe itunanya ya bịara mgbe James Cameron họọrọ Alba site na nnọkọ ihe karịrị otu puku ndị na-aga ka e wee ha n'ime ihe nkiri nke onye agha akwadoro nke oma, Max Guevara, na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn FOX a kpọrọ Dark Angel
Usoro bu ihe emepụtara maka oge abụọ ruo 2002, o wee nwetara Alba nhọpụta nkwanye ùgwù nke Golden Globe, Teen Choice Award for Choice Actress, na Saturn Award for Best Actress
A kọwawo ọrụ ya dị ka agwa nwanyị, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke ikike ụmụ nwanyị

N'ịbụ onye na-ede ihe maka Mahadum Melbourne, Bronwen Auty weere Max dị ka 'dike nwanyị nke oge a - nwa agbọghọ nke e nyere ikike iji ahụ ya na-arụsi ọrụ ike iji nweta ihe mweta', na-ekwu maka ọjụjụ Max jụrụ iji ngwa agha, ma kama iji nkà na ihe ọmụma dị ka ngwá agha iji wee na-enye aka na ọkwa a
N'afọ 2004, a họọrọ Max dịka onye nke iri na asaa na ndepụta nke TV Guide gbasara '25 Greatest Sci-Fi Legends'
Ọrụ ya na Dark Angel mere ka akụkụ dị ịrịba ama na fim, o nwere nnukwu ihe ngosi ihuenyo ya na 2003, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba egwú na Honey
Nkwekọrịta siri ike nke ihe nkiri Rotten Tomato bụ 'Jessica Alba mara mma nakwa ịgba egwu siri ike na-enye ụfọdụ ihe na-ebuli elu na ihe nkiri a'
Emebere na ihe nkiri ahụ ga-enweta nde dọla iri na asatọ mana ihe nkiri ahụ, mechara nweta ihe karịrị nde dọla iri isii na abụọ
Alba sonyekwara n'ihe nkiri dika onye na-agba egwu Nancy Callahan, dị ka akụkụ nke ihe nkedo ogologo oge, na ihe nkiri mpụ Sin City (2005), nke Robert Rodriguez na Frank Miller dere, meputa ma duzie
Ọ dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe osise Miller nke nwere otu aha ahụ
Ọ nụbeghị banyere akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ tupu itinye aka na fim ahụ, mana ọ na-agụsi ya agụụ ike isoro Rodriguez wee rụkọọ ọrụ
Ọ nwetara ihe nrite ihe nkiri MTV maka ịrụ ọrụ kacha mma
Alba gosipụtara agwa Marvel Comics nke Invisible Woman na Fantastic Four (nakwa 2005), n'akụkụ Ioan Gruffudd, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis, na Julian McMahon

The Guardian, na nyocha ya maka ihe nkiri ahụ, kwuru, sị 'Ndị inyom na ndị na-abụghị ndị inyom ga-etinyerịrị ihe mgbagwoju anya nke Fantastic Four's kasị enye nsogbu ebe a nabatara ya na akụkọ ahụ n'ihi ịma mma ya, ihe bu ike ukwuu nke Alba ga-abụ na-apughị ihụ ya anya'
Na MTV Movie Awards nke afọ 2006, ọ nwetara nhọpụta maka Best Hero na Best On-Screen Team
Ọ kwadoro ihe nkiri nke MTV Movie Awards nke afọ 2006 wee mee ihe osise na-eme ihe nkiri King Kong, Mission Impossible III na The Da Vinci Code
Alba meghariri ọrụ ya na Fantastic Four Rise of the Silver Surfer, nke ewepụtara na June 2007
Dị ka Alba si kwuo, ntụziaka Tim Story n'oge ọnọdụ mmetụta uche fọdụrụ ihe nta ka ọ kwụsị ime ihe
'[Ọ gwara m] 'Ọ dị ka ọ dị adị
Ọ na-adị oke na-egbu mgbu
Ị nwere ike ịma mma karịa mgbe ị na-ebe akwa? Bee akwa mara mma, Jessica' O kwụrụ si, 'Ejila ihu gị eme ihe ahụ
Naanị mee ka ọ dị larịị
Na Good Luck Chuck (nakwa 2007), Alba gosipụtara mmasị ịhụnanya nke dọkịta eze na-enwe mmasị nwanyi

Ọ pụtara n'otu akwụkwọ mmado ihe nkiri Good Luck Chuck ' na-egosipụta akwụkwọ mkpuchi nke Rolling Stone nke onye na-ese foto ama aha ya bu Annie Leibovitz sere nke gosipụtara John Lennon na Yoko Ono n'ụdị ihe ngosi yiri ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị nkatọ tụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ n'anya nke ukwuu, ọ nwetara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde dọla iri isii mgbe ewepụtara ya
Ụgbọ ihe ngosiputa nke atọ ya na 2007 bụ ihe na-akpali akpali nke mmụọ Awake, na-egosi enyi nwanyị nke nwoke nwere ego ruru nde kwuru nde nke na-achọ ịkpụgharị obi
Na February 2008, ọ kwadoro Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences ' Science and Technical Awards

Alba mere ka ọ na-eme mgbanwe na ụdị ihe egwu dị na ihe nkiri a kpọrọ The Eye, nke bu ihe nkiri Hong Kong emeghariri, bụ nke ọ nwetara ọrụ nke onye na-akụ violin na-aga nke ọma nke nwetara mweghari anya ya nke nyere ya ohere ịhụ n'ime ụwa nke anya nkịtị na-apughị ihụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị nkatọ anabataghị ihe nkiri ahụ nke ọma, arụmọrụ ya n'onwe ya nwetara nyocha dị iche iche
Ọ nwetara nhọpụta nke Teen Choice for Movie Actress Horror–Thriller na nhọpụta Razzie Award maka Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha njọ (nke ya na Love Guru kesara)

Na 2008, ọ mere ihe nkiri dika nwata nwanyị na-ere ahịa n'ihe nkiri ihunanya ntochi a kpọrọ Meet Bill, n'akụkụ Logan Lerman na Elizabeth Banks, nakwa n'ihe nkiri The Love Guru, dị ka nwanyị nke ketara otu egwuregwu Toronto Maple Leafs hockey, megide Mike Myers na Justin Timberlake
Mick LaSalle, nke San Francisco Chronicle, na-achọpụta na ọ bụ 'nke a ma ama' na fim ahụ, chere na 'n'ikpeazụ o yiri ka ọ dị jụụ na igwefoto'
The Love Guru bụ ihe dị egwu n'azụmahịa
Ọ bụ ezie na Alba enweghị mwepụta ihe nkiri ọ bụla na 2009, ihe nkiri ise dị elu ewepụtara na 2010 gosipụtara ya n'ọrụ dị ịrịba ama

Ọrụ mbụ ya n'ime afọ bụ nke onye akwụna na The Killer Inside Me, mmegharị nke akwụkwọ nke otu aha ahụ, megidere Kate Hudson na Casey Affleck, bụ nke malitere na Sundance Film Festival ka mmeghachi omume na-ezighị ezi sitere na ndị nkatọ
N'agbanyeghị nyocha ndị na-adịghị mma, ihe nkiri ahụ bu nke gara nke ọma n'azụmahịa, o nwetara ego karịrị nde dọla narị abụọ na iri na isii
Na ihe nkiri Machete, Alba na onye nduzi ihe nkiri jikọtara Robert Rodriguez, na-arụ ọrụ nke onye ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ onye na-ahọrọ n'etiti ịkwado iwu na ime ihe na-ewu ewu n'anya ezinụlọ ya
Machete nwetara ihe karịrị nde dọla iri anọ na anọ n'ụwa niile
N'ime ya, e gosipụtara ya dika otu nwa agbọghọ a dọpụrụ n'ụzọ na-egbu mgbu
Robert De Niro jikọtakwara bụ onye nọkwa na Machete
N'agbanyeghị nyocha ndị na-adịghị mma sitere n'aka ndị nkatọ, ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara ihe karịrị nddọlaUnarị atọ na iri 0 n'ụwa nile
Maka ọrụ ya niile na 2010, ọ nwetara ihe nrite Razzie Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha njọ
Na 2011, Alba na Robert Rodriguez rụrụ ọrụ nke ugboro atọ na ihe nkiri Spy Kids All Time in the World, na egosiputa onye nledo ezumike nká nke a na-akpọghachi n'ime ihe
Iji soro ụmụ di ya ọhụrụ na-akpakọrịta, ọ na-akpọ ha òkù ka ha bịa

Alba pụtakwara n'ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ ya na Adam Scott, Richard Jenkins, Jane Lynch, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, na Catherine O'Hara na ihe nkiri ACOD (2013), na-egosiputa ihe Washington Post kọwara dị ka 'nwa nke ịgba alụkwaghịm', onye ya na àgwà Scott fọrọ nke nta ka ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-enwe mmekọ na-azu enyi ya nwanyị

Onye nkatọ ScreenRant Ben Kendrick dere, sị '[Winstead] na [Alba] na-enyekwa onyinye ha - ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ bụ ndị e mere ka ha bụrụ enyo maka Carter iji nyochaa ndụ ya na nhọrọ ya' ACOD nwetara obere ihe ngo n'ihe nkiri na North America
Na 2013, Alba mekwara ka olu ya na-eme ihe mpụta mbụ na ihe nkiri ahụ a gara nke ọma a kpọrọ Escape From Planet Earth
Alba na onye nduzi Rodriguez rụkwara ọrụ ọzọ maka usoro ihe nkiri abụọ

Ọ meghariri ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ, n'ọdịdị mputa na-enweghi nzere, na Machete Kills (2013), nke ndị nkatọ na ndị na-ege ntị katọrọ, na ọrụ ya ka ukwuu nke onye na-agba egwu n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Nancy Callahan, na-achọ ịbọ ọbọ onye nchekwa ya nwụrụ aAs of 2014[update]nwụ, na Sin City A Dame to Kill For, nke e wepụtara na August 2014, na 2D na 3D

N'adịghị ka ihe nkiri mbụ ahụ, A Dame to Kill For bụ ihe nkiri na-emeghị nke ọma n'azụmahịa, na-eweta naanị nde dọla iri atọ na itoolu ebe e mefuru nde dọla iri isii na ise wee mee ya, wee nweta nyocha dị iche iche site n'aka ndị nkatọ ihe nkiri
Ndị dị iche iche chere na ọ bụ 'mgbalị oge na-adịghị anya iji gbanwee àgwà Alba site n'onye a na-erigbu emegbu ka ọ bụrụ nke a na-enye ike'

O mechara rụọ ọrụ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri cabaret na ihe nkiri Dear Eleanor (2014), enyi nwanyị na-eme egwuregwu nke onye prọfesọ Bekee ihe na-agara nke ọma na nke a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Some Kind of Beautiful (2014), onye nnabata na ụlọ ọrụ limo na Stretch (nakwa 2014), onye na-azụ ahịa ngwa ọgụ na-adịghị ike nke mmetụta uche na mpụ ntochi Barely Lethal (2015), na nke onye na-ese ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri egwu egwu The Veil (2016); ewepụtara ihe nkiri niile maka ịhe ngosi pere mpe yana VOD
N'ihe nkiri Mechanic Mbilite n'ọnwụ (2016), n'akụkụ Jason Statham, Alba ka e gosipụtara dika enyi nwanyị nke onye ezumike nká

O mere Krav Maga ka o wee nwee ọdịdị maka ihe nkiri ahụ, wee dọta ya na ike nke àgwà ya gosipụtara, na-ekwu, sị 'Echere m na maka ụdị ihe nkiri ndị a, ị naghị ahụkarị nwanyị ka ọ na-egosipụta ihe ngosi ịhụnanya
Ọ ga-eme ihe nkiri wee mepụta usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ maka Disney + akpọrọ 'Parenting Without Borders' (aha ọrụ) nke ga-elekwasị anya na ezinụlọ gburugburu ụwa nakwa nkwenkwe na omenala ha
Na Jenụwarị 2012, Alba na onye ọchụnta ego Christopher Gavigan malitere Ụlọ Ọru a kpọrọ The Honest Company na-ere ihe nchịkọta nke ngwongwo ụlọ, ihe eji awachi nwa ike, na ngwaahịa nlekọta ahụ

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gara nke ọma, ma bụrụ nke nwere ego na ngwaahịa ruru otu ijeri dọla dika n'afọ 2014 Na mbido 2013, Alba wepụtara akwụkwọ ya, The Honest Life, nke dabere na ahụmịhe ya, ndụ na-adịghị egbu egbu maka ezinụlọ ya
Akwụkwọ ahụ ghọrọ New York Times Best Seller
Na 2015, e mere atụmatụ na Alba nwere pasent iri na ise ruo pasent iri abụọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'October 2015, Alba malitere nchịkọta nlekọta anụ ahụ na ihe mara mma nke a na-akpọ Honest Beauty
Alba pụtara maka mgbasa ozi nbipụta nke agbụ site na ihe mkpọsa akpọrọ 'Declare Yourself' mkpọsa na-agba ume ndebanye aha ntuli aka n'etiti ndị ntorobịa maka ntuli aka onye isi ala United States 2008
Mgbasa ozi ndị ahụ, nke Mark Liddell sere, gosipụtara Alba ka e kechiri na teepu ojii, ma dọta uche mgbasa ozi mba

Alba kwuru maka ime mgbasa ozi na 'ọ naghị ewute m ma ọlị' Alba kwukwara, 'Echere m na ọ dị mkpa ka ndị na-eto eto mara mkpa anyị nwere na obodo a iji mee ka ha na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ndị mmadụ na-anabata ihe ndị na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ'
Alba kwadoro onye na-aputa maka ọkwa onye isi ala na pati nke Democratic Barack Obama n'oge izizi n'afọ 2008
Ọ kwadokwara mkpọsa Hillary Clinton maka onyeisi oche
Na June 2009, mgbe a na-eme ihe nkiri The Killer Inside Me na Oklahoma City, Alba tinyere aka na esemokwu ya na ndị bi na ya mgbe ọ madoro akwụkwọ ozi nke nnukwu azụ 'shark' na gburugburu obodo
Alba kwuru na ya na-agbalị ileba anya na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nnukwu shark ọcha nke na-ebelata kwa ụbọchị
Ndị mgbasa ozi na-eche na a ga-achụ Alba ma bo ya ebubo imebi ihe
Na June 16, 2009, ndị uwe ojii Oklahoma City kwuru na ha agaghị agbaso ebubo mpụ megide Alba, n'ihi na ọ nweghị onye nwe ụlọ chọrọ ịchụso ya
Alba rịọrọ mgbaghara na nkwupụta ọ gwara magazin a kpọrọ wee kwuo na ya kwara ụta maka omume ya
O mechara nye United Way ego a na-akọwaghị nke ọma (ihe karịrị dọla narị ise) , bụ́ nke o ji otu n'ime akwụkwọ mmado shark kpuchie bọọdụ mgbasa ozi ya
N'afọ 2011, Alba sonyeere na mbọ ịgbachitere ụbọchị abụọ na Washington DC na nkwado nke Iwu Nchekwa Kemịkalụ, ngbanwe nke Iwu nchịkwa ihe na -egbu egbu nke 1976
Alba laghachiri na Capitol Hill na 2015 ka ọ na-agbachitere ndị omebe iwu ka ha na-arụrịta ụka ọzọ maka nnọchi nke 1976 Substances Control Act
Ọ bụkwa onye nkwado siri ike maka ikike ndị mmekọ nwoke na nwoke na June 27, 2013, o gosipụtara obi ụtọ ya na mkpebi Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu ịkagbu DOMA n'akara Twitter ya
O tinyere ozi na Twitter '#equality #love'

Ọrụ ebere Alba gụnyere itinye aka na Clothes Off Our Back, Habitat for Humanity, National Center for Missing and Exploited Children, Project HOME, RADD, Revlon Run / Walk for Women, SOS Children's Villages, Soles4Souls, Step Up and Baby2Baby
Alba bụ onye nnọchi anya otu 1Goal iji nye ụmụaka Africa mmụta na ọzụzụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya Baby2Baby, na-enye onyinye ma na-enyere aka ikesa ihe dị ka diapers na uwe nye ezinụlọ nọ na Los Angeles
Na 2015, Alba na The Honest Company kwadoro ụlọ nyocha na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Mount Sinai na New York City
Ekwuwapụtara ụlọ nyocha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ọnụ ụlọ pụrụ iche emebere iji gbochie uzuzu na ụmụ irighiri ihe, ebe otu ndị na-ahụ maka ọrịa na-efe efe ga-enyocha njikọ dị n'etiti kemịkalụ ezinụlọ na autism
Jessica Alba anabatala nlebara anya maka ọdịdị ya kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ e tinyekwala ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche nke ndị na-eme ememme kachasị maa mma n'oge ahụ
A gụnyere Alba na ndepụta nke Maxim Magazine's Hot 100 ebe edeputara ya ọtụtụ oge site na 2001 ruo 2014

N'okwu a, o kwuru, sị, 'M ga-agbarịrị mbọ ụfọdụ iji ihem bu mee ihe maka ọdịmma m, ebe m na-eduzi ndị mmadụ ka ha na-eche echiche otú m chọrọ' N'afọ 2002, a họpụtara Alba dika nwanyị nke ise kacha maa mma mmekọahụ na ntuli aka Hollywoodcom
Na 2005, a kpọrọ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị mmadụ iri ise kasị mma nke magazin ndị mmadụ, ọ pụtakwara mgbe e mesịrị na ndepụta mmadu otu narị Kasị Mma nke magazin ahụ na 2007
Ahukwara Alba dịka otu onye na ndepụta nke FHM nke ụmụ nwanyị kaacha maa mma ile anya
Akpọrọ Alba na ndekọ '25 Sexiest Celebrities' nke Playboy na 2006 wee pụta na mkpuchi nke magazin n'afọ ahụ

Alba tinyere aka na ịgba akwụkwọ megide Playboy maka iji ihe oyiyi ya mee ihe na mkpuchi a (site na mgbasa ozi maka Into the Blue ) na-enwetaghi ikike ua, nke ọ na-ekwu na-egosi na e gosipụtara ya dika ihe osise gba ọtọ na mbipụta ahụ'
Otú ọ dị, o mesịrị kwụsị ikpe ahụ mgbe ọ natachara mgbaghara nke onye nwe Playboy Hugh Hefner, bụ onye kwetara inye onyinye maka ụlọ ọrụ ebere abụọ nke Alba kwadoro
Nakwa na 2006, ndị na-agụ AskMencom turu Alba votu ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke izizi na ihe ndepụta 'ụmụ nwanyị iri itoolu na itoolu kasị maa mma'
Na 2007, Alba bụrụ onye nke anọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Empire Magazine a kpọrọ '100 Sexiest Movie Stars'
Ma GQ na In Style nwere Alba na mkpuchi June 2008 ha
Alba pụtara na kalenda Campari 2009 nke gosipụtara foto nke ihe ngosi ya
Campari bipụtara akwụkwọ kalenda 9,999
Na 2011, a kpọrọ ya otu n'ime '100 Best Women of All-time' site na Men's Health, na 2012 ndị mmadụ kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị 'Kachasị Mma n'oge Ọ bụla'

Na 2010, akụkọ pụtara na otu nwa agbọghọ China dị afọ iri abụọ na otu na-achọ ịwa ahụ plastik ka ọ dị ka Alba iji nwetaghachi enyi ya nwoke; Alba kwuru okwu megide mkpa ọ dị ka ọ gbanwee ọdịdị ya maka ịhụnanya
Echere m na e nwere ụmụ agbọghọ nwere oke ọchịchọ ga-eme ihe ọ bụla iji bụrụ ndị a ma ama, ha na-eche na ndị ikom nọ na ụlọọrụ a amarala ụmụ nwanyị dika ndị n'eme ihe ahụ
N'adịghị ka mmetụta ndị mmadụ nwere, ọ dịtụbeghị mgbe m ji mmekọahụ eme ihe
Nke ahụ abụghị nnọọ maka m

Mgbe m nọ na nzukọ, achọrọ m ịgwa gị ihe mere m ji bụrụ ihe bara uru, ka m si bụrụ ngwa ahịa, otu m ga-esi tinye ike ndị mmadu na oche, ọ bụghị, 'E nwere ohere ị ga-enwe ike idina m' Nke ahụ abụbeghị nkwekọrịta m
Alba ekwuola maka egwu ọ na-atụ na a ga-edegharị ya dị ka nwa agbọghọ hụrụ mmekọahụ n'anya n'ihi n'ọtụtụ ihe àgwà e nyere ya n'ihe nkiri

N'ajụjụ ọnụ, Alba kwuru na ọ chọrọ ka e were ya kpọrọ ihe dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri mana o kwenyere na ọ kwesịrị ime ihe nkiri na ọ gaghị enwe mmasị ịmalite ọrụ ya, na-ekwu na n'ikpeazụ ọ tụrụ anya na ọ ga-ahọrọ ọrụ na fim ya

Ekwuru na Alba na-ekwu na ọ gaghị agba ọtọ n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya Enyere ya ohere ihọrọ igosi ịgba ọtọ na Sin City site na ndị nduzi ihe nkiri ahụ, Frank Miller na Robert Rodriguez, ma ọ jụrụ onyinye ahụ, na-ekwu, sị, 'Anaghị m agba ọtọ
Anaghị m eme ya
Ma eleghị anya, nke ahụ na-eme ka m bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ọjọọ
Ma eleghị anya, a gaghị ewe m n'ọrụ n'ihe ụfọdụ

Ma enwere m nchegbu nke ukwuu' O kwuru banyere oge ịse ihe nke GQ ebe ọ na-eyi obere uwe, 'Ha achọghị ka m yie uwe ogologo ọkpa mana m kwuru, 'Ọ bụrụ na m ga-abụ onye na-eyighi akwa, achọrọ m iyi uwe ogoglogo ọkpa'
A zụlitere Alba dị ka onye Katọlik n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, mana ọ hapụrụ ụka n'ihi na ọ chere na a na-ekpe ya ikpe maka ọdịdị ya, na-akọwa
Ndị okenye na-akụ m ihe, onye pastọ m na-eto eto kwuru na ọ bụ n’ihi na m na-eyi uwe na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ, mgbe m na-ejighị
O mere ka ọ dị m ka m bụ onye nwoke na-achọsi ike, ka ọ bụ m kpatara ya, ọ na-emekwa m ka m nwee ihere ahụ m na ịbụ nwanyị

Alba nwekwara ihe nkatọ megide ihe chọọchị ahụ kwụrụ maka mmekọahụ tupu alụmdi na nwunye na nwoke idina nwoke na ihe ọ hụrụ dị ka enweghị ụmụ nwanyị siri ike ndị nlereanya na Bible, na-akọwa si 'Echere m na ọ bụ ezigbo nduzi, ma ọ bụghị otú m ga-esi bie ndụ m' 'Okpukpe ya [malitere] ibelata' mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise mgbe o mere ihe nkiri dị ka onye ntorobịa nwere gonorrhea na akpịrị na ihe omume 1996 nke usoro telivishọn Chicago Hope
Ndị enyi ya nọ na chọọchị meghachiri omume n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma maka ọrụ ya, na-eme ka ọ kwụsị inwe okwukwe na chọọchị ahụ
Ma, o kwuru na ya ka jisi okwukwe ya ike na Chineke n’agbanyeghị na ọ hapụrụ chọọchị ahụ
Mgbe a na-emeputa ihe nkiri Angel Dark na January 2000, Alba malitere mmekọrịta afọ atọ ya na onye ọrụ ibe ya Michael Weatherly
Weatherly gwara Alba ka ọ lụọ ya n'ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ nke iri abụọ ya, nke ọ nabatara
N'August 2003, Alba na Weatherly kwupụtara na ha akwụsịla mmekọrịta ha
Na July 2007, Alba kwuru banyere nkewa ahụ, na-ekwu, 'Amaghị m [ihe mere m ji tinye aka]
Abụ m nwa agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke
O ji afọ iri na abụọ wee tọọ m
Echere m na ọ maara nke ọma karị
Obi adịghị ndị mụrụ m ụtọ
Ha bụ ndị okpukpe n'ezie
Ha kwenyere na Chineke agaghị ekwe ka e dee Bible ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ihe ha kwesịrị ikwere
Adị m nnọọ iche'
Alba zutere Cash Warren, nwa nwoke omee Michael Warren, mgbe ọ na-emeputa ihe nkiri Fantastic Four na 2004
Di na nwunye a lụrụ na Los Angeles na Mee 2008
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ ụmụ nwanyị Honor Marie, a mụrụ na June 2008, na Haven Garner a mụrụ na August 2011, na nwa nwoke, Hayes, a mụrụ na December 2017
Foto mbụ nke ada ya, bụ́ ndị dị na mbiputa nke OK! na Julaị 2008 ka a na-akọ na ọ wetaara Alba otu nde dọla na ọkara
N'afọ 2014, Alba pụtara na usoro oro ọmụmụ nke Henry Louis Gaa kpọrọ tes Ịchọta mgbọrọgwụ gị, e kweru na ube usoro ọmụmụ ya sitere na mmepeanya oge ochie nke Maya
Nchọpụta ihe nkiri ahụ gosiri na aha nna ya eketaghị onye Spen, ebe ọ bụ na nna nna ya kpọmkwem (Y-DNA) bụ Haplogroup Q-M3, bụ onye amaala
Aheal nna ya ( mtDNA ) bụ onye Juu wee kpughee na onye ọka iwu Alan Dershowitz bụ onywu eta ya

Mgbakwụnye nke Alba zuru ụwa ọn ụpasent iri asaa na atọ bu nke sị Yuropupeebe pasent iri iri abụọ na abụọ si obodo ọwụwa anyanwụ AsiaEsia na Ameicpasent abụọ,si 2% Sub-Saharan Africpasent001 si 3% Middle Eastern na North Afripasent001 sikwa1% South Asiapasent2abụọ na ọkara nke ọzọ bu nke na-enweghi ebe a gụnyere ya gwu'
Jessica Balogun (amuru na ọnwa Disemba 20, nke afọ 1988) bụ onye okpu okpu Naijiria nke dabere na German
Jessica bụ onye amateur pụtara ìhè ma bụrụkwa onye ọkachamara n'ịgba ọkpọ n'ụwa ugbu a
A mụrụ Jessica n' ọnwa Disemba 20, nke afọ 1988 na Ibadan Nigeria
Ọnwa isii ka amụchara Balogun, ya na nne ya rutere Stuttgart
Site na nwa klas ya n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ Aachen, ọ chọtara kọntaktị mbụ ya na ụlọ ịgba ọkpọ na-eto eto MTK Boxen Aachen
Jessica Balogun sonyeere MTK Boxen Aachen n'oge okpomọkụ nke nke afọ 2005
N'asọmpi mbụ ya, na ọnwa Eprel 1, 2006, o meriri asọmpi West German na mmeri KO n'agba nke mbụ
Ọnwa isii ka e mesịrị, ọ gụchara 4th International German Women's Box Championship na Herrischried / Südbaden wee nweta aha nke International German Champion na mmeri na agba abụọ
O dere akụkọ egwuregwu Aachen Ọ bụ onye mmeri ịkụ ọkpọ mbụ nke Kaiserstadt ochie
Na Nọvemba 2006 Jessica Balogun meriri asọmpi ịkụ ọkpọ ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa, Baden Open, site na mmeri abụọ agba nke mbụ KO
Asọmpi “Open Aachen City Championship”, nke otu ya hibere, MTK Boxen Aachen, na 2002, wetara ya aha nke anọ na 2006
Oge a ọ meriri onye iro ya na agba nke atọ site na KOJessica Balogun nwere mmeri dịka onye ọkpọ ọkpọ bụ ugbu a (njedebe nke 2006) na-enwe mmeri iri n'ime ọgụ iri
Ná mmalite nke afọ 2008, Balogun kwagara n'ogige ndị ọkachamara
N'ebe a, ọ bịanyere aka na onye na-enye ọzụzụ na nkwekọrịta nchịkwa na onye nchọpụta ya, Aachen nchịkwa na onye njikwa Mario Guedes
Ugbua na Febụwarị 23, 2008, ọ lụrụ ọgụ ọkachamara mbụ ya wee lụso ụzọ ya gafee mmeri ise n'usoro

Na ọnwa June 7, nke afọ 2008, Balogun meriri World Championship na World Championship aha (WFC), onye mmeri ụwa na onye mmeri super-welterweight, na isi agha nke 6th Hattersheimer Boxing Night megide onye mmeri Europe na-enweghị mmeri Anja Henning
Balogun ji mmeri a gbagoro n'ọkwa 5 n'asọmpi ụwa kọmputa nwere onwe ya
Na 24 Jenụarị 2009, Balogun kwadoro egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ ọkachamara nke iri na otu ma merie n'ọkwa ụwa nke abụọ ya
Na Port-au-Prince, isi obodo Haiti, o meriri World Junior Championship nke GBU

Ha meriri onye iro ha Evelina Diaz ( Dominican Republic ) na 5th gburugburu KO Ka ọ dị ugbu a, na November 29, 2008, ọ gbachitere aha WFC World Super-Welterweight megide Tatjana Dieckmann na Aachen, site KO Na gburugburu 4
Mgbe GBU World Cup meriri na Haiti, Sugar J Jessica Balogun meriri aha obere welterweight megide Daniela David si Romania
N'egwuregwu ịkụ ọkpọ ọkachamara nke iri na atọ ya, ọ meriri Olga Bojare sitere na Latvia na Septemba 5, 2009 maka aha WFC ụwa welterweight ohere (ruo 6667) n'arọ)
O ji obi ike merie ya na 100-90 isi
The WFC welterweight aha e wee chebe megide Eva Halasi (Serbia, 21 November 2009), ọzọ Olga Bojare March 13th 2010, Angel McKenzie June 4, 2010 na Marija Pejakovic ( Serbia )
Na 20 Nọvemba 2010, Balogun merikwara mmeri WIBA World Championship megide onye Spaniard Loli Munoz
Ọ merikwara aha GBU nke mba ụwa megide ndị Romanian Floarea Lihet na Disemba 3, 2011
Na ọnwa June 2, 2012, Jessica Balogun na Herning / Denmark weere ọgụ Profibox nke iri abụọ na anọ
Onye mmegide bụ Norwegian Cecilia Brækhus, nke Sauerland Events Berlin na-elekọta, onye nwe eriri ụwa nke WBA, WBC na WBO
Balogun meriri ka agbachara agba iri
Ọ tụfuru na March 2014 na Magdeburg megide Christina Hammer
N'aka nke ọzọ, ọ bụ ike gbachitere ụwa asọmpi belt na super welterweight mgbe WFC na April 26, 2014 na Stolberg megide Edita Lesnik si Bosnia-Herzegovina
N'ikpeazụ, Balogun ga-emeri Norwegian Braekhus ọzọ na June 7, 2014 na Schwerin
Ọrụ Balogun malitere n'afọ 2003 ebe e si n'aka ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya webatara ya na ụlọ ịgba ọkpọ MTK
Balogun meriri asọmpi mba ụwa n'oge niile ọ na-amu amu ]
Ndekọ Balogun dị na 24 meriri - 4 meriri

Jessica Eriyo (26 August 1969 ̊ ruo 12 August 2022) bụ onye nkuzi Uganda, onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke East African Community, (EAC), nke na-ahụ maka ngalaba mmepụta na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 30 Eprel na afo 2012
A mụrụ Eriyo na Adjumani District na 26 Ọgọst na afo 1969
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Arts na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ
O nwekwara asambodo abụọ; asambodo na atụmatụ na njikwa ọrụ na asambodo na sayensị kọmputa
E nyere ya nzere Master of Arts na ọmụmụ mmepe site na Mahadum Makerere
N'afọ 1994, Eriyo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Kololo Senior Secondary School na Kololo, mpaghara Kampala bara ọgaranya, isi obodo Uganda na obodo kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ
N'etiti afọ 1998 na afo 1999, ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Our Lady Consolata Senior Secondary School
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo na Adjumani District, site na afo 1999 ruo na afo 2001
Ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 2001, na-azọ oche ndị omeiwu nke Adjumani District Women's Representative
Ọ meriri ma họpụta ya ọzọ na afo 2006 na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement, ma jee ozi na ndị omeiwu ruo n'afọ 2011
Na ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2011, Jesca Ababiku, onye na-azọ onwe ya, tụfuru oche ya
Eriyo jere ozi dị ka Minista Steeti maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Kọmitii Ugandan, site na 2006 ruo 2011
Na ntuli aka nke 27 Mee 2011, a chụpụrụ ya ma jiri Flavia Munaaba dochie ya
N'ọnwa Eprel na afọ 2012, a họpụtara Eriyo ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu maka ngalaba mmepụta na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na East African Community
Ọ nọchiri Beatrice Kiraso, onye ọzọ si Uganda, onye jere ozi n'ọkwa ahụ n'etiti Eprel 2006 na Eprel 2012
Eriyo nwụrụ na MD Anderson Cancer Center na Houston, United States, ebe ọ na-agwọ ọrịa kansa na 12 August 2022, mgbe ọ dị afọ 52
