Jessica Tarahata Hagedorn (amuru 1949) bu onye odee America, onye ode akwukwo, onye na-ede uri, na onye na-ese ihe n’igwe
Hagedorn bụ onye America agwakọtara
A mụrụ ya na Manila nye nne Scots-Irish -French-Filipino na nna Spanish Filipino nwere otu nna nna China
Mgbe ọ gara San Francisco na 1963, Hagedorn guru akwụkwọ ya na ọzụzụ American Conservatory Theatre
Ka ọ wee gaa n'ihu ịchụso ọdịde na egwu, ọ kwagara New York City na 1978
Na 1978, Joseph Papp mepụtara egwuregwu mbụ Hagedorn Mango Tango
Mmepụta Hagedorn ndị ọzọ gụnyere Tenement Lover, nri dị nsọ, na Teenytown
Ụdị mgbasa ozi ngwakọta ya na-agụnyekarị abụ, uri, onyonyo, na mkparịta ụka
Site na 1975 ruo 1985, ọ bụ onye ndu otu egwu uri—The West Coast Gangster Choir (na SF) na emesia The Gangster Choir (na New York)

N'afọ 1985, 1986, 1989, na 1994 ọ natara mkpakọrịta MacDowell Colony, nke a nyeere ya aka ide akwụkwọ akụkọ Dogeaters, bụ nke kpughere ọtụtụ akụkụ dị iche iche nke Filipino, na-adabere na mmetụta America site na redio, telivishọn, na ihe nkiri dị iche iche
Ọ na-egosi mgbagwoju anya nke mmekọrịta ịhụnanya na ịkpọasị nke ọtụtụ ndị Filipinos nọ na mba ọzọ na-enwe gbasara oge ha gara aga
Mgbe e bipụtachara ya na 1990, akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nwetara nhọpụta 1990 National Book Award na onyinye nturu ugo America
Na 1998 La Jolla Playhouse mepụtara mmegharị ogbo
Na 2001, mmegharị egwuregwu ahụ malitere Off-Broadway na Ụlọ ihe nkiri Ọha
Hagedorn na ndị na-ede egwuregwu na ndị na-ese ihe Robbie McCauley na Laurie Carlos rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka egwu echiche mkpokọta, nke mechara gbasapu wee gụnye onye na-ese ihe nkiri John Woo
Egwu echiche biakọtara ọnụ wee keputa ọtụtụ ọrụ nke gụnyere Teenytown (nke egosiputara na La Mama na 1987) na klas (nke egosiputara na The Kitchen na 2000)
Egwu echiche jikọtara ọnụ wee nyochaa agbụrụ, klaasị, mmekọahụ na ọrụ nke ndị kwabatara na United States
Hagedorn, na egwu echiche nakwa n'onwe ya, na Urban Bush Women ejikọtawokwa aka wee rụọ ọrụ nke gụnyere Heat na lipstick

Hagedorn, n'akụkụ bell hooks, June Jordan, na mmadụ asaa ndị ọzọ ritere ihe nrite nke Lila Wallace-Reader's Digest Fund Writer's Awards nke a na-eme kwa afọ n'afọ 1994, ebe onye ọ bụla n'ime ha natara $105,000
Na 2006, Hagedorn bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede asatọ mbụ nwetara mkpakọrịta Lucille Lortel Foundation
N'afọ 2021, Hagedorn bụ natara nnata nke Bret Adams na Paul Reisch Foundation's 2021 Idea Awards maka Ụlọ ihe nkiri ebe ọ nwetara nturu ugo nrịbama nke oge nakwa $20,000
Hagedorn, na Two River Theater na-ejikọta kwa aka na-arụkwa ọrụ na egwu na-akọwa mbilite nke Jean na June Millington nke Fanny
Hagedorn na ụmụ ya nwanyị bi na New York City

Jessica Nkosi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 20 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1990) bụ onye South Afrika na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-egosi TV, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na M-Net nyere telenovelas Isibaya, Ayeyeye, na The Queen
A mụrụ Jessica Nkosi na Empangeni, KwaZulu-Natal nye Jabu Nkosi na Nhlanhlayethu Ntuli
Nkosi kwagara Eshowe, KwaZulu-Natal mgbe nne na nna ya kewara
Mgbe Nkosi nọ na Grade 11, nna ya nwụrụ site na Hodgkin's Lymphoma
Nkosi gara Mahadum nke KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na-achọ nzere bachelọ na Iwu, o mechara gbanwee gaa na ọmụmụ maka nzere bachelọ na Drama na Performing Arts nke ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 2012
Na Septemba afo 2018, Nkosi na onye ọrụ ibe ya Uzalo onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Ntokozo Dlamini nabatara nwa ha nwanyị, Namisa Dlamini
N'afọ 2013, Jessica Nkosi bidoro ọrụ ihe nkiri ya na ọrụ Qondisile na telenovela Isibaya nke South Afrika
N'afọ 2015, ọ pụtara dị ka Eve na Mzansi Magic's Ayeye
N'afọ 2020, Jessica malitere ọrụ ọhụrụ ya dị ka onye isi nwanyị ọjọọ Thando Sebata na telenovela a ma ama na South Afrika, The Queen
N'afọ 2017, Nkosi mere onye ngosi TV mbụ ya dị ka onye na-akwado ya na BET's A-List ya na onye otu Isibaya ya bụ Nomzamo Mabtha
Nkosi apụtawo na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onyinye dịka Channel O Music Video Awards, MTV Africa Music Awards, V-Entertainment na ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ
Ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi dị iche iche dịka MTV's dị ka onye ọbịa ama ama
Nkosi bu ụzọ pụta na ihe ngosi agbamakwụkwọ anyị zuru oke dị ka onye ọbịa ma mesịa gaa n'ihu na-akwado ihe ngosi ahụ maka oge ọzọ
Jessica Opare Saforo (amụrụ na 29 Eprel 1981) bụ onye mgbasa ozi Ghana, onye mgbasa ozi igwe onyonyo na redio na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka Transformation with Jess, ihe ngosi igwe onyonyo mbụ nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ The Voice Ova Company, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ijikwa talent olu
Saforo gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Akosombo International School ma nwekwa nzere bachelọ na nka na Mahadum Ghana, Legon ebe ọ gụrụ na Economics na Psychology
A mụrụ ya na Katakwi District na 23 Mee 1974
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Aputon Katakwi
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị Kangole maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya
Maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ngora High School
Alupo zụrụ azụ dị ka onye nlekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị tupu ya agụọ nkuzi cadet na Uganda Junior Staff College dị na Jinja
O nwere nzere bachelọ nke Arts na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na asụsụ, nwetara na 1997 na Mahadum Makerere
Nzere nke mbụ ya, Master of Arts in international relations na diplomacy, nwetara ya na Mahadum Makerere na 2008
O jikwa Diploma na nchịkwa ọha na njikwa, nwetara na 2008 site na Uganda Management Institute (UMI)
Ugo mmụta nna ya nke abụọ bụ Masters in Public Administration and Management, nwetara n'afọ 2009, nakwa na Mahadum Makerere
Jessica Ann Johnson ( née Simpson ; amuru Julaị 10, 1980) bụ onye America na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye mmebe ejiji
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ na ukwe ụka mgbe ọ bụ nwata, Simpson bịanyere aka n'ụlọọrụ mmepụta egwu, Columbia Records na 1997, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Usoro egwu mbụ ya a kpọrọ, Sweet Kisses (1999), rere ihe rụrụ nde abụọ na United States wee hụ ọganihu azụmahịa nke egwu ' I Wanna Love You Forever'

Simpson nakweere ihe onyonyo tozuru oke maka usoro egwu nke abụọ ya ọ kpọrọ, Irresistible (2001), egwu ahụ ghọrọ ntinye nke abụọ ya n'egwu iri abụọ kacha ewu ewu na Billboard Hot 100, ebe ndị ụlọ ọrụ Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) nyere usoro egwu akwụkwọ ikike ọla edo
In this Skin (2003), usoro egwu nke atọ nke Simpson, rere nde atọ na United States

N'oge ọrụ mbụ ya, a bịara mara Simpson maka mmekọrịta ya na alụmdi na nwunye ya na Nick Lachey, bụ onye ọ pụtara n'usoro telivishọn nke ụlọ ọrụ MTV a kpọrọ Newlyweds Nick and Jessica n'etiti 2003 na 2005

Site na mwepụta nke usoro egwu ekeresimesi mbụ ya ReJoyce usoro egwu ekeresimesi (2004), nke nwetara ọla edo, Simpson mere mpụta ihe nkiri ya dị ka Daisy Duke na The Dukes of Hazzard (2005), nke ọ gughariri egwu nke 'The Boots Are Made for Walkin' maka ụda egwu ihe nkiri ahụ
Na 2006, o wepụtara usoro egwu ya nke ise A Public Affair wee pụta n'ihe nkiri ihunanya a kpọrọ Employee of the Month
Site na mwepụta nke usoro egwu ya nke isii a kpọrọ Do You Know (2008), Simpson kwagara n'ụdị egwu obodo
Ewezuga egwu ya, Simpson weputara mkpokọta Jessica Simpson na 2005, ụlọ ọrụ ejiji nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ
Akara ahụ gara n'ihu na-enweta ego karịrị otu ijeri dọla

Ọ gbakwara ama na usoro ihe onyonyo nke a kpọrọ The Price of Beauty na 2010, ọ bụkwa onye ọka ikpe na oge abụọ nke ihe nkiri Fashion Star n'etiti 2012 na 2013, wee bipụta ihe ncheta na 2020, Open Book, nke ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mbụ na ndeputa Best Seller na-ere ihe karịrị pụkụ iri ise na itoolu n'ime izu mbụ ya
Simpson lụrụ Eric Johnson, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ atọ
A mụrụ Simpson na July 10, 1980, na Abilene, Texas

Ọ bụ nwa mbụ nke Tina Ann Simpson (née Drew), onye na-edozi ụlọ, na Joseph Simpson, onye ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ na onye ozizi ntorobịa n'ụlọ ụka Baptist Nne na Nna Simpson lụrụ na 1978; ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 2013
Simpson ekwuola na o tolitere na Dallas na Waco, mana ndị mụrụ ya bi ugbu a na McGregor, Texas
Simpson nwere nwanne nwanyị nke obere, Ashlee
N'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma ọ gara Amelia Middle School nwa oge mgbe nna ya mere mgbasa ozi na Cincinnati, Ohio

Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Texas ọnwa iri abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị JJ Pearce dị na Richardson n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, n'agbanyeghị na ọ kwụsịrị na 1997 ka ọrụ ya malitere ịmalite; Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, ọ nwetara GED ya site na mmụta dị anya na Texas Tech High School
A zụlitere Simpson n'okwukwe Ndị Kraịst, ma nna ya nyere ya mgbanaka ịdị ọcha mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
Jessica na ezinụlọ ya kwagara ugboro ugboro n'ihi ọrụ nna ya dị ka onye ozi, n'agbanyeghị na ha nọgidere na Texas ọtụtụ afọ, ha bikwara na Midwest ruo afọ ole na ole
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ n'òtù ukwe chọọchị mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ọ rọrọ nrọ maka ihe ịga nke ọma ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwú mgbe ọ nọ na otu ememe chọọchị
Simpson tinyere akwụkwọ ma gaa ule maka The Mickey Mouse Club mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ebe o mere ihe ngosiputa nke ' Amazing Grace ' na ịgba egwu ' Ice Ice Baby ' (1990)

Ọ gara n'ihu site n'ọtụtụ agba, ma emechara o soro na agba na-esote nke ikpeazụ maka ihe nkiri ahụ ya onwe ya na ndị na ndi ọzọ na-agu egwu dị ka Britney Spears, Christina Aguilera, na Justin Timberlake
Simpson kwuru na ụjọ tụrụ ya maka nlegharị anya ikpeazụ ya mgbe ọ hụchara ihe Aguilera na-eme, ma emechaghị họpụta ya maka ihe ngosi ahụ
Simpson maliteghachiri ịsonye n'otu ndị na-ekwe ụkwe n'ụlọ ụka ya, n'ikpeazụ onye isi otu ndị na-emeputa egwu ndị Kraịst chọtara ya
Ọ gwara ya na mbụ ka o mee ihe ngosiputa, ma emechara o were ya n'ọrụ ozugbo ọ gụchara ' I Will Always Love You' (1973) nke Dolly Parton dere
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'usoro egwu mbụ ya n'ụlọ ọrụ Proclaim Records, wee malite njem nlegharị anya iji kwalite ọrụ ahụ
Nna Jessica mechara kwuo na ya ga-akwụsị njem nlegharị anya n'ihi na oke ara ya mere ka a na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-ekwesighi iti ụdị egwu ahụ ọ na-eti
Usoro egwu mbụ ya, Jessica, bu nke a na-ewepụtaghị ewepụta mgbe Proclaim Records kwụsịrị ọrụ n'ihi nsogbu ego; n'agbanyeghị nke a, nne nne ya n'onwe ya kwadoro ka ewepụta obere n'ime usoro egwu ahụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke a gasịrị, Simpson nwetara ọtụtụ nyocha mgbe e zigara usoro egwu ahu Jessica n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-emepụta egwu
N'ikpeazụ, ọ dọtara mmasị nke Tommy Mottola, di Mariah Carey na mgbe ahụ na onye isi Columbia Records

Ọ gara n'ihu ịdebanye aha ya na label, na-ekwu na 'O nwere ezigbo àgwà dị mma, ihu ọhụrụ ọhụrụ, na ihe dị iche karịa Britney na ha niile; ọ nwere ike ịbụ abụ n'ezie' Simpson malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka usoro egwu mbụ ya na Orlando, Florida
Mottola tụrụ anya ịme Simpson wuo ewuo n'ụzọ dị ịche n'ebe Spears na Aguilera nọ, bụ ndị ha abụọ malitere ọrụ na-aga nke ọma lekwasịrị anya n'ịgba egwu na mmekọahụ
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mpụta egwu mbụ ya, Simpson debara aha nna ya Joe dị ka onye njikwa ya; nne ya ghọrọ onye ndozi ya

Mgbe ọ nọ n'otu oriri na ọṅụṅụ ekeresimeesi n'afo 1998, Simpson zutere otu onye na-aguru otu 98 Degrees egwú Nick Lachey, ha abụọ malitere ịyị ọyị; Lachey kwuru na ya hapụrụ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ ma gwa nne ya na ya ga-alụ Simpson otu ụbọchị
Simpson malitere ịrụ ọrụ gbasara usoro egwu mbụ ya na 1998
Mottola chọrọ ka Simpson nabata ihe oyiyi 'mgbochi mmekọahụ' mgbe ọ na-akwalite ụlọ ọrụ egwu ahụ, n'ụzọ dị ịche n'ihe ndị na-eti egwu na-aga nke ọma Britney Spears na Christina Aguilera
O kwenyere na ihe onyonyo a ga-eme ka Simpson bụrụ onye ndị na-ege ntị “nwere ike ighọta nke ọma”, nke ga na-enyere aka n'ịre ahịa
Simpson gara n'ihu kwupụta atụmatụ ya ịnọrọ onwe ya ruo mgbe ọ ga-alu di n'ihi mkpebi Mottola
Eweputara egwu mbụ ya nke aha ya bu ' I Wanna Love You Forever' (1999), na Septemba 28
Egwu ahụ ghọrọ nke gara nke ọma n'ọtụtụ ókèala, ọkachasị ruru ọnụọgụ atọ na Hot 100 na United States
Egwu ahụ nwetara asambodo platinum site n'aka ụlọọrụ Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) maka ire ahịa karịrị otu nde na mba ahụ
Usoro egwu ahụ gakwara nke ọma na mpaghara ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị n'ọtụtụ mba Yuropu
E wepụtara usoro egwu nke mbụ nke Simpson, Sweet Kisses (1999), na Nọvemba 23
Usoro egwu ahụ rere pụkụ iri isii na ise n'izu mbụ nke mweputa ya, na-arụ ọrụ na ọnụọgụ iri isii na ise na 200 na mba United States
Iji kwalite egwu ahụ, ' Where You Are ' (2000) ka ewepụtara dị ka egwu nke abụọ n'usoro egwu; E gosipụtara enyi nwoke Simpson Nick Lachey n'egwu ahụ
' I Think I'm In Love With You ' (2000) jere ozi dị ka egwu nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ na usoro egwu ahụ, wee nweta ihe ịga nke ọma na ókèala ndị dị ka United States
Site na ọganihu nke egwu nke atọ n'usoro egwu ahu, Sweet Kisses bilitere na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọhụrụ nke iri abụọ na ise na Billboard 200 n'August 2000
Usoro egwu ahụ rere ihe karịrị nde abụọ na United States, na-enweta asambodo platinum okpukpu abụọ n'aka RIAA
Simpson so ndị otu enyi ya nwoke, 98 Degrees malite njem a kpọrọ Heat It Up Tour, dị ka mmemme mmeghe ha iji kwalite Kisses Sweet n'ime 2000
Ọrụ iji weputa usoro egwu ya nke abụọ malitere n'afọ 2000, ọ họrọ ịdekọ ọtụtụ egwu nwere 'mmekọrịta redio' na egwu ndị ọzọ maka ndekọ ahụ
N'oge mmepụta nke album ahụ, Simpson nakweere ọdịdị ọha na-eto eto karịa, mkpebi nke Simpson na ụlọ ọrụ egwu ya mere na-atụ anya inweta ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị na-na agụ egwu dị ka Spears
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'egwu ahụ, Simpson kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ya na Lachey iji lekwasị anya n'ịkwalite ọrụ ya; Ha abụọ ga-emecha mee ka ha dịghachi ná mma na Septemba

N'ajụjụ ọnụ July 2001 na akwụkwọ akụkọ Coventry, Simpson kọwara 'Edere m [ Sweet Kisses ] mgbe m dị afọ iri na asaa, ugbu a adim afọ iri abụọ na otu [ọnwa a] n'ihi ya enwere afọ anọ nke uto gụnyere' Simpson weputara aha usoro egwu ahụ, ' Iresistible ' (2001) dị ka egwu sitere na ọrụ ahụ n'April

Onye otu ahụ nwetara mmeghachi omume agwakọtara n'ozuzu ya site n'aka ndị nkatọ n'ihi na ọ nwere isiokwu mmekọahụ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ gara n'ihu wee bụrụ nke abụọ ya kachasị elu nke iri abụọ na chaatị Billboard Hot 100
Simpson weputara usoro egwu ya nke abụọ, Irresistible (2001), na Mee
E rere ọnụ ọgụgụ pụkụ otu narị na iri abụọ na asaa n'ime ịzụ mbụ nke mpibuta usoro egwu ya na mba United States, na-arụ ọrụ na nọmba isii na chaatị Billboard 200

Ọ bụ ezie na ahịa nke izu mbụ nke album ahụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ okpukpu abụọ nke mbọ ya gara aga, Iresistible emezughị ihe ịga nke ọma nke usoro egwu mbụ ya; ndekọ ahụ nwetara asambodo ọla edo site na RIAA maka ire usoro egwu ọhịa narị ise nke ebiputara
' A Little Bit ' (2001), egwu nke abụọ n'usoro egwu ahụ, enwetaghị nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
Iji kwalite egwu ahụ, Simpson malitere dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Total Request Live Tour (2001), ya na ndị na-agu egwu dịka Destiny's Child na Nelly
O mechara hapụ njem ahụ iji malite njem DreamChaser nke ya (2001), nke Simpson gbakwunyere ndị na-agba egwu na arụmọrụ ya; A kagburu njegharị ahụ ka mwakpo Septemba 11 gasịrị
Simpson kwupụtara njikọ aka ya na Nick Lachey na February 2002, ha abụọ na-eme ememe agbamakwụkwọ ha na October 26 na Austin, Texas
Simpson malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'usoro egwu nke atọ ya na 2002
Egwu ndu nke usoro a, ' Sweetest Sin ' (2003), kwuru nnọọ okwu banyere Simpson na itufu amaghị nwoke ya nye Lachey
Egwu ahụ enwetaghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'azụmahịa
Nna Simpson turu aro nye MTV banyere ihe ngosi na-egosi di na nwunye ahụ, nke mere ka e kee usoro ihe omume televishọn a kpọrọ Newlyweds Nick and Jessica
Usoro nke mbụ ya lekwasịrị anya n'alụmdi na nwunye dị n'etiti Michael Jackson na Lisa Marie Presley, ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ akwadozighi, nke meziri ka Simpson na Lachey dochie ha
Ihe ngosi a, bụ nke lekwasịrị anya na alụmdi na nwunye nke di na nwunye a nakwa usoro egwu nke atọ nke Simpson, malitere na August 19, 2003
Ihe ngosi ahụ ghọrọ ihe ọdịnala mara mma ozugbo, ọzọ kwa, ndị nkatọ nke ihe nkiri Simpson nyere aka mee ka di na nwunye ahụ bụrụ aha a kpu n'ọnụ n'ezinụlọ ọ bụla
Usoro a bụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke nrịbama maka MTV, wee gbasaa ruo oge atọ ruo afọ 2005
E wepụtara usoro egwu nke atọ nke Simpson bu nke a kpọrọ 'In This Skin' (2003), ụbọchị nke ihe nkiri 'Newlyweds Nick and Jessica' malitere, ihe ngosi ahụ na-eje ozi dị ka ngwa nkwado maka egwu ahu
'In This Skin' rụrụ na nọmba iri na Billboard 200, e rere puku iri isii na anọ nke usoro egwu n'ime izu mbụ nke e weputara ya
Ọnụọgụ nke mmeghe nke usoro egwu ahụ bu nke kacha ala na ọrụ egwu Simpson n'oge ahụ
'In This skin' jụrụ chaatị ahụ ngwa ngwa, ma ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị 2004 erewo ihe karịrị pụkụ narị ise na iri isii na ise na mba United States
Simpson wepụtara 'With You' (2003) dị ka egwu nọọrọ onwe ya nke abụọ si n'usoro egwu ahu na October
Simpson pụtara na ihe ngosi ọkara oge nke Super Bowl XXXVIII
O dekọtara ihe ọhụrụ maka mwepụtaghachi nke In This Skin, nke ewepụtara na Maachị 2004
Mwepụtaghachi ahụ nyere aka n'ụzọ dị egwu n'ire usoro egwu ahu; in This Skin gara n'ihu na-ere nde atọ na United States
Ma 'Take My Breath Away' (2004) na 'Angels' (2004) ka ewepụtara dị ka egwu nọọrọ onwe ya n'usoro egwu ahu
Simpson na Lachey sonyere n'ihe ngosi nke ABC puru iche a kpọrọ The Nick na Jessica Variety Hour na Eprel, bụ nke gosipụtara ngosipụta ndị ama ama dịka Jewel na Mr
T, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, ọ malitere Jessica Simpson Desserts nke ụlọọrụ ịchọ mma nke Jessica Simpson ya na Randi Shinder; Ngwaahịa niile dị n'ụlọ́ọrụ bụ ihe oriri
Simpson malitere njem nlegharị anya yaReality Tour (2004) na North America niile nke malitere na June; njem ahụ gara nke ọma nke ego, wee kwụsị n'October
N'oge a, Simpson na di ya malitere iputa n'ihe ngosi nke Ashlee Simpson Show, nke a-egosi mmalite nke ọrụ egwu nwanne Jessica
Usoro egwu nke anọ nke Simpson, bu nchịkọta egwu ekeresimesi akpọrọ ReJoyce The Christmas Album (2004), ka ewepụtara na Nọvemba 23
Ndekọ ahụ ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu ebe o nwetara ọnụọgụ nke iri na anọ na Billboard 200, ma ritekwa nrite ọla edo nke RIAA maka ire ahịa karịrị mbipụta pụkụ narị ise
Ọzọkwa na 2004, Simpson sere a sitcom pilot maka ABC, nke netwọk ahụ ewereghi
Na Febụwarị 2005, Simpson na Shinder weputara ahịrị ịchọ mma nri Dessert Treats, dị ka ahịrị ha nke mbụ mana ezubere ya maka ndị na-ege ntị na-eto eto
A kagburu ahịrị abụọ ahụ ka usoro ikpe siri dị
Simpson mere ' The Star-Spangled Banner ' na Indy 500 na 2005
Simpson weputara mkpokọta Jessica Simpson na 2005, na mbụ ya na Tarrant Apparel Group na-emekọrịta ihe iji weputa ahịrị uwe Jessica Simpson Princy na JS
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ anọgidewo na-eto eto n'ime afọ niile, na 2014 a kọrọ na ọ na-enweta otu ijeri dọla n'ahịa kwa afọ
Simpson mere ihe nkiri mpụta mbụ ya dị ka Daisy Duke na mmegharị ihe nkiri nke Dukes of Hazzard (2005)
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe nkiri ahụ nwetara nlebanya na-adịghị mma n'ozuzu site n'aka ndị nkatọ ihe nkiri, ọ gara n'ihu na-enweta ihe karịrị nde otu narị na iri na otu n'ụwa nile
Simpson dekọrọ egwu ' These Boots Are Made for Walkin ' ' (2005) iji kwalite ihe nkiri ahụ; were ihe imaatua na-ekere òkè aha nke otú egwu Nancy Sinatra song
Egwu ahụ batara na egwu iri abụọ kacha elu nke Billboard Hot 100, o wee buru otu egwu Simpson kacha nwee ihe ịga nke ọma ruo taa
Vidio egwu a, nke gosipụtara Simpson n'omume dị ka Daisy Duke, wetara arụmụka maka igosi Simpson na uwe 'ikpughe' ahụ ya na ịsacha ụgbọ ala General Lee mgbe o yi uwe ikpughe ahụ ya
Esemokwu a mere ka amachibidoro vidiyo egwu na mba ụfọdụ
Na Nọvemba 2005, Simpson na Lachey kwupụtara na ha na- ekewa
Simpson gbara akwụkwọ maka ịgba alụkwaghịm na Disemba 2005, na-ekwu maka 'ọdịiche na-enweghị ndozikwata' E kwusara ịgba alụkwaghịm ha n'ụwa niile ma mechaa ya na June 30, 2006
A kọrọ na ọ ga-akwụ Lachey nde dọla iri na abụọ na ịgba alụkwaghịm ha n'ihi na ọ bịanyeghị aka na nkwekọrịta maka alụmdi na nwunye tupu ha alụọ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2015, Simpson kpọrọ alụmdi na nwunye ya na Lachey 'nnukwu mmejọ ego'
Simpson malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka usoro egwu nke ise ya na 2005
E gosipụtara na March 2006 na ya na ụlọọrụ Columbia Record ekewala, bụ onye ya na ya nọ kemgbe mmalite nke ọrụ ya, ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ụlọọrụ egwu ọhụrụ s kpọrọ Epic Records
Simpson na Ken Pavés weputara ahịrị ntutu na ngwaahịa ịchọ mma na netwọk ịzụ ahịa ụlọ na 2006
Simpson wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ ya, ' A Public Affair ' (2006) na June 29
Egwu ahụ batara n'ọkwa nke iri abụọ na Billboard Hot 100, wee nweta asambodo ọla edo site na RIAA maka ire ahịa karịrị pụkụ narị ise na United States
E wepụtara egwu ahụ, egwu nkewa ụbọchị tupu ịgba alụkwaghịm ya na Lachey agwụ
Egwu a bu nke banyere n'isi iri nke Ụlọ Ahịa iTunes n'otu oge ahụ nke egwu ' Invisible ' (2006) banyere, nke a bu nke izizi egwu abụọ a gụkọrọ na-apụta n'otu oge na egwu iri kachasị n'ụlọ ahịa ahụ
Usoro egwu nke ise ya, A Public Affair (2006), pụtara na ọnụọgụ ise na Billboard 200, e rekwara pụkụ narị na otu n'izu mbụ nke mbipụta ya
Usoro egwu ahu a enwetaghi ọganiihu nke In This Skin (2003) nwere, o rere nanị pụkụ narị ise nke egwu ahu na United States
Egwu inye ike ' I Belong To Me' (2006), bụ nke jere ozi dị ka egwu nọọrọ onwe ya nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ n'usoro egwu ahụ, o nwetaghị ọganihu n'azụmahịa
Simpson sonyere na ihe nkiri ya na Dane Cook na Dax Shepard na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Employee of the Month (2006), ewepụtara na Ọktọba ahụ
Simpson gughariri égwú Dolly Parton ' 9 to 5 ' (1980) dị ka ụtụ nye onye na-agu egwu na Kennedy Center Awards na Disemba 2006
Nkatọ siri ike zutere arụmọrụ ahụ mgbe Simpson chefuru ihe odide nke egwu ahụ; e nyere ya ohere imeghari egwu maka igwefoto, n'agbanyeghị na ewepuru ihe ngosi ya na mgbasa ozi
Arụmọrụ nke usoro egwu Simpson nke ise na ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ bụ ndị ndị nkatọ kwuru, ebe nwanne ya nwanyị Ashlee nwetara ọdịda yiri nke ahụ na ihe gbasara ihe iga nke ọma
Simpson nwere mmekọrịta ọzọ ya na onye na-agụ abụ John Mayer site na Ọgọst 2006 ruo Mee 2007
O mechara kọwaa mmekọrịta ya na Mayer na 2020 memoir ya, Open Book
Na Nọvemba 2007, Simpson malitere ịyị ọyị, ya na onye otu egwuregwu Dallas Cowboys aha ya buTony Romo
Mmekọrịta ahụ bụ arụmụka n'etiti ndị na-akwado Cowboys, bụ ndị tara Simpson ụta maka omume Romo na-adịghị mma na egwuregwu mgbe ha abụọ malitere ịyị ọyị
Ụfọdụ ndị kwunyeere Romo na-akpọ Simpson 'Yoko Romo,' nkr na-arutu aka na Yoko Ono, bụ onye a kwenyere na ọ bụ ya kpatara nkewa nke The Beatles
Onye isi ala mgbe ahụ George W
Bush kwuru okwu banyere mmekọrịta abụọ ahụ, na-egosi na Simpson bu onye kpatara arụrụ arụ nke Romo
A kọrọ na Simpson na Romo kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ha na Julaị 2009
Simpson na Luke Wilson pụtara na ihe nkiri Blonde Ambition (2007); ọ nwere ntakịrị mweputa na Texas tupu eweputazie ya na mgbasa ozi ụlọ
Ọ sonyekwara na ihe nkiri vidiyo ozugbo na Private Valentine Blonde & Dangerous (2008), na-egosi onye na-eme ihe nkiri sonyeere ndị agha
Simpson jikọtara ya na Parlux Fragrances iji wepụta ísì mbụ ya, Fancy, na 2008
E ji nnọọ mmeghachi omume dị mma wee zute ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ ahụ
Simpson malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka usoro egwu nke isii ya na 2007, nna ya na-ekwu na ọ na-anwale egwu obodo maka ndekọ ahụ
Simpson kwuru na ya tolitere n'ihe gbasara gburugburu egwu obodo, ma chọọ 'inyeghachi ihe' Ọ wepụtara ' Come On Over ' (2008) dị ka egwu nọọrọ onwe ya na June 20
Egwu a gbara na ọnụọgụ iri anọ na otu na eserese Billboard Hot Country, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ mpụta mbụ kacha elu maka ntinye mbụ onye nka na eserese ahụ
E wepụtara Do you Know(2008) na Septemba 9
Ọrụ ahụ rere mbipụta puku iri isii na ise n'ime izu mbụ ewepụtara ya, ma nọrọ kwa na nọmba anọ na chaatị Billboard 200
A na-ewere ọba ahụ dị ka nke na-agaghi nke ime n'azụmahịa, ọ pụtara naanị izu itoolu na Billboard 200 wee na-ere ihe karịtị pụkụ narị abụọ na United States dị ka nke 2012
Simpson mepere maka otu egwu obodo Rascal Flatts na Bob That Head Tour (2009) site na Jenụwarị ruo Maachị 2009
Mgbalị Simpson maka ịbanye n'egwu obodo nwetara mmeghachi omume na-adịghị mma
Karịsịa, Simps bu onye ìgwè mmadụ na-akwa emo mgbe o mesiri ihe ngosi na Country Thunder Festival na Wisconsin
A rutukwara Simpson aka na egwu Eminem 2009, ' We made You ', nke Trisha Paytas gosipụtara
Usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ Simpson's VH1, The Price of Beauty , malitere ịgbasa na Maachị 2010
Usoro a sochiri Simpson gburugburu ụwa, na-ewebata ndị na-ekiri echiche dị iche iche nke ịma mma na omenala dị iche iche
Ihe omume izizi dọtara otu nde ndị na-ekiri ya, mana Simpson kpughere na usoro a ga-alaghachi na 2011 na mgbanwe usoro; Atụmatụ ndị a emezughị

Simpson buru ụzọ mee atụmatụ ịdekọ usoro egwu nke asaa ya dị ka mbiputa ikpeazụ ya site na Epic Records, n'agbanyeghị na emechara wepụta usoro mkpokọta egwu Playlist The very Best of Jessica Simpson (2010)
E wepụtara usoro egwu ahụ n'enweghị nkwalite nke mere ka o nwee obere ihe ịga nke ọma
O mechara binye aka na nkwekọrịta ụlọọrụ na-emeputa egwu a kpọrọ ElevenEleven na Primary Wave Music wee malite ịrụ ọrụ n'usoro egwu nke ekeresimesi ya nke asaa
E wepụtara egwu 'Happy Christmas' (2010) na November 22; ọ pụtara obere oge na ọkara ala nke Billboard 200 tupu ọ daa na chaatị ahụ
Simpson malitere mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị ya na onye egwuregwu NFL lara ezumike nka aha ya bu Eric Johnson na Mee 2010; Di na nwunye ahụ kwupụtara njikọ aka ha na Nọvemba 2010
Simpson pụtara n'ihe nkiri ya na Nicole Richie dị ka onye ndụmọdụ n'usoro televishonu nke NBC a kpọrọ Fashion Star
Usoro egwu a Na-ekwu maka otu ndị na-emepụta ihe ndị na-asọmpi kwa izu iji mepụta uwe; kwa izu, a na-ewepụ otu onye asọmpi
Usoro ahụ bú nke ewepụtara oge nke abụọ ya na 2013, n'agbanyeghị na a kagbuola ya
Na-esote ọnwa nke ntule, Simpson kwụrụ kpọmkwem na Halloween nke 2011 na ọ dị ime nwa mbụ ya
Simpson bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ nde dollar na Weight Watchers na 2012, na-ekwe nkwa iji atụmatụ nri ha wepụ ibu ọ nwetara n'oge ime ya
Simpson na-esere mgbasa ozi telivishọn maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na mgbasa ozi mbụ na Septemba 2012
Simpson mụrụ nwa nwanyị Maxwell Drew Johnson na Mee 1, 2012
Simpson wepụtara ahịrị uwe ime nwa na 2012
O mechara wepụta ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, Vintage Bloom, nke ịbụ nne kpaliri
Simpson kwuwaputara na Disemba 2012 na ya na Johnson na-atụ anya nwa nke abụọ
Na-esote ọkwa ahụ, Weight Watchers kwupụtara na ọ ga-akwụsị ịgbaso atụmatụ nri ụlọ ọrụ n'oge ime ya
Simpson mụrụ nwa ya nwoke, Ace Knute Johnson, na June 30, 2013
Ọ malitere ahịrị ihe ndozi ime ụlọ gụnyere akwa na draperies enyere n'ụdị bohemian ihunanya, nwere ifuru
N'August 2014, agbakwunyere ísì ụtọ
Simpson na Johnson lụrụ na July 2014 na Montecito, California
N'afọ 2013, a mara ọkwa na Simpson na NBC na-akparịta ụka ka o sonye na usoro ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke ọkara nke onwe, mana ọrụ ahụ emezughị
Simpson kwadoro na 2015 na ọ ga-amalite ịrụ ọrụ na usoro egwu ya, dịka nkwekọrịta ya na Primary Wave akwụsịla n'ihu ọha
Simpson na Linda Perry na-arụ ọrụ na oru ngo, nke o kpughere na 2016
N'August 2015, Simpson bụ onye ọbịa na ọwa HSN ebe ọ na-akwalite ngwaahịa ya
Ahịa ahụ gara nke ọma
Simpson weputara ụdị uwe mgbatị ahụ Warm Up, nke dị na ebe a na-ere ahịa na United States
A gbasaa usoro ahia ahụ n'August 2016 ka ọ gụnyere ndị na-enye ọzụzụ, ebe Simpson kwuru na ahịrị ahụ ga-abụ ihe na-elekwasị anya ya n'ọdịnihu
Na Septemba 2018, Simpson kwupụtara na ọ dị ime nwa nke atọ, nwa nwanyị
Ọ mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị, Birdie Mae Johnson, na Maachị 19, 2019
Na Febụwarị 2, 2020, Simpson weputara ihe ncheta ya Open Book, nke togoro ndepụta nke New York Times Best Sellers list

N'akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ tụlere isiokwu ndị dị ka alụmdi na nwunye ya na Nick Lachey, mmekọrịta ya na onye na-agụ egwú John Mayer, mmetọ mmekọahụ ọ nwetara n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ịṅụ mmanya na-aba n'anya na idabere n'ọgwụ na nrụgide ọ na-enwe iji felata, nke kpatara ahụ ya nsogbu onyonyo
E wepụtara abụ ọhụrụ isii dị ka akụkụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ, bụ akara ntọhapụ mbụ ya na egwu kemgbe ekeresimesi obi ụtọ na 2010
Na Disemba 2020, Simpson bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta ikike mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na Amazon, wee wepụta edemede maka ịbụ nne nke akpọrọ Buru ụzọ n'April na-esote
Na Nọvemba 2021, Simpson weputara ngughari egwu nke otu egwu bekee No
Nothing But Thieves nke ha kpọrọ'Particles', si otú a na-aka akara mweputa nke egwu nọọrọ onwe ya ka
emgbe 'Naanị Ọchịchọ m' na 2010
Simpson edepụtala Mariah Carey, Aretha Franklin, Sade, na Whitney Houston dị ka ndị metụtara egwu ya
Ọ nwara ịmalite ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu Ndị Kraịst, ma n'otu oge, o dechara usoro egwu nke egwu ndị Kraịst nke ọ kpọrọ n'onwe ya
Mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Columbia Records na 1998, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ọba egwu pop
Simpson ejirila isiokwu Ndị Kraịst dekọọ abụ n'afọ ndị sochirinụ, nke gụnyere 'Kpee ekpere n'olu dara ụda' (2008)
Egwu ahụ achọtara na ọba mpụta mbụ bụ nke bụ pop ballads, n'ebumnobi nke igosi ụda olu Simpson
AllMusic 's Stephen Thomas Erlewine kwubiri n'usoro egwu ahụ “[gosipụtara] ya dị ka Celine Dion dị afọ iri na ụma
Karịsịa, ọ gosipụtara ballad ike 'Achọrọ m ịhụ gị n'anya ruo mgbe ebighị ebi' (1999)
Egwu a chọtara na mpụta mbụ ya dọtara itụnyere egwu Mariah Carey
Site na mweputa nke Irresistible (2001), Simpson dekọtara egwu ndị ọzọ na-atọ ụtọ, jiri onwe ya tụnyere ndị na-agu egwu dị ka Britney Spears

Egwu dị ka 'Iresistible' na 'A Little Bit' nwere egwu na-akpasu iwe ma e jiri ya tụnyere egwu ya o weputara na mgbe gara aga, ebe Simpson na-ekwu na afọ dị iche n'etiti ndekọ nke usoro egwu abụọ ahụ bụ isi ihe kpatara ya
N'oge Total Request Live Tour (2001) na DreamChaser Tour (2001), Simpson webatara ọtụtụ ndị na-agba egwu n'ime mmemme ngosiputa ya
Simpson malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka usoro egwu nke atọ ya na 2002, nke edobere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-agu egwu Missy Elliott ga-emepụta ya
Ihe ndekọ ahụ mechara weghaara ụzọ ọhụrụ, nke di ya bụ Nick Lachey kọwara dị ka 'organic' ma e jiri ya tụnyere usoro egwu abụọ mbụ ya
Simpson malitekwara idekọ abụ nke ya maka ndekọ, ihe ụjọ tụrụ ya ime n'oge gara aga

Ihe si na ya pụta bụ In This Skin (2003), ndekọ nke AllMusic kwuru na 'nọrọ n'ime ọgba aghara ọgba aghara nke oge a ka ị na-abanye n'etiti ụzọ nke ọ na-achọsi ike ịbụ' Simpson rụrụ ọrụ na akụkụ nke egwu obodo na mwepụta nke ' These Boots Are Made For Walkin ' ' (2005), nke e dekọrọ maka ihe nkiri mbụ Simpson mere The Dukes of Hazzard (2005)
Ọ nọgidere na-anwale na egwu'Push Your Tush' (2006)
Ọtụtụ egwu dị na usoro egwu nke ise ya nwere akụkụ nke egwu na egwu disco, ọkachasị 'Affair Ọha' na mkpuchi ya nke ' You Spin Me Round (dị ka ndekọ) '
N'ịbụ ndí a kwadoro ọ dị ka Faith Hill, Shania Twain, na Martina McBride, Simpson dekọrọ otu egwu egwu obodo akpọrọ Ị Mara (2008)
N'ime oge ọrụ ya niile, Simpson abanyela n'ụdị ndị ọzọ, na-ewepụta ọba abụọ nwere isiokwu ekeresimesi na 2004 na 2010

Simpson bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye nlereanya nye ndị dị afọ iri na ụma na ngwụcha afọ 1990 wee kọwa ya dị ka 'nzaghachi nKe Columbia Record nye Britney Spears na Christina Aguilera ', bụ ndị nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na n'usoro egwu mbụ ha
Ndekọ mpụta mbụ ya, Sweet Kisses (1999) na-enyochakarị isiokwu dị ka ịhụnanya, na Simpson kwupụtara na ọ ga-anọgide na-akwaghi iko ruo mgbe alụmdi na nwunye
Ọ gara na 'mmekọrịta mmekọahụ ejiri nlezianya hazie' ka o wee na-akwalite usoro egwu nke abụọ ya, Iresistible (2001)

Simpson mechara kọwaa onye isi ndekọ ndekọ Columbia Tommy Mottola dị ka onye mkparị, ebe ọ na-achọ ịchịkwa onyonyo ya wee gwa ya ka ọ “tufuo pound iri na ise” mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na 1997
Mgbe Simpson rịgoro n'ọganihu nke ihe nkiri 'Newlyweds Nick and Jessica' na 2003, a hụrụ ya dị ka 'onye na-acha odo odo na' dabere na mkparị ya na nkwupụta ya na ihe nkiri ahụ

Emily Yahr ' nke Washington Post kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime onye ngosiputa nke TV mbụ anyị, tupu onye ọ bụla enwee ike itinye uche na mmerụ ahụ ọ nwere ike ịkpata' Simpson chetara oge ya na ihe ngosi ya nke ndetu afọ 2020 Open Book, na-ekwu, sị 'Ugbu a, a na m ahụ ọtụtụ ndị na-eme njirimara ha na mgbasa ozi, mana ọ dị m ka m bụ ezi maka nke ahụ
Kedu ka m ga-esi bie ezigbo ndụ ahụike na-enyocha site na oghere nke ihe ngosi eziokwu? Ọ bụrụ na ndụ m bụ ọrụ m, na ọrụ m chọrọ ka m rụọ ọrụ ụfọdụ, ònye ka m bụkwanụ? '
A kọwara ya dị ka akara ngosi mmekọahụ site na mgbasa ozi

Ngosipụta Simpson nke Daisy Duke mere ka onyonyo akara ngosi mmekọahụ ya na-aga n'ihu, wee gosipụta agwa dị na vidiyo egwu ya 'These Boots Are Made For Walkin', nke na-egosi 'ihe nkiri Simpson na-ede n'ụzọ megidere ụgbọ ala suds jupụtara'
Emere ihe nkiri a na vidiyo egwu Pink ' Stupid Girls '
Simpson pụtakwara dị ka Daisy Duke n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi telivishọn maka mgbasa ozi Pizza Hut n'oge Super Bowl na 2006 na 2007
Simpson kwuru na 'ọrụ [Daisy Duke] kere 'ọkọlọtọ ọla edo' nke a ga-ekpe ya ikpe n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ, na a na-enyocha ya nke ukwuu na mgbasa ozi na-esochi oke ibu ya na 2009
Simpson bụ onye Republican edebanyere aha
Ọ kwadoro George W
Bush n'oge mgbasa ozi onye isi ala ya na 2004, n'agbanyeghị na ọ kagburu ihe ngosi na 2006 Republican fundraiser n'ihi na ọ chere na ọ bụghị 'ihe kwesịrị ekwesị'
Ọ bụ ezie na onye Republican, Simpson etoola onye bụbu First Lady Michelle Obama n'oge di ya nọ n'ọkwa ọchịchị, na-ekwu, 'Ọ bụ nwanyị dị egwu, na ya na nwoke dị ike dị otú ahụ
Ihe ọ bụla ọ na-eme na-eme ka obi sie ya ike
Na April 2004, Simpson rụrụ n'oge ọrụ uru VH1 a kpọrọ Divas Live 2004 n'akụkụ Ashanti, Cyndi Lauper, Gladys Knight, Joss Stone na Patti LaBelle, na nkwado nke Save the Music Foundation
Na Mee 2004, Simpson mere egwu iji nyere Skin Care Foundation aka
Na Maachị 2007, Simpson nyere obere Chrysler ọhụrụ nye ụlọ ụmụ mgbei Elim na Nuevo Laredo
Simpson bụ onye nnochite anya Soles4Souls ebe o sonyeere akpụkpọ ụkwụ akpaaka iji nye ego sitere na obodo dị na United States
Simpson na-arụkwa ọrụ na Make-A-Wish Foundation
