Jessica Laura Sutton (a mụrụ na June 2, 1993) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Netflix The Kissing Booth na dịka onye isi Tally Craven na usoro Freeform Motherland Fort Salem
A mụrụ Sutton na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ gara ACT Film Academy ma nata diplọma ya n'afọ 2014 na Advanced Acting for Film ma gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Matthew Harrison na The Actors Foundry na Vancouver
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri Detour, Finders Keepers, Bhai's Cafe, Escape Room, The Kissing Booth na Inside Man Most Wanted
Jessica Andrea Watkins (amuru May 14, 1988) bu onye na-enyocha mbara igwe nke NASA, ọkà mmụta banyere mbara ala, aquanaut na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu rugby mba ụwa
A mara ọkwa Watkins dị ka nwanyị ojii mbụ nke ga-emecha ọdụ ogologo oge International Space Station na Eprel 2022
A mụrụ Jessica Watkins na Mee 14, 1988 na Gaithersburg, Maryland nye Michael na Carolyn Watkins
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Lafayette, Colorado, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fairview High School
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na sayensị geological na gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum Stanford
N'ebe ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu rugby
Mgbe Stanford gasịrị, Watkins nwetara PhD
na Geology na Mahadum California, Los Angeles
Nnyocha ya gụsịrị akwụkwọ, n'okpuru nlekọta nke Prọfesọ An Yin, lekwasịrị anya na usoro ntinye maka mbuze na Mars na Ụwa, gụnyere mmetụta nke ọrụ mmiri
Tupu ahọpụtara ya dị ka onye na-enyocha mbara igwe, Watkins bụ onye ọrụ postdoctoral na California Institute of Technology, ebe ọ bụkwa onye na-enye aka nchịkwa na otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị
Watkins began playing rugby during her freshman year at Stanford and remained on the team for four years
In 2008, during her sophomore year, she was a member of the Division I national champion team
In both 2008 and 2010, Watkins became a member of First Team Collegiate Rugby All-American
She is a former American women's national team rugby player for the sevens, and played for the USA Eagles in its 3rd-place finish at the 2009 Rugby World Cup Sevens
During the World Cup she was the leading try scorer for the US team
Dị ka onye na-agụghị akwụkwọ, Watkins rụrụ ọrụ na Ames Research Center iji kwado Mars Phoenix lander na prototype Mars drill test
Na 2009, ọ bụ onye isi geologist maka NASA Spaceward Bound Crew 86 na Mars Desert Research Station
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Jet Propulsion Laboratory na ọrụ NEOWISE iji nyochaa nso-Earth asteroids
Watkins rụkwara ọrụ na nhazi maka Mars rover Curiosity
Na 2011, Watkins jere ozi dị ka onye otu ọrụ sayensị maka ozi analọgụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme atụmatụ maka rover Mars 2020 na ihe nlele Mars, ma bụrụkwa onye otu sayensị maka ebumnuche nyocha Desert na teknụzụ analog

Dị ka onye postdoctoral ibe na Caltech, na dị ka onye na-arụkọ ọrụ na Mars Science Laboratory Science Team, o sonye na nhazi ụbọchị nke ihe omume Mars rover ma jiri data oyiyi ya jikọtara ya na data orbital iji nyochaa stratigraphy, geology, na geomorphology nke Mars
Na June 2017, ahọpụtara Watkins ka onye otu NASA Astronaut Group 22 wee malite ọzụzụ afọ abụọ n'August
Na Disemba 2020, ahọpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke otu Artemis ka ọ laghachite mmadụ na Ọnwa
Afọ 2024 bụ ụbọchị echere maka mbido ọnwa

Na Nọvemba 2021, ọ ghọrọ onye na-enyocha mbara igwe nke anọ nke Group 22, na nwanyị ojii mbụ, ka e kenye ya ozi na ọdụ ụgbọ elu International Space (ISS) ka ahọpụtara ya dị ka onye ikpeazụ nke SpaceX Crew-4, nke akwadoro ịmalite na Eprel 2022
Ọ ga-abụ oge mbụ Watkins na mbara igwe
Ọ ga-ejekwa ozi dị ka ọkachamara mgbasa ozi maka ozi ọnwa isii ahụ
Ọrụ ya ga-agụnye ileba anya na ịse foto mgbanwe geological na Ụwa, yana nyocha ndị ọzọ gbasara sayensị ụwa na mbara igwe, sayensị ihe ọmụmụ ihe ndụ, na mmetụta nke ogologo oge na-efe efe na ụmụ mmadụ
Watkins sonyeere na ozi NEEMO 23 site na June 10 ruo June 22, 2019
Ozi a nwalere teknụzụ na ebumnobi maka ozi mbara ala miri emi na nyocha ọnwa n'elu oke osimiri
Ọrụ NEEMO nke Watkins bụ nke mbụ n'ụdị ya gosipụtara otu nyocha nwanyị niile nke onye na-enyocha mbara igwe Italy bụ Samantha Cristoforetti na-edu
Nne na nna Watkins bi na Lafayette, Colorado
Ihe omume ntụrụndụ ya gụnyere bọọlụ, ịrị elu nkume, ski, na ide ihe okike
Watkins enwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya, agụmakwụkwọ, na egwuregwu, gụnyere
Jessie Chisi bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede ihe nkiri nke Zambia
Ka ọ na-etolite na Zambia, Chisi gara Durban Talent Campus na 2009 ma na 2010 a nabatara ya na Berlinale Talent Campus
Ọ bụ onye enyemaka mmepụta na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke Rungano Nyoni nke afọ 2011 nke a kpọrọ Mwansa the Great
N'afọ 2013, Chisi guzobere Zambia Short Film Fest, nke na-egosi ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke nkeji iri na ise ma ọ bụ obere
Chisi's Berlinale pitch, nke a na-akpọ Woman On Hold, mechara bụrụ ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2014 Between Rings, nke Finnish Film Foundation kwadoro
E gosipụtara ya na Copenhagen International Documentary Festival
O dere, soro mepụta ma duzie Imagination (2016), banyere nwa okorobịa nọ na Garden Township, Lusaka onye na-arọ nrọ megide ohere nke ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ duziri Season 1 & 2 nke Zuba (2018-2019), ihe nkiri mbụ nke Zambia
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o mepụtara, duzie ma dee Remedy (2020), ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke dabeere na ahụmịhe Zambia n'oge ọrịa COVID-19
Chisi bi na Lusaka, Zambia
Ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Finland
A mụrụ Jessie Eden na 24 Febụwarị 1902 na 61 Talbot Street, nke edepụtara dị ka mpaghara Birmingham All Saints
Nne ya bụ onye na-eme mkpọsa maka ikike nhọpụta dị afọ iri na asaa nke a na-akpọkwa Jessie, nna ya bụ 'onye na-eme njem ọla' nke a na'akpọ William
Ya na ezinụlọ ya tolitere na Jewellery Quarter nke Hockley, Birmingham
Mpaghara a nke Birmingham dị nso na ụlọ ọrụ Lucas Electrics, ebe Eden mechara bụrụ onye ọrụ, ọ ga-abụkwa onye a ma ama n'ihi ọrụ ya
Jessie bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ nke Jessie na William, abụọ ndị ọzọ a na-akpọ May na Nell
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1911, ezinụlọ ahụ bi na 32 Court 2 House, Bridge Street, nna ya dị afọ iri abụọ na asaa ugbu a na-arụ ọrụ dị ka 'wireman'
Alụmdi na nwunye dị mkpirikpi n'oge ọkọchị nke 1923 na Kings Norton na nwoke a na-akpọ Albert Eden ga-ahụ Jessie gbanwee aha nna ya site na Shrimpton gaa na Eden, aha ọ ga-abụ nke a kacha mara
Ka oge na-aga, ọ kọwara alụmdi na nwunye ya na Eden dị mkpirikpi dị ka 'ihe nzuzu', nakwa na afọ ojujughị ya n'ịlụ onye na-ekwenyeghị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya

N'agbanyeghị ogologo alụmdi na nwunye ahụ, di na nwunye ahụ kuchiri nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Douglas (Douggie na ndị enyi), Otú ọ dị, ọnọdụ nne na nna ya na-ese okwu na ọtụtụ ndị ezinụlọ Eden kwenyere na Douglas bụ onye ikwu ọbara nke Jessie Eden (lee Personal and Family Life)
Eden ghọrọ onye ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ejupụta ihe na-egbochi ihe mgbagwoju anya na ụlọ ọrụ Lucas Electronics nke Birmingham na onye na-ahụ maka otu ụlọ ọrụ maka naanị ngalaba nke ụmụ nwanyị unionised
N'oge ọgbaghara zuru oke nke United Kingdom na 1926, o mere ka otu ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọrụ a kweta ịpụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma sonye na ọgbaghara ahụ
Nne na nna ya abụọ kwadoro ọrụ ya nke ọma, nna ya sonyeere ya n'oge ọgbaghara ahụ na nne ya na-akwụnye ọkọlọtọ uhie na windo ihu ụlọ ha
N'afọ 1931, Eden haziri ọgbaghara ọzọ, n'oge a na-eduga ụmụ nwanyị 10,000 na-abụghị ndị otu ọrụ n'ọgbaghara izu, n'ime oge ọ sonyeere ndị Communist Party of Great Britain (CPGB)

Tupu ọgbaghara ahụ, Eden chọpụtara na ndị nlekọta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-eleba anya nke ọma n'ọrụ ya, n'oge na-adịghị anya, Eden na ndị ọrụ ibe ya chọpụtara na ndị nchịkwa na-ele ya anya n'ihi na ọ bụ onye ọrụ ngwa ngwa nakwa na ha na-eme atụmatụ iji ọsọ ọrụ ya dị ka ụkpụrụ maka ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ niile nọ n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Eden gakwuuru Amalgamated Engineering Union (AEU), Otú ọ dị, ha ekweghị ka ụmụ nwanyị sonye na ndị otu ha, ya mere ọ gakwuuru Transport and General Workers' Union (T&W)
Iji mee mkpesa megide atụmatụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Eden haziri ngagharị iwe nke ụmụ nwanyị 10,000, ndị jụrụ ịrụ ọrụ otu izu
Ọgbaghara ahụ gara nke ọma ma manye ndị na-elekọta ụlọ ọrụ Lucas Electrics ịlaghachi azụ
Mgbe mmeri ahụ gasịrị, ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere obi ụtọ nke ukwuu nke na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ enweghị ike ịrụ ọrụ n'oge dị mma ma mechie ya n'oge
Otu n'ime ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe nke ndị gbara Eden ume ka a zụlitere n'ubu ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ n'oge nri abalị n'ememe
Trades Union Congress (TUC) kọwara ọgbaghara a dị ka 'ihe a na-ahụtụbeghị n'oge ahụ', ma mee ka onye ndú T&G (Ernest Bevin n'oge a) nye Jessie Eden ihe nrite ọla edo nke otu ahụ
Nduzi na nhazi nke Eden mere ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'etiti obodo ahụ mụbaa nke ukwuu na ndị ọrụ aka nke Britain
Mgbe ọgbaghara nke afọ 1931 gasịrị, ndị Communist Party (nke ọ bụ onye otu ya ruo ogologo ndụ ya) mere ndokwa ka ọ gaa Soviet Union iji nyere ndị ọrụ nwanyị aka iji nyere aka wuo Moscow Metro na 1934
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na ọkara na Soviet Union, ọ bụ ezie na n'agbanyeghị nkà ya na nhazi ndị ọrụ, ọrụ ya mere obere ihe iji mee ka ọganihu nke Moscow Metro dị ngwa, n'ihi nsogbu asụsụ
N'oge ọ nọ na Soviet Union, ọ sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ Lenin nke Comintern, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka onye ọrụ Shock na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala Stalin (nke e mechara kpọwa ụgbọ ala ZiL)
Ka oge na-aga, Eden gwara nwunye nwa ya na ọ gara Soviet Union na nzuzo, nakwa na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ kwenyere na ọ furu efu
Mgbe o si na Soviet Union lọta, Eden duziri ọzọ ọgbaghara gara nke ọma n'obodo Birmingham
N'afọ 1939, dị ka ngagharị iwe megide ọnọdụ ụlọ ndị ogbenye n'obodo Birmingham, Eden haziri nnukwu ọgbaghara nke ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị bi na ya 50,000
Ọ ga-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya n'ihe gbasara ikike ụlọ ma nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri atọ dị ka onye ndú nke otu ndị bi n'ụlọ kansụl nke obodo Birmingham
Eden sonyere na mpaghara Handsworth n'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 1945, merie 34% (1,390) nke votu
Ka e mesịrị na Nọvemba 1945, ọ sonyere dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka ime obodo, na-erughị mmeri site na votu 2,887
Oge nke anọ na nke ise nke Peaky Blinders gosipụtara onye aha ya bụ Jessie Eden, nke onye Irish na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Charlie Murphy gosipụtara
Ọ bụ ezie na nnabata ahụ dị mgbagwoju anya, ụfọdụ ndị maara Eden n'onwe ha were iwe n'ụzọ e gosipụtara ya
Graham Stevenson, onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọchịchị Kọmunist nke Britain, enyi Eden na onye dere akụkọ ndụ ya, katọrọ ihe ngosi ahụ
'Amaara m Eden, ma dị ka onye dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ, ajụghị m Jessie dị afọ iri asaa maka mmekọrịta ya, ma ya fọdụkwa ndụ mmekọahụ
Mana enwere m obi abụọ na ndụ onwe ya dị mgbagwoju anya ma ọ bụ dị egwu dị ka nke onye a na-akpọ aha ya
Enweghị m ike ịhụ nwa agbọghọ ọ bụla n'ime afọ 1920 na-abanye n'ụlọ mposi ndị mmadụ n'efu, dịka egosiri Eden na-eme, maka ihe ọ bụla ọzọ karịa ndụ ma ọ bụ ọnwụ
Ụkpụrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke mmemme ahụ bụ akụkọ ihe mere eme

O doro anya na ọ bụ mpako na Tommy Shelby, onye omekome na-eme ihe ike nke usoro ahụ, nwere ike ime ka nwanyị dị ka Eden kwenye ka a merie ya ma rie ya, ma ọ bụghị naanị ka a rafuo ya, nke mechara kpughee ezi ebumnuche nke ndị mepụtara mmemme ahụ
N'ihe omume tebụl gburugburu nke gosipụtara Stevenson, onye na-ede uri Dave Puller, na onye na-akọ akụkọ ọdịbendị Prọfesọ Paul Long, mmadụ atọ ahụ tụlere usoro ahụ na ngosipụta ya nke ndị ọrụ Britain
Long kwuru na usoro ahụ dị mma ma too usoro ahụ dị ka 'nnukwu nnọchiteanya nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ na-adọrọ mmasị'
Puller nwere mmetụta dị iche iche ma nwee nkụda mmụọ na ihe ngosi ahụ họọrọ ilekwasị anya na romance efu nke Eden na Tommy Shelby, karịa ezigbo ihe ọ rụzuru dị ka onye Kọmunist na onye isi otu ọrụ
Eden lụrụ di ugboro abụọ, otu oge na 1923 na Albert Eden onye ya na ya gbasara ngwa ngwa, na-ekwu maka echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị iche iche

N'oge alụmdi na nwunye a dị mkpirikpi, di na nwunye ahụ kuchiri nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Douglas (Douggie na ndị enyi), onye mechara sonye na Royal Navy, wee bụrụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kọmunist ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1977
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, ndị ezinụlọ Eden dị iche iche kwuru na ya bụ onye ikwu ọbara, nakwa na Douglas biri ndụ ya niile n'amaghị na ọ bụghị nwa Jessie Eden
N'afọ 1948, Eden lụrụ onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Kọmunist Walter McCulloch, ha wee nọrọ ọnụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1978
McCulloch bụ ọkwá nkà na onye otu CPGB nke lekọtara iwu ụlọ ọrụ Star Social Club nke pati Kọmunist maka alaka Midlands
Eden nwụrụ na Birmingham na 27 Septemba 1986
Jessie Margaret Soga, LRAM (21 Ọgọstụ 1870 na 23 Febụwarị 1954) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Xhosa / Scottish contralto, onye nkuzi egwu na onye suffragist
A kọwara ya dị ka naanị onye ojii na-eme mkpọsa maka ikike nhọpụta nke dị na Scotland
Soga bụ onye isi otu Women's Freedom League na Glasgow ma mesịa sonye na Women's Social and Political Union; mana ọ naghị arụ ọrụ agha, na-eji nkà nhazi ya na nkà egwu ya iji nweta ego
Jessie Soga bụ nwa nwanyị nke Reverend Tiyo Soga (1831-1871), onye ụkọchukwu ojii South Africa mbụ a họpụtara, onye ghọrọ onye ozi ala ọzọ na onye nsụgharị
A mụrụ ya na Tutura (Somerville) na Transkei, Cape, South Africa, otu afọ tupu ọnwụ nna ya na 1871
Nne ya bụ onye ozi ala ọzọ Scotland bụ Janet Burnside (1827-1903), onye zutere nna ya mgbe ọ nọ na Scotland mgbe ọ na-amụ nkà mmụta okpukpe na Glasgow
Nne ya na ụmụnne ya laghachiri Scotland mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Jessie na ụmụ ndị ọzọ niile gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Dollar Academy
Ọ gara ma kwụọ ụgwọ site na 1879 ruo 1882
N'afọ 1882, a jara Jessie mma na klas ịkwa akwa ya, afọ iri ka e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na 1892 na Edinburgh School of Art ma nye ya ohere nke abụọ maka Plant Drawing in Outline

A jara ya mma nke ukwuu na asọmpi Girls Own Paper na 1897, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-akụzi ịbụ abụ, ma na-eme ihe n'oge ahụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na Kelvingrove United Presbyterian Choir's 'very creditable performance' nke The Wreck of the Hesperus, na dị ka onye-agụ egwuregwu na Coatbridge Corporation Recitals

Ụmụnne Soga, ma e wezụga Jessie, laghachiri ibi na South Africa William Anderson Soga (1858ī 1948) onye ghọrọ dọkịta na onye ozi ala ọzọ; John Henderson Soga (1860ī 1941), onye ghọkwara onye ozi ala ala ọzọ; Allan Kirkland Soga (1861ī 1938), onye mbụ na-akwalite na African National Congress; ụmụnne ya nwanyị, Isabella Macfarlane Soga (18641884) na Frances Maria Anne Soga (1868ī1942) rụkwara ọrụ na ozi ala ọzọ Ndị Kraịst, na Jotello Soga (1865 Syga (1860), onye mbụ dọkịta ojii South Africa
Jessie na nne ya nọrọ ma ha na enyi ha gara ezumike na St
Andrews n'August 1901
A kọwara Soga dị ka 'contralto ọhụrụ' mgbe ya na ndị ọzọ na-egwu egwu na egwu egwu nke Glasgow City Hall na 16 Nọvemba 1895, ọ na-enyekwa agụmakwụkwọ egwu onwe onye
Soga gụsịrị akwụkwọ ọkachamara ya na Singing na egwu na 1894 na 1895, n'okpuru Richard Cummings, Llewela Davies na George E
Mott na Royal Academy of Music, London, mgbe ọ bi na 8 South Crescent, Bedford Square

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ mbụ dị ka onye nkuzi na-agụ egwú na Disemba 1901 (LRAM) na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ka e mesịrị na Septemba 1910, ndị nyocha RAM, Henry William Richards na William Gray McNaught gafere ya maka Voice-Culture na Class Singing

Agụmakwụkwọ egwu ya na iru eru ya bụ nke mba ụwa, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru onye nkuzi abụ Italian Alberto Giovannini na Milan Conservatory; ọ kụzikwaara onye Irish na-ede egwu Thomas O'Brien Butler yana onye Italian tenor Francesco Tagmagno na Austrian baritone Joseph Kaschmann
Ọ kpọkwara Jacques Bouhy ka ọ na-akụzi ya na Paris (ma eleghị anya tupu ọ gaa America na 1904)
Otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ Soga bụ onye Africa America Helen A
Moore nke Fiske Jubilee Singers mgbe ọ nọ na njem mba ụwa ma na-eme ihe na Glasgow, onye kwuru mgbe e mesịrị (na 1930) na ọ họọrọ Soga dị ka 'n'etiti ndị isi na-agụ egwú nke mba ahụ'
Soga rụrụ ọrụ na 'nkwado na-aga nke ọma' nke Mass nke Beethoven na C major na olu 90 nke Blairgowrie na Rattray Choral Society na 30 Machị 1899, mgbe a jara ya mma maka ịbụ abụ ya
Miss Soga gosipụtara nnukwu ọkacha mmasị
Ọ bụ onye nwere olu dị nro, nke na-egosipụta mgbe ụfọdụ àgwà dị nro nke nwa nwanyị nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
A kpaliri ya nke ọma maka abụ mbụ ya, ma jiri ntụgharị ọmịiko nke Bonnie Wee Thing zaghachi ya; ebe a na-akọwa Stay at Home n'ụzọ dị ụtọ
A kọwakwara uwe ya na ngalaba a na-akpọ 'Ụfọdụ n'ime uwe [nke Helen]' dị ka 'gold satin ochie, gaze ojii kpuchiri, yoke gbara gburugburu nke elu ahụ nke a na-akọwa site na akwa ojii
Soga bụ onye otu Wellington United Free Church na Glasgow, ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ na-ede akwụkwọ maka Christian Endeavour Society nke ụka ahụ
Isiokwu ndị bụ isiokwu nke mmemme Society gụnyere ọrụ Mission na Temperance
Society bụ maka ndị na-eto eto nọ na chọọchị ahụ, ebumnuche ya bụ 'ịkwalite ndụ Ndị Kraịst siri ike n'etiti ndị otu ya'
Soga bụrụ abụ 'Like as the hart desireth' site na Abụ Ọma nke 42 n'oge Social Evening na chọọchị na Mee 1902

Na 1 Jenụwarị 1903, Soga bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Coatbridge Choral Union 'Grand New Year's Mid-Day Concert' nke Handel's Messiah, mana n'oge ahụ, a kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-adịghị ike na mbido mana ọ meziwanyere n'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya ka oge na-aga
mgbalị ya kachasị mma bụ akụkụ 'A kpọrọ ya asị'
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Messiah ọzọ na Turriff na 15 Disemba 1903, ya na ndị ukwe ha
Na Septemba 1910 ọ gafere ule na olu-ọdịbendị na klas-abụ abụ na Royal Academy of Music

Ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na-eme ihe na ebe ndị buru ibu na obere gafee Scotland, ya na ndị otu ukwe, ma ọ bụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwú, ọ kwadokwara ịnakọta ego na ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na 1910, na-abụ abụ maka British Women's Temperance Association na St Andrew's Hall, Glasgow na World Women's Christian Temperance Union International Convention, ya na òtù ndị ntorobịa nke mba ụwa nke 600 olu, na ịgbakwunye n'etiti ndị ọkà okwu dị iche iche na alaka Temperance League ma ọ bụ Land League
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na 1919 kwuru na 'ihe ịga nke ọma nke nnọkọ ahụ abụghị obere n'ihi ntụrụndụ magburu onwe ya nke, [] abụ Miss Soga nyere
Soga kpọsara na The Scotsman maka ụmụ akwụkwọ na-abụ abụ, na-akụzi kwa izu na ụlọ ahịa ọkachamara piano, nso ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na Stafford Street, Edinburgh
Soga jiri nkà abụ ya na njikọ ya na-ahazi ntụrụndụ ma ọ bụ na-akpata ego dị ka akụkụ nke idu ndú na Glasgow nke mkpọsa ụmụ nwanyị n'etiti 1908 na 1917
N'afọ 1924, Soga sonyeere An Commun Gaidhealach mana amabeghị ma ọ bụrụ na ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nke ọ bụla n'ime National Mòds

N'afọ 1908, Soga bụ otu n'ime 'ndị isi na-akpali', dị ka onye ndú mkpọsa ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Teresa Billington-Greig si kwuo, n'ịmepụta nnukwu alaka ọhụrụ nke Women's Freedom League na West End nke Glasgow (Hillhead)
Nzukọ mmeghe ọha na eze na Hillhead Burgh Hall karịrị atụmanya nke ukwuu, ebe ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ jupụtara na nnukwu ụlọ nzukọ na ụlọ nke abụọ, yana nnukwu ndị otu n'ihi ya
A họpụtara Soga na ES
Semple ka ha bụrụ odeakwụkwọ alaka na Febụwarị 1908 ma kwado ihe omume 'At Home' n'otu ụlọ nzukọ ahụ n'ọnwa Eprel, na Margaret Irwin (onye otu ọrụ) dị ka onye isi okwu

Ọnụ ọgụgụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ihe omume gụnyere oge mba, dịka na Machị 1908, mgbe Soga nyere abụ, ha haziri recitations na onye na-eme violin na ihe omume 'na-agafe' na nnukwu ụlọ ndị Gris nke Glasgow (Prince of Wales Halls) iji nabata ndị mkpọrọ Scottish (WSPU) a tọhapụrụ site na Holloway

Ọ bụ Agnes Husband nke Dundee nabatara ndị ọkà okwu Amy Sanderson na Anna Munro (ha abụọ bụ ndị mkpọrọ n'onwe ha, bụ ndị nwere ukwe a na-abụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, ma nọrọ na Kọmitii Nchịkwa Mba WFL) na onye ọkà okwu ọzọ bụ onye isi WFL Teresa Billington-Greig
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ ahụ, a na-enwe nzukọ alaka kwa izu abụọ, na Soga ka bụ odeakwụkwọ alaka, ugbu a na M
Barrowman
A kpọtụrụ aha ya n'akwụkwọ ozi onwe onye n'etiti ndị isi ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Helen Crawfurd na Janet Barrowman
Ihe nlereanya Soga nke ' Chantant' bụ otu n'ime ihe omume ndị na-aga nke ọma, n'ịdọta ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu ma bulie £ 75, a tụgharịrị ya na alaka ndị ọzọ
Ọ hazikwara ntụrụndụ maka WSPU 'Scottish Exhibition' na Charing Cross, na maka obere nzukọ alaka
O nyere onyinye site na ego ọ na-enweta na ego nkuzi, gụnyere maka ihe omume WSPU nke London
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-etinye aka na Women's Social and Political Union, ọ sonyeghị na ngagharị iwe ime ihe ike
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke nzukọ WSPU n'obodo ndị dị nso, dị ka Blackwood, ma nye onyinye marmalade e mere n'ụlọ maka ire ere na ihe omume

Ọ hazikwara ọbá akwụkwọ na-agagharị agagharị nke bara uru, na-enye akwụkwọ n'onwe ya na ụlọ ọrụ WSPU Sauchiehall Street, ma nye onyinye maka ndebanye aha ọnwa isii na Women's Franchise ka e zigara ya na Woodside District Library Soga na WSPU kwụsịrị n'ihe dị ka 1917, ọ bụ ezie na WSPU akwụsịla onwe ya mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ malitere na 1914, na nkwekọrịta ịkwụsị ọrụ agha iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka ịtọhapụ ụmụ nwanyị a tụrụ mkpọrọ
Iwu nnọchiteanya nke ndị mmadụ nke 1918 nyere ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị ikike ịtụ vootu
Soga nwụrụ na Old People's Cottages na Rottenrow n'isi ụtụtụ nke 23 Febụwarị 1954, mgbe ọ dị afọ 83, olili ozu ya dịkwa na Western Necropolis Crematorium, Glasgow
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ dịghị ihe oyiyi Soga a chọpụtara, ma ọ bụ ama ma ọ bụrụ na e nwere ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-acha odo odo na-eme mkpọsa maka ntuli aka
TS Beall kwuru na anaghị akụzi ọrụ ndị suffragists na ndị suffragettes nke Scotland 'ọtụtụ' n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Scotland, a maghịkwa aha ha

A gụnyere Soga na egwuregwu agụmakwụkwọ ọhụrụ (Top Trumps-style) na Scotland's Suffragettes Trumps, nke Protests & Suffragette (ndị na-ese ihe, ndị na-eme ihe ike na otu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke obodo gụnyere Dr
Beall) mepụtara site na ịkwụ ụgwọ iji zipụ 700 set n'ụlọ akwụkwọ

Yvonne McFadden nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụ nwanyị Scotland kpọrọ ya 'ihe na-atọ ụtọ ma dị mkpa iji hụ na ụmụ nwanyị ndị a na akụkọ ha' gụnyere na usoro agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ Scotland, ebe akụkọ ihe mere mere eme nke ndị inyom na-ejikarị nkuzi akụkọ ihe mere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
A gbakwunyere aha Soga na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ 'PlainsightSOUND', akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị egwu Black Classical na United Kingdom
A gbakwunyere aha ya na akụkọ ndụ dị mkpirikpi na usoro iheomume ya
Àtụ Women's suffrage in Scotland
Fungayi Jessie Majome bụ onye otu National Assembly of the Parliament of Zimbabwe for Harare West constituency na tiketi MDC-T a họpụtara 1st na 2008 wee na 2013
Ọ bụ onye isi oche ndị omeiwu nke Kọmitii Pọtụfoliyo Zimbabwe
Wikipedia
Fungayi Jessie Majome (amụrụ na 20 Disemba 1971) bụ onye otu National Assembly nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Zimbabwe maka mpaghara Harare West na tiketi MDC-T nke a họpụtara nke mbụ na 2008 na 2013
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ikpe Zimbabue, Iwu na Ihe Ndị Omeiwu
Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Iwu nke ndị omeiwu na Kọmitii Portfolio na Gọọmentị Obodo na Mmepe Obodo

N'oge usoro iwu Zimbabwe nke afọ 2009 ruo afọ 2013 ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Nhọrọ nke ndị omeiwu iri abụọ na ise (COPAC) na Iwu ọhụrụ nke nkwekọrịta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Global Political Agreement guzobere
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ya na onye isi oche
Onye bụbu onye otu National Executive Committee nke Movement for Democratic Change Party (MDC-T) na onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ya maka iwu na ndị omeiwu
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi na Jessie Majome & Co
Legal Practitioners

Ọ bụbu osote minista na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi, iwu na ndị omeiwu na Zimbabwe ma bụrụkwa osote minisita na-ahụkarị maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị, okike na mmepe obodo (Zimbabwe) n'ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na mmepe ọha na eze

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Councillor Ward 1 na Onye isi oche nke Hwange Local Board na 2003 mana onye otu na-achị achị nke Mịnịsta nke Gọọmentị Obodo chụpụrụ ya na 2004 maka ịghara irube isi ntụziaka ya iji kagbuo nkwụsịtụ ya nke Chief Executive Officer nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
O nwere Master of Laws (LLM) Mahadum nke South Africa 2004, Masters In Women's Law (MSWL) Mahaduma nke Zimbabwe 2008, Post Graduate Diploma In Women'S Law Dip
1996, Bachelor of Laws Honours (LLBS) Mahadum nke Zimbabwe 1995
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, ọ kwupụtara na ya agaghị etinye aka na ntuli aka nke pati ahụ na-ekwu maka iji ntuziaka pati eme ihe
Onye na-asọmpi ya ga-abụ Joanna Mamombe dị afọ iri abụọ na ise onye ọtụtụ chere na ọ nwere mmeri na-ezighị ezi karịa Majome
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik

Ọ na-anọdụ na bọọdụ dị iche iche dị ka Mutemwa Leprosy Catholic Care Centre (MLCC), Zimbabwe Women Lawyers Xia Association ebe ọ na-eduzi Kọmitii Mmasị Ọkachamara - ZWLA), Ndabaningi Sithole Foundation
Jessie Redmon Fauset (27 na onwa isii, na afọ 1882 na 30 na onwa isii, na afọ 1961) bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Africa-America, onye na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye edemedo, na onye nkuzi
Ọrụ edemede ya nyere aka kpụọ akwụkwọ ndị Afirika na Amerika na afo 1920 ha ka ọ na-elekwasị anya n'igosi ezi onyinyo nke ndụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Africa America

Site na afọ 1919 ruo afọ 1926, ọnọdụ Fauset dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Crisis, magazin NAACP, nyere ya ohere inye aka na Harlem Renaissance site n'ịkwalite ọrụ edemede metụtara òtù mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke oge a

Site n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye nchịkọta akwụkwọ na onye nyocha, ọ kụdara ndị edemede ojii ume ka ha ghara ibelata àgwà agbụrụ nke ndị na-ede akwụkwọ n'ọrụ ha, ma gbaa ha ume ide ihe n'eziokwu na n'ihu ọha banyere agbụrụ ndị Africa America
Ọ chọrọ nnọchite anya dị mma na nke dị mma nke obodo ndị Africa America n'akwụkwọ ndị a na-enwetụbeghị mbụ gosipụtara n'ụzọ doro anya
Tupu na mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na The Crisis, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ dị ka onye nkuzi French na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na Washington, DC, na New York City
O bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ anọ n'ime afọ 1920 na 1930, na-enyocha ndụ ndị isi ojii nọ n'etiti

Ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye na-ede akwụkwọ nke magazin ụmụaka Africa-America The Brownies' Book A maara ya maka ịchọpụta na iduzi ndị edemede ndị ọzọ Africa America, gụnyere Langston Hughes, Jean Toomer, Countee Cullen, na Claude McKay
A mụrụ ya Jessie Redmona Fauset (nke e mechara mara dị ka Jessie Redmon Fauset) na Eprel 27, na afọ 1882, na Fredericksville, Camden County, Snow Hill Center Township, New Jersey
A maara obodo ahụ ugbu a dị ka Lawnside, New Jersey
Ọ bụ nwa nke asaa nke Redmon Fauset, onye ụkọchukwu African Methodist Episcopal, na Annie (née Seamon) Fauset
Nne Jessie nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere, nna ya lụrụ di ọzọ
Ya na nwunye ya nke abụọ Bella mụrụ ụmụ atọ, nwanyị ọcha onye Juu nke ghọrọ Onye Kraịst
Bella wetara ụmụ atọ n'ezinụlọ site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya
Ndị nne na nna abụọ mesiri ụmụ ha ike agụmakwụkwọ
Onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na onye na-amụ banyere ụmụ mmadụ bụ Arthur Fauset bụ nwanne ya nwoke
Fauset si n'ezinụlọ buru ibu dara ogbenye
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere; abụọ n'ime ụmụnne ya ka na-erubeghị afọ ise
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Philadelphia maka ụmụ nwanyị, ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ kachasị elu n'obodo ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu ikpeazụ nke klas ya ma eleghị anya onye Africa America mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Ọ chọrọ ịmụ akwụkwọ na Bryn Mawr College, a na-enyekwa onye na-ekwu okwu ikpeazụ nke Girls' High agụmakwụkwọ na kọleji ahụ
Otú ọ dị, onye isi oche Bryn Mawr M
Carey Thomas nwetara ego maka Fauset ịga Mahadum Cornell kama ọ ga-egbochi ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii ọ bụla ịga Bryn Ma wr n'oge ọ nọ n'ọrụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Cornell dị na New York, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1905 na nzere na asụsụ oge ochie
N'oge ọ nọ na Mahadum Cornell na afọ 1903 ruo akụkụ nke 1904, Fauset biri na Sage College
Ọ ga-emeri Phi Beta Kappa
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, a na-ewere ya dị ka nwanyị ojii mbụ nabatara na Phi Beta Kappa Society, mana nyocha e mechara mee gosiri na nke a bụ Mary Annette Anderson n'ezie
Fauset mechara nweta nzere masta ya na French na Mahadum Pennsylvania (1919)

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị kọleji, Fauset ghọrọ onye nkuzi na Dunbar High School (nke a na-akpọ M Street High School), ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii na Washington, DC, nke nwere usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze
Ọ kụziri French na Latin, wee gaa Paris maka oge okpomọkụ iji mụọ na Sorbonne
N'afọ 1919, Fauset hapụrụ nkuzi ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka The Crisis, nke W
Du Bois nke NAACP guzobere
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo afọ 1926
Fauset ghọrọ onye otu NAACP ma nọchite anya ha na Pan African Congress na 1921
Mgbe okwu Congress ya gasịrị, Delta Sigma Theta sorority mere ya onye otu nsọpụrụ
N'afọ 1926, Fauset hapụrụ The Crisis wee laghachi na nkuzi, n'oge a na DeWitt Clinton High School na New York City, ebe ọ nwere ike ịkụziri James Baldwin na-eto eto
Ọ kụziri na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke New York City ruo na afọ 1944
N'afọ 1929, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ na asaa, Fauset lụrụ onye na-ahụ maka mkpuchi Herbert Harris na nke mbụ ya
Ha si New York City kwaga Montclair, New Jersey, ebe ha biri ndụ dị jụụ
Harris nwụrụ na 1958
Ọ laghachiri Philadelphia na nwanne ya nwoke, otu n'ime ụmụ Bella
Fauset nwụrụ na Eprel 30, na afo1961, site na ọrịa obi ma lie ya na Eden Cemetery na Collingdale, Pennsylvania
A na-ewere oge Jessie Fauset na The Crisis dị ka oge edemede kachasị mma nke magazin ahụ
Na ọnwa Julai, na afọ 1918, Fauset ghọrọ onye na-enye aka na The Crisus, na-eziga isiokwu maka kọlụm 'Looking Glass' site n'ụlọ ya na Philadelphia
Ka ọ na-erule Julaị na-esote, onye nchịkọta akụkọ W
Du Bois rịọrọ ka ọ kwaga New York ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ oge niile
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Ọktoba, e debere ya n'ọfịs Crisis, ebe ọ weghaara ọtụtụ ọrụ nhazi ngwa ngwa

Dị ka onye nchịkọta akwụkwọ, Fauset kwalitere ọrụ nke ọtụtụ ndị edemede a ma ama nke Harlem Renaissance, gụnyere Countee Cullen, Claude McKay, Jean Toomer, Nella Larsen, Georgia Douglas Johnson, Anne Spencer, George Schuyler, Arna Bontemps, na Langston Hughes
Fauset bụ onye mbụ bipụtara Hughes
Dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Brownies' Book, magazin ụmụaka nke The Crisis, ọ gụnyere ole na ole n'ime uri mbụ ya
N'akwụkwọ ncheta ya The Big Sea, Hughes dere, 'Jessie Fauset na The Crisis, Charles Johnson na Opportunity, na Alain Locke na Washington bụ ndị na-amụ nwa nke a na-akpọ New Negro Literature
E wezụga ịzụlite ọrụ nke ndị edemede ndị ọzọ nke oge a nke Afirika na America, Fauset bụkwa onye na-enye aka na The Crisis na The Brownies' Book
N'oge ya na The Crisis, o nyere uri na akụkọ mkpirikpi, yana akwụkwọ akụkọ, nsụgharị sitere na French nke ihe odide ndị edemede ojii si Europe na Africa, na ọtụtụ nchịkọta akụkọ
O bipụtakwara akụkọ banyere njem ya dị ukwuu
N'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama, Fauset gụnyere edemede ise, gụnyere 'Dark Algiers the White,' na-akọwa njem ọnwa isii ya na Laura Wheeler Waring gaa France na obodo Algeria na afọ 1925 na 1926
Mgbe afọ asatọ jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ, Fauset chọpụtara na esemokwu dị n'etiti ya na Du Bois na-emebi ha
Na Febụwarị, na afo 1927, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ya
E depụtara ya dị ka 'Onye nchịkọta akụkọ na-enye aka' n'ọnwa na-esote
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị magazin ahụ, Fauset lekwasịrị anya n'ide akwụkwọ akụkọ, ka ọ na-akwado onwe ya site na nkuzi
Site na afọ 1927 ruo 1944, ọ kụziri French na DeWitt Clinton High School na Bronx, ka ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ
N'etiti afọ 1924 na 1933, Fauset bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ anọ There is Confusion (1924), Plum Bun (1928), The Chinaberry Tree (1931), na Comedy, American Style (1933)
O kwenyere na akwụkwọ akụkọ T
Stribling bụ Birthright, nke onye ọcha dere banyere ndụ ndị isi ojii, enweghị ike igosipụta ndị ya n'ụzọ zuru ezu
Fauset chere na e nwere ụkọ ihe ngosi dị mma nke ndụ ndị Africa na America na akwụkwọ nke oge a
A kpaliri ya igosipụta ndụ ndị Africa America ma n'ụzọ ziri ezi, ma n'ezie, dịka o kwere mee, ma dee banyere ndụ ndị nọ n'etiti ọ maara dị ka onye gụrụ akwụkwọ
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji nyochaa nsogbu ndị dị ugbu a banyere njirimara n'etiti ndị Africa America, gụnyere nsogbu ndị metụtara nyocha obodo banyere ụcha akpụkpọ ahụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị agbụrụ na-agwakọta na ụfọdụ ndị nna Europe
Ọtụtụ Mbufe ahụ mere ka ọtụtụ ndị Africa America kwaga n'obodo mmepụta ihe; n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ, ndị mmadụ jiri mgbanwe a dị ka nnwere onwe ịnwale njirimara ọhụrụ

Ụfọdụ jiri akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ndị nna nna Europe na ọdịdị mee ka ọ dị ọcha, maka ịdị mfe ma ọ bụ uru nwa oge dịka ọmụmaatụ, iji nweta ọrụ ka mma na ụlọ ahịa ma ọ bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ma ọ bụ iji nweta ọrụ
Ndị ọzọ batara n'etiti ndị ọcha ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ ga-adịgide adịgide iji nweta ohere akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mgbe ụfọdụ na-ahapụ ndị ikwu na-acha oji n'azụ
Ndị edemede ndị ọzọ nke Harlem Renaissance nyochara mbipụta a na mgbakwunye na Fauset, onye nwere akpụkpọ anụ na-acha ọcha ma na-ahụ anya nke agbụrụ ngwakọta

Vashti Crutcher Lewis, n'otu edemede akpọrọ 'Mulatto Hegemony in the Novels of Jessie Redmon Fauset', na-atụ aro na akwụkwọ akụkọ Fauset na-egosi ihe akaebe nke usoro ndị isi na-acha uhie uhie na ndị isi ojii na-enwu gbaa na-enwe ihe ùgwù
Ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta na-ede akwụkwọ nwere mmasị na Fauset n'afọ ndị 1920
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, There is Confusion, bụ nke Alain Locke toro na mbipụta February 1924 nke Crisis

Locke chere na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ga- 'akara oge' n'ihi na o kwenyere na ọ bụ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ nke onye na-agụ akwụkwọ gụrụ akwụkwọ tụrụ anya ya ka ọ na-enwu ìhè na klas dị elu nke ndị isi ojii karịa ụdị 'onye na-eje ozi' nke a gosipụtara na akwụkwọ ndị gara aga

N'akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ nke June 1924 bụ Opportunity, prọfesọ Mahadum Howard Montgomery Gregory toro ọrụ Fausetʹs n'ihi na o chere na o mere ka 'ihe ndị ka mma' nke ndụ ndị Africa-America doo anya 'na ndị maara anyị naanị dị ka ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ, 'ndị nwanne nna', ma ọ bụ ndị omempụ'
Ọ bụ ezie na Fauset nwetara ọtụtụ nyocha dị mma na ọrụ edemede ya na 1920s, ọ na-enwekwa nzaghachi na-adịghị mma
Onye ọ bụla ejighị aka meghee ya nabata echiche ọhụrụ ya n'ihi na ọ megidere onyinyo ndị ọcha America nke ndị Africa America nọ n'etiti
Onye mbụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ hụrụ ihe odide There is Confusion jụrụ ya, na-ekwu na 'ndị ọcha na-agụ akwụkwọ anaghị atụ anya na ndị isi ojii ga-adị ka nke a'
N'agbanyeghị mkparịta ụka dị mgbagwoju anya banyere ọrụ Fausetī na 1920s, ka ọ na-erule 1930s ndị mmadụ kwụsịrị ikwu banyere ya wee ghọọ onye edemede echefuru echefu
Locke chere na ihe mere ndị mmadụ ji kwụsị ikwu banyere Fauset bụ n'ihi mgbanwe n'ihe odide n'ihi Great Depression na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ bụghị ruo mgbe afọ 1970 gasịrị, oge nke òtù ụmụ nwanyị, ka Fauset malitere ịja mma

N'afọ 1981, onye edemede Carolyn Wedin Sylvander dere akwụkwọ banyere Fauset, Jessie Redmon Fauset, Black American Writer, nke na-enyocha ma na-egosi ekele dị ukwuu maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, akụkọ mkpirikpi na uri

Ndị nkatọ ndị ọzọ dị ka Deborah McDowell kwetara na Fauset na edemede ya nke afọ 1986 'Jessie Fauset Onyeozi nke oge a nke Black Racial Pride' maka igosi 'ịmara akụkọ ọdịbendị ndị Africa America' na igosi otu esi eme ememe 'ọdịdị ojii'
McDowell na-ekwukwa na Fauset nọ n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị ojii n'oge mbụ n'ihi na na mgbakwunye na ilekwasị anya na njirimara agbụrụ, ọ na-enyocha 'ịmara ụmụ nwanyị'
A maara Fauset taa dị ka ihe dị mkpa na Harlem Renaissance
Prọfesọ akwụkwọ America na nke Africa America Ann duCille jiri Fauset tụnyere ndị edemede Harlem Renaissance ndị ọzọ dị ka Nella Larsen maka igosipụta ụmụ nwanyị n'ọrụ edemede ya
Jessie T
Pettway (amụrụ n'afọ 1929) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-ejikọta ya na otu Gee's Bend nkè ndị na-ese akwa
N'afọ 2006, ihe mkpuchi ya na ogidi ndị nwere eriri pụtara na stampụ ọrụ US Postal dị ka akụkụ nké usoro na-echeta ihe mkpuchi Gee's Bend
A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nké Art Institute of Chicago na Fine Arts Museums nke San Francisco
Nwanyị nwèrè ọtụtụ aha, e nyere Jessie T
Pettway aha JT
mgbè a mụrụ ya, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-akpọ ya aha njirimara ya, 'Bootnie,' ma ọ na-akpọ onwé ya 'Jessie,' mgbe niile n'aha ónyé nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị amasị ya
A mụrụ ya na Primrose, Alabama n'aka nné naanị ya, Channie Pettway
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ maara nna ya, Joe Benning, ma na-agafe ụlọ ya ugboro ugboro, ọ naghị arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu na ndụ ụmụnne ya
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obérè, ya na ụmụnne ya bi na nwanne nné ya nwanyị, Seebell Kennedy ('Little Sis'), na di ya, Alp Kennedy, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Ụbọchị ha dị ogologo ma jupụta n'ọrụ ụlọ tupu na mgbè ụlọ akwụkwọ gasịrị
Ugbo ha na-akụ ogho, ọka, peas, ahụekere, na poteto na-atọ ụtọ, yana ụdị akwụkwọ nri dị iche iche ha nọ n'ala nke ha màkà iji nweta ihe ha ga-eri
Ha zụkwara anụ ụlọ, dị ka ewu na ezì
Pettway gụsịrị akwụkwọ ruo na klas nke iri na otu
Ọ lụrụ Monroe Pettway ma ha abụọ zụlitere ụmụ nwanyị asaá na ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Mgbè arụchara ọrụ ugbo ahụ, nwanne nne ha Seebell ga-anọdụ ala ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ ma kụziere ha ịkpụcha na ịkwa akwa
Akpụkpọ ụkwụ mbụ Jessie bụ 'Eight Pointed Star'
Ọ malitere imecha ụkpụrụ n'onwe ya mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ

Mgbe niile na-eji ákwà na ihe ndị e nyèrè ya site n'aka ndị ọbọdọ ma ọ bụ ezinụlọ ya na Mobile, Alabama, Jessie chetara, 'Nwanne nne m nwèrè akwụkwọ ochie nke ụkpụrụ nke ọ na-eji eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ, mana enweghị mmasị na m na ụkpụrụ akwụkwọ
Enweghị m ike ịzụta ihe mara mma, n'ihi ya enweghị m ike ime ihe mara mma
' Ọ na-ahọrọkarị usoro 'Bricklayer' n'ihi na 'ị nwèrè ike ime ka ọ bụrụ ihe mara mma na ụdị akwa ochie ọ bụla'
Jessie Vihrog (19 Ọktoba 1906 - 1 Jenụwarị 1996) bụ onye Germany na-eme ihe nkiri nke a mụrụ na South Africa
Jessie Wallace Hughan (December 25, 1875 - April 10, 1955) bụ onye nkuzi America, onye na-eme ihe ike, na onye na-ahụ maka udo
N'oge ọ nọ na kọleji, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Alpha Omicron Pi, òtù mba maka ụmụ nwanyị mahadum
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere na ode - akwụkwọ mbụ nke War Resisters League, nke e guzobere n'afọ 1923
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na tiketi nke Socialist Party of America na steeti ya bụ New York
A mụrụ Jessie Wallace Hughan na ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Disemba , n'afọ 1875 na Brooklyn, New York
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ anọ Margaret na Samuel Hughan mụrụ, ndị sitere na ndị Scotland, ndị England, na ndị France
Nna ya bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego
Hughan gara ụlọ akwụkwọ grammar na Staten Island wee gaa Northfield Seminary, ụlọ akwụkwọ na-akwadebe kọleji Unitarian maka ụmụ agbọghọ dị na Northfield, Massachusetts
Hughan debara aha ya na Barnard College na New York City na 1894
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1897, ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ atọ ndị ọzọ guzobere otu mba ụwa Alpha Omicron Pi
N'afọ 1898, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, nweta nzere AB
ya, nke o dere edemede dị elu a na-ebipụtaghị na 'Recent Theories of Profits
' Nwa akwụkwọ magburu onwe ya, Hughan bụ onye otu Phi Beta Kappa, otu mba na-asọpụrụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Barnard, Hughan debara aha na Mahadum Columbia, nke dịkwa na New York City
N'ebe ahụ, Hughan nwetara nzere Masters of Arts na 1899, na-ede edemede akpọrọ 'The Place of Henry George in Economics,' na PhD
ya n' afọ 1910
Columbia University Press kwadoro edemede ya ma bipụta ya n'ụdị akwụkwọ dị ka The Present Status of Socialism in America, nke onye a ma ama a mụrụ na Britain bụ John Spargo dere mmeghe ya
Onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ azụmahịa mechara bipụta akwụkwọ ahụ n'okpuru aha e dezigharịrị ntakịrị
Hughan rụrụ ọrụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye nkuzi, na-akụzi n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na nke onwe ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Columbia na nzere AM
ya n'afọ 1899
O bu ụzọ kụzie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Naugatuck, Connecticut na White Plains, New York tupu ọ laghachi New York City na mbido afọ 1900 iji mezue nzere doctorate ya
N'ịgbaso ọrụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, ọ kụziri n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na New York City, karịsịa na Brooklyn
N'afọ 1920, Hughan bụ onye na-ahụ maka Ngalaba Bekee na Textile High School, ọkwá ọ nọgidere na ya ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ ahụ na 1945
Jessie Wallace Hughan sonyeere Socialist Party of America (SPA) n'afọ 1907

Ebe bụ isi Hughan nọ n'òtù ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ dịka onye ọrụ nke Intercollegiate Socialist Society (ISS), otu nwere onwe ya nke onye edemede Upton Sinclair guzobere na 1905 iji nye ebe isiokwu ndị metụtara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, pro na con, site n'aka ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum gafee America

A họpụtara Hughan ka ọ bụrụ onye isi kọmitii nke ISS na 1907 ma rụọ ọrụ n'ụzọ gara n'ihu na ikike ahụ ruo na njedebe nke nzukọ ahụ na 1921, na-aga n'ihu n'ụdị yiri nke ahụ na nzukọ nọchiri ya, League for Industrial Democracy (LID) ruo 1925
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ISS site na 1920 ruo 1921
Ndị ọzọ a na-akpọ ndị isi okenye nke ISS n'oge a gụnyere Morris Hillquit, JG
Phelps Stokes, Harry W
Laidler, yana nna ntọala Upton Sinclair
N'afọ 1913, ISS nyere Hughan ọrụ ide akwụkwọ banyere ụkpụrụ nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya ka ọ bụrụ ederede maka ọmụmụ na mkparịta ụka site na isi dị iche iche nke nzukọ ahụ

Mbipụta ahụ, akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Facts of Socialism, bụ ederede nwere mmetụta n'etiti ndị ụbụrụ na-eto eto sonyere n'ọrụ Intercollegiate Socialist Society, otu nke gụnyere onye na-eme udo Devere Allen, onye nta akụkọ Heywood Broun, onye nchọpụta na onye ọrụ American Civil Liberties Union Robert W
Dunn, ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Herbert Feis, na onye mgbasa ozi Walter Lippmann
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ, Jessie Wallace Hughan bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa ọha na eze na tiketi nke Socialist Party of America
Oge mbụ ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bịara na 1915 maka Alderman na 1915
Ọ bụ ma eleghị anya naanị asọmpi ọ gbara ọsọ nke o nwere ohere a na-atụle iji merie

Hughan gbara ọsọ maka ọfịs ọ bụghị na-ezube imeri, kama ọ bụ ụzọ isi kwalite echiche ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nye ọha na eze na itinye nrụgide na ndị ọrụ a họpụtara ahọpụta ka ha sonye ma tinye echiche sitere na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Socialist Party
N'ihi ya, mmeri na ntuli aka enweghị obi ụtọ na Hughan, kama ọ na-agba ọsọ maka usoro ọfịs ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-arịwanye elu
Hughan gbara ọsọ na tiketi Socialist maka New York State Treasurer na 1918
N'afọ 1920, ọ gbara ọsọ maka Lieutenant Governor nke New York dị ka onye Socialist

Afọ 1922 bụ afọ mbụ Hughan bidoro maka US Congress, ọfịs ọ choro ugboro anọ na 1922 na New York 16th District; na 1924 na New York 17th District; n'afọ 1928 na New York 15th District; nakwa na 1934 na New York 15
N'afọ 1926, ọ kwụsịtụrụ na mkpọsa ndị omeiwu ya iji malite itinye akwụkwọ maka ntuli aka na US Senate site na New York
Hughan gbakwara ọsọ maka Nzukọ nke Steeti New York na 1927, 1932, na 1938

Hughan yiri ka ọ hapụghị Socialist Party na akụkụ ya a na-akpọ 'Old Guard' na 1936 iji sonye na Social Democratic Federation, kama ịnọgide na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nye onye na-eme udo Norman Thomas n'agbanyeghị na SPA banyere n'agha dị iche iche ka afọ iri nke afọ 1930 bịara na njedebe
N'ụzọ na-adọrọ mmasị, ọ dịghịkwa onye ọ gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa ọzọ mgbe 1938
Onye ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe, Hughan bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo nke nọrọ ndụ ya niile na-alụ ọgụ maka mgbasa nke militarism na America
Hughan sonyeere Frances M
Witherspoon na Tracy Mygatt n'ịmepụta ọtụtụ òtù udo na-ejikọta pacifism, Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ọchịchị
N'adịghị ka ndị ọzọ na-emegide agha, Hughan ji ọgụgụ isi mepụta ọnọdụ dị mgbagwoju anya nke ndị na-ahụ maka udo
Tupu ndị agha US etinye aka na Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ mara ndị na-akwado agha aka, dị ka Graham Stokes
Mgbe agha tiwapụrụ n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1914, Hughan chere na a kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 1915, ọ haziri Anti-Enlistment League, nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ n'ụlọ ya

Hughan na ndị enyi ya nwere ike ịnakọta mbinye aka nke ihe dị ka ndị ikom 3,500 na nkwupụta na-emegide ịbanye n'ọrụ agha iji gosipụta ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America na enweghị mmasị nke agha Europe
Ọ bụ onye na-emegide mkpọsa 'Preparedness' nke pụtara na mba ahụ na 1915 na 1916
Ntinye nke America n'agha ahụ n'ọnwa Eprel, n'afọ 1917 gosipụtara njedebe nke Anti-Enlistment League, na gọọmentị weghaara faịlụ na ndekọ nke nzukọ ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na a chụpụghị ya n'ọkwa nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze maka echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, a kpọrọ Hughan n'anya ụfọdụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị New York
N'afọ 1919, a kpọrọ Hughan n'ihu Kọmitii Lusk nke Nzukọ nke New York State, kọmitii pụrụ iche gbakọtara iji nyochaa ma kọọ akụkọ banyere radicalism na steeti New York
Kọmitii ahụ jụrụ ya asambodo nke àgwà na iguzosi ike n'ihe n'ihi na ọ gbakwunyere okwu 'Nrubeisi a na-eru eru mgbe niile site na iwu nke akọ na uche' na iyi ndị nkuzi steeti

Ka e mesịrị na 1919, aha Hughan pụtara na nke Jane Addams, onye ọsụ ụzọ ụlọ obibi na onye nta akụkọ nwere nnwere onwe Oswald Garrison Villard na ndepụta nke iri isii na abụọ 'ndị dị ize ndụ' nyere Kọmitii Overman nke Senate US, òtù ndị omeiwu mbụ a na-ebo ebubo nyocha nke radicalism na United States
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị, Hughan duziri mkpọsa iji hazie òtù na-eguzogide agha na United States
N'ime afọ 1920, ọ debanyere aha ọtụtụ ndị na-emegide agha, kwuo ọtụtụ okwu, ma dee akwụkwọ nta na traktị banyere iji ọrụ na-adịghị eme ihe ike
Ọ hazikwara ngagharị iwe ọha na eze dị iche iche megide agha na militarism, gụnyere ụfọdụ New York 'NO More War' parades
Hughan nọrọ na National Council ma bụrụ onye otu New York Executive Committee nke Fellowship of Reconciliation, otu okpukpe na-ahụ maka udo, site ná afo 1920 ruo 1923
N'afọ 1923, o guzobere otu ọhụrụ na-emegide ndị agha, War Resisters League (WRL), ma duzie ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ site n'oge e guzobere ya
Ebumnuche dị n'azụ WRL bụ inye usoro nhazi maka ndị na-emegide militarism ndị na-enweghị ntọala okpukpe ọdịnala maka nkwenkwe pacifist ha
Òtù ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka udo kwadoro nzukọ WRL, gụnyere Fellowship of Reconciliation, Women's Peace Society, na Women's Paz Union

N'afọ 1938, mgbe agha ọzọ na-aga n'ihu na Europe, Hughan haziri otu nzukọ nche anwụ ọhụrụ a maara dị ka Kọmitii United Pacifist, nke e mere iji hazie ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị otu dị iche iche na-eme udo
O nyere aka n'ịhazi ngagharị iwe ọha na eze, gụnyere usoro 'No More War' na New York City, ọ bụkwa onye na-emegide nloghachi na ndị agha na 1940
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke War Resisters League n'ihu ruo na njedebe nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ n' afọ 1945, n'oge ahụ ọ kwụsịrị ịghọ 'Secretary Honorary' nke otu ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Kọmitii Na-achịkwa WRL
Jessie Wallace Hughan lara ezumike nká na 1945
Ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na War Resisters League dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Nchịkwa nke nzukọ ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Eprel 10, 1955
Ọ dị afọ 79 n'oge ọ nwụrụ
Nwanne ya nwanyị Evelyn Hughan, onye ya na ya biri n'oge ndụ ya niile, yana nwanne ya nwanyị Marjorie Hughan Rockwell na ụmụ anọ Marjorie, onye Jessie na ya dị nnọọ nso, hapụrụ ya
Nzukọ nke Hughan guzobere, War Resisters League, yana nzukọ ọ nyeere aka guzobe, Alpha Omicron Pi fraternity, ha abụọ na-aga n'ihu dị ka ụlọ ọrụ dị mkpa ma guzobe na narị afọ nke 21
Òtù abụọ a na-echeta aha Hughan na ọrụ ya na nhazi ha
Alpha Omicron Pi na-enye onyinye a maara dị ka Jessie Wallace Hughan Cup kwa afọ na isi nke nzukọ ahụ
Jessy Kimbangi (French pronunciation ), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Jessy Matador, bụ onye na-agụ egwu French-Congolese
Matador malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba egwú n'afọ 2001
O mechara sonye n'òtù 'Les cœurs brisés' (The Broken Hearts) bụ ndị ya na ha gara United States, Democratic Republic of the Congo, United Kingdom, Italy na Canada
N'afọ 2005, o kpebiri ịme pụta otu nke ya a na-akpọ 'La Sélésao' nke ndị otu Dr
Love, Linho na Benkoff mejupụtara
Otu ndị otu ahụ guzo bekwara mbipụta mbụ nke otu Magic System
Na ngwụcha afọ 2007, ha bịanyere aka na Oyas Records tupu ha abịanye aka na Wagram Records n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2008
Ha wepụtara egwu mbụ ha 'Décalé Gwada' na June 2008, na aghọ otu n'ime egwu nke oge okpomọkụ ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2008, otu ahụ wepụtara abọm Afrikan New Style, ngwakọta egwu nke mmetụta Africa na Caribbean na ụda obodo
Ụdị ahụ gụnyere mmetụta nke zouk, dancehall, reggae, hip hop, Coupé-Décalé, ndombolo na kuduro
Na Disemba 2008, ha wepụtara egwu nke abụọ ha 'Mini Kawoulé'
Na 19 Febụwarị 2010, France Télévisions mara ọkwa na Matador ga anọchite anya France na Eurovision Song Contest 2010, nke a ga-eme na 29 Mee 2010 na Oslo, Norway na egwu 'Allez Ola Olé'
Jessy Matador nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na abụọ na nke ikpeazụ, nke bụ otu n'ime nsonaazụ kachasị mma nke France na afọ 2000

Jisọs Kraịst bụ onye nkwusa na onye ndú okpukpe ndị Juu na narị afọ mbụ
Onye Jew bu onye bi na ekpere chi ana-kpo Judaism
Ndi na bu ndi agadi umu Abraham, bu nde mbu
Jewel Plummer Cobb (January 17, 1924 - Jenụwarị 1, 2017) bụ ọkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ America, onye nyocha ọrịa kansa, prọfesọ, dean, na onye nchịkwa agụmakwụkwọ
O nyere aka na ngalaba nyocha ọrịa kansa site n'ịmụ ọgwụgwọ maka melanoma
Cobb bụ onye na-akwado maka ịbawanye nnochite anya ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ akwụkwọ nke agba na mahadum, ma o mepụtara mmemme iji kwado ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere mmasị ịchụso ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Jewel Isadora Plummer bụ naanị nwa Frank V
Plummer, na Carriebel (Cole) Plummer
Ndị mụrụ ya abụọ na-ebibu na Washington DC Nne ya, Carriebel, chọtara ọrụ dị ka agụmakwụkwọ anụ ahụ na onye nkuzi ịgba egwu nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji nwere BA na ịgba egwu ntụgharị
Ọ banyeghachiri mahadum n'otu oge Jewel debara aha ya nke mere ka ma nne na nwa nwanyị nweta akara ugo mmụta n'otu afọ ahụ
Nna Jewel, Frank, bụ onye isi ojii mbụ nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Dọkịta nke Ọgwụ na Mahadum Cornell, ghọrọ dọkịta ọkachamara na dermatology
Nna nna Plummer bụ ohu a tọhapụrụ onwe ya nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard n'afọ 1898 na-ebi ndụ dị ka onye na-ere ọgwụ
Nzụlite Cobb nwere oke akụ na ụba nyere ya ohere nchọgharị ọgụgụ isi n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Site na ọba akwụkwọ sayensị nke nna ya ruo na agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ agbụrụ dị iche iche, Cobb zụlitere mmasị n'ịmụ ihe site na nwata
N'agbanyeghị na ọ tụrụ anya ịghọ onye nkuzi mmụta anụ ahụ, mmasị ya na sayensị gbasiri ike n'afọ nke abụọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ka ọ na-ele anya na microscope na klas biology
Mmasị a bụ onye nkuzi biology ya gbara ume, akwụkwọ gbasara microorganisms dị ka Paul DeKruif's The Microbe Hunters masịrị ya
Cobb gbara akwụkwọ na Mahadum Michigan N'afọ 1942, mana, enweghị afọ ojuju maka ụlọ ndị kewapụrụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ America America na Michigan, ọ gafere na kọleji Talladega na Alabama
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Talladega anabataghị kredit mbufe, na-amanye Cobb ịmalite ọzọ
N'agbanyeghị nke a, ọ rụchara ọrụ nkuzi ya n'ime afọ atọ karịa ọkọlọtọ anọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BA na bayoloji n'afọ 1944 wee bụrụ onye otu Alpha Kappa Alpha sorority
Na mbụ a jụrụ Cobb mkpakọrịta nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na bayoloji na Mahadum New York, ebubo na ọ bụ n'ihi agbụrụ ya, mana enyere ya mkpakọrịta mgbe a gbachara ajụjụ ọnụ
O nwetara MS ya na Mahadum New York n'afọ 1947, yana PhD ya na-elekwasị anya na physiology cell n'afọ 1950
Akwụkwọ edemede ya, Mechanisms of Pigment Formation, nyochara nhazi nke melanin pigment granules in vitro site na iji enzyme tyrosinase
N' 1949, a họpụtara ya onye nyocha onwe ya na Woods Hole Marine Biological Laboratory
N'afọ 2021, obodo ahụ degharịrị aha okporo ụzọ dị nso na Laboratory Marine Biological 'Jewel Cobb Road' iji sọpụrụ Cobb
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị PhD ya, Cobb ghọrọ onye nkuzi nkuzi bayoloji na Mahadum New York ka ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ maka National Cancer Institute na Harlem Hospital (1950-1952)
Site na 1952-1954 Cobb bụ onye nkuzi na mmewere ahụ na Chicago na Mahadum Illinois College of Medicine ebe ọ kuziri histology

N’oge na-adịghị anya ka nke ahụ gasịrị, Cobb laghachiri na New York, na-eje ozi dị ka onye osote prọfesọ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike gụsịrị akwụkwọ na NYU (1955–60), ebe ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nleta na Hunter College (1956–57)
Site n'afọ 1960-69, Cobb were n'ọrụ dị ka onye isi ụlọ nyocha bayoloji na kọleji Sarah Lawrence
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, o mere nyocha maka ndị sonyere na National Science Foundation
Cobb jere ozi dị ka onye prọfesọ nke Zoology yana Dean of Arts and Sciences na Kọleji Connecticut site na Julaị 1969 ruo Julaị 1976
Cobb bụ onye isi ojii mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme kọleji
Mgbe ọ nabatara ọkwa ahụ na Kọleji Connecticut, o kwuru, sị 'Nke a bụ kọleji na mgbanwe, na-aga n'ihu n'ụzọ na-akpali akpali
Anyị chọrọ ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị nkuzi ojii ka ha nyere anyị aka ịhazi na ime atụmatụ ọhụrụ anyị nwere obi ike'
N'oge ya na Connecticut College, o mejuputa atumatu Black Scholarship nke nyere aka ego ma ọ dịkarịa ala iri aNọ Black undergraduates na kọleji
Nkuzi nkuzi a bu n’obi ịbawanye mkpa enyemaka ego maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere agba
Ọrụ a kpaliri mmemme ndị yiri ya na mahadum ndị ọzọ
Cobb guzobekwara mmemme Pre-Medical Post-Baccalaureate nke afọ ise, nke nyere enyemaka ego na ohere mmụta maka ụmụ akwụkwọ pere mpe na kọleji chọrọ ịchụso ọrụ na ọgwụ ma ọ bụ dentistry
Enyere ụmụ akwụkwọ ihe enyemaka maka nkuzi na ndụmọdụ
Naanị afọ ise ka emechara mmemme a, a nabatara ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị a na mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ, nke gụnyere, Yale, Georgetown, na Mahadum Connecticut
Mgbe ọ nọ na Connecticut, Dr
Cobb jere ozi dị ka onye otu Lawrence na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ncheta dị na New London, na mgbakwunye na ịbụ onye a họpụtara ahọpụta onye isi oche nke American Council on Education, (1973-1976)

Dr Cobb, dị ka onye so na National Science Board na onye na-enye ndụmọdụ na Otu Amerika maka nganihu nke Sayensị, onye isi oche ogbako nke ụmụ nwanyị iri atọ pere mpe bụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị iji nye ndụmọdụ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ, ndị na-eme iwu na gọọmentị US maka otu esi ewebata ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ
agba n'ime sayensị
E bipụtara akụkọ ahụ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu dị ka The Double Bind The Price of Being a Minority Woman in Science
N'ihi ọtụtụ ọrụ, Cobb rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ awa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ laabu n'isi ụtụtụ na-esochi ọrụ nchịkwa tupu izi ihe n'ehihie
Na July 1976, Cobb kpebiri ịhapụ Connecticut College wee bụrụ onye isi na prọfesọ nke sayensị sayensị na Douglass Residential College na Mahadum Rutgers
Mkpebi Cobb ịpụ abụghị ebum n'obi, kama ọ gbadoro ụkwụ na mmasị ịbụ onye nchịkwa oge niile maka ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị Rutgers
Ihe kacha egbu azụ Cobb na ịhapụ kọleji metụtara enweghị ike ịga n'ihu nyocha ruo otu ogo na ọrụ ọhụrụ ya
Mgbe ọ nọ na Douglass, Rockefeller Foundation họpụtara Cobb (ya na ndị America itoolu) ka ha sonye na ogbako zuru ụwa ọnụ na Ịtali gbasara ọdịnihu agụmakwụkwọ ka elu maka ụmụ nwanyị
Na mgbakwunye, na Eprel 1978, Onye isi ala Carter họpụtara Cobb ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Board of Scholarships Ofesi, nke a kacha mara amara dị ka nzukọ na-ahụ maka ikpebi ntozu Fulbright
A họpụtara Cobb Onye isi oche nke Mahadum California State, Fullerton n'afọ 1981 ebe ọ malitere imeziwanye akụrụngwa ụlọ akwụkwọ site na mmalite nke oge ya

Cobb nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'inweta ego maka owuwu nke Engineering na Kọmputa Science Building nke e ji ego steeti wuo, yana Ruby Gerontology Center, nke bụ ụlọ mbụ n'ime akụkọ ihe mere eme kọleji nke a na-enweta site na onyinye nkeonwe
O nwetakwara ego maka iwu ụlọ obibi ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ na kampos
Emechara ụlọ a ka emechara aha maka nsọpụrụ ya
Cobb kpakọrịtakwara nkwekọrịta ya na Marriott Corporation na obodo Fullerton maka ịgbazinye ụlọ iji wuo ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, na-enye ya ohere iji ego dịnụ maka iwu ụlọ egwuregwu ogige
Ọtụtụ n'ime atụmatụ maka Sayensị laabu center, nke a na-akpọ ugbu a Dan Black Hall, mere mgbe Cobb bụ onyeisi oche
Na Fullerton, ụfọdụ ndị otu ngalaba ekereghị mmasị Cobb na nyocha na iwughachi ụlọ, na-ejide na isi ọrụ nke kọleji ahụ bụ ịkụziri ihe
Mkpebi ya ịbanye n'ime nkwekọrịta iji wuo ụlọ nkwari akụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ na ịgbakwunye ogige satịlaịtị na mpaghara ndịda Orange County si otú a mee nkatọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Cobb wetara okwu abụọ a na ngalaba Senate maka ntuli aka
Ugboro abụọ ahụ, a kwadoro mkpebi ya
N'afọ 1990, ọ dị afọ 66, a manyere ya ịla ezumike nká n'okpuru iwu nyere W
Ann Reynolds, Chancellor nke California State University System, na-achọ ka ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ niile dị afọ iri isii na ise ma ọ bụ karịa ka ha lara ezumike nká

Na nzaghachi na ọpụpụ ya, Julian Foster, onye ndu ụlọ akwụkwọ na onye ọkà mmụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama, kwuputara mmesi ike Cobb na nyocha na agụmakwụkwọ ka ọ bụrụ ntinye aka ya kacha mkpa na Cal State Fullerton
N'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ lara ezumike nká, a kpọrọ Cobb aha Prọfesọ Nlekọta Mahadum California State maka ngalaba Los Angeles ya

N'afọ 1991, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nyocha na Southern California Sayensi na Engineering ACCESS Center and Network, nke na-enyere ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị sitere na enweghị nsogbu na-achụso ọdịnihu na ngalaba sayensị na injinia
N'afọ 2001, Cobb ghọrọ onye nyocha isi maka Mmemme Sayensị Teknụzụ Injinia (STEP) Up for Youth—ASCEND project na Mahadum California State, Los Angeles
Akpọrọkwa ya aha wee jee ozi dịka onye otu Board of Trustees Caltech
Nnyocha nke Cobb gụnyere ọrụ na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti melanin na mmebi akpụkpọ ahụ, yana mmetụta nke homonụ, ìhè ultraviolet, na ọgwụ chemotherapy na nkewa cell
Cobb chọpụtara na methotrexate dị irè n'ịgwọ ụfọdụ ọrịa cancer akpụkpọ anụ, ọrịa cancer akpa ume, na leukemia nwata

A ka na-eji ọgwụ a eme ihe na chemotherapy taa na-enye ọgwụgwọ ọrịa cancer dị iche iche na ọrịa autoimmune nke gụnyere ọrịa ara ara, ọrịa isi na olu, ọrịa cancer akpa ume, leukemia, na ụfọdụ ụdị lymphoma
Cobb bụ onye mbụ bipụtara data na actinomycin D na ikike ya ime ka mbelata nke nucleoli na nucleus nke sel mmadụ nkịtị na nke ọjọọ

O nwetara onyinye $5,000 sitere na American Cancer Society ka ọ gaa n'ihu na nyocha ya na 'Direct Hormone Action to Human and Mouse Melanomas in Tissue Culture' Onyinye a kwadoro nyocha ya na nyocha sara mbara nke uto cell pigmenti na ọdịiche dị na melanomas mmadụ na òké
Nkwado ndị ọzọ maka nyocha ọrịa kansa sitere na mkpakọrịta post-doctoral ya, onyinye nyocha sitere na Damon Runyon, National Science Foundation, National Cancer Institute, na Ọrụ Ahụike Ọha
Cobb bụ akụkụ nke United States International Cancer Congress na London (1958) na Moscow (1962) wee jee ozi na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ na Mohegan Community College
Enyere ya National Institute of Health Fellowship na ọnụ $68,000, ebe ọ nọrọ ọnwa asaa na Naples, Italy na-aga n'ihu na nyocha uto cell na International Laboratory of Genetics and Biophysics
N'ime oge ọrụ ya niile, ya na ndị nchọpụta ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-arụkọ ọrụ, gụnyere oncologist Jane C
Wright, Grace Antikajian, na Dorothy Walker Jones
Ndị ndụmọdụ ya kacha emetụta bụ prọfesọ banyere nje bacteria James R
Hayden na prọfesọ biochemistry ya bụ MJ Kopac
N'ịkwado mmezu nyocha ya, a họpụtara Cobb na Institute of Medicine na National Academy of Sciences n'afọ 1974
Ọ bụkwa onye so na National Science Board site na 1974 ruo 1980
Akpọrọ Cobb osote onye isi oche nke Board maka 21st Century Foundation, raara onwe ya nye n'ịkwado mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ojii na-ekwu okwu na obodo ojii
Mmemme nke nzukọ ahụ hibere gụnyere mmepe akụ na ụba, agụmakwụkwọ na obodo na ebumnuche nke imepụta ohere maka ndị agba
Ọ bụkwa onye òtù American Association for the Advancement of Science, nke kwadoro ma ndị inyom na ndị na-agba agba n'ọhịa
Cobb bụ otu n'ime mmadụ asaa nke Oakland Museum Association's Cultural and Ethnic Affairs ghọtara maka ntinye aka ya na sayensị na/ma ọ bụ teknụzụ
Ihe ngosi ihe ngosi nka nwere olile anya ịbawanye nnochite anya nta na sayensị site n'igosipụta mmezu nke ndị agba agba, gụnyere ọtụtụ nchọpụta Cobb
Dị ka onye isi okwu na mmalite 1971 Wheaton College mmalite, Cobb kpọrọ oku maka njikọ n'etiti Women's Liberation Movement na Black Liberation Movement
Ọ kpọkuru maka nha nhata nke ụmụ nwanyị, kagbuo iwu ite ime, na ịchọ nlekọta ọha na eze karịsịa
Ọtụtụ n'ime atumatu na mmemme Cobb bidoro n'oge ọrụ nchịkwa ya na-ewere ọnọdụ na akwụkwọ 1979 ya, Filters for Women in Science, ebe o kwuputara nchegbu banyere nnọchite nwanyị na sayensị na injinia

Site na ntụnyere jikọtara mmasị ya maka sayensị na ọchịchọ maka ịha nhatanha, Cobb kwuru na njirimara nke nzacha na-agafe na nzacha na-ekpebi n'ụzọ bụ isi n'ogo nke pores, nke o jikọtara ya na njedebe nke ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na sayensị
Mkpesa Cobb n'inye akụrụngwa na mmemme iji mee ka ndị pere mpe nọchite anya na kọleji ọrụ ya na-akọwa ihe nketa ya na mpụga ụlọ nyocha
Onye bụbu nwa akwụkwọ, Timothy Yarboro, kwuru, sị, “Agaraghị m abụ dọkịta
N’ihi ya, amaara m na ọ ga-ekwe omume”
Cobb biri na Maplewood, New Jersey, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 1, 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 92
Ọ mụrụ naanị otu nwa ya, Jonathan, onye ọkà mmụta redio nke ọkachamara n'ihe onyonyo magnetik

Jewel Cianeh Taylor (née Howard; amụrụ na 17 Jenụwarị na afọ 1963) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Liberia nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka osote onye isi ala nke iri atọ nke Liberia
Ọ lụrụ onye agha a mara ikpe na onye bụbu onye isi ala Charles Taylor (onye ọ lụrụ na afọ 1997, mana o mechara gbaa alụkwaghịm na afọ 2006) ma bụrụkwa First Lady nke Liberia n'oge ọ bụ onye isi ala
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara Jewel Taylor ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Liberia maka Bong County dị ka onye otu National Patriotic Party
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ahụike na Ọdịmma Ọha na Eze nke Senate na Gender, Women and Children

Mgbe di ya bụ onye isi ala, Taylor nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa gọọmentị na gọọmentị Liberia, gụnyere osote gọvanọ nke National Bank of Liberia (onye bu ụzọ na Central Bank of Liberia ugbu a), onye isi oche nke Agriculture Cooperative and Development Bank (ACDB) na Mortgage Financing Underwriter nke First Union National Bank
Na mgbakwunye, o lekwasịrị anya na agụmakwụkwọ, ahụike na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Taylor nwere akara ugo mmụta na ụlọ akụ na bachelors abụọ na ụlọ akụ akụ na akụ na ụba
Ọ debanyere aha ya ugbu a na mmemme MBA na Mahadum Cuttington na Liberia
Na 21 Disemba, na afọ 2011, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Louise Arthur Grimes School of Law nke Mahadum Liberia nke steeti

Ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị, esemokwu ọha na eze bilitere na Bong County banyere nsọpụrụ a na-ekwu na e nyere ya; a mara ọkwa na ọ bụ onye ọhụrụ nwere aha 'Madam Suakoko', aha nsọpụrụ nke Bong County na-echeta onye aha nke Suakoko District, mana ndị otu ahụ e chere na ha nyere ya aha ahụ malitere ịgọnahụ na nzukọ ahụ nke o nyere ya, na-ekwu n'ezie nzukọ ahụ bụ nzukọ iji nyere ndị bi na mpaghara ahụ merie esemokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, Taylor nwara iwebata iwu n'ime ndị omeiwu Liberia nke ga-eme ka omume nwoke idina nwoke bụrụ mpụ mbụ na-ebu ntaramahụhụ ọnwụ dị ka ntaramahụjụ kachasị
E nyeghị iwu ahụ mgbe Onye isi ala Ellen Johnson Sirleaf mere ka o doo anya na ọ gaghị abịanye aka na iwu ọ bụla dị otú ahụ
N'afọ 2017, George Weah họọrọ Jewel dị ka onye ya na ya na-agba ọsọ na tiketi Coalition (CDC) e guzobere ọhụrụ
N'ịgbaso ọsọ na ngwụcha afọ 2017, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ osote onye isi ala nke Liberia mgbe pati ya meriri ntuli aka ahụ
N'afọ 2020, ọ butere ọrịa COVID-19 ma buru ya gaa Ghana maka ọgwụgwọ
N'ime nde isii ndị Juu e gburu n'oge Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ, nde abụọ bụ ụmụnwanyị
N'agbata afọ 1941 nakwa n'afọ 1945, a tụrụ ụmụnwanyị ndị Juu mkpọrọ n'ogige ịta ahụhụ ndị Nazi ma ọ bụ zoo iji zere njide ndị Nazi n'okpuru ọchịchị Adolf Hitler na mba Germany
A na-emegbu ha n'ụzọ mmekọahụ, dinaa ha n'ike, na-akparị ha ihe, na-eti ha ihe, ma jiri ha mee nnwale ụmụ mmadụ ndị Nazi
Ụmụnwanyị ndị Juu nwere ọrụ dị ukwuu ma dị iche na ndị na-eguzogide na ndị otu
Dị ka onye edemede Joan Ringelheim si kwuo, ụmụnwanyị gosipụtara omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'ogige ịta ahụhụ karịa ụmụnwoke ibe ha, n'ihi àgwà ha pụrụ iche
Otú ọ dị, ụmụnwoke kewapụtakwara nkwado nke mmekọrịta nke ọha n'ogige ndị ahụ
Ajụjụ ọnụ nke onye lanarịrị Holocaust aha ya bụ Rose kọwara nkekọ ụmụnwanyị ahụ guzobere

Ụmụnwanyị ndị Juu n'oge Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ bụ ndị nwere ike imetọ mmekọahụ site n'aka ndị Nazi jidere ha E mebiri ụmụnwanyị ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ iri asatọ (80) ozugbo ha banyere dị ka 'igbu egbugbu, iwepụ ntutu isi ha, mwakpo nke oghere ahụ ha' bụ akụkụ nke usoro mmebi, mmechuihu, na ime ha dịka ngwa ahịa
' Ikike ịmụ nwa nke ụmụnwanyị nwere mmetụta na-adịghị mma n'ihi ọnọdụ mgbukpọ
Ọtụtụ ụmụnwanyị lanarịrị Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ kwuru na ha malitere amenorrhea, nke belatara ohere ha ịmụ ụmụ 82 Ndina n'ike bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ihe ize ndụ ụmụ nwanyị chere ihu na Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ
A na-edina ha n'ike mgbe ụfọdụ, wee gbuo ha 83 A kọrọ na otu onye ọrụ SS 'nwere omenala nke iguzo n'ọnụ ụzọ
ma nwee mmetụta nke akụkụ nzuzo nke ụmụ agbọghọ na-abanye na gas bunker
E nwekwara ihe atụ nke ụmụnwoke SS nke ọkwa niile na-agbanye mkpịsị aka ha n'ime ike ụmụagbọghọ mara mma

A kọrọ na '50%-80% nke ndị agha SS na ndị uwe ojii na-arụ ọrụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ mba Europe bụ ndị ikpe mara maka mwakpo mmekọahụ na ụmụnwanyị ndị Juu,' ọ bụghị naanị maka obi ụtọ mmekọahụ kamakwa iji chịkwaa ma mee ka ha ghara ịdị mmadụ
Nke a bụ n'agbanyeghị iwu ndị Nazi nke machibidoro mmekọahụ n'etiti agbụrụ ndị Germany na ndị Juu nke a na-ata ahụhụ site na mkpọrọ ma ọ bụ ọnwụ
E nwere oge nke ndị otu SS ebe a na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị ndị Juu na-enweghị nchebe ugboro ugboro ruo mgbe ha dara n'ala na-agba ọbara

Jhalobia Recreation Park and Garden bụ ogige nkwọrí-akụ nwere ọtụtụ ebumnuche nke nwere ogige ntorobịa na ogige ntụziaka dị na Ikeja, Lagos
E guzobere ya n'afọ 1988 nke mbụ dị ka ebe a na-atụfu ihe mkpofu tupu a gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ogige ntụrụndụ
Jhalobia Recreation Park and Garden bụ nke nwada Mrs Veronica Adepoju guzobere n'afọ 1998
E bu ụzọ malite ya dị ka ebe a na-atụfu ihe mkpofu na ebe a na'ere ájá, ebe a na na-atụ ihe mkpofu, tupu e mesịa gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ogige ntụrụndụ
Kemgbe ahụ, ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ esila n'ogige ntụrụntụ gaa n'oghere ntụrụndaka mara mma
Ogige nkwọrí-akụ ahụ dị na ngalaba iri isii na asatọ nke Murtala Muhammad Airport road, n'etiti Hajj Camp na Ajao Estate na Ikeja, Lagos State, Nigeria
A na-eji okooko osisi mara mma nke ahụ, bụ ihe ndị na-adọrọ mmasị na ọhụụ mara mma chọọ ogige ahụ mma mma

Carlos Jhilmar Lora Saavedra (amụrụ na 24 Ọktoba 2000), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Jhilmar Lora, bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ ama ama Peruvian nke na-egwu egwu azụ nri maka Peruvian Primera División club Sporting Cristal na otu mba Peru
A mụrụ Lora na October 24, 2000 na Callao
N'ịbụ onye tolitere na ezinụlọ na-ahụ n'anya football, 'Jhil' malitere inwe mmasị na egwuregwu ahụ site na nwata, na-egwu egwu mgbe niile na mpaghara Boterín
Mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọgbakọ Alianza Lima dị na Liceo Naval Capitan de Navío Germán Astete, nke dị na mpaghara La Perla, nkeji iri site n'ụlọ ya, ebe Nill Gonzáles zụrụ ya
Mgbe e mesịrị, Bruno Ferreira zụrụ ya na 2013 Prọfesọ Hitzvan Tazayco nabatara ya
Onye na-akwado ndụ Sporting Cristal, Lora sonyeere klọb Lima mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
N'ime afọ asatọ ọ na-egwuri egwu maka ndị obere, ọ meriri ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ asọmpi ọ bụla nke obere na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nke a na-apụghị imeri na otu ndị ntorobịa
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị egwuregwu ahụ bụ nnọọ ọrụ aka
Ọ nwere obi ụtọ banyere Jhilmar n'ihi ọnọdụ ndị ọ na-egosi, n'ihi na n'oge ahụ, ọ pụtaghị na mberede ma na mberede n'oge ahụ, onye na-aga n'ihu ma ọ bụ midfielder pụtara
N'akụkụ nke ya, Conrad Flores, onye duziri ya na mgbawa mgbawa na sub-20 nke Sporting Cristal kwusiri ike na Jhilmar Lora emeghị egwuregwu dị ka akara ziri ezi kama na ọnọdụ ọzọ
'Na mmalite ọ bụ onye azụ azụ na Benjamin Villalta bụ azụ azụ
Ya mere, n'ihi àgwà egwuregwu ha, ekpebiri m ịgbanwe ọnọdụ ha Villalta dị ka azụ na Lora dị ka azụ azụ '
Lora na-egwuri egwu na asọmpi niile, ọ ghọrọ enyi ya na ndị otu ya, n'etiti ha bụ Joao Grimaldo na Benjamin Villalta
Lora ghọrọ akụkụ dị mkpa nke otu ndị ntorobịa Sporting Cristal
N'ime oge izizi ya zuru oke (2016), ọ bụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi Reserve - Apertura y Clausura- na Copa Modelo Centenario

N'ime oge nke abụọ ya (2017), ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Reserve Tournament - Apertura- na Centennial Tournament Sub-17 Clausura, nke ikpeazụ nke otu ya nyere mmeri 3-2 na Alianza Lima, Lora meriri ihe mgbaru ọsọ mmeri mgbe ọ lọghachiri
site na 0-2
Otu izu ka e mesịrị, ọ ga-atụfu aha obodo na Universitario
N'ime oge nke atọ ya (2018) ọ bụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi Reserve - Apertura-

Oge ikpeazụ ya (2019) bụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi Reserve - Apertura-, Lora n'etiti afọ ka ebuliri ya na otu nke mbụ, agbanyeghị, a ga-akpọ ya ka ọ gaa n'ihu na Copa Libertadores nke otu ya n'afọ na-esote ebe ọ nọ
furu efu na agba nke otu
Lora bụ akụkụ nke obere egwuregwu Sporting Cristal n'etiti 2011 na 2019
Na klọb ọ meriri aha mba ise U-17 Centennial Tournament, 2016 Centennial Model Cup na Torneo de Promoción y Reserva 2016, 2018 na 2019
Asọmpi 3 dị mkpirikpi na 2018 Oge okpomọkụ, mmeghe na mmechi
N'ime oge 2019, Na August 7, 2019, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkachamara mbụ ya wee bufee ya na ndị otu mbụ
Na 19 afọ na 16 ụbọchị, ọ mere mpụta mbụ ya maka ndị otu mbụ na asọmpi asọmpi megide Melgar, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi na nkeji 61st kama Renzo Revoredo
Na oge 2020, ọ na-egwuri egwu 4 na mbido mmalite na asọmpi asọmpi na njedebe nke oge a ghọrọ onye mmeri nke Peru na klọb ahụ
Na Jenụwarị 31, 2021 Sporting Cristal kwadoro ịgbatị nkwekọrịta ya na Lora ruo na njedebe nke 2023
Na Machị 13, o nyere Christopher González aka mbụ ya na ọrụ ya na egwuregwu nke 1st agba nke oge ọhụrụ megide klọb ahụ
'Deportivo Binacional' (4 0)
Na Eprel 21, 2021, o mere mpụta mbụ ya na Copa Libertadores na egwuregwu megide Sao Paulo (0 3), na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi na nkeji 82nd
Na Julaị 14, 2021, o mere mpụta mbụ ya na Copa Sudamericana na agba nke 16 megide Arsenal de Sarandí (2 1), dị ka onye mbido
Klọb ya gara na nkeji iri na ise ebe ha meriri Peñarol na egwuregwu abụọ ahụ (1 3) na (0 1)
Na Septemba 17, 2021, o nyere Marcos Riquelme aka nke abụọ na ọrụ ya n'egwuregwu agba nke 11 nke oge ọhụrụ megide ọgbakọ Universidad Técnica de Cajamarca (6 1)
Na Eprel 27, 2021, onye nchịkwa Ricardo Gareca nyefere ihe ịma aka onye ọkpụkpọ 50 mbụ maka Peru Copa América maka Copa América 2021, nke gụnyere Jhilmar Lora
Na Mee 21, a kpọrọ ya nke mbụ maka asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke 2022 megide Colombia na Ecuador
June 10 banyere ngwa ikpeazụ nke otu mba maka Copa America na Brazil
N'ime egwuregwu nkeji iri na ise nke asọmpi megide Paraguay, Lora mere mpụta mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba, na-abanye n'ọhịa kama Aldo Corzo na 90 + 2 nkeji

Na egwuregwu ndị sochirinụ, ọkara nke ikpeazụ megide Brazil (0 1) na egwuregwu maka ebe 3 megide Colombia (2 3), Lora banyere n'ọhịa kama Corzo ugboro abụọ ma were ọnọdụ nke anọ ya na ndị otu mba ya na njedebe
asọmpi ahụ
N'August 29, a kpọrọ ya oku ngwa ngwa maka iru eru maka iko mba ụwa nke 2022 megide Uruguay, Venezuela na Brazil
Na Septemba 24, 2021, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa asọmpi ụbọchị atọ megide Chile, Bolivia na Argentina
Na egwuregwu nke atọ nke ụbọchị atọ megide Argentina, Lora na ndị otu mba na-eme egwuregwu na FIFA World Cup iru eru, na-abanye n'ọhịa dị ka onye mbido
