Jibrin Ndatsu Ndajiwo (A mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 1948 – ọ nwụọ n'abalị iri n'otu nke ọnwa Ọgọst nke afọ 2020) bụ onye nkuzi na ọka iwu nke rụrụ ọrụ dịka Onye ọka ikpe nke Niger steeti site n'afọ 1991 ruo ezumike nka n'afọ 2013, ọ nwekwara aha otutu ọdịnala Magajin Garin Nupe ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Fati Lami Abubakar nọchiri ya dịka onye nnọchiteanya ọka ikpe
A mụrụ Ndajiwo n'obodo Doko nke Lavun, Niger Steeti
Ọ malitere mbido agụmakwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Doko nke obodo ya site n'afọ 1956 ruo afọ 1959 wee kwaga Bida n'afọ 1960 ịga Ụlọakwụkwọ Praịmarị Agadi Nke Ndayako ruo afọ 1962
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị site n'afọ 1963 ruo afọ 1969 na kọleji Gọọmenti Bida n'afọ 1970 ruo afọ 1973 ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na mahadum Ahmadu Bello
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Iwu Naịjirịa site na 1973 ruo 1974 wee gaa mahadum QMC, London site na afọ 1979 ruo afọ 1980
Ọ gara mahadum Lagos maka agụmakwụkwọ nke Ụlọakwụkwọ iwu dị elu n'afọ 1981
Ọ malitere dịka onye nkuzi na kọleji ndị nkuzi ụmụ nwanyị, Minna n'afọ 1970 ruo afọ 1973 ebe a kpọgara ya na Ụlọikpe Mpaghara dị ka onye nyocha, onye ndụmọdụ steeti n'afọ 1974
Ọ mechara bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya onye ọkaikpe ukwu n'afọ 1977 wee bụrụ Onye ọka ikpe n'afọ 1979

N'afọ 1980, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi na -edeba aha nke Ụlọikpe dị Elu nke dị na Minna mgbe ahụ bụ afọ 1983 Ọ kwagara Mịnịstrị Ụlọikpe nke Niger Steeti dịka onye ọkaiwu izugbe na onye ode akwụkwọ n'adigide n'afọ 1985
Ọ bụ onye otu na Amiral Hajj n'oge ọchịchị abụọ
Ọ mechara bụrụ onye isi ọkaikpe nke ụlọ ikpe ukwu nke Niger steeti nke a họpụtara ya n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1991 ruo Maachị afọ 2013 ka O jere ozi afọ iri abụọ na abụọ
Ọ jekwara ozi dị ka onye isi oche Ụlọ ọrụ njem na njem ala nsọ nke Niger Steeti site n'afọ 2013 ruo ọnwụ
Ọkwa ọchịchị o jidere
Ndajiwo jidere ọkwa dị iche iche na steeti na gọọmentị etiti nke gụnyere
Ọ lụrụ Aishetu Aliyu Lemu na 1974 wee mụọ ụmụ nwoke abụọ, ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Jibu Sani bụ onye Malawi na-ese ihe na otu n'ime ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị na-ese osisi si Bwanausi
Ọ bụ ngwaahịa nke ezinụlọ na-akpụ osisi na Mua Mission KuNgoni Art Center
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya nwere isiokwu okpukpe Ndị Kraịst ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye Alakụba
A mụrụ ya n'obodo Bwanausi
Nna nna ya bụ onye isi obodo ndị Alakụba n'obodo Chigale dị nsọ
N'otu n'ime ndị nna nna ya na-aga n'okpukpe na Dar es Salaam, ọ mụtara banyere azụmahịa ịkpụ osisi site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe Makonde ma weta azụmahịa nka a na Malawi
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na onye na-ese ihe na Malawi bụ Akimatondo n'ihe gbasara nkà nka
O nyere aka zụọ ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na Malawi gụnyere Kay Chiromo
Prince Jide Kosoko (amụrụ n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Jenuarị ,1954) bu onye omee, onye ntụziaka na onye na-emeputa ihe nkiri na Naijiria
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ eze, n'ihi ya, aha ọdịnala ya nke eze ma ọ bụ ' omoba ' n'asụsụ Yoruba
A mụrụ Prince Jide Kosoko na Lagos n'abali iri na abụọ nke January, 1954, na ezinụlọ Kosoko nke Lagos Island
Prince Jide Kosoko gụrụ akwụkwọ nchịkwa azụmahịa na Yaba College of Technology
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri dịka nwata na-eme ihe nkiri na 1964 na mmepụta telivishọn aha ya bụ Makanjuola
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood n'asụsụ Bekee na Yoruba

Jide Kosoko na-eto eto tolitere na Ebute Metta ma nwee mmụọ site na nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma nke Hubert Ogunde ịbanye n'ime ihe nkiri, mgbe otu onye maara -arụ ọrụ na Ifelodun na-eme ihe nkiri na-eme njem kpọrọ ya òkù ka ọ gaa nyocha maka ọrụ na Makanjuola, ihe nkiri telemuvi
Jide Kosoko nabatara òkù ahụ; o mechara gawa maka nyocha anya e wee họrọ ya maka ọrụ ahụ, igosipụta agwa dịka Alabi
Kosoko gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri, o wee soro ndị Awada Kerikeri mejupụtara Sunday Omobolanle, Lanre Hassan na Oga Bello, wee nwee ngosi ndị ọbịa na ihe nkiri TV, New Masquerade
N'afọ 1972, o hiwere otu egwuregwu ihe nkiri nke ya
Jide Kosoko edeela ma mepụtakwa ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri nke ya gụnyere Ogun Ahoyaya
Kosoko bịara pụta ìhè n'oge ihe nkiri vidio, na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke ya, Asiri n la na 1992, mekwa ihe nkiri na Asewo to re Mecca na Tunde Kelani 's Ti Oluwa Ni'Le part 2
Nkwado
Prince Jide Kosoko bụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe ọṅụṅụ na-ewu ewu bụ Chivita
Na 2016, ọ kwadoro MeritAbode Limited, ndị nwe Emerald Estate
Kosoko bụkwa otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya akara maka Western Lotto dị na Nigeria
Prince Jide Kosoko lụrụ nwunye abụọ, Karimat na Henrietta, ma ejiri ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ gọzie ha abụọ
A maara ya dika na ọ bụ nna mụrụ ụmụ isii bụ Bidemi, Shola, Temilade, Tunji, Muyiwa, na Tunde Kosoko
Jide Macaulay (a mụrụ n'abalị anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1966) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikike LGBTQ nke Britain na Naijiria ma bụrụ onye ụkọchukwu site na Chọọchị Anglịkan nke England

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Pastọ nke ụlọ ofufe mbụ nke House Of Rainbow Nigeria maka ndị LGBTQ na Nigeria, a kwanyekwara ya ùgwù dị ka nwoke nke kachasị mma nke afọ 2007 bụ 2007 Man of the Year site na UK Black LGBT maka ọrụ ya n'inyere ndị LGBT nwere okwukwe aka
Nne ya mụrụ Jide Obi na England site na onye ọka iwu Naijiria nke Lincoln Inn England, o bukwa onye nkuzi
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 1970 ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara iwu n'Enugwu campus nke mahadum Naịjirịa, ebe ya na umu nwakwụkwọ ibe ya bụ Chris Okotie ghọrọ enyi
N'ịgbaso ọganihu Okotie, na mmalite 1980s ọ wepụtara album mbụ ya bụ 'Front Page News' n'okpuru akara Tabansi Records
Ihe egwu ndị ọzọ gụnyere igbu m n'ịhụnanya, na akụkọ ihu ihu
Ọ orukwara ọtụtụ ihe gosikwarw na redio na telivishọn Naijiria
Na Nọvemba 1981, akara ndekọ ya, Tabansi Records, nyere ya ihe nrite diski ọla edo mbụ ya na National Theater, Surulere
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gara eja nlegharị anya Eastern Nigeria na Bunny Mack nke Sierra Leone, nke ndị Comrades nke Enugu, Nigeria kwadoro ofuma
O nweela urodu ndị egwu na-akwado ya, tinyere onye egwu Guyanese Eddy Grant 's Coach House Band, Dukes nke Freetown Sierra Leone, na Ndịozi nke Aba
Ọ bụ onye obodo Barbados bụ Bill Campbell mepụtara albums ya Front Page News na Kill Me With Love
Ex- Osibisa na Funkees onye egwu Jake Solo mere na ndekọ abụọ ahụ
N'afọ 1984, Obi dere isiokwu egwu ihe nkiri ụmụaka NTA Tales By Moonlight
Na Dizzy K Falola, Chris Okotie, na Felix Liberty ọ kpaliri ụlọ ọrụ egwu na-apụta nke Nigeria
Ọ guru agwu ozi ọma ọgbara ọhụrụ, akọwara dị ka pop/blues
A hụrụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke otu ndị na-agba mbọ maka mgbanwe na imegide ahaghị nhata na Naijiria
A maara Jide Obi ka ọ na-enye ndị nta akụkọ ajụjụ ọnụ na-akatọ akụkụ okpukpe
Ihe atụ kacha pụta ìhè mekwere na 1989 na 1990, mgbe o kwura okpukpe dị ka ihe na-akpatakarị nsogbu
N’afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, ha lale Jide Obi ka ọ na-ebi na Britain na United States, n’agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye a na-adịghị ahụkebe n’ihu agbakwo
Jidenna Theodore Mobisson (a mụrụ ya na Mee 4, 1985)
Ọ bụ sọọsọ Jidenna ka, eji mara yaỌ bụ onye Naịjirịa ma bụrụkwa Amerịkan rapa, na-agụ egwú, Odee egwu, na onye mmepụta ndekọ egwu
Na 2015, Jidenna wepụtara egwu abụọ, 'Classic Man ' na 'Yoga',nke na-akwalite lebeelụ Jane lle Monáe Wondaland nchịkọta ndekọ egwu EP The Eephus ya naEpic Records
E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, The Chief na Febuarị 17, 2017 nke bụ nọmba 38 na 200
A mụrụ Jidenna Theodore Mobisson na Mee 4, 1985 na Wisconsin Rapids, Wisconsin
Nna ya bụ Tama Mobisson bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego ebe nne ya bụ Oliver Mobisson, bụ onye mmụta Igbo na Naịjirịa
Jidenna tolitere nwantịtị oge na Naịjirịa, ebe nna ya na-aru ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi nke sayensi kọmputa na Enugu State University
Mgbe Jidenna dị afọ isii, ezinụlọ ya laghachiri United Steeti
Na 1995, ezinụlọ kwagara Norwood, Massachusetts, wee mesịa gaa Milton, Massachusetts, na 2000
Nna ya nwụrụ na 2010
Na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị ọ chọpụtara ngalaba otu rapụ nke akpọrọ Black Spadez, ọ were malite imepụta, ịhazi na ide ihe
Jidenna wepụtara abọm mbụ ya nke ya na Black Spadez tiri dịka ọrụ ikpeazụ ha na Milton Academy, ebe Jidenna gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2003

Na 2008, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na Comparative Studies in Race and Ethnicity na Mahadum Stanford, ọ gbasoro ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi, na-agagharị na obodo ndị a ; Los Angeles, Oakland, Brooklyn na Atlanta, tupu ọ banye na nkwekọrịta ya na onye na-ede ihe ndekọ Janelle Monáe's Wondaland Records
Jidenna binyere aka na Janelle Monáe 's Wondaland Records ma kesaa ya site na Epic Records
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-eti egwu na labeelụ ha bụ Roman GianArthur, St Beauty, Deep Cotton na Janelle Monáe etikọla egwu
Ọ malite ịdekọba egwu ise nke mbido egwu mbụ ndị (EP), nke akpọrọ Eephus
Na Febụwarị 2015, Jidenna wepụtara egwu izizi ya, nke akpọrọ ' Classic Man ' nke gosipụtara GianArthur
Egwú ahụ na-atụgharị ntụgharị dị egwu na United Steeti niile, o were pụta na nọmba 49 na chaatị Billboard Hot R & B / Hip-Hop Airplay
Na March 31, 2015, Janelle Monáe na Jidenna wepụtara egwu nke abụọ nke sitere na EP - 'Yoga'
A họpụtara egwu ya bụ 'Classic Man' maka Best Rap / Sung Collaboration na 58th Grammy Awards
Na ọnwa Juunu nke otu afọ ahụ, Jidenna na Monáe gosipụtara egwu ha na BET Awards
Jidenna natakwara onyinye maka onye ọhụụ kachasị mma na 2015 Soul Train Music Awards na Nọvemba
Jidenna bụ onye guzobere ọgbakọ mmekọrịta 'Fear & Fancy', nke bidoro na California n'afọ 2006

Otu a bụ mkpokọta mba nke ndị ọchụnta ego, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ndị nkuzi, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, na ndị nka na-akwado nnọkọ maka egwu, oriri nke nri abalị, na ihe ngosipụta na-echeta enyemaka ndị mmadụ na klọbụ obi ụtọ nke New Orleans
Na Juunu 2016, ọ wepụtara egwu a 'Chief Don't Run'
na February 17, 2017, Jidenna weputara The Chief, egwu studiyo abọm ya izizi
Azụ abọm ya nye gara nnukwu nsọpụrụ n'ebe Boz Scaggs' Middle Man abọm nọ
E wepụtara egwu nke na-ebu ụzọ bụ 'Sufi Woman' and 'Tribe' na Julaị 26, 2019 ọ ga-apụtakwa na studiyo abọm ya nke abụọ bụ
85 to Africa
Na 2019 Jidenna wepụtara egwu nke abụọ ya bụ '85 na Africa'
Jidenna kwuru na isi ọrụ metụtara n' ụdịrị egwu ọ na-eti gụnyere KRS-One na Big Daddy Kane, ya na ụdị egwu Naịjiria Highlife

Kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, onye otii egwu a, zulitere otu o si ebi ndụ ya na koleeji, ebe ahụ ka ọ nọrọ mụọ maka ihe gbasara ejije n'aka ọkammụta akparamàgwà mmadụ aha ya bụ Philip ZimbardoN'aka nke ọzọ, ọ gaghị anabata ụdịrị ejije dandy tupu o ruo mgbe nna ya nwụrụ na 2010

Jidenna kọwara 'ọdịdị m bu Harlem Renaissance kpalitere m nke ukwu na obele ihe ọdịnala nke ọdịda anyanwụ West Afrịka ,' ya na 'obi ụtọ alụm di na nwunye nke ndị Europe na ndị Afrịka na-enye' Jidenna bi ugbu a na East Flatbush, Brooklyn
Na Septemba 2016, e gosipụtara Jidenna na otu ihe ọmụme nwere nkeji na Netflix nke aha ya bụ
Na oge mbu nkeji ise bu 'Just to get a Rep', meghere ebe Jidenna na-egosipụta egwu ya bụ 'Long Live the Chief' n'ebe e mere dịka obi Eze Harlem
O gosiputara egwu ya bụ' Long Live the Chief' na 'Little Bit More' na ndị otu egwu zuru ezu na The Daily Show na Trevor Noah na Ọktoba 2016
Jidenna pụtakwara na ihe ọmụme nkeji na Insecure ndị gụnyere 'Thirsty as Fuck,' na 'Shady as Fuck,' nke emere na Nọvemba 2016
E mere ọbele ' Classic Man' na Academy Award mmeri 2016 fiim

Jigi Bola bụ nnyocha anya na ịwa anya maka ndị Lagos
Ọ bụ onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Lagos State Senator Ahmed Bola Tinubu webatara ya n'afọ 2001
Nke a bụ usoro mgbochi, ọgwụgwọ na mmata nke na-elekwasị anya na mgbọrọgwụ ahịhịa
A na-arụ ọrụ mmemme ahụ n'okpuru ngalaba ahụike na steeti ahụ
Ihe omume ahụ bụ atụmatụ steeti niile nke na-agbanwe n'etiti mpaghara niile dị na steeti ahụ
Afọ iri na otu mgbe gọọmentị nke Senator Ahmed Bola Tinubu malitere Jigi Bola, Senator Gbenga Bareehu Ashafa mere ka mmụọ nke mmemme ahụ dịghachi ndụ site n'ikesa ndị Lagos enyo anya
Bola Tinubu

Jihan Abass (amụrụ 1993/1994) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Kenya na nwanyị ọchụnta ego bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Lami Insurance Technology, ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ mkpuchi dabere na Nairobi, Kenya, na Griffin Insurance, ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi ụgbọ ala dijitalụ
Abass founded Lami to increase Africa's low insurance coverage
Abass hiwere Lami ka o webawanye mkpuchi mkpuchi dị ala nke Africa
Abass bụbu onye na-ere ahịa n'ọdịnihu na onye na-ere ahịa shuga n'ụlọ a na-ere ahịa na London, England, ebe ọ na-ere ahịa na ahịa shuga New York City na London
Abass nwere MBA sitere na Mahadum Oxford yana akara ugo mmụta mahadum na ego sitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ azụmahịa Bayes
N'afọ 2020, a họpụtara Abass ka ọ nọchite anya Africa na InsureTech Connect 2020
Na 2021, Quartz kpọrọ ya aha onye nrụpụta Africa
Jiji bụ ahịa n'ịntanetị nke Afrịka nke na-enye ndị na-azụ ahịa na ndị na-ere ahịa ụzọ iji zute ma gbanwee ngwaahịa na ọrụ

Ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị, na afọ 2018, ọ nwere ihe karịrị 800,000 mgbasa ozi, na-adọta ihe karịrị ndị na-ere ahịa 160,000 na nde ndị ọrụ 7 kwa ọnwa, ndị na-achọ ahịa na ụgbọala, ngwongwo ụlọ, ekwentị mkpanaaka, ihe ntecha, ihe egwuregwu, anụ ụlọ, ngwá electronic, ọrụ, na n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ịchọ ọrụ site na ịchọ ọrụ site n'ịchọ ọrụ
Site na akụkọ nke The Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU), Jiji bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị nke mba ahụ na-ejere ndị ahịa ahịa ahịa ozi
Ka ọ na-erule Machị 8, na afọ 2018, a họpụtara Jiji dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke 39 kachasị eleta na Naịjirịa site na Alexa nakwa dị ka ebe 32 nke TOP na Naịjarịa maka ụdị niile site na SimilarWeb
E hiwere Jiji na afọ 2014 na Lagos, Nigeria site n'aka Anton Wolyansky, onye bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2015 Jiji malitere ọrụ a maara dị ka blog Jiji, na-enye ndị ọbịa ozi gbasara azụmahịa, teknụzụ, ntụrụndụ, ụdị ndụ, ndụmọdụ, akụkọ ndụ, akụkọ
N'afọ 2016, Jiji sonyeere Airtel, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nkwukọrịta zuru ụwa ọnụ
Nke a pụtara na ndị ahịa na saịtị Jiji agaghị akwụ ụgwọ maka data ma ọ bụrụ na ha abanye na weebụsaịtị site na netwọk Airtel
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, na afọ 2016, Jiji nwere nzukọ mbụ maka ndị na-ere ahịa, nke mere na Westown Hotel na Lagos
N'ọnwa Eprel, na afọ 2017, Jiji natara Nigeria Internet Registration Association Awards dị ka ọrụ ntanetị kachasị ọhụrụ n'afọ na Naịjirịa
Na Mee, na afọ 2017, Jiji pụtara dị ka onye ikpeazụ nke The West Africa Mobile Awards (WAMAS), ebe ọ banyere na ndị nnọchiteanya 5 kachasị elu na Commerce & Retail Category
Enwekwara ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche raara nye ihe ndị isi na ebumnuche nke akara a
Kemgbe afọ 2019, Jiji anọwo na-arụ ọrụ na mba ise dị n'Afrịka Nigeria, Kenya, Ghana, Uganda, na Tanzania
Jiji nwere ụdị mkpanaka nke ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ahụ, mepụtara maka gam akporo na iOS
Dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ Google Play, Jiji App nọ na ndepụta nke ngwa iri kachasị ebudata na Naịjirịa
Asụsụ Jijili, Tanjijili, nke eji Ujijili were mara bụ asụsụ ndị Plateau nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ asụsụ nke eji aha Koro were mara
Jilali Gharbaoui (1930–1971) bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe sitere na Jorf El Melha
A na-ewere ya, ya na Ahmed Cherkaoui, onye ọsụ ụzọ nke nka ọgbara ọhụrụ na Morocco
N'adịghị ka ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe n'oge a na Morocco, abstraction ya dabere na brushstrokes na etụ ihe eji ete ihe si dị, na-emegide omenala Morocco
Gharbaoui nwere nnukwu ọrịa uche ma nwụọ n'ihi igbu onwe ya na Paris n'afọ 1971
Ọ malitere ịmụ nka na na Fes
Ọ gara France na 1952
Site n'enyemaka nke onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Ahmed Sefrioui, onye nduzi nke nka na Rabat, Gharbaoui nwere ike ịga École des Beaux-Arts na Paris
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ afọ anọ wee rụọ ọrụ na Académie Julian naanị otu afọ
O mere enyi onye na-ede uri na onye na-ese ihe Henri Michaux, ndị na-ese ihe Hans Hartung na Jean Dubuffet, na onye nkatọ nka Pierre Restany
Site na onyinye sitere n'aka gọọmentị Ịtali, ọ biri na Rom site na 1958 ruo 1960, mgbe ọ laghachiri Morocco
N'oge a, ọ na-agakarị Paris maka ọrụ, na 1959, Pierre Restany webatara Gharbaoui na Salon Comparaisons
A na-anabatakarị ya na ebe obibi ndị mọnk na Toumliline, ebe o mepụtara ihe ịchọ mma mgbidi
N'oge ndụ ya, o gosipụtara na gburugburu Morocco na Egypt, France, Netherlands, United States, na Brazil
Ihe osise ya pụtara na magazin Souffles-Anfas
A hụrụ ya ka ọ nwụrụ mgbe o gburu onwe ya na oche ọha na Champ de Mars na Paris na 1971
A kpọghachiri ozu ya ma lie ya na Fes
N'afọ 1993, Arab World Institute dị na Paris mere ihe ngosi ngosi nke a raara nye ya
Tupu ọ nabata abstraction na mmalite afọ 1950, Gharbaoui nwalere French Impressionism na German Expressionism
Dị ka Toni Maraini, 'Ọrụ Gharbaoui na-elekwasị anya na mmegharị na ụjọ
Site na nsogbu chromatic na ike a na-akpaghị aka, ọ na-emepụta ohere na-anọpụ iche na ihe na-arụ ọrụ, na-egosipụta ihe
Na Art in the Service of Colonialism, Hamid Irbouh na-akọwa Gharbaoui na Ahmed Cherkaoui dị ka 'bipictorialists' n'ụzọ dị iche na ndị nativists nke Casablanca School

Ebe ndị nativists, nke Farid Belkahia na-edu, chọrọ ịhapụ kpamkpam na nka French na Western, ndị bipictorialists gụnyere mmetụta Morocco na Western, na-arụ ọrụ iji dozie akụkụ dị iche iche nke njirimara Morocco postcolonial
Jilbe (nke a makwaara dị ka Zoulbou) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nke a na-asụ n'otu na ekwu kwa na obodo dị na Borno Steeti, Naijiria
A na-akpọkwa ya Zoulbou
A na-asụ ya n'obodo Jilbe, gafee ókèala Cameroon bido n'obodo Dabanga
Jili (Lijili) bụ asụsụ ndị Plateau nke Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ asụsụ nke eji aha Koro were mara
Maka mwakpo nke 19th century afọ nke iri na itoolu, ndị na-asụ Jili gbasara n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke etiti Naịjirịa
Jill Bargonetti bụ prọfesọ America na Mahadum City nke New York nwere nhọpụta abụọ na Hunter College na The Graduate Center
Nnyocha ya lekwasịrị anya na protein suppressor p53 yana ọrụ ya dị ka oncogene mgbe ọ na-agbanwe na ọrịa kansa ara
Amụrụ ya na onwa iri, na afọ 1962 na ụlọ ogwụ no na Obodo New York, Jill Bargonetti bụ ada Adah Askew na Arthur Bargonetti
Jill bụ ngwaahịa sitere na njikọ agbụrụ dị n'etiti nne ojii na nna onye America America
Ọ tolitere na mmepe ụlọ Mitchel-Lama nke nwere ọtụtụ agbụrụ na ọdịbendị dị na Manhattan's Upper West Side
Bargonetti gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha pụrụ iche nke New York City atọ Hunter College Elementary School, Hunter College High School na Bronx High School of Science
Ọ gara n'ihu na mahadum steeti New York na Purchase ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na bayoloji na ịgba egwu wee nweta nzere BA na Biology
O nwetara Masters ya na Mahadum New York na 1987 wee soro ya PhD
sitere na NYU na 1990
O mere mmekorita postdoctoral na Mahadum Columbia site na 1990 rue 1994, ebe ya na Dr
Carol Prives rụkọrọ ọrụ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ kọwara ọrụ dị mkpa nke p53 dị mkpa maka nkwụsị ụbụrụ yana na ha furu efu mgbe p53 gbanwere na ọrịa cancer
Ọkwa ọkachamara mbụ Bargonetti na 1980 bụ onye na-agba egwu ya na ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwu Harlem akpọrọ Dianne McIntyre's Sounds in Motion yana dịka onye nyocha nyocha na Mahadum Rockefeller
N'ịgbaso ọzụzụ doctoral na postdoctoral ya, na 1994 Bargonetti ghọrọ osote prọfesọ na The City University of New York na nhọpụta na Hunter College na The Graduate Center
Ọ họọrọ Mahadum Obodo New York n'otu akụkụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nlereanya maka ndị ọzọ sitere na otu ndị na-akọwapụtaghị ya na sayensị

Na 1997, e nyere ya ihe nrite onye isi ala Early Career Award maka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị injinia sitere n'aka Onye isi ala Bill Clinton maka 'ọrụ ndị ọkà mmụta na ọrịa cancer metụtara ọmụmụ mkpụrụ ndụ na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa na itinye aka nke undergraduate, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na karịsịa ụmụ akwụkwọ nta na usoro nchọpụta' Ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ zuru oke na kọleji Hunter na 2007 yana Onye isi oche nke MCD PhD subprogram nke CUNY Graduate Center na 2009
Bargonetti jere ozi na ọtụtụ kọmitii mba iji nyochaa sayensị na amụma

Ụfọdụ n'ime nhọpụta ya gụnyere 2012-2018 Membership na National Institutes of Health (NIH) Tumor Cell Biology Study Section Review Committee na onye na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye otu National Cancer Policy Board site na 2002 ruo 2005
E gosipụtara Bargonetti na usoro PBS nke a na-akpọ 'Ụbọchị Ngụsị Akwụkwọ America' na 2015
Na mgbakwunye, o kwuru okwu na mmemme TedX 'Borders and Belonging' na Mahadum City nke New York (CUNY) na 2016
Achọpụtara ya dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York nke Arts na Sciences Alumna dị iche iche na SUNY Purchase Presidential Distinguished Alumna
Na 2017, a kpọbatara Jill Bargonetti na Bronx Science High School Hall of Fame
Jill Trappler (amụrụ na Julaị 1957 na Gauteng, Benoni, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi, nke gụnyere eserese, ịkpa ákwà, na ntinye ihe
Ọrụ Trappler dị na nchịkọta dị iche iche nke onwe, ụlọ ọrụ, na nke ọha na eze, nke gụnyere National Museum of African Art, SANG, Vodacom, SABC, Investec, na Nandos UK
E gosipụtara ọrụ Trappler n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi gụnyere na Association for Visual Arts Gallery na 2003, na AVA Gallery na 2015, yana saịtị dị n'ịntanetị dịka 'Invaluablecom'
Trappler na-azụkwa ndị na-achọ ịpụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ dịka ụlọọrụ 'Restructuring Two-dimensional Images' na Kirstenbosch na 2019

Jim Alexander (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 7, afọ 1935) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto, onye nta akụkọ foto, onye na-eme ihe ike, na onye nkuzi nke a maara nke ọma maka ịbụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe na foto ya banyere ikike mmadụ na omenala ndị isi ojii
N'afọ 1995, ọ bụ onye omenkà mbụ ahọpụtara na mmemme a na-eme kwa afọ nke ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị nke obodo Atlanta na-eduzi
A ga-emecha tinye ya na The HistoryMakers na 2006
A mụrụ Alexander James Alexander n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 7, nke afọ 1935, na Waldwick, New Jersey dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ iri na abụọ nke onye na-arụzi ụgbọala David Alexander, na Frances James Alexander
Ọ gara Waldwick Public School na Ramsey High School
Ọ tolitere n'oge ohere maka ndị isi ojii na Amerịka iji nwee ọganihu akụ na ụba dị ole na ole
N'afọ 1952, Alexander sonyeere ndị agha mmiri US mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa

N'oge ọ nọ n'ogige ụgbọ mmiri na United States Naval Training Center Bainbridge, otu ihe omume ga-enyere aka ịkpụzi ndụ ya niile; Alexander meriri igwefoto mbụ ya, Kodak 'Brownie Hawkeye' na egwuregwu dice enyi na enyi
Ozugbo o tinyere igwefoto ọhụrụ ya, Alexander resịrị ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ndị ọzọ foto maka cents iri ise nke ọ bụla
Ozugbo ọ gwụchara ogige buut, a kpọfere ya n'ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri dị na Charleston, SC
iji malite ọzụzụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ diesel
Mgbe ọ nọ na Charleston, ọ gwara onye na-ese foto ụgbọ mmiri ka ọ lelee ụfọdụ ọrụ ya, ọ malitekwara ịkụziri ya ihe gbasara 35mm na nnukwu foto
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ndị agha mmiri n'afọ 1956, Alexander kwụsịtụrụ foto ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ọ na-elekọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụgbọala zuru ezu
Ọ biri n'elu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, nke a na-akpọ ụlọ obibi
A na-akwụ ụgwọ ụlọ ndị ahụ maka $ 9 kwa izu
Ụlọ ahụ na obere àkwà ghọrọ ụlọ Alexander n'oge ọ kpọrọ 'oge okporo ámá' ya
N'afọ 1964, ọ kwagara Ridgewood, New Jersey site na Paterson ebe o biri mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya wee malite ọrụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya
Alexander gụsịrị akwụkwọ maka asambodo na nhazi azụmaahịa na njikwa na Mahadum Rutgers, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi njikwa nke ọrụ nnyefe akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ọ debanyere aha na New York Institute of Photography (NYIP) wee nweta akara ugo mmụta na foto azụmahịa n'afọ 1968
O mechara bụrụ akụkụ nke NYIP Famous Alumni
N'oge mmụba nke mmegharị nke ikike mmadụ, Alexander malitere idepụta mmegide agha na mmegharị nke ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, ma mesịa meghachi omume mpaghara na nke mba maka ogbugbu Dr
Martin Luther King, Jr n'afọ 1968
Foto ya gụnyere ngagharị, nzukọ, nnọkọ, mmemme, kọntaktị, na ndụ ndị isi ojii n'ozuzu ya
Ọ kpọrọ ọrụ ahụ Spirits/Martyrs/Heroes ma gaa n'ihu na-agbakwunye foto na nchịkọta ahụ n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ
Nchịkọta ahụ sitere na 1960s ruo ugbu a
Ọ na-agụnye isiokwu dịgasị iche iche sitere na mmegharị nke ikike mmadụ na nke obodo, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, egwu, nka, na ndị mmadụ kwa ụbọchị bụ ndị na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ịchọ ha maka ịha nhata
Jim Bohlen (Julaị 4, 1926 - Julaị 5, 2010) bụ onye injinia na onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị onye America rụrụ ọrụ dịka akụkụ nke mmemme ogbunigwe Atlas ICBM wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị bidoro Greenpeace
Jim Chuchu (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Kenya, onye na-ese foto, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ese ihe
O bu ụzọ pụta ìhè dị ka onye otu egwu Kenya bụ Just A Band ma mesịa bụrụ onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri LGBT nke Kenya bu akuko nke ndu anyi
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ kọleji n'afọ 2006, ebe ọ gụrụ telekomunikashions, Chuchu malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe osise, na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-emepụta ihe osise n'onwe ya na ngwụsị afọ 2006
N'afọ 2008, Chuchu na ndị otu ya bụ Bill 'Blinky' Sellanga na Dan Muli, bụ ndị ọ zutere mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kenyatta, hiwere Just A Band

Jim rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ime ndị otu ahụ, gụnyere imekọ ihe nkiri atọ mbụ nke ndị otu ahụ, Scratch to Reveal, 82 na Sorry for the Delay, na-emepụta ihe osise maka ndị otu ahụ ma na-eduzi ọtụtụ vidiyo nke ndị otu ahụ - gụnyere 'Ha-He' nke mepụtara Makmende, na-eme ka a kọwaa ihe onyonyo ahụ dị ka ihe ntanetị mbụ nke Kenya site na Wall Street Journal, CNN na Fast Company
N'afọ 2012, Chuchu hiwere Nchikota akwu , ebe a na-ahụ maka nka dị iche iche na nchịkọta na Nairobi
Na Machị 2013, Chuchu mepụtara ma wepụta Imaginary Chains dị ka onye na-akpọ Adeiyu
Otu n'ime egwu EP - Hollow - gosipụtara na Mercedes Benz Mixed Tape 55
Ọ gbasoro EP a site na iwepụta otu egwu You Can't Break Her Heart na onwa Septemba 2013
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2013, Just A Band kwupụtara na Chuchu ahapụla ndị otu ahụ iji rụọ ọrụ naanị ya

Mgbe ọpụpụ ya gasịrị, Chuchu duziri obere ihe nkiri mbụ ya Homecoming dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ African Metropolis, nke malitere na 2013 Durban International Film Festival, wee gaa n'ihu na 2013 Toronto International Film Festival, na International Film Festival Rotterdam, Santa Barbara International Film Festival, Film Festival Locarno na Seattle International Film Festival na 2014

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, e gosipụtara usoro foto Chuchu nke akpọrọ Pagans na mbipụta 2014 nke Dak'Art, Biennale nke iri na otu nke Contemporary African Art, dịka akụkụ nke Precarious Imaging Visibility and Media Surrounding African Queerness exhibition na Dakar, Senegal A kagburu ihe ngosi ahụ otu ụbọchị mgbe ndị ọchịchị Senegal meghere ya, bụ ndị kpebiri na a ghaghị imechi ma ọ bụ kagbuo ihe ngosi n'ọdịnihu na-ekwu maka nsogbu nwoke idina nwoke
N'ịgbaso mbido ahụ, Chuchu na ndị otu Nest Collective ibe ya bụ George Gachara na Njoki Ngumi họọrọ ikpughe aha ha na nyocha ahụ na ajụjụ ọnụ ha na akwụkwọ akụkọ LGBT nke Toronto bụ Xtra!
E wepụtara ụda nke ihe nkiri ahụ, nke Chuchu mepụtara ma mee egwu anọ, na ngwụsị Septemba dị ka nbudata n'efu
Ndị ọgọ mmụọ bụ usoro foto nke Chuchu mepụtara nke na-achọ '[ịrụgharị] chi ndị Afrịka a na-amaghị aha n'ọdịnihu, ndị na-efe ha na ememe okpukpe echefuru echefu
' Otu ọrụ a na-akpọghị aha site na 2014 na-egosi 'onye nwere akpụkpọ ahụ na-egbuke egbuke na uru ahụ a kpụrụ akpụ [onye] na-ele anya n'elu ka ọkụ na ajị anụ na-apụta n'ihu ya
' Iji mepụta ibe ndị ahụ, Chuchu were foto ojii na nke ọcha nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, sere ma tee ihe ndị ọzọ na ha, wee nyochaa ma gbanwee ha
E gosipụtara ọtụtụ foto sitere n'aka ndị ọgọ mmụọ na ngosi 'Precarious Imaging Visibility and Media Surrounding African Queerness' dịka akụkụ nke Dakar Biennial nke ugboro iri n' otu
Ihe ngosi a bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na kọntinent Afrịka lekwasịrị anya na nwoke idina nwoke
Gọọmentị Senegal mechiri ihe ngosi ahụ n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ndị Alakụba na-emegide nwoke idina nwoke na Senegal mebiri ebe ngosi ahụ
E gosipụtala foto Jim na ọrụ vidiyo ya na ihe ngosi ndị otu na-esonụ
James Ikechukwu Esomugha, nke a na-akpọ Jim Iyke, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa na otu n'ime kpakpando ihe nkiri Last Flight to Abuja n'akụkụ Omotola Jalade Ekeinde na Hakeem Kae-Kazim
Amụrụ Jim Iyke n'ubochi iri abuo na ise nke Septemba, n'afo1976 na Libreville, Gabon
Nne na nna ya bụ Maazi na Oriakụ Stephen Okolue, onye aha ikpeazụ ha gbanwere Esomugha site na Ogwugwu Village dị na Enugu Agidi nke steeti Anambra
Jim Iyke bụ naanị nwa nwoke n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụaka asatọ
Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị di na FGC Kwali Abuja site n'afo 1985 ruo n'afo1991
Jim Iyke gụrụ akwụkwọ na mahadum Jos, Plateau Steeti ebe ọ nwetara diploma na Idosa Aku na Uba wee nweta nzere BSc na Filosofii
Jim Iyke malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2001
A maara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na -eme ihe nkiri kacha akwụ ụgwọ na Nollywood, wee pụta n'ihe karịrị otu narị na iri ise (150) ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ na -emepụta ihe nkiri, Untamed Productions n'afo 2007
Jim Iyke malitere akara egwu nke ya, Untamed Records
Ọ wepụtara album mbụ, nke akpọrọ “ Onye ka m bụ? ”Nke na-egosi ụfọdụ ndị egwu Naịjirịa dịka TuFace Idibia, na Sound Sultan
Vidiyo esemokwu nke Jim Iyke sị na ọ bụ 'nnapụta' na ụlọ ụka Synagogue of All Nations (SCOAN), nke ụkọchukwu TB Joshua duziri wee bute nnukwu arụmụka na soshal midia
'Mmụọ ọjọọ' ekwetere na ọ bụ ya kpatara na Iyke enweghị ike ịlụ nwanyị
Esomugha bụ onye guzobere Jim lyke Foundation maka ụmụaka nwere orusi pụrụ iche
Ọ gara Kenya na Disemba n'afo 2012 iji kwado Mgbasa Mgbanwe, ọrụ ebere nke Christopher Gray hiwere, na onye na -ese ụlọ egwu Jamaica Cécile
Iyke nwere eriri ojii na taekwondo
N'Aprel n'afo 2019, kpakpando Nollywood gara na peeji Instagram ya iji kwupụta ọmụmụ nwa ya nwoke nke o buliri foto na -egosi ya na nwa nwoke amụrụ ọhụrụ n'aka ya
Na Jenụwarị n'afo 2021, Jim Iyke kwuru na n'ajụjụ ọnu ihe gbasara omenka kachasị amasị ya, na ọ họọrọ Davido karịa Wizkid
Jim Kosek bụ ónyé America na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe na telivishọn na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye isi na-ahụ Màkà ihu igwe na WAND na Decatur, Illinois
A maara Kosek nke ọma màkà ụdị ngosi ya, nke gụnyere mkpu na-ada ụda, mmegharị gabigara oke, njikọ na omenala a ma ama, na mkpu yiri nke ónyé na-eme ihe ọchị Sam Kinison
Jim Kosek gụrụ meteorology na Mahadum Penn State, mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ chọtara ọrụ na AccuWeather na 1985
Ọ bidoro dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe, mànà ọ malitere ime ihe dị ịtụnanya site n'ébé afọ 1990s gaa n'ihu

Business Insider akọwaala ya dị ka 'Bill O'Reilly nke ihu igwe', site na The Washington Post dị ka 'Al Roker zutere Sam Kinison,' na Jimmy Kimmel dị ka ihe yiri 'Glenn Beck kwesịrị ekwesị' ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe
Ụbọchị ikpeazụ ya na Accuweather bụ ụbọchị iri na otu n'ọnwa Jenụwari, 2012
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka Chief Meteorologist màkà KTVX ABC 4 na Salt Lake City, Utah n'ubochi irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2012, wee kwụsị ọrụ ya n'ogè ọkọchị nke afọ 2014
Dan Pope nọchiri ya bụ ónyé laghachiri na KTVX
Mgbè KTVX gasịrị, Kosek bidoro igosi ihu igwe na KCTV na Kansas City, Missouri
Ọ sonyeere WGCL-TV na Atlanta n'ubochi mbu n'ọnwa Disemba, 2014, wee laghachi n'ọkwa Chief Meteorologist
Ụbọchị ikpeazụ Jim na WGCL bụ ụbọchị iri abụo na atọ n'ọnwa Juun, 2017, mgbè ụlọ ọrụ ahụ hapụrụ ya
N'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ ahụ, ọ sonyeere WLTZ na Columbus, Georgia dị ka ónyé isi na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma nọrọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Ọgọst 2019
Jim James Ovia (amụrụ ya na Nọvemba 4, 1951) bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke obodo Naịjirịa na obodo Delta
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Ụlọ akụ na 1990
Jim Ovia nwere akara ugo mmụta masịta ya na nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Louisiana, Monroe, Louisiana, USA n’afọ 1979 na BSc
ogo na nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Southern, Baton Rouge, Louisiana, USA (1977)
Ọ bụkwa onye gụsịrị na nke Harvard Business Sukulu (OPM)
Ọ bụ onye tọrọ ntọala ụlọ akụ Zenith, o so na ụlọakụ kacha uru na ụlọ oru nke na-ahụ ihe gbasara ego na Naịjirịa ruo na 2010, mgbe o rigoro dịka onye isi oche
Ọ bụ onye natara onyinye nrite nke Naịjirịa
N'ime afọ iri abụọ nke onye ndu, o nyere aka ịkwado ụlọ akụ ahụ dịka otu n'ime ndị kachasị baa uru na Afrịka

Ovia bụ onye guzobere 'Visafone Communications Limited' na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị Naịjirịa nke 'software Development Initiative' (NSDI) na ndị 'National Information Technology Advisory Council' (NITAC)
Ọ bụ onye otu 'Honorary International Investor Council' ya na 'Digital Bridge Institute' (DBI)
Ọ bụ Onye isi oche nke 'Cyberspace Network Limited'
Enyere ya nzere dọkịtoreti na-asọpụrụ, na emume nkpọkọta afọ iri ise nke Mahadum Legọọsụ
Ọ bụ onye otu Kansụl na-achị nke Mahadum Legoosu Steeti , na onye otu Bọọdụ nke Trostii, Mahadum Redeemer nke mba, Legọọsụ
Ọ bụ onye otu Kansụl na-achị nke 'Nigerian Investment Promotion Commission' (1999 - 2007) wee jee ozi na kọmitii nke Amerịkan International Sukulu, Legọọsụ [2001 -2003]
Ovia chịrị ọtụtụ ọgbakọ ndị na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị [NGO] n'oge dị iche iche gụnyere ịbụ onye isi oche mbụ nke otu Ịntanetị (2001-2003)
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na Onye isi oche nke 'Mankind United to Support Total Education' (MUSTE), otu nzukọ na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ, lekwasịrị anya n'inye agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị ụwa na-atụ n'ọnụ

Ọ bụ onye guzobere 'Youth Empowerment /ICT Foundation', nke na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite ọdịmma mmekọrịta ọhanaeze nke ndị ntorobịa Nigeria site n'ịgba ha ume ma na-akpali ha ịnabata ozi na teknụzụ nkwukọrịta
James Radford (1 Ọktoba 1928 6 Nọvemba 2020) bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-ede egwú, onye na-eme mkpọsa udo na onye na'obodo
Ọ bụkwa onye kachasị nta a maara na ọ sonyere na mwakpo ndị agha jikọrọ aka na Normandy n'ọnwa June 1944

Abụ mbụ Radford dere, 'The Shores of Normandy', bụkwa nke kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na nke a maara nke ọma, ebe ọ bụ na ọ kụrụ ya na kọntaktị abụọ a na-egosi na Royal Albert Hall n'afọ 2014 ma wepụta ya dị ka otu n'ọnwa Mee 2019 iji nweta ego maka Normandy Memorial Trust
Ọ nọ n'elu chaatị Amazon na iTunes nbudata n'izu mbụ nke ọnwa June 2019, wee ruo ọnụọgụ 72 na chaatị gọọmentị
Amụrụ Radford na Hull, East Riding nke Yorkshire, England n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1928
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu Merchant Navy mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise ma mesịa sonye na Royal Navy mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri na asatọ
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na mkpọsa udo dị iche iche
Ọ lara ezumike nká mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dịgasị iche iche nke gụnyere oge dị ka onye ọrụ injinia, na ndị nta akụkọ na ọrụ dị iche iche na Community Work na Social Action initiatives
Radford kụrụ egwu ya, 'The Shores of Normandy', na Royal Albert Hall na London n'afọ ncheta afọ iri asaa nke mwakpo ahụ n'afọ 2014
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, mba France họpụtara Radford ka ọ bụrụ Chevalier nke Légion d'Honneur 'n'ịghọta
itinye aka siri ike na nnwere onwe nke France n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ'
James A
Simon, ónyé a makwaara dị ka Jim Simon, bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri
Ya na ụlọ ọrụ animation ya, Wantu Studios, mepụtara animations màkà Sesame Street na ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ
Simon gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke New York City nke Art and Design, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1963
N'ebe ahụ, o ritere íhée nríte màkà ịdị mmá na animation, ma nwéta agụmakwụkwọ abụọ site na Junior Epstein Memorial Foundation yana agụmakwụkwọ na School of Visual Arts
Na SVA, ọ malitere ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri TV, mana ọ gbanwere na animation
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Simon malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe nkiri na Paramount Pictures' animation studio
Ọ mechiri ọnwa anọ mgbè ọ sonyere, mana ógè ya n'ebe ahụ nyèrè ya ohere isonye n'òtù ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Ónyé ọrụ ibe Paramount wee kpọbata Simon dị ka ónyé na-enyere ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri aka na usoro ihe nkiri Spider-Man nke afọ 1960

Mgbè otu afọ na ọkara gasịrị, Simon hapụrụ iji rụọ ọrụ n'onwe ya, na-echeta na 1975 na, 'M na-arụ ọrụ dị ukwuu, ha ga-akwalite m, n'ihi na m na-enweta ego karịa ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri zuru oke
Mànà o ruru n'ókè na enwere m obi ụtọ màkà ihe na-eme n'ime uche m, nke m na-enweghị ike ịhapụ mgbè m na-arụrụ ónyé ọzọ ọrụ
N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1972, o guzobere Wantu Animation Inc, nke mbụ dị na New York City na Los Angeles

Ndị ahịa Simon gụnyere usoro agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka PBS The Electric Company, nké íhée nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya, 'Hey Diddle Diddle', meriri ihe nrite na International Animated Film Association's 1975 Animation Awards Festival; usoro agụmakọta ụmụaka WNET Vegetable Soup; Sesame Street; Black Psychiatrists of America; na New York Public Library
Ka ọ na-erule 1977, Simon na nwunye ya René Simon nwèrè ụmụ nwoke anọ Jimmy, Kelly, Sean, na Mark
Simon na nwunye ya maara ibe ha kemgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ma lụọ di mgbè ọ na-aga kọleji
N'afọ 2009, o kwuru na ụfọdụ ihe ndọghachi azụ n'ọrụ 'mèrè ka m nwee obéré ịda mbà n'obi, obere ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè na enweghị ebe obibi na mụ na nkịta m na-ehi ụra n'ụgbọala'
Mgbè ọ na-eseghị ihe ruo afọ iri, ọ malitere ise ihe na mmanụ ma nwee ihe ngosi na gallery St
Clair na El Cajon, California, nso San Diego, ebe ọ bi n'oge ahụ
Jimmy Wales bu onye bidoro Wikipedia
Ana-kpo ya benevolent dictator mgbe ufodu

Lieutenant Colonel Jimi Koroi (~1943/1944 - February 2022) bụ onye agha na onye uwe ojii Fijian onye ọchịchị ndị agha họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anọchite anya Kọmishọna nke ndị uwe ojii mgbe nnupụisi Fijian nke afọ 2006 gasịrị
Koroi si n'obodo Nawaikama na Gau Island
Ọ sonyeere ndị uwe ojii Fiji na July 1964, wee rịgoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ osote kọmishọna na 1988
N'afọ 1988, o nwere ihe mberede okporo ụzọ nke mere ka ọ nọrọ n'oche nkwagharị
Mgbe nnupụisi nke afọ 2006 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anọchite anya ndị uwe ojii na 6 Disemba 2006, na-anọchi Moses Driver, onye megidere nnupụis ahụ
Romanu Tikotikoca nọchiri ya dị ka Kọmishọna na 9 Febụwarị 2007
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, e nyere ya ihe nrite Fiji Police Long Service Medal
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, e nyere ya ihe nrite ncheta afọ iri ise nke nnwere onwe Fiji
Jimi Solanke Listen (amụrụ na Julaị 1942) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme egwuregwu, onye na'agụ egwú, onye na - na-ede abụ na onye na-ede egwuregwuListen (help·info)
Solanke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo nzere diplọma na ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Solanke kwagara na United States, ebe o mepụtara otu ihe nkiri a na-akpọ 'The Africa Review', na-elekwasị anya na ọdịbendị Afrịka
Ndị otu a na-eyikarị uwe Africa, ọkachasị uwe Yoruba
Ha rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị isi ojii Afrika
Solanke guzobere onwe ya na Los Angeles, California, ebe ọrụ ịkọ akụkọ ya malitere
CNN kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-akọ akụkọ'
N'afọ 1986, ya na ndị otu Ndị Nyocha Afrịka atọ laghachiri Naịjirịa iji soro ndị Nigerian Television Authority rụọ ọrụ
Aha ya mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ola Balogun
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu mere ihe nkiri nke' Kongi's Harvest' nke onye Nobel Laureate bụ Wole Soyinka
Jimi (Djimi), nke a makwaara dị ka Jimjimən na 'Um Falin, bụ asụsụ Chadic a na-asụ na Cameroon na ote aka mpaghara Ugwu na ókèala Naijiria na gburugburu Bourrha
Olumba ndị a bụ Djimi, Jimo, Malabu, Wadi, na Zumo
A na-asụ Jimjimén na Bourrha, ngalaba mpaghara ote aka Ugwu
Jimi (eji Bi-Gimu were mara) bụ asụsụ ndị Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ n'obodo Jimi na Bauchi State, Nigeria
Blench (2006) na-ewere ụdị Zumo (Jum) dị kwa asụsụ dị iche

Jimmie Robinson (a mụrụ n'afọ 1963 na California) bụ onye America na-emepụta akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, nke a maara maka ide na ise akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị a kpọrọ Bomb Queen, na maka ọrụ ndị ọzọ, nke gụnyere Amanda na Gunn, Avigon, Code Blue, Evil & Malice, Five Weapons, The Empty, na Power Lines, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị Image Comics bipụtara
Robinson tolitere na Oakland, California, ma gaa Mosswood Arts, Renaissance Middle School, na Concordia High School

Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe nakwa mgbe ọ malitere ezinụlọ, Robinson banyere ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na 1994, na-ebipụta mbipụta asatọ nke Cyberzone n'okpuru akara Jet Black Graphiks nke ya
N'afọ 1996, Image Comics bipụtara mbipụta anọ akpọrọ Amanda & Gunn
A kagburu ihe na-esote ya nke afọ 1997 nke a na-akpọ Code Blue - ihe nkiri ahụike n'ụdị ER n'ụdị ọchị - mgbe otu mbipụta gasịrị
Usoro ya ọzọ bụ agba, afọ niile Adventures of Evil & Malice banyere ụmụ nwanyị dike na nzuzo nke nnukwu onye ọjọọ

Robinson tụgharịrị na-egosi onye edemede Ché Gilson's Avigon, nke mbụ e bipụtara na 2000 dị ka akụkọ dị peeji iri ise na isii, wee mechaa gbasaa bụrụ peeji otu narị na iri asatọ na anọ na 2005 dị ka Avigon Gods And Demons

N'afọ 2006, ọ malitere usoro ihe nkiri ike na nke ọchị Bomb Queen, nke gosipụtara 'nwanyị ọjọọ' onye ọjọọ nke na-achị obodo na-enweghị iwu nke bụ ebe nchekwa maka ụdị onye omekome na onye na-eme ihe ọjọọ ọ bụla
Obere usoro nke mbụ gara nke ọma, na-eduga na obere usoro ise ọzọ na 2015
O dere otu ihe nkiri ahụ a kpọrọ 'What If?' Wolverine Enemy of the State maka Marvel Comics na 2008
Ya na onye edemede Derek McCulloch rụkọrọ ọrụ, na-egosi T
Runt!, akwụkwọ ụmụaka banyere Tyrannosaurus rex dị obere, nke e bipụtara na 2009
N'afọ 2013-2014, Robinson mepụtara Five Weapons, ihe nkiri banyere nwata nwoke dị afọ iri na atọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ pụrụ iche ebe ụmụ ndị na-egbu ọchụ na-amụta ọrụ ezinụlọ
Ebumnuche mbụ bu ka o nwee naani obere usoro ise, mana usoro ise sochiri
N'afọ 2015, ọ malitere ibipụta The Empty, akụkọ sayensị nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ n'adịghị ka ha malitere ọnụ iji zọpụta ụwa na-anwụ anwụ
O nwetara Inkpot Award na San Diego Comic Convention International n'afọ 2015
A họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ikpe isii maka 2019 Eisner Awards
James O
Adegoke bụ onye sayensị ihu igwe nke bụ onye Naijiria-America na ọkammụta na Mahadum Missouri-Kansas City (UMKC) ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Geosciences (2008-2010)

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye a họpụtara dị ka onye isi obodo nke Kansas City Missouri na Kọmitii Nchịkwa Environmental Management Committee nke obodo ahụ (EMC) ma gbaa akaebe n'ihu Kọmitii Naịjirịa na Kọmiti Naịjirị na-ahụ maka sayensị na teknụzụ na Kọmiti Mgbanwe Ihu igwe nke Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya Naịjiria
Na mba United States, ọ gbara akaebe na United States House of Representatives maka United States House Select Committee on Energy Independence and Global Warming

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Technical Advisory Board nke ọtụtụ mmemme sayensị nke United Nations (UN), gụnyere ọrụ United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) na itinye n'ọrụ mmetụta dịpụrụ adịpụ maka ihe onwunwe mmiri na njikwa gburugburu ebe obibi mba n'Africa

Na oku nke Gọọmentị Naijiria, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Ministerial Advisory Committee on Agricultural Resilience in Nigeria (ACARN) nke mepụtara National Agricultural Resilience Framework (NARF) maka Naijiria n'afọ 2014
Adegoke lebara anya agụmakwụkwọ ya na na ihe omúmú nke Geography, ya na obere ọmụmụ na Physics na Geology, dị ka onye na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
Ọ gara ma gụọ akwụkwọ n Mahadum Ibadan, nweta nzere MS
na ihe ọmụmụ gbasara Geography, ọkachamara na Climatology, na nzere PhD
na Mahadum Pennsylvania State USA, na-elekwasị anya na satellite climatology
Ọ rụchara ọrụ nke mmecha nzere ọkammụta na Cooperative Institute for Research in the Atmosphere (CIRA) na Mahadum Colorado State, USA
Ọ bụkwa, na mbido afọ 1990, onye nyocha na-eleta na Joint Institute for the Study of the Atmosphere and Ocean (JISAO) na Mahadum Washington, na Seattle
Prọfesọ Adegoke bụ onye ndú a ma ama n'ụwa niile na ngalaba pụrụ iche nke 'mmekọrịta ala na ikuku' ebe o nyere aka dị mkpa na sayensị n'ime afọ iri abụọ (20) gara aga

Ọrụ ya ugbu a na-elekwasị anya na mmetụta ọha na eze nke mgbanwe gburugburu ebe obibi, gụnyere ọmụmụ mmetọ ikuku na mpaghara obodo ukwu na-agbanwe ngwa ngwa, mmetụta ihu igwe na ihe onwunwe mmiri na Lake Chad Basin, na usoro gburugburu ebe obibi dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na mpaghara Niger Delta nke Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye otu ọtụtụ ndị ọkachamara nke gụnyere American Geophysical Union (AGU), Association of American Geographers (AAG), na American Meteorological Society (AMS)
Ọ nọ na Kansụl ndụmọdụ ma ọ bụ bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ mmemme ma ọ bụ ebe ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ego dị ka World Bank na UK Research and Innovation kwadoro

O nweela nyocha na nkuzi na Federal University of Technology Minna na Nigeria, Colorado State University na Fort Collins, Colorado na Earth Resources Observation Systems (EROS) Data Center, na Sioux Falls, South Dakota

Site n'afọ 2010 ruo n'afọ 2012 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Council for Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR) Natural Resources & Environment (NRE), na Pretoria, South Africa ebe o nwere nhọpụta n'otu oge dị ka onye nduzi nke Applied Center for Climate & Earth Systems Science (ACCESS), a Center of Excellence (CoE) nke South Africa Department of Science and Technology (DST) Global Change Grande Challenge (GCGC)
N'afọ 2017, ọ rụchara ọrụ ndụmọdụ n'afọ 2017 (Eprel ruo Disemba) dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke West African Science Service Center on Climate Change and Adapted Land Use (WASCAL)
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ abụọ (2) na WASCAL's Governing Board na dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii ndụmọdụ sayensị nke nzukọ ahụ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ndụmọdụ na African Development Bank Group (AfDB) Department of Climate Change and Green Growth mgbe ọ nọ ezumike na Mahadum Missouri-Kansas City
Jimmy Bulus (ka amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1986 na Kaduna, Naịjirịa) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger nke gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
Jimmy Bulus malitere ọrụ ya na JS du Ténéré na Niger wee gaa ASFA Yennenga na Burkinabé Premier League
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger, nke ọ na-agbara bọọlụ site na 2003
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na 2012 African Nations Cup, ọkachasị n'ọnọdụ azụ aka nri
Jimmy Lee Sudduth (n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Machi, 1910 rụo ụbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 2007) bụ ónyé a ma ama na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eti egwu na Fayette, Alabama, US
A mụrụ Jimmy Lee Sudduth n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Machi, 1910
A zụlitere ya n'ugbo dị na Caines Ridge, nso Fayette, Alabama
Ọ malitere ime ihe osise mgbè ọ bụ nwatakịrị, jiri ụmụ bebi osisi a tụrụ n'aka gbaa veranda ụlọ nné na nnà ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ ma na-ese ihe na unyi ma ọ bụ n'elu ogwe osisi n'èzí
Ka a maara nkà ya n'ọbọdọ ahụ, ọ malitere ịnakọta ihe na-acha odo odo site na ala, osisi nkume, nri, na ngwaahịa ụlọ ọrụ maka iji mee ihe na mkpịsị aka ya
O ji mkpịsị aka ya mee ihe n'ihi na 'ọ dịghị mgbè ha gwụrụ'
A na-arụkarị ọtụtụ ọrụ ya n'elu ebe ndị a chọtara dị ka plywood, ọnụ ụzọ, na bọọdụ sitere na ụlọ ndị a kwatuworo
Ọ nwalere ịgwakọta ihe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ ya na ihe dị iche iche iji mee ka ha na-arapara nke ọma, gụnyere syrup, shuga, ihe ọṅụṅụ, na caulk
E mèrè ihe ngosi nka ọha na eze mbụ ya na 1968 na Stillman College na Tuscaloosa
Ihe ngosi nke 1971 n'ọbọdọ ya bụ Fayette nwetara nlebara anya mpaghara ma, malite n'afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ ónyé na-ese ihe na Kentuck Festival of the Arts kwa afọ na Northport, Alabama
N'afọ 1976, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ kpọọ harmonica ma gosipụta ụfọdụ ihe osise ya na Smithsonian Institution's Bicentennial Festival of American Folk Life
Ọ pụtara na Today Show na 60 Minutes na 1980
A na-asọpụrụ ya na Alabama Arts Award na 1995 ma jee ozi dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na New Orleans Museum of Art
A na-egosipụta ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta, gụnyere Smithsonian American Art Museum, High Museum of Art, Corcoran Gallery, Birmingham Museum of Art na House of Blues
N'ịbụ ónyé jụrụ ịhapụ ụlọ ya ruo mgbè o nwere ike, Sudduth nọrọ afọ ikpeazụ ya na Fayette Nursing Home
Ọ nwụrụ na Fayette Medical Center n'ubochí abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba, 2007, mgbè ọ dị afọ irí itoolu na asaá
Jimmy Ogonga bụ onye Kenya na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche nke mba ụwa [nkọwa dị mkpa]

A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1977 na Nairobi, Kenya, Ogonga kụziiri onwe ya nka site na eserese eserese; ihe oyiyi ndị a na-abụkarị nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị akụkọ ha na ọrụ ha na-ahụ mgbe ọ na-eto na East Africa
Ọ gara ọtụtụ mba, na-egosi na ụlọ ngosi nka nke Afrịka na Europe
Ọ na-ewere ọrụ ya dị ka ọrụ nke ịmegharị ndị dike Afrịka site na nka
Ogonga malitere ọrụ ọkpụkpụ ya n'afọ ndị 1990, mgbe afọ iri gachara, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-anakọta ọrụ ya adọtawo na osisi ya na-agbagọ agbagọ na ihe oyiyi ọla
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Nairobi
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Nairobi Arts Trust n'afọ 2001
Jimmy Omonga bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu si Democratic Republic of the Congo

Site na abọm izizi ya 'Destin' (2008), ọ ghọrọ n'ime ọnwa ole na ole otu n'ime ndị ọbụ abụ ọhụrụ a ma ama na Congo, nke a maara maka njirimara ya na olu ya pụrụ iche; doro anya ma na-ada ụda n'elu ya, na ụda ala
A mụrụ Omongo na Kinshasa
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Akụkụ a ma ama na omenala Congo bụ na ọ gwakọtara isi mmalite egwu agbụrụ ya na rumba Cuba na merengue iji mụọ soukous
Ụfọdụ n'ime egwu Omonga bụ ihe sitere na ya kpọmkwem, mana ọ gwakọtara ya na ụdị Afrịka ndị ọzọ ọ nwetara mgbe ọ na-eme njem na Angola na South Afrịka

Mgbe ọ bịarutere South Afrịka n'afọ 1998, Omonga sonyeere Brothers Band (nke mechara bụrụ Afro Fiesta) dị ka onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu ya na ndị enyi ya ogologo oge Mermans Mosengo na bass, Papy (Felix Garemua) Lilawu sonyeere dị ka onye isi egwu, Junior Kisangwa, drum, percussion & backing vocal na Christian Eboko na rhythm guitar, keyboards na backing vocal

N'oge na-adịghị anya, ndị otu ahụ ghọrọ kaadị eserese na ebe dị iche iche gburugburu Cape Town, gụnyere Mama Afrika, Chapman's Peak Hotel, Kennedy's Cigar Lounge, Africa Junction, Marco's African Restaurant
Omonga na-abụkarị abụ banyere ịhụnanya
Ọ na-abụ abụ n'ọtụtụ asụsụ (French, English, Italian na Lingala)
Narị afọ ọhụrụ ahụ wetara mgbanwe ka Jimmy mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Europe dị ka onye na-agụ egwú, ọ bụghịzi dị ka Jibriel kama Jimmy Omonga
Nnukwu ezumike Omonga na egwu a ma ama n'Afrịka bịara mgbe ewepụtara egwu ya abụọ na Womex sampler-CD n'afọ 2007
Tupu ewepụta abọm izizi ya 'Destin' na 2008 (UK nkesa Harmonia Mundi) Omonga meriri Music of the World Award na Amsterdam
UPC bufere Emume Onyinye ahụ na ọwa Amsterdam A1 na Amsterdam TV Foundation Salto maka inye ihe ngosi ahụ, ya mere a hụrụ ihe omume ahụ na ihe karịrị mba 200 n'ụbọchị Afọ Ọhụrụ 2008
Ndị na-akwado egwu si n'akụkụ ụwa niile mere ihe ndekọ nke ihe karịrị votu puku iri ise na asaa n'ịntanetị
MokumTV's Music of the World Awards kpughere Jimmy Omonga dị ka onye kachasị mma n'afọ ahụ na Worldmusic
N'afọ 2007, Omonga gara South Africa, ebe ya na Junior Kisangwa dekọrọ abọm izizi ya bụ Destin

James Bromley Spicer (May 12, 1958 na September 27, 2019) bụ onye America na-edekọ egwu hip hop nke wepụtara ọtụtụ egwú rap ochie n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1970 na mmalite afọ 1980 gụnyere 'Dollar Bill Y'all,' nke a maara ya nkè ọma
Ọ bụ Russell Simmons 'Rush Management na-achịkwa Spicer
Otu égwu ya 'The Bubble Bunch' gosipụtara remix mbụ nke Jellybean Benitez
Spicer nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị anọ, Angelina, Leticia, Janel, na Princess na otu nwa nwoke, James
N'afọ 2018, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa ụbụrụ na akpa ume
Ọ nwụrụ na Septemba 27, 2019, mgbè ọ dị afọ 61
Jimmy Wales bu onye bidoro Wikipedia
Ana-kpo ya benevolent dictator mgbe ufodu
Jimoh Aliu, MFR (11 Nọvemba 1939 - 17 Septemba 2020), onye a makwaara dịka Aworo, bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye nduzi
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 11 ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1939 na Okemesi, obodo dị na Ekiti Steeti n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Nna ya, Aliu Fakoya, bụ onye ụkọchukwu Ifa nke si Oke-Imesi ebe nne ya si Iloro-Ekiti
Aliu malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 1959 mgbe Akin Ogungbe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria gara obodo ya, n'otu afọ ahụ kwa ọ sonyeere otu ihe nkiri Akin Ogungbe ebe ọ nwetara ahụmịhe na ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1966, mgbe ọ nọrọ afọ asaa na ndị otu Ogungbe, o guzobere 'Jimoh Aliu Concert Party', otu dị na Ikare na Ondo Steeti n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa

O mechara sonye na ndị agha Naịjirịa n'afọ 1967 mana ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1975 n'ebumnobi ilekwasị anya na ihe nkiri yana ịkwalite ndị na-ese ihe n'onwe ha n'okpuru ikpo okwu nke otu omenala Jimoh Aliu
O mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn dịka Iku Jare Eda Yanpan yanrin na Fopomoyo nke gosipụtara eze Sunny Ade, ezigbo enyi Jimoh Aliu
E mechara chọpụta na ezigbo enyi ya, Sunny Ade, na nwunye ya, Orisabunmi dinara
Jimoh Aliu mechara gbaghara enyi ya mana o mechara gbaa Orisabunmi alụkwaghịm
Onye isi, Fadeyi Oloro, nke Ojo Arowosegbe na-egwu ghọrọ akụkụ dị mkpa nke mmepụta Jimoh Aliu
Fadeyi Oloro a bụ onye ọzọ so n'òtù Jimoh Aliu (na Ondo Steeti) tupu Ojo Arowosegbe esonye na otu ahụ
Nwunye Fadeyi Oloro mbụ mekwara ihe nkiri Orisabunmi mbụ tupu nke ikpeazụ (nke a maara nke ọma) gosipụtara Orisabunmi onye a na-ekwu na ya na Eze Sunny Ade dinara sonyeere otu ahụ
Aliu nwụrụ na Ekiti State University Teaching Hospital na Ado-Ekiti na 17 Septemba afọ 2020 mgbe ọ rịachara obere ọrịa
Ọ dị afọ iri asatọ
Chief Jimoh Buraimoh (amụrụ n'afọ 1943, dị ka Jimoh Adetunji Buraimoh ) bụ onye eserese Naijiria na onye na-ese ihe
Chief Buraimoh bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe kachasị nwee mmetụta nke pụtara site na ọmụmụ ihe nke Ulli Beier na Georgina Beier duziri na Osogbo, Osun State, Nigeria
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà a ma ama site na Osogbo
A mụrụ Jimoh Buraimoh na Osogbo, Osun State, Nigeria, n'afọ 1943 n'ime alaka ndị Alakụba nke ezinụlọ eze nke obodo ahụ
Ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe nke afọ 1960 nke Ulli Beier duziri, ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ọkụ n'ụlọ ihe nkiri Duro Ladipo
Ọrụ Jimoh Buraimoh jikọtara mgbasa ozi ọdịda anyanwụ na ụdị Yoruba

A na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye isi mbụ na-ese ihe n'Afrịka mgbe, n'afọ 1964, o mere ụdị nka nke oge a sitere na ọdịnala ndị Yoruba nke itinye ihe eji emepụta ihe n'ime ákwà emume na okpueze e ji bead wee mepụta
N'afọ 1972, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na First All African Trade Fair na Nairobi, Kenya
E gosipụtara otu n'ime ihe osise ya a ma ama na World Festival of Black Arts, Festac '77
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria mbụ e mere onye otu na Contemporary World Association of Mosaic Artists
E gosipụtala ọrụ Jimoh Buraimoh ma n'ụlọ ma na mba ofesi
Jimoh Buraimoh bụkwa onye na-ese ihe nke ọma
N'afọ 1974, ọ kụziri na Haystack Mountain School of Crafts na Maine
Ọ kụzikwaara na Mahadum Bloomington na ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na New York, Boston na Los Angeles

Jina Valentine (amụrụ n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba, 1979, na Berwyn, Pennsylvania) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri nke ógè a nke ọrụ ya na-agwa site na usoro na atụmatụ nke ndị America na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-eji usoro mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche emepụta akụkọ ihe méré eme gụnyere eserese, ime akwụkwọ, collage ihe achọtara, na nchekwa ihe
Valentine nwetara MFA na Mahadum Stanford mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadụ Pennsylvania na California College of the Arts
Ọ natara BFA na Mahadum Carnegie Mellon ma gụọ akwụkwọ na France na Lacoste School
Valentine bi na Chicago, ebe ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nkè Printmedia nà School of the Art Institute of Chicago
Na mbụ, ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nkè nka na UNC Chapel Hill

Valentine egosila na ebe ndị gụnyere The Drawing Center, Studio Museum na Harlem, CUE Foundation, Elizabeth Foundation, Patricia Sweetow Gallery, Fleisher-Ollman Gallery, Marlborough Gallery, Ogilvy Gallery, na 21C Museum Hotel (Durham, North Carolina)

O sonyere na ébé óbíbí na Atlantic Center for the Arts, Women's Studio Workshop, Sculpture Space, Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculptura, Santa Fe Art Institute, na Cité internationale des arts na Paris
N'afọ 2011, Valentine bipụtara Ticket to the Unknown, nsụgharị nke ọrụ nké onye na-ese ihe na Switzerland Aloise Corbaz
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke Steffani Jemison's Future Plan and Program, ọrụ iji bipụta akwụkwọ édémédé site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe na-acha
Ọ natara Joan Mitchell MFA Grant, San Francisco Arts Commission Fellowship, na Creative Capital Emerging Fields Award
E gosipụtakwara nka ya n'ihu Southern Cultures, Summer 2015
Valentine na ónyé na-ese ihe Heather Hart guzobere The Black Lunch Table na 2005
Ọrụ na-aga n'ihu na-emepụta ihe ndekọ ọnụ, salons na Wikipedia edit-a-thons
Jina (Zina) bụ asụsụ Afroasiatic nke Cameroon
Ụdịdị Muxule nwere ike ịbụ asụsụ dị iche
A na-asụ Jina na nkwukọrịta nke Zina, nke dị n'ebe ndịda nke nkwukọrịta Logone-Birni
A na-asụ Muxule n'obodo nta ole na ole dị n'ebe ugwu nke Logone-Birni (ngalaba nke Logone-et-Chari, mpaghara ote aka Ugwu) site na ndị ọkà okwu otu puku na narị ise
Ndị Zina na-azọrọ na ha ghọtara Lagwan na Munjuk karịa Muxule

Mpaghara Jingjinji ma ọ bụ Jing-Jin-Ji ( JJJ ), [lower-alpha 1] makwaara dị ka Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei ( BJ-TJ-HB ) yana mpaghara Isi Akụ Obodo, bụ Mpaghara Isi Obodo nke Ndị Mba nke China
Ọ bụ mpaghara megalopolis kachasị mepee emepe na Mpaghara Ugwu China
Ọ gụnyere mpaghara akụ na ụba gbara mmepe obodo Beijing na Tianjin gburu gburu, n'akụkụ ụsọ Oké Osimiri Bohai
Mpaghara a na -apụta na-ebili ka mpaghara ugwu mepere emepe na-ama Osimiri Delta Pearl na ndịda anyanwụ yana Osimiri Delta Yangtze n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ
N'afọ 2016, Jingjinji nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nde otu narị na iri na abụọ ma nweekwa ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ dị ka Guangdong, mpaghara China kachasị n'ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ

N'afọ 2019, Jingjinji wepụtara ihe dị ka pasent asatọ ( US $ otu Ijeri na nde nari abụọ ma ọ bụ US $ Ijeri abụọ na PPP ) nke GDP China ma ọ bụ ihe ruru nha ka Spain, nọ na mpaghara nha nke United Kingdom
Jingjinji etinyela aka na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta na nrụpụta
Ike Tianjin anọrọla na ụgbọ elu, mbugharị ibu na mbupu
Beijing mejuputara ọrụ akụ na ụba a na ụlọ ọrụ kemịkal mmanụ ala , agụmakwụkwọ na R&D siri ike

Mpaghara a na-aghọ ụyọkọ uto dị dị ịrịba ama maka ụgbọ ala, elektrọnik, kemịkal mmanụ alakemịkal mmanụ ala, ụlọ ọrụ nrụpụta ụgbọ ala, ngwanrọ na ụgbọ elu, na-adọta ntinye ego nke ndị si mba ọzọ nrụpụta na ọrụ ahụike
Gọọmentị etiti China emeela ka ọ bụrụ ihe kacha mkpa ijikọ obodo niile dị na Bohai Bay rim na ịkwalite mmepe akụ na ụba
Nke a gụnyere iwu netwọk nkwukọrịta dị elu, okporo ụzọ ndị ka mma, abawanye agụmakwụkwọ, na akụrụngwa sayensị yana ị nweta ihe okike sitere na mmiri mmiri Bohai
N'afọ 2016, gọọmentị etiti kwadoro atụmatụ $ ijeri Iri atọ n'isii ijikọ obodo dị iche iche mejupụtara nnukwu obodo a site na ụgbọ okporo ígwè iji belata oge njem na ijikọ ha nke ọma
Atụmatụ a gụnyere ịrụ ụzọ ụgbọ oloko itoolu dị 1,100 kilomita otu puku na otu nari (680 m) n'ogologo nke a ga-emecha ya n'afọ 2020
Ebumnuche ogologo oge a bụ imepụta mpaghara njem otu awa; a na-eme atụmatụ ịrụ ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè n'etiti obodo iri abụọ na anọ nke ga-adị tupu afọ 2050
N'ime iri afọ ndị na -adịbeghị anya, achọpụtala mmanụ ala na mmanụ gas na mpaghara Jingjinji nke oke osimiri Bohai
Jingjinji gụnyere mpaghara Beijing, Tianjin, na Hebei
Isi obodo n'ime obodo na mpaghara ndị a gụnyere
n'usoro ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ bi n'obodo mepere emepe
Na Nchikwa, ọ bụ otu n'ime obodo mepere emepe anọ nwere ọnọdụ ọkwa mpaghara, , n'ekpesa kpọmkwem n'aka gọọmentị etiti
Mpaghara Ala obodo ya mepere emepe bụ ebe nke atọ kacha ibu na mba China, nọ n'ọkwa n'esote Beijing na Shanghai
Enwere ọtụtụ nnukwu okporo ụzọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ime mpaghara Jingjinji
Nke a gụnyere okporo ụzọ ndị a
Ụzọ okporo ụzọ isii nke China National na -esote gafere na Tianjin
Jīng (京), Jīn (津), and Jì (冀
Nke a bụ ndetu nkenke ama ama maka Beijing, Tianjin na Hebei

Jishou ( Asụsụ China ; Tujia Jiersouv) bụ obodo ọkwa ogbe yana oche Xiangxi Tujia na Miao nọ n'okpuru ọchịchị onye isi obodo kwụrụ onwe ya, Mpaghara Hunan, China

Obodo a dị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke ógbè ahụ, ógbè Huayuan na Baojing dị nwere oke ala na mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ, n'akụkụ Ogbe Guzhang na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ site na Ogbe Luxi, na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ site na mpaghara Ogbe Fenghuang

Obodo Jishou kpuchitere kilomita otu puku , iri asaa na asatọ na ụma iri atọ na atọ (sq mi Narị anọ na iri na isii na ụma iri atọ na ise) n'afọ 2015, O nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ edebanyere nke bụ puku narị atọ na otu puku yana ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi ebi bụ puku narị abụọ na isi asato na isii na narị anọ
Jishou nwere mpaghara mpaghara anọ, obodo ise na otu ime obodo n'okpuru ikike ya, oche obodo a bụ Mpaghara mpaghara Qianzhou (乾州街道)
Jishou nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke karịrị afọ puku abụọ malitere na usoro ndị eze Qin
N'ụbọchị ndị ahụ, ọ jikọtara na Obodo nwere onye isi Qianzhong (黔中郡)

N'oge usoro ndị eze Song, e guzobere ọchịchị gọọmenti obodo n'ime obodo mkpọchi, Zhenxi (镇溪寨;鎮 溪 寨), nke dị n'ime usoro ndị eze Ming mechara bụrụ ndị agha Zhenxi na ndị agha nkịtị otu puku (镇溪军民千户所;鎮 溪 軍民 千 千Akara ngosi )
Emepụtara Obodo nwere onye isi ọchịchị Qianzhou (乾州厅) n'oge usoro ndị eze Qing
N'oge Mba nke China, a maara ya dị ka Ogbe Qian (乾县;乾 縣) N'afọ 1953 a kpọgharịrị aha mpaghara ahụ ka ọ bụrụ mpaghara Jishou, yana obodo abụọ dị n'akụkụ, Jishou na Qianzhou
N'afọ 1982 Jishou ghọrọ isi obodo Xiangxi Tujia na Miao nwere onye isi ọchịchị kwụrụ onwe ya
Obodo Qianzhou (乾城) dị ugbu a na ndịda obodo Jishou
Jishou dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke oke ugwu Wuling
Banyere Pacentị iri asatọ nke ala obodo ahụ bụ ugwu nta ma ọ bụ ugwu dị ala

Ebe kachasị elu bụ mita narị itoolu na iri isii na anọ na ụma ise na Liantaifeng (莲台峰;蓮台 峰, na nso obodo Aizhai (矮寨) na ebe kachasị dị ala bụ mita otu narị na iri anọ na abụọ, na nso obodo Hexi (Asụsụ China dị mfe)
Osimiri Dong (峒河), bụ ụtụ nke Osimiri Yuan, na-aga site na ọdịda anyanwụ ruo ọwụwa anyanwụ site n'ime obodo a

Mpaghara Jishou nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ puku narị abụọ na iri itoolu na otu, narị abụọ n'afọ 2008, gụnyere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọrụ ugbo otu narị puku, iri isii na atọ na otu narị, ma ọ bụ Pacentị iri ise na isii nke ndị bi na ya
Ndị bi n'obodo mepere emepe bụ Otu narị puku na iri itoolu na abụọ, narị ise

Ihe dị ka pacentị iri asaa na asaa na ụma atọ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị obodo bụ ndị pere mpeMiao ma ọ bụ Tujia, yana Miao otu narị puku na iri abụọ na otu, narị abụọ na Tujia otu narị puku, otu puku na narị abụọ
Ndị otu agbụrụ Han kacha ukwuu na China gụnyere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọzọ
Jishou nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị elu abụọ
N'afọ 2001, nnukwu ngwaahịa ụlọ dị na Jishou bụ ijeri yuan iri na itoolu na ụma iri anọ na ise, yana ego ruru ijeri yuan otu na ụma iri anọ na ise
Jishou na emepụta mkpụrụ osisi, ọkachasị kiwi na oroma, akwụkwọ nri, anụ ụlọ na anụ ọkụkọ, na ụtaba
Njem nlegharị anya na -aghọ ụlọ ọrụ nrụpụta dị mkpa, Kemgbe obodo ochie Fenghuang dị ihe dị ka nkeji iri atọ site na ya ma Dehang National Park dị ihe dị ka nkeji iri anọ site na ya

Dabere na atụmatụ mbido, nnukwu ngwaahịa emepụta na mba n'afọ 2018 bụ nde CN puku iri na isii, narị asaa na iri isii na abụọ (nde $ puku abụọ, narị ise na iri atọ na atọ), ji pacentị iri na otu ụma karịa afọ gara aga

N'ime ngụkọta a, ọnụ ahịa agbakwunyere na ụlọ ọrụ izizi bụ nde CN ￥narị asaa na iri na isii (nde $ otu narị na asa), site na pacentị atọ na ụma ise, nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta sekọndrị bụ CN nde ￥ puku anọ, narị asatọ na iri anọ na otu (nde $ narị asaa na iri atọ na abụọ), site na Pacentị iri na otu na ụma asatọ na nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta tertiary bụ nde CN puku iri na otu, narị abụọ na isii (nde $ Otu puku, narị irii na iri itoolu na atọ), gbagoro pacentị itoolu na ụma asatọ

Ọnụ ahịa agbakwunyere na ụlọ ọrụ bụ isi Gosiri pacentị anọ na iri abụọ na asaa nke GDP; nke ụlọ ọrụ sekọndrị ruru pacentị iri abụọ na asatọ na ụma iri asatọ na asatọ; na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta tertiary nyere pacentị iri isii na isii na ụma iri asatọ na ise
GDP nke otu onye n'afọ 2018 bụ CN ￥ puku iri anọ na anọ, narị asatọ na iri anọ na itoolu ($ isii na ụma narị asaa na iri asaa na asaa), jiri pasent ise na ụma itoolu ma atụnyere afọ gara aga

Kim Ji-soo ( Korean ; amuru Jenuarị 3, 1995), nke amara aha ya dika Jisoo, bu onye South Korea na-abụ abụ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ arụ dị ka onye so na otu nwa agbọghọ Blackpink, nke YG Entertainment hibere, na August 2016
Na Disemba 2021, Jisoo gbara aka na ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye ndu onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri JTBC Snowdrop
A mụrụ Kim Ji-soo na Jenụwarị 3, 1995 na Gunpo, Gyeonggi Province, South Korea
O nwere nwanne nwoke na nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-agba bọọlụ basketball ma na-eme Taekwondo
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado otu nwoke Korea TVXQ
Jisoo gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na School of Performing Arts Seoul ; na klaasị 11, o hiwere ụlọ egwuregwu ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ wee nweta ahụmịhe karịa na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ site na ịga mgbakọ
N'afọ 2011, Jisoo sonyeere YG Entertainment dị ka onye na-azụ ọzụzụ mgbe ọ gafechara nyocha ya
N'October 2014, ọ pụtara na vidiyo egwu Epik High maka 'SPOILER + HAPPEN ENDING' dịka nwa agbọghọ obi mgbawa
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbara egwu na vidiyo egwu Hi Suhyun maka 'M dị iche' dị ka enyi nwanyị Bobby
Na 2015, Jisoo mere nputa cameo na KBS2 drama The Producers ya na onye otu lebelu ya bu Sandara Park nke 2NE1 and Kang Seung-yoon nke Winner
Jisoo putara mbu dị ka otu n'ime ndị kasị ochie n'ime mmadụ anọ nke otu nwa agbọghọ Blackpink na August 8, 2016, n'akụkụ Jennie, Rosé na Lisa, na ntọhapụ nke otu album ha Square One
Site na 2017 ruo 2018, Jisoo sonyeere Inkigayo dị ka onye ọbịa n'akụkụ Got7 's Jin- Young na NCT 's Doyoung
O buru ụzọ tinye aka n'ime ihe nkiri na 2019 site na obere mpụta cameo na ihe nkiri fantasy tvN Arthdal Chronicles
N'afọ 2020, Jisoo dekọtara otu onye ndu Lovesick Girls nke album studio mbụ n'asụsụ Korea nke Blackpink The Album
Na Ọgọst 18, 2020 YG Entertainment kwadoro na Jisoo ga-eme egwuregwu na ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka onye ndu onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri JTBC Snowdrop n'akụkụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Jung Hae-in
Usoro a bido gosiwe site na Disemba 18, 2021, ruo Jenụwarị 30, 2022, na JTBC n'ime ụlọ yana na Disney + mba ụwa

N'agbanyeghị esemokwu ndị metụtara ebubo ụgha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ihe nkiri ahụ, ndị nkatọ nabatara omume Jisoo nke ọma, bụ ndị kwuru na ọ 'na-egosipụta n'ezie ike ya' nakwa na 'oke ya bụ ihe kwesịrị ịja mma'
YG Entertainment kwadoro na mputa mbu Jisoo dị ka onye na-agwu egwu so ya no na-arụ ọrụ mana enweghị ụbọchị n'ihi nkwa ya na ịse Snowdrop
Ọ ga-abụ onye ikpeazụ na Blackpink mere mpụta mbụ ya
Na mgbakwunye na onye Korea ya, Jisoo mụtakwara ịsụ Chinese, Japanese na Bekee
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ rọrọ nrọ ịghọ onye na-ese ihe na onye edemede
Tupu mmalite ya, Jisoo binyere nne na nna ya, ụmụnne ya na nne na nna ya ochie
A họọrọ Jisoo dị ka arụsị K-pop nke iri kachasị ewu ewu na 2018 na 17th na 2019 na nyocha kwa afọ nke Gallup Korea mere
Na 2019, ahọpụtara ya dị ka arụsị K-pop nwanyị nke isii ama ama na nyocha nke ndị agha na-arụ ọrụ agha amanyere na South Korea
Dịka nke February 2021, ọ bụ arụsị K-pop nke atọ a na-agbaso na Instagram, yana onye otu ya Rosé
N’afọ 2019, akpọrọ aha ya na BoF 500, “ntụgharị aka ọkachamara doro anya” nke ndị mmadụ na-akpụzi ụlọ ọrụ ejiji $24 trillion
Agụnyere Jisoo na ọkwa maka ndị ama ama iri kachasị na ndị na-eme ihe na-eduga ụwa ịchọ mma maka ọnwa ise mbụ nke 2020
Women's Wear Daily, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahia ahia ejiji, kpughere na Jisoo na-edu ọkwa na ntinye aka na nkezi, Rihanna na Kylie Jenner sochiri ya
O debere 7th na ọkwa n'ozuzu ya n'agbanyeghị na ọ nwere ọkwa kacha nta na naanị 12 na mkpokọta
Jisoo bụ naanị onye East Asia na ndepụta ahụ
Na June 2020, ụdị Jisoo dị na teasers maka otu Blackpink ' Otu Ị masịrị nke ahụ ' malitere ịrịa na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Ndị na-eme ememme na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na South Korea, China, Thailand, na Vietnam ṅomiri 'ụdị ndozi isi abụọ' na etemeete, nke Jisoo kere onwe ya
'Ụdị ntụpọ' ya, echiche etemeete ọ malitere, malitere na nyiwe mgbasa ozi dịka Instagram iji kwalite ihe ịma aka n'etiti ndị na-akwado esenidụt

Jisoo họọrọ nke mbụ na ndepụta aha njirimara nkeonwe nke ụlọ ọrụ nyocha Korea Enterprise mepụtara, nke nyochara data sitere na ụdị na omume ndị na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị iji tụọ ndị nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na oriri na mmasị ika

Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nyocha asụsụ Korea Seong-sun Lim kwuru na ebili mmiri Korea na mpaghara ụwa na-emebi ngwa ngwa ọdịnala ọdịnala Western, na-akpọ Jisoo na Jungkook dị ka ụkpụrụ maka ịma mma ụwa karịa ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Olivia Hussey na James Dean
N'afọ 2020, mmụba Dior na ahịa n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na South Korea bụ nke sitere na mgbasa ozi ahịa ya na ndị na-abụ abụ Korea, gụnyere Jisoo
Ọ pụtara na nkwalite maka Dior ọhụrụ Bobby akpa n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ a ma ama influencers dị ka Chiara Ferragni na Kat Graham
Njirimara Jisoo na mkpọsa Dior's Fall/Winter 2020 kpaliri onye na-eme ihe nkiri Liza Soberano iyi akwa ịchafụ Dior's Oblique
N'ihe ngosi mkpokọta mmiri/okpomọkụ 2021 nke ika a, Jisoo dọtara mmasị dị ka onye nnọchi anya Korea
Ọbịbịa ya na ihe ngosi ahụ nwetara Dior ọkwa ọkwa ya kachasị elu, yana nkezi 33% MIV, [lower-alpha 1] kemgbe ihe ngosi Fall 2020 ya
Na Machị 2021, onye isi ihe okike Maria Grazia Chiuri kpughere na mkpokọta Dior's Autumn/Winter 2021 sitere na Jisoo
E gosikwara na otu n'ime ndo iri nke Dior Addict Lip Glow lip balm, #025 Seoul Scarlet, sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ụmụ nwanyị Korea dị ka Jisoo
Ọbịbịa ya na ihe ngosi nchịkọta Dior Spring/Summer 2022 kpalitere mkpọtụ ma n'ime ma na mpụga ebe Jardin des Tuileries

Ihe mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi Jisoo nwere uru kachasị elu nke ihe ọ bụla metụtara ihe omume ahụ, na naanị mmadụ abụọ posts na mgbasa ozi puku abụọ na-eduga na ngụkọta ọnụ ahịa nke $ 157 nde maka ụlọ ejiji n'oge Paris Fashion Week
Na Machị 2021, ogo ngwa mụbara ruo ebe 11 mgbe ọkwa imewe ya na Jisoo gasịrị
Mmekọrịta ọ sonyere na enwetakwara nzaghachi dị mma site n'aka ndị ọrụ
Tupu mmalite ya na Blackpink, Jisoo gosipụtara na mgbasa ozi maka Samsonite, Smart Uniform, LG Electronics, na Nikon
Na Septemba 2018, Jisoo na onye otu nwoke Rosé ghọrọ ụdị nkwado maka akara ịchọ mma Japan Kiss Me
Na Febụwarị 2021, ụdị uwe ndị Korea Ọ Michaa họpụtara Jisoo ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi nka maka mkpokọta mmiri 2021 ha
A họpụtara ya maka mkpọsa oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2021 na ahịrị It Michaa, Maka otu ụbọchị Michaa
N'August 2021, ahọpụtara Jisoo ka ọ bụrụ onye nkwuchite maka akara mkpụmkpụ Korea CELEBe
Na Disemba 2019, Jisoo ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya mpaghara maka akara ịchọ mma Dior, Dior Beauty
N'oge okpomọkụ na-esote, a na-ewe Jisoo ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi nka nke Dior wee mee ya maka mkpokọta Dior's Fall/Winter 2020
Na Septemba 2020, Jisoo kpuchiri mbipụta 155th 2020 nke Dazed Korea, ebe ya na Dior kwurịtara ọrụ ya
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ isi ihe nlereanya maka 'Pasha de cartier ' cartier
Na Disemba 2020, Jisoo were foto Lady Dior na akpa D'Lite na mkpokọta Dior's Cruise 2020–2021
Na Jenụwarị 2021, Dior Beauty's 'Dior Forever Skin Glow Cushion', nke Jisoo kwadoro, ka ewepụtara naanị na Korea
Ọ na-akwalite ika si mmiri/Summer mkpokọta, yi Dior si Caro akpa
Na March na-esote, Jisoo kwadoro mmekọrịta ogologo oge ya na Dior mgbe ha kwupụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchianya ọhụrụ ha zuru ụwa ọnụ, n'akụkụ Natalie Portman na Cara Delevingne

Na Mee 2021, Jisoo malitere ọrụ mmekọ mbụ ya na ika ahụ, na-aga n'ihu mkpọsa Dior Fall '21 na Dior Vespa dị ka kpakpando mkpuchi nke June, nke kụrụ shelf na mba anọ-Hong Kong, Thailand, Singapore na India
Jisoo mere Dior ọhụrụ ulo oru egbugbere ọnụ, Dior Riri egbugbere ọnụ Glow, maka Dior Mma usoro
Na June 2021, Jisoo gara Dior Resort 2022 show na Gris Panthenaic Stadium, yi uwe linin na-acha ọcha niile nke onye isi ihe okike Maria Grazia Chiuri
Na Septemba 2021, Jisoo gara ihe ngosi Dior's Womenswear Spring/Summer 2022, emere n'oge izu Ejiji Paris 2021 na Jardin des Tuileries
Ọ nọdụrụ n'ahịrị n'ihu, n'akụkụ onye isi oche na CEO nke Dior, Pietro Beccari

Tupu ihe ngosi ahụ, e dekọrọ njem ya na Paris na akaụntụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta nke Dior, na-egosi oge sitere na nleta ya na ndị na-eri nri ụlọ na mkpali dị n'azụ nchịkọta mmiri/Summer 2022 na ebe nchekwa nke Lady Dior, nke aha ya bụ Princess Diana
Jisọs Kraịst bụ onye nkwusa na onye ndú okpukpe ndị Juu na narị afọ mbụ
