Jju bụ asụsụ ala nke ndị Bajju nke Kaduna Steeti dị kwa n'etiti Naịjirịa
A makwaara ya dị ka 'Kaje ma ọ bụ Kache' (site na Hausas)
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1988, e nwere ihe dịka ndị ọkà okwu 300,000
Dị ka Blench si kwuo na AFO (2008), Jjuʹ na ndị ọzọ na-asụ ya yiri ka ọ bụ ụdị Tyap (ọ bụ ezie na ndị na-asụrụ ya dị iche iche n'agbụrụ)
Bajju bụ kwa otu n'ime asụsụ Southern Kaduna
Ndị Bajju na-asụ Jju dị ka asụsụ mbụ na Zangon Kataf, Jema'a, Kachia, Kaura na Kaduna South Local Government Areas nke Kaduna steeti
A na-asụkwa ya na ndị agbata obi Atyap, Fantswam, Agworok, Ham, Adara, na obodo ndị ọzọ dị iche iche ka asụsụ nke abụọ ma ọ bụ nke atọ
Joël M'Maka Tchédré, bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Togo, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri dịka Pacte na T’Bool
Ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye nduzi ememme
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stendhal, France na Creative Documentary
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị Baccalaureate n'afọ 2006, ọ debara aha na Mahadum Lomé iji mee akwụkwọ akụkọ
N'afọ 2014, o mepụtara Emergence Film Festival, na Lome
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya ma mesịa hiwe ụlọ mmepụta ihe ya nke a na-akpọ 'Les Films du Siècle'
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere telivishọn mba Togo dị ka onye na amụ amụ
Ka ọ dịgodị, o mere ule ịbanye na Superior School of Visual Arts (ESAV) nke Marrakech na Morocco
Mgbe ọ nabatara ule ahụ, ọ kwụsịrị nke ahụ wee kpebie ịkwaga Institut Supérieur des Métiers de l'Audio-visuels (ISMA) na Cotonou, Benin n'afọ 2009
Mgbe o ritere agụmakwụkwọ site na Embassy nke France, ọ gara France iji mee nzere masta na mmepụta ihe nkiri sinima nke Okike na Niger
N'afọ 2010, o mere obere Reliquat (Le)

Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke mkpụmkpụ ahụ gasịrị, ọ duziri ihe nkiri abụọ ọzọ Ajoda, un vieux aux bras valides na Vues d'Afrique N'afọ 2019, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na sinima na ihe nkiri T'Bool, nke natara otuto dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ
Tupu ọ nweta nzere masta nke abụọ na Production na Grenoble, France na 2013, o mere obere ihe nkiri The films of the century
N'afọ 2014, o ritere Kodio Grand Prize na Clap'Ivoir festival na Ivory Coast maka ihe nkiri ya Les nanas benz, les reines du textiles
N'afọ 2016, o mere ihe nkiri Pacte, nke e mepụtara n'enweghị mkparịta ụka ka ahọpụtara na Pan-African Film and Television Festival of Ouagadougou (FESPACO) n'afọ 2017
Joëlle le Bussy Fal bụ onye France naSenegal na-ese ihe, onye na-ere ihe osise, onye na-ahazi ihe osise na Dakar, Senegal, ebe o guzobere Galerie Arte na 1996
N'ịbụ onye Belgian-Congolese, a mụrụ Joëlle le Bussy na 1 February 1958, na Mont-de-Marsan, France
O guzobere Galerie Arte na 1996 na mpaghara Plateau nke Dakar
Kemgbe afọ 2009, ụlọ ngosi ahụ nwere alaka na Saint-Louis du Senegal, obodo e kewara dị ka World Heritage Site
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Association for the Promotion of Visual Arts (PAVA) na Africa
N'afọ 2009, Amadou Diaw, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Saint-Louis 350, họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke nka na akwụkwọ ozi
Kemgbe ahụ, o guzobere emume nka nke oge a, Le Fleuve en Couleurs, ma site na otu a, obodo Saint-Louis aghọwo ebe mmalite maka Dakar Biennale
Fleuve en Couleurs bụ ihe omume a na-ahazi kwa afọ
Ụlọ ngosi Joëlle le Bussy Fal na-enye oche na ihe osisi dị oké ọnụ ahịa sitere na kọntinent Afrịka, nke ọ na-emepụta ma na-enye ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Dakar ya site n'aka ndị ọrụ Casamance nwere ahụmahụ
Ụlọ ngosi ahụ na-egosipụtakwa ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka (ndị na-ese ma ọ bụ ndị na-akpụ ihe) ma na-akwalite ọrụ aka, ọla na ákwà si West Africa
Joëlle le Bussy Fal anọwo na-akụzi ihe ọmụmụ mmeghe kemgbe afọ 2012 na Mahadum Gaston Berger na Saint-Louis, Senegal
Jo-Ann Cindy Strauss (amụrụ na 3 Febụwarị 1981 na Cape Town ) bụ onye nlereanya South Africa, onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha na nwanyị ọchụnta ego
N'afọ 2001, ọ nọchiri anya mba ya dị ka Miss South Africa na asọmpi Miss Universe na Puerto Rico yana na asọmpi Miss World nke emere na Sun City na obodo ya n'afọ 2001
E gosipụtara ya na vidiyo egwu nke 2001 nke otu egwu pop nke Irish Westlife 'When You're Looking Like That'
Strauss nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum Stellenbosch
N'ime afọ ọ na-achị dị ka Miss So

uth Africa, bidoro ọrụrụ mgbasa ozi ya na mmemme magazin Afrikaans TV Pasella tupu ọ banye na ihe ngosi magazin ndụ Bekee Top Billing (ihe ngosi TV), nke ọ gbara ajụjụ ọnụ dịka Charlize Theron, Antonio Banderas na George Clooney
O gosipụtara dị ka nwa agbọghọ mkpuchi maka ọtụtụ magazin South Africa
Otu afọ ka e chiri Strauss okpueze Miss South Africa, o sonyere na nke mbụ na bụrụ naanị onye ama ama nke Celebrity Big Brother (usoro TV South Africa), ebe ọ gbara onye nke abụọ
N'afọ 2010, Jo-Ann gosipụtara emume mmeghe maka 2010 FIFA World Cup na mba South Africa maka ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn German ZDF ya na Thomas Gottschalk na mgbasa ozi sitere na Johannesburg na 10 June
N'afọ 2008, Strauss duziri Princess Project iji nye ụmụ agbọghọ kwesịrị ekwesị ohere ịga 'Matric Balls' ma ọ bụ 'Proms' ha n'uwe ndị na-emepụta ihe nke ndị amara ama na South Africa nweburu
Ebumnuche n'azụ atụmatụ ya sitere n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ya onwe ya gara Matric Dance ya na uwe 'a hụrụ n'anya n'oge gafere agafe' nke ya na nne ya zụtara na ụlọ ahịa nke abụọ
Strauss bụ otu n'ime ndị mgbasa ozi a na-akwanyere ùgwù na South Africa ma jiri profaịlụ ya na mmetụta ya nyere aka na atụmatụ dị iche iche

Ọtụtụ ndị South Africa na ndị mba ụwa ugbu a akwadola Princess Project ya ma nye ihe karịrị ụmụ agbọghọbia iri asatọ uwe ruo ugbu a site n'enyemaka nke magazin kachasị elu nke SA bụ YOU, Huisgenoot na Drum yana Top Billing
O sonyere International Fashion Sale n'afọ 2010 wee ruo ụmụ agbọghọbia kwesịrị ekwesị na mba SA
Atụmatụ ndị yiri ya dị gburugburu ụwa, na-eme ka ụmụ agbọghọ na-eto eto nwee mmetụta dị ka ụmụ adaeze nke oge a
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Strauss ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akwado ndị a mara ama maka nzukọ ikike ụmụaka nke mba ụwa, United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) na South Africa
Jo-Anne Richards bụ onye odeakụkọ na onye edemede South Africa
Jo-Anne Richards tolitere na Port Elizabeth, South Africa, wee gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Collegiate Girls
Akwụkwọ mbụ ọ gụrụ bụ The Boy Next Door na The Island of Adventure
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rhodes na Grahamstown n'afọ 1979, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta nsọpụrụ na Journalism na Linguistics
Ọ na-ejide PhD na okike ide na Mahadum Witwatersrand, ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi na akwụkwọ akụkọ maka afọ iri na ise
Richards rụrụ ọrụ oge niile maka akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa anọ - The Star, Sunday Express, Cape Times na Anyasị Post - akuko, sub-edezi na-edezi akụkọ
O deela atụmatụ na mgbakwunye maka ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ South Africa na akwụkwọ akụkọ, gụnyere Fair Lady, Elle, Diversions, True Love, Sunday Times Magazine, The Star na Mail & Guardian

Richards wee bụrụ onye a ma ama na akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Innocence of Roast Chicken (1996), bụ onye ghọrọ onye na-ere ahịa kacha mma na obodo ya wee depụta aha mkpirisi maka Nrite Akwụkwọ M-Net wee họpụta ya maka Impac International Dublin Literary Award
Richards dere na echiche dị ka ịgbalịsi ike na ịla azụ n'atụmatụ akwụkwọ nwụrụ anwụ n'etiti mgbe afọ 1990s
O bi na Cape Town, ebe ọ na-akụzi ihe okike
Richards lụrụ onye na-ede uri bụ Mark Swift
Ọ bụ onye isi oche mba South Africa Turner's Syndrome otu nkwado

Jo-anne Reyneke (a mụrụ na 2 June 1988) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ telivishọn ya dịka Pearl na Muvhango nke SABC 2 na dịka Prudence Oliphant, onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ maka Redemption Records, na etv's Rhythm City
A mụrụ Jo-anne Reyneke na Vereeniging, Gauteng n'aka nne ojii Zulu na nna ọcha
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke tolitere na Pietermaritzburg, KwaZulu-Natal site n'aka nne naanị ya
O kwuru banyere otu esi eme ya ka ọ na-etolite n'obodo ahụ n'ihi ìhè ya na akpụkpọ ahụ ya na ihe ndị dị na ya n'ihi ihe nketa agbụrụ ya
Ọ gara Russell High School (Pietermaritzburg) ebe ọ malitere inwe mmasị na ihe nkiri na nka
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ debanyere aha na Movietech Film and Television School na Durban ebe ọ gụrụ ime ihe nkiri na egwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na The Playhouse Company, Durban mgbe a tụbara ya na Duma Ndlovu play The Game, ya na Mary Twala, Lucia Mthiyane nakwa Sindi Dlathu
Dịka Duma Ndlovu bụ onye okike nke egwuregwu ahụ na onye okike na onye isi mmepụta nke Muvhango, e nyere Jo-anne ọrụ na Muvhango
Ọ bụ ọrụ ọganihu ya, na-enweta nkwado ya
N'afọ 2013, ọ hapụrụ Muvhango, na-egosi na Intersexions, tupu ọ pụta na Rhythm City n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-apụta na ọrụ ndị a ma ama na usoro ihe nkiri TV 'High roller, Isidingo na Scandal!
N'afọ 2019 ọ na-apụta na ihe ngosi BET 'Black Tax' ya na Jason Goliath na Mamodibe Ramodibe
N'afọ 2008, Jo-anne Reyneke lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Generations Thami Mngqolo, onye weere ọrụ 'Senzo Dlomo'
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ abụọ, Uvolwethu a mụrụ n'afọ 2013 na Lungelo a mụrụ n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2018 mgbe afọ 10 nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị, Reyneke na Mnqolo gbara alụkwaghịm
JoAnn Hardin Morgan (December 4, 1940) bu onye injinia izizi nwanyị na National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA ) John F
Kennedy Space Center na nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye isi ọrụ na Kennedy Space Center
Maka ọrụ ya na NASA, Onye isi ala US Bill Clinton kwanyere Morgan ugwu dịka onye isi nchịkwa na 1995 na 1998
Tupu ezumike nka ya n'afọ 2003, o nwere ọkwa ndu dị iche iche n'ime afọ iri anọ na mmemme ụgbọ elu mmadụ na NASA
Morgan jere ozi dị ka onye nduzi nke Mmekọrịta Mpụga na Mmepe Azụmahịa n'ime afọ ikpeazụ ya na oghere oghere

JoAnn Hardin, nwa nke ụmụ anọ nke Don na Laverne Hardin, mụrụ na Huntsville, Alabama na Disemba 4, 1940, na nso ebe nna ya guzoro dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọ elu US Army na Redstone Arsenal n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Titusville, Florida ebe nna ya rụrụ ọrụ na Cape Canaveral dị ka onye nchịkwa ngwa ngwa na mmemme rọketi US Army
N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere di ya n'ọdịnihu, Larry Morgan
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na June 1958, ọ sonyeere Army Ballistic Missile Agency na Cape Canaveral dị ka onye enyemaka injinia nkịtị
N'oge ọdịda nke 1958, Hardin debara aha na Mahadum Florida na Gainesville ebe ọ gụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ
N'oge ezumike ọkọchị ya, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Canaveral n'okpuru ndị ndụmọdụ dịka onye injinia German-American Wernher von Braun
N'ọrụ ya dị ka onye enyemaka injinia, Hardin nwere ahụmịhe aka na imepụta sistemu kọmpụta rọketi maka mmemme ụgbọ elu NASA mbụ
Mgbe Hardin nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Arts na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Jacksonville State na Alabama na 1963, ọ gara ọrụ maka NASA na Kennedy Space Center dị ka onye injinia ikuku
Na afọ 1963, Morgan malitere ọrụ oge niile na Kennedy Space Center

Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ injinia nwanyị, ọ na-echetakwa na ya 'ga-anọgide na-abụ nanị nwanyị ebe ahụ ruo ogologo oge' Morgan bụ naanị onye injinia nwanyị nọ n'ime ụlọ ịgba egbe n'oge mmalite nke Apollo 11 na abalị iri na isii na onwa nke asaa na afọ 1969
Morgan ji ọchị na-ekwu na 'maka afọ iri na ise mbụ, arụrụ m ọrụ n'ụlọ ebe a na-enweghị ebe ezumike ụmụ nwanyị,' na 'ọ bụ nnukwu ụbọchị n'akwụkwọ m mgbe enwere otu'
A họpụtara Morgan dika onye ga enweta Sloan Fellowship iji kwado ya maka ọkwa nchịkwa na oghere
Ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Stanford wee nweta Masters of Science na 1977
Na afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, nye ya okwa dika onye isi nke ngalaba ọrụ Kọmputa

Morgan rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke Mpụga Mmekọahụ na Mmepe Azụmahịa n'ime afọ ikpeazụ ya na oghere belụsọ obere oge na 2002 mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya onye nnọchi anya KSC ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa
Morgan lara ezumike nká n'August 2003 na-eje ozi afọ iri anọ na ise nye NASA
Onye isi ala US Bill Clinton kwanyere Morgan ugwu dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na 1995 na 1998
N'afọ 1995, a kpọbatara ya na Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Nwanyị Florida

Dị ka Orlando Business Journal si kwuo, 'n'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mmemme ụgbọ elu mmadụ nke US, Morgan enwetawo ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù na onyinye, gụnyere ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya n'oge mmalite nke Apollo Launch Complex 39, ihe nrite ọrụ anọ pụrụ iche, na abụọ pụtara ìhè
nrite onye ndu' Ọ nwetara Nrite Nduzi pụtara ìhè na 1991 na 2001, Society of Women Engineer's National 'Upward Mobility Award,' na American Society of Mechanical EngineersJ
Tal Webb Award' na 1994, 'Asọpụrụ Ọrụ Apụrụiche' site na Space

Coast Chapter of Federally Employed Women in 1996, 'Achievement Award for Management Leadership' site na 34th Annual Space Congress na 1998, 'Debus Award' site na National Space Club na 1998, na '1998 Presidential Distinguished Rank Award'
Morgan bụ onye otu AIAA, National Space Club, na Tau Beta Pi
A họpụtara Morgan ka ọ bụrụ onye nlekọta nke mahadum steeti Florida maka okwu abụọ, na 2001 na 2003
Kpọpụta njehie is not used in prior text
Àtụ Florida Women's Hall of Fame
Josephine Vallentine (a mụrụ na 30 Mee 1946) bụ onye Australia na-ahụ maka udo na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye bụbu onye omeiwu nke Western Australia

Ọ banyere na Senate n'ụbọchị 1 Julaị 1985 mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Nuclear Disarmament Party mana ọ nọdụrụ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya ma mesịa bụrụ onye otu Greens Western Australia site n'ụbọchị 1 Julaị 1990
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na 31 Jenụwarị 1992
Jo Vallentine tolitere na Beverley, na mpaghara Wheatbelt nke Western Australia
Dị ka nwa agbọghọ ọ gara United States ma kpaliri ya ịnụ ma zute Robert F
Kennedy

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 2001 maka akụkọ mere eme nke òtù udo nke WA, o kwuru, sị 'Ndị Quakers metụtara m na-eche na m sitere n'oge Vietnam Moratorium n'ihi na m bụ onye nkuzi n'oge ahụ, n'afọ 1967-69, mgbe ngagharị na-aga na Perth, enwere m ike icheta na m na-enwe ntakịrị ụjọ n'ihi n'ụbọchị ndị ahụ ọ bụrụ na a hụrụ gị na ngagharị iwe ị nwere ike ị tụfuru ọrụ gị na Mọnde mgbe ị gara ọrụ
' [citation needed]
Na mkpọsa ntuli aka mbụ ya n'afọ 1984, mmasị mgbasa ozi lekwasịrị anya na onye NDP Senate maka New South Wales, onye na-agụ egwu Midnight Oil bụ Peter Garrett
Otú ọ dị, n'okpuru usoro ịtụ vootu nke Senate nke Australia nke nnọchiteanya ruru eru, Western Australia bụ naanị steeti weghachiri onye omeiwu NDP
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe a họpụtara ya, Jo Vallentine gbara arụkwaghịm na NDP, nọrọ n'oche Senate ya dị ka onye nweere onwe ya ma họpụta ya ọzọ na ntuli aka n'afọ 1987
N'afọ 1990, dị ka onye mbụ na-azọ ọkwa onye omebe iwu nke Greens WA, a họpụtara ya ọzọ mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ihi ọrịa tupu ọ gụchaa oge ya
Christabel Chamarette jupụtara n'oghere ahụ
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ omebe iwu, Jo Vallentine gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya, wee gaa n'ihu n'ụlọ ọrụ 'Joint Facilities' Pine Gap dị nso na Alice Springs
E jidere ya
Ọ gakwara n'ihu na American Clark Air Base na Philippines n'afọ 1989
Mgbalị ya mere ka o nwee ọdachi
Mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Senate (a họpụtara Christabel Chamarette ka ọ nọchie ya), Vallentine were oge iji gbakee site na ọrịa
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1994, ọ na-enyere aka ịchọta Alternatives to Violence Project na Western Australia, lekwasịrị anya n'ịkekọrịta nkà na-abụghị ime ihe ike na ndị nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ

Ọ gakwara njem na Peace Pilgrimage nke afọ 1997, sonyere na mkpọsa Jabiluka, nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na mkpọsa iji mee ka ọnụ mmiri Guilderton ghara inwe mmepe obodo dị n'akụkụ ndịda nke Osimiri Moore, ma na-aga n'ihu na-emegide Agha Iraq nke afọ 2003, iji uranium eme ihe na Iraq (na US nwere ike iji ya mee ihe na Lancelin) na mgbasawanye nke ike nuklia na ngwá agha
N'ime nyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke steeti ahụ na Nọvemba 2006, akwụkwọ akụkọ West Australian kpọrọ Jo Vallentine dịka otu n'ime mmadụ 100 kachasị emetụta steeti ahụ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ụmụnwanyị a họpụtara maka Nobel Peace Prize
Onye bụbu South Australian Liberal Senator Mary Jo Fisher bụ nwa nwanne Vallentine
Jo da Silva, bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri na onye na- eme nkwupụta Televishion nke South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ama ama bụ Gabriël, Operation Delta Force 3 Clear Target na Arsenaal
Da Silva gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Wits na 1990 site na nzere na nka ime ejije nkiri O nwekwara diplọma nke nkuzi na mmụta gbasara ihe nkiri
Da Silva lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa bụ Eckard Rabe site na 1996 ruo 2007
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere otu nwa nwanyị, bụ Caitlin
Na 2010, ma Da Silva na Rabe gosipụtara agwa ọrụ na soapie nke South Africa, 7de Laan
Da Silva malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri wee gaa n'ihu ruo ọtụtụ afọ n'ihe nkiri nkwago
Ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri Soap opera bụ Isidingo nke o gosiri agwa dị ka'Natasha Wallace'
Emechaa o gosipụta agwa dị ka 'Gita McGregor' na nhazi telivishọn 7de Laan
Maka ọrụ ya dị ka Gita McGregor, a họpụtara Da Silva dị ka nwanyị ike pụtara ìhè' na nnabata Royalty Soapie Awọd na 2013
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye nturu ugo Royalty Soapie ọzọ na ngalaba 'nwanyị ike pụtara ìhè' maka ọrụ ya na 7de Laan
A họpụtara Da Silva na udi nke 'Onye ihe nkiri Soapie kacha mma' maka ọrụ ya na 7de Laan na 2016 nke awọ dụ Huisgenoot Tempo
Da Silva hapụrụ 7de Laan na 2016, ma-kwaga Cape Town ka ya na nwa ya nwanyị nọrọ oge na ịrụ ọrụ nke onwe ya
E wezụga ọrụ ndị a, Da Silva sonyekwara ihe nkiri telivishọn gụnyere Gabriel, Arsenaal, Madam & Eve, Suburban Bliss na Egoli
Malite na 2007, ọ gosipụtara dị ka 'Olivia Fitzgerald' na nhazi ihe nkiri telivishọn ama ama bụ Erfsondes
Mgbe ọ hapụchara ogologo oge ezumike na ụlọ ihe nkiri, ọ mechara laghachi na ogbo site n'ịrụ ọrụ abụọ na ihe nkiri bụ Present Laughter nke Noël Coward dere
E gosipụtara ihe omume a na Ụlọ ihe nkiri nọ na Bay
Emechaa ọ gosipụta n'ihe nkiri, Fatal Attraction, nke e gosipụtara na Ụlọ ihe nkiri nụ Bay na Pieter Toerien's Monte Casino Theatre dị na Johannesburg
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, o n'emekwa mmepụta eduzi ma n'egosi ihe ngosi akwụkwọ akụkọ M-Net 'Showbuzz'
Ọ bụkwa onye ndu nwanyị n'ihe nkiri Bekee, bụ It rained last night

Ọ bụkwa onye ndu nwanyị n'ihe nkiri Bekee, bụ It rained last night
Joan Helene Hambidge (amụrụ ya na 11 Septemba 1956 na Aliwal North, South Afriika) (aha nna bekee n'agbanyeghị), bụ onye na-ede uri Afrikaans, onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ onye na-ede uri na Afrịka, na-arụrịta ụka dị ka onye ọha na eze na nkatọ na ama ama maka ụdị edemede ya na-apụ apụ
Enyemaka usoro mmụta ya na-emetụta Roland Barthes, mwepu, postmodernism, psychoanalysis na metaphysics
Hambidge gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stellenbosch na Mahadum Pretoria
A nabatara ya na doctorate n'okpuru André P
Brink na Mahadum Rhodes na 1985
Dọkịta nke abụọ sochiri ( Mahadum Cape Town, 2001)
Ọ bụ ezie na Hambidge kwuru na ọ chọtara ihe ngosi ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ bụ mgbe ọ bụ onye nkuzi na Mahadum North, Limpopo Province, South Africa, ka ọ malitere ito eto dị ka onye edemede
Enyere ya ihe nrite Eugène Marais maka akwụkwọ maka uri nke abụọ ya, Bitterlemoene ('Bitter Oranges'), na 1986
Ihe nrite a bụ otu n'ime ihe nrite agụmagụ kacha achọsi ike na South AfriIkaa
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite Litera yana ụlọ akwụkwọ uri uri nke Africa maka uri ya
Ugbu a ọ bụ prọfesọ na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Asụsụ na Akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ede na Afrikaans, Hambidge atụgharịala ụfọdụ uri ya n'asụsụ Bekee
Jo Nel, onye na-ede uri ibe ya na ezigbo enyi Johann de Lange, na Charl JF Cilliers, emewo nsụgharị ndị ọzọ
E bipụtala ọrụ ya na Netherlands na UK yana na US
N'ịbụ onye bipụtaworo mpịakọta ịrị abụọ na isii nke abụ ruo n'afọ 2016, ọ bụ onye na-ede uri kachasị na Afrikaans
Mmasị Hambidge nwere n'echiche agụmagụ (karịsịa psychoanalysis na metafiction ) pụtara n'ihe odide ya, ọkachasị na akụkọ ifo ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ọdịiche dị n'etiti tiori na omume na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Judaskus ('Judas kiss', 1998) na 'Kladboek' (2008)

O bipụtakwala ọrụ usoro ihe abụọ Postmodernisme (1995), banyere Roland Barthes, deconstruction and post-modernism, na Psigoanalise en lees ('Psychoanalysis and reading', 1991), na Jacques Lacan na ịgụ akwụkwọ
Hambidge bụ onye njem na-eme njem ma na-ede kọlụm kwa izu maka Cape Town kwa ụbọchị, Die Burger
Ọ bụ onye nkatọ na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ e-zine Litnet nke Afrikaans
Hambidge bụ onye ama ama maka ụzọ akara ngosi ya na enweghị nkwanye ùgwù maka ọdịnala agụmagụ na Afrịka na arụsị ọdịnala yana maka nyochagharị ya nke isiokwu ndị dị na mbụ
Ọ bụkwa onye odee Afrịka nke mbụ lebarala anya n'ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị nwere mmasị nwanyị site n'echiche onye nyocha
Ọ na-amanye ntụgharị ọchị na satirical n'ọtụtụ isiokwu ọ na-agba
Joan Cynthia Harrison (mgbe e mesịrị Breetzke, amụrụ na 29 Nọvemba na afọ 1935) bụ onye na-egwu mmiri na South Africa lara ezumike nká nke meriri 100m backstroke event na afọ 1952 Olympics
Nne Harrison bụ onye na-egwu mmiri na nna ya na-egwu rugby
Joan gara Clarendon High School for Girls na East London
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, o nwere ihe ndekọ mba atọ na abụọ dị elu, na utu aha igwu mmiri abụọ dị elu

N'afọ 1950, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ meriri 440 yd freestyle na British Empire Games, na-akụ ihe ndekọ egwuregwu gara aga site na sekọnd iri na atọ ma na-emecha sekọnd asaa n'ihu ndị asọmpi ndị ọzọ, a kwupụtakwara na ọ bụ nwanyị na-egwu mmiri nke egwuregwu ahụ
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo abụọ ọzọ na 1954 British Empire na Commonwealth Games
N'afọ 1982, a nabatara ya n'ime International Swimming Hall of Fame

Joana Choumali (a mụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya nke bi na Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire Ọ na-eji foto iji chọpụta nsogbu nke njirimara na ọdịiche dị iche iche nke ọdịbendị Afrịka
Usoro ya nke afọ 2014, Hâbré, the Last Generation, na-edekọ ọgbọ ikpeazụ nke ndị Afrịka na-ese ihe n'ihu
N'afọ 2019, e nyere ya Prix Pictet maka usoro ya Ça va aller (Ọ ga-adị mma)
A mụrụ Choumali ma zụlitekwa ya na Abidjan
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mba ụwa, ọ gụrụ Graphic Arts na Casablanca ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nka na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi tupu ọ malite ọrụ foto ya
Ụdị ya gụnyere ihe osise echiche, mgbasa ozi agwakọtara agwakọta na ihe nkiri
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na Afrịka, echiche ya banyere ọdịbendị dị iche iche gbara ya gburugburu, na echiche ya na-agbasawanye banyere ụwa
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Choumali na-aga Adaou, obere obodo dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ, ileta nne nne ya, onye ọrụ ugbo na onye ahịa
Ọ na-enwekarị mmetụta nke ọdịbendị dị iche n'ihi na ha anaghị asụ otu asụsụ ma ọ bụ soro ahụmahụ ndụ
Mgbe nne nne ya nwụsịrị na 2001, Choumali kwara arịrị na ọ tụfuru akụkụ nke akụkọ ezinụlọ ya ma jụọ ajụjụ banyere njirimara ya dị ka onye Afrịka
Ahụmahụ a kpaliri usoro ihe osise ya nke afọ 2014, 'Resilients', nke na-edekọ ụmụ agbọghọ, ndị ọkachamara n'Afrịka bụ ndị na-agbasi mbọ ike ijikọ na ọdịnala ezinụlọ ha
Nanị ihe achọrọ bụ na ụmụ nwanyị ga-eyi uwe ọdịnala nke nne nne ha ma ọ bụ onye ikwu nwanyị tọrọ ha yi, na-emesi njikọ dị n'etiti oge gara aga na ugbu a ike
Choumali na-enwe mmasị ịhụ ndị si n'ebe dị iche iche na-eji mpako na-egosipụta ihu ha esere ihe Ivory Coast, mana omume ahụ na-anwụ
Ọrụ Choumali nke afọ 2014, Hâbré, the Last Generation, na-edekọ ọgbọ ikpeazụ nke ndị Afrịka na-ese ihe n'ihu
A na-akpọ ya 'A na-asụ asụsụ a; otu okwu a na-apụta echiche atọ ahụ niile na 'A na Burkina Faso'
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị e sere foto si Burkina Faso kwaga ogologo oge gara aga, mana ise ihe n'ihu na-echetara ha obodo ha n'oge gara aga ha
Ọrụ ahụ na-achịkọta akaebe ha ma na-eleba anya na njikọta ha n'ime ọha mmadụ Ivoirian
Joana Ruvimbo Mamombe (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 18 n'ọnwa Jun n'afọ 1993) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe, onye bụbu onye ndu ụmụ akwụkwọ na onye otu njiko ndi mmadu maka mgbanwe
A maara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị omeiwu Zimbabwe kacha nta, na-anọchite anya Harare West
A mụrụ Mamombe na Harare na June 18, 1993
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Monte Cassino Girls High School ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2011
Ọ gara Chinhoyi University of Technology ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Biotechnology
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Gender Officer maka Zimbabwe National Students Union (ZINASU)
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Chinhoyi University of Technology, ọ gara n'ihu na Mahadum Bergen na Norway ebe ọ nwetara nzere Masters na Molecular Biology
Mamombe sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Norway wee laghachi Zimbabwe na 2018
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Harare West n'okpuru tiketi nke MDC Alliance
Mgbe ntuli aka nke emere na Julaị 30 2018, ọ ṅụrụ iyi ọrụ
Na 2 Machị 2019, e jidere ya ma bo ya ebubo ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru
E boro ya ebubo na ọ na-anwa ịkwatu ọchịchị a họpụtara n'usoro iwu nke onye isi ala Emmerson Mnangagwa, mgbe o duziri ngagharị iwe na 14 Jenụwarị 2018

N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2020, ndị mwakpo kpuchiri ihu tọọrọ ya na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ndị ọzọ, ndị na-akwado MDC Cecilia Chimbiri na Netsai Marova, na ngagharị iwe Harare megide ọdịda gọọmentị na-egbo mkpa ndị ogbenye n'oge ọrịa COVID-19
Mgbe ụbọchị abụọ gasịrị, a hụrụ ụmụ nwanyị ahụ, merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu ma nwee obi mgbawa, n'akụkụ ụzọ dị kilomita iri isii site na Harare
Ha kwuru na a tara ha ahụhụ ma metọọ ha ugboro ugboro
Kemgbe Mee 2020, e jidere ụmụ nwanyị atọ ahụ ma jide ha ọtụtụ ugboro

N'agbanyeghị na Mamombe pụtara n'ụlọ ikpe ugboro 129 n'ime ọnwa iri na abụọ gara aga, a gọnarịrị ya ugboro ugboro mgbapụtaDị ka akụkụ nke ọnọdụ mgbapụta ha kachasị ọhụrụ, a naghị ekwe ka Mamombe na Chimbiri kwuo okwu na nzukọ nke ihe karịrị mmadụ iri ise ma ọ bụ tinye aka na ọrụ ọ bụla, nke megidere iwu Covid-19
Joanna Pettway (1924 - 1993) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na nwa nwanyị nke ónyé na-ese akwa Gees Bend Martha Jane Pettway
A mụrụ Pettway na 1924 na Gees Bend, Alabama
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri na abụọ nke Martha Jane snd Little Pettway, na-ebi ndụ ya niile na Gees Bend
A na-ejikọta ya na otu Gee's Bend nkè ndị na-emepụta akwa
Ọrụ Joanna Pettway dị na nchịkọta nkè Birmingham Museum of Art, Montgomery Museum of Fine Arts, na Philadelphia Museum of Art
Joanna Trollope CBE / / ˈtrɒləp / ; amuru 9 Disemba 1943) bu onye odee Bekee
Odewokwa n'okpuru pseudonym nke Caroline Harvey
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ Parson Harding's Daughter meriri na 1980 ihe nrite nke Romantic Novel of the Year site n'aka Associationtù Ndị Na-ahụ Maka Akwụkwọ akụkọ Romantic
A mụrụ Trollope na 9 Disemba 1943 na ụlọ nna nna ya na Minchinhampton, Gloucestershire, England, ada Rosemary Hodson na Arthur George Cecil Trollope
Nna ya bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford nke ghọrọ onye isi nke obere ụlọ ọrụ na onye na-ese ihe
Nne ya bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye edemede
Nna ya gara ije agha na India mgbe a mụrụ ya; ọ lọghachiri mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Ezinụlọ ahụ biri na Reigate, Surrey, ebe ọ bụ ọkpara n'ime ụmụ atọ; Trollope nwere nwanne na nwanne
Trollope gụrụ akwụkwọ na Reigate County School for Girls, sochiri akwụkwọ mmụta 1961 na St Hugh's College, Oxford ebe ọ gụrụ Bekee
Nna ya bụ otu ezinụlọ dị ka onye edemede Victoria bụ Anthony Trollope ; ọ bụ nwa nwanne ya nke ọgbọ nke ise, na ọ bụ nwanne nna nke onye edemede na onye mgbasa ozi James Trollope
Maka iketa aha ahụ, o kwuru
Site na 1965 ruo 1967, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Office Ofesi na Commonwealth
Mgbe ọ bụ onye ọrụ obodo, ọ nyochara Eastern Europe na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti China na mba ndị na-emepe emepe
Site na 1967 ruo 1979, e were ya n'ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọkwa nkuzi tupu ọ ghọọ onye edemede oge niile na 1980
Trollope malitere ide akụkọ gbasara ịhụnanya n'okpuru pseudonym nke Caroline Harvey, aha mbụ nke nne na nna nna ya

Ọ bụ ezie na ndị a bụ nkà mmụta ya dị irè, ọ bịara kwere 'Ọ bụ ụdị na-ezighị ezi maka oge ahụ' N'ịbụ onye di ya nke abụọ, Ian Curteis gbara ume, a kpaliri ya ka ọ gbanwee gaa na akụkọ ifo nke oge a bụ nke a maara ya
The Choir, nke e bipụtara na 1987, bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya
Nwunye Rector, nke e bipụtara na 1991, chụpụrụ Jeffrey Archer site na n'elu ndepụta hardback bestseller

Dị ka nkọwa, o kwuru na 2006 'ma e wezụga thrillers ọ dịghị ihe dị n'etiti ala nke omenala akwụkwọ akụkọ, nke bụ ebe m chere na m nọ' N'afọ 1992, ọ bụ naanị Jilly Cooper 's Polo na Archer's Dị ka Crow Flies bụ ndị na-ere akwụkwọ kacha mma
'Echere m na akwụkwọ m bụ naanị akwụkwọ akụkọ ọdịnala ochie hụrụ n'anya na-alaghachi azụ,' ka ọ gwara Geraldine Bedell na N'ajụjụ ọnụ 1993 maka The Independent na Sọnde
A na-akọwakarị Aga sagas, maka isiokwu ime obodo ha, naanị akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ nke Trollope (site na 2006) na-egosipụta Aga
Ntinye okwu a na The Oxford Companion to English Literature (2009) na-ekwu na 'ọ dịghị ma ọlị, ọrụ ya niile dabara na n'ozuzu nkasi obi mmetụta nke labelụ'
N'ịjụ akara ahụ dị ka ọ bụghị eziokwu, Trollope gwara Lisa Allardice, na-ede maka The Guardian na 2006 'N'ezie, akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ahụ na-agbagọ agbagọ, na-adịghị mma

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ ihe na-akwado ya, ọ bụghị ya?' Allardice rụrụ ụka na akwụkwọ Trollope nwetara 'aha mara mma' ka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya 'gbasarala okwu ndị na-esiwanye ike nke ogwu gụnyere mmasị nwanyị, ezinụlọ gbajiri agbaji na nkuchi, ọnọdụ na-agba ọchịchịrị na akwụkwọ akụkọ ọ bụla
Terence Blacker, bụ onye chepụtara okwu maka akụkọ ifo Trollope na Publishing News na 1992, kwetara afọ iri ka e mesịrị na ọ 'nwere mmetụta nke ikpe mara' maka ịkụ osisi Trollope na nkebiokwu ahụ
Trollope gwara Bedell na 1993 na akụkọ ifo ya na-eme 'ihe akwụkwọ akụkọ ọdịnala na-emebu' site n'ichepụta eziokwu na inyocha 'ndụ mmetụta uche ndị mmadụ'
Bedell chọpụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya ruo mgbe ahụ bụ
'Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ bụla suburban, nke bụ ezigbo ọnọdụ nke ọtụtụ n'ime England

A na-eme ihe omume trollopian na nnukwu ụlọ ime obodo, na nnukwu tebụl kichin; ya dọkịta, vicars, ọkàiwu na craft-gallery nwe nwere ike na-eche banyere ego, dị ka ya onwe ya ndị mụrụ ya mere, ma ha enweghị ihe ọ bụla na-elekọta mmadụ nchegbu a na-akpọ ha maka ihe ọṅụṅụ na nnukwu ụlọ dị ka a okwu nke N'ezie
Akwụkwọ ndị ahụ bụ ndị a ma ama n'ụzọ akụ na ụba, ma bụrụ ndị na-achọsi ike n'ụzọ nke aka ha, dị ka ihe na-egbuke egbuke nke ndị Eighties'
N'afọ 2009, o nyere ọrụ mkpirisi akụkọ The Piano Man nye Oxfam's ' Ox-Tales ', nchịkọta akụkọ UK anọ nke ndị ode akwụkwọ 38 dere
E bipụtara akụkọ Trollope na nchịkọta 'mmiri'
O deela akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ na Harper Collins na-emelite nke Jane Austen canon, The Austen Project
E bipụtara ụdị ya nke 'Sense na Sensibility' n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2013 na-enwe obere ihe ịga nke ọma
Ntugharị nke nwunye Rector (1994), nke emepụtara maka Channel 4, nke Lindsay Duncan na Ronald Pickup nwere kpakpando
Ọ gbara Jane Asher na James Fox
N'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ya ndị ọzọ, A Village Affair na ụmụaka ndị ọzọ ka emegharịrị maka telivishọn
ndu nke onwe
Ịlụ nwunye nwanyị ahụ 'N'iji anya ya dị nkọ, ụda dị nro na aghụghọ, ime ihe ike, akwụkwọ akụkọ itoolu nke Joanna Trollope na-ebuga ihe niile dị na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya, ma na-ejedebe na aghụghọ dị nro
Abalị Fraịde Heather Thompson nke The Guardian kpọrọ Friday Nights 'ìhè ma nghọta na-ele anya nke ọma nkedo agwa'
Charlie Lee-Potter, n'akwụkwọ akụkọ maka The Independent, dere na Nwanna & Nwanyị
Na 14 Mee 1966, Trollope lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego obodo David Roger William Potter; Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Antonia na Louise, tupu ịgba alụkwaghịm ha na 1983
Na 1985, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn bụ Ian Curteis wee bụrụ nne nne nke ụmụ ya nwoke abụọ; Ya na Curteis gbara alụkwaghịm na 2001
Mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm nke abụọ ya gasịrị, Trollope kwagara West London
Ọ bụ nne ochie
Trollope pụtara na mbipụta 1994 nke Desert Island discs

Usoro ihe ngosi ahụ na-agwa ndị ọbịa ka ha họrọ akwụkwọ na ihe okomoko ka ha na ha ga-aga n'àgwàetiti a na-eche n'echiche; Trollope họọrọ The Oxford Book of English Verse na akwa nwere akwa ọcha nke ndị Ijipt

O gakwara n'ihu n'igu akwukwo iji mezue ogo mmụta Master na Human Performance nke gbadoro ukwu na itinye uche na Sports Management na 2003

Aluka nwetara ọrụ izizi mbụ ya na nkuzi ihe banyere basketball na FIU ebe ọrụ ya gụnyere inye aka na ntinye, egwuregwu, ya na nkwalite na ogige amps
Tupu ọ banye na n'oru nkuzi na nchịkwa basketball, ọ rụpụtara ọrụ ya nke ọma na egwuregwu na Middle Tennessee State (1997-2002)
Joanne Martin, PhD
bụ onye na-ahụ maka nchekwa na ihe egwu onye rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche teknụzụ nke IBM site na 2010–2012, yana onye isi nchekwa nchekwa ozi (CISO) na VP maka ihe egwu IT sitere na 2012–2015
Martin nwetara PhD
na mgbakọ na mwepụ na 1981 site na Mahadum Johns Hopkins
Ọ malitere ọrụ nyocha ya na Los Alamos National Laboratory

Martin sonyeere IBM dị ka onye ọrụ nyocha na 1984 na Thomas J Watson Research Center, na 'jere ozi na ndị ọrụ nchịkwa nke mepụtara ma nyefee supercomputer mbụ nke IBM, na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche maka njikwa arụmọrụ na nyocha nke usoro'
Magazin ndị nne na-arụ ọrụ kpọrọ ya aha dị ka otu n'ime ndị nne 25 kasị nwee mmetụta na-arụ ọrụ maka 1998
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na ụlọ ọrụ US dị iche iche, gụnyere Ngalaba Ike US, National Science Foundation, na National Research Council
A kpọbatara ya na Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị Nkà na ụzụ nke Fame na 2012
Jocelyne Machevo bụ onye isi ike nke Mozambik bụ onye a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ọrụ gas mbụ maka mba Mozambique, Coral South FLNG Project
Ọ bụ nwanyị Mozambik mbụ nwere ọkwa onye isi na Eni Ronuma Basin

O nwere nzere na injinịa obodo na Higher Institute of Transport and Communications na Mozambique na nzere masta na Economy and Management of Energy and Environment na Eni Corporate University na Milan, Italy
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Young African Leader Initiative (YALI), ọ gara otu mbụ nke Power Africa - Young Women in African Power Leadership Training na 2018

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2013 dị ka injinia na ahụ maka ọdịmma uzo na Eni, ụlọ ọrụ ike mba ụwa, ebe ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na ngalaba Projects ma nweta nkà na njikwa ọrụ, mmepe azụmahịa, nkwekọrịta ọkọnọ Gas na LNG, njikwa ndị na-ahụ maka ya, mmepe ọdịnaya obodo na atụmatụ mmepe obodo
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na onye Mozambik mbụ nwere ọkwa onye isi na Eni Rovuma Basin, Eni subsidiary na Mozambique
Na ngwụcha afọ 2020, ọ sonyeere Total Exploration & Production Mozambique, dị ka Interface Lead na nnukwu ọrụ LNG na Mozambique n'oge ahụ, Mozambique LNG

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye ndụmọdụ O&G na Energy na mpaghara mmepe azụmahịa, atụmatụ itinye ego, itinye aka na ndị na-ahụ maka ya, mmepe ọdịnaya obodo, mgbanwe ike na dị iche iche, ịkwụwa aka ọtọ na itinye aka
N'afọ 2017, o ritere ihe nrite 'Outstanding Mozambican Woman of the Year' na CWC Mozambique Gas Summit
N'afọ 2019, o ritere Power Play Rising Star Award, nke e nyere nwa agbọghọ na-erubeghị afọ iri atọ na ise nke nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ụlọ ọrụ LNG
N'afọ 2021, ọ natara onyinye kacha mma na mbipụta nke abụọ nke Angola Oil & Gas Technology Conference (AOTC) na Luanda, Angola
A na-enye onyinye a nye nwanyị nke na-aga n'ihu mgbe niile iji nwee mmetụta dị mma na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma na-eje ozi dị ka mmụọ nsọ na ihe nlereanya nye ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị
Ihe nrite a na-anabata ọrụ Jocelyne na-arụ na Ụlọ ọrụ Mmanụ na Gas

Jodi Balfour (a mụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 24, n'afọ 1987) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya dịka Gladys Witham na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Canada Bomb Girls na Apple TV + space drama series For All Mankind
Balfour tolitere na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye so achikọba youth television series Bling nke South Africa na mmalite afọ ndi 2000
Kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Britain na Canada
A họpụtara ya dịka Gladys Witham na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Canada Bomb Girls n'afọ 2013

O ritere ihe nrite Canadian Screen Award for Best Lead Actress in a Television Film or Miniseries na 3rd Canadian Screen Awards n'afọ 2015 maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn na-esote Bomb Girls Facing the Enemy
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya na usoro Cinemax
Kemgbe afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na Apple TV + space drama series For All Mankind
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, a họpụtara ya na Apple TV + bọl sitcom Ted Lasso
Balfour bi na Vancouver, British Columbia, ebe na mgbakwunye na ime ihe nkiri ya, ọ bụ onye nwe ụlọ kọfị na mpaghara Gastown nke obodo ahụ
Na 30 June 2021, ọ kwupụtara na Instagram na ọ na-akọwa dịka onye na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, na-ekwu na ọ hụrụ na ọ na-enwere onwe ya 'n'ikpeazụ ịnabata ma chọpụta [ya] queerness'
Na 24 Ọktoba 2021, Balfour kwupụtara na Instagram na ya na Abbi Jacobson nwere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya
Jodi Bieber (a mụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto
A họpụtara foto ya nke Bibi Aisha, nwanyị si Afghanistan nke di ya na nwanne di ya gbupụrụ ntị ya na imi ya, dị ka World Press Photo of the Year n'afọ 2010
A mụrụ Bieber n'afọ 1966 na Johannesburg

Ná mbido afọ ndị 1990, ọ gara Market Photo Workshop ma kpuchie ntuli aka ukwu nke South Africa n'afọ 1994, ntuli aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya izizi nke South Africa, banyere The Star Ọ zụrụ n'okpuru Ken Oosterbroek na 1993 ma rụọ ọrụ na South Africa ruo 1996
N'afọ 2000, o kpuchiri ọrịa ebola na Uganda maka The New York Times Magazine
Bieber ekwuola na ọrụ ya abụghị foto akụkọ 'Anaghị m achọ ebumnuche
Abụ m naanị onye na-ese foto
Ana m egosi ihe m na-ahụ na ihe na-emetụ m n'ahụ, ógè niile site n'echiche m
Bibi Aisha, onye dị afọ iri na asatọ n'oge ahụ, mebiri emebi mgbe ndị Taliban mara ya ikpe banyere ịgbaba n'aka di na-eme ihe ike n'ụlọ ezinụlọ ya

David Burnett, onye isi oche nke ndị ọka ikpe World Press Photo (WPP), kwuru banyere foto Bieber nke Aisha, 'Nke a nwere ike ịghọ otu n'ime foto ndị ahụ - anyị nwere ma eleghị anya naanị iri n'oge ndụ anyị - ebe ọ bụrụ na mmadụ asị, 'Ị maara, foto ahụ nke nwa agbọghọ', ị maara kpọmkwem nke ha na-ekwu banyere ya
' Ihe nrite Foto nke Afọ bụ ihe nrite WPP nke iri nke Bieber
N'ikwu okwu màkà foto ahụ, Bieber kwuru 'Enwere m ike ịme foto ya na-ele anya ma ọ bụ na-egosi ya dị ka onye ahụ

Echere m na 'ee, nwanyị a mara mma' ' N'ime edemede nke afọ 2014, Hilary Janks tụlere nchegbu Bieber banyere ịma mma Aisha ma jụọ ma 'mkpagbu ahụ [ga-abụ] abụ ihe a na-enyo enyo ma ọ bụrụ na Aisha adịghị eto ma mara mma'
E bipụtara akwụkwọ Bieber Soweto nke na-egosi ihe nkiri nke oge a site na obodo Soweto na Johannesburg, n'afọ 2010
Bieber kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka mgbalị iji megide echiche maka Soweto na iji dozie enweghị nnọchi anya nke Soweto post-Apartheid
N'oge mmechi a machibidoro maka ọrịa COVID-19 na South Africa, Bieber bipụtara na Instagram ọtụtụ foto nke di ya Francois n'uwe dị iche iche
Jodi Evans (amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye Canada na-agba bọọlụ
Evans gbara bọọlụ maka ndị otu Canada Women's National Basketball Team na 1996 Summer Olympics
Evans mere isi akụkọ mba ụwa n'afọ 1993 dị ka nwanyị mbụ nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwoke nke Mahadum Oxford na The Varsity Game megide Mahadum Cambridge
Evans nọ na Mahadum Calgary Dinos site n'afọ 1987 ruo afọ 1991
N'afọ 2005, a nabatara ya na Mahadum nke Calgary Hall of Fame
Evans gara Mahadum Oxford dị ka Rhodes Scholar n'afọ 1991 wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na DPhil na Management Studies
Mgbe ọ nọ na Oxford, Evans bụ onye isi otu 1994 National Championship Oxford University Women's Basketball Team
Evans mere isi akụkọ mba ụwa dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-anọchite anya otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwoke nke Mahadum Oxford na The Varsity Game megide Cambridge
N'oge gara aga, e kpebiri na ya erughị eru igwu egwu na egwuregwu ọ bụla nke ụmụ nwoke BSSF
ma ọ bụ egwuregwu asọmpi na mkpebi esemokwu site n'aka ndị na-achịkwa egwuregwu ahụ n'ihi na ọ bụ nwanyị
Jodie Evans (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba 22, 1954) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Evans jere ozi na kọmitii nke Gọvanọ California Jerry Brown ma duzie mkpọsa 1992 ya maka onye isi ala
Evans na Medea Benjamin na ndị ọzọ guzobere otu ụmụ nwanyị na-emegide agha Code Pink
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Rainforest Action Network
Amụrụ Evans ma zụlite ya na Las Vegas, Nevada
O buru ụzọ nwee mmasị na ikpe ziri ezi mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odibo na nnukwu họtel Las Vegas dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma dịka ndị ọrụ ibe ya haziri, ọ gara ije maka ụgwọ ọrụ
Omume mkpesa CODEPINK ya gụnyere ịkpaghasị okwu Sarah Palin na 2008 Republican National Convention, na mkpesa n'afọ 2009 na Santa Monica megide ụlọ ọrụ ihe ntecha Israel Ahava
Mgbe o si Afghanistan lọta, o nyere onye isi ala Barack Obama mbinye aka site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị nọ na mba ahụ na US na-arịọ ya ka ọ ghara iziga ndị agha ọhụrụ n'ime esemokwu ahụ n'ebe ahụ
N'ọnwa Machị, 2010, n'oge Karl Rove bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ, ya na ndị ọzọ nọ na Code Pink kpatara ọgba aghara
N'otu oge, Evans ji aka abụọ na-aga Rove, na-ekwupụta na ọ na-ejide nwa amaala
Na Jenụwarị 30, 2011, e jidere Evans maka omume ọgba aghara na họtel Rancho Mirage ebe ọ na-eduga ngagharị iwe megide David H
Koch na Charles G
Koch maka nkwado ego ha nyere akụkụ nke Tea Party Movement
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke People People's Support Foundation, ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru nke e guzobere n'afọ 2017 site na nkwado nke ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ngwanrọ ThoughtWorks

N'afọ 2019, Evans sonyeere onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-arụ ọrụ Jane Fonda n'usoro nzukọ kwa izu na omume nnupụisi obodo, nke a na-akpọ Fire Drill Fridays, na Washington DC's Capitol iji mee ka nsogbu ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ pụta ìhè, ebe e jidere Evans ọtụtụ oge tinyere Fonda
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ Twilight of Empire Responses to Occupation (2004) (Co-Editor) na Stop the Next War Now Effective Responses to Violence and Terrorism (2005) (Co-editor)
Ọ lụrụ Max Palevsky ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Mee 5, 2010
Ọ bi na Venice, California ugbu a

Jody Williams (Amụrụ n'ọnwa October 9, 1950) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị America nke a maara maka ọrụ ya n'ịmachibido ogbunigwe ndị na-egbochi ndị mmadụ, nkwado ya maka ikike mmadụ (karịsịa nke ụmụ nwanyị), na mbọ ọ na-agba ịkwalite nghọta ọhụrụ nke nchekwa n'ụwa taa
E nyere ya Nobel Peace Prize n'afọ 1997 maka ọrụ ya maka mmachibido iwu na iwepụ ogbunigwe ndị na-egbochi ndị ọrụ
Joe Daly (amụrụ na 23 Machị 1979) bụ onye na-ese ihe na-atọ ọchị na South Africa
A kọwara ọrụ America mbụ ya nke akpọrọ Scrublands dị ka 'mmiri nrọ nke uche' na 'n'elu-ọkwa postmodern vaudevillian'
Ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere Red Monkey Double Happiness Book, usoro akwụkwọ Dungeon Quest, na Highbone Theatre
Ọrụ ya apụtawo na Bitterkomix, Mome, na Kramers Ergot comic anthologies
Fantagraphics Books, na Seattle, USA, na L'Association, na Paris, France na-ebipụta akwụkwọ Joe Daly
A mụrụ ya na London, United KingdomDaly gụrụ ihe nkiri ruo afọ abụọ na Cape Town's City Varsity
Joe Louis Light (1934-2005) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe si Dyersburg, Tennessee
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na transcendentalism, inweta nghọta ime mmụọ ma ọ bụ omume, na nguzozi na usoro nke eluigwe na ala
Joe Light tolitere n'ugbo dị na mpụga Dyersburg, Tennessee na nne ya, Virgie (Virgin) Mary, na nnà ya, Hiawatha
Ọ kewapụrụ onwé ya na nne na nna ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwoke ma gụchaa ruo na nke asatọ na Brewer High School
Ọ nọrọ n'ọrụ ugbo mgbè ọ na-eto eto ruo mgbe ọ debanyere aha na ndị agha na Machị 1951
Otú ọ dị, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke otu afọ ahụ, a tọhapụrụ ya n'ihi na, dịka o kwuru, 'Amagara m na ha ga-eziga m Korea, yabụ merụrụ m aka'
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ hapụsịrị ndị agha, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ site na 1954-55 maka ịpụnara ụlọ ahịa nri
A tụkwara ya mkpọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Nashville site na 1960 na 1966-68
N'oge mbụ a màrà ya ikpe n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, Light zutere onye rabaị wee gbanwee gaa n'okpukpe ndị Juu
Ọ chetara na ịnụ Agba Ochie 'bụ oge mbụ ihe onye nkwusa kwuru kwuru na ọ bụ ihe ezi uche dị na ya nye m'
Light nwụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2005, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri asaa ma lie ya na West Tennessee State Veterans Cemetery
Joe Light malitere ime ihe osise mgbè ọ tọghatara na okpukpe ndị Juu
Ka ọ na-aga n'ebe ndịda etiti ọdịda anyanwụ na-achọ nwunye, ọ malitere ịdepụta ma na-edepụta ụkpụrụ omume na amaokwu Agba Ochie n'ebe ọha na eze
Ihe odide nyeere ya aka ịzụlite ụdị akara ya, nke o ji mée ka ụkpụrụ omume ya gbanwee

na Memphis na 1970, o jiri ụlọ ya dị ka isi ụlọ ọrụ ya màkà izipu ozi ya
O nwetara mkpali site na ihe odide ya n'afọ ndị 1960 wee malite ide iwu omume na omume ọma na shutters na siding nkè ụlọ ya
Ojiji nke ìhè chọtara driftwood si Mississippi màkà ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
Ọ na-eji ihe ndị ọzọ a chọtara dị ka usoro TV
ochie na hubcaps màkà ihe osise na nchịkọta ya
E mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na ágbá ụlọ na plywood dị nro
Okpukpe na okwukwe nke onwé ya bụ ihe kachasị mkpali Light
'N'ịhapụ Iso Ụzọ Kraịst Baptist nke ntorobịa ya, ọ zụlitere okwukwe onwe onye nke ajọ mbunobi agbụrụ ọ nwéré n'oge ikike ọbọdọ South, yana ebubo megide mmetụta nke Iso Ụzọ Ụzọ Kraịst na ndị a na-achị
Hobo na Birdman na-apụta dị ka ihe oyiyi ọdịnala na-apụghị ịhụ ányá n'ọrụ Light
Ha abụọ na-achọpụta mmalite ha na njem Light na ntọghata na nghọta ime mmụọ
Hobo na-anọchite anya ónyé na-enweghị nghọta na-achọ ihe ọ pụtara
Ìhè esewo nsụgharị anọ nke The Hobo, otu ojii, otu ọcha, otu ọbara ọbara, na otu odo, na-ezo aka na ihe nketa ya dị iche iche
O debere Hobo n'etiti okike, nke na-abụkarị n'akụkụ osimiri ma ọ bụ ugwu, nke na'anọchite anya enweghị nkwụsị nke Hobo ga-agafe iji nweta nghọta

Joe 'Sdumo' Mafela (25 June 1942 na 18 March 2017) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye nduzi, onye na'agụ egwu, na onye ọchụnta ego

A mụrụ Mafela na Sibasa, Transvaal, South Africa, ma zụlite ya na Kliptown na White City Jabavu, na Soweto, nso Johannesburg, mgbe ahụ ezinụlọ ya nọgidere ruo afọ 1990 na Tshiawelo Township nke e wepụtara maka ndị Venda n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na ihe nkiri ahụ, Real News
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri South Africa SA Films, n'ime afọ 20 sochirinụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi yana onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ chịkwara ndị otu ịgba egwú agbụrụ dị iche iche Mzumba, Sangoma, na Gold Reef Dancers, nke rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri, ụlọ ihe nkiri, na họtel ma pụta na kọntinent anọ
N'afọ 1974, Mafela sonyeere na ihe nkiri ojii mbụ e mere na South Africa, dịka Peter Pleasure na Udeliwe
Ya na onye nduzi Peter R
Hunt (nke a ma ama maka ihe nkiri James Bond On Her Majesty's Secret Service) rụkọrọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri afọ 1976 Shout at the Devil
Site na ọbịbịa nke telivishọn na South Africa n'afọ 1976, Mafela rụrụ ọrụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mgbe niile na usoro ahụ
N'afọ 1986, a họpụtara ya dịka onye na-enweghị ọrụ S'dumo na usoro ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke asụsụ Zulu 'Sgudi 'Snaysi
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke 'Sgudi 'Snaysi ('Ọ dị mma, Ọ dị mma') nke gbara ihe omume 78 na SABC mere ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na usoro ndị ọzọ, nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke Mafela Penguin Films na-emepụta

Ọ gbakwara Mafela ume ịbanye na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye nduzi okike nke Black Communications na BBDO South Africa na, kemgbe afọ 1992, dịka onye isi nke Sharrer Advertising na Johannesburg
Mafela chepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri na mgbasa ozi telivishọn Chicken Licken, ma dee ụlọ ọrụ ahụ 'Ọ dị mma, dị mma, ọ dị mma' jingle n'oge a na-eme mgbasa ozi Chicken Licsen n'afọ 1986

N'afọ 1996, Gallo Records wepụtara abọm Shebeleza Fela, nke nwere egwu a ma ama 'Shebeleza (Congo Mama) Ọ bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma, na 'Shebeleza' bụ abụ isiokwu n'oge Africa Cup of Nations n'afọ 1996
Kemgbe ahụ, Mafela dekọrọ ma wepụta ọtụtụ abọm ndị ọzọ nke abụ asụsụ Zulu

Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya 'ihu ntụrụndụ South Africa', na 'Bill Cosby nke South Africa', ọ pụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'afọ 2011 na ihe egwu Retribution Ka o sina dị, Mafela mere mkpesa n'afọ 2012 na o siri ya ike inweta ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
O kwuru na a gwara ya na ọ 'mere agadi ma jụọ oyi'
Ọ nọ n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala na 18 Machị 2017, na M1 n'ebe ugwu Johannesburg, ebe ụgbọala abụọ metụtara
Ọ nwụrụ ozugbo, na-ahapụ nwunye ya na ụmụ anọ
E liri ya na 29 Machị 2017 na Westpark Cemetery na Johannesburg
N'afọ 2004, e nyere Mafela onyinye Duku Duku pụrụ iche maka ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn South Africa
N'afọ 2005, e nyere ya ihe nrite Theatre Management of South Africa Lifetime Achievement na Naledi Theatre Awards
Joe Minter (amụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Machị, 1943) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na Birmingham, Alabama
A mụrụ Minter na Birmingham, Alabama, nwá nke asatọ n'ime ezinụlọ nke mmadụ iri
Nnà ya bụ ónyé na-arụzi ụgbọala n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, mana mgbè agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ pụghị ịchọta ọrụ n'ọhịa ya
Nná Minter rụrụ ọrụ afọ iri atọ dị ka onye nlekọta nke ili ozu ndị ọcha
Joe Minter gárá ụlọ akwụkwọ Birmingham, e debara aha ya na 1965 ma hapụ ya na 1967
Mgbè ndị agha gachara, Minter were ọtụtụ ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala, site na ónyé na-asa efere na ụgbọala, ruo onye ozi na ọrụ ụlọ ọgwụ dị n'usoro
Minter rụkwara ọrụ na ọla, rụọ oche ụlọ akwụkwọ, rụọ ọrụ na ụgbọala, yana ndị ọrụ na-ewu okporo ụzọ
N'ihi ọrụ mmepụta ya, Minter nwetara ájá asbestos n'anya ya n'afọ ndị 1960 na afọ ndị 1970
Minter nwèrè otu anya na-arụ ọrụ iji mee ka asbestos dị n'etiti; Otú ọ dị, ọ gaghị ekwe ka ndị dọkịta rụọ ọrụ n'anya nke ọzọ
Minter enwetụbeghị mmetụta nke ike n'anya ya ma manye ya ịla ezumike nká
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká, Minter chọpụtara ọrụ nka nke na-adịghị arụ ọrụ kemgbe ọ bụ nwata

N'ịbụ nke dị na nsọtụ ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Birmingham, Alabama ma malite na ngwụcha afọ 1980 ma wuo ya n'ime afọ iri atọ, Ọbọdọ Africa nke Minter na America bụ akụkụ nke ogige ihe a tụrụ atụ, akụkụ nke ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie, na akụkụ nke ncheta

Ọbọdọ Africa dị na America bụ ebe nka na-agbanwe agbanwe, nke ihe ndị a tụrụ atụ nke e ji ihe mkpofu mee ma chọta ihe ndị sitere na akpụkpọ ụkwụ, ihe ịchọ mma ahịhịa, ihe egwuregwu, ihe egwuregwu ochie, na arịa ime achịcha, na ihe ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ ezie na ihe ọkpụkpụ Minter nwere isiokwu na mmetụta dịgasị iche iche, site na otu na-echeta ịgba égbè ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị Sandy Hook ruo otu nke a raara nye ndị ajọ ifufe Katrina metụtara, ozi kachasị mkpa Minter bụ inye mmata màkà nde ndị Afrịka iri na otu e zigara America, yana ụmụ ha nyere aka iwu ma chebe America

Ihe ndị a tụrụ atụ n'ọbọdọ nta Africa dị na America na-akọ akụkọ banyéré ndị Africa America kemgbe ọtụtụ narị afọ, site na griots na ndị agha nke West Africa ruo na bọmbụ na-egbu egbu na 1963 na 16th Street Baptist Church
Josephine Obiajulu Okei-Odumakin (amụrụ na 4 Julaị 1966) bụ onyé Naijiria na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke otu ndị na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, Women Arise for Change Initiative na Campaign for Democracy
A mụrụ Odumakin na Zaria, Kaduna, Nigeria, ma too n'ezinụlọ́ Roman Katọlik
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na agụmakwụkwọ Bekee n'afọ 1987, nke masta na Guidance and Counseling sochiri na nzere doctorate na History and Policy of Education na Mahadum Ilorin
A na-ejidé ya ugboro ugboro maka ọrụ ya, e jidere ya ugboro iri na asaa n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha nke Ibrahim Babangida
O tinyere aka n'ihe karịrị puku abụọ ikpe ebe a na-eleghara ikike nwanyị anya
Ikpe ndị ahụ gụnyere igbu ụmụ nwanyị ma ọ bụ di ha site n'aka ndị uwe ojii
Ụlọ akwụkwọ Naijiria ma ọ bụ ọbụna ndị isi ụlọ ọgwụ leghaara ikike ụmụ ha anya
N'afọ 2013, e nyeré Odumakin onyinye International Women of Courage Award site na Ngalaba Mba United States
Michelle Obama na John Kerry nyere onyinye ahụ na US State Department's Dean Acheson Auditorium na ememe nke International Women's Day
N'afọ 2019, Dr Odumakin kwadoro ọzụzụ nke ndị sónyere na 10th Civil Society Organisation Professionalism, Effectiveness and Therapy (CSO-CPET) Workshop isiokwu Mobilising Women for Change

Ọzụzụ a na-eme ugboro abụọ n'afọ, a na-elekwasịkwa anya n'ịmepụta ikike na ịkwalite ịdị mma n'etiti ndị otu obodo, na-akpali ma na-akwalite ụkpụrụ omume ọkachamara na ọrụ azụmaahịa nke CSOs ma na-emepụta ihe ngwọta ọhụrụ maka ihe ịma aka ndị ụlọ ọrụ onwe na-eche ihu

N'ịbụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Institute of Human Rights & Democratic Studies; onye guzobere onye isi oche nke Women Arise for Change Initiative; onye isi oche of the Task Force of the Citizen Forum; onye isi àlà nke Centre for Change in Community Development & Public Awareness; onye isi nke Centre for Participatory Democracy; na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Coalition of Civil Society Organizations na Nigeria, a makwaara ya dị ka onye agha nwere obi ịke nke ihe ịma aka na-emebi ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ emeela ka ọ hụ na ọ hụ n'eme n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị na-eme ihe ike n'okpuru ndị na-emegide ya
Ọ lụrụ Peter Yinka Odumakin ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2021 n'ihi nsogbu COVID-19 na Eprel 2 na Lagos State University Teaching Hospital (LASUTH)
Di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ na 1997 wee mụọ nwa mbụ ha, nwa nwanyị, na 2000 na nke abụọ, nwa nwoke, na 2003
Mgbe a gụrụ nwa agbọghọ ahụ aha Joe, a gụrụ nwata nwoke ahụ aha Abraham n'aha onye ndú Afenifere nwụrụ anwụ, Pa Abraham Adesanya
Àtụ International Women of Courage Awards
Joseph Akinwale Akinfenwa-Donus (amụrụ na 21 Mee 1997), nke a maara dịka Joeboy, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Maazị Eazi nke labelụ 'emPawa Africa' chọpụtara ya n'afọ 2017
Ụdị egwu ya bụ nke Afro pop na R&B
A mụrụ ya na Lagos State, Nigeria
Maazị Eazi nyere aka na egwu 'Fààjí' na Ọktoba 26, 2018; o jiri akụkụ ya nke onyinye ọ natara n'aka emPawa100 gbaa vidiyo maka egwu ahụ
E wepụtara egwu Joeboy 'Baby' na Machị 1, 2019; ọ nwetara nde iri abụọ na YouTube na Spotify na 2019
Vidio egwu ọhụụ maka 'Baby' karịrị nde mmadụ iri atọ na otu na YouTube
Joeboy wepụtara egwu Killertunes mepụtara 'Beginning' na August 15, 2019
Vidio egwu ọhụụ maka 'Malite' karịrị nde mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ na YouTube
N'ime ya, ọ na-ahụ onwe ya ka ọ na-enwe mmetụta maka enyi ya nke ọ jụrụ na mbụ
Joeboy wepụtara egwu izizi ya bụ Love & Light na Nọvemba 2019
Ọ bụ emPawa Africa wepụtara ya ma ndị otu 'Baby' na 'Beginning' kwadoro ya
EP ahụ nwekwara egwu Mayorkun nyere aka 'Don't Call Me' na 'All for You'
Joeboy meriri Best Artiste na African Pop na 2019 All Africa Music Awards, na Best Pop na 2020 Soundcity MVP Awards Festival
A họpụtara ya maka ọtụtụ City People Entertainment Awards na The Headies Joeboy wepụtara egwu Dera mepụtara 'Call' na Eprel 10, 2020
A kọwara ya dị ka 'abụ ịhụnanya na-adọrọ adọrọ', 'Call' bụ egwu mbụ sitere na abọm studio mbụ ya na-abịanụ
Vidio TG Omori duziri maka 'Call' nwere isiokwu dystopian sci-fi
Joel Robinson (1915-2012) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese onyinyo
Ọ bụ ónyé mmepụta Africa America mbụ nke Museum of Modern Art nabatara na usoro ngosi Good Design ya na ónyé mbụ nwetara ọrụ ya màkà nchịkọta MoMA na-adịgide adịgide
Ihe osise ákwà Robinson bụ Ovals, nke e dèrè na ákwà linin, bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi MoMA nke 1951 Good Design
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mbipụta May 1952 nke magazin Ebony
Joelle Kayembe Hagen (amuru 31 Mee 1983) bu onye na eme ihe nlereanya na ihe nkiri nke Congo
A mụrụ Kayembe na Lubumbashi, Democratic Republic of Congo, ada nke onye ọchụnta ego Congo bara ọgaranya bụ Kalonji Kayembe
Na afo 1994, ọ kwagara South Africa
Kayembe malitere ịbu onye nanny ụmụaka ya asaa
Ọ chọrọ ịmụ gbasara akparamàgwà mmadụ, mana ọ ghọrọ ihe nlereanya mgbe a hụchara ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 19
Ọ malitere site n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na-akwụghị ụgwọ ruo mgbe ọ na-ekesa kalenda na FHM SA
Ọ pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ dịka Cosmopolitan na Elle yana mgbasa ozi Sprite Zero
Kayembe bụkwa onye na-ese ihe maka ndị ahịa ahọpụtara
Ọ pụtara na vidiyo Ludacris maka 'Pimpin' n'ụwa niile'
Kayembe bụ onye ikpeazụ na asọmpi International Supermodel 2005 emere na China
Ọ jerela ụzọ ụgbọ elu na SA Ejiji izu na Johannesburg Ejiji izu
Na Septemba 27, 2008, Kayembe lụrụ onye ukwu Platfields Ltd
Bongani Mbindwane na emume ọdịnala
Di na nwunye ahụ emekọrịtala ma kwụsị ihe dị ka afọ anọ
E yigharịrị emume obodo mgbe a chọpụtara na Kayembe dị ime nakwa n'ihi na ha nwere nsogbu
Mgbe o kpebiri ịwepu ime ya, ọ kpọrọ ya ogbu mmadụ
Kayembe hibere usoro ịgba alụkwaghịm na Ọktoba 2009, mana Mbendwane jụrụ na ha alụbeghị di na nwunye n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro
N'April 2010, ọ tụpụtara R10-million dị ka mmezi, na-edozi mkpesa gụnyere ebubo nke mbuso agha megide Mbendwane
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, ụlọikpe nyere Kayembe iwu ka ọ pụọ n'ụlọ ha site na Jenụwarị 2011
Kayembe gbara egwu dị ka Zina na ihe nkiri 2013 nke Jérôme Salle Zulu
Na 2015, Kayembe so Trace Foundation rụkọrọ ọrụ iji nye ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ ihe mmụta
Na November 2016, ọ lụrụ di na Cape Town
Joeri Rogelj (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye obodo Belgium na-ahụ maka ihu igwe na-arụ ọrụ na ngwọta maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ na-enyocha otú ọha mmadụ nwere ike isi gbanwee gaa n'ọdịnihu na-adịgide adịgide

Ọ bụ onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na sayensị na iwu ihu igwe (onye na-arụkọ ọrụ) na Centre for Environmental Policy (CEP) na onye ntuzi nyocha na Grantham Institute Climate Change and Environment, ma na Imperial College London
Ọ na-esokwa International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis

Ọ bụ onye dere ọtụtụ akụkọ ihu igwe site na Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) na United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP), yana onye otu European sayensi bọọdụ ndụmọdụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
rogelj dechara nzere injinia na kU Leuven (Belgium) na 2003, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta postgraduate na omenala na ọmụmụ mmepe n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2005
Ọ gụsịrị PhD ya na physics ihu igwe na Swiss Federal Institute for Technology (ETH Zurich) na afọ 2013 n'okpuru nlekọta nke Prọfesọ
Reto Knutti na isiokwu nke ejighị n'aka na ọnọdụ ikuku ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ
Joevana Charles (July 1955 na 17 Jenụwarị 2021) bụ onye otu National Assembly of Seychelles
Ọ bụ onye otu Seychelles People's Progressive Front, a họpụtakwara ya na Nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 1993
A mụrụ Charles n'ọnwa July 1955 dị ka nwa nke ise n'ime ụmụ asatọ
Ka nne na nna ya abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na mba ọzọ, Charles weere ọrụ nke ilekọta na ịkụziri ụmụnne ya ndị nwoke na ndị nwanyị yana ijikwa agụmakwụkwọ ha
Nwanne ya nwoke, Flavien Joubert, kọwara ya dị ka 'nwa agbọghọ na-eme oriri' nke na-eme ememme n'ebe dị iche iche na klọb Seychelles kwa Satọdee tupu ya alụọ di
Charles malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi
O mechara gaa National Teachers Training College wee gaa maka ịmụtakwu na mba ofesi na Moscow State Institute of International Relations
Joey Vercher (amụrụ n'August 3, 1991), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka aha egwu ya bụ Joey Fatts bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si Long Beach, California
Fatts bịanyere aka na ákàrá nke ya, Cutthroat Records
Ọ nwetara nkwado site na ịtọhapụ usoro Chipper Jones site n'enyemaka nke A$AP Yams nwụrụ anwụ, ónyé nyeere aka ịmalite ọrụ ya
Ọ gara n'ihu wepụta mixtapes ndị ọzọ, Ill Street Blues (2015) na I'll Call You Tomorrow (2016)
A mụrụ Vercher na August 3, 1991 na Long Beach, California
Nné Vercher na nnà ya sitere na Compton, mana ha kwagara Long Beach n'ihi na ha chọrọ ndụ ka mma màkà Vercher na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye
Vercher malitere itinye aka n'ọrụ ndị òtù n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1999, mgbe ọ dị afọ 8
Nne Vercher bụ onye aṅụrụma ma ọ dịghị mgbè ọ leghaara ya anya
Mgbè Vercher nọ na klas nke ise, nna ya gàrà mkpọrọ ma hapụ nne ya na nwanne ya nwanyị
Vercher na nne ya kwagara San Fernando Valley nwa ógè
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ si n'ụlọ nne ya kwaga Los Angeles igwu bọọlụ, n'agbanyeghị na ọ nweghị ebe ọ ga-ebi n'ọbọdọ ahụ
Ọ na-ehi ụra ebe ọ bụla o nwere ike, ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala nke enyi ya, ụlọ enyi ya nwanyị, azụ nke Camaro ya nke 1986, ka ọ na-achụ nrọ ya nke igwu egwu na kọleji
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii, otu n'ime ezigbo ndị enyi ya nwụrụ site na ịgba égbè ma nwee ịda mbà n'obi ruo oge ụfọdụ
Ihe dị ka mmadụ isii n'ime ezigbo ndị enyi ya nwụrụ site na ịgba égbè mgbe ọ na-etolite
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ hapụrụ nrọ ahụ mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya malitere ịkpa oke
Ka ọ na-erule klas nke iri na abụọ, e jidere ya màkà izu ohi ma kwụsị ịgba bọọlụ kpamkpam
Joey Muthengi bụ onye mgbasa ozi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ntinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Kenya sitere na ịbụ onye redio na 984 Capital FM site n'afọ 2009-2013 ebe ọ kwadoro ma mepụta ihe ngosi ndị ntorobịa a ma ama 'Hits Not Homework'
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya (June 2016 - Ugbu a), dịka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi Power Breakfast ọhụrụ na Citizen TV, Joey Muthengi ugbu a na-akwado ihe ngosi kwa ụbọchị na Fred Indimuli na Willis Raburu
Mgbe ọ nọ na Citizen TV, ọ kwadokwara ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ 10 karịa 10Joey mechara n'afọ 018, hapụ ọrụ ya na Royal Media
A mụrụ Joey na 2nd August n'afọ 1985 na Kijabe, Rift Valley wee kwaga United States mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ
Ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ ma gaa Rift Valley Academy, ma mesịa kwaga USA ebe ọ gara Hope College na-achụso isi abụọ na Communications na Business Management
Joey nwere nwanne nwoke (David Muthengi) onye a ma ama, onye nyocha ego, onye egwu ma bụrụ onye na-elekọta Rauka TV Show na Citizen, onye a maara dịka Holy Dave

N'agbata afọ 2011 na afọ 2014, Joey jere ozi dịka VJ nke mbụ nke Kenya (Video Jockey) maka ọwa egwu nke South-Africa Channel O ebe ọ nọchitere anya egwu, ntụrụndụ, na ọdịbendị Kenya na kọntinent ndị ọzọ

N'afọ 2013, ọ kwadoro Oge nke isii nke ihe ngosi egwu kachasị ukwuu na East Africa 'Tusker Project Fame', na Citizen TV ebe ọ na-etinye aka na franchise na 'Tusker All Stars' nke gosipụtara n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2015, ọ malitere ịme ihe ngosi Drivetime kwa ụbọchị na Hot 96 Fm
Ọ kwadoro 'Sugar and Spice' na Ebru TV
Joey Muthengi rụrụ ọrụ na Royal Media Services na Citizen Tv dịka onye nnabata iri karịa iri ebe ya na Willis Raburu kwadoro
Ọ hapụrụ Citizen TV mgbe ya na onye were ya n'ọrụ nwere nsogbu mgbe ụlọ ọrụ Betin, nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ, jiri ya mee ihe dịka onye nnọchi anya ha
Ihe dịka otu afọ ka e mesịrị na ibe mgbasa ozi ya, o kwuru banyere oge siri ike ọ nwetara mgbe ọ hapụrụ Citizen Tv, mana ọ kwadoro na ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ ka mma ma nwee afọ ojuju
Joey nwere mmasị maka egwu na uri okwu
Nwanne Joey bụ onye egwu ozioma Holy Dave
Joey bụ onye nchoputa na onye isi nke Muthengi Foundation, otu ọrụ ebere na-achọghị uru nke na-ezube ịzụlite ikike akụ na ụba site na agụmakwụkwọ
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ bụ akụkụ nke ọtụtụ usoro ihe nkiri TV nke obodo, gụnyere ihe nkiri Family 'Changing Times' nke gosipụtara na Kenya Television Network site n'afọ 2010–2012
Ọ bụkwa onye ndu na usoro ihe nkiri 'Prem' nke mbụ gosipụtara na KTN n'afọ 2013-2014 ma mesịa na Africa Magic na DSTV

Joffre Lamar Stewart (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 17 Eprel 1925 ruo ụbọchị 12 Machị 2019) bụ onye America na-ede uri, onye anarchist, na onye na-eme udo nke a maara maka itinye aka na mmalite mmalite Beat movement
Stewart bi na Chicago; a kpọtụrụ ya aha na uri Allen Ginsberg nke afọ 1955 'Howl'
Akwụkwọ Stewart bụ Poems and Poetry ka Every Now and Then Publishing Cooperative bipụtara n'afọ 1982
Stewart nwetara BA
na Mahadum Roosevelt na afọ 1952
Johan Petrus Burger bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye isi nke FirstRand
Ọ nọchiri Sizwe Nxasana onye lara ezumike nká mgbe afọ itoolu gasịrị dị ka CEO
Burger bụbu CFO nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Johannesburg
'Johannes Gerhardus Hendrikus Burgers (31 Jenụwarị 1870 - 12 Juun 1943) bụ na 1913 onye guzobere Burgers 'Dierenpark, nke a na-akpọ Royal Burgers Zoo n'oge a
Ọ bụ onye nwe ya na onye nduzi ya ruo 1939
Nwa ya nwanyị nke ikpeazụ bụ Lucie Burgers bụ onye nọchiri ya, ya na di ya bụ Reinier van Hooff
Nwa ha nwoke, Antoon van Hooff (1937-2004), mekwuru zoo ahụ
A mụrụ Johan Burgers na 's-Heerenberg Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọrụ aka, Burgers ghọrọ ọkachamara n'ọrụ ugbo na-arụ ọrụ na Eastern Europe nke nyere ya ezigbo ụgwọ ọrụ
Ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya ka ọ lụọ di, wee malite igbu anụ
Na 1895, Burgers zụtara ụlọ obodo na 's-Heerenberg
N'ogige ahụ, o debere nchịkọta nke anụ ọhịa na nkịta nke mere ka ọ nweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite, ma mee ka ọ zụta ọtụtụ anụmanụ
Iji kwado nchịkọta na-arịwanye elu, ọ zụtara ala dị nso ma kpọọ ya Buitenlust
Na 1908, ọ gara Tierpark Hagenbeck nke Carl Hagenbeck na Hamburg nke masịrị ya n'ezie
Na 1913, Burgers meghere saịtị ahụ maka ọha na eze, ma tinye anụmanụ ndị ọzọ dị ka nkịta ọhịa, anụ ọhịa wolf na flamingos
Burgers Zoo bụ zoo ọha na eze mbụ nwere onwe ya na Netherlands, n'ihi na Natura Artis Magistra na Amsterdam bụ naanị maka ndị otu
Na 1916, Burgers chọrọ itinye ọdụm na anụ ọhịa bea nke gọọmentị obodo guzogidere
N'afọ 1918, obodo Arnhem nwere ịnụ ọkụ n'obi maka atụmatụ ya, e meghekwara zoo ahụ n'akụkụ Open Air Museum
Na 1932, nwa ya nwanyị Johanna lụrụ Johan van Glabbeek, ma dị ka onyinye agbamakwụkwọ o nyere ha Dierenpark Tilburg
Na 1939, Burgers lara ezumike nká ma họpụta nwa ya nwanyị Lucie dị ka onye ga-anọchi ya
N'afọ ndị 1940, Burgers butere ọrịa kansa
Burgers nwụrụ na Arnhem na 12 June 1943
Burgers lụrụ Maria Erwig ma ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Jan van Hooff, ọkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ na prọfesọ nke comparative physiology na Mahadum Utrecht bụ otu n'ime ụmụ ụmụ ya
Johan Oldert (1912-1984) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-akpụ ihe na South Africa nke a maara màkà ihe osise mmanụ, ọkachasị ala, na ihe ọkpụkpụ ọkachasị ihe osise ọla nchara
A mụrụ Johan Oldert na Rotterdam na 1912, nwa nwoke nke ónyé na-eme achịcha
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Royal Academy na Rotterdam n'okpuru Koos den Hartog, na London n'okpuru Harold Brownsword na Regent Street Polytechnic
Na South Africa ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Natal Technical College n'okpuru Merlyn Evans na Nils Anderson, na n'okpuru Eric Byrd na Witwatersrand Technical College
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara South Africa na 1935
Johan Oldert rụrụ ọrụ na mbụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe osise na ónyé na-ere ahịa na Johannesburg
Mgbè ihe mberede nke ọ dara n'elu ihe na-ebuli elu n'ụlọ ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ malitere ogologo ógè, ma mesịa kpebie ịhapụ ọrụ ya wee bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
Oldert bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-ewu ewu ma na-aga nke ọma na 1960s na 1970s
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 2000, ọrụ Oldert adaala n'ụdị ejiji; na 2009 Stephan Welz nke Sotheby kọwara ya dị ka ' nka kalenda', ma kwuo na ahịa Oldert fọrọ nke nta ka ọ pụọ
E nyere ụlọ ọrụ Metzudat Ze'ev na ébé ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na Tel Aviv ihe oyiyi ọla nchara nkè Ze'ev Jabotinsky site na Oldert na 2008 ma kà ná-egosi
Johan Thom (a mụrụ n'afọ 1976, South Africa), bụ onye na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na vidiyo, ntinye, arụmọrụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ
A kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nkiri na mba South Africa

E gosipụtara ọrụ Thom na ihe ngosi otu na Venice Biennial n'afọ 2003 na afọ 2005; International Film Festival Rotterdam, Netherlands, n'afọ 2006; 1st Architecture, Landscape and Art Biennial of the Canary Islands nké afọ 2006, nke Antonio Zaya (afọ 1954 rụọ afọ 2007), Spain, na number nkè iri anọ na Belgrade International Theatre Festival nké afọ 2006

Ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ gụnyere Britto New Media Festival na National Gallery na Dhaka, Bangladesh, 2009;ZA Giovane arte dul Sudafrica na Pallazo delle Papesse, Sienna, Italy nke Lorenzo Fusi, Kendell Geers Minette Vari, Sue Williamson, Berni Searle na Marlene Dumas haziri na 2008; South African Art on Paper na Gallery Barry Keldoulis na Sydney, Australia, 2007; The 10th International Computer Arts Festival, Maribor, Slovenia, 2004 na 'X- ihe ngosi na Ememe nke Afọ Iri nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na South Africa', nke Kelly O'Reilly haziri na Stephen Lawrence Gallery, Greenwich, London, 2004
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na 2009–2010 dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ngosi ndị otu njem 'Dystopia', nke mbụ na UNISA Art Gallery, Pretoria, South Africa (8 Ọktoba - 15 Nọvemba 2009)
Ihe ngosi ahụ wee gaa Museum Africa, Johannesburg, South Africa (8 Ọktoba - 15 Nọvemba 2009) na Oliewenhuis Art Museum; Bloemfontein, South Africa (10 Juun - 8 Ọgọst 2010)

Ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ na-eme njem gụnyere 'Mine', nhọrọ nke ihe nkiri nke ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa, gụnyere William Kentridge, Minette Vari, Berni Searle, Robin Rhode, Simon Gush, Bridget Baker na ndị ọzọ) nke Abrie Fourie haziri na-aga Iwalewa-Haus, Bayreuth, Germany (10 February - 6 March 2010) na Ductac Gallery, Dubai (18 January - 6 February 2012) na Johannesburg Art Gallery, (7 - 28 March 2012)

Thom gosipụtara okwu na ọmụmụ ihe na ọtụtụ nzukọ na ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere na University College London; UK; Finnish Academy of Fine Art, Helsinki, ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2010; Graduate School of the University of Dublin, UK; University of Cambridge, UK; University of Belgrade; The Venice Biennial, Italy

Na Saụt Afrịka, ọ kụziri ma gosipụta okwu na ọmụmụ ihe na Tshwane University of Technology, Tshwane; Mahadum Pretoria, Tshwane; Mahadum Rhodes, Grahamstown; Technikon Witwatersrand, Johannesburg; Bag Factory (Fordsburg Artists 'Studios), Johannesburg; Wits School of Fine Arts, Johannesburg na Wits University, Johannesburg

Thom edeela nyocha nka na isiokwu n'ihe banyere mbipụta dị iche iche gụnyere maka Art South Africa Magazine, nyocha nke ihe ngosi Kendell Geers na Steven Friedman Gallery, London; edemede katalọgụ nke onye na-ese ihe Diane Victor 'Disasters of Peace Series' nke Map - South Africa Modern Art Projects, South Africa, afọ 2008; isiokwu maka ihe banyere Die Beeld, (South African Newspaper), banyere foto nke onye na-ese ihe Santu Mofokeng
Johanita Scholtz (ka amụrụ na 25 Jenụwarị 2000) bụ onye egwuregwu badminton nke South Africa
Scholtz meriri aha mbụ ya na mba ụwa na asọmpi Botswana International nke afọ 2017
Ọ sọrọ mpi na 2018 Commonwealth Games na Gold Coast, Australia
