Joice Runaida Mujuru (née Mugari; amụrụ na 15 Eprel, na afọ 1955), nke a makwaara site na aha agha ya bụ Teurai Ropa, bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme mgbanwe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi ala nke Zimbabwe site na afo 2004 ruo na afọ 2014
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka minista gọọmentị
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ZANUīPF
Ọ lụrụ Solomon Mujuru ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na afọ 2011 ma were ya dị ka onye ga-anọchi onye isi ala Robert Mugabe, mana n'afọ 2014, a katọrọ ya maka ebubo na ọ na-akpa nkata megide Mugabe
N'ihi ebubo ndị a na-ebo ya, Mujuru tụfuru ọkwa ya dị ka osote onye isi ala na ọnọdụ ya na ndị isi otu
A chụpụrụ ya n'òtù ahụ ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o guzobere òtù ọhụrụ Zimbabwe People First
A mụrụ Runaida Mugari na mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Zimbabwe nke Ugwu Darwin, onye Shona sitere n'asụsụ Korekore
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ala ọzọ nke Salvation Army, Howard High na Chiweshe na Mashonaland Central Province
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Mujuru bụ naanị nwanyị zụrụ na Lusaka
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị afọ abụọ, o kpebiri isonye na Rhodesian Bush War
A na-ekwu na o ji égbè gbuo helikọpta na 17 Febụwarị, na afọ 1974 mgbe ọ jụrụ ịgbapụ

Onye isi oche nke ndị agha agha, Christopher Mutsvangwa agọnahụla ihe mere na helikọpta dara mgbe a chụpụrụ ya n'òtù ahụ; ndị ọkachamara ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ịgba égbè ajụwokwa na enwere ike iji ngwá agha dị mfe dị ka akọwara na akụkọ ya
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1975, ọ bụ onye nkuzi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ụlọ ọrụ agha abụọ na-aga nke ọma
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, Mujuru bụ onye isi ogige na ogige ndị agha na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Chimoio na Mozambique
Ọ were aha agha Teurai Ropa (Shona maka 'ịwụfu ọbara'), wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi nwanyị mbụ na ndị agha ZANLA nke Mugabe
N'afọ 1977, ọ lụrụ Solomon Mujuru, onye a maara n'oge ahụ site na aha agha ya bụ Rex Nhongo, osote onye isi ndị agha nke ZANLA
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye kachasị nta na ZANU Central Committee, onye otu National Executive
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ndị uwe ojii Rhodesia lekwasịrị anya, nke gbalịrị ijide ya mana enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Dị ka akụkụ nke Operation Dingo, ndị agha Rhodesia wakporo ogige ZANLA dị na Chimoio na Nọvemba 23, na afọ 1977
Mujuru jisiri ike zere ijide ya site n'ị zoo n'ime ụlọ mposi ọha na eze a na-eji eme ihe nke ọma
N'afọ 1978, mgbe a wakporo ogige ya, Murujuńnọn dị ime ọnwa itoolu n'oge ahụ ka bụ onye agha na-arụsi ọrụ ike
Ọ mụrụ nwa naanị ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị
Mgbe o si n'agha lọta, a maghị ihe banyere mmalite nke aha ya na ezigbo aha ya

Nne ya, n'ajụjụ ọnụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ The Sunday Mail n'ụlọ ya dị n'ime ime obodo Mount Darwin, gwara onye nta akụkọ na onye mgbasa ozi na-ahụ maka ụmụ mmadụ Robert Mukondiwa okwu, onye ọ kpughere na Joice bụ aha ọ nabatakwara n'oge ọ nọ n'agha
Aha ya n'ezie, a gwara ya, bụ Runaida, nke bụ aha nwanne nne ya nwụrụ anwụ

Ndị Mujurus bi ugbu a n'ugbo a chọrọ 3,500-acre (14 2), Alamein Farm, 45 miles (72 km) n'ebe ndịda Harare, nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na Zimbabwe chọpụtara na e weghaara ya n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị n'aka onye nwe ugbo ahụ
Mgbe nnwere onwe na afọ 1980, Mujuru ghọrọ onye minista kacha nta na kansụl ahụ, na-ewere ngalaba egwuregwu, ndị ntorobịa na ntụrụndụ
Ọ banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'etiti oge ọrụ ya mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi
Dị ka Minista nke Telecommunications, ọ gbalịrị ịkwụsị Strive Masiyiwa ka ọ ghara iguzobe netwọk ekwentị ya Econet
Ndị kansụl nyere Masiyiwa iwu ka ọ ree ndị na-asọmpi ya ngwá ọrụ ya
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1997, Mujuru kpebiri ịnye ikikere ekwentị nke abụọ nke Zimbabwe na ụlọ ọrụ Zairois a na-amaghị ama Telecel, na-ebibi Masiyiwa
Ndị otu Zairois gụnyere di ya Solomon na nwa nwanne onye isi ala Robert Mugabe bụ Leo
Mgbe ọtụtụ ọgụ iwu gasịrị, Masiyiwa nwetara ikike ya na Disemba na afọ 1997

ZANU-PF Women's League kpebiri na nnọkọ ya kwa afọ nke e mere na Septemba, na afọ 2004 iji wepụta nwanyị na-azọ ọkwa osote onye isi oche nke pati ahụ, ọnọdụ a hapụrụ n'efu mgbe ọnwụ Simon Muzenda gasịrị

Mugabe gbadoro n'okpuru nrụgide sitere n'aka otu ZANU-PF nke di Mujuru, General Solomon Mujuru, duziri, iji nye nwanyị osote onye isi oche nke abụọ na-esote onye isi ụlọ omebe iwu Emmerson Mnangagwa, nke a na-ahụkarị dị ka onye nketa ya
ZANU-PF a gbanwere aha a bụ 'abalị nke ogologo mma' site na Zimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation
A ṅụrụ Mujuru iyi dị ka osote onye isi ala nke Zimbabwe na 6 Disemba, na afọ 2004
A họpụtara Mujuru dị ka onye ZANU-PF na-azọ oche House of Assembly site na Mt
Darwin West na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke March 2008

Dabere na nsonaazụ gọọmentị, ọ meriri oche ahụ site na oke mmeri, na-enweta vootu 13,236 megide 1,792 maka Gora Madzudzo, onye na-azọ ọkwa nke Movement for Democratic Change (MDC) nke Morgan Tsvangirai duziri
Nke a megidere nkwupụta mbụ sitere na MDC na Mujuru efunahụla oche ahụ
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, Mugabe ṅụrụ iyi ọzọ dị ka osote onye isi ala na 13 Ọktoba, na afọ 2008, ya na Msika
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke ntaramahụhụ onwe onye nke United States nyere
A na-etinye Joice Mujuru na afọ 2009 na-anwa ire ihe ruru tọn ọla edo 35 site na Democratic Republic of the Congo na ụlọ ọrụ Europe, na-emegide mmachibido iwu European Union n'akụkụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Ọ bi ugbu a na Alamein Farm, ọrụ na-arụpụta ihe na nke bara uru dị elu nke e ji iwu na-akwadoghị mee ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke mmemme mgbanwe ala site n'aka Guy Watson-Smith na afọ 2001, dị ka ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Zimbabwe na ụlọ ikpe mba ụwa chọpụtara
N'afọ 2001, ezinụlọ Mujuru ghọrọ isiokwu nke ikpe ikpe mbụ megide onye ọ bụla so n'òtù Maazị Mugabe nke metụtara na nnweta ala na akụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Zimbabwe kwuru na mmeri nke Alamein Farm bụ iwu na-akwadoghị
A na-ewere Mujuru dị ka onye nwere ike ịnọchi Onye isi ala Mugabe, na-asọ mpi megide Emmerson Mnangagwa
Ọ nwetara nkwado n'etiti politburo, kọmitii etiti na presidium, na ndị isi otu mpaghara
O nwetakwara nkwado site n'aka ndị Zimbabwe n'ozuzu ha, nke gosipụtara site na nhọpụta nke ndị na-akwado ya na ndị ntorobịa
Otú ọ dị, a na-atụ anya na a ga-ama onye ga-anọchi ya aka na nnọkọ nke Disemba na afọ 2014, ebe a na-eche na ndị otu politburo na ndị isi kọmitii etiti niile ga-achọ nhọpụta ọzọ
Na ngwụcha afọ 2014, e boro Mujuru ebubo na ọ na-akpa nkata megide Mugabe ma ghọọ onye a chụpụrụ na ZANU-PF

Ọ tụfuru ọkwa ya na ndị isi otu na December na afọ 2014 congress, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, na 8 December na afọ 2014, Mugabe chụpụrụ ya n'ọkwa ya dị ka osote onye isi ala, tinyere ndị minista ndị a maara na ha bụ ndị otu ya
N'okwu e bipụtara na 9 Disemba, n'otu ụbọchị a mara ọkwa nchụpụ, Mujuru kwuru na nkwupụta na ya gbara izu megide Mugabe bụ 'ihe nzuzu'
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2014, Mugabe họpụtara onye na-asọ mpi Mujuru ogologo oge n'ọgụ nke onye ga-anọchiteanya, Emmerson Mnangagwa, iji dochie ya dị ka osote onye isi ala
A chụpụrụ Mujuru na ZANU-PF na 3 Eprel na afọ 2015 wee gaa n'ihu guzobe Zimbabwe People First party, na-emegide ZANU- PF
N'afọ 2017 mgbe ọ chụpụrụ ndị isi asaa nke Zimbabwe People First party, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ National People's Party mgbe ndị a chụpụrụ na-ama ndị nwe aha Zimbabwe People First aka
Joice Mujuru bịanyere aka na njikọ aka ya na obere òtù 20 n'oge ọ na-agba ọsọ ruo na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2018
E kwenyere na nke a bụ ihe na-emegide njikọ aka MDC nke Tsvangirai nke ga-enye ya nnukwu ike nkwekọrịta na tebụl njikọ
Ndị People's Democratic Party (PDP) nke Lucia Matibenga na-eduzi, Dumiso Dabengwa's Zapu na NPP kpughere nkwekọrịta njikọ aka iji maa Zanu PF aka na Matabeleland na ntuli aka afọ 2018

Ndị isi Zapu, NPP na PDP kwuru na ha agaghị emegide ibe ha maka oche ndị omeiwu ọ bụla na Matabeleland, tupu ha ekwuo na 'ọnụ ụzọ ka na-emeghe' maka njikọ aka sara mbara na ndị ọzọ na-emegide ya, na-eme ka egwu na MDC Alliance, nke a mara ọkwa na nso nso a, nwere ike ịba ọgba aghara
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala
Jok bụ ụdị mmụọ n'ime usoro nkwenye ọdịnala Acholi nke a na-ele anya dịka ihe n'akpata ọrịa
Ndị na-agwọ ọrịa ọdịnala (nke a maara dị ka ajakwa) na mbụ chọpụtara Jok ahụ a na-ekwu maka ya ma mee àjà kwesịrị ekwesị na emume iji gbochie ha
N'aka nke ọzọ, ọ bụrụ na usoro dị otú ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, onye nwere njakịrị ahụ nwere ike ịgafe usoro ememe iji nweta ọkwa ụfọdụ nke njikwa ahụ wee bụrụ onwe ya ajakwa
Ogologo Jok dị ukwuu ma na-agụnye ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ahụmịhe nke ọchịchị nchigbu metụtara
E nwere otu chi Afrịka a maara dịka Jok
Otú ọ dị, Jok nwere ọtụtụ ihe yiri onwe ya nke na-etinye onwe ha n'ihe omume ndị mmadụ
Joke Silva, MFR (amụrụ 29 Septemba 1961) bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, onye ntụzi na ọchụnta ego
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos na Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art na London, Joke Silva malitere ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri na mbido 1990
Na 1998 ọ nwere nnukwu ọrụ, na-esepụta n'ihu Colin Firth na Nia Long na ihe nkiri British-Canadian The Secret Laughter of Women

N'afọ 2006, o meriri 'Best Actress in a Lead Role' na 2nd Africa Movie Academy Awards maka arụmọrụ ya na Women's cot, yana ' Best Actress in a Support Role ' na 4th Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2008 maka arụmọrụ ya dịka nne nne na White Waters
Joke Silva lụrụ onye omee Olu Jacobs
Di na nwunye ahụ hiwere ma rụọ ọrụ Lufodo Group, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke mejupụtara ihe nkiri, akụ nkesa na Lufodo Academy nke nka a na ekiri ekiri
Joke Silva bụ onye isi ihe ọmụmụ na ngwụcha a
Joke Silva bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa nke Malete Film Village, nwere njikọ na Mahadum Kwara State
Na 29 Septemba 2014, a nabatara Joke Silva dị ka onye so na Order nke Federal Republic, otu n'ime nsọpụrụ mba Nigeria, na International Conference Center dị n'Abuja
A mụrụ Joke Silva na Lagos n'ime ezinụlọ Amaro nwere ụmụ anọ
Nne ya, Adebimbola Silva, dọkịta ọsụ ụzọ, nwụrụ na Juli 2015
Nna ya, Emmanuel Afolabi Silva bụ onye ọkaiwu
Joke Silva gara Holy Child College dị na Lagos
Na mahadum ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu ọdịbendị nke gụnyere onye na -ede egwuregwu Bode Osanyin na onye ọbụ abụ Stella Monye
Joke Silva wepụrụ Ofú afọ agụmakwụkwọ ya, oge ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri
Silva kwagara England, na -amụ ihe nkiri na Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art na London
Na mbido, nne na nna ya na -emegide mkpebi Silva ka ọ banye n'ụlọ ihe nkiri mana n'oge na -adịghị anya ha malitere ịkwado ya, na -enwe obi ụtọ maka ihe ịga nke ọma ọ rụrụ n'ọrụ ya
N'ime obere oge ọ na -arụ ọrụ, ọ laghachiri ụlọ akwụkwọ, na -amụ Bekee na Mahadum Lagos
Joke Silva emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro onyonyo n'asụsụ Bekee na Yoruba
Otu n'ime ọrụ izizi ya bụ na ihe nkiri Bekee nke 1990 Mind Bending
Na 1993 ọ pụtara na Owulorojo, sochiri Violated na1995
N'afọ 1998, ọ pụtara n'ihu Colin Firth na Nia Long na ihe nkiri Britain-Canada Ihe ọchị nke ụmụ nwanyị, nke ọ kọwara Nene n'ime ya
Onye edemede Finola Kerrigan kwuru karịa Silva pụtara dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri pụrụiche na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa mgbe o kwuru ọrụ ya
Na 2002, Joke Silva pụtara n'ihu Bimbo Akintola na Keeping Faith
Akintola mechara rụtụ aka na Silva, onye ọ na -akpọ 'Aunty Joke', dị ka nnukwu mmetụta ọrụ, na -agbakwụnye, 'Silva emeela ọtụtụ ihe, mana ọbụghị maka ihe ndị o mere, ọ bụ maka ihe ndị ọ maghị
na ọ mere '
Ọzọkwa na 2002, Silva rụkọrọ ọrụ na gosiputa na The Kingmaker ya na Olu Jacobs
Nke a sochiri ọrụ na foto A Husband's Wife (2003), Shylock (2004), na Ochie Kpọrọ Kpọrọ (2004)
N'afọ 2006, e nyere Joke Silva ihe nrite 'Best Actress in a Leading Role' na 2nd Africa Movie Academy Awards maka ọrụ ya na akwa akwa ụmụ nwanyị
Ka emechara n'afọ ahụ, Silva pụtara n'ihu Genevieve Nnaji na Mildred Okwo gosiputara na ihe nkiri 30 Days, nke nwetara nhọpụta 10 na Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2008
Ọ kọkwara mmepụta Anglo-Nigerian nke Jeta Amata bụ Amazing Grace, nke emere na Calabar
Ndị nkatọ jara ihe nkiri ahụ mma, wee họpụta ya maka nturu ugo 11 African Movie Academy Awards
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kwuru “olu Silva dị ka abụ, [nke] na-enye nghọta maka omume”)
N'afọ 2007, Joke Silva pụtara n'ihu Kate Henshaw-Nuttal, Michael Okon na Fred Essien na Ndubuisi Okoh's To Love and to Hold
Silva meriri nturu ugo onye na -eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2008 maka ngosipụta nne ya na White Waters (2007), n'agbanyeghị na ọ nọghị n'ememe ịnata onyinye ya n'onwe ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ November 2008, Joke Silva kwupụtara na 'oge ọ bụla ọ ga -eme ihe ọjọọ na fim, na ọ ga -ekpe ekpere wee jiri Jizọs mere 'ogige' ya
Silva bụkwa onye nwetara EMOTAN Award site na African Independent Television (AIT) na SOLIDRA Award nke Visual Art
In 2011, Joke Silva gosiputara ya na Nse Ikpe Etim, Wale Ojo naLydia Forson n'imeKunle Afolayan's ihe ọchị ihunanya Phone Swap
Ndị nkatọ toro ya, na otu n'ime ihe nkiri kacha atụ anya n'afọọ nwetara nhọpụta anọ na nturu ugo 8th Africa Movie Academy Awards, gụnyere nhọpụta maka Best Nigerian Film
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite maka Mmezu na nhazi Mmepụta
N'afọ 2013, Silva gara n'ihu ka ọ pụta na Thespian Family Theatre na Mmepụta ihe nkiri 'Mad King of Ijudiya' na Agip Hall nke Muson Center nke Lagos na ekeresimesi

Emere ihe ngosi abụọ n'elekere atọ nke ehihie na elekere ịsị mgbede na 21, 22, 28 na 29 Disemba, nke Vanguard kọwara dị ka 'ngwakọta bara ụba nke akụkọ ọdịnala, ịgba egwu ọdịnala na egwu na -ebuga ndị na -ege ntị na ọnọdụ ime obodo Africa
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2012, ụlọ ọrụ United Nations na -ahụ maka ọgwụ ọjọọ na mpụ họpụtara Joke Silva onye nnọchi anya
Dika iwu UN siri tinye ndị a ma ama na nka, egwu, ihe nkiri, egwuregwu na akwụkwọ iji nyere aka na mkpọsa ha, ọrụ Joke Silva lekwasịrị anya na isonye na ọgụ megide ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na Naịjirịa
Ọrụ na -alụ ọgụ maka ịzụ ahịa mmadụ bụ akụkụ nke mkpọsa 'I Am Priceless' mgbasa Ozi, nke nwetakwara nkwado n'aka ndị ọchịchị Naịjirịa
Nhọpụta Silva bụ maka oge afọ atọ
Joke Silva lụrụ onye omere nka bụ Olu Jacobs ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Di na nwunye ahụ zutere na 1981 na National Theatre, Lagos n'oge ncheta nnwere onwe nke iri abụọ na otu
Joke Silva bụ onye isi ihe ọmụmụ na Lufodo Academy of Performing Arts, ebe di ya na -elekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Lufodo Academy bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ akụ di na nwunye nwere dịka akụkụ nke Lufodo Group, gụnyere Lufodo Productions, Lufodo Nyocha, N'nkesa Lufodo
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya dị ka onye na -eme ihe nkiri, Joke Silva bụ onye na -eme ebere na onye nkwado siri ike maka nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị na ike, na -enye aka na agụmakwụkwọ ha, ọzụzụ na ọganihu ha
Na 29 Septemba 2014, a kwanyere Joke Silva ugwu dịka onye otu Order nke Federal Republic, otu n'ime nsọpụrụ mba Naijiria, na International Conference Center dị n'Abuja
Na Septemba 2016, ekpughere ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara maka AIICO Pension Managers Limited (APML)
Joke Silva, n'ime afọ 2020, na -eduzi mkpọsa ahụ megide ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na -arịa ọrịa na -arịọ maka ego iji kwụọ ụgwọ ọgwụ ha
Joke Silva mere nke ahụ site na ihe atụ nke ndị na -eme ihe nkiri Guild nke Nigeria, AGN, nke kpughere atụmatụ ịmalite mkpuchi ahụike maka ndị otu ya
Jolin Tsai (Mandarin [tsˈaɪ] (na-ege ntị); Chinese 蔡依林; amuru Septemba 15, 1980) bu onye Taiwanese na-abụ abụ, onye na-ede abụ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A na-akpọ ya 'Queen of C-Pop', a na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị kasị nwee mmetụta na omenala ndị China
A maara ya maka nrụgharịgharị ya na-aga n'ihu na ịdị uchu n'ụdị egwu na onyonyo a na-ahụ anya, o nwetekwala nnukwu aha na ewu ewu n'ụwa ndị China na-asụ
Ọ na-ejigide akụkụ ọ bụla nke ọrụ ya, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka onye bụ isi n'ịkwasa ịgba egwu-pop dị ka egwu a ma ama na Greater China
Ọrụ ya, nke gụnyere isiokwu gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ewepụtala ma ọganihu azụmahịa na otuto dị egwu
N'afọ 1998, Tsai meriri asọmpi ịgụ egwu telivishọn nke MTV Mandarin mepụtara
Ndekọ mpụta mbụ ya 1019 (1999) mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe egwu ozugbo, na nwa nwanyị mbụ ya n'ọnụ ụzọ na-esote mere ka ọ bụrụ arụsị dị afọ iri na ụma nke nwere nnukwu onye na-eto eto
Ndekọ ya Ime Anwansi (2003), nke gosipụtara mmeghari egwu mbụ ya, bụ akara mmalite nke ntụzịaka egwu egwu ya gbadoro ụkwụ

Ndekọ ya Dancing Diva (2006), bụ nke masịrị ọha na eze nke ukwuu site na egwu egwu slick na egwu egwu na-adọrọ adọrọ, guzobe ọkwa onye nnọchi anya ya dị ka onye na-ese egwu egwu na mpaghara egwu China
N'afọ 2009, Tsai tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ahụ Ebighị Ebi wee malite ilekọta ọrụ ya kpamkpam
A na-ahụ album ya n'onwe m (2010) dị ka otu n'ime album nnwale kachasị na ụlọ ọrụ egwu China
Ndekọ ya Muse (2012) agbakwunyere egwu pop nwere nka pop ma gbasaa nke ọma na indie

ntọhapụ, yana anọ n'ime ọba ndị a bụkwa ọba egwu kachasị ere na mba n'ozuzu n'ime afọ ewepụtara ha
Ọ natala mkpokọta Golden Melody Awards asaa, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese egwu-pop nwanyị nwere mmeri kachasị
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nwanyị na-ese ihe nkiri Taiwan kacha akwụ ụgwọ, ma gosipụtala ọtụtụ oge na ndepụta Forbes China Celebrity 100
N'afọ 2014, Magazin na-esote kọrọ na ọnụ ahịa ụgbụ ya ruru ijeri $2 NT
A mụrụ Tsai na Hsinchuang City, Taipei County, Taiwan (ugbu a Hsinchuang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan) na Septemba 15, 1980
Aha nna ya bụ Tsai Chu-chen, aha nne ya bụ Huang Chun-mei, o nwekwara nwa nwoke
nwanne nwanyị nke okenye aha ya bụ Tsai Min-wen
Nna ya sitere na Han Chinese, nne ya bụ ọkara Han Chinese na ọkara nwa amaala Taiwanese Papora
Nna ya rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwụ ụgwọ ego tupu ya emepe ụlọ ọrụ na Thailand, nne ya zụlitekwara ụmụ ha nwanyị abụọ na Taiwan n'onwe ya
Nna ya mechara laghachi Taiwan ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọrụ na-akwaga mbata na Thailand
Tsai gara Hsinchuang Elementary School, Hsinchuang Junior High School, na Chingmei High School
Kemgbe klas nke mbụ, ọ so na ndị atọ kacha elu na klaasị ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ semester ọ bụla
Ọ mụtala ịmụ akwụkwọ ọgụgụ ndị China na ịkpọ piano kemgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, ọ gafere ule piano nke klasị 9
Ọ nwere mmasị isonye na mmemme extracurricular kemgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị
Ọ sonyeere ndị otu egwu na egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ya, mana o mechara kwụsị n'ihi mmerụ ahụ nke nkwonkwo ụkwụ ya
Ọ sonyeere ndị otu bọọlụ bọọlụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, wee hibe otu egwu aha ya bụ Twister na ụmụ klas ya, ndị otu ahụ mechara tiwa n'ihi na arụmọrụ ha adịghị mma dịka a tụrụ anya ya

Ọ rụrụ 'Zombie' Cranberries na oriri nnabata nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ama ama nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ sophomore ya, ma mee Bette Midler's 'The Rose' na mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọzọ n'afọ sophomore

Tsai has taken part in singing competitions since high school, and she won in a singing competition organized by her high school and placed second in another competition organized by Broadcasting Corporation of China

In May 1998, she participated in a television singing competition show produced by MTV Mandarin to meet the requirement for a record of extracurricular activity to apply for universities, and she stand out by performing a series of English songs, including Whitney Houston's 'Greatest Love of All', Mariah Carey's 'Hero', and LeAnn Rimes's 'How Do I Live', and eventually won the competition
'It will be great if I could help her produce a record,' said one judge Jeff Lee
'She is a born singer, she sings with her talent,' said another judge Wawa Chen

Universal Music Taiwan's music director Sam Chen described Tsai looked different on and off stage in the competition, saying 'She looked just like a uniform student when she was off the stage, but she looked like she has great superstar potential when she was on the stage' In March 1999, Tsai signed a recording contract with Universal, and she became the key new artist of the year

Universal arranged a series of courses for Tsai for half a year, including twice-weekly dance course to help her improve stage performance, twice-weekly makeup course to help her do makeup when she was pressed for schedules, and speech training course to help her cope with the press
Additionally, Universal arranged for her to fly to Ireland, Japan, the United States, and the United Kingdom to watch live performances of foreign artists

In June 1999, Tsai was admitted to the English literature major of Fu Jen Catholic University after winning first place in the recommendation and screening test, and she started her four-year career as a 'student singer'

Tsai nwere oke ụda mezzo-soprano
Na May 1998, Tsai so na asọmpi ịbụ abụ nke MTV Mandarin nwere
O meriri asọmpi ahụ site n'ịrụ abụ nke Whitney Houston, Mariah Carey, na LeAnn Rimes, o gosikwara na o nwere nkà ịbụ abụ
'Ọ bụ onye na-agụ egwú mụrụ
O ji nkà ya na-abụ abụ, 'ka otu ọkàikpe Wawa Chen kwuru
A na-amata olu Tsai nke ukwuu, mana a katọrọ ya maka nka ịbụ abụ kemgbe ọ malitere, gụnyere olu egwu dị obere na oke ụda olu
Onye na-emepụta ihe Taiwanese Bing Wang kwuru, sị 'Nka nke ịbụ abụ ya adịghị agafe agafe, mana ọ dabara nke ọma na nkwupụta ya pụrụ iche'
A họpụtara tsai maka Golden Melody Award for Best Female Mandarin Singer ọtụtụ oge, ma merie ihe nrite maka album 2006 ya, Dancing Diva
Ọ bụ nke mbụ a na-amata ụda olu ya site na nturu ugo egwu ndị ọkachamara, mana ụfọdụ ndị ka na-ajụ ma ikike ịbụ abụ ya ò kwesịrị inweta ihe nrite a

Liu Ya-wen, onye isi oche ndị juri Golden Melody Awards nke afọ, kwuru na Tsai meriri maka àgwà ya niile, na-ekwu, sị 'Jolin Tsai na-eji amamihe ya na egwu egwu ya na-edu ụzọ, karịsịa album ya Dancing Diva bụ
ọgaranya ọdịnaya, mere ka ọ hapụ ịbụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri wee ghọọ ezigbo onye na-abụ abụ'

A họpụtara Tsai maka 10 Golden Melody Awards maka album 2014 ya, Play, mana ahọpụtaghị ya maka onye na-abụ nwanyị Mandarin kacha mma, n'ihi na ụfọdụ ndị ọka ikpe kwuru na album ahụ nwere nsogbu na mgbazi oke ụda, nke mere na emetụta ntuli aka nke ndị ọka ikpe ndị ọzọ

DJ Taiwanese Kyle Cheng kwuru na ya ahụghị nsogbu na mgbazi ụda, na-ekwu, sị 'Ihe ndekọ na-emepụta ụda pụrụ iche' Onye njikwa Tsai Tom Wang zarakwara, sị 'Jolin Tsai abụghị onye na-agụ egwú na-adabere na mgbazi pitch, anyị na-anabata ndị mmadụ ka ha gee ntị na ọrụ ndụ ya

Enwere m obi ike na ike ya' Tencent Entertainment dere na a na-eleda nkà nke Tsai anya mgbe mgbe, na-agbakwụnye, sị 'Jolin Tsai nwere njikwa iku ume na nkà dị elu, ọ dịghị ọtụtụ ndị na-abụ abụ dị ka ya nwere ike ịgba egwu egwu niile na-enweghị ume'

Dị ka Tsai si kwuo, mmeghe yoga mmeghe nke J1 World Tour na 2004 sitere na mmeghe yoga mmeghe nke Madonna's Re-Invention World Tour n'otu afọ ahụ

Tsai kwuru na ya ji nwayọọ nwayọọ ghọọ onye na-akwado Madonna mgbe ọ chọpụtara na ọ na-etinye ọtụtụ ahụ ike, o kwuru, sị 'Enwere m olileanya na m ga-abụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri n'ọdịnihu, dị ka Madonna, onye nwere ike iduzi ụzọ na egwu, ogbo

, ịgba egwu, na ejiji, ọ bụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ m' Onye bụbu onye na-egwu egwu Tsai Bruce Chang chetara na Tsai ejirila nlezianya leruo ihe ngosi nke Madonna, Tsai kwuru, sị 'Ọ [Madonna] anaghị adịkarị n'ịgba egwu, mana ihe ọ bụla ọ na-eme na-adị ike, nke ahụ bụkwa arụmọrụ ọkwa m ga-ele anya' Tsai rụrụ egwu vogue na-asọpụrụ Madonna na vidiyo egwu nke egwu 'Ọnyà Mmanụ aṅụ' site na album 2010, onwe m, o kwuru, sị 'Madonna bụ onye na-ese ihe na-amasị m nke ukwuu
Ọ na-emepụta ihe n'ọtụtụ akụkụ

Ọbụna ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ ya kpalitere ọtụtụ esemokwu n'oge ahụ, n'ileghachi anya azụ ugbu a, m ka na-eche na ọrụ ya dị nnọọ ịtụnanya' Madonna wetara Eurodance na egwu eletrọnịkị ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ewu ewu na egwu egwu America na 1980 na 1990, Tsai kwuru, sị 'Achọrọ m iweta egwu egwu egwu kachasị ewu ewu sitere na West gaa na ebe egwu China' Ọ gbakwụnyere 'Mgbe ị na-eme egwu pop, anyị kwesịrị iduga ndị mmadụ ịnakwere ụdị ọhụrụ na ihe ọhụrụ, ma na-agbagha echiche ndị dị ugbu a' DJ Mykal Taiwanese kwuru, sị 'Mgbanwe ga-emerịrị n'ahịa a na-emekarị ka ọ nwee mmetụta dị ukwuu
Jolin Tsai na-anwale ihe egwu egwu ọhụrụ dị ka diva, nke a kwenyere na o nwere ohere ime mmetụta na ndị na-ege ntị n'ozuzu'

Tsai kwukwara na Destiny's Child kpaliri ya nke ukwuu tupu mgbe ahụ, na-ekwu, sị 'M na-enwe mmasị na ha nke ukwuu, ma ịgba egwú na ịbụ abụ bụ ezigbo nkà' Na mgbakwunye, Tsai akpọwokwa ndị nka gụnyere Janet Jackson, Kylie Minogue, Sandy Lam, A-Mei, Faye Wong na Coco Lee dị ka isi mmalite nke mkpali
N'ịbụ onye a ma ama maka iweghachi ụdị ya na onyonyo ya, ọha na eze na-ahụ ụdị ejiji nke Tsai, ọ na-edobekwa ụdị ejiji n'ụwa niile na-asụ Chinese
Akpọrọ ya dị ka 'Onye na-egbu ụmụ nwoke na-eto eto', Tsai bụ onye ama ama n'etiti ụmụ nwoke nọ n'afọ iri na ụma maka anya nwa agbọghọ dị ọcha na nke aka ya dị ọcha n'ọnụ ụzọ na-esote n'oge ọ bụ nwata

Kemgbe ewepụtara album Magic 2003 ya, Tsai na-achụpụkarị ihe onyonyo ya na-emeghị ihe ọjọọ maka ile anya sexy, akwụkwọ akụkọ Japan Ray na aha ya bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Taiwan, o kwuru na mgbakwasa bụ iyi ụdị na njirimara ndị mmadụ
Na May 2006, Tsai nwetara MTV Asia Award maka Ụdị Award

Na Disemba 2006, Yahoo! Taiwan họọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe kachasị mma na Taiwan, Tsai nwetara nkwado nke ọtụtụ ndị isi akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji na ọha ọha, na-egosi nkwenye ndị mmadụ banyere ụdị ejiji ya
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, Tsai ji nwayọọ nwayọọ ghọọ ụdị avant-garde

N'October 2016, Vogue dere, sị 'Dịka ụdị chameleon, ọ na-eyi uwe iji kwado ọnọdụ ya na oge ahụ' Kemgbe 2007, a na-akpọ Tsai n'otu n'otu ka ọ na-ekiri izu ejiji 'Big Four', Met Gala, na Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ na-agụ egwú China nke a kpọrọ òkù ịbịa ihe omume ejiji ndị a ma ama
Ọdịdị ejiji ya etinyela ya n'ihu akwụkwọ akụkọ ejiji, dị ka Cosmopolitan, Elle, Harper's Bazaar, Marie Claire, na Vogue
Tsai ebutewokwa ụzọ na nka ntu
Ọ pụtara na mkpuchi nke Ntu Up! Taiwan, onye isi oche magazin ahụ bụ Sigehito Sasaki kpọrọ 'Queen of Nail Art' nke Taiwan

Tsai kwuru, sị 'Enweghị m ike iguzo enweghị agba na mbọ m, enweghị m ntụkwasị obi na-enweghị agba agba' FHM Taiwan họọrọ Tsai kacha 10 ugboro asatọ na ndepụta '100 ndị inyom kacha nwee mmekọahụ n'ụwa' n'ime afọ iri
Na 2016, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ họọrọ ya nke mbụ na ndepụta ahụ
Tsai bụbu onye ọbụ abụ nwere nnukwu uru azụmaahịa, ọ natakwala nnukwu uru azụmaahịa kemgbe ọ malitere
N'ịre ihe ndekọ ihe karịrị nde 25, Tsai bụ nwanyị na-ese ihe nkiri Taiwan kacha ere kemgbe 2000
Akpọrọ ya dị ka 'Queen of Money-Making', ọ bụ nwanyị Taiwanese kacha akwụ ụgwọ site na 2004 ruo 2019 yana onye nke abụọ kacha akwụ ụgwọ
Nwanyị nwanyị Taiwanese na-ese ihe na 2020 na 2021
N'afọ 2010, Forbes China malitere ịkọ akụkọ ego nke ndị ama ama China mụrụ na Hong Kong, Taiwan, na mba ofesi
Ahọpụtala ya na 20 kacha elu ugboro isii na ndepụta 'Forbes China Celebrity 100' n'ime afọ iri, na atọ n'ime ha bụ ndị ọ nọ n'ọkwa 10
N'ihe dị ka December 2014, a na-eme atụmatụ na ọnụ ahịa Tsai ruru ihe karịrị ijeri NT $2

N'ịbụ ndị nwere ihe karịrị nde 43 na-eso ụzọ na Sina Weibo na nde 4 na Instagram, Forbes depụtara Tsai na 'Asia's 100 Digital Stars', nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ememme Asia-Pacific kachasị na mgbasa ozi ọha
N'inwe fanbase raara onwe ya nye nke ndị LGBT mejupụtara, a na-ewere Tsai dị ka akara ngosi nwoke nwere mmasị nwoke

N'afọ 2012, ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ mkpesa na-akpọ gọọmentị Taiwan na-agafe Iwu Ịha nhatanha alụmdi na nwunye na ịkwado alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị na Taiwan, o kwuru, sị 'Ụdị ịhụnanya ọ bụla aghaghị ịkwado, na-akatọ ịhụnanya nke ndị ọzọ adịghị n'ụzọ ịhụnanya
' Egwu ya - 'Dr
Jolin', 'Fantasy', 'nwanyị nwanyị', 'Anyị niile dị iche, ma otu', na 'Womxnly' niile na-akwado ndị LGBT na-ege ntị ma na-akwado ịhụnanya nwoke na nwanyị

N'April 2015, e nyere Tsai Icon Award na 2nd Asia LGBT Milestone Awards iji gosi na o wepụrụ nrụgide echiche ọha na eze na iji mmetụta ya na-akwado ikike LGBT, o kwuru, sị 'Ihe nrite a kwesịrị ịgakwuru ndị niile na-ekwu okwu
maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị iji weta okwu a n'ihu' N'October 2015, Tsai gosipụtara na mkpuchi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere mmasị nwanyị nke Singapore, Lezs

N'ajụjụ ọnụ Lezs gbara ya na Lezs, o kwuru, sị 'Ndị na-abụ abụ anaghị adabere na ihe nrite ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ, kama na-adabere n'ịbụ abụ iji gosi ịhụnanya, ka ndị mmadụ wee nwetakwu obi ike, obi ụtọ na ncheta, nke a bụ ihe m pụtara na ogbo

' Na June 2017, Billboard dere, sị 'Tsai anọchiwo anya ndị di na nwunye na-edina ụdị onwe na ụdị ndụ LGBTQ+ dị iche iche site na mwepụta pop ya na-egbuke egbuke, na-enye ihe ngosi maka ihe nnọchianya dị iche iche na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na-agbanwe agbanwe na-asụ Chinese' Tsai kwuru, sị 'Echeghị m na m ga-abụ arụsị maka ndị otu ọ bụla
Naanị ihe m chọrọ ime bụ ịgba ụfọdụ ndị ume site n'ikwu ihe m chere na ọ dị mma, ka ha wee mara na ọ bụghị naanị ha'
Ndụ nke Tsai bụ ihe a na-elebara ọha anya, ya na Jay Chou, Eddie Peng na Vivian Dawson enweela mmekọrịta ogologo oge kemgbe ọ malitere
Na Jenụwarị 2001, Tsai zutere onye ọbụ abụ Taiwanese Jay Chou na ihe ngosi telivishọn Taiwanese, Guess
N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2001, a hụrụ ha abụọ ka ha na-eri nri n’otu izakaya dị na Shinjuku, Japan, e mechakwara hụ na ha na-akpa na Taiwan ọtụtụ ugboro
Na February 2005, a hụrụ Chou na onye na-egosi telivishọn Taiwanese Patty Hou ka ha na-eme njem na Shibuya, Japan, na-eme ka mmekọrịta Tsai na Chou kwụsị
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Tsai na Chou malitere ịkpachara anya zere ịhụ ibe ha n'oge dị iche iche
Na June 2010, a kpọrọ Tsai ka ọ bụrụ ọbịa pụrụ iche na egwu egwu Chou dị na Taipei, Taiwan, ọ dịkwa ka ha alọghachila na ndị enyi nkịtị
Na Jenụwarị 2007, a hụrụ Tsai na onye omee Taiwanese Eddie Peng ka ha na-eme njem na London, England, e mesịakwa, a hụrụ ka ha na-akpa na Taiwan ọtụtụ ugboro
Na Septemba 2008, Peng nwere esemokwu ya na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa ya, Power Generation, nke a na-enyo enyo na ọ na-agbalị igbochi Tsai na Peng mmekọrịta

N'August 2009, onye bụbu onye njikwa Peng Virginia Liu gosipụtara n'ezoghị ọnụ na Tsai na Peng nwere mmekọrịta karịrị afọ atọ kemgbe etiti afọ 2006, a na-enyo enyo na nne Peng gbochiri mmekọrịta ha ịmalite n'ihi enweghị afọ ojuju nke Tsai achọghị ikwusa mmekọrịta ha
Na July 2010, ihe nlereanya New Zealand Vivian Dawson gbara egwu na vidiyo egwu Tsai nke egwu 'Ịhụnanya Player' site na album, Onwe m (2010)
Na Septemba 2010, a hụrụ ha abụọ ka ha na-eme njem na Tokyo, Japan
Kemgbe ahụ, a na-ahụ ha mgbe niile ka ha na-akpa na ịgagharị gburugburu ụwa
Na Nọvemba 2011, nna Tsai kwadoro mmekọrịta Tsai na Dawson yana Tsai nwere mmekọrịta na Jay Chou na Eddie Peng
Na February 2013, Tsai na Dawson gbagara New Zealand izute ndị mụrụ Dawson
Na Disemba 2016, onye njikwa Tsai Tom Wang kwadoro na mmekọrịta Tsai na Dawson akwụsịla n'udo na Nọvemba 2016

Ihe ịga nke ọma Tsai emeela ka ọ bụrụ akara omenala pop na ụwa ndị na-asụ Chinese, Tencent Entertainment dere, sị 'Jolin Tsai aghọwo ihe nnọchianya nke egwu pop ọ bụghị nanị n'ihi egwu ya, ihe oyiyi, na ịgba egwú ya, kamakwa n'ihi na ọ naghị agba ọsọ, enweghị atụ egwu

mmụọ, na ohere na-adịghị agwụ agwụ' NetEase Entertainment dere, sị 'Ikekwe, ọgbọ ole na ole site ugbu a, mgbe anyị leghachiri anya azụ na C-pop divas nke mmalite narị afọ nke 21, anyị ga-ebu ụzọ chee banyere Jolin Tsai na ọ dịghị onye ọzọ dị ka akara ngosi, dịka anyị agaghị ele anya ma ọlị

laghachi na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke 20 na-enweghị aha na-egbuke egbuke nke Madonna' Hung Hsiu-chu, onye bụbu onye isi oche otu pati Nationalist nke China kwuru, sị 'Ihe omume nka ya ewepụtala ụkpụrụ na-enweghị atụ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu C-pop
E nwere ike ikwu na aha Jolin Tsai sonyeere ọgbọ ndị na-eto eto n'ime afọ iri abụọ dum
N'ime afọ niile, àgwà Tsai siri ike na ịrụsi ọrụ ike na-amasị m mgbe niile

E ji ọbara, ọsụsọ, na anya mmiri na-enweghị atụ, bụ́ ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ndị a na-akwanyere ùgwù kwakọbara! N'April 2010, a kpọrọ Tsai ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime egwu egwu Hong Kong/Taiwan 10 kacha emetụta n'ime afọ iri site na Top Chinese Music Awards
Na Disemba 2016, Migu Music Awards nyere ya Best Female Singer of the Year
Na Mee 2019, a họọrọ ya nke mbụ na ngalaba nke ụdị ejiji na nyocha nke 'Ònye bụ nwanyị kacha nwee mmetụta maka ọgbọ ọhụrụ?' nke Elle Taiwan na magazin Taiwan Cheers jikọtara ya
Ọ nọkwa n'ọkwa nke abụọ n'ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na àgwà ndụ
Cheers dere, sị 'Site na onye na-agụ egwú pop ruo onye na-elekọta mmadụ, Jolin Tsai ejiriwo nlezianya na-egosipụta ike ya kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ'
A maara dị ka 'Queen of C-Pop', Tsai bụ onye na-ewu ewu na-agba egwu dị ka egwu na-ewu ewu na Greater China

Bloomberg Businessweek dere, sị 'Jolin Tsai ji egwu malite oge ya, ma mee ka ụwa mara ụkpụrụ egwu egwu ndị China' Tencent Entertainment dere, sị 'Jolin Tsai bụ diva kachasị na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na mpaghara egwu ndị China n'ime afọ iri gara aga
Site na nwa agbọghọ na-esote ọnụ na 'Queen of Reinvention', ihe kacha mma banyere Jolin Tsai abụghị nkà egwu ya, kama ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike
omume dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu' Tsai akwalitela imepụta vidiyo egwu ndị China n'ogo ọhụrụ

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Beijing dere, sị 'Ebumnuche nke ụlọ ọrụ egwu pop abụghị naanị ịme ego, kamakwa ịmepụta ọdịnaya ọhụrụ, ihe okike na nke mara mma n'ime usoro azụmahịa ya site n'ịkwado ụbụrụ ya ugboro ugboro
Dị ka ndị okike
N'ime ọrụ egwu ndị a ma ama, ha kwesịrị ịnwe ihe ndị dị elu na nke emelitere maka ọrụ ha, ọ bụghịkwa naanị inwe afọ ojuju maka usoro mmepụta ihe ugboro ugboro
akụkụ nke vidiyo egwu, ọ kwụsịrị na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ album ọ bụla

na-arụ ọrụ sitere na album ọ bụla' Ọrụ Tsai emetụtawokwa ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe nke ọgbọ ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Cyndi Wang, Rainie Yang, Angela Chang, A-Lin, GEM, Lala Hsu, Eve Ai, Shi Shi, Emma Wu, Yao Yao, By2, Lexie Liu, Meng Meiqi
, Wu Xuanyi, Cheng Xiao, Kimberley Chen, Sharon Kwan, wdg
Jollof (/dʒəˈlɒf/), ma ọ bụ osikapa jollof, bụ nri osikapa sitere na West Afrịka

A na-ejikarị osikapa ogologo, tomato, yabasị, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, akwụkwọ nri na anụ eme nri ahụ n'otu ite, ọ bụ ezie na ihe ndị mejupụtara ya na usoro nkwadebe ya dịgasị iche na mpaghara dị iche iche

Enwere ike ịchọta mmalite nke osikapa jollof na mpaghara Senegambian nke Wolof ma ọ bụ Alaeze Ukwu Jolof chịrị na narị afọ nke iri na anọ, na-agafe akụkụ nke Senegal nke taa, Gambia na Mauritania, ebe a na-akụ osikapa
Nri a sitere na nri ọdịnala a na-akpọ thieboudienne, nke nwere osikapa, azụ, shellfish na akwụkwọ nri
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nri na ọrụ ugbo bụ James C

McCann na-ewere nkwupụta a dị ka ihe ezi uche dị na ya n'ihi ewu ewu nke osikapa na ndagwurugwu Niger dị n'elu, mana ọ na-ewere na o yighị ka nri ahụ nwere ike ịgbasa site na Senegal ruo ebe ọ dị ugbu a ebe ọ bụ na a anaghị ahụ mgbasa dị otú ahụ na 'usoro asụsụ, akụkọ ihe mere n'oge ma ọ bụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị'

Kama nke ahụ, ọ na-atụ aro ka nri ahụ gbasaa na alaeze Mali, ọkachasị ndị ahịa Djula bụ ndị gbasasịrị n'ọtụtụ ebe na mpaghara azụmahịa na obodo ukwu, na-eburu ha nka akụ na ụba nke 'ịkpụ ihe ojii, obere ahịa, na ọrụ ugbo osikapa' yana okpukpe nke Islam

Marc Dufumier, prọfesọ emeritus nke agronomy, na-atụ aro mmalite ọhụrụ maka nri ahụ, nke nwere ike ịpụta dị ka nsonaazụ nke nkwalite nke ịkọ ahụekere siri ike na etiti Senegal maka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ French, na ebe a kwụrụ mbelata dị mma n'ebe a kụrụ ọka na sorghum staples site na mbubata nke osikapa a kụwara akụwa site na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia

O nwere ike ịgbasa n'ógbè ahụ dum site na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke azụmahịa, ọdịbendị na okpukpe na-ejikọta mba Senegal na mba Ghana, Naijiria na karịa, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-aga n'ihu taa, dị ka Tijāniyyah Sufi brotherhood na-eweta ọtụtụ puku ndị njem ala nsọ West Afrịka na mba Senegal kwa afọ
Osikapa Jollof bụ otu n'ime nri ndị a na-ahụkarị na West Afrịka
E nwere ọtụtụ ọdịiche mpaghara na aha na ihe ndị mejupụtara ya; dịka ọmụmaatụ, na Mali a na-akpọ ya zaamè na Bamanankan
Aha a na-akpọkarị Jollof sitere na aha ndị Wolof, ọ bụ ezie na na mba Senegal na mba Gambia a na-ezo aka na nri ahụ na Wolof dị ka ceebu jën ma ọ bụ benachin
N'ógbè ndị na-asụ French, a na-akpọ ya riz au gras
N'agbanyeghị ọdịiche dị iche iche, nri ahụ bụ 'ihe a na-aghọta ọnụ' n'ofe mpaghara ma ghọọ nri Afrịka a ma ama na mpụga kọntinent ahụ
Osikapa Jollof na-ejikarị osikapa, mmanụ nri, akwụkwọ nri dịka tomato, yabasị, ose uhie, galik, ginger na ose Scotch bonnet chilli
Iji mee ka ụcha nri ahụ dịkwuo mma, a na-agbakwunye tomato paste (purée)
Dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, a na-eji ihe na-atọ ụtọ, nnu, cubes (mgwakọta nke ihe na-eme ka ụtọ dị ụtọ, nnu
Iji gbakwunye nri ahụ, a na-ejikarị ọkụkọ, turkey, anụ ehi ma ọ bụ azụ na nri ahụ

Mba ọ bụla dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka nwere ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu ụdị nri, na mba Ghana, mba Naijiria, mba Sierra Leone, mbaLiberia na mba Cameroon na-asọ mpi karịsịa maka mba na-eme jollof kacha mma
Nke a bụ ihe a ma ama karịsịa n'etiti Naịjirịa na Ghana, na asọmpi a na-akpọ 'Jollof Wars'
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere nnukwu ọdịiche, njirimara bụ isi maka osikapa jollof nke Naijiria gụnyere osikapa a na-esi nri, tomato na tomato paste, ose, mmanụ akwụkwọ nri, yabasị, na cubes
A na-esi ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị a n'otu ite, nke anụ bara ọgaranya na tomato e siri esi na ose puree na-eme ka ntọala ya
A na-agbakwunye osikapa ma hapụ ya ka ọ sie na mmiri
A na-ejikwa protein a họọrọ na nri ahụ ma na-ejikarị plantain e siri esi, moi moi, akwụkwọ nri a na-esi ísì ụtọ, coleslaw, salad, wdg
N'ógbè ndị dị n'akụkụ osimiri nke Naijiria ebe nri mmiri bụ isi na-eweta protein, nri mmiri na-ejikarị ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ anụ dị ka protein nke nhọrọ
[citation needed]

A na-eji mmanụ akwụkwọ nri, yabasị, ginger, cloves nke galik, chillies, tomato paste, anụ ehi ma ọ bụ ewu ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ (mgbe ụfọdụ na-agbanwere na akwụkwọ nri agwakọta), osikapa mpaghara ma ọ bụ nke a nụchara anụcha, nke a na-ahụkarị Jasmine osikapa na ose ojii

Usoro isi jollof na-amalite site na mbụ ịkwadebe anụ ehi ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ site na itinye ya n'ime ihe na-atọ ụtọ ma jiri pureé nke ginger, yabasị na galik na-esi ya ọkụ ma sie ya ruo mgbe esichara ya nke ọma
A na-esizi ihe ndị ọzọ n'ọkụ ọnụ, malite na yabasị, ose, tomato paste, tomato na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ n'usoro ahụ
Mgbe e siri ihe niile, a na-agbakwunye osikapa ma sie ya ruo mgbe a kwadebere nri ahụ
A na-ejikarị anụ ehi, ọkụkọ, azụ e siri esi nke ọma, ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri agwakọta na nri ndị Ghana jollof
A na-ejikwa Jollof na Ghana na shito, ụdị ose a ma ama nke sitere na Ghana, na salad n'oge oriri na ememe ndị ọzọ
A na-eji nlezianya akwadebe osikapa Jollof nke e mere na Guinea-Bissau na ihe ndị dị ka tomato, yabasị, tomato paste, red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers
A na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ esi nri ndị a na mmanụ akwụkwọ nri na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ iji mee ka ụtọ jollof dịkwuo mma
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, nri a na-etinye ginger iji mee ka osikapa na-acha ọcha na-atọ ụtọ
N'ikpeazụ, a na-ejikarị nri a n'onwe ya mana mgbe ụfọdụ a na-enye ya ọkụkọ, okra na / ma ọ bụ plantain e siri esi
Kemgbe afọ 2010s enwere mmasị na-arịwanye elu na nri West Africa na ụwa ọdịda anyanwụ
E meela emume nri Jollof na Washington, DC, na US, na Toronto, Canada
A na-eme emume 'Ụbọchị Jollof Ụwa' kemgbe afọ 2015 na 22 na ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na-enweta mmasị na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta
Àtụ Rice dishes
Jonathan Granoff bụ onye ọka iwu America, onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye nkuzi, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Onye isi oche nke Global Security Institute
Granoff bụ onye ndụmọdụ ukwu nke Kọmitii American Bar Association na Arms Control na National Security ma jee ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Kọmiti NGO na Disarmament na United Nations

Ọ na-eje ozi n'ọtụtụ bọọdụ na-achịkwa na ndị ndụmọdụ gụnyere Kọmitii Ndị Ọkaiwu na Iwu Nuklia, Lawyers Alliance for World Security, Jane Goodall Institute, Bipartisan Security Group, na Middle Powers Initiative
Granoff akụziwo n'ụwa niile gbasara iwu, omume na akụkụ ime mmụọ nke mmepe na nchekwa mmadụ, na-elekwasị anya na egwu nke ngwá agha nuklia
Dị ka onye na-ede ihe nkiri, e gosipụtara Granoff n'ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri atọ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ iwu na Philadelphia dị ka onye na-arụ otu onye, n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ dị n'etiti, yana dị ka onye ndụmọdụ n'ụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke nnọkọ pụrụ iche gbasara iyi ọha egwu na iyi egwu nye mmadụ na Summit of Nobel Peace Laureates na Rome n'afọ 2004, ebe ọ nọchitere anya International Peace Bureau, otu Nobel Peace Laireate
Granoff nọchitere anya International Peace Bureau na Nobel Peace Laureate Summits na Rome kwa afọ kemgbe afọ 2002
Granoff bụ nwa nwoke nke onye na-agụ egwu Kitty Kallen nke a maara nke ọma maka ndekọ egwu ya nke afọ 1954 Little Things Mean a Lot' na onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn Bernard 'Budd' Granoff (1920-1996)
Granoff nwetara nzere Baccalaureate ya, Cum Laude, na Vassar College na Juris Doctor na Rutgers School of Law - Camden
N'ọnwa Mee 5, 2010, New York City 'A Good Framework for a Good Future' ()
gosipụtara na 'Principles, Values and Global Security,' seminarị nke Religions for Peace haziri
N'ọnwa Eprel 19, 2010, Tehran, Iran ()
ngosi e nyere na Nzukọ Mba Nile na Non-proliferation na Disarmament, nke Ministri Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme ná Mba Ọzọ nke Iran kwadoro
N'ọnwa Disemba 5, 2009, Hiroshima, Japan ' icheta anyị, ekele gị, Hiroshima' ()
gosipụtara na nnọkọ ahụ, 'Hiroshima Strives for Nuclear Abolition Pursuing measures to energize the 2010 NPT Review Conference,' nke Hiroshima Peace Institute na Chugoku Shimbun haziri
Jonathan Grigg bụ prọfesọ Britain nkè iku ume ụmụaka na ọgwụ gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum Queen Mary nke London

Ọ bụbu ónyé ndu nyocha nke British Paediatric Respiratory Society ma bụrụkwa osote ónyé isi óche nke Royal College of Physicians' na-arụ ọrụ na mmetọ ikuku ma dee akụkọ 'Mmfu ọ bụla anyị na-ewe, mmetụta ndụ nke mmetọ ifufe'
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Paediatric Assembly nké European Respiratory Society ruo n'afọ 2017
N'afọ 2020 ọ ghọrọ ónyé isi nchọpụta na National Institute for Health and Care Research (NIHR)
Grigg enweela ihe ngosi mgbasa ozi dị íchè íchè nke Britain gụnyere ịbụ onye sonyere na mmemme Radio 4 Costing the Earth, na ajụjụ ọnụ na Sky News gbásárá akụkọ RCP
Jonathan Grigg bụ ónyé guzobere Doctors against Diesel, otu na-akwado ngwá ngwá site na ụgbọ ala diesel, vans, na tagzi ugbu a
Jonathan Mhondorohuma (a mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Disemba 25, 1974) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Mvurwi, Mhondorohuma gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'obodo ya, ma gụchaa ogo level O ya n'ebe ahụ
N'afọ 1989, enyi ya Square Chikwanda kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa rụọ ọrụ na Tengenenge Sculpture Community; ọ nọrọ ọnwa isii sochirinụ n'ebe ahụ na-amụta ihe site na Chikwanda tupu ọ kwaga Harare
N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere ma rụọ ọrụ n'okpuru Joseph Ndandarika, onye a ka nwere ike ịhụ mmetụta ya na ọrụ ya
Mgbe Ndandarika nwụrụ n'afọ 1991, Mhondorohuma kwagara Hatfield ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya
N'afọ 1997, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Jonathan nwere ọtụtụ njikọ ezinụlọ, ma nwee njikọ dị ukwuu na ụmụ ya atọ, na nwunye ya Faith
Jonathan Moore (amụrụ na 31 Mee na afọ 1984) bụ onye England na-eme egwuregwu nke na-ahụ maka ịwụli elu atọ na ịwụli ogologo
N'asọmupi na ihe omume triple jump na 2001, ọ meriri ọla edo na World Youth Championships na ọlaọcha na European Junior Championships
Onye bụbu onye nwere ihe ndekọ British Junior long jump, ọ bụ nwa nke Commonwealth Games triple jump medalist Aston Moore
A mụrụ ya na Sutton Coldfield, Birmingham, Jonathan Moore malitere ime ịwụli elu okpukpu atọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Ihe nrite mbụ ya bịara na ihe omume English Schools na 1999 ma merie ọla edo n'otu ihe omume ahụ na 2000
N'afọ 2000 ọ nwetakwara mmeri U17 Championship na ihe omume abụọ ahụ na Schools 'International na Commonwealth Youth Games na okpukpu atọ
N'afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye nke mbụ na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa na-agba ọsọ mita iri na isii na ịwụli elu atọ
N'afọ 2001, Moore meriri n'ọkwa English Schools na ọla edo AAA U20 na ogologo ịwụli elu
O nwetara ọla edo na ịwụli elu atọ na World Youth Championships site na ịwụ elu nke mita 1636 na ọlaọcha na 2001 European Junior Championships na mita 1643
O ruru ihe ndekọ British Junior long jump na 798 mita na egwuregwu mba ụwa megide France ma mee 800 m mbụ ya na 2002 mgbe o mere British Junior Record na 803 m na Loughborough
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ British Junior wụlitere ihe karịrị mita asatọ
Ọ nọgidere na AAA U20 ya mana n'afọ 2002, n'oge ihe omume mbụ nke oge ahụ, Moore gbajiri patella ya
Ọ gbakere ngwa ngwa mgbe a wasịrị ya n'oghere oghere ma nwee ekele dị ukwuu maka nkwado sitere n'aka onye egwuregwu ibe ya Jonathan Edwards
N'ime naanị ọnwa iri na abụọ, Moore nọ na-asọmupi ọzọ wee laghachi na asọmupi ọzọ wee nweta ọlaọcha n'afọ 2004 maka AAA Indoor Long Jumpis mana mmechuihu ga-eso
Moore dara ule ọgwụ ọjọọ na nzukọ na Merksem, Belgium, ebe o meriri n'ịgba ọsọ ogologo site na mgbalị nke 782 m na 2004
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ gbanahụ mmachibido iwu ọgwụ ọjọọ mgbe ọ nwalere cannabis ma nye ya ịdọ aka ná ntị ọha na eze mgbe o kwuru na ọgwụ ahụ abanyela n'usoro ya n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi
A dọrọ ya aka na ntị na ọ ga-eche nkwụsị afọ abụọ ihu ma ọ bụrụ na ọ nwalee cannabis ọzọ
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2009, Moore mechara nke anọ na ogologo ịwụli elu na 737 m na nzukọ egwuregwu na Potchefstroom, South Africa
Otú ọ dị, ihe omume a kpuchiri na mgbasa ozi site na ihe dị ịtụnanya nke merụrụ ya ahụ mgbe ọ gbapụrụ ọtọ n'elu ụlọ mgbe ọ na-ekere òkè na ọzụzụ okpomọkụ
Ihe mberede ahụ juru Moore anya ma mesịa jiri ụgbọelu laghachi na United Kingdom na nna ya na dọkịta UK Athletics
Ọ naghị asọmupi kemgbe ihe ahụ mere
Moore so n'ezinụlọ na emeri na egwuregwu nke ọma ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke onye mmeri European Junior nke 1975 na onye nkuzi egwuregwu ugbu a bụ Aston Moore

Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye na-agba ọsọ Wendy Hoyte (nke bụbu Clarke), onye lụrụ Les Hoyte, onye bụkwa onye na-ebute ọsọ na onye nkuzi sprint na Arsenal Football Club (nwanne Trevor Hoyte, 1978 Commonwealth 200m finalist)
Ụmụ nwanne nne ya gụnyere ndị egwuregwu Arsenal Justin na Gavin Hoyte, na onye na-eme egwuregwu Chris Clarke na 2007 400 mita World Youth Champion

'Mkpúrù èdè íke'Jonathan Mwe di Malila nke a makwaara dị ka Jonathan Malila, (amụrụ na 1 Eprel 1993 na Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo ) bụ onye na-ese ihe amụrụ na Congo bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cologne, Germany
Ihe osise ya na-anwa ime ka ọdịbendị ndị Congo kwa ụbọchị, nke ọ kpọrọ Congo Pop

Ọ bụ nwa nwanne osote onye ozi Congo nke mmekọrịta mba ụwa na njikọta mba Franck Mwe di Malila ma bụrụkwa onye sitere n'ezinụlọ Mwe di Malila, n'etiti ezinụlọ ndị a ma ama na Kinshasa, Cabinda na Bas-Congo
Mwe di, ihe a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke pụtara Onyenwe anyị, sitere na okwu Kikongo bụ Mwene, aha ndị nwe na ndị a ma ama nke alaeze Kongo
Jonathan Mwe di Malila bụ onye ezinụlọ nke onye Congo nde, onye ọrụ bọọlụ na onye nwe ala Édouard Mwe di Malila Apenela
1998 ọ kwagara Germany n'ihi ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Cologne ma mesịa gaa Erzbischöfliche Liebfrauenschule
Mgbe afọ ole na ole gasịrị, ọ gbanwere wee gaa Humboldtgymnasium Cologne
N'oge ọ na-eto eto, ọ na-egwuri egwu, hockey, bọọlụ ma na-eme egwuregwu
N'afọ 2008, o meriri aha nwa akwụkwọ nke cologne na asọmpi ọsọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọ bụla dị na Cologne sonyere
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego, nke bụ ọkachamara na onyinye nke ngwaahịa ego
Jonathan Mwe di Malila na-eji agba siri ike, nke na-egbuke egbuke na nke na-adịghị agbaji agbaji
Na mkpali nke Fauvism na Pop-Art ọ na-ezube imegide fugacity nke eserese iji nye ihe osise ahụ ogologo oge
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya nke gụnyere ihe ndị Africa ma ọ bụ Congo, jikọtara ya na ihe ndị a na-eme kwa ụbọchị, isiokwu na ọnọdụ iji mepụta ọdịnaya na-atọ ọchị
Isi Medium ya bụ mmanụ, nke ọ na-ejikọkarị ya na acrylics ma ọ bụ ákwà ndị Africa, dị ka akwụkwọ wax nke Africa
Nkà ya enweghị ebumnuche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ na-arụ ọrụ iji bulie ihe nketa ya ma wetara ndị mmadụ omenala ya
Ọzọkwa, ụfọdụ n'ime nka ya yiri ka ọ bụ ihe na-enweghị uche
Ọrụ ndị a na-egosiputa ọhụụ nwata na nke mbụ nke onye na-ese ihe ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ngosipụta nke onwe ya
N'ime usoro ya kachasị ọhụrụ, Jonathan Mwe di Malila sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ 'Gentlemen of Bacongo' ma ọ bụ nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Les Sapeurs

Ndị ikom a, ndị bi na Brazzaville, bụ ndị a maara maka uwe ha mara mma na-adọta mmasị ndị mmadu, ma bụrụ ndị na-akpali ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-emepụta ihe dịka Solange Knowles maka vidiyo egwu ya 'Losing You' na onye na-emepụta ihe Paul Smith
Mwe di Malila gbanwere ndị Sapeurs na ihe osise ya ma weta isiokwu ahụ na agba siri ike, nke na-adịghị agbaji ma na-egbuke egbuke na akwa
O jikọtara ákwà Afrịka dị ka nkọwa nka ya
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ onye Kinshasa, Steeti Congo nke ọzọ, o nyere usoro ya aha 'Les Gens de coleur de Kinshasa', nke pụtara 'Ndị nwere agba si Kinshasa'
Ọrụ Jonalthan nwekwara mmetụta site n'aka onye na-ese ihe kachasị amasị ya, Henri Matisse onye a makwaara na ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Fauvism
Jonathan Malila na-esekarị ihe maka otu izu n'otu oge ma ọ bụ naanị awa ole na ole n'otu ụbọchị kwa nnọkọ, nke a dabeere na ọnụ ọgụgụ ma ọ bụ ebumnuche nke ibe ikpeazụ
Ọrụ ya bụ nwa ịhụnanya nke Fauvism na Pop-Art, Jonathan na-egosipụtakarị ihe omume kwa ụbọchị na ọdịbendị gbara ya gburugburu wee mee ka ọrụ ya pụta ìhè na agba dị egwu
Jonathan Pienaar (a mụrụ na 16 Septemba 1962) bụ onye edemede South Africa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'olu na onye na-akpa ụka ọchị nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike ihe karịrị afọ 20
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri South Africa na nke mba ụwa na ihe ngosi telivishọn gụnyere Skin, Black Venus, Fried Barry, na To the Ends of the Earth, Cape Town, Troy Fall of a City, na Deutschland 86
Pienaar gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Marist Brothers College (nke bụzi Sacred Heart College) na Observatory, Johannesburg
Ọ gara ihe nkiri na Technikon Pretoria

Jonathan Roxmouth (a mụrụ na 25 Febụwarị 1987) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri egwu na onye na-agụ egwu na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Phantom na ọtụtụ mmepụta nke Phantom of the Opera, gụnyere njem ụwa
A mụrụ Roxmouth na Randburg, South Africa
Ọ gara Northcliff High School, ebe ọ sonyere na mmepụta ihe nkiri kwa afọ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Roxmouth mekwara ihe nkiri na Natal Playhouse
Ka ọ na-etolite, o sonyere na Randburg Eisteddfod ma nweta diplọma na amaokwu okike, egwu / jazz, na olu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ọkachamara ya n'afọ 2006, na-egwu Vince Fontaine / Teen Angel na mmepụta nke Barnyard Theatre Group nke Grease, ọ na-emekwa ihe nkiri na egwu egwu kemgbe ahụ
Aha nna Jonker (Dutch pronunciation ) sitere obodo Dutch
Ọ bụkwa ọdịiche nke aha jonkheer
Aha ahụ nwere ike ịbụ ọrụ sitere na mmalite, na-egosi nna nna nke na-arụ ọrụ ma ọ bụ na-arụ maka jonkheer, ma ọ bụ toponymical, dịka ọmụmaatụ na-ezo aka n'ụlọ a na-akpọ De Jonker
Ndị nwere aha nna gụnyere
A na-akpọ Joram Mariga (o na-ekwenye na ya bụ) 'Nna nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Zimbabwe' n'ihi mmetụta ya na obodo nka malite na 1950s wee gaa n'ihu ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2000
A na-akpọkarị mmegharị ihe ọkpụkpụ nke ọ bụ akụkụ ya dị ka 'Shona sculpture', ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị otu ya a ma ama abụghị agbụrụ Shona
Joram Mariga nwụrụ na Disemba afọ 2000 n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ bịarutere n'ụlọ ọgwụ Bonda Mission, n'ihi ihe mberede ụgbọala
A mụrụ ya na nso Chinhoyi, (nke a na-akpọbu Sinoia) na ihe na 1927 bụ Southern Rhodesia, Joram Mariga bụ onye si na agbụrụ Shona ma na-asụ Zezuru, asụsụ obodo
Ọ bụ nwa sangoma, nne na nna ya abụọ bụ ndị nka
Nna ya na ụmụnne ya ndị okenye (Copper na Douglas) bụ ndị ọkachamara na-akpụ osisi, ebe nne ya na-eme ite
Ha niile rere ọrụ ha nye ndị obodo
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ ma ọ bụ itoolu, ọ malitere ịkpụ osisi, n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ sonyeere klas ndị na-arụ ọrụ osisi
Dị ka nwa ehi, isiokwu mbụ ya bụ ehi
Joram gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Goromonzi ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Waddilove Institute
O ruru eru dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo ma Agritex were ya n'ọrụ

Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-akpụ ihe na nkume malitere n'afọ 1957 mgbe ọ chọpụtara ebe a na-achọsi ike nke akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ Inyanga (Moon) soapstone mgbe ọ na-edu ndị ọrụ na-ewu okporo ụzọ na ọwụwa anyanwụ Rhodesia
N'amaghị mkpa ọ chọtara, ọ malitere iji ya mepụta arịa na obere ọnụ ọgụgụ
Ọ malitekwara ịkụziri ndị ọrụ ya na-ewu okporo ụzọ ka ha jiri ngwá ọrụ ịkpụ osisi kpụọ nkume ahụ
Central Zimbabwe nwere 'Great Dyke' - isi iyi nke nkume agwọ nke ọtụtụ ụdị gụnyere ụdị siri ike nke a na-akpọ springstone

Omenala mbụ nke ndị Shona biri n'elu ugwu dị elu n'ihe dị ka 900 AD na 'Great Zimbabwe', nke malitere n'ihe dị ka 1250–1450 AD, bụ obodo nwere mgbidi nkume na-egosi ihe akaebe na nkà mmụta ihe ochie ya nke nkume nwere nkà na-arụ ọrụ
A na-eji granite dị n'ógbè ahụ rụọ mgbidi ahụ ma ọ nweghị ihe eji eme ihe n'ihe owuwu ha
Mgbe e gwupụtara ya, a hụrụ nnụnụ isii na efere soapstone na ogige ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ihe ncheta ahụ, ya mere ụdị nka na soapstone bụ akụkụ nke ọdịbendị mbụ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, ịkpụ nkume dị ka nka enweghị usoro ọmụmụ kpọmkwem ruo taa ma ọ bụ naanị n'afọ 1954 ka mmegharị nke oge a malitere
Nke a bụ mgbe Frank McEwen ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ nke Rhodes National Gallery ọhụrụ a ga-ewu na Harare na site n'afọ 1955 ruo 1973 bụ onye isi ntọala ya (ọ mepere na 1957)

Ebumnuche nke Gallery bụ iweta nka na-abụghị nke Afrịka na Harare mana mgbe McEwen mepụtara Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Workshop iji gbaa ọrụ ọhụrụ ume na eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ, obodo nke ndị na-ese ihe chọpụtaghachiri nkà ndị na-adịghị ahụ maka ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume

E mere ka Joram mara McEwen ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ha na-akpọtụrụ mgbe niile Mariga gosipụtara na Gallery nke ọma site na 1962 mana ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya n'oge ezumike ya ma mesịa na ụlọ ọrụ ya na Greendale, Harare
Mgbe e mesịrị, McEwen ga-echeta ya otú a
Mgbasawanye ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ mepụtara n'ime naanị afọ 34
Iji nye ezi ihe atụ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ si n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ bịa Joram Mariga
Ọ bụghị onye mbụ bịara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, kama ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị mmaO wetara m obere ite mmiri ara ehi a pịrị na nkume dị nro
Achọpụtara m na nke a bụ mmiri ara ehi Bekee maka onye Bekee hụrụ tii ya n'anya! Ajụrụ m ma ọ nwere ike ịme isi
Isi ahụ bịara, nke emere maka onye Bekee, n'ụdị nka ọdụ ụgbọ elu dị ka ndị njem nleta nwetara
'Ọ bụrụ na ị mere ọnụ ọgụgụ maka ezinụlọ gị ma ọ bụ ndị nna nna gị?' Ajụrụ m

'Oh, nke ahụ ga-adị iche' Ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ bịara, n'oge a nke echiche Afrịka dị ọcha - isi sara mbara, oche nke mmụọ, ọnọdụ ihu, ihu na-ele anya ruo mgbe ebighi ebi na ogwe aka na-etinye n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro na ọkpọ
Ọ bụ tupu oge Kọlọb, dị ka à ga-asị na ihe oyiyi mmụọ etinyere na nkume nwere ike ịmepụta nsonaazụ yiri nke ahụ n'agbanyeghị ọdịiche nke agbụrụ, ebe na oge
Mmiri ara ehi ahụ na ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume abụọ nke Joram bụ akụkụ nke onyinye McEwen nyere British Museum
Mgbe afọ 1962 gasịrị, Mariga hapụrụ iji nkume ncha dị nro wee malite iji nnukwu, nke siri ike nke agwọ nke ọ hụrụ n'oge ọrụ ya
Ọ malitekwara ngwá ọrụ ọhụrụ wee na-arụ ọrụ
Ka usoro ya na-etolite, ọ kụziiri ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ihe ọ chọpụtara
Ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe gụnyere ndị na-ewu okporo ụzọ ya, yana ndị na-ese ihe dịka Joseph Ndandarika bụ ndị McEwen zigara ka ha soro ya zụọ
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1967, Joram bụ onye isi nke ndi na-akpụ ihe na Zimbabwe, ndị ibe ya sochiri ya na-arụ ọrụ na nkume ndị ọhụrụ dị ka serpentine na springstone nke ọ bụrụ ụzọ mee
E gosipụtara otu n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na stampụ Rhodesian, akụkụ nke set nke e nyere na 12 Julaị 1967 iji cheta Afọ Iri nke mmeghe nke Rhodes National Gallery
Mpempe akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dị na set ahụ gosipụtara ọrụ Auguste Rodin, Roberto Crippa na M
Tossini
N'afọ 1966, Crispin Chakanyuka, onye bụbu onye mmụta nke Mariga bụ onye na-arụrụ Tom Blomefield ọrụ, chọpụtara ihe nkwụnye Tengenenge serpentine springstone mbụ
1969 bụ afọ dị mkpa maka mmegharị ihe ọkpụkpụ ọhụrụ, n'ihi na ọ bụ oge McEwen were otu ọrụ gaa Museum of Modern Art na New York na ebe ndị ọzọ na USA, iji nweta otuto dị egwu
Ọ bụkwa afọ ahụ ka nwunye ya Mary (née McFadden) guzobere Vukutu, ugbo ọkpụkpụ dị nso na Inyanga, nke ndị na-ese ihe nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ
Mariga chọtara ebe maka McEwens ma ha kwere ya nkwa na ọ ga-edu obodo nka
Mgbe a na-enyo ya enyo na ọ na-echekwa ndị nnupụisi ZANU ma bufee ya na mpaghara dị anya, McEwen jụrụ inwe Mariga na Vukutu ma tinye Sylvester Mubayi dị ka onye ndu

Ndepụta nke aha ndị na-akpụ Vukutu bụ ndị ga-abụ ndị a maara nke ọma n'ụwa niile toro wee gụnye Bernard Matemera, Sylvester Mubayi, Henry Mukarobgwa, Thomas Mukarobgwa, Nicholas Mukomberanwa, Henry Munyaradzi, Joseph Ndandarika, Bernard Takawira na nwanne ya nwoke John ya na Joram Mariga n'onwe ya guzobere ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị Shona ọhụrụ na-akpụ ihe

Ha niile nyere aka na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ Arte de Vukutu gosipụtara na 1971 na Musée National d'Art Moderne na 1972 na Musée Rodin, nke McEwen haziri, onye biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Paris tupu nhọpụta ya na Harare
Mariga bụ onye otu National Gallery of Zimbabwe's Board of Trustees site na 1982 ruo 1993

O sonyere na 1989 Pachipamwe II Workshop nke emere na Cyrene Mission na mpụga Bulawayo, Zimbabwe ya na ndị na-akpụ ihe nke gụnyere Adam Madebe, Bernard Matemera, Bill Ainslie, Voti Thebe na Sokari Douglas Camp
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ese ihe a gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma, ọrụ Mariga hụrụ ahụhụ mgbe ọ gafere Chipinga
Na mpaghara a, nkume gwụrụ ya ngwa ngwa, ọ hụghịkwa ihe ọ bụla dị na mpaghara iji kpụọ
N'ịbụ onye dara mbà n'obi mgbe ndị McEwens raara ya nye, ihe osise ya gụnyere ọtụtụ ihe osise osisi mara mma maka ezinụlọ ya
Ọ gaghị amaliteghachi ịkpụ nkume ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri mmeri na ngwụsị afọ 1980
Mariga lụrụ nwanyị ugboro anọ
Ya na nwunye mbụ ya, Doreen, mụrụ nwa nwanyị, Mary
Nwunye ya nke abụọ bụ Philipa, nne Owen, Richard na Robin
Anne bụ nwunye ya nke atọ bụ nne Walter, Daniel, Aaron na Jay
N'afọ 1976, Joram lụrụ Maud mana ha amụtaghị nwa

Dị ka Jonathan Zilberg kwuru, mmegharị ihe ọkpụkpụ Shona na-egbu oge iji nweta ume, n'otu akụkụ n'ihi àgwà na-adịghị mma n'ozuzu ya na 1960s na 1970s nke ndị Europe nọ n'ebe Frank McEwen na ndị na-akpụ ihe ọ gbara ume, n'ihe ka bụ mba nke gọọmentị ndị ọcha na-achị nke Nkwupụta nnwere onwe ya na 1965 nke United Nations hụrụ dị ka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Dị ka Aeneas Chigwedere, onye Zimbabwe na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si kwuo, n'oge ahụ, ọ bụ ndị isi ojii Afrịka ole na ole gụrụ akwụkwọ bụ ndị hụrụ uru ọ bụla n'ihe Joram Mariga na ndị ọzọ na-eme ma ha azụghị nka nke gosipụtara ọdịbendị nke ha, n'ihi nkuzi nke ndị ọcha na-achị achị

Pat Pearce (onye na-ese ihe nke bi na Nyanga na onye bu ụzọ webata Mariga na McEwen) na Sidney Littlefield Kasfir atụlewo mkpa nke ndị na-ese ihe n'ịdọta mmegharị ihe ọhụrụ ahụ n'uche ndị na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Mariga gụnyere isiokwu sitere na ọdịbendị nke ndị Shona, ma tinye isiokwu sitere na okike

O kwenyere na 'Mmadụ kwesịrị izere ihe pụtara ìhè, mepụta nnukwu ebe maka ụbụrụ na nnukwu anya, n'ihi na ihe ọkpụkpụ bụ ndị ga-enwe ike iche echiche ma hụ onwe ha ruo mgbe ebighi ebi' A pịrị ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na springstone mana Joram jikwa nkume ndị ọzọ na-adịghị ahụkebe dị ka nkume agụ owuru (a serpentine with green and yellow inclusions), na lepidolite, na lilac purple colour available to him
E gosipụtala otu n'ime ihe ọkpụkpụ lepidolite, “Spirit of Zimbabwe' (1989) na Yorkshire Sculpture Park na 1990 na katalọgụ maka ihe ngosi ahụ nke gụnyere ma foto (p
28) na ihe ndị sitere na ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Mariga (p
42-43) mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ebe ahụ site na 22–30 July 1990
Ọ gụnyekwara (p
44) foto nke nnukwu ọrụ ya “Communicating with the Earth Spirit” (1990)
N'afọ 1989, a jara ọrụ abụọ nke Mariga mma nke ukwuu na Zimbabwe Heritage Exhibition na Natitional Gallery, ebe ihe ngosi ya 'Whispering the Gospel of Stone' mere
Otu n'ime ndị a, nke a na-akpọ 'Calabash Man', gosipụtara n'akwụkwọ Celia Winter-Irving na Stone Sculpture (lee Further Reading) nke nwekwara ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ na Joram na ọnọdụ nka ya
Nchikọta 'Chapungu Culture and Legend - A Culture in Stone' maka ihe ngosi na Kew Gardens na 2000 na-egosi ihe ọkpụkpụ Joram 'Chief Chirorodziwa' (Lepidolite, 1991) na p
E wezụga ịbụ onye na-akpụ ihe, Mariga bụ onye nkuzi, ụmụ akwụkwọ ya gụnyere John na Bernard Takawira na Crispen Chakanyuka, (ụmụ nwanne ya niile), Bernard Manyadure, Kingsley Sambo, na Moses Masaya
Ọ ga-ewerekwa ụmụ akwụkwọ si n'ebe ndị ọzọ, n'ozuzu mgbe ọ na-eme njem
N'afọ 2000, Mariga gbara Jonathan Zilberg ajụjụ ọnụ, ebe o nyere akụkọ banyere ndụ ya na ọrụ ya
Media related to Joram Mariga at Wikimedia Commons
Jordan Casteel (amụrụ n'afọ 1989) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise
Casteel na-ese foto nke ndị enyi, ndị hụrụ n'anya, na ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị agbata obi na ndị ọ na-amaghị na Harlem na New York
Casteel bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York City
A mụrụ Casteel na Denver, Colorado na 1989 na Lauren Young Casteel
Casteel nwèrè ejima na nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya
A gụrụ ya aha Vernon E
Jordan Jr, ónyé nọchiri nna nna ya Whitney Young dị ka onyeisi National Urban League ma bụrụ ezigbo enyi ezinụlọ
Nné nné ya bụ Margaret Buckner Young, ónyé nkụzi na onye edemede akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Ndị na-ese ihe Romare Bearden, Hale Woodruff, Faith Ringgold, Charles White, na Jacob Lawrence nwèrè mmetụta dị ukwuu mgbè ha na-etolite
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Yale, Casteel kwagara New York City iji chụsoo ihe osise
Ihe ngosi nké mbụ nke Casteel na New York, nke akpọrọ Visible Man, meghere n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2014 na Sargent's Daughters
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise buru ibu nke na-egosi ndị ikom ojii gba ọtọ n'ebe dị iche iche n'ụlọ ha niile
Ihe ngosi ahụ nyochara nguzozi n'etiti mmekọahụ na agụụ mmekọahụ, ma na isiokwu ya ma na ndị na-ekiri ya
A họpụtara Casteel dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na 2015-2016 na The Studio Museum na Harlem, New York, n'akụkụ EJ Hill na Jibade-Khalil Huffman
Ihe omume ahụ na-enye ndị na-ese ihe ohere studio ruo otu afọ, onyinye mkpakọrịta, ụgwọ màkà ihe, na ihe ngosi otu nke gụnyere ndị na-eme ihe nkírí niile bi
Ya na di ya David Schulze bi na Harlem, ónyé na-ese foto a mụrụ n'Australia nkè ọ zutere na ngwa mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị Raya
Jordan Ifeanyi Nwora (amụrụ ya na Septemba 9, 1998) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerịka na-agba basket bọọlụ na Indiana Pacers nke National Basketball Association (NBA)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Louisville Cardinals
Ọ na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa maka otu egwuregwu basketball ụmụ nwoke nke Naịjirịa
Nwora meriri n'asọmpi n'afọ 2021 na Milwaukee Bucks tupu e ree ya nye Indiana Pacers n'afọ 2023
A mụrụ Nwora na Septemba 9, 1998, na Buffalo, New York munye nna ya bu onye Naijiria na nne ya bu Amerika
Nna ya Alexander Nwora, onye nkuzi basketball, nyeere Jordan aka ịzụlite ikike basketball ya
Nwora malitere ịgba bọọlụ na Amherst Central High School n'afọ 2013-2014, tupu ọ gaa The Park School of Buffalo maka oge abụọ
Na The Park School, ọ gbara pasent Iri anọ na abụọ site na akara atọ na-eduga ndị ọsụ ụzọ na asọmpi New York State Federation Class B, na-enweta akara 215, 65 rebounds, 24 steals, na 14 assists
Oge nke abụọ ya na The Park School hụrụ ka ọ na-ebuli nkezi oge ya niile, na-agbanye na 234, 101 rebounds, 23 steals, na 18 assists
O nwetara ihe nrite nke First Team All-Centercourt na oge ya nke obere na nke okenye na-egwu na The Park School
Nwora gara n'ihu n'ọrụ nkwadebe ya maka otu oge ọzọ, ebe ọ meriri ihe karịrị isi narị ise na ụlọ akwụkwọ Vermont, na-akwụ ụgwọ 187 isi na 53 nkwụghachi na oge afọ 2016–2017
Nwora sonyeere Louisville Cardinals n'afọ 2018
N'oge ọhụrụ ya, ọ nwetara akara 57, 22 rebounds na 04 assists kwa egwuregwu obula
N'oge ọ nọ n'afọ nke abụọ, Nwora ghọrọ onye mbido egwuregwu na-adịgide adịgide na egwuregwu isii n'ime oge ahụ
Ọ na-enweta akara 170, 76 rebounds, na 13 assists kwa egwuregwu, na-aghọ onye nke abụọ kachasị mma na egwuregwu NCAA ma kpọọ ya Onye kachasị mma na ACC
A kpọrọ ya onye egwuregwu ACC nke afọ
Na Jenụwarị 29, 2020, Nwora nwetara akara 37 kachasị elu ma gbakwunye rebounds itoolu na mmeri 86-69 megide ụlọ akwụkwọ Boston
Na ngwụcha oge a na-eme kwa oge, a kpọrọ Nwora aha na First Team All-ACC, na-emecha nke abụọ na onye ọkpụkpọ nke afọ na-atụ vootu Tre Jones
Dị ka onye na-eto eto, Nwora na-enweta akara iri na asatọ na 77 rebounds kwa egwuregwu mgbe ọ na-agbapụ pasent Iri anọ na anọ site n'ọhịa
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, o kwupụtara maka draft NBA nke afọ 2020
A họpụtara Nwora dịka onye nke iri anọ na ise n'ozuzu site na Milwaukee Bucks na 2020 NBA draft
Na Nọvemba 24, 2020, ndị Bucks kwupụtara na ha Zụrụ Nwora
E kenyere ya na Salt Lake City Stars maka mmalite nke oge NBA G League, na-eme nke mbụ ya na Febụwarị 10, 2021
Ụbọchị atọ ka e mesịrị, a kpọghachiri ya na Stars n'ihi mmerụ ahụ n'ikiri ụkwụ
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Mee, Nwora mechiri oge ọhụrụ ya site n'ịgba akara dị elu 34 na ịgba bọọlụ 14-23, yana rebounds 14 na blocks 2, n'oge mmeri 118 - 112 na Chicago Bulls
N'oge ọhụrụ ya, Nwora ghọrọ onye mmeri NBA, nyere Bucks aka imeri Phoenix Suns na 2021 NBA Finals
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2021, Nwora nwetara akara dị elu nke oge 28, yana rebounds iri na otu, na mmeri 119-90 na Cleveland Cavaliers
Na Febụwarị 9, 2023, e rere Nwora na Indiana Pacers tinyere George Hill na Serge Ibaka na ahia anọ metụtara Brooklyn Nets na Phoenix Suns
Nwora sonyeere Tyrese Haliburton, Aaron Nesmith, na Jalen Smith na Pacers, niile ahọpụtara na 2020 NBA Draft
O mere Pacers nke mbụ ya na Febụwarị 13, na-edekọ akara 7, 3 rebounds na 2 steals na mmeri 123 - 117 na Utah Jazz
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Febụwarị, Nwora dekọrọ akara iri na asatọ, rebounds asatọ, na enyemaka isii na ịgba bọọlụ iri na abụọ, na mmeri Orlando Magic
Na Machị 13 megide Detroit Pistons, Nwora dekọrọ akara 20, rebounds anọ, na ohi abụọ
Na Machị 25 megide Atlanta Hawks, Nwora weputara akara 33 nke Pacers ma gbakwunye rebounds isii n'oge ọdịda

O nwetara akara Iri abụọ na ise n'ime akara iri atọ na atọ ya na nkeji nke abụọ, na-etinye ihe ndekọ nke Pacers maka ọtụtụ akara na nkeji iri na ise ebe ọ bụ na nyocha malitere na oge NBA nke afọ 1996
Ha kpọrọ Nworah ka ọ sọrọ otu egwuregwu nke D'Tigers maka 2019 FIBA World Cup qualifier n'etiti June 28-30, 2018, site n'aka nna ya Alexander Nwora onye bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ahụ
N'asọmpi ahụ, o nwetara akara 217, 8 rebounds na 27 assists

N'oge asọmpi FIBA World Cup nke afọ 2019 na Lagos, Nwora nwetara akara iri atọ na isii na mmegide Mali ka ọ bụrụ onye kachasị mma maka Naịjirịa n'akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-emebi ndekọ Ike Diogu nke akara iri atọ na otu
Nwora nwetara akara 33 dị elu n'egwuregwu na mmeri Germany na agba nke mbụ nke afọ 2020 Olympics na Tokyo
Ọ butere Naịjirịa n'ịnwete mmeri na asọmpi ahụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara 21 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla

Jordan Nwora bụ nwa mbụ nke Amy Nwora, onye America na Alexander Nwora Erie Community College na Nigerian National Basketball Team Head Coach Ụmụnne ya atọ (Ronni, Caeli, na Lex) nwekwara mmasị na basketball ka nwanne ya nwanyị Ronni Nwora na-egwu basketball ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na The Park School of Buffalo, Buffalo, New York

N'afọ 2019 FIBA World Cup qualifier na Lagos, Jordan na nna ya Alexander ghọrọ nwa na nna mbụ Naijiria na-anọchite anya otu mba Naijiria n'otu oge ahụ

Jordan Riber bụ onye Zimbabwe a mụrụ na Tanzania, onye ntuziaka ihe onyonyo na ihe nkiri, onye odee, onye mmepụta, onye ndezi na injinia ụda
A mụrụ Riber n'ezinụlọ nwa nwoke John na Louise Riber, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, a zụlitere ya na Harare, Zimbabwe
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime oge ya nọrọ na ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe mgbe ọ na-etolite
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2004 na Fairhaven College, Western Washington University, Bellingham, Washington, USA, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri
Kemgbe afọ 2005, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na injinia ụda na Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
N'afọ 2012, ọ duziri ma dezie Siri ya Mtungi, usoro TV nke asụsụ Swahili nke dị ọkara awa, nke Cathryn Credo, Beatrice Taisamo, Yvonne Cherrie na ndị ọzọ gosipụtara

A họpụtara ya maka 'Best Television Series - Comedy / drama', 'Best Indigenous Language Movie / Series Swahili' na 'Best Sound Editor' award categories na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards (AMVCA) event
N'afọ 2017, ọ duziri ihe nkiri ahụ, Hadithi za Kumekucha Tunu
N'afọ 2018, ọ duziri, mepụta ma dezie ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ, Hadithi za Kumekucha Fatuma, nke Cathryn Credo, Beatrice Taisamo na Ayoub Bombwe gosipụtara
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ duziri ma mepụta Bahasha (The Envelope), ihe nkiri nkiri, nke gosipụtara Ayoub Bombwe, Godliver Gordian, Omary Mrisho na Cathryn Credo
N'afọ 2018 Zanzibar International Film Festival (ZIFF)'s official selection, Riber's Bahasha bụ ihe nkiri mmeghe maka mbido, nke ya na Fatuma tinyere na ngalaba 'Long Features'
N'ihe nrite ndị ahụ, o nwetara ihe nrite Best Director na Best Cinematography, na ngalaba pụrụ iche nke Swahili Movies

José Carlos Schwarz (Bissau, abalị isii na ọnwa December, 1949 Havana, May 27, 1977) bụ onye Bissau-Guinean na-ede uri na onye na-eti egwu
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị mkpa na ndị nwere mmetụta na Guinea-Bissau
A mụrụ José Carlos Schwarz na Bissau (Portuguese Guinea) site n'aka ndị nne na nna bara ọgaranya nke Cape Verdean, Portuguese Guinean na German
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Senegal na Cape Verde na obere oge na Lisbon, ọ laghachiri Guinea-Bissau na 1969
N'afọ 1970, ya na otu ndị enyi (Aliu Bari, Mamadu Bá na Samakê) guzobere otu egwu Cobiana Djazz
Ìgwè ahụ nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n'ógbè ahụ, n'otu akụkụ n'ihi na ìgwè ahụ malitere ịkpọ ọtụtụ gumbe, ụdị egwu West Africa
Schwarz dere na Portuguese na French, mana ọ bụrụ abụ na Creole
Ọ ghọkwara onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, wee sonye na mmegide megide onye ọchịchị na-achị ala
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ nke Ilha das Galinhas (Guinea-Bissau) maka itinye aka na ọgụ maka nnwere onwe nke mba ya
N'ịbụ onye ahụmahụ a kpaliri, o dere abụ 'Djiu Di Galinha'
Mgbe nnwere onwe nke Guinea-Bissau na 1974, Schwarz ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Ngalaba nka na ọdịbendị, nke na-ahụkwa maka iwu ndị ntorobịa Guinea-Bisau
N'afọ 1977, ọ nwetara ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya Guinea-Bissau na Cuba
Na Mee 27 nke otu afọ ahụ, Schwarz nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu na nso Havana
José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero (4 Ọgọọst 1960 – ) bu prime minister de Spain
Joséphine Hundt bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mba Togolese
N'afọ 1961, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba ahụ, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ so na ya
A mụrụ Joséphine de Medeiros, Hundt ghọrọ onye nkuzi
O nwere ụmụ abụọ; a mụrụ Berthine na ọnwa Jenụwarị na afọ 1944 na Sylvia a mụrụ na afọ 1951
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa nke Party of Togolese Unity (PUT) maka ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 1961
Site na PUT dị ka naanị otu na-asọ mpi na ntuli aka ahụ, a họpụtara ya na National Assembly, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ so na ya
A họpụtaghi ya ọzọ na afọ 1963
Joséphine Ndagnou (a mụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na Cameroon
Ndagou rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nduzi maka Cameroon Radio Television ruo afọ iri na ise

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn, gụnyere Japhet na Ginette na Līetoile de Noudi [The Star of Noudi], nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama n'okpuru aha Ta Zibi N'afọ 2007, o dere, duzie, mepụta ma mee ihe nkiri, Paris Or Nothing, nke gosipụtara nwa okorobịa gbara ọsọ ndụ a manyere ịgba akwụna ma na-agba mbọ ịlanarị na Europe
Jos (makwaara dị ka J-Town) bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Jos bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Plateau (Plateau State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 900,000 (2015; calculated)
Okpomọkụ na mmiri ozuzo nke Jos
Jos Museum bụ ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị na steeti Jos, Nigeria
Bernard Fagg guzobere ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ n'afọ 1952 ma bụrụ National Museum na mbụ
Ọ bụ ebe dị mkpa nke nyocha banyere ọdịbendị akụkọ mere eme tupu e dee ya n'akwụkwọ nke Naịjirịa, a makwaara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị kachasị mma na mba ahụ mana ọ lara n'iyi
Ụlọ Nzukọ ụrọ dị na ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ nwere nchịkọta pụrụ iche nke ite ndị a rụrụ nke ọma site na Naịjirịa niile
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka ahụ nwere ụfọdụ ezigbo ihe atụ nke isi Nok terracotta na ihe ndị dị n'etiti 500 BC ruo AD 200
Ọ na-etinyekwa Museum of Traditional Nigerian Architecture na ihe ngosi nke ụlọ dị iche iche, site na mgbidi nke steeti Kano na ụlọ alakụba dị na Zaria ruo obodo Tiv
A pụkwara ịchọta ihe ndị nwere mmasị site n'oge ọchịchị ndị metụtara ụgbọ okporo ígwè na Ngwuputa tin na ngosi
A na-ejikọta ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ndị ọkachamara na ihe ngosi nka na ihe ngosi nka ahụ, nke e guzobere site n'enyemaka nke otú UNESCO
Jos Museum dịkwa n'akụkụ ụlọ nchekwa ụmụ anụmanụ
Ihe ngosi nka Jos, nke gụnyere Museum of Traditional Nigerian Architecture (MOTNA), bụbu ebe a ga-ahụ Ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum n'ofe West Africa na-eleta ụlọ ochie maka ihe ọmụma akụkọ ihe mere eme

Ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ahụ maka ụkpụrụ ụlọ hụrụ atụmatụ oge ochie echekwara na-akpali akpali, maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Ụlọ ihe ejije na ihe nkiri, yana ndị nke Nigerian Film Corporation na Film Institute, MOTNA nyere ọnọdụ na-adọrọ adọrọ iji mee ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara ọnọdụ ọdịnala Naịjirịa
Otú ọ dị, taa, ihe owuwu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nyere ọnọdụ dị egwu nke ihe nketa Naịjirịa gara aga na ọdịbendị aghọwo ikpo ájá na-acha uhie uhie, nke yiri mkpu
Jos South bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Plateau Steeti, Naijiria

Ọ nwere ụlọ gọọmentị ọhụrụ nke Plateau Steeti nke gụnyere Ọfịs Gọvanọ Executive na ụlọ ọrụ nlekọta na ngalaba ụlọ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Plateau Steeti Information and Communication Technology Development Agency na Rayfield ma nwee ike ịkọwa ya dị ka isi obodo steeti Plateau
