Josef Casimir Hofmann (nke a naakpọ Józef Kazimierz Hofmann; Jenụwarị 20, 1876 - Febụwarị 16, 1957) bụ onye Poland-America na-akpọ piano, onye na-ede egwu, onye nkuzi egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe
A mụrụ Josef Hofmann na Podgórze (mpaghara nke Kraków), na Austro-Hungarian Galicia (Poland nke oge a) na 1876
Nna ya bụ onye na-ede egwu, onye nduzi na onye na-akpọ piano Kazimierz Hofmann, nne ya bụ onye egwu Matylda Pindelska
O nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya - Zofia Wanda (amụrụ na June 11, 1874, kwa na Krakow)
N'oge ha bụ nwata, nna ha, Kazimierz, lụrụ Aniela Teofila née Kwiecińska (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 3, 1843, na Warsaw), onye, mgbe ya na di ya kwagara Warsaw na 1878, nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ na Ọktoba 12, 1885
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ sochirinụ Kazimierz Mikołaj Hofmann lụrụ na June 17, 1886, Matylda Franciszka Pindelska - nne ụmụ ya, (nwa nwanyị Wincenty na Eleonora née Wyszkowska, b
na 1851 na Kraków) na Holy Cross Basilica na Warszawa
Iji hụ na nwa ha nwoke Josef nwetara agụmakwụkwọ egwu zuru oke, ezinụlọ ahụ dum kwagara Berlin site na 1886

Josef Hofmann, nwatakịrị mara mma, nyere egwu izizi na Warsaw mgbe ọ dị afọ 5, na ogologo usoro egwu na Europe na Scandinavia, na-agwụcha n'usoro egwu na America na 1887-88 nke mere ka e jiri ya tụnyere Mozart na Mendelssohn na-eto eto
Hofmann na-eto eto natara nkuzi egwu site na Heinrich Urban (ihe osise) yana onye na-akpọ piano na onye na-ede egwu Moritz Moszkowski
N'ikpeazụ, Anton Rubinstein weere Hofmann dị ka naanị nwa akwụkwọ onwe ya na 1892 wee hazie mmalite nke nwa akwụkwọ ya na Hamburg, Germany, na 1894
Hofmann gara njem ma rụọ ọrụ nke ọma n'ime afọ 50 sochirinụ dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-akpọ piano a ma ama n'oge ahụ
N'afọ 1913, e nyere ya mkpịsị ugodi maka obodo St
Petersburg, Russia
Dị ka onye na-ede egwu, Hofmann bipụtara ihe karịrị otu narị ọrụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị nọ n'okpuru aha Michel Dvorsky, gụnyere piano concerto abụọ na egwu ballet
O mere United States ebe obibi ya n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ wee ghọọ nwa amaala US na 1926
N'afọ 1924, ọ ghọrọ onye isi mbụ nke ngalaba piano na mmalite nke Curtis Institute of Music, Philadelphia; ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'afọ 1927 ma nọgide na ya ruo 1938

O nyere aka n'ịkpọbata ndị egwu ama ama dịka Efrem Zimbalist, Fritz Reiner, Marcella Sembrich, Isabella Vengerova, Moriz Rosenthal, Wilhelm Backhaus, Benno Moiseiwitsch, Abram Chasins, David Saperton, Wanda Landowska, na Leopold Auer na ngalaba Curtis
Ụmụ akwụkwọ Hofmann gụnyere Abbey Simon, Abram Chasins, Shura Cherkassky, Ruth Slenczynska, Ezra Rachlin, Angelica Morales von Sauer, Nadia Reisenberg (lee), Jean Behrend, na Harry Kaufman
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị nwa akwụkwọ, Jorge Bolet ritere uru site na mmasị Hofmann
N'afọ 1937, emere emume ncheta afọ iri ise nke egwu izizi ya na New York site na mmemme mmemme gụnyere 'Golden Jubilee' na Metropolitan Opera, New York City
N'afọ 1938, a manyere ya ịhapụ Curtis Institute of Music n'ihi esemokwu ego na nchịkwa
N'ime afọ site na 1939 ruo 1946, nka ya mebiri, n'otu akụkụ n'ihi nsogbu ezinụlọ na ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè
N'afọ 1946, o mere ihe ngosi ikpeazụ ya na Carnegie Hall, ebe ọ pụtara ugboro 151, wee laa ezumike nká na ndụ onwe onye n'afọ 1948
He spent his last decade in losAngeles in relative obscurity working on inventions and keeping a steady correspondence with associate
Dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe, Hofmann nwere ihe karịrị ikike ikike 70, na nchọpụta ya nke pneumatic shock absorbers maka ụgbọala na ụgbọelu nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ahịa site na 1905 ruo 1928

Ihe ndị ọzọ e mepụtara gụnyere wiper windscreen, ọkụ ọkụ nke na-ere mmanụ, ụlọ nke na-agba anyanwụ gburugburu, ngwaọrụ iji dekọọ ihe dị egwu (nọmba patent US 1614984) n'ịmepụta mpịakọta piano nke ọ rụzuru dịka ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahụ na-eme mpịakụta si na azụmahịa, na mmelite nke ụlọ ọrụ Steinway (nọkwa patent US 2263088)
Hoffman kwagara Los Angeles na 1939
Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ n'ihi oyi bara ya n'ahụ na Febụwarị 16, 1957, n'ụlọ ndị agadi
O nwere ụmụ anọ; nwa nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke atọ

N'afọ 1928, ọ pụtara n'ihu ọha na Hofmann gbara nwunye mbụ ya alụkwaghịm - Marie Eustis, onye ya na ya nwere nwa nwanyị - n'afọ 1924 wee lụọ nwunye ya nke abụọ - Betty Short, onye bụbu otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya - n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Nwa ya nwoke nke okenye, Josef Anton Hofmann, ghọrọ onye injinia a ma ama
E guzobere asọmpi Josef Hofmann Piano, nke American Council maka Polish Culture na Mahadum South Carolina Aiken kwadoro, iji sọpụrụ ya na 1994
Anton Rubinstein nụrụ Hofmann dị afọ asaa na-akpọ Beethoven's C minor Piano Concerto na Warsaw ma kwuo na ọ bụ onye nwere nkà a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ

Na aro Rubinstein, onye Germany na-ahụ maka ọrụ Hermann Wolff nyere nlekọta ọrụ ma kwuo na ọ ga-eziga nwata nwoke ahụ na njem Europe, mana nna Hofmann jụrụ ikwe ka nwata nwoke ahụ gaa ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu
N'oge ahụ, Hofmann nyere kọntaktị na Germany, France, Holland, Norway, Denmark, Sweden, na Great Britain

Mgbe odi afo iri na abuo young Hofmann was probably the first paianist of note to record on Edison's phonograph Hans von Builow recorded a chopin mazurka on Edison's improved phonograph thevsame year ie1888
N'afọ 1887, a haziri njem America, nke nwere ọnwa atọ nke ihe ngosi nke gụnyere iri ise, iri na asaa n'ime ha dị na Metropolitan Opera House
Ma n'oge na-adịghị anya, Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children batara, na-ekwu maka ahụike nwata nwoke ahụ
Otú ọ dị, dị ka nkwekọrịta nke kwụrụ Hofmann $ 10,000 si dị, iwu kwadoro ya ka ọ mezue njem ahụ
Alfred Corning Clark mere ka nkwekọrịta ahụ ghara ịdị irè bụ onye nyere $ 50,000 ma, n'aka nke ya, machibido Hofmann iwu ime ihe nkiri n'ihu ọha ruo mgbe ọ gbara afọ 18
A kagbuola akụkụ ikpeazụ nke njem ahụ ma ezinụlọ ahụ laghachiri Potsdam, na mpụga Berlin
Nke a gosipụtara njedebe nke afọ egwu nwata Hofmann
(Lee na maka nkọwa zuru ezu)

Onyinye Clark mere ka Hofmann gaa n'ihu na-amụ ihe gbasara sayensị na mgbakọ na mwepụ, ọ nọgidekwara na-amụta egwu site na Heinrich Urban (ihe osise) yana onye na-akpọ piano na onye na-ede egwu Moritz Moszkowski
N'afọ 1892, Rubinstein nabatara Hofmann dị ka naanị nwa akwụkwọ ya, nzukọ abụọ maka nnọkọ 42 na Dresden's Hotel d'Europe
Ihe nkuzi mbụ, otu izu, gụnyere iri Bach Preludes na Fugues na abụọ Beethoven sonatas, site na ncheta
A naghị ekwe ka Hofmann weta otu ihe ahụ ugboro abụọ, dịka Rubinstein kwuru dị ka onye nkuzi na ọ ga-echefu ihe ọ gwara nwa akwụkwọ ahụ n'oge nkuzi gara aga
Rubinstein egosighi egwu maka Hofmann, mana o nyere ihe akaebe zuru oke nke echiche ya dị ka pianist n'oge ọtụtụ egwu nwata nwoke ahụ nụrụ
N'ime ụbọchị atọ, Hofmann nụrụ na Bechstein Hall ọhụrụ nke Berlin site n'aka Hans von Bülow, Johannes Brahms na Rubinstein, ma kwuo maka egwu ha dị iche
Rubinstein haziri Hofmann's adult debut na March 14, 1894, na Symphonic Assembly Hall nke Hamburg, akụkụ ahụ bụ Rubinstein's Piano Concerto No
4 in D minor, na onye na-ede egwu na-eduzi
Mgbe egwú ahụ gasịrị, Rubinstein gwara Hofmann na a gaghị enwe nkuzi ọzọ, ha ahụghịkwa ibe ha ọzọ
Rubinstein laghachiri Russia ma nwụọ n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, Hofmann zoro aka na mmekọrịta ya na nna ukwu Russia dị ka 'ihe omume kachasị mkpa na ndụ m'

Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1930, Hofmann aghọwo onye aṅụrụma mana ọ nọgidere na-enwe iwu pụrụ iche nke piano n'ime afọ iri a; Rudolf Serkin na Glenn Gould na-eto eto akọwaala mmetụta anwansi nke kọntaktị Hofmann mepụtara na ha n'etiti na ngwụcha afọ 1930
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Curtis Institute na 1938, njikọta nke ịṅụ mmanya, nsogbu alụmdi na nwunye ya na enweghị mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri mere ka ikike nka ya daa ngwa ngwa
N'ikwu okwu banyere ọdịda dị egwu nke Hofmann, Sergei Rachmaninoff kwuru, 'Hofmann ka dị elu
onye egwu piano kachasị ukwuu ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị ọcha ma nwee ahụike
Ma ọ bụghị ya, ọ gaghị ekwe omume ịmata Hofmann nke oge ochie
' Oscar Levant wrote one of the terrible tragedies of music was the disintegration of josef hofmann as an artist
In the latter days he became an alcoholic
(H) is the last public concert was an ordeal for all of us
A na-akọwa echiche Hofmann banyere usoro na egwu n'akwụkwọ ya Piano Playing with Questions Answered
O nwere aka pere mpe ma sie ike nke ukwuu

Steinway mechara wuru maka ya mkpịsị aka omenala nwere mkpịsị ugodi dị warara (onye na-akpọ piano / onye nkatọ Stephen Hough kwuru banyere otu nghọta Hofmann si eme ihe piano Steinway si mee ka ọ dị iche na ndị ọzọ na-akpọ pianist) Mgbe ọ kụrụ ngwá egwu pụrụ iche nke Hofmann na ala Steinway New York, Gunnar Johansen kọrọ na piano nwere ụda kachasị ukwuu karịa nke ọ bụla ọ nwetụrụla
Faultless regulation and were accompanied on tours by his own recital chair built with a short folding back and 11/2 slope from rear to front
After playing hofmanns special concert instrument in the Steinway new York basement gunnar johasen reported that the piano had the biggest seniority of any he had ever tried
N'adịghị ka Rubinstein, Hofmann nọdụrụ ala na piano, na-akụ mkpịsị ugodi n'ụzọ na-egbu ikpere n'ala
Mkpịsị aka ya staccato bụ n'oge ahụ na-enweghị atụ, dị ka ụda egwú ya
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ ya Nadia Reisenberg si kwuo, ọ nọgidere na-eji ngwakọta nke mkpịsị aka na ụkwụ
Onye nkatọ New York Times Harold C
Schonberg kwuru na Hofmann nwere usoro Leopold Godowsky niile, nkwupụta nke Godowsk n'onwe ya kwadoro
Site na nnabata nke ya, Sergei Rachmaninoff, n'ime afọ 40, kwadebere maka ọrụ dị ka onye na-akpọ piano site na ịme ihe karịrị awa 15 n'ụbọchị na ebumnuche nke iru ọkwa nke usoro Hofmann

Mgbe a jụrụ onye na-akpọ piano Ralph Berkowitz ma ọ bụrụ na Vladimir Horowitz nwere usoro kachasị ukwuu n'ime ndị na-akpọ egwu piano niile ọ nụrụ, Berkowitz zaghachiri na Horowitz bụ n'ezie onye kachasị elu nke akụkụ teknụzụ nke arụmọrụ, mana otu onye na-eme piano nke oge okenye bụ ya - Hofmann
Hofmanns approach and style can be summarized by his motte an aristocrat never hurries
He often stated that Rubinstein and Moriz Rosenthal were the only plantist who had influenced his art and admired singers Mattia Battistini and Marcella sembrich

Ọ nabatara ụdị ngosipụta na-aga n'ihu n'egwuregwu ma bụrụ ụdị aghụghọ na nke a na-ejide n'aka maka ndekọ studio ya; n'ọnọdụ abụọ ahụ, ọ na-agbasokarị akara e biri ebi, mgbe ụfọdụ na-agbakọta okpukpu abụọ nke aka ekpe, ma na-ezere mmetụta uche
O tinyere spontaneity karịa nhazi ma kweta na Rachmaninoff na 'Amaghị m otu esi ewu ihe osise
mgbe ụfọdụ, ọ na-ada ụda nke ọma'

Schonberg dere na n'etiti ndị ọgbọ Hofmann, ọ bụ naanị Godowsky nwere njedebe na mmezi nke Hofmann mana enweghị ụcha, ọkụ, na 'ọbara uhie' nke Hofmann, ebe ọ bụ naanị Ferruccio Busoni na Rachmaninoff ka ndị ọgbọ ya kpọtụrụ aha dị ka ndị ha na Hofmann hà
Mgbe ọ nụsịrị egwu nke Chopin's B minor Sonata site na Hofmann, Rachmaninoff wepụrụ akụkụ ahụ site na repertoire nke ya na-ekwu 'ọ bụghị kemgbe Anton Rubinstein ka m nụrụ egwu dị egwu'
Ihe atụ ndị a tụrụ aro na-egosi ụdị Hofmann
Ihe ndekọ Hofmann na-ejikarị egwu edere tupu mmalite nke narị afọ nke 20
Dị nnọọ ka ihe ndekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme asaa nke Rubinstein nke 1885, o nyere kọntaktị 21 n'usoro na St
Petersburg n'ekwughi otu egwu, na-akpọ ọrụ 255 dị iche iche site na ncheta n'oge usoro marathon ahụ na 1912-1913

N'akwụkwọ diary nwunye ya debere n'oge njem Russia ya na 1909, ọ kwuru na ọ na-eweli anya ya mgbe ọ hụrụ Brahms' Handel Variations na mmemme - ihe ọ na-akpọghị ma ọ bụ ọbụna lee anya ruo afọ abụọ na ọkara
Ọ kụrụ ọrụ ahụ na kọntaktị ahụ n'egbughị oge

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye na-adịghị ahụ ụzọ nke ọma, a sịrị na o nwere ikike nke Franz Liszt na Camille Saint-Saëns Rosina Lhévinne chetara na Hofmann nụrụ ka di ya Josef Lhévinne na-akpọ Liszt's Lorelei, otu egwu Hofmann nụtụbeghị ma ọ gara n'ihu na-akpọ ya 'dị ka Josef m (Lhevinne) ' maka ọzọ na kọntaktị ya ka e mesịrị n'ụbọchị ahụ
Maurice Aronson, onye jere ozi dị ka onye na-enyere Leopold Godowsky aka, chetara Hofmann na-amụta transcription Fledermaus nke Godowski
Godowsky na Hofmann zutere na Berlin na 1900, wee bụrụ ndị enyi ruo mgbe Godowski nwụrụ na 1938
Hofmann ga-eleta ụlọ ọrụ Godowsky ma gee ntị mgbe Godowski na-ede Fledermaus
Otu izu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Hofmann gara Godowsky ọzọ wee kpọọ ihe niile, ọ hụtụbeghịkwa egwu ahụ
Godowsky, n'ezie, edebeghị ya
Schonberg agbakwunyere na Godowsky's Fledermaus bụ otu n'ime ihe ndị kachasị mma na ihe mgbagwoju anya edere maka piano

Hofmann malitere idekọ ihe na ụlọ ọrụ na 1880s mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-enwe afọ ojuju na teknụzụ dịnụ ma mee naanị nrụgide nnwale mgbe 1923; o weere nrụgide nnwere onwe e mere maka HMV na Nọvemba 1935 ka ọ bụrụ ihe nnọchianya bara uru nke nka ya
N'afọ 1940, o dekọrọ maka mmemme redio Bell Telephone Hour nke ụfọdụ ihe nkiri na-adịghị ahụkebe fọdụrụ, gụnyere Prelude Rachmaninoff na C-sharp minor, Op
3, No
2, na Concerto Beethoven na E-flat major, 'Emperor'
Gregor Benko kwuru na Hofmann ekwesịghị ịpụta n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi Bell Telephone Hour kemgbe, n'oge a
Nwa akwụkwọ Hofmann bụ Jeanne Behrend, mgbe mbụ ọ nụrụ ihe ndekọ ahụ site na 1940 ruo 1946, kwuru 'nke ọma, ọ bụ egwu ya, mana ọ dịghị ihe dị ka ihe anyị nụrụ na 1920s'
Cylinders edere c
1890 maka Thomas Edison bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ndekọ mbụ nke egwu oge ochie ma furu efu n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ
A chọtara cylinders anọ e mere na Russia na 1895-1896, na egwu Mendelssohn, Louis Brassin na Rubinstein, na nso nso a ma wepụta ya na CD
O mere usoro abụọ nke ịmegharị mpịakọta piano, gụnyere na 1913 mpịakọ 23 maka Welte-Mignon mana ọ tụkwasịghị mpịakịrị obi dị ka ihe nnọchianya ziri ezi nke egwu ya
Hofmann dekọrọ diski ụda site na 1912 ruo 1923 maka Columbia na Brunswick, mana o chere na nnọchiteanya nke ụda olu ya dị ọcha na nke na-egbuke egbuke egbuke ejighi ya

Hofmann nwalere ihe ndekọ ule dị mkpirikpi maka RCA Victor na 1935 (nke RCA wepụtara na LP na 1970), ma na-ala ezumike nká na California nwalere pickups eletrik nke eriri piano ma na-emepụta bọọdụ ụda spruce ọzọ n'okpuru mkpuchi piano
RCA Victor dekọrọ egwu ncheta afọ iri ise nke Hofmann na New York na Metropolitan Opera House na Nọvemba 28, 1937
Ọ dịkarịa ala abụọ n'ime kọntaktị ndị ọzọ ya na 1930s ka edere na ndụ

Ihe ndekọ egwu ndị a na-egosipụta Hofmann meworo okenye (afọ 60-62) n'ihu ọha obere oge tupu mbelata dị egwu na iwu pianistic ya, ma gụnye ọgụgụ dị egwu nke Chopin's G minor Ballade, Andante Spianato and Grand Polonaise, A-flat Waltz (Op
42) na F minor Ballada
E bipụtara ihe ndekọ ndị a niile na diski compact n'okpuru nkwado nke Gregor Benko na ọkachamara na-eweghachi ọdịyo Ward Marston
Harold C
Schonberg ekwuola na Hofmann bụ onye na-enweghị ntụpọ na ikekwe onye kachasị egwu piano na narị afọ nke 20
HMV na RCA na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na Hofmann na-arụ ọrụ ndekọ na 1930s
Sergei Rachmaninoff raara Piano Concerto No
3 ya na D obere (1909) nye Hofmann, ọ bụ ezie na Hofmann enweghị mmasị na ya ma ọ dịghị mgbe ọ kpụrụ ya
Ndị nkatọ nke ọgbọ ndị okenye dị ka James Huneker kpọrọ Hofmann 'eze nke ndị na-akpọ piano', Samuel Chotzinoff kpọrọ ya 'onye na-akpọ egwu piano kachasị ukwuu n'oge anyị'

Ndị oge dị ka Rachmaninoff, Ignaz Friedman, Josef Lhévinne, na Godowsky weere Hofmann dị ka, n'ozuzu, onye egwu piano kachasị ukwuu nke ọgbọ ha, mana otuto ahụ abụghị nke zuru ụwa ọnụ site na ọgbọ na-esote nke ndị egwu piano

N'ime akụkọ ndụ ya, Arthur Rubinstein katọrọ Hofmann dị ka onye nwere mmasị naanị na usoro egwu ọ bụghị n'obi ya ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ ime mmụọ ya, ma kwuo na njedebe nke ọrụ Hofmann 'a hapụrụ ya ihe ọ bụla mgbe usoro ya hapụrụ ya'
Claudio Arrau chụpụrụ Hofmann (ya na Paderewski) dị ka onye a ma ama ma kwuo 'amaghị m ihe m ga-eme ya'
Sviatoslav Richter, mgbe ọ nụsịrị ule Hofmann RCA nke Scherzo site na Sonata Beethoven na E-flat, Op
31, No

3, weere onye na-akpọ piano nke okenye dị ka 'ihe dị egwu', mana o kwuru na Hofmann leghaara akara sforzando nke onye na-ede egwu anya; ebe György Sándor kpọrọ ya onye kachasị ukwuu n'ime ndị na-akpọ egwu piano nke narị afọ nke 20 n'ihe gbasara egwu, ntụgharị, na usoro
Nwa akwụkwọ Hofmann n'onwe ya bụ Shura Cherkassky jiri Horowitz tụnyere Hofmann n'ụzọ dị mma dị ka ndị a 'Hofmann nwere ike ịbụ uche egwu ka ukwuu
Mana, echere m na Horowitz bụ onye na-akpọ piano ka ukwuu, onye na-eme nke ọma - ọ rịọrọ ụwa niile n'ụzọ ụfọdụ
Hofmann enweghị ike ikwurịta okwu na ọkwa ahụ
Iji kwado ndekọ ahụ, Earl Wild kwetara na ụdị Hofmann bụ mmetụta kachasị ukwuu n'ebe ọ nọ na-enweta usoro na-agbanwe agbanwe 'A na-enye nkọwa ya mgbe niile na nnukwu ezi uche na ịma mma
' A na-akọ na Jorge Bolet kwuru na mgbe ọ bụla ọ nụrụ Rachmaninoff ma ọ bụ Hofmann, ọ na-eche mgbe niile n'onwe ya, 'Onye ọ bụla na-akpọ - nke ahụ bụ ihe m ga-achọ ịkpọ'
Akwụkwọ Hofmann dabeere na edemede ya na Ladies' Home Journal
Joseph Kumbela (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri si Democratic Republic of the Congo
O ritere ihe nrite maka ime ihe nkiri ya
A mụrụ Joseph Kumbela n'afọ 1958
Ọ bi na Switzerland kemgbe afọ 1980
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na France na USA
Na onyinye FESPACO na 1993 ọ meriri ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe ọchị Gito l'ingrat (Gito onye na-enweghị ekele) nke Leonce Ngabo nke Burundi duziri
Na ihe nkiri a, Gito, nwa akwụkwọ si Burundi na onye na-emepụta ejiji nwere nkà na Paris, kpebiri ịlaghachi n'ụlọ
N'iji diplọma ya n'aka ma jupụta na atụmatụ banyere ọrụ ya, ọ hapụrụ onye ibe ya, Christine na-ekwe nkwa ịkpọbata ya na Burundi mgbe e mesịrị
Ọ pụghị ịchọta ọrụ, mana ọ zutere onye ọ hụrụ n'anya n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Mgbe ahụ Christine rutere n'ebughị ụzọ dọọ aka ná ntị ma chọpụta ihe na-eme
Ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ jikọtara ọnụ iji kụziere Gito ihe
Josef Kumbela edeela ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi kemgbe 1994 site na iji ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya dị na Geneva
Ọ na-ele anya n'ịhụnanya dị n'etiti Lulu, nwa akwụkwọ Africa, na nwanyị China, ma gosipụta esemokwu ọdịbendị

Josef Slavík (26 Machị 1806 - 30 Mee 1833), nke a makwaara dị ka Josef Slawjk ma ọ bụ Joseph Slawik, bụ onye Bohemian violin virtuoso na onye na-ede egwu, onye ndị nkatọ egwu Vienna na-atụ anya ka ọ bụrụ onye nọchiri Paganini mgbe o dechara Concerto a na-eche na ọ gaghị egwuri egwu na F-sharp obere ma kụziere onwe ya ịkpọ 'La Campanella' nke Paganini ozugbo a nụrụ otu ugboro
Nwa mbụ nke Barbora (onye amụrụ Krásová) na Antonín Slavík, onye nkuzi na onye egwu, onye malitere ịkụziri Josef violin mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
Ka oge na-aga, ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ violin nke Friedrich Wilhelm Pixis na echiche egwu na ihe osise nke Friedrich Dionys Weber na Prague Conservatory

Pixis na-eche otú onye ọ bụla ga-esi dee ihe nzuzu dị otú ahụ, ihe a na-apụghị igwu egwu mgbe ọ hụchara ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị Slavík dere (concert, variations, wdg)Ọpụpụ ọzọ Tupu ọ pụọ na Prague, Slavík gosipụtara na kọntaktị nke ọma na Prague Conservatory na ọ dịkarịa ala otu onye nwere ike ịkpọ ihe nzuzu ahụ
Ọ gara Vienna na 1825 wee bụrụ ihe na-akpali akpali
Ọ bụ nwa okorobịa dị afọ iri na itoolu n'oge ahụ, mana ọ dị elu karịa ndị ọzọ na-eme violin nke a nụrụ n'isi obodo Austria
Mayseder a ma ama kpọrọ ya Lipinski nke abụọ

Frédéric Chopin onye nụrụ Slavík n'ọtụtụ oge kọwara nkà ya dị ka Staccatos iri itoolu na isii n'otu ụta! Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe ịtụnanya! Ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka Paganini nke abụọ, mana onye e mere ka ọ dị ọhụrụ, onye ga-agafe nke mbụ n'oge
Slavík na-adọrọ mmasị onye na-ege ntị ma na-eweta anya mmiri n'anya ya
ọ na-eme ka ụmụ mmadụ na-ebe ákwá, ka ọ na-emekwa ka agụ na-ebelata ákwá
Franz Schubert dere ihe abụọ yiri violin sonata maka Slavík na onye na-akpọ piano Carl Maria von Bocklet Rondo na B obere, D 895 (1826), na Fantasy na C ukwu, D 934 (1827)
Variations in E major (1820)
Violin concerto in F sharp minor (1823)observatory graduation work)

piano polonese in D major (1828)

Joselyn Dumas ( /ˌ dʒ ɔː s əl ɪ n D ʊ m ɑː / ; amuru 31 August 1980) bu onye nnabata ihe onyonyo Ghana na onye omere
N'afọ 2014 ọ gbara n'ime ihe nkiri A Northern Affair, ọrụ nwetara ya ihe nrite ihe nkiri Ghana na nhọpụta ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
A mụrụ Dumas na Ghana ma tó n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Accra, Ghana
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ izizi ya na Morning Star School wee gaa na Archbishop Porter Girls High School ebe ọ ghọrọ Prefect Entertainment
Joselyn gara n'ihu n'akwụkwọ ya na United States ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iji nweta nzere na Iwu nchịkwa
Joselyn Dumas bụ onye ọka iwu ruo mgbe ọ kwagara Ghana na-eso nrọ nke I bu onye na-egosi na onyonyo
O mere mpụta mbụ na onyonyo dị ka onye ọbịa nke Charter House's Rhythmz, Ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ, nke hụrụ ajụjụ ọnụ ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ TV na-achụpụ ya bụ ViaSat 1 ka ọ nọrọ na nso nso a nke mbụ ha mepụtara flagship Talk show, The One Show, nke ewepụtara site na 2010 ruo 2014
Ọ bụ onye nnabata maka ihe ngosi akụkọ TV N'ụlọ ya na Joselyn Dumas nke ekesara n'ofe Africa na akụkụ Europe
Ọrụ ya na Foto zuru oke, mere mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide na onye nduzi nke mere ka ọ bụrụ isi ọrụ ndị na-esote na fim ndị ọzọ
Nnukwu ezumike ya bịara afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na Shirley Frimpong-Manso usoro ihe nkiri Adams Apples
Ọrụ nke 'Jennifer Adams' na Adams Apples nwetara aha ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na onye ndu na Hollywood Actress Kimberly Elise na 2011 Ghana Movie Awards
Kemgbe Joselyn Dumas bịara na ihe nkiri na Ghana
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na fim na usoro dị ka ịhụnanya ma ọ bụ ihe yiri nke ahụ, A Sting in a Tale, Foto zuru oke, Affair Northern na Lekki nwunye
Ya na ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'Africa, gụnyere John Dumelo, Majid Michel nke Ghana na OC Ukeje nke Naijiria
O mebere Miss Malaika Ghana, otu n'ime asọmpi ịma mma kachasị ama na Ghana, site na 2008 ruo 2010
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na CEO nke Virgo Sun Company Limited, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke n'okpuru nduzi ya, ejikọtalarị ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Love or Something Like that, nke UNAIDS kwadoro
Ọ na-atụ anya imepụta yana itinye ego na mmemme onyonyo ma ọ bụ usoro dị ka V Republic, usoro onyonyo nke Sparrow Productions na mepụta ukwu site na VirgoSun
Dumas pụtara dị ka nwunye na egwu Lynxx 'Fine Lady' gosiputa Wizkid
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nke Range Rover Evoque Ghana na Jobberman Ghana, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọrụ
Ya na Ayo Makun na-akwado ya na 2018 Golden Movie Awards Africa emere na Movenpick Ambassador Hotel na Accra na June 2, 2018, Ghana
O kwenyere n'inyeghachi ọha mmadụ, ọkachasị ebe ụmụaka nwere nsogbu
Mmasị ya maka ọrụ enyemaka butere nguzobe nke Joselyn Canfor-Dumas Foundation (JCDF) iji nyere aka gboo mkpa ụmụaka na-adịghị ike sitere na nzụlite na mpaghara Ghana niile
Ntọala JCD na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na-elekwasị anya na Autism
A mụrụ Joseph-Francis Sumégné na abalị iri atọ na onwa Julaị , na afọ 1951 na Bamenjou, Cameroon
Onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe kemgbe afọ 1976, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Yaoundé (Cameroon)
N'ịbụ onye ihe osise na egbugbu ndị ọ hụrụ n'ahụ nne nne ya na ogidi nke ụlọ eze dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Cameroon, ọ sere ọtụtụ ihe n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'obodo nta ahụ
Mgbe ahụ, a kpọ batara ya n'ụdị nka dị iche iche (ihe ọkpụkpụ, agba, ọla, nkata na ịkpa ákwà), ngwakọta nke ga-egosipụta ọrụ ya n'ọdịnihu
Ọrụ ya nwere mmetụta nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ọdịnala na mpaghara ebe obibi ya
Ngwakọta nke ihe ndị a chọtara jikọtara ya na waya ọla kọpa na stitches nke ọ mepụtara, na-eche ihe ịma aka nke olu n'efu ihu
N'ịchọpụta ọchịchọ ya, ihe mgbu, agụụ, iwe ya na nrọ ya site na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, Sumégné mepụtara nkà ihe ọmụma ya na usoro ya nke JALA'A iji gosipụta ma mee ka mmadụ dị elu

Isiokwu ndị Sumégné kwuru bụ ọtụtụ ihe mkpuchi na ihe odide nke ike ọdịnala, ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na-agagharị (ndị na-agba egwu, ndị na-akwagharị), ihe nkiri si na gburugburu ebe obibi ya kwa ụbọchị
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa biri na Douala site na doual'art ruo afọ atọ, site na 1993 ruo 1996, Sumégné mere La Nouvelle Liberté ya, ihe ọkpụkpụ dị egwu nke dị mita iri na abụọ n'ịdị elu
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ mepụta ọrụ n'èzí na Gabon, France na Germany
Ihe okike obodo ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ Le monument pour la Paix maka nka nka nke Bangui, na Central African Republic
O gosipụtala na ọtụtụ mba, gụnyere Japan maka afọ atọ nke Osaka (1998) na Netherlands maka afọ atọ nke Arnhem (2008)
N'afọ 2004, o sonyere na biennale nke Dakar (Senegal), na ihe ngosi otu onye na nhọrọ gọọmentị, ebe o gosipụtara usoro ihe ọkpụkpụ ya Les neufs ama ama nye ndị na-ege ntị na mba ụwa na nke mbụ ya
Nnukwu ngosi ọhaneze ya kachasị ọhụrụ mere na 2014 na ArtFair London, na United Kingdom
N'afọ 2015, ọ gbakọtara na eserese
Joseph Amedokpo bụ onye mba Togo na-ese ihe

A mụrụ ya na Vogan, Togo (West Africa), n'afọ 1946, wee kwaga Lagos, Nigeria, mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ebe ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ ya na ọzụzụ nka, ma-nweta ohere agụmakwụkwọ n' efu na Yaba Trade Center ebe ọ gụrụ nka osise ihe site na 1966 ruo 1968
Amedokpo na-ese ihe site na iji mmanụ dị na mpaghara na akwa ya bụ akpa ntụ ọka a na-emegharị emegharị, ndi asara asa ma gbatịa ya
Ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke ogige ezinụlọ ya; elu ụlọ na-echebe ya pụọ na anyanwụ Afrịka na mmiri ozuzo oge
O nwetala nkwanye ùgwù na Europe na United States
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2008, a họpụtara Amedokpo dị ka otu n'ime mmadụ ano ndị na-ese ihe maka atụmatụ Dell's Product RED dị ka akụkụ nke ọgụ zuru ụwa ọnụ megide ọrịa obirinajaocha
Ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe ahọpụtara gụnyere Siobhan Gunning, Bruce Mau na Mike Ming
N' oge di ugbu a Joseph Amedokpo enweghị ego ọ bụla ịzụta ọgwụ, iri nri n'ụzọ ziri ezi ma ọ bụ ikwado ezinụlọ ya
Onye ọrụ nke rere ihe okike ya, nyere ya naanị euro iri ise kwa ọnwa isii
Na mbido, e nyeghị ya ohere ịgụ nkwekọrịta ya
Joseph Amedokpo enweghị ịnyịnya ígwè ma ọ bụ ụgbọala, ma ọ bụ ọkụ latrik n'ụlọ ya
Ụbọchị ụfọdụ, ọ nweghị ego ịzụta ngwaahịa ndị dị mkpa iji rụọ ọrụ n'ụzọ ziri ezi; ọ bụ iwu na ọ ga-agbaziri ụmụ ego
Joseph Ayo Babalola (25 Eprel 1904 - 26 Jula 1959) bu onye ozi oma izugbe mbu nke Christ Apostolic Church, Naigeria
Onwu Joseph Ayo Babalola mere na 26 Jula 1959 na Ede, Osun State, Naigeria
Babalola nwuro n'enweghi oria
Akuko banyere onwu ya bu otu Baba Abiye na Ede
Otu o du, Prophet I
Ogedegbe kesara akuko aho ozo na wee malite ife efe
Joseph Böhm (Hungarian ; 4 Eprel 1795 - 28 Machị 1876) bụ onye na-eme violin na Hungary na onye nduzi nke Vienna Conservatory
A mụrụ ya na Pest, n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu
Nna ya na Pierre Rode kụziiri ya
Nwanne ya nwoke Franz Böhm (1788-1846), nna nna nke onye mgbakọ na mwepụ Georg Cantor, bụkwa onye a ma ama na-eme violin na onye na-eme solo na alaeze ukwu Russia
O mere nke mbụ ya na Vienna na 1816, na-akpọ ọrụ Rodolphe Kreutzer na Franz Weiss
O mechara gaa Ịtali, Germany, na France
Na ubochi mbu na onwa junu 1819 a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ prọfesọ na Vienna Conservatory, prọfesụ violin mbụ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ bụ prọfesọ site na 1819 ruo 1848
Ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ya gụnyere Jenő Hubay, Joseph Joachim, Eduard Reményi, Heinrich Wilhelm Ernst, Jakob Dont, Georg Hellmesberger, Sr, Jakob Grün na Sigismund Bachrich
Ọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na egwu ụlọ
N'afọ 1816, ọ haziri kọntaktị a raara nye kọntett nke Ludwig van Beethoven, Joseph Haydn na Franz Schubert
Ya na Carl Maria von Bocklet rụkọkwara ọrụ
N'afọ 1821, o sonyere na string quartet consisting of fellow violinist Karl Hold violist Franz Weiss and cellist Joseph linke
Ya na Ludwig van Beethoven nwere mmekọrịta ọrụ, ebe ọ bụ onye otu quartet nke gosipụtara Quartet nke iri na abụọ nke Beethoven
N'ụbọchị nke asaa n'ọnwa Mee afọ 1824, ọ kụrụ egwu n'òtù ndị egwú maka mmalite nke Symphony nke itoolu nke Beethoven

Joseph Benjamin (amuru 9 Nọvemba 1976) bu onye omere Naijiria, ihe nlere anya, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na atughari olu na onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo nke amara nke ọma maka nnabata MTN's Project Fame, ihe ngosi nka nke mere eme, ma gosiputa na ihe nkiri Tango With Me, Mr
and Mrs￼￼, na Murder at Prime Suites
Ọ meriri ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'Africa na 2012 African Film Awards
Maka ọrụ ya na Married but Living Single, ọ meriri onye na-edu ndú kacha mma na 2012 Best of Nollywood Awards
A mụrụ Joseph na 9 Nọvemba 1976, nye nna nwa amaala Kogi steeti na nne Anambra steeti
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na steeti Benue wee gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Legọs steeti
O nwetara diplọma na mmuta Kọmputa na nzere na Mass Communication
Benjamin lụrụ nwanyi na 2004 ma mụọ ụmụ abụọ; ya na nwunye ya kewapụrụ ugbu a
Benjamin kwagara United States na 2016, ebe o bi ugbu a
Ọ na-akọwapụta dị ka Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ

Benjamin mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Crossroads, na 1991 (n'akụkụ Ramsey Nouah na Sandra Achums); Otú ọ dị, mpụta mbụ ihuenyo ya bụ na mbụ, mgbe ọ pụtara mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abuo na mmemme telivishọn Tales by Moonlight na NTA
Benjamin kpalitere n'ọtụtụ usoro ihe onyonyo, gụnyere Edge of Paradaịs, nke nwa nwanyi onye agbata obi ya “na-echi ya ọnụ” yana Super Story

Ọganihu ya pụtara ìhè na ihe nkiri bịara na mbido 2010, na-arụ ọrụ na fim ndị nwere mmetụta ịhụnanya dị ka Kiss na Tell, Tango With Me, nke ahọpụtara maka Africa Movie Awards ise, Married but Living Single

Ọ mechiri akwụkwọ ịde ederede na 2013 site n'ịkpọ onye nyocha na mpụ 2013 Murder at Prime Suites (MAPS), nke sitere n'okwu ikpe mpụ n'ezie na Lagos, Nigeria, bụ nke onye ọ zutere na Facebook gburu otu nwanyị

Obere oge ka ọ mechara MAPS, Benjamin sonyeere ndị otu ndi mere ihe nkiri Desperate Housewives Africa, Nigerian meghari nke usoro American na-arụ ọrụ nke Chuka Obi, nwunye ulo Kiki Obi bara ọgaranya na di na-achị achị,n'ihu Kehinde Bankole
Ọ so bụrụ onye nnabata ya na Adaora Oleh, MTN Project Fame West Africa n'etiti 2009 na 2016, wee pụta na mgbasa ozi TV na redio
N'ịbụ onye na-abụ abụ n'òtù ukwe kemgbe afọ iri abụọ ya, Benjamin malitere ọrụ n'ịabụ ọkachamara na 2012, na-arụkọ ọrụ na onye na-agụ egwú Sabina na album Merry Christmas n'afọ ahụ
Onye Kraịst ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe, ọ bụrụla ọkachamara n'ozi ọma na ụdị mkpali ya na otu Joy na 2016 na m wụsara ịhụnanya m na 2020
O kwuputala na ya na-ewere onwe ya dị ka onye na-agu egwu na mbụ
Joseph Clinton Devillis (aka De Villis) (1878 rụo 1912) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe na Brooklyn, New York ónyé na-ese foto ala na mmiri
Devillis debanyere áhà na United States Navy na 1894 (na pad na pensụl n'aka)
Mgbè ọ gàrà Europe, o jiri ezumike ya n'ụsọ oké osimiri mụọ ihe ndị magburu onwé ha na Louvre, Luxembourg na gallery nkè London
Ónyé mmụta mbụ na Dewey's USS Olympia, na 1898 ọ bụ ónyé mgbaàmà na Agha nke Manila Bay
N'afọ 1901, ọ hapụrụ ndị agha mmiri wee laghachi New York ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ole na ole nke African American Art na New York n'oge ahụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Adelphi College n'etiti 1907 na 1912, sonye na Adelph Sketch Club
Devillis bụkwa ónyé otu Nazarene Congregational Church na Brooklyn ebe ọ bụ Deacon na Treasurer
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa oyi bàrà ya n'ahụ n'afọ 1912 mgbè ọ dị afọ iri atọ na atọ
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya mgbè ọ nwụsịrị na New York Public Library na 1921 ma bụrụ akụkụ nke AA
Schomburg Collection n'ebe ahụ
Joseph Delaney (1904 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Novemba, 1991) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe nke ghọrọ akụkụ nkè ihe nkírí nka New York n'oge Harlem Renaissance
A mụrụ Delaney na Knoxville, Tennessee, otu n'ime ụmụ iri nke ónyé ụkọchukwu Metọdist
Ọ bụ nwanne Beauford Delaney nke obérè, ónyé ya na ya nwere mmasị ise ihe
Delaney hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na klas nke itoolu
N'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma na mmalite afọ iri abụọ, Delaney nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ n'enweghị ebe óbíbí tupu ọ banye na Eighth Infantry Regiment, Illinois National Guard
8N'afọ 1930, Delaney kwagara New York City, ébé o debara áhà ya na Art Students League of New York
Na Art Students League, ya na Alexander Brook mụrụ, George Bridgman sere ihe osise, na anatomy mmadụ n'okpuru Thomas Hart Benton
Ọ nwalere usoro na-egosipụta ihe
Delaney mechara kwuo na Benton nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu, na-ekwu, 'Benton ga-anọnyere m mgbè niile'
N'oge ezumike ya, Delaney sere ndị mmadụ na ebe ndị gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ
Also'oge Great Depression, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Works Progress Administration
Ọ kụziri klas nka ụmụaka, Paul Revere sere ọlaọcha, na 1943 a kpọrọ áhà ya na WPAX Easel Painting Division
N'oge WPA kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ, e nyèrè Delaney onyinye site na Julius Rosenwald Fund
Site n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1942 ruo Jenụwarị 1943, o jiri onyinye ahụ gaa n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke oké osimiri ma mepụta usoro nke na-edekọ ndụ ndị ọrụ ojii
N'afọ 1978 na 1979, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe dị ka akụkụ nke Cultural Council Foundation CETA Artists Project na New York City
Delaney biri ma rụọ ọrụ na New York ruo 1986, na-egosi ọrụ ya na New York na Washington Square ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ
N'afọ 1986, ọ laghachiri Knoxville ka ọ bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Mahadum Tennessee, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1991
N'oge ndụ ya niile, Delaney kpebisiri ike imegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ọrụ ya na-ekpughe 'nchegbu miri emi màkà ndụ ndị nkịtị'

The Art Institute of Chicago, Knoxville Museum of Art, Museum of the City of New York, Indianapolis Museum of Art، David Owsley Museum of Art na Smithsonian American Art Museum so n'ime ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nwere ọrụ Joseph Delaney
N'afọ 1968, o bipụtara akwụkwọ nta nke chịkọtara ahụmahụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na New York nke akpọrọ, Thirty-six Years Exhibiting in the Washington Square Outdoor Art Show
Joseph Émilienne Essombe Tiako (amụrụ na ụbọsị 22 March 1988) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba mgba
O sonyere na asọmpi freestyle 53 kg nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2016 Summer Olympics, nke Betzabeth Argüello wepụrụ ya na agba nke iri na isii
Na Machị 2019, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị nke 57 kilogram na 2019 African Wrestling Championships
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitekwara anya Cameroon na 2019 African Games ma merie nrite ọla edo na freestyle ụmụ nwanyị 53 kg
N'afọ 2020, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị nke 53 kg na 2020 African Wrestling Championships
O ruru eru na 2021 African & Oceania Wrestling Olympic Qualification Tournament iji nọchite anya Cameroon na 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan
Ọ meriri n'egwuregwu ọla nchara ya na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 53 kilogram
O meriri ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ya na 2022 African Wrestling Championships nke emere na El Jadida, Morocco
Joseph Ettedgui (1936–2010), nke a na-akpọkwa Joseph, bụ onye na-ere ahịa na London na onye guzobere Joseph retail empire
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, onye isi oche nke British Fashion Council Harold Tillman kọwara ya dị ka 'nnukwu onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ere ahịa na onye ọchụnta ego'
Onye nchịkọta akụkọ ejiji Le Figaro bụ Godfrey Deeny akọwaala ya dị ka 'otu n'ime mmadụ isii kachasị ere ahịa ejiji na ọkara narị afọ gara aga'
A mụrụ ya na Casablanca na Febụwarị 22, 1936
Joseph Ettedgui bụ nwa onye na-ere ngwá ụlọ ndị Juu nke Morocco
Nna Joseph lere ire ere anya dị ka ọrụ na-eweda ala ma nwee olileanya na nwa ya nwoke ga-abụ dọkịta ma ọ bụ onye ọka iwu
Joseph enweghị ọchịchọ dị otú ahụ ma soro nwanne ya nwoke Maurice kwaga London na 1960 iji zụọ dị ka onye na-edozi isi
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ụmụnne ahụ mepere ụlọ ntutu isi (Salon 33) na King's Road, Chelsea - otu n'ime ebe obibi nke Swinging London
Na 1964, nwanne ha nwoke Franklin sonyeere ha
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na 1989 na Jewish Chronicle, Joseph kwuru, sị 'Achọrọ m n'ezie ịbụ onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ mana enweghị m ndidi
Ekpebiri m ịga ọmụmụ n'ihe gbasara ntutu isi ma enwere m mmasị na ya; enwere m mmasị n'ụzọ ị nwere ike isi gbanwee mmadụ n'ime awa abụọ
Joseph Ettedgui malitere ịga Paris iji hụ nchịkọta ejiji dị njikere
Nke a dugara na nzukọ na mkpakọrịta azụmahịa mbụ ya na onye Japan na-emepụta Kenzo Takada
Ọ malitere ire uwe elu Kenzo na Salon 33, na 1972 ụlọ ahịa uwe Joseph mbụ mepere n'okpuru ebe a na-edozi isi

Onye nchịkọta akụkọ ejiji Sunday Times n'oge ahụ bụ Michael Roberts hụrụ uwe elu Kenzo na windo ụlọ ahịa ahụ ma jiri ya mee ihe na foto - njem a na-ekwu na ọ malitere ma ejiji Europe na aha ụlọ ahịa Joseph n'otu oge nye ndị na-ege ntị na UK
Ụlọ ahịa dị elu nke Norman Foster mepụtara mepere na Sloane Street, Knightsbridge na 1979, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Joseph Ettedgui nọ dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ na-ere ahịa
N'oge 1980s, e webatara akwa na uwe nke aka ya
Akara Joseph gbasaa n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ (Joe's Café) na ihe eji eme ụlọ (Joseph Pour la Maison)
Ụlọ ahịa mepere na London na ebe ejiji ndị ọzọ, gụnyere New York, Paris na Tokyo
Joseph Ettedgui nyeere ndị na-emepụta ejiji aka, nke gụnyere Margaret Howell, Katharine Hamnett, John Galliano na Azzedine Alaïa
Ọ kwadokwara ndị na-ewu ụlọ na ndị na-emepụta ime mmụọ na dịka David Chipperfield na Eva Jiricna

Onye na-emepụta ejiji nke Britain bụ John Richmond kpọrọ ya 'onye kere ụlọ ahịa ọgbara ọhụrụ' na onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ọchụnta ego nke Italy bụ Miuccia Prada kwuru na ụlọ ahịa Joseph bụ 'n'etiti ndị mara mma n'ụwa'
Onye isi na-ahụ maka ịzụ ahịa Saks Fifth Avenue nke dị na London bụ Gail Sackloff chetara otú ndị na-azụ ejiji America si chọọ ileta ụlọ ahịa Joseph na 1980s n'ihi ụzọ o si azụ ahịa

Mgbe o rere akara Joseph ozugbo nye onye ikikere Japan ya na 2005, Joseph Ettedgui tụgharịrị uche ya na akụnụba ya na Connolly Luxury Goods, nke sitere na Connolly Leather, na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Belgravia Italian Il Vaporetto Ka ọ na-erule Nọvemba 2020, ụlọ ahịa Connolly ka dị n'aka nwanyị di ya nwụrụ, Isabel

Oloye Sir Joseph Odeleye Fadahunsi, KBE (1901 - 12 Mee 1986) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa bụ osote onye isi oche nke National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroons Ọ nọchikwara anya mpaghara Ilesha na House of Assembly n'oge mba mbụ nke mba ahụ
Ọ bụ Oloye nke ndị Yoruba, o mechara bụrụ Gọvanọ nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Fadahunsi na Ilesa n'afọ 1901
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Osu Methodist Elementary School wee gaa Wesley College, Ibadan
Fadahunsi malitere ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ enyemaka gọọmentị na Ilesha ma mesịa kụzie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Lagos na Ikorodu
N'enweghị mmasị n'ịkụzi ihe, ọ gwara onye isi nchịkwa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ na-akụzi ka o nyere aka na ọrụ azụmahịa
Onye isi ahụ mechara kpọbata ya na United Trading Company (UTC)
Fadahunsi zụlitere mmekọrịta ya na UTC na 1927 wee bụrụ onye na-azụ ahịa n'okpuru United Trading Company, alaka nke òtù ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Swiss Lutheran Church, Basle Mission
Ọ malitere azụmahịa ya na-azụta koko n'aka ndị ọrụ ugbo ma na-akwụ ndị na-ebugharị ụgbọ ala iji nyefee ihe ndị ahụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Ibadan nke United Trading Company
O mechara nweta uru zuru ezu iji zụta ụgbọ njem nke ya ma ụlọ ọrụ ya gbasaa n'oge na-adịghị anya na ngalaba njem
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Ijesa United Trading and Transport Company Ltd iji bubata ihe ndị sitere na ụlọ ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ ma na-ejekwa ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa ndị ọzọ ọrụ
Azụmahịa njem ya malitere inweta nkwanye ùgwù mpaghara ụfọdụ
Na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1940, ọ ghọrọ onye otu bọọdụ nke Nigerian Cocoa Marketing Board na Western Region Production Development Board
N'afọ 1951, Fadaunsi sonyeere National Council of Nigeria and the Cameroons, a họpụtara ya na mpaghara House of Assembly dị ka onye nnọchi anya Ilesa South West
Na nzukọ ahụ, ọ bụ osote onye isi ndị mmegide
N'afọ 1962, nkewa na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ mere ka e mepụta United People's Party site n'aka otu nkewa nke onye isi mpaghara na-edu
Ndị otu ahụ wee banye na njikọ aka na ndị otu NCNC
A họpụtara Fadahunsi dị ka Gọvanọ nke mpaghara ahụ na 1962
Joseph Haygood Blodgett (1858 ruo 1934), nke a na-akpọkarị J
Blodgettqa, bụ onye Afrịka Amerịka na-arụ ọrụ ngo na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, bi ma na-arụkọ ọrụ na Jacksonville, Florida, n'oge mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ
A mụrụ Blodgett n'ohu na Augusta, Georgia na Febụwarị 8, 1858

Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ọ hapụrụ ugbo ahụ wee gaa Summerville, South Carolina, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ma mesịa guzobe azụmahịa nke ya, gụnyere ọrụ drayage na osisi, tupu ọ tụgharịa n'ọrụ ugbo
Mgbe ọ dara ogbenye, ọ kwagara Jacksonville, na-arụ ọrụ maka ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè tupu ọ maliteghachi ụfọdụ ọrụ azụmaahịa mbụ ya, gụnyere ebe ọzọ a na-egbu osisi
N'afọ 1898, ọ banyere n'azụmahịa nkwekọrịta oge niile ma bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ ụlọ n'obodo ahụ na-agbasawanye
Mgbe nnukwu ọkụ nke Jacksonville nke 1901, nke kpochapụrụ ọtụtụ n'ime obodo ahụ n'onwe ya, Blodgett sonyeere iwughachi obodo ahụ ngwa ngwa
Ka ọ na-erule 1919, e mere atụmatụ na ụlọ ọrụ ya nwere ihe karịrị ụlọ narị abụọ na iri ise, ọtụtụ n'ime ha ka ọ na-etinye ego

Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a bụ obere ụlọ e wuru n'ógbè ndị Afrịka Amerịka nke obodo ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ ụlọ buru ibu na Craftsman na Colonial Revival styles, gụnyere nke ya, nke a na-akpọ 'Blodgett Villa,' n'oge gara aga na West 8th Street na Jacksonville
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ na Georgia, Massachusetts, North Carolina na Oklahoma
N'ihi ọrịa na-ada ada, ọ lara ezumike nká na azụmaahịa na 1920s
N'oge ọnwụ ya, nke mere na Jụn 5, 1934, a na-eche na ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Afrịka Amerịka kacha baa ọgaranya na Florida
E bibiri ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ Blodgett dị ka akụkụ nke mgbalị imezigharị obodo na obodo ndị Afrịka Amerịka nke Jacksonville
Otú ọ dị, ụfọdụ, karịsịa ebe obibi, ka dị
Na mgbakwunye na ihe ịga nke ọma azụmaahịa ya, a maara Blodgett dị ka onye isi obodo
Mgbe ọkụ ahụ mere n'afọ 1901, ọ bụ onye nduzi nke otu enyemaka iji hazie enyemaka n'ime obodo ndị Afrịka Amerịka
Blodgett kwadokwara ngalaba mpaghara nke Negro Business League, yana Edward Waters College na ụka ya
Blodgett lụrụ na 1894, Sallie A
Barnes nke Bamberg, South Carolina
Blodgett bụ aha Blodgettqa, nnukwu ụlọ ọha na eze e wuru na 1942 na Jacksonville, yana nke nọchiri ya, Blodgetta Villas

Joseph Holston (onye amụrụ Joseph Deweese Holston Jr, ubochí isii n'ọnwa Eprel, 1944) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ nke a maara màkà ihe ngosi ya nke ahụmịhe ndị Africa America, na-eji ụcha na-egbuke egbuke na ahịrị na-egosipụta n'ụdị cubist-abstractionist
Mgbasa ozi ya gụnyere eserese, etching, silk screen, na collage
A zụlitere Joseph Holston na obéré obodo Black nke Hawkins Lane, n'ihe bụ n'ime ime ọbọdọ nke Chevy Chase, Maryland, na Washington, DC
Ọrụ ya na-egosipụta mmetụta siri ike nke njirimara Black nke ịzụlite site na ịzụlite ya na ọbọdọ ahụ dị n'otu
N'afọ 1960, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Washington, DC, ebe a nabatara Holston n'ime mmemme nka azụmahịa na Chamberlain Vocational High School
Holston rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe / ónyé na-egosi ihe nkírí site na 1964 ruo 1970
Ọ gbakwara mbọ n'onwe ya site na itinye akwụkwọ na klas nka na mpaghara Washington, DC
Ndị a gụnyere klas ya na ónyé a ma ama na-ese foto Marcos Blahove (1928-2012)
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1971, Holston gàrà Santa Fe, New Mexico iji soro ónyé na-ese ihe, Richard Vernon Goetz (1915-1991), ónyé a ma ama na-ese foto, ala, na ọnye na-ede ihe
N'ime ọnwa ole na ole ọ laghachiri Washington, DC, Holston gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na-ere ahịa, iji malite ise ihe ógè niile
N'afọ sochirinụ, ónyé ọchụnta ego Texas na ónyé bụbu Postmaster General W
Marvin Watson Jr, zụrụ ihe osise ya Ghetto Boy, ma nye ya onyinye maka nchịkọta nke Lyndon Baines Johnson Library and Museum
Ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ dị mkpa bụ na Washington County Museum of Fine Arts, Southern Alleghenies Museum of Art, Reginald F
Lewis Museum of Maryland African American History and Culture, na Federal Reserve Arts Program na Washington, D
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Mahadum Maryland Eastern Shore, North Carolina A & T State University, na Experimental Printmaking Institute na Lafayette College
N'afọ 2008, Holston mepụtara akụkọ ọhụụ nke njem site n'ohu gaa na nnwere onwé na Freedom Journey along the Underground Railroad
A na-ahazi nchịkọta nke ihe osise, etchings, na eserese karịrị iri ise n'ime usoro anọ I
The Unknown World na-egosi usoro nke mmegharị nke ndị Afrịka a dọtara n'agha site na Middle Passage na n'ogige ohu; II
Ibi na Bondage - Life on the Plantation na-egosi ndụ ohu; III
The Journey of Escape, na-agbaso ụzọ nnwere onwe, na; IV
Agba na nnwere onwe na-eme emume iru ihe mgbaru ọsọ na mmalite ọhụrụ
'N'ịmalite ọrụ a, Holston sonyeere ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na-emepụta nka dị ka ụgbọ ala iji hụ, chee echiche, chee ihu, jụọ ajụjụ, ma mechaa mee ka nghọta nke akụkọ ihe méré eme dị omimi
' Kemgbe emeghe ya na 2008 na Mahadum nke Mahadum Maryland University College, nchịkọta ahụ agaala ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie, gallery na ụlọ ọrụ na mba na mba ụwa
N'afọ 2010, e gosipụtara ya na United Nations na Geneva, Switzerland
Nhọrọ sitere na suite gụnyere na 2016 na ngosi Black Mechanics Making of an American University and a Nation, na Mahadum Brown, na oku nke Brown's Center for the Study of Slavery and Justice
Joseph Kossivi Ahiator (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1956 na Aflao) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Ghana, nke a kọwara dị ka 'onye na-ese ụlọ nsọ mmụọ India na Benin, Togo na Ghana'
Ọrụ ya dị na Fowler Museum
A maara ya maka mbipụta ya bụ The King of Mami Watań (2005) na ihe osise nke ụlọ nsọ Tchamba ya na Lomé
Joseph Makula (1929 ruo 2006) bụ onye Congo na-ese foto
O jere ozi na mbụ dị ka onye na-ese foto ndị agha maka Force Publique tupu e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye mbụ na-ese ihe na Congo maka Congopresse n'afọ 1956
Mgbe Congopresse mechiri n'afọ 1968, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ nke ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2006
A mụrụ Joseph Makula n'afọ 1929 na Orientale Province, Belgian Congo
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị nọọsụ na Stanleyville, mana ọ debanyere aha na Force Publique na Port-Francqui na 1948
N'afọ sochirinụ, e zigara ya na Léopoldville, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị agha, Sango Ya Biso, kpọrọ ya dị ka onye na-ese foto maka mbipụta ahụ
E mechara mee ya onye nlekọta nke ụlọ ọrụ foto ndị agha nke na-ahụ maka ịmepụta ihe nkiri
Ọ hapụrụ ndị agha na 1956 wee chọta ọrụ n'oge na-adịghị anya na akwụkwọ akụkọ, Pourquoi pas l'Avenir
Ka e mesịrị na 1956 ma ọ bụ 1957 Congopresse, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke Belgian Congo, were Makula n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto Congo mbụ
Ọ na-ese foto évolués, ndị Congo gụrụ akwụkwọ bụ ndị guzobere otu ndị isi na mpaghara ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ime na gburugburu isi obodo, Léopoldville, na-ese foto ole na ole na mpaghara ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ ma ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-ese onyinyo obodo nta
N'adịghị ka ndị ọrụ ibe ya na Europe, Makula sere foto ole na ole nke ememe gọọmentị ma ọ bụ ileta ndị isi mba ọzọ
Mgbe nnwere onwe Congolese gasịrị na 1960, ndị ọrụ Europe nke Congopresse hapụrụ, Makula wee gaa Belgium maka ọzụzụ na foto
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Congo, ọ zụrụ otu ìgwè ọhụrụ nke ndị na-ese foto Congo maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, gụnyere naanị nwanyị na-ese ihe, Mpate Sulia
N'afọ 1968, Congopresse mechiri ma Mukula ghọrọ onye na-eseese foto n'onwe ya
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ foto nke ya, Photo Mak, na Lemba, Kinshasa, na 1981
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo 1991
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2006
Joseph mathunjwa (amụrụ 26 Mee 1965) bụ onye isi otu ndị ọrụ ogbunigwe na ndị ọrụ owuwu (AMCU)
A mụrụ Mathunjwa na amathikulu north kwazulu-natl, South Africa na ọrụ mbụ ya Abụ m onye nlekọta ụlọ nyocha m 1986 na rand coal ebe ọ na-enweta n'etiti R3000 na R4000 kwa ọnwa

Mmasị ya na otu ndị ọrụ bịara mgbe ọ hụrụ ka a na-achụpụ ndị mmadụ n'enweghị ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe Mgbalị iji chekwaa ọrụ ha, nkwụghachi ụgwọ mbụ ọ lụrụ site n'ụlọ ikpe ndị ọrụ bụ na BHP Billiton na 2005 wee merie ikpe dị n'etiti ya na AMUC mmalite mmalite
Njikọ nke ndị ọrụ ogbunigwe nandị otu ụlọ ọrụ ọunụa o oa
(AMCU)
A mụrụ Mathunjwa na Amathikulu, n'ebe ugwu KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa na ọrụ mbụ ya bụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ nyocha na 1986 na Rand Coal ebe ọ na'etiti R300 na R400 kwa ọnwa

Mmasị ya n'òtù ndị ọrụ bịara mgbe ọ hụrụ ka a na-achụpụ ndị mmadụ n'enweghị ụlọ ọrụ na ha na'eme mgbalị iji chekwaa ọrụ ha, Mgbaghara mbụ ọ lụrụ site na Ụlọikpe Ọrụ bụ na BHP Billiton na 2005 ma merie ikpe nke bụ ya na AMCU malitere
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022, n'oge ọ na-ekwu okwu, Mathunjwa kwuru na South Africa na'ọrụ n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n-achị ndị ọcha, karịa ka ọ dị ugbu a
Mathunjwa bụ Onye Kraịst ma na-aga na Salvation Army ya mere ọ nwere ike ịkpọ opi ma nwee ike ịgụ egwu
Ọ bụ ezigbo onye na-agụ egwú
Joseph Michael Solomon (11 Disemba 1886 - 26 Ọgọst 1920) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bishops (Diocesan College) na Rondebosch, Cape Town
Ọ lụrụ Jean Harkness (née Hamilton), onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na 1914
Ụmụ ha gụnyere Olga na nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Paul
O nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mmepe ọdịbendị nke obodo ya ma bụrụ onye a ma ama dị ka onye ntụgharị ya kachasị nwee nkà n'oge ndụ ya dị mkpirikpi
N'ihi nrụgide dị ukwuu nke e nyere ya ọrụ ịhazi ụlọ Mahadum Cape Town na Rondebosch na iweghachi ebe obibi Vergelegen n'otu oge ahụ, o gburu onwe ya na 1920 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na atọ
Joseph 'Joe' Kinyua Muriuki (a mụrụ n'abalị 31 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1984), bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na-arụsi ọrụ ike na sinima America
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri The Fifth Estate
A mụrụ ya na 15 Disemba 1980 na Eastleigh, Nairobi, Kenya
O mechara tolite na Nairobi ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Kasarani
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ego na Visions Professional Institute
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ chọtara ọrụ na Aga Khan University Hospital ma rụọ ọrụ afọ anọ n'ebe ahụ
N'afọ 2008, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ pụta na ihe nkiri Will You Still Love Me In The Morning, nke Brian Clemens na Dennis Spooners duziri ma mepụta site na Festival of Creative arts
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'otu n'otu na ihe nkiri na telivishọn, na mpaghara na mba ụwa
Ngosipụta mbụ ya na mba ụwa sitere na ihe nkiri Wikileaks The Fifth Estate mepụtara dịka ihe nkiri Dreamworks
Na ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado dịka onye nta akụkọ 'John Paul Oulu'
Joseph Muzondo (a mụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe
N'ịbụ onye nwanne nna ya kụziiri ya n'ọrụ , Muzondo mechara sonye na National Gallery BAT
Workshop na Harare, Zimbabwe
Ọ gụrụ maka imewe ákwà na Tanzania na eserese nka na Austria, ma gosipụta ya n'ụwa niile
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe
Ndubisi Joseph C
Egemonye (1933 ruo 2011), bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria, onye edemede, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego

Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ na onye guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ The Nigeria Monitor, akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ kwa izu na Nnewi, ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria, yana onye guzobere Winston-Salem Chronicle, akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo kachasị ochie na Winston-Salim, United States
A mụrụ Joseph Joe Ndubisi Chukwukadibia Egemonye na ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1933 n'ime ezinụlọ ndị Anglican na aga ozi ala ọzọ si Uruagu, Nnewi
Ọ bụ nwa nwa nke onye isi agbụrụ na onye otu agbụrụ Igbo na Naịjirịa
Major-General Emeka Onwuamaegbu bụ nwa nwanne ya
Ọ gara Manchester College of Commerce, England, n'afọ 1962 ya na St
John College dịkwa na Manchester, ebe ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1968, ọ nwetara nzere BSc na sayensị njikwa na Mahadum Manchester, ebe ọ bụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi arụmụka nke afọ 1966 na 1967 Manchester Debating Union
O nwetakwara nzere Master of Arts na nta akụkọ na Mahadum North Carolina na Chapel Hill
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye nkuzi, odee na onye nta akụkọ na Nnewi
O dere akụkọ abụọ dị mkpirikpi, Disaster in the Realms of Love na Broken Engagement nke gosipụtara na Onitsha Market Literature ma nwee ike ịchọta ya na Library of Congress
Dị ka onye nta akụkọ, ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ Igbo nke Eastern Nigerian Observer Newspaper n'afọ 1960 tupu o guzobe magazin Anglican Youth Fellowship a na-akpọ The Voice of the Youth
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi na Mahadum North Carolina Central, Durham na onye isi nke Ngalaba Akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mahadụ Shaw

N'ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 1974, o guzobere Winston-Salem Chronicle na Winston-Salim (akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu nke na-elekwasị anya na obodo ndị Africa-America) n'afọ 1986 o guzobere The Nigeria Monitor, akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ kwa izu na Nnewi
Ọ mere ka ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ obodo mara banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo na ihe omume obodo, nke mere ka a kpọọ ya Monitor
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ ndị 1990, ọchịchị aka ike nke ndị agha nke General Sani Abacha gbochiri nnwere onwe nke ndị nta akụkọ na Naịjirịa
Dị ka onye ọchụnta ego, o webatara Micro wheel balancing Machine n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala Naijiria iji nye ndị na-eto eto ọrụ
Dịka onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, otu National Republican Convention Party (NRC) họpụtara ya dịka onye ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisioche ọchịchị ime obodo Nnewi North n'afọ 1993

Joseph Nanven Garba (17 Julaị na afọ 1943 na 1 Juun, na afọ 2002) bụ onye ọchịagha Naijiria, onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ezumezu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu site na afọ 1989 ruo na afọ 1990
A mụrụ ya na Langtang, Naịjirịa, Garba gụrụ akwụkwọ na Sacred Heart School, Shendam site na afọ 1952 ruo na afọ 1957
Ọrụ agha mbụ ya malitere na Nigerian Military School na Zaria na afọ 1957, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ rụọ na afọ 1961
N'afọ 1961, ọ debanyere aha na ndị agha Naịjirịa ma zigara ya na Mons Officer Cadet School na Aldershot, England, tupu e nye ya ọrụ dị ka onye agha ụkwụ n'afọ 1962
Garba bilitere n'ọkwa ngwa ngwa n'etiti ọtụtụ ọkwa ndị agha ya bụ onye isi nke 44th Battalion na afọ 1963, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ site na afọ 1963 ruo 64, na onye isi nke ogbunigwe na afọ 1964
O sonyere na United Nations Military Observer Mission na India / Pakistan (UNIPOM) site na afọ 1965 ruo na afọ 1966 tupu e mee ya onye isi nke Brigade of Guards na 1968
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Staff College, Camberley, England, na afọ 1973

Garba, onye bụ Captain na ndị Federal Guards na Lagos, bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị isi nke ndị Naijiria (gụnyere Lieutenant Colonel Murtala Muhammed, Major Theophilus Danjuma, Lieutenant Muhammadu Buhari, Lieutenant Ibrahim Babangida, Lieutenant Abraham Bako, 2nd Lieutenant Sani Abacha na ndị ọzọ), bụ ndị mere ihe a maara dị ka mmegide Naijiria nke afọ 1966 n'ihi mkpesa ha nwere n'ebe nchịkwa nke General Aguiyi Ironsi nọ nke mere ka ọ kwụsị ọchịchị nke Jenụwarị 15, na afọ 1966
Garba bịara n'uche mba Naịjirịa mgbe, na Julaị 29, na afọ 1975, ọ kwupụtara nnupụisi megide onye ndú mba ahụ, General Yakubu Gowon
Okwu Garba, nke Redio Naịjirịa na-agbasa, malitere na nkwupụta ndị a
Garba bụ ezigbo enyi Gowon

Ọchịchị ahụ sitere n'aka ndị isi ndị agha na-enweghị obi ụtọ na enweghị ọganihu General Gowon mere n'ịkwalite mba ahụ gaa n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, a na-ekwukwa na ọrụ Garba dị ka onye nọ n'ime ya na-ahụ na ọchịchị ahụ enweghị ọbara
Garba na Gowon mechara mee ka udo dị ruo n'ókè nke na Gowon gara olili ozu Garba na Langtang na afọ 2002
Mgbe nnupụisi ahụ gasịrị, Garba gbanwere site na ndị agha gaa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mba na mba

N'afọ 1975, Murtala Mohammed họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista mba ofesi nke Naijiria (Federal Commissioner for External Affairs), ma gaa n'ihu n'ọrụ a n'okpuru Olusẹgun Ọbasanjọ mgbe e gburu onye mbụ na afo 1976

Garba bụ onye isi nke ndị nnọchi anya Naijiria na Nzukọ Ezumezu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu site na afọ 1975, nke mere ka a họpụta ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Kansụl Nchebe nke Mba Ndị dị n'Ozu na Jenụwarị, na afọ 1978
N'afọ 1978, ka Ọbasanjọ na-akwadebe inyefe ndị nkịtị ọchịchị Naịjirịa, e weghachiri Garba ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ nchekwa Naịjiria
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa a rụọ na afọ 1980, mgbe ọ hapụrụ ịga gụọ akwụkwọ na National Defence College na New Delhi, India
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, Garba gụrụ akwụkwọ dị ka onye otu na Kennedy School of Government nke Mahadum Harvard, ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na Public Administration
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a họpụtara Garba ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya na United Nations na afọ 1984, ọrụ ọ gara n'ihu rụọ na afọ 1989
N'afọ 1989, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Nzukọ Ezumezu nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka nnọkọ nke iri anọ na anọ
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa, a nabatara Nkwekọrịta na Ikike nke Nwatakịrị n'ime iwu mba ụwa
N'ọkwa onye isi ala, Garba bụkwa onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
Garba nọgidere bụrụ onye isi oche maka nnọkọ nke iri na isii, nke iri na asaa, na nke iri na asatọ pụrụ iche nke nzukọ ahụ, na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe, na mmekọrịta akụ na ụba mba ụwa
N'afọ 1979, e nyere Garba utu aha Commander of the Order of the Federal Republic, ma mee ya nnukwu onye ọrụ nke Ordre National Du Bénin ('National Order of Benin')

O dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Revolution in Nigeria Another View (1982), Diplomatic Soldiering (1987), na Fractured History Elite Shifts and Policy Changes in Nigeria (1995), e nyekwara ya nzere doctoral nsọpụrụ site na Mahadum Steeti nke New York na afọ 1991

Garba nọrọ afọ anọ (1992-1995) na New York na-eduzi The Southern African Peacekeeping and Peacemaking Project, nke lekwasịrị anya na ihe ịma aka nchekwa na-eche mpaghara ndịda Afrịka na-agbanwe agbanwe ihu
Isi ihe e lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ ahụ bụ ịmegharị ndị ọrụ nchekwa maka South Africa ọhụrụ na nke na-esote ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
E bipụtara nchọpụta na nsonaazụ nke ọrụ ahụ na mpịakọta abụọ na afọ 1993 na afọ 1994

Na 2628 Jenụwarị na afọ 1994, na Harare, Zimbabwe, ọ kpọkọtara ndị isi agha si South Africa na ndị otu ha si ANC na mpaghara ndịda Afrịka, yana ndị ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara nchekwa mba ụwa maka nzukọ maka ịmegharị ndị agha South Africa
[citation needed] Ntinye aka ya, ọrụ ya na mmekọrịta ya na ụfọdụ ndị isi ndị agha na ndị uwe ojii na South Africa na South Africa, gụnyere Lt
General Pierre Steyn, General J
Geldenhuys, Major-General Bantu Holomoth na Lt
Smiting, ndị agbata obi ha ga-eme ka ndị agha ọhụrụ na-agbanwe site na-eme ka ha dị mfe [ndị]]
N'afọ ndị ikpeazụ ya, a kọrọ na Garba nwere ọchịchọ iduzi Naịjirịa, ma kwuo ya n'ihu ọha na 1995
N'oge usoro mgbanwe Abacha ọ bụ onye otu United Nigeria Congress Party (UNCP), Na mba nke anọ ọ sonyeere All Nigeria People's Party, ọ bụ ezie na a họpụtaghị ya n'ọkwa ọha
Site na afọ 1999, ọ bụ Director General nke National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies na Nigeria, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọfịs a na Abuja ọ nwụrụ na June 1, na afọ 2002
Garba hapụrụ nwunye ya na ụmụ isii

Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, onye isi oche nke Senate nke Naijiria, Anyim Pius, kọwara Garba dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya mba [Nijiria], ndị hụrụ mba n'anya na ndị na-akwado kọntinent Afrịka a na-apụghị ikewapụ iche na nke a na-enweghị nkụda mmụọ', na-ezo aka na nkwenye siri ike Garba na nkwado nke Pan-Africanism
