Joseph Ndandarika (1940 - Mee 1991) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe nke a maara maka ọrụ ihe atụ ya
A mụrụ Ndandarika na Salisbury, Rhodesia ma o tolitere na Rusape
Ọ bụ nwa onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala Malawi, nne ya bu onye Shona
Nne ya bụ onye na-ese ihe ma na-arụ ọrụ mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka onye nlereanya maka onye na-akpụ ihe Job Kekana, onye ọzọ bi na Rusape
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi ndị Katọlik na Serima Mission na ngwụsị afọ 1950
Fr John Groeber na Cornelius Manguma chọpụtara nkà nka ya n'ebe ahụ, bụ ndị zụrụ ya na eserese na ịkpụ osisi
Mgbe ọ nọ na Serima, Groeber họpụtara ya ka ọ see ọtụtụ ihe osise n'ime ụlọ ụka St
Mary
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ Serima na 1959, ọ kwagara Salisbury wee sonye na Frank McEwen's Workshop School na Harare na 1960
Na mbụ, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na McEwen, ọkachamara na ala na ihe nkiri amoosu
N'ihi mmasị McEwen nwere maka ndị na-ese ihe na-enweghị ọzụzụ, ndị na-ekpere arụsị, Ndandarika zoro ọzụzụ ya na Serima ruo ọtụtụ afọ
O mepụtakwara agwa ọhụrụ dị ka nwa nwa nke sangoma, na-ekwu na ya na ya nwetara ọzụzụ dị ukwuu
Ịdị elu nke ọrụ eserese Ndandarika bịara mgbe MoMA nwetara mmanụ ya nke 1962, 'Bushmen Running From the Rain'
Ntinye aka Ndandarika bụ ngwakọta ya nke eserese na akwa kama palette, usoro nke mepụtara ihu na-adịghị mma
Mgbe ọtụtụ afọ nke eserese gasịrị, McEwen zigara Ndandarika ka Joram Mariga zụọ ya n'ihe gbasara ọkpụkpụ nkume
N'etiti afọ ndị 1960, o ji nwayọọ nwayọọ gbanwee n'ịkpụ ihe, ma na-ejedebe na nnukwu ihe ngosi niile McEwen mere ka ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume Zimbabwe bụrụ ihe a ma ama
Mmetụta kasịnụ nke Ndandarika nwere ike ime ka McEwen kwenye na n'akụkọ ifo Shona, ndị mmụọ bi na nkume
Nkọwapụta a nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ahịa McEwen nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, na-eduga ya ikwu na ndị na-akpụ ya na-ewepụta mmụọ dị na nkume ahụ n'oge ọrụ ha
Ndandarika nwere ike ịnọgide na-ere ahịa n'oge ihe isi ike nke afọ 1970 mgbe McEwen si Rhodesia pụọ, na n'oge 1980s Zimbabwean arts revival ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na mba ahụ
E gosipụtara otu n'ime ọrụ ọkpụkpụ Ndandarika, nke a na-akpọ Telling Secrets, na stampụ Zimbabwe nke e nyere iji cheta ụbọchị Commonwealth na 14 Machị 1983
Ọ mepụtara uru 11c n'ime usoro nke Henry Munyaradzi, John Takawira na Nicholas Mukomberanwa rụchara
Ndandarika lụrụ onye na-ese ihe Locardia Ndandarika ruo obere oge, ụmụ ya Ronnie Drigo na Virginia Ndandarika bụkwa ndị na-ese ihe
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na onye ndụmọdụ nye ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe, gụnyere Jonathan Mhondorohuma
Joseph obinna Nwafor amuru na May 5, 1983 bu onye okacha amara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke gbara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ na nso nso a Comerica I'm the Peruvian primers duvi
Joseph Obinna Ogba (amụrụ n'afọ 1961 na Ebonyi Steeti, Naịjirịa) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirị
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Ebonyi Central senatorial district na Seneti Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly nke asatọ na Naịjirịa ma bụrụkwa onye omeiwu a họpụtara na republic nke nke itoolu nke National Assembly
A mụrụ Joseph Ogba na 1961 na Nkalagu, Ishielu Local Government Area nke Ebonyi Steeti, Nigeria
A zụlitere ya na Ishielu obere oge
Ogba gara Command Secondary School na Nkalagu ebe ọ natara General Certificate of Education n'afo 1975
Ọ gara Federal Polytechnic, Oko ebe ọ nwetara Diploma na Higher National Diploma na Mass Communication
Ogba malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọka ikpe na Nigerian Football Referee Association n'afo 1986
N'afọ 1995, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Nigeria Football Referee Council (Chapter nke Anambra Steeti ) ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 1997
N'afọ 1997, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Federal Government Delegation na United States na Owuwu ihe onyonyo
N'afọ 1998, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche nke gọọmentị ime obodo Ishielu na steeti Ebonyi
E mesịa, a họpụtara ya dịka Onye isi oche nke ndị isi oche (ALGON) na steeti Ebonyi
N'ihi ahụmịhe ya na bọọlụ, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche, Ebonyi Angels Football Club na 1999 ruo 2002
Mgbe ọ ka na-eje ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Ebonyi Angels, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna maka ndị ntorobịa na egwuregwu, Ebonyi Steeti na 2002
N'afọ 2003, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye kọmishọna, a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Football Association na Ebonyi Steeti
N'afọ 2006, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii ahịa na nkwado nke Nigeria Football Federation
N'oge ntuli aka 2015 na Naịjirịa, Ogba gbara aka bia kwa sonyere na ndị omeiwu ha họpụta ra ka ọ nọchite anya mpaghara Ebonyi Central
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche kọmitii na-ahụ maka egwuregwu n'etiti ndị omeiwu Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ọzọ na ndị omeiwu Naịjirịa maka oge nke abụọ
Àtụ Nigerian Senators of the 8th National AssemblyÀtụ Nigerian Senators of the 9th National Assembly
Joseph Ogola Olita (31 March 1944 - 1 June 2014) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka igosi Idi Amin na Rise and Fall of Idi Amin (1981) na Mississippi Masala (1991)
A mụrụ Joseph Ogola Olita n'ọnwa March 31, 1944 nne ya bụ Regina Oduma
N'afọ 1951, Olita gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Pap Oriang
N'afọ 1958, o debara aha na St
Mary's Yala ebe ọ gara maka O level ya ma bụrụ onye otu klọb ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Olita bụ onye ọrụ nke Brooke Bond Company na Kericho na Union Carbide na Nakuru
Olita bụ nwoke nwere mmụọ miri emi nke gara Barding Secondary School, n'etiti afọ 1956 na 1960, ma mesịa gaa Yala Seminary School
Olita na-arụ ọrụ maka USAID mgbe ohere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ ndi 1981 Rise and Fall of Idi Amin gosipụtara onwe ya

Dị ka NTV Uganda si kwuo, Olita amaghị ọtụtụ ihe banyere Amin, ya mere ọ 'gụrụ ọtụtụ ihe banyere ya site n'akwụkwọ, site na akwụkwọ akụkọ na ihe nkiri' Ọ tụfuru ohere ime ihe dị ka ya mgbe a bịakwutere ya ka ọ gosipụta ọrụ ahụ na ihe nkiri 1976, Victory at Entebbe
Mgbe oge ruru iji gosipụta ya na Rise and Fall, 'Aghaghị m ịmara omume ya n'ezie' Rise and Fall of Idi Amin meriri ihe nrite ise, gụnyere Best Actor, na Las Vegas International Film Festival
Olita anataghị nhọpụta Oscar maka arụmọrụ ya ka a na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe nkiri kachasị njọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Academy Awards
'Ị na-ahụ ndị wazungu a na-achọ ọdịmma onwe ha naanị
Naanị ihe ha chọrọ ime ka otu n'ime ha bụrụ kpakpando
(Forest) Ọrụ Whitaker na ọrụ ya na The Last King of Scotland adịghị nso na ihe m mere ma ka nwere ike ime,' ka Olita na-ekwu

N'afọ 1984, Olita gosipụtara obere ọrụ nke onye uwe ojii mbụ na Sheena N'afọ 1991, ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ ya dịka Amin nke ugboro abụọ na nke ikpeazụ na Mississippi Masala nke Denzel Washington sonyekwara
Olita gosikwara onye isi ndị agha na The Black Forest Clinic
Ngosipụta ihuenyo ikpeazụ nke Olita bụ romantic comedy nke afọ 2011, The Captain of Nakara, nke o gosipụtara nna di Muntu
N'afọ 1980, mgbe Olita na-arụ ọrụ ya a maara nke ọma na-egwu Idi Amin, o degaara ezigbo Amin akwụkwọ ozi na-arịọ ka ọ zute ya mana Amin azaghị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 2013, Olita kọwara onwe ya dịka Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ
O kwetakwara na o nwere nwunye atọ yana ụmụ nwoke asatọ na ụmụ nwanyị anọ
Otu n'ime ndị nwunye ya nwụrụ site na ọrịa shuga

Olita nwụrụ n'ihe dịka elekere iri na otu nke ụtụtụ na June 1, 2014 n'ụlọ ime obodo ya dị na Pap Oriang' na South East Alego nke Siaya District mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa mgbe ọ nwụsịrị site na ọbara mgbali elu
A kọrọ na ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ n'ụbọchị gara aga site na Nairobi, ebe ọ bi mgbe olili ozu nne ya gasịrị
Dịka nwanne ya nwoke, Matthews Ogola, si kwuo, Olita na-arịa ọrịa ọmị ọkpụkpụ , ọrịa shuga na ọbara mgbali elu n'oge ọnwụ ya
N'agbanyeghị ọkwa ya site na Rise and Fall of Idi Amin, Olita nwụrụ dịka ogbenye
Dị ka Sipross Odero, onye ikwu Olita si kwuo, e wepụrụ ozu ya n'ụlọ ozu Bama Private Hospital
E guzobere kọmitii olili ozu n'obodo ya nke onye nnọchi anya South Alego Ward bụ Joshua Osuri
Tinyere ndị ikwu ya dị ndụ a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu, Olita nwere otu nwunye, aha ya bụ Alice Atieno, na ọtụtụ ụmụ gụnyere nwa nwanyị Risper Odero, na ụmụ ụmụ

Joseph Otsiman bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri na New York, onye na-emepụta ihe bụrụkwa DJ, amaara maka ọrụ ya dịka Pastor John Moses na The Cursed Ones na Kojo na The Burial of Kojo Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na New York Film Academy's student film director Casey Zidane's upcoming new film “Once Upon A Time In New York' , nke a na-ahọpụta maka Halloween 2022 world premier na AMC Manhattan, New York
Ọ bụ onye a họpụtara ugboro abụọ African Movie Academy Awards maka The Cursed Ones n'afọ 2015 na The Burial of Kojo
Ọ mere Nabil na 2021 German / Ghanaian feature film Borga
Joseph pụtara na 2021 Musical Album Moonlit Fools site na Criticality acclaimed Singer na songwriter Sam Dew ma Young Replicant duziri ya
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na ogbo anọ wee nwekwuo mmasị n'ime ihe nkiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị

O mekwara ihe nkiri ole na ole ma n'afọ 2006 o mere onye na-akọ akụkọ na The Marriage of Anansewa njem ihe nkiri na Ghana na United Kingdom site na njikọ Plymouth- Secondi Takoradi na Theatre Royal (England)

Tracy Moore (onye nduzi ihe nkiri Hollywood na onye nkuzi ama ama) na Rockmond Dunbar (onye nduzi ihe nkiri Hollywood na onye na-eme ihe nkiri) ruo 6 ikpeazụ nke mbipụta mbụ nke Onye na-eme ihe nkiri-The Search for the Next African Hollywood Star n'afọ 2011
Ọ bụ otu oge onye na-elekọta Kyzz FM's Mega chart show na world chart show site n'afọ 2010–2012 mgbe ahụ Onye na-elekọta Aseda FM's multiple countdown 2012–2014
N'afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke Pastọ John Moses na The Cursed Ones N'afọ 2017, o mere ihe nkiri Keteke dịka Nwa okorobịa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Connect Fm 971 nke TV3 Ghana
O mere John Moses na ihe nkiri ọtụtụ ihe nrite nke 2015 The Cursed Ones nke Nana Obiri Yeboah duziri
N'afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ aha ya, Kojo Bonsu na The Burial of Kojo, nke Blitz onye nnọchi anya duziri wepụtara n'afọ 2018
mere Nabil na ihe nkiri German / Ghana e nweputara na 2021 Borga Movie

Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na New York Film Academy's student film director Casey Zidane's upcoming new film 'Once Upon A Time in New York', nke a na-ahọpụta maka Halloween 2022 world premier na AMC Manhattan, New York
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ọrụ nkwado na AMA Awards (Nominee) nke afọ 2016
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ọrụ ndu na Africa Movie Academy Awards (Nominee) nke afọ 2019
Joseph Seamon Cotter Sr

(Ọnwa Febuwarị 2, afọ 1861 - rụo ọnwa Maachị 14, afọ 1949) bụ onye na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye na-eme egwuregwu, na onye isi obodo toro na Louisville, Kentucky (ma amụrụ na Nelson County, Kentucky)
Cotter bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede egwuregwu Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ e bipụtara
A maara ya dị ka 'onye na-ede uri Negro mbụ nke Kentucky nwere ezigbo ikike okike'
A mụrụ Cotter na mbido Agha Obodo America, a zụlitere ya na ịda ogbenye na-enweghị agụmakwụkwọ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 22
O mechara bụrụ onye nkuzi na onye na-akwado agụmakwụkwọ ndị isi ojii
Cotter tolitere n'ezinụlọ nwere ihe nketa agbụrụ
Nna ya, Michael J
Cotter, bụ nwoke ọcha nke ndị nna Scots-Irish, nne ya, Martha Vaughn, bụ nwanyị ojii a mụrụ n'efu nke nwere ihe nketa ngwakọta (otu n'ime ọtụtụ ụmụ nke nne ohu Afrịka na nna English-Cherokee mụrụ)
N'ọnwa Julaị 22, nke afọ 1891, Cotter lụrụ Maria F
Cox, onye nkuzi ibe ya, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ anọ Leonidas, Florence, Olivia, na Joseph Seamon Cotter Jr (onye na-ede uri na-ede egwuregwu n'onwe ya)
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị klas nke atọ, Cotter hapụrụ iji nyere aka kwado ezinụlọ ya
Cotter rụrụ ọrụ aka na ọrụ aka dị iche iche ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 22, ebe ọ sonyeere ụlọ akwụkwọ abalị Louisville nke mbụ na nke ọhụrụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii
Cotter gara ụlọ akwụkwọ abalị ruo ọnwa iri, nweta diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na asambodo nkuzi

Dị ka Metzger si kwuo (1989) 'E nwere obere ozi doro anya banyere ma ọ bụ oke agụmakwụkwọ Cotter o yiri ka o doro anya na ọ gakwaghị kọleji ma ọ bụ mechaa mmemme na-enye nzere ma ọ bụ ndụ ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi
Ọ bụ ezie na ụfọdụ ndị edemede chere na Cotter ga-aga kọleji, ịhụnanya ya maka ide na akwụkwọ nwere ike isi n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nne ya gụrụ ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ahụ onyinye Cotter nyere maka agụmakwụkwọ ndị isi ojii ugbu a dị ka ihe dị oke mkpa, n'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ, e chekwara nkọwa ole na ole nke ọrụ dị otú ahụ maka ọmụmụ ihe
Ihe doro anya ugbu a bụ na Cotter ghọrọ onye edemede a na-akwanyere ùgwù, ọ bụ ezie na mgbe mbụ ọ malitere ide ihe edoghị anya
Onyinye Cotter nyere n'akwụkwọ gụnyere akwụkwọ itoolu e bipụtara
N'etiti ọrụ ndị a bụ mpịakọta 4 nke uri A Rhyming (1895); Links of Friendship (1898); A White Song and a Black One (1909); na Collected Poems (1938)

Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ Cotter bi gụnyere Sequel to 'The Pied Piper of Hamelin,' and Other Poems (1939), nchịkọta nke uri na akụkọ; Negroes and Others at Work and Play (1947); Caleb, the Degenerate; A Play in Four Acts A Study of the Types, Customs, and Needs of the American Negro (1903); na nchịkọta abụọ nke akụkọ, Negro Tales (1912), na Twenty-fient Anniversary of the Founding of Colored Parkland or 'Little Africa', 18916 Kyzley, 1891 - 1916 18934)

Cotter na-enyekarị aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ dịka Louisville Courier-Journal (site na 1884), National Baptist Magazine (1894 Xi1908), Voice of the Negro (1904 Xi), Southern Teachers Advocate (Kentucky; 1905-6), na Alexander's Magazine (1909)
The ugbu aha nke Stalin - Dzhugashvili Iosif Vissarionovich
A mụrụ ya na 9 (21, New Style) na December 1878 na Georgian obodo nke Gori

N'ihi na ọtụtụ kwabatara nke Soviet Union n'oge Stalin na-achị ya na ụdị onye a na-ejikọta ya na usoro nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, na mmeri na Great Agha Ịhụ Mba n'Anya, nakwa dị ka ajọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ada, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ nke na-ọkọdọhọ na-kasị obi ọjọọ na obi ọjọọ na-achị obodo
More karịa atọ nde ndị e gburu ma ọ bụ tụọ ya mkpọrọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ebubo
Ọtụtụ mgbe nke ụlọnga, dispossession, njikọ wetara ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị ahụ tara nke Stalinist ọchịchị na a na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke iri abụọ nde mmadụ
Na taa ugboro, ọtụtụ ndị ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ na otu olu ikwusa a ịrịba mmetụta na guzobere agwa na ụdị onye n'ozuzu, ụmụ na-ekpe na ndị ezinụlọ gburugburu ebe obibi
Ya mere, ihe mere ndị dị otú ahụ a siri ike agwa nke Stalin?
Dị ka ihe ndekọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, bụ onye ndú na nwata bụghị obi ụtọ na-egbuke egbuke
Ugboro showdown nne na nna, Bilie tie si neprosyhayuschego nna nne, nwere ike agaghị agabiga ibonke a Chọpụta na enweghị mmetụta na nke-ntà nwata
Iji ebelata a echiche nke enweghị enyemaka na nwoke ahụ dị ike nke aka, nne ya nọ na-achọ onye obi ohere n'ọdịnihu ndú, nke mere na ndị dị otú ahụ n'iti na a na-emeso, Stalin mụtara na nwata
Kemgbe ahụ ọ ghọtara onwe ha ụkpụrụ nke ndụ - nri nke onye bụ ike
Na ndị dị otú a N'ezie na ọ nọgidere na ná ndụ
The mbụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nzọụkwụ, Stalin na-eme na 1902, haziri a ngosipụta na Batumi
N'ime oge ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye ndú nke Bolsheviks, na-eme maara Lenin, na a na-ewere ezigbo onye supporter nke ya revolutionary echiche
Na 1913, Joseph Dzhugashvili mbụ aka site na ya ọhụrụ na utu aha, nọrọ na ya ruo ọgwụgwụ nke ndụ ya
Ya mere Stalin na-achị a na-aga n'okpuru mara aha n'ụwa nile
Ewe kpọkwasịwo banyere iri atọ ndị ọzọ, na emeghị arapara
The afọ nke Stalin na-achị dị ka a Ọkaakaa isi nke ala-amalite site na 1929 na-agbaso site oge nke collectivization, nke rụpụtara ọtụtụ ọnwụ na agụụ
Na 1932, a e tiri iwu ahụ, popularly maara dị ka 'atọ spikelets'
Dị na ya iwu, ma ọ bụrụ na agụụ na-agụgbu ọrụ ugbo zuru si kwuo ha na-emezu wheat spikelets, ọ bụ anwụ anwụ
Zọpụtara achịcha exported, si otú na-emeghere onwe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta
Na ego zụta ọhụrụ ngwá mepụtara mba dị iche iche, ọ bụghị naanị Europe ma America
The afọ nke Stalin na-achị na-na-ji ọtụtụ ada nke malitere na 1936, mgbe ndị post of Ndị mmadụ Commissar esịtidem Affairs họpụtara Ni Yezhov
1938 gbagburu Stalin kasị bụrụ enyi - Bukharin
Oge a e ji mara igbu mmadụ n'ìgwè na njikọ nke Gulag ahụhụ
N'agbanyeghị otú obi ọjọọ bụ gọvanọ, ndị dị otú ahụ a iwu na-mụụrụ maka abamuru nke ala, n'ihi na ya n'ihu mmepe
Gịnị bụ mma na-eme na emeela ebe na mba n'oge afọ nke Stalin na-achị?

N'okpuru ike ya ike a ọha usoro nke ala, ya aku na uba, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-elekọta mmadụ oru; Anyị rụrụ modernization nke mba, hapụrụ NEP iwu, na-efu nke obodo industrialize; usoro mkpebi iji hụ na mmeri World War II; Ọ tụgharịrị na Soviet Union n'ime a superpower
The USSR ghọrọ ike ọchịchị ụwa, a na-adịgide adịgide so na UN Security Council
Na 1953, Stalin ejewo
Ọ bịara na njedebe nke oge nke Josef Vissarionovich Dzhugashvili, a mgbanwe n'ezie mgbanwe nke mba ọzọ amụma nke Khrushchev
Senator Joseph Sarwuan Tarka (afọ 1932 - 1980) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria si Benue Steeti na onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka njem na nkwukọrịta n'okpuru General Yakubu Gowon
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere United Middle Belt Congress, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị raara onwe ya nye ichebe na ịkwado maka Middle Belt nke mba ahụ
A mụrụ Tarka na 10 Julaị, na afọ 1932 na Igbor, Benue State n'ezinụlọ Tarka Nachi na Ikpa Anyam
Nna ya bụ onye nkuzi obodo nke sitere na Tiv onye mechara bụrụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na onye isi na Mbakor, Gboko
Ọ gara Native Authority Primary School, Gboko na Katsina Ala Middle School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na Katsina-Ala Middle School tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe na Bauchi Rural Science School
Ọ bụ onye otu Tiv Native Authority Staff Union na nke Northern Teachers Association
N'afọ 1954, na tiketi nke jikọtara ya na Middle Belt People's Party, a họpụtara Tarka ka ọ nọchite anya mpaghara Jemgbagh na Federal House of Representative
N'afọ 1957, Middle Belt People's Party jikọtara ya na David Lot duziri Middle Zone League iji guzobe United Middle Belt Congress
Tarka wee pụta dị ka onye isi oche nke United Middle Belt Congress (UMBC), n'oge na-adịghị anya, pati ahụ jikọtara aka na Action Group, otu kachasị na Western Region
Action Group chọrọ nkwado maka njikọta nke Ilorin na Kabba na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ na UMBC chọrọ ịmepụta Middle Belt State
Tarka bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye otu na Nzukọ Iwu Naịjirịa nke afọ 1957 ma bụrụkwa onye nnọchi anya mpaghara Middle Belt na Willinks Commission nke 1958
N'afọ 1958, a họpụtara ya dị ka minista na-ahụ maka azụmahịa
Tarka's UMBC, otu òtù ndị Kraịst na-azọ ọkwa ntuli aka tupu nnwere onwe nke afọ 1959 na ntuli aka sochirinụ nke afọ 1963 megide ndị Alakụba Northern People's Congress
Nhọrọ abụọ ahụ dugara n'ime ihe ike na Middle Belt, nke nyere aka na Major Chukwuma Kaduna Nzeogwu si n'ike mmụọ nsọ weghara ọchịchị ndị agha na Jenụwarị 15, na afọ 1966
Tarka bụ onye na-akwado ịmepụta steeti iji nye ndị na-erughị eru ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba n'ime mba ahụ
Ọ kwadoro ka e mepụta steeti Middle Belt tupu e belata mba ahụ

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1961, otu afọ mgbe nsogbu dị n'ala Tiv gasịrị, e jidere Tarka izu atọ na Jos n'okpuru igwe ojii nke nyocha maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru na ịkpali ọgba aghara n'oge ọgba aghụghọ Tiv, njide ya dị otu ọnwa site na ntuli aka mpaghara
N'afọ 1962, UMBC nke Action Group kwadoro n'ụzọ ụfọdụ kpebiri ịkwụsị mmekọrịta ha maka nke ọhụrụ na NEPU
A kpọrọ òtù ọhụrụ ahụ Northern People's Front na Aminu Kano dị ka Onye isi ala na Tarka dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu
N'afọ 1962, ya na ndị isi ndị ọzọ nke Action Group, e jidere ya maka ebubo nke ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru mana a tọhapụrụ ya n'ihi enweghị ihe akaebe

Mgbe General Gowon weghaara ọrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 1966, a họpụtara Tarka ka ọ bụrụ Federal Commissioner of Transport na nke Communications, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'afọ 1974 mgbe e bipụtara ebubo nrụrụ aka site n'aka onye otu Liv aha ya bụ Godwin Daboh
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ Paul Unongo na Gọvanọ Benue-Plateau Steeti Joseph Gomwalk kpaliri omume Daboh na Sunday Adewusi duziri nyocha ndị uwe ojii banyere ebubo ahụ

N'ịga n'ihu iweghachi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Republic nke Abụọ nke Naijiria, Tarka sonyeere ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ugwu iji guzobe National Party of Nigeria, ebe ọ na-asọ mpi na ntuli aka onye isi ala

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Senator maka Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Benue na afọ 1979, a họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii Senate na-ahụ maka ego na mmefu ego, ọkwá o nwere mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 30 Machị na afọ 1980, mgbe ọ dị afọ 48
A họpụtara nwa ya nwoke, Simeon Tarka, ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchianya ụlọ omebe iwu n'afọ 1979
Joseph Wowo bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria nke sonyeere ụlọ ikpe Gambia n'afọ 2000 wee bụrụ onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke Gambia site n'abalị 20 ọnwa June afọ 2013 ruo abalị 19 ọnwa july afọ 2013

Onye isi ala mgbe ahụ bụ Yahaya Jammeh wepụrụ ya n'ọrụ ma maa ya ikpe mgbe e kwuru na e jidere ya na teepu na-arịọ aka azụ nke 500,000 Dalasi n'aka onye ọchụnta ego Dutch iji gbanwee usoro ikpe ziri ezi n'okwu esemokwu ala
A mara ya ikpe ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ abụọ na Jenụwarị afọ 2014 site n'aka Ụlọikpe Criminal Pụrụ Iche na Banjul
Otú ọ dị, ọ gbara gọọmentị Gambia akwụkwọ n'ụlọ ikpe ECOWAS nke kpebiri na Gambia ga-akwụ ya $ 200,000 maka mwepụ iwu na-akwadoghị n'ọrụna mkpọrọ n'afọ 2019
A họpụtara Iyom Josephine Anenih (amụrụ na 6 Julaị, na afọ 1948) ka ọ bụrụ minista Naijiria nke Women Affairs na 6 Eprel, na afọ 2010, mgbe onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan kwupụtara ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ya

A mụrụ ya na Sokoto na afọ 1948, ọ nwere ebe obibi na-adịgide adịgide n'ihi na a na-ebufe ya ugboro ugboro dịka nna ya, onye ọrụ gọọmentị na ngalaba ọrụ ọha na eze, jere ozi na steeti niile na Naịjirịa
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ Ndị Kraịst
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Queen's College, Lagos
N'ịmụ Iwu, ọ natara BEd, LLB, na BL
site na Mahadum Ife (1974/75) na Mahadim Benin
A họpụtara di ya, Tony Anenih na afọ (1933-2018) dị ka Minista na Naịjirịa (Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ) Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Federation of Women Lawyers site na afọ 1994 ruo afọ 2000, ọ bụkwa onye isi nwanyị mbụ nke People's Democratic Party (PDP) site na afọ 1999 ruo afọ 2005
N'ọnwa Eprel na afọ 2002, o kwuru na mmejuputa usoro iwu Sharia na steeti Kano emeela ka a kwalite ikike ụmụ nwanyị dịka Islam si kwuo
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na Women Affairs nke Onye isi ala Obasanjo ruo n'afọ 2006

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Women Foundation Nigeria (WFN), otu na-enyere ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria aka n'ịgbanwerịta echiche banyere nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị zuru ụwa ọnụ na iji nyere ụmụ nwanyị aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye otu Gender Electoral and Constitutional Memoranda Committee, nke na-achọ itinye echiche ụmụ nwanyị na Iwu na mgbanwe Electoral nke Naịjirịa
Josephine Apieu Jenaro Aken (1 Mee 1955 - 2 Mee 2008), onye otu Luo si n'ógbè Bahr el Ghazal, a mụrụ na Wau, Western Bahr el Gazzal, South Sudan
Ọ bụ onye otu Sudan People's Liberation Movement
A mụrụ Aken na Alur, Kuarjena ma mụọ nkwukọrịta na Juba Training Centre na Khartoum
O mechara gaa UK iji mụọ azụmahịa na Mahadum Open
Aken malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ọfịs post
Site na 1973 ruo 1976, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Mmụta na South Sudan
N'afọ 1976, ọ gbanwere ọrụ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nhazi ma rụọ ọrụ na Khartoum ruo n'afọ 1987
N'afọ 1987, Aken kwagara United Kingdom
O so mepụta SWA na Febụwarị 1991 ma bụrụ onyeisi oche nke nzukọ ahụ site na 1994 ruo 2000
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị oche ya dị ka onye isi oche, ọ ghọrọ onye nhazi SWA
Tupu ọ banye na Gọọmentị South Sudan, ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Sudan Women Association nke dị na London Abbey Community Centre, Kilburn, London, UK
Ọ bụ onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị na Gọọmentị nke Southern Sudan
Site na 1994 ruo 2008, Aken jere ozi na National Liberation Council maka Sudan People's Liberation Movement (SPLM)
N'afọ 2000, a họpụtara Aken ka ọ bụrụ oche maka Camden And Westminster Refugee Training Partnership
Ọ nọgidere na ọrụ ebere ruo n'afọ 2004
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, na 2006, Aken laghachiri South Sudan ma họrọ ya iduzi Southern Sudan Employees Justice Commission (SSJEC)
Na Mee 2, 2008, Aken nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu n'akụkụ di ya Minista na-ahụ maka SPLA General Dominic Dim Deng, na Juba, Sudan
Josephine Casey (1 Jenụwarị 1878 (?) - 27 Jenụwarụ 1950) bụ onye nhazi ọrụ na onye ndú, na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Casey, nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ, na Memphis, Tennessee na [1878?] ma zụlite ya na Chicago
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Katọlik, Cornelius na Bridget Stephens Casey, bụ ndị Irish kwagara mba ọzọ
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka tiketi ụgbọ okporo ígwè na Chicago na 1904 ọ gwara ụmụ nwanyị ya na ha na-arụkọ ọrụ ka ha guzobe otu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi maka Boston Women's Trade Union League site na 1906 ruo 1909
Mgbe ahụ, ọ haziri maka International Ladies Garment Workers Union ma bụrụ onye ndú maka ndị ọrụ uwe na Kalamazoo, Cleveland, na St
Louis n'etiti 1911 na 1914

Na Machị 1912, mgbalị Casey na Michigan lekwasịrị anya na nchegbu nke ndị ọrụ nwanyị na Kalamazoo Corset Company gụnyere ụgwọ ọrụ dị ala, ogologo awa n'ọnọdụ na-adịghị ọcha na nsogbu mmekọahụ site n'aka onye isi nwoke

Ndị na-ahazi ya, gụnyere Pauline Newman na Gertrude Barnum, na ndị ọrụ na-eme ngagharị iwe nwetara nlebara anya mba maka mkpesa na nzukọ ekpere na nzaghachi maka iwu ụlọ ikpe iji gbochie usoro ngagharị iwe na-enweghị usoro
E nwetara nkwekọrịta nke na-erughị nnukwu ụgwọ ọrụ, mana ọganihu maka ikike ndị ọrụ nwanyị, na June 12
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, Casey megidere iwu ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na South
Ọ bụ onye na-agba mbọ maka ụmụ nwanyị na New York
N'afọ 1920, ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Equal Rights Amendment
N'ịgbaso usoro ọdachi, ọ na-enweta $ 5 kwa izu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-elekọta ụlọ
N'afọ 1931, National Woman's Party (NWP) kpọtụrụ ya wee zigara ya Atlanta iji megide mbọ Southern Council na Cotton Textile Institute na-agba iji guzobe iwu metụtara mmekọahụ
E mere akụkọ ya ka ọ bụrụ kọlụm a na-ahụkarị na akwụkwọ akụkọ izu ụka nke NWP bụ Equal Rights

Dị ka onye otu First Church of Christ, Scientist na Boston na mgbe e mesịrị na Seventh Church of Christ Scientist na New York, Casey jụrụ ịchọ nlekọta ahụike maka nsogbu metụtara obi n'ihi nkwenkwe okpukpe ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na New York City na Jenụwarị 27, 1950
Àtụ Infobox football biography
Josephine Chiwendu Chukwunonye (amụrụ 19 Maachị 1992) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa na-agba Kungsbacka na Damallsvenskan na maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
Ọ gbaburu bọọlụ na mpaghara Rivers Angels afọ asaa na Washington Spirit na Otu Egwuriegwu boolu Nke Umunwaanyi￼￼
Ka ọ gbachara afọ asaa na Rivers Angels n'asọmpị ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa, n'ọnwa Jun afọ 2015 ka a mara ọkwa na Chukwunonye ga-esonye na otu Egwuriegwu boolu Nke Umunwaanyi Washington Spirit
A bịanyere aka na ya n'otu oge ahụ Hayley Raso mba Australia, na ọkwa ahụ na-abịa ụbọchị tupu otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa gbagoro Australia na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA 2015

Chukwunonye kwuru n'oge ahụ, 'Obi dị m ụtọ isonye na ezinụlọ Washington Spirit; ọ bụ ihe ọṅụ na nrọ mezuru m, ọ na-amasị m iso nnukwu ndị egwuregwu dịka Crystal Dunn, bụ onye m zutere n'asọmpi U20 World Cup na 2012
Obi dị m ụtọ iso onye nchịkwa Parsons rụkọọ ọrụ n'ihi na amaara m na ọ ga-ewepụta ihe kacha mma n'ime m' Chukwunonye bụ onye mba Naịjirịa nke abụọ na squad, sonyere Francisca Ordega
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị egwuregwu abụọ maka otu ahụ, a tọhapụrụ ya na Disemba 2015
Na March 2016, ma Chukwynonye na onye mba Naijiria ibe ya bụ Ngozi Okobi bụ ndị otu Sweden Vittsjö GIK bịanyere aka na ya
Ha na-agbakọbu ọnụ na squad nke Washington Spirit, na mgbe ha na-akwaga Vittsjö GIK, ha na ndị mba Naijiria abụọ ọzọ sonyeere, Nkem Ezurike na Ifeoma Dieke
Chukwynonye kwuru 'Obi dị m ụtọ ịbanye na ezinụlọ Vittsjo; ọ bụ ihe ọṅụ na nrọ mezuru m, ọ na-agụsi m agụụ ike igosi onwe m ma nyekwa ike m niile iji kwalite klọb ahụ n'ebube'
Chukwunonye nọchitere anya Naijiria n'ọkwa ndị obere na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA U-17 na 2012 FIFA U-20
N'ọkwa dị elu ọ so na ndị otu Naijiria na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA nke 2011 na 2015 yana asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Africa na mbipụta 2010, 2012 na 2014, merie asọmpi ahụ ugboro abụọ ( 2010 na 2014 )

Josephine Delphine Henderson Heard (11 Ọktoba, 1861 - 21 Ọktoba, 1924) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede abụ na onye nkuzi
A mụrụ Josie Henderson na Ọktoba 11, 1861
Ọ bụ nwa nne na nna abụọ bụ ndị ohu, Lafayette na Annie Henderson na Salisbury, North Carolina
Mgbe ịgba ohu biri, e setịpụrụ ihe mgbaru ọsọ maka ya ịghọ onye nkụzi
Ọ lụrụ William Henry Heard na Jenụwarị 21, 1882
O nwere ọkwa nkuzi n'ọtụtụ obodo ka ya na di ya na-eme njem, onye ama ama na AME Church
A na-egosipụta ọṅụ ya n'ịkụzi ihe na mbido nke mpịakọta uri ya nke afọ 1890 nke akpọrọ Morning Glories
O dere site n'obi nke na-achọ ịgba ndị ntorobịa nke agbụrụ ahụ ume ma kpalie ha” Ọrụ ahụ nwere abụ iri asaa na abụọ mbụ ya
E degharịrị ya ma gbasaa ya n'afọ 1891

Di ya dere n'akwụkwọ ncheta ya, 'Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta na onye na-ede abụ, na ojiji o ji asụsụ Bekee eme ihe, yana nkatọ nke okwuchukwu m, emeela ọtụtụ ihe n'ime ka m bụrụ onye nkwusa ha na-ekwu na m bụ
Ọ nwụrụ na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, n'afọ 1924 n'ihi ọrịa kansa ara
Abụ ya Heard 'Black Sampson' dị ka gụnyere na anthology She Wields a Pen American Women Poets of the Nineteenth Century nke Janet Gray deziri
Josephine Johnson Genzabuke bụ onye ome iwu na National Assembly nke Tanzania
Josephine Ngminvielu Kuuire bụ onye Ghana na-ese foto, onye na-ese ihe dijitalụ, onye na-emepụta ihe osise na onye na-eme Mpụta ntinye ọnụ
N'ịbụ onye Ghana, Josephine Ngminvielu Kuuire nwere nzere bachelọ na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na egwu na Mahadum nke Ghana
Ọ malitere inyocha osise foto dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Leonia High School na New Jersey, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara irighiri na mmụbara dị na osise foto
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana n'afọ 2009, o kpebiri ịga n'ihu na ọrụ foto ya, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya n'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ mahadum
Kuuire bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Mumble Photography
N'afọ 2016, onye na-ese foto gosipụtara ihe ngosi nka mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Second Chance, na Accra[dot]Alt
Ọ nke lekwasịrị anya na ọmụma igwe kọmputa na eserese iji nye ihe nnọchianya ọzọ dị ka onwe
Onye na-ese ihe dijitalụ na-eji mmekọrịta chiri anya dị ka ngwá ọrụ iguzogide na usoro ọgwụgwọ nke na-eme ka nkowapụta ọsịsa ya dị mma n'ihu ọha na eze dị mma
Onye osise ihe n'enweta mkpali mmụọ site na ahụmịhe ya kwa ụbọchị na ihe ịma aka dị iche iche nke ndụ dị ka nwanyị pụrụ iche
Ọ na-eji foto achọ nnwere onwe, na-enwe olileanya ịkpali ndị ọzọ ịchọkwa nke ha, Nakwa ịjụ ajụjụ gbasara usoro mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke e guzobere na obodo Ghana
Ụfọdụ n'ime isiokwu nke pgosiputara n'ọrụ ya gụnyere ụkpụrụ ụlọ, gburugburu ebe obibi, ọdịdị, na ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na akụkọ ihe mere eme na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke oge a
N'afọ 2016, Kuuire nwere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya, Second Chance, na Accra[dot]Alt, na Accra, Ghana, ihe ngosi nke ihe osise onwe onye
Afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe sonyere na mmemme Arts for All Phase II, nke Creative Arts Council of Ghana malitere
Ebumnuche a bụ iji nnukwu ihe osise chọọ mgbidi konkiri nke okporo ámá Accra
Onye kere ọrụ ahụ, o sonyekwara na atụmatụ dijitalụ nke eserese ahụ na ahụ aja gburugburu mgbanwe Tetteh Qurashie

Maka onye na-ese ihe, ihe osise a pụrụ iche na-enye ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị nyere aka na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ghana, dịka Susan Ofori-Atta, nwanyị dọkịta mbụ nke mba ahụ, Esther Afua Ocloo, Mabel Dove Danquah, Theodosia Okoh, nwanyị ọka iwu mbụ Annie Jiagge, Laura Adorkor Coffie, Efua Sutherland, Yaa Asantewaa, Melody Millicent Danquah na Rebecca Naa Dedei Aryeetey
N'afọ 2017, Kuuire bụ onye meririnu na ihe omume nke Portraits Ghana Photography Prize, nke Dutch Embassy na Ghana na Nuku Studio haziri
N'afọ 2018, e depụtara ọrụ ya n'etiti ndị ikpeazụ iri kachasị elu na Ghana maka Kuenyehia Art Prize for Contemporary Ghanaian Arts
Josephine Mathias (amụrụ na 16 Disemba 1999) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị, onye gbara bọọlụ na Turkish Women's First Football League maka Trabzon İdmanocağı na nọmba jersey 16
Mathias gbara bọọlụ na mba ya maka Nasarawa Amazons
Ka ọ na-erule Machị 2018, ọ kwagara Turkey wee sonye na Trabzon İdmanocağı iji gbaa bọọlụ na 2017-18 Turkish Women's First Football League
O meriri ugboro isii n'ozuzu ya, wee hapụ otu ahụ mgbe e wepụrụ ya na Women's Second League
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naijiria, ọ bịanyere aka na Rivers Angels, wee kwaga na klọb mbụ ya na Nasarawa Amazons
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naijiria na egwuregwu CAF Women's Olympic Qualifying Tournament nke 2020 n'etiti Ọgọst na Ọktoba 2019
Chief Josephine Oboh-MacLeod (amụrụ na 18 Julaị 1965) bụ onye nwe ụlọ ihe nkiri na United Kingdom
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka mbụ guzobere ụlọ ngosi nka nke Afrịka, nke a na-akpọ 'Timbuktu', na UK nakwa naanị nwanyị Afrịka ojii nke nwere ebe ọdịbendị nka na Scotland
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta nka nke oge a na Scotland nwere ihe karịrị nchịkọta pụkụ isii
Ọ bụ onye mbụ mere ihe ngosi omenala Afro-Celtic na Naịjirịa, na Fela Kuti New Afrika Shrine

A mụrụ Oboh-MacLeod n'ime ezinụlọ Chief Major Humphrey Etafo Oboh (Adolor nke Ugboha Kingdom / Okakulu nke Emu Kingdom na Chief Mrs Comfort Eimiebaluye Oboh, Edeniokun nke Emu Kingdom, Ehan, Edo State, Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke onye mgbasa ozi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Mabel Oboh na Peter Oboh, onye bụbu WBA na British light heavy weight champion

Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Government College, Ojo, Lagos, Newman Prep School, Boston, Newbury College, ebe ọ nwetara nzere na njikwa ọbịa na nzere masta na Business Administration na Mahadum nke Surrey
Ọ gụrụ nka na London Art College, UK; ime ụlọ / ogige imewe na KLC School of Design, Chelsea Harbour, UK; na foto na Calumet Photography na Jessop Academy, UK
Epson Master Printing Course
Oboh-Macleod anọwo na ụwa nka ruo afọ iri anọ
O gosipụtala ihe karịrị nchịkọta puku isii
Ọ bụ onye isi nka na Johfrim Art and Design nke na-egosi nka na onye na-ere ahịa na Milngavie
Malite na 2016, Johfrim na-akwado ihe omume ọdịbendị ma na-anọchite anya ọrụ nke ihe dị ka ndị na-ese ihe iri ise, ihe dịka pasent iri asaa n'ime ha si Africa
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka mbụ guzobere ụlọ ngosi nka nke Afrịka, nke a na-akpọ 'Timbuktu', na UK na naanị nwanyị ojii nke Afrịka nwere ụlọ ọrụ omenala nka na Scotland
Ọ bụ onye mbụ mere ihe ngosi omenala Afro-Celtic na Naịjirịa, Fela Kuti New Afrika Shrine

Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị United Kingdom na onye otu The Scottish Conservative Party na onye otu Black Tories nke na-akwado itinye ndị isi ojii ruru eru n'ọkwa ọha dịka ndị omeiwu na UK, ọkachasị na Scotland
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Scottish Conservative Friends Of Black, Asian and Minority Ethnic (SCBAME)
N'afọ 2022, Oboh-Macleod zọrọ ọkwa kansụl na Kirkintilloch East, North na Twechar n'okpuru Scottish Conservatives na Unionist Party
O mere akụkọ ihe mere eme site n'ịbụ nwanyị mbụ sitere n'agbụrụ Afrịka ịzọ ọkwa onye nnọchi anya kansụl nke Scottish Conservative na Unionist Party na East Dunbartonshire, Scotland, United Kingdom
Josephine Ada Omaka (amụrụ na 29 Nọvemba 1993) bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ na onye ṅa-agbachitere
O meriri na asọmpi obodo na nke mba ụwa na egwuregwu na-anọchite anya Naijirịa
Josephine Ada Omaka malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ na onye na-eme ihe mgbochi na Naijirịa ebe ọ na-asọmpi na asọmpi dị iche iche
O ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 2011 African Junior Championships na 2010 Summer Youth Olympics na 100 mita

O sonyekwara na 4 × 100 mita relay ụmụ nwanyị na 2012 World Junior Championships nke emere na Estadi Olímpic Lluís Companys na 13 na 14 Julaị, ma merie 2009 African Junior Championships na 100 mita na ọlaọcha ọzọ na 4 × 10 m relay na asọmpi 2009 na Margaret Benson, Goodness Thomas na Wisdom Isoken
Ọzọkwa, o sonyere na ndị otu African 4 × 400 m relay nke meriri ọlaọcha na 2010 Summer Youth Olympics na Nkiruka Florence Nwakwe, Izelle Neuhoff na Bukola Abogunloko
Josephine Orji (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 8 n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1979) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-asọ mpi i bu igwe
Josephine malitere inwe agụụ maka i bu igwe n'afọ 2001 mgbe ọ gachara mgbatị ahụ na Owerri ma nwaa egwuregwu ahụ na nke mbụ ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o kwụsịrị ọrụ ya dị ka ọkachamara na kọmpụta na ụlọ ọrụ saịba ma bido ọzụzụ ya iji banye ọrụ egwuregwu i bu igwe
Joshua Aloiye Okogie (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1998) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba basket bọọlụ na Phoenix Suns nke National Basketball Association (NBA)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Georgia Tech, a họpụtakwara ya nke iri abụọ n'ozuzu na NBA Draft nke afọ 2018 site na Minnesota Timberwolves
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị otu mba Naịjirịa
Okogie na ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Ezinụlọ ahụ biri na Snellville, Georgia, ebe Okogie malitere ịgba basketball bu na ụlọ akwụkwọ Shiloh
Dị ka onye na-agba égbè 6'4 , ESPN edeghị ya na klas recruiting nke afọ 2016
Ọ bịanyere aka na Georgia Tech ma dị ka onye ọhụrụ, Okogie nwetara akara 161 54 rebounds kwa egwuregwu ma kpọọ aha ya na ACC All-Freshman Team
Ọ bụ onye otu nke atọ na 201718 All-ACC selection dị ka onye nọ na klas nke abụọ
Dị ka onye sophomore, Okogie duuru Georgia Tech iji nweta akara 182 kwa egwuregwu
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, o kwupụtara maka 2018 NBA Draft mana ọ wereghị onye nnọchi anya, yabụ na-ahapụ ohere ịlaghachi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Otú ọ dị, o gosipụtara ebumnuche ya ịbanye na NBA Draft na Mee 21
Na June 21, 2018, Minnesota Timberwolves were Okogie na n'ozuzu iri abuo na 2018 NBA draft
Na Julaị 2, 2018, ọ bịnyere aka na Timberwolves
O sonyere na 2018 NBA Summer League
Mgbe a zụrụ Jimmy Butler site na Minnesota na mbido Nọvemba, Okogie banyere na mbido mmalite, na-eme ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nkeji iri abụọ na abụọ n'egwuregwu n'oge ahụ
Mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, o sonyere na NBA Summer League nke afọ 2019
Na Jenụwarị 29, 2019, a kpọrọ ya onye otu World Team maka 2019 Rising Stars Challenge
Na Julaị 2, 2022, Okogie bịanyere aka na Phoenix Suns
N'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Disemba, Okogie nwetara akara Iri abụọ na asatọ kachasị elu n'ime mmeri 125-90 n'aka ndi Boston Celtics
Okogie na-agba na otu egwuregwu basketball nke mba Naijiria ma sonye na 2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup

Joshua Ade Tuyo bụ a ma ama na Nigerian ọchụnta ego si Ijebu-Ode, Ogun State
A mụrụ ya n'ime ndị ezinụlọ ihe Ijebu ọrụ ubi na indigo ahia
Si na ọzụzụ dị ka onye ozizi, ọ hapụrụ ozizi ọrụ maka ọrụ n'ọfịs
O ji osisi iri na abụọ afọ dị ka a ụkọchukwu mkpara maka Nigerian Railway Corporation, na British Bank of West Africa na ozi nke Commerce, na lara ezumike nká na 1953
N'oge ụkọchukwu afọ, ọ lụrụ a na-Ijebu nwaanyị a mụrụ a trading ezinụlọ Onitsha
Nwunye ya wee trading mgbe Ade a familiarizing onwe-ya na ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ, dị ka nke a bụ na-achị okike N'ezie e site a otutu Nigerian ezinụlọ n'oge tupu colonial na n'oge colonial oge
Ke mbubreyo 1949, Mrs Ade Tuyo furu efu ọtụtụ n'ime ya trading ngwa ahia n'ori ọrụ
Ebe ọ chọrọ ime na-aga n'ime a nnọọ ná ntụkwasị obi azụmahịa, o wee banye a ọzụzụ N'ezie maka na-eme bred
Mgbe Mr Ade Tuyo lara ezumike nká, na ọ ghọtara na ihe ndị pụrụ na-eme achịcha azụmahịa, a nsinammuo e nwere obere kwụsịrị kwalitere site na nkwado nye ụmụ amaala ọchụnta ego site gọọmenti etiti
Ọ na-achụ a ọma ego ngwa si Federal Loans Board, na malitere De facto Works, a isi nri na-eme achịcha ụlọ ọrụ
Ke 1969, ya bụ ndị kasị ibu na-eme bred ọrụ na mba
Joshua Taylor Bassett (amuru Disemba 22, 2000) bu onye omekorita na onye ọbụ abụ America
A maara ya maka ọrụ ịgba egwu ya dị ka Ricky Bowen na High School Musical The Musical The Series
Na Mee 2021, ọ pụtara dịka onye otu LGBTQ+
Na Jenụwarị 2021, Bassett nwere ujo septic na nkụda mmụọ
Joshua Ikhaghomi (amụrụ na abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1975) bụ onye Naijiria na-egwu mmiri
O sonyere n'ihe omume abụọ na 1992 Summer Olympics
Joshua Johnson (ihe dị ka o
) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe si n'ógbè Baltimore nke ndị nna nna Africa na Europe
A maara Johnson màkà ihe osise ya na-enweghị isi nke ndị bi na Maryland a ma ama
Ọ bụghị ruo na 1939 ka onye na-ese ihe nke ndị Baltimore nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu ka onye na'akụkọ ihe méré eme na onye na-ede usoro ọmụmụ J
Hall Pleasants chọpụtara, ónyé kwenyere na otu Joshua Johnson sere foto iri na atọ

Ndị Pleasants gbalịrị itinye mgbagwoju anya nke ndụ Johnson ọnụ; Otú ọ dị, ajụjụ banyéré agbụrụ Johnson, ụbọchị ndụ na ọbụna aha nnà ya (Johnson ma ọ bụ Johnston) nọgidere ruo n'etiti afọ 1990, mgbe Maryland Historical Society wepụtara ihe odide ọhụrụ a chọtara gbasara ndụ Johnson

Nnyocha e mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya emeela ka a màrà na Johnson enweghị njikọ na ezinụlọ Peale; Otú ọ dị, a ka na-ejikọta ọrụ ya na aha ndị dị ka Charles Peale Polk, onye ihe osise ya na ọrụ ya na-adịchaghị mma (ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị ọzọ nọ n'ezinụlọ ya) yiri nke Johnson
Na mgbasa ozi ya na Baltimore Intelligencer nke Disemba 19, 1798, Johnson kpọrọ ihe osise ya ọrụ nke 'onye nwere ọgụgụ isi na-amụta onwe ya, nke sitere na okike na ụlọ ọrụ ihe ọmụma ya banyéré nka'

N'ihe osise ya The Westwood Children (nke dị ugbu a na National Gallery of Art), Johnson gosipụtara ụmụ nwoke nke Margaret na John Westwood, onye bụ ónyé na-emepụta ụgbọ okporo ígwè Baltimore nke nwéré ihe ịga nke ọma
A na-ese ihe osise ahụ ma gosipụta ụmụaka atọ na-ejide okooko osisi n'aka ha, ya na nkịta ezinụlọ nke na-ejere nnụnụ n'ọnụ ya
Ụmụaka ahụ emeela ka ányá na-enweghị ihu, ọ bụ ezie na nwatakịrị nke nta yiri ka ọ na-achọ ịmụmụ ọnụ ọchị
Joshua Mays (amụrụ c1976) bụ onye America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese onyinyo, na ónyé na-eme ihe osise
Ọrụ ya, nke na-egosipụtakarị isiokwu ojii na ntọala dị egwu, ọtụtụ ndị na-ewere ya dị ka ihe atụ nke Afrofuturism, ọ bụ ezie na ọ naghị eji ákàrà ahụ akọwa onwé ya
A mụrụ ya na Denver, ma ugbu a ọ dị na Oakland
Mays bụ ónyé nkụzi onwé ya ma ree akwụkwọ mbụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ na-akpọ onye na-ese ihe mkpuchi abọm Mati Klarwein dị ka mmetụta, ọ rụkwara ihe osise abọm maka Jneiro Jarel na Jill Scott
Ihe osise Mays gụnyere usoro 'BEACON', nke dabeere n'ihe Maya Angelou kwuru Ọ bụrụ na mmadụ nwèrè ihu ọma, otu nrọ nwéré ike ịgbanwe otu nde ihe
Usoro a nwere murals na Oakland na 23rd Avenue na 24th Street, 829 Vermont St, West Oakland, na 1700 Broadway
A na-akpọ mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ dị na 1700 Broadway Beacon Frequency Reader ma bụrụ otu n'ime nnukwu mgbidi ọbọdọ ahụ
Isiokwu ya bụ nwa agbọghọ nwere mkpara, nke nnụnụ gbara Gburugburu
A na-ehota Mays ka ọ na-ekwu na nwa agbọghọ ahụ bụ 'onye na-elekọta ụlọ mkpọrọ na mpaghara dị egwu'
Onye na-ahụ maka ihe osise ahụ bụ Sorell Raino-Tsui, onye kwurịtara maka ntinye nke nnukwu ihe osise ndị ọzọ na mpaghara Uptown nke Oakland
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, a màrà ọkwa na Kaiser Permanente na ABG Art Group na-arụkọ ọrụ iji nye Mays na Rachel Wolfe-Goldsmith ọrụ ime ihe osise gbasara ikpe ziri ezi màkà Liberation Park na Oakland
Joshua Uzoigwe (July 1, 1946 - Ọktoba 15, 2005) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede egwú na ọkà mmụta ethnomusic
Onye otu agbụrụ Igbo, ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na-esetịpụ egwu ọdịnala ndị ahụ
A mụrụ Uzoigwe na Umuahia, Abia State (mbụ Imo State), Nigeria
Ọ malitere akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị obodo dị n'Umuagu
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndụ nwata ya bụ nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ ya, Sunday Uzoigwe, onye nwere ọrụ na mahadum nke Ibadan
N'agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, Joshua gara King's College, Lagos tupu ọ gawa International School Ibadan ịgụ akwụkwọ maka Advanced Level Certificate
Site na 1970 ruo 1973, ọ nọ na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka, ebe ọ malitere mmụta ya na egwu
Ọ gụchara akara ugo mmụta mahadum (1973–77) na Guildhall College of Music, London, na site na 1977 ruo 1981 ọ gara Queen's University Belfast, wee nweta ma MA na PhD
na ethnomusicology
Uzoigwe kụziri egwu na mahadum atọ dị na Naijiria, malite na mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ife, mechaa gaba mahadum nke Nigeria Nsukka na n'ikpeazụ University of Uyo dị na Akwa Ibom State
Ọ nwere nnukwu chi nke ọma na ọganihu mgbe ọ dị afọ 21
Ihe egwu a kacha mara nke Uzoigwe gụnyere 'Ụbọchị na-agafe'
Jọshụa bụ onye na-akụ piano nke oma ama, sonyekwa ọtụtụ ndị egwu egwu, gụnyere Ori Enyi Okoro na Joyce Akinwumi

Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ egwu egwu n'oge agha obodo Biafra ma bụrụkwa onye otu ndị omekome Odunke, bụ ndị gbalịsiri ike ịkwado ndụ omenala n'oge agha obodo ahụ na ịkwalite omenala Igbo n'akụkụ ya niile site na ntọala ya na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka
Atọ n’ime abụ Uzoigwe, “Na onyinyo na-ada ada”, “Transition” na “ Lake Drying, Rising Spring” ewepụtara na Nsukka Harvest Abụ sitere na Nsukka, 1966–72 (ed
Chukwuma Azuonye, Nsukka Odunke Publications, 1972, p 13–15), pụta na http //wwwsentinelpoetryorguk/magonline1105/Joshua_Uzoigwehtm
Na 1993, o bipụtara ọmụmụ ya na Akin Euba ( ISBN 9783927510166 )
Joshua Uzoigwe lụrụ Joanne McGuckin na Nigeria na 1981
Ha zutere mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Queen's University Belfast
Joanne bụ onye nkuzi na Mahadum Ibadan, Nigeria, ma na-agụcha akwụkwọ mmụta postgraduate ya mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1990
Ha mụrụ ụmụ atọ bụ Uzoma, Ejike na Nneka

Joyce Adewumi, onye guzobere New York African Chorus Ensemble ( http //wwwnyafricanensemblecom/ ) na ezigbo enyi ya na onye bụbu onye ọrụ Uzoigwe, dere na 'ọrụ ya na New York African Chorus Ensemble bụ nke a raara nye Joshua na ọ gaghị ekwe omume ma ọ bụrụ na mmetụta ya na ndụ m'
Josie Briggs Hall (September 17, 1869 October 25, 1935) bụ onye edemede na onye nkuzi Amerika
O dere akwụkwọ mbụ nke nwanyị ojii Texan bipụtara
A mụrụ Josie Briggs na Waxahachie, Texas na Septemba 17, 1869
Nne na nna ya, Henry na Tennie Briggs, nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Briggs na nwanne ya nwanyị biri wee gaa Bishop College na Marshall, Texas n'ihe dị ka nke afọ 1886 mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Briggs nwetara ọrụ nkuzi mbụ ya na Kenan, Texas
N'afọ 1888, ọ lụrụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ J
Hall
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ ise
Ọ kụzikwaara na obodo Texas Ray na Mexia, na obodo Mississippi Peyton na Tunica
Josie Briggs Hall fọrọ nke nta ka ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ mbụ ya mgbe ọkụ gbara akwụkwọ ahụ n'afọ 1898
Akwụkwọ ya ọzọ, A Scroll of Facts and Advice (Houxīs Printery, 1905), bụ akwụkwọ mbụ nke nwanyị ojii Texan bipụtara
Jenkins, 1905), nchịkọta nke abụ na edemede mbụ, ihe e bipụtara ọzọ, na ihe osise na foto nke ndị isi ojii na Texas na United States
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ntuziaka onwe onye yiri akwụkwọ ọgụgụ
nke a na-ere na ndị Afrika Amerika na-achọ agụmakwụkwọ n'èzí klas ọdịnala
A kpaliri Hall ide ya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ iji dọọ ndị nne na nna nke ụmụaka dịka ndị ọ kụziri
Hall mechara kwaga Dallas wee guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na azụmahịa nke Homemakersń, nke ọ na-elekọta site n'afọ 1916 ruo 1928
Hall nwụrụ na October 25, 1935, na Dallas
N'afọ 1936, e tinyere abụ Hall n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ndị na-ede abụ ojii nke Texas, Heralding Down An Anthology of Verse, nke J
Mason Brewer dezigharịrị
Joseph Kiambukuta Londa, onye a maara dị ka Josky Kiambukuta, (14 Febụwarị 1949 - 7 Machị 2021) bụ onye Congo na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu nakwa onye na-arọpụta egwu
Dị ka onye otu TPOK Jazz, ọ gụrụ egwu n'akụkụ Franco n'oge ha kachasị ewu ewu n'etiti afọ 1960 ruo ngwụsị afọ 1980
A mụrụ Joseph Kiambukuta Londa na Gombe-Matadi n'ụbọchị Valentine nke afọ 1949, nye Bernard Bakiansuni na Albertine Londa
Kiambukuta sonyeere otu Dr
Nico, African Fiesta Sukisa n'afọ 1969
N'oge ọ nọ n'òtù ahụ, o dekọrọ otu n'ime egwu mbụ ya, 'Sadi Naboyi Masumu'

Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 1971, ọ hapụrụ iji mepụta otu egwu ya Orchestre Continental ya na ndị ọzọ na-eto eto gụnyere Wuta Mayi na Bopol Mansiamina O dekọrọ ma depụta egwu ọzọ, “Nakobondela”, n'oge ya na ndị otu ahụ
Kiambukuta sonyeere TPOK Jazz n'afọ 1973
A maara Kiambukuta maka olu ya dị iche iche, site na ụda dị elu ruo na bass miri emi, dịka mkpa ọ dị
A na-eto ya maka ịdee ọtụtụ egwu maka ndị otu ahụ, gụnyere “Chandra”, “Fariya”, “KSK” na “Bimansha”
Josky mechara hapụ otu ahụ, ya na Ntesa Dalienst n'afọ 1985
Ha abụọ malitere ọrụ naanị ha ma na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro
N'oge mmalite ọrụ naanị ya, ya na Dalienst na Serge Kiambukuta, nwa nwanne nna ya wepụtara abọm
O sonyekwara na abọm Koffi Olomide mbụ
Kiambukuta laghachiri TPOK Jazz n'afọ 1987
N'afọ sochirinụ, o wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya 'Mata Kita Bloqué', nke nwere egwu a kpọrọ aha ya
Mgbe Franco nwụsịrị n'afọ 1989, TPOK Jazz gara n'ihu na-egwu egwu ruo afọ anọ
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 1994, esemokwu manyere ndị otu ahụ kewaa
Kiambukuta, ya na Simaro Lutumba, Ndombe Opetum na ndị otu egwu ndị ọzọ gara n'ihu mepụta otu egwu ọhụrụ Bana OK
A kọrọ na Kiambukuta kwagara France ma bụrụ onye bi na Paris
A kọrọ na Kiambukuta lara ezumike nká site na egwu n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 2009
A kọkwara na ọ nọ na-arịa ọrịa, ruo ọtụtụ afọ tupu ọnwụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ Kinshasa na 7 Machị 2021 mgbe ọ dị afọ 72
Josiah Akanbi 'Josy' Ajiboye bụ onye na-ese ihe osise na Naijiria nke na-arụ ọrụ na Daily Times

Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe osise na akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-eme kwa ụbọchị site na 1971 ruo 2000, na ihe osise kachasị amasị ya bụ iji ezi uche kwuo okwu banyere ọdịbendị, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Naịjirịa
Ajiboye bu onye Erinmope Ekiti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Yaba College of Technology ma ụfọdụ ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama dịka Yusuf Grillo na Solomon Wangboje kụziiri ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọzụzụ maka African Challenge Magazine, ngalaba nke Sudan Interior Mission
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na Morning Post
N'afọ 1971, ọ sonyeere Ngalaba nka nke Daily Times
Ajiboye bụkwa onye na-ese ihe ma nwee ihe ngosi mbụ ya na 1977 na Gong Gallery, Lagos Island
O nwere ihe ngosi naanị ya na Terra Kulture n'afọ 2011
Aha nna Joubert sitere obodo French
Ọ bụ ụdị mpaghara dị iche iche nke Jaubert, nke sitere na etiti ọdịda anyanwụ na etiti ndịda France
Aha nna a bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na Ndịda Africa na Namibia, ọkachasị n'etiti ụmụ ndị Huguenot bi na ya
Jouda Najah (Arabic) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Jovanice Twinobusingye bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan, onye omeiwu na onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu maka Kiruhura District na nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Ọ na-anọdụ na Kọmitii Ndị Omeiwu na Ọrụ Ọha na Gọọmentị Obodo nke Hon
Onzima Godfrey
Mary Begumisa meriri Twinobusingye na asọmpi maka tiketi NRM maka Sembabule Woman onye otu oche ndị omeiwu

O meriri na ntuli aka NRM site na imeri Nuweahereza Phionah na Mwiine Sheillah ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ NRM na ntuliaka mba na afo puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu Twinobusingye meriri na ntuli aka mba nke 2021 iji bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu maka Kiruhura District na nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Twinobusingye bụ akụkụ nke isi Rabecca Kadaga mgbe ọ malitere itinye akwụkwọ maka oge nke atọ n'ọfịs n'oge mkpọsa ntuli aka ya na Speke Resort, Munyonyo na Kampala

Twinobusingye so n'ime ndị omeiwu nke Uganda bụ ndị katọrọ ọnọdụ ọjọọ nke okporo ụzọ na mpaghara ya mgbe ndị omeiwu na-arụrịta ụka banyere mmegharị ahụ na-agba gọọmentị ume ka ha gbasie mbọ ịkwalite nchekwa okporo ụzọ nke Alex Ruhunda kpaliri, n'oge ncheta nke National Road Safety Week
O kwuru na ya nwere ụzọ ọjọọ n'ihi obere mmefu ego nke Ministry of Works and Transport
Twinobusingye jụrụ nsonaazụ ntuli aka nke 2020 NRM primaries mgbe Mary Begumisa meriri ya na asọmpi maka tiketi NRM maka Sembabule Woman onye otu oche ndị omeiwu

Joy Kabasti onye jụkwara otu nsonaazụ ahụ kwuru na a tọọrọ ọtụtụ ndị na-edeba aha na mpaghara ruo ọtụtụ awa ka ha na-eziga ụdị nkwupụta ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ distrikti na-ekwu na ọ nweghị ụzọ nsonaazụ ga-esi bụrụ ihe a pụrụ ịdabere na ya

Twinobusingye so n'ime mmadụ anọ n'ime ndị asaa na-azọ ọkwaNational Resistance Movement primaries na Mawogola North na West constituencies, Sembabule District bụ ndị jụrụ iji National Identity Cards na 2020 NRM primaries dị ka guildline nke Tanga Odoi nyere ebe ndị niile na-atụ vootu ga-egosi kaadị National Identification ha tupu ha enwee ike ịtụ vootu maka onye ha

Odoi kwuru na kọmitii ahụ bu n'uche ịtọpụta njirimara doro anya maka ndị na-eme ntụli aka ziri ezi maka ebumnuche nke iwepụ ndị na-abụghị ndị bi na ya nwere ike ịbanye ma ọ bụ jiri nzuzo weta n'ógbè ahụ iji chịkwaa usoro ahụ ma o kwuru na iji IDs ga-egbochi ọtụtụ ndị si na mpaghara ndị ọzọ ịtụ vootu

Twinobusingye nyere ihe abụọ mere ọ jụrụ, otu bụ na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ntụli aka efunahụla kaadị ma ọ bụ debanye aha mana ha ahọrọbeghị ha site na National Identification and Registration Authority- NIRA
Ihe nke abụọ kpatara ya bụ na ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ntụli aka n'ógbè ahụ ghọgburu ọtụtụ ndị na-atụ vootu ka ha tụfuo kaadị ha dị ka ndị nchebe mgbe ha nwetara aka azụ
Okwu ọṅụ na-ezo aka na mmetụta nke ọdịmma, ihe ịga nke ọma, ma ọ bụ ezi ihu ọma, a na-ejikọkwa ya na mmetụta nke obi ụtọ siri ike, nke na-adịgide adịgide
Nkọwa okwu nke ọṅụ na-agụnyekarị mmetụta nke ịbụ mmeghachi omume na ihe na-eme na ezí, dịka mmetụta anụ ahụ, ma ọ bụ ịnata ozi ọma

Lewis saw a clear distinction between joy, pleasure, and happiness 'I sometimes wonder whether all pleasures are not substitutes for Joy', and 'I call it Joy, which is here a technical term and must be sharply distinguished both from Happiness and Pleasure
Joy (in my sense) has indeed one characteristic, and one only, in common with them; the fact that anyone who has experienced it will want it again
I doubt whether anyone who has tasted it would ever, if both were in his power, exchange it for all the pleasures in the world
But then Joy is never in our power and Pleasure often is'
Michela Summa na-ekwu na ọdịiche dị na etiti ọṅụ na obi ụtọ bụ na, 'ọṅụ na e
'Mgbe uche dị ọcha, ọṅụ na-eso dị ka onyinyo nke na-adịghị apụ apụ
'[Ọṅụ bụ] akụkụ mmetụta uche nke ezi ndụ, nke ndụ nke na-aga nke ọma ma na-ebi nke ọma' - Miroslav Volf

'Nke a bụ ezi ọṅụ na ndụ, ihe eji eme ihe maka ebumnuche nke onwe gị ghọtara dị ka onye dị ike; ihe ike gwụrụ kpamkpam tupu a tụba gị n'elu ihe mkpofu; ịbụ ike nke Okike kama ịbụ obere ọrịa na mkpesa na-eme mkpesa na ụwa agaghị etinye onwe ya n'ime ka ị nwee obi ụtọ
' - George Bernard Shaw
Joy Anwulika Alphonsus (a muru n'abalị iri ato na otu n'ime onwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1987), onye ama ama dika Joy Alphonsus bụ Egyptian–Austrian actress
A maara ya nke oma maka ọrụ ya dị mkpa n'ihe nkiri nturu ugo akpọrọ Joy
A mụrụ ya n'abalị iri atọ na otu n'onwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1987 na Cairo, Egypt
Ọ bi na Austria ugbu a
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara oge mbu na sinima n'ihe nkiri Austrian mara mma akpọrọ Joy nke Sudabeh Mortezai duziri
N'ihe nkiri a, ọ mere dịka onye abara aha fiim ahu
E mechara kpọọ ihe nkiri a na ngalaba Giornate degli Autori
E nyochara ihe nkiri ahụ ma nye ya onyinye n'ọtụtụ emume ihe nkiri mba niile
N’ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 2018, Alphonsus ritere ihe nrite dika Nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri Kachasị Mma na Seville International Film Festival
N'onwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2019, e nyere ya onyinye Max Ophüls na Saarbrücken maka ọrụ ya
N’otu afọ ahụ, ọ ritere Diagonale Acting Award ma n’afọ 2020, e nyere ya onyinye dika nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Austrian Film Award 2020

Atim Joy Ongom, (amụrụ na 15 Septemba, na afọ 1968) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ugandan, onye jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Lira District Women Constituency na 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
A mụrụ ya Joy Atim, na 15 Septemba, na afọ 1968, na Lira District, na Northern Region nke Uganda
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ ya tupu mahadum
N'afọ 1989, a nabatara ya na Uganda College of Commerce Aduku, na Aduku, Apac District, gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na Diploma na Business Studies (DipBS)
Ka e mesịrị na afọ 2011, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kampala International na Bachelor of Public Administration (BPA)
N'afọ 1993, ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ 'Riclen Printers' were ya n'ọrụ, na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye na-akwụ ụgwọ afọ isii, ruo n'afọ 1999
Ọ kwagara na azụmahịa ọzọ a na-akpọ 'Jocent Enterprises', ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, ruo n'afọ 2011
Mgbe ahụ site na 2005, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa na azụmaahịa ọzọ a na-akpọ 'Hillside Annex', ọkwá ọ ka na-enwe mgbe ọ bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu
N'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2006, a họpụtara Joy Atim ka ọ bụrụ onye Gọọmentị Obodo Lira, na-eje ozi n'ebe ahụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ distrikti
N'afọ 2011, ọ gbara ọsọ ịnọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị na Lira District na 9th Parliament (2011 ruo 2016)
N'oge okirikiri ahụ, ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya ma merie
N'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2016, ọ gbara ọsọ n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda People's Congress (UPC), a họpụtara ya ọzọ ma bụrụ onye nọ n'ọkwa
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu Uganda na-emegide mmezi gharị nke iwu, iji wepụ oke afọ nke onye isi ala
Ndị uwe ojii Uganda lekwasịrị anya na nnọkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, na-akpata mmerụ ahụ na ụlọ ọgwụ
Otú ọ dị, na ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, Minista Dr
Jane Ruth Aceng meriri ya
Joy Atim Ongom lụrụ Maazị Ongom Innocent
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri, Joy Atim bụ onye otu kọmitii ndị omeiwu abụọ (a) Kọmitii Ntinye aha na (b) Kọmiti mmefu ego

Joy Ebinemiere Bokiri (amụrụ na 29 Disemba 1998) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti etiti maka French Division 2 Féminine club Saint-Étienne na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria
Bokiri bụ onye otu Bayelsa Queens na Nigeria Women Premier League
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Sporting de Huelva na Spain, na Elpides Karditsas na Gris
N'etiti Ọktọba 2019, ọ kwagara Turkey ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ na Turkish Women's First Football League maka Konak Belediyespor na Izmir
Na mba, Bokiri nọchitere anya Naijirịa na asọmpi ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri, tupu ya emee nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu okenye
Na 2019 WAFU Zone B Women's Cup, Bokiri gbara goolu na mmeri Naijirịa meriri Niger
Joy Chinwe Eyisi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1969) bụ prọfesọ onye Igbo Naijirian , na-ede akwụkwọ, bụ ọkà mmụta, na onye na-eneye ndị mmadụ aka
N’agbata afọ 2006 na 2011, ọ bụụrụ onye isi ngalaba, asụsụ bekee na agụmagụ bekee, Fakọlti Aat nka mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, (NAU), Awka, dị n'Anambra steeti
Ọ bụzi onye isi osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ (Ọmụmụ) nke National Open University of Nigeria (NOUN), ọkwá ọ malitere n'ụbọchị nke 26 ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017
Eyisi, onye bụbu onye isi senta nke NOUN's Study Center na National Assembly na Abuja, pụtara onye mmeri nke ntuli aka nke ndị Sineeti nke mahadum a mere n'ụbọchị nke 25 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2017
Ọ nọchiri Prọfesọ Patrick Eya dị ka nwanyị mbụ bụ osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ (Ọmụmụ)
Dika nwa mbu, a mụrụ Joy Eyisi n'ezinulo nke Sir Geoffrey na Lady Caroline Okpalanzekwe na ngwụcha agha Biafran
O nwere mmalite dị umeala
Ndị mụrụ ya e nweghị ike igbo mkpa ndị dị ha mkpa nke ọma
Ya mere, e mere ya ka ọ gaa maka nlekọta nwa
Eyisi bụ onye obodo Eziora nke dị n'Adazi-Ani dị na okpuru ọchịchị Anaocha, Anambra Steeti
Mgbe o mechara NCE ya, ọ lụrụ Chief Ray Ifeanyichukwu Eyisi, onye naịtị nke otu ụka Anglịkan nke Naijiria na-azụ ahịa,onye sitere na otu obodo nta, onye o zutere nke mbụ n'obodo ya
Nwa ya nwoke nke abụọ bụ Noble Eyisi bụbu onye isi otu ndi ọchịchị otu jikọtara ụmụ akwụkwọ (SUG), na Mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe

Naanị otu nwa nwanyị ya (Joy Eyisi, Jnr, dere akwụkwọ Willy-nilly, akwụkwọ nke a ma dị ka akwụkwọ agụmagụ nke ụmụaka na Nigeria nke narị afọ 21) bụ oney ji digrii klaas mbụ na Asụsụ bekee pụta site na Mahadum Koovenantị, Ota,dị na Ogun Steeti,na Naijirịa
Eyisi kwuru na ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ kachasị dị ume ngwụ na klaasị ahụ, ma nwekaa mpụtara na-adịghị mma na agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ogea
N'ikwu ya n'ụzọ ọzọ, maka agụmakwụkwọ ogo akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, ọ debara aha na Central School,nke Nnewi, mana ọ gụchara akwụkwọ ogo praịmarị na St Jude's Central School,dị n'Adazi-Ani, n'afọ 1981
N'ime otu afọ ahụ, site na mpụtara ule Common Entrance katụ mma, a nabatara ya na Girls' High School, Agulu, nke dị n'okpuru ọchịchị nke Rev (Sr) Miriam Theresa Ozomma oge ahụ
Ọ gụchara n'afọ 1986
Eyisi, ebe ọ bụ onye akpọrọ aha ya na agụmakwụkwọ, nwetara asambodo National Certificate in Education (NCE) site na Anambra State College of Education, Awka (1986-1989)
Ọ gara maka ọmụmụ na Mahadum Nigeria, (UNN), Nsukka, n'Enugu Steeti, jiri nzere bachalọ (Second-Class Upper Division) na Mmụta na Asụsụ Bekee

Mgbe ọ fechara ala nna ya n'afọ 1994, a nabatara ya maka nzere masta na Nchịkwa Mmụta na Nlekọta Ụlọ Akwụkwọ,na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, bụ ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dịka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma n'etiti abụbụ ọrụ nke ASUU n'afọ 1995
N’agbata afọ 1997 na 2000, ọ gara MA / PhD na Alma mata, UNN
Eyisi bidoro ọrụ ya dịka onye nkuzi nwa oge na Nwafor Orizuo College of Education, Nsugbe, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụbu onye nkuzi nwa oge na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe na mbido afọ 1996
N'afọ 2000, Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe nyere ya ọkwa dị ka onye nkuzi oge zuru ezu
Ọganihu ya site na Lecturer I ruo ọkwa prọfesọ na 1 October 2007 dịka o were afọ asaa iji rụzuo; n'ihi ya a kwadoro ya prọfesọ nke kacha dị ntorobịa na mahadum ahụ n'oge ahụ

Mmetụta Eyisi wetara Ngalaba Asụsụ Bekee na Agụmagụ (nke dị nso na ngalaba Agụmagụ Iwu nke Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe) nke onye na-eme azụmahịa i bụ ndị mmadụ n'ụgbọala na Naijirịa, bụ Chif Godwin Ubaka Okeke (MON)
Ọ bụrụla Prọfesọ na-abịarute abịarute na ụlọ akwụkwọ ukwu dị iche iche, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ Mahadum St Paul,dị n'Awka, (2002-2005), na Mahadum Ebonyi Steeti,dị n'Abakiliki (2001-2005)
Dika onye oka-mmuta, a maara Eyisi dị ka onye dere, degharia, ma dezie otutu ihe ọmụmụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ, akwụkwọ nkuzi, akwukwo ndi na agba ume, na ihe ngosi ogbako ndi e deputara
Akwụkwọ ya bụ Oral English for Successful Performance and Phonetics of English A Hands-on Guide to Correct Pronunciation na-agbado ụkwụ na ka e si enweta ma mụta olu na ụda olu n'Asụsụ Bekee
Ọrụ ya a kacha mara amara, bụ Common Errors in the Use of English, na-achọpụta ma na-edozi ụfọdụ njehie pụtara ìhè ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu okwu na-eme mgbe ha na-asụ asụsụ Bekee

A Grammar of English The Student's Companion, ọrụ ya ọzọ, na-egosi ndị na-amụ ihe kịrịkịrị ihe dịgasị n'ime asụsụ Bekee dịka asụsụ nke abụọ, ebe he Mechanics of Reading Comprehension and Summary Writing na-achọpụta ụzọ ndị na-agụ nwere ike isi ghọta ma kọwaa okwu ndị e bipụtara
Site na The Secret of Academic Success, nke o kwuru na ọ bụ ọrụ ya kachasị mma, Joy Eyisi na-agba ụmụ akwụkwọ ume ka ha mee ọfụma na-agụmakwụkwọ

English for All Purposes Hands-on Guide for Excellence in the Use of English, nke onye so dee ya bụ Chinonso Okolo na Joseph Onwe, dị ka onye nyocha kwuru, nwere ike 'ịnye ederede nrụtụaka… ihe na-enye ume ọhụrụ iji kpalite echiche banyere ụfọdụ mgbagwoju anya bekee nkw mahadum Quirk na Greenbaum na ederede ọzọ
Okwu kacha amasị ya bụ “Gawa n'ebe kacha elu
A chọla mpụtara dị Ezigbo mma ebe e nwere ike ị nweta mpụtara Magburu onwe ya “na“ Ọchụchọ magburu onwe ya bụ nchọta maka ịdị mma” bụ mkpalite maka mmezu agụmakwụkwọ ya na ụdị ndu ọ na-ebi
Eyisi, na-mmekọrịta ya ndị odee ise ọzọ , na-enye ndụmọdụ mgbanwe na onyinye na nkọwa nke mmụta dị iche iche nke asụsụ Bekee a ga-asụ naanị na mmụta mbaụwa
Dika onye oka nmuta natara otutu ihe nrita nke obodo na nke uwa maka onyinye ya na mmuta, o na-eme mgbasa ozi na i sụ ma i kuzi asusu bekee ziri e zi na ọnọdụ asụsụ nke abụọ
A ga-enyerịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ ụlọ nyocha asụsụ, ọba akwụkwọ ọkọlọtọ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ iji wepụta ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị nkuzi kacha mma
Ọnọdụ dị ugbu a dị njọ

E kwediri m nkwa inye onyinye nye ndị nkuzi nwere ike ịkpọpụta okwu 50 n'ụzọ ziri ezi na nzukọ ọmụmụ dị iche iche ebe m jere ozi dị ka onye nhazi n'ofe obodo, e nwekwazịrị m ike ịgwa gị na o siiri anyị ike inweta azịza 10 ziri ezi
Nkwupụta ahụ dị n'elu gosipụtara obi ya banyere adịghị mma nke Asụsụ Bekee na Naijirịa na Afrịka
A chọpụtara na Eyisi nwere mmetụta dị ike n'ahụ ndị na-ege ya ntị na nkuzi ọ bụla o sonyere na ya dị ka onye nhazi

N’ime ‘’The Role of Women in Empowering Change’’, Eyisi kwuru na ị mụ nwa e kwesịghị ị bụ ihe ngọpụ maka ị ga n’ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ, na-ekwupụta na “ Ekwesịrị i nye nwatakịrị nwanyị ohere agụmakwụkwọ, o kwesịrị ị ga ụlọakwụkwọ, ọ ga-agụrịrị akwụkwọ

Dịka akụkụ nke onyinye ya na agụmakwụkwọ na ọha mmadụ n'ozuzu, Eyisi, n'afọ 2004, natara Silver Jubilee Merit Award nke Bishop Crowther Seminary, Awka ; 2005 Adadiebube Recognition and Merit Award si n’aka St

O jikwa Educational Leadership Award site n'aka Institute of Industrial Administration (2007); Leadership Merit Award site n’aka First Bank of Nigeria Plc (2008); Award of Excellence An Appreciation of Wonderful Contributions to Academic Excellence in NAU, Hostel Union Government, Awka (2009); Merit Award in Recognition of her Contributions to the Growth of Engineering Profession and Youth Empowerment site n'aka Nigerian Universities Engineering Student’ Association NAU Branch (2010); Most Prestigious Academic Excellence Award in Recognition of her Contributions to the Growth of Education in Nigeria, nkeUniversity of Nigeria Alumni Association, Awka (2010) nyere ya

Na mgbakwunye na nturu ugo na nsọpụrụ ndị a na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ, Eyisi bụ onye otu ọtụtụ ndị otu ọkachamara dịka National Association of Teachers of English, National Association for the Advancement of Knowledge, Modern Languages’ Association of Nigeria, International Reading Association, (ANA), na English Language Teacher’s Association of Nigeria, wdg
Joy Emodi (amụrụ 23 Mee 1955) bụ onye a họpụtara dịka Senator maka Anambra North constituency nke Anambra State, Nigeria, na-ebido ọrụ na 20 February 2005 ka e wepụrụ Emmanuel Anosike
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 2007, mana ntuli aka nke abụọ ya bụ Alphonsus Obi Igbeke, onye na- azọ ọkwa ọchịchị All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP)
Ka e kpechara ikpe ogologo oge, Igbeke bụ onye mmeri na 25 Maachị 2010
Amụrụ Emodi na 23 Mee 1955 na Onitsha, Anambra Steeti; ma bụrụ onye Igbo
Ọ gara Queen of the Rosary College, Onitsha wee gaa na mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka ebe ọ nwetara nzere BSc
na Geography Education (1979), wee bụrụ LLB
Ka ọ gachara ọzụzụ gbasara iwu na Nigeria Law School, Lagos ọ ghọrọ ọkaiwu ọkachamara na 1987
Emodi bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmụta na Anambra State School Board (1983–1986), wee bụrụ odeakwụkwọ Executive, Anambra State Development Authority (1994–1995)
N'afọ 1995, ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na Mgbakọ nke atọ nke ndị Africa na ndị America na Senegal na n'ọgbakọ ụmụ nwanyị ụwa na Beijing China
A họpụtara ya na 1994/1995 Constitutional Conference
A họpụtara ya ka oburu onye osote onye isi oche nke mba (1994) na onye ndụmọdụ gbasara iwu obodo (1996) maka otu Congress nke National Consensus (CNC) n'oge ọchịchị General Sani Abacha
N'afọ 1999, ọ zọọrọ ọkwa gọvanọ steeti Anambra n'elu ikpo okwu All People's Party (APP)
Emodi meriri primaries ndị People's Democratic Party (PDP) maka ntuliaka 12 Eprel 2003 maka mpaghara Anambra North Senatorial zone, wee kpọpụta onye meriri na 16 Eprel 2003
Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) kagburu mkpebi a, ma kwupụta Emmanuel Anosike dịka onye meriri
INEC eweghachila Anosike dịka onye meriri n'Anambra East/West Federal Constituency nke Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya
Mgbe mkpegharị ikpe gasịrị, na 21 Jenụwarị 2004, Ụlọikpe Mkpesa ntuli aka kwupụtara na ahọpụtala Emodi nke ọma, na mgbe ọ gbasịrị akwụkwọ mkpesa ọzọ ọ nọkwasịrị na oche Senate na February 2005
Joy Emodi lụrụ Dọkịta Okey Emodi nwụrụ anwụ, ma ha abụọ nwere ụmụ anọ gụnyere Ray Emodi, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na Naịjirịa
Joy Eze (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 23 Önwa ife Eke 1988) ọ bụ eme egwuregwu na Naigeria, pụrụ iche na 400 mita
Joy Ngozi Ezeilo bụ onye ọkà mmụta iwu Naijiria
O guzobere Women Aid Collective (WACOL), Tamar Sexual Assault Referral Centre na West African Women's Rights Coalition (WAWORC)
Prọfesọ Ezeilo bụkwa onye na-eme ngagharị iwe na ọkà mmụta
Ọ bụ onye ritere ihenrite nke 2019 nke National Human Rights na Naịjirịa na National Honour of Officer of the Order of Niger (OON) maka ọrụ ya na enyemaka ya na mmepe mmadụ
Ọ bụkwa ugbu a osote onye isi oche nke African Women Leadership Network (AWLN) nke Naijiria ma bụrụkwa onye otu Enugu Steeti Judicial Panel of Inquiry on Police Brutality na Extra-Judicial Killings

Joy Isi Bewaji (amụrụ na ụbọchị asatọ ka ọnwa June afọ nari iri itoolu iri asaa na asaa) bụ onye edemede Naijiria, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na'ede egwuregwu, onye ọchụnta ego mgbasa ozi ọhụrụ na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ihe odide ya na ihe nkiri ya lekwasịrị anya na ọdịbendị na-ekwesịghị ekwesị na okpukpe na-adịghị mma
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ naghị ekwupụta na ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, echiche ya n'ihe gbasara ọha na eze emeela ka mgbasa ozi kọwaa ya dị ka 'onye na-ahụkarị ụmụ nwanyị na-enweghị egwu nke oge a'
Bewaji gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagos State Model College, Kankon Badagry
Ọ gụrụ Mass Communication na Polytechnic, Ibadan
Ọ gara n'ihu mepụta ọrụ na mgbasa ozi
Ọ gbara alụkwaghịm na ụmụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ afọ puku abụọ iri na isii, o kwuru na 'ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma naanị ya'
Bewaji bụ onye isi nchịkwa na redio Happenings ma bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na magazin Happenings
Ọ bụbu onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka magazin Genevieve
Ọ bụkwa onye malitere The Conversation nke na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị, sexism na misogyny na ndị Naijiria
N'afọ puku abụọ iri na iri, ọ gwara United Nations okwu gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na nwa nwanyị
Bewaji bụ onye na-akatọ ewu ewu nke omume okpukpe n'etiti ndị Naijiria, ọ na-akọwa nsonaazụ ikpeazụ dị ka ịmepụta 'ndị na-adịghị ike, ndị na-elekwasị anya n'onwe ha na ndị na-eduhie eduhie'
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akwado na okpukpe bụ naanị ngwá ọrụ iji nye afọ ojuju nwa oge n'ọnọdụ efu
Ọtụtụ ndị katọrọ okwu ya gụnyere Mark Anthony Osuchukwu nke YNaija, onye kwuru na ọ kwesịrị iburu ọrụ ya n'uche n'otu isiokwu akpọrọ, Hallelujah Challenge vs the Joy Isi Bewaji Challenge
N'afọ puku abụọ iri na anọ, ọ kpughere Tina sha Shoes & Love Issues, nke bụ usoro ọdịyo e mere maka ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ n'afọ puku abụọ iri na anọ, ọ kpughere na ọ dị nso ibipụta ụfọdụ akwụkwọ ya
N'afọ puku abụọ iri na isii, ọ haziri ma dozie nnọkọ akpọrọ Gender Equality And The Funk of Feminism, ebe ndị na-ekwu okwu welitere okwu na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị n'inweta ikike ha zuru oke
N'ikwu okwu banyere mkpali maka egwuregwu ya, Story of my Vagina (n'afọ puku abụọ iri na isii), Bewaji kọwara na 'ụmụ nwanyị ajụla ịghọ ihe karịrị ọdịnala ọha mmadụ nyere ha'

Na afọ puku abụọ iri na isii UN International Youth Day, Bewaji gosipụtara okpukpe, ọdịbendị na nna ochie dị ka isi ihe kpatara ịda ogbenye na Naịjirịa, ọ dụrụ ndị ntorobịa ọdụ ka ha leghara ihe niile ha mụtara n'aka ndị okenye anya, na-ekwu na ha agaghị aga ebe dị anya na ndụ ma ọ bụrụ na ha nọgide na-ebi na ha
A kọwawo Bewaji dị ka onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị nke oge a
Bellanaija gara n'ihu ịkọwa na ọ na-achọ ọnọdụ nkà ihe ọmụma n'ịmezigharị otú ụmụ nwanyị si ele onwe ha anya na ọha mmadụ
O kwukwara okwu banyere ụmụ nwanyị na Mahadum Harvard
Bewaji bụkwa onye na-akatọ ihe ndị dị n'egwú nke ndị egwu Naijiria kachasị elu, bụ ndị o kwuru na ha belatara ụmụ nwanyị ka ha bụrụ ihe a ga-eji ihe onwunwe zụta iji nweta afọ ojuju mmekọahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu ịkọwa na gburugburu a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe a na-apụghị izere ezere maka ọha mmadụ ịhụ ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị hụrụ ihe onwunwe n'anya

N'afọ puku abụọ iri na asaa, Bewaji dụrụ ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria lụrụ di ọdụ ka ha guzogide nwoke ọ bụla na-adịghị eji ha kpọrọ ihe, na-akọwa kpọmkwem ihe mere nkwa alụmdi na nwunye ha ekwesịghị ịbụ ihe kachasị mkpa karịa nchekwa na obi ụtọ ha

Dị ka Guardian si kwuo, egwuregwu ya bụ Marriage Onions In Wedding Blues (puku abụọ iri na asaa) bụ azịza ihe nkiri nye ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka na ajụjụ ndị inyom Naijiria lụrụ di na-eche ihu, gụnyere mmetụta nke ezinụlọ di na alụmdi na nwunye na ọrụ ndị nwunye Naijiria
Emere egwuregwu ahụ na Freedom Park, Lagos State na Machị 5, na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood gụnyere Osas Ighodaro na Damilola Adegbite na ọrụ ndị dị mkpa

N'afọ puku abụọ iri na itoolu, Bewaji wepụtara 'Las Las, We'll be Alright', akwụkwọ ntuziaka nke bụ akwụkwọ nke echiche ya dị ka onye na-akatọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọdịbendị na idiosyncrasies nke ndị Naijiria, ndụ, ụgha na nkwenkwe nke ụmụ amaala

Ụdị esemokwu nke isiokwu ndị ọ na-ekwu na nghọta ya banyere ụmụ nwanyị emeela ka ọtụtụ ndị na-etinye aka katọọ ya gụnyere, Adegoke Adeola, onye mgbasa ozi na Ogun Steeti Broadcasting Corporation, onye nkwado ụmụ nwanyị ibe ya, Omotoyosi Ogunbanwo, Uchegbu Ndubuisi, onye nkuzi na Mahadum Naijiria na ndị ọzọ
