Joy Jegede (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 16 ọnwa Disemba afọ 1991) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị mba ụwa nke na-agba ọnọdụ etiti na bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa, na mbụ maka ndị na- erughi afọ 20
O so na ndị sọrọ mpi na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka nke afọ 2012
N'egwuregwu klọb, ọ na-elekọta Delta Queens nke dị na Naijirịa, ma gbakwaara otu Bobruichanka Bobruisk bọọlụ na Belarus
Joy Jegede bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu Naịjirịa so na ndị otu bọọlụ Bobruichanka Bobruisk, nke Belarusian Premier League
Nwaafọ mba Naijirịa bụ Queen Ejovwo Willian toro Jegede maka ime ka a nabata ya mgbe o sonyere otu bọọlụ ahụ
Kemgbe opekata mpe afọ 2015, Jegede agbaalara ndị Delta Queens nke dị na Naijiria bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye isi otu bọọlụ a
Jegede bụ onye isi otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na-erughi afọ iri abụọ nke Naịjirịa na 2010 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup, ebe Jamini meriri ha n'ikpeazụ
N'oge na -adịghị anya, Jegede batara na ndị otu egwuregwu ndị okenye, gụnyere ịkpọ ya maka ndị otu asọmpi maka asọmpi Olimpik nke afọ 2012 na Lọndọn, Yunaịted Kịndọm
O sokwa akụkụ nke ndị otu asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka n'afọ ahụ
Ọ bụghị onye egwuregwu na-anọgide anọgide n'otu bọọlụ mba Naijirịa, mana e chetara ya ọzọ maka asọmpi Naijirịa na Equatorial Guinea n'afọ 2015 maka asọmpi Olimpik na -esote
Ọ gara n'ihu na-etinye aka na ndị otu bọọlụ Naijirịa kemgbe, a kpọrọ ya ka o sonye otu bọọlụ maka 2016 Africa Women Cup of Nations
Jegede bụ nwa PA Jegede, onye bụbu onye nlekọta ndị uwe ojii
Joy Kabatsi, nke a na-akpọkwa Joy Kabatsi Kafura (1 Febụwarị 1954), bụ onye ọka iwu Uganda, onye ọrụ ugbo na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị 2020, ọ bụ Minista Na-ahụ Maka Njem na Cabinet nke Uganda, malite na Disemba 2019
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
Tupu nke ahụ, site na 6 June 2016 ruo 14 December 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Ụlọ Ọrụ Ụmụ Anụmanụ na Kọmitii Ugandan
Ọ nọchiri Bright Rwamirama, onye a chụpụrụ na Cabinet
N'ihi ọnọdụ minista ya, ọ bụ onye otu ex-officio nke 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
A mụrụ ya na Sembabule District, na Buganda, Uganda, na 1 Febụwarị 1954
Ọ gara Bweranyangi Girls' Senior Secondary School maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level ya
Ọ gara na Namasagali College maka ọmụmụ A-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1973
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Dar es Salaam, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Laws na 1981
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ nwetara diplọma na Legal Practice site na Law Development Centre
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1982, dị ka onye na-enye ọzụzụ na National Institute of Public Administration, na Lusaka, Zambia, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 1987
Site na 1987 ruo 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa na World University Service International, kwa na Lusaka, Zambia
Ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya bụ Uganda n'afọ 1988 wee rụọ ọrụ na Ministry of Finance, Planning and Economic Development (Uganda), site na World Bank
N'afọ 1997, ọ gafere na Uganda Revenue Authority (URA), wee rụọ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo n'afọ 2001, dị ka onye isi ha na-ahụ maka ego (iwu)
Site n'afọ 2002 ruo n'afọ 2004, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi enyemaka nke Kọmishọna General na URA
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ kwagara n'Ọfịs Onye isi ala, na-eje ozi dị ka Onye isi nke Ngalaba Iwu, site na afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri abụọ ruo 2012
Ozugbo tupu nhọpụta ya, Kabatsi bụ onye ọrụ ugbo mmiri ara ehi
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Entuutsi Rural Enterprise Limited, kemgbe afọ 2005
Ọ na-asọ mpi maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Sembabule District na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda, n'ime ntuli aka atọ n'usoro
N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ụmụ anụmanụ
Joy Nunieh bụ onye ọkaiwu na Naijiria na onye bụbu onye isi nchikwa nke Niger Delta Development Commission
Onyeisi ala bụ Buhari chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu nke onwa Febuwarị n'afọ 2020 ma were Kemebradikumo Pondei nọchie ya ozugbo
Nunieh so kwado ihe nkwuto nke NDDC nke boro ebubo megide Goodswill Akpabio
Joy Ifeoma Nroli Nwosu Lo-Bamijoko bu onye a muru na August nke iri abuo na asaa, 1940
O bu onye obodo Nigeria, bu kwara onye ethnomusicologist, onye nduzi choral, ndi nkato ma onye sopranoO bu onye nkuzi egwu na Unilag
O kwalitere Bel canto aru oru nkiri na Nigeria izulite mmasi na opera na udi ikwo abu nke ndi Italian
O mela iri ise nkoghari egwu na Nigeria ma na mba ole na ole ndi ozo
Na 1968, o bibutere akwukwo a na kpo 'Cinema e Africa' nke Aracne editrice,ihe ndi Africans na ulo oyo yo
Amuru Nwosu na Enugu, na ezinulo Charles Belonwu, onye pasto na Deborah Nwosu
ha ibuo so na ndi na gu egwu na uluko ha
Nwosu soro ndi muru ya nwe na agu egwu na ulo-uka ha a na akpo Faith Terbanacle Church choir

O gara na iru na agwu egwu na mgbe ono na ulo akwukwo secondari ma onwetara okwa abua na ikwuzi nkwuzi na Holy Rosary College, Enugu ọ na-anọchite anya ya na asọmpi dị iche iche dị iche iche ma merie asọmpi asaa na-abụ abụ na-eme egwuregwu na Enugu Festival of Arts
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Holy Rosary, ọ nọgidere na ụlọ akwụkwọ dịka onye nkụzi
lọ nsọ Rosary dị nsọ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Katọlik; ndị nọn na-ahụ ọrụ Nwosu na-abụ n'ịbụ abụ na-enye ya agụmakwụkwọ iji na-amụ egwú na College of Music na Dublin
O weghaara akwukwo akwukwo ndi ozo nke anyanwu na ohere nke imuta egwu na Rom
Nwosu họọrọ Rom ma mụọ olu na Conservatori Do Musica Santa Cecilia
Ọ gara Itali na 1962 ma tupu a gụọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ ghaghị ịgba akwụkwọ ma gụọ akwụkwọ Ịtali
Ọ gụchara ihe ọmụmụ mgbe ọ nọrọ afọ ise na conservatori ma soro ya ọzọ ọmụmụ na nkwukọrịta

N'Itali, a na-ahụ ya na-arụ ọrụ ndị dị ka Puccini's Turandot na Garden Theater nke Castel Gandolfo ma werekwa ọrụ ndị ọzọ na Cleopatra na Tenth VictimO puta kwa ra na obere oyo yo nke bu , Giovanni Vento's, Ill Nero na 1966
Mgbe o sii Europe we bata, oruru oru ka onye mmeputa oyoyo na Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation (NBC)
Na NBC, o me bi doro out egwu
Na 1973, otu a woputara egwu UWAM na okpuru Decca records nke mechara we buru ihe wuru ewu
Ka egwu siri ewu ewu mere ka o puta na oyoyo na redio na 1975 ma 1975
O guru egwu na omenala abali na NBC
Mgbe e mere Festac, o bu onye isi na ndi soprano na Ayo Bankole's Festac Cantata ma onye na enyere onye isi ndi egwu na ememme
Mgbe nka anwa, o so kwarao otu ndi egwu Lazarus Ekwueme's gawa Ghana na ufodu ndi staati di na Nigeria I gwu egwuNa 1975, o ha puru NBC ka oburu onye na akuzi nkuzi na University of Lagos
Nwosu enwere nzere degree ma o huru mmegide na aka ndi nkuzi ndi ozo di ka Akin Euba onye na ahu ya ka onye ga ekwesiri I nweta oru na ebe anwa
Na 1978, o nwe tara nbanye na Michigan maka doctorate, nke o mechara na 1981
Mgbe o yatara Michigan, ndi na akuzi nkuzi umu nwoke ndi ozo e we na ele ya anya nke oma
Na etiti, 1986 na 1987, obu onye isi ndi ngbalaba egwu ma mechara buru onye isi ndi igwe egwu na ebe omume omenala
Nwosu ha puru coral Ekwueme's ibido nke ya nke bu Joy Nwosu and Her Ensemble na afo mbido1980s
Na1985, otu ya mere aru oru na National Arts Theatre, Iganmu ibido afo jubili na Nigeria
Nwosu lara ezumike nka na Unilag na mbubreyo 1990s new lara na US
Na US
o nwara I nweta ndokwa nmahadum ma ana o nwere isi
o me chara bido oru nke I leta umu aka tu p u o buru onye nkuzi egwu na ulo akwukwo secondari
O dego akwukwo ibuo, Mirror of Our Lives na Legend of the Walking Dead Igbo Mythologies
Joy Ogbonne Eze (amuru na ọnwa 6 June 2004) bu onye ebuli elu Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme 64kg nke ụmụ nwanyị na egwuregwu mba Africa nke afọ 2019 na Rabat, Morocco na asọmpi ịdị arọ nke Africa 2021 na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ nọchiri anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2019 emere na Rabat, Morocco wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na 64 ụmụnwaanyị kg omume
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme ya na asọmpi ịdị arọ nke Afrịka nke afọ 2021 emere na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla n'ime mmemme dị ọcha & n'azụ na mmemme 71 n'arọ ụmụ nwanyị na asọmpi ịdị arọ ụwa nke 2021 emere na Tashkent, Uzbekistan
Ọ meriri n'ọkwa 6 n'asọmpi a
O debere ndekọ ntorobịa ọhụrụ na ọcha & jerk na mkpokọta
Emekwara asọmpi ịdị arọ nke Commonwealth nke afọ 2021 n'otu oge na nsonaazụ ya nyere ya ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme a
N'ihi ya, ọ tozuru ịsọ mpi na 2022 Commonwealth Games na Birmingham, England
Joy Uche Angela Ogwu (amụrụ n'Ọnwa asatọ n'afọ 1946) bụ bu onye n'anọchite anya obodo Naịjirịa n’ịhe gbasara obodo ndị ọzọ
N’afọ 2008, ọ bụkwa ya bụ onye nnọchite anya Naịjịrịa n’ọgbakọ nke ndị bekee kpọrọ United Nations, na mba New York
Ọ bụ ya bụ nwaanyị nke mbụ nke jidegoro okwa nnọchite anya Naịjịrịa n’ọgbakọ United Nations
Tupu ya e were ọkwa dị ka onye nnọchite anya, Ogwu, onye nke si na Delta Steeti arụọla ọrụ dika onye isi ụlọ-ọrụ ihe gbasara Naịjịrịa na mba ndi ọzọ
Ogwu bụ onye na-enye ndị United Nations ndụmọdụ n’ihe gbasara ị webilata aka na ngwa agha, ma dekwaa ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nke na akwalite mba Afrịka n’ihe gbasara mba Latin Amerịka
O bụkwa, n’oge gara aga, onye isi oche nke ndị nlekọta ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ United Nations Institute for Disarmament Reasearch (UNDIR) na bekee
She is the former Chair of the Board of Trustees of the United Nations Institute for Disarmament Research (UNIDIR)
N’ọnwa nke asatọ n’afọ 2006, onye isi ala Naịjịrịa n’oge ahụ, bụ Olusegun Obasanjo, nyere ya ọkwa nke onye nnọchite anya obodo n’ihe gbasara mba ndị ọzọ
N’afọ 2008, Ogwu were okwa dika onye n’anọchite anya obodo Naịjịrịa na United Nations dị na New York
N’ọnwa nke asaa n’afor 2010, ya na nke iri n’afọ 2011, Ogwu bu onye isi nke ndi United Nations n’ihe gbasara nchekwa obodo
O nwetara akwụkwọ asambodo nke mbụ nke a na akpọ Bachelors na bekee; ya na asambodo nke abụọ nke a na akpọ Masters na bekee na mahadum Rutgers
Mgbe o mesiri, o nwetara asambodo dokinta na Mahadum nke Legos din a Naịjịrịa
Nafọ 1977; n’out aka ahu ọ banyere n’otu ihe gbasara ndi mba ọzọ na mahadum Legos
Joy Onaolapo (24 Disemba 1982 na Sapele, Naijiria na July 2013) bụ onye mmeri Naijiria nke na-ebu ibu na Paralympic(2012)
E gosipụtara na Onaolapo nwụrụ na ones July 2013 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ
Onye bụbu onye isi ala Naijiria Goodluck Ebele Jonathan kọwara 'ọnwụ nke onye nrite ọla edo nke Naijiria Paralympic, Mrs
Joy Onaolapo dị ka nnukwu Ọnwụ mfu nye mbaa
' Onye nkuzi aha ya but Ijeoma Iheriobim, Kọwaaputara Onaolapo nwụrụ anwụ dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu na-arụsi ọrụ ike'
Joy Osomiamhe-Onumajuru (amụrụ na 19 Febụwarị 1991), bụ nwa afọ Naijiria bụbu onye mmeri na asọmpi ịma mma na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye malitere African Scholars Care Initiative na Diamond Scholars Royal Academy

Onumajuru malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Nursery na Primary School di na Festac Town, Lagos Steeti site na 1992 ruo 1995 na 5th Avenue Primary School di na obodo Festac, Lagos Steeti site na 1995 ruo 2000, ọ gara Rolex Comprehensive College, Iba Town, Ojo LGA, Lagos Steeti site na 2000 ruo 2003 na Barek Memorial High School, Iba Town
Site na 2008 ruo 2012, ọ gara Mahadum Imo State wee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na sayensị kọmputa
Site na 2014 ruo 2016, ọ gara Mahadum Greenwich ebe ọ nwetara MSC na teknụzụ ozi azụmahịa
Onumajuru malitere ọrụ ya na 2011 mgba o meriri dika Nwanyi Eze nke Aso Naijiria
N'afọ 2014, ọ kwagara UK ebe ọ meriri asọmpi ọzọ, Miss Commonwealth Africa
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa wee soro Shakatawa na Africa Independent Television rụọ ọrụ na Personalities Places & Event All
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, ọ malitere African Scholars Care Initiative (ASCI) na-enye nkwado agụmakwụkwọ na ihe enyemaka maka ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù gafee mpaghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị isii na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2020, ASCI debere otu narị ụmụ agbọghọ Naijiria na ọzụzụ ICT
N'afọ 2014, Onumajuru nwetara ihe nrite Nigeria Goodwill Ambassador Award na African Leading Women Award n'afọ 2019
Joy Petersen Packer (12 Febrụwarị 1905 - 7 Septemba 1977 bụ onye South Africa odee akwụkwọ akụkọ ndụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ ịhụnanya
A mụrụ Packer bịa zụọ ya n'akwụkwọ na Cape Town, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mbụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ nwere onwe, na 1931 ghọrọ onye nta akụkọ maka Daily Express London
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ nọrọ oge na redio na Hong Kong yana ide akwụkwọ maka akwụkwọ Britain na Balkans
Ihe jikọrọ njem ya na alụmdi na nwunye ya na onye isi ọchịchị Britain, Sir Herbert Packer
Mgbe akpọrọ di ya na ndepụta nkwanye ugwu 1950, Oriakụ Joy Packer bịara mara ozugbo dị ka 'Lady Packer', aha nkwanye ugwu
Ihe odide mbụ ya bụ mpịakọta atọ nke ihe ncheta nke e bipụtara site na 1945 ruo 1953 na-ekwu banyere njem ya na gburugburu ụwa n'oge gara aga, n'oge, na mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị na di ya
Ebe ndị a gara gụnyere Britain, Mediterenian, ndị Balkan, na China
Na mbido 1950s, ọ gara njem nlegharị anya dị ukwuu na Africa, nke etinyere n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ ikpeazụ o bipụtara
N'afọ ndị 1950, ọ malitekwara ibipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ, malite na Valley of the Vines na 1955, nke rere ihe karịrị 600,000 na Bekee, ma sụgharịa ya na opekata mpe asụsụ Europe itoolu
Ọ bụ ezie na isi isiokwu akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ ịhụnanya, ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na-ekwu na ha dịkwa mkpa maka nkọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ha nke South Africa n'oge ahụ
Emere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Nor the Moon by Night ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri Britain nwere otu aha
Na America, a tọhapụrụ ya dị ka egbe Elephant

Joy Udo-Gabriel (amụrụ na 2 June afo 1999) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba ọsọ

O ritere ọla nchara na igba ósó otu nari mita na arò 2018 African Championships, ọla nchara na igbo ósó 4 × 100 mita na egwuregwu Commonwealth nke 2018 yana ọla edo na 4 x 100 mita na 2019 African Games
Joyce Ababio (amụrụ na 1988) bụ onye mmebe ejiji nke Ghana
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Joyce Ababio College of Fashion Design
Joyce Ababio gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Achimota
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ nwetara nnabata na mahadum St
Cloud State University na Minnesota, USA
Agbanyeghị nke a, ka otu afọ gachara na mmụta teknụzụ ahụike o mere, ya na ndị ndụmọdụ ya kwurịtara okwu wee bufee ya na Mahadum Texas Woman’s University ebe ọ nwetara nzere ya na Nhazi Ejiji
N'afọ 2013, ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ aha ya bụ Joyce Ababio College of Creative Design (JACCD) na Accra, Ghana
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị ọ rụzuru gụnyere
Joyce Angela Jellison (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye edemede America bi na mba England ọhụrụ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Urban College of Boston na Bay Path College na Longmeadow, Massachusetts
O nwere nzere JD
na Massachusetts School of Law na Andover, Massachusetts
A mụrụ Joyce Angela Jellison na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, onye nke ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ
Ọ gara Mahadum Pennsylvania State maka obere oge tupu ọ pụọ ma sonye na Nchekwa ndị agha edọsara edọsa nke ọbọdọ United States
Mgbe ọ lọtara n'ụlọ site na ọzụzụ bụ isi, ọ gara Ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Philadelphia
Na mgbakasị ahụ odida na arụmọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya ma were ndụmọdụ nke onye nkụzi iji lekwasị anya na edemede, Jellison kwagara New England
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo, The Lynn Sunday Post
'Echere m na m bụ onye nta akụkọ kachasị njọ,' ka ọ na-ekwu maka oge a
'O doro anya na agụụ na-agụ m ma were akụkọ ọ bụla bịara n'ụzọ m
Anọgidere m ọtụtụ ebe ma n'ihi ya, m sụrụ ngọngọ na ụfọdụ akụkọ dị egwu
Amaghị m ihe ọ bụla banyere ọrụ nta akụkọ
Enwetara m ọrụ ahụ site na edemede m dere n'ụlọ na isiokwu sitere na ọrụ akụkọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'afọ 1999, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Urban College of Boston, kọleji afọ abụọ
Ọ kwagara Lenoir, North Carolina, ebe Lenoir News-Topic goro ya ọrụ dị ka onye edemede azụmahịa

N'afọ ahụ, o ritere ihe nrite nke afọ 1999 ihe nrite ndị Ndị otu nta akụkọ maka ụlọ ọrụ nta akụkọ nke North Carolina maka akụkọ ya banyere ndụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na Associated Press Citation maka ọrụ ya n'oge ikpe mpụ nke Robert Frederick Glass, nwoke a mara ikpe maka igbu Sharon Lopatka, nwanyị Maryland
'Ọ bụ ihe mbụ m na-ahụ maka akụkọ kwa ụbọchị,' ka Jellison na-ekwu
'Amụtara m ka m na-ede ma jisiri ike lekwasị anya na akụkọ ndị masịrị m
Amụtara m na enwere m mmasị ikpughe ikpe na-ezighị ezi ọha na eze na nke a bụ ihe m mere ma ọ bụ gbalịa ime
N'otu oge ahụ, ana m alụ ọgụ na ezi echiche nwa nwoke ole nke dị na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi America
Abụ m naanị onye ojii na naanị nwanyị n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a ma ọ bụ ihe ịma aka mgbe niile
Mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu afọ na News-Topic, e goro Jellison dị ka onye nta akụkọ mpụ maka Hickory Daily Record

N'afọ 2000, e nyere ya Media General Award for Journalism Excellence maka akụkọ ya banyere ọrịa AIDS n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, Associated Press weghaara isiokwu ahụ, ma gosipụta mkpa ọ dị maka nlekọta ahụike siri ike na agụmakwụkwọ HIV na Usoro ụlọ mkpọrọ nke North Carolina

Jellison dekwara otu isiokwu maka magazin Poz, 'Hair Come the Condoms', nke kọwara mgbalị nke ndị na-ahụ maka ntutu isi na Durham, North Carolina, iji kụziere ndị ahịa ha mkpa ọ dị iji condom gbochie mgbasa nke ọrịa ndị a na-ebute site na mmekọahụ
Na mgbakwunye na akụkọ ya na-elekwasị anya na nje HIV na AIDS, Jellison dere isiokwu na North Carolina's Death Row
N'ịbụ onye mkpa ọ dị ịkọ akụkọ buru ibu kpaliri, ọ nabatara ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ gọọmentị obodo maka Charlotte Leader, na Charlotte, North Carolina
N'afọ 2002, ọ ga-akwaga Elizabeth City, North Carolina, iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka Daily Advance
'Echere m na arụla m ọrụ ọ bụla o kwere mee na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi,' Jellison kwuru
'Otu ihe na-adịghị amasị m bụ edezi
Ọ dị ka ịbụ onye tọrọ atọ n'ime ụlọ
M ga-agụ akụkọ ma mara na m nwere ike ide ha nke ọma ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala jụọ ajụjụ ndị a na-ajụghị
Jellison laghachiri Boston n'afọ 2005

Kemgbe ọ lọtara, ọ gbanwere site na ọrụ nta akụkọ gaa n'ịme abụ ya dị ka onye na-ese okwu na ebe dị iche iche na mpaghara mba England Ọhụrụ dị ka Lizard Lounge na Cantab Lounge na Cambridge, Massachusetts
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na The Daily News Tribune, The Boston Globe na The MetroWest Daily News
O kwuru na ọ naghị agụ ọrụ nta akụkọ ma nwee nnwere onwe nke ịbụ onye edemede onwe ya
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ na Hapalifecom, magazin n'ịntanetị na-enyocha agbụrụ na njirimara
Jellison anọwokwa n'ihu ọha banyere ọgụ ya na ọrịa bipolar
'Ọ bụghị ihe m nwere ike izochi,' ka o kwuru
'Ana m ekwu na e nwere oge mgbe o doro anya na m na-edozi eziokwu dị n'isi m na ebe ahụ m dị
Ọ bụrụ na mmadụ ajụọ, ọ dịghị mgbe m ghaara ụgha - mana ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-atụ egwu ịjụ ma ọ bụ na ọ dịghị mkpa
Ọ bụrụhaala na m mepụtara akụkọ ndị ahụ, ọ dịghị mkpa nye ọtụtụ ndị editọ
Ọ bụ onye edemede akwụkwọ bụ Where Everything Fits Beautifully, wepụtara na Eprel 11, 2007, Black Apple, nchịkọta uri, obere akụkọ, na edemede wepụtara na August 2008, na Tongue (2010)
E jiriwo ọrụ ya tụnyere nke Lucille Clifton na Nikki Giovanni
Joyce Anima Misa Amoah bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ejije na onye nduzi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kwaw Ansah's ‘Love Brewed In African Pot’ na ‘Heritage Africa, Adams Apples na onye so na nduzi 'Wogbɛ Jɛkɛ” stage play
O gosiputara dị ka Nana na The Burial of Kojo
Ọ bụ General Manager nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na nka, Sapphire Ghana
Joyce Bagala bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa akụkọ na Next Media, telivishọn NBS
Na ntuli aka nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri abụọ na otu , na-agba ọsọ na tiketi National Unity Platform, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Mityana District 2021-2026
Bagala bụ onye Muganda site n'agbụrụ
Ọ si n'ezinụlọ onye nwụrụ anwụ Petero Ntwatwa, onye jere ozi dị ka ọkà okwu Buganda Lukiiko na 1960s, na nna nna nne Rev William Ssewanyana Katula, onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ diocesan Mityana
Nne na nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere ma nwanne nne ya, Josephine Esther Nansikombi zụlitere ya
Ọ gara Mityana Junior School, Gombe SS na UMCAT School of Journalism and Mass Communication
O mechara gaa Mahadum Makerere iji nweta akara ugo mmụta na nkwurịta okwu ọha
Bagala sonyeere NBS TV na 2016 ma bụrụkwa onye isi nke Amasengejje, mgbasa ozi akụkọ Luganda nke elekere asaa nke ehihie
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Radio One Uganda
Bagala rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agụ akụkọ na Bekee na Beat FM, Buddu FM na Sanyu FM
Ọ malitere ịde akụkọ Luganda na Sanyu FM
N'afọ 2019, Bagala bụ otu n'ime ndị njikwa akụkọ kwụsịtụrụ ọrụ na ntụziaka nke Uganda Communications Commission maka inye onye isi ala Hopefiul, na Kyadondo East MP Robert Kyagulanyi aka Bobi Wine
Kọmitii Mmekọrịta nke Uganda kwụsịtụrụ ndị ọrụ niile nọ n'ụlọ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi
O yiri egwu ịgba ụlọ ọrụ ahụ akwụkwọ maka ịchụpụ ya n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, egwu nke na-enwetụbeghị
ZụlitereN'afọ 2019, a kọrọ na ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ afọ iri na otu ya na Radio One Uganda iji mepụta oge iji laghachi na ntuli aka 2021 na-abịanụ na nwanyị nọ ugbu a na Mityana District, Judith Nabakooba
Otú ọ dị, Bagala nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ ya na telivishọn NBS
N'afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na isi o kwuru na ọ ga-ala ezumike nká na mgbasa ozi iji sonye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Otú ọ dị, ọ sonyeere na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016 ma merie Judith Nabakooba, onye bụ onye NRM na-azọ ọkwa Mityana Woman MP
Afọ atọ tupu mgbe ahụ, ya na nwa nwanne ya nwanyị Namuleme Esther Ntwatwa sonyeere ntuli aka ahụ, Nabakooba meriri ha abụọ

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, ụlọ ikpe dị elu dị na Mubende wepụrụ nhọpụta Joyce Bagala dị ka nwanyị Mityana so na ndị omeiwu ma kpọọ maka ntuli aka ọhụrụ, na-agbaso arịrịọ nke Minista ala Judith Nabakooba
Minista nke ala, ụlọ na atụmatụ obodo Judith Nabakooba gbara Bagala akwụkwọ, onye kwuru na ọ bụ ndị na-eme ntụli aka na ndị na-atụ vootu na-emebi vootu
Joyce Hilda Banda (née Ntila ; amụrụ 12 Eprel 1950 ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Malawi bụ onye isi ala Malawi site na 7 Eprel 2012 ruo 31 Mee 2014
Banda weghaara ọkwa dịka onye isi ala na-esochi ọnwụ mberede nke Onye isi ala Bingu wa Mutharika
Ọ bụ onye hiwere ma bụrụ onye ndu nke People's Party, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke e kere n'afọ 2011
Onye nkuzi na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ọ bụ onye minista nke mba ofesi site na 2006 ruo 2009 na osote onye isi ala Malawi site na Mee 2009 ruo Eprel 2012
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche dị ka onye otu nzuko omeiwu na onye minista na-ahụ maka ọdịmma nwoke na nwanyị na ọdịmma ụmụaka tupu ọ ghọọ onye isi ala nke mba Malawi

Tupu ya arụọ ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụ onye hiwere Joyce Banda Foundation, ọ bụkwa onye tọrọ ntọala National Association of Business Women (NABW), Young Women Leaders Network nakwa Hunger Project
Banda bụ onye isi ala nke anọ nke Malawi na onye isi ala nwanyị mbụ ya na nwanyị nke abụọ bụrụ onye isi mgbe Elizabeth II gasịrị
Ọ bụ nwanyị nke abụọ ghọrọ onye isi ala na kọntinent Africa, ka Ellen Johnson Sirleaf nke Liberia gasịrị
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi ala nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ
Na June 2014, Forbes kpọrọ President Banda dị ka nwanyị nke iri anọ kachasị ike n'ụwa na nwanyị kachasị ike na Africa
A mụrụ Joyce Hilda Ntila na 12 Eprel 1950 na Malemia, obodo dị na mpaghara Zomba nke Nyasaland (ugbu a Malawi)
Nna ya bụ onye uwe ojii na-gu egwu brass
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ ma ghọọ onye a ma ama n'oge ọchịchị aka ike nke Hastings Banda (ha enweghị njikọ)

O nwere asambodo nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Cambridge, nzere bachelọ nke Arts na nkuzi nwata sitere na Mahadum Columbus (ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ dị anya nke a na-akwadoghị), na nzere bachelọ nke Social Studies na Gender Studies sitere na Mahadum Atlantic International (nke a bụkwa ụlọakwụkwọ mmụta dị anya) na Diploma na Management nke NGO sitere na International Labour Organisation (ILO) Center na Turin, Italy
Ugbu a, ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ maka Master of Arts Degree in Leadership na Royal Roads University na Canada
Ọ nwetara nzere doctorate na 2013 site na Mahadum Jeonju
Ọ lụrụ Roy Kachale, bụ́ onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise, ọ biri na Nairobi, Kenya
Na 1975, otu òtù ụmụ nwanyị na-eto eto na Kenya kpaliri Banda ịkpọrọ ụmụ ya atọ hapụ ihe ọ kọwara dị ka alụmdi na nwunye mkparị
Alụmdi na nwunye ya na Roy Kachele biri na 1981
Ọ lụrụ Richard Banda, onye ọka ikpe Malawi lara ezumike nká, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ
N'agbata 1985 na 1997 Banda jisiri ma guzobe azụmaahịa na otu dị iche iche gụnyere Ndekani Garments (1985), Akajuwe Enterprises (1992), na Kaligidza Bakery (1995)
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya kpaliri ya inyere ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ aka inweta nnwere onwe n'ego ma mebie usoro mmegbu na ịda ogbenye
Ọ bụ nwanne Anjimile Oponyo, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Raising Malawi Academy for Girls, nke Madonna kwadoro
Joyce Banda banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1999
Ọ meriri oche ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka onye kwuo uche ya nke atọ nke Malawi dịka onye so na pati President Bakili Muluzi a kpọrọ United Democratic Front
Ọ nọchitere anya mpaghara Zomba Malosa
Muluzi họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka okike na ọrụ obodo
Dị ka onye jị ọkwa Minista, ọ lụrụ ọgụ iji wepụta Iwu Ime Ihe Ike n'Ụlọ, nke dara afọ asaa
Ọ haziri National Platform for Action on Orphans and vulnerable children na Zero Tolerance Campaign Against Child Abuse
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya ọzọ dịka onye otu Muluzi's Party
Bingu wa Mutharika ghọrọ Onye isi ala
N'agbanyeghị na Banda abụghị onye otu ya, Mutharika họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye minista na-ahụ maka mba ofesi na 2006
Banda kwagara ịgbanwe nnabata Malawi maka ọchịchị ziri ezi nke China site na Republic of China (na Taiwan) gaa na Republic of China na ala; o kwuru na ngbanwe ahụ ga-ewetara Malawi uru akụ na ụba
Na 2010, China rụchara ụlọ omeiwu ọhụrụ na Lilongwe
Banda zọrọ ọkwa nke onye osote onye isi dika onye otu nke Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 2009, na-eso Mutharika, onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi DPP
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka osote onye isi ala nwanyị mbụ Malawi

N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya nke DPP, a chụrụ Joyce Banda na osote onye isi oche nke abụọ Khumbo Kachali n'ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke DPP na 12 Disemba 2010 maka mmemme 'megidere Patị ahụ' nke na-enweghị nkọwa
N'ịgbalị ịchụpụ ya, Onye isi ala gara n'ihu na-enye Callista Mutharika ọrụ ndị ọ na-arụbu, bụ onye a gụnyere n'ụlọ ọrụ na September 2011
Ụlọ ikpe gbochiri mbọ Mutharika ịchụ ya dị ka osote onye isi ala n'ihi usoro iwu
Nke a gụnyere ịgbalị ijide ụgbọ ala gọọmentị ya na igbochi ya idebanye aha pati ọhụrụ ya
Na 8 Septemba 2011, a hapụrụ ọrụ osote onye isi ala na ngbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ
N'agbanyeghị nke a, ọ ka bụ osote onye isi ala nke iwu kwadoro n'ihi na ọ bụ iwu nyere ọkwa ahụ
Onye na-ekwuchitere DPP bụ Hetherwick Ntaba gbara ya ume ka ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm dịka osote onye isi ala
Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Banda na Onye isi ala Bingu wa Mutharika abụrụla nke na-esiwanye ike n'ihi mgbalị Mutharika gbalịsiri ike idowe nwanne ya nwoke, Peter Mutharika, dị ka onye ga-anọchi ya

N'agbanyeghị na a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke DPP yana osote onye isi ala nke abụọ Khumbo Kachali, ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi ala Malawi dị ka e depụtara n'akwụkwọ iwu
Nkwagharị a mere ka arụkwaghịm nke ukwuu dị na DPP, ebe e nwere nguzobe nke netwọk ndị kwadoro nkwado ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala Malawi na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke 2014
Ndị DPP gọrọ agọ na e nwere arụkwaghịm ọtụtụ mmadụ ma kwusie ike na ọ bụ naanị mmadụ ole na ole gbara arụkwaghịm

Joyce Banda bụ onye hiwere na onye ndu nke People's Party, nke e guzobere na 2011 mgbe a chụpụrụ Banda na DPP na-achị achị mgbe ọ jụrụ ịkwado nwanne nwanne President Mutharika Peter Mutharika dịka onye ga-anọchi anya onyeisi oche maka ntuli aka 2014
Na 5 Eprel 2012, Onye isi ala Mutharika nwụrụ
Mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, gọọmentị emeghị ka ọha mara na onye isi ala anwụọla n'oge
Nke a butere egwu nke nsogbu iwu na Malawi
Agence France-Presse kọrọ akụkọ na onye bụbu onye isi ala Malawi bu Bakili Muluzi na-ekwusi ike na 'usoro iwu kwadoro', na-ekwu na osote onye isi ala ga-ewere ikike ozugbo dịka iwu si kwado
“A na m akpọ oku ka e nwee usoro iwu kwadoro, maka udo na ịdị n'otu na-aga n'ihu
Iwu Malawi doro anya na osote onye isi ala na-eweghara ọchịchị' mgbe onye isi oche na-enweghị ike ịchịisi ọzọ
Anyị aghaghị izere ọnọdụ ebe enwere ọgba aghara
Ka anyi soro ihe iwu kwadoro
Anyị enweghị nhọrọ ọzọ ma ọ bụghị ịgbaso ihe dị n'iwu
Ọ dị ezigbo mkpa na udo na ịdị jụụ ga-adịrịrị” Ndị ọrụ nchekwa Malawi chọkwara ka usoro iwu na-achị
Malawi Law Society kwadoro na n'okpuru ngalaba 83(4) nke akwụkwọ iwu Malawi, ọ bụ ya bụ onye ga-anọchi anya onyeisi ala ahụ
Na 7 Eprel, ndị otu Malawi chọrọ ka ụlọ ikpe gbochie Banda ịbụ onye isi ala
N'aka nke ya, ọ kpọrọ onyeisi ndị agha, bụ́ General Henry Odillo, na ekwentị ma jụọ ma ọ̀ ga-akwado ya
O kwetara wee mee ka ndị agha guzoro n’ụlọ ya
Joyce Banda weghaara ọchịchị na 7 Eprel 2012 dị ka Onye isi ala Malawi, nwanyị mbụ na-ejide ọkwa ahụ
Onye ọka ikpe Lovemore Munlo nọrọ dika onye isi oche nke emume a mere na ụlọ omebe iwu dị na Lilongwe
Mgbe ọ ṅụsịrị iyi, Banda rịọrọ maka ịdị n'otu mba
'Achọrọ m ka anyị niile jiri olileanya na mmụọ nke ịdị n'otu wee gaa n'ọdịnihu
Enwere m olileanya na anyị ga-eguzo n'otu n'otu, enwere m olileanya na dị ka mba na-atụ egwu Chineke, anyị na-ekwe ka Chineke bịa n'ihu anyị, n'ihi na ọ bụrụ na anyị emeghị otú ahụ, anyị dara ada'
Ndị mgbasa ozi Malawi na mba ụwa kọrọ banyere nraranye Joyce Banda nke ọma
Ha kpọrọ ya mmeri maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Malawi Sunday Times kwuru na nraranye onye isi ala ọhụrụ enyela aka n'ịkwado omenala onye kwuo uche ya na mba ahụ
Na 26 Eprel 2012, Onye isi ala Banda họpụtara ụlọ ọrụ ya, nke mejupụtara ndị ozi iri abụọ na atọ na ndị osote onye ozi itoolu
O nyere onwe ya ọtụtụ nnukwu ọrụ iji wee jigidesie ike ya dịka onye ndu obodo
Na 10 Ọktoba 2013, ụbọchị ole na ole ka o si na njem ọ gara na UN lọta, Onye isi ala Joyce Banda chụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ya na-esochi akụkọkasịrị ne Capital Hill Cashgate
Na 15 Ọktọba, ahọpụtara ọkwa ọhụrụ ydịoiche iche ebe nye minista na-ahụ maka ego Ken Lipenga na Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi Ralph Kasambara ka ewepụrụ na'ọkwa minista ha
Na May 2014, e meriri Joyce Banda nke ukwuu na ntuli aka nke onye isi ala
Ọ dara na mbọ ọ na-eme imebi ntuli aka ahụ
Ọ gaghị ememe ndọnye n'oche nke onye meriri, Peter Mutharika, mana ọ kelere ya
Ọ biri na mpụga Malawi malite na 2014
Ekwuputara akwụkwọ ikike maka ijide ya n'ihe metụtara nrụrụ aka n'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka onye isi ala na 31 Julaị 2017, n'agbanyeghị na ọ nọgidere na mpụga obodo ahụ
Ọ gọrọ agọ maka ebubo ahụ ma kwuo na ya ga-alọghachi izara ọnụ ya
N'oge ọchịchị Mutharika, Malawi batara n'ọnọdụ akụ na ụba dara ogbenye n'ihi ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mba ọzọ n'okpuru ọchịchị Mutharika
N'ime afọ ikpeazụ nke ọchịchị Mutharika, Britain, United States, Germany, Norway, European Union, World Bank, na African Development Bank kwụsịrị enyemaka ego
Ha ekwupụtala nchegbu gbasara mbuso agha Mutharika busoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'ime mba ahụ yana atumatu ya na-esiwanye ike
Na March 2012, Mutharika gwara ndị mba ọzọ na-enye onyinye ka ha 'gaa hell' O boro ha ebubo na ha na-akpa nkata iwetu ọchịchị ya
Otu n'ime ihe ịma aka Banda dị ka onye isi ala bụ iweghachi mmekọrịta mba ụwa na ndị na-enye onyinye
O nwekwara ihe ịma aka nke iweghachi mmekọrịta Malawi na mba ndị gbara ha gburugburu dị ka Mozambique, na mpaghara mba ndị ọzọ dịka Botswana
N'ime izu mbụ nke onye isi ala ya, Banda malitere mbuso agha ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji mezie mmekọrịta mba ụwa nke Malawi
Ọ gwara Henry Bellingham nke Ọfịs Ofesi nke United Kingdom okwu
O mesiri ya obi ike na a ga-eziga onye nnọchi anya Britain ọhụrụ 'n'ime obere oge enwere ike' Ọ gwara odeakwụkwọ mba Amerịka bụ Hillary Clinton okwu
Clinton kwere nkwa ịmaliteghachi mkparịta ụka na onyinye nke nde dọla narị atọ na iri ise ozugbo enwere ike
Banda kwuputara atụmatụ ya ịgwa Baroness Ashton nke ụlọ ọrụ mba ofesi nke European Union na onye nnọchi anya IMF nke Malawi, Ruby Randall
Ya na onye isi ala Zambia Michael Sata enyekwara aka maka ịmaliteghachi mmekọrịta chiri anya

Opekempe n'otu akụkụ iji mee ka ndị na-enye onyinye nwee obi ụtọ, nchịkwa Banda jụkwara na June 2012 ịnabata nzukọ ndị Africa Union nke July n'ihi na AU siri ọnwụ na a ga-enye onye isi ala Sudan Omar al-Bashir mmesi obi ike na Malawi ga-ajụ inye ya akwụkwọ ikike ijide nke ụlọ ikpe mpụ mba ụwa dere megide ya; ndị Cabinet kpebiri na ha agaghị anabata ọnọdụ ndị dị otú ahụ
Onye isi ala Banda bu onye Forbes kpọrọ dịka nwanyị nke iri anọ kachasị ike n'ụwa, aha Africa kachasị elu na ndepụta ahụ
Na 18 Mee 2012, Banda kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịkagbu mmachibido iwu Malawi nke nwoke idina nwoke
Ekwuru na okwu a nwere nkwado nke ọtụtụ ndị omeiwu
Ọ bụrụ na ọ gaa nke ọma, ọ ga-eme Malawi mba Africa nke abụọ kwadoro mmekọ nwoke na nwoke nakwa mmekọ nwanyị na nwanyị n'iwu kemgbe 1994
Amnesty International kọrọ na mbido Nọvemba 2012 na Malawi akwụsịla iwu ndị na-emegide nwoke idina nwoke na-echere ntuli aka
Na ndụmọdụ nke International Monetary Fund, na May 2012 Banda wedara Malawi kwacha, ihe Mutharika jụrụ ime
Mgbe ọ ghọrọ Onye isi ala, Banda kpebiri ire ụgbọ elu onye isi ala ma nye onyinye nke pasent iri atọ nke ụgwọ ọnwa ya iji wee mee ka kansul Malawi maka Ndị Nkwarụ rite uru ahụ
Otú ọ dị, ego e nwetara n'ahịa ụgbọ elu ahụ bu nke edetughi
Nkọwa nke Joyce Banda nyere bụ na e resịrị ụgbọ elu ahụ nye ụlọ ọrụ ngwá agha dị na South Africa bụ ndị Gọọmenti Malawi ji ụgwọ dị ukwuu na ya mere eji ụgbọ elu ahụ kwụọ ụgwọ a
Ọnweghị akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ihe akaebe ewepụtara iji kwado nzọrọ ahụ

Na 17 Jenụwarị 2013, ọtụtụ puku ndị Malawi mere mkpesa na Blantyre megide ịrị elu nke ihe a na-ere n'ahia mgbe Banda na onye isi IMF Christine Lagarde, gbachitere ọnụ ahịa kwacha ma kwuo na ọ gaghị atụgharị mkpebi ahụ
Onye isi ala Banda egosila nkwụsi ike na ahụike nne na ikike ịmụ nwa, ọkachasị site na nkwado ya maka ịbụ nne nwere nchekwa na Malawi
O gosiputara nkwado ya site na iguzobe atụmatụ Presidential Initiative on Health Maternal and Safe Motherhood

N'ime naanị afọ abụọ, atụmatụ a gosipụtara mbelata nke ọnụọgụ ọnwụ nke nne site na ọnwụ narị isii na ịrị asaa na ise n'ime otu narị puku dị ndụ ruo ọnwụ narị anọ na ịrị isii n'ime otu narị puku ọmụmụ dị ndụ
Mgbe gọọmentị Mutharika gbanwere ọkọlọtọ na 2010, enwere mmegide ọha
Ọtụtụ otu na-agbagha izi ezi nke ọkọlọtọ ahụ
Na 28 Mee 2012, Banda duuru ndị omeiwu nke mba ahụ ịtụ vootu ka eweghachi ọkọlọtọ ahụ n'ọkọlọtọ nnwere onwe ya, nke ewepụtara na 1964
Ndị otu niile, ma ewezuga DPP, kwadoro ịlaghachi na ọkọlọtọ nnwere onwe
Banda nọrọ na mmapu nke onwe ya na mba United Steeti dị ka onye ama ama na Woodrow Wilson Center na Center for Global Development ruo afọ atọ, tupu ịlaghachi na Malawi na 2018
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ nweghị ebubo e boro Banda n'ihu ọha

Banda banyere nhoputa ndi ochichi nke 2019 dika onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi ndi mmadu, ma wepu onwe ya n'ịzọ ọkwa ahụ onwa abuo tupu ntuli aka; o mechara kwado onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi mmegide Lazarus Chakwera
Ka a kagburu ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 2019, ọ kwadoro Chakwera ọzọ na mmeghari nke afọ 2020
Akpọrọ nwa Banda Roy Kahele-Banda ka ọ bụrụ onye minista nke ụlọ ọrụ na ọchịchị Chakwera
Tupu ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ala, ọ bụ onye hiwere ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke Joyce Banda Foundation
maka agụmakwụkwọ ka mma, ntọala ọrụ ebere na-enyere ụmụaka Malawi na ụmụ mgbei aka site na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ nchịkọta nke ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke sekọndrị na mpaghara Chimwankhunda nke Blantyre
Ọ gụnyere ebe nlekọta ụmụ mgbei nke nwere ebe isii na ụmụaka narị isii
Ọ na-enyere obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu aka site n'inye ụmụ nwanyị iri anọ na otu ndị ntorobịa iri obere kredit
O nyere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ ugbo pụkụ iri mkpụrụ maka ọkụkọ ugbo ma nyekwa onyinye ndị ọzọ
Ntọala ahụ arụọla ụlọọgwụ anọ n'ime obodo anọ n'ime obodo narị abụọ ndi ọ na-enyere aka
Ntọala ahụ na-enyekwa aka na mmepe ime obodo
O nwere mmekorita ya na Jack Brewer Foundation, ntọala mmepe zuru ụwa ọnụ nke NFL star, Jack Brewer hiwere
Banda bụ onye guzobere National Association of Business Women na Malawi nke e hiwere n'afọ 1990
Ọ bụ ntọala anaghị akwụ ụgwọ edebanyere aha ya na Malawi
Otu a bu n'obi ibupụ ụmụ nwanyị n'ime ịda ogbenye site n'ịkwalite ikike ha na inye ha ike n'ụzọ akụ na ụba
Nke a bụ njikọ mmekọrịta nke ụmụ nwanyị pụkụ ịrị atọ, nke raara onwe ya nye ịkwado azụmahịa ụmụ nwanyị na ịkwado ụmụ nwanyị chọrọ isonye na azụmahịa
Ihe omume ya gụnyere ọzụzụ azụmaahịa, ọzụzụ teknụzụ, idekọ ndekọ na nka njikwa
Ha na-arụ ọrụ n'ịmepụta mkparịta ụka na ndị na-eme iwu iji mee ka atumatu dị mma nye ndị inyom na-azụ ahịa
Onye isi ya ugbu a bụ Mary Malunga
Ntọala ahụ enweela mmekorita ya na ụlọọrụ di na mba Netherlands a kpọrọ Humanist Institute for Development Cooperation ( Hivos ) na Hague kemgbe 2003
Banda etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ntọala ya na ụmụ nwanyị kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise iji weta mgbanwe amụma, ọkachasị na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Joyce Banda Foundation for Better Education
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Network Young Women Leaders Network, National Association of Business Women nakwa amụma Hunger Project na Malawi

Enyere ya (ya na Onye isi ala Joaquim Chissano nke Mozambique) ihe nrite n'afọ 1997 nke Africa Prize for Leadership for the Sustainable End of Hunger n'ihi Hunger Project, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị di na New York
O ji ego nrite nyere aka wuo ntọala Joyce Banda maka ụmụaka
N'afọ 2006, ọ natara ihe nrite mba ụwa maka ahụike na ugwu ụmụ nwanyị maka nraranye ya n'ikike ụmụ nwanyị Malawi sitere n'aka ndị Americans for United Nations Population Fund
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye kọmishọna maka 'Ịmekọrịta Ụwa e Kewara' n'akụkụ ndị mmadụ dị ka Bishop Desmond Tutu, nakwa onye komishona nke United Nations Commissioner Human Rights, Mary Robinson
Banda bụkwa onye so na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na Washington DC, yana na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ maka Federation of World Peace and Love in Taiwan (China)
Dịka akụkụ nke mmegharị gọọmentị na Ọktoba 2012, Banda belatara pasent iri atọ n'ụgwọ ọnwa ya
O kwuputakwara na a ga-ere ụgbọ elu onyeisiala

Na 2010, Banda ghọrọ onye otu Global Leaders Council for Reproductive Health, otu ndị nọ ọdụ iri na isii na ndị bụbu ndị isi ala, ndị na-eme iwu dị elu na ndị isi ndị ọzọ kwadoro ịkwalite ahụike ọmụmụ maka mmepe na ọganihu na-adịgide adịgide

Onye isi oche nke otu a bụ onye bụbụ onye isi ala nke Ireland Mary Robinson, ndị isi a na-achọ ịchịkọta ọchịchọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ego dị mkpa iji nweta ohere zuru ụwa ọnụ maka ahụike ọmụmụ site na 2015 - isi ihe mgbaru ọsọ UN Millennium Development Goals

Joyce Bawah Mogtari bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana nke jere ozi dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka njem na Ghana
Ọ bụ onye enyemaka pụrụ iche ugbu a nye onye bụbu onye isi ala Ghana bụ John Dramani Mahama na onye na-eburu ọkọlọtọ maka National Democratic Congress (NDC) maka ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 2020
Ọ bụ onye ogbugbo nwere ahụmahụ ma mee nke a ọtụtụ oge ma na mpaghara ma na mba ụwa
Mogtari gara Wesley Girls' Senior High School maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara Holborn College, Mahadum nke London ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Laws (LLB) nzere na afọ 1997

O nwekwara nzere masta na Maritime Law (LLM) site na International Maritime Organization (IMO) International Maritime Law Institute, (IMLI) Malta, ebe ọ natara onyinye onye isi oche nke IMO Legal Committee maka Best Overall Performance in International Transport Law
O nwekwara nzere masta na Conflict Resolution and Mediation site na Kofi Annan International Peacekeeping Training Centre- Ghana
A kpọrọ Mogtari ka ọ bịa n'ụlọ ikpe n'afọ 2000 wee malite ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ iwu Sey & Co
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ maka KPMG na Venture Capital Trust Fund
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Onye isi nke Ngalaba Iwu na odeakwụkwọ onye ọka iwu nke Ghana Shippersão Authority ma bụrụkwa onye isi nke Ghana Sshippersão Authority site na afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2013
Mogtari bụ onye otu National Democratic Congress
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị otu mkpọsa na kọmitii n'ime otu ahụ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ gụnyere ije ozi dị ka onye otu ndị otu iwu 30 nke otu ahụ
Ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru onye isi ala John Dramani Mahama na afọ 2016 General Elections
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, Mahama họpụtara ya dị ka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na ọnụ na-ekwuru ya
Na Machị na afọ 2013, John Dramani Mahama họpụtara Mogtari ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka njem
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ahụ ruo Jenụwarị na afọ 2017
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuru maka mkpọsa John Dramani Mahama afọ 2016 Election
Mogtari bụ onye otu Ghana Bar Association na onye otu African Women Lawyers Association
Ọ bụkwa onye otu USA - International Visitor leadership Programme
Mogtari lụrụ di ma nwee nwa nwoke
Joyce bụ nwanne nwanyị nke onye bụbu Minista na-ahụ maka Mmekọahụ, Ụmụaka na Nchebe Ọha, Otiko Afisa Djaba

Joyce Chepchumba (amụrụ na 6 Nọvemba 1970 na Kericho) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu ogologo oge si Kenya
Joyce Grant (23 Jenụwarị 1924 na 11 Julaị 2006) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na UK nke South Africa nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na-atọ ọchị
A mụrụ Grant na Bloemfontein, South Africa ma nna ya gbara ya ume ịkwaga London iji mụọ ime ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọrụ ya gụnyere 'Lola' na William Inge's Come Back Little Sheba na dịka 'Laura Wingfield' na Tennessee Williams' The Glass Menagerie
Na ngwụcha afọ 1950 ọ laghachiri na London kpamkpam wee pụta na The Happy Apple, Something Áfoot, The Club, Deathtrap na Tonight at Eight-thirty
Na telivishọn ọ nọ na Gideon's Way 'Olee otu esi ezumike nká n'enweghị ezigbo ọrụ'

N'afọ 1980 ọ pụtara na ihe omume mbụ nke Hi-de-Hi! na-eme nne Jeffrey FairbrotherN'afọ 1987, Joyce ghọrọ onye otu The National Theatre Company, na-apụta na mmepụta atọ, Ting Tang Mine, Fathers and Sons na Six Characters in Search of an Author
N'afọ 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Aunt Em/Glinda na Royal Shakespeare Company's The Wizard of Oz na Mother Superior na Black Adder S1E3-The Archbishop
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa, ọ ghọrọ 'enyi' ndị ọrịa HIV+ na Lighthouse na London ma gosipụta ya na foto Lewis Morley abụọ na National Portrait Gallery
Joyce Grant nwụrụ na 11 Julaị 2006, site na ọrịa kansa, mgbe ọ dị afọ 82
Joyce Johnson bụ onye America na-ede akụkọ ifo na akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo

A mụrụ ya Joyce Glassman na 1935 n'ezinụlọ ndị Juu dị na New York City ma zụlite ya na mpaghara Morningside Heights nke Manhattan, nke dị kilomita ole na ole site n'ụlọ Joan Vollmer Adams ebe William Burroughs, Allen Ginsberg na Jack Kerouac biri site na 1944 ruo 1946
Ọ bụ nwa na-eme ihe nkiri ma pụta na mmepụta Broadway nke I Remember Mama, nke o dere banyere ya na 2004 Missing Men
Ụzọ e si zụlite Johnson bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe ma dị iche na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ọzọ dị afọ ya na 1940s na 1950s
Ọ tolitere n'ọtụtụ ndụ ya na-ahụ ụmụ nwanyị nọ na ndụ ya na ọtụtụ ọgụ na ndụ na-anwa ịchọta nzube
Otu ihe atụ ga-abụ nne ya onye dị afọ iri na itoolu na-aga n'ihu site n'otu ebe gaa n'ebe ọzọ na mbọ ezinụlọ ya na-agba iji nyere ya aka inweta atụmanya alụmdi na nwunye ka mma

Dị ka o kwuru na County College of Morris's Legacy Project Forum on Women of the Beat Generation na-ekpughe ọtụtụ ọnọdụ dị iche iche na-etolite, ọ kwenyere na nke ahụ bụ ihe mere o ji mụta ịghara ịdabere na onye ọ bụla
Dị nnọọ ka nne ya, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị na kọleji ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ọ malitere ịnọ na Washington Square Park, ihe jikọtara ọdịbendị bohemian na ọdịbendị egwu ọdịnala nke oge ahụ
Ọ gara Barnard College mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Ọ chọpụtara na ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ na-aga Barnard College bụ ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'etiti nke ezinụlọ ha zitere ebe ahụ ịchọta ezigbo di

Otú ọ dị, ụmụ nwanyị ndị ahụ nupụụrụ isi megide nke ahụ bụ naanị ihe mere ha ji gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ma kpebie iji ohere ahụ gbapụ na atụmanya ọha na eze ma wuo njirimara nke ha dị ka ụmụ nwanyị nwere onwe ha
Nke a mere ka Johnson kwado ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu kama ịbụ naanị nwunye
Johnson kpughere n'akwụkwọ ya, Door Wide Open na mgbe a mụrụ ya, nne ya chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ onye egwu
Otu n'ime nrọ nne ya, mgbe ọ dị obere, bụ ịbụ onye na-agụ egwú ma ọ gbara Johnson ume ịgbaso ụzọ egwu
Ka ọ na-etolite n'afọ iri na ụma ya, nne ya kwadebere maka ọganihu Johnson site n'ịdebanye aha ya n'ọtụtụ ọzụzụ dị oke ọnụ nke ide egwu egwu, a zụrụ ya ide ma dee egwu na edemede nke ya
Nne ya n'oge ahụ bụ onye njikwa ya ma gwa ya na ọ gaghị alụ di n'oge na ọ nwere ike ichere ruo mgbe ọ 'kwusiri ike' n'ọrụ ya
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ nọ na Barnard College, mmekọahụ ghọrọ ihe iyi egwu nye ikike nne ya n'ebe ọ nọ
Nne ya bi n'ofe okporo ámá ebe Johnson bi iji lekwasị ya anya
Ọ bụ ezie na Johnson nọgidere na-ede egwu maka nne ya, o dekwara akụkọ ndị ọ na-agaghị anwa iweta n'ụlọ ma ọ bụ hapụ nne ya ka ọ gụọ
E bipụtara otu akụkọ na magazin Barnard Literary banyere mmekọrịta Johnson na ezinụlọ ya

Johnson chetara ibi ndụ abụọ ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, n'oge ahụ, ya na onye nkuzi Barnard aha ya bụ Donald Cook nọ na mmekọrịta, onye ji afọ iri tọọ ya ma bụrụkwa onye klas Lucien Carr na Allen Ginsberg na Columbia
Site na mmekọrịta ya na Cook, a kọwaara ya Carl Solomon, Burroughs na Ginsberg
Ginsberg na Johnson zutere n'ụlọ Cook mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, site ebe a ka ya na Ginsberg malitere ọbụbụenyi
N'afọ 1955, Johnson kwenyesiri ike na mmekọrịta ya na Cook ga-eduga ha n'alụmdi na nwunye ozugbo ọ hapụrụ ụlọ nne na nna ya
Otú ọ dị, o mechara biri n'ọnụ ụlọ odibo n'otu ụlọ dị nso na Columbia ma rụọ ọrụ odeakwụkwọ ebe a na-akwụ ya dollar iri ise n'izu iji bie ndụ n'onwe ya ọ bụ ezie na o zuo ezughị
Mmekọrịta ya na Cook emeghị ka ọ dị mma ka ọ na-ewepụ onwe ya n'ebe ọ nọ ma mesịa hapụ ya ka ya na nwa akwụkwọ Barnard ọzọ nọrọ
Na Barnard College, ọ ghọrọ enyi na Elise Cowen (onye Allen Ginsberg hụrụ n'anya n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi) onye mere ka ọ mata ndị Beat

Ginsberg mere ndokwa ka Glassman na Kerouac zute na ụbọchị ìsì mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, Come and Join the Dance, nke e rere na Random House mgbe ọ dị afọ 21 ma bipụta ya afọ ise ka e mesịrị na 1962 dịka ọ na-amalite ọrụ ya dị ka onye nchịkọta akwụkwọ
Mmekọrịta ya na Jack Kerouac bụ oge dị mkpa na ndụ ya
'M ga-ekwu na otu n'ime ndị ikom a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke gbara m ume n'ihe odide m bụ Jack Kerouac'

Otu n'ime ihe mere o ji bụrụ oge dị ịrịba ama maka Johnson bụ site na nkwupụta ya dị n'elu ebe ọ kwetara na ọ bụ mmekọrịta ya na Kerouac mere ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọrụ edemede ya n'ihi na ọ kwadoro ya ka ọ banye n'akwụkwọ
N'oge mmekọrịta ya na Kerouac, ọ ghọtara na ụmụ nwoke na-ahụ ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ihe maka ederede ha, na dị ka ihe mmekọahụ, ọ bụghị dị ka ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu
Johnson kwenyere na nghọta a nke ụmụ nwanyị Beat kwadebere ụzọ maka nnwere onwe ụmụ nwanyị n'oge ahụ, na-akpali mkpali maka ha ịbụ ihe karịrị naanị obere ihe odide
Mgbe ya na Jack Kerouac gbasara, ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ihe James Johnson, onye nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ọgba tum tum
Site n'alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ ya na onye na-ese ihe Peter Pinchbeck, nke gwụrụ na ịgba alụkwaghịm, nwa ya nwoke, Daniel Pinchbeck، bụkwa onye edemede
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ Johnson gosipụtara okwu banyere ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na ọha mmadụ na njedebe nke ahụmịhe ha n'ihi okike ha dị ka nwanyị
A na-ele nwanyị ahụ anya dị ka onye na-ekwesịghị ekwesị, ndị nnupụisi na ndị mmehie na-enweghị ike ịchịkwa
Ya mere, mbipụta ndị a kpaliri Johnson imepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya Come and Join the Dance na 1962
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ tupu òtù Beatnik aghọọ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'omenala ma bụrụ nke a ghọtara dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ Beat mbụ nke nwanyị dere
Ewezuga Come and Join the Dance, o bipụtakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ dị ka Bad Connections na 1978 na In the Night Cafe na 1987
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a nwere isiokwu yiri nke ahụ ebe ha gosipụtara ndụ ụmụ nwanyị na 1950 na 60s
N'ọnwa mbụ nke afọ 1957, Johnson zutere Jack Kerouac na ụbọchị ìsì nke Allen Ginsberg haziri
Kerouac gbara Johnson ume ide akwụkwọ mbụ ya na 1962
Otú ọ dị, ịhụnanya ha were naanị afọ abụọ ma mee ka o dee akwụkwọ ncheta akpọrọ Minor Characters nke e bipụtara na 1983
Akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ na-atụgharị uche na ndụ ya n'etiti 1957 na 1958, ọkachasị maka mmekọrịta ya na Kerouac
O mekwara ka Kerouac pụta ìhè bụ onye si n'ọchịchịrị gaa n'ọkwa mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya On the Road na 1957
Ọzọkwa, ọ tụgharịrị uche na ya ịlaghachi azụ na ndụ ndị nọ n'etiti ebe ndị mụrụ ya chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ede egwu
Otú ọ dị, ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye na-ede uri na onye na-agụ egwú; ya mere, ọ malitere ịgbapụ ma gbalaga na Washington Square Park iji chụsoo nrọ ya
Akwụkwọ ncheta a emeela ka a mara ihe dị n'ime ya, ndụ onwe onye, ahụmịhe ọrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị jikọtara ya na ndị edemede Beat Generation
N'afọ 1990, kpọmkwem afọ iri abụọ na asatọ mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, o bipụtara ọrụ mgbasa ozi nyocha nke akpọrọ What Lisa Knew The Truths and Lies of the Steinberg Case
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-elekwasị anya na ikike uche, mmekọahụ na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ na William Morrow, The Dial Press, McGraw-Hill na The Atlantic Monthly Press
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ibipụta akwụkwọ, o dere maka akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere Vanity Fair, The New Yorker, The New York Times Magazine, New York, Harper's Bazaar, Mirabella, na Harper's
Site na 1983 ruo 1997, ọ kụziri edemede na Bread Loaf Writers' Conference, Mahadum Vermont, Mahadim New York na nke mbụ na mmemme MFA nke Mahadum Columbia

From the period her memoir entitled minor characters won the national book critics circle award in 1983then in 1987 her penultimate chapter from her novel in the night cafe which is the children wing won the first prize ohenry award or grant from the national endowment for the arts (NEA) in 1992
N'afọ 2000, o bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta Door Wide Open A Beat Love Affair in Letters
Ọ bụ nchịkọta nke akwụkwọ ozi nke ịhụnanya ha nke ya na Kerouac dere site na 1957 ruo 1958
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ọzọ, Missing Men, n'afọ 2004

Mgbe afọ anọ nke ibipụta ọrụ ya gasịrị, ya na onye na-ebipụta ya bụ Viking/Penguin bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta maka akụkọ ndụ Jack Kerouac nke akpọrọ The Voice is All The Lonely Victory of Jack Kerou ac na 2008
O were ya afọ anọ iji bipụta akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ, nke ọ kọwara na ọ na-egbu oge n'ihi nsogbu ndị na-enweta ebe nchekwa Kerouac nke Berg Collection nwetara
Ọzọkwa, iwu Kerouac Estate gbochiri ịnweta akwụkwọ ya naanị ndị na-ede akụkọ ndụ
N'ozuzu, ihe ncheta nke Joyce Johnson gụnyere nghọta banyere ahụmịhe onwe ya, ncheta, na njirimara

O dere akụkọ ihe mere eme anọ nke bụ Minor Characters, Door Wide Open A Beat Love Affair in Letters, Missing Men A Memoir na The Voice is All The Lonely Victory of Jack Kerouac nke e bipụtara na 1983, 2000, 2004 na 2012 n'otu n'otu
Enwere ike ịhụ na ahụmịhe ndụ ya dị ka onye edemede nwanyị na mmekọrịta ya na Jack Kerouac edeela na akụkọ ihe mere eme ndị a
Banyere ụdị edemede, Joyce Johnson nwere ụzọ nke ya iji gosipụta echiche ya n'ide akwụkwọ
Enwere ike ịhụ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma n'ihi na ọ chọrọ inye ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ahụmịhe ịgụ ihe kachasị mma
Nchegbu bụ isi Joyce Johnson na usoro ide ihe bụ nhazi kama ịbụ isiokwu dị n'akwụkwọ ya
Nke a pụtara na ọ chọrọ atụmatụ kwesịrị ekwesị iji hazie echiche n'ọrụ ya
Ya mere, ụdị edemede ya dị iche na ndị edemede Beat ndị ọzọ a na-ejikọkarị na echiche nke ederede na-enweghị isi
E wezụga nke ahụ, Joyce Johnson jiri ụdị nkọwa na akụkọ dee banyere akụkọ ndụ ya nke gụnyere ndị edemede, ntọala na esemokwu
Enwere ike iwere ụdị edemede ndị a dị ka ụzọ kachasị dị irè maka ya ịkọwa ihe omume na nkọwa dabere na ahụmịhe onwe ya
Ọ ga-ahọrọ ihe omume ụfọdụ ka etinye ya n'ọrụ edemede ya
Enwere ike ịhụ nke a na ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Nancy Grace
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, enwere m ike itinye ihe niile mere m n'ime afọ ndị m na-ede banyere ha, mana enwere ọtụtụ ihe m hapụrụ n'ihi na achọrọ m ilekwasị anya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, eziokwu ahụ bụ na mgbe m bụ nwata, m nọ n'ụlọ ihe nkiri
Ọfọn, nke ahụ bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị, mana ọ gaara ewepụ m n'ihe m na-ede banyere ya n'ezie, yabụ etinyeghị m ihe ahụ na
Dabere na ajụjụ ọnụ a, enwere ike ikwu na ide akwụkwọ ncheta abụghị ọrụ dị mfe n'ihi na onye edemede ga-echeta ihe omume ụfọdụ iji zere ihe ọ bụla e chepụtara echepụta
Ọ na-egosi na Joyce Johnson chọrọ ka ndị na-agụ ya hụ ndụ ya ma ghọta ozi ahụ site na ederede ya
Ya mere, ụdị ngosipụta a na-enyere aka ịhazi nghọta ha banyere ndụ ya dị ka onye edemede nwanyị na Beat Movement na narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ewezuga akụkọ ndụ na akụkọ ndụ onwe onye, Joyce Johnson dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo
Ihe odide mbụ ya na 1962, Come and Join the Dance bụ akụkọ ifo e dere otu afọ tupu ya ezute Kerouac
N'agbanyeghị na ọ na-agbagha echiche ụmụ nwanyị orthodox nke oge ahụ, Johnson na-ekwusi ike na o dere dabere na ọnọdụ ndị inyom ọ maara na-ebi ndụ, n'ụzọ dị anya na-agbaso atụmanya nwoke na nwanyị ha
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Nancy Grace na Mee 1999, Johnson kwetara na Andre Gide's The Counterfeiters abụwo nnukwu mmetụta maka ya ide ụdị akụkọ ahụ
O chere na ọ na-echegbu onwe ya mgbe niile banyere ide ya na mbido
Oh, edere m akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ n'enweghị ihe mgbochi nke ukwuu, o siri m kwere na m na-ede otu n'ezie
Egwu tụrụ m nke ukwuu
Ọzọkwa, ụjọ na-atụ m
Amaara m nke ọma na m na-ede banyere ihe ndị ezigbo nwa agbọghọ na-ekwesịghị ide banyere ha
Ọ bụrụ na ị dee banyere ihe ndị ahụ, ndị mmadụ ga-eche na ị nwere ha n'onwe gị - na ndị mụrụ m ga-agụ ya ma wụọ ya akpata oyi n'ahụ
Ndị mmadụ dị iche iche gụrụ ya ma wụọ ha akpata oyi n'ahụ
Ọ tụrụ ndị na-enyocha ya n'anya!
Afọ iri na isii ka e mesịrị, Johnson mepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo nke abụọ ya na 1978, Bad Connections ma gaa n'ihu dee aha akụkọ ifo ọzọ, In the Night Cafe (1987)
Akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ ahụ na-ejide ọdịbendị Bohemian na 1960s na ihe ndị ọzọ na-eme ka mmetụta nke ụmụ nwanyị na-eche ọgụ ihu dị ka ụmụ nwanyị Beat
Dị ka Johnson si kwuo n'otu ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ, o weere In the Night Cafe dị ka akwụkwọ ya kachasị mma ma kwuo otú ịgụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Henry James si emetụta ya ide akụkọ ifo
Jack Kerouac na Joyce Johnsons bụ ndị na-eme mkpapụ
Ha na-ederịta akwụkwọ ozi ịhụnanya
Ndị a bụ naanị eziokwu banyere mmekọrịta ha

Na-ebi n'etiti 1950s 'Beat Movement, ọrụ ya dị ezigbo mkpa n'igosi ndụ ụmụ nwanyị n'oge ebe ọtụtụ oge, olu ụmụ nwanyị na-adabere na akụkọ ndị edemede nwoke Beat dere dị ka Ginsberg, Burroughs, na Kerouac
Ya mere, Johnson kpebiri inye ndị na-agụ ya nghọta banyere njirimara ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ime òtù ahụ n'agbanyeghị na a na-ewepụkarị ya
Johnson na-ahụ onwe ya dị ka onye na-ekiri ihe ọ na-eme dị ka ụzọ isi nye onwe ya ike ebe ọ nwere ike ịkọwa ya ma n'otu oge ahụ ọ naghị ejikọta ya na ya
O kwuru n'otu n'ime akụkọ ndụ ya
Ọrụ onye na-ekiri ihe nwere uru ya
Ị nwere ike ikere òkè dị ukwuu n'ìgwè ahụ dịka ị chọrọ, mana mgbe ị na-adọta gị nke ọma, ị nwere ike ịsị mgbe niile 'Ọ dị mma, abụ m naanị onye na-ekiri,' wee laghachi n'udo ọzọ
Joyce nwere nchegbu banyere mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị n'oge ahụ ma nwee obi ụtọ na ọrụ ya nwetara nkwado dị ka nwanyị na-ede Beat Generation
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara Johnson maka ịmepụta njikọ akwụkwọ siri ike, a ga-ekweta ọrụ ya maka inwe mmetụta dị ukwuu
Ọrụ edemede ya niile na-arụ ọrụ n'iwepụ ịgbachi nkịtị nke a na-ekwukarị na ọ bụ nwanyị n'akwụkwọ ndị na-esote agha

N'ịbụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole jisiri ike chọta ụzọ ya ruo n'elu Beat Movement, Johnson na-eji ohere a dị ka onye na-akọrọ ahụmahụ ya na-ebi ndụ dị ka nwanyị nke na-apụ n'ịga n'ụzọ omenala n'ọrụ edemede ya
Aga m eme ka ọ bụrụ azụmahịa m ide banyere ụmụ agbọghọ dị nnọọ iche na ndị e gosipụtara na peeji nke New Yorker
Aga m ede banyere ọnụ ụlọ ndị nwere ụlọ na mmekọahụ
Atọ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Come and Join the Dance, Bad Connections, na In the Night Café gosipụtara isiokwu yiri nke ahụ bụ okwu ọdịbendị na okike
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a gosipụtara n'ụzọ gara nke ọma njem nke ụmụ nwanyị ọcha nọ n'etiti karịsịa na 1950s na 1960s
Okwu gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na-emetụta nke ukwuu n'akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ ya niile ọkachasị na Bad Connections, nke e bipụtara na 1978

Ọ bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị iburu n'uche na ọ bụ ezie na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ anọghị na mbipụta ruo ọtụtụ afọ ma ghara inwe nyocha zuru oke site n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta, ihe gbara akụkọ ahụ gburugburu na akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-enye nkọwa bara uru na zeitgeist nke 1950s na 1960s yana echiche nke otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị gbara gburugburu Beat Movement

Dị ka edepụtara ihe odide Johnson n'ihe gbasara omenala America, ebe omenala nwere ụkpụrụ na ụkpụrụ omume dị iche na nke ọha mmadụ, ha na-agbaso usoro ebe nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na-eche ọtụtụ ihe isi ike ihu iji nweta nnwere onwe nke ịtọhapụ onwe ya na ndụ nke a na-eme maka ụmụ nwanyị

Nke ahụ bụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ gosipụtara iwu, omenala, na nkwenye nke ọgbọ Beat maka ụmụ nwanyị, mana ọ katọrọ ha site n'ịgbanwe ọnọdụ nke nwoke na nwanyị, ọbụlagodi mgbe ọ na-echekwa usoro abụọ, nke usoro okike
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nwekwara ihe yiri nke ahụ ebe ha gosipụtara nwanyị bohemian dị ka onye isi na-achọ ihe a na-ezube ịbụ n'efu ọbụna mgbe ha nwetasịrị otu
Ha mekwara ka ọnọdụ esemokwu nke ụmụ nwanyị na-eche ihu n'oge ahụ na-ebi n'ime mmetụta siri ike nke Beat Generation pụta ìhè
E wezụga nke ahụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ mbụ ya nwere njikọ siri ike na afọ nke ahụmahụ Johnson mgbe mbụ ya na Beats zutere
Akwụkwọ akụkọ atọ a mejupụtara trilogy na-agụnye ndụ Johnson na hipster na hippie New York ma na-akatọ Beat yana countercultures na okwu iri isii

Site n'ịtụle nke ahụ, ngosipụta ya nke ụmụ nwanyị n'ihe odide ya na-emeghe ụzọ ọhụrụ nke ile anya n'otú nwanyị, nke jupụtara n'echiche nke òtù a, si anọchite anya onye isi nwanyị n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'akụkụ nke ọha mmadụ America na-emepe ngwa ngwa
Ọ bụkwa ihe na-adọrọ mmasị iburu n'uche na echiche Johnson banyere ndụ nwere obi abụọ na Kerouac na Beats metụtara àgwà ha n'ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọ
Site na nke a, ọ na-egosi otu Johnson si kpebie ịhapụ nwanyị ma mechaa kewapụ onwe ya na ejiji na ngosipụta na-adịghị omimi nke ụmụ nwanyị site n'aka ndị edemede Beat

Despite having most of non fiction works that narrate the experiences as one of the scarce women within the beat generation and her relationship with kerouac her fictions seems to be more of protofeminist reaction to the patriarchal belief and sexist construction of wòmen Her protagonists not only acted as reconfiguration of the dominant beat discourse they also arbitrated in the reactionary beat culture of female inferiority and marginality
In other words her writings could be viewed as counter responses of women towards the dominance of male writers within the beat movement
She successfully showcased the misperception and conflicts surrounding the white middle class female protagonist in a rigid patriarchal society
Ihe niile malitere site na ụbọchị ìsì nke onye na-ede uri nke Howl, Allen Ginsberg, onye bụkwa onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Beat, guzobere

Ị ga-achọ ịbịa na Howard Johnson na Eighth Street? Aga m anọ ọdụ na tebụl
Joyce Johnson onye dị afọ iri abụọ na otu zutere Jack Kerouac, onye ji afọ iri na atọ tọọ ya
N'ihi ya, mmekọrịta were ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ abụọ malitere
Mmekọrịta ha malitere n'ihi mmasị ha nwere maka ide ihe ma ọ dịteghị aka ka Johnson kwuru na Kerouac bụ nsogbu mgbe ọ bịara na mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge ahụ, Johnson ka na-alụ ọgụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya nke bụ Come and Join the Dance
Ọzọkwa, Kerouac bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ebe ọ na-agbanwe onye mmekọ ya mgbe niile ma nwee àgwà ọjọọ nke ịṅụ mmanya
Otu n'ime isi ihe mere mmekọrịta ha ji kwụsị bụ nne ya, Gabrielle L'Evesque Kerouac
Ọ na-enyo ndị enyi ya niile enyo ma kewapụ ya kpamkpam na mmekọrịta ọ bụla n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ka ọ nọgide na-ekwesị ntụkwasị obi nye ya n'enweghị asọmpi ọ bụla site n'aka ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ
Kerouac na nne ya na-emetụta ibe ha nke ukwuu n'ihi na enweghị ihe nzuzo n'etiti ha gbasara ndụ onwe ha
Ka o sina dị, Johnson weghaara oge a nke mmekọrịta ya n'akwụkwọ ncheta ya Minor Characters na 1983 nke na-akwalite ọrụ ya dị ka onye edemede
N'otu n'ime ajụjụ ọnụ ya, Johnson kwuru na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ chere na ya na-ede ihe ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo
Otú ọ dị, Minor Characters na-eme ka ọ nwee afọ ojuju ide ihe na-abịa kpọmkwem na ndụ nke dị nnọọ iche na ide akụkọ ifo
O doro anya na ndụ n'ezie nwere ọtụtụ ihe ijuanya na enweghị ike ịkọwapụta ya
Site n'ide akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ, Johnson chọrọ ịchọpụta ma ghọta ihe omume ndị na-eme n'ụbọchị ndị gara aga

N'ụzọ dị mwute, mkpebi ya itinye ndụ mmekọrịta ya na Kerouac n'oge gara aga na Minor Characters na-eweta nsogbu ụfọdụ mgbe ndị mmadụ malitere ịsị na ọ na-eme ka Kerouac bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ọdịmma nke ya
Ọrụ Johnson dị ka onye bụbu enyi nwanyị nke onye edemede a ma ama kpuchiri ọrụ nke ya ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye edemede nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'onwe ya

In a way it has been a cruise because people cannot see me as writer apart from my relationship to that material it has been immensely frustrating what has been frustrating to me is that the people who know my work seem to be remember it only in the context of my wrtting jack
Minor Characters bụ ngwakọta nke ọtụtụ isiokwu dị iche iche dị ka Beats Generation na ụmụ nwanyị ndị na-atụ anya ịgbanahụ ajọ mbunobi ọha na eze
Ọ bụ ezie na Kerouac bụ onye isi na akụkọ ahụ dịka na onyinye ya nye ọgbọ America na-eto eto, akwụkwọ ncheta ahụ bụ n'ezie maka mwute nke onye a na-akpọ obere onye chọrọ ịghọ onye isi
N'ezie, ọ bụ ihe ncheta nke onwe ya nke malitere na akụkọ ya na-etolite na Upper West Side
Johnson kwuru na na mberede chere na ọ chọrọ ide banyere ndị na-adịbeghị ndụ
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọrụ ya ka ghọrọ akụkụ nke mmegharị ahụ yana ndị edemede nwanyị ndị ọzọ
A na-elekarị ọrụ Joyce Johnson na akụkọ ihe mere eme Beat anya dị ka nke enyi nwanyị Jack Kerouac
Iji mee ka ọ ka njọ, n'akwụkwọ ya kachasị ọhụrụ, The Voice is All The Lonely Victory of Jack Kerouac, a tụrụ anya na ọ ga-ede ihe ọzọ na-elekwasị anya na mmekọrịta afọ abụọ ya na Kerouac
Ka o sina dị, ọ họọrọ n'ezie ịmepụta akụkọ ndụ afọ iri ise nke ya site n'akụkụ dị iche ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị ọzọ na-ede akụkọ ndụ
Site na oge dị mkpirikpi nke mmekọrịta chiri anya ha, Johnson jiri ihe ọmụma ya niile banyere Kerouac kpụzie echiche ya mgbe ọ na-ede The Voice Is All
Ọ maara banyere isiokwu ya nke ọma ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị edemede ndị ọzọ n'ihi na ọ na-anọkarị na Kerouac n'oge ọ na-eto eto na ndụ ya
Aha Johnson dị ka onye edemede na-abụkarị ihe omimi gbara Kerouac gburugburu kpuchiri
Onye na-ede akụkọ ndụ Kerouac bụ Ellis Amburn na-ekwu na Johnson na Helen Weaver, onye edemede ọzọ na onye bụbu enyi nwanyị Kerouac, lụrụ ọgụ n'akwụkwọ ya bụ Subterranean Kerouac
Johnson na Weaver na-ekwu na nke a emeghị, ma gaa n'ihu na ọbụbụenyi ha dị ka ndị okenye

Joyce Kalu (amụrụ 1970) bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri Nollywood, onye na -emeputa ihe nkiri na onye isi na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke Nigeria
A mụrụ Joyce Kalu na Septemba 25, 1970 na Ohafia, Abia State, South Eastern Nigeria

Joyce Leswana Kgoali (13 Jenụwarị na afọ 1950, 21 Nọvemba na afọ 2004) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke National Council of Provinces site na Mee, na afọ 2004 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba na afọ 2004

Joyce Mhango-Chavula bụ onye mba Malawi na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme fim, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na onye na-enye ọzụzụ nka
Joyce Mhango-Chavula malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, site na Association for Teaching English na Malawi
O mechara sonye n'òtù ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Reformation Theayre ma soro ụlọ ihe nkiri Alabama rụọ ọrụ

N'ịbụ onye ihe nlereanya nke Gertrude Kamkwatira kpaliri, Chavula hapụrụ ọrụ ya dịka onye na-ahụ maka ahịa mgbasa ozi na ahịa n'afọ 2009, wee malite ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke ya, Rising Choreos Theatre Company
The Return (2011) kpọkọtara ndị Naijiria na ndị Malawi, gụnyere Patience Ozokwor, wee gaa mpaghara atọ niile nke Malawi
Ọ kọrọ akụkọ banyere nwa agbọghọ dị afọ 20 nke chọrọ ilekọta nna ya mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị n'ọrịa AIDS
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ụmụnne ya ndị nwoke kwuru na ọ bụ ihe onwunwe ya, na-ahapụ nwa agbọghọ ahụ n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla

Joyce Moriku nke a na-akpọkwa Joyce Kaducu (amụrụ na 21 Eprel 1969), bụ onye Uganda na-ahụ maka ụmụaka, agụmakwụkwọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ Minista steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na kọmitii ọhụrụ malite na 2021
N'oge gara aga, ọ nọ na Minista nke Steeti maka Nlekọta Ahụike Primary na Cabinet Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016, na-anọchi Sarah Achieng Opendi, onye ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka ahụike, General Duties
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara maka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke mpaghara Moyo na 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)
A mụrụ Dr
Moriku na Moyo District, West Nile sub-region, na Northern Region nke Uganda, na 21 Eprel 1969
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Laropi maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Metu Senior Secondary School, na Moyo, maka agụmakwụkwọ O-Level ya, tupu ọ gaa na Sacred Heart Senior Secondary school na Gulu maka ọmụmụ A-Level
N'afọ 1997, a nabatara ya na Mbarara University School of Medicine iji mụọ Human Medicine, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Medicine na Bachelor of Surgery n'afọ puku abụọ na abụọ
N'afọ puku abụọ na ise , ọ natara diplọma postgraduate na Project Planning and Management na Mahadum Gulu
Ọ banyere na Makerere University School of Medicine na Mulago, ebe ọ nwetara Master of Medicine na Pediatrics na 2008
Ka oge na-aga, na 2015, Mahadum Gulu nyere ya PhD na Neuroscience
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Lacor Hospital dị na Gulu, site na 2002 ruo 2003
N'agbata afọ 2003 na afọ 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi ahụike maka The AIDS Support Organisation (TASO), nke dị na Gulu
Site na 2005 ruo 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ụlọ na Mulago National Referral Hospital
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ahụike, maka otu afọ na Mildmay Clinic na Entebbe Road, site na 2008 ruo 2009
Site na 2010 ruo 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na pediatrics na Mahadum Gulu ma n'otu oge ahụ rụọ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara ụmụaka na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Mpaghara Gulu
N'afọ 2016, ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site n'ịgba ọsọ maka mpaghara ụmụ nwanyị nke Moyo District
Ọ meriri ma bụrụ onye nọ n'ọkwa na 10th Parliament (2016 ruo 2021)

Joyce Rovincer Mpanga (née Masembe amụrụ na 22 Jenụwarị na afọ 1934) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu Lukiiko kemgbe na afọ 2009
Mpanga bụ Minista nke Ụmụ nwanyị na Mmepe site na 1988 ruo 1989 na Minista nke Steeti maka Mmụta Primary site na afọ 1989 ruo na afọ 1992
N'èzí kansụl nke Uganda, Mpanga bụ onye omeiwu site na afọ 1996 ruo na afọ 2001 maka Mubende District
A mụrụ Mpanga na 22 Jenụwarị na afọ 1934 na Mityana, Uganda ma gaa Gayaza High School
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Makerere College na afọ 1958, ọ gara Mahadum London maka Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Indiana Bloomington maka Master of Science na afọ 1962
Mpanga malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Makerere College na afọ 1958 na osote onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Gayaza na afọ 1962
N'oge ọ nọ na Makerere, a họpụtara Mpanga na Kansụl Iwu nke Uganda na afọ 1960
Mpagna gara England na mba ọzọ otu afọ mgbe mwakpo Lubiri na afọ 1966 gasịrị wee laghachi Uganda na afọ 1972
Mgbe ọ nọ n' MBA England, ọ bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị
N'afọ 1988, Mpanga ghọrọ Minista mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na mmepe nke Uganda ma Gertrude Byekwaso Lubega nọchiri ya
N'afọ sochirinụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke State maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ma nọrọ n'ọkwa a ruo n'afọ 1991
Ewezuga ije ozi na kansụl nke Uganda, Mpanga bụkwa onye omeiwu maka Mubende District site na afọ 1996 ruo na afọ 2001
N'etiti ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya, o sonyere na idegharị Iwu Iwu nke Uganda na afọ 1995
N'afọ 2009, Mpanga ghọrọ onye otu Lukiiko maka Buwekula ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka ndị omeiwu Buganda kemgbe afọ 2011
Mpanga lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
