Joyce Newton-Thompson (née ; 9 Machị, na afọ 1893, 22 Ọktoba na afọ 1978) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa a mụrụ na Britain, onye nhazi obodo na onye edemede
N'ịbụ onye tolitere na London, England, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị Britain
Mgbe ya na di ya kwagara Cape Town, South Africa na afọ 1919, Newton-Thompson sonyere n'ịhazi atụmatụ obodo dị ka nri n'efu maka ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọgwụ mbụ na-egbochi ọmụmụ n'obodo ahụ
N'afọ 1951, a họpụtara Newton-Thompson ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl obodo, n'afọ 1959 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo Cape Town

Ọ kwadoro atụmatụ ndị na-eme emume ndị Europe na-achị South Africa, kamakwa ọ katọrọ obodo ndị South Africa dị ka Bloemfontein nke na-eme ka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke ụmụaka na iwu oche agbụrụ na ememme ọha na eze
Newton-Thompson dere akwụkwọ abụọ Gwelo Goodman, onye na-ese ihe na South Africa (1951) na The story of a house (1968)
Ọ natara LL nsọpụrụD degree site na Mahadum nke Cape Town na 1971
A mụrụ Joyce Nettelfold na 1893 na London, England
N'afọ 1914, ọ gụsịrị diplọma na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nchịkwa site na London School of Economics, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na ọdịiche

Nettelfold na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị Britain, otu n'ime ọrụ ya gụnyere ichebe onye ndú suffragette Christabel Pankhurst dị ka onye na-eche onwe ya nche 209 Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nọọsụ n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, na-enye nkwado na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ndị Agha Endell Street
N'afọ 1917, Nettelfold lụrụ onye ọka iwu Cyril Newton-Thompson, ha abụọ kwagara Cape Town, South Africa, afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị
Ha nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ
Otu n'ime ha, Oswald, ga-aga n'ihu ịghọ onye omeiwu
N'afọ 1924, Joyce Newton-Thompson duziri ihe okike nke mmemme nri nri n'efu mbụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ, nke gọọmentị kwadoro ruo oge ụfọdụ tupu ebufee ọrụ ahụ na nzukọ ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo
N'afọ 1931, Newton-Thompson sonyeere ụmụ nwanyị isii ndị ọzọ wee guzobe Kọmitii Ọgwụ Nne nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na-egbochi ọmụmụ na Cape Town

Ndị guzobere ya bụ Ursula Scott, Sallie Woodrow, Beatrice Newton, Adele Bell, Birch Reynardson na Isabel Haddon 197-198 Ha guzobere ụlọ ọgwụ na-egbochi ọmụmụ na Observatory, nke na-ejere ọnụ ọgụgụ hà nhata nke ụmụ nwanyị ọcha na ndị isi ojii ozi mana ha nọgidere na-eme ka ụkpụrụ nkewa agbụrụ dị na nnyefe ọrụ ya 202
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, Newton-Thompson bụ onye guzobere South African Women Auxiliary Services
Ụmụ ya nwoke atọ niile jere ozi n'agha ma nata onyinye maka obi ike, nwa mbụ ya nwoke, Hugh Markham, nwụrụ n'agha na Tobruk na afọ 1942
N'afọ 1951, a họpụtara Newton-Thompson ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl obodo

N'afọ sochirinụ, o kwupụtara nkwado ya maka emume Van Riebeeck nke mba na-eme emume akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị bi na Europe na South Africa, na-eme nke ọma na-eme ka kansụl ahụ nye onyinye £ 75,000 maka ọrụ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye isi obodo Cape Town site na afo 1959 ruo n'afọ 1961, nwanyị mbụ nwere ọrụ ahụ

N'afọ 1960, ọ gara emume na Bloemfontein iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri ise nke Union of South Africa, mana ọ katọrọ emume ahụ na-eme ka a mata ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke ụmụaka na enweghị oche maka ndị na-abụghị ndị ọcha
Mgbe ọ gachara dịka onye isi obodo, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl obodo ruo n'afọ 1968
Newton-Thompson dere ọtụtụ isiokwu kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ ma dee akwụkwọ abụọ Gwelo Goodman, onye na-ese ihe na South Africa (1951) na The story of a house (1968)
Ọ natara LL nsọpụrụD degree site na Mahadum nke Cape Town na afọ 1971
Joyce Nonde-Simukoko bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia
Onye isi ala Edgar Chagwa Lungu họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụ na nchekwa ọha na eze na Cabinet nke Zambia na 15 Septemba, na afọ 2016
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Federation of Free Trade Unions of Zambia (FFTUZ)
Ozugbo tupu nhọpụta ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche maka Labour na Social Security na Patriotic Front (Zambia)
N'ọnwa Septemba na afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ na nchekwa ọha na eze na Cabinet nke Zambia ma họpụta ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Zambia
Ọ ṅụrụ iyi n'ọkwa n'ụbọchị iri na ise nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2015

Ọ bịara n'okpuru nrụgide ịhapụ ọrụ na Disemba, na afọ 2016 mgbe ọ kpọrọ oku ka e jide onye na-eme mkpọtụ Mika Mw Valley onye malitere mkpesa banyere mmeso ọjọọ a na-ebo ndị ọrụ na Horseshoe, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-adịghị mma na Lusaka
Otú ọ dị, Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ wepụtara akụkọ nke kwuru na mkpesa nke mmeso ọjọọ na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ bụ n'ezie ihe e guzobere
Joyce Nomafa Sikakane, mechara Sikakane-Rankin (amụrụ ya na1943), bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye ndọrọndọrọ South Africa
Ndị ọchịchị Apartheid South Africa nwụchiri ya ọnwa iri na asaa maka ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ya
A mụrụ Sikakane na 1943 nye Jonathan Sikakane na Amelia Nxumalo na Bridgeman Memorial Maternity Hospital na Johannesburg, South Africa
O tolitere na Soweto, ada nKeke onye nkuzi na Mahadum Witwatersrand
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Holy Cross ruo mgbe African National Congress (ANC) kpọrọ oku ka ewepụ ya n'ihi iwu Bantu Education Act wee mechie ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Nne na nna ya mechara kewapụ wee malite ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Inanda Seminary
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Orlando ruo nwa oge ka nne ya nwetasịrị ikike mana ọ laghachiri na Seminary Inanda, nke ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1963
Ọ chọghị ịdebanye aha na kọleji ọ bụla na South Africa ọzọ n'ihi iwu Bantu Education Act, kama o kpebiri ịghọ onye nta akụkọ
O mechara nweta nzere bachelọ nke Science Honors na United Kingdom na Mahadum Open
Sikakane malitere ọrụ ya dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ n'afọ 1960 na The World, akwụkwọ akụkọ na-acha ọcha na-elekọta ndị na-ege ntị ojii
Na 1968, ọ hapụrụ ụwa ka ọ bụrụ onye nweere onwe ya maka Rand Daily Mail, ebe ọ ga-abụ nwanyị ojii mbụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ na-akwụ ụgwọ
Na Rand Daily Mail, ọ malitere ilekwasị anya n'ihe odide ya na mmetụta nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nwere na ndị Africa nke South Africa
Na 12 Mee 1969, ndị uwe ojii nwụchiri Sikakane n'okpuru iwu iyi ọha egwu wee kpụga ya na Pretoria Central Prison, ebe a gbara ya ajụjụ gbasara African National Congress (ANC)
E boro ya ebubo n'okpuru Iwu Suppression of Communism wee kpee ya na 1 Disemba 1969, ya na ndị ndọrọndọrọ 21 ndị ọzọ
Ewepụrụ ebubo a na 16 February 1970 mana ejideghachiri Sikakane na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ike obere oge ka nke ahụ gasịrị
Mgbe ihe dị ka ọnwa 17 nke njide gachara, a tọhapụrụ ya na ngwụcha afọ 1970
O mechara hapụ South Africa n'afọ 1973 wee gaa n'ihu na-arụrụ ANC ọrụ mgbe ọ nọ na mba ọzọ
N'otu oge ahụ ka ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Rand Daily Mail, Sikakane hụrụ n'anya wee banye dọkịta Scotland, Ken Rankin (1939-2011), mana dịka nke a
mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị bụ iwu na-akwadoghị na South Africa, ha mere atụmatụ ịlụ di na nwunye na mba ọzọ
N'afọ 1973, Sikakane hapụrụ South Africa gaa Zambia na ngalaba ANC achụpụrụ, na ya na Rankin lụrụ n'afọ 1974, mechaa kwaga Scotland
Sikakane nwere ụmụ ise
N'afọ 1977, Sikakane's autobiography, Window on Soweto, bipụtara na London site na International Defense and Aid Fund
N'afọ 1994, ọ laghachiri South Africa, ebe ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South Africa na-arụ ọrụ ruo afọ 2001

Na úbọchị nke iri na abuo na itoolu Julaị 1997, ọ gbara ama n'ihu Truth and Reconciliation Commission (TRC) banyere ahụmịhe ya n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, gụnyere ọgwụgwọ ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọnga ogologo ọnwa
N'afọ 2008, onye na-edebe akwụkwọ akụkọ Nelson Mandela Foundation chọtara akwụkwọ ozi na-ezigaghị Sikakane
Sikakane so na ndị odee egosipụtara na akụkọ anthology nke Margaret Busby nke 1992 Daughters of Africa
Joyce Wambui Njuguna (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe ike
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke Mgbakwunye kilogram iri isii na otu n'afọ 2014 nke egwuregwu Commonwealth ebe o ritere Ihe nrite ọla nchara

O mekwara asọmpi na egwuregwu Commonwelath n'afọ 2018, ebe ọ bụ onye nke atọ na ụmụ nwanyị ndị n'ebu ihe ike anọ ma enwetaghị ihe nrite n'ihi na e nwere ndị asọmpi anọ, n'afọ 2022 ebe ọ bụ onye nke ise na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị ndị n'ebu ihe ike
Jozia (onye a mụrụ n'afọ 1993) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye nduzi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ na-agụ egwu n'asụsụ Sepedi, Zulu, Xhsosa, Xevenda na Bekee
A mụrụ Jozia n'afọ 1991 na Daveyton, obodo dị nso na Johannesburg
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Cape Town iji kwado ọmụmụ egwu ya nke o mechara malite n'afọ 2015 na COPA na Johannesburg
N'oge a, ọ dekọtala ọtụtụ egwu na ekwentị mkpanaaka ya, nke dabere na ụda olu na ụda egwu

N'afọ 2015, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa Switzerland idekọ egwu ya na morph2 Recording Studio na Zurich ebe ya na onye ọjọọ ụbọ si Ducth bụ Jordi Kemperman na Onye British bu injinia ụda bu Nigel Hilbourne na-arụkọ ọrụ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị EP mbụ ya bu At Last na labelụ egwu German RecordJet, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ole na ole mbụ ya na Switzerland na Netherlands, gụnyere na Openair Literature Festival Zurich
Na Machị 2017, o wepụtara abọm mbụ ya zuru ezu nke akpọrọ Mamokebe, nke ya na Kevin Leicher dekọrọ na Darkstar Studio na Johannesburg ma mepụta ya site na Foundation Society of Arts nke Switzerland
Ntọhapụ ahụ na-esonyere vidiyo egwu anọ, nke e mere n'ebe dị iche iche na US, Mexico, Europe na Africa

Ọ bụ ezie na e jiriwo Jozia tụnyere ụmụ nwanyị na-abụ abụ dị ka Tracy Chapman ma ọ bụ Erykah Badu, ọ na-arụtu aka na ndị na-ese ihe dịka Björk, David Bowie, Thom Yorke, na Amy Winehouse dị ka ndị isi mkpali mmụọ ya na ịchụso akara aka egwu na nka ya

Okwu ya na-egosipụta ọtụtụ akụkọ ihe mere ya na ndụ ya na South Africa yana oge ọ nọrọ na mba ọzọ, na-eme ngosipụta nyocha isiokwu dịka ịhụnanya na ọnwụ, mkpọkọta na nkewa, oge uto na njirimara, marihuana na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya - nke a na-ejikarị okwu, mgbagwoju anya uri na ọchị aghụghọ
Paul Julius Nunda (amụrụ na 12 Septemba 1979), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Jua Cali, bụ onye na-agụ egwu hip hop na Kenya
N'afọ 2000, ya na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Clemo, hiwere Calif Records ebe ọ nọ kemgbe ahụ
Jua Cali na-eme ihe na Swahili na Sheng n'ụdị rap na-ewu ewu na Kenya a na-akpọ genge
A mụrụ Jua Cali na Eastlands, Nairobi
Nne na nna ya, Doreen Onditi na Evans Onditi (nwụrụ anwụ) bụ ndị nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ tolitere na nkuzi Katọlik siri ike na California Estate n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke obodo Nairobi
Ọ malitere ịgba egwu rap mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, nke nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bụ Christopher Sati gbara ume
A maara ya dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-anọpụ iche nke na-anọkarị jụụ, ọ na-esiri ya ike iso ndị mmadụ na-akpakọrịta

Ọ gara Ainsworth Primary School (Standards 1 ruo 6); Shepherds Junior Buruburu (Standers 6 ruo 8); Jamuhuri High School na n'ikpeazụ Kenya Christian Industrial Training Institute (KCITI) Eastleigh ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na teknụzụ ozi
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gbara bọọlụ, o nwere ebumnuche ịbanye na Kenyan National Basketball Team
O nwetụbeghị mgbe ọ batara n'òtù ahụ, na-ata ịdị elu ya uta
Njem mbụ ya n'egwú gụnyere ịbụ abụ n'òtù a na-akpọ 'Sita Futi'
Sita Futi gbasara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ozugbo ọ malitere ịhapụ Jua Cali na ezigbo enyi ya Jemmoh
Ndị otu ahụ hapụrụ iji chụsoo ọrụ na-abụghị egwu

Calif Records malitere mgbe Jua Cali sonyeere enyi ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata Clemo iji guzobe akara ndekọ nke ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ewu ngwa ngwa, na-enweta ihe a ma ama na egwu egwu nke East Africa na ndị na-ese ihe na egwu
Calif Records mepụtara ụdị Genge nke hip hop nke Kenya
Jua Cali na-ekwukarị na nwanne ya nwoke, Chris, na ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị kacha nwee mmetụta na ndụ yaỌ bụkwa onye ikwu dell xerxes dị ka nwanne di ya
Egwú mbụ o dekọrọ bụ Ruka, nke e wepụtara n'afọ 2001, Nipe Asali sochiri ya n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 2004, ya na Pilipili rụkọtara ọrụ na egwu 'Kamata Dame'
Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na Kenya, o were ọtụtụ afọ tupu o wepụta abọm mbụ ya zuru ezu
Abọm ya 'Juacali Sekta' rutere n'ụlọ ahịa n'afọ 2006, nke nwere ọtụtụ n'ime egwu ndị e wepụtara na mbụ
Otu egwu ya bụ Kwaheri (nke gosipụtara Sainapei Tande-winner Coca-Cola pop star na onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio) bụ nnukwu ihe na Kenya na 2007
Na mgbede Afọ Ọhụrụ 2008/2009 ọ wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ, Ngeli ya Genge Ọ gara US na mba ndị ọzọ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2007, ọ so na ndị Kenya otu narị kachasị nwee mmetụta dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ The Standard họọrọ
Aha egwu ya bụ Jua Cali, sitere na California, ala dị na Nairobi (dị ka aha Calif Records)
Ọ dịkwa ka Jua Kali, okwu Swahili nke pụtara anyanwụ dị egwu, nke a na-ewere na ọ na-ezo aka na ngalaba akụ na ụba nke Kenya
O weputara usoro egwu ọhụrụ ya na onye mmepụta ọhụrụ Keggah nke dị na United States
Egwú ọhụrụ ya gụnyere, Karibu Nairobi na Kuna Sheng nke nwetara nnukwu ikuku na nyocha dị mma
E wezụga ịbụ onye nwere nkà, ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ahịa, nke a bụ n'ihi arịrịọ ya nye ndị na-eto eto na ndị na-abụghị ndị na-amalite

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ ghọrọ onye omenkà mbụ nke Kenya iji nweta nkwekọrịta nkwado mgbe n'afọ 2007 ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta Sh1-million kwa afọ nke nnukwu ekwentị mkpanaaka Motorola maka ụdị W yaMa, dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si kwuo, ọ bụ ezigbo onye na-ejide
'Jua Cali bụ akụkụ nke ezinụlọ Motorola, a na-asọpụrụ anyị na ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya', ka Joanne Doyle, onye njikwa ahịa maka East Africa kwuru
'Ọ bụ nnukwu onye nnọchi anya ma, dị ka Motorola, ọ bụ ihe niile gbasara ihe okike, ụdị na ihe dị n'ime ya, yabụ anyị enweghị ike inwe obi ụtọ na a nabatara ọrụ ike ya na onyinye Kisima
Juacali bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma taa n'ọrụ egwu Kenya n'ihe gbasara nkwado na ịkwụ ụgwọ maka ego ọ bụla

Na mbido afọ 2009, Telkom Kenya họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya Orange maka ahịa ndị ntorobịa ha wee malite nkwekọrịta otu afọ nke sh10 nde shilling site n'ịga n'ihu mkpọsa mgbasa ozi 'hello tunes'
N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma nke ndị otu Kenya Rugby Sevens, Orange gara n'ihu na-egosi usoro ozi maka ahia na Rugby na-egosi ndị egwuregwu rugby kachasị elu na Kenya na onye na-ese ihe
Ndị ọzọ gosipụtara na ndị na-akọ akụkọ bụ ndị enyi aha Mejja, Jimwat na onye na-emepụta ha Clemo
Pamoja Mtaani, Swahili maka 'n'otu n'ime okpu' bụ egwuregwu vidio ọhụrụ na Kenya nke Warner Bros mepụtara
Ntụrụndụ Interactive
Ọ bụ n'ụzọ bụ isi banyere otu ndị ntorobịa na-agbakọ aka na-agafe ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka n'obodo East Africa
Ndị na-egwu egwuregwu anaghị eche egwu nke HIV ihu; kama, ha na-ezute ihe ịma aka n'oge njem ahụ nke na-eduga na nkuzi banyere ihe ize ndụ na obi ike
Jua Cali dekọrọ egwu egwuregwu vidio 'City in the Sun'
Onye na-agụ egwu etinyewokwa aka na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ dị ka ncha ịsa ahụ Protex na biya Pilsner, na nkwekọrịta ndị ahụ ejirila nnukwu ego
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya Bloodlink Foundation Kenya

Bloodlink Foundation Kenya bụ ntụkwasị obi ọrụ ebere na-enweghị uru nke e guzobere na Kenya na-achọ inyere ndị Kenya aka inweta ahụike ka mma na ndụ ka mma site na mmekọrịta ya na obodo, ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na ngalaba ọha na eze
Abọm
Ihe mmeri
Ndị a họpụtara
Juan Logan (amụrụ n'August 16, 1946) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe si Nashville, Tennessee
Ihe osise ya, ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, na ihe owuwu ya na-egosipụta ahụmịhe ya banyéré agbụrụ na usoro ike nke ụlọ ọrụ na South ma mee ka ndị na-ekiri ya tụlee ọrụ ọha na eze
A mụrụ Juan Logan na Nashville, Tennessee, n'aka John Louie Logan, onye ụkọchukwu na ónyé guzobere John Calvin Presbyterian Church, na Madge Sarah Jane Grier, Ónyé nkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị
Mgbè nna ya dara ọrịa, ezinụlọ ahụ si Nashville kwaga n'obodo nna ya na Marion, North Carolina na 1949
John Louie Logan nwụrụ n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ
Madge Grier lụrụ di ọzọ na 1950, afọ anọ ka e mesịrị, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara ebe a mụrụ ya, Belmont, North Carolina
Juan na ezinụlọ ya kwagara n'ụlọ ọhụrụ nke nna nna ya James WW
Grier na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nọ n'ezinụlọ wuru
Mmasị Logan nwèrè na nka malitere na 1960 mgbe ọ na-aga Reid High School, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị isi ojii na Belmont n'oge ahụ
Ịzụlite n'ime ọbọdọ ndị ọrụ ugbo ojii dị oke mkpa màkà ikike Logan nwéré ịhụ ma mepụta 'ihe'
Usoro nke ime ihe dị ezigbo mkpa nye nna nna ya, yana nna nna ya James William Washington Grier
Ezinụlọ ahụ ji obi ụtọ chọta ihe ngwọta ọhụrụ màkà ịmepụta ihe kama ịzụta ha, ma mesie ike mkpa ọ dị afọ ojuju
Logan natara MFA ya na 1998 site na Maryland Institute College of Art, Mount Royal School na Baltimore, ebe ihe ọmụmụ ya lekwasịrị ányá bụ eserese na ihe osise mgbasa ozi

Na mgbakwunye na ịmepụta ọrụ nke ya, Logan bụ ónyé njikwa nchekwa na Vollis Simpson Whirligig Project, ebe ọ na-eweghachi ihe osise 31 bụrụ ibu nkè ónyé na-ese ihe Vollis Simpson mepụtara maka ọbọdọ Wilson, North Carolina
Ọ bụ prọfesọ lara ezumike nká nke nka studio na Mahadum nke North Carolina Chapel Hill
Ọrụ Logan pụtara na ngosi REMIX na Columbia Museum of Art na 2016
Logan bi na Belmont, North Carolina ugbu a
Ọ lụrụ onye nlekọta Jonell Logan
A na-ewere Juan Rodríguez Botas (1880 - 1917) dị ka onye mbụ na-ese onyinyo nke Canary
Juana Rouco Buela (Madrid, 1889 - Buenos Aires, 1969) bụ onye na-asụ Spanish-Argentine, onye nhazi anarcha-nwanyị nwanyị, ọkà okwu ọha, na onye na-akwado ọgụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụmụ nwanyi
O tinyere onwe ya na ntọhapụ nke ụmụ nwanyị ma bụrụkwa onye bụ isi nke anarcho-syndicalism Argentine
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa Argentine na otu n'ime mgbasa ozi ọha kacha mma

Ọ gbakwara ebe a na-edebe akwụkwọ, na-ere akwụkwọ nta na akwụkwọ gbasara socialism, anarchism na ọrụ ndị ọzọ na akụnụba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ajụjụ ndị ọzọ nwere mmasị na ndị na-arụ ọrụ na Buenos Aires
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ, Rouco Buela kwagara Argentina mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ma kụziere onwe ya otu esi agụ na ide
O sonyere na nzukọ nke ụbọchị Mee nke afọ 1904
N'afọ 1907, Ọ jikọtara Centro Femeino Anarquista na Virginia Bolten, Teresa Caporaletti, Elisa Leotar, María Reyes, Violeta Garcia, Marta Newelstein, na Maria Collazo
N'otu afọ ahụ, a kpọghachiri ya na Spen; N'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere Federica Montseny, bụ onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na Rouco Buela
O nwere ma ọ dịkarịa ala otu nwa, nwa nwanyị, Poema, amụrụ na Disemba 1923
N'afọ 1964, o dere akụkọ ndụ onwe onye nke akpọrọ Historia de un ideal
Rouco Rouco Buela nwụrụ na 31 Ọktoba 1969 nke ọnya ha nwetara mgbe ụgbọ ala pipụ kụchara ya ọtụtụ ọnwa gara aga
ahụ
Juanita Fredrika Terblanche (née Hattingh, amụrụ na 14 Disemba 1970) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Tupu ọ hapụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 2017, ọ bụ onye omeiwu na Democratic Alliance na osote minista sayensị na teknụzụ
A mụrụ Terblanche na 14th nke Disemba 1970 na Chris na Ina Hattingh
Nna ya bụ onye ndụmọdụ obodo Potchefstroom tupu ọ banye na Democratic Alliance wee bụrụ onye otu North West Provincial Legislature
N'afọ 1998, nna Terblanche gafere ala gaa na Democratic Party wee sonye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike
O sonyere na mkpọsa 1999, wee merie ntuli aka na ikpo okwu nke DP na 76% nke votu
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2001, Terblanche bụ onye kansụl obodo Potchefstroom n'akụkụ nna ya
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche caucus, ọ bụkwa odeakwụkwọ mpaghara North West site na 2000 ruo 2004
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu National Council of Provinces, ebe a maara ya nke ọma maka ịgafe mmegharị 2004 nke na-akatọ Thabo Mbeki maka àgwà ya na ndina n'ike
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, a họpụtara Terblanche dị ka Whip na NCOP ma gaa n'ihu na-eje ozi oge zuru ezu
Ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya mpaghara Ventersdorp / Tlokwe (Potchefstroom)
Site na 2005 rụọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nwanyị mbụ bụ onye ndụmọdụ nke onye ndú nke ndị mmegide, na-anọchi onye otu MP Gareth Morgan
N'afọ 2009, ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere DA Home Affairs ma rụọ ọrụ ọzọ dị ka Whip, n'oge a n'ụlọ nke ala
N'afọ 2011, ọ bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic Alliance maka onye isi obodo Potchefstroom
Ọ bụkwa onye isi mpaghara nke Tlokwe mgbe DA weghaara ọchịchị obodo ahụ n'oge na-adịghị anya na 2013
Na June 2014, a kpọrọ Terblanche dịka osote ọnụ na-ekwuchitere na ngalaba sayensị na teknụzụ
N'afọ 2014, e boro osote minista na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ dị elu Mduduzi Manana ebubo maka, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ, 'ịchịkwa mmadụ' Terblanche na esem okwu na ndị omeiwu
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2015, a chụpụrụ Terblanche na Democratic Alliance, ya na Dianne Kohler Barnard, ANC kpọrọ ya 'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta ọha na eze'
Terblanche kwuru na nyocha omume ọjọọ ahụ bụ 'ezighị ezi, na-eduhie eduhie na nkwutọ' ma kwuo na ọ ga-arịọ ụlọ ikpe dị elu
Ọ hapụrụ ndị omeiwu n'afọ 2017
Otú ọ dị, e weghachiri ya na Democratic Alliance na Febụwarị 2022
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a kpọrọ Terblanche dịka otu n'ime 'ndị ntorobịa 200 ị ga-eburu nri ehihie' site na Mail na Guardian
Ọ nwetakwara onyinye Sunday Times maka 'Upstart of the Year' ma kpọọ ya otu n'ime 'ndị na-eto eto 100 ga-eme mgbanwe n'ime afọ 10 sochirinụ', ọzọ site na Mail na Guardian
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2010, a chọpụtara na Terblanche nwere neuroma acoustic
O mechara nwee nke mbụ n'ime ịwa ahụ atọ na July 13 nke afọ ahụ
Mgbe emechara usoro atọ ahụ, ụfọdụ n'ime akpụ ahụ nọgidere n'ihi ọdịdị nke ikpe Terblanche karịsịa na mmebi ahụ e nwere n'oge ịwa ahụ ikpeazụ
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na ọgwụgwọ ugbu a
Terblanche lụrụ onye lepidopterist Reinier Terblanche
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ, ụmụ nwoke abụọ na nwa nwanyị
Àtụ South African Shadow CabinetÀtụ DA National Assembly members
Juanita du Plessis (née Naudé) bụ onye na-agụ egwu mba Afrikaans, a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii nke ọnwa Eprel na Windhoek, Namibia
A maara ya maka egwu ya bu Ska-Rumba
Ọrụ ịbụ abụ Du Plessis malitere n'afọ1998 na abọm mbụ ya bụ Juanita
N'afọ ahụ, o ritere ihe nrite CMA (Country Music Association in Namibia) dị ka onye ọbụ abụ kachasị mma, onye na-ede egwu kachasị mma na awọd nke Association maka ihe ịga nke ọma
Nrepu Ahịa ndekọ ya karịrị puku atọ
N'afọ 2010, ọ natara ihe nrite South African Music na ngalaba Best Afrikaans DVD nke emume anuri afọ iri ya imepụta egwu kpọrọ ọkụ
DVD ahụ nwere egwu ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ime afọ iri mbụ nke ọrụ abụ ya
E tụnyere ya ugo onye kachasị ewu ewu na afọ nke asaa n'usoro na mmemme Huisgenoot's Tempo Awards na Johannesburg n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2018, o mere emume afọ iri abụọ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, na-ewepụta abọm kachasị nke 20 Jaar - Treffers van 2008–2018
Ọtụtụ abọm dị n'asusuAfrikaans ma a na-edebe aha ndị a n'asụsụ mbụ
Juanita lụrụ Herman du Plessis ma ha mụtara ụmụ atọ bụ Ruan, Mario na Franja (abụọ ikpeazụ bụ ejima)
Nwanne ya nwoke, Pieter Naudé, bụkwa onye na-eme ihe omume na South Africa
Nwa ya nwoke nke mbụ bụ Ruan bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu Afrikaans, na onye njikwa na Juanita Records
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri nke oji aha Ruan Josh
Nanị otu nwa ya nwanyị bụ Franja bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu Afrikaans nke ọma ma rite onyinye Ghoema abụọ n'afọ 2017
Judaism bu ekpere chi nde umu Israel, nde Hebrew na Jews
Onye ana-kpo Jesus Christ bula onye Jew

Jude Idada bụ onye Naijiria na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede uri, onye na-ede egwuregwu na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri a maara nke ọma maka ide ihe nkiri, The Tenant Ọ rụpụtala ma dee ọtụtụ obere ihe nkiri na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
Idada, onye sitere na Edo, amụrụ ma zụlite ya na Lagos, Nigeria

Idada bụ nwa akwụkwọ sayensị dị ọcha na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-enweghị nzụlite ọ bụla na nka, o tinyere akwụkwọ na mbụ ịmụ ọgwụ na mahadum mana mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gbanwere usoro ọmụmụ ya na akụ na ụba ọrụ ugbo

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ole na ole na ọrụ ugbo, Idada kwụsịrị ịmụ akụ na ụba ọrụ ugbo ma nọrọ n'ụlọ ruo ọnwa itoolu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a nabatara ya na Mahadum nke Ibadan iji mụọ nka ihe nkiri ebe o nwere akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Idada rụrụ ọrụ na Guardian Express Bank, ọrụ ọ nwetara mgbe ọ ka bụ onye otu ozu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara Arthur Andersen
Ọ kwagara Canada, gụsịa akwụkwọ ma rụọ ọrụ n'ụlọ akụ, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta na n'akụkụ nke ahụ
Mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya hụrụ obere ihe nkiri, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ya iji gbasoo edemede na mmepụta ihe nkiri
A họpụtara ya na ihe nkiri ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-ede ihe nkiri maka Toronto International Film Festival's Adapt This! na Afrinolly / Ntọala Ford Cinema4Change projects
Idada bụkwa onye sonyere na Relativity Media / AFRIFF Filmmaking project
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nka nke Africa Theatre Ensemble na Toronto, Canada
Idada nwere ihe nkiri, nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, uri maka otuto ya
O dekwara ma bipụta nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi A Box of Chocolates, Exotica Celestica
Edere ma duzie ihe nkiri Stage Oduduwa - King of the Edos, By My Own Hands na akwụkwọ ụmụaka Didi Kanu and the Singing Dwarfs of the North
Dị ka onye nkuzi na-eme ihe nkiri, Idada na-akụzi ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe ndị na-eme ihe na nkà na ụzụ nke ime ihe nkiri maka ogbo na ihe nkiri

Ọ kụzikwara ndị ọbịa maka African Theatre Ensemble na Canada, Mofilm / Unilever Sunlight Foundation Film Project na Nigeria, ntọala AIDS na Guyana ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche ọtụtụ panel na mmemme ihe nkiri mba ụwa ma na-ede maka magazin dị iche iche
Bipụtara site na Createspace/Creoternity Books

Judeo-Berber ma ọ bụ Judeo-Amazigh (Asụsụ Berber ⵜⴰⵎⴰⵣⵉⵖⵜ ⵏ ⵡⵓⴷⴰⵢⵏ tamazight n wudayen, Hibru ברברי יהודית omenala ndị Juu na obodo Berberitly dị iche iche na mpaghara Berberitly dị iche iche na mpaghara Berberitly dị iche iche
mbụ na Algeria
Judeo-Berber bụ (ma ọ bụ bụ) asụsụ kọntaktị; mbụ asụsụ ndị na-asụ asụsụ Judeo-Arabic
(E nwekwara ndị Juu na-asụ Berber dị ka asụsụ mbụ ha, ma ọ bụghị ụdị ndị Juu dị iche iche) Ndị ọkà okwu kwagara Israel na 1950 na 1960
Ọ bụ ezie na Tamazight na-asụ n'otu n'otu na ọtụtụ ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ (Galand-Pernet et al
1970 14), a na-amata ụdị ndị a site n'iji okwu mbinye ego Hibru na ịkpọ š as s (dị ka ọ dị n'ọtụtụ asụsụ Arabic nke Moroccan Juu)
Dame Judith Obiajulu Amaechi (née Nwankwo; onye amụrụ na 24 December 1970) bụ nwunye nke gọvanọ nke Rivers Steti Governor Chibuike Amaechi
Ọ bụ onye isi Empowerment Support Initiative (ESI) nke na-eme mkpọsa megide ọrịa mminwụ 'HIV/AIDS', na-akwado ikike nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, ma na-akwalite ọdịmma ụmụ nwanyị na nwata gender equity
A mụrụ Amaechi na 24 December 1970 n' Enugu Ukwu, Anambra State Ọ gara akwụkwọ Sekọdri na Federal Government Girls College, Abuloma
Ọ gara Mahadum Rivers State University of Science and Technology, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka Onye Ọrụ Ọmụma Obodo 'Urban and Regional Planning Professional'
Ọ lụrụ Chibuike Amaechi ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Amaechi malitere ulo oru Empowerment Support Initiative 'Non-Governmental Organization (NGO)', na 16 October 2008
NGO a na-enye nkwado na ndụmọdụ bara uru maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, karịsịa ndị kasị daa ogbenye

Na June 2009,ebe o kwuruokwu n'oge Ụbọchi Ụmụnwanyi Mba Ụwa 'International Women's Day', Amaechi kpọrọ maka nyochaa iwu obodo na omenala ndị na-eme ka ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ nwee nsogbu, mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-atụba ha na ịda ogbenye Na March 2010, ya na Manuela George-Izunwa, Kọmishọna Kansụl nke Ndị Nwanyi, gara Israel iji nyochaa ugbo ma kwurịta ọzụzụ na mmepe nke ọrụ ugbo n'etiti ndị inyom nọ na Rivers State
N'afọ 2009, Amaechi kwadoro usoro nchịkọta ndị na-adịghị mma maka ụmụaka Rivers State
Ọ bụ onye siri ike na nkwado Iwu Ụmụaka na-abanye na steeti Rivers n'afọ 2010, na-achọ igbochi mmegbu ụmụaka
N'August 2010, o meghere Ugboigwe na Nkwukọrịta Technology nke izu anọ, nke na-enye ọzụzụ kọmputa n'efu na ememe ndị na-eto eto na ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Judith Emike Audu-Foght, onye ama-ama dịka Judith Audu, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Nigeria, onye ngosi, ihe nlereanya, blogger, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A ma ya ama dịka Mofe n'ihe nkiri onyo-nyo nke Emerald, tinyere Joseph Benjamin, Carol King, Lilian Esoro na Femi Branch
A makwaara ya nke ọma maka ntunye-ugo onwere site n'ihe nkiri nke omepụtara nke ihe nkiri nke akpọrọ Just Not Married, so n'ime ya Flipped and The Sessions
N'afọ 2019, edepụtara aha ya na YNAIJA, otu narị ụmụ Naịjiria akachasị mara n'ihe nkiri
Amuru Audu na Navy Town, Ojo n'ezinụlọ Audu Alị Audu, nna ya, onye agha ụgbọ mmiri na nne ya bụ Gift Salamat Audu
Nne ya bụ onye na-esi nri ahịa na onye ọchụ nta ego nke nyere ọtụtụ ụlọ nri na ebe mgbazinye maka ihe mme-mme
Judith nwere ụmụnne nwoke abụọ, nwanne nwoke okenye, Franklin Audu na nwanne ya nwoke nke ọ tọrọ bụ Abdulmalik Audu
Ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ bụrụkwa otu nwanyi n'ime ụmụ nne ya
O si na mpaghara Auchi di na Edo Steeti na mpaghara ndida Nigeria
Audu gụrụ praịmarị na Navy Town Primary School nke dị n'Ojo, site n'afọ 1988 ruo n'afọ1993, wee gawa Navy Town Secondary School site n'afọ 1993 ruo n'afọ 1999, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Arts
O mechara gaa mpaghara abobdo akpọrọ Nigerian French Language Village, Badagry n’afọ 2001 wee nweta nkwado nke Diplọma nke o jiri nweta nnabata nke akwọrọ dairet entrị na Mahadum Lagos n'afọ 2002
N'afọ 2005, Audu nwetara Osambodo BA na French na Mahadum Lagos

Mgbe o jichara otu afọ fee ala nna ya, (NYSC) nke o mere na Kebbi Steeti n'afọ 2006/2007, ọ laghachiri Mahadum nke Lagos ma tinye akwụkwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ nke Mastas na Public and International Affairs site n'afọ 2008 rue n'afọ 2010, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke akpọrọ Master of Public and International Affairs (MPIA)
Mgbe Audu nọ na Mahadum nke Lagos, ọ sonyeere otu na-akwado ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Campus Playhouse ma sonye n'ọtụtụ mmemme
Site na ebe ahụ ka a họpụtara ya ka-asoro n'ihe nkiri nke Theater 15 nke bụ otu ihe nkiri kachasị enwe asọpụrụ na Mahadum Lagọs n'oge ahụ

Ọ bụ site n'otu ihe nkiri ndi a ka Audu jiri kwagote nka mmụta ya n'ime ihe nkiri nke mere ya na onye nlere onyonyo nke Nigeria bụ Denrele Edun, Onye ome ihe ọchị bụ Koffi na onye utụziaka bụ Wole Oguntokun, jiri rụkọọ ọrụ

N’afọ 2004, mgbe Mahadum Lagos gara abụbọ ọrụ ruru ọnwa iri, onye ọrụ ibe ya bụ Denrele Edun kpọrọ ya bụ Audu n’ụlọ ọrụ Alpha Vision Company ebe ọ nyochara ma nweta ọrụ mbụ ya n’obere enyo na Tajudeen Adepetu’s TV Series, One Love

N'ime otu afọ ahụ, Audu debara aha ya n'akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na nke Guild of Nigeria wee malite ịga nyocha, site na nke ọ nwetara òkè na ihe nkiri Ghetto nke Femi Ogedegbe na-akpọ Tears of the Ghetto (Ndụ mara mma)

Na ngwụsị abụbọ ọrụ Mahadum, Audu laghachiri ụlọ akwụkwọ wee were hiatus site na ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụ ezie na o sonyere mmeputa ihe nkiri nke Independent Children's Series, Funtime, ebe aha ihe nkiri ya bụ Vanessa

N'oge ọrụ mmanye National Youth Service ya, ọ bụ onye mkwupụta okwu na onye nrụpụta ihe omume na Kebbi State Television nke a na-akpọ French For Beginners, ọ bụkwa onye isi ntụziaka nk akpọrọ Drama Troupe

N’afọ 2011, ka Audu guchasịrị akwụkwụkwọ ma nweta osambodo nke mastas digiri, ọ gara nnyocha maka ọrụ maka ihe nkiri onyonyo, Tinsel wee nweta ọrụ nke ndị ọkachamara n'ọrịa ụmụ nwanyị, ọ sozi bụrụ onye otu ndi n'emepụta ọtụtụ usoro ihe nkiri onynyo dị ka, Emerald, Seekers, Burning Spears, Tinsel, Huzzel, 4 Walls, Comfort Zone, Rush, Oge, Funtime, Life is Beautiful, Case File, House Apart and Queen Drive
N’afọ 2014, Audu wepụtara ihe nkiri izizi ya, ihe nkiri nkpirishi gbasara ihe mmerụ ahụ n’ezinụlọ nke akpọrọ ‘Not Right’, nke Omowunmi Dada, Ani Iyoho, Philip Festus na Judith Audu so mepụta

N’afọ 2014, Audu bidoro igbasa ihe mme-mme redio n’otu ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na ntanetị, Igroove Radio kpọrọ aha Meet the Actor With Judith Audu ebe ya na ndi n'eme ihe nkiri nọ na mba ụwa nile na-akparịta ụka
N'ime ọnwa ise nke afọ 2016, Audu mepụtara ma gosipụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya, nke bụ ihe nkiri zuru oke, n’okpuru ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya bụ Judith Audu Productions

Audu bụ onye n'akọ asiri na ntanetị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi ma nwee blọọgụ abụọ wwwjudithaudublogspotcom ebe ọ na-akọwapụta ndi ka n'eto-eto n'ime ihe nkiri ma n'agbasa akụkọ egwuru-egwuma , ma nke ọzọ bụ wwwplayingwithrecipesblogspotcom ebe ọ ne-egosi nri oshiri dị ka ọ bụkwa onye hụrụ nri n'anya na-agbalị Ezi ntụziaka si n'akụkụ ụwa nile
N’afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye kacha mma nke ụmụnwanyị n'eme ihe nkiri n’afọ 2013 na nturuugo ndị na - ahụ maka Mgbasaozi Naịjirịa
N'ime ọnwa iri n'abụọ n'afọ 2014, Audu ritere onyinye maka Onye Okacha amara n'ihe nkiri ụmụ nwanyị na In-Short International Film Festival 2014 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri mkpirishi, Alpha Mama

ihe nkiri mkpirishi nke Audu mere nke akpọrọ Not Right, nke o mepụtara pụtara na nhọpụta maka 2015 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards dị ka 'Best Short Film', a họpụtakwara ihe nkiri a na Best of Nollywood Awards, Nollywood Movie Awards na Abuja International Film Festival n'afọ 2014
N’afọ 2016, Audu ritere nturu ugo maka Best Actress na onyinye kacha mma na Nollywood Awards maka ihe nkiri ahụ, Just Not Married
N'ime ọnwa abụọ, n'afọ 2020, ndi otu United Nations High Commission for Refugees (UNHCR) kpọrọ Audu dị ka “onye nkwado dị elu” maka ọrụ ya “Telling the Real Story” (TRS)
Judith Nneka Chime (amụrụ na 20 Mee 1978 na Lagos) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye na-edebe goolu bọọlụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naijirịa na 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup, na 2000 Summer Olympics

Judith Mason amụrụ Judith Seelander Menge (ubochí irí n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1938 na ubochi irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba 2016) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nké na-arụ ọrụ na mmanụ, pensụl, obibi akwụkwọ na mgbasa ozi ngwakọta
Ọrụ ya bàrà ọgaranya na ihe nnọchianya na akụkọ ifo, na-egosipụta nkà na ụzụ a na-adịghị ahụkebe
A mụrụ Judith Mason nà Pretoria; South Africa, na 1938
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nà Pretoria High School for Girls n'afọ 1956
N'afọ 1960, e nyere ya nzere BA na Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand

Ọ kụziri ihe osise na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Mahadum Pretoria, Michaelis School of Fine Art na Cape Town, Scuola Lorenzo de 'Medici na Florence, Ịtali site n'afọ 1989 ruo afọ 1991 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha mpụga màkà akara ugo mmụta na nke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadụ Pretoria, Potchefstroom, Natal, Stellenbosch na Cape Town
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Mason na-ekwu màkà arụrụala nke Truth and Reconciliation Commission kpughere
Mason nwụrụ na White River n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Disemba 2016

Nnukwu ihe ncheta Judith Mason 'A Prospect of Icons' Standard Bank Gallery n'ubochí isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2008 na Sasol Art Museum, Mahadum Stellenbosch n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị ruo Machị 2009
Ndepụta e bipụtara na njikọ ya na ihe ngosi ahụ
E gosipụtara akwụkwọ ndị na-ese ihe Mason na Washington DC na National Museum for African Art màkà ihe ngosi 'Artists' Books na Africa' kwụsịrị n'ubochí irí n'otu n'ọnwa Septemba 2016
'Anụmanụ ndị a na-achọpụtaghị' June 2016 bụ ihe ngosi ikpeazụ ya
Mason gosipụtara ugboro ugboro na South Africa, yana ọrụ na nnukwu nchịkọta nka South Africa yana na nchịkọta onwé nà nkè ọha na eze na Europe na United States
E meela ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya na Gris, Ịtali, Netherlands, Belgium, Chile, Germany, Switzerland, New York na Miami
Ọrụ ọha na eze ya kachasị gụnyere Nwoke na-abụ abụ na Nwaanyị Na-agbachi nkịtị aka Blue Dress na Ụlọikpe Iwu na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọtụtụ nnukwu tapestries na mmekorita ya na Marguerite Stephens na windo windo màkà ụlọ nzukọ Great Park na Johannesburg

N'afọ 2008, site n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba ruo n'ụbọchị isii n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2008, ụlọ ọrụ Standard Bank Gallery dị na Johannesburg, South Africa kwadoro nnukwu ihe ngosi nke ihe osise, eserese, nchịkọta, ntinye, akwụkwọ na édémédé ndị na-ese ihe
Sasol Art Museum na Mahadum Stellenbosch tinyere otu ihe ngosi ahụ akpọrọ A Prospect of Icons site na 14 Jenụwarị ruo 28 Machị 2009
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya n'onwe ya bụ na Gallery 101, Johannesburg, na 1964 mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ihe nrite nke abụọ na asọmpi UAT na 1963
Mason egosila mgbe niile na Johannesburg, Cape Town, Pretoria, Stellenbosch, Mpumalanga na George

Goodman Gallery, Chelsea Gallery, Association of Arts Pretoria, Association of Art Cape Town, Hout Street Gallery, Strydom Gallery, Dorp Street Gallery, Art on Paper, Abalone Gallery, Sasol Art Museum, Mahadum Stellenbosch, Standard Bank Museum, Karen Mackerron Gallery, yana lithographs, ihe osise na ihe osise dị na Ombondi Gallery na New York na 1990 na nso a, tapestries, ihe osisa na eserese na Deeringate, Miami Dade, 2016 na lithograph na Art Basel Miami Beach 2010 na 2015
Ọ nọchitere anya South Africa na Venice Biennale, 1986, São Paulo Biennale 1973, Brazil, Valparaiso Biennale 1979, Chile na Houston Arts Festival 1980, USA
Judith Nalule Nabakooba (amụrụ na 28 Ọktoba 1977), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye bụbu onye uwe ojii
Ọ bụ Minista nke Ala, Ụlọ na Mmepe Obodo ugbu a, na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 8 June 2021
Tupu nke ahụ, site na Disemba 2019, ruo Mee 2021, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ozi na Nkà na Ụzụ Mmekọrịta
Nabakooba jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu a họpụtara ahọpụta, na-anọchite anya Mityana District Women's Constituency na 10th Parliament (20162021)

Nabakooba gara Ndejje Secondary School, na Luweero District, maka agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọstrị, ebe ọ nwetara ma Uganda Certificate of Education na 1994, na Uganda Advanced Certificate of education na 1997
A nabatara ya na Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ukwuu na nke kachasị ochie na Uganda, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Mass Communication na 2002
Ka e mesịrị, e nyere ya nzere masta na Human Rights, kwa site na Mahadum Makerere
O nwekwara diplọma na Strategic Leadership Management, site na Chartered Management Institute, na United Kingdom, nwetara na 2010

Na mgbakwunye, o nwere diplọma abụọ ọzọ, otu bụ Postgraduate Diploma in Management na nke ọzọ bụ Postgr graduaduate Diploma in Monitoring and Evaluation, nke Uganda Management Institute nyere, na 2012 na 2013 n'otu n'otu
Site na 2004 ruo 2015, Nabakooba jere ozi na ndị uwe ojii Uganda, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche, gụnyere dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ndị uwe ojii, site na 2011 ruo 2015
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ n'oge ahụ, gụnyere dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Exodus Savings na Credit Cooperative Society Limited, ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na ụgwọ nke ndị uwe ojii Uganda (UP) na ezinụlọ ha
Ọ hapụrụ UP maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na June 2015
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2016, a họpụtara Nabakooba dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke Mityana District na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke National Resistance Movement
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọkwa, ọ na-eche nkatọ na iyi egwu ihu maka ọnọdụ ya gbasara onye omeiwu Age-Limit Bill Ọ na-enwekwa nkatọ maka akụkọ Kasese na-egbu oge

N'ime mgbanwe nke ndị ọrụ na 14 Disemba 2019, a họpụtara Nabakooba ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ozi, ICT na Mmekọrịta, na-anọchi Frank Tumwebaze, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta nke Ọrụ, Mmekọahụ, Ọrụ Ndị Ntorobịa na Mmepe Ọha
Nwaanyị MP

Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kọmitii ndị omeiwu Uganda na-ahụ maka nchekwa na ihe ndị dị n'ime ụlọ ma bụrụ onye otu kọmitii azụmahịa ndị omeiwu na kọmitii omeiwu na-ahụkarị kọmitii, ndị ọchịchị steeti na ụlọ ọrụ steeti
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement na-achị
Judith Peace Achan (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1983) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya n'ọfịs dị ka nwanyị Member iji nọchite anya mpaghara Nwoya n'oge ntuli aka nke afo 2021 Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu National Resistance Movement
Judith Sealy bụ Prọfesọ na South Afriika nnyocha oche atumatu na Archaeology na Paleoenvironmental Studies na onye nduzi nke Stable Light Isotope Lab na Ngalaba Archaeology na Mahadum Cape Town
Judith Sephuma (a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1974) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu jazz na Afro-pop
A mụrụ ya na Seshego, a zụlitere ya na Polokwane, Limpopo, o wee kwaga Cape Town n'afọ 1994 iji nweta ọmụmụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwú jazz
N'afọ 1997, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town na mmụta Performer Diploma na Jazz wee gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe
N'afọ 1999, ọ meriri 'Best Jazz Vocalist' na asọmpi Old Mutual Jazz Into The Future wee bịanye aka nkwekọrịta na ngalaba BMG nke Africa
Abọm mbụ ya bụ A Cry, A Smile, A Dance (2001) bụ nke a nabatara nke ọma ma soro ya na New Beginnings n'afọ 2005

Abọm ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere Change is Here (2008), I Am A Living Testimony (2011), A Legacy Live in Concert (2012; CD na DVD), na abọm ozioma mbụ ya nke afọ 2013 nke akpọrọ The Experience LIVE in Concert na ụfọdụ egwu nke Wilson Joel mepụtara (CD na DVD)
N'afọ 2015 ọ wepụtara abọm ya One Word, nke ọ kọwara dị ka Afro-Funk Jazz
E wepụtara abọm ikpeazụ ya, My Worship - Live, n'afọ 2017
A na-edekọ ma na-ere ya site na akara ndekọ ónwè na ònwé ya, Lalomba Music

Judith Tshabalala (amụrụ na 30 Machị 1982) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa si Gauteng na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe 2019, na n'oge gara aga site na 2011 ruo 2014
Tshabalala bụ onye otu African National Congress
Tshabalala bụ onye otu African National Congress
Ọ banyere na National Assembly nke South Africa na 19 Ọktoba 2011 dị ka onye nọchiri Noluthando Mayende-Sibiya
N'oge mbụ ya, e kenyere ya na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ego na Kọmiti Portfolio na Arts na Ọdịbendị
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, ọ ghọrọ onye otu kọmitii ad hoc na nhọpụta nke Auditor General
A họpụtabeghị ya maka oge zuru ezu na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, ebe ọ bụ na ọ nọ n'okpuru na ndepụta mpaghara na mba nke ANC
Na Mee 2019, a họpụtara Tshabalala ka ọ laghachi na National Assembly
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, a tọọrọ Tshabalala n'ụlọ ya dị na Sebokeng
E jidere ya ma tụba ya n'enweghị mmerụ ahụ na Eden Park, Alberton
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Judith Uwizeye bụ onye ọka iwu, ọkà mmụta na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Rwanda, onye jere ozi dị ka Minista na Ọfịs Onye isi ala, kemgbe ụbọchị 31 Ọgọst 2017
Site n'ọnwa Julaị 2014 ruo ọnwa Ọgọst 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka minista nke ọrụ ọha na eze na ọrụ na Cabinet nke Rwanda
Judy Bell-Gam (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1956) bụ onye Naijirịa bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu track and field
O meriri 100 mita hurdles maka Naijirịa na African Championships mbụ na Dakar na 1979 ma bụrụkwa onye mmeri mbụ nke Naijirịa na ihe omume ahụ na 1978 All-Africa Games
A mụrụ Bell-Gam na ejima ya, Bella, na Opobo Town, Rivers State na 1956
Ha abụọ ga-aghọ ndị na-eme egwuregwu
Ha gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị gọọmentị dị na Afikpo, ụlọ akwụkwọ Metọdist, Uwani na steeti Enugu na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Union, Ikot Ekpene
Ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ nọ na Enugu mgbe Agha Obodo Naijirịa malitere na 1967 wee kwaga n'ebe ndịda Nnewi
Na ngwụcha agha ahụ, Bell-Gam laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Ikot Ekpene
Otu n'ime nsọpụrụ mba ụwa mbụ ya bụ ọlaọcha na 100m hurdles na 1977 West African Games, na-emecha nke abụọ n'ụlọ n'azụ onye obodo ya Modupe Oshikoya
Judy Bell-Gam meriri nrite ọla edo na 100m hurdles na African Games na 1978 na Algiers na oge nke 1367 s, n'ihu Ugandan Ruth Kyalisima na ejima ya Bella Bell-Gum
Na African Athletics Championships na Dakar na 1979, ọ gbara ọsọ 1413 s n'otu ọzụzụ ahụ n'ihu nwanne ya nwanyị na onye Moroccan Fatima El Faquir wee nata ihe nrite ọla edo
N'ikpeazụ, na 1979 IAAF World Cup na Montreal ọ gbara ọsọ 100 n hurdles na 1393 ma bụrụ onye nke asaa
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri nke ihe mgbochi na All-Africa University Games n'afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2018 Oluwatobiloba Amusan meriri n'asọmpi African Championship nke mbụ ya na ihe mgbochi na Asaba African Championships

Nke a gbatịkwuru omenala Naijirịa na ihe omume ahụ, nke Bell-Gam malitere, ya na ndị mmeri Naijirịa ndị ọzọ gụnyere Maria Usifo, Ime Akpan, Glory Alozie, Olutoyin Augustus, Seun Adigun, bụ ndị meriri asọmpi a maka Naijirịa n'asọmpi Afrịka mbụ
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 100 m Hurdles WomenÀtụ Footer African Champions women's 100 metres hurdles
Judy Croome (amuru Judy-Ann Heinemann na 16 Disemba 1958) bu onye ode akwukwo South Africa, onye edemede nkenke, na onye na- ede uri, onye amuru na Zvishavane, Southern Rhodesia (ugbu a Zimbabwe )
O nwetara nzere Master of Arts (English) na Mahadum South Africa
O bi ugbu a na Johannesburg

Croome lụrụ onye ọkà mmụta iwu ụtụ isi South Africa, Advocate of the High Court of South Africa na onye na-ede akwụkwọ ụtụ isi, onye nwụrụ anwụ Dr Beric John Croome, bụ onye nwụrụ na April 2019 mgbe ọ rịasịrị ọrịa ogologo oge

Ebipụtala akụkọ dị mkpirikpi na uri Croome na The Huffington Post, Mahadum Witwatersrand 's School of Literature, Language and Media's Itch Magazine na n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche nke ndị nta akụkọ wepụtara na United States na South Afirika
Croome pụtakwara na ihie onyo nyo mba ndi South Afirika na South Africa Broadcasting Corporation 's Channel 2 Morning Live show na na ugegbe nti mba South Africa na ememme Sunday Literature SAFM
Croome nwekwara akụkọ e bipụtara na South Africa, gụnyere na Sunday Times (South Africa) na mba ụwa site na dị iche iche no na eterneti akwụkwọ akụkọ na webụsaịtị
Croome nwekwara mmasị na ihe ndị esoteric ma na-agụ tarot nwere ọgụgụ isi
Na 2021, Croome nyere ogbako uri 'Onyinye nke uri' nye ndi edemede 2000 (South Africa)
Na 2021 na 2016, Croome bụ onye ọka ikpe mpụga nke ngalaba uri na Writers2000 (South Africa) (1985) asọmpi ide kwa afọ
Na 2011, Croome's “Ebe Nduru” ka edepụtara aha maka ihe nrite ide akụkọ ifo Afrịka
Judith Angela Broderick (amụrụ na ubochi iri abuo na abuo n' onwa Julaị afo 1963), nke a maara dịka Judy Ditchfield, bụ onye mba South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọnodu o weere na ihe nkiri a ma ama The Story of an African Farm, Cape Town na Hoodlum & Son Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego na-aga nke ọma yana onye mba UK zụrụ dị ka BRP na onye nhazi
A mụrụ ya na abali iri abuo n' abuo n' onwa Julaị 1963 na Pretoria, South Africa ma mesịa tolite na Irene
Mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, ya na nne na nna ya kwagara Kimberley
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Pietermaritzburg ọzọ
Site na 1984 ruo 1987, ọ nọrọ na Durban wee kwaga Johannesburg
Ọ gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Belgravia Junior School na Herlear Primary na Kimberley maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị
, ọ garakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Pelham maka Standard 5
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị ule matric na Pietermaritzburg Girls High School, Pietermaritzburg
O gakwara n' ihu nweta nzere BA na Psychology na Drama na Mahadum Natal, Pietermaritzburg Site na 1984 ruo 1987 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Natal Performing Arts Council (NAPAC)
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ogu egwu Paul Ditchfield
Di na nwunye a nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ Keaton na Tom
A mụrụ Keaton na 1991, o bukwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Tom na 1996 o na- agu BCom Law na Mahadum Wits
Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na Loft Theatre Company, ngalaba nke NAPAC

N'oge a, ọ rụrụ na egwuregwu Boo To The Moon nke Paul Slabolepszy mepụtara, Tales From The Pleasure Palace nke Janice Honeyman, Kwamanzi, Every Good Boy Deserves Favour, Hambe Kahle, Maid In South Africa, Mistakes Of An African Night To Conquer, En Dit Was More, In The War na Kitchen Tea o garanihu, gosiputa na egwuregwu Macbeth na State Theatre na Pretoria yana ihe egwuregwu The Things We Do For Love na Comrades Arms nke Anthony Ackerman mepụtara
N'afọ 2001, ọ nwetara nhọpụta Kwazulu-Natal Vita maka onye nwanyi kachasi mma n' ihe omume mkpa ochi

E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye na-agụ egwu ma mee ọtụtụ egwu na ngosiputa egwu Christian; Neill Solomon Rock Concert; Bursting Out; Soundcraft; The Last Great Drive-In Movie Picture Show; It's All Fright By Me; It's Still Rock And Roll To Me; Tarts; A Touch Of Tonic; the smash hit Richard Loring production A Touch Of Webber, A Taste Of Rice; Snow White And The Seven Dwarves; Buddy The Buddy Holly Story; Fiela's Child The Musical; The Night They Invented Champagne; na Queen The Concert at the Sandton Convention Centre
Site na Ọktọba 2006 ruo Machị 2007, ọ gosiputara onwe ya na Menopause The Musical for Showtime Management nke e mere na Montecasino Theatre na Johannesburg
N'oge a, ọ natara nhọpụta Naledi Theatre Award nke afọ 2006 maka maka onye kacha mma i gosipota ihe mkpa ochi (nwanyi) maka egwuregwu a
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ pụtara na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn gụnyere The Game II, Sonnekring II, Suburban Bliss na Streaks I na II
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ ndị isi na usoro ihe nkiri; Angels, Hoof Of Africa, Zero Tolerance na Yizo Yizo
N'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara na sitcom telivishọn Ses'Top La ma rụọ ọrụ nke 'Mrs
Rabinowitz'
N'afọ 2019, ọ gosiputara agwa 'Stella Fouche' na soapie Isidingo
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri, Faith's Corner, Glory Glory, Cape Of Good Hope na Stander
Judy Dlamini (amụrụ 10 Julaị 1959) bụ nwanyị South Africa ọchụnta ego na onye ode akwụkwọ, onye bụ onye jị ọkwa Chancellor nke Mahadum Witwatersrand na onye isi oche ntọala Mbekani Group
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke bọọdụ Aspen Pharmacare Holdings site na Nọvemba 2007 ruo Disemba 2015 ebe ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa na-abụghị onye isi site na July 2005 ruo Disemba 2015
Na 2020 akwụkwọ akụkọ Forbes kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị iri ise kachasị ike n'Africa
Judith Carol Irola (November 23, 1943 - February 21, 2021) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye nduzi

Nwanyị nke atọ a nabatara n'ime American Society of Cinematographers, ọ bụ onye isi nke ngalaba cinematography na USC School of Cinematic Arts ruo afọ 15 ma nwee oche Conrad Hall na Cinematography n'ebe ahụ
Irola guzobere alaka National Association of Broadcast Employees and Technicians na San Francisco na 1969, ọ bụkwa onye guzobere otu ihe nkiri Cine Manifest na 1972
A mụrụ Judith Carol Irola n'ime ime obodo Fresno, California, na Nọvemba 23, 1943
Nne na nna ya, Barbara na Johnny Irola, bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo atụrụ, nne na nna ya ochie kwagara United States na 1917 site na mpaghara Basque nke Spain
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ ọ tọrọ, Jeanne na Barbara Jo
Ụmụnne nwanyị atọ ahụ ga-aga na Saturday matinees na ụlọ ihe nkiri mpaghara
O mechara dekọọ ọzụzụ ha n'ugbo ahụ na obere ihe ngosi ya nke afọ 2014 The Sheepherder's Daughters
Irola hapụrụ kọleji iji gaa Central California Commercial College iji mụta nkà odeakwụkwọ
O jiri ihe ndị a rụọ ọrụ na London na Seville

N'afọ 1965, ọ sonyeere Peace Corps ma, mgbe ọnwa atọ nke ọzụzụ na US gasịrị, nọrọ afọ abụọ na Niger ebe o nyere aka melite usoro mmiri na nke ịdị ọcha, wuo ụlọ akwụkwọ ma nye agụmakwụkwọ ahụike dị mkpa
O mechara laghachi n'oge a na 2010 Niger '66 A Peace Corps Diary
Mgbe Niger gasịrị, Irola laghachiri San Francisco wee malite ịrụ ọrụ n'ọfịs nke KQED-TV
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ngalaba ihe nkiri ha na ngwụsị izu, ha mechara were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto oge niile
Mgbe ọ nọ na ngalaba ihe nkiri KQED-TV, Irola guzobere alaka mpaghara Bay nke National Association of Broadcast Employees and Technicians
Na mbụ ọ bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa, ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye isi oche nke alaka ahụ
N'afọ 1972, KQED-TV gbasara ngalaba ihe nkiri ya
Irola guzobere Cine Manifest, otu ihe nkiri Marxist, ya na Gene Corr, Peter Gessner, John Hanson, Stephen Lighthill, Rob Nilsson na Steve Wax
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nọ n'òtù ahụ
Ha mere ihe ngosi, ọkwa ọrụ ọha na eze maka Amnesty International na ihe nkiri abụọ
Irola laghachiri n'òtù ahụ na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2006 Cine Manifest Irola bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Northern Lights, ihe nkiri mbụ ha
Ọ meriri Caméra d'Or na 1979 Cannes Film Festival ma too ya maka ihe nkiri ya
Otu onye nkatọ jiri ọrụ Irola tụnyere foto Dorothea Lange
Irola hapụrụ Cine Manifest mgbe ọ gbasịrị Northern Lights wee kwaga New York City ebe ya na Sandi Sissel na Joan Churchill nwekọrọ ụlọ elu na SoHo
E kweghị ka ọ sonye na NYC IATSE, na NABET na-anọchite anya ndị na-ese ihe nkiri (mgbasa ozi)
Nke a ga-aghọ nsogbu na 1986
Ọ malitere iso Tom Schiller, onye edemede na Saturday Night Live rụkọọ ọrụ
Ha mere ihe nkiri asatọ dị mkpirikpi maka SNL ọnụ, gụnyere La Dolce Gilda, nke Gilda Radner na-eme, na Don't Look Back in Anger, nke John Belushi na-eme
Ọ malitekwara ise obere ihe ndị dị iche iche
N'afọ 1986, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Working Girls, nke Lizzie Borden duziri
IATSE chọpụtara na Irola rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ahụ na-enweghị kaadị njikọ ha
Ha kpere ya ikpe, mgbe ọ na-anọghị ya, ma kwụọ ya $ 4,000
Ọ lụsoro ha ọgụ, ma nweta mgbaghara mana ekweghị ka ọ sonyere ha
N'afọ 1989, mgbe ikpe Working Girls gasịrị, Irola kwagara Los Angeles ebe ọ gbara Lifestories maka telivishọn NBC, na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke izu maka ABC na NBC
N'afọ 1993, ya na onye nduzi Everett Lewis gbara ihe nkiri Ambush of Ghosts
O meriri onyinye maka ịdị mma na Cinematography na 1993 Sundance Film Festival maka ihe nkiri ahụ
A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote prọfesọ na USC School of Cinematic Arts
N'afọ 1995, Woody Omens, Steven Poster na Robert Primes họpụtara Irola ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ASC
Ọ sonyeere Sandi Sissel onye a nabatara n'afọ gara aga, ọ bụkwa naanị nwanyị nke atọ a nabatara na njikọ ahụ
Dị ka nwanyị na-ese ihe nkiri, a chọtara ya maka echiche ya banyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
A gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ n'akwụkwọ Women Behind the Camera - Conversations with Camerawomen nke Alexis Krasilovsky (1997) ma nọrọkwa na ihe ngosi Cinematographer Style (2005, nke Jon Fauer duziri)
Irola ghọrọ osote prọfesọ na USC School of Cinematic Arts na 1992
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1999, a họpụtara Irola ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba ihe nkiri, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 2018
Site n'afọ 2005, o jikwa oche Conrad Hall na Cinematography na Color Timing, ọnọdụ nke Steven Spielberg na George Lucas nyere
Irola nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke COVID-19 na Los Angeles, na Febụwarị 21, 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ 77, n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na California

Judy Juanita bụ onye America na-ede abụ, onye na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na-ede egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi edemede na Laney College
N'afọ 1968, mgbe ọ na-aga San Francisco Steeti, Juanita jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Black Panther, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Black Panther Party
N'akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Virgin Soul, (Viking, 2013), onye ojii nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-amalite kọleji obodo na Oakland, na-agbasi mbọ ike ịbanye na matriculate wee sonye na Black Panther Party (BPP)
A na-edebe ihe odide Juanita na Mahadum Duke na John Hope Franklin Ụlọ nyocha maka akụkọ ihe mere eme na omenala ndị Amerika na Afrika, n'akụkụ ebe nchekwa nke ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eme ihe ike si SNCC
E debere egwuregwu iri na otu n'ime egwuregwu ya na Jerome Lawrence & Robert E
Lee Ụlọ nyocha ihe nkiri dị na, Ohio State University (OSU), ebe egwuregwu ya zuru oke, 'Theodicy,' meriri nnukwu ihe nrite na Eileen Heckart Asọmpi egwuregwu ndị okenye nke afọ 2008
A mụrụ Juanita Judith Hart na Berkeley, California, ma tolite na Oakland
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ malitere ịga Oakland City College, na-agafe na San Francisco State University dị ka onye na-eto eto
Ọ bụ onye otu Black Student Union
Mgbe Huey P
Newton na Bobby Seale gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ sonyeere BPP n'afọ 1967 wee biri n'otu n'ime ụlọ nchekwa ha na Potrero Hill
mgbe ọ na-edezi The Black Panther, akwụkwọ akụkọ Party, ma rụọ ọrụ na mmemme BPP's Free Breakfast for Children O nwetara BA ya na akparamaagwa na MFA na edemede okike site na Steeti San Francisco
Juanita kụziri na Mahadum San Francisco Steeti dị ka onye nkuzi Black Psychology na Akwụkwọ akụkọ ojii na mmemme Ọmụmụ ojii nke mbụ na United States
Juanita gara Community of Writers na Squaw Valley n'afọ 1992
Site na afọ 1992 rụọ 2007, San Francisco Mime Troupe, ụlọ ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ogige ntụrụndụ, gara 'Knocked Up' nke ya na Tina Tree Murch dere
Site na njedebe egwuregwu, ha abịawo ịkwado RU486, dị ka a na-akpọ ụtụtụ mgbe a kpọchara ọgwụ
N'afọ 2012, ọ gara nzukọ ndị edemede Vermont Studio Center na Breadloaf
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara uri Juanita 'Bling' maka Pushcart Prize
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtakwara edemede ya 'The Gun as Ultimate Performance Poem' maka Pushcart Prize
O deela egwuregwu iri na asaa nke emere na Bay Area, LA, NYC, Winston-Salem, na Minneapolis
Onye ikpeazụ a ma ama na OSU's Non / Ihe nrite mkpokọta akụkọ ifo nke afọ 2016, nchịkọta edemede ya bụ akụkọ nke onye agha ụkwụ nwanyị

DeFacto Feminism Essays Straight Outta Oakland (EquiDistance Press, 2016) bụ nhọrọ Book-of-the-Month na Machị, 2017, na Kirkus Reviews (ebe ọ nwetakwara nyocha dị mma), na African Americans on the Move Book Club (AAMBC) na Disemba, 2016
Ogologo nyocha dị egwu nke nchịkọta nke onye na-ede uri-egwu egwu na onye na-eme ihe ike Chris Stroffolino pụtara na magazin Ishmael Reed KONCH na Disemba, 2016
N'afọ 2014 na 2015, nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirikpi nke Juanita The High Cost of Freeways bụ onye ikpeazụ na Donna Tartt First Fiction Contest
Juanita bụ onye Buddha kemgbe afọ 1980, na-eme Nichiren Buddha na Soka Gakkai International
uri Judy Juanita na nso nso a pụtara na New Verse News, blọọgụ uri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ịntanetị
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri Netflix nke afọ 2020, Last Chance U Season 5, LANEY College
Jukun (Njikun), ma ọ bụ karịa kpọmkwem Jukun Takum, bụ asụsụ Jukunoid nke Cameroon eji dị ka asụsụ azụmahịa na Naijiria

Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere naanị puku mmadụ ole na ole na-asụ ya, na naanị iri na abụọ na Naijiria (dị ka na afọ puku abụọ), ọtụtụ iri puku mmadụ na-asụrụ ya dị ka asụsụ nke abụọ na Naịjirịa (puku iri anọ kọrọ na 1979)
Aha Jukun bụ okwu mkpuchi maka ọtụtụ nyìrí asụsụ Jukunoid, dị ka ọtụtụ karịa Jukun Wapan
Blench depụtara Wase Tofa (2019) dị ka olumba

A mụrụ Jules Lion (ihe dị ka afọ 1809-1866) na Paris ma gosipụta ya na Paris Salon tupu ọ kwaga United States n'afọ 1837
O mechara mepee ụlọ ọrụ daguerrotype na New Orleans n'afọ 1840 otu afọ mgbe e mepụtara usoro ahụ
N'ọnwa Maachị 14, afọ 1840, New Orleans Bee bipụtara ọkwa banyere ihe ngosi nke Lion's daguerreotypes na St
Charles Museum, ihe ngosi foto mbụ e dere ede na Louisiana

Site n'afọ ndị 1970s ruo na mmalite narị afọ nke 21, a na-eche na Lion bụ onye Ojiị (a kpọtụrụ ya aha na ihe ngosi dị ka onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ese foto), mana ndekọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị France nyochara n'afọ 2017 na-egosi na ọ bụ nwa nne na nna ndị Juu na German
Echiche nke ịbụ onye ojii sitere na ọtụtụ mbipụta nke akwụkwọ ndekọ obodo New Orleans n'afọ ndị 1850s nke gụnyere mkpụrụedemede 'fmc' ('nwoke nwere onwe ya') n'akụkụ aha ya

Otú ọ dị, enweghị onye ọ bụla na-ahọpụta agbụrụ na akwụkwọ iwu na ihe ndekọ ndị ọzọ n'oge ndụ ya niile, na mwepụ ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme dị mkpa nke mmalite narị afọ nke 20 nke Louisiana nwere ndị na-acha ọcha (dịka, Nos Hommes et Notre Histoire, nke Rodolphe Desdunes), na-atụ aro na-ezighị ezi na ndekọ ahụ, ikekwe metụtara mmekọrịta ya na nwanyị nwere onwe ya na-acha n'oge ahụ

Ọ bụ ezie na Lion na-ese ihe, isi ihe ọ lekwasịrị anya bụ usoro foto lithographed nke ndị Louisian a ma ama na ndị nwere njikọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Louisiana, gụnyere John James Audubon na Andrew Jackson
Ọdụm kụziri nka na Mahadum Louisiana ma, n'oge ndụ ya, mepụtara mkpuchi egwu egwu Confederate

Jules Allen (amụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba 13, afọ 1947) bụ onye na-ese foto na prọfesọ na-arụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Nka na Foto nke Queensboro Community College, Mahadum City nke New York, ebe ọ kụziri ihe ruo afọ iri abụọ
A mụrụ ya na San Francisco, California
O nwere nkwenye nke onye na-ese foto bụ Diane Arbus, onye na-ekwu, ka ihe na-esikarị n'ụzọ doro anya, ka ọ na-esikwu n'ozuzu
Onye na-ese ihe, Danny Dawson kwuru, sị, 'Allen nwere anya doro anya maka ihe doro anya n'ọrụ ndụ ya niile nke na-echetara ahụmahụ ndị isi ojii nke oge a
Ihe oyiyi ya na-etinye isiokwu ndị sitere na akụ na ụba nke ndụ ndị isi ojii n'ime usoro zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ha emeela ka ha na ndị nta akụkọ, ndị na-ese ihe nkiri, ndị na'egwú, ndị na na-ede egwuregwu, ndị na -ede uri, na ndị na-eme nkiri rụkọọ ọrụ
