Julia Anastasopoulos (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na ànó n'ọnwa June 1983) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa, ónyé na-eme ihe osise, ónyé na'ese ihe na ónyé na-ememe ihe nkiri
Anastasopoulos ghọrọ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ịntanetị na Mee 2014, na usoro weebụ ya na-eme onwé ya nke a maara dị ka SuzelleDIY
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye YouTube, Anastasopoulos mepụtara ihe osise aka na mgbidi na windo nke ọdụ bọs MyCiTi ole na ole
Julia bịdọrọ ihe ngosi nke ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya 'Ridiculousness with Suzelle DIY' na Comedy Central ebe ya na ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa gụnyere Amore na Francois va Coke
A mụrụ ya na Johannesburg na 1983, dị ka Anastasopoulos si kwuo, 'Nne m bụ ónyé nkuzi nka ma na-agba m na ụmụnne m nwanyị ume mgbè niile ime ihe ma gosipụta onwé m n'ụzọ okike
Akwụkwọ foto na ndị na-ese ihe osise dị ka Quentin Blake, Saul Steinberg na Raymond Peynet na-akpali m mgbè niile
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na arụmọrụ na Mahadum nke Cape Town
Site na 2001 rụo 2004, ọ nwetara BA ya na Theatre and Performance majoring na Acting na Mahadum Cape Town
Anastasopoulos sonyere na mmepụta ihe nkírí na Mahadum Cape Town
N'afọ 2004, o sonyere na The Blue Room, ihe nkiri nke Jacqui Singer duziri ma David Hare dèrè na Arena Theatre
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, n'afọ 2006, ọ kpara Ophelia na ihe nkiri Hamlet nkè Roy Sargaent duziri na Artscape Theatre
N'afọ 2008, Anastasopoulos mepụtara Peg Light ma nata ònyìnyé màkà asọmpi Eskom's Energy Efficient Lighting Design Competition n'okpuru Ụdị B Nhazi ọkụ ụlọ màkà ndị ọkachamara
Anastasopolous na-emepụta ihe màkà ihe nkírí, na 2008 o mepụtara ihe nkiri Magnet Theatre kwa afọ, kwa ụbọchị, m na-eje ije
N'afọ 2015, Suzelle nwetara ọnọdụ mbụ na mkpọsa Superbalist 100

Julia Grace Wales (14 Julaị 1881 - 15 Julaị 1957) bụ onye Canada agụmakwụkwọ a maara maka ide atụmatụ Wisconsin, atụmatụ ịmepụta nzukọ nke ndị ụbụrụ na-aghọ nkọ si mba ndị na-anọpụ iche ga-arụ ọrụ ịchọta ihe ngwọta maka Agha Ụwa Mbụ

A mụrụ Wales n'ụbọchị 14 Julaị n'afọ 1881 na Bury, Eastern Townships, Quebec na Benjamin Nathaniel Wales, onye dọkịta - gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum McGill n'afọ 1874 - na nwunye ya Emma Theodosia (née Osgood), onye lụrụ n'afọ 1878
Benjamin Nathaniel Wales bụ onye isi oche mbụ nke Historical Society of Argenteuil County, na nwa nwa Benjamin Wales, onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ akwụkwọ mbụ na Canada
Ezinụlọ ahụ bụ ndị Presbyterian
Julia Grace Wales gara Mahadum McGill na Montreal, nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts n'afọ 1903
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ natara Master of Arts na Radcliffe College
N'afọ 1906, ọ si Bury kwaga St
Andrews East, Quebec
Wales bụ nwa akwụkwọ, onye nkuzi na prọfesọ nke akwụkwọ Bekee na Mahadum Wisconsin (nke bụzi Mahadum nke Wisconsin)
Ọ kụziri na Mahadum London site n'afọ 1919 ruo n'afọ 1920, wee gaa na Mahadim Cambridge ruo n'afọ 1921
N'ịbụ onye ọkachamara na William Shakespeare, ọ nwetara nzere doctorate n'afọ 1926
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1914, Wales amalitela ịtụ egwu ma na-arịa ọrịa n'ihi akụkọ Agha Ụwa Mbụ sitere na Europe
Ezigbo enyi ya dere na 'ọmịiko na egwu ya jidere ya'

N'ịbụ onye kwenyesiri ike na agha ahụ bụ ihe na-enweghị isi na nke na-abụghị nke Ndị Kraịst, Wales bipụtara echiche ya na ngwọta maka njedebe nke agha ahụ na mpempe akwụkwọ akpọrọ 'Continuous Mediation Without Armistice', nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Wisconsin Plan

Atụmatụ ya bụ ka United States hazie nzukọ nke ndị ogbugbo ọgụgụ isi sitere na mba ndị na-anọpụ iche, ndị ga-enweta aro site na mba ndị ahụ na-ese okwu n'otu oge ahụ na-atụle ngwọta ndị nwere ike ịlụ agha
Ọtụtụ ndị na-emegide agha na udo kwadoro atụmatụ ahụ, yana ndị omeiwu Wisconsin
Dị ka onye nnọchiteanya, Wales nọchitere anya Wisconsin Peace Society na International Congress of Women, nke e mere na The Hague n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1915
N'ụzọ dị otú a, ọ ghọrọ onye guzobere Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Dị ka onye otu nnọchi anya nnọkọ ahụ, Wales weere aro ya, nke a nabatara dị ka mkpebi nke nnọkọ ahụ
Atụmatụ ya dara mgbe United States banyere n'agha n'ọnwa Eprel 1917, ọ laghachiri North America iji maliteghachi ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya
Wales akwụsịghị mmasị ya n'ihe omume udo, ma gaa n'ihu na-ebipụta isiokwu ndị na-emegide udo
Ya na nne ya na nwanne ya nwanyị nke ọ tọrọ, Anna Letitia, so dee nchịkọta abụ akpọrọ Argenteuil Lyrics, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1935
O dekwara edemede gbasara okpukpe
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ya, Democracy Needs Education, n'afọ 1942
Ebe ọ biri na Madison, Wisconsin site n'afọ 1940 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1947, Wales laghachiri St
Andrews East
Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ na 15 Julaị 1957, ụbọchị ọ gbara afọ iri asaa na isii
Ọ lụbeghị di ma ọ bụ nwunye ma ọ nweghị ụmụ
Julia Rosa Clark (amụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi nke ógè a na South Africa nke a maara maka 'ihe osise dị mgbagwoju anya, ederede ederede na akwụkwọ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ'
A mụrụ Clark nà Cape Town, South Africa nà 1975
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Fine Art Degree na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Mahadum Cape Town nà 2004
Clark arụwo ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ahụ màkà nhazi, a na-egosikwa ya na ihe ngosi mba ụwa na ọrụ ndị sitere na akpa ọkụ na uwe na nnukwu mgbidi
Ihe ngosi ya na-eji ala gallery, mgbidi na uko dị ka ákwà màkà nka ya
Ọ na-ejikarị ihe ndị a chọtara, ihe ndị ọ na-eji na-agụnye ihe ụmụaka ji egwuri egwu, igbe ochie na akwụkwọ ndị a na-ebipụ
Clark na-akọwa ọrụ ya na-agbanwe ihe ndị a dị ka 'ngwá ọrụ màkà ịnagide oke ozi ma ọ bụ mmetụta'
Ihe ngosi ya nke afọ 2004-2005, A Million Trillion Gazillion, jiri ihe dị iche iche nyochaa 'ụdị na-agbanwe agbanwe nke usoro ihe ọmụma'

Site n'enyemaka nke ụmụ akwụkwọ nka ndị ọzọ, Clark nwere mmetụta n'ihe agụmakwụkwọ ọdịnala dị ka akwụkwọ ndị e sere ihe iji gosipụta 'nkwekọ nke echiche ụwa na ọdịda na eziokwu nke ụwa anyị nke oge a'
Atọ n'ime ihe ngosi ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka trilogy, na-eleba ányà n'ụdị usoro ihe ọmụma na-agafe agafe
Ihe ngosi ọzọ, Hypocrite's Lament (2007) lekwasịrị anya na 'usoro nzaghachi nkè mgbakwunye na mbibi', (2007)
Ihe ngosi ya na-esote, Fever Jubilee (2010) lekwasịrị ányà na uto, na osisi ndị e ji akwụkwọ e wepụ mee nke rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ohere maka Clark na ezinụlọ ya iji zuo ike na ndị na-ege ntị
Akụkụ ikpeazụ nke trilogy ahụ lekwasịrị ányà na sayensị na agụmakwụkwọ, na-egosi ntinye nke na-ezo aka n'echiche na physics na nkà ihe ọmụma
Na mgbakwunye na ihe ngosi nke onwé ya, e gosipụtara Clark n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na mmekorita
Ọ chịkọtakwara ma soro hazie ọtụtụ ihe ngosi gụnyere Big Wednesday (2008) na Sing into my Mouth (2009) na gallery whatiftheworld na Woodstock, Cape Town
Clark na-ekwu okwu n'ọtụtụ mahadum South Africa
Clark akụziwo na alma mater ya Michaelis School of Fine Art na Cape Town klas dịgasị íchè íchè gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị ala na nke dị elu, eserese na eserese
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka ónyé nkuzi na Mahadum Stellenbosch, Cape Town School of Photography, Mahadum Teknụzụ Cape Peninsula, na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị ọzọ
Julia Frances Solly (née Muspratt; 21 Disemba 1862 ̊ 1953) bụ onye Britain na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eme ihe ike
Mgbe ọ lụrụ́ di, ọ gara South Africa, ebe ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị inyom a ma ama na Cape Colony
Na ikwado maka ikike ịtụ vootu, ọ kwadoro Cape Branch nke Women's Enfranchisement League (WEL), nzukọ mbụ na South Africa nke e guzobere iji kwalite ikike ụmụ nwanyị ịtụ vootu
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ike dị ka onye na-eme udo, ọ na-emegide Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer na Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ, mana o kwenyere na a ga kwụsị ndị Nazi na-ụzọ ọ bụla
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na-ọtụtụ mmemme mgbanwe ọha na eze ma bụrụ akụkụ nke purity movement
Maka ọrụ ya na National Council of Women, e nyere ya King George Silver Jubilee Medal na 1935
A mụrụ Julia Frances Muspratt na 21 Disemba 1862 na Seaforth Hall, Seaforth, Lancashire, England
Frances Jane (née Baines) na Edmund Knowles Muspratt
Ọ gara Cheltenham Ladies' College ma ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Nessie bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị mbụ na Mahadum College, Liverpool
Muspratt mụụrụ prọfesọ Harvey Gibson ma tinye uche na osisi nke South Africa

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ya na nna ya mere njem gaa Amerịka, buru ụzọ gaa Canada iji gaa nzukọ British Association na Montreal wee si n'ụzọ oké osimiri Pacific Northwest nke United States gaa New York City tupu ọ laa n'ụlọ

Na ngwụcha afọ 1880, Muspratt sonyeere alaka ụlọ ọrụ Women's Liberal Federation (WLF) West Toxteth nke nwanne ya nwanyị Nessie Stewart-Brown bụ onye isi oche, ya na nne ya, nwanne nne ya Ann Neal Muspratt (Mrs
Sheridan), nwanne ya nwanyị Stella Permewan (née Muspratt) na nwanne nwanyị di ya Helena Agnes Dalrymple Ainsworth (nwunye nwanne ya nwoke Max Muspratt)
Na 15 June 1890, ọ lụrụ Hubert LeGay Solly (23 April 1856 ː 1 December 1912) onye injinia Bekee na-arụ ọrụ na mba ọzọ n'ihi nsogbu ahụike maka gọvmentị South Africa na ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
N'otu afọ ahụ, di na nwunye ahụ gara De Aar, ebe Solly sonyeere Women's Christian Temperance Union
Ka ọ na-eru afọ 1895, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nlekọta nke otu ya
Onye na-eme udo, ọ zigara nna ya akwụkwọ ozi n'oge Agha nke Abụọ nke Boer, na-akọ akụkọ obi ọjọọ nke esemokwu ahụ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe agha ahụ kwụsịrị, di ya lara ezumike nká na 1904 n'ihi nsogbu ahụike ya wee biri n'ubi ya dị nso na Knor Hoek, Sir Lowry's Pass, Cape Colony
N'afọ 1907, Solly nyere aka chọta Cape Branch nke Women's Enfranchisement League (WEL), nzukọ mbụ na South Africa nke ha mepụtara iji nweta azụmahịa ha iji nweta ikike ịtụ vootu ụmụ nwanyị

Schreiner nwere nchegbu banyere nkewa ma gbaa Solly ume ka ọ wepụ ọdị iche okpukpe ma ọ bụ agbụrụ ma wepụ ihe ndị na-ekewa, dị ka onye isi ala otu oge, Irene Macfadyen (1907-1908), onye bụ otu onye na-emegide ụmụ nwanyị
Solly ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na Cape Colony
Ka ọ na-eru n'oge di ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1912, Solly na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town ebe ọ sonyeere National Council of Women na 1913
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, Solly na Reverend Ramsden Balmforth, nke Unitarian Church, South African Peace and Arbitration Society
Ọ bụ ezie na ha gosiri arụmụka na-akpali maka udo, mmadụ ole chọrọ ịnụ ha
Ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ sonyeere South African Association for the Advancement of Science, na-red war and negative Society Society Society Society
Ụmụ nwanyị NCW gara ámá na brigades iji nyochaa agbata obi
Solly guzoro maka ntuli aka na 1918 dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa maka Salt River Municipality mana e meriri ya
Na ọkara mbụ nke afọ 1920, Solly dere Charter ụmụ nwanyị nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Afrikaans ma zigara ya na alaka niile nke (National Women's Party)
'N'afọ 1926, Julia Solly rụrụ ụka n'ihu kọmitii ndị ome iwu na ụmụ nwanyị chọrọ ịtụ vootu dị ka 'ngwá agha nchebe ụlọ, nke pụtara na ikwe ka ụmụ nwanyị ịtụ vootu ga-echebe ezinụlọ
Ikike ụmụ nwanyị na South Africa nwere mgbagwoju anya n'ihi egwu na ndị isi ojii ga-enweta ike
Solly, jiri egwu ndị a mee ihe maka uru ụmụ nwanyị na-ekwu si ike na ọ bụrụ na e nye ụmụ nwanyị ọcha votu, ọ ga-amụ ba ndị ọcha na-atụ vootu
N'ikpeazụ, na 11 Eprel 1930, site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke vootu 40, gọvmentị Prime Minister Albert Hertzog kwadoro ikike ịtụ vootu maka ụmụ nwanyị ọcha dịka nke ndị ọcha
Ka ọ na-eru n'afọ 1935, Solly na-eje ozi dị ka South Africa meriri ya
Solly na Balm forth hapụrụ nguzo ha niile na world war II nwụrụ na South Africa, ka ọ bụrụ South Africa, na 1953
Julia Natasha Stone (amụrụ 13 Eprel 1984) bụ onye Australia na-abụ abụ-onye na-agụ abụ na ọtụtụ ngwa ngwa
Ọ bụ nwanne ọkara nke Angus & Julia Stone ma bụrụkwa onye na-agụ egwú solo
Mpụta mbụ ya album, The Memory Machine, ka ewepụtara na Septemba 2010
A tọhapụrụ album solo ya nke abụọ, Site na Horns na Mee 2012, wee nọrọ na No 11 na Chart Album ARIA
Julia Natasha Stone mụrụ na 13 Eprel 1984 wee tolite na Sydney
Ndị mụrụ ya, Kim na John Stone, bụ ndị egwu ọdịnala
Nwanne okenye nke Stone bụ Catherine (amụrụ ca
1982) na nwanne ya nwoke nke nta bụ Angus Stone (amụrụ 27 Eprel 1986)
Nkume gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Newport na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Barrenjoey
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ọ sonyeere ndị egwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na nna ya na-akụzi ihe na ụmụnne ya so ya
Na nnọkọ ezinụlọ mgbe ụmụaka na-eme egwuregwu, Stone na-akpọ opi, Catherine na saxophone na Angus na trombone na Kim na-abụ abụ na John na kiiboodu ma ọ bụ guitar
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na mgbe ya na nwanne ya nwoke nọ na South America na ezumike, nkà egwu egwu ya masịrị Stone masịrị, '[Angus] na-ede egwu dị ịtụnanya
[ọ] gosiri m otú e si egwu guitar na Bolivia, na ndị ahụ
egwu enwetala m n'afọ ahụ' N'ikpeazụ, Stone malitere ide egwu nke ya
Ka ọ na-erule 2005 Nkume na-egwuri egwu n'abalị mic mepere emepe, mgbe ụfọdụ Angus rụrụ ụda nkwado - egwu mbụ ha, na Coogee Bay Hotel, ha rụrụ 'Anya mmiri'
Mgbe ha na-egwu egwu nkewa na onye ọ bụla na-abụ abụ na-akwado ihe ndị ọzọ, na 2006, ha malitere duo, Angus & Julia Stone
Na March n'afọ ahụ ụzọ abụọ debut ha mpụta mbụ ogologo play, Chocolates na sịga, nke e wepụtara na August
Kemgbe ahụ otu ahụ ewepụtala EP ise, ọba mkpokọta na ọba studio anọ
Album nke abụọ Angus & Julia Stone, Down the Way (March 2010), arụpụtara na ọnụọgụgụ otu na Chart Albums ARIA wee nweta asambodo 3× platinum na 2011
Ọ bụ ọba egwu kacha ere nke onye na-ese ihe Australia maka 2010
Na ARIA Music Awards nke 2010 duo meriri ARIA Album of the Year for Down the Way na ARIA Single of the Year maka ' Big Jet Plane '
Egwu ahụ, 'Big Jet Plane', bụ ndị na-ege ọdụ ọdụ a họpụtara na ọnụọgụ-otu na Triple J Hottest 100 na 2011
N'agbanyeghị na ọ nwetara otuto dị egwu dị ka onye duo, Stone ebidola ọrụ egwu ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-egwu naanị ya
Na Septemba 2010, mgbe afọ ise nke ndekọ na njem na duo gachara, Stone wepụtara ya mpụta mbụ album, The Memory Machine, nke e depụtara na ARIA Albums Chart n'ime elu 100
Ndị Fans na ndị nkatọ nabatara ya nke ọma
Poppy Reid nke The Music Network chọpụtara na 'Julia na-eji akwụkwọ mmado ihe nkiri egwu egwu mara nkọ nke onye na-ese ihe UK bụ Caroline Pedler sere
Ihe ịma ọkwa ndị ahụ na-egosipụta isiokwu sitere na egwu ọ bụla; N'ezie, ha niile na-egosi Julia dị ka onwe ya'
Na June 2011 ọ bụrụ abụ nkwado na 'Ị Ga-aghọta' maka egbugbere ọnụ na-egbuke egbuke na Edward Sharpe na Igwe Igwe Igwe Ọdụdọ na egwu ọwụwa anyanwụ na Hollywood ebe a na-eli ozu
N'August afọ ahụ Nkume kwadoro onye ya na ya na-emekọ ihe, Doveman, na ihe ngosi na California na New York
Na 25 Mee 2012 Nkume wepụtara album solo ya nke abụọ, Site na mpi, n'otu oge gburugburu ụwa, nke rụrụ arụ na No 11 na Chart Album ARIA
Nkume kọwara ide abụ ndị ahụ wee kewapụ onwe ya na Angus nwa oge, '[w] e na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ndekọ ọhụrụ mana ọ naghị adị ya mma

Anọ m na-eche 'M ga-eme ya ugbu a, anyị ga-achọpụta ihe ga-eme mgbe ọ mere 'Mgbe ahụ, mụ na Angus na-ekwurịta okwu na ekwentị, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na ihe ndị ọzọ n'onwe ya, anyị abụọ kwenyekwara - anyị abụọ nọ n'otu ebe, dị njikere ijikọta nchịkọta egwu nke anyị' Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na album na California, France, Australia na India
Na mbụ ewepụtara na 2010, Julia's cover version nke 'Ị bụ Onye M Chọrọ' egosila na UK na Irish TV channel, Sky 's identification ad
Egwu ahụ banyere na eserese UK iTunes ka ọ gbasaa na azụmahịa
N'afọ 2015, e gosipụtara nkume na otu Jarryd James, ' N'agbanyeghị ' nke ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ 48 na Australia na August
Na Febụwarị 2020, Stone weputara ụdị mkpuchi nke ' akwa na-ere ọkụ '
Egwu a bụ onye ndu otu sitere na album mmekọ ọnụ Songs for Australia, ewepụtara na 5 Maachị 2020
Na Julaị 2020, ekwenyela na Stone abanyela na BMG Australia yana na 31 Ọktoba 2020, Stone kwupụtara na album studio nke atọ ya, Sixty Summers, ga-ewepụta na 30 Eprel 2021
EiC Na Nọvemba 2021, Stone kwupụtara mwepụta nke ọba ekeresimesi akpọrọ Ihe niile bụ ekeresimesi
Na nkwupụta na-eso ya, Stone kwuru, 'Egwu ekeresimesi abụwo akụkụ mara mma na nke na-enweghị atụ nke ndụ m
Nke a bụ ndekọ m na-achọbu ịme
Ọ nọwo n'ime m ogologo oge'

Na Septemba 2012, o gosipụtara na mkpọsa, 30 Songs / 30 Days, iji kwado Half the Sky Turning Uppression into Opportunity for Women Worldwide, a multi-platform media project nke Nicholas Kristof na Sheryl WuDunn 's akwụkwọ nke otu aha
Ihe nrite egwu ARIA bụ emume nturu ugo kwa afọ nke na-amata ịdị mma, ihe ọhụrụ na mmezu n'ụdị egwu Australia niile
Àtụ Angus & Julia Stone
Julia Varley, OBE (16 March 1871, Bradford, Yorkshire – 24 November 1952, Yorkshire) was an English trade unionist and suffragette

Born at 4, Monk Street in Horton in Bradford, she was one of seven surviving children out of nine born to Martha Ann née Alderson (1849-1896) and Richard Varley (1847-1913), an 'Engine Tenter' according to the 1911 Census, meaning he oversaw the operation of the engine driving the machinery at a local woollen mill
The family lived in Horton Bradford
Her maternal grandfather, Joseph B

Alderson (1796-1886), was among those protesting during the Peterloo Massacre of 1819 and was a Chartists during the 1830s, and it was perhaps from him that she inherited her social conscience and desire to campaign for the rights of ordinary working people
In 1883 at the age of 12 she worked as a 'half-timer', attending school but also working as a sweeper
A 'full-timer' at the age of 14, she joined the General Union of Textile Workers and quickly became a full-time organiser and branch secretary
In 1886 aged just 15, she became the secretary of the Bradford Weavers' and Textile Workers' Union

In the 1891 Census Varley is listed as a 'Worsted Weaver', and during this period she showed her early commitment to the rights of working people when she supported textile workers at Manningham Mills when they went on strike over low pay and poor working conditions
She talked to workers about the importance of joining a union

On the death of her mother in 1896 Varley became responsible for caring for her younger siblings until 1902, at the same time still working long hours at the mill while also maintaining her trade union efforts
Varley was the first woman to join the Bradford Trades Council in 1900, and went on to serve on the Council for seven years
Aged 24 she chose to live for six weeks as a tramp, walking or ‘tramping’ from Leeds to Liverpool to see what it was like to live on Poor Law handouts
She served on the Board of the Poor Law Guardians of Bradford between 1904 and 1907
Varley joined the Women's Social and Political Union (WSPU), with whom in February 1907 she was involved in a raid on the floor of the House of Commons
She refused to pay a fine for disturbance and obstruction and was sentenced to 14 days in Holloway Prison
Varley served a second sentence for a similar action and was released on April 20 1907
For these actions she was awarded the Holloway brooch by the WSPU
In 1909 Varley moved to Birmingham and established a branch of the National Federation of Women Workers at the Cadbury factory at Bournville

She was also involved in the Cradley Heath women chainmakers' strike of 1910, led by Mary Macarthur, and the Black Country strike of 1913, and later sat on the General Council of the Trade Union Congress
From 1912 to 1929 Varley was an organiser for the Workers' Union
In 1913 she supported the Workers' Union when 5,000 Cornish Clay workers went on strike

Until 1915 Varley was the only female organiser in the Workers' Union, actively working for the Union as an organiser throughout World War I, even though she endured a serious operation on her throat in 1917
Varley disagreed with many of the male members of the Birmingham Trades Council when the government introduced conscription, joining the breakaway Birmingham Trade Union Industrial Council
In 1918 Varley joined five other women who were sent to France to investigate rumours that WAACs serving there during WWI had behaved in an immoral way
Varley and the other women found the rumours to be baseless, finding instead that the women had actually served with distinction
In 1920 in Birmingham Varley founded a Domestic Servants' Union to take on the plight of the 125 million female domestic servants
Varley set up a social club for these women in Birmingham which the Daily Chronicle referred to as a 'servants’ paradise'

At the same time a Servants' Charter of appropriate working conditions for the women was issued covering working hours, time off, a minimum wage, their own bedroom, that the employer was responsible for paying for their uniform and that they should be addressed by their proper names
Varley was a member of a 1923 Ministry of Labour enquiry into the problem of the 'servant shortage'
This, she stated, was largely down to parents wanting a better life for their daughters, rather than have them endure the drudgery of domestic service
Varley also worked with the Society for the Overseas Settlement of British Women, and in 1925 travelled to Canada to meet women who had settled there
At this time she was also involved in the work of the Industrial Welfare Society, which was concerned with the struggle for employer-provided lunchrooms and restrooms
Varley was Women Workers member of the General Council of the Trades Union Congress (1921–1935), and Chief Women's Officer of the Transport and General Workers' Union (1929–1936)
A họpụtara ya OBE na 1931 maka ọrụ ọha
Na 1928 na 1937 Varley nwetara ịwa ahụ n'anya ya ma mesịa kpuo ìsì
Na Septemba 1935 ọ bụ onye otu nnukwu ndị nnọchi anya mba ụwa na Njikọ Mba Nile na Geneva bụ nke kwuru okwu maka ịha nhata maka ụmụ nwanyị gburugburu ụwa
Ọ bụ onye isi okwu nke ndị nnọchiteanya na ọrụ ya na Kọmitii Women's of Trades Union Congress (TUC) na Kọmitii International nke Trade Union Women
Ọ lara ezumike nká na 1938 mana ọ gara n'ihu na-ebi na Birmingham, mana n'ihi ahụ ike ya na-ada ada na kpuru ìsì ọ gara biri na nwanne ya nwanyị di ya nwụrụ bụ Jessie Wooller na Bradford na Yorkshire
Julia Varley nwụrụ na Nọvemba 1952 dị afọ 81 na 32 Hampden Street na Bradford wee lie ya n'ili Undercliffe
Ọ lụọghị nwanyị ma hapụ nwanne ya nwanyị Jessie otu ala bara uru na £ 1419 14s 3d
Na Mee 2013, e mere ncheta ya site n'iwulite ihe ncheta na-acha anụnụ anụnụ n'ụlọ mbụ ya na 42 Hay Green Lane, Bournville, nke Birmingham Civic Society
A na-edebe ebe nchekwa akwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Hull Archives

Julian Francis Abele (Eprell 30, 1881 ruo Eprel 23, 1950) bụ onye Black Amerịka a ma ama na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, na onye isi na-ese ihe n'ọfịs Horace Trumbauer

O nyere aka n'ịmepụta ihe karịrị ụlọ narị anọ, gụnyere Widener Memorial Library na Mahadum Harvard (1912 ruo 15), Central Library nke Philadelphia (1917 ruo 27), na Philadelphia Museum of Art (1914 ruo 28)
Ọ bụ onye isi na-emepụta ihe nke ogige ọdịda anyanwụ nke Mahadum Duke (1924 ruo 54)
Onyinye Abele nyere ụlọ ọrụ Trumbauer dị ukwuu, mana naanị ụlọ ọ kwuru na ọ bụ ya dere ya n'oge ndụ Trumbauer bụ Duke University Chapel
Mgbe ọnwụ Trumbauer na 1938 gasịrị, ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu ma mepụta ụlọ ndị ọzọ na Duke, gụnyere Allen Administrative Building na Cameron Indoor Stadium
A mụrụ Julian Abele na Philadelphia n'ezinụlọ a ma ama
Nna nna ya bụ Robert Jones, onye guzobere Lombard Street Central Presbyterian Church na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na asatọ
O nwekwara ihe jikọrọ ya na Absalom Jones, onye guzobere African Episcopal Church of St
Thomas na 1794, chọọchị ojii mbụ na Philadelphia
Nwa Abele, Julian Francis Abele, Jr
bụ onye injinia na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na nwa nwanne ya nwoke, Julian Abele Cook, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi ụlọ maka Mahadum Howard
Abele rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi watercolor, lithography, etching na pensụl, osisi, ígwè, ọlaedo na ọlaọcha
O chepụtara ma wuo oche nke ya niile, ọbụnakwa na-eme obere ihe n'onwe ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ maara ọtụtụ ụdị akụkọ ihe mere eme, o yiri ka ọ hụrụ Louis nke Iri na Anọ French n'anya karịa ihe niile
Abele gara Quaker-run Institute for Colored Youth, nke mesịrị ghọọ Mahadum Cheyney, ebe ọ pụtara nke ọma na mgbakọ na mwepụ ma họrọ ya inye adreesị mmalite
N'afọ 1898, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ abụọ nke ihe osise ụlọ na Pennsylvania Museum School of Industrial Art (PMSIA, ugbu a Mahadum nke Arts)
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ ojii mbụ nabatara na Ngalaba Architecture na Mahadum Pennsylvania
Ihe a rụzuru bụ ihe dị ịrịba ama maka mgbochi ndị Black na-eche ihu na mahadum ahụ, gụnyere enweghị ike ibi n'ụlọ ihi ụra ma ọ bụ rie nri na ụlọ nri ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
[aha mkpa] Na ọrụ e kenyere ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ, ya na Louis Magaziner, naanị nwa akwụkwọ ndị Juu nọ na ngalaba ahụ, onye na-eche ịkpa ókè ihu
Nke a bụ mmalite nke ọbụbụenyi ogologo oge n'etiti ha abụọ
O meriri asọmpi ụmụ akwụkwọ nke 1901 iji mepụta ọnụ ụzọ ndị njem Beaux Arts
Nkwado ya dị n'ụdị exedra a curved bench flanked by piers, mana na steepụ na-agafe n'etiti ya
Nke a ghọrọ ọrụ mbụ ya mgbe e wuru ya na campus nke Haverford College
Edward B
Conklin Memorial Gate guzo n'ọnụ ụzọ Railroad Avenue nke kọleji

A na-akwanyere ya ùgwù n'etiti ndị ọgbọ ya, na-enweta aha njirimara 'Willing and Able', ma nwetakwara onyinye ụmụ akwụkwọ maka atụmatụ ya maka post ọfịs na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke botany, a họpụtakwara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Architectural Society nke mahadum
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ojii mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba ihe owuwu nke Mahadum Pennsylvania na 1902
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge maka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ n'ógbè ahụ ma gaa klas mgbede na Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts
N'okpuru nkwado ego nke onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na Philadelphia bụ Horace Trumbauer, ọ gara France na Ịtali, ahụmịhe nke ga-emetụta ọrụ imewe ya n'oge ndụ ya niile
N'agbata 1903 na iwe ya n'ọrụ site n'aka Horace Trumbauer na 1906, Abele gara Europe niile
Ụmụ ya na-ekwu na ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École des Beaux-Arts na Paris n'oge ọ nọrọ
Mana Sandra L
Tatman, onye so dee The Biographical Dictionary of Philadelphia Architects, 1700-1930, enweghị ike ịchọta ihe ndekọ ọ bụla banyere idebanye aha ya na École
Ọ na-ekwe ka e kwe ka ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ n'amaghị ama
Ọ na-ekwukwa na Abele depụtara njem gaa France, Italy, England, Germany, Switzerland, na Spain na ngwa ya na American Institute of Architects (AIA), mana ọ bụghị ịmụ na École des Beaux-Arts
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UPenn na 1902, Abele gara n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ gaa Spokane, Washington, ebe o mere ụlọ maka nwanne ya nwanyị, Elizabeth Abele Cook, tupu ọ laghachi n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ
N'afọ 1906, Abele sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Trumbauer dị ka onye na-enyere onye isi na-emepụta ihe Frank Seeburger aka
Mgbe Seeburger hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1909, Abele gara n'ihu bụrụ onye isi na-emepụta ihe
Ọdịdị Abele n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ abụghị ihe nzuzo; ọ bụ onye ọrụ nke abụọ a na-akwụ ụgwọ kachasị elu
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme David B
Brownlee nyochara mgbalị afọ iri na anọ iji chepụta ma wuo Philadelphia Museum of Art, 1914-28
Ọ na-eto onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Trumbauer bụ Howell Lewis Shay maka atụmatụ na nchịkọta nke ụlọ ahụ, mana ọ na-ekwu na ihe osise ikpeazụ dị n'aka pụrụ iche nke Abele
Nhazi nke terracing mpụga, gụnyere nzọụkwụ ihu emere na ihe nkiri 1976 Rocky, bụ nke Abele
Mgbe Abele sonyeere American Institute of Architects na 1942, onye nduzi Philadelphia Museum of Art Fiske Kimball kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe na America'
Smithsonian Magazine kọwara ya, n'ihe gbasara ọrụ ya, dị ka 'ma eleghị anya onye kachasị arụ ọrụ [Black architect] nke oge ya'
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye isi na-emepụta Mahadum Duke, a jụrụ Abele ebe obibi na họtel Durham n'oge ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ruo na 1988 ka e gosipụtara onyinyo ya na Mahadum ahụ, a na-akpọ isi quad na Mahadim Duke ugbu a Abele Quad na ihe ncheta nraranye nke a na-etinye n'ebe kachasị na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
N'afọ 1925, mgbe ọ dị afọ 44, ọ lụrụ Marguerite Bulle, onye France na-akpọ piano nke dị afọ iri abụọ karịa ya
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ Julian Abele, Jr, Marguerite Marie Abele (nwụrụ na nwata), na Nadia Boulanger Abele
Marguerite hapụrụ ya na 1936, ka ọ bụrụ nwunye iwu nke onye na-agụ egwu opera Jozef Kowalewski, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ atọ ọzọ
N'ihi na Abele emeghị ihe iji gbaa nwunye ya alụkwaghịm, ụmụ Kowalewski kewara na ala ya
Ọ nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi na 1950, na Philadelphia ma lie ya na Eden Cemetery na Collingdale, Pennsylvania
Gothic House, Tours, France (1915), ihe osise nke Abele
'Rocky Steps' na terraces, Philadelphia Museum of Art, Philadelphia, PA (1928)
Duke University Chapel, Durham, NC (1932)
Cameron Indoor Stadium, Duke University, Durham, NC (1940)
Krzyzewskiville Lawn, Cameron Indoor Stadium, Duke University, Durham, NC
Allen Administrative Building, Duke University, Durham, NC (1954)
Julian Ogilvie Thompson (a mụrụ n'afọ 1934 na Cape Town, South Africa) bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke De Beers na ụlọ ọrụ Anglo American mining
A mụrụ Julian Ogilvie Thompson na 1934 na Cape Town, South Africa
Nna ya, Newton Ogilvie Thompson, bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Mkpesa nke South Africa
Ogilvie Thompson gụrụ akwụkwọ na Diocesan College na Cape Town na Mahadum Oxford
Ogilvie Thompson ghọrọ onye enyemaka nke Harry Oppenheimer na 1957, ọ sonyekwara ngalaba ego Anglo American na 1961
Ọ gara n'ihu na-elekọta ma na-eduzi ngalaba a ma sonyekwa na bọọdụ De Beers na 1966
A họpụtara Ogilvie Thompson dị ka onye isi oche nke Anglo American na 1971 nakwa dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Barclays National Bank, bụbu First National Bank, na 1977
Ọ nọchiri Harry Oppenheimer dị ka onye isi oche nke Minorco na 1982 na dịka onye isi oche nke De Beers na 1985
Ọ nọchiri Gavin Relly dị ka onye isi oche nke Anglo American na 1990 ma lara ezumike nká dị ka onye isi oche nke De Beers na 1997 iji bụrụ osote onye isi oche na-abụghị onye isi oche
Mgbe o duziri njikọta nke Anglo American na Minorco n'afọ 1999, Ogilvie Thompson ghọrọ onye isi oche na onye isi oche ya
Tony Trahar nọchiri ya na 2000 mana ọ gara n'ihu dị ka onye isi oche na-abụghị onye isi oche
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka osote onye isi oche nke De Beers na 2002, mana ọ gara n'ihu ịbụ onye isi na-abụghị onye isi
Ogilvie Thompson bụ onye otu Board of Trustees nke Mandela Rhodes Foundation
Ogilvie Thompson lụrụ The Honourable Tessa Mary Brand, nwa Thomas Brand, 3rd Viscount Hampden, na 1956
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2020
Julian Perry Robinson (N'ụbọchị 11 Nọvemba 1941 ruo n'ụbọchị 22 Eprel 2020) bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka ọgwụ na onye na-eme nchọpụta udo
A mụrụ ya na Jerusalem, Perry Robinson gụrụ akwụkwọ na Canford School, wee gaa Merton College, Oxford n'afọ 1960 iji gụọ Chemistry; ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta nke abụọ n'afọ 1964
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ nọrọ afọ anọ na-amụ iwu patent nke mba na nke mba ụwa na ụlọ ọrụ Chartered Patent Agents nke dị na London
O nwere nhọpụta nyocha na Mahadum Free nke Berlin, Mahadum Harvard na Mahadim Sussex
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ na World Health Organization, United Nations, International Committee of the Red Cross na United Nations Environment Programme
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ na Stockholm International Peace Research Institute site n'afọ 1968 ruo afọ 1971
Mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ, ọ bụ onye isi nyere aka na ọmụmụ nke isii The Problem of Chemical and Biological Warfare

Ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado Pugwash Study Group on Implementation of the Chemical and Biological Weapons Conventions, onye na-eduzi Harvard Sussex Program on Chemical andBiological Weapons, nke bipụtara CBW Conventions Bulletin
Juliana Ojoshogu Negedu (ka a mụrụ n'ụbọchị iri atọ na otu
n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1979 na Kaduna ) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
Onye otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na 2004 Summer Olympics, Negedu nwetara akara asatọ n'ime egwuregwu ise
Juliana Oluwatobiloba Olayode, makwaara dị ka Toyo Baby, aha o nwetara site na egosi dị ka Toyosi na usoro Jenifa's Diary ; bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri na onye na-akwado mmekọahụ na Naijiria
A makwa ya dị ka onye na-akatọ inwe mmekọahụ tupu ha alụọ di na nwunye n'etiti ndị ntorobịa Naijiria
A mụrụ Juliana n'ezinụlọ nwere mmadụ asatọ, a zụlitere ya na Lagos, Nigeria
Olayode si n'okpuru ọchịchị Ipokia nke Ogun Steeti
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ dịghị mgbe ọ chere na ọ ga-abụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Tupu ọ pụta ìhè, o meela ihe dị ka ihe nkiri anọ gụnyere Couple of Days ebe ọ gosipụtara dị ka 'Judith'
Ọ nwetara ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Jenifa ka ọ gachara ihe ngosi ahụ
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye ama ama na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria
N'agbanyeghị ji nwayọọ nwayọọ ghọọ aha ezinụlọ n'ihi ọrụ ya dị ka Toyo Baby na usoro ihe nkiri TV, Olayode na-akwado onyinyo ya dị ka nwa agbọghọ na-esote
Ọ na-agbalịsi ike ka ọ kwụ n'ala n'agbanyeghị àgwà ndị a ma ama na akụ̀ na ụba
Na ọkara nke abụọ nke 2017, Olayode bipụtara akụkọ ndụ ya, Rebirth From Grass to Grace
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ na-ekwu banyere ndụ onwe ya, mmetọ mmekọahụ, na mgba ọrụ ya
O meela n'ụfọdụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere
Juliana Daniel Shonza (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1987) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania na onye otu Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na-achị
Ọ bụ osote minista nke ozi, ọdịbendị, nka na egwuregwu ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu otu oge ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ oche pụrụ iche maka ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Juliana Daniel Shonza na ọnwa 23 Eprel nke afọ 1987 na mpaghara Songwe
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kibasila Secondary School na afọ 2005 na Dakawa high school na afọ 2008
Bachelor mbụ ya na Sociology site na afọ 2008 ruo na afọ 2011 na nzere masta na Sociology sitere na afọ 2013 ruo na afọ 2015 na Mahadum Dar es Salaam na Mahadume Dodoma

Shonza tinyere aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Dar es Salaam dị ka osote onye isi oche nke National Youth Council of Chadema N'afọ 2013 ọ kwagara Chama Cha Mapinduzi ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ nke mkpali na isi ụlọ ọrụ CCM
N'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2015, a họpụtara Juliana Shonza dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu Tanzania site na oche ụmụ nwanyị pụrụ iche iji debe maka afọ 2015 ruo na afọ 2020
N'afọ 2017, Onye isi ala John Magufuli họpụtara ya dị ka osote minista na Ministry for Information, Culture, Arts and Sports n'oge mgbanwe ndị o mere na 9 Ọktoba 2017
Ọ na-eje ozi na kansụl n'okpuru Minista Dr
Harrison Mwakyembe
Àtụ Chama Cha Mapinduzi
Julie nwere ike na-ezo aka
Julie Michelle Arblaster bụ onye sayensị mba Australia
Ọ bụ ọkà nkuzi na School of Earth, Atmosphere and Environment na Mahadum Monash
Ọ bụ onye edemede na-enye aka na akụkọ nke Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) bụ otu onye natara 2007 Nobel Peace Prize

Ọ natara ihe nrite nke 2014 Anton Hales Medal maka nyocha na sayensị ụwa site na Australian Academy of Science, n'afọ 2017 Priestley Medals site n'aka Australian Meteorological and Oceanographic Society
A họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Top Influential Earth Scientists nke afọ 2010-2020, site n'ihi ọrụ ịma na ọrụ mkparịtaụka yaị
Arblaster tolitere na Swan Hill, na mpaghara Loddon Mallee nke Victoria, mba Australia
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke teknụzụ na sayensị ikuku, na Mahadum Macquarie, Sydney, nakwa n'afọ 1995 e nyere ya nzere nke Ogo mbụ (First Class Honours), kwa na Маhadụ Maccuarie
Ndị nlekọta nzere ya bụ Bryant McAvaney na Ann Henderson-Sellers
Site n'afọ 1997 ruo n'afọ 1999 Arblaster gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Colorado, USA, ebe ọ nwetara MSc na Atmospheric na Oceanic Sciences

Akwụkwọ edemede ya nke nzere Masters, nke Gerald Meehl (National Center for Atmospheric Research) na Andrew Moore (University of Colorado) lekọtara, akpọrọ 'Interdecadal modulation of Australian climate in the Parallel Climate Model'
Site n'afọ 2007 ruo n'afọ 2013 Arblaster gụsịrị akwụkwọ nzere PhD ya na School of Earth Sciences, Mahadum Melbourne, Australia
Ndị nlekọta PhD ya bụ David Karoly, Ian Simmonds (Mahadum Melbourne) na Gerald Meehl
Isiokwu edemede ya bụ 'Drivers of Southern Hemisphere Climate Change'
Site n'afọ 1999 ruo n'afọ 2003, Prọfesọ Julie Arblaster rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR)
N'afọ 2003, ọ laghachiri mba Australia, na-arụ ọrụ na NCAR na Bureau of Meteorology na Melbourne

Prọfesọ Arblaster rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchọpụta sayensị site n'afọ 2003 ruo n'afọ 2016 na otu usoro mgbanwe ihu igwe na The Centre for Australian Weather and Climate Research, nke bụ mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation na Bureau of Meteorology
Ọ ka na-arụkọ ọrụ nyocha ya na otu amụma mgbanwe ihu igwe na NCAR
N'afọ 2016, Prọfesọ Arblaster sonyeere ụlọakwụkwọ nke School of Earth, Atmosphere and Environment na Mahadum Monash dị na Melbourne, Australia
A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ Prọfesọ zuru oke n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2020
Arblaster zụlitere inwe mmasị na ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ikuku n'ime afọ mbụ nke nzere sayensị ya, ma mesịa gbanwee uche ya na nzere ya iji mụọ sayensi ikuku
N'oge ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ ndị ọzọ na Bureau of Meteorology, nke kpaliri ya ịmụtakwu banyere usoro ihu igwe
Nnyocha Arblaster na-elekwasị anya na usoro ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ na ụzọ mgbanwe ihu ọha gara aga, nke na nso nso a na nke ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu
N'afọ 2009, o so dee akwụkwọ jikọta obere mgbanwe na ọrụ anyanwụ n'oge afọ 11 nke okirikiri anyanwụ na usoro dị na stratosphere na oké osimiri
N'ịmepụta ihe karịrị otu narị afọ nke data, ndị nchọpụta nwere ike ịkọ ọdịdị ihu igwe mpaghara dị ka mmiri ozuzo nke India na mmiri mmiri zoro n'oge oyi na North America
Nsonaazụ ahụ gosikwara na a pụghị ịkọwa ịdọ aka ná ntị zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ọma site na okirikiri anyanwụ
Ịchọpụta na ikewapụ mmetụta nke obere mgbanwe stratospheric bụ nzọụkwụ dị mkpa n'ịmepụta ụdị amụma ziri ezi

Arblaster na-eji ụdị ihu igwe iji ghọta mgbanwe na Southern Hemisphere atmospheric circulation dị ka Southern Annular Mode (SAM) na Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD), na'ịgwakọta mgbanwe okpomọkụ na oke ihu ọha
Arblaster nwere mmasị na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti mgbake a tụrụ anya ya nke oghere ozone Antarctic n'ime iri afọ na-abịanụ na mmụba nke gas na atụmatụ ihu igwe n-abịa
Ọ na-emepụta ihe nlereanya ndị nwere ike igosi ohere nke ihe omume ihu igwe siri ike na onyinye nke mgbanwe ihu ọha nke mmadụ kpatara na ihe ndị dị otú ahụ
Isiokwu a nyochara ihe akaebe dịnụ iji ghọta etu ihu igwe ụwa nwere ike isi gbanwee n'etiti narị afọ a na karịa
N'ụzọ doro anya, akụkọ IPCC a bụ nke mbụ na-akọwapụta carbon dioxide ole ọzọ nwere ike ịpụta iji mee ka okpomọkụ ụwa dị n'okpuru ọnụ ụzọ ụfọdụ
Arblaster bụ onye otu World Climate Research Programme Stratospheric-Tropospherric Processes na ọrụ ha na Climate (SPARC) otu nduzi sayensị
Ọ bụ onye edemede na Scientific Assessment of Ozone Depletion 2014 site na World Meteorological Organization na ndị ọzọ
Ụfọdụ n'ime ụdị ihu igwe kachasị ọhụrụ na-atụ aro na mmetụta na 'mmetụta ihu ọha' nwere ike ịdị njọ karịa ka a tụrụ anya ya na mbụ

Arblaster bụ onye bịanyere aka na nkwupụta nke afọ 2020 site n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị 423 nke mba Australia bụ ndị kwenyesiri ike na 'ihe akaebe sayensi na-ejikọta mgbanwe ihu igwe nke mmadụ kpatara na ihe ize ndụ na ụba nke ọkụ ọhịa na ala Australia' ma kpọọ gọọmentị Australia 'ịmepụta ụkpụrụ ndị sayị maara iji lụso mgbanwe ọnọdụ ihu ọha nke ụmụ mmadụ mere ọgụ' na 'belata ngụkọta gas na mba Australia'
N'afọ 2014, ndị òtù Australian Academy of Science nyere Arblaster ihe nrite Anton Hales maka nyocha na sayensị ụwa
Ihe nrite a gosipụtara nyocha Arblaster banyere usoro ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ na mmetụta ya na mgbanwe
N'afọ 2017, Arblaster ritere ihe nrite Priestley site na Australian Meteorological and Oceanographic Society
Arblaster bụ onye edemede na-enye aka na akụkọ nke IPCC nkeIPCC bụ otu onye natara 2007 Nobel Peace Prize
Julie Catherine Manning bụ onye ọka iwu, onye ọka ikpe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Tanzania
Nwaanyị Tanzania mbụ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu tupu ọ bụrụ Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi site n'afọ 1975 ruo afọ 1983
N'afọ 1963, Julie Manning ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum nke East Africa
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese iwu na Ụlọikpe Attorney General

N'afọ 1973, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Tanzania, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị Africa mbụ na-ekpe ikpe n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ma ọ bụ n'etiti AfrịkaA họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi n'afọ 1975, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị abụọ mbụ jere ozi na kansụl Tanzania
Mgbe Joseph Warioba nọchiri Manning dị ka Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi n'afọ 1983, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya nke Tanzania Ottawa, Canada
Julie Mosch

elesová (nke mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụo na otu nke ọnwa Ọgụstu afọ 1892, Prague ̊ mkpụrụ ụbọchị asaa nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1956, Prague), nke a makwaara dị ka Julie Moschelos, bụ onye Juu na-asụ asụsụ German na Czechoslovak geographer
Ọ bụ nwanne nna ya, onye England na-ese ihe Felix Moscheles, zụlitere Moschelesová na London
Mgbe ya na ya nọ na njem gaa North Afrika, ọ zutere onye Norwegian geologist Hans Henrik Reusch onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Oslo, Norway
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, Alfred Grund [de] nke Mahadum Germany nke Prague chọpụtara mmasị ya na ọdịdị ala bụ onye mere ka ọ kwenye ịmụ ihe n'ebe wana
N'inweta PhD
na 1916, o mechara kwaga Mahadum Czech dị na Prague wee nweta ikike na anthropogeography n'afọ1934
N'afọ 1939, ọ gbapụrụ n'aka ndị Nazi wee kwaga Australia, ebe ọ kụziri ihe na Mahadum Melbourne
Ya na enyi ya Greta Hort laghachiri Prague mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị mana ha chere ọtụtụ afọ tupu ya enwee ike ịkụzi na Mahadum Charles
Ọ bụ onye na-ese siga nke ukwuu, ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa n'afọ 1956

A mụrụ ya na Prague, Austro-Hungary, n'abali iri abụo na otu nke ọnwa 21 Ọgọst n'afọ 1882, Julie Moschelesová bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye ọka iwu ndị Juu na-asụ German Wilhelm Moscheles (1861 Xi 1943) na nwunye ya Luise née Schwabacher (1869 Xi 1922)
Ebe ọ bụ na nne ya kpuru ìsì, ọ bụ nwanne nna ya, onye England na-ese ihe Felix Moscheles, na nwunye ya zụlitere ya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na London
Di na nwunye ahụ kpọọrọ nwa nwanne ha nwanyị na njem ha na-eme ugboro ugboro na Europe na North Afrika
Mgbe ọ nọ na Morocco, Moschelesová zutere Hans Henrik Reusch, onye Norwegian geologist, onye kpọrọ ya ka ya na ya rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụgharị na ọrụ geology ya na Oslo
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, prọfesọ Austrian bụ Alfred Grund chọpụtara mmasị ya na ọdịdị ala na njem ọmụmụ
O mere ka o kwenye ịmụ geography na Mahadum German dị na Prague
O nwetara nzere doctorate na 1916, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka a na-akwụghị ụgwọ na mahadum
N'ịbụ onye ụmụ akwụkwọ Germany na-ahụ mba n'anya na-eche ihu, ọ kwagara na Mahadum Charles na-asụ Czech ebe ọ nwetara nzere habilitation na anthropogeography n'afọ 1934
N'ịbụ onye ndị Nazi bi na Czechoslovakia na-eyi egwu, dị ka onye Juu, a manyere Moschelesová ịhapụ mba ahụ
Ọ kwagara Australia ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ geography na Mahadum Melbourne
N'ebe ahụ, ya na Greta Hort, prọfesọ a mụrụ na Denmark nke akwụkwọ Bekee, nke mahadum ahụ jikwa n'ọrụ
Ọ zutere Hort na alaka Czechoslovak nke Red Cross ebe ha abụọ bụ ndị otu
Mgbe ọ nọ na Melbourne, n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ Moschelesová rụrụ ọrụ maka gọọmentị Dutch dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala yana maka Ngalaba Geographical nke Allied Military Service
Mgbe agha ahụ biri, ya na Hort Moschelesová laghachiri Prague mana ha chọpụtara na ọ dịghị onye ọ bụla n'ime ndị ikwu ya ka dị ndụ
Ebe ọ na-enweghị ike ịchọta ọrụ a na-akwụ ụgwọ, ọ biri n'ọnọdụ siri ike nke Hort nyeere aka
Ihe dị ka afọ anọ mgbe ọ bịarutere, o mechara nwee ike ịkụzi ihe gbasara ala na Mahadum Charlies, na-enye ya ohere ịkwaga n'otu ụlọ
Onye na-ese siga nke ukwuu, ọ butere ọrịa kansa ma nwụọ na 7 Jenụwarị 1956 na Prague
A mụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 2, 1980
Julie Mukoda gara Mengo Senior School na Mbogo High School maka ọkwa O na 1996 na ọkwa A na 1998 maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gụrụ Computer Science na Mahadum Makerere na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Computer Science na 2005
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta Master of Public Administration site na Uganda Management Institute, na Kampala na 2016-2018
N'afọ 2014

N'agbata afọ 2007 na afọ 2008 ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-edeba aha agụmakwụkwọ na Betel Training Institute, Assistant Systems Administrator na TASO, Jinja na 2002 Dzha2004, Network Administrator na MXN Technologies na 2006 Dzha 2007 ọ bụ onye nduzi na United Helping Hands for Uganda site na afọ pụkụ abụọ na asaa 2007 ruo taa, Patron na Core Foundation 2012 ruo taa, ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị Mayuge District ọ nọ n'ọkwa kemgbe 2016 ruo taa
Mgbe ntuli aka February 2016 gasịrị, a họpụtara Julie Mukoda dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị Mayuge District na 2016
E wezụga ọrụ ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Ugandan, ọ na-anọdụ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu ndị a

Juliana (Julie) Omonukpon Omoifo Okoh (onye amụrụ na Ubiaja, n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Ọgọọst, n'afọ 1947) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede egwuregwu, onye nkuzi na onye na -akwado ụmụ nwanyị bụ onye prọfesọ nke usoro ihe nkiri na Mahadum Port Harcourt site n'afọ 2004 ruo afọ 2017
N'ịgbasa okwu gbasara ụmụ nwanyị na ọha mmadụ, ihe ejije ya gụnyere The Mannequins (1997), Edewede (2000) na Emechiri ụzọ (2007)
Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta Fulbright,n'afọ 2011, O nwetara onyinye mmeri ndụ site na Society of Nigerian Theater Artists (SONTA)

Amụrụ ya na Ubiaja na steeti Edo dị na ndịda Naijiria, Juliana Omonukpon Omoifo bụ ada Augustine Azamuoisa Omoifo, onye nkuzi na ode akwụkwọ ụlọikpe na nwunye ya, onye na- akwa akwa na onye njikwa ụlọ ahịa
N'ịbụ onye a zụlitere n'ezinụlọ dị obi umeala, ọ bụ onye nke ise n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ asatọ
Nne na nna ya gbasiri ukwu ike na omenaala nna ya hụrụ egwu n'anya ma na-akpọ ụbọ mgbe nne ya bụ onye na-akọ akụkọ ọdịnala bụ onye so na egwu ejije Ikhio
Ọ lụrụ Joseph Donatus Okoh (amụrụ n'afọ 1941), onye prọfesọ ọkachamara na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt
Ha nwere ụmụ anọ
Mgbe Juliana Omoifo gụchara akwụkwọ praịmarị na Ubiaja, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Our Lady of Lourdes na Uromi
O wee nweta ọrụ na Ministry of External Affairs na Legọs ebe ọ gara ule GCE na ọkwa nkịtị na ọkwa dị elu
N'ihi rizọọt ya pụtara ìhè, ọ nwere ike ịga nkuzi afọ atọ na ọzụzụ dịka odeakwụkwọ asụsụ abụọ na Federal Training Center
N'afọ 1972, enyere ya ohere ịbanye na Mahadum Loyola Chicago ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na French na English Literature n'afọ 1976
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta akara ugo mmụta mastas na French Literature na Mahadum Alberta (1979)
O mechara gaa Mahadum Bordeaux III ka ọ mụọ ihe nkiri French na English, na-enweta nzere masta na 1989 yana PhD na 1991

N'afọ 2000 na 2001, Okoh nọ na United States ebe ọ bụ onye ọkaibe Fulbright na Smith College, na-ewere ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi ọbịa na North Carolina State University na University of Massachusetts na Amherst
N'afọ 2004, ọ malitere ogologo ọrụ dịka prọfesọ nke usoro ihe nkiri na nkatọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt
Julie Okoh lara ezumike nka n'afọ 2017
N'okwu nkuzi akpọrọ 'Towards Feminist Theater in Nigeria', nke O gosipụtara na October 2012, Okoh kwubiri
Echiche nke ịha nhatanha nke nwoke na nwanyị gbadoro anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị abịala ogologo oge, akwụkwọ gbasara nwanyị ekerewokwa oke n'iweta mgbanwe n'omume n'ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọ
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ogologo agha ka dị n'ihu, n'ihi na ọ ga-ewe ogologo oge tupu ịha nhatanha nwoke na nwanyị na ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị n'ime ọha mmadụ ka a ghọta nke ọma ma nabata ya n'echiche ziri ezi
Ọ bụrụ maka mụ onwe m, ahọpụtara m ebe a na-eme ihe nkiri ka ọ bụrụ ebe a na-ekwu okwu, maka nke ahụ
Agbalịrị m ịgakwuru ụwa site na omume ihe nkiri m dabere na ụkpụrụ na usoro nwanyị
Okoh edeela ma duzie ihe karịrị egwuregwu iri atọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha ebipụtala, ya na edemede dị egwu na akụkọ n'asụsụ French na Bekee gbasara ihe nkiri, omenala na okike
Otu n'ime ihe nkiri ya kacha aga nke ọma bụ Ewedede nke e mere na mahadum Port Harcourt n'afọ 1998
Ebumnuche ya bụ ime ka ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa kwenye na mpụpụ bụ omenala ekwesịrị ịzere, na-egosi ya dịka omume ọjọọ
Ejije na-agụnye egwu ọdịnala na egwu ụmụ nwanyị, mgbe ụfọdụ na-emebi emebi
Iji ogologo iku ume mmekọahụ dị ka ngwaọrụ, ụmụ nwanyị na-atụ vootu machibido mpụpụ
Mpụpụ bụkwa isiokwu nke oge zuru oke, nke a na-agba ndị na-ege ntị ume isonye na ntuli aka ma ọ bụ n'abụ na ịkụ aka
Ejije ya gụnyere
Enyere Okoh ọtụtụ ego nyemaka ịga akwụkwọ na ihe nrite
Ha gụnyere

Julie Ann Owens (amụrụ 17 Ọktoba 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Australia nke bụbu onye otu pati Labour Party nke Australian House of nnọchiteanya kemgbe October 2004, na-anọchite anya Division of Parramatta, New South Wales
A mụrụ Owens na abali iri asaa, na onwa iri na 1958 na Rockhampton, Queensland
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Brisbane n’ihi ọrụ nna ya na-arụ n’agha
Owens gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Everton Park State
Ọ gara n'ihu na-aga Queensland Conservatorium of Music, na-amụ piano n'okpuru Nancy Weir na gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na Music
Owens bụ onye njikwa mmepụta na Lyric Opera nke Queensland site na 1985 ruo 1989, ebe ọ na-etinye aka na mmepụta nke Aida, La bohème na Madama Butterfly
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi mmemme mmemme na Council Australia site na 1989 ruo 1993 na CEO nke Association of Independent Record Labels site na 2000 ruo 2004
Ọ bụkwa onye nwe obere azụmaahịa wee gụchaa MBA na Mahadum Sydney
Nkwalite mbụ Owens na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bịara na 1996, mgbe ọ guzoro dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour na Division of North Sydney
E nyere ya obere ohere imeri, n'ihi na North Sydney abụwo ebe nchekwa nchekwa ogologo oge, na Liberal Joe Hockey meriri ya nke ọma
Na mkpọsa ntuli aka nke 2004, Owens gbara ọsọ megide onye isi Liberal Ross Cameron

Mgbasa ozi ahụ ama ama maka nnabata Cameron, onye ama ama na-akwado ụkpụrụ ezin’ụlọ, na o nwere mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị, na Owens meriri oche na mmasị, n’agbanyeghị mgbawa megide Labour Party na New South Wales
Owens bụ onye na-azụ azụ ma bụrụkwa onye so na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Nkwukọrịta Ozi, Ozi Teknụzụ na Arts site na Disemba 2004
Ọ bụ ezie na ya oche e mere notionally Liberal na a redistribution n'ihu nke 2007 ntuli aka, ọ bụghị nanị na-ejigide oche ya, ma e dekọrọ a ike siwing nke asaa isi
Ọ meriri oge nke atọ na 2010 na naanị obere ịgbagharị megide ya, wee merie nke anọ na 2013 ọbụlagodi gọọmentị Labour tụfuru
Mmeri ya nke 2013 bụ akara nke ugboro abụọ (mmeri mbụ ya bụ nke mbụ) na ndị Liberal ma ọ bụ ndị bu ya ụzọ nọ na gọọmentị na-ejideghị Parramatta
Ka arụkwaghịm nke onye omebe iwu Labour Craig Thomson dị ka onye isi oche kọmitii Economics, a họpụtara Owens onye isi kọmitii ahụ
Na 28 Ọktoba 2021, Owens kwupụtara na nzuko omeiwu na ọ gaghị esonye na ntuli aka na-esote
Julien Hudson (Jenụwarị 9, 1811), bụ nwoke nwere onwe ya na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu nke bi na New Orleans
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nka na-aga nke ọma
A na-eche na ọ bụ onye Africa America mbụ nke a maara onyinyo onwe ya, agbanyeghị na Louisiana State Museum na-ezo aka ugbu a na onyinyo mmanụ 1839 dị ka Portrait of a Man, So-Called Self Portrait
A mụrụ Julien Hudson na Jenụwarị 9, 1811, na New Orleans
Nna ya, John Thomas Hudson, bụ ónyé Britain na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na onye na-ere ígwè
Nne ya, Suzanne Désirée Marcos, bụ onye New Orleans quadroon n'efu
Omume agbụrụ nke Hudson abụwo ihe nyocha ruo afọ ole na ole
E depụtara ya na mbụ na ndekọ ọbọdọ na 1838 na-enweghị aha 'nwoke nweere onwé ya nke agba'
N'afọ sochirinụ, a gụnyere 'fmc'
O doro anya na nna Hudson esoghị ezinụlọ ahụ biri mgbe 1822, mana nne ya nwere itinye ego na ụlọ ma nwee ego na-akwụsi ike
Hudson nwere ike ịbụ na ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ na Bienville Street dị nso na Bourbon Street
N'ime ezinụlọ ahụ, a maara Julien site na aha njirimara 'Pickil'
Mgbè ọ laghachiri New Orleans, Hudson meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na 120 Bienville Street na 1831, ọ bụ ezie na ọ pụtara na ndekọ ọbọdọ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe naanị n'afọ 1837-1838
N'oge dị mkpirikpi na 1840, Hudson nwere nwa akwụkwọ, George David Coulon (1822-1904)
Julien Hudson nwụrụ na 1844 na New Orleans
Julienne Keutcha (21 Ọktoba, na afọ 1924, 2000) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Cameroon
N'afọ 1960, ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na National Assembly nke French Cameroon
A mụrụ Keutcha na afọ 1924 n'obodo nta Ngwatta dị nso na Santchou
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ịma mma na Paris, wee ghọọ onye na-elekọta ụmụaka
Ọ lụrụ Jean Keutcha, onye mechara bụrụ minista na onye nnọchi anya
Ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 1960 wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na National Assembly
Ọ nọgidere n'ọchịchị ruo n'afọ 1972
N'oge ọ nọ na nzuko omeiwu ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Bureau ma nọrọ na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme ná Mba Ọzọ
Ọ ghọkwara onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke Cameroon National Union ma bụrụ naanị nwanyị so na kọmitii ahụ n'oge ahụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2000
Julienne Lusenge na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) na 1998 mgbe agha obodo dara
Ọ bụ onye mgbasa ozi redio na-elekọta mmadụ maka ịkọrọ ndị obodo nọ n'ime ime obodo ozi ahụike na ikike mmadụ
Lusenge gara njem na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ DRC na-agba ụmụ nwanyị ajụjụ ọnụ gbasara ndụ ha na ịkọrọ akụkọ ha na ihe nkiri redio ya
Ka oge na-aga, ụmụ nwanyị malitere ịkọwa ihe mere ime ihe ike dị egwu nke ha hụrụ ma ọ bụ ndị ihe metụtara ka agha ahụ na-akawanye njọ
Lusenge malitere idekọ mmetọ ahụ n'ụzọ mmekọahụ na ịkatọ omume a na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị n'ihu ọha
Julienne Uwacu bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Rwanda, onye jere ozi dị ka minista nke egwuregwu na ọdịbendị na Cabinet nke Rwanda, kemgbe ụbọchị 24 Febụwarị 2015
Na mgbanwe nke ụbọchị 31 Ọgọst 2017, Julienne Uwacu nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ ya
A mụrụ ya na Rwanda, n'ihe dị ka afọ 1979
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere tupu afọ 2008, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi obodo nke Nyabihu District, na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na mmepe
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015
Mgbe ọ nọ na nzuko omeiwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'onye osote onyeisi oche nke Kọmitii Nzukọ omeiwu na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ọzọ, imekọ ihe ọnụ na nchekwa'
Juliet Nene Akano (amuru May 22, 1963) bu onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
A họpụtara ya na Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya na 2007 ya na 2011
A mụrụ Akano na Kano State na afọ 1963 na ezinụlọ Godson na Alice Obasi bu ndi Arochukwu
Azụliteghị ya na Kano steeti ka ezinụlọ ya na-akwagharị mgbe ọ ka amụrụ ya ọhụrụ
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata ọ bi n'Enugwu ebe nne ya kuziri ihe, nna ya na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Ministry of Finance
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ omebe iwu obodo ka ọ nọchite anya gọọmentị Nwangele/Isu na Njaba mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo steeti Imo
Ọ jere ozi site na 2007 mgbe ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke kọmitii na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị

N'afọ 2008, o kwuputara atụmatụ inye ụmụaka 20 nọ n'afọ praịmarị nke atọ iji kwụọ ụgwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na maka mmadụ iri abụọ ahụ bụ ndị kacha elu n'afọ 6 na mpaghara gọọmentị ha, mgbe ahụ, scholarship ga-akwụ ụgwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ obere ha
Akano wepụtara ịgọnarị maka asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ya, nke eboro ebubo ụgha
Ọ nọ na House of Assembly ruo 2011
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnwaanyị iri na otu a họpụtara n'afọ 2007 bụ ndị ahọpụtara ọzọ n'afọ 2011 mgbe ụlọomeiwu nta fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 95% nwoke

Ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ a họpụtara gụnyere Mulikat Adeola-Akande, Abike Dabiri, Nkiru Onyeagocha, Uche Ekwunife, Nnena Elendu-Ukeje, Olajumoke Okoya-Thomas, Beni Lar, Khadija Bukar Abba-Ibrahim, Elizabeth Ogbaga na Peace Uzoamaka Nnaji
N'afọ 2015 ọ bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa ịbụ onye sinetọ n'ụlọomeiwu ukwu maka Orlo na steeti Imo
Juliet Yaa Asantewa Asante bụ onye ome ihe nkiri Ghana, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi na onye enyemaka
Na 1999, Asante malitere mmepụta ụlọ Eagle House Productions

N'otu afọ ahụ ọ malitekwara 'Save Our Women International', bụ ụlọ ọrụ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na-elekwasị anya na agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị wee malite ihe ọhụrụ na-eme obere ihe nkiri maka ekwentị mkpanaaka na Africa na 2014 nke a na-akpọ Mobile Flicks
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi oche nke Black Star International Film Festival
Eagle Production enyerela aka zụọ ụfọdụ ndị nwoke na nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na Ghana site na aka ọzụzụ ha, Eagle Drama Workshop
Amụrụ Asante na Ghana na ọ bụ nke abụọ n'ime ụmụaka ise
O nwetara nzere Masters na Public Administration (MPA) na Master's na Public Policy (MPP) na Harvard Kennedy School of Government
O nwekwara nzere bachelọ abụọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Coast, ma gụchaakwa na National Film and Television Institute

Juliet bụ onye isi oche nke National Film Authority nke Ghana, Onye isi oche nke National Film na Television Institute (NAFTI) na onye guzobere Black Star International Film Institute, ndị na-ahazi Black Star International Film Festival (BSIFF)
Enyere Juliet ihe nkiri 'Kachasị Mma' na Ghana na 2001
O mechara gaa na National Film na Television Institute nke Ghana, ebe o nwetara klaasị mbụ ya na nduzi ihe nkiri

Dị ka onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-emeputa ihe nkiri, Juliet tọrọ ntọala Eagle Productions ltd na 1999, na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji mepụta ụfọdụ ihe ngosi na-aga nke ọma na Ghana Television n'etiti 2001 na 2010
Juliet Bashiisha Agasha bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke jere ozi na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda kemgbe na afo 2021
Agasha na-anọchite anya oche Mitooma District maka ụmụ nwanyị dị ka onye otu National Resistance Movement
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2011 na Uganda, Agasha gbara ọsọ dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya maka ndị omeiwu nke Uganda na oche Mitooma District maka ụmụ nwanyị
Agasha zutere Jovah Kamateeka nke National Resistance Movement
Kamateeka meriri Agasha, na-enweta votu 19,971 ma e jiri ya tụnyere votu ogugu 29,263 nke Kamateeka
Na ntuli aka nke Uganda n'afọ 2016, Agasha gbara ọsọ ọzọ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya megide Kamateeka
Ọ bụ ezie na e meriri Agasha ọzọ, ọ meriri site na obere ohere, na-enweta ogugu 32,032 vootu ma e jiri ya tụnyere ogugu 37,949 nke Kamateeka
Na ntuli aka nke 2021 na Uganda, Agasha gbara ọsọ megide Kamateeka maka oge nke atọ
Agasha meriri Kamateeka na ntuli aka NRM, na-enweta vootu 25,228 na 23,227
Isi ihe kpatara ọnwụ Kamateeka bụ afọ ndụ ya, ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ntụli aka na-ekwu na ha ga-ahọrọ ịhụ onye nnọchi anya ọhụrụ, nke na-eto eto na ndị omeiwu
N'agbanyeghị mmeri ya na ntuli aka, Kamateeka gbara ọsọ na ntuliaka n'ozuzu dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya

Ọ bụ ezie na isi nkwado Agasha dị na mpaghara Ruhinda South, Kamateeka enweghị ike ijikọta isi nkwado n'ihi onye nke atọ, onye nweere onwe ya Rebecca Kyarampe, na-ekewa votu na Kamateeka n'ọtụtụ mpaghara ya kachasị ike
Agasha mechara merie Kamateeka na Kyarampe na ntuli aka n'ozuzu, na-enweta vootu 34,736 ma e jiri ya tụnyere 16,148 nke Kamateeka na ogugu 13,974
N'oge ọ nọ na ụlọ omebe iwu, a na-eto Agasha maka imeziwanye ọnọdụ akụ na ụba na Mitooma District, ebe ọ na-akwadokwa maka inye ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ntorobịa ikike
Ọ na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Otu na Kọmiti Na-ahụ Nkwekọrịta
Isiokwu nke usoro ahụ metụtara onye nyocha ndị uwe ojii nwanyị nke weghaara ikike nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii na obodo efu nke Hartley na Lancashire
Stephanie Turner rụrụ ọrụ onye isi nke Inspector Jean Darblay na usoro otú ruo atọ , mana na usoro anọ ruo isii Anna Carteret nọchiri ya maka ọrụ Inspector Kate Longton
Carteret nọgidere na usoro ahụ ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị na 1985
Ọ bụ Ian Kennedy Martin chepụtara usoro ahụ, onye nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na usoro ihe nkiri ndị uwe ojii ọzọ, The Sweeney

Ọ bụ ezie na ụdị ihe nkiri ndị uwe ojii guzobere nke ọma na telivishọn Britain site na 1980, Juliet Bravo na London Weekend Television's The Gentle Touch, nke malitere ọnwa ole na ole tupu mgbe ahụ, bụ usoro mbụ nke hụrụ ndị isi nwanyị dị ka ndị isi, na-alụ ọgụ megide mpụ na ajọ mbunobi nke ndị ọrụ ibe nwoke
Kennedy Martin dabeere na àgwà nke Jean Darblay na ezigbo onye nyocha ndị uwe ojii, Wynne Darwin
Ụlọ ọrụ UKTV Drama weghachiri usoro isii niile na 2018 na ọzọ na mbido 2019
A na-ekwughachi usoro ahụ n'ozuzu ya na eriri na satellite UK Gold site na mmalite na 1992 ruo 2001
E chepụtara aha usoro ahụ site na akara oku redio nke onye nyocha 'J-B' ma ọ bụ 'Juliet Bravo' dị ka ọ na-egosi na mkpụrụ edemede phonetic NATO

E ji akara a mee ihe naanị ugboro abụọ n'oge Stephanie Turner nọ n'ọkwa, oge abụọ ahụ na usoro atọ , ihe omume iri na anọ Ebe e nwere Muck ikpeazụ Stephanie Turner dị ka onye isi ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe Inspector Darblay malitere redio n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Hartley site n'ebe ihe mberede okporo ụzọ metụtara ụgbọala na-ebu drum jupụtara na kemịkal
N'oge ndị ọzọ niile ọ na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka Inspector Darblay na nkwukọrịta redio
Otú ọ dị, site na usoro nke anọ gaa n'ihu, a na-ejikarị akara oku eme ihe
Aha ọrụ mbụ nke mmemme ahụ bụ 'Inspector, Ma'am,' na-ezo aka na ọkwa na aha onye isi
E jidere aha a n'oge ihe nkiri nke usoro mbụ, mana a tụfuru ya tupu mgbasa ozi
Onye Inspector Jean Darblay dabeere na ya nwere ọkwa Inspector na ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Great Harwood na mpụga Blackburn
Otú ọ dị, obodo Lancashire nke Hartley gosipụtara na mmemme ahụ dabeere na Bacup
[citation needed]
Ọ bụ Terence Williams mepụtara usoro abụọ mbụ
Site na usoro nke atọ, a họpụtara Jonathan Alwyn dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe, na Chris Boucher na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta edemede
Geraint Morris mepụtara usoro anọ , ịse na isii Ọ bụ Derek Goom dere egwu egwu nke usoro ahụ

Bob Cosford bụ onye na-ese ihe osise mbụ, onye kwekọrọ na ụda isiokwu ahụ na ihe osise mmeghe na mmechi nke dị na baajị ndị uwe ojii na-agbagharị 'kpakpando na okpueze', nke nwere ngwaọrụ 'E II R' nke ndị uwe ojii England, mana n'ọnọdụ aha ike gburugburu gburugburu gburugburu na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, ọ gosipụtara okwu ndị 'County Constabulary'
N'ime usoro abụọ mbụ, a na-ahụ Inspector Darblay ka ọ na-anya oroma Austin Mini (ndebanye aha ikikere RVH 873T)

N'usoro nke atọ, a na-ahụ ya ka ọ na-anya Austin Mini Metro na-acha odo odo (ndebanye aha ikike MVP 519W) nke, na ihe omume anọ Amateur Night, a pụrụ ịhụ ya ka ọ kwụsịrị n'akụkụ oroma Mini ː ma eleghị anya ụgbọ ala eji mee ihe na usoro abụọ gara aga na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala n'èzí Hartley Little Theatre, ma e wezụga ihe omume ịse A Breach of the Peace ebe a hụrụ ya ka ọkwọ ụgbọala ndị uwe ojii Ford Escort
Na usoro nke anọ gaa n'ihu, a na-ahụ Inspector Kate Longton ka ọ na-anya Austin Maestro ọla edo (ndebanye aha ikikere SOJ 626Y)

Ọ bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị iburu n'uche na dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ DVLA si kwuo, edebanyere ụgbọala a n'akwụkwọ na Febụwarị 1983, mana ụbọchị mbido maka Austin Maestro abụghị ruo na ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Machị 1983
Nke a nwere ike ịbụ ntinye ngwaahịa site na ụlọ ọrụ British Leyland nke oge ahụ iji nye ụgbọ ala ọhụrụ ha ụfọdụ mgbasa ozi
E mere ihe nkiri ndị dị n'èzí n'obodo ndị dị na Lancashire nke Colne, Bacup, Accrington, Nelson, Burnley, Todmorden, Blackburn, Simonstone na Read
E jikwa ebe ndị ọzọ dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Lancashire, West Yorkshire na Black Country (Tipton na Dudley) mee ihe
Mpụga nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Hartley nke a hụrụ n'ime usoro niile bụ n'ezie ụlọ ọrụ ndị Uwe Ojii dị na Bank Street n'obodo Bacup
Mgbe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechiri na 2011, ndị na-akwado usoro ahụ mere mkpọsa iji chekwaa ya ka ọ ghara ịkwatu, ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie a raara nye ihe nketa nke usoro ahụ
N'afọ 2012, onye mmepe obodo zụrụ ya ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọhụrụ isii
A tọhapụrụ usoro isii niile nke Juliet Bravo na DVD site na 2 avinEntertain/Cinema Club
E wepụtara usoro nke mbụ na ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba 2005
E wepụtara usoro nke abụọ na ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2005
E wepụtara usoro nke atọ na na ụbọchị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 2006
E wepụtara usoro nke anọ na ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee 2006
E wepụtara usoro nke ise na ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst 2006

Usoro nke isii nọgidere na-enweghị ntọhapụ ruo ihe karịrị afọ abụọ mgbe ntọhapụ nke Usoro nke ise, ruo mgbe ndị na-akwado usoro ahụ nyere abụọ LakEntertain arịrịọ, na-achọ ka ewepụta usoro nke isii na nke ikpeazụ na DVD
E mechara wepụta usoro nke isii na ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba 2008
A tọhapụrụ usoro mbụ na abụọ na Region anọ DVD na Australia
Ọ bụ Mollie Hardwick dere nke a
Pan Books bipụtara abụọ mbụ
Juliet Bravo 1 (1980) bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke usoro mbụ Shot Gun, Fraudulently Uttered, The Draughtsman, The Runner na Family Unit
Juliet Bravo 2 (1980) bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke usoro mbụ Cages, The One Who Got Away, Relief na The Anastasia Syndrome
Calling Juliet Bravo New Arrivals (1981) bụ akụkọ nke usoro nke abụọ nke New Arrivales na usoro nke atọ nke Cause For Complaint
Longman Imprint Books wepụtara akwụkwọ edemede, nke nwere edemede TV ise site na usoro mbụ nke Alison Leake chịkọtara na Febụwarị 1983
Ọtụtụ aha a ma ama, ma nke oge ma ọ bụ nke ọdịnihu, pụtara na ihe ngosi ahụ

Juliet Ehimuan bụ onye Nigeria gụrụ maka nkanụzụ ma nwekwa nghọta miri emi na ya, Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego nọ ugbu a dika ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ụlọ ọrụ Google na Nigeria
N' ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, edebara aha ya naForbes dika otu n'ime '20 Youngest Power Women In Africa'
A mụrụ Ehimuan na Nigeria, Ehimuan nwetara nzere digiri na BEng

nakwa Computer Engineering site Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife Ọ mere ọfụma site na inwe 'first Class' Ọ gara n'ihu inweta postgraduate digiri na Computer Science site na University of Cambridge, United Kingdom tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ịgụchapụ MBA ya na London Business School

N'afọ 1995, Ehimuan bidoro ọrụ dị ka Onye Nlekọta na ahụ ndi ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ ha nke ọma otu ọkwesiri ka esi rụọ ya bụ nke a kpọrọ 'Performance Monitoring and Quality Assurance Supervisor' n'ụlọ Shell Petroleum Development

O hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ a n'afọ 1997 we sonye ụlọ ọrụ nke Microsoft UK dị ka Maneja na-ahụ ọrụ di iche iche nke ụlọ ọrụ Microsoft nwegasịrị na mba Europe, Middle East nakwa Africa, ọrụ ọzọ gụnyere Maneja na ahụ maka nzụkọrịta ahia nke ụlọ ọrụ Microsoft Nigeria na mba ụwa niile
N'afọ 2005 ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Microsoft wee bido ụlọ ọrụ nke ya ọ kpọrọ Strategic Insight Consulting Ltd
Ọ mechara bụrụ Maneja n'ụlọ ọrụ Chams Plc's Strategic Business Units n' ọmwa Eprel n'afọ 2011, E nyere ọkwa dika Maneja na-anọchite anya ụlọ ọrụ Google na Nigeria

Dika 'Fellow' nke ndi Cambrige Commonwealth Society, Mbọ ọna-agba iji kwalite nkanụzụ mere ka enye ihe onyinye di iche ichea ụfọdụ ihe onyinkye ndi a gụnyere igụ akwụkwọ n'efu nke di 'London Business School Global Women' nyere ya
Mgbe ọ gara Mahadum Cambridge o ritere ihe onyinye abụọ , ha bụ ' Selwyn College Scholar na Malaysian Commonwealth Scholar'
N’afọ 2012, ọ nwere mmeri ma nweta ihe onyiye “IT Personality of the Year” na mmeme 'National Information Technology Merit Award
Juliet Ibrahim bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ghana na onye na-agụ egwú nke ndị Lebanọn, o bụ onye Ghana na Liberia
O meriri ihe nturu ugo onye omere kacha mma na ihe nrite onye ndu na 2010 Ghana Movie Awards maka oru ya na 4 Play
Akpọrọ ya aha 'Nwanyị Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka Kachasị Mma' dịka Magazin A-listers siri kwuo
Juliet Ibrahim amụrụ nye nna Lebanon na nne bu onye Ghana -Liberia
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ ma nwee ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Sonia Ibrahim, na nwanne

Juliet na ụmụnne ya nọrọ ogologo oge n'oge ha bụ nwata na Lebanon na Ivory Coast n'ihi agha obodo O guru ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Lebanon, wee ga Ivory Coast maka akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya ebe o bi ya na ndị mụrụ ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ghana Institute of Languages, ebe ọ gụrụ Bekee, French na Spanish
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka ire ahịa, mgbasa ozi na mmekọrịta ọhanaeze na Ghana Institute of Journalism
Ibrahim mere ihe ngosi izizi mbụ ya na ihe nkiri 2005 Crime to Christ nke na- egosi Majid Michel
Na 2014 o wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Number One Fan, bụ ebe ọ gosiputara dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke onye ofufe ya na-achụso na fim ahụ
Usoro ihe onyonyo ọhụrụ ya; 'Every woman has a Story ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nduzi na-agbasa na Terrestrial Tv na ihe ngosi eziokwu ọhụrụ ya, Onye enyemaka zuru oke, TPA ga-ekpughere n'oge adịghị anya
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri Twi, na ihe nkiri asụsụ Yoruba
nakwa na Ladan Aure, ihe nkiri asụsụ Hausa
N'afọ 2020, Ibrahim lụrụ VJ Adams, onye na-egwu diski Naijiria

Juliet Itoya onye amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri na asaa n'ime ọnwa asatọ n'afọ 1986, bụ nwaafọ Naijiria amụrụ na Spanish na-eme egwuregwu ma bụrụ ọkachamara Long Jump O meriri nrite ọla edo na 2014 Ibero-American Championship
Ogo kacha amasị ya na ihe omume ahụ bụ mita 679 n’èzí (+ 14 m/s, Salamanca 2016) na 647 mita n'ime (Madrid 2016)
Nrụtụaka
1RFEA Profile

University of Geneva
Juliet Kyinyamatama Suubi (amụrụ na 22 Disemba, na afọ 1988) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu

N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti na nzuko omeiwu maka distrikti Rakai, a họpụtara ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ n'ọchịchị na ntuli aka 2016 Uganda General na maka oge nke atọ n'ọkwa na ntuliaka afọ 2021 Uganda General
O mere mkpọsa dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere onwe ya mgbe ọ meriri na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n'afọ 2001 na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịm Ronald Ruta na Lyantonde

N'afọ 2005, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị dị ala na Valley College dị na Bushenyi, ebe ọ gụsịrị ọkwa sekọndndrị dị elu nke a maara dị ka Uganda Advanced Certification of Education (UACE) n'afọ 2008
N'afọ 2012 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ndị Kraịst nke Uganda na nzere Bachelor nke Social Work and Social Administration
O nwetara asambodo na Global Health na Mahadum Geneva na afọ 2013
Juliet Rainer Kafiire bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye omeiwu nke Uganda nke nọchitere anya Kibuku County na Pallisa n'etiti afọ 1994 ruo afọ 2006
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Uganda's Democratic Party (DP)

N'oge ntuli aka nke 1994 Ugandan Constituent Assembly, a họpụtara Kafiire dị ka onye nnọchi anya Pallisa Dị ka onye otu National Caucus for Democracy (NCD), Kafiire bụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchi anya iri ise na atọ nke ndị omebe iwu jụrụ ịkwado iwu na afọ 1995
Kafiire nọchitere anya Kibuku County na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda n'etiti na afọ 1996 ruo afọ 2006
O mechara tụfuo ọkwa a na afọ 2006 General Elections na Saleh Kamba onye nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement (NRM)
N'ọnwa Nọvemba na afọ 2005, a họpụtara Kafiire dị ka osote onye isi ala nke Uganda's Democratic Party (DP)
Kafiire lụrụ Joseph Rainer, onye Germany nwụrụ na afọ 2007
Juliet Raphael Michael bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka akụrụngwa nke Western Bahr el Ghazal kemgbe 18 Mee 2010
Julieta da Graça Pinto do Espírito Santo (Nwụrụ wụrụ na Jenụwarị 2, 2008) bụ dọkịta na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị São Toméan
Nwaanyị dọkịta mbụ na mba ahụ, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ìgwè mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị so na National Assembly n'afọ 1975
Graça banyere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi nke Instituto de Odivelas na Portugal n'afọ 1933
O mechara mụọ ọgwụ na ịwa ahụ na Mahadum nke Coimbra, laghachi São Tomé n'afọ 1955 dị ka nwanyị dọkịta mbụ na mpaghara ahụ
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị n'afọ 1975 ọ ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwa nke ọrụ ahụike ma na-ahazi mmemme World Health Organization na agwaetiti ahụ
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1975, a họpụtara Graça ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu mba ahụ dịka otu n'ime ndị inyom isii mbụ nọ na ndị omeiwu
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na ndị omeiwu maka Independent Democratic Action

Juliette Nana (amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2000) bụ onye Burkinabé na agba bọọlụ, onye na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-eme bọọlụ n'etiti Hatayspor na Njikọ bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Turkish na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Burkina Faso
Nana agbaala bọọlụ maka ZhFK Neman Grodno na Belarus
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2022, ọ kwagara Turkey, wee bịanye aka na Hatayspor ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ na Super otu egwuregwu nke afọ 2022
Nana gbara ọsọ maka Burkina Faso na ọkwa dị elu noge asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2022
Julio Cusurichi Palacios bụ onye isi na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Peru si na mpaghara Madre de Dios nke Peru
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị natara ihe nrite nke Goldman maka ebe obibi n'afọ 2007
Julius Amedume (amụrụ na 6 June 1977), bụ onye nduzi Ghana-British, onye edemede na onye na-emepụta ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka iduzi ihe nkiri a kpọrọ A Goat's Tail na Rattlensnakes
A mụrụ ya na 6 June 1977 na Ewe, nke dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science (BSC Hons) na nkwukọrịta na teknụzụ
O nwere ike ịkwaga England mgbe o nwetasiri ohere agụmakwụkwọ n'efu nke Toledo, ebe ọ gụsịrị ma nweta nzere masta ya na iduzi akụkọ ifo na National Film and Television School
Ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ obere ihe nkiri Canal Plus na Belgium na France banyere ihe nrite Cinefondation na 2001 Cannes Film Festival
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, o dere ma duzie ihe nkiri anọ dị mkpirikpi nke gụnyere The Meeting, The Video Tape, na The Phone Call

N'afọ 2006, o duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ A Goat's Tail nke e mesịrị merie ihe nrite Best Feature na 2007 Los Angeles Pan African Film Festival Ka ọ dịgodị, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya, 'Amedume Films'
N'afọ 2009, ọ duziri obere ihe nkiri Mary na John, nke e mechara họpụta maka Best Short na 2009 Rushes Soho Film Festival na Golden Lion na 2010 Taipei county film festival na Taiwan
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke mkpirikpi ahụ gasịrị, ọ duziri mkpirikpi ihe nkiri ọzọ na-enweta ihe nrite Lorraine
A họpụtakwara mkpirikpi a maka Best Short na 2010 Rushes Soho Film Festival
N'afọ 2010, e gosipụtara mkpirikpi ihe nkiri ya bụ Maazị Graham na 14th Urbanworld Film Festival na New York 2010
Mgbe ahụ o mere ihe nkiri maka ngụsị akwụkwọ ya na aha Precipice
E nyere ọrụ a Best Short Film Award na 7th Africa Movie Academy Awards, yana African Oscar maka Best Diaspora Short na 2011 African Movie Academy Awards (AMAA) na Nigeria

Mgbe o gosipụtara ọgụgụ isi na mahadum ahụ, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ iri na asatọ sitere na ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri Britain, French na Polish nke MEDIA DESK UK ga-ahọrọ iji nyere aka mepụta ihe nkiri ngụsị akwụkwọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2012, o mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya site n'ime usoro Doctors
Mgbe ahụ na 2014, o mere ihe nkiri ụlọ That Thing That Happened nke nwetara otuto ndị nkatọ
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu The Academy Of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
Julius Nyang'oro (a mụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye edemede, ọkà mmụta sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọkà mmụta iwu

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Ngalaba nke African na African-American Studies na Mahadum nke North Carolina na Chapel Hill ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri, tupu ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ihi ihe ihere aghụghọ agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ 2011
A mụrụ Nyang'oro n'afọ 1954
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Dar es Salaam na Tanzania na-agụsị akwụkwọ na BA na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
O nwetara nzere masta na PhD na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Miami na JD na Mahadụ Duke
Prọfesọ Nyang'oro nọrọ ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum nke North Carolina ma bụrụ onye otu na ndị Africa na United States
Ihe odide agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na akụ na ụba nke Afrịka
E bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya nke akpọrọ The State and Capitalist Development in Africa n'afọ 1989
N'ikpeazụ, o bipụtara akwụkwọ gbasara mmepe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'Africa, ọkachasị gbasara ajụjụ gbasara ọha mmadụ, ebe ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya na-emetụta Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na Ndịda Afrịka
Ọ duziri Ngalaba nke African na African-American Studies na UNC Chapel Hill site na mbido ya dịka usoro mmụta ruo ọnọdụ ya dịka Ngalaba n'afọ 1996

Site n'afọ 2002 ruo n'afọ 2005, ọ bụ onye nchọpụta na United Nations Research Institute for Social Development, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọrụ akpọrọ 'Ethnic Structure, Inequality and Governance of the Public Sector'
Ọrụ ndị e mechara rụọ lekwasịrị anya na Tanzania
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, Nyangoro rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ mba ụwa n'ihe gbasara mmepe na nchekwa Afrịka
Julius Ubido (amụrụ n'ubochi 29 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1984) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa na-agbara Warri Wolves dịka onye ọkpọ ọkpọ
Ubido agbaarala Heartland bọọlu klọb na Naijiria
O mere otu mpụta mba ụwa maka Naijiria n'afọ 2011

Julius Ucha (amụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa iri n'afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri ise na asatọ (Ọktoba afọ 1958) bụ onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Ebonyi Central nke Ebonyi Steetị, Naịjirịa, ọ malitere ọrụ na abali iri abụọ na iteolu n'ọnwa ise afọ puku abụọ na atọ (29 mee 2003)
Ọ bụ onye otu All Progressives Congress(APC)
Ucha nwetara LLB degree site na Anambra State University of Science & Technology
Ọ bụ onye otu Enugu Steetị Board of Mercy
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Ebonyi Steetị House of Assembly, ebe a họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Sịnatị na afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007), a họpụtara Ucha na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ọrụ, ọrụ Senet, ihe gbasara ndị omeiwu, Independent National Electoral Commission na Commerce
N'ime nyocha nke ndị Sịnatị na ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iteoụ (Mee 2009), This Day kwuru na ọ kwadoghị iwu ọ bụla mana ọ kwụrụ ụgwọ ma ọ bụ soro kwado ọtụtụ mmegharị
Ime oguafọr Gregorian, Julaị bu onwa asato na afo, bu otu onwa n'ime asaa nwere ubochi ruru 31 (iri ato na otu)
Na mgbe gara-aga, Julaị bula onwa ise mgbe adila kpo ya Quintilis
Otu afo nwela onwa iri
Mgbe ekere Jenụwarị na Febrụwarị, Julaị a-da, mee otu afo nwere onwa iri na abuo
