Jumas Omar (onye amụrụ Jumas Omar, 10 Ọktoba 1943, ọ nwụrụ na Mee 1989 na London) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Zanzibar
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Britain na-eme n'Africa dị ka nwa na-eme egwuregwu
Juma na Magic Jinn bụ akwụkwọ ụmụaka na-ese onyinyo nke Joy Anderson dere ma Charles Mikolaycak sere ya

Nke e bipụtara izizi na 1986 site na Lothrop, Lee na Shepard Books, akụkọ ọdịnala a nke nwere ọnọdụ Afrịka na-akọ akụkọ banyere nwa okorobịa na-eme omume ihe nrọ́ , nke aha ya bụ Juma onye bi na ezigbo Lamu Island dị nso n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Kenya
N'ịchọ ịga ebe ọ na-agaghị amụ maọbụ kpaa àgwà, Juma na+achọ enyemaka nke anwansi jinn (n'asụsụ Bekee, onye mmụọ), mkpebi nke na ya na ihe ọjọọ
N'otu afọ ahụ e bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ, Juma na Magic Jinn meriri 1986 Golden Kite Award maka ihe osise Mikolaycak
Ihe osise ndị a rụkwara ọrụ na Mikolaycak na-anata ihe nrite nke 1987 Kerland Award 'n'ịghọta ihe ndị pụrụ iche ọ rụzuru n'ichepụta akwụkwọ ụmụaka'
Juma na Magic Jinn bụ akwụkwọ ụmụaka sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Africa nke e onye dere ya bụ Joy Anderson ma Charles Mikolaycak sere ihe osise ya (26 Jenụwarị 1937)
Ihe osise akwụkwọ ahụ na-eji mpempe akwụkwọ abụọ na ibe iji weghara ụdị foto na usoro nke nwere nlebara anya na nkọwa, agba, na ụkpụrụ ntọala Africa

N'ịbụ nke e mere maka ụmụaka dị afọ iri isii na itoolu, akụkọ ọdịnala ahụ na-ewere ọnọdụ na Lamu, ezigbo agwaetiti dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Kenya nke ndị ahịa Arab guzobere na narị afọ nke iri na anọ ma nwee ndị Alakụba
Ọ bụ nleta Anderson gara n'àgwàetiti ahụ kpaliri Mahadum nke Central Florida ka ọ dee banyere nwa okorobịa nke oge a nke nwere akụkọ ifo

N'àgwàetiti Lamu nke na-aga n'oké osimiri, ezinụlọ n'usoro ọdịnala na-edobe Jinn jar Jinn jar bụ akpa nke nwere ihe karịrị nke mmadụ na Islam na akụkọ ifo ndị Arab a na-akpọ jinn (n'asụsụ Bekee, a geni)
A na-edebe ite jinn ahụ n'ihi na ndị nwe ya amaghị ma anwansi jinni ha a dị mma maọbụụ ọ dị njọ, nke na-eme ka ndị Lamu Island n'ozuzu na - tụ jins egwu
Ebe ọ bụ na Juma na-eto eto na-etinye uche ya n'ebe echiche ya dị karịa ihe mmụta a na-enye ya, onye nkụzi zilara ya ụlọ Ka ọ na-ala, ọ hụrụ nne ya na-azụ azụ n'ikpere mmiri
Nne ya dọrọ ya aka ná ntị na ọ na-arọ nrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma kpebie na Juma nwere ike ịka mma iso nna ya rụọ ọrụ iji gbutuo osisi mangrove
Ọ gwara Juma ka ọ laa n'ụlọ, mana ọ gwara Jum ka o ghara imetụ ite jinn aka
N'ụlọ, Juma nupụụrụ ntụziaka nne ya isi ma wepụ cork na-emechi ite jinn ma kpọọ jins ahụ
Juma nwere obi abụọ banyere mbọ ọ na-agba ma ghara ikwere na anwansi
Otú ọ dị, anwansi jinn ahụ pụtara, n'ọnọdụ a dịka 'nwa agbọghọ nwere anya ojii ma na-amụmụ ọnụ ọchị,' nke e ji beads amber kee ntutu isi ya
Jinn na-enye onyinye inye Juma ọchịchọ
N'ịchọ ịbụ ebe ọ na-agaghị amụ ma ọ bụ na ọ ga-akpa àgwà, Juma na'ịkọwa ọchịchọ ya imeri mkpa ya maka agụmakwụkwọ, ọkachasị mgbakọ na mwepụ na ide ihe ('sums and script')
Jinn anwansi ahụ na-enye ụfọdụ n'ime ọchịchọ Juma ma chụpụ ya n'ụlọ ya maka ihe n'ụzọ ihe ọdachi
N'ikpeazụ, Juma nwere ike ịlaghachi n'ụlọ ọzọ mana ọ bịarutere na ekele ọhụrụ maka ụlọ ya na ezinụlọ ya ma ghọta na mmụta nwere ihe na-akpali akpali ma na'atọ ụtọ
Hajia Jumai Bello (amụrụ 1941)bụ onye isi mgbasa ozi Naijiria
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ redio Bauchi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka nwanyị mbụ onye isi nchịkwa Bauchi Radio Corporation
Ọ bụ aka na-achịbu nke Bauchi steeti bụ Mohammed Abubakar kwadoro ya
Tupu nhọpụta ya dị ka MD (onye isi nchịkwa) nke isi ọrụa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi akụkọ na akụkọ gbasara mba ihe ndị dị ugbu a
N'afọ 1982, ọ gụchara na mahadum Bayero dị na Kano ebe ọ gụrụ mass Communication
Jumia bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ Pan-African nke e wuru gburugburu ahịa, ọrụ nhazi na ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ
Ọrụ nhazi na-eme ka nnyefe nke ngwugwu site na netwọk nke ndị mmekọ mpaghara ebe ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ na-eme gore ịkwụ ụgwọ nke azụmahịa n'ịntanetị n'ime usoro okike Jumiaz
Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na ihe karịrị ndị na-ere ahịa 110,000 na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu ma bụrụ onye na-asọ mpi Konga na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2012, Jeremy Hodara na Sacha Poignonnec, ndị bụbu ndị ndụmọdụ McKinsey, hiwere Jumia tinyere Tunde Kehinde na Raphael Kofi Afaedor
A malitere Jumia na Naịjirịa na afọ 2012 ma gbasaa na mba ise ndị ọzọ Egypt, Morocco, Ivory Coast, Kenya na South Africa
N'afọ 2014, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ọfịs na Tunisia, Tanzania, Ghana, Cameroon, Algeria na Uganda, na afọ 2018 ọ nọ na mba 14 nke Afrịka
N'Ijipt, Jumia anọwo na-anwa ịhazi onwe ya dị ka otu n'ime ebe nrụọrụ weebụ e-commerce
Na Juun na afọ 2013, Jumia malitere Jumia Travel, ebe a na-ede akwụkwọ na họtel, na Jumia Food, ebe a-enye nri
A malitere Jumia Deals n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015
N'afọ 2017, Jumia malitere Jumia One, ngwa nke na-enyere ndị ahịa aka ịkwụ ụgwọ dịka oge ikuku
N'otu afọ ahụ, Jumia malitere JumiaPay, ụgwọ dị nchebe maka ndị mmadụ ịzụ ahịa na ọrụ Jumia niile
Nke a sochiri usoro ịgbazinye ego Jumia, atụmatụ nke na-enye ndị na-ere ya ohere ịnweta ego azụmahịa
Jumia ga-emesị soro teknụzụ Amadeus jikọọ aka iji malite ikpo okwu nke na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka idepụta ụgbọ elu
Na South Africa, Jumia na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru aha aha Zando (zandocoza), na-elekwasị anya nanị na ire ahịa ejiji n'ịntanetị
Na ngwụcha afọ 2015, ndị guzobere Jumia họpụtara Juliet Anammah dị ka onye isi oche nke Jumia Nigeria ka ha wee nwee ike ilekwasị anya na njikwa ụwa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Massimiliano Spalazzi nọchiri Juliet dị ka onye isi oche na Naijiria na Jenụwarị na afọ 2020 ma họpụta Juliet dị Ka onyeisi oche nke Jumia Naijiria nakwa Onye isi nke Institutional Affairs, Afrịka
N'afọ 2015, Jumia nwetara nde $ 234 na ego, nke na-anọchite anya uto 265% site na afọ 2014
N'afọ 2016, Jumia ghọrọ kọntinent mbụ unicorn nke ọnụ ahịa ya karịrị 1 ijeri USD
Na ngwụcha Nọvemba, na afọ 2018, Jumia jikọtara aka na ụlọ ọrụ cryptocurrency Telcoin iji bulie ikike ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ n'ebe niile ha na-arụ ọrụ
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, Jumia na Carrefour bịanyere aka na mmekọrịta iji ree ngwaahịa n'ịntanetị n'Afrika
N'ọnwa Eprel, na afọ 2019, Jumia gara n'ihu ọha na New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) wee nweta nde $ 196 na ego
Ọnụahịa òkè, nke e nyere na mbụ na $ 1450, rịrị elu karịa 200% na oge azụmaahịa atọ mbụ
Akwụkwọ nyocha mbụ wepụtara ụbọchị 21 mgbe IPO nyochachara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ebumnuche ngwaahịa n'etiti 27 na 40 USD
Mgbe ọ ruru fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ $ 50 na 1 Mee, na afọ 2019, ọnụ ahịa òkè ahụ agbadatawo n'okpuru $ 5 / òkè site na ngwụcha afọ
[citation needed]

N'ọnwa Nọvemba, na afọ 2019, Jumia kwupụtara nkwụsịtụ nke ọrụ e-commerce ya na Cameroon malite na 18 Nọvember ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwubiri na ọnụ ụzọ azụmahịa ya adabaghị ugbu a na gburugburu ebe obibi dị ugbu a na Cameroon
Dị ka akụkụ nke mgbalị njikarịcha ọfịs, Jumia mechara kwụsị ọrụ na Tanzania malite na 27 Nọvemba, na afọ 2019

Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ Jumia na Tanzania nyere ọtụtụ ohere maka ndị ahịa na ndị na-ere ahịa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwuru na ọ dị ya mkpa ilekwasị anya na akụ ya na ahịa ndị ọzọ nwere ike iweta uru kachasị mma ma nyere Jumia aka itolite
Mkpebi ahụ, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwupụtara, ga-enyere ya aka inweta ihe ịga nke ọma ka ukwuu n'ọdịnihu

Na 9 Disemba, na afọ 2019, Jumia kwụsịtụrụ Jumia Food na Rwanda, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ mba nke atọ n'ime ọnwa abụọ dị ka akụkụ nke nlekota na-aga n'ihu nke gburugburu azụmahịa na ụgwọ ọrụ na ahịa ọ na-arụ ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, Jumia kwere nkwa ịga n'ihu na-azụ ahịa n'ịntanetị na mba ndị ahụ na ọnụ ụzọ ndị a na-akpọ Jumia Deals

John's Primary School na Okitipupa tupu ya agaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Secondary nke St

Louis, Ondo ebe ọ nwetara akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ West Africa n'Afọ 1981 O nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na Iwu 'Law' n' Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile Ife ma mee iwu ruo afọ ole na ole tupu ya etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 2006

Na 1998 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na LL

M nzere na iwu azụmahịa nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Cambridge na 2000 dị ka onye ọkà mmụta DFID- t

Mmasị ya n'ihe gbasara mmepe ntorobịa dugara ya na nguzobe otu NGO a na-akpọ 'No Limit' n'uche nke na-akpali akpali na inye ụkpụrụ nduzi n'ime ndị ntorobịa Naijiria
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ibe site na Africa n Leadership Institute for Archbishop Desmond Tutu Fellowship na 2013
N'ọnwa Jenụarị afọ 2016, a họpụtara Oduwole ka ọ bụrụ Senior Special Assistant to the President na Industry, Trade and Investment
Jumoke Verissimo (amụrụ ya na 26 Disemba 1979 na Lagos) ọ bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na'ede akwụkwọ ụmụaka na onye nkatọ
A mụrụ ya bụ Jumoke na Lagos
O nwere nzere masta na ọmụmụ Afrịka (arụ ọrụ) na Mahadum Ibadan na nzere bachelọ na akwụkwọ Bekee na Mahadum nke di na Legos Steeti
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na onye nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị dịka The Guardian na NEXT
Jumoke na nwa ya nwanyị bi na Canada ugbu a ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka prọfesọ nke Mahadum Metropolitan nke di na Toronto
Àtụ Calendarna Juun bu onwa nke isii na afo na kalenda Julian na Gregorian bu nke abuo n'ime onwa ano nwere ogologo 30 ubochi, na nke ato n'ime onwa ise nwere ihe na-erughi ubochi iri ato na otu
June nwere okpomọkụ solstice na Northern Hemisphere, ụbọchị na-kacha ìhè awa, na oyi solstice na Southern Hemisphere, ụbọchị na nke kacha nta ìhè awa (ewezuga pola mpaghara na abụọ ikpe)
June na Northern Hemisphere bụ oge oge ya na Disemba na ndịda Hemisphere na nke ọzọ
Na Northern Hemisphere, mmalite nke oge okpomọkụ astronomical ọdịnala bụ 21 June (oge okpomọkụ ihu igwe na-amalite na 1 June)
Na South Hemisphere, oyi meteorological na-amalite na 1 June
Ná mmalite nke June, anyanwụ na-awa na ìgwè kpakpando nke Taurus; na njedebe nke June, anyanwụ na-ebili na ìgwè kpakpando nke Gemini
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi ọdịdị nke equinoxes, June na-amalite site na anyanwụ na akara kpakpando nke Gemini, ma na-ejedebe na anyanwụ na akara kpakpando nke Cancer
[Ihe ndekọ achọrọ]
Aha Latin maka June bụ Junius
Ovid na-enye ọtụtụ nkọwa maka aha na Fasti, uri gbasara kalenda Rome

Nke mbụ bụ na a na-akpọ ọnwa ahụ aha chi nwanyị Rom Juno, chi nwanyị nke alụmdi na nwunye na nwunye nke chi kachasị elu nke Jupita; nke abụọ bụ na aha ahụ si n’okwu Latin bụ iuniores, nke pụtara “ndị na-eto eto”, n’adịghị ka maiores (“ndị okenye”) nke a pụrụ ịkpọ ọnwa May (Maius) bu ya ụzọ
Ebe ọzọ na-ekwu na June bụ aha Lucius Junius Brutus, onye nchoputa nke Roman Republic na nna ochie nke Roman gens Junia

Na Rom oge ochie, a na-ewere oge malite n'etiti May ruo etiti June adịghị mma maka alụmdi na nwunye Ovid kwuru na ya gakwuuru Flaminica Dialis, bụ́ nnukwu onye nchụàjà Jupiter, banyere ịtọ ụbọchị maka agbamakwụkwọ nwa ya nwanyị, na a dụrụ ya ọdụ ichere ruo mgbe June 15 gasịrị Otú ọ dị, Plutarch na-egosi na ọnwa June dum dị mma maka agbamakwụkwọ karịa Mee
N'okpuru kalenda nke Rome oge ochie, ememe Ludi Fabarici mere na May 29 - June 1, Kalendae Fabariae mere na June 1, Ememme Bellona mere na June 3, Ludi Piscatorii mere na June 7, na Vestalia weere
Ebe site na June 7 - June 15
A na-eme Rosalia na June 20
A na-eme egwuregwu ụwa n'ihe dịka 100 afọ ọ bụla na May ma ọ bụ June
Ụbọchị ndị a adabaghị na kalenda Gregorian ọgbara ọhụrụ
May 15 – June 15 Tourette Syndrome awareness month

June Esther Bacon-Bercey (née Griffin, Ọktoba 23, 1928 - Julaị 3, 2019) bụ ọkachamara mba America na ihu igwe na ụgbọ elu onye rụrụ ọrụ maka National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, National Weather Service na Atomic Energy Commission
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye Afrịka America nwetara akara ugo mmụta na meteorology ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ TV meteorologist zụrụ azụ na ngalaba meteorology na United States
A mụrụ Bacon-Bercey ma zụlite na Wichita, Kansas na afọ 1928
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu na nne ya bụ onye nkụzi egwu
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere, ma nne ya lụgharịrị di na nwunye kwaga Florida, hapụ ya ka ọ bụrụ nne na nna ya zụrụ ya
Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ nwa nwere mmasị ịnya igwe kwụ otu ebe, ịga njem, ịkpọ piano, na isonye na mmemme Girl Scouts
A na-eto onye nkuzi physics ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ịhụ mmasị Bacon-Bercey na nchụpụ mmiri na ịma mma na ịgba ya ume ịchụso ọrụ na meteorology
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum nkeonwe dị nso n'ụlọ n'ebumnobi ka ọ bụrụ isi na mgbakọ na mwepụ, mana ọ hapụrụ mahadum Friends mgbe afọ abụọ gachara ịga nweta akara ugo mmụta na meteorology
Ọ gara wee nweta nzere bachelọ na 1954 na Mahadum California, Los Angeles (UCLA), nke n'oge ahụ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ole na ole na mba ahụ nyere nzere afọ anọ na sayensị ikuku

O chere mmegide na nkụda mmụọ ihu n'ịchụso akara ugo mmụta meteorology ya, dị ka o kwuru n'oge a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ nke 1977 maka isiokwu Baltimore Sun, “Mgbe m họọrọ isi m, onye ndụmọdụ m, onye ka nọ na UCLA, dụrụ m ọdụ ka m banye na akụnụba ụlọ
Enwetara m D na akụnụba ụlọ yana A na thermodynamics
' Bacon-Bercey ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ Afrịka America ka e nyere nzere meteorology site na UCLA
O nwetara Masters of Public Administration (MPA) site na Journalism School of University of Southern California na 1979

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ịse na itoolu, ọ nwetara nzere nkuzi ka o wee nwee ike ije ozi dị ka onye nkuzi enyemaka mpaghara maka ọmụmụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị elementrị na nke sekọndrị ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 80, yana ọrụ ikpeazụ ya na Westmoor High School na Daly City, California

N'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ,na Bacon-Bercey kwagara Washington DC maka ọkwa dị ka onye nyocha ihu igwe na onye na-ahụ maka amụma na National Meteorological Center, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's National Weather Service
Bacon-Bercey gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye injinia, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Sperry Corporation, wee rụọ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmenti etiti dị iche iche gụnyere United States Atomic Energy Commission
Ọ natara ọkwa dịka onye ndụmọdụ dị elu na Atomic Energy Commission na 1959 n'ihi mmasị ya ịghọta nke ọma mmetụta hydrogen na bọmbụ atọm na ikuku ụwa
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọrụ a, ọ mụtara usoro mmebi nke mgbawa ngwa ngwa nuklia kpatara
N'afọ ndị 1960, Bacon-Bercey sonyeere NOAA na ụlọ ọrụ New York City dị ka onye na-ahụ maka meteorologist radar
N'afọ 1971, ọ sonyeere WGR-TV dị ka onye nta akụkọ akụkọ, na ọrụ ọ kpuchiri ọgba aghara Ụlọ mkpọrọ Attica
N'afọ 1972, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka meteorologist n'ikuku mgbe e jidere onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe gara aga maka izu ohi ụlọ akụ
Ọ bụ ngwa gwa ghọrọ onye isi meteorologist ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ

Nke a Malite na 1979, Bacon-Bercey nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri dị ka onye isi nchịkwa maka Ọrụ Weather Television na National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) ma rụọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Ịbawanye nsonye nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa-American na meteorology na sayensị geophysical bụ isi ihe na-elekwasị anya maka Bacon-Bercey
Na 1978, o bipụtara nyocha nke ndị ọkà mmụta meteorologists Africa-American na US
Ọ meriri $64,000 dị ka onye na-asọmpi na ajụjụ $128,000 na 1977, nke ọ na-eji guzobe ego mmụta maka ụmụ agbọghọ nwere mmasị na sayensị ikuku, nke American Geophysical Union (AGU) na-elekọta

Site na afọ 1978 ruo afọ 1990, ụmụ nwanyị 13 (ụmụ akwụkwọ 12 gụsịrị akwụkwọ, nwa akwụkwọ 1 na-agụghị akwụkwọ) nwetara $ 400- $ 500 nke ego mmụta sitere na AGU's June Bacon-Bercey Scholarship na Sayensị ikuku maka ụmụ nwanyị
Ọmụmụ ihe a na-amalitegharị na 2021
Bacon-Bercey jere ozi na kọmitii AGU na ụmụ nwanyị na ndị pere mpe na sayensị ikuku, wee rụkọọ aka na Board American Meteorological Society's Board on Women and Minorities
Warren M
Washington bụ onye ọzọ tọrọ ntọala nke AWS Board on Women and Minorities
Na mgbakwunye, ọ jere ozi na bọọdụ ndị isi nke otu mba nke mmepe ọkachamara ojii
Na afọ 2006, Bacon-Bercey pụtara n'akwụkwọ maka ndị na-eto eto, June Bacon-Bercey meteorologist na-ekwu banyere ihu igwe

Bacon-Bercey bụ nwanyị mbụ, yana onye America-America mbụ, nke a ga-enye ndị American Meteorological Society 's Seal of Approval maka ọkaibe na ihu igwe telivishọn mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na WGR na Buffalo, New York na mgbe afọ 1970s

Na afọ 2000, a kwanyere ya ugwu n'oge ogbako ụbọchị atọ na Mahadum Howard maka onyinye ya gụnyere inyere aka guzobe ụlọ nyocha meteorology na Mahadum Jackson State na Mississippi, onyinye ya nke scholarships, na ọrụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze California
Akpọkwara Bacon-Bercey onye ọsụ ụzọ pere mpe maka mmezu na sayensị ikuku site n'aka NASA
Bacon-Bercey lụrụ Walker Bacon Jr, John Bercey na George Brewer ugboro atọ
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Dawn-Marie na Dail
Bacon-Bercey nwụrụ n'okpuru nlekọta ụlọ ọgwụ na Burlingame, California site na dementia frontotemporal na July 3, 2019 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu
A mara ọkwa ọnwụ ya ka ọnwa isii gachara
Jupiter Bokondji (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1965) bụ onye egwu si Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC)
Ya na ndị otu ya, Okwess International, wepụtara abọm mbụ ha, Hotel Univers, n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2013 na United Kingdom
E mepụtara otú egwu ahụ n'afọ 1990, ha wee gaa na kọntinent Afrịka
Otú ọ dị, n'otu oge ahụ ewu ewu ha toro, agha obodo malitere na Democratic Republic of Congo
Ụfọdụ ndị otu egwu gbagara Europe iji gbanahụ ime ihe ike, mana Bokondji nọrọ na Kinshasa
Ka agha ahụ kwụsịrị, ewu ewu ya toro ọzọ, n'afọ 2006 e gosipụtara ya na ihe nkiri Jupiter's Dance
Nke a mere ka ndị na-emepụta ihe na ndị na-eti egwu na UK mara ya, nke mere ka ọ sonye na njem African Express, mmepụta nke Hotel Univers, ma mee ihe nkiri n'afọ 2013 Glastonbury Festival
Ụda Bokondji bụ ngwakọta nke Afropop, ụda ọdịnala Congo, funk, na egwu nkume
Ọ na-akpọ ụda a dị iche 'Bofenia Rock'
Okwu ya na-ebukarị ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, gụnyere nkatọ nke gọọmentị DRC yana agbamume dị mma maka ndị Afrịka ka ha ghọtakwuo ụbụrụ na ikike ha
A mụrụ Bokondji na Kinshasa
Nna ya bụ onye nnọchi anya mba Congo, nne nne ya bụ onye na-agwọ ọrịa ọdịnala
Nne nne ya mere ka ọ malite egwu ka ọ na-aga emume na olili ozu, ya na ya iji kpọọ ngwá egwu dị ka ịgba
Mgbe e mesịrị, e zigara nna ya na ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya dị na East Berlin, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Germany
Ọ bụ na Germany ka Bokondji malitere otú egwu ya, Der Neger, nke jikọtara ụdị egwu Mongo ya na ụdị egwu egwu Europe nke ndị otu ya na Germany
Ọrụ nna ya mechara kwụsị, ezinụlọ ahụ laghachikwara Kinshasa n'afọ 1980
Bokondji mere njem gburugburu mba ahụ na-ege egwu sitere n'ebo dị iche iche ma na-eme ka ụdị nke ya sie ike
O guzobere otu egwu a na-akpọ Bongofolk n'afọ 1984 na Okwess International n'afọ 1990
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri French bụ Renaud Barret na Florent de la Tullaye zutere Bokondji n'afọ 2004, ọ kpaliri ha ịmepụta ihe nkiri Jupiter's Dance, nke ewepụtara n'afọ 2006
Nke a dugara na njikọ ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu mba ụwa, a kpọkwara Bokondji ka ọ sonye na njem African Express n'afọ 2012
Njem a na-etinye ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na UK n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke na-eme njem gburugburu Britain, na-eme ihe ngosi ma na-akwalite mgbanwe omenala
Nakwa n'afọ 2012, Bokondji tinyere aka na DRC Music Project na Oxfam
Nke a nyere ya ohere iso Damon Albarn, nke Blur na Gorillaz ama ama rụọ ọrụ
Ndị otu a rụrụ na UK's Womad festival n'afọ 2012 na Glastonbury festival n'afọ 2013
N'ịbụ ndị a kpọrọ 'Jupiter & Okwess', ndị otu ahụ gara n'ihu na njem ruo afọ 2019, gụnyere na Africa, America, Asia, na Europe

The jus trium liberorum, nke pụtara 'ikike nke ụmụ atọ' n'asụsụ Latin, bụ ihe ùgwù a na-akwụ ụgwọ nye ụmụ amaala Rom ndị mụrụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala ụmụ atọ ma ọ bụ ndị nweere onwe ha - nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị ndị mụrụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala ụmụ anọ
Ọ bụ nsonaazụ kpọmkwem nke Lex Iulia na Lex Papia Poppaea, iwu nke Ọgọstọs webatara n'afọ 18 BC na 9 AD, n'otu n'otu
Ebumnuche iwu ndị a bụ ime ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Rom nọ n'ọkwá dị elu na-abawanye

Otú ọ dị, o yiri ka ha nwekwara ọrụ nke abụọ dị mkpa na nkwụghachi ụgwọ nke amicitia, dịka 'ịdị mkpa nke ihe nketa nye Martial na Suetonius nwere ike ịpụta site na mgbalị ha (nke gara nke ọma) iji nweta jus trium liberorum'
Ebumnuche nke jus trium liberorum mere ka ndị ọkà mmụta kọwaa ya dị ka iwu eugenic
Otú ọ dị, ọtụtụ agụmakwụkwọ dị ugbu a na-ahụ iwu ahụ dị ka mgbalị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji mee ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ọmụmụ dị elu n'etiti ndị omeiwu
A gbaghaara ndị ikom natara jus trium liberorum na munera (ọrụ mmanye)
Ụmụnwanyị nwere jus trium liberorum anaghịzi n'okpuru tutela mulierum (nlekọta site n'aka onye ikwu nwoke) ma nwee ike ịnata ihe nketa nke ga-adakwasị ụmụ ha
Otú ọ dị, mmeghachi omume ndị omeiwu na jus trium liberorum bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu ịchọta oghere
Atụmanya nke inwe nnukwu ezinụlọ ka na-adịghị adọrọ mmasị
Onye jidere nwa amaala na mmebi iwu a nwere ikike inweta akụkụ nke ihe nketa metụtara, na-emepụta azụmahịa na-akwụ ụgwọ maka ndị nledo ọkachamara
Ndị nledo ahụ jupụtara ebe niile nke na e belatara ụgwọ ọrụ ahụ ruo otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke nha ya gara aga
Ka oge na-aga, ndị nnọchianya nyere ụfọdụ ụmụ amaala jus trium liberorum dị ka ụgwọ ọrụ maka ezi ọrụ n'ozuzu, na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa ma ọ bụ dị ka ihu ọma onwe, ọ bụghị naanị mgbasa ozi dị ukwuu
N'ikpeazụ, Justinian kagburu jus trium liberorum na 534 AD
N'oge Augustan, ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu, ndị omeiwu na ndị na-agba ịnyịnya, na-ebelata ọnụ ọgụgụ
Ogo ndị a bụ ọkpụkpụ nke steeti ahụ, na-etolite ọchịchị obodo na nke ndị agha nke alaeze ukwu ahụ
Agha obodo na-adịbeghị anya, mmachibido iwu, na nke kachasị mkpa, ọnụ ọgụgụ ọmụmụ dị ala n'ime klas ahụ emetụtawo ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ahụ
Mbelata nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ọmụmụ dị egwu karịa ka ọ na-ahụkarị maka mmụba nke mmepe Rome
Lex Iulia na Papia Poppaea enweela ike ịbawanye ọnụ ọgụgụ alụmdi na nwunye n'ime ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu, mana ọnụ ọgụgụ ọmụmụ abawanyeghị nke ọma site na iwu ndị a naanị
N'ihi nke a, e mere iwu jus trium liberorum
Ọ dị mkpa iburu n'uche na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi n'Ịtali n'ozuzu ya adịghị ebelata
N'ezie, ọ nwere ike na-arịwanye elu
Ọganihu nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi mbata nke ndị ohu si na mpụga Ịtali
Ya mere, ndị ọkà mmụta akpọwo jus trium liberorum ihe eugenic dịka ọ na-arụ ọrụ kpọmkwem iji mụbaa ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ a na-ewere dị ka ihe achọrọ
A na-arụ ụka na akụkụ nke mmụba ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na jus trium liberorum bụ ebumnuche nke abụọ
Ọ dị mkpa na a na-edebe jus trium liberorum n'ọnọdụ nke Lex Iulia na Papia Poppaea, nke metụtara nsogbu gbasara ịdị ọcha agbụrụ n'ime klas ndị a, dị ka ndị mmekọ alụmdi na nwunye kwesịrị ekwesị
James A Field tụnyere jus trium liberorum na iwu nke atọ nke Reich nke onye Juu nwere ike ịghọ onye Aryan na-asọpụrụ n'isiokwu ya 'Nzube nke Lex Iulia et Papia Poppaea'
Jus trium liberorum bụ ụgwọ ọrụ e nwetara site na nrubeisi na Lex Iulia na Papia Poppea
Ihe ùgwù ahụ metụtara nwoke na nwanyị, mana ọ metụtara ụmụnwanyị karịa ụmụnwoke
A kọwara nkọwa nke jus trium liberorum dị ka ndị a na Adolf Berger's Encyclopedia of Roman Law
Ndị nna nwere ike ikwu na a tọhapụrụ ha (excusatio) site na ebubo ọha na eze na nlekọta nke iwu kpọrọ ha (tutela legitima)
Ngwa kachasị mkpa nke jus liberorum metụtara ụmụnwanyị

A tọhapụrụ nwanyị nweere onwe ya nke nwere ụmụ atọ na nwanyị nweere onwe ya nke nwere ụmụ anọ (jus trium vel quattuor liberorum) site na nlekọta nke ụmụnwanyị nọ n'okpuru (tutela mulierum) ma nwee ikike ịnọchi ihe nketa nke ụmụ ha
A na-etinye ụmụnwanyị jus liberorum ọbụna mgbe ụmụaka ahụ adịkwaghị ndụ
Na nkenke, nke a pụtara na a pụghị ịmanye nwoke ịnara ọrụ nlekọta nke nwanyị, n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro nwata, na ọ ga-abụ iwu n'okpuru tutela mulierum
Ụmụnwanyị nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kwesịrị ekwesị nke ụmụ adịghịzi mkpa inwe onye nlekọta dị ka ha ga-eme n'okpuru tutela mulierum
Nke a pụtara na mgbe nwanyị anaghịzi n'okpuru ike nke nna ya (patria potestas) ma ọ bụ di ya (manus) ọ nwere ike ime ihe n'onwe ya
O nwetakwara ikike inweta ihe nketa nke a gaara enye ụmụ ya
Ọtụtụ mgbe nke a pụtara na ọ ketara ma nwee ala di ya mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Dị ka ekwuru n'elu, ọ dịghị mkpa ka ụmụaka dị ndụ ka ha wee gụọ na jus liberorum
A gụrụ ụmụ ziri ezi maka ụmụnwoke na ụmụnwanyị

Ụmụaka a mụrụ n'aka nna a na-amaghị ama (spurius) gụrụ maka ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụnwanyị n'okpuru jus trium liberorum A naghị ewere nwatakịrị a na-ewere dị ka ihe ngosi (n'ụzọ nkịtị anụ ọhịa ma ọ bụ onye dị egwu) dị ka mmadụ mana ọ ka na-agụ ya na ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nne n'okpuru jus trium liberorum Nne na nna abụọ ahụ nwere ike ịgụta nwa a na-ewere dị ka ihe ịrịba ama n'okpuru iwu megide ndị nne na nna na-enweghị nwa na Lex Iulia na Papia Poppaea, Otú ọ dị
Mgbe emechara ikike a, a na-ewere ya dị ka ihe bara uru, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ ghọrọ ihe ùgwù na-enweghị njikọ na ọmụmụ nwa amaala atọ ma ọ bụ karịa
Ọtụtụ ndị achọghị ibu arọ nke ụmụaka, mana ha ka na-achọ jus trium liberorum
Nke a dọtara ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ iji oghere dị na iwu, nke a na-arụkarị site n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị
A na-enye ụgwọ ọrụ nke gụnyere pasent nke ihe nketa metụtara maka ndị nledo jidere ndị ọzọ na-erite uru n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị site na jus trium liberorum
Ụgwọ ọrụ a mepụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ndị nledo n'ihi ụgwọ ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ
Iji belata nsogbu nke ndị nledo, e belatara ụgwọ ọrụ ahụ ruo otu ụzọ n'ụzọ anọ nke nha ya gara aga
E nyekwara ndị mmadụ jus trium liberorum n'enweghị njikọ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ ha dị ka ụgwọ ọrụ site n'aka eze ukwu
A na-enyekarị ya n'ihe gbasara ezi ọrụ, ọrụ agha ma ọ bụ dị ka amara onwe onye

E nyere ọtụtụ ndị Rom a ma ama jus trium liberorum gụnyere Suetonius site na ihu ọma onwe onye site n'aka Trajan nye Pliny the Younger, Martial site n'aka Domitian na ụgwọ ọrụ maka ịja mma Martial, na Livia na nzaghachi nke ọnwụ Drusus na 9 BCE
E nyekwara ndị nwe nnukwu ụgbọ mmiri jus trium liberorum n'okpuru Alaeze Ukwu
Justinian mechara kagbuo jus trium liberorum na 534 CE
AKWỤKWỌ Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime agụmakwụkwọ a bụ oge ochie, a na-atụ aro mgbanwe dị egwu na ntinye na agụmakwụkwọ eji eme ihe
Biko rịba ama
A na-akpọkarị jus trium liberorum ius liberorum
Latịn oge ochie emeghị ọdịiche dị n'etiti i na j ya mere enwere ike ịkpọ ya jus trium liberorum ma ọ bụ ius liberorum n'ụzọ ziri ezi
Justin Gregory Smith (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 8, 1978), nkè a maara dịka Just Blaze, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na DJ
A mụrụ ya na Paterson, New Jersey, Blaze gàrà Mahadum Rutgers ruo afọ atọ tupu ọ kwụsị iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu ya
Aha egwu ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Blaze Fielding sitere na usoro egwuregwu vidio Streets of Rage
Blaze nwetara nkwado dị ka ónyé na-emepụta Roc-A-Fella Records na mbido afọ 2000, na-ebute ụzọ n'ụdị nnwale 'chipmunk soul' nke a ma ama na mbido ruo n'etiti afọ 2000 nke hip-hop
Ọ pụtara na vidiyo maka egwu nke atọ site na album Eminem nke 2010 Recovery nke akpọrọ 'No Love', nkè o mepụtara
Blaze bụkwa onye isi oche nke Fort Knocks Entertainment
O dekwara ụdaolu maka egwuregwu vidio, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri na NBA Street Vol
Ọbọdọ nna ya nke Paterson sọpụrụ ya na Julaị 2018 site na igodo màkà obodo ahụ iji kwado 'onyinye ọdịbendị pụrụ iche' ya na obodo ahụ
Justice Mukheli (amụrụ na Soweto) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba South Africa, onye na-ese foto, na onye ọchụnta ego na-emepụta ihe
A maara ya maka ihe banyere ịmepụta nka ma ọ bụ ihe nkiri nke na-elekwasị anya na ahụmịhe Afrịka
Ikpe ziri ezi gbara mgbasa ozi maka Ballantines n'afọ 2021 gburugburu mkpọsa ha Stay True There were No Wrong Way
E gosipụtara Justice Mukheli na mbipụta nke anọ nke ihe ngosi nka nke oge a nke a makwaara dị ka Africa na Paris n'afọ 2019 dị ka onye na-ese foto
Justice Tweneboaa (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere Ampem Darkoaa onye ọ bụkwa onyeisi ya na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana
Tweneboaa malitere ọrụ ya na otu egwuregwu Ghana Women's Premier League Ampem Darkoa
N'afọ 2020, tupu oge 2020 na 21, a họpụtara ya dị ka onyeisi ndị otu
Tweneboaa emeela maka Ghana na U17, U20 na ọkwa dị elu
Na ọkwa U17, ọ nọchitere anya Ghana na 2018 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup, ebe ọ gbara egwuregwu 4 ka Mexico wepụrụ Ghana na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ site na penalty shoot-out
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ abụọ na-enweghị ntaramahụhụ ha
Na Iko Mba Ụwa ahụ, ya na ndị egwuregwu dị ka Mukarama Abdulai na Nina Norshie gbara bọọlụ
N'otu afọ ahụ, Yusif Basigi kpọrọ Tweneboaa ka ọ bụrụ onye otu U20 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii na Julaị 2018 ma kpọọ ya maka 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup ebe ọ gbara bọọlụ niile
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi egwuregwu maka egwuregwu FIFA U-20 World Cup nke afọ 2020 na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Morocco n'etiti Ọgọstụ na Ọktoba afọ 2020
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, ọ natara ndị otu mba mbụ ya n'ihu egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Japan
O mere nke mbụ ya n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii n'egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Japan nke Ghana meriri site na 7X1
N'ọnwa Julaị 2021, Tweneboaa mere ndị otu maka Aisha Buhari Cup na 2022 Africa Women Cup of Nations qualifiers megide Naịjirịa
Nke a bịara mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị egwu na league nke dugara Ampem Darkoa n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na league
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa n'oge egwuregwu enyi na enyi nke Aisha Buhari Cup megide ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa na 17 Septemba 2021
Justin Drew Bieber (mù yá na Önwa ató 1, 1994) bu onye Canada na bu abu pop-R&B
Scooter Braun hürü mmerírí ya na YouTube, ya kpotasia ya ka yá nwà onwe ya bu onye na dozie ihnye maka Bieber
Braun si ka Bieber na Usher hü na Atlanta, Georgia na mgbe óge gáfèrè Bieber bàtàrà orürü Raymond Braun Media Group (RBMG), nke Braun na Usher, na akwukwo I bu abu nke Island Record ne LA
Reid nyèrè
Abu nke o jị a fútá, 'One Time', fùtàrà na úwà na 2009 yá gá ishi 30 na obodo gáfèrè iri

Njikota abu My World, fútárá na Önwa iri na otu 17, 2009, sòrò, nke rúrú platinum na Njikota Obodo Amerika, nke nyéré, na oge áhu, Bieber abu nke fútárá nke kárírí na afor nke áhu, na ó mèrè ka Bieber bu onye na bu abu nke ishi nke nwéré abu asaá nor na ndetu abu Billboard Hot 100
Abu ya nke ozor, My World 20, mekwàrà nke ómá mgbe of fùtàrà na ishi na abu irí ne ndi ishi na obodo ichi iche na o bukwa platinum na önwa abuọo mgbe of futara na Njikota Obodo
O futuara mgbe ab ha kpòrò 'Baby' fùtàchàrà
Justin Raimondo (Onye amụrụ Dennis Raimondo; n'ọnwa November 18, 1951 ̊ June 27, 2019) bụ onye edemede America na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Antiwarcom
Ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'onye na-agbaso omenala-paleo-libertarian'
A mụrụ ya na White Plains, New York, Raimondo na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Yorktown Heights, New York mgbe ọ dị obere
Raimondo kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'nwatakịrị ọjọọ'; iji gbochie onwe ya n'ụzọ a, ọ nọrọ otu afọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Jesuit na-elekọta na ugwu New York
N'oge a, o nwere mmasị na nkà ihe ọmụma Ayn Rand nke Objectivism
O mechara sonye na Young Americans for Freedom
N'afọ ndị 1970, ọ malitere ịrụsi ọrụ ike na Libertarian Party
Ọ 'esonyeere òtù ahụ n'afọ 1974, ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mkpọsa onye isi ala nke Roger MacBride n'afọ 1976, nke abụọ nke LP na White House bid'
Ọ bịara na-agbachitere ọgba aghara White Night, nke sochiri ikpe igbu ọchụ nke Dan White (maka ọnwụ nke onye nlekọta San Francisco Harvey Milk na Onye isi obodo George Moscone)
N'afọ 1983, mgbe nkewa n'ime Libertarian Party gasịrị, Raimondo hapụrụ òtù ahụ ma gbalịa ịhazi otu òtù nnwere onwe na Republican Party nke a maara dị ka Kọmitii Nhazi Libertarian Republican
Mgbe 1989, Raimondo malitere ọzọ iso Rothbard na-arụ ọrụ na ndị na-emegide agha, onye na-agbaso omenala John Randolph Club, akụkụ nke Rockford Institute
Na Egwuruegwu Afrika nke puku afọ abụọ na asaa, nke emere na Maputo, Mozambique
O ritere ọla nchara na ihe omume nke kilogram iri ise na abụọ
Na afọ puku abụọ na asatọ nke Asumpi nke Judo nke Afrika na Agadir, Morocco, Agatahi sonyere ọzọ na kilogram iri ise na abụọ ihe omume wee merie ọla nchara
N'afọ 2008, o sonyere na asọmpi mba ụwa Nabeul, Tunisia wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na U52kg ụmụ nwanyị
Justina Blakeney bụ onye America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese onyinyo, onye na'ime ụlọ, onye édémédé, na ọkà okwu nke a maara nke ọma site na ụdị bohemian na-egbuke egbuke
O guzobere ihe eji achọ ụlọ mma na ihe ịchọ ụlọ mma Jungalow
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya, The New Bohemians Cool and Collected Homes, bụ akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa na New York Times
Blakeney tolitere na Berkeley, California
Nna ya bụ ónyé Africa-America na onye American Indian, nne ya bụ ónyé ndị Juu si n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Europe
Ọ na-ekwu na nzụlite agbụrụ dị iche iche a na ịzụlite California metụtara ọmarịcha ọmarịca ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na UCLA na 2001 na BA
na World Arts and Cultures N'afọ mbụ ya na mahadum, ọ gàrà Ịtali iji mụọ ejiji na nkwurịta okwu
Ahụmahụ ọ nwere n'Ịtali méré ka ọ laghachi Ịtali mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, wee banye na Polimoda-ụlọ akwụkwọ ejiji
E gosipụtara atụmatụ ya maka onye na-ere ahịa ejiji Moda Operandi, gụnyere foto nkè ihe ngosi ejiji dị ka Grace Jones, na Vogue Magazine

Justine Ayebazibwe Kashaija (Amụrụ na 23 Julaị 1972) bụ onye njikwa akụ mmadụ nke Uganda, ọkachamara n'ịchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ nwanyị omeiwu nke Isingiro District ma bụrụ onye nnọchi anya NRM, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị achị
ọ meriri Claire Mugumya na ntuli aka afọ 2021 iji nọchite anya ndị mmadụ na ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Ọ nọchiri Grace Isingoma Byarugaba onye ọ meriri na ntuli aka nke pati ahụ n'afọ 2015
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ahụike na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Kọmitii, Ndị Ọchịchị Steeti na Ụlọ Ọrụ Steeti
Ọ bụkwa onye otu NRM Parliamentary Caucus

Jwira-Pepesa, nke a makwaara n'aha dị ka Gwira na Pepesa-Jwira, bụ asụsụ Niger-Congo nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ghana, nke nwere asụsụ Jwira na Pepessa, nke nwere ihe dịka ndị na-asụ puku iri na asatọ Ọ bụ asụsụ Kwa nke alaka Central Tano, ma soro Nzema nwee nghọta 60% na Ahanta na Anyin nwee nghọta
A na-asụ Jwira n'obodo nta iri na asatọ site na Bamiankaw ruo Humjibere n'akụkụ Osimiri Ankobra, ebe a na-asụrụ Pepesa n'ala Wasa n'etiti Agona Junction na Tarkwa
Ugwu dị iche iche kewara olumba abụọ ahụ

Käthe Kollwitz (German pronunciation [kɛːtə kɔlvɪt*s]; amụrụ dị ka Schmidt; na mkpụrụ ụbọchị 8 n'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 1867 - 22 Eprel 1945) bụ onye Germany na-ese ihe nke na-arụ ọrụ na eserese, mbipụta (gụnyere etching, lithography na woodcuts) na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Usoro nka ya a ma ama, gụnyere The Weavers na The Peasant War, na-egosi mmetụta nke ịda ogbenye, agụụ na agha na ndị ọrụ
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu nke ọrụ mbụ ya, nka ya nwere njikọ chiri anya ugbu a na Expressionism
Kollwitz bụ nwanyị mbụ ọ bụghị naanị na a họpụtara ya na Prussian Academy of Arts kamakwa ịnata ọkwa prọfesọ nsọpụrụ
A mụrụ Kollwitz na Königsberg, Prussia, dị ka nwa nke ise n'ezinụlọ ya
Nna ya, Karl Schmidt, bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke ghọrọ onye na-ewu ụlọ
Nne ya, Katherina Schmidt, bụ nwa Julius Rupp, onye pastọ Lutheran nke a chụpụrụ na Evangelical State Church ma guzobe ọgbakọ kwụụrụ onwe ya
Agụmakwụkwọ ya na nka ya nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na ihe ọmụmụ nna nna ya na okpukpe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'ịghọta talentị ya, nna Kollwitz mere ndokwa ka ọ malite ọmụmụ ihe na eserese na iṅomi plasta na 14 Ọgọọst n'afọ 1879 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
N'afọ 1885-6 ọ malitere ọmụmụ nka ya n'okpuru nduzi nke Karl Stauffer-Bern, enyi onye na-ese ihe Max Klinger, na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ụmụ nwanyị na ese ihe na Berlin
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na isiokwu ndị metụtara Realism movement, na-ese ihe osise nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ, ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na ndị ọrụ ugbo ọ hụrụ n'ọfịs nna ya
Ihe eserese nke Klinger, usoro ha na nchegbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, bụ ihe mkpali nye Kollwitz
N'afọ 1888/89, ọ gụrụ ihe osise na Ludwig Herterich na Munich, ebe ọ chọpụtara na ike ya abụghị dị ka onye na-ese ihe, kama ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, nwanne ya nwoke Konrad mere ka ọ mata Karl Kollwitz, nwa akwụkwọ ahụike
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Kathe kwere Karl nkwa ọlụlụ, mgbe ọ na-amụ nka na Munich
N'afọ 1890, ọ laghachiri Königsberg, gbazite ụlọ ọrụ mbụ ya, ma gaa n'ihu na-egosi ọrụ siri ike nke ndị ọrụ
Isiokwu ndị a bụ ihe mkpali n'ọrụ ya ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1891, Kollwitz lụrụ Karl, onye n'oge a bụ dọkịta na-elekọta ndị ogbenye na Berlin
Di na nwunye ahụ kwagara n'ime nnukwu ụlọ nke ga-abụ ụlọ Kollwitz ruo mgbe e bibiri ya na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ịdị nso nke omume di ya gosipụtara na ọ bara uru
Ihe ndị m nwere ike ịhọrọ site na gburugburu ebe a (ndụ ndị ọrụ) nyere m, n'ụzọ dị mfe na n'ezoghị ọnụ, ihe m chọpụtara na ọ mara mma
Ndị si na mpaghara bourgeois enweghị arịrịọ ma ọ bụ mmasị
Ndụ niile nke ndị nọ n'etiti yiri m ka ọ bụ ihe na-enweghị isi
N'aka nke ọzọ, enwere m mmetụta na ndị na-arụ ọrụ nwere obi ike
Ọ bụ mgbe e mesịrị
mgbe m matara ụmụ nwanyị ga-abịakwute di m maka enyemaka, na n'ụzọ dabara adaba nye m, na akara aka nke ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ihe niile metụtara ụzọ ndụ ya kpaliri m nke ukwuu
Ma ihe m ga-achọ imesi ike ọzọ bụ na ọmịiko na ọmịiko na mbụ dị ntakịrị mkpa n'ịdọta m na nnọchi anya nke ndụ ndị na-enweghị ọrụ; ihe dị mkpa bụ naanị na achọtara m ya ka ọ mara mma
Kekele bụ otu òtù e guzobere n'afọ 2000, nke ndị isi egwu Africa, ọtụtụ n'ime ha sitere na Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ha na-akpọ rumba Congolese n'ụdị mmeghachi omume nke laghachiri azụ na afo 1950s, 60s, na 70s, na-eji ụbọ akwara
Kekele yiri ka ọ na-ehi ụra ma ọ bụ na-adịghịzi, ebe ọ na-ewepụtaghị ihe ndekọ kemgbe afọ 2006 ma ọ bụ rụọ ọrụ kemgbe (ihe doro anya) afọ 2010

Onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Africa bụ Ibrahim Sylla guzobere Kekele na afọ 2000 iji dekọọ abọm mbụ ya, Rumba Congo Dị ka otu akụkọ si kwuo, e bu n'obi na mbụ ka ndị otu ahụ bụrụ mgbalị, naanị maka otu abọm ahụ
Okwu kekele n'asụsụ Lingala pụtara ụdị osisi vaịn na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpa ya ọnụ iji mee eriri
Otu onye edemede kwuru na nke a bụ ihe atụ maka ndị na-agụ egwú mejupụtara òtù ahụ
Mmụọ na-akpali akpali nke òtù ahụ bụ enweghị afọ ojuju na ntụziaka egwu Congolese na-ewu ewu na nso nso a, yana ọchịchọ ịlaghachi na mgbọrọgwụ ya
Dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara Kekele Syran Mbenza kwuru, 'Enweghị abụ ọzọ, ọ dịghị abụ ọzọ
Egwú anyị na-aghọ ihe na-adịghị mma
Anyị ga-akpọte ya ọzọ'
Dị ka mgbalị nke otu ndị na-agụ egwú meworo agadi iji mee ka ụdị egwu ochie dịghachi ndụ, ọtụtụ ndị edemede jiri ọrụ otu a tụnyere Buena Vista Social Club, afọ 1990s Havana band na album

Ikekwe n'ụzọ yiri nke Buena Vista Social Club, Kekele yiri ka ọ na-elekwasị anya na ndị na-abụghị ndị Afrịka; Martin Sinnock, onye UK ọkachamara na egwu Congolese, kọwara abọm mbụ Kekele dị ka 'nke kachasị ewu ewu na Congolese nke afọ 2001' n'etiti ndị ahụ '[n'èzí] obodo Afrịka,' n'ihi na ndị na na-akwado egwu Congolese nwere mmasị na ndị egwu ndị ọzọ dị ka Koffi Olomide
Dị ka Kekele dekọrọ ma gaa njem, ndị otu ya, ndị egwu iri ruo iri abụọ nọ na studio ma ọ bụ n'elu ikpo okwu, agbanweela mgbe niile
Otú ọ dị, usoro ọ bụla abụwo ndị na-agụ egwú nwere ahụmahụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha sitere na Democratic Republic of the Congo mana ụfọdụ si n'ebe ndị ọzọ n'Afirika
Ndị isi ndị otu Kekele na-agụnye ndị na-agụ egwú Nyboma (Nyboma Mwanīdido), Wuta Mayi, Bumba Massa, na Loko ̆ Djeskain Masengo, na onye na-agụ ụbọ akwara Syran Mbenza
Ọ bụ onye si na Republic of the Congo, ebe anọ ndị ọzọ si na Democratic Republic of the Kongo, ha niile nọ n'agbata afọ 50 na 55 n'afọ 2001
Ndị isi ise a nke Kekele gụnyere atọ n'ime 'kpakpando' anọ mejupụtara nnukwu ìgwè Les Quatre Etoiles (The Four Stars) Nyboma, Wuta Mayi, na Syran Mbenza

Onye isi egwu Papa Noel Nedule duziri usoro mbụ nke Kekele dị ka onye nduzi egwu, ma tinye, na mgbakwunye na ndị isi ise a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu, Jean-Papy Ramazani (olu), Yves Ndjock nke Cameroon (guitar), Sungu Debat (conga), na Viviane Arnoux nke France (accordion)
N'adịghị ka egwu Congolese na-arịwanye elu, nke eletrọniki nke afọ 1990, ụdị egwu nke abọm ahụ bụ azụ azụ azụ, na rumba tempos, guitar acoustic, na accordion
Ndị na-enyocha ya kwuru na ndị na-agụ egwú dị elu na ọdịdị dị nwayọ, nke dị nro nke egwu ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, Mark Romano dere, 'Nke a bụ ebube zuru oke nke rumba Congolese, nke a na-akpọ ya n'ụdị na ọmarịcha agụụ mmekọahụ nke na-enweghị atụ n'ụwa egwu Africa
Enweghị ihe na-eme ka ọ dị n'ebe a, naanị ọrụ guitar na-enweghị isi, ụda olu na-acha mmanụ aṅụ, ụda ọkpọ na-ekpo ọkụ, na mpi abụba siri ike
' Christina Roden dere, 'Ụda egwú ndị ahụ na-egosipụta ụda Cuban clavé, ụdọ na-akụ, na ụda olu dị nso nke gosipụtara ụdị ndị okenye, ndị ọzọ
Enweghị otu ọnụ siri ike ma ọ bụ ọsọ ọsọ n'ime ntị
N'ikpeazụ, ọrụ ahụ na-abịa dị ka akụkọ ndụ dị ụtọ nke ndị maara na-akụzi
Onye na-enyocha egwu rock Robert Christgau dere 'Ọ bụrụhaala na ọ na-enweghị ụgbọala, ịdị jụụ na-adịgide adịgide adịghị mkpa maka ọnọdụ dị elu

Mana mgbe ọ dịghị ihe yiri ka ọ dị ụtọ karịa ụlọ, ọ bụ nkasi obi a gọziri agọzi - nkwekọrịta na-asụ ude, ịgbà na-agbanye, oghere na-asa ahụ na uru ahụ ọ bụla na-emebiga ihe ókè ruo mgbe ọbara nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ ya n'ebe ahụ ma na-aga n'ihu
A nabatara abọm ahụ nke ọma
Christgau nyere ndekọ ahụ A−, Romano kwubiri 'Ọ ga-esiri ike ịkwado ndekọ a maka album rumba Congolese nke afọ ma ọ bụ, maka nke ahụ, album Africa nke afọ'
Papa Noel na-arịa ọrịa mgbe edere abọm nke abụọ nke Kekele, ọ sonyeghị
Rigo Star Bamundélé nọchiri ya na guitar
Ramazani na Ndjock alaghachighị maka abọm nke abụọ
Dị ka abọm mbụ, nke abụọ gosipụtara ụbọ akwara na ụda conga
N'ụzọ dị iche, ọ gbakwunyere ọjà, clarinet, na violin
Ọ gụnyere ụtụ maka OK Jazz, Souvenirs-OK-Jazz
Ndị na-enyocha ihe lekwasịrị anya ọzọ na ịma mma nke ndekọ ahụ
Abụ nke Rigo Star dere, Oyibi Bien, bụ nke ndị nyocha abụọ họpụtara dị ka ihe pụrụ iche
Christgau họọrọ abọm mbụ karịa nke abụọ, mana ndị nyocha ndị ọzọ chere dị iche
Rick Sanders nke magazin fRoots dere 'ebe a, afọ ole na ole n'okpuru akara, na-abịa ọnụọgụ abụọ, abọm nke na-egosi ọbụna okpomọkụ, ọgụgụ isi na mkpụrụ obi karịa onye bu ya ụzọ'

John Pareles dere na New York Times, 'Kekele bụ njikọ nke ndị na-agụ egwú na-egwuri egwu na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị egwu a ma ama na Congo, na 'Congo Life' (World Music), ha gosipụtara ngwá egwú, woodwinds, marimbasīin edere nke ọma nke na-enweghị ike ịgba egwu maka nhazi ya dị nro
Papa Noel laghachiri maka abọm nke atọ, nke onye saxophonist Manu Dibango, si Cameroon, na ndị na-agụ egwu Mbilia Bel na Madilu System, ha abụọ si Democratic Republic of the Congo sonyeere Kekele
Aha abọm nke atọ na-ezo aka n'ebe a na-eche n'echiche, ngwakọta nke Kinshasa (Democratic Republic of the Congo), na Havana (Cuba)
Abọm ahụ na-enyocha njikọ dị n'etiti egwu rumba nke Congolese na Cuban
Na Kinavana, ndị otu ahụ na-ewere egwu ndị onye na-ede egwu Cuban Guillermo Portabales dere ma ọ bụ mee, ma kpọọ ha n'ụdị Congolese, jiri okwu Lingala dochie okwu Spanish ha

Onye otu egwu Nyboma ekwuola na Cuban rumba - ma okwu ahụ ma ịgba egwú ahụ - sitere na nkumba Congolese, na Spanish 'r' agbakwunyere na okwu ahụ, nakwa na e si Congo weta ya na Cuba na ahia ohu gafere Atlantic
Mgbe rumba Congolese mepụtara mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, egwu Cuban nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ya

N'ihi ya, Kinavana na-etinye ma ọ dịkarịa ala omenala atọ na-aga n'ihu nke Atlantic na ịgba egwu site na Congo na-ejikọta ya na mmetụta ndị ọzọ iji ghọọ Cuban rumba, otu egwu Cuban ahụ na-enye aka na rumba Congolese, wee webata egwu Portabales n'ime egwu Congolese maka Kinavana
Abọm a nwetakwara nyocha dị mma
Norman Weinstein dere maka All About Jazz 'Egwú a na-ada ụda na-enweghị mgbalị, na-aṅụrị ọṅụ, na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, ọbụnakwa maka ntị ndị na-adaba na jazz, na-agbanye ike
Nke a abụghị naanị abọm Afrịka kachasị mma m nụtụrụla kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ; ọ dị elu karịa ọtụtụ egwu egwu ụwa m nụturu n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, site n'ebe ọ bụla
Lee ihe gbasara otu afọ nwere ike isi weta ngwakọta zuru oke nke ihe oriri egwu

N'etiti njem egwu mbụ ha, iri ma ọ bụ iri na otu na UK na Nọvemba na Disemba, na afọ 2001, na ihe yiri ka ọ bụ egwu egwu ha kachasị ọhụrụ, ihe ngosi Julai 9, na afọ 2010 na Bozar na Brussels, otu isi akụkọ na-akọ na Kekele gara United States na Canada n'oge ọkọchị afọ 2004 na oge ọkọchị afọ 2006, na Europe n'oge okpomọkụ afọ 2005 na oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2007, yana ịrụ ọrụ na Canary Islands, Reunion, Guadeloupe, Dominican Republic, Morocco, na Congo Brazzaville
Tụkwasị na nke a, a na-akọwa abọm ha na 2006 dị ka nke edere 'n'oge njem oyi nke Kekele na afọ 2005 na Canada na US'
Ndepụta na-ezughị ezu nke ihe ngosi ndị a nyochara ma ọ bụ nke a ma ama gụnyere ihe ndị a

Tomoca (edekwara TOMOCA) bụ ụlọ ọrụ kọfị ezinụlọ nwere na Addis Ababa, Etiopia
E hiwere ya na February 1953
A maara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maka ụdị kọfị Italian ya nke e ji agwa arabica nke Etiopia mee
Aha ahụ sitere na Italian Torrefazione Moderna Café ma ọ bụ 'Modern coffee roasting'
Tomoca bụ onye otu Ethiopia Commodity Exchange, na ọ na-ebupụ kọfị ya na Sweden, Germany, United States, Japan, na obodo ndị ọzọ
Onye na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ Wondwossen Meshesha, onye njikwa ọrụ
Tomoca nwere alaka 22 na Addis Ababa ma mepee alaka mba ụwa mbụ ya na Tokyo na 2015
Na Septemba 2020, Tomoca meghere ụlọ ahịa kọfị mbụ ya n'Africa na Two Rivers Mall na Nairobi, Kenya

College of Climate Change and Environmental Science (CoCCES), nkè a na-akpọbu Academy of Climate Changing Education and Research (ACCER), bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkè Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo Kerala guzobere n'afọ 2010 iji mụọ banyéré mgbanwe ihu igwe n'okpuru ngalaba ọrụ ugbo
Ogige ahụ dị na Vellanikara, Thrissur, Kerala, India, ma nwee afọ ise na MSc
(Integrated) Climate Change Adaptation na afọ anọ na BSc
Climate Change na Environmental Science
Mgbè emere usoro ahụ n'ubochi isii n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010, ìgwè mbụ nwèrè klas mbụ ha na College of Fisheries (CoF) Panangad, Ernakulam

Mgbè l e wepụrụ CoF site na KAU gaa na Mahadum Kerala nke Azụmaahịa na Ọmụmụ Oké Osimiri na 2010, a kpọfere ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ n'ụlọ dị na isi ụlọ akwụkwọ KAU na Vellanikara, n'akụkụ NH-47, na GSLHV Prasad Rao dị ka ónyé ọrụ pụrụ iche mbụ
Ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ nọgidere n'ebe ahụ ruo n'afọ 2015, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ ise, n'oge ahụ kọleji ahụ toro ruo n'ókè ya zuru oke nke ise
Oommen Chandy, ónyé bụ Chief Minister nke Kerala n'oge ahụ, meghere ụlọ kọleji ọhụrụ ahụ n'ubochi iri abụo na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba 2015
N'afọ 2020, aha kọleji ahụ gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ College of Climate Change and Environmental Science, a kpọtakwara usoro ọhụrụ akpọrọ BSc(Hons) Climate Change na Environmental Science
Kọleji nke Mmụta, Akwanga bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum dị na Akwanga na Mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Akwanga na Ȯra Nasarawa, na Central Naijiria
Kọleji na-edu ndị a Dr Roseline Kella, Provost; Oriakụ Ruth O
Agwadu, onye na-edeba aha; Oriakụ Lillian Okpede, Bursar na Mr Godwin Ekoja dị ka onye na-agụ akwụkwọ
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka Ụlọ akwụkwọ nkuzi did elu Akwanga na Septemba 1976, site na Ȯra Plateau ederede ọnụọgụ 5 na 1978
A kagburu iwu a maka iwu nke 16 nke 1996 nke Nasarawa steeti malitere na 1 October 1996, ka e mechara steeti ahụ site na Ȯra Plateau, site n'aka ọchịchị Abacha, bụ nke bufere steeti ahụ
Ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na gọọmentị Nasarawa steeti, n'ihi ọnọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na steeti Nasarawa ọhụrụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nkuzi di elu malitere mmemme mmụta na saịtị nwa oge na Jos nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Akwanga
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nkuzi di elu mechara si na Jos kwaga na saịtị ya na-adịgide adịgide na Akwanga, na 1 Septemba 1985

Ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum dị n'obodo ochie Ilorin, isi obodo Kwara Steeti
Ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji ahụ bidoro dịka ụlọ akwụkwọ mmuta, ọ bụ Kwara State College of Technology (ugbu a Polytechnic Kwara Steeti)
E mechara gbanwee kọleji ahụ ka ọ bụrụ kọleji ndị nkuzi dị elu
Ka ọ na-erule 1976, kọleji ahụ wepụrụ kpamkpam na kọleji nke teknụzụ nke Kwara wee kpọọ ya Kọleji nke Mmụta Ȯra Kwara ka a nọrọ na Oro
The College moved to a temporary site in Ilorin and was affiliated to Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria
At the College's 1980 convocation, the then Governor of Kwara State, Alhaji Adamu Attah declared that the College will remain in Ilorin
It was then re-affiliated to the University of Ilorin

Kọmitii ahụ nọ n'okpuru Kansụl Nzuzo Akụnụba
E guzobere ya na 1990
Onye isi kọmitii ahụ na-abụkarị onye isi nchịkwa nke Directorate General of Income Tax Investigation
Ndị otu na-adịgasị iche site na steeti ruo steeti
Àtụ Indian intelligence agencies
E guzobere Kọmitii na Mgbanwe ihu igwe Sayensị na Njikọ Nkà na Ụzụ dị ka akụkụ nkè Clear Skies Initiative n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2002 site n'aka George W
Bush, dị ka mgbalị nke ọkwa kọmitii iji hazie sayensị mgbanwe ihu igwe na nyocha teknụzụ
White House na-ekwu, sị
Kọmitii na-ahụ màkà mmetụta ahụike nké ikuku na mmeto ikuku (COMEAP) bụ otu ndị ọkachamara sayensị na-enye gọọmentị UK ndụmọdụ onwé ha na ikike na mmetụta ahụike site na mmetọ ikuku

Ndị isi ya na-abụkarị ndị ọkà mmụta ma ọ bụ ndị ọkachamara sitere na ngalaba ndị dị ka kemịkalụ ikuku, ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi, epidemiology, na toxicology; otu ónyé na-enyere áká ịhụ na ọrụ teknụzụ nké kọmitii ahụ nwèrè ike ịnweta ọha na eze
N'afọ 2001, COMEAP dọrọ áká ná ntị na ịnọ ogologo ógè na ụmụ irighiri ihe na-eme ka ihe ize ndụ nkè ọnwụ mberede dịkwuo elu, ọkachasị site na ọrịa obi
Otu n'ime akụkọ ya na-adịbeghị ányá, nké e wepụtara n'afọ 2022, nyochara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nyocha ọrịa na-efe efe irí asaá wee kwubie na mmetọ ikuku nwèrè
ike ịbawanye ihe ize ndụ nke mbelata ọgụgụ isi na dementia n'etiti ndị agadi
COMEAP akọwakwala ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ ikuku na-eku ume n'ọnọdụ dị iche iche

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2019, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ọ kọrọ na mmetọ sitere na particulates ruru okpukpu iri atọ karịa na London Underground karịa n'okporo ámá dị n'okpọ ụzọ dị n'elu, na Northern Line nwéré ikuku kachasị njọ

COMEAP na-enyekwa ndụmọdụ banyéré otu esi ekwurịta ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ ikuku na ọha na eze (dị ka site na ọkwa ịdọ aka ná ntị nke otu ruo iri eji na London) na otu ndị mmadụ ga-esi gbanwee omume ha mgbè mmetọ ifufe dị elu
COMEAP ewepụtala ọtụtụ akụkọ gbásárá mmetọ ikuku na ahụike, gụnyere
Ónyé isi óche COMEAP ugbu a bụ Anna Hansell; oche ndị gara-aga gụnyere Frank J Kelly, Jon Ayres, na Sir Stephen Holgate
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere Roy M
Harrison, Jonathan Grigg, David Newby, na H
Ross Anderson
Injinia Kọmputa (CoE ma ọ bụ CpE) bụ ngalaba injinia na-ejikọta ọtụtụ ngalaba sayensị kọmputa na injinịa eletrọnịkị chọrọ iji wulite ngwaike kọmputa na ngwanrọ
Ndị injinia kọmpụta na-enwekarị ọzụzụ na injinịa eletrọnịkị (ma ọ bụ injinịa eletrọnịkị), imewe sọftụwia, na njikọta ngwaike-software kama ịbụ naanị injinịa ngwanrọ ma ọ bụ injinịa eletrọnịkị

Ndị injinia kọmpụta na-etinye aka n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ngwaike na sọftụwia nke kọmpụta, site na nhazi nke microcontrollers n'otu n'otu, microprocessors, kọmpụta nkeonwe na supercomputers, ruo na imepụta sekit
Ngalaba injinia abụghị naanị na-elekwasị anya n'otú sistemụ kọmputa n'onwe ha si arụ ọrụ kamakwa ka ha si abanye na foto ka ukwuu

Ọrụ ndị a na-emekarị gụnyere ndị injinia kọmpụta gụnyere ide sọftụwia na ngwa ngwa maka microcontrollers agbakwunyere, imepụta ibe VLSI, imepụta sensọ analog, imepụta bọọdụ sekit mgbama agwakọtara, na imepụta sistemu arụ ọrụ
Ndị injinia kọmpụta dabarakwara maka nyocha robotics, nke dabere na iji sistemu dijitalụ jikwaa na nyochaa sistemu eletriki dị ka moto, nkwukọrịta, na sensọ

N'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ mmụta dị elu, a na-ahapụ ụmụ akwụkwọ injinia kọmpụta ka ha họrọ ebe ọmụmụ ihe omimi n'oge obere na afọ ndị agadi n'ihi na njupụta nke ihe ọmụma ejiri mee ihe na nhazi na ntinye nke kọmputa karịrị ogo ogo mmụta mahadum
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịchọ ka ụmụ akwụkwọ injinịa mechaa otu afọ ma ọ bụ abụọ nke injinịa izugbe tupu ha ekwupụta injinịa kọmputa dị ka isi ihe ha na-elekwasị anya
Injinia Kọmputa malitere na 1939 mgbe John Vincent Atanasoff na Clifford Berry malitere imepụta kọmpụta dijitalụ mbụ nke ụwa site na physics, mgbakọ na mwepụ, na injinịa ọkụ
John Vincent Atanasoff bụbu onye nkuzi physics na mgbakọ na mwepụ maka Mahadum steeti Iowa na Clifford Berry bụbu onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'okpuru injinia ọkụ na physics

Ha jikọtara ya na kọmpụta Atanasoff-Berry, nke a makwaara dị ka ABC nke were afọ 5 iji wuchaaỌ bụ ezie na ABC mbụ ahụ kwụsịrị ma tụfuo ya na 1940s, a na-atụ ụtụ maka ndị na-emepụta ihe na-emepe emepe, e mere ihe atụ nke ABC na 1997 ebe ọ na-ewe otu ìgwè ndị nchọpụta na ndị injinia afọ anọ na $ 350,000 iji wuo ya
Kọmputa nkeonwe nke ọgbara ọhụrụ pụtara na 1970s, ka emechara ọtụtụ ọganihu na teknụzụ semiconductor

Ndị a gụnyere transistor mbụ na-arụ ọrụ nke William Shockley, John Bardeen na Walter Brattain na Bell Labs na 1947, usoro ngafe silicon elu (site na oxidation thermal) nke Mohamed Atalla na Bell Labs na 1957, mgbawa sekit agbakwunyere monolithic nke Robert Noyce na Fairchild Semiconductor na 1959, transistor metal-oxide-semiconductor field-effect transistor (MOSFET, ma ọ bụ MOS transistor) nke Mohamed Atalla na Dawon Kahng na Bell Labs na 1959, na otu-chip microprocessor (Intel 4004) nke Federico Faggin, Marcian Hoff, Masatoshi Shima na Stanley Mazor na Intel na 1971
E hiwere mmemme nzere kọmputa izizi na United States na 1971 na Case Western Reserve University dị na Cleveland, Ohio
Dịka nke 2015, enwere mmemme injinịa kọmpụta 250 nke ABET nwetara na US Na Europe, nzere nke ụlọ akwụkwọ injinịa kọmpụta bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na-eme akụkụ nke netwọkụ EQANIE

N'ihi ịba ụba ọrụ chọrọ maka ndị injinia nwere ike chepụta ngwaike, sọftụwia, firmware na jikwaa ụdị sistemụ kọmputa niile ejiri na ụlọ ọrụ, ụfọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gburugburu ụwa na-enye nzere bachelọ nke a na-akpọkarị injinịa kọmputa
Ma mmemme kọmputa na injinịa eletrọnịkị gụnyere imewe sekit sekit dijitalụ na usoro ọmụmụ ha
Dị ka ọ dị n'ọtụtụ ọzụzụ injinia, inwe ezigbo amamihe nke mgbakọ na mwepụ na sayensị dị mkpa maka ndị injinia kọmpụta
Onye nwere ọrụ na injinia kọmpụta ka a na-akpọ onye injinia kọmpụta

K, ma ọ bụ k, bụ mkpụrụedemede nke iri na otu na mkpụrụedemede Latịn, nke ejiri na mkpụrụedemede Bekee ọgbara ọhụrụ, mkpụrụedemede nke asụsụ ndị ọzọ ọdịda anyanwụ Europe na ndị ọzọ n'ụwa niile
Aha ya n'asụsụ bekee bụ kay (akpọrọ /ˈkeɪ/), ọtụtụ kays
Akwụkwọ ozi K na-anọchi anya velar plosive enweghị olu
Mkpụrụ akwụkwọ K sitere na mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Grik Κ (kappa), nke e si na Semitic kaph, akara maka aka mepere emepe

Nke a, n'aka nke ya, nwere ike ịbụ nke agbụrụ Semitic ndị biri n'Ijipt si na hieroglyph maka 'aka' na-anọchite anya /ḏ/ na okwu ndị Ijipt maka aka, 意-r-t (ma eleghị anya a na-akpọ //ˈcʼaːɾat// na Old Egyptian)
O doro anya na ndị Semite nyere ya uru ụda //k// kama, n'ihi na okwu ha maka aka malitere na ụda ahụ
E webatara K n'ime mkpụrụ akwụkwọ Latin na aha ka /kaː/ iji mee ka ọ dị iche na C, nke a na-akpọ ce (nke a na-asụ /keː/) na Q, nke a kpọrọ qu ma na-asị /kuː/
N'ihe odide Latin mbụ, a na-eji mkpụrụedemede C, /k/ na Q eme ihe iji nọchite anya ụda /k/ na //ɡ// (nke a na-adịghị ekewapụta n'ide)
N'ime ndị a, a na-eji Q mee ihe n'ihu ụdaume gbara gburugburu (dịka
__ibo____ibo__ 'Ike'), K tupu /a/ (dịka
C na ebe ndị ọzọ
Ka oge na-aga, ojiji nke C na ụdị ya G dochiri ọtụtụ ojiji nke K na Q
K dịgidere naanị n'ụdị fossil ole na ole dị ka Kalendae, 'kalenda'
Mgbe ewerechara okwu Grik n'asụsụ Latịn, a sụgharịchara Kappa ka ọ bụrụ C
Asụgharịkwara okwu nbinye sitere na mkpụrụedemede ndị ọzọ nwere ụda /k/ na C
N'ihi ya, asụsụ Romance na-ejikarị C, na-eṅomi omume Latin Classical, ma nwee K
naanị n'ime okwu mgbazinye ego sitere na otu asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Asụsụ Celtic na-ejikwa C kama iji K, mmetụta a gafere na Old English￼￼￼￼￼
Bekee bụ ugbu a naanị asụsụ German na-eji 'ike' eme ihe karịa (ọ bụ ezie na Dutch na-eji ya eme n'okwu ndị sitere na Latin, na ịkpọpụta okwu ndị a na-agbaso otu ọdịiche siri ike / dị nro dị ka Bekee)
Mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nke a na-adịghị ekwu okwu na mbido okwu Bekee mgbe ọ na-abịa n'ihu mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ahụ, dịka n'okwu ndị a bụ 'onye na-agba ịnyịnya,' 'mma,' na 'ikpere'
Dị ka J, X, Q, na Z, a naghị eji mkpụrụedemede K eme ihe ugboro ugboro na Bekee
Ọ bụ mkpụrụedemede nke ise a na-ejikarị eme ihe n'asụsụ Bekee, na-enwe ihe dị ka 08%

King Adebayo Film and Theatre Arts Network Television (KAFTAN TV) bụ ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Naijiria na-arụ ọrụ awa iri abụọ na anọ
E guzobere ya na Disemba 2016, ọ bụ KAFTAN TV Ventures, ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa njikọ aka nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Ondo City, Ondo State, yana ọfịs ndị ọzọ na Lagos na Abuja na-ahazi ụlọọrụ televishọn a

Ọ bụ onye otu Broadcasting Organization of Nigeria (BON) nke bụ njikọ mgbasa ozi nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na nke onwe, nke ụlọ ọrụ Corporate Affairs Commission debanyere aha ya, dị ka onye nche nche nke Naịjirịa nke Terrestrial Free-to-Air Radio and Television (Tv), Digital Terrestrial Television (DTT), Direct-To-Home (DTH), na Multimedia Distribution System (MMDS)
KAFTAN TV malitere mgbasa ozi na Septemba 2018
Ọ na-agbasa ozi n'asụsụ Bekee na StarTimes, BEN Television, na Lyngsat
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ọwa asụsụ Yoruba ya, nke malitekwara mgbasa ozi na StarTimes na mba niile na mpụga Naịjirịa na 1 Septemba 2020

Mgbe ọ na-ekpuchi ntuli aka 2018 Osun State na isi obodo Osogbo, otu onye ọrụ KAFTAN TV merụrụ ahụ mgbe ndị omempụ wakporo ya n'oge ọgba aghara nke usoro ntuli aka, yana ngwá ọrụ mmepụta na-enwekwa mmebi a na-apụghị idozi edozi
KAFTAN TV na-arụ ọrụ na mmepụta mgbasa ozi na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ ihe nkiri ma na-emepụta mmemme mbụ, gụnyere ihe ngosi, mmemme TV, na ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere inye mmemme ọzụzụ mgbasa ozi telivishọn n'efu, nke Queen Lilian Adebayo Foundation kwadoro, maka ndị na-eto eto na Ondo State na Jenụwarị 2021
KAFTAN TV malitere igosiputa na Thursday, 28 Jenụwarị 2021, na UK BEN TV Sky Channel 195
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2018, a kpọrọ KAFTAN TV Best Exhibitor for Public Relations and Media na Abuja International Trade Fair

Na Jenụwarị 2021, KAFTAN TV natara ihe nrite Distinguished Excellence Award site na Coalition of Civil Societies and Media Executives for Good Governance in Nigeria (COCMEGG) maka 'ọrụ mgbasa ozi, nkwado na mkpọsa mmeghachi omume na ọrịa COVID-19'
KCB Bank Tanzania Limited, bụkwa KCB Bank Tanzania, bụ ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa na Tanzania
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akụ iri abụọ na itoolu (29) nyere ikike nke Bank of Tanzania, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke obodo ahụ
Ụlọ akụ ahụ bụ onye otu Kenya Commercial Bank (KCB Group), nke dị na Nairobi, Kenya, yana ndị enyemaka na Kenya, Rwanda, South Sudan, Tanzania na Uganda

Ayoola Agboola nke a maara dị ka KDDO bụ onye na-emepụta egwu Afrobeats, onye nhazi egwu na onye na-agụ egwu si Lagos, Naijiria

N'afọ 2020, KDDO ghọrọ onye mbụ na-emepụta egwu Afrobeats n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ egwu nke America (RIAA) kwadoro mgbe egwu Davido a kpọrọ 'Fall' ghọrọ egwu nwere ihe nrite ọla edo na US
KDDO malitere njem ya n'egwú mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ dị ka onye DJ na Lagos, Naịjirịa, wee mechaa malite imepụta maka ndị na-agụ egwu n'ofe Afrịka
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke egwu 'Fall' na 2020 kpọgara ya n'ọkwa ụwa niile ma kọwaa ya ọzọ dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu na-esote iji duzie ụdị Afrobeats na-eto ngwa ngwa
Ọrụ KDDOX na-agafe n'ụwa niile ka ya na ndị na-agu egwu dịka Wizkid, Davido, Chris Brown, Summer Walker, Shenseea, Becky G, Ari Lennox, Popcaan, Bas, Cardi B na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ rụkọtara ọrụ
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Lagos State, Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Redeemer, ebe ọ gụrụ actuarial sayensị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Hundreds n'afọ 2016, ọ kwuru banyere ndụ ya na uto ya na Lagos, na-ekwu etu o si metụta ya na egwu ya
Ọ kwukwara banyere njem ya ruo ugbu a na otu o si malite dị ka DJ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ma kọwaa ụdị mmepụta ya mmetụta egwu KDDO gụnyere Fela Kuti, Timbaland, Sade Adu na Polow da Don
Na Maachị 23, 2017, ọ bịanyere aka na Sony/ATV Music Publishing dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ede egwu
N'afọ 2018, KDDO ghọrọ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Naijiria mbụ na-ere platinum nke RISA kwadoro
A kwadoro ya maka ọrụ mmepụta ya na 'Fall' na 'Fela in Versace' mgbe ndekọ abụọ ahụ rere ihe karịrị pụkụ ịrị abụọ na South Africa
N'afọ 2019, e gosipụtara ya na Davido na abọm Chris Brown nke akpọrọ 'Indigo Extended'
KDDO esorowo ọtụtụ ndị na-agụ egwu nke gụnyere Davido, Wizkid, Popcaan, Wale, Mike Will Made It, DJ Neptune, Aka, DJ Maphorisa, Maazị Eazi, Mayorkun na Orezi rụkọọ ọrụ
Egwu ndị ọ na-emepụta gụnyere 'Lower Body' na 'Under the Influence' nke Chris Brown na D&G nke Davido na Summer Walker, 'The Money (feat
Olamide ) nke Davido', 'Alụọ (feat
Mr Eazi) ' nke DJ Neptune, 'Fall' nke Davido, 'Mama' nke Mayorkun na 'Fela in Versace' nke Aka gụrụ
N'April 17, 2019, Davido kesara ozi ọma na Instagram, dị ka ya si kwuo; KDDO mere ya na album Beyoncé 'B7'
Ọ kpughere egwu nke KDDO mepụtara aha ya bụ 'Nefertiti' nke gosipụtara Rihanna
N'afọ 2018, a kọrọ na abọm Beyoncé 'B7' na-abụghị nke gọọmentị pụtara na Spotify na Nọvemba 2018
Dị ka Kathryn Lindsay nke Refinery29 media si kwuo, o dere 'Abọm B7 pụtara na Spotify ma o nwere egwu iri na anọ nke gosiputara ndị dịka Wizkid, Normani, SZA, Blue Ivy' na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Na Julaị 12, 2017, KDDO malitere njem mbụ ya 'LOUD Music Production Tour' nke mere na steeti itoolu gụnyere Abuja, Lagos State, Enugu, Port Harcourt, Johannesburg, Cape Town, Nairobi, Accra na Addis Ababa nke Sony ATV na Davido Music Worldwide kwadoro
KDDO so 'Mayorkun' kerịta ebe a na-eme nkiri na Mayor Of Lagos Concert nke e mere na Disemba 2017, n'akụkụ Davidon'elu ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2018, AKA na KDDO rụrụ ọrụ na FNB Stadium n'oge egwuregwu AFCON n'etiti Naịjirịa na South Africa
Craig Stephen Lawson (amụrụ na Julaị 15, 1969), nke a maara dịka KLC, bụ ónyé American DJ, onye na-akụ ọkpọ, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Ọ chọtara aha dị ka ónyé otu No Limit Records 'in-house production team Beats by the Pound
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ akara ahụ, ọ bụ ónyé otu Medicine Men ma nwee akara ndekọ nkè ya Overdose Entertainment aka Overdose Empire
Lawson tolitere na Melpomene Projects na New Orleans' Third Ward

A na-akpọ ya Drum major ọbụna tupu ya esonye n'òtù ahụ na Green Middle School, KLC nwèrè njikọ siri ike na cadences nke ọnyà ndị na-agagharị agagharị - ụda ahụ ga-emesị metụta ụda hip-hop ya
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, KLC banyere na breakin', otu n'ime ndị na-asọmpi ya bụ Michael 'Mystikal Mike' Tyler

'Ka anyị niile jikọọ ma mee ememe ọnụ' (Arabic; French Unish-nous tous et célébrons ensemble; Portuguese Let's all united and celebremos juntos; Spanish Unámonos todos y celebremos juntos); Swahili carry) bụ ukwe nke African Union (AU)
Ọ bụ Arthur Mudogo Kemoli, onye na-ede ukwe ukwe nke Kenya dere egwu a
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ukwe nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ịdị n'Otu Africa mbụ kemgbe 1986 tupu otu Union hiwere ọhụrụ nabata ya
E dere abụ ahụ dị ka uri akpọrọ 'Proud to be African' site n'aka onye Etiopia na-ede uri bụ Tsegaye Gabre-Medhin
Onye Kenya na-ede egwu Arthur Mudogo Kemoli dere egwu ahụ na Dakar, Senegal na 1986, a họrọkwara ya dị ka ukwe nke onye bu AU ụzọ, Organisation of African Unity (OAU), dịka akụkụ nke asọmpi
N'otu afọ ahụ, OAU sọpụrụ Tsegaye na OAU African Unity Anthem Prize maka ide abụ ahụ
Mgbe AU guzobechara na 2002, ọ haziri asọmpi iji guzobe akara ngosi nke otu, gụnyere ọkọlọtọ, akara na ukwe

Mpempe akwụkwọ asọmpi a maka ukwe ahụ gụnyere na ụdị mkpirisi ya maka emume ndị ọchịchị (nke mbụ ma ọ bụ amaokwu abụọ na ukwe) ekwesịghị ịfe otu nkeji n'ogologo nakwa na ntinye ọ bụla kwesịrị ịgụnye egwu, egwu mpempe akwụkwọ, ndekọ dị mma na nkọwa nkọwa wee bụrụ
nyefee n'otu n'ime asụsụ ọrụ nke AU
Nkenkenke kwuru na akara ngosi kwesịrị ịdọta mmụọ site n'ọtụtụ ụkpụrụ gụnyere mgba, nnwere onwe, ọrụ, ịdị n'otu, ikpe ziri ezi na olileanya
Asọmpi a ga-adịgide ruo Eprel 25, 2003, a ga-ewepụta ntinye atọ kachasị mma yana akara ndị a họọrọ na nnọkọ nke Mgbakọ AU na Maputo, Mozambique, na Julaị 2003, yana ebe mbụ, nke abụọ na nke atọ
ndị meriri na-anata ihe nrite ego US $ 7,000, US $ 5,000 na US $ 3,000, n'otu n'otu

Kaalong (Kàlòng) nke a makwaara dị ka Dimbong (Mbong), bụ asụsụ Bantu fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ịdị na étíti mpaghara nke ndịda Cameroon

A na-akọwakarị asụsụ ahụ dị ka ngwakọta nke ụdị asaa Maja, Zakan, Tingong, Mbong, Ripe (ma ọ bụ Bapé), Kpa (ma ọ dị Bafia), na Ti'bea (ma ọ bụrụ Djanti), agbanyeghị na ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ enwetabeghị otu nkwekọrịta banyere asụsụ bụ ma ọ bụghị nke dị iche na Kaalong
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ Kaalong agbanweela n'asụsụ Bafia yiri ya ma bụrụ nke a na-ekwu na ọ dị iche
Mike Kipruto Kigen (amụrụ na 15 Jenụwarị 1986) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na mita 5000 na mita 10,000 ma nweta ọlaọcha na ihe omume abụọ ahụ na African Championships in Athletics na 2006 na-anọchite anya Kenya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Kaan Kigen Özbilen ma kemgbe ahụ na-asọ mpi maka Turkey
A mụrụ Kigen na Keiyo District
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005 na Simotwo High School na Ainabkoi, Keiyo South District ebe ọ nọchitere anya ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na asọmpi dị iche iche
Ọ nọ na ogige ọzụzụ PACE Sports Management na Kaptagat
Afọ ọganihu Kigen bịara na 2006 mgbe ọ nọchitere anya Kenya na mba ụwa na asọmpi atọ
Ọ bụ onye nke ise na 2006 IAAF World Cross Country Championships nke mere ka ya na ndị Kenya nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na asọmpi otu
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke 12 5858 na mita 5000 na egwuregwu Bislett na Oslo wee bụrụ onye mmeri mba n'ebe dị anya

Nke a mere ka a họpụta ya maka 2006 African Championships in Athletics na Bambous, ebe o nwetara ọlaọcha n'ebe kachasị amasị ya tupu ọ gaa merie ọlaọcha ọzọ site na nke kachasị mma nke 28 0370 na ihe omume mita 10,000

O nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na 2006 IAAF World Athletics Final, na-ewere nke asaa na 5000 m, mana ụdị egwu ya laghachiri na 2006 IA AF World Cup ka ọ na-ewere ọlaọcha nke abụọ ya na 5000 m nke afọ na-anọchite anya Africa
Ọrụ ya mebiri na ngwụcha oge ahụ site na mmerụ ahụ siri ike n'ikpere na Nọvemba
Ọ laghachiri na asọmpi n'afọ 2007, mana ọ bụ n'afọ 2008 ka ọ malitere ịlaghachi n'ụdị ya
O meriri na Great Capital Run na Julaị 2008, na-edekọ ihe ndekọ nke nkeji 28 42
Na 2008 IAAF World Athletics Final ọ gbara ọsọ na mita 3000 wee bụrụ onye nke anọ
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gara 2009 IAAF World Athletics Final (mbipụta ikpeazụ nke ihe omume ahụ) ma bụrụ nke iri na otu karịa 5000 m
Ọ malitere oge ịgba ọsọ na 2010 nke ọma, site na mmeri na nzukọ ikike IAAF Antrim International Cross Country na Crosse Oeust-France
O sochiri nke a site na mmeri ọzọ na San Sebastián Cross Country mana a họrọghị ya maka ndị otu Kenya maka 2010 IAAF World Cross Country Championships
O setịpụrụ nke kacha mma nke 28 09 karịa kilomita 10 na ọsọ Parelloop na Brunssum na Machị, na-abịa nke anọ n'azụ Berhanu Delale
Ọ gbara ọsọ na Grand 10 Berlin n'ọnwa Ọktoba wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ n'ihe gbasara Kenya, jiri ihe kachasị mma nke 27 25 maka 10K
Ọ laghachiri na sekit cross country na Nọvemba, na-ewere nke atọ na Tuskys Cross Country zutere na Kenya na Cross de l'Acier na France
O merikwara na Antrim na Jenụwarị na-esote, na-ejigide aha ya
A gụnyeghị ya na ndị otu Kenya World Cross Country ma gbaa ọsọ nke mbụ ya na ọkara marathon kama na Lisbon Half Marathon, na-abịa nke ise na oge 1 00 49
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Micah Kogo na Parelloop n'ọnwa Eprel
O sonyere na 2011 IAAF Diamond League circuit, mana ọ gwụbeghị karịa nke asaa
Otú ọ dị, o setịpụrụ 10,000 m kacha mma nke 27 3053 nkeji na Memorial Van Damme
Kigen dabara n'okpuru akara awa maka oge mbụ na Delhi Half Marathon, na oge ya nke 59 58 nkeji bụ naanị otu sekọnd n'azụ onye mmeri Lelisa Desisa
Ọ malitere 2012 site na mmeri nke atọ ya na Antrim na mmeri ọrụ nke abụọ na Cross de San Sebastián Ọ bịara nke atọ na Azkoitia-Azpeitia Half Marathon na nke abụọ na Würzburger Residenzlauf
Ọ gbalịrị inweta nhọpụta maka 2012 London Olympics, mana o mechara nke iri na 10,000 m ule na Prefontaine Classic na nke ise na Kenyan 5000 m ule
Ihe kacha mma nke onwe ya nke nkeji 27 0349 bịara na Memorial Van Damme
Njem ikpeazụ ya n'afọ ahụ bụ njedebe nke anọ na Great North Run
Kigen mere nke mbụ ya na marathon na Jenụwarị 2013, na-abịa nke asatọ na Dubai Marathon na oge nke 2 08 24 awa
Na 2014 Great North Run Kigen duziri ọtụtụ n'ime asọmpi ahụ, Mo Farah gafere ya na 300m ikpeazụ
Ndị egwuregwu abụọ ahụ mechara na 59 59
