Kaaps (UK /kɑːps/, nke pụtara 'Cape'), nkè á makwaara dị kà Afrikaaps, bụ asụsụ West German Africa nket malitere nat mpaghara Western Cape nkè South Africa
Ọnọdụ yá dị kà asụsụ nwanne nwanyị nkè Afrikaans ma ọ bụ olumba nkè Afrikaans edoghị anya
Kemgbe mmalite afọ 2020 enwere mmụba dị ịrịba àmà n'ọnụ ọgụgụ akwụkwọ ndị e bipụtara ná Kaaps
Ọtụtụ ọrụ ná Kaaps sitere n'aka ndị edemede nọ ná mpaghara Cape Flats nkè Cape Town, South Africa ebe á na-asụkarị yá
Á malitere ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ iji mepụta akwụkwọ ọkọwa ókwú asụsụ Kaaps mbụ ná 2021

Okou Gnakouri Armand Olivier (French pronunciation [ɔku *akuʁi aʁmɑ̃ ɔlivje]; amụrụ ya na ụbọchị 30 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1980), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Kaaris (/ˈkɑːrɪs/, French ; stylized as K·RIS), bụ onye amụrụ dịka onye Ivorian ma burukwa onye na rap na French, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ede egwu
Or Noir, nnukwu abọm ya na Therapy Music / AZ / Universal Music, wepụtara na 21 Ọktoba 2013
A mụrụ ya na Cocody, nke dị na Abidjan na Ivory Coast, a zụlitere Kaaris na Sevran na ngalaba Seine-Saint-Denis, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Paris
Kaaris malitere ịkụ egwu n'afọ 1999, wee wepụta mixtape mbụ ya na 2001
Ọ laghachiri obodo ya bụ Ivory Coast ruo oge ụfọdụ, mana ọ laghachiri France mgbe ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gachara na mba ahụ
N'afọ 2007, o wepụtara abọm ya n'okporo ámá 43ème Bima (nke a na-akpọ 'Quarante-troisième Bima'), nke mere ka ọ bịanye aka na labelụ ọhụrụ French Cut Music
Otú ọ dị, nzukọ ya na onye egwu French Booba na ndị na-emepụta Therapy nyere ya ndekọ mbụ ya na Booba, 'Criminelle league' wepụtara dịka akụkụ nke Booba's Autopsie Vol
Kaaris nwere egwu mbụ ya 'Kalash', nke Booba gosipụtara Kaaris pụtara na abọm Booba bụ Futur
Kaaris na-edekọ ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ya na mmekorita ya na ndị na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, nke a maara dị ka Therapy (nke ndị na-emepụta 2031 na 2093 mejupụtara)
Agha dị n'etiti Booba na Kaaris dugara na mmechi nwa oge nke Ụlọ Nzukọ 1 na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Paris-Orly na 1 Ọgọọst n'afọ 2018
E nyere Kaaris ikpe ọnwa iri na asatọ ma kwụọ ya ụgwọ € 50,000

Nialé malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nyocha na n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ onye isi ndị ọrụ na Prime Minister site na 1991 ruo 2000 mgbe a kpọgara ya na Ministry of the Economy and Finance dị ka osote onye isi ndị ọrụ na Ministry of the Economy and Finance

Site na 2003 ruo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ndị ọrụ na Minister of Crafts and Supervision of Informal Sector tupu a họpụta ya dị ka onye isi njikwa nke Côte d'Ivoire Tourisme site na 2005 ruo 2007
A họpụtara ya Minister of Housing Promotion of Côte d
'Ivoire na gọọmentị Prime Minister Guillaume Soro, na-eje ozi site na 2011 ruo 2012

Nialé pụtara nwanyị mbụ ga-eduzi Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ego na Côte d'Ivoire mgbe onye isi ala Alassane Ouattara họpụtara ya na 22 Nọvemba 2012 wee jee ozi ruo Jenụwarị 2016 mgbe e zigara ya na Mịnịstrị nke Atụmatụ na Mmepe

N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ego, akụ na ụba Ivorian nwetara ọnụego uto kwa afọ nke ruru 9% ma bụrụ otu n'ime akụ na ụba kachasị ike na Africa site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa dịka Moody's na Fitch
Asụsụ Kaba, nke a na-akpọkwa Sara Kaba ma ọ bụghị ịgbagwojuanya tinyere asụsụ Sara, nwere asụsụ atọ ruo ise nke Chad na etiti Afrịka Republic
Ha bụ ọtụtụ asụsụ Bongo Bagirmi nke ezin'ụlọ asụsụ étíti Sudan
Okwu 'Kaba' na 'Sara' bụ ndị a na-ejikarị eme ihe ma na-agbanwekarị, ọ naghịkwa adaba na alaka aha ya bụ Kaba na Sara nke etiti Sudanic
Kabba na Kabba Laka, dịka ọmụmaatụ, bụ asụsụ Sara, ọtụtụ n'ime asụsụ Kaba na-aga n'okpuru aha 'Kaba', 'Sara', na 'Kaba Sara'
Princess Kabakumba Labwoni Masiko bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
Ọ bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Onye isi ala na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 27 Mee 2011
Ọ nọchiri Beatrice Wabudeya onye e wepụrụ na kansụl
N'ọrụ ahụ, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Minista maka Kampala Capital City Authority
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa abụọ ahụ na 14 Disemba 2011, na-eso ebubo nke iji ọrụ eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, izu ohi site na iwere, na-akpata mfu ego nye gọọmentị na nkata ịghọgbu gọọmentị
Ọ bụkwa onye a họpụtara dịka onye omeiwu (MP) maka 'Bujenje County mana ọ tụfuru oche na 2016', Masindi District
A mụrụ ya na Masindi District na 20 Ọktoba 1966
Kabakumba Masiko na-agụ akwụkwọ na Gulu High School maka O-Level ya na Nabisunsa Girls' Secondary School maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level
Ọ banyere Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na nke kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1990, na nzere Bachelor of Science na Economics
O nwere diplọma na Project Planning & Management site na Uganda National Chamber of Commerce and Industry, nke o nwetara na 1998
O nwekwara diplọma na Project Planning and Management, nke ọ nwetara na 2000, site na Uganda Management Institute (UMI)
N'afọ 2009, UMI nyere ya nzere Master of Arts na Public Administration & Management
E nyere ya diplọma na Legislative Drafting na 2003 site na International Law Institute
N'ọnwa Eprel 2018, Kabakumba gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Diploma na Legal Practice, site na Law Development Centre na Kampala
Site na 1986 ruo 1996, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
N'afọ 1996, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche ndị omeiwu maka Masindi District, merie oche ahụ ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'afọ 2001
N'afọ 2001, mgbe a gbanwere ya, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche nke Bujenje County, na Masindi District, merie oche ahụ ma jee ozi dị ka onye omeiwu mpaghara ruo n'afọ 2006
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Uganda
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ndị omeiwu na onye isi ọchịchị, ọkwá ọ rụrụ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ọ na ngalaba ozi na Febụwarị 2009
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ozi na nduzi mba, na-eje ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwarị afọ 2011
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke mba 2016, Kabakumba Masiko gbara ọsọ dị ka onye nweere onwe ya maka oche Masindi Municipality, mana Ernest Kiiza, Minista nke State maka Bunyoro Affairs, meriri ya

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu ndị uwe ojii Uganda, na-arụ ọrụ na ntuli aka, weghaara transmitter redio na mast redio site na ụlọ nke Kings Broadcasting Sercvice (KBS), n'obodo Masindi, na Western Uganda

A na-ekwu na ngwá ọrụ ahụ bụ nke Uganda Broadcasting Corporation (UBC), netwọk redio na telivishọn mba ma zuo ya na UBC na 2009 ma ọ bụ 2010, mgbe Kabakumba bụ Minista nke Ozi na Nduzi Mba, na-ahụ maka UBC
KBS, nke na-adịghịzi na ikuku, bụ nke Kabakumba Masiko (75%) na onye isi njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ (25%)
A na-etinye ya na ire ere na ịgbazite ala nke UBC, nke dị na Bugoloobi, mpaghara Kampala
Ndị uwe ojii ewepụtala nchọpụta ha na Directorate of Public Prosecution (DPP) maka ime ihe
Mgbe DPP kpebiri ịghara ibo Masiko ebubo ma kama ọ na-ebo ndị njikwa redio ebubo naanị, ndị otu ndị omeiwu ibe ha mere mkpesa
Kabange Mupopo (amụrụ na 21 Septemba na afọ 1992) bụ onye Zambia na-agba ọsọ na onye na-agba bọọlụ, onye ritere ọla edo na 400m na afọ 2015 All-Africa Games
Mupopo malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, nke nwanne ya nwoke kpaliri

Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Green Buffaloes FC na ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Zambia; dị ka onyeisi ndị otu, ọ duuru Zambia gaa asọmpi asọmpi asọmpị ụmụ nwanyị nke Afrịka nke afọ 2014, ebe e wepụrụ ha n'ọkwa otu
Mupopo malitere egwuregwu n'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2014, na-agba ọsọ 5344 maka mita 400 na nzukọ mbụ ya
Ọ nọchitere anya Zambia na afọ 2014 Commonwealth Games na Glasgow, ebe ọ gbara ọsọ 5309 ma wepụ ya na ọkara ikpeazụ

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, o nwetara ọlaọcha na 5121 na African Championships na Marrakech, na-emebi ihe ndekọ Zambia; ọ tụfuru ọla edo na Folashade Abugan nke Naijiria, onye gbara ọsọ n'otu oge ahụ, na foto-ọgwụ
Mupopo ruru eru ịnọchite anya Africa na afo 2014 IAAF Continental Cup, kwa na Marrakech, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ ma melite ndekọ mba ya ruo 5087
Mupopo natara agụmakwụkwọ egwuregwu ọnwa iri na asatọ site na Kọmitii Olympic nke Zambia na afọ 2015, nke mere ka ọ lekwasị anya na egwuregwu ọ bụghị bọọlụ
Mupopo malitere na IAAF Diamond League na Doha na ọnwa Mee, na afọ 2015, na-etinye nke asaa na 5188
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2015 ọ gbara ọsọ 5086 na La Chaux-de-Fonds, na-emeziwanye ihe ndekọ mba ya site na otu narị nke abụọ
A họpụtara ya maka asọmpi afọ 2015 World Championships na Beijing
Kabbah ma ọ bụ Kabba bụ aha nna madu a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Mandinka nke West Africa
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Kabbo (nwụrụ na 25 Jenụwarị 1876) (nke e jikwara Sá-ddoro ma ọ bụ Jantje
mara) bụ onye a ma ama na-ede akụkọ maka ọdịbendị na amamihe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa iji nye aka na Bleek na Lloyd archive nke ndi Bushman Folklore
Ọ dere gbasara ndụ, ememe, na nkwenkwe nke ndi obodo ixam
Kabelo nwere ike izo aka na ndia

Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya (onye amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri n'isii nke ọnwa Juun afọ 1952) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke jere ozi na Sineti nke Naịjirịa kemgbe 2007, na-anọchite anya mpaghara ndịda Kano nke Kano Steeti
O so n’otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị All Progressive Congress (APC) na-achị achị
A mụrụ Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya N'ụbọchị iri n'isii nke ọnwa Juun afọ 1952 na Alkala quarters Gaya LG, na ezinụlọ Magajin Garin Gaya Sani

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Gaya site n'afọ 1961 ruo afọ 1964 na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Tsangaya ebe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n'afọ 1968 nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bụzi Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ naAbdullahi Aliyu Sumaila bụ onye na-enyere isi ụlọ akwụkwọ aka kụziiri ya mgbakọ na mwepụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị, Birnin Kudu site n'afọ 1969 ruo afọ 1973 ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West Africa na kọleji nke agụmakwụkwụ ukwu site n'afọ 1974 ruo afọ 1975
O nwetere nzere bachelọ na ihe owuwu na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello dị na Zaria n'afọ 1977
Ọ nọgidere na mahadum a, ebe ọ mesịrị nweta akara ugo mmụta Master na ihe owuwu n'afọ 1980
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gara akwụkwọ na ụlọ mmụta politekniki nke Kano Steeti
N’afọ 1985, ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Ụlọ ọrụ Atụmatụ na nchedo gburugburu ebe obibi nke Kano Steeti

Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị National Party of Nigeria (NPN) na Naịjirịa nke abụọ N'afọ 1992, n'oge mgbanwe nke obodo Naịjirịa nke atọ , ọ bụ onye otu etiti aka nri Republic National Convention (NRC) bụ onye a họpụtara n'okpuru otu a dịka gọvanọ Kano steeti site n'afo 1992 rue afọ 1993
N'afọ 1997, n’oge mgbanwe General Sani Abacha, ọ banyere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị United Nigeria Congress Party (UNCP) ọ bụ kwa onye otu Kọmitii mba Na-ahụ Maka Nlekọta Mba

UNCP gụnyere ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị dịka Atiku Abubakar, Emeka Ojukwu, Abdullahi Aliyu Sumaila, Mohammed Daggash, Ali Modu Sheriff, Ibrahim Saminu Turaki, Attahiru Bafarawa, Bello Matawalle, Hope Uzodinma, Adamu Aliero, Anyim Pius Anyim na ndị ọzọ
N’afọ 2003, Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya zọrọ ọkwa National Democratic Party (NDP) na ntuli aka gọvanọ steeti n'afọ 2003
A họpụtara Kabiru Ibrahim Gaya na Sịneti nke ndịda Kano n'afọ 2007

A họpụtara ya na kọmitii maka ikuku mmanụ ala, Ụgwọ Obodo na mba Ofesi, Steeti na gọọmenti ime obodo na Akụrụngwa mmanụ ala elu ugwu na ọrụ Na nyocha nke etiti oge nke arụmọrụ nke ndị Sịnetọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ ThisDay kwuru na ọ kwadoro Bill Management and Accountability Bill, 2009, na Millennium Development Agency Bill, 2009
Ọ kwadoro nkwado ise ma nye aka nke ọma na arụmụka na nnọkọ ọnụ

N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, dịka onye isi oche kọmitii ndị omebe iwu sineti na-arụmọrụ, Kabiru Gaya kwara arịrị na ụfọdụ ọrụ na-aga nwayọ nwayọ, ma kwuo na Sineti agaghị ekwenye n'echiche nke ịtọzị ụzọ Naịjirịa
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2009, ọ kwadoro mkpalite nke otu ANPP isi nke Kano iji nye gọvanọ steeti ahụ Ibrahim Shekarau, ikike ka ọ kpọpụta onye ga azọ ọkwa ọchịchị gọvanọ n’afọ 2011
Onye nhoputa ndi ochichi bu Sheikh Ibrahim Khaleel
Kabiru Gaya zọrọ ọkwa dịka Sịnetọ na anọchite anya ndịda Kano n'oche ANPP n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, ma bụrụkwa sịnetọ ọzọ
Gaya bụ osote onye ụtarị ndị omeiwu ka dị obere n'ọnụ ọgụgụ nke sịnetị site na 2007 ruo 2011
A họputara ya ugboro atọ ịnọchite anya ndịda kano ntuli aka nke afọ 2011, 2015 na 2019
A họpụtara Kabiru Gaya dịka osote onye isi nke Inter-Parliamentary Union (IPU) maka Africa na ọgbakọ izugbe nke 135 nke njikọ na Geneva, Switzerland n'ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ 2016
Ọ bụ onye otu Nigerian Institute of Architects (NIA) na Nigerian Large Scale Farmers Association (NLSFA)
Ndi University of Science And Applied Management, Porto-Novo, Benin nyere ya nzere digiri ugwu
Ọ bụkwa onye otu kọmitii na'ahụ maka ụgbọ mmiri
Kabiru Rabiu (amụrụ na 28 Nọvemba 1980) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria ma na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi otu BUA Group
N'afọ 2020, a kpọrọ ya onye ndu akụ na ụba Afrịka kachasị mma n'okpuru afọ iri anọ na 100 African Economic Leaders for Tomorrow awards site n'aka French Institut Choiseu
Rabiu nwetara nzere bachelọ na njikwa na Webster University, London ma nwee nzere masta ya na American Intercontinental University na London
Rabiu malitere ọrụ ya na Universal Rice Mills ma mesịa sonye na Nigeria Oil Mills Limited ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka General Manager ma mesịa bụrụ General Manager
N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke BUA Oil Mills Limited
N'afọ 2010, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke BUA Group
Kabiru bụ onye guzobere Hollaport (ngwaọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ na ozi)
Kabiye ( ; nke a sụgharịrị Kabiyé, Kabiyè, Kabye, Kabyé, Kabyè, Cabrais) bụ asụsụ Gurunsi Gur nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ nke a na-asụkarị n'ebe ugwu Togo
N'ime narị afọ nke ịrị abụọ, e nwere ọtụtụ mbata na etiti na ndịda Togo nakwa Ghana na Benin
Ndị na-asụ Kabiye mejupụtara ihe karịrị pasent iri abụọ na atọ nke ndị Togolese bi na afọ 1999
Kabiye bụ otu n'ime asụsụ mba abụọ nke Togo (ya na Ewe)
N'ihe gbasara Togolese, asụsụ mba ugbu a pụtara na a na-akwalite asụsụ ahụ na mgbasa ozi mba na, na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ, dị ka ihe nyocha nhọrọ na klaasị iteghete na ịrị
Onye ozi ala ọzọ na-asụ asụsụ bụ Jacques Delord bipụtara ụtọ asụsụ mbụ na-akọwa Kabiye na afọ 1976
Nke a sochiri ụtọ asụsụ nkọwa nke Kezié Lébikaza na afọ 1999, nke ka bụ ọrụ ntụziaka dị mkpa na asụsụ Kabiye
E nwekwara akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Kabiye-French

Isiokwu ndị ọzọ a na-elekwasị anya na nyocha gụnyere Comparative linguistics, Discourse analysis, Language contact, Lexicology, Morphology, Phonology, Sociolinguistics, Syntax, Tone orthography, Tonology, na ngwaa
Akwụkwọ ndị mbụ a maara na Kabiye pụtara na 1930s
N'ozuzu, e nweela ihe dị ka akwụkwọ 200 na Kabiye, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ha niile ka na-ebipụta ma ọ bụ dị mfe ịzụta
Maka ndepụta ruo mmalite nke narị afọ, lee Pouwili, 1999

Akwụkwọ gụnyere akwụkwọ abụọ nke ilu, akụkọ ọdịnala, uri, akwụkwọ ọgwụ, akwụkwọ ọrụ ugbo, nsụgharị nke Bible, traktị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, traktị okpukpe, akwụkwọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, primers, na ihe nkuzi ndị ọzọ
Gnasse Atinèdi, odeakwụkwọ nke Académie Kabiye, malitere Wikipedia Kabiye na ọnwa June n'afọ 2014
Ọ dị ugbu a (July 2017) nwere isiokwu 1185 n'ọtụtụ isiokwu mba ụwa
Kabkabou ma ọ bụ Kabkabu (Arabic) bụ azụ̀ na tomato stew a na-akwadebe na Tunisia
A na-enwe ekele maka nri ahụ nke ọma n'ihi na ọ dịtụ mma ma dị mfe ịkwadebe
Ọ na-agụnye ofe nke a na-esi anụ azụ, a na-agbakwunye capers, oliv na lemon
A na-eji ọtụtụ ụdị azụ, dị ka nhazi ya , azu ukwu nke mmụọ, tuna ma ọ bụ mackerel
Ihe ndị a na-eji eme ihe na nkwadebe ahụ bụ yabasị, mmanụ oliv, tomato paste, galik, harissa, nnu, ose, cumin, caper, oroma, mkpụrụ oliv ojii, mkpụrụ oliv na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na saffron
Ebe nchọputa nri
Mkpúrù èdè íke
abomo Vilakazi (amụrụ na 27 Julaị 1978), ma ọ bụ naanị dị ka Kabomo, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri telivishọn Zabalaza, Sink na Seriously Single
Ewezuga ime nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye edemede, onye na-ede uri, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, onye egwu, onye na-eti egwu, onye mmepụta na onye njikwa ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na 27 Julaị 1978 na Benoni, Gauteng
E wepụtara egwu mbụ nke Kabomo, 'Uzobuya', n'afọ 2012
Ihe ịga nke ọma bịara na abọm abụọ, All Things Grey na Sekusile N'ihe nkiri ncha Zabalaza, ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ, nke dugara n'ọkpụkpọ òkù ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na Vuzu sitcom Check Coast na 2014

N'afọ 2015, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Sink, mgbe ahụ na usoro telivishọn Sober Companion, nke sochiri ya bu ngosi ndị a ma ama dị ka Soul City, Scandal, Thola, Saints & Sinners, Umlilo, Captain Bozaa na Tshisa
Dị ka onye na-ede egwu, o mere ọtụtụ egwu a ma ama maka ndị na-agụ egwu Tshepo Tshola, Unathi, Aya, Kelly Khumalo, Thiwe, Nothende, Flabba, The Fridge, Flatoe, Pebbles, Zubz, Dineo Moeketsi
O duzikwara ihe nkiri abụọ Droplets na Melody
Ka ọ dịgodị, o dekwara edemede maka usoro ihe nkiri Sepedi SABC1 a ma ama Skeem Sam
Otú ọ dị, ndị ọrụ ihe nkiri Droplets mechara katọọ ya na-ekwu na ọ kwụghị ha ụgwọ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Seriously Single nke Katleho Ramaphakela na Rethabile Ramaphakala duziri
A tọhapụrụ ya na 31 Julaị 2020 na Netflix
Kabuchai bụ mpaghara ebe ọchịchị mezuru constituency dị Kenya
Ọ bụ otu n’ime mpaghara iteolu dị na Bungoma County
Kabundungdulu bụ ejima nwoke nke Sudika-mbambi ma bụrụkwa ihe akụkọ ifo Ambundu Ọ bụ akụkụ nke akụkọ ifo mmalite maka égbè eluigwe, ebe ọ na-anọchite anya ụda éji ézi
Kabundungdulu bụ nwa nke abụọ, ma gwa nne ya okwu n'afọ, dịka ejima ya nke okenye
Mgbe Sudika-mbambi gara n'ihu na-achọ igbu mmụọ (makishi) bụ ndị kpatara mbibi nke ụlọ ha mgbe ha bụ nwata tupu a mụọ ha ñakwa ogbugbu nke nna nna ha, Kabundungdulu na nne na nna ha nọ
Ka e mesịrị, mgbe Sudika-mbambi na-anwụ site na mmerụ ahụ ya n'agha ya iji merie aka nke nwa nwanyị chi nke ala mmụọ, Kabundungdulu zọpụtara ya
Otú ọ dị, Kabundungdulu, onye na-enweghị ndị nwunye ọ bụla, rịọrọ nwanne ya nwoke maka otu n'ime nwunye ya
Sudika-mbambi jụrụ ma ha abụọ gara n'ụzọ dị iche iche mgbe ọ dịghị onye meriri ibe ya n'ọgụ
Kabura Zakama (amụrụ ya mgbe ọnwa Mee dị mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri n'otu, n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri, dọkịta anụmanụ na onye mmepe mba ụwa na onye ọrụ ebere
Nchịkọta uri ya, The Man Lived, meriri na 1999 Association of Nigerian Authors ANA Poetry Prize
Ọ kọwapụtara Birago Diop, Lenrie Peters, Tanure Ojaide na Kwesi Brew dị ka ndị isi na-emetụta uri ya
N'afọ 1998, Zakama guzobere Kairos Productions iji bipụta ndị odee na-agbagote
A nabatara uri ya nke ọma n'ofe Afrịka nakwazi n'èzí
A mụrụ Kabura Lynn Zakama n'ezinụlọ Garnvwa nke obodo Garkida, Adamawa steeti, North East Nigeria na 11 Mee 1964, ma gụọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na North Garkida Praịmarị School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Federal Government College, Maiduguri na Borno State, Nigeria, ebe ọ natara Federal Government School Scholarship
Ọ gara Mahadum Ahmadu Bello dị na Zaria ebe ọ nwetara nzere Doctor of Veterinary Medicine n'afọ 1989
N'afọ ahụ, ọ nwetakwara asambodo profishiensi na French
N'afọ 1997, Kabura Zakama gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Postgraduate Diploma na Management na Mahadum Bayero, Kano
E nyere ya Chevening Scholarship n'afọ 2004, wee nwetakwa nzere masta na Governance na Development na Institute of Development Studies, Mahadum Sussex na Brighton, United Kingdom n'afọ 2005
Kabura Zakama nọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya dị ka dọkịta anụmanụ ruo afọ itoolu tupu ọ malite ọrụ na mmepe mba ụwa

N'afọ 1999, o guzobere Pastoralist Development Initiative, otu NGO na-ewulite ikike na mmepe mmadụ na ndị na-azụ atụrụ na North Central Nigeria, nke lekwasịrị anya na ọchịchị, ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ nakwazi ihe gbasara mmemme ndụ
Dị ka nwata na-etolite ngwa ngwa ma na-etinye onwe ya n'ime onwe ya (ya bụ na ọ naghị achọ mmekọ ya na ndị mmadụ), Kabura Zakama malitere ide uri mgbe ọ dị obere
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Veterinary School, o dere uri ma tinye ha na bọọdụ ọkwa
O nyere uri, Farida, nke a raara nye nwa klas ya nke a gbagburu mgbe a kpọrọ ndị uwe ojii ka ha kwụsị ọgba aghara ụmụ akwụkwọ, na magazin ụmụ akwụkwọ
Ọ bụ n'afọ 1994 ka Kabura Zakama zutere Prọfesọ Zaynab Alkali onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa kọwaa uri / akụkọ dị mkpirikpi nke mụpụtara Vultures in the Air Voices from Northern Nigeria
Site n'oge ahụ, Kabura Zakama, onye bụ onye na-ede uri, malitere ibipụta uri ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ, magazin na nchịkọta akwụkwọ akụkọ
Kabura Zakama na-ahụzi uri ya dị ka ọkpụkpọ oku ma na-akwalite ndị odee na-eto eto ya na ide ihe n'asụsụ nne ya nke ji nwayọọ nwayọọ anwụ
Ọ bụ onye otu Association of Nigerian Authors, Abuja Literary Society na Abuja Writers Forum ebe ọ na-etinye aka na uri na-eme ihe nkiri ma na-etinye akụkọ dị mkpirikpi na ederede na-abụghị akụkọ ifo
Dị ka onye na-ede blọgụ na-arụsikwa ọrụ ike, ọ na-arụ ọrụ ike n'ọtụtụ forums edemede n'ịntanetị
Kabura Zakama malitere ide uri n'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma ma nyekwa aka na edemede uri nke mba nakwa nke mba ụwa
N'afọ 1999, ọ meriri Association of Nigerian Authors ANA Poetry Prize maka nchịkọta uri ya, The Man Lived
Ọtụtụ n'ime uri ya na-ekwu maka nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọchịchị na Naịjirịa
Akwụkwọ ndị e bipụtara nanị ha
Anthologies
Kachama-Ganjule bụ asụsụ Afroasiatic a na-asụ na Etiopia n'àgwàetiti dị na Lake Chamo na Lake Abaya
A na-asụ Kachama n'àgwàetiti Gidicho na Ọdọ Mmiri Abaya, ebe a na-asụrụ Ganjule na obere agwaetiti dị na Ọdọ mmiri Chamo
Ugbu a, ndị na-asụ asụsụ Ganjule akwagala n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke ọdọ mmiri ahụ
A ka nwere ihe dị ka otu pụkụ monolinguals na asụsụ a
Blench (2006) depụtara Gidicho, Kachama, na Ganjule dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche
Ethnologue na-enye Gatame/Get'eme/Gats'ame dị ka otu okwu; Otú ọ dị, Blench na-emeso nke ahụ dị ka asụsụ dị iche, otu okwu na Haruro/Harro
Ka ọ na-akwaga ndị ọzọ na alaka ugwu nke asụsụ Ometo, ọ hapụrụ Gatame / Haruro na alaka ọwụwa anyanwụ
Enweghị ihe akaebe maka imeso ndị a dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche
Kachifo Limited bụ ụlọ mbiputa akwụkwọ kwụụrụ onwe ya nke dị na Lagos, Nigeria
Muhtar Bakare guzobere ya na 2004
Ihe odide ya gụnyere Farafina Books, Farafina Educational, Prestige Books na Farafina Magazine
Farafina Books bụ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ na akụkọ ifo, akwụkwọ nkuzi, tebụl kọfị, mmasị n'ozuzu na akwụkwọ ụmụaka
Farafina bipụtara Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's Purple Hibiscus nke meriri Commonwealth Writers' Prize na Half of a Hello Sun Yellow Sun nke natara Orange Broadband Prize for Fiction

Ndị ọzọ na-anata onyinye nke Farafina bipụtara gụnyere akwụkwọ Sefi Atta nke ritere 2006 Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa-winning Everything Good Will Come[Tinye edensibịa] na Nnedi Okorafor's Zahrah the Windseeker, onye natara 2008 Wole Soinka Prize
[citation necessary]
Prestige Books bụ ụlọọrụ mbipụta akwụkwọ nke Kachifo Limited
Magazin Farafina bụ magazin na-adọrọ mmasị n'ozuzu ya na mbipụta ọ bụla nke onye nchịkọta akụkọ ọbịa chịkọtara
Ndị nchịkọta akụkọ gụnyere ndị edemede Uzodinma Iweala, Molara Wood, Okey Ndibe, na Petina Gappah

Ọ gosipụtara ọrụ nke Wole Soyinka, Segun Afolabi, Uche James Iroha, Funmi Iyanda, Dinaw Mengestu, Barbara Murray, Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie, Jackee Budesta Batanda, Helon Habila, Tosin Oshinowo, Patrice Nganang, Jide Alakija, na Nnedi Okorafor
Kachumbari bụ nri tomato na salad onion nke na-ewu ewu na nri nke mpaghara Great Lakes nke Africa
Ọ bụ nri salad a na-esighị esi nke nwere tomato, yabasị, na ose chili
Enwere ike ịchọta ọdịiche nke kachumbari na Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda, Uganda, Burundi na mba ndịda Afrịka nke Malawi na Congo
Okwu Swahili kachumbari sitere na okwu India cachumber
A na-eji Kachumbari eme ihe dị ka nri akwụkwọ nri maka nri isi
Na obodo Kenya, a na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na pilau (pilaf), mukimo, ma ọ bụ nri nyama choma (anụ e siri esi) na ugali
Na obodo Tanzania, a na-eri ya na osikapa pilau ma ọ bụ biryani
Na obodo Malawi, a na-erikarị ya n'onwe ya dị ka nri salad ọ bụla ọzọ, ebe na Uganda a na-eri ya na nyama choma
Enwere ike itinye ihe ndị ọzọ, dị ka lime ma ọ bụ mmiri lemon, cilantro ọhụrụ (coriander ma ọ bụ dhania), parsley, avocado, ma ọ bụ cucumber, na n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ gin ma ọ bụ vodka
Ụfọdụ ụdị ntụziaka na-akpọkwa habanero ma ọ bụ Scotch bonnet peppers, na aka nke cayenne pepper
Kachumbari na-ewu ewu n'ógbè Great Lakes nke Afrịka ma enwere ike iri ya na Afrika pilaf na African biryani
Na Malawi, a na-akpọ ya sumu ma ọ bụ shum ma ọ bụ naanị 'tomato na salad yabasị'
Kachumber, ma ọ bụ cachumber, bụ nri salad na nri ndị India nke nwere tomato, cucumbers, yabasị, mmiri epe ilu, na mgbe ụfọdụ, ose chili
Ọ dị ka ọtụtụ salad ndị ọzọ nke Mediterenian na étíti ọwụwa anyanwụ nwere otu ihe ahụ
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-akpọkwa raita, nri yiri nke a na-eji curd eme, kachumber

sei
nukwu ụlọ ọrụ ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọrụ ya gosipụtara na Lagos Photo Festival na 2015 na 2017
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Zeitz MOCAA, Still Here Tomorrow To High Five You Yesterday (2019)

Kadaria Ahmed bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria, onye ọchụnta ego nke mgbasa ozi, na onye ọrụ televishọn
Ahmed nwere MA na Televishọn si Goldsmiths, Mahadum nke London, na okokporo si na Mahadum Bayero nke Kano
Ọ bụkwa Ọkammụta Chevening
N'ime ikike ahụ, o nyeere aka ịhazi usoro akụkọ maka ndị isi mmemme ahụ wee kọọ site n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ụwa gụnyere South Africa, Eritrea na United Nations
Laghachi na Naijiria, Ahmed jere ozi dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Next (Naijiria), mbipụta mmeri
N’ebe ahụ, ọ lekọtara ọnụ ụlọ ọrụ akụkọ nke ihe dị ka otu narị mmadụ na iri abụọ na ihe dị ka ụdọ iri atọ ma na-ebugharị ihe omume bu n’obi banyere nzukọ ahụ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kwụsịrị ibipụta mbipụta ya na Septemba 2011
N'afọ 2011, o lebara anya na mkparịta ụka ntuli aka onye isi ala na Naijiria na igwe onyonyo
N'afọ 2014, o kere aka, weputa ma gosiputa Okwu Kwuru Okwu, usoro ajuju anya nke oma iji choputa ma mee ka ndi Naijiria nwee mkpebi n’iru ihe di nkpa
Offọdụ n'ime ndị a gbara ama n'okwu a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ gụnyere Ibrahim Babangida, Tonye Princewill, Babatunde Fashola, Rotimi Amaechi, Ali Baba, Oby Ezekwesili, tinyere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
N’afọ 2017, ọ bidoro ihe nkiri ọhụụ akpọrọ The Core na Channels TV
N’ọnwa Julaị afọ 2017, ọ gbara Nnamdi Kanu ajụjụ ọnụ, onye ndu ndị Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) onye mere akụkọ site n’ikwu na ọ bụ “ Biafra ma ọ bụ ọnwụ”

Na nhazi rue ntuli aka nke ọnwa Febụwarị 2019, ọ na-ahazi nzukọ ọgbakọ maka ime obodo maka ndị ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala na ndị nnọchi anya ha, ọkachasị nke onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari na osote ya, Ọkammụta Yemi Osibanjo
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndi Guild nke ndi editọ Naigiria na ndi ụlọ akwụkwọ ndi nduzi
Na 2017, ọ malitere Daria Media Ltd, ụlọ ọrụ ezubere iji kwalite ọrụ mgbasa ozi ọha na eze
E bipụtara akụkọ banyere Ahmed na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba na nke mba uwa dịka Daily Trust, The Guardian, na Financial Times nke London
O deziela akwụkwọ abụọ dị mkpa

Nke mbụ, nke akpọrọ, Nigeria the Good News, nke e bipụtara na 2012, bụ mkpokọta edemede sitere n’aka ndị ọchụnta ego, ndị na-ahụ maka ọha mmadụ, ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na ndị na-eme iwu banyere ihe ọma na-eme na Naịjirịa n’agbanyeghi ihe isi ike mba ahụ chere ihu
N’afọ 2014 ka Henrich Boell Foundation nyere ya ọrụ ka ọ bipụta akwụkwọ banyere mmepe na-adigide ya na mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na Lagos Steeti

Aha ya bụ, 'Lagos - ' mbipụta a bụ nchịkọta isiokwu nke ndị ọkachamara na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ebe gbasara mmetụta mgbanwe ihu igwe na Lagos na ụdị mmemme achọrọ iji dozie nsogbu ndị dị ugbu a ma belata ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu

A mụrụ Amadou na Niamey, Niger

Ọ so na ndị otu na asọmpi iko mba ụwa 2010 na 2012 African Nations Cup

Kadi Sesay (amụrụ na Machị 4, 1949) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sierra Leone, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, onye na'akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke Sierra Leone People's Party (SLPP)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Azụmaahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ Sierra Leone site na 2002 ruo 2007
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke Leone Consulting & Advisory Services maka Azụmaahịa, itinye ego na mmepe
Ọ bụ nne nke onye na-akọ akụkọ CNN International Isha Sesay

A mụrụ Kadi Sesay na Machị 4, 1949 na Rotifunk, Moyamba District, na Southern Sierra Leone, mgbe ahụ bụ British Crown Colony, nne na nna sitere na agbụrụ Temne si n'ime ime obodo obodo Rhombe, Lokomasama Chiefdom, Port Loko District na Northern Province of Sierra Leone
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na EUB Primary School na Rotifunk, Moyamba District
Sesay gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Fourah Bay College na Freetown na 1973 na nzere BA (Hons) na Asụsụ Bekee na Akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1974, ọ nwetara nzere MA na akwụkwọ edemede Africa na Mahadum Sheffield na United Kingdom wee nweta nzere PhD ya na Applied Linguistics na Mahadim London
Sesay bụ onye nkuzi na Fourah Bay College ruo afọ 20 wee bụrụ Onye isi nke Ngalaba Bekee
Ọ nọrọ afọ 6 dịka onye isi oche nke National Commission for Democracy and Human Rights (NCDHR)
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Sierra Leone iduzi kọmitii mba
Ọ hapụrụ ọkwa a ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe na atụmatụ akụ na ụba nke o mere ruo afọ atọ
Ọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ onye isi ala na Rtd
Brigadier Gen
Julius Madda Bio maka ntuli aka nke afọ 2012
Sesay bụ nwanyị mbụ gbara ọsọ maka ọfịs osote onye isi ala n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Sierra Leone
Sesay akwadowo mkpọsa mpaghara maka ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ sonyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ ugbu a nke pati mmegide maka ntuli aka nke afọ pụkụ abụọ na iri na abụọ
Sesay bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na nne nke ụmụ atọ toro eto
Ọ bi na Freetown ma bụrụ onye a na-eto na mgbasa ozi mpaghara dị ka 'otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị kachasị mma Sierra Leone mepụtara'
Ọ bụ nne nke onye na-akọ akụkọ CNN International Isha Sesay
Kadidiatou Kanouté Tounkara OLY (amụrụ na abalị iri na otụ na onwa nke isii, na afọ 1978) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball
Onye otu egwuregwu basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Mali, Kanouté sonyere Mali na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics
Kadiatou Touré (amụrụ na ọnwa Jenụwarị 18, na afọ 1983) bụ onye Mali na-egwu basketball ụmụ nwanyị
Toure sonyere Mali na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics, ebe o nwetara akara 17 na egwuregwu 5
A mụrụ ya na Markala, Ségou Region na Osimiri Niger

Kadir bụ isi transliteration nke aha nwoke abụọ Arabic nyere (Arabic ҡаd, nke a na-akpokwa Ghader, Kader, Qader, Qadir ma ọ bụ Quadir) na (Arabic) na (Arab قدیر, nke a a na-akpokwa Ghadir, Kadeer, Qadeer ma ọ bụ Qadir)
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime aha Chineke na Islam, nke pụtara 'Onye Ike Nile'

Kadir Nelson (n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Mée, 1974) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé na-eme ihe osise, na onye édémédé nke Los Angeles nke a maara nke ọma màkà ihe osise ya nke a na-egosipụtakarị na mkpuchi magazin The New Yorker, na mkpuchi album màkà Michael Jackson na Drake
Ọrụ ya lekwasịrị ányà na omenala na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Africa America
The New York Times kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka 'ọrụ dị elu, nke na-emetụta nke ukwuu
Ihe osise Neelson na-ejupụta na gburugburu, na mgbe mgbe ihe nnọchianya doro ányá
Ọ bụ ónyé na-anata Caldecott nsọpụrụ ugboro abụọ ma merie 2020 Caldecott Medal màkà akwụkwọ ya The Undefeated
N'afọ 1996, Nelson malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe màkà ihe nkírí Steven Spielberg bụ Amistad, na ihe nkiri animated Spirit Stallion of the Cimarron
Nelson emeela ọtụtụ stampụ ncheta maka United States Postal Service gụnyere stampụ ndị gosipụtara Wilt Chamberlain, Joe Dimaggio, na Richard Wright

O dekwara ma / ma ọ bụ gosipụta ihe karịrị akwụkwọ foto irí atọ gụnyere, Brothers of the Knight nke ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí Debbie Allen, WE ARE THE SHIP The Story of Negro League Baseball, nke gosipụtara na mkpuchi nke magazin Sports Illustrated, na Heart and Soul The Story nke America na African Americans
N'afọ 2013, e nyèrè Nelson ọrụ ise mkpuchi mbụ ya màkà magazin The New Yorker, onyinyo nke Nelson Mandela
Nelson emeela ọtụtụ mkpuchi a na-agaghị echefu echefu màkà magazin ahụ gụnyere, Eustace Negro, Schomburg Center, Harlem, New York, na A Day at the Beach
A mụrụ Nelson na Washington DC, ma too na Atlantic City, New Jersey na San Diego, California, nwá nkè ónyé édémédé Emily Gunter na ónyé nkụzi Lenwood Nelson
Ọ natara ọzụzụ mbụ ya na nka site n'aka nwanne nna ya, Michael Morris, onye bụ onye na-ese ihe na ónyé nkụzi nka
Ma nwanne nnà ya na ónyé nkụzi nka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya kụziiri ya ụkpụrụ na usoro nka dị mkpa, gụnyere otu esi eji mmanụ ese ihe
Mgbe ọ zụlitere ọfịs dị egwu n'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Crawford High na San Diego, Kadir Nelson nwetara agụmakwụkwọ na Pratt Institute dị na Brooklyn, New York
Nelson nwetara BFA ya na Pratt Institute na Brooklyn, New York na 1996
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1999, e gosipụtara ihe osise Nelson na-egosi ihe nkiri baseball nke Negro league na magazin Sports Illustrated na peeji mmalite ya Leading Off

Ha bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise mbụ n'usoro ọrụ nke dugara Nelson dee ma gosipụta akwụkwọ na-echeta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Negro Baseball Leagues nke akpọrọ, We Are the Ship The Story of Negro Leagues Baseball, nke Jump at the Sun bipụtara na 2008
E mepụtara Nelson na-eto nke mbụ n'ime afọ asaa ma mee ka Nelson nweta Sibert Medal, Coretta Scott King Author Award na Illustrator Honor
We Are the Ship bụ nke Brilliance Audio wepụtara dị ka akwụkwọ a na-ege ntị na 2009, nke ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri olu bụ Dion Graham kọrọ
Nelson enwetala ọtụtụ Gold na Silver Medals site na New York Society of Illustrators
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, e nyere Nelson onyinye Hamilton King màkà ihe osise kachasị mma n'afọ
Nelson bụkwa ónyé natara NAACP Image Awards atọ maka akwụkwọ foto ya, na New York Times Best Illustrated Book for We Are The Ship The Story of Negro League Baseball
Nelson bụ onye mmeri Caldecott Honor Award ugboro abụọ
N'afọ 2020, Nelson ritere ihe nrite Caldecott na Coretta Scott King Award maka ihe osise ya na The Undefeated Ọ natara NAACP Image Award maka akwụkwọ Just the Two of Us
Maka akwụkwọ ya, We Are the Ship The Story of Negro League Baseball, ọ natara 2008 CASEY Award maka akwụkwọ baseball kacha mma, 2009 Coretta Scott King Author Award, na 2009 Robert F
Sibert Informational Book Award
Akwụkwọ ya, Nelson Mandela, bụ akwụkwọ Coretta Scott King Honor na 2014
Nelson enweela ihe ngosi na gallery na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na United States na ụwa, gụnyere Muskegon Museum of Art, Chicago Art Institute, na The Studio Museum na Harlem
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ụlọ ọrụ Smithsonian's National Portrait Gallery na National Museum of African American History and Culture jikọtara aka nweta ihe osise Kadir Nelson nke Henrietta Lacks
HBO nyèrè iwu ka e see Lacks
Ihe osise naanị ọ gwụla ma egosiri ya n'ụzọ ọzọ

Kador Ben-Salim (Russian) bụ onye Senegalese-Soviet acrobat, onye agha Red Army na o yikarịrị ka ọ bụ naanị onye na-eme ihe nkiri sitere na ndị Afrịka na ihe nkiri Soviet n'ime afọ 1920 na mmalite afọ 1930
Onye agha obodo, ọ pụtara na ọ dịkarịa ala ihe nkiri asatọ, gụnyere The Return of Nathan Becker, ihe nkiri ụda nke mbụ nke asụsụ Yiddish
Ben-Salim bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'otu ndị na-eme njem na Morocco nke rutere mba Moscow n'afọ 1912
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1916, ọ gara Almaty wee sonye n'òtù ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke Alexander Sosin na-eduzi (onye mbụ mere njem abụọ n'ihu)
Mgbe Russian Revolution na mmalite nke agha obodo, ọ sonyeere ndị Red Army ma jee ozi n'otu n'ime ndị agha ịnyịnya nke mba ụwa n'okpuru iwu nke Vasily Chapayev

Kaduna bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Kaduna (Kaduna State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 1,640,000 (2015; e mere atụmatụ ịbụ)
Kaduna South bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na Kaduna Central Kaduna Steeti, Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ obodo Makera
Ngalaba ndị ọzọ bụ Barnawa, Tudun wada, Television, Kakuri, Unguwar Muazu, Kabala West, Sabon Gari, Badikko, Unguwar Sanusi na Kurmin Mashi

Mpaghara okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo ndịda anyanwụ Kaduna nwere ngalaba iri na atọ (nkewa nhazi nke abụọ), ha bụ

Kafa ma ọ bụ Kefa (Kafi noono) bụ asụsụ North Omotic nke a na-asụ na Ethiopia na mpaghara Keffa
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke mpaghara asụsụ Etiopia, nke nwere usoro okwu SOV, ụdaume ejective, wdg
Mesfin Wodajo bipụtara nchịkọta ilu n'asụsụ ahụ
N'ime ọdịbendị Kafa, e nwere ndị na achụ nta ọdịnala a na-akpọ Manja / Manjo 'ndị na-achụrụ nta'
Ha nwere ike ịbụ na ha na asụ asụsụ dị iche
Otú ọ dị, Leikola egosila na ugbu a ha na-asụ Kafa na ọtụtụ okwu na ihe owuwu pụrụ iche ha na-eji, na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti onwe ha na ndị ka ukwuu Kafa sie ike
Kafayat Oluwatoyin Shafau (amụrụ 30 June 1980), nke amara aha ya dika Kaffy, bụ onye egwu Naijiria, onye na- agụ egwu, onye nkuzi ịgba egwu na onye nkuzi ahụike
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ Imagneto Dance
A maara ya nke ọma maka inweta ndekọ Guinness World Record maka 'Longest Dance Party' na Nokia Silverbird Danceathon na 2006
A mụrụ ma zụlite Kaffy na Nigeria

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na Chrisland School, Opebi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Coker Secondary School, Orile-Iganmu tupu ọ gaa Yaba College of Technology nwa oge wee nweta diploma na nhazi data na sayensị kọmputa site na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo
O tolitere na ebumnobi nke ịbụ Injinia nke ụgbọ elu
Ọrụ ịgba egwu Kaffy malitere mgbe ọ gara ihe omume iji mee ihe nkiri site n'aka onye hụrụ ya mgbe ọ na-aga n'ámá egwuregwu mba n'oge izu ụka maka ịgba egwu na mgbatị ahụ
N'afọ 2006, Kaffy duuru ndị otu ya na-agba egwu wee nweta ihe nrite nke Guinness Book of Record maka 'Longest Dance Party' mgbe ha gbasịrị egwu awa iri ise na ise na nkeji iri anọ
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nkuzi ịgba egwu bụ onye mepụtara ụzọ dabere nlegharị anya ọhụrụ maka nkuzi ịgba egwu na ịgba egwu n'usoro mmụta gbagoro agbago
N'afọ 2017, o mepụtara mgbakọ ịgba egwu 'The Dance Workshop' nke ezubere iji zụọ na inye ndụmọdụ ndị ọkachamara n'ịgba egwu yana ịkwalite mgbanwe omenala n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwu Naijiria
Mbipụta 2017 gosipụtara onye na-agụ egwu America, AY Hollywood
Kaffy alụbeghị di ugbu a

Brigitte Kafui Adjamagbo-Johnson (amụrụ na ọnwa Disemba 26 nke afọ 1958) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mba Togolese, onye ọka iwu na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, na nwanyị mbụ guzoro dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala na mba ya
A mụrụ Adjamagbo-Johnson na 26 Disemba nke afọ 1958 na Bassar, Togo, nwa nwanyị nke Cornélie, onye na-amụ nwa, na Paul Adjamagbe, onye dọkịta

Adjamagbo-Johnson nwetara nzere masta na iwu na afọ 1983 site na Mahadum Lomé, DEA na iwu onwe onye na Mahadim Paris V, Malakoff, na DEA nke abụọ na iwu onwe na iwu ntụnyere, nhọrọ ikike Afrịka na PhD na afọ 1986 na Mahadam Paris I, Panthéon Sorbonne
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Lomé
Adjamagbo-Johnson bụ onye guzobere Convention démocratique des peuples africains (CDPA), ọ bụkwa onye isi na-ekwu maka Nzukọ Mba ya na afọ 1991
O nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa dị elu na gọọmentị, na-etolite ịbụ onye minista, ma bụrụ onye a maara maka 'okwu ihu na ihu na nkwenye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị', a na-akpọkwa ya 'The Iron Lady'
Kemgbe onwa Eprel na afọ 1997, Adjamagbo-Johnson abụwo onye nhazi nke ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara West Africa nke WiLDAF (Law and Development in Africa)
N'afọ 2010, Adjamagbo-Johnson bụ onye isi nke ndị na-emegide Democratic Convention of African Peoples party, na nwanyị mbụ guzoro dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala na mba ya
Otú ọ dị, na Febụwarị 2010, Adjamagbo-Johnson na ndị isi mmegide abụọ ndị ọzọ na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala lara ezumike nká dị ka mkpesa megide ha kwenyere na ọ ga-abụ nsonaazụ aghụghọ

N'ide akwụkwọ na African Feminist Forum, Adjamagbo-Johnson na-ekwu, 'Njem m na ụmụ nwanyị malitere n'oge ndụ m ka mmata m banyere enweghị nhata na mmegbu nke ụmụ nwanyị na gburugburu ezinụlọ m, agbata obi m na ọha mmadụ n'ozuzu'
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, e jidere Adjamagbo-Johnson n'ụlọ ya dị na isi obodo Togo bụ Lomé
N'okwu a na-ekwu na telivishọn, onye ọkàiwu Essolissam Poyodi kwuru na ọ kpughere 'akwụkwọ ndị nwere atụmatụ imebi mba ahụ'
Mgbe mkpesa mba ụwa gasịrị, a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na 17 Disemba 2020
Kafui Danku bụ onye Ghana na- eme ihe nkiri na onye na- emepụta ihe nkiri, nke a kacha mara maka ọrụ ya na fim dịka Any other Monday Alvina Thunder and Lightning, I Do, na
Ọ bụkwa ya dere akwụkwọ bụ Silence Is Not Golden
Danku gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Ola Girls Schools na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana, wee gaa n'ihu na agụmagu akwụkwọ na Mahadum Cape Coast na Central Region nke Ghana
Ọ lụrụ nwoke Canada

Kagarko (Wogon) bụ otu n'ime Local Government Area na southern Kaduna State, Nigeria isi obodo ya dị naị na Kagarko
O nwere mpaghara ala dị kilomita puku abuọ, narị atọ,iri ise na isii ma nwee nari puku abụọ na iri atọ na iteolu na iri iri ise na asatọ site n'ọnụ ọgụgụ sensus e mere n'afọ 2006

Kagarko (Wogon )Local Government Area na ndị Kachia Local Government Area gbara agbataobi na mgbago ugwu, Ha na Jaba bụ ndị agbataobi na ọwụwa anyanwụ, Niger State na ọdịda anyanwụ na the FCT na ndịda anyanwụ
Kagarko Local Government Area nwere mpaghara iri (ngalaba nhazi nke abụọ) ma ọ bụ ngalaba ntụli aka, ha bụ
Ọ gụnyekwara ihe dị ka mpaghara iri na otu, ha bụ
Ndị bi n' obodo a bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo mara Ndị (Koro) kacha n'ọnụ ọgụbụ na gburugburu a
Ndi ọzọ bụ ,

Kagarko nwere ndị isi Eze atọ
Kagbolodougou bụ obodo dị n'ebe ugwu Ivory Coast

Kagendo Murungi (7 Disemba 1971 na 27 Disemba 2017) bụ onye Kenya na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị, onye na-ahụ Maka ihe ndị ruuru LGBT na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwado ikike nke ndị LGBTQ nke Afrịka ruo ihe karịrị afọ 20
A mụrụ Kagendo na Kenya ma o nwee ụmụnne isii
Ọ kwagara na United States ebe ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya
Kagendo nwetara nzere BA ya na ọmụmụ ụmụnwanyị na Mahadum Rutgers wee gaa n'ihu na MA ya na ọmụmụ mgbasa ozi site na New School for Social Research
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri dị ka onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri Wapinduzi Productions n'afọ 1991 ma jee ozi dị ka onye na-emepụta ya ruo ihe dị ka afọ 26
Ọ kọrọ akụkọ ahụ maka ihe nkiri America nke afọ 1995 These Girls Are Missing
O nyere aka n'ịmepụta ọrụ onye ọrụ mmemme Africa na International Gay & Lesbian Human Rights Commission
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka African Film Festival ruo afọ iri na ise
O jikwa ọkwa nke Program Associate na National Black Programming Consortium mgbe ọ ka bụ onye nhazi obodo
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke Food Pantry na St
Mary's Church, Harlem
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, edepụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Afrịka asaa na-eme ihe ike nke kwesịrị isiokwu Wikipedia site na Global Citizen, otu mba ụwa na òtù nkwado
Ọ nwụrụ na 27 Disemba 2017 mgbe ọ dị afọ 46 n'ụlọ ya na Harlem
E liri ya n'ugbo ezinụlọ ya na Kenya
Ugwu Kristo (Koiali) bụ asụsụ nke mpaghara Oro, Papua Guinea ọhụrụ
Ọ bụghị ihe dị nso na asụsụ ọzọ nke kesara aha ya, Grass Koiari
Ọkara nke ndị na-asụ ya bụ otu asụsụ

Kagiso Patrick 'Pat' Mautloa (September 24, 1952, Ventersdorp, Western Transvaal) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ usoro mgbasa ozi
O bi na Johannesburg, South Africa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ, ezinụlọ Mautloa kwagara Soweto ma mesịa gaa Morris Isaacson High School
N'afọ 1969, mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ malitere ịmụ ihe osise na Jubilee Art Center nakwa n'afọ sochirinụ na Mofolo Park Arts Centre ebe ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya maka afọ ise sochirinụ
E nyere ya bursary nke ọ nabatara, mgbe ọ sonyere na Soweto Uprisings, ịmụ na ELC Rorke's Drift Art and Craft Centre na 1978 ruo afọ abụọ ma gụọ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Dan Rakgoathe
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise na prọfesọ na Mofolo Park Arts Centre na Federated Union of Black Artists Arts Centre (FUBA)
N'afọ 1981, Mautloa malitere dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ ma rụọ ọrụ na SABC, mana ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ya n'ụlọ akụ ka o wee ghọọ onye na-ese ihe

N'afọ 1985, afọ nke South African State of Emergency, Mautloa guzobere ebe obibi onye na-ese ihe, Thupelo Workshops, na Cape Town na David Koloane na Bill Ainslie, nke Triangle Network, FUBA, FUNDA na Johannesburg Art Foundation kwadoro
Ọ bụ ezie na Mautloa bi na Alexandra, ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na The Bag Factory, onye otu Johannesburg nke The Triangle Network
A kpọrọ ya na Sam Nhlengethwa ka ha bụrụ ndị mbụ bi na Bag Factory mgbe David Koloane na Robert Loder mepụtara ya n'ógbè na-abụghị nke ojii ma ọ bụ nke ọcha n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na 1991
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị enyi Mautloa ndị ọzọ bụ William Kentridge, Helen Sebidi, Penny Siopis, Wayne Barker, Benon Lutaaya na Deborah Bell
Mautloa bụzi onye otu bọọdụ maka Bag Factory

E nyere Mautloa onyinye ebe obibi dị ka akụkụ nke Triangle Workshop, nke na-anabata ndị na-ese ihe mba ụwa na mmemme izu abụọ siri ike nke dị na steeti New York nke onye na-akpụ ihe ọkpụkpụ, Sir Anthony Caro guzobere
N'afọ 1991, o ritere ihe nrite Vita Art
N'afọ 2008 ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na Nirox Arts
N'afọ 2012 ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ebi na National School of the Arts na Johannesburg ebe ọ duziri ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi
Na 2014 Mashumi Art Projects na -Eyethu Centre na Soweto gosipụtara ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ma n'ụzọ ihe atụ ma n'echiche, na-eji ọ bụghị naanị ihe osise ọdịnala, eserese na ihe obibi akwụkwọ ma ọ na-ejikọkarị ihe ndị a chọtara dị ka ihe ndị dị n'okpuru na ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe nchịkọta maka ọrụ ya, ebe o mere ọtụtụ ihe ncheta ihe ọkpụkpụ

O mere usoro ihe nkpuchi na 2016 nke sitere na mkpali nke ndị dị iche iche na South Africa maka ntinye ọha na eze na 1 54 Art Fair, ihe ngosi nke sitere na mba iri ise na anọ na mkparịta ụka nke oge a

Ọrụ Mautloa nọ n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ọha na eze nke gụnyere Iziko South African National Gallery, Johannesburg Art Gallery, Pretoria Art Museum, International Bank for Development and Reconstruction, Mahadum Zululand, Mahadim Fort Hare, Sasol Corporate Collection, The Spier Art Collection, SABC Collection na Readers Digest na ndị ọzọ
Mautloa egosila ihe ngosi na Goodman Gallery
O kwuru, 'ihe dị mma banyere nke a [ịbụ onye na-ese ihe] bụ na ị naghị aga ezumike nká
Ị na-ese ihe ruo mgbe akara ikpeazụ ị nwere ike ime na ndụ gị
Mautloa lụrụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri Bongiwe Dhlomo
Kahina Bounab (amụrụ n'ime 24 Jenụwarị 1982) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball nke mba ụwa nke na egwuri egwu maka AC Tizi-Ouzou
Kahina Messaoudene (amụrụ na Julaị 15, 1992 n'ime Béjaïa) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball
Klọb dị ugbu a ASW Bejaia
Kahlil Davis, ónyé a maara dịka Kahlil Joseph (amụrụ n'afọ 1981), bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkiri, ónyé nduzi vidio egwu, na onye na-ese vidio
A maara Joseph maka ịmepụta 'ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke ọgụgụ isi na mmetụta uche' nke na-elekwasị anya na ahụmịhe nke ndị Africa America na United States
Ọ bụ 2017 Artadia Awardee
Nna Joseph bụ Keven Davis bụ ónyé ọka iwu egwuregwu na ntụrụndụ a ma ama, nwanne ya nwoke nke obéré bụ Noah Davis bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-elekọta ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie
Joseph gàrà Mahadum Loyola Marymount mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Ọmụmụ ihe nke Apichatpong Weerasethakul, ónyé nduzi Thai nke ihe nkírí nnwale, metụtara ụzọ Joseph si eme ihe nkírí
Joseph rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-enyere onye na-ese foto Melodie McDaniel aka na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri azụmahịa Directors Bureau na Los Angeles
Ọ duziri azụmahịa màkà ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Britain O2 na ihe nkírí dị mkpirikpi màkà akara okomoko Kenzo
Joseph duziri vidiyo egwu màkà Blvck Spvde(Black Spade), Flying Lotus, Shabazz Palaces, Sampha, na Kendrick Lamar na ndị ọzọ
Joseph bụ ónyé nduzi mbụ Beyoncé Knowles bịakwutere iji duzie ihe nkiri ibe ya na 2016 ya bụ Lemonade
Joseph na Knowles jikọrọ aka nweta BET Award màkà Video Director of the Year màkà egwu 'Sorry'
Knowles mechara mepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ahụ na ọtụtụ ndị nduzi dị iche iche, ma kemgbe ahụ, o kwe ka egosiputa ụdị Joseph nke Lemonade naanị na ebe ngosi nka

N'afọ 2014, ónyé na-ese ihe n'oge a bụ Kara Walker haziri ihe ngosi ICA Philadelphia Ruffneck Constructivists ma tinye vidiyo egwu Joseph nke 2011 màkà Shabazz Palaces Black Up na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi nke 2012 Until the Quiet Comes maka egwu Flying Lotus

N'afọ 2015, The Underground Museum gosipụtara ihe ngosi Oracle, na-egosi ọrụ Joseph na ndị ọgbọ ya Henry Taylor, Kandis Williams, na Ruby Neri tinyere ihe ndị dị ụkọ site na The Jeremiah Cole Collection of Arts d'Afrique
malitere ebe a na nke mbụ ya dị ka ihe ngosi ihuenyo abụọ, na ọzọ na ngosi 2016 Kahlil Joseph Double Conscience na Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles
Otú ọ dị, ihe ngosi 2015 Young Blood Noah Davis, Kahlil Joseph, The Underground Museum na Frye Art Museum na Seattle, WA, bụ ihe ngosi nka mbụ nke Joseph
Kai Luke Brümmer (nke a na-akpọkwa Brummer; a mụrụ ya na 17 Febụwarị 1993) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dịka Nicholas van der Swart na ihe nkiri Moffie (2019)
The Guardian kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị ọhụrụ kachasị mma na 76th Venice Film Festival
A mụrụ Brümmer na Johannesburg ma o tolite na Henley na Klip
Nne ya, onye bụ onye nkuzi ihe nkiri, mere ka ọ mara ime ihe nkiri

Ọ gara St John's College, Johannesburg Ọ gara n'ihu gụsịa akwụkwọ n'afọ 2016 na Bachelor of Arts na Theatre & Performance na ọdịiche na ime ihe nkiri na Mahadum nke Cape Town Ọ bụ nwa oge onye isi mgbaaka maka Boswell Wilkie Circus

Abdoul Kairou Amoustapha (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba Cancún bọọlụ ugbu a na Liga de Expansión MX
Amoustapha si ASN Nigelec kwaga Loudoun United nke USL Championship na 20 Febụwarị 2020

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Amoustapha malitere ọzụzụ na klọb nne na nna Loudoun bụ DC
United mgbe oge Loudoun gwụsịrị
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, a kpọghachiri Amoustapha na klọb nne na nna ya, MFK Vyskov
E mechara zigara ya na Cancún FC
ozugbo o si Loudoun lọta
Amoustapha apụtala ugboro atọ n'otu n'otu na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger U-17 na U-20
Ọ gbara goolu mba ụwa mbụ ya na U-20 n'oge 2019 Africa U-20 Cup of Nations, na 9 Febụwarị 2019, megide U-20 nke Burundi, n'egwuregwu nke gwụrụ na 3o3 draw
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger kpọrọ Amoustapha dịka akụkụ nke ndị otu mbido maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2021
O mechara pụta nke mbụ ya na ndị otu mba ahụ na 13 Nọvemba, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya na mmeri Niger meriri Ethiopia

Isi ụlọ ọrụ ha dị n'obodo Okeho
Obodo ndị ọzọ dị na okpúrù ọchịchị Kajola bụ Ilero, Imia, Ilua, Ayetoro-oke, Isemi ile, Iwere-oke, na Ilaji-oke

Kakawa Discount House bụ otu n'ime ụlọ nkwụnye ego ise na-arụ ọrụ na Naijiria nke na-eje ozi dị ka ngwá ọrụ ego gọmentị ma na-arụ dị ka ebe dị n'etiti etiti n'etiti ụlọ akụ ndị ọzọ niile dị na Naijeria na ụlọ akụ Apex nke Naijiria, Central Bank of Nigeria
Dị ka ụlọ nkwụsịtụ niile, azụmahịa na bonds gọmentị na akwụkwọ ego bụ ọrụ azụmahịa bụ isi
Kakawa Discount House bụ nke FBNQuest nwetara, aha aha nke ụlọ ọrụ Merchant Banking and Asset Management nke FBN Holdings Plc
Ọ malitere ọrụ ụlọ akụ na 2 Nọvemba na afọ 2015 ma bụrụ nke a maara ugbu a dị ka FBN Merchant Bank Limited
A mụrụ ngalaba Discount Houses nke ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ ọrụ ego Naịjirịa na afọ 1995 ma bịa dị ka nwa nke gọmentị etiti nke Naịjirị site na Central bank of Nigeria (CBN)
Ụlọ nkwụnye ego ghọrọ ebe ụlọ akụ nwere ike isi mee ka ego karịrị akarị ma nweta otu na CBN
E mepụtara ahịa nke abụọ site na ụlọ nkwụsịtụ ọkachasị maka ahia nke akwụkwọ Treasury na akwụkwọ azụmahịa ndị ọzọ
A na-enweta aha Kakawa site n'okporo ámá (Kakawa Street) ebe isi ụlọ ọrụ nke otu onye nwe òkè ha kachasị ukwuu dị (First Bank of Nigeria)
Ndị nwe ya bụ First Bank of Nigeria Plc, Guaranty Trust Bank Plc, Sterling Bank Plc
First City Monument Bank, Skye Bank, na Unity Bank

Kakawa agbanweela site n'ịbụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta otu ihe ka ọ bụrụ onye ọsụ ụzọ maka ire ahịa nke Treasury bill nye ndị na-etinye ego n'otu n'otu site na iwebata onye nwe ya Treasury Bill Backed Investment (TBBI) ngwaahịa na afọ 1997
N'afọ 1998, a chọpụtara Corporate Finance ma guzobe otu ọrụ ndụmọdụ (Wealth Management Unit)
Kakawa Asset Management Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka nwere ikikere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ndị njikwa ego
E hiwere Kakawa Asset Management (KAM) n'afọ 2004
Tupu e sonye ya, KAM na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ngalaba nke Kakawa kemgbe afọ 2001
E guzobere KAM n'ihi mkpa ọ dị inye ndị ahịa na-arụkọ ọrụ na Kakawa ka oge na-aga, na nhọrọ itinye ego ogologo oge na ahịa ọrụ ego
KAM debanyere aha na Securities & Exchange commission (SEC) dị ka onye njikwa ego / ego na onye ndụmọdụ itinye ego

Khaled Muhammad Samy Abol Naga (Arabic ; a mụrụ na Nọvemba 2, 1966), onye a na-akpọ Khaled Abol Naga ('Arabic خەلد أبو النج) na aha ya bụ Kal Naga, bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-emepụta ihe
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Egypt na Middle East, mana ọ na-etinyewanye aka na ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke America na Britain
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na iduzi (asụsụ Bekee na Arabic) ihe nkiri na egwu egwu na Egypt mgbe ọ na-amụ ihe nkiri na Mahadum America dị na Cairo

Malite n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 2000, Naga pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri n'ime afọ iri sochirinụ na ọrụ ndị gụnyere ọtụtụ ụdị, site na egwu egwu None but that! (2007), Agamista (2007), Eyes Of A Thief (2014), ihe egwu Kashf Hesab (2007), ụlọ nka Heliopolis (2009), Villa 69 (2013), Decor (2014), na slapstick comedy Habibi Naêman (Sleeping Habibi) (2008)
Tụkwasị na nke a, o sonyere n'ọtụtụ mmemme ihe nkiri Europe, ebe ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe

N'emume ihe nkiri n'afọ 2016 nke na-eme emume maka ihe nkiri Arab na Oscars, a chọpụtara na ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị na ihe nkiri Arabic na Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film (The Oscars)
A na-akpọkarị ya na mgbasa ozi ọdịda anyanwụ dịka 'Egypt's Brad Pitt', a kọwakwara ya dịka 'Omar Sharif ọzọ' karịsịa mgbe ihe nkiri America mbụ ya bụ Civic Duty n'afọ 2007

A họpụtara ya dịka onye nnọchi anya Goodwill maka UNICEF n'afọ 2007, Naga rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịmata ikike ụmụaka, yana mkpọsa mmata mbụ nke HIV na Egypt na Arab ụwa, ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe mba ụwa, gụnyere ịkwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na mba ya Egypt
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ama ama ama nke 2011 Egyptian Revolution, na-ekere òkè na ngagharị iwe na Cairo nke dugara n'iwepụ Onye isi ala Mubarak

Ọ na-eche mkpọsa nkwutọ megide ya ihu site n'aka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke gọọmentị n'oge Mubarak tupu mgbanwe nke Jenụwarị 25, 2011 na Egypt, na ọtụtụ ugboro ọzọ site na 2013 'coup d'état' General Sisi gọọmentị na Egypt na mmegwara maka nkwado ya banyere mmebi nke ọnọdụ ikike mmadụ na Egypt
A mụrụ Naga na Heliopolis, mpaghara cosmopolitan nke Cairo, Egypt

Nna ya, onye isi ndị agha Egypt General Mohamed-Sami Aboul-Naga (Arabic اللواء أح / محمد-سامي السيد أبو النجا), sitere n'ezinụlọ ọdịnala nke ndị isi nwe ala na ad-Daqahliyah, Aga, Egypt nke e weghaara n'oge mgbanwe Nasser nke afọ 1952 na mgbanwe ala ya na Egypy
Nne ya kpughere n'afọ 2013 na ọ bụ nwa onye amụma Islam Muhammad site na Fatima Az-Zahraa na Imam Husayn ibn Ali nwa Ali ibn Abi Talib
Ọ bụ nwanne nwoke nke onye America na-ewu ụlọ bụ Tarek Naga, na onye na-ewu ihe owuwu Seif Abol Naga, onye pụtara na ihe nkiri Empire M

Akụkụ mbụ nke ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke Naga (1989ī2002) dị n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'elu ikpo okwu (n'ihe nkiri), ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere ịnabata ihe ngosi okwu TV n'afọ 1998, nke nyere aka mee ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama dịka onye mgbasa ozi na Egypt na steeti ndị na-asụ Arabic
Ọrụ telivishọn na ihe nkiri ya gụnyere ụdị dị iche iche
Mgbe o mepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri na 2009 Heliopolis site na onye nduzi nke mbụ Ahmad Abdalla, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri nke abụọ Microphone nke ya na Mohamed Hefzy mepụtara n'afọ 2010

Site n'afọ 2010 gaa n'ihu, Abol Naga na-eduga ọtụtụ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche na nke dị mgbagwoju anya, nọgidere na-enweta ọtụtụ onyinye dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na dịka onye mmepụta site na mmemme ihe nkiri mpaghara na nke mba ụwa
A họpụtara ya dịka onye otu ndị ọka ikpe na mgbe ụfọdụ onye isi ndị ọka ikpe nke mmemme ihe nkiri nke mpaghara na nke ụwa
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu kachasị elu n'ụwa taa site na mpaghara Arab
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke Naga malitere na 1977 mgbe ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị nwere òkè na ihe nkiri Egypt Madness of Love (Arabic) (aka Genoun El Hob) (aka - La Folie De L'amore)
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri dịgasị iche iche gụnyere ihe egwu na-akpali akpali, romance na egwu egwu
N'afọ 2001, ọrụ ihe nkiri ya nwetara ume mgbe onye nduzi Daoud Abdel Sayed họpụtara ya maka idu ndú na A Citizen, An Informant And A Thief (Mowaten we Mokhber we Haramy) (Arabic)
N'afọ 2002 o gosipụtara nkà ya maka ịbụ abụ na egwu egwu Wust El-Balad ('Downtown')
Mgbe ahụ, e nyere ya òkè na 'Sleepless Nights' (aka 'Sahar El Layali') nke ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu na 2003 Xia2004

Ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, e nyere Abol Naga onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Damascus International Film Festival na onyinye onye na-ese ihe nkiri kacha kyau site na Paris Arab Cinema Biennale nke Institute du Monde Arabe IMA Film Festival

Kalakuta Republic bụ aha onye egwu na onye nkwuchite ọnụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Fela Kuti nyere ụlọ ọrụ obodo jikọtara ebe obibi ezinụlọ ya, ndị otu egwu, na ụlọ ndekọ
Ọ dị na ọnụ ọgụgụ ụlọ iri na ano Agege Motor Road, Idi-Oro, Mushin, Lagos, Nigeria, ọ nwere ụlọ ọgwụ ahụike n'efu, na ebe ndekọ
Fela kwupụtara na ọ nwere onwe ya site na steeti nke ndị agha na-achị mgbe o si na United States lọta na 1970
Ogige ahụ gbara ọkụ ruo ala n'abali iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1977 mgbe otu puku ndị agha ji égbè wakporo ya
'Kalakuta' bụ ịkwa emo maka ụlọ mkpọrọ a na-akpọ 'Calcutta' nke Fela bi
Aha ahụ sitere na Black Hole nke Calcutta dungeon na India
Tupu mwakpo a wakporo ụlọ Fela, o mere ihe ndekọ a na-akpọ Zombie, banyere ọchịchị ndị agha Naijiria
N'abụ ahụ, a na-akpọ ndị agha zombies maka irube isi n'iwu na-enweghị isi
Otu n'ime ahịrị nke abụ ahụ, nke agụrụ na Pidgin English nke west Africa, na-ekwu, 'Zombie agaghị aga ije ọ gwụla ma ị gwara ya ka ọ gaa ije', ya bụ, zombie agaghị aga ije ma ọ bụrụ na enyeghị ya iwu
Fela nwere nkụda mmụọ na ọkwa ndị agha Naijiria nke nyere ohere nrụrụ aka na egwu nke obodo ha site na ndị na-eme ihe aka ike na ndị bara ọgaranya, mgbe ha na-agbaso iwu iji menye ndị Naijiria egwu
Abụ ahụ na-ewu ewu na Naịjirịa, nke kpaliri iwe onye isi ala General Olusegun Obasanjo
Ndị agha enweghị obi ụtọ na nkatọ Fela na-akatọ mgbe niile ma kwuo na ọ bụghị ihe na-ekwesịghị ekwesị inwe mba n'ime mba
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị Naijiria bu akụkọ na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ ma bụrụ nke a na-ejighị n'aka banyere ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ndị otu Fela dọtara n'ogige ahụ ma mebie
N'oge mwakpo ndị agha Naịjirịa wakporo Kalakuta Republic, a tụpuru nne Fela Frances Abigail Olufunmilayo Thomas site na windo nke ụlọ elu ogo nke abụọ
Ọ nwụrụ mgbe ọ nọrọ n'ọnọdụ coma ruo ihe dị ka izu asatọ

Fela dara na atụmatụ mbụ ya iji cheta otu afọ ncheta nke nchụpụ Kalakuta Republic site n'ịlụ nwanyị iri abụọ na asaa n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú ya n'ememe agbamakwụkwọ n'ọfịs onye ọka iwu ya, Tunji Braithwaite
Ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị, n'abalị iri abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1978, ọ lụrụ ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ na asaa a maara dị ka 'Queens' na Parisona Hotel dị n'okporo ụzọ Ikorodu na Lagos
Fela kwuru na ya na ụmụ nwanyị niile agaghị enwe mmekọrịta alụmdi na nwunye dị ka tabloids tụrụ aro, mana ọ lụrụ ha n'ihi na ha enweghị ike ịchọta ọrụ mgbe ọkụ gbara ụlọ ndekọ ahụ
Dị ka Fela si kwuo, n'omenala Yoruba, mgbe nwanyị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke ịbụ onye ogbenye, ọ bụ ọrụ nwoke nọ n'obodo ya ịlụ ya dị ka ụzọ isi chebe ya
N'afọ 2012, Babatunde Fashola, Gọvanọ Lagos, malitere ime ihe iji wughachi ogige ahụ ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie
Ebe ngosi nka nke Kalakuta Republic meghere n'ụzọ iwu n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Oktoba afọ afọ 2012, iji cheta ụbọchị ọmụmụ afọ iri asaa na asato nke Fela
O nwere ngosipụta nke uwe Fela, ngwá ọrụ na ihe osise, yana ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na họtel
Kalanoro bụ cryptid humanoid, ndị e kwenyere na ha na-ebi ndụ dị ka mmụọ n'àgwàetiti nke Madagascar
Omenala na-ekwu na ha na-ebibu n'ụdị anụ ahụ n'ime ọhịa mmiri ozuzo mana mbibi ebe obibi ha na-eme ka ọdịdị anụ ahụ ha kwụsị
A na-akọwa Kalanoro dị ka obere ihe yiri mmadụ nwere ntutu ya na ezé dị nkọ
A na-ekwu na ụkwụ ha na aga azụ, nakwa ụkwụ chere ihu na azụ
Ma anya ha na-acha ọbara ọbara
Ntutu isi ha na mbọ áká ha dị ogologo adịghị ọcha
Na-ebi ndụ naanị ha, a na-akọ na ha na'eri anụ esighi esi, ma nwee 'olu na-awu akpata oyi n'ahụ' nke na-atụ nkịta egwu
Enwere ike ise ha dị ka mmụọ ọjọọ ga-ezu ụmụaka, gbuo ndị mmadụ, ma ọ bụ zuo ha ohi
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Kalanoro na ịṅụbigazi mmanya ókè
Otù ọ dị, a na-ahụkwa ha dị ka ndị ohu na-eguzosi ike n'íhé nye ndị enyi ha bụ mmadụ ma nwekwa ike nwé mmasị n'ebe ụmụ mmadụ nọ
Ozugbo e mezuru ihe ndị kalanoro chọrọ, a kpọghachiri ụmụaka ahụ azụ
Cryptids bụ isiokwu nke otu ihe omume nke Destination Truth
A na-ekwu na Kalanoro na'arụ ọrụ dị ka mmụọ na-ejere ndị dị ndụ ozi
A na-akọ na ha n'ezu ohi ma na-eme ka ihe nwéré ike karịrị nke mmadụ nyé ndị enyi ha bụ mmadụ, ndị nwekwara ike ịdọrọ ha maka ọgwụgwọ
Ọ bụrụ na mmadụ chọrọ ịzụta ọrụ nke kalanoro, ha na-eleta ụlọ ọrụ 'onye nwe ụlọ' n'ụzọ omenala n'abalị, ma naanị n'eso ha na-emekọrịta ihe site na mgbidi ma ọ bụ n'ọnụ ụzọ mechiri emechi
A na-ekwu na mgbe olu okwu mmadụ ghọrọ ụda imi ma dị elu, kalanoro si n'ime ha ekwu okwu
A na-ekwukwa na Kalanoro n'enye ndị mmadụ iwu mgbochi site na nrọ ha ma ọ bụ site n'ọhụụ ha
A tụkwaala aro na ndị Vazimba bụ mmụọ nke kalanoro
Amira Kiziamina, onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Kalash Criminel, bụ onye na-eti egwu French
Ọ bụ onye albino ma họrọ iyi balaclava, n'ihi na mgbe ọrụ egwu ya malitere, ọ ga-ezo ihu ya n'ihi ya nne ya achọghị ka ọ rap
Otú ọ dị, ọ nwetara mmeghachi omume dị mma maka iyi balaclava, ma ugbu a ọ na-eyi ya site na nhọrọ
Ọ bịanyere aka na Def Jam Recordings na Universal Music
Ya na Kaaris na-arụkọ ọrụ mgbe niile, onye ya na ya mere egwu 'Arrêt du Cœur' na album ya RAS
A mụrụ Kalash Criminel na Zaïre, obodo nke a mara ugbu a dị ka Democratic Republic of the Congo na abalị iri na ano, na onwa Febụwarị, na afọ 1995
Na mbido, ya na ezinụlọ ya biri na Kinshasa, mana mgbe Agha Congo Mbụ malitere, ya na ndị ezinụlọ ya gbagara France
Ya na ezinụlọ ya rutere Rougemont, na Sevran ma biri ebe ahụ kemgbe ahụ
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ malitere rap, na mbụ ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke otu nzukọ 14 na ndị rapper Daystiil, Kifa, Krimo JS et Zino5
E mechara bịanye aka na otu a na akara 10/12 Records
N'afọ 2012, ha wepụtara ihe ngosi, nke akpọrọ Traumatiser, nke mere ka mmekọrịta na ọrụ ha sie ike
N'afọ 2015, Kiziamina malitere ọrụ ya n'onwe ya wee wepụta egwu '10 12 14 Bureau', ma mesịa wepụta usoro freestyles akpọrọ Sauvagerie
O mechara soro ndị na-eti egwu Ixzo, Sofiane, Kaaris na JUL rụkọọ ọrụ
Njikọ ya na Kaaris mere ka egwu 'Arrêt du cœur' nke kwadoro ma malite ọrụ ya na rap French
Na abalị iri abụo na atọ, na ọnwa Septemba na afọ 2016, ọ wepụtara vidiyo egwu mbụ ya akpọrọ 'Sale Sonorité'
Vidio a nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri na YouTube
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2016, ọ kwupụtara ntọhapụ nke mixtape mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ RAS, nke a ga-ewepụta n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2016
N'izu mbụ ya, RAS rere 2,970 mbipụta
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, Kiziamina wepụtara abọm studio mbụ ya, La Fosse aux lions, n'okpuru akara ya, Sale sonorité Records
Nzaghachi dị mma, na 13,388 e rere n'izu mbụ

Kalb el louz maọbụ Qalb ellouz (Arabic) bụ nri ọdịnala nke Obodo Algeria
Kelb el louz, nke pụtara 'obi almond' a makwaara dịka chamia maọbụ h'rissa dabere na mpaghara, ọ bụ nri ọdịnaala Algeria
A na-eji semolina, almond, oroma na mmanụ aṅụ emekwazi ya
• Nri ndị Algeria
Kale (/keɪl/), ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ cabbage, bụ nke otu cabage (Brassica oleracea) nke a na-akụ maka akwụkwọ ha a na-eri eri, ọ bụ ezie na a na-eji ụfọdụ dị ka ihe ịchọ mma
Osisi Kale na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma ọ bụ anụnụ anụnụ akwụkwọ ndị dị n'etiti anaghị eme isi (dị ka cabbage nwere isi)
A na-ewere Kales dịka ihe kachasị dị nso cabage ọhịa karịa ọtụtụ n'ime ụdị Brassica oleracea
Kale sitere na Northern Middle English cale (iji ya tụnyere Scots kail na German Kohl) maka ụdị cabbages dị iche iche
Mmalite kachasị bụ Latin caulis 'cabbage'
Kale malitere n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Mediterenian na Anatolia, ebe a na-akụ ya maka nri malite n'afọ 2000 BCE na nke kachasị ọhụrụ
Ụdị cabbage nwere akwụkwọ rọgọrọ arọgọ adịlarị na ụdị dị larịị na Gris kamgbe senchiri nke anọ BC
A na-ewere ụdị ndị a, nke ndị Rom na-akpọ Sabellian kale, dị ka ndị nna nna nke kales nke dị oge a
Ihe ndekọ mbụ nke cabbages n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Europe bụ nke cabbage siri ike na senchiri nke irí na atọ
Ihe ndekọ na senchiri nke iri na anọ na England na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti cabbage siri ike na kale nwere akwụkwọ
Ndị ahịa Russia webatara kale Russia na Canada, wee banye na United States, site n'aka ndị ahịa Russia na senchiri nke irí na itoolu

A na-ekwu na onye botanist USDA David Fairchild na-ewebata kale (na ọtụtụ ihe ọkụkụ ndị ọzọ) nye ndị America, ebe ọ si Croatia weghachite ya, ọ bụ ezie na Fairchild n'onwe ya enweghị mmasị na cabbages, gụnyere kale
N'oge ahụ, a na-akụ kale n'ọtụtụ ebe na Croatia karịsịa n'ihi na ọ dị mfe ịzụlite ma dị ọnụ ala, ma nwee ike iwepụ nnu n'ala
Maka ihe ka ukwuu na senchiri nke iri abụọ, a na-ejikarị kale eme ihe na United States maka ebumnuche ịchọ mma; ọ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama dị ka akwụkwọ nri a na-eri eri na 1990s n'ihi uru nri ya
N'oge agha ụwa nke abụọ, a kwalitere ịzụlite kale (na akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ) na UK site na mkpọsa Dig for Victory
Akwụkwọ nri ahụ dị mfe ịzụlite ma nye ihe oriri dị mkpa na-efu na nri n'ihi rationing
Kale na-abụkarị osisi na-eto kwa afọ nke a na-akụ site na mkpụrụ nwere okpomọkụ dịgasị iche iche
Ọ na-eguzogide ma na-eto eto n'oge oyi, ma nwee ike ịdị ndụ na okpomọkụ dị ala dị ka -150° Celsius
Kale nwere ike ịghọ ihe na-atọ ụtọ mgbe nnukwu oyi gasịrị
Otu onye nwere ike ịmata ndịiche dị n'etiti ụdị kale dị iche iche dabere na obere, etiti, ma ọ bụ ogologo ogologo nke ogwe osisi ahụ, yana ụdị akwụkwọ dị iche iche
Agba akwụkwọ ya sitere na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ruo na akwụkwọ ndụ nweturu ucha anụnụ anụnụ
Nchịkọta site na ụdị akwụkwọ
N'ihi na kale nwere ike itolite nke ọma n'oge oyi, a na-akpọ otu ụdị rape kale 'oghere agụụ' mgbe oge oyi gasịrị n'ọrụ ugbo ọdịnala mgbe obere ihe ọzọ nwere ike ịghọrọ
A maara ụdị dị oke elu dị ka Jersey kale ma ọ bụ cabbage ehi
Kai-lan ma ọ bụ Chinese kale bụ ihe a na-ejikarị eme nri ndị China
Na Portugal, a na-akpọkarị kale nwere akwụkwọ ndụ 'couve galega' (Galician kale ma ọ bụ Portuguese Cabbage)
A na-akụ ọtụtụ ụdị kale na cabbage karịsịa maka akwụkwọ ịchọ mma na-acha ọcha, ọbara ọbara, uhie ọcha, lavender, anụnụ anụnụ ma ọ bụ violet n'ime rosette
Ụdị dị iche iche nke ihe ịchọ mma bụ peacock kale, coral prince, kamone coral queen, color up kale na chidori kale
Kale ịchọ mma bu nke a na-eri dị ka ụdị ọ bụla ọzọ, mana ọ gaghị adị ka ihe na-atọ ụtọ
A na-ejikarị akwụkwọ osisi dị ka ihe eji eme ihe maka akwụkwọ nri na akwụkwọ agbamakwụkwọ
Àtụ Nutritional value
Àtụ Nutritional value
Kale esibeghị esi nwere mmiri dị pasent ịrị asatọ na ano, carbohydrates dị pasent itoolu, protein dị pasent anọ na abụba dị otú pasent (tebụl)
Na 100g (3½ oz) kale esibeghị esi na-enye 207 kilojoules (49 kilocalories) nke ike nri na nnukwu vitamin K na ihe karịrị ugboro atọ kwa ụbọchị (DV) (tebụl)
Ọ bụ isi iyi bara ọgaranya (20% ma ọ bụ karịa nke DV) nke vitamin A, vitamin C, vitamin B6, folate, na manganese (lee tebụl 'Kale, raw')
Kale bụ ezigbo isi iyi (10 - 19% DV) nke thiamin, riboflavin, pantothenic acid, vitamin E na ọtụtụ mineral nri, gụnyere iron, calcium, magnesium, potassium, na phosphorus (lee tebụl 'Kale, raw')
Ịsi kale esi na-ebelata ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị a, ebe uru maka vitamin A, C, na K, na manganese ka dị ukwuu (lee tebụl 'Kale, esiri esi')
Kale bụ isi iyi nke carotenoids, lutein na zeaxanthin (tebụl)

Dị ka ọ dị na broccoli na akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ na-acha uhie uhie, kale nwere glucosinolate compounds, dị ka glucoraphanin, nke na-enye aka n'ịmepụta sulforaphane, ihe dị n'okpuru nnyocha mbụ maka ikike ya imetụta ahụike mmadụ n'ụzọ bara uru
Ịsị kale esi na-ebelata ọkwa nke glucosinate compounds, ebe ịsi ya obere oge n'ọkụ, microwaving ma ọ bụ ịghe ya eghe anaghị akpata nnukwu mfu
Kale nwere oxalic acid dị ukwuu, nke enwere ike ibelata site na isi ya esi
Kale nwere polyphenols dị ukwuu, dị ka ferulic acid, na ọkwa dịgasị iche iche n'ihi ihe ndị metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi na mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa
E mepụtara 'kale chips' na-atọ ụtọ dị ka ihe na-anọchi anya poteto chip
Na Netherlands, nri ọdịnala nke oge oyi a na-akpọ 'boerenkoolstamppot' bụ ngwakọta nke kale rọgọrọ arọgọ na nduku esuru esu, mgbe ụfọdụ na becon e siri esi, ma jiri rookworst ('smoked sausage')

N'ebe ugwu Germany, e nwere omenala oge oyi a maara dị ka 'Kohlfahrt' ('njem kale'), ebe otu ìgwè mmadụ ga-aga ije n'ime ọhịa n'ụbọchị tupu ha agbakọta n'ụlọ oriri ma ọ bụ ebe obibi onwe onye ebe a na-enye kale, na-ejikarị becon na Kohlwurst ('kale sausage')
A na-ewere Kale dị ka nri dị mkpa na nri ntụsara ahụ nke Northern German
N'Ịtali, cavolo nero kale bụ ihe eji eme ofe Tuscan ribollita
Nri ọdịnala Portuguese, caldo verde, na-ejikọta poteto dị ọcha, kale a kwọrọ akwọ nke ọma, mmanụ oliv na nnu
Ihe ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịgụnye broth na sausage na-esi ísì ụtọ
Na Scotland, kale nyere ntọala dị otú ahụ maka nri ọdịnala nke na okwu ahụ n'asụsụ ụfọdụ nke Scots bụ otu ihe na nri
Ịbụ 'onye na-anọghi na kail ya' bụ ọnọdụ mmadụ ịrịa ọrịa nke ukwuu nke bụ na ọ pụghị iri nri
Na Ireland, a na-agwakọta kale na nduku esuru esu iji mee nri ọdịnala colcannon
Ọ na-ewu ewu na Halloween, mgbe enwere ike inye ya na sausages

N'akwụkwọ Cuthbertson bụ Autumn in Kyle and the charm of Cunninghame, o kwuru na Kilmaurs na East Ayrshire bụ ndị a ma ama maka kale ya, nke bụ ihe oriri dị mkpa

Ihe akaebe asụsụ na-egosi n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Middle Nile Basin n'ebe ndịda nke Osimiri Abbai, dị ka ebe a na-azụ asụsụ Nilotic
Nke ahụ bụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Khartoum nke oge a

A na-eche na malite na puku afọ nke abụọ BC, ụfọdụ obodo ndị na-asụ asụsụ Nilotic malitere ịkwaga n'ebe ndịda n'ime South Sudan nke oge a ebe ọtụtụ biri na na ọha mmadụ ndị a na-akpọ Southern Nilotes gara n'ihu, na-eru ihe bụ n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Uganda nke oge a site na 1000 BC

Ọkammụta asụsụ Christopher Ehret tụrụ aro na n'agbata 1000 na 700 BC, obodo ndịda Nilotic na-asụ asụsụ, bụ ndị na-echekwa anụ ụlọ na ikekwe akọ sorghum na millet mkpịsị aka, bi n'akụkụ obodo ndị na-asụ asụsụ Kushiti dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ bụ ndị ha na ha nwere mmekọrịta ọdịbendị dị ịrịba ama
Ebe izugbe nke ebe mgbanwe omenala a bụ ebe dị nso na oke ala dị n'etiti Sudan, Uganda, Kenya na Etiopia
Kalettes (nke a maara n'oge gara aga dị ka Flower Sprouts, Petit Posy, Brukale, ma ọ bụ Brusselkale) bụ aha osisi ngwakọta maka mkpụrụ osisi kale
A zụlitere ha site na iji usoro ịzụlite ọdịnala, ha bụ ngwakọta n'etiti kale na Brussels sprouts
A na-eto osisi ahụ dị ka akwụkwọ nri na-edozi ahụ nke nwere ike iri dị ka akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma ọ bụ sie ya
'Kalette' bụ n'ezie aha akara maka akwụkwọ nri 'kale sprouts,' nke e webatara n'ahịa UK na 2010 n'okpuru aha Flower Sprouts
Okooko osisi ya yiri okooko osisi na-emeghe ihe dị ka 2 in (51 mm) n'obosara
A na-akụ ụdị atọ nwere agba abụọ maka oge owuwe ihe ubi dị iche iche maka mmalite oge, etiti oge, na owuwe ihe ọkụkụ nke oge
A na-eme ka okooko osisi ndị na-achọ mma mma mma mma mgbe a kụrụ ha n'ala na-eme nri nke pH dị n'elu 65-75
N'oge ọkọchị, osisi ndị ahụ chọrọ iji nlezianya mee ka ha na-agbanye mmiri mgbe niile
Ọ bụ Tozer Seeds malitere ngwakọta ahụ na England
E bu ụzọ webata ha na United States n'okpuru aha 'Lollipops' nke a na-eji eme ihe ugbu a
